Video, 28 May\u0131s\u2019ta Romanya\u2019n\u0131n Zalau kentinde ger\u00e7ekle\u015fen dolu ya\u011f\u0131\u015f\u0131n\u0131 g\u00f6stermektedir.\nVideo, Meteoplus adl\u0131 sayfa taraf\u0131ndan Facebook\u2019ta da payla\u015f\u0131lm\u0131\u015f ve yakla\u015f\u0131k 1.7 milyon g\u00f6r\u00fcnt\u00fcleme alm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r.\n      28 May\u0131s 2019\u2019da ger\u00e7ekle\u015fen sa\u011fanak ya\u011f\u0131\u015fta kuvvetli r\u00fczgarla birlikte yumurta b\u00fcy\u00fckl\u00fc\u011f\u00fcnde dolu ya\u011fd\u0131\u011f\u0131 g\u00f6r\u00fclm\u00fc\u015ft\u00fcr. Romanya\u2019n\u0131n Baia Mare, Zalau ve Fagaras kentlerini vuran dolu f\u0131rt\u0131nas\u0131n\u0131n yakla\u015f\u0131k 10\u201315 dakika s\u00fcrd\u00fc\u011f\u00fc bildirilmi\u015ftir.\n    Romanya\u2019n\u0131n \u00e7e\u015fitli b\u00f6lgelerini etkileyen dolu f\u0131rt\u0131nas\u0131, d\u00fczinelerce araca ve binaya ciddi hasar vermi\u015ftir. Yerel sakinlere g\u00f6re, f\u0131rt\u0131na s\u0131ras\u0131nda duvarlar sallanm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r.\n      G\u00f6r\u00fcld\u00fc\u011f\u00fc \u00fczere iddia do\u011frudur. Video, 28 May\u0131s\u2019ta Romanya\u2019n\u0131n Zalau kentindeki dolu ya\u011f\u0131\u015f\u0131n\u0131 g\u00f6stermektedir.\nKaynaklar: kaynak1, kaynak2, kaynak3, kaynak4, kaynak5\nVideo oynat\u0131c\u0131\nhttps://dogrula.org/wp-content/uploads/2018/02/dogrula.org_.mp4\n00:00\n00:07\n[Toplam:1    Ortalama:5/5] Videonun Romanya\u2019da Dolu Ya\u011f\u0131\u015f\u0131n\u0131 G\u00f6sterdi\u011fi \u0130ddias\u0131", "  Gazeteci, televizyon programc\u0131s\u0131 ve ekonomist Cem Seymen, Twitter hesab\u0131nda yapt\u0131\u011f\u0131 bir payla\u015f\u0131mda, T\u00fcrkiye\u2019deki tohumlar\u0131n \u00e7o\u011fu yabanc\u0131 kaynakl\u0131 oldu\u011funu iddia etti.\nT\u00fcrkiye\u2019deki tohumlar\u0131n \u00e7o\u011fu yabanc\u0131 kaynakl\u0131.\nM\u0131s\u0131r % 95,\nPamuk % 80,\nSoya % 80,\nSebze % 75,\nPatates % 95,\nAy\u00e7i\u00e7e\u011fi % 82,\nBu\u011fday % 5 yabanc\u0131 kaynakl\u0131 tohum.\nHastal\u0131\u011f\u0131 da beraberinde geliyor.\nSonu\u00e7 olarak tohumculuk pazar\u0131n\u0131n % 70\u2019i yabanc\u0131 firmalara ait.\nBu de\u011fi\u015fmeli!\n\u2014 Cem Seymen (@cemseymen) May 26, 2019\nS\u00f6z konusu iddialar do\u011fru de\u011fildir. \nTar\u0131m ve Orman Bakanl\u0131\u011f\u0131 Verileri\nBakanl\u0131\u011f\u0131n web sitesinde yer alan, y\u0131llara g\u00f6re tohumluk \u00fcretimlerinin yer ald\u0131\u011f\u0131 tablo \u015fu \u015fekilde:\n    Y\u0131llara g\u00f6re tohum ithalat\u0131 tablosu:\n    Y\u0131llara g\u00f6re tohum ihracat\u0131 tablosu:\nT\u00fcrkiye Tohumcular Birli\u011fi D\u0131\u015f Ticaret Verileri\nT\u00fcrkiye Tohumcular Birli\u011fi (T\u00dcRKTOB) web sitesinde yer alan d\u0131\u015f ticaret verilerinin yer ald\u0131\u011f\u0131 tablo \u015fu \u015fekilde:\nTabloda, 2018\u2019de ihracat\u0131n ithalat\u0131 kar\u015f\u0131lama oran\u0131 %108 olarak g\u00f6r\u00fcl\u00fcyor.\n5553 Say\u0131l\u0131 Tohumculuk Kanunu\nResmi Gazete\u2019de yer alan 5553 Say\u0131l\u0131 Tohumculuk Kanunu\u2019nda, \u00e7ift\u00e7ilerin kendi ihtiya\u00e7lar\u0131 i\u00e7in ticarete konu olmamak kayd\u0131yla yapacaklar\u0131 tohum \u00fcretiminin kanun h\u00fck\u00fcmlerinden m\u00fcstesna tutuldu\u011fu ifadesi yer al\u0131yor:\n  5042 Say\u0131l\u0131 Yeni Bitki \u00c7e\u015fitlerine Ait Islah\u00e7\u0131 Haklar\u0131n\u0131n Korunmas\u0131na \u0130li\u015fkin Kanun\n5042 Say\u0131l\u0131 Yeni Bitki \u00c7e\u015fitlerine Ait Islah\u00e7\u0131 Haklar\u0131n\u0131n Korunmas\u0131na \u0130li\u015fkin Kanun\u2019da, koruma alt\u0131na al\u0131nan yeni \u00e7e\u015fitleri kullanan \u00e7ift\u00e7ilerin elde ettikleri \u00fcr\u00fcnlerini tohum olarak kullanmas\u0131na izin veriliyor:\n  Tohumda Do\u011fru Bilinen Yanl\u0131\u015flar\nBakanl\u0131k, web sitesinde Sorular ve Cevaplarla Tohumda Do\u011fru Bilinen Yanl\u0131\u015flar adl\u0131 bir bilgilendirme raporu olu\u015fturmu\u015f:\n  T\u00dcRKTOB Ba\u015fkan\u0131 Sava\u015f Akcan\u2019\u0131n A\u00e7\u0131klamalar\u0131\n  T\u00fcrkiye Tohumcular Birli\u011fi (T\u00dcRKTOB) Ba\u015fkan\u0131 Sava\u015f Akcan, \u2018T\u00fcrkiye\u2019nin tohumculukta d\u0131\u015fa ba\u011f\u0131ml\u0131 bir \u00fclke olmad\u0131\u011f\u0131n\u0131, \u0130srail tohumu konusunun da bir \u015fehir efsanesi oldu\u011funu\u2019 belirten bir a\u00e7\u0131klama yapm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r:\n  Tohumculukla \u0130lgili Verilere Nas\u0131l Ula\u015fabiliriz?\n  Tar\u0131m ve Orman Bakanl\u0131\u011f\u0131 web sitesinden Y\u0131llara G\u00f6re Tohumluk \u00dcretim Miktarlar\u0131na buradan, Yetkilendirilmi\u015f Tohumculuk Kurulu\u015flar\u0131na buradan, Yetkilendirilmi\u015f Tohumculuk Kurulu\u015fu Olabilmek \u0130\u00e7in Gerekli \u015eartlara buradan, Kamu ve \u00d6zel Sekt\u00f6r \u00dcretim Paylar\u0131na buradan ula\u015fmak m\u00fcmk\u00fcn.\n  G\u00f6r\u00fcld\u00fc\u011f\u00fc \u00fczere, tohumculuk hakk\u0131ndaki s\u00f6z konusu iddialar do\u011fru de\u011fildir.\nKaynaklar: kaynak1, kaynak2, kaynak3, kaynak4, kaynak5, kaynak6, kaynak7, kaynak8\nVideo oynat\u0131c\u0131\nhttps://dogrula.org/wp-content/uploads/2018/02/dogrula.org_.mp4\n00:00\n00:07\n[Toplam:0    Ortalama:0/5] T\u00fcrkiye\u2019de Tohumculuk Pazar\u0131n\u0131n %70\u2019i Yabanc\u0131 Firmalara Ait\u00a0\u0130ddias\u0131", "  Cumhuriyet Halk Partisi Genel Ba\u015fkan Ba\u015fdan\u0131\u015fman\u0131 Deniz Demir, 11 May\u0131s tarihinde yapt\u0131\u011f\u0131 bir Twitter payla\u015f\u0131m\u0131nda, bir sokak r\u00f6portaj\u0131 videosundaki ki\u015finin hislerine terc\u00fcman olan bir vatanda\u015f oldu\u011funu belirtti.\nAbla hislerimize terc\u00fcman olmu\u015f. A\u011fz\u0131na sa\u011fl\u0131k 54 saniyede her \u015fey bu kadar m\u0131 g\u00fczel \u00f6zetlenir. pic.twitter.com/bKRzHgP6jN\n\u2014 Deniz Demir (@demirdenizchp) May 11, 2019\n  Payla\u015f\u0131m\u0131n alt\u0131na yap\u0131lan yorumlarda ise, videodaki kad\u0131n\u0131n s\u0131radan bir vatanda\u015f de\u011fil, CHP Esenyurt Meclis \u00fcyesi oldu\u011fu iddia edildi:\n  S\u00f6z konusu iddia do\u011frudur. Videodaki kad\u0131n, Cumhuriyet Halk Partisi Esenyurt Meclis \u00dcyesi Emine Polat\u2019t\u0131r.\nESENYURT BELED\u0130YES\u0130 CUMHUR\u0130YET HALK PART\u0130S\u0130 MECL\u0130S \u00dcYELER\u0130\nEsenyurt Belediyesinin web sitesinde yer alan CHP meclis \u00fcyeleri aras\u0131nda Emine Polat ismi g\u00f6r\u00fcl\u00fcyor:\n  Videoda yer alan kad\u0131n\u0131n Emine Polat ile benzerli\u011fi, foto\u011fraflarla da \u00f6rt\u00fc\u015f\u00fcyor.\nCHP ESENYURT KADIN KOLLARI BA\u015eKANLI\u011eI\nVideoda yer alan Emine Polat, CHP Esenyurt Kad\u0131n Kollar\u0131 Ba\u015fkan\u0131 olarak da g\u00f6r\u00fcl\u00fcyor:\n  G\u00f6r\u00fcld\u00fc\u011f\u00fc \u00fczere, Cumhuriyet Halk Partisi Genel Ba\u015fkan Ba\u015fdan\u0131\u015fman\u0131 Deniz Demir\u2019in, bir sokak r\u00f6portaj\u0131 videosunda hislerine terc\u00fcman olan s\u0131radan bir vatanda\u015f oldu\u011funu belirtti\u011fi kad\u0131n\u0131n CHP Esenyurt Meclis \u00dcyesi oldu\u011fu iddias\u0131 do\u011frudur.\nKaynaklar: kaynak1, kaynak2, kaynak3\nVideo oynat\u0131c\u0131\nhttps://dogrula.org/wp-content/uploads/2018/02/dogrula.org_.mp4\n00:00\n00:07\n[Toplam:0    Ortalama:0/5] Videodaki Kad\u0131n\u0131n CHP Esenyurt Meclis \u00dcyesi Oldu\u011fu \u0130ddias\u0131", "  \u0130hbar olarak dogrula.org\u2019a gelen bir haberde, Cumhuriyet Halk Partisi\u2019nin 6 ay \u00f6nce \u0130stanbul B\u00fcy\u00fck\u015fehir Belediyesi\u2019nde yap\u0131lan su indirimi \u00f6nerisine hay\u0131r oyu verdi\u011fi iddia edildi.\nS\u00f6z konusu iddia do\u011frudur. Chp grubu 6 ay \u00f6nce \u0130BB Meclisi\u2019nde Ak Parti grubu taraf\u0131ndan teklif edilen %15 su indirimi \u00f6nerisine hay\u0131r oyu vermi\u015ftir. \u00d6neri, Chp muhalefetiyle, oy \u00e7oklu\u011fuyla kabul edilmi\u015ftir.\n  14 Kas\u0131m 2018 Tarihli Meclis Kararlar\u0131\nKarar no \u0130SK\u0130 18\u2019deki 6 numaral\u0131 raporun, CHP muhalefetiyle, oy \u00e7oklu\u011fuyla kabul edildi\u011fi g\u00f6r\u00fcl\u00fcyor.\nKarara \u0130li\u015fkin S\u00f6z Konusu Video\nCHP grubunun, 6 ay \u00f6nce \u0130stanbul\u2019da suyun %15 indirimli olmas\u0131 teklifine kar\u015f\u0131 \u00e7\u0131kt\u0131\u011f\u0131 g\u00f6r\u00fcl\u00fcyor.\nG\u00f6r\u00fcnt\u00fcde AK Parti Grup S\u00f6zc\u00fcs\u00fc \u00d6mer \u015eahan, 14 Kas\u0131m 2018\u2018de \u0130stanbul B\u00fcy\u00fck\u015fehir Belediye Meclisi\u2019ne \u0130stanbul\u2019da su fiyatlar\u0131nda %15 indirime gitme teklifi sunduklar\u0131n\u0131, \u201c\u0130SK\u0130\u2019den gelen teklif indirimiyle birlikte suda %15 indirim yap\u0131yoruz. \u0130stanbullulara hay\u0131rl\u0131 olsun\u201d diyerek a\u00e7\u0131kl\u0131yor.\n  \u0130BB Meclis \u00fcyesi ve CHP Parti Grup S\u00f6zc\u00fcs\u00fc olan Tar\u0131k Balyal\u0131\u2019n\u0131n, \u201cBug\u00fcnk\u00fc \u0130SK\u0130 Genel Kurulu\u2019nda 6, 7, 8 ve 9 nolu raporlara CHP grubu olarak hay\u0131r oyu veriyoruz\u201d dedi\u011fi g\u00f6r\u00fcl\u00fcyor.\n6 No\u2019lu rapor oylamaya sunuluyor. AK Parti grubu, \u2018Evet, CHP grubu ise \u2018Hay\u0131r\u2019 oyu veriyor. Suyun %15 indirimli olmas\u0131na ili\u015fkin karar\u0131n oy \u00e7oklu\u011fuyla al\u0131nd\u0131\u011f\u0131, \u0130BB Meclis Ba\u015fkan Vekili G\u00f6ksel G\u00fcm\u00fc\u015fda\u011f taraf\u0131ndan a\u00e7\u0131klan\u0131yor.\nO d\u00f6nem \u0130BB Meclisi\u2019nin Kas\u0131m ay\u0131nda ger\u00e7ekle\u015fen toplant\u0131da ald\u0131\u011f\u0131, \u201cT\u00fcm abone gruplar\u0131nda su tarifeleri, 1 Ocak 2019\u2019dan itibaren %15 indirimli olacak\u201d karar\u0131 y\u00fcr\u00fcrl\u00fc\u011fe girmi\u015fti.\n  14 Kas\u0131m 2018 Tarihli Su \u0130ndirimi Haberi\nKarar\u0131, 14 Kas\u0131m 2018 tarihli haberlerde g\u00f6rmek m\u00fcmk\u00fcn:\n  G\u00f6r\u00fcld\u00fc\u011f\u00fc \u00fczere, Cumhuriyet Halk Partisi\u2019nin 6 ay \u00f6nce \u0130stanbul B\u00fcy\u00fck\u015fehir Belediyesi\u2019nde Ak Parti grubu taraf\u0131ndan teklif edilen %15 su indirimi \u00f6nerisine hay\u0131r oyu verdi\u011fi iddias\u0131 do\u011frudur. \u00d6neri, CHP muhalefetiyle, oy \u00e7oklu\u011fuyla kabul edilmi\u015ftir.\nKaynaklar: kaynak1, kaynak2, kaynak3\nVideo oynat\u0131c\u0131\nhttps://dogrula.org/wp-content/uploads/2018/02/dogrula.org_.mp4\n00:00\n00:07\n[Toplam:0    Ortalama:0/5] CHP\u2019nin 6 Ay \u00d6nce \u0130BB\u2019de Su \u0130ndirimi \u00d6nerisine Hay\u0131r Oyu Verdi\u011fi \u0130ddias\u0131", "  Sosyal medya ve \u0130nternet ortamlar\u0131nda, yenilenecek \u0130stanbul se\u00e7imlerinde ba\u015fka \u015fehirlerden 100 bin polisin gelip oy kullanaca\u011f\u0131 iddialar\u0131 dola\u015fmaktad\u0131r.\nS\u00f6z konusu iddialar do\u011fru de\u011fildir. \u0130\u00e7i\u015fleri Bakanl\u0131\u011f\u0131 iddialar\u0131n ger\u00e7e\u011fi yans\u0131tmad\u0131\u011f\u0131n\u0131 ve se\u00e7men listelerinin 31 Ocak itibar\u0131yla kesinle\u015fti\u011fini a\u00e7\u0131klam\u0131\u015ft\u0131r. Se\u00e7imlerin yenilenmesi gereken yerlere ili\u015fkin Y\u00fcksek Se\u00e7im Kurulunun alm\u0131\u015f oldu\u011fu 1683 say\u0131l\u0131 kararda se\u00e7men listelerinde g\u00fcncelleme yap\u0131lmayaca\u011f\u0131 net bir \u015fekilde ifade edilmi\u015ftir.\n\u0130\u00e7i\u015fleri Bakanl\u0131\u011f\u0131 Twitter hesab\u0131nda yapt\u0131\u011f\u0131 bir payla\u015f\u0131mda, 100 bin polisin \u0130stanbul\u2019a getirilerek oy kulland\u0131r\u0131laca\u011f\u0131 iddialar\u0131n\u0131n ger\u00e7e\u011fi yans\u0131tmad\u0131\u011f\u0131n\u0131 ve se\u00e7men listelerinin 31 Ocak itibar\u0131yla kesinle\u015fti\u011fini a\u00e7\u0131klam\u0131\u015ft\u0131r.\nSosyal medyada kas\u0131tl\u0131 olarak servis edilen ikamet zorunlulu\u011fu olmamas\u0131 nedeniyle 100.000 Polisin \u0130stanbul\u2019a getirilerek oy kulland\u0131r\u0131laca\u011f\u0131na ili\u015fkin ger\u00e7ek d\u0131\u015f\u0131 payla\u015f\u0131mlar\u0131n yan\u0131lt\u0131c\u0131 bir alg\u0131 olu\u015fturmamas\u0131 ad\u0131na, ger\u00e7ek durumun kamuoyu ile payla\u015f\u0131lmas\u0131na ihtiya\u00e7 duyulmu\u015ftur; pic.twitter.com/8IaFP8g25k\n\u2014 T.C. \u0130\u00e7i\u015fleri Bakanl\u0131\u011f\u0131 (@TC_icisleri) May 9, 2019\nBakanl\u0131\u011f\u0131n A\u00e7\u0131klama Metni\nBakanl\u0131\u011f\u0131n payla\u015f\u0131m\u0131nda, \u201cSosyal medyada kas\u0131tl\u0131 olarak servis edilen ikamet zorunlulu\u011fu olmamas\u0131 nedeniyle 100.000 Polisin \u0130stanbul\u2019a getirilerek oy kulland\u0131r\u0131laca\u011f\u0131na ili\u015fkin ger\u00e7ek d\u0131\u015f\u0131 payla\u015f\u0131mlar\u0131n yan\u0131lt\u0131c\u0131 bir alg\u0131 olu\u015fturmamas\u0131 ad\u0131na, ger\u00e7ek durumun kamuoyu ile payla\u015f\u0131lmas\u0131na ihtiya\u00e7 duyulmu\u015ftur.\u201d ifadesi yer alm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r.\n      Se\u00e7imlerin yenilenmesi gereken yerlere ili\u015fkin Y\u00fcksek Se\u00e7im Kurulunun alm\u0131\u015f oldu\u011fu 1683 say\u0131l\u0131 kararda se\u00e7men listelerinde g\u00fcncelleme yap\u0131lmayaca\u011f\u0131 net bir \u015fekilde ifade edilmi\u015ftir:\n  298 say\u0131l\u0131 Se\u00e7imlerin Temel H\u00fck\u00fcmleri ve Se\u00e7men K\u00fct\u00fckleri Hakk\u0131nda Kanun\u2019da yer alan ilgili k\u0131s\u0131m:\n    G\u00f6r\u00fcld\u00fc\u011f\u00fc \u00fczere iddia do\u011fru de\u011fildir. \u0130\u00e7i\u015fleri Bakanl\u0131\u011f\u0131 iddialar\u0131n ger\u00e7e\u011fi yans\u0131tmad\u0131\u011f\u0131n\u0131 ve se\u00e7men listelerinin 31 Ocak itibar\u0131yla kesinle\u015fti\u011fini a\u00e7\u0131klam\u0131\u015ft\u0131r. Se\u00e7imlerin yenilenmesi gereken yerlere ili\u015fkin Y\u00fcksek Se\u00e7im Kurulunun alm\u0131\u015f oldu\u011fu 1683 say\u0131l\u0131 kararda se\u00e7men listelerinde g\u00fcncelleme yap\u0131lmayaca\u011f\u0131 net bir \u015fekilde ifade edilmi\u015ftir.\nKaynaklar: kaynak1, kaynak2, kaynak3, kaynak4\nVideo oynat\u0131c\u0131\nhttps://dogrula.org/wp-content/uploads/2018/02/dogrula.org_.mp4\n00:00\n00:07\n[Toplam:0    Ortalama:0/5] 100 bin Polisin \u0130stanbul\u2019a Getirilerek Oy Kulland\u0131r\u0131laca\u011f\u0131 \u0130ddias\u0131", "  T\u00fcrk Psikologlar Derne\u011fi Twitter hesab\u0131nda yap\u0131lan bir payla\u015f\u0131mda, g\u00f6rseldeki kelebe\u011fin nesli t\u00fckenmekte olan y\u0131ld\u0131zl\u0131 kelebek ad\u0131nda bir t\u00fcr oldu\u011fu iddia edildi.\nS\u00f6z konusu iddia do\u011fru de\u011fildir. Foto\u011fraf, nesli t\u00fckenmekte olan y\u0131ld\u0131zl\u0131 bir t\u00fcr\u00fc g\u00f6stermiyor. G\u00f6rsel, bir Instagram kullan\u0131c\u0131s\u0131 taraf\u0131ndan tasarlanm\u0131\u015f bir dijital sanat eseri.\n  S\u00f6zde \u201cnesli t\u00fckenmekte olan y\u0131ld\u0131zl\u0131 bir kelebe\u011fi\u201d g\u00f6sterdi\u011fi s\u00f6ylenen bu resim, Facebook\u2019ta Earth Wonders adl\u0131 bir sayfada payla\u015f\u0131ld\u0131 ve 24 bin be\u011feni ve 70.000\u2019den fazla payla\u015f\u0131m ald\u0131:\n    Ancak bu ger\u00e7ek bir kelebek foto\u011fraf\u0131 de\u011fil; Sara Shakeel adl\u0131 Instagram kullan\u0131c\u0131s\u0131 taraf\u0131ndan tasarlanm\u0131\u015f bir dijital sanat eseridir.\nBu dijital sanat eserinin temel imaj\u0131n\u0131 do\u011fa foto\u011fraf\u00e7\u0131s\u0131 Stephen Powell\u2019\u0131n web sitesinde de bulmak m\u00fcmk\u00fcn.\n  \u0130\u015fte Powell\u2019\u0131n orijinal foto\u011fraf\u0131 (solda) ve Shakeel\u2019in dijital sanat\u0131n\u0131n (sa\u011fda) kar\u015f\u0131la\u015ft\u0131rmas\u0131:\n  Shakeel bu \u00e7al\u0131\u015fmas\u0131n\u0131 ilk olarak Mart 2019\u2019da yay\u0131nlam\u0131\u015f. Daha sonra bunun bir kelebe\u011fin orijinal bir foto\u011fraf\u0131 de\u011fil, bir kolaj sanat\u0131 oldu\u011funu a\u00e7\u0131klam\u0131\u015f:\n  G\u00f6r\u00fcld\u00fc\u011f\u00fc \u00fczere s\u00f6z konusu iddia do\u011fru de\u011fildir. Foto\u011fraf, nesli t\u00fckenmekte olan y\u0131ld\u0131zl\u0131 bir t\u00fcr\u00fc g\u00f6stermiyor. G\u00f6rsel, bir Instagram kullan\u0131c\u0131s\u0131 taraf\u0131ndan tasarlanm\u0131\u015f bir dijital sanat eseri.\nKaynaklar: kaynak1, kaynak2, kaynak3, kaynak4, kaynak5\nVideo oynat\u0131c\u0131\nhttps://dogrula.org/wp-content/uploads/2018/02/dogrula.org_.mp4\n00:00\n00:07\n[Toplam:0    Ortalama:0/5] Nesli T\u00fckenmekte Olan Y\u0131ld\u0131zl\u0131 Kelebek \u0130ddias\u0131", "  \u0130hbar olarak dogrula.org\u2019a gelen bir haberde, Avusturya\u2019da bozkurt i\u015fareti yapmak resmi olarak yasakland\u0131\u011f\u0131 iddia edildi.\nS\u00f6z konusu iddia do\u011frudur.\nAvusturya \u0130\u00e7i\u015fleri Bakanl\u0131\u011f\u0131, radikal \u0130slamc\u0131 ve milliyet\u00e7i sembolleri yasaklayan bir kararname yay\u0131mlam\u0131\u015ft\u0131r. M\u00fcsl\u00fcman Karde\u015fler, Hamas, Hizbullah, El-Kaide, Bokurt (Graue W\u00f6lfe\u200a\u2014\u200aGray Wolves), PKK ve H\u0131rvat-fa\u015fist Ustasha\u2019y\u0131 i\u00e7eren 13 bayrak ve sembol\u00fc yasaklam\u0131\u015ft\u0131r.\n(\u0130ngilizcesi)\n  \u201cElektronik ileti\u015fim ara\u00e7lar\u0131 da dahil olmak \u00fczere belirtilen gruplar\u0131n sembollerinin g\u00f6sterilmesi veya da\u011f\u0131t\u0131lmas\u0131 yasakt\u0131r. Semboller rozetleri, amblemleri ve el hareketlerini i\u00e7erir.\u201d denmi\u015ftir.\n1 Mart\u2019ta y\u00fcr\u00fcrl\u00fc\u011fe giren yasak, kamuoyunda bayrak veya sembolleri g\u00f6steren herkesi kaps\u0131yor ve bu su\u00e7u i\u015fleyenlerin 4-10 bin Euro para cezas\u0131na \u00e7arpt\u0131r\u0131lmas\u0131 kararla\u015ft\u0131r\u0131lm\u0131\u015f:\n  (\u0130ngilizcesi)\nYasaklanan bayrak ve semboller \u015fu \u015fekilde g\u00f6sterilmi\u015f:\n  Ayr\u0131ca Avusturya Ba\u015fbakan Yard\u0131mc\u0131s\u0131 ve \u00d6zg\u00fcrl\u00fck Partisi lideri (FP\u00d6) Heinz-Christian Strache, Avusturya\u2019da Recep Tayyip Erdo\u011fan\u2019a oy veren T\u00fcrklerin T\u00fcrkiye\u2019ye d\u00f6nmesi gerekti\u011fini s\u00f6ylemi\u015fti.\nStrache, Facebook\u2019ta yapt\u0131\u011f\u0131 payla\u015f\u0131mda \u201cAvusturya\u2019da Erdo\u011fan\u2019a oy veren t\u00fcm T\u00fcrklerin T\u00fcrkiye\u2019ye d\u00f6nmelerini tavsiye ediyorum!\u201d demi\u015fti.\n  G\u00f6r\u00fcld\u00fc\u011f\u00fc \u00fczere iddia do\u011frudur. Avusturya \u0130\u00e7i\u015fleri Bakanl\u0131\u011f\u0131, islamc\u0131 ve milliyet\u00e7i sembolleri yasaklayan bir kararname sunmu\u015ftur. M\u00fcsl\u00fcman Karde\u015fler, Hamas, Hizbullah, El-Kaide, Bokurt, PKK ve H\u0131rvat-fa\u015fist Ustasha\u2019y\u0131 i\u00e7eren 13 bayrak ve sembol\u00fc yasaklam\u0131\u015ft\u0131r.\nKaynaklar: kaynak1, kaynak2, kaynak3, kaynak4, kaynak5\nVideo oynat\u0131c\u0131\nhttps://dogrula.org/wp-content/uploads/2018/02/dogrula.org_.mp4\n00:00\n00:07\n[Toplam:0    Ortalama:0/5] Avusturya\u2019da Bozkurt \u0130\u015fareti Yapmak Resmi Olarak Yasakland\u0131 \u0130ddias\u0131", "  S\u00f6zc\u00fc Gazetesinden \u00c7i\u011fdem Toker\u2019in bir k\u00f6\u015fe yaz\u0131s\u0131nda iddia etti\u011fi \u2018\u0130BB STK-Yurt-Okul Faaliyet Raporu 2018\u2019 adl\u0131 belgede yer alanlar, \u0130nternet ortamlar\u0131nda payla\u015f\u0131ld\u0131\u011f\u0131 g\u00fcnden bu yana g\u00fcndemden d\u00fc\u015fm\u00fcyor.\nAncak rapora dair herhangi bir do\u011frulama yapmak m\u00fcmk\u00fcn de\u011fil, zira \u0130BB ve s\u00f6z konusu vak\u0131flardan baz\u0131lar\u0131 iddiay\u0131 yalanlam\u0131\u015f. Ayr\u0131ca raporun ger\u00e7ekli\u011fi hususunda dikkat \u00e7eken baz\u0131 b\u00f6l\u00fcmler var.\nS\u00f6z Konusu Raporda Dikkat \u00c7ekenler\n  STK-Okul-Yurt Faaliyet Raporu 2018 ad\u0131yla yay\u0131mlanan raporun \u0130stanbul B\u00fcy\u00fck\u015fehir Belediyesi taraf\u0131ndan haz\u0131rland\u0131\u011f\u0131 iddia edilmi\u015fti. Ancak \u0130BB bu raporun \u2018ger\u00e7ek d\u0131\u015f\u0131\u2019 oldu\u011funu s\u00f6ylemi\u015f. Vak\u0131flara para aktar\u0131ld\u0131\u011f\u0131 iddias\u0131na ili\u015fkin a\u00e7\u0131klamas\u0131n\u0131n ilgili k\u0131sm\u0131nda, \u201cBaz\u0131 medya organlar\u0131nda \u00e7arp\u0131t\u0131larak haber konusu edilen \u2018\u0130BB\u2019den Vak\u0131flara Hizmet Raporu\u2019 ger\u00e7ek d\u0131\u015f\u0131d\u0131r, do\u011frulu\u011fu teyit edilmemi\u015f bilgilerle olu\u015fturuldu\u011fu anla\u015f\u0131lmaktad\u0131r.\u201d ifadesi yer al\u0131yor.\n  \u00c7i\u011fdem Toker kendisi de bu raporun haz\u0131rland\u0131\u011f\u0131n\u0131 fakat ilan edilmedi\u011fini yazm\u0131\u015f. Bu sebeple raporun yaz\u0131lmas\u0131na ra\u011fmen neden yay\u0131mlanmad\u0131\u011f\u0131, Toker\u2019in bu rapora nas\u0131l ula\u015ft\u0131\u011f\u0131 ve raporun ne derece do\u011fru oldu\u011fu daha da belirsizle\u015fiyor.\n\u20182018 Y\u0131l\u0131 ve \u00d6ncesi\u2019 Tam Olarak Hangi Tarihi \u0130\u015faret Ediyor?\nRaporda yer alan \u201c2018 y\u0131l\u0131 ve \u00f6ncesini kapsamaktad\u0131r\u2026\u201d ifadesinin belirli bir tarihi i\u015faret etmemesi dikkat \u00e7ekiyor.\n  1994 y\u0131l\u0131nda Recep Tayyip Erdo\u011fan Refah Partisi\u2019nden aday olmu\u015f ve \u0130BB ba\u015fkan\u0131 se\u00e7ilmi\u015fti. 2001 y\u0131l\u0131nda Ak Parti kuruldu ve Erdo\u011fan genel ba\u015fkan se\u00e7ildi.\nErdo\u011fan\u2019\u0131n ard\u0131ndan 1998 y\u0131l\u0131nda Fazilet Partisi\u2019nden (daha sonra ba\u011f\u0131ms\u0131z aday olarak) Ali M\u00fcfit G\u00fcrtuna, 2004 y\u0131l\u0131nda Ak Parti\u2019den Kadir Topba\u015f, 2017 y\u0131l\u0131nda ise yine Ak Parti\u2019den Mevl\u00fct Uysal \u0130BB ba\u015fkan\u0131 oldu.\n\u0130stanbul B\u00fcy\u00fck\u015fehir Belediyesi 14 y\u0131ld\u0131r Ak Partili ba\u015fkanlar taraf\u0131ndan y\u00f6netiliyordu. Ancak s\u00f6z konusu raporda \u20182018 ve \u00f6ncesi\u2019 ifadesinin 2018 y\u0131l\u0131n\u0131n ne kadar \u00f6ncesini ve hangi ba\u015fkan\u0131n d\u00f6nemini kapsad\u0131\u011f\u0131 belli de\u011fil.\nAyr\u0131ca \u0130BB\u2019nin 2018 y\u0131l\u0131 belediye b\u00fct\u00e7esi 20 milyar 100 milyon lira olarak belirlenmi\u015fti. \u0130BB\u2019nin oldu\u011fu iddia edilen raporda bu b\u00fct\u00e7eden yakla\u015f\u0131k 848 milyonun hangi y\u0131lda ya da y\u0131llarda STK, okul ve yurtlara aktar\u0131ld\u0131\u011f\u0131 belli olmuyor.\nBaz\u0131 Kalemlerde G\u00f6sterilmeyen Kuru\u015f Birimi\nBelgenin son kullan\u0131c\u0131ya ula\u015farak sosyal medya ve \u0130nternet ortamlar\u0131nda en \u00e7ok payla\u015f\u0131lan ilgili b\u00f6l\u00fcm\u00fcndeki \u201cokul spor salonlar\u0131\u201d kaleminde virg\u00fclden sonraki kuru\u015f birimi eklenmemi\u015f. Bu da asl\u0131nda en \u00e7ok yat\u0131r\u0131m yap\u0131ld\u0131\u011f\u0131 i\u015faret edilen alan\u0131n nispeten az g\u00f6r\u00fcnmesine yol a\u00e7m\u0131\u015f.\n  S\u00f6z konusu rapordaki okul ve spor salonlar\u0131 maliyetinin toplam\u0131, genel toplamdan \u00e7\u0131kar\u0131l\u0131nca, yakla\u015f\u0131k 308 milyonluk bir miktar kal\u0131yor. Bunun da bahsedilen STK\u2019lara sadece 1 y\u0131lda verilip verilmedi\u011fi ya da hangi y\u0131llarda verildi\u011fi belli de\u011fil.\n\u0130BB Duyurusu\nPek \u00e7ok platformda payla\u015f\u0131larak h\u0131zla yay\u0131lan iddialar \u00fczerine \u0130stanbul B\u00fcy\u00fck\u015fehir Belediyesi AA kanal\u0131yla a\u00e7\u0131klama yapt\u0131: \u201cB\u00fcy\u00fck\u015fehir Belediyesinden hi\u00e7bir vakfa nakit aktar\u0131m\u0131 kesinlikle s\u00f6z konusu de\u011fildir.\u201d\n  T\u00fcgva\u2019dan Gelen Yalanlama\nT\u00fcrkiye Gen\u00e7lik Vakf\u0131 da \u0130BB taraf\u0131ndan vakfa para aktar\u0131ld\u0131\u011f\u0131 iddialar\u0131n\u0131 yalanlad\u0131.\n\u201cT\u00dcGVA, \u0130stanbul B\u00fcy\u00fck\u015fehir Belediyesi ile yapm\u0131\u015f oldu\u011fu Belediye Meclis karar\u0131yla onaylanan protokol \u00e7er\u00e7evesinde sosyal ve k\u00fclt\u00fcrel aktivitelerde mevzu bahis belediyenin kamunun yarar\u0131na sundu\u011fu ayni imk\u00e2nlar\u0131ndan istifade etmi\u015f olup, bunun d\u0131\u015f\u0131nda bahsi ge\u00e7en kurumdan vakf\u0131m\u0131za tek bir kuru\u015f dahi nakdi yard\u0131mda bulunulmam\u0131\u015ft\u0131r.\u201d\nT3 Vakf\u0131 (T\u00fcrkiye Teknoloji Tak\u0131m\u0131) \u0130ddialar\u0131 Yalanlad\u0131\nM\u00fctevelli heyetinde Erdo\u011fan\u2019\u0131n damad\u0131 Sel\u00e7uk Bayraktar\u2019\u0131n da bulundu\u011fu T\u00fcrkiye Teknoloji Tak\u0131m\u0131 Vakf\u0131, \u0130BB\u2019den aktar\u0131lan para iddialar\u0131n\u0131 web sitesinde bir duyuruyla yalanlad\u0131:\nHazine ve Maliye Bakanl\u0131\u011f\u0131 Bas\u0131n M\u00fc\u015favirinin Twitter Payla\u015f\u0131m\u0131\nHazine ve Maliye Bakanl\u0131\u011f\u0131 Bas\u0131n M\u00fc\u015faviri Mehmet Ali Berber, Twitter hesab\u0131nda \u015fu a\u00e7\u0131klamay\u0131 yaparak iddialar\u0131 yalanlad\u0131:\n\u201cBahsettikleri rakam, \u201csiyasi partilerden Maarif vakf\u0131na, afet b\u00f6lgesindeki alanlar\u0131n d\u00f6n\u00fc\u015f\u00fcmlerine\u201c kadar \u00e7ok say\u0131da kalemden olu\u015fan \u201ckar amac\u0131 g\u00fctmeyen kurulu\u015flara\u201d yap\u0131lan \u00f6demelerdir.\u201d\nBu haberi yapanlar ve yayanlar i\u00e7in hukuki s\u00fcre\u00e7ler i\u015fletilecek.\nBu \u00f6demelerle ilgili tabloya buradan ula\u015fabilirsiniz. https://t.co/4ituxp1guN\n\u00c7o\u011fu \u00fclkede olmayan \u015feffafl\u0131kla \u00e7al\u0131\u015fan kurumlara iftira atmak bu kadar basit olmamal\u0131. Bu zihniyet ile sonuna kadar m\u00fccadele edece\u011fiz.\n\u2014 mehmet ali berber (@mali_berber) April 18, 2019\nBerber\u2019in payla\u015ft\u0131\u011f\u0131 tablodan kar amac\u0131 g\u00fctmeyen kurulu\u015flara yap\u0131lan s\u00f6z konusu \u00f6demeleri burada g\u00f6rmek m\u00fcmk\u00fcn.\n  G\u00f6r\u00fcld\u00fc\u011f\u00fc \u00fczere bahsi ge\u00e7en rapor \u0130BB taraf\u0131ndan \u2018ger\u00e7ek d\u0131\u015f\u0131\u2018 olarak tan\u0131mlanm\u0131\u015f, bilgilerin do\u011frulu\u011funun teyit edilmedi\u011fi s\u00f6ylenmi\u015f. Ayr\u0131ca baz\u0131 vak\u0131flar da para aktar\u0131ld\u0131\u011f\u0131 iddias\u0131n\u0131 yalanlam\u0131\u015f. Raporun do\u011frulu\u011fu hususunda dikkat \u00e7eken detaylar da mevcut. T\u00fcm bunlar bir araya geldi\u011finde, s\u00f6z konusu iddian\u0131n tam bir belirsizlik ta\u015f\u0131d\u0131\u011f\u0131 s\u00f6ylenebilir.\nKaynaklar: kaynak1, kaynak2, kaynak3, kaynak4, kaynak5, kaynak6, kaynak7, kaynak8, kaynak9, kaynak10\nVideo oynat\u0131c\u0131\nhttps://dogrula.org/wp-content/uploads/2018/02/dogrula.org_.mp4\n00:00\n00:07\n[Toplam:0    Ortalama:0/5] Ara\u015ft\u0131rma: \u0130BB\u2019den Vak\u0131flara Aktar\u0131lan Para \u0130ddialar\u0131", "  \u0130nternet ortamlar\u0131nda s\u0131k\u00e7a payla\u015f\u0131lan ve ihbar olarak dogrula.org\u2019a g\u00f6nderilen bu g\u00f6rseldeki y\u00fcz\u00fc kanl\u0131 ki\u015finin Osmanl\u0131 Padi\u015fah\u0131 2. Abd\u00fclhamid oldu\u011fu iddia edildi. Pek \u00e7ok yerde payla\u015f\u0131lan bu iddia, binlerce be\u011feni ve yorum etkile\u015fimi ald\u0131.\n    S\u00f6z konusu iddia do\u011fru de\u011fildir; foto\u011fraftaki ki\u015fi Sultan 2. Abd\u00fclhamid de\u011fildir. \u00c7\u00fcnk\u00fc iddiadaki g\u00f6rsel o d\u00f6nemde \u00e7ekilen bir foto\u011fraf de\u011fil, Gennaro Amato (1857-1947) taraf\u0131ndan \u00e7izilen bir resimdir. Resim detayl\u0131 \u015fekilde incelendi\u011finde bunu g\u00f6rmek m\u00fcmk\u00fcn. Ayr\u0131ca ressam\u0131n imzas\u0131yla ba\u015fka tarihi resimleri de bulunuyor.\nFoto\u011fraf De\u011fil Resim\nS\u00f6z konusu resimler ressam Gennaro d\u2019Amato (1857-1947) taraf\u0131ndan \u00e7izilmi\u015f. Ressam\u0131n ayn\u0131 imzayla bir ba\u015fka tarihi resmi de bulunuyor:\nResmin Tam Boyutlu Hali\n  Sultan II. Abd\u00fclhamid\u2019in foto\u011fraflar\u0131 incelendi\u011finde ilerleyen ya\u015f\u0131nda daha da zay\u0131f oldu\u011fu g\u00f6r\u00fcl\u00fcyor. Bu y\u00fczden, g\u00f6r\u00fcnt\u00fclerdeki uzun boylu ve yap\u0131l\u0131 ki\u015fiyle benzerli\u011fi olmad\u0131\u011f\u0131 s\u00f6ylenebilir.\nK\u0131yaslama yap\u0131l\u0131nca sa\u011fdaki ki\u015finin burnu de Sultan II. Abd\u00fclhamid\u2019in kemerli burnuna benzemiyor.\nHafif kamburu olan, zay\u0131f ve y\u00fcz\u00fc nispeten kemikli ve uzun olan Sultan, s\u00f6z konusu g\u00f6rseldeki uzun boylu ve iri yap\u0131l\u0131 ki\u015fiye benzemiyor.\nII. Abd\u00fclhamid ve s\u00f6z konusu g\u00f6rseldeki ki\u015finin foto\u011fraflar\u0131:\nTarih\u00e7i Mustafa Arma\u011fan G\u00f6rseli Yalanlam\u0131\u015f\ndogrula.org olarak Abd\u00fclhamid\u2019in Kurtlarla Dans\u0131 serisinin yazar\u0131, tarih\u00e7i yazar ve gazeteci Mustafa Arma\u011fan\u2019la ileti\u015fime ge\u00e7tik. Kendisine Instagram sayfas\u0131ndaki payla\u015f\u0131m\u0131 \u00fczerine foto\u011fraftaki ki\u015finin kim oldu\u011funu sorduk. Arma\u011fan, g\u00f6rselin foto\u011fraf de\u011fil, Bat\u0131 bas\u0131n\u0131ndan yay\u0131lan bir resim oldu\u011funu s\u00f6yledi. \u00c7izilen resmin amac\u0131n\u0131n Sultan 2. Abd\u00fclhamid\u2019i a\u015fa\u011f\u0131lamak amac\u0131yla \u00e7izildi\u011fini belirtti.\nSultan 2. Abd\u00fclhamid\u2019e atfedilen foto\u011fraf\u0131n sosyal medya ortamlar\u0131nda \u00e7ok\u00e7a payla\u015f\u0131larak h\u0131zla yay\u0131lmas\u0131 \u00fczerine, tarih\u00e7i yazar Mustafa Arma\u011fan Instagram ve Twitter hesab\u0131nda payla\u015f\u0131m yaparak iddiay\u0131 yalanlam\u0131\u015f:\n\u00c7\u00f6zd\u00fcm sonunda\nArt\u0131k Sultan Abd\u00fclhamid'i tahttan indirilirken g\u00f6steren bu tart\u0131\u015fmal\u0131 g\u00f6rselin foto\u011fraf olmad\u0131\u011f\u0131n\u0131 kati olarak s\u00f6yleyebilirim.\nRessam\u0131 Gennaro Amato (1857-1947).\nSoldaki elden ele gezen resim, sa\u011fdaki ba\u015fka bir resmi.\nHer ikisinin de sa\u011f alt\u0131nda imzalar\u0131 okunuyor\n. pic.twitter.com/uUYb6Ghx31\n\u2014 mustafa armagan (@mustafarmagan) April 23, 2019\n    Abd\u00fclhamid Kay\u0131han Osmano\u011flu\u2019nun Payla\u015f\u0131m\u0131\nSultan 2. Abd\u00fclhamid\u2019in 4. ku\u015fak torunu olan Abd\u00fclhamid Kay\u0131han Osmano\u011flu da bu g\u00f6rsel \u00fczerine Twitter hesab\u0131nda bir payla\u015f\u0131m yaparak iddialar\u0131 yalanlam\u0131\u015ft\u0131r:\n  G\u00f6r\u00fcld\u00fc\u011f\u00fc \u00fczere iddia do\u011fru de\u011fildir; foto\u011fraftaki ki\u015fi Sultan 2. Abd\u00fclhamid de\u011fildir. \u00c7\u00fcnk\u00fc s\u00f6z konusu g\u00f6rsel bir foto\u011fraf de\u011fil, \u00e7izen ki\u015finin tespit edilemedi\u011fi bir resimdir. Resim detayl\u0131 \u015fekilde incelendi\u011finde bunu g\u00f6rmek m\u00fcmk\u00fcn.\nKaynaklar: kaynak1, kaynak2, kaynak3, kaynak4, kaynak5, kaynak6\nVideo oynat\u0131c\u0131\nhttps://dogrula.org/wp-content/uploads/2018/02/dogrula.org_.mp4\n00:00\n00:07\n[Toplam:1    Ortalama:5/5] Foto\u011fraftaki Y\u00fcz\u00fc Kanl\u0131 Ki\u015finin Sultan Abd\u00fclhamid Oldu\u011fu \u0130ddias\u0131", "\u0130hbar olarak dogrula.org\u2019a gelen g\u00f6rselde, y\u0131lda 50 milyondan fazla k\u00f6pekbal\u0131\u011f\u0131n\u0131n cinsel g\u00fcc\u00fc artt\u0131rd\u0131\u011f\u0131 inanc\u0131yla y\u00fczge\u00e7lerinin kesilip okyanusa geri b\u0131rak\u0131ld\u0131\u011f\u0131 iddia edildi. Bu Instagram payla\u015f\u0131m\u0131 yakla\u015f\u0131k 260 bin g\u00f6r\u00fcnt\u00fcleme ald\u0131.\nS\u00f6z konusu iddia do\u011frudur. \u00c7in tarihinde olduk\u00e7a yayg\u0131n olan ve k\u00f6pekbal\u0131\u011f\u0131 y\u00fczgecinden yap\u0131lan \u00e7orban\u0131n afrodizyak etkisi oldu\u011funa inan\u0131l\u0131r. Bunun gibi pek \u00e7ok sebeple y\u0131lda yakla\u015f\u0131k 100 milyon k\u00f6pekbal\u0131\u011f\u0131 \u00f6ld\u00fcr\u00fclmektedir.\nK\u00f6pekbal\u0131\u011f\u0131 Y\u00fczgeci \u00c7orbas\u0131\nRaporlara g\u00f6re, ba\u015fta \u00c7in\u2019de ve Vietnam\u2019da olmak \u00fczere k\u00f6pekbal\u0131\u011f\u0131 y\u00fczgeci \u00e7orbas\u0131n\u0131n t\u00fcketilmesi, 100 milyon k\u00f6pekbal\u0131\u011f\u0131n\u0131n katledilmesinin en b\u00fcy\u00fck sebebi.\nK\u00f6pekbal\u0131\u011f\u0131 y\u00fczgeci \u00e7orbas\u0131, etnik \u00c7in\u2019de ve \u00c7inliler aras\u0131nda olduk\u00e7a prestijli bir yemektir; d\u00fc\u011f\u00fcn ziyafetlerinde, \u00c7in Yeni Y\u0131l\u0131 (Lunar New Year) kutlamalar\u0131nda ve \u00fcst d\u00fczey restoranlarda servis edilir. Tayvan, Vietnam ve Endonezya gibi yerlerdeki geni\u015fleyen orta s\u0131n\u0131f aras\u0131ndaki talep, ekonomik olarak daha az geli\u015fmi\u015f \u00fclkelerin y\u00f6netilmeyen bal\u0131k\u00e7\u0131l\u0131k pazarlar\u0131nda s\u00fcrd\u00fcr\u00fclemez avc\u0131l\u0131\u011fa yol a\u00e7maktad\u0131r.\n  Kaynaklarda \u00e7orban\u0131n tarihsel olarak Ming Hanedanl\u0131\u011f\u0131 d\u00f6neminde soylu ve zenginlerin ev sahipli\u011findeki ziyafetler ve d\u00fc\u011f\u00fcnlerde yap\u0131ld\u0131\u011f\u0131, ancak \u00fclkedeki ekonomik patlamayla 1985 ve 2001 y\u0131llar\u0131 aras\u0131nda t\u00fcketimin iki kat\u0131na \u00e7\u0131kt\u0131\u011f\u0131 bilgisi yer al\u0131r. \u00c7orban\u0131n cinsel g\u00fcc\u00fc art\u0131rd\u0131\u011f\u0131na dair inan\u0131\u015f da pek \u00e7ok \u00c7ince ve yabanc\u0131 kaynakta mevcuttur.\n    \u00c7orban\u0131n cinsel g\u00fcc\u00fc artt\u0131rmadan cilt kalitesine kadar pek \u00e7ok \u015feyi iyile\u015ftirdi\u011fi, ayr\u0131ca kalp hastal\u0131\u011f\u0131n\u0131 \u00f6nledi\u011fi, kolesterol\u00fc d\u00fc\u015f\u00fcrd\u00fc\u011f\u00fc ve kanserle sava\u015ft\u0131\u011f\u0131 d\u00fc\u015f\u00fcn\u00fcl\u00fcyor.\n    Bununla birlikte, bu iddialar\u0131 destekleyen bilimsel kan\u0131t yoktur. Hatta bir \u00e7al\u0131\u015fmada k\u00f6pekbal\u0131\u011f\u0131 k\u0131k\u0131rda\u011f\u0131n\u0131n kanser tedavisinde hi\u00e7bir de\u011feri olmad\u0131\u011f\u0131, y\u00fcksek miktarlarda t\u00fcketilirse, \u00e7orban\u0131n c\u0131va i\u00e7eri\u011fi nedeniyle erkeklerde k\u0131s\u0131rl\u0131\u011fa neden olabilece\u011fi \u00f6ne s\u00fcr\u00fclm\u00fc\u015ft\u00fcr.\nAl\u0131nan \u00d6nlemler\n  Marine Policy raporu, k\u00fcresel k\u00f6pekbal\u0131\u011f\u0131 av\u0131n\u0131n son 60 y\u0131lda 1.4 milyon tona \u00e7\u0131kt\u0131\u011f\u0131n\u0131 ve k\u00f6pekbal\u0131\u011f\u0131 t\u00fcrlerinin neredeyse %60\u2019\u0131n\u0131 tehdit etti\u011fini ortaya \u00e7\u0131karm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r.\nK\u00f6pekbal\u0131\u011f\u0131 say\u0131lar\u0131n\u0131n t\u00fckenmesi ve aktivistlerin bask\u0131s\u0131 \u00fczerine \u00c7in h\u00fck\u00fcmeti devlet ziyafetlerinde k\u00f6pekbal\u0131\u011f\u0131 y\u00fczgeci \u00e7orbas\u0131 yap\u0131lmas\u0131n\u0131 ve Air China u\u00e7aklar\u0131nda k\u00f6pekbal\u0131\u011f\u0131 y\u00fczge\u00e7lerinin ta\u015f\u0131nmas\u0131n\u0131 yasaklam\u0131\u015ft\u0131r.\n20\u2019den fazla \u00fclkede k\u00f6pekbal\u0131\u011f\u0131 av\u0131 ile ilgili yasaklar veya k\u0131s\u0131tlamalar getirilmi\u015ftir.\n  WildAID\u2019e g\u00f6re, \u00c7in\u2019de k\u00f6pekbal\u0131\u011f\u0131 y\u00fczgeci t\u00fcketimi 2011\u2019den bu yana %50 ila 70 oran\u0131nda azalm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r. \u00c7in Deniz \u00dcr\u00fcnleri Lojistik ve \u0130\u015fleme Derne\u011fi, k\u00f6pekbal\u0131\u011f\u0131 y\u00fczgeci ithalat\u0131n\u0131n 2011\u2019den 2014\u2019e kadar %81 oran\u0131nda azald\u0131\u011f\u0131n\u0131 bildirmi\u015ftir.\nHong Kong\u2019un en b\u00fcy\u00fck restoran grubu Maxim\u2019s, Ocak 2020\u2019den itibaren k\u00f6pekbal\u0131\u011f\u0131 y\u00fczgeci servis etmeyi b\u0131rakaca\u011f\u0131n\u0131 a\u00e7\u0131klam\u0131\u015ft\u0131r.\nHindistan\u2019da bu ay \u00c7in ve Hong Kong\u2019a gidecek toplam sekiz ton k\u00f6pekbal\u0131\u011f\u0131 y\u00fczgecine el konulmu\u015ftur. Y\u00fczge\u00e7lerin 6.2 milyon dolar de\u011ferinde oldu\u011fu ve bunun i\u00e7in 15 bin ile 16 bin aras\u0131nda k\u00f6pekbal\u0131\u011f\u0131 \u00f6ld\u00fcr\u00fcld\u00fc\u011f\u00fc tahmin edilmektedir.\n    G\u00f6r\u00fcld\u00fc\u011f\u00fc \u00fczere iddia do\u011frudur. \u00c7in tarihinde olduk\u00e7a yayg\u0131n olan ve k\u00f6pekbal\u0131\u011f\u0131 y\u00fczgecinden yap\u0131lan \u00e7orban\u0131n afrodizyak etkisi oldu\u011funa inan\u0131l\u0131r. Bunun gibi pek \u00e7ok sebeple y\u0131lda yakla\u015f\u0131k 100 milyon k\u00f6pekbal\u0131\u011f\u0131 \u00f6ld\u00fcr\u00fclmektedir.\nKaynaklar: kaynak1, kaynak2, kaynak3, kaynak4, kaynak5, kaynak6, kaynak7, kaynak8, kaynak9, kaynak10\nVideo oynat\u0131c\u0131\nhttps://dogrula.org/wp-content/uploads/2018/02/dogrula.org_.mp4\n00:00\n00:07\n[Toplam:0    Ortalama:0/5] Y\u0131lda 50 Milyondan Fazla K\u00f6pekbal\u0131\u011f\u0131n\u0131n Cinsel G\u00fcc\u00fc Artt\u0131rd\u0131\u011f\u0131 \u0130nanc\u0131yla Y\u00fczge\u00e7lerinin Kesilip Okyanusa Geri B\u0131rak\u0131ld\u0131\u011f\u0131 \u0130ddias\u0131", "  \u0130hbar olarak dogrula.org\u2019a gelen bir haberde, g\u00f6rseldeki 800 avukat\u0131n Kemal K\u0131l\u0131\u00e7daro\u011flu\u2019na tokat atan Osman Sar\u0131g\u00fcn\u2019\u00fc savunmak i\u00e7in ba\u015fvuru yapt\u0131\u011f\u0131 iddia edildi.\nS\u00f6z konusu iddia do\u011fru de\u011fildir. Foto\u011fraf, 2014 y\u0131l\u0131nda AYM\u2019nin ba\u015f\u00f6rt\u00fcl\u00fc bir avukat lehine verdi\u011fi karara ili\u015fkin yaz\u0131lan haberlerde yer alan Hukuk\u00e7u Kad\u0131nlar Platformu Ba\u015fkan\u0131 Figen \u015ea\u015ft\u0131m ve di\u011fer avukatlar\u0131 g\u00f6steriyor.\n  Ayr\u0131ca Osman Sar\u0131g\u00fcn, adli kontrol h\u00fck\u00fcmleri uygulanarak serbest b\u0131rak\u0131lm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r.\n  2014 y\u0131l\u0131nda ba\u015f\u00f6rt\u00fcl\u00fc bir avukat, duru\u015fmaya al\u0131nmad\u0131\u011f\u0131 gerek\u00e7esiyle haklar\u0131n\u0131n ihlal edildi\u011fini savunarak, Anayasa Mahkemesine bireysel ba\u015fvuruda bulunmu\u015ftu. Anayasa Mahkemesi Genel Kurulu da, kad\u0131n avukat\u0131n haklar\u0131n\u0131n ihlal edildi\u011fine karar vermi\u015fti.\n  S\u00f6z konusu avukatlar\u0131, d\u00f6nemin pek \u00e7ok \u0130nternet gazetesinde g\u00f6rmek m\u00fcmk\u00fcn.\n    G\u00f6r\u00fcld\u00fc\u011f\u00fc \u00fczere iddia do\u011fru de\u011fildir. Foto\u011fraf, 2014 y\u0131l\u0131nda AYM\u2019nin ba\u015f\u00f6rt\u00fcl\u00fc bir avukat lehine verdi\u011fi karara ili\u015fkin yaz\u0131lan haberlerde yer alan Hukuk\u00e7u Kad\u0131nlar Platformu Ba\u015fkan\u0131 Figen \u015ea\u015ft\u0131m ve di\u011fer avukatlar\u0131 g\u00f6steriyor.\nKaynaklar: kaynak1, kaynak2\nVideo oynat\u0131c\u0131\nhttps://dogrula.org/wp-content/uploads/2018/02/dogrula.org_.mp4\n00:00\n00:07\n[Toplam:0    Ortalama:0/5] 800 Avukat\u0131n Osman Sar\u0131g\u00fcn\u2019\u00fc Savunmak \u0130\u00e7in Ba\u015fvuru Yapt\u0131\u011f\u0131 \u0130ddias\u0131", "  BirG\u00fcn Gazetesinde payla\u015f\u0131lan , Cumhuriyet ve t24 web gazetelerinde de yer alan bu haber k\u0131sa zamanda pek \u00e7ok sosyal medya platformuna ta\u015f\u0131narak g\u00fcndem oldu.\nAncak s\u00f6z konusu iddia do\u011fru de\u011fildir. Hazine ve Maliye Bakanl\u0131\u011f\u0131 Bas\u0131n M\u00fc\u015faviri Mehmet Ali Berber, Twitter hesab\u0131nda \u015fu a\u00e7\u0131klamay\u0131 yapm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r:\n\u201cBahsettikleri rakam, \u201csiyasi partilerden Maarif vakf\u0131na, afet b\u00f6lgesindeki alanlar\u0131n d\u00f6n\u00fc\u015f\u00fcmlerine\u201c kadar \u00e7ok say\u0131da kalemden olu\u015fan \u201ckar amac\u0131 g\u00fctmeyen kurulu\u015flara\u201d yap\u0131lan \u00f6demelerdir.\u201d\n  Berber\u2019in payla\u015ft\u0131\u011f\u0131 tablodan kar amac\u0131 g\u00fctmeyen kurulu\u015flara yap\u0131lan s\u00f6z konusu \u00f6demeleri burada g\u00f6rmek m\u00fcmk\u00fcn.\nKaynak: https://t.co/4ituxp1guN\nVideo oynat\u0131c\u0131\nhttps://dogrula.org/wp-content/uploads/2018/02/dogrula.org_.mp4\n00:00\n00:07\n[Toplam:0    Ortalama:0/5] BirG\u00fcn Gazetesinin Vak\u0131flara Aktar\u0131lan Para \u0130ddias\u0131", "  \u0130hbar olarak dogrula.org\u2019a en fazla gelen haberlerden biri olan s\u00f6z konusu g\u00f6rselde, Kuzey K\u0131br\u0131s T\u00fcrk Cumhuriyeti\u2019nin bayra\u011f\u0131n\u0131 merhum ba\u015fbakan Necmettin Erbakan\u2019\u0131n \u00e7izdi\u011fi iddia ediliyor.\nAncak iddia do\u011fru de\u011fildir. KKTC bayra\u011f\u0131, KKTC Kurucu Meclisi\u2019nin \u00e7a\u011fr\u0131s\u0131 \u00fczerine K\u0131br\u0131sl\u0131 ressam Emin \u00c7izenel taraf\u0131ndan tasarlanm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r.\nErbakan\u2019a Atfedilen bir \u015eehir Efsanesi\n  \u0130nternet ortamlar\u0131nda defalarca payla\u015f\u0131larak \u015fehir efsanesi haline gelen bu iddiaya yerel gazetelerde, web sitelerinde ve \u201cmilli g\u00f6r\u00fc\u015f\u201d ideolojisinin benimsendi\u011fi platformlarda s\u0131k\u00e7a kar\u015f\u0131la\u015fmak m\u00fcmk\u00fcn.\nS\u00f6z konusu iddia \u015fu hikayeyle de desteklenmi\u015f:\n\u201c\u0130srail bayra\u011f\u0131, iki mavi \u015ferit aras\u0131ndaki bir alt\u0131genden olu\u015fuyor. Bu \u015feritler F\u0131rat ve Nil nehirlerini temsil ediyor. Bu da Siyonistlerin iki nehrin aras\u0131ndaki b\u00f6lgeyi kendilerinin olarak g\u00f6rmesi.\nErbakan\u2019\u0131n \u00e7izdi\u011fi KKTC bayra\u011f\u0131nda da F\u0131rat ve Nil nehri \u015feritleri ve bununla beraber ay y\u0131ld\u0131z bulunuyor. Prof. Dr. Necmettin Erbakan bu bayra\u011f\u0131 bizzat tasarl\u0131yor. Verdi\u011fi mesajda ise \u201cbu topraklar bizim\u201d diyor.\u201d\nKKTC Kurucu Meclisi\u2019nin Bayrak \u00c7a\u011fr\u0131s\u0131\n23 Kas\u0131m 1983 tarihinde yay\u0131nlanan gazetede bu \u00e7a\u011fr\u0131 g\u00f6r\u00fclebiliyor:\nEmin \u00c7izenel Tasar\u0131m\u0131 Bayrak\n\u0130nternet ortamlar\u0131ndaki do\u011frulama platformlar\u0131nda yer alan bu \u00f6d\u00fcl belgesinde yazan \u015fu ifadeler, KKTC bayra\u011f\u0131n\u0131 \u00e7izen ki\u015finin Emin \u00c7izenel oldu\u011funu a\u00e7\u0131k\u00e7a g\u00f6steriyor:\n\u201c\u00d6nerimiz: KKTC bayra\u011f\u0131n\u0131 \u00e7izen Say\u0131n Emin \u00c7izenel\u2019e, resmi mar\u015f \u015fiirini yazan \u015faire verilen miktar kadar \u00f6d\u00fcl verilmesidir.\u201d\nKKTC bayra\u011f\u0131n\u0131 Emin \u00c7izenel\u2019in \u00e7izdi\u011fi bilgisi KKTC Milli E\u011fitim Bakanl\u0131\u011f\u0131na ait ders kitab\u0131nda da bulunuyor.\nKKTC Bayra\u011f\u0131n\u0131n Resmi Olarak Kabul Edilmesi\n7 Mart 1984 tarihinde KKTC bayra\u011f\u0131n\u0131n resmi olarak kabul edilmesi haberi ertesi g\u00fcn Bozkurt Gazetesi\u2019nde yer al\u0131yor:\n  G\u00f6r\u00fcld\u00fc\u011f\u00fc \u00fczere KKTC bayra\u011f\u0131n\u0131 merhum ba\u015fbakan Necmettin Erbakan\u2019\u0131n \u00e7izdi\u011fi iddias\u0131 do\u011fru de\u011fildir. Bayrak, KKTC Kurucu Meclisi\u2019nin \u00e7a\u011fr\u0131s\u0131 \u00fczerine K\u0131br\u0131sl\u0131 ressam Emin \u00c7izenel taraf\u0131ndan tasarlanm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r.\nKaynaklar: kaynak1, kaynak2, kaynak3, kaynak4\nVideo oynat\u0131c\u0131\nhttps://dogrula.org/wp-content/uploads/2018/02/dogrula.org_.mp4\n00:00\n00:07\n[Toplam:1    Ortalama:5/5] KKTC Bayra\u011f\u0131n\u0131 Necmettin Erbakan\u2019\u0131n \u00c7izdi\u011fi \u0130ddias\u0131", "  Sosyal medya ortamlar\u0131nda s\u0131k\u00e7a payla\u015f\u0131lan haberde, ABD\u2019de ya\u015fayan bir adam\u0131n e\u015fiyle daha az muhatap olmak i\u00e7in 62 y\u0131l boyunca sa\u011f\u0131r ve dilsiz numaras\u0131 yapt\u0131\u011f\u0131 ve e\u015finin de sosyal medyaya y\u00fcklenen bir video sayesinde bu durumu \u00f6\u011frendi\u011fi iddia edildi.\nS\u00f6z konusu iddia do\u011fru de\u011fildir. World News Daily Report adl\u0131 parodi web sitesinde yer alan haber mizah ama\u00e7l\u0131 yap\u0131lm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r.\n  Mart 2019\u2019da World News Daily Report (WNDR) web sitesinde \u00e7\u0131kan bu habere g\u00f6re, bir adam e\u015fini dinlemek zorunda kalmamak i\u00e7in alt\u0131 y\u0131ldan fazla bir s\u00fcre sa\u011f\u0131r ve dilsiz kald\u0131. Sonra yakaland\u0131.\nHabere g\u00f6re, 84 ya\u015f\u0131ndaki Barry Dawson, birlikte ya\u015fad\u0131klar\u0131 on y\u0131llar boyunca 80 ya\u015f\u0131ndaki e\u015fi Dorothy\u2019nin \u00f6n\u00fcnde tek bir kelime konu\u015fmad\u0131.\nBunun \u00fczerine Dawson, kocas\u0131yla ileti\u015fim kurabilmek i\u00e7in i\u015faret dilini \u00f6\u011frendi. \u00c7iftin alt\u0131 \u00e7ocu\u011fu , 13 torunu oldu ve hepsi de Dawson\u2019\u0131n sa\u011f\u0131r oldu\u011funa ikna olmu\u015ftu.\nFoto\u011fraflar Ger\u00e7ek, Haber ise Parodi\nParodi web sitesinde yer alan haberler genellikle di\u011fer sitelerdeki g\u00fcncel haber makalelerinden aktar\u0131lan resimlerle servis ediliyor. Bu haberde de 2017\u2019de ger\u00e7ek bir Floridal\u0131 \u00e7ift olan Lucille Handelsman ve gayrimenkul imparatoru Burt Handelsman\u2019\u0131n bo\u015fanma davas\u0131ndan al\u0131nan foto\u011fraflar kullan\u0131lm\u0131\u015f.\nHaberler Kurgusal\nWorld News Daily Report, sitede yer alan haberlerin e\u011flence amac\u0131yla olu\u015fturulmu\u015f kurgusal haberler oldu\u011funu da web sitesinde belirtmi\u015f:\n  \u201cWorld News Daily Report, makalelerinin hiciv niteli\u011fi ve i\u00e7eri\u011finin kurgusal niteli\u011fi i\u00e7in t\u00fcm sorumlulu\u011fu \u00fcstlenir. Bu web sitesinde yer alan makalelerde g\u00f6r\u00fcnen t\u00fcm karakterler\u200a\u2014\u200ager\u00e7ek insanlara dayansalar bile\u200a\u2014\u200atamamen kurgusald\u0131r ve onlar ile ya\u015fayan, \u00f6l\u00fc veya \u00f6l\u00fcms\u00fcz olan herhangi bir ki\u015fi aras\u0131ndaki benzerlik tamamen mucizedir.\u201d\n  G\u00f6r\u00fcld\u00fc\u011f\u00fc \u00fczere iddia do\u011fru de\u011fildir. World News Daily Report adl\u0131 parodi web sitesinde yer alan haber mizah ama\u00e7l\u0131 yap\u0131lm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r.\n  Kaynaklar: kaynak1, kaynak2, kaynak3\nVideo oynat\u0131c\u0131\nhttps://dogrula.org/wp-content/uploads/2018/02/dogrula.org_.mp4\n00:00\n00:07\n[Toplam:0    Ortalama:0/5] Kar\u0131s\u0131na 62 Y\u0131l Boyunca Sa\u011f\u0131r-Dilsiz Taklidi Yapan Adam \u0130ddias\u0131", "  \u0130hbar olarak dogrula.org\u2019a gelen g\u00f6rselde, NASA\u2019n\u0131n 2 ay boyunca otel odas\u0131nda yat\u0131p 100 bin TL kazanacak g\u00f6n\u00fcll\u00fcler arad\u0131\u011f\u0131 iddia edildi.\nS\u00f6z konusu iddia do\u011frudur. Alman Havac\u0131l\u0131k ve Uzay Merkezi, yapay yer \u00e7ekiminin sa\u011fl\u0131\u011fa etkilerinin incelenece\u011fi NASA ile ortak y\u00fcr\u00fct\u00fclecek bir ara\u015ft\u0131rma i\u00e7in yakla\u015f\u0131k 100 bin TL kar\u015f\u0131l\u0131\u011f\u0131nda (18 bin 500 dolar) 60 g\u00fcn boyunca bir odada yatmas\u0131 gereken 24 g\u00f6n\u00fcll\u00fc arad\u0131\u011f\u0131n\u0131 duyurmu\u015ftur.\n  Artificial Gravity Bed Rest Study\nNASA ve Avrupa Uzay Ajans\u0131\u2019n\u0131n (ESA) bir projesi olan \u00e7al\u0131\u015fma, K\u00f6ln merkezli Alman Havac\u0131l\u0131k ve Uzay Merkezi\u2019nde (DLR) yap\u0131lacak.\n  Se\u00e7ilen 24 kat\u0131l\u0131mc\u0131 (12 kad\u0131n, 12 erkek), Eyl\u00fcl ay\u0131nda yapay yer \u00e7ekiminin potansiyel faydalar\u0131n\u0131 test etmek i\u00e7in iki ay boyunca yatakta uzanarak kalacaklar\u0131 Alman Havac\u0131l\u0131k Merkezi\u2019ne (Deutsches Zentrum f\u00fcr Luft- und Raumfahrt; DLR) gidecek.\n  G\u00f6n\u00fcll\u00fcler iki gruba ayr\u0131lacak ve tek bir odada kalacak. 60 g\u00fcnl\u00fck yatak istirahati s\u0131ras\u0131nda, yemek yemeden tuvalete kadar her \u015feyi uzanarak yapmalar\u0131 istenecek.\nKat\u0131l\u0131mc\u0131lara bir televizyon, okuma materyalleri ve di\u011fer e\u011flence etkinlikleri verilecek.\nAra\u015ft\u0131rma toplam 89 g\u00fcn s\u00fcrecek. Yatakta kalmadan \u00f6nce, kat\u0131l\u0131mc\u0131lara be\u015f g\u00fcn bilgi verilecek ve 60 g\u00fcn\u00fcn bitiminde 14 g\u00fcn dinlenme ve astronot rehabilitasyonu yap\u0131lacak.\n  Bilim adamlar\u0131, bu sistemin uzun s\u00fcreli uzay yolculu\u011fu yapan astronotlara uygulanabilecek faydalar\u0131 da ortaya \u00e7\u0131karaca\u011f\u0131n\u0131 umuyor.\nT\u0131bbi, psikoterap\u00f6tik ve bilimsel profesyonellerden olu\u015fan bir ekip, bir beslenme uzman\u0131yla birlikte kat\u0131l\u0131mc\u0131lar\u0131n beslenmelerini destekleyecek.\nYiyecekler katk\u0131 maddeleri veya suni tatland\u0131r\u0131c\u0131lar olmadan haz\u0131rlanacak ve yeterli kalorifik ve besin i\u00e7eri\u011fi sa\u011flamak i\u00e7in dengelenmi\u015f olacak; zaman zaman da tatl\u0131 verilecek.\n  24 May\u0131s\u2019a kadar ba\u015fvurular\u0131n kabul edilece\u011fi ara\u015ft\u0131rmaya kay\u0131lacak olan ki\u015filerin Almanca bilmesi gerekiyor.\n  G\u00f6r\u00fcld\u00fc\u011f\u00fc \u00fczere iddia do\u011frudur. Alman Havac\u0131l\u0131k ve Uzay Merkezi, yapay yer \u00e7ekiminin sa\u011fl\u0131\u011fa etkilerinin incelenece\u011fi NASA ile ortak y\u00fcr\u00fct\u00fclecek bir ara\u015ft\u0131rma i\u00e7in yakla\u015f\u0131k 100 bin TL kar\u015f\u0131l\u0131\u011f\u0131nda (18 bin 500 dolar) 60 g\u00fcn boyunca bir odada yatmas\u0131 gereken 24 g\u00f6n\u00fcll\u00fc arad\u0131\u011f\u0131n\u0131 duyurmu\u015ftur.\nKaynaklar: kaynak1, kaynak2, kaynak3, kaynak4, kaynak5, kaynak6\nVideo oynat\u0131c\u0131\nhttps://dogrula.org/wp-content/uploads/2018/02/dogrula.org_.mp4\n00:00\n00:07\n[Toplam:0    Ortalama:0/5] NASA 2 Ay Boyunca Otel Odas\u0131nda Yat\u0131p 100 bin TL Kazanacak G\u00f6n\u00fcll\u00fcler Ar\u0131yor \u0130ddias\u0131", "  \u0130hbar olarak dogrula.org\u2019a g\u00f6nderilen bu videonun, \u00c7in\u2019de k\u0131rm\u0131z\u0131 \u0131\u015f\u0131kta ge\u00e7meyi engelleyen su p\u00fcsk\u00fcrtme y\u00f6ntemini g\u00f6sterdi\u011fi iddia edildi. Video yakla\u015f\u0131k 353 bin kez g\u00f6r\u00fcnt\u00fclendi; 12 bin 500 be\u011feni ve 350\u2018den fazla yorum ald\u0131.\nS\u00f6z konusu iddia do\u011frudur. \u00c7in\u2019in Hubei (\u6e56\u5317) eyaletinin Daye (\u5927\u51b6) kentinde bir ge\u00e7itte, \u0131\u015f\u0131k ihlali yapan yayalar\u0131 engellemek amac\u0131yla bir su p\u00fcsk\u00fcrtme sistemi kurulmu\u015ftur. Bu ekipmanla, k\u0131rm\u0131z\u0131 \u0131\u015f\u0131kta ge\u00e7meye \u00e7al\u0131\u015fan yayalara su p\u00fcsk\u00fcrt\u00fclmektedir.\n  China Daily ve Beijing News\u2019in haberine g\u00f6re, \u0131\u015f\u0131k ihlali yapan yayalar su p\u00fcsk\u00fcrterek cezaland\u0131ran ak\u0131ll\u0131 bir sistem, \u00c7in\u2019in Hubei eyaletindeki Dayekentinde bir ge\u00e7itte uygulan\u0131yor.\nEkipman kentin \u015fehir merkezinde bir kav\u015fakta kurulmu\u015f ve yol boyunca d\u00fczenlenmi\u015f be\u015f direkten olu\u015fuyor. Trafik ak\u0131\u015f\u0131n\u0131 izleyen sens\u00f6rler k\u0131rm\u0131z\u0131 \u0131\u015f\u0131kta ge\u00e7meye \u00e7al\u0131\u015fan yayalara su p\u00fcsk\u00fcrt\u00fcyor.\n  Daye (\u5927\u51b6) kamu g\u00fcvenlik b\u00fcrosu tan\u0131t\u0131m ba\u015fkan yard\u0131mc\u0131s\u0131 Wan Xinqiang\u2019\u0131n a\u00e7\u0131klamas\u0131na g\u00f6re, az miktarda su p\u00fcsk\u00fcrtmenin yan\u0131 s\u0131ra, k\u0131rm\u0131z\u0131 \u0131\u015f\u0131kta ge\u00e7meye \u00e7al\u0131\u015fan yayalar foto\u011fraflan\u0131yor ve foto\u011fraflar\u0131 yak\u0131ndaki ekranlarda g\u00f6steriliyor. Bu foto\u011fraflar devlet sisteminin veritaban\u0131na y\u00fckleniyor ve kimli\u011fi belirlenen ki\u015filerden bu ihlali tekrar eden su\u00e7lular \u00c7in\u2019in geli\u015fen sosyal kredi sisteminde puan kaybediyor.\nSu p\u00fcsk\u00fcrtmenin yan\u0131 s\u0131ra yayalara k\u0131rm\u0131z\u0131 \u0131\u015f\u0131kta kar\u015f\u0131ya ge\u00e7memelerini hat\u0131rlatmak i\u00e7in sesler ve yan\u0131p s\u00f6nen \u0131\u015f\u0131klar \u015feklinde uyar\u0131lar da yap\u0131l\u0131yor.\nDaye\u2019deki kamu g\u00fcvenli\u011fi yetkililerinin ve yerel bir \u015firketin 1.3 milyon yuan\u0131n (207 bin dolar)\u00fczerinde bir maliyeti olan sistemi geli\u015ftirmesi iki ay s\u00fcrm\u00fc\u015f.\nEkipman iyi \u00e7al\u0131\u015f\u0131rsa, \u015fehir genelinde kullan\u0131laca\u011f\u0131 bilgisi verilmi\u015f.\n  G\u00f6r\u00fcld\u00fc\u011f\u00fc \u00fczere, s\u00f6z konusu iddia do\u011frudur. \u00c7in\u2019in Hubei (\u6e56\u5317) eyaletinin Daye (\u5927\u51b6) kentinde bir ge\u00e7itte, \u0131\u015f\u0131k ihlali yapan yayalar\u0131 engellemek amac\u0131yla bir su p\u00fcsk\u00fcrtme sistemi kurulmu\u015ftur. Bu ekipmanla, k\u0131rm\u0131z\u0131 \u0131\u015f\u0131kta ge\u00e7meye \u00e7al\u0131\u015fan yayalara su p\u00fcsk\u00fcrt\u00fclmektedir.\nKaynaklar: kaynak1, kaynak2, kaynak3, kaynak4, kaynak5, kaynak6, kaynak7\nVideo oynat\u0131c\u0131\nhttps://dogrula.org/wp-content/uploads/2018/02/dogrula.org_.mp4\n00:00\n00:07\n[Toplam:0    Ortalama:0/5] \u00c7in\u2019de K\u0131rm\u0131z\u0131 I\u015f\u0131kta Ge\u00e7meyi Engelleyen Su P\u00fcsk\u00fcrtme Y\u00f6ntemi \u0130ddias\u0131", "  \u0130hbar olarak dogrula.org\u2019a gelen ve \u0130nternet ortamlar\u0131nda s\u0131k\u00e7a yer alan \u201cNorve\u00e7\u00e7e\u2019de Atat\u00fcrk gibi d\u00fc\u015f\u00fcn diye bir deyim bulundu\u011fu\u201d iddias\u0131, pek \u00e7ok platformda payla\u015f\u0131larak bir sosyal medya efsanesi haline gelmi\u015ftir.\n\u0130ddia Cumhuriyet, S\u00f6zc\u00fc, Ayd\u0131nl\u0131k, Yeni\u00e7a\u011f gibi gazetelerde de payla\u015f\u0131lm\u0131\u015f; ayn\u0131 c\u00fcmlenin ingilizce \u00e7evirisi de Facebook gibi platformlarda yer alm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r.\n  Ancak s\u00f6z konusu iddia do\u011fru de\u011fildir, Norve\u00e7\u00e7e\u2019de b\u00f6yle bir deyim bulunmamaktad\u0131r.\n\u0130ddia g\u00fcndeme geldikten sonra baz\u0131 yazar ve gazeteciler taraf\u0131ndan benzer \u015fekilde hikayele\u015ftirilmi\u015f ve kendilerinin deneyimledi\u011fi iddias\u0131yla payla\u015f\u0131lm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r. Orijinal dilinde arat\u0131ld\u0131\u011f\u0131nda bunun uydurma bir haber oldu\u011fu g\u00f6r\u00fclebilir.\n\u0130ddian\u0131n Kayna\u011f\u0131 Ne?\n\u0130nternet ortamlar\u0131nda referans al\u0131nan, ara\u015ft\u0131rmac\u0131 yazar Prof. \u0130lknur G\u00dcNT\u00dcRK\u00dcN KALIP\u00c7I adl\u0131 bir ki\u015fi taraf\u0131ndan bir konferans notu olarak anlat\u0131lan hikayenin ilgili k\u0131sm\u0131nda \u015fu sat\u0131rlar ge\u00e7mi\u015f:\n  Fakat s\u00f6z konusu hikayedeki iddian\u0131n bir dayana\u011f\u0131 yok.\nAyr\u0131ca \u0130lknur G\u00dcNT\u00dcRK\u00dcN KALIP\u00c7I isimli \u015fah\u0131s bir yazar ve bahsedildi\u011fi gibi profes\u00f6r \u00fcnvan\u0131 da bulunmuyor.\n  Anlat\u0131lan hikayenin yer ald\u0131\u011f\u0131 kaynaklarda bu ki\u015finin profes\u00f6r, Atat\u00fcrk K\u00fclt\u00fcr Dil ve Tarih Y\u00fcksek Kurumu \u00fcyesi ve Ba\u015fbakanl\u0131k Atat\u00fcrk Ara\u015ft\u0131rmac\u0131s\u0131 oldu\u011fu bilgisi yer al\u0131yor, ancak bu bilgiler do\u011fru de\u011fil, \u00e7\u00fcnk\u00fc herhangi bir akademik yay\u0131n\u0131na ya da bir \u00fcniversite b\u00fcnyesinde elde etti\u011fi profes\u00f6rl\u00fck \u00fcnvan\u0131na rastlanm\u0131yor.\n\u0130lknur G\u00fcnt\u00fcrk\u00fcn Kal\u0131p\u00e7\u0131\u2019n\u0131n 2004\u2019te Anlatt\u0131\u011f\u0131 Hikaye 2002\u2019de Ek\u015fi S\u00f6zl\u00fck\u2019te Payla\u015f\u0131lm\u0131\u015f\n\u0130ddia sahibi \u0130lknur G\u00fcnt\u00fcrk\u00fcn Kal\u0131p\u00e7\u0131\u2019n\u0131n, 2004 y\u0131l\u0131nda konferansta ger\u00e7ekle\u015fti\u011fini \u00f6ne s\u00fcrd\u00fc\u011f\u00fc hikaye, asl\u0131nda 2002 y\u0131l\u0131nda Ek\u015fi S\u00f6zl\u00fck\u2019te bir kullan\u0131c\u0131 taraf\u0131ndan yorum olarak benzer ifadelerle yaz\u0131lm\u0131\u015f. Yani bu konudan 2 y\u0131l \u00f6nce de bahsedilmi\u015f. Ek\u015fi S\u00f6zl\u00fck\u2019teki yaz\u0131n\u0131n da bir dayana\u011f\u0131 bulunmuyor, ancak \u0130lknur G\u00fcnt\u00fcrk\u00fcn Kal\u0131p\u00e7\u0131\u2019n\u0131n Ek\u015fi S\u00f6zl\u00fck\u2019teki bu payla\u015f\u0131m\u0131 hikayele\u015ftirmi\u015f olma ihtimali g\u00f6r\u00fcn\u00fcyor.\nBenzer Hikaye 2016\u2019da Nasuh Mahruki Taraf\u0131ndan da Anlat\u0131lm\u0131\u015f\nBenzer bir hikayeyi Nasuh Mahruki de 20 ya\u015f\u0131nda, yani 1988 y\u0131l\u0131nda deneyimledi\u011fini yazm\u0131\u015f. Ancak Mahruki\u2019nin 2016 y\u0131l\u0131 \u00f6ncesinde bu an\u0131s\u0131 \u00fczerine hi\u00e7bir yaz\u0131s\u0131 bulunmamas\u0131 ise dikkat \u00e7ekiyor.\nYine Benzer Bir Hikaye \u00dcmit Zileli Taraf\u0131ndan Anlat\u0131lm\u0131\u015f\n\u00dcmit Zileli de k\u00f6\u015fe yaz\u0131s\u0131nda, Utku O\u011fuz Adl\u0131 i\u015fadam\u0131n\u0131n \u0130talya\u2019da ayn\u0131 hikayeyi 2002 y\u0131l\u0131nda ya\u015fad\u0131\u011f\u0131n\u0131 benzer c\u00fcmlelerle yazm\u0131\u015f:\nNorve\u00e7\u00e7e\u2019de B\u00f6yle Bir Deyim Yok\nOrijinal dilinde arat\u0131ld\u0131\u011f\u0131nda, Norve\u00e7\u00e7e\u2019de b\u00f6yle bir deyime rastlamak m\u00fcmk\u00fcn de\u011fil. Birka\u00e7 dilde yap\u0131lacak basit bir Google aramas\u0131yla bu sonuca ula\u015f\u0131labiliyor.\nMerakl\u0131lar\u0131n\u0131n uluslararas\u0131 forumlarda da g\u00fcndeme getirmesi \u00fczerine Norve\u00e7liler konu hakk\u0131nda yazm\u0131\u015f, bu deyimi kendi dillerinde asla duymad\u0131klar\u0131n\u0131 s\u00f6ylemi\u015f.\nNorve\u00e7\u00e7ede \u201cT\u00fcrk gibi sinirli\u201d (sint som en Tyrk / angry as a Turk ) deyiminin yer ald\u0131\u011f\u0131n\u0131 yazan Norve\u00e7liler, \u201cAtat\u00fcrk gibi d\u00fc\u015f\u00fcnmek\u201d deyiminin bulunmad\u0131\u011f\u0131n\u0131 s\u00f6yl\u00fcyor.\nForumdaki bir iddia sahibinin \u201cAtat\u00fcrk gibi d\u00fc\u015f\u00fcnmek\u201d deyiminin Norve\u00e7\u2019te \u00e7ok s\u0131k kullan\u0131ld\u0131\u011f\u0131n\u0131 iddia etmesine ra\u011fmen, yorumlarda buna dair bir yaz\u0131 yer alm\u0131yor.\n  Forumda \u0130lknur G\u00fcnt\u00fcrk\u00fcn Kal\u0131p\u00e7\u0131 kaynak g\u00f6sterilmi\u015f, bunun \u00fczerine yorum yapan Norve\u00e7li yazarlardan biri, ulusal kahraman Atat\u00fcrk\u2019\u00fc onurland\u0131rarak vatanda\u015flar\u0131 etkilemeye \u00e7al\u0131\u015fmak amac\u0131yla s\u00f6ylenmi\u015f olabilece\u011fi ihtimalini belirtmi\u015f.\nForum yaz\u0131\u015fmalar\u0131na buradan ula\u015fabilirsiniz.\nGoogle Aramalar\u0131nda da \u201cAtat\u00fcrk Gibi D\u00fc\u015f\u00fcn\u201d Deyimi Yok\n\u201c\u00c7aresiz hissetti\u011finde Atat\u00fcrk gibi d\u00fc\u015f\u00fcn\u201d s\u00f6z\u00fcn\u00fc Norve\u00e7\u00e7e\u2019ye \u00e7evirip aratt\u0131\u011f\u0131m\u0131zda (n\u00e5r du f\u00f8ler deg h\u00e5pl\u00f8s, tenk som Ataturk), bu sonuca dair herhangi bir yaz\u0131ya ya da bilgiye rastlanm\u0131yor. \u00c7\u0131kan t\u00fcm aramalar T\u00fcrkler taraf\u0131ndan yap\u0131lm\u0131\u015f ve bu \u015fekilde endekslenmi\u015f. Ayn\u0131 arama Norve\u00e7\u00e7e kaynaklarda da sonu\u00e7 vermiyor.\n  Ayn\u0131 c\u00fcmleyi (\u00e7aresiz hissetti\u011finde Atat\u00fcrk gibi d\u00fc\u015f\u00fcn) \u0130ngilizce \u201cwhen you feel hopeless think like ataturk norwegian\u201d olarak arat\u0131nca da bir sonuca ula\u015f\u0131lm\u0131yor.\nS\u00f6z\u00fcn k\u0131sas\u0131, Norve\u00e7\u00e7e\u2019de Atat\u00fcrk ile ilgili bir deyim yok, fakat \u201cT\u00fcrk gibi sinirli\u200a\u2014\u200asint som en Tyrk\u201d deyimi var.\n  Blog Yazar\u0131 da Norve\u00e7 Seyahatinde Sormu\u015f\nT\u00fcm bunlara ek olarak, blog yazar\u0131 G\u00fcrkan Gen\u00e7 Norve\u00e7\u2019e yapt\u0131\u011f\u0131 bir seyahat esnas\u0131nda bu deyimi Norve\u00e7lilere sormu\u015f ve b\u00f6yle bir deyimin asl\u0131nda olmad\u0131\u011f\u0131n\u0131 teyit etmi\u015f.\nCelal Bayar\u2019\u0131n \u201cAtat\u00fcrk Gibi D\u00fc\u015f\u00fcnmek\u201d Adl\u0131 Kitab\u0131\nT\u00fcrkiye Cumhuriyeti\u2019nin 3. Cumhurba\u015fkan\u0131 Celal Bayar\u2019\u0131n \u0130smail Bozda\u011f taraf\u0131ndan derlenen \u201cAtat\u00fcrk Gibi D\u00fc\u015f\u00fcnmek\u201d isimli bir kitab\u0131 bulunuyor. Y\u0131llar \u00f6nce yaz\u0131lm\u0131\u015f bu kitab\u0131n, Norve\u00e7\u00e7e\u2019de bulunan deyim efsanesine ilham verdi\u011fini d\u00fc\u015f\u00fcnebiliriz.\n  G\u00f6r\u00fcld\u00fc\u011f\u00fc \u00fczere iddia do\u011fru de\u011fildir. \u0130lk olarak 2002\u2019de g\u00fcndeme geldikten sonra baz\u0131 yazar ve gazeteciler taraf\u0131ndan kendileri ya\u015fam\u0131\u015f gibi hikayele\u015ftirilen iddian\u0131n hi\u00e7bir dayana\u011f\u0131 yoktur. \u0130lgili deyime orijinal dilinde ve ba\u015fka dillerde yap\u0131lan Google aramalar\u0131nda da rastlanmam\u0131\u015ft\u0131r.\nKaynaklar: kaynak1, kaynak2, kaynak3, kaynak4, kaynak5, kaynak6, kaynak7, kaynak8, kaynak9, kaynak11, kaynak12, kaynak13, kaynak14\nVideo oynat\u0131c\u0131\nhttps://dogrula.org/wp-content/uploads/2018/02/dogrula.org_.mp4\n00:00\n00:07\n[Toplam:1    Ortalama:5/5] Norve\u00e7\u00e7e\u2019de \u201cAtat\u00fcrk Gibi D\u00fc\u015f\u00fcn\u201d Diye Bir Deyim Bulundu\u011fu \u0130ddias\u0131", "  Yunus Paksoy adl\u0131 Twitter kullan\u0131c\u0131s\u0131n\u0131n Berlin havaliman\u0131na ili\u015fkin yapt\u0131\u011f\u0131 payla\u015f\u0131mda, \u0130stanbul Havaliman\u0131\u2019n\u0131n a\u00e7\u0131ld\u0131\u011f\u0131 g\u00fcn Alman medyas\u0131nda Berlin Yeni Havaliman\u0131 2500 g\u00fcnd\u00fcr a\u00e7\u0131lamad\u0131 haberinin yer ald\u0131\u011f\u0131 iddia edildi.\nS\u00f6z konusu iddia do\u011frudur. Berlin Havaliman\u0131\u2019n\u0131n 2500 g\u00fcnd\u00fcr a\u00e7\u0131lamad\u0131\u011f\u0131na y\u00f6nelik ele\u015ftirel haberler Alman medyas\u0131nda ve pek \u00e7ok web sitesinde \u0130stanbul Havaliman\u0131\u2019n\u0131n a\u00e7\u0131ld\u0131\u011f\u0131 g\u00fcn yay\u0131mlanm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r.\nBu konunun Do\u011fu\u2019ya u\u00e7u\u015flarda en \u00f6nemli aktar\u0131m merkezi olaca\u011f\u0131 i\u00e7in Almanya\u2019ya ciddi rakip olacak \u0130stanbul Havaliman\u0131\u2019n\u0131n a\u00e7\u0131ld\u0131\u011f\u0131 g\u00fcn g\u00fcndeme getirilmesi, Almanya\u2019n\u0131n \u0130stanbul Havaliman\u0131 projesi hakk\u0131ndaki g\u00f6r\u00fc\u015fleri de g\u00f6z \u00f6n\u00fcne al\u0131nd\u0131\u011f\u0131nda son derece manidar ve dikkat \u00e7ekicidir.\n  \u0130stanbul Havaliman\u0131 projesi hakk\u0131nda olumsuz alg\u0131ya y\u00f6nelik haberler \u00f6zellikle Alman medyas\u0131nda s\u0131k\u00e7a yer bulmu\u015f, Almanya bu konuda endi\u015fe duymu\u015ftu. Frankfurt, Avrupa\u2019n\u0131n en \u00f6nemli aktarma noktalar\u0131ndan biri. Mega proje \u0130stanbul Havaliman\u0131, Do\u011fu\u2019ya u\u00e7u\u015flarda en \u00f6nemli aktar\u0131m merkezi olaca\u011f\u0131 i\u00e7in Almanya\u2019ya ciddi rakip olacak. Frankfurt Havaliman\u0131\u2019n\u0131 i\u015fleten Fraport \u015firketinin Y\u00f6netim Kurulu Ba\u015fkan\u0131 Schulte, \u0130stanbul\u2019a yap\u0131lacak 3. havaliman\u0131n\u0131n kendileri i\u00e7in \u00fcstesinden gelinmesi gereken bir s\u0131nama olaca\u011f\u0131n\u0131 s\u00f6ylemi\u015fti.\n\u201c\u0130stanbul Havaliman\u0131 Ger\u00e7ekten \u0130htiya\u00e7 m\u0131?\u201d ba\u015fl\u0131kl\u0131 ara\u015ft\u0131rma yaz\u0131s\u0131na buradan ula\u015fabilirsiniz.\n\u0130stanbul Havaliman\u0131\u2019n\u0131n A\u00e7\u0131ld\u0131\u011f\u0131 G\u00fcn Alman Bas\u0131n\u0131nda Yer Alan Berlin Havaliman\u0131 Haberleri\n7 Nisan 2019\u2018da \u0130stanbul Havaliman\u0131\u2019nda ticari u\u00e7u\u015flar ba\u015flam\u0131\u015f ve ilk u\u00e7ak Ankara\u2019ya kalkm\u0131\u015ft\u0131.\nAyn\u0131 g\u00fcn (7 Nisan 2019) Alman web sitelerinde \u201cTebrikler! Berlin Havaliman\u0131 2500 G\u00fcnd\u00fcr A\u00e7\u0131lm\u0131yor. (Gl\u00fcckwunsch! Der BER ist seit 2500 Tagen NICHT er\u00f6ffnet)\u201d ba\u015fl\u0131kl\u0131 haberler yay\u0131mland\u0131.\n7 Nisan\u2019da bz-berlin.de web sitesinde yer alan haber:\n  Haberde, Berlin Havaliman\u0131\u2019n\u0131n (BER) 3 Haziran 2012\u2019de, 2500 g\u00fcn \u00f6nce a\u00e7\u0131lm\u0131\u015f olmas\u0131 gerekti\u011fi yaz\u0131yor.\n8 Nisan\u2019da morgenpost.de web sitesinde yer alan haber:\n  7 Nisan 2019\u2019da yay\u0131mlanan s\u00f6z konusu habere tagesspiegel.de web sitesinde de yer verilmi\u015f:\nBurada ise daha sert bir ele\u015ftirel haber ba\u015fl\u0131\u011f\u0131 kullan\u0131lm\u0131\u015f. Ba\u015fl\u0131kta, \u201c2500 g\u00fcn \u00f6nce ba\u015fkentin havaalan\u0131n\u0131n a\u00e7\u0131lmas\u0131 patlad\u0131. Ekim 2020\u2019de (BER\u2019in) lansman\u0131 olmas\u0131 ise m\u00fcmk\u00fcn de\u011fil.\u201d ifadeleri yer al\u0131yor.\n  Yine 7 Nisan 2019\u2019da GTT NEWS taraf\u0131ndan y\u00fcklenen ele\u015ftirel bir YouTube videosuna da rastlamak m\u00fcmk\u00fcn:\n    Ayn\u0131 ele\u015ftirel ba\u015fl\u0131kla servis edilen bu habere pek \u00e7ok web sitesinde rastlamak m\u00fcmk\u00fcn; \u00fcstelik tam da 7 Nisan 2019\u2018da, \u0130stanbul Havaliman\u0131\u2019nda ticari u\u00e7u\u015flar\u0131n ba\u015flad\u0131\u011f\u0131 tarihte.\n  G\u00f6r\u00fcld\u00fc\u011f\u00fc \u00fczere s\u00f6z konusu iddia do\u011frudur; Berlin Havaliman\u0131\u2019n\u0131n 2500 g\u00fcnd\u00fcr a\u00e7\u0131lamad\u0131\u011f\u0131na y\u00f6nelik ele\u015ftirel haberler Alman medyas\u0131nda ve pek \u00e7ok web sitesinde \u0130stanbul Havaliman\u0131\u2019n\u0131n a\u00e7\u0131ld\u0131\u011f\u0131 g\u00fcn yay\u0131mlanm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r.\nBu konunun tam da \u0130stanbul Havaliman\u0131\u2019n\u0131n a\u00e7\u0131ld\u0131\u011f\u0131 g\u00fcn g\u00fcndeme getirilmesi, Almanya\u2019n\u0131n \u0130stanbul Havaliman\u0131 projesi hakk\u0131ndaki g\u00f6r\u00fc\u015fleri g\u00f6z \u00f6n\u00fcne al\u0131nd\u0131\u011f\u0131nda son derece manidar ve dikkat \u00e7ekicidir.\nKaynaklar: kaynak1, kaynak2, kaynak3, kaynak4, kaynak5, kaynak6, kaynak7, kaynak8, kaynak9\nVideo oynat\u0131c\u0131\nhttps://dogrula.org/wp-content/uploads/2018/02/dogrula.org_.mp4\n00:00\n00:07\n[Toplam:0    Ortalama:0/5] \u0130stanbul Havaliman\u0131\u2019n\u0131n A\u00e7\u0131ld\u0131\u011f\u0131 G\u00fcn Alman Medyas\u0131nda \u201cBerlin Yeni Havaliman\u0131 2500 G\u00fcnd\u00fcr A\u00e7\u0131lamad\u0131\u201d Haberlerinin Yaz\u0131ld\u0131\u011f\u0131 \u0130ddias\u0131", "  \u0130hbar olarak dogrula.org\u2019a g\u00f6nderilen bu iddia, \u0130nternet ve sosyal medya ortamlar\u0131nda s\u0131k\u00e7a payla\u015f\u0131lmaktad\u0131r.\nAncak s\u00f6z konusu iddia do\u011fru de\u011fildir; Japonya\u2019da 18 ya\u015f\u0131n\u0131 ge\u00e7en b\u00fct\u00fcn vatanda\u015flar\u0131n oy kullanma hakk\u0131 mevcuttur. Japonya h\u00fck\u00fcmetinin bu konuda bir yapt\u0131r\u0131m\u0131 veya se\u00e7men ayr\u0131m\u0131 bulunmamaktad\u0131r.\nJaponya\u2019da E\u011fitim Derecesine Bak\u0131lmaks\u0131z\u0131n 18 Ya\u015f\u0131ndaki Her Vatanda\u015f\u0131n Oy Verme Hakk\u0131 Var\nJapon \u0130\u00e7i\u015fleri ve Haberle\u015fme Bakanl\u0131\u011f\u0131 web sayfas\u0131nda da 18 ya\u015f\u0131n\u0131 dolduran her vatanda\u015f\u0131n oy kullanabilece\u011fi bilgisi yer al\u0131yor.\n20 Olan Se\u00e7me Ya\u015f\u0131 18\u2019e \u0130ndirilmi\u015fti\nJaponya\u2019da se\u00e7me ya\u015f\u0131 20\u2019den 18\u2019e d\u00fc\u015f\u00fcr\u00fclm\u00fc\u015f ve 18 ve 19 ya\u015f\u0131ndaki gen\u00e7ler 2016 referandumunda oy kullanm\u0131\u015flard\u0131.\nYerel haber kaynaklar\u0131nda bu gen\u00e7 se\u00e7menleri g\u00f6rmek m\u00fcmk\u00fcn:\nYasada B\u00f6yle Bir Ayr\u0131m Bulunmuyor\n1946 Japon Anayas\u0131\u2019n\u0131n ilgili maddelerinde b\u00f6yle bir ayr\u0131ma yer verilmiyor:\n  \u0130lgili maddelerde halk\u0131n kamu g\u00f6revlilerini se\u00e7me ve i\u015ften \u00e7\u0131karma konusunda devredilemez hakka (vazge\u00e7ilmez hak)sahip oldu\u011fu bilgisi mevcut. Ayr\u0131ca, kamu g\u00f6revlilerinin se\u00e7ilmesi konusunda genel yeti\u015fkin oy hakk\u0131 garanti alt\u0131ndad\u0131r deniyor.\n  Maddeler, devredilemez haklar\u0131n koruma alt\u0131nda oldu\u011funu ve sosyal stat\u00fc, cinsiyet, e\u011fitim gibi ayr\u0131mlar\u0131n bulunmad\u0131\u011f\u0131n\u0131 vurguluyor.\n  G\u00f6r\u00fcld\u00fc\u011f\u00fc \u00fczere, s\u00f6z konusu iddia do\u011fru de\u011fil. Japonya\u2019da 18 ya\u015f\u0131n\u0131 ge\u00e7en b\u00fct\u00fcn vatanda\u015flar\u0131n oy kullanma hakk\u0131 mevcut. Japonya h\u00fck\u00fcmetinin bu konuda bir yapt\u0131r\u0131m\u0131 veya se\u00e7men ayr\u0131m\u0131 bulunmuyor.\nKaynaklar: kaynak1, kaynak2, kaynak3, kaynak4, kaynak5\nVideo oynat\u0131c\u0131\nhttps://dogrula.org/wp-content/uploads/2018/02/dogrula.org_.mp4\n00:00\n00:07\n[Toplam:1    Ortalama:5/5] Japonya\u2019da Lise Mezunu Olmayanlar Oy Veremiyor \u0130ddias\u0131", "  Sputnik Twitter hesab\u0131nda payla\u015f\u0131lan bu haber, yakla\u015f\u0131k 2 bin 600 kez rt yap\u0131ld\u0131 ve 16 bin be\u011feni ald\u0131.\nHaberde, \u201cLiberty \u00dcniversitesi\u2019nden arkeologlar, Babil kral\u0131 Nabonidus\u2019un, M.\u00d6. 6. y\u00fczy\u0131lda yazd\u0131\u011f\u0131, d\u00fcnyan\u0131n ilk ayr\u0131l\u0131k mektubunu ke\u015ffetti.\u201d ifadesi yer ald\u0131.\n\u0130\u00e7erikte mektubun i\u00e7eri\u011fi \u015f\u00f6yle belirtildi:\n\u201c\u00c7ocukluk arkada\u015f\u0131m Nisaba ile g\u00f6r\u00fc\u015ft\u00fc\u011f\u00fcn\u00fcn haberi, Yukar\u0131 F\u0131rat\u2019tan bana ula\u015ft\u0131. En sevdi\u011fim cariyelerimden biri oldu\u011fun i\u00e7in bu ihanetle mahvoldum.\nKeten \u015fal ve sandaletlerini almak i\u00e7in ay\u0131n sonuna kadar vaktin var, yoksa onlar\u0131 ay tanr\u0131s\u0131n\u0131n tap\u0131na\u011f\u0131na ba\u011f\u0131\u015flayaca\u011f\u0131m.\u201d\nAncak s\u00f6z konusu iddia do\u011fru de\u011fildir, haber, mizahi payla\u015f\u0131mlar yapan bir web sitesi taraf\u0131ndan 1 Nisan \u015fakas\u0131 olarak servis edilmi\u015ftir.\nHyperallergic \u0130simli \u0130nternet Sitesinin 1 Nisan \u015eakas\u0131\n1 Nisan\u2019da yap\u0131lan bu payla\u015f\u0131m, \u015faka amac\u0131yla servis edilmi\u015f.\nA tablet discovered this year, suggests that Neo-Babylonians may have been the first to start writing break up letters.https://t.co/xM3JZOhu9z\n\u2014 hyperallergic (@hyperallergic) April 1, 2019\n  Haber, web sitesinde de April Fools tagiyle payla\u015f\u0131lm\u0131\u015f.\n  G\u00f6r\u00fcld\u00fc\u011f\u00fc \u00fczere iddia do\u011fru de\u011fil; Foto\u011fraf, yakla\u015f\u0131k 559 bin kez payla\u015f\u0131lm\u0131\u015f, 7 bin yorum ve 39 bin be\u011feni alm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r.\n    2016 Y\u0131l\u0131na Ait Bu Foto\u011fraf Hollanda\u2019dan\nFoto\u011fraf asl\u0131nda 7 Mart 2016\u2019da foto\u011fraf\u00e7\u0131 Koen Van Weel taraf\u0131ndan Hollanda\u2019da yap\u0131lan bir polis tatbikat\u0131 s\u0131ras\u0131nda \u00e7ekilmi\u015f. Foto\u011fraf\u0131n sahibi ve \u00e7ekildi\u011fi yer, Getty Images sayfas\u0131nda g\u00f6r\u00fcl\u00fcyor:\n      BBC News\u2019in 2016 tarihli bir videosunda da bu kartallar\u0131 g\u00f6rmek m\u00fcmk\u00fcn.\n  G\u00f6r\u00fcld\u00fc\u011f\u00fc \u00fczere, drone yakalayan kartal foto\u011fraf\u0131n\u0131n 2019\u2019da Fethiye\u2019de \u00e7ekildi\u011fi iddias\u0131 do\u011fru de\u011fildir. Foto\u011fraf 7 Mart 2016\u2019da foto\u011fraf\u00e7\u0131 Koen Van Weel taraf\u0131ndan Hollanda\u2019da yap\u0131lan bir polis tatbikat\u0131 s\u0131ras\u0131nda \u00e7ekilmi\u015ftir.\nKaynaklar: kaynak1, kaynak2, kaynak3, kaynak4, kaynak5\nVideo oynat\u0131c\u0131\nhttps://dogrula.org/wp-content/uploads/2018/02/dogrula.org_.mp4\n00:00\n00:07\n[Toplam:1    Ortalama:5/5] Drone Yakalayan Kartal Foto\u011fraf\u0131n\u0131n 2019\u2019da Fethiye\u2019de \u00c7ekildi\u011fi \u0130ddias\u0131", "  \u0130hbar olarak dogrula.org\u2019a g\u00f6nderilen bu payla\u015f\u0131mda, Adolf Hitler\u2019in 30 Ocak 1933\u2019te yaln\u0131zca 1 oy farkla Almanya Ba\u015fbakan\u0131 oldu\u011fu iddia edildi.\nAncak s\u00f6z konusu iddia do\u011fru de\u011fildir, bir \u015fehir efsanesidir. Hitler liderli\u011finde se\u00e7imlere giren Nazi Partisi, se\u00e7imlerde oylar\u0131n \u00e7o\u011funlu\u011funu alm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r.\n  Berlin, 1932\nBerlin, 1932\nBerlin, 1932\n  \u0130nsanlar\u0131 oy kullanmaya te\u015fvik etmek ad\u0131na \u201c1 Oy Neden \u00d6nemli\u201d ba\u015fl\u0131\u011f\u0131yla benzer iddialar ortaya at\u0131lm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r. Ancak bu iddialar\u0131n hi\u00e7biri ger\u00e7e\u011fi yans\u0131tmamaktad\u0131r.\nHitler Nazi Partisi\u2019nin Liderli\u011fini 1921\u2019de Devrald\u0131, 1933\u2019te Ba\u015fbakan Se\u00e7ildi\n  Adolf Hitler, Temmuz 1921\u2018de, sonradan Ulusal Sosyalist Alman \u0130\u015f\u00e7i Partisi (Nazi) olarak yeniden adland\u0131r\u0131lan \u00f6rg\u00fct\u00fcn liderli\u011fini \u00fcstlenmi\u015ftir.\nKaynaklar, Temmuz 1932 se\u00e7imlerinde Hitler liderli\u011findeki Nazi Partisi\u2019nin Alman parlamentosundaki 608 sandalyeden 230\u2019unu, Kas\u0131m ay\u0131nda yap\u0131lan se\u00e7imlerde ise 196\u2019s\u0131n\u0131 ald\u0131\u011f\u0131 bilgisine yer vermektedir.\nOcak 1933\u2018te Hitler, Almanya Ba\u015fbakan\u0131 se\u00e7ilmi\u015f ve Nazi h\u00fck\u00fcmeti k\u0131sa s\u00fcrede Alman ya\u015fam\u0131n\u0131n her y\u00f6n\u00fcn\u00fc kontrol alt\u0131na alm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r.\nD\u00f6nemin The Guardian Gazetesinde Se\u00e7im Sonu\u00e7lar\u0131\n1932\u20131933 y\u0131l\u0131nda Almanya\u2019da yap\u0131lan se\u00e7imin sonu\u00e7lar\u0131, 13 Kas\u0131m 1933 tarihli The Guardian haberinde yer al\u0131yor.\nHaberde, \u201cSe\u00e7imlerinin sonu\u00e7lar\u0131 beklendi\u011fi gibi Herr Hitler\u2019in ezici \u00e7o\u011funlu\u011funu g\u00f6steriyor.\u201d ifadesi yer al\u0131yor.\n  D\u00f6nemin haber kaynaklar\u0131na bak\u0131ld\u0131\u011f\u0131nda, Hitler\u2019in ba\u015fbakan oldu\u011fu haberi g\u00f6r\u00fcl\u00fcyor; diktat\u00f6rl\u00fc\u011f\u00fcne dair yak\u0131\u015ft\u0131rmalar da haberlerde yer al\u0131yor ancak 1 oy farkla se\u00e7imi kazand\u0131\u011f\u0131na dair bir bilgiye rastlanm\u0131yor.\n  Wiener K\u00fct\u00fcphanesi\u2019nde bulunan, Mart 1933 se\u00e7imlerinden bir poster. Posterin alt yar\u0131s\u0131nda \u015funlar yaz\u0131yor:\n  \u201cHitler\u2019e ne kadar g\u00fc\u00e7 verirseniz, kazanmas\u0131 o kadar kolay olur ve insanlar\u0131 bug\u00fcn bulunduklar\u0131 yere getiren partilerden daha ba\u011f\u0131ms\u0131z yapars\u0131n\u0131z. Bu partilere 14 y\u0131l boyunca Almanya\u2019y\u0131 mahvetme izni verdiniz! Hitler\u2019e ise yeniden in\u015fa etmesi i\u00e7in 4 y\u0131l verin! H\u0130TLER\u2019i oylayarak ona g\u00fc\u00e7 ve zaman verin!\u201d\nTek Oy \u0130ddialar\u0131na Dair Benzer \u015eehir Efsaneleri\nS\u00fcrekli olarak \u0130nternet ortamlar\u0131nda g\u00fcndeme gelen \u201c1 oy tarihi nas\u0131l de\u011fi\u015ftirdi\u201d iddialar\u0131na ili\u015fkin en eski yaz\u0131lardan biri de 1986 y\u0131l\u0131nda ABD gazetesi Chicago Tribune\u2019de yaz\u0131lm\u0131\u015f. Listelenen \u015fehir efsaneleri \u00f6zellikle se\u00e7im d\u00f6nemlerinde rutin olarak sosyal medya ortamlar\u0131nda payla\u015f\u0131l\u0131yor; yaz\u0131l\u0131 bas\u0131nda yer al\u0131yor. Ama\u00e7 oy vermenin \u00f6nemini vurgulamak olsa da, ortaya at\u0131lan iddialar ger\u00e7e\u011fi yans\u0131tm\u0131yor. \u0130lgili kaynakta bunu delilleriyle g\u00f6rmek m\u00fcmk\u00fcn.\n\u0130nsanlar\u0131 oy kullanmaya te\u015fvik etmek ad\u0131na \u201c1 Oy Neden \u00d6nemli\u201d ba\u015fl\u0131\u011f\u0131yla ortaya at\u0131lan benzer iddialar:\n\u00b7 1645\u2019te bir oy Oliver Cromwell\u2019e \u0130ngiltere\u2019nin kontrol\u00fcn\u00fc verdi.\n\u00b7 1649\u2019da bir oy \u0130ngiltere\u2019de I.Charles\u2019in idam\u0131na neden oldu.\n\u00b7 1776\u2019da bir oy Amerika\u2019ya Almanca yerine \u0130ngilizce dilini verdi.\n\u00b7 1875\u2019te bir oy Fransa\u2019n\u0131n monar\u015fiden cumhuriyete ge\u00e7mesini sa\u011flad\u0131.\n\u00b7 1923\u2019te bir oy, Adolf Hitler\u2019e Nazi Partisi\u2019nin liderli\u011fini verdi.\n  G\u00f6r\u00fcld\u00fc\u011f\u00fc \u00fczere Adolf Hitler\u2019in 30 Ocak 1933\u2019te yaln\u0131zca 1 oy farkla Almanya Ba\u015fbakan\u0131 oldu\u011fu iddias\u0131 do\u011fru de\u011fildir, bir \u015fehir efsanesidir. Hitler liderli\u011finde se\u00e7imlere giren Nazi Partisi, se\u00e7imlerde oylar\u0131n \u00e7o\u011funlu\u011funu alm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r. Ge\u00e7mi\u015fe bak\u0131ld\u0131\u011f\u0131nda, insanlar\u0131 oy kullanmaya te\u015fvik etmek ad\u0131na \u201c1 Oy Neden \u00d6nemli\u201d ba\u015fl\u0131\u011f\u0131yla ortaya at\u0131lan benzer iddialar\u0131 g\u00f6rmek m\u00fcmk\u00fcn.\n  Kaynaklar: kaynak1, kaynak2, kaynak3, kaynak4, kaynak5, kaynak6, kaynak7, kaynak8, kaynak9, kaynak10, kaynak11, kaynak12\nVideo oynat\u0131c\u0131\nhttps://dogrula.org/wp-content/uploads/2018/02/dogrula.org_.mp4\n00:00\n00:07\n[Toplam:2    Ortalama:5/5] Hitler\u2019in 1 Oy Farkla Almanya Ba\u015fbakan\u0131 Oldu\u011fu \u0130ddias\u0131", "  \u0130hbar olarak dogrula.org\u2019a gelen bu g\u00f6rsel, Saadet Partisi Batman Belediye Ba\u015fkan Aday\u0131 \u0130lhami I\u015f\u0131k taraf\u0131ndan Batman\u2019dan oldu\u011fu \u00f6ne s\u00fcr\u00fclerek servis edilmi\u015fti.\nAncak s\u00f6z konusu iddia do\u011fru de\u011fildir.
