\u00c7ocu\u011fu G\u00f6sterdi\u011fi \u0130ddias\u0131", "  M.Sc Azuth Asilkan adl\u0131 bir Twitter kullan\u0131c\u0131s\u0131, gerzek kelimesinin dilimize Ay\u015fen Gruda taraf\u0131ndan kazand\u0131r\u0131ld\u0131\u011f\u0131n\u0131, 1976\u2019dan \u00f6nce b\u00f6yle bir kelimenin olmad\u0131\u011f\u0131n\u0131 iddia etti; bu payla\u015f\u0131m\u0131 30 bin be\u011feni ve yakla\u015f\u0131k 2 bin retweet ald\u0131.\n  Gerzek kelimesi bizzat Ay\u015fen Gruda bulu\u015fuymu\u015f.. geri zekal\u0131n\u0131n k\u0131salt\u0131lm\u0131\u015f\u0131.. 76\u2019dan \u00f6nce gerzek diye bir kelime yokmu\u015f.. vay be..\n\u2014 M.Sc. Azuth Asilkan (@Azuth) March 18, 2019\n  S\u00f6z konusu iddia do\u011frudur, vefat\u0131ndan \u00f6nce bizzat Ay\u015fen Gruda taraf\u0131ndan da teyit edilmi\u015ftir. Ayr\u0131ca bas\u0131l\u0131 kaynaklar incelendi\u011finde, belirtilen tarihten \u00f6nce gerzek kelimesinin kullan\u0131m\u0131na rastlanmam\u0131\u015ft\u0131r.\nAy\u015fen Gruda Teyit Etmi\u015f\nGe\u00e7ti\u011fimiz g\u00fcnlerde hayat\u0131n\u0131 kaybeden oyuncu Ay\u015fen Gruda, 17 Ocak 2012 tarihinde CNN T\u00fcrk\u2019te Burada Laf \u00c7ok adl\u0131 bir show program\u0131na kat\u0131lm\u0131\u015f. TV program\u0131nda sunucu Mesut Yar kendisine, \u201cbir \u015fehir efsanesi var, geri zekal\u0131 laf\u0131n\u0131 gerze\u011fe \u00e7evirip dilimize o kazand\u0131rd\u0131\u201d diyerek bu konuyu sormu\u015f.\nBunun \u00fczerine Ay\u015fen Gruda, \u201cEvet do\u011fru. Ben bir yapt\u0131\u011f\u0131m \u015feyi bir daha ba\u015fka kullanmam, hayatta hi\u00e7bir rolde bir daha gerzek laf\u0131n\u0131 kullanmad\u0131m. Manyam\u0131\u015f var\u201d diyerek bu kelimeleri kendisinin \u00fcretti\u011fini s\u00f6ylemi\u015ftir.\nCNN T\u00fcrk web sitesinde yer alan videonun 1:15:30 saniyesine gidildi\u011finde, Ay\u015fen Gruda\u2019n\u0131n gerzek kelimesi hakk\u0131nda s\u00f6ylediklerine ula\u015fmak m\u00fcmk\u00fcn.\n\u201c1976\u2019dan \u00d6nce Gerzek Diye bir Kelime Yokmu\u015f\u201d \u0130ddias\u0131\n22 A\u011fustos 1944\u2019te d\u00fcnyaya gelen Ye\u015fil\u00e7am\u2019\u0131n simgelerinden Ay\u015fen Gruda 23 Ocak 2019\u2019da, 74 ya\u015f\u0131ndayken ya\u015fam\u0131n\u0131 yitirmi\u015ftir. \u0130lk filmi Yasak Sokaklar\u2019\u0131 1965 y\u0131l\u0131nda, Bizim Aile filmini ise 1975 y\u0131l\u0131nda \u00e7ekmi\u015ftir. Bu tarihlerde filmlerde rol almaya ba\u015flamas\u0131 da, \u201c1976\u2019dan \u00f6nce gerzek diye bir kelime yokmu\u015f\u201d iddias\u0131n\u0131 do\u011frular nitelikte.\n  \u0130nternette 1976 y\u0131l\u0131 \u00f6ncesindeki kitap ve gazete ar\u015fivi tarand\u0131\u011f\u0131nda, gerzek kelimesinin kullan\u0131m\u0131na rastlanm\u0131yor.\nGerzek \u015eaban filmi\nGerzek kelimesi Kemal Sunal\u2019\u0131n bir filminde de kullan\u0131lm\u0131\u015f. Film, 1980y\u0131l\u0131nda \u00e7ekilmi\u015f. Bu tarih de ayn\u0131 \u015fekilde iddiay\u0131 do\u011frular nitelikte.\n  Gerzek kelimesi, TDK web sitesinde argo bir s\u0131fat olarak geri zekal\u0131 tan\u0131m\u0131yla yer al\u0131r.\n  Baz\u0131 kaynaklarda ise, Ay\u015fen Gruda\u2019n\u0131n gerzek kelimesini ilk olarak \u201cDomates G\u00fczeli Nahide \u015eerbet\u201d karakteri oldu\u011fu zaman sahnede s\u00f6yledi\u011fi bilgisi yer al\u0131r.\n  G\u00f6r\u00fcld\u00fc\u011f\u00fc \u00fczere iddia do\u011frudur, vefat\u0131ndan \u00f6nce bizzat Ay\u015fen Gruda taraf\u0131ndan da teyit edilmi\u015ftir. Ayr\u0131ca bas\u0131l\u0131 kaynaklar incelendi\u011finde, belirtilen tarihten \u00f6nce gerzek kelimesinin kullan\u0131m\u0131na rastlanmam\u0131\u015ft\u0131r.\n  Kaynaklar: kaynak1, kaynak2, kaynak3, kaynak4, kaynak5, kaynak6\nVideo oynat\u0131c\u0131\nhttps://dogrula.org/wp-content/uploads/2018/02/dogrula.org_.mp4\n00:00\n00:07\n[Toplam:1    Ortalama:5/5] Gerzek Kelimesini Dilimize Ay\u015fen Gruda Kazand\u0131rd\u0131 \u0130ddias\u0131", "  Gennosuke Sama adl\u0131 Twitter kullan\u0131c\u0131s\u0131n\u0131n yapt\u0131\u011f\u0131 bir payla\u015f\u0131mda, \u0130ngiltere\u2019de hakimlerin ceplerinde Krali\u00e7e imzal\u0131 bo\u015f bir \u00e7ek bulundu\u011fu; hakimin isterse 100 milyon sterlin yaz\u0131p bankadan tahsil edebilece\u011fi, bu durumun Krali\u00e7enin yarg\u0131\u00e7lar\u0131na \u0130ngiltere hazinesini emanet edecek kadar g\u00fcvendi\u011fi anlam\u0131na geldi\u011fi iddia edildi.\n\"\u0130ngiltere'de hakimlerin cebinde Krali\u00e7e imzal\u0131 bo\u015f \u00e7ek vard\u0131r\nHakim isterse 100 Milyon Sterlin yaz\u0131p bankadan tahsil edebilir\nBu durum -Ben yarg\u0131\u00e7lar\u0131ma \u0130ngiltere Hazinesini emanet edecek kadar g\u00fcveniyorum- anlam\u0131 ta\u015f\u0131r\"@can_atakli_\n\u2014 Gennosuke Sama (@mydream_waterr) March 13, 2019\n\u015eehir efsanesi haline gelen bu iddiaya Can Atakl\u0131 da bir yaz\u0131s\u0131nda yer vermi\u015ftir ancak iddia do\u011fru de\u011fildir. Krali\u00e7e asla belge imzalamaz; kraliyet ailesinin \u00fcyelerine de potansiyel bir imza taklit ihtimali y\u00fcz\u00fcnden imza atma izni verilmez.\nCan Atakl\u0131 yaz\u0131s\u0131nda ne demi\u015f:\nBirle\u015fik Krall\u0131k\u2019ta Hakimler Ne Kadar Maa\u015f Al\u0131yor?\nBirle\u015fik Krall\u0131k Adalet Bakanl\u0131\u011f\u0131 verilerine g\u00f6re, hakimlerin maa\u015f tablosu \u015fu \u015fekilde:\n    Yukar\u0131daki tablo, 1 Nisan 2017 tarihinden itibaren adli maa\u015flara genel bir bak\u0131\u015f sunuyor.\n  Burada da Krali\u00e7e taraf\u0131ndan verilen ekstra bo\u015f bir \u00e7ek veya benzeri bir \u00f6denekten bahsedilmiyor.\nKrali\u00e7e Elizabeth Asla \u00c7ek Yazm\u0131yor\n  Krali\u00e7e II. Elizabeth \u00e7ek yazm\u0131yor \u00e7\u00fcnk\u00fc insanlar kendilerinde imzas\u0131 olan ve Krali\u00e7e\u2019den gelen bir \u00e7eki bozdurmak yerine hat\u0131ra olarak saklamay\u0131 tercih ederdi.\nAyr\u0131ca The Sun gazetesinde yer alan habere g\u00f6re, kraliyet ailesindeki hi\u00e7 kimsenin \u00e7ek gibi imzal\u0131 bir belge vermesine m\u00fcsaade edilmiyor. Sebebi ise potansiyel bir h\u0131rs\u0131z\u0131n imzay\u0131 taklit etme ihtimali.\nBir istisna olarak 1599 y\u0131l\u0131nda Krali\u00e7e I. Elizabeth\u2019in imzalad\u0131\u011f\u0131 bir belge bulunuyor ve hat\u0131ra amac\u0131yla saklanan bu belge sat\u0131\u015fa sunulmu\u015f.\nDokuz Y\u0131l Sava\u015flar\u0131 esnas\u0131nda daha fazla birlik gerekti\u011finde ili\u015fkin bu belgede, Elizebeth R imzas\u0131 g\u00f6r\u00fcl\u00fcyor.\n  Yani, kraliyet ailesinin hi\u00e7bir \u00fcyesinin, hat\u0131ra amac\u0131yla kitaplar veya v\u00fccutlar \u00fczerine dahi imza atmas\u0131na izin verilmiyor.\nHatta Prens Charles\u2019in imzas\u0131 istendi\u011finde her zaman \u015fu \u015fekilde cevap verdi\u011fi bildiriliyor: \u201c\u00dczg\u00fcn\u00fcm, bunu yapmama izin vermiyorlar.\u201d\nBirle\u015fik Krall\u0131k Resmi Kaynaklar\u0131nda Yer Alan Yarg\u0131 Giderleri\nBirle\u015fik Krall\u0131k resmi kaynaklar\u0131nda yer alan ekstra yarg\u0131 giderleri incelendi\u011finde, Krali\u00e7e taraf\u0131ndan verildi\u011fi iddia edilen s\u00f6z konusu bo\u015f \u00e7ek bilgisine rastlanm\u0131yor.\nDetaylara bak\u0131ld\u0131\u011f\u0131nda hakimler, Adalet Bakanl\u0131\u011f\u0131ndaki memurlara uygulananlarla ayn\u0131 \u015fekilde, s\u0131n\u0131rl\u0131 ko\u015fullarda masraf talep edebiliyor. Yani adli g\u00f6revlerinde yapt\u0131klar\u0131 seyahat ve ge\u00e7im masraflar\u0131n\u0131 talep edebiliyor.\nBo\u015f \u00c7ek Efsanesi Nereden Geliyor?\nA\u00e7\u0131k \u00e7ek olarak da \u00e7evirebilece\u011fimiz bo\u015f \u00e7ek (blank cheque) efsanesi 2014 y\u0131l\u0131na ait. Birle\u015fik Krall\u0131k\u2019ta o d\u00f6nemin \u0130ngiltere Y\u00fcksek Mahkeme Ba\u015fkan\u0131 yarg\u0131\u00e7 Lord Neuberger, \u0130nsan Haklar\u0131 Yasas\u0131\u2019n\u0131n mahkemelerce yasa yapabilmek i\u00e7in bir a\u00e7\u0131k \u00e7ek oldu\u011funu ifade etmi\u015f.\nYarg\u0131\u00e7 Avustralya\u2019da avukatlara verdi\u011fi bir deme\u00e7te parlamentonun bu ba\u011flamda hakimlere a\u00e7\u0131k \u00e7ek verdi\u011fini s\u00f6ylemi\u015f.\n\u0130nsan Haklar\u0131 Yasas\u0131\u2019n\u0131n hakimlere parlamento \u00fcyelerini (milletvekili) ge\u00e7ersiz k\u0131lma olana\u011f\u0131 ve hukuki g\u00f6r\u00fc\u015flere de parlamentoya g\u00f6re \u00f6ncelik verdi\u011fini belirtmi\u015f. Bu ekstra g\u00fcc\u00fcn de h\u00fck\u00fcmetleri kontrol alt\u0131nda tutmaya olanak sa\u011flad\u0131\u011f\u0131n\u0131 dile getirmi\u015f.\nDaily Mail haberinde \u201cbo\u015f \u00e7ek/a\u00e7\u0131k \u00e7ek (blank cheque)\u201d ifadesini s\u0131k\u00e7a g\u00f6rmek m\u00fcmk\u00fcn:\n    G\u00f6r\u00fcld\u00fc\u011f\u00fc \u00fczere, \u0130ngiltere\u2019de hakimlerin cebinde Krali\u00e7e imzal\u0131 bo\u015f bir \u00e7ek bulundu\u011fu iddias\u0131 do\u011fru de\u011fildir, bir \u015fehir efsanesidir. Ayr\u0131ca Krali\u00e7e asla belge imzalamaz; kraliyet ailesinin \u00fcyelerine de potansiyel bir imza taklit ihtimali y\u00fcz\u00fcnden imza atma izni verilmez.\nKaynaklar: kaynak1, kaynak2, kaynak3, kaynak4, kaynak5, kaynak6, kaynak7, kaynak8, kaynak9\nVideo oynat\u0131c\u0131\nhttps://dogrula.org/wp-content/uploads/2018/02/dogrula.org_.mp4\n00:00\n00:07\n[Toplam:1    Ortalama:5/5] \u0130ngiltere\u2019de Hakimlerin Cebinde Krali\u00e7e \u0130mzal\u0131 Bo\u015f \u00c7ek Vard\u0131r \u0130ddias\u0131", "  \u0130hbar olarak dogrula.org\u2019a g\u00f6nderilen bu haberde, foto\u011fraftaki Hamza Bendelladj adl\u0131 yaz\u0131l\u0131mc\u0131n\u0131n ABD bankalar\u0131ndaki 280 milyon dolar\u0131 hackleyerek Filistinli yard\u0131m kurulu\u015flar\u0131na g\u00f6nderdi\u011fi ve bu y\u00fczden idam cezas\u0131na \u00e7arpt\u0131r\u0131ld\u0131\u011f\u0131 iddia edildi.\nS\u00f6z konusu iddia \u00e7o\u011funlukla yanl\u0131\u015ft\u0131r. G\u00f6rseldeki ki\u015fi Rus orta\u011f\u0131yla birlikte ABD bankalar\u0131n\u0131 hacklemi\u015ftir; ancak idam cezas\u0131na de\u011fil, 15 y\u0131l hapis cezas\u0131na \u00e7arpt\u0131r\u0131lm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r. Ayr\u0131ca bu paray\u0131 Filistinli yard\u0131m kurulu\u015flar\u0131na g\u00f6nderdi\u011fi iddias\u0131 ise avukat\u0131 taraf\u0131ndan yalanlanm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r.\n  2016 y\u0131l\u0131nda, Cezayirli hacker Hamza Bendelladj\u2019\u0131n (bin Dalaj) ABD mahkemesi taraf\u0131ndan 15 y\u0131l hapis cezas\u0131na \u00e7arpt\u0131r\u0131ld\u0131\u011f\u0131 haberi medyada yer alm\u0131\u015ft\u0131.\nCNN\u2019nin haberine g\u00f6re, Cezayirli Bendelladj Ocak 2013\u2019te Bangkok\u2019ta polis taraf\u0131ndan tutuklan\u0131p ABD\u2019ye iade edildi ve ABD mahkemesince cezaland\u0131r\u0131lmas\u0131na karar verildi.\nMahkeme \u201cBx1\u201d kod ad\u0131yla bilinen 27 ya\u015f\u0131ndaki hackeri bilgi sistemlerine vir\u00fcs bula\u015ft\u0131rmak ve d\u00fcnyadaki bir\u00e7ok \u015firkete ve kuruma b\u00fcy\u00fck zararlar vermekle su\u00e7lad\u0131. ABD\u2019de 50 milyon bilgisayar\u0131n SpyEye adl\u0131 bu vir\u00fcsten etkilendi\u011fi bildirildi.\n50 milyondan fazla bilgisayara bula\u015fm\u0131\u015f oldu\u011funa inan\u0131lan SpyEye vir\u00fcs\u00fcnden \u00f6t\u00fcr\u00fc Rus Aleksandr Andreevich Panin 9,5 y\u0131l, orta\u011f\u0131 Cezayirli Hamza Bendelladj ise 15 y\u0131l hapis cezas\u0131na \u00e7arpt\u0131r\u0131ld\u0131.\nABD Adalet Bakanl\u0131\u011f\u0131 yapt\u0131\u011f\u0131 a\u00e7\u0131klamada, Aleksandr Andreevich Panin ve Hamza Bendelladj\u2019in finans sekt\u00f6r\u00fcne y\u00fcz milyonlarca dolar zarara neden oldu\u011fu s\u00f6ylenen SpyEye k\u00f6t\u00fc ama\u00e7l\u0131 yaz\u0131l\u0131mlar\u0131n\u0131n geli\u015ftirilmesinde ve da\u011f\u0131t\u0131lmas\u0131ndaki rollerinden dolay\u0131 mahkum edildi\u011fi bilgisine yer verdi.\n\u0130dam Cezas\u0131 Dedikodusu Nas\u0131l Yay\u0131ld\u0131? Paray\u0131 Filistinli Yard\u0131m Kurulu\u015flar\u0131na m\u0131 Aktard\u0131?\n\u0130ddia g\u00f6rselinde ayr\u0131ca Bendelladj\u2019\u0131n hackledi\u011fi ABD bankalar\u0131ndaki milyonlarca dolar\u0131 Filistinli yard\u0131m kurulu\u015flar\u0131na g\u00f6nderdi\u011fi ve idam cezas\u0131na \u00e7arpt\u0131r\u0131ld\u0131\u011f\u0131 iddia edilmi\u015fti.\n5 Ocak 2013 tarihinde Tayland\u2019\u0131n Bangkok kentindeki Suvarnabhumi Havaalan\u0131nda Malezya\u2019dan Cezayir\u2019e transit giderken yakalanan Bendelladj, g\u00f6zalt\u0131na al\u0131nd\u0131\u011f\u0131nda \u00e7ekilen foto\u011fraf\u0131ndan dolay\u0131 \u201cmutlu hacker\u201d olarak adland\u0131r\u0131ld\u0131 .2 May\u0131s 2013 tarihinde Tayland\u2019dan ABD\u2019ye iade edildi.\n\u0130adesini takiben, sosyal medyada Bendelladj\u2019in idam cezas\u0131yla kar\u015f\u0131 kar\u015f\u0131ya kald\u0131\u011f\u0131na dair s\u00f6ylentiler ba\u015flad\u0131 ve destek\u00e7ileri onun korunmas\u0131n\u0131 isteyen bir kampanya ba\u015flatt\u0131.\n    Hamza Bendelladj\u2018\u0131n ABD bankalar\u0131ndaki 280 milyon dolar\u0131 hackleyerek Filistinli yard\u0131m kurulu\u015flar\u0131na g\u00f6nderdi\u011fi ve bu y\u00fczden idam cezas\u0131na \u00e7arpt\u0131r\u0131ld\u0131\u011f\u0131 iddias\u0131 bir tweetle ortaya at\u0131ld\u0131.\nPayla\u015f\u0131mda, Hassan_JBr adl\u0131 kullan\u0131c\u0131, \u201cCezayir kahraman\u0131, en tehlikeli 10 hackerden 1\u2019i. 217 bankay\u0131 hackledi, Filistin\u2019e 280 milyon dolar g\u00f6nderdi. Cezas\u0131 ne? \u00d6l\u00fcm.\u201d adl\u0131 bir payla\u015f\u0131m yapt\u0131 ve mesaj\u0131 4.500\u2019den fazla retweet ald\u0131.\n  ABD makamlar\u0131 iddialar\u0131 reddetti; ABD\u2019nin Cezayir\u2019deki b\u00fcy\u00fckel\u00e7isi (o d\u00f6nemdeki) Frans\u0131zca yazd\u0131\u011f\u0131 bir tweetle, bili\u015fim su\u00e7lar\u0131 i\u015fleyenlerin idam cezas\u0131na \u00e7arpt\u0131r\u0131lmad\u0131\u011f\u0131n\u0131 s\u00f6yledi.\n1/2 Hamza Bendelladj a plaid\u00e9 coupable 26 juin pour avoir d\u00e9velopp\u00e9, distribu\u00e9, et contr\u00f4l\u00e9 SpyEye un Cheval de Troie bancaire malicieux.\n\u2014 Ambassador Desrocher (@USAmbtoAlgeria) August 22, 2015\n2/2 Le verdict aura lieu apres quelques mois. Crimes informatiques ne sont pas des crimes capitaux & ne sont pas punis par la peine de mort\n\u2014 Ambassador Desrocher (@USAmbtoAlgeria) August 22, 2015\n  Su\u00e7lu su\u00e7unu kabul etmesine ra\u011fmen, Bendellaj\u2019\u0131n destek\u00e7ileri #FreeHamzaBendellaj ve #FreePalestine etiketlerini kullanarak serbest b\u0131rak\u0131lmas\u0131n\u0131 talep eden Twitter payla\u015f\u0131mlar\u0131 yapt\u0131.\n    Sosyal medya kullan\u0131c\u0131lar\u0131 taraf\u0131ndan ortaya at\u0131lan, Bendelladj\u2019\u0131n paray\u0131 Filistinli yard\u0131m kurulu\u015flar\u0131na aktard\u0131\u011f\u0131 iddias\u0131 \u015fehir efsanesi olmu\u015f, web ortamlar\u0131nda da payla\u015f\u0131lm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r. A Jazeera haber kurulu\u015fu, Bendelladj\u2019\u0131n avukat\u0131 Jay Strongwater\u2019in Filistinli yard\u0131m kurulu\u015flar\u0131na para aktard\u0131\u011f\u0131 iddias\u0131n\u0131 yalanlad\u0131\u011f\u0131 bilgisine yer vermi\u015ftir.\n  G\u00f6r\u00fcld\u00fc\u011f\u00fc \u00fczere iddia \u00e7o\u011funlukla yanl\u0131\u015ft\u0131r. G\u00f6rseldeki Cezayirli Hamza Bendelladj Rus orta\u011f\u0131yla birlikte ABD bankalar\u0131n\u0131 hacklemi\u015ftir; ancak idam cezas\u0131na de\u011fil, 15 y\u0131l hapis cezas\u0131na \u00e7arpt\u0131r\u0131lm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r. Ayr\u0131ca bu paray\u0131 Filistinli yard\u0131m kurulu\u015flar\u0131na g\u00f6nderdi\u011fi iddias\u0131 ise avukat\u0131 taraf\u0131ndan yalanlanm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r ve b\u00f6yle bir yard\u0131m bilgisine ula\u015f\u0131lmam\u0131\u015ft\u0131r.\n  Kaynaklar: kaynak1, kaynak2, kaynak3, kaynak4, kaynak5, kaynak6, kaynak7, kaynak8, kaynak9\nVideo oynat\u0131c\u0131\nhttps://dogrula.org/wp-content/uploads/2018/02/dogrula.org_.mp4\n00:00\n00:07\n[Toplam:1    Ortalama:5/5] ABD Bankalar\u0131n\u0131 Hackleyip Filistin\u2019e Yard\u0131m Yapan ve \u0130dam Cezas\u0131 Alan Cezayirli Yaz\u0131l\u0131mc\u0131 \u0130ddias\u0131", "\u0130hbar olarak dogrula.org\u2019a g\u00f6nderilen bir haberde, The Times Gazetesinin \u201cT\u00fcrkiye Turistleri Uyar\u0131yor: Erdo\u011fan\u2019\u0131 Ele\u015ftirirseniz Sizi G\u00f6zalt\u0131na Alaca\u011f\u0131z\u201d ba\u015fl\u0131kl\u0131 haberi soruldu.\nAncak Times Gazetesinin s\u00f6z konusu iddias\u0131 do\u011fru de\u011fildir. Gazete, aldat\u0131c\u0131 bir ba\u015fl\u0131k kullanm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r.\nS\u00fcleyman Soylu yapt\u0131\u011f\u0131 konu\u015fmada \u201cAvrupa\u2019da, Almanya\u2019da \u00f6yle ter\u00f6r \u00f6rg\u00fct\u00fcn\u00fcn (PKK) toplant\u0131lar\u0131na kat\u0131l\u0131p da ondan sonra gelip Antalya\u2019da, Bodrum\u2019da, Mu\u011fla\u2019da tatil yapanlar var ya, onlar i\u00e7in de tedbir ald\u0131k \u015fimdi.\u201d demi\u015ftir.\n  Tourists suspected of opposing President Erdogan\u2019s regime will be arrested as soon as they set foot on Turkish soil, the government has said https://t.co/MTxqv3yHnE\n\u2014 The Times of London (@thetimes) March 7, 2019\nGazetede yer alan haberde, h\u00fck\u00fcmet yetkililerinin Cumhurba\u015fkan\u0131 Erdo\u011fan\u2019\u0131n rejimine kar\u015f\u0131 \u00e7\u0131kt\u0131klar\u0131ndan \u015f\u00fcphelenilen turistlerin T\u00fcrkiye topraklar\u0131na ayak basar basmaz tutuklanaca\u011f\u0131n\u0131 belirtti\u011fi iddia edildi. Haberde \u00f6zellikle Almanya\u2019dan gelecek olan turistlerin tehdit edildi\u011fi de iddia edildi.\nHaberde \u0130\u00e7i\u015fleri Bakan\u0131 S\u00fcleyman Soylu\u2019nun yapt\u0131\u011f\u0131 konu\u015fmada, \u00f6zellikle Almanya\u2019dan gelecek turistlerin hedef al\u0131nd\u0131\u011f\u0131 ifadeleri de yer ald\u0131.\nS\u00fcleyman Soylu Ne Demi\u015fti?\n3 Mart 2019 g\u00fcn\u00fc Ankara\u2019n\u0131n Polatl\u0131 il\u00e7esinde konu\u015fan S\u00fcleyman Soylu\u2019nun konu\u015fmas\u0131nda Times Gazetesinin iddia etti\u011fi gibi \u201cCumhurba\u015fkan\u0131 Erdo\u011fan\u2019\u0131n rejimine kar\u015f\u0131 \u00e7\u0131kt\u0131klar\u0131ndan \u015f\u00fcphelenilen turistlerin T\u00fcrkiye topraklar\u0131na ayak basar basmaz tutuklanaca\u011f\u0131n\u0131 belirtti\u011fi\u201d \u015feklinde bir c\u00fcmle yer alm\u0131yor.\nSoylu\u2019nun yapt\u0131\u011f\u0131 konu\u015fman\u0131n ilgili k\u0131sm\u0131nda \u015fu ifadeler yer al\u0131yor:\n\u201cAvrupa\u2019da, Almanya\u2019da \u00f6yle ter\u00f6r \u00f6rg\u00fct\u00fcn\u00fcn (PKK) toplant\u0131lar\u0131na kat\u0131l\u0131p da ondan sonra gelip Antalya\u2019da, Bodrum\u2019da, Mu\u011fla\u2019da tatil yapanlar var ya, onlar i\u00e7in de tedbir ald\u0131k \u015fimdi. Hadi gelsinler bakal\u0131m havalimanlar\u0131ndan i\u00e7eriye girsinler. G\u00f6zalt\u0131na al\u0131p yallah, \u00f6yle kolay de\u011fil. D\u0131\u015far\u0131da hainlik yap\u0131p, i\u00e7eride, T\u00fcrkiye\u2019de keyfini, sefas\u0131n\u0131 s\u00fcrmek bundan sonra kolay de\u011fil\u2026\u201d\nS\u00fcleyman Soylu konu\u015fmas\u0131nda \u00f6zellikle Almanya\u2019dan bahsetmi\u015ftir \u00e7\u00fcnk\u00fc PKK ter\u00f6r \u00f6rg\u00fct\u00fc, faaliyetleriyle Almanya\u2019da olduk\u00e7a aktiftir.\nD\u0131\u015fi\u015fleri Bakanl\u0131\u011f\u0131 S\u00f6zc\u00fcs\u00fc Hami Aksoy\u2019un Bas\u0131n A\u00e7\u0131klamas\u0131\nT.C. D\u0131\u015fi\u015fleri Bakanl\u0131\u011f\u0131 web sitesinde 5 Mart 2019, D\u0131\u015fi\u015fleri Bakanl\u0131\u011f\u0131 S\u00f6zc\u00fcs\u00fc Hami Aksoy\u2019un Alman Bas\u0131n\u0131nda Yer Alan As\u0131ls\u0131z \u0130ddialar Hakk\u0131ndaki Soruya Cevab\u0131 ba\u015fl\u0131\u011f\u0131yla bir a\u00e7\u0131klama yap\u0131ld\u0131:\nTohumluk \u00dcretimleri \u0130nfografikleri\n2018 y\u0131l\u0131nda ger\u00e7ekle\u015fen tohumluk \u00fcretimlerini Do\u011fru Veri infografik sayfas\u0131nda g\u00f6rmek m\u00fcmk\u00fcn:\n  G\u00f6r\u00fcld\u00fc\u011f\u00fc \u00fczere, Times Gazetesinin iddias\u0131 do\u011fru de\u011fildir; S\u00fcleyman Soylu\u2019nun konu\u015fmas\u0131nda \u201cCumhurba\u015fkan\u0131 Erdo\u011fan\u2019\u0131n rejimine kar\u015f\u0131 \u00e7\u0131kt\u0131klar\u0131ndan \u015f\u00fcphelenilen turistlerin T\u00fcrkiye topraklar\u0131na ayak basar basmaz tutuklanaca\u011f\u0131n\u0131 belirtti\u011fi\u201d \u015feklinde bir c\u00fcmle yer almamaktad\u0131r.\nKaynaklar: kaynak1, kaynak2, kaynak3, kaynak4, kaynak5\nVideo oynat\u0131c\u0131\nhttps://dogrula.org/wp-content/uploads/2018/02/dogrula.org_.mp4\n00:00\n00:07\n[Toplam:1    Ortalama:5/5] Times Gazetesinin \u201cT\u00fcrkiye Turistleri Uyar\u0131yor: Erdo\u011fan\u2019\u0131 Ele\u015ftirirseniz Sizi G\u00f6zalt\u0131na Alaca\u011f\u0131z\u201d \u0130ddias\u0131", "\u0130hbar olarak dogrula.org\u2019a g\u00f6nderilen bu video, sosyal medyada pek \u00e7ok hesap ve haber kanal\u0131nda payla\u015f\u0131ld\u0131. CHP Edremit Belediye Ba\u015fkan Aday\u0131 Selman Hasan Arslan\u2019\u0131n, k\u00fcrs\u00fcde tokala\u015ft\u0131\u011f\u0131 ki\u015finin \u201cYok a\u011fabey bizim oy K\u00fcrdistan\u2019a\u201d s\u00f6z\u00fcn\u00fc onaylayarak \u201cHee bize verecek demektir\u201d dedi\u011fi iddia edildi.\nAtat\u00fcrk\u00e7\u00fcler Bu Rezilli\u011fe Ne Diyecekler?\nCHP Edremit BB Aday\u0131 Selman Hasan Arslan ve CHP Bal\u0131kesir MV Ensar Aytekin!\nMiting s\u0131ras\u0131nda Cuma Sel\u00e2s\u0131 ba\u015fl\u0131yor ve mikrofonu a\u00e7\u0131k unutuyorlar!\n\u00d6nce \u0130mama Hakaret!\nSonra \u0130hanet \u0130ttifak\u0131!\n\"Oylar K\u00dcRD\u0130STAN\u2019a ise B\u0130ZE demek!\u201d\nYAZIKLAR OLSUN! pic.twitter.com/1hISezF4AJ\n\u2014 F\u00e2tih Tezcan (@fatihtezcan) March 9, 2019\n  S\u00f6z konusu iddia do\u011frudur. CHP Edremit Belediye Ba\u015fkan\u0131 Aday\u0131 Selman Hasan Arslan, kesin ihra\u00e7 talebiyle disiplin kuruluna sevk edilmi\u015ftir.\nVideo, CHP Edremit Belediye Ba\u015fkan Aday\u0131 Selman Hasan Arslan\u2019\u0131n, 8 Mart\u2019ta kat\u0131ld\u0131\u011f\u0131 Ak\u00e7ay\u2019daki se\u00e7im b\u00fcrosunun a\u00e7\u0131l\u0131\u015f\u0131n\u0131 g\u00f6steriyor. Yerel bir TV kanal\u0131ndan canl\u0131 yay\u0131nlanan programda, CHP Edremit Belediye Ba\u015fkan Aday\u0131 Selman Hasan Arslan, CHP Bal\u0131kesir Milletvekili Ensar Aytekin, CHP Ak\u00e7ay eski Belediye Ba\u015fkan\u0131 Cahit \u0130nceo\u011flu ve Edremit\u2019te m\u00fcteahhitlik yapt\u0131\u011f\u0131 iddia edilen Fettah \u0130\u00e7en g\u00f6r\u00fcl\u00fcyor.\n\u0130ddia 1: Sela okunurken Vekil Ensar Aytekin konu\u015fmas\u0131n\u0131 bitirdi\n\u0130ddia do\u011frudur. CHP Bal\u0131kesir Milletvekili Ensar Aytekin\u2019in konu\u015fmas\u0131 s\u0131ras\u0131nda Cuma selas\u0131 okunmaya ba\u015fl\u0131yor. Milletvekili sela esnas\u0131nda konu\u015fmamak i\u00e7in, \u201cUzun s\u00fcrecek arkada\u015flar, ben konu\u015fmam\u0131 burada sonland\u0131r\u0131yorum\u201d diyor ve k\u00fcrs\u00fcden ayr\u0131l\u0131yor.\n\u0130ddia 2: Sela okunurken s\u00f6ylenen s\u00f6zler\nEge T\u00fcrk TV kanal\u0131n\u0131n canl\u0131 yay\u0131nlad\u0131\u011f\u0131 programda Ensar Aytekin k\u00fcrs\u00fcn\u00fcn yan\u0131ndan ayr\u0131l\u0131rken, k\u00fcrs\u00fcde bulunan CHP Ak\u00e7ay eski Belediye Ba\u015fkan\u0131 Cahit \u0130nceo\u011flu\u2019nun sela okunurken, \u201cHoca bize\u2026\u201d diyor ancak c\u00fcmlesi sans\u00fcrlendi\u011fi i\u00e7in anla\u015f\u0131lm\u0131yor. \u0130nceo\u011flu\u2019nun sela \u00fczerine s\u00f6ylediklerine etraf\u0131ndakiler g\u00fcl\u00fc\u015f\u00fcyor, CHP Edremit \u0130l\u00e7e Ba\u015fkan\u0131 Tayfun Gerku\u015f\u2019un \u201cA\u011fdal\u0131 okuyor de\u011fil mi\u201d dedi\u011fi duyuluyor.\n\u0130ddia 3: \u201cYok a\u011fabey bizim oy K\u00fcrdistan\u2019a\u201d diyen ki\u015fi i\u00e7in CHP aday\u0131n\u0131n \u201cHee bize verecek demektir\u201d ifadesi\n\u0130ddia do\u011frudur. G\u00f6r\u00fcnt\u00fclere g\u00f6re, CHP Edremit Belediye Ba\u015fkan Aday\u0131 Selman Hasan Arslan\u2019\u0131n yan\u0131na, Edremit\u2019te m\u00fcteahhitlik yapt\u0131\u011f\u0131 iddia edilen Fettah \u0130\u00e7en geliyor. Hasan Arslan, \u201cFettaho\u011flu neredesin ya\u201d diyerek kar\u015f\u0131l\u0131yor. Eski Ba\u015fkan \u0130nceo\u011flu Fettah \u0130\u00e7en\u2019i g\u00f6stererek, \u201cBu sefer oylar bize\u201d diyor. Hasan Arslan da ayn\u0131 ki\u015fiye \u201cHerhalde oyun benim\u201d diyor. Bu s\u00f6z \u00fczerine Fettah \u0130\u00e7en \u201cYok a\u011fabey bizim oy K\u00fcrdistan\u2019a\u201d diyor. \u0130\u00e7en\u2019in s\u00f6zlerini Cahit \u0130nceo\u011flu ve \u0130\u00e7en tekrarl\u0131yor. Selman Hasan Arslan da \u201cHee bize verecek demektir\u201d diyor. Son olarak \u0130\u00e7en, Hasan Arslan\u2019\u0131 g\u00f6stererek, \u201cK\u00fcrdistan i\u015fte\u201d diyerek s\u00f6zlerini sonland\u0131r\u0131yor.\nMikrofonu kapal\u0131 zannettiler, oysa skandal konu\u015fmalar\u0131 anbean kay\u0131tlara ge\u00e7ti.\nCHP\u2019nin Bal\u0131kesir Edremit Belediye Ba\u015fkan aday\u0131 Hasan Arslan\u2019\u0131n bir i\u015f adam\u0131yla sohbeti, CHP ve \u0130yi Parti\u2019nin HDP ile \u00f6rt\u00fcl\u00fc ittifak\u0131na delil olarak g\u00f6sterildi.https://t.co/y65P3FkdZA pic.twitter.com/8OAar8DYbD\n\u2014 TRT HABER (@trthaber) March 9, 2019\n  T\u00fcm bu K\u00fcrdistan konu\u015fmalar\u0131ndan sonra CHP Edremit Belediye Ba\u015fkan Aday\u0131 Selman Hasan Arslan, Edremit\u2019te m\u00fcteahhitlik yapt\u0131\u011f\u0131 iddia edilenFettah \u0130\u00e7en ve CHP Ak\u00e7ay eski Belediye Ba\u015fkan\u0131 Cahit \u0130nceo\u011flu g\u00fcl\u00fc\u015ferek sohbeti sonland\u0131r\u0131yor.\nSelman Hasan Arslan Bas\u0131n A\u00e7\u0131klamas\u0131\nTepkiler \u00fczerine bas\u0131n a\u00e7\u0131klamas\u0131 yapan Arslan\u2019\u0131n a\u00e7\u0131klamas\u0131ndaki ilgili ifadeler \u015f\u00f6yle:\n\u201cD\u00fcn, Ak\u00e7ay\u2019da se\u00e7im irtibat b\u00fcrosu a\u00e7\u0131l\u0131\u015f\u0131m\u0131z esnas\u0131nda, okunan sela nedeniyle konu\u015fmalara ara verdi\u011fimiz s\u0131rada, Ak\u00e7ay eski Belediye Ba\u015fkan\u0131 Say\u0131n Cahit \u0130nceo\u011flu ile ayak\u00fcst\u00fc bir sohbet ger\u00e7ekle\u015ftirirken, daha \u00f6nce hi\u00e7bir ortamda g\u00f6rmedi\u011fim, hi\u00e7bir neden ve \u015fart i\u00e7erisinde g\u00f6r\u00fc\u015fmedi\u011fim bir \u015fah\u0131s yan\u0131m\u0131za gelerek, okunan selan\u0131n sesiyle de ne dedi\u011fini anlamad\u0131\u011f\u0131m, ancak canl\u0131 yay\u0131n mikrofonun a\u00e7\u0131k kalmas\u0131 sonucu kamuoyuna yans\u0131yan ipe sapa gelmez, bizim a\u00e7\u0131m\u0131zdan hi\u00e7bir de\u011feri olmayan ve hem siyasi hem de ki\u015fisel olarak kesinlikle kat\u0131lmad\u0131\u011f\u0131m ucube bir s\u00f6ylemde bulunmu\u015ftur. Az \u00f6nce de ifade etti\u011fim gibi, okunan selan\u0131n sesiyle ne dedi\u011fini kesinlikle anlamad\u0131\u011f\u0131m, ancak o anki reaksiyon i\u00e7erisinde bizi destekledi\u011fini s\u00f6yledi\u011fini sand\u0131\u011f\u0131m bir ifadesine, \u2018Bizi destekliyorsun, anlad\u0131m\u2019 \u015feklinde bir yan\u0131t verdim. Ya\u015fan\u0131lan hadisenin, \u00e7ok a\u00e7\u0131k \u015fekilde provokasyon oldu\u011fu, Millet \u0130ttifak\u0131\u2019n\u0131n t\u00fcm T\u00fcrkiye\u2019de, Bal\u0131kesir\u2019de ve Edremit\u2019teki g\u00fcc\u00fcn\u00fc g\u00f6ren ve bundan korkan baz\u0131 kirli odaklar taraf\u0131ndan alg\u0131 yarat\u0131lmak amac\u0131yla servis edildi\u011fi bellidir. Alg\u0131 yaratmak ve toplumu farkl\u0131 \u015fekilde sinir u\u00e7lar\u0131ndan y\u00f6nlendirmek isteyen bu kirli odaklar\u0131 \u00e7ok iyi biliyoruz ve \u00f6n\u00fcm\u00fczdeki g\u00fcnlerde kamuoyuyla da payla\u015faca\u011f\u0131z. \u0130fade etti\u011fim bu hususu alt\u0131n\u0131 kal\u0131n \u015fekilde \u00e7izerek belirtmek istiyorum.\u201d\nAncak defalarca K\u00fcrdistan kelimesinin ge\u00e7ti\u011fi diyalog \u00fczerine yap\u0131lan bas\u0131n a\u00e7\u0131klamas\u0131 sosyal medya kullan\u0131c\u0131lar\u0131n\u0131 tatmin etmedi. Twitter ve Ek\u015fi S\u00f6zl\u00fck ba\u015fl\u0131klar\u0131nda bu memnuniyetsizli\u011fi g\u00f6rmek m\u00fcmk\u00fcn.\nCHP Edremit Belediye Ba\u015fkan\u0131 Aday\u0131, Kesin \u0130hra\u00e7 Talebiyle Disiplin Kuruluna Sevk Edildi\nCHP Parti S\u00f6zc\u00fcs\u00fc Faik \u00d6ztrak, a\u00e7\u0131k kalan mikrofona yakalanan K\u00fcrdistan s\u00f6zleri nedeniyle g\u00fcndemde olan Arslan i\u00e7in \u201c\u00d6nemli bir hata yapm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r. Kendisi ihra\u00e7 talebiyle disiplin kuruluna sevk edilmi\u015ftir.\u201d a\u00e7\u0131klamas\u0131nda bulunmu\u015ftur.\nGenel Ba\u015fkan Yard\u0131mc\u0131m\u0131z ve Parti S\u00f6zc\u00fcm\u00fcz @faikoztrak g\u00fcndemdeki konular\u0131 de\u011ferlendiriyor. https://t.co/uV1HNGPbrw\n\u2014 CHP (@herkesicinCHP) March 11, 2019\n  G\u00f6r\u00fcld\u00fc\u011f\u00fc \u00fczere, CHP Edremit Belediye Ba\u015fkan Aday\u0131 Selman Hasan Arslan\u2019\u0131n, k\u00fcrs\u00fcde tokala\u015ft\u0131\u011f\u0131 ki\u015finin \u201cYok a\u011fabey bizim oy K\u00fcrdistan\u2019a\u201d s\u00f6z\u00fcn\u00fc onaylayarak \u201cHee bize verecek demektir\u201d dedi\u011fi iddias\u0131 do\u011frudur.\nKaynaklar: kaynak1, kaynak2, kaynak3, kaynak4\nVideo oynat\u0131c\u0131\nhttps://dogrula.org/wp-content/uploads/2018/02/dogrula.org_.mp4\n00:00\n00:07\n[Toplam:0    Ortalama:0/5] CHP\u2019li Belediye Ba\u015fkan Aday\u0131 ve Milletvekilinin Dahil Oldu\u011fu K\u00fcrdistan ve Sela \u0130ddialar\u0131", "  Geberik Gelin adl\u0131 Instagram hesab\u0131nda payla\u015f\u0131lan bu video, 400 binden fazla g\u00f6r\u00fcnt\u00fcleme ve 395 yorum ald\u0131.\nMoskova metrosundaki bilet otomat\u0131n\u0131n 30 squat yapana bedava bilet verdi\u011fi iddias\u0131 k\u0131smen do\u011frudur; \u00e7\u00fcnk\u00fc uygulama 7\u201323 \u015eubat 2014 tarihleri aras\u0131nda Rusya\u2019n\u0131n So\u00e7i \u015fehrinde d\u00fczenlenen 22. K\u0131\u015f Olimpiyatlar\u0131 kapsam\u0131nda, k\u0131sa bir s\u00fcre i\u00e7in yap\u0131lm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r.\nOlimpiyatlar\u0131n tan\u0131t\u0131m\u0131n\u0131n bir par\u00e7as\u0131 olan squat bilet makinesi, 2013 y\u0131l\u0131nda yaln\u0131zca Kas\u0131m ay\u0131 boyunca \u00e7al\u0131\u015fm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r.\nKas\u0131m 2013\u2013 Moskova\u2019n\u0131n bat\u0131s\u0131ndaki Vystavochaya Metro \u0130stasyonundabulunan bu bilet otomatlar\u0131 So\u00e7i\u2019deki K\u0131\u015f Olimpiyatlar\u0131\u2019n\u0131n tan\u0131t\u0131m\u0131n par\u00e7as\u0131 olarak yolculara iki dakika i\u00e7inde 30 squat (\u00e7\u00f6melme) yapmalar\u0131 kar\u015f\u0131l\u0131\u011f\u0131nda 1 adet bilet veriyordu. O d\u00f6nemde bir bilet fiyat\u0131 30 ruble (0.91 dolar) idi.\nYenilik\u00e7i fikir Moskova Metro \u0130stasyonunda squat sens\u00f6rl\u00fc \u00f6zel bir bilet makinesi kuran Olimpic Change\u2019den gelmi\u015ftir. \u00d6deme olarak para yerine, y\u00fcksek teknoloji \u00fcr\u00fcn\u00fc olan bu bilet makinesi yaln\u0131zca squat egzersizini kabul ediyordu. \u00dccretsiz bilet alabilmek i\u00e7in yolcular\u0131n makinenin kameras\u0131n\u0131n \u00f6n\u00fcnde durarak iki dakika i\u00e7inde 30 squat yapmas\u0131 gerekiyordu.\nOlimpiyat yetkilileri, projenin halk\u0131n spora te\u015fvik edilmesi amac\u0131yla yap\u0131ld\u0131\u011f\u0131n\u0131 s\u00f6ylemi\u015ftir. Wall Street Journal\u2019in haberine g\u00f6re, Rusya Olimpiyat Komitesi ba\u015fkan\u0131 Alexander Zhukov, \u201cOlimpiyat Oyunlar\u0131n\u0131n insanlar\u0131n \u00e7o\u011funun sadece iki y\u0131lda bir televizyonda izledi\u011fi uluslararas\u0131 bir rekabet olmad\u0131\u011f\u0131n\u0131 g\u00f6stermek istedik. Bunun d\u0131\u015f\u0131nda Olimpiyat Oyunlar\u0131 herkesi spor ya\u015fam\u0131na dahil etmekle ilgilidir.\u201d demi\u015ftir.\nAFP, Rusya Olimpiyat Komitesi\u2019nin daha sa\u011fl\u0131kl\u0131 bir ya\u015fam tarz\u0131 geli\u015ftirmek i\u00e7in halka \u00e7e\u015fitli fiziksel m\u00fccadeleler sunuldu\u011funu belirtmi\u015ftir. Di\u011fer aktiviteler aras\u0131nda, otob\u00fcslerde as\u0131l\u0131 tutma kollar\u0131n\u0131n egzersiz bantlar\u0131na \u00e7evrilmesi ve cep telefonlar\u0131n\u0131 \u015farj etmek i\u00e7in elektrik \u00fcretebilen bisikletler sa\u011flanmas\u0131n\u0131n yer ald\u0131\u011f\u0131 bilgisi verilmi\u015ftir. Ama\u00e7, \u201cspor unsurlar\u0131n\u0131 g\u00fcnl\u00fck hayata dahil etmek\u201d olarak ifade edilmi\u015ftir.\n  Squat bilet makinesi, 2013 y\u0131l\u0131nda yaln\u0131zca Kas\u0131m ay\u0131 boyunca \u00e7al\u0131\u015fm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r.\nSquat (\u00e7\u00f6melme) egzersizinin nas\u0131l yap\u0131ld\u0131\u011f\u0131na ve yararlar\u0131na buradan ula\u015fabilirsiniz.\n  G\u00f6r\u00fcld\u00fc\u011f\u00fc \u00fczere, iddia k\u0131smen do\u011frudur. 30 squat yapana bedava bilet projesi, Rusya\u2019n\u0131n So\u00e7i \u015fehrinde d\u00fczenlenen 22. K\u0131\u015f Olimpiyatlar\u0131 tan\u0131t\u0131m\u0131 kapsam\u0131nda, k\u0131sa bir s\u00fcre i\u00e7in yap\u0131lm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r.\nOlimpiyatlar\u0131n tan\u0131t\u0131m\u0131n\u0131n bir par\u00e7as\u0131 olan squat bilet makinesi, 2013 y\u0131l\u0131nda yaln\u0131zca Kas\u0131m ay\u0131 boyunca \u00e7al\u0131\u015fm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r.\n  Kaynaklar: kaynak1, kaynak2, kaynak3, kaynak4, kaynak5, kaynak6, kaynak7, kaynak8\nVideo oynat\u0131c\u0131\nhttps://dogrula.org/wp-content/uploads/2018/02/dogrula.org_.mp4\n00:00\n00:07\n[Toplam:0    Ortalama:0/5] Moskova Metrosundaki Bilet Otomat\u0131n\u0131n 30 Squat Yapana Bedava Bilet Verdi\u011fi \u0130ddias\u0131", "A&Bodur & adl\u0131 Twitter hesab\u0131nda payla\u015f\u0131lan bir videoda, Binali Y\u0131ld\u0131r\u0131m\u2019\u0131n kat\u0131ld\u0131\u011f\u0131 bir TV program\u0131nda bir f\u0131kra anlatt\u0131\u011f\u0131 ve programdaki gazetecilerin f\u0131kray\u0131 dinledikten sonra donuk ifadeler tak\u0131nd\u0131\u011f\u0131 ve g\u00fclmedikleri g\u00f6r\u00fcl\u00fcyor.\nAncak s\u00f6z konusu iddia do\u011fru de\u011fildir, video montajlanm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r. Foto\u011fraf, karaci\u011fer ve dala\u011f\u0131nda b\u00fcy\u00fcme olan, talasemi hastas\u0131 Afganistanl\u0131 bir k\u0131z \u00e7ocu\u011funu g\u00f6stermektedir.\n  Anne ve babadan \u00e7ocuklara kal\u0131tsal olarak ge\u00e7en, \u00f6nlenebilir bir kan hastal\u0131\u011f\u0131olan talasemi hastal\u0131\u011f\u0131n\u0131n belirtileri aras\u0131nda karaci\u011fer ve/veya dalak b\u00fcy\u00fcmesi sonucu kar\u0131n \u015fi\u015fli\u011fi oldu\u011fu bilgisi yer al\u0131r.\nAfganistanl\u0131 Roya \u0130\u00e7in Yard\u0131m Kampanyas\u0131 D\u00fczenlenmi\u015f\nLaghman\u2019l\u0131 (Afganistan) 8 ya\u015f\u0131nda bir k\u0131z olan Roya\u2019ya b\u00f6lgedeki bir\u00e7ok \u00e7ocuk gibi, v\u00fccutta normalden daha az k\u0131rm\u0131z\u0131 kan h\u00fccresi bulunan bir kan hastal\u0131\u011f\u0131 olan Talasemi te\u015fhisi konmu\u015f. Roya\u2019n\u0131n, hastal\u0131\u011f\u0131n \u015fiddetli bir evresinde oldu\u011fu ve tedavi edilmezse \u00f6l\u00fcmc\u00fcl dalak geni\u015flemesiyle sonu\u00e7lanaca\u011f\u0131 belirtilmi\u015f.\nYard\u0131m kampanyas\u0131 d\u00fczenleyen \u00c7ocuk Vakf\u0131 ve ortak kurulu\u015flar, Roya ve ailesini tedavi amac\u0131yla 27 Ocak\u2019ta \u0130ran\u2019a g\u00f6ndermi\u015f. Roya\u2019n\u0131n tedavisine Afganistan\u2019da devam edilmi\u015f ve \u00e7ocu\u011fun hastal\u0131\u011f\u0131 tedavi edilmi\u015f.\n  Talasemi Tedavi Fonu, Roya\u2019n\u0131n tedavisi i\u00e7in yard\u0131m kampanyas\u0131 d\u00fczenlemi\u015f. Kampanyay\u0131 childfoundation.org web sitesinden g\u00f6rmek m\u00fcmk\u00fcn.\nTalasemi Hastal\u0131\u011f\u0131 ve Kar\u0131n \u015ei\u015fli\u011fi\nTalaseminin belirtilerinden birinin kar\u0131n \u015fi\u015fli\u011fi oldu\u011funu belirtmilmi\u015ftir. Talasemi hastal\u0131\u011f\u0131na yakalanan \u00e7ocuklar\u0131n kar\u0131nlar\u0131 da bahsedildi\u011fi \u015fekilde \u015fi\u015fmektedir. Talasemi sendromlar\u0131 ve anormal hemoglobinler \u00f6zellikle i\u00e7lerinde T\u00fcrkiye gibi Akdeniz \u00fclkelerinin bulundu\u011fu b\u00f6lgelerde, Orta Do\u011fu \u00fclkelerinde ve Uzakdo\u011fu \u00fclkelerinde ciddi sa\u011fl\u0131k problemler yaratmaktad\u0131r.\n  G\u00f6r\u00fcld\u00fc\u011f\u00fc \u00fczere iddia do\u011fru de\u011fildir. Foto\u011fraf, Bolu\u2019da ya\u015fayan ve 11 ya\u015f\u0131nda imam nikah\u0131yla evlendirilen, 8 ayl\u0131k hamile bir \u00e7ocu\u011fu de\u011fil; karaci\u011fer ve dala\u011f\u0131nda b\u00fcy\u00fcme olan, talasemi hastas\u0131 Afganistanl\u0131 bir k\u0131z \u00e7ocu\u011funu g\u00f6stermektedir.\nKaynaklar: kaynak1, kaynak2, kaynak3, kaynak4, kaynak5, kaynak6\nVideo oynat\u0131c\u0131\nhttps://dogrula.org/wp-content/uploads/2018/02/dogrula.org_.mp4\n00:00\n00:07\n[Toplam:0    Ortalama:0/5] Foto\u011fraftaki \u00c7ocu\u011fun 11 Ya\u015f\u0131nda Bolu\u2019da \u0130mam Nikah\u0131yla Evlendirildi\u011fi ve 8 Ayl\u0131k Hamile Oldu\u011fu \u0130ddias\u0131", "  Tuhaf Ama Ger\u00e7ek adl\u0131 Instagram sayfas\u0131nda payla\u015f\u0131lan bu g\u00f6rseldeki arac\u0131n, Almanya\u2019da kullan\u0131lmaya ba\u015flanacak bir belediye otob\u00fcs\u00fc oldu\u011fu ve yolcular\u0131n da istedikleri zaman bu balkonlara \u00e7\u0131k\u0131p sigara i\u00e7ebilece\u011fi iddia edildi. G\u00f6rsel yakla\u015f\u0131k 54 bin be\u011fenme ald\u0131.\nS\u00f6z konusu iddia do\u011fru de\u011fildir. Foto\u011frafta yer alan ara\u00e7, i\u00e7erisinde bir dairenin oturma alan\u0131, tuvalet, du\u015f ve mutfak gibi t\u00fcm \u00f6zelliklerini bar\u0131nd\u0131ran, Veranda adl\u0131 l\u00fcks bir karavand\u0131r.\nCountry Couch \u015eirketinin Balkonlu Karavan\u0131\nG\u00f6rseldeki ara\u00e7, \u00f6nde gelen karavan \u015firketlerinden Country Couch\u2019un \u201cVeranda\u201d adl\u0131 l\u00fcks bir karavan modeli. Bu karavan, 18 ay s\u00fcren \u00e7al\u0131\u015fmalar sonucunda \u00fcretilmi\u015f ve karavandaki balkona at\u0131fta bulunularak \u201cVeranda\u201d ad\u0131n\u0131 alm\u0131\u015f.\n  G\u00f6r\u00fcld\u00fc\u011f\u00fc \u00fczere, foto\u011fraf\u0131n Almanya\u2019da yolcular\u0131n istedikleri zaman \u00e7\u0131k\u0131p sigara i\u00e7ebilecekleri balkonlu bir belediye otob\u00fcs\u00fcn\u00fc g\u00f6sterdi\u011fi iddias\u0131 do\u011fru de\u011fil. G\u00f6rseldeki, Veranda adl\u0131 bir karavan modeli.\n  Kaynaklar: kaynak1, kaynak2, kaynak3, kaynak4\nVideo oynat\u0131c\u0131\nhttps://dogrula.org/wp-content/uploads/2018/02/dogrula.org_.mp4\n00:00\n00:07\n[Toplam:0    Ortalama:0/5] Foto\u011fraf\u0131n Almanya\u2019da Bir Belediye Otob\u00fcs\u00fcn\u00fc G\u00f6sterdi\u011fi \u0130ddias\u0131", "  \u0130ronik Adam adl\u0131 Twitter hesab\u0131nda yap\u0131lan bir payla\u015f\u0131mda, TikTokuygulamas\u0131n\u0131n ki\u015fisel verileri takip alt\u0131na ald\u0131\u011f\u0131 ve ba\u015fka platformlarla payla\u015ft\u0131\u011f\u0131 iddia edildi.\nS\u00f6z konusu iddia do\u011frudur. TikTok uygulamas\u0131n\u0131n gizlilik politikas\u0131nda, ki\u015fisel verilerin \u00fc\u00e7\u00fcnc\u00fc taraf servis sa\u011flay\u0131c\u0131larla payla\u015f\u0131ld\u0131\u011f\u0131 belirtiliyor. Ayr\u0131ca gizlilik politikas\u0131na g\u00f6re, uygulamay\u0131 kullan ki\u015filer bilgilerinin toplanmas\u0131n\u0131 ba\u015ftan kabul etmi\u015f oluyor.\nTikTok ayr\u0131ca ge\u00e7ti\u011fimiz g\u00fcnlerde, 13 ya\u015f\u0131n alt\u0131ndaki \u00e7ocuklar\u0131n ki\u015fisel bilgilerini yasa d\u0131\u015f\u0131 yollarla toplad\u0131\u011f\u0131 iddialar\u0131ndan \u00f6t\u00fcr\u00fc, 5.7 milyon dolar cezaya \u00e7arpt\u0131r\u0131ld\u0131 ve bunu \u00f6demeyi kabul etti.\nMobil Uygulama Tiktok\n  TikTok, kullan\u0131c\u0131lar\u0131n 15 saniye s\u00fcreli videolar kaydetmelerini ve payla\u015fmalar\u0131n\u0131 sa\u011flayan mobil uygulamad\u0131r, \u00f6zellikle gen\u00e7ler aras\u0131nda olduk\u00e7a pop\u00fclerdir.\nwho remembers this? pic.twitter.com/bD5S4Iwkfp\n\u2014 TikTok (@tiktok_us) March 2, 2019\nTikTok Gizlilik Politikas\u0131nda Yer Alan Bilgiler\nTikTok uygulamas\u0131n\u0131n gizlilik politikas\u0131nda yer alan bilgileri sizin i\u00e7in inceledik ve ilgili b\u00f6l\u00fcmleri sayfada yer ald\u0131\u011f\u0131 \u015fekliyle burada payla\u015f\u0131yoruz:\nHangi bilgileriniz toplan\u0131yor?\nBir hesap olu\u015fturup platformu kulland\u0131\u011f\u0131n\u0131zda (TikTok), ileti\u015fim bilgileriniz, hesab\u0131n\u0131z\u0131n i\u00e7eri\u011fi, konumunuz ve kredi kart\u0131 bilgileriniz toplan\u0131yor. Ayr\u0131ca, \u00fc\u00e7\u00fcnc\u00fc taraf sosyal a\u011f sa\u011flay\u0131c\u0131lar\u0131ndan TikTok uygulamas\u0131nda payla\u015ft\u0131\u011f\u0131n\u0131z ve platformu (TikTok) kullan\u0131m\u0131n\u0131zla ilgili teknik ve davran\u0131\u015fsal bilgiler toplan\u0131yor. Uygulaman\u0131n mobil cihaz\u0131n\u0131zdaki telefon rehberinize eri\u015fmesine izin verirseniz, platform ve rehberiniz arac\u0131l\u0131\u011f\u0131yla g\u00f6nderdi\u011finiz mesajlarda bulunan bilgilerin de topland\u0131\u011f\u0131 belirtiliyor.\nBilgileriniz nas\u0131l kullan\u0131l\u0131yor?\nBilgilerinizin, hizmet s\u00f6zle\u015fmesini yerine getirmek, platformu geli\u015ftirmek, y\u00f6netmek ve i\u015flevlerini kullanman\u0131za izin vermek i\u00e7in kullan\u0131ld\u0131\u011f\u0131 bilgisi yer al\u0131yor. Bunlar\u0131n yan\u0131 s\u0131ra, size \u00f6nerilerde bulunmak, platformu tan\u0131tmak ve hedefli reklamlar sunmak i\u00e7in de bilgilerinizin kullan\u0131ld\u0131\u011f\u0131 belirtiliyor.\nKullan\u0131c\u0131 bilgileri kimlerle payla\u015f\u0131l\u0131yor?\nVerilerin, platformun sa\u011flanmas\u0131nda yard\u0131mc\u0131 olmak i\u00e7in g\u00fcvenilen \u00fc\u00e7\u00fcnc\u00fc taraf servis sa\u011flay\u0131c\u0131lar\u0131yla payla\u015f\u0131ld\u0131\u011f\u0131 belirtiliyor. Bu sa\u011flay\u0131c\u0131lar bulut depolama sa\u011flay\u0131c\u0131lar\u0131n\u0131 ve di\u011fer BT servis sa\u011flay\u0131c\u0131lar\u0131n\u0131 i\u00e7eriyor. Ayr\u0131ca bilgilerin i\u015f ortaklar\u0131yla, reklam verenlerle, analitiklerle ve arama motoru sa\u011flay\u0131c\u0131lar\u0131yla da payla\u015f\u0131ld\u0131\u011f\u0131 bilgisi yer al\u0131yor. Kullan\u0131c\u0131 bilgilerinin kanun uygulay\u0131c\u0131 kurumlar, kamu otoriteleri veya yasalar\u0131n gerektirdi\u011fi \u015fekilde devlet organlar\u0131yla da payla\u015f\u0131labilece\u011fi belirtiliyor.\nKullan\u0131c\u0131 bilgileri ne kadar s\u00fcre saklan\u0131yor?\nS\u00f6zle\u015fmede, kullan\u0131c\u0131 bilgilerinin me\u015fru i\u015f ama\u00e7lar\u0131 veya olas\u0131 (yasal) anla\u015fmazl\u0131klar ile ilgili olarak savunma yapmak amac\u0131yla belirli bir s\u00fcre sakland\u0131\u011f\u0131 belirtiliyor.\nUygulamay\u0131 kullanarak bilgilerin toplanmas\u0131n\u0131 ba\u015ftan kabul etmi\u015f oluyorsunuz\nGizlilik politikas\u0131n\u0131n ilk b\u00f6l\u00fcm\u00fcnde yer alan bilgiye g\u00f6re, TikTok uygulamas\u0131n\u0131 kulland\u0131\u011f\u0131n\u0131z zaman, platformun bilgilerinizi toplamas\u0131na izin vermi\u015f oluyorsunuz. Web sitesine, hizmetlere, uygulamalara, \u00fcr\u00fcnlere ve i\u00e7eri\u011fe eri\u015ferek veya bunlar\u0131 kullanarak, bu politikay\u0131 okudu\u011funuzu ve bilgilerinizin toplad\u0131\u011f\u0131m\u0131za dair haklar\u0131n\u0131z\u0131 ve bilgilerinizi kullanaca\u011f\u0131n\u0131 anlad\u0131\u011f\u0131n\u0131z\u0131 belirtmi\u015f oluyorsunuz. S\u00f6zle\u015fmede, bu politikaya genel olarak veya k\u0131smen kat\u0131lm\u0131yorsan\u0131z, hizmetleri kullanmaman\u0131z gerekti\u011fi yaz\u0131yor.\nTikTok 5.7 Milyon Dolar Cezaya \u00c7arpt\u0131r\u0131ld\u0131\n  Pop\u00fcler video payla\u015f\u0131m uygulamas\u0131 TikTok, 13 ya\u015f\u0131n alt\u0131ndaki \u00e7ocuklardan isim, E-posta adresi ve konum\u0131 gibi ki\u015fisel bilgileri yasa d\u0131\u015f\u0131 yollarla toplad\u0131\u011f\u0131 iddialar\u0131ndan \u00f6t\u00fcr\u00fc, 5.7 milyon dolar cezaya \u00e7arpt\u0131r\u0131ld\u0131 ve bunu \u00f6demeyi kabul etti.\nABD Federal Ticaret Komisyonu (FTC) yapt\u0131\u011f\u0131 a\u00e7\u0131klamada, TikTok para cezas\u0131n\u0131n \u00e7ocuk mahremiyeti davas\u0131 i\u00e7in bir rekor oldu\u011funu s\u00f6yledi.\nFTC, k\u00fc\u00e7\u00fck \u00e7ocuklar\u0131n \u201ckonum bilgilerinin toplanmas\u0131 ve ortaya \u00e7\u0131kar\u0131lmas\u0131 da dahil olmak \u00fczere rahats\u0131z edici uygulamalar\u0131n ortaya \u00e7\u0131kar\u0131ld\u0131\u011f\u0131n\u0131\u201d s\u00f6yledi. Anne-babalardan binlerce \u015fikayet almas\u0131na ra\u011fmen \u015firket, re\u015fit olmayan \u00e7ocuklar hakk\u0131ndaki bilgileri silme taleplerine uymad\u0131.\nAncak TikTok, yapt\u0131\u011f\u0131 a\u00e7\u0131klamada, ebeveynleri \u00e7ocuklar\u0131n\u0131 korumak i\u00e7in ara\u00e7lar da dahil olmak \u00fczere kullan\u0131c\u0131lar\u0131 korumak i\u00e7in \u201c\u00f6nlemler olu\u015fturmak\u201d konusunda kararl\u0131 oldu\u011funu belirtti.\nWe\u2019re implementing changes to accommodate younger US users in a new, separate app experience. More info here: https://t.co/jPWVJDTYfX\n\u2014 TikTok (@tiktok_us) February 27, 2019\n  G\u00f6r\u00fcld\u00fc\u011f\u00fc \u00fczere, TikTok uygulamas\u0131n\u0131n ki\u015fisel kullan\u0131c\u0131 verilerini ba\u015fkalar\u0131yla payla\u015ft\u0131\u011f\u0131 iddias\u0131 do\u011fru. TikTok uygulamas\u0131n\u0131n gizlilik politikas\u0131nda, ki\u015fisel verilerin \u00fc\u00e7\u00fcnc\u00fc taraf servis sa\u011flay\u0131c\u0131larla payla\u015f\u0131ld\u0131\u011f\u0131 belirtiliyor. Ayr\u0131ca gizlilik politikas\u0131na g\u00f6re, uygulamay\u0131 kullan ki\u015filer bilgilerinin toplanmas\u0131n\u0131 ba\u015ftan kabul etmi\u015f oluyor.\nKaynaklar: kaynak1, kaynak2, kaynak3, kaynak4, kaynak5\nVideo oynat\u0131c\u0131\nhttps://dogrula.org/wp-content/uploads/2018/02/dogrula.org_.mp4\n00:00\n00:07\n[Toplam:0    Ortalama:0/5] TikTok Uygulamas\u0131n\u0131n Ki\u015fisel Kullan\u0131c\u0131 Verilerini Ba\u015fkalar\u0131yla Payla\u015ft\u0131\u011f\u0131 \u0130ddias\u0131", "  Dogrula.org\u2019a gelen ihbarlar \u00fczerine, Chp \u015ei\u015fli Belediye Ba\u015fkan aday\u0131n\u0131n \u2018K\u00fcrdistan taraf\u0131 -T\u00fcrkiye taraf\u0131\u2019 s\u00f6z\u00fcne tepki g\u00f6stermedi\u011fi iddias\u0131n\u0131 inceledik.\nS\u00f6z konusu iddia do\u011frudur. Videodaki ki\u015filer Chp \u015ei\u015fli Belediye Ba\u015fkan Aday\u0131 Muammer Keskin ve Hdp \u015ei\u015fli \u0130l\u00e7e Ba\u015fkan\u0131 Mutlu \u00d6zt\u00fcrk\u2019t\u00fcr. \u00d6zt\u00fcrk, Chp aday\u0131n\u0131 desteklediklerini, \u2018K\u00fcrdistan\u2019da kayyumun el koydu\u011fu b\u00fct\u00fcn belediyeleri geri alaca\u011f\u0131z. T\u00fcrkiye taraf\u0131nda da AKP-MHP koalisyonuna kazand\u0131rmayaca\u011f\u0131z\u2019 diyerek belirtmi\u015ftir. Chp\u2019li Muammer Keskin, \u00d6zt\u00fcrk\u2019\u00fcn \u2018K\u00fcrdistan taraf\u0131 -T\u00fcrkiye taraf\u0131\u2019 s\u00f6z\u00fcne tepkisiz kalm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r.\n  Chp \u015ei\u015fli Belediye Ba\u015fkan aday\u0131 Muammer Keskin\u2019in kat\u0131ld\u0131\u011f\u0131 bir t\u00f6rende, Hdp \u015ei\u015fli \u0130l\u00e7e Ba\u015fkan\u0131 Mutlu \u00d6zt\u00fcrk bir konu\u015fma yapm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r. Chp \u015ei\u015fli Belediye Ba\u015fkan Aday\u0131 Muammer Keskin\u2019e destek verece\u011fini s\u00f6yleyen Hdp \u0130l\u00e7e Ba\u015fkan\u0131 \u015funlar\u0131 s\u00f6ylemi\u015ftir:\n\u201cSon bir ka\u00e7 y\u0131lda ya\u015fad\u0131\u011f\u0131m\u0131z se\u00e7imler zincirinin kritik bir par\u00e7as\u0131. Partimizin, (HDP) bu konudaki tavr\u0131 \u00e7ok net. K\u00fcrdistan\u2019da kayyumun el koydu\u011fu b\u00fct\u00fcn belediyeleri geri alaca\u011f\u0131z. T\u00fcrkiye taraf\u0131nda da AKP-MHP koalisyonuna kazand\u0131rmayaca\u011f\u0131z. Dolay\u0131s\u0131yla \u015ei\u015fli\u2019de CHP\u2019yi dikkatinize sunuyoruz. Muammer bey, \u015ei\u015fli demokrasi cephesinin aday\u0131d\u0131r ve kendisi 2013\u2019ten beri Gezi\u2019den bug\u00fcne \u00e7e\u015fitli forumlarda halk\u00e7\u0131 belediyecili\u011fi savundu. Dolay\u0131s\u0131yla, kendisine b\u0131rak\u0131yorum. Bakal\u0131m be\u011fenecek misiniz, buyrun.\u201d\nArd\u0131ndan mikrofonu alarak konu\u015fan Muammer Keskin, \u00d6zt\u00fcrk\u2019\u00fcn \u201cK\u00fcrdistan taraf\u0131\u200a\u2014\u200aT\u00fcrkiye taraf\u0131\u201d ifadesine tepkisiz kalm\u0131\u015f ve o da \u015funlar\u0131 s\u00f6ylemi\u015ftir:\n\u201c31 Mart se\u00e7imleri demokrasi g\u00fc\u00e7lerini bir arada tutmak ve bir ba\u015far\u0131 hikayesi yazmak i\u00e7in bir araya geldik. Bug\u00fcn, \u015ei\u015fli\u2019de de gerek HDP\u2019li dostlar\u0131m\u0131z gerek bizimle birlikte yol y\u00fcr\u00fcyen b\u00fct\u00fcn siyasi akt\u00f6rlerle 31 Mart ak\u015fam\u0131 zaferi birlikte g\u00f6rece\u011fiz. Bu ate\u015fe sizin de destek vermenizi diliyorum.\u201d\nChp \u015ei\u015fli Belediye Ba\u015fkan Aday\u0131 Muammer Keskin\u2019in A\u00e7\u0131klamas\u0131\nVideonun \u0130nternet ortam\u0131na d\u00fc\u015fmesi \u00fczerine, sosyal medyadan Chp ve Muharrem Keskin\u2019e pek \u00e7ok tepki geldi. Olaya ilk ba\u015flarda sessiz kalan Muammer Keskin\u2019in daha sonra \u015fu a\u00e7\u0131klamalarda bulundu\u011fu ajanslara d\u00fc\u015ft\u00fc:\n(A\u00e7\u0131klaman\u0131n yaln\u0131zca baz\u0131 b\u00f6l\u00fcmlerini payla\u015ft\u0131k, tamam\u0131na buradan ula\u015fabilirsiniz.)\n\u201cBenim s\u00f6ylediklerim beni ba\u011flar ba\u015fka siyasi partinin s\u00f6yledikleri onlar\u0131 ba\u011flar. Devletin yetkili organlar\u0131 var. Bizi takip eden Emniyet\u2019ten g\u00fc\u00e7ler var. Benim dahil oldu\u011fum bir \u015fey de\u011fil. Benim payla\u015ft\u0131\u011f\u0131m bir anlay\u0131\u015f de\u011fil. Dolay\u0131s\u0131yla ben oradaki iki gen\u00e7 karde\u015fimin mutlulu\u011funu payla\u015fmak i\u00e7in oraya gittim.\u201d\n\u201cBen bir ba\u015fkas\u0131n\u0131n konu\u015fmas\u0131na nas\u0131l kar\u015f\u0131 \u00e7\u0131kar\u0131m? Benim partimden biri, benim s\u00f6ylediklerimle ilgili s\u00f6yleyece\u011finiz bir \u015fey varsa, ele\u015ftiri varsa\u2026 Yani k\u00f6t\u00fc niyetli birtak\u0131m insanlar, devletin yetkili organlar\u0131 var, \u2018K\u00fcrdistan\u2019 meselesine onlar karar versin. Beni ilgilendirmiyor. Oradaki bir konu\u015fmac\u0131n\u0131n konu\u015fmas\u0131na m\u00fcdahale edecek konumda de\u011filim. Ben de davetliyim\u2026\u201d\n  G\u00f6r\u00fcld\u00fc\u011f\u00fc \u00fczere iddia do\u011frudur; Hdp \u015ei\u015fli \u0130l\u00e7e Ba\u015fkan\u0131 Mutlu \u00d6zt\u00fcrk, Chp \u015ei\u015fli Belediye Ba\u015fkan Aday\u0131 Muammer Keskin\u2019le bir araya geldi\u011fi bir d\u00fc\u011f\u00fcnde Chp aday\u0131n\u0131 desteklediklerini, \u2018K\u00fcrdistan\u2019da kayyumun el koydu\u011fu b\u00fct\u00fcn belediyeleri geri alaca\u011f\u0131z. T\u00fcrkiye taraf\u0131nda da AKP-MHP koalisyonuna kazand\u0131rmayaca\u011f\u0131z\u2019 diyerek belirtmi\u015ftir. Chp\u2019li Muammer Keskin, \u00d6zt\u00fcrk\u2019\u00fcn \u2018K\u00fcrdistan taraf\u0131 -T\u00fcrkiye taraf\u0131\u2019 s\u00f6z\u00fcne tepkisiz kalm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r.\nKaynaklar: kaynak1, kaynak2, kaynak3\nVideo oynat\u0131c\u0131\nhttps://dogrula.org/wp-content/uploads/2018/02/dogrula.org_.mp4\n00:00\n00:07\n[Toplam:0    Ortalama:0/5] Chp \u015ei\u015fli Belediye Ba\u015fkan Aday\u0131n\u0131n \u2018K\u00fcrdistan Taraf\u0131 -T\u00fcrkiye Taraf\u0131\u2019 S\u00f6z\u00fcne Tepki G\u00f6stermedi\u011fi \u0130ddias\u0131", "  \u0130hbar olarak dogrula.org\u2019a g\u00f6nderilen bu iddia; Instagram, Twitter, Facebook, Onedio ve Ek\u015fi S\u00f6zl\u00fck gibi pek \u00e7ok platformda payla\u015f\u0131ld\u0131.\nLiberya Devlet Ba\u015fkan\u0131 (1920\u20131930) Charles King\u2019in 15 bin se\u00e7menin oldu\u011fu se\u00e7imde 243 bin oy ald\u0131\u011f\u0131 iddias\u0131 do\u011frudur. Yasal olarak yaln\u0131zca 15 bin ki\u015finin oy kullanmas\u0131na izin verilen se\u00e7imden, True Whig Partisi aday\u0131 Charles King 243 bin oy alm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r. Bu hileli se\u00e7im, Guinness Rekorlar Kitab\u0131\u2019nda da \u201cMost crooked (en hileli)\u201d ifadesiyle yer alm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r.\nGuinness Rekorlar Kitab\u0131, 1991\n  Charles Dunbar Burgess King, 1920\u2019den 1930\u2019a kadar Liberya\u2019daki Bat\u0131 Afrika\u2019n\u0131n 17. ba\u015fkan\u0131yd\u0131. True Whig Partisi\u2019nden Charles King, Thomas J.R Faulkner ile girdi\u011fi se\u00e7im yar\u0131\u015f\u0131nda, o zamanlar sadece 15.000 kay\u0131tl\u0131 se\u00e7men varken 243.000 oy ald\u0131. Bu nedenle de ba\u015fkanl\u0131\u011f\u0131 Guinness Rekorlar Kitab\u0131 taraf\u0131ndan tarihteki en sahte se\u00e7im olarak listelendi.\nCharles Dunbar Burgess King (1875\u20131961)\n1927\u2019de Liberya\u2019da ger\u00e7ekle\u015fen Cumhurba\u015fkanl\u0131\u011f\u0131 se\u00e7iminde, True True Whig Partisi\u2019nden Charles D. B. King, Halk Partisi\u2019nden (People\u2019s Party) Thomas J. Faulkner\u2019i yenerek \u00fc\u00e7\u00fcnc\u00fc d\u00f6nem i\u00e7in tekrar se\u00e7ildi.\nSe\u00e7imler, \u00fclkenin Ulusal Se\u00e7imler Komisyonu Ba\u015fkan\u0131 Francis Johnson-Morris taraf\u0131ndan \u201c\u015fimdiye kadar yap\u0131lan en hileli se\u00e7im\u201d olarak an\u0131ld\u0131 ve ayn\u0131 zamanda tarihte bildirilen en sahte se\u00e7im olarak Guinness Rekorlar Kitab\u0131\u2019na girdi. \u00c7\u00fcnk\u00fc 15.000\u2019den daha az kay\u0131tl\u0131 se\u00e7men olmas\u0131na ra\u011fmen King, Faulkner\u2019in 9 bin oyuna kar\u015f\u0131l\u0131k 243 bin oy ald\u0131.\nSonu\u00e7lar: Aday parti oy y\u00fczdeleri\nCharles D. B. King \u2013 True Whig Party \u2013 243.000 oy (%96.43)\nThomas J. Faulkner \u2013 People\u2019s Party- 9.000 oy (%3.57)\nToplam 252.000 oy (%100)\n  Se\u00e7imlerin ard\u0131ndan, muhalefet partisinden Faulkner, True Whig Partisi h\u00fck\u00fcmetinin \u00fcyelerini evde k\u00f6le i\u015f\u00e7ili\u011fi yapmak, Fernando Po\u2019nun \u0130spanyol kolonisine k\u00f6le satmak ve ayn\u0131 zamanda orduyu s\u00fcrece dahil etmekle su\u00e7lad\u0131. H\u00fck\u00fcmetin inkarlar\u0131na ve i\u015fbirli\u011fini reddetmesine ra\u011fmen Milletler Cemiyeti, \u0130ngiliz hukuk\u00e7u Cuthbert Christy ba\u015fkanl\u0131\u011f\u0131 alt\u0131nda \u2018Liberya Cumhuriyeti\u2019nde K\u00f6lelik ve Zorunlu \u00c7al\u0131\u015fma Varl\u0131\u011f\u0131 Konusunda Uluslararas\u0131 Soru\u015fturma Komisyonu\u2019nu kurdu.\nD\u00f6nemin Amerikan Cumhurba\u015fkan\u0131 Herbert Hoover, Monrovia (Liberya\u2019n\u0131n ba\u015fkenti) ile uyum s\u00fcrecini ask\u0131ya ald\u0131. 1930\u2019da komitenin raporu yay\u0131nland\u0131; k\u00f6lelik ve zorla \u00e7al\u0131\u015ft\u0131rma su\u00e7lamalar\u0131 kan\u0131tlanamasa da, hem Charles King hem de ba\u015fkan yard\u0131mc\u0131s\u0131 Allen Yancy\u2019nin zorla \u00e7al\u0131\u015ft\u0131rmaktan kazan\u00e7 sa\u011flanmas\u0131 su\u00e7undan (k\u00f6leli\u011fe e\u015fde\u011fer) bu i\u015fe bula\u015ft\u0131\u011f\u0131 belirtildi. Ancak herhangi bir yarg\u0131lama ya da tutuklama s\u00f6z konusu olmad\u0131.\nSonu\u00e7 olarak, Temsilciler Meclisi, h\u0131zla istifa eden King aleyhine dava a\u00e7ma i\u015flemlerine ba\u015flad\u0131. Faulkner 1931 se\u00e7imlerine itiraz etti, ancak yine kaybetti.\n  Charles King, Berlin (1927)\nG\u00f6r\u00fcld\u00fc\u011f\u00fc \u00fczere, Liberya Devlet Ba\u015fkan\u0131 (1920\u20131930) Charles King\u2019in 15 bin se\u00e7menin oldu\u011fu se\u00e7imde 243 bin oy ald\u0131\u011f\u0131 iddias\u0131 do\u011frudur. Yasal olarak yaln\u0131zca 15 bin ki\u015finin oy kullanmas\u0131na izin verilen se\u00e7imde, True Whig Partisi aday\u0131 Charles King 243 bin oy alm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r. Bu hileli se\u00e7im, Guinness Rekorlar Kitab\u0131\u2019nda da \u201cMost crooked (en hileli)\u201d ifadesiyle yer alm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r.\n  Kaynaklar: kaynak1, kaynak2, kaynak3, kaynak4, kaynak5, kaynak6, kaynak7, kaynak8, kaynak9, kaynak10, kaynak11, kaynak12, kaynak13, kaynak14, kaynak15, kaynak16\nVideo oynat\u0131c\u0131\nhttps://dogrula.org/wp-content/uploads/2018/02/dogrula.org_.mp4\n00:00\n00:07\n[Toplam:0    Ortalama:0/5] Eski Liberya Ba\u015fkan\u0131 Charles King\u2019in 15 Bin Se\u00e7menin Oldu\u011fu Se\u00e7imde 243 Bin Oy Ald\u0131\u011f\u0131 \u0130ddias\u0131", "Yutun\u00e7 Kelepir adl\u0131 bir Twitter hesab\u0131nda yap\u0131lan payla\u015f\u0131mda, g\u00f6rseldeki kertenkelenin tanzim sat\u0131\u015f noktas\u0131ndan al\u0131nan marulun i\u00e7inden \u00e7\u0131kt\u0131\u011f\u0131 iddia edildi. Kullan\u0131c\u0131, marulun ucuz olmas\u0131n\u0131n nedenini i\u00e7inde kertenkele olmas\u0131 \u015feklinde yorumlad\u0131.\nAncak iddia do\u011fru de\u011fildir. Tanzim sat\u0131\u015f noktalar\u0131 2019 y\u0131l\u0131nda a\u00e7\u0131lmaya ba\u015flam\u0131\u015ft\u0131r fakat bu g\u00f6rsel 2018 y\u0131l\u0131na aittir. S\u00f6z konusu foto\u011fraf, bir Twitter kullan\u0131c\u0131s\u0131 taraf\u0131ndan \u201cmarulun i\u00e7inden \u00e7\u0131kan yarat\u0131k\u201d notuyla 2018 y\u0131l\u0131nda payla\u015f\u0131lm\u0131\u015f ve haber ajanslara d\u00fc\u015fm\u00fc\u015ft\u00fcr.\n\u0130ddian\u0131n do\u011fru olmad\u0131\u011f\u0131 k\u0131sa s\u00fcrede anla\u015f\u0131l\u0131nca kertenkelenin tanzim sat\u0131\u015f noktas\u0131ndan al\u0131nan marulun i\u00e7inden \u00e7\u0131kt\u0131\u011f\u0131n\u0131 iddia eden Yutun\u00e7 Kelepir adl\u0131 Twitter kullan\u0131c\u0131s\u0131 hesab\u0131n\u0131 kapatm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r.\n  Haber, pazardan ald\u0131\u011f\u0131 po\u015fete sar\u0131l\u0131 marulu bir s\u00fcre dolapta bekleten ve salata yapmak i\u00e7in \u00e7\u0131kard\u0131\u011f\u0131nda donmu\u015f kertenkeleyle kar\u015f\u0131la\u015fan kullan\u0131c\u0131n\u0131n payla\u015ft\u0131\u011f\u0131 foto\u011fraf olarak 28 Nisan 2018\u2019de H\u00fcrriyet, Sabah, Star, Cumhuriyet gazetelerinde yer ald\u0131.\nS\u00f6z konusu iddiaya ait, yine Nisan 2018\u2019te yay\u0131nlanan bir YouTube videosu da mevcut.\nOnedio ve Uluda\u011f S\u00f6zl\u00fck\u2019te de pazardan al\u0131nan marulun i\u00e7inden \u00e7\u0131kan kertenkeleye ait Nisan 2018\u2019de a\u00e7\u0131lan bir ba\u015fl\u0131k ve yorumlar bulunuyor.\nHaber \u00fczerine sosyal medya kullan\u0131c\u0131lar\u0131 da mizahi payla\u015f\u0131mlar yapm\u0131\u015f:\nBu arkada\u015f pazardan ald\u0131\u011f\u0131m marulun i\u00e7inden \u00e7\u0131kt\u0131. Daha da marul falan yemem pic.twitter.com/pJBsle7o48\n\u2014 Aykut Elmas (@onudabitirin) April 28, 2018\nMarul ald\u0131m i\u00e7inden \u00e7\u0131kana bak pic.twitter.com/lbfzB6Ngbm\n\u2014 Tutankhamun (@ankaralitutank) April 28, 2018\n  G\u00f6r\u00fcld\u00fc\u011f\u00fc \u00fczere, iddia do\u011fru de\u011fildir. Tanzim sat\u0131\u015f noktalar\u0131 2019 y\u0131l\u0131nda a\u00e7\u0131lmaya ba\u015flam\u0131\u015ft\u0131r fakat bu g\u00f6rsel 2018 y\u0131l\u0131na aittir. S\u00f6z konusu foto\u011fraf, bir Twitter kullan\u0131c\u0131s\u0131 taraf\u0131ndan \u201cmarulun i\u00e7inden \u00e7\u0131kan yarat\u0131k\u201d notuyla 2018 y\u0131l\u0131nda payla\u015f\u0131lm\u0131\u015f ve haber ajanslara d\u00fc\u015fm\u00fc\u015ft\u00fcr.\nKaynaklar: kaynak1, kaynak2, kaynak3, kaynak4, kaynak5, kaynak6, kaynak7, kaynak8, kaynak9, kaynak10\nVideo oynat\u0131c\u0131\nhttps://dogrula.org/wp-content/uploads/2018/02/dogrula.org_.mp4\n00:00\n00:07\n[Toplam:0    Ortalama:0/5] Tanzim Sat\u0131\u015f Noktas\u0131ndan Al\u0131nan Maruldan Kertenkele \u00c7\u0131kt\u0131\u011f\u0131 \u0130ddias\u0131", "  \u0130hbar olarak dogrula.org\u2019a gelen, Instagram\u2019da payla\u015f\u0131lan bu g\u00f6nderi, yakla\u015f\u0131k 19 bin be\u011feni ve 400 yorum ald\u0131.\nAncak K\u00fcba\u2019da Atat\u00fcrk haricinde hi\u00e7bir liderin heykelinin bulunmad\u0131\u011f\u0131 iddias\u0131 do\u011fru de\u011fildir.\nAbraham Lincoln, Simon Bolivar, Yaser Arafat, Ho Chi Minh ve Vladimir Lenin heykelleri, K\u00fcba\u2019daki yabanc\u0131 lider heykellerinden baz\u0131lar\u0131d\u0131r.\n  S\u00f6z konusu Atat\u00fcrk heykeli, K\u00fcba\u2019da 2008 y\u0131l\u0131nda yapt\u0131r\u0131lm\u0131\u015f. A\u00e7\u0131l\u0131\u015f t\u00f6renindeki ki\u015filerden baz\u0131lar\u0131 ise, T\u00fcrkiye\u2019nin NATO Daimi Temsilcisi B\u00fcy\u00fckel\u00e7i Haydar Berk ve Havana kent tarih\u00e7isi Dr. Eusebio Leal Spengler.\n  Cumhurba\u015fkan\u0131 Recep Tayyip Erdo\u011fan\u2019\u0131n ve vefat eden i\u015f adam\u0131 Mustafa Ko\u00e7\u2019un da Havana\u2019daki Atat\u00fcrk b\u00fcst\u00fcn\u00fc ziyaret ederken \u00e7ekilmi\u015f foto\u011fraflar\u0131 bulunuyor.\nK\u00fcba\u2019da Ba\u015fka Liderlerin Heykeli Var m\u0131?\n\u0130ddia edildi\u011fi gibi, K\u00fcba\u2019da yabanc\u0131 lider olarak yaln\u0131zca Atat\u00fcrk\u2019\u00fcn b\u00fcst\u00fc bulunmuyor.\nAbraham Lincoln \nCapitolio\u2019nun yan\u0131ndaki Parque de La Fraternidad\u2019da ABD\u2019nin 16. ba\u015fkan\u0131 Abraham Lincoln\u2019un bir b\u00fcst\u00fc bulunuyor.\n  Havana K\u00fcba\u2019da bulunan bir \u0130ngilizce okulunun \u00f6n\u00fcnde de, Abraham Lincoln\u2019un heykeli bulunuyor.\nSimon Bolivar\nVenezuela do\u011fumlu olan G\u00fcney Amerikal\u0131 devlet adam\u0131 Simon Bolivar, 1800\u2019l\u00fc y\u0131llarda Kolombiya devlet ba\u015fkanl\u0131\u011f\u0131 yapm\u0131\u015f \u00fcnl\u00fc bir liderdir.\nBolivar\u2019\u0131n heykeli, K\u00fcba\u2019n\u0131n ba\u015fkenti Havana\u2019da heykeli bulunan liderlerden biridir.\nVladimir Lenin\nSovyetler Birli\u011fi\u2019nin kurucusu, Rus sosyalist ve politikac\u0131 Lenin\u2019in de Havana\u2019da bronz bir heykeli bulunuyor.\n  Regla, Habana\u2019da bulunan bu heykeli, Google Haritalar\u2019da Lenin Tepesi (Colina Lenin) olarak g\u00f6rmek m\u00fcmk\u00fcn.\nYaser Arafat\nFilistin Kurtulu\u015f \u00d6rg\u00fct\u00fc\u2019n\u00fcn lideri ve Filistin ba\u015fbakan\u0131 olan Yaser Arafat\u2019\u0131n bir b\u00fcst\u00fc de K\u00fcba\u2019n\u0131n ba\u015fkenti Havana\u2019da yer alan heykellerden biri.\nK\u00fcbal\u0131 sanat\u00e7\u0131 Andres Gonzalez taraf\u0131ndan yap\u0131lan Filistin liderinin b\u00fcst\u00fc, Havana 7. caddede bulunuyor.\nHo Chi Minh\nVietnam ba\u011f\u0131ms\u0131zl\u0131k hareketinin \u00f6nderi ve Vietnam Demokratik Cumhuriyeti\u2019nin ilk ba\u015fkan\u0131 Ho Chi Minh de K\u00fcba\u2019da heykeli bulunan liderlerden biri.\nB\u00fcst, Havana\u2019n\u0131n New Vedado b\u00f6lgesindeki Acapulco park\u0131nda bulunuyor.\n  G\u00f6r\u00fcld\u00fc\u011f\u00fc \u00fczere, K\u00fcba\u2019da yabanc\u0131 lider olarak yaln\u0131zca Atat\u00fcrk\u2019\u00fcn heykelinin bulundu\u011fu iddias\u0131 do\u011fru de\u011fildir. Abraham Lincoln, Simon Bolivar, Yaser Arafat, Ho Chi Minh ve Vladimir Lenin heykelleri, K\u00fcba\u2019daki yabanc\u0131 lider heykellerinden baz\u0131lar\u0131d\u0131r.\nKaynaklar: kaynak1, kaynak2, kaynak3, kaynak4, kaynak5, kaynak6, kaynak7, kaynak8, kaynak9, kaynak10, kaynak11, kaynak12, kaynak13, kaynak14, kaynak15, kaynak16, kaynak17, kaynak18\nVideo oynat\u0131c\u0131\nhttps://dogrula.org/wp-content/uploads/2018/02/dogrula.org_.mp4\n00:00\n00:07\n[Toplam:0    Ortalama:0/5] K\u00fcba\u2019da Atat\u00fcrk Haricinde Hi\u00e7bir Liderin Heykelinin Bulunmad\u0131\u011f\u0131 \u0130ddias\u0131", "  \u0130hbar olarak dogrula.org\u2019a gelen, Milli Savunma Bakan\u0131 Hulusi Akar\u2019\u0131n K\u00fcrdistan bayra\u011f\u0131 ile ayn\u0131 masada bulundu\u011fu iddias\u0131 do\u011frudur.\nToplant\u0131 salonundaki masada T\u00fcrk bayra\u011f\u0131, Irak bayra\u011f\u0131 ve Irak K\u00fcrt B\u00f6lgesel Y\u00f6netimi bayra\u011f\u0131 yer alm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r; ancak bu bayra\u011f\u0131n ter\u00f6r \u00f6rg\u00fct\u00fc PKK bayra\u011f\u0131 ile kar\u0131\u015ft\u0131r\u0131lmamas\u0131 gerekmektedir.\nBa\u015fbakan\u0131 Ne\u00e7irvan Barzani olan IKBY \u00f6zerk bir yap\u0131d\u0131r, kendine ait bir bayra\u011f\u0131 bulunur.\n  Milli Savunma Bakan\u0131 Hulusi Akar, Irak K\u00fcrt B\u00f6lgesel Y\u00f6netimi G\u00fcvenlik Konseyi Ba\u015fkan\u0131 Mesrur Barzani ile Almanya\u2019da d\u00fczenlenen M\u00fcnih G\u00fcvenlik Konferans\u0131 kapsam\u0131nda bir g\u00f6r\u00fc\u015fme ger\u00e7ekle\u015ftirmi\u015ftir. Toplant\u0131 salonundaki masada T\u00fcrk bayra\u011f\u0131, Irak bayra\u011f\u0131 ve Irak K\u00fcrt B\u00f6lgesel Y\u00f6netimi bayra\u011f\u0131yer alm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r.\nG\u00f6r\u00fc\u015fmenin detaylar\u0131 ajanslara, \u201cT\u00fcrkiye, Irak ve IKBY (Irak K\u00fcrt B\u00f6lgesel Y\u00f6netimi) aras\u0131ndaki ili\u015fkilerin geli\u015ftirilmesine i\u015faret edilen g\u00f6r\u00fc\u015fmede, ba\u015fta ticaret olmak \u00fczere t\u00fcm alanlarda ili\u015fkilerin geli\u015ftirilmesi vurguland\u0131. \u0130ki taraf\u0131n ayr\u0131ca ter\u00f6rle m\u00fccadele konular\u0131n\u0131n ele ald\u0131\u011f\u0131n\u0131 bildiren IKBY bas\u0131n\u0131, g\u00f6r\u00fc\u015fmeyi olumlu olarak yorumlad\u0131.\u201d \u015feklinde d\u00fc\u015fm\u00fc\u015ft\u00fcr.\n\u0645\u06d5\u0633\u0631\u0648\u0631 \u0628\u0627\u0631\u0632\u0627\u0646\u06cc \u0644\u06d5 \u0645\u06cc\u0648\u0646\u0634\u0646 \u0644\u06d5\u06af\u06d5\u06b5 \u0648\u06d5\u0632\u06cc\u0631\u06cc \u0628\u06d5\u0631\u06af\u0631\u06cc \u062a\u0648\u0631\u06a9\u06cc\u0627 \u06a9\u06c6\u0628\u0648\u0648\u06d5\u0648\u06d5\nKURDISTAN24 PAYLA\u015eTI: 16 \u015eUBAT 2019 CUMARTESI\nIrak K\u00fcrt B\u00f6lgesel Y\u00f6netimi ve PKK Aras\u0131ndaki Fark\nIrak K\u00fcrt B\u00f6lgesel Y\u00f6netimi ba\u015fkan\u0131 Mesut Barzani PKK i\u00e7in, \u201cVatana ihanet i\u00e7indeki olu\u015fum\u201d demi\u015ftir. Pkk ve Irak K\u00fcrt B\u00f6lgesel Y\u00f6netimi pek \u00e7ok konuda kar\u015f\u0131 kar\u015f\u0131ya gelmi\u015f ve \u00e7at\u0131\u015fma ya\u015fam\u0131\u015ft\u0131r.\nIrak K\u00fcrt B\u00f6lgesel Y\u00f6netimi Bayra\u011f\u0131\nIrak K\u00fcrt B\u00f6lgesel Y\u00f6netimi veya Irak K\u00fcrt B\u00f6lgesi, yakla\u015f\u0131k 40.000 km\u00b2\u2019den olu\u015fan; Bat\u0131\u2019da Suriye\u2019ye, Do\u011fu\u2019da \u0130ran\u2019a ve Kuzey\u2019de T\u00fcrkiye\u2019ye kom\u015fu olan Irak Federasyonu\u2019na ba\u011fl\u0131, anayasal d\u00fczeyde varl\u0131\u011f\u0131 olan \u00f6zerk bir b\u00f6lgedir. Ba\u015fkenti Erbil\u2019dir ve d\u00fcnyada bu \u015fekilde tan\u0131nmaktad\u0131r.\nBa\u015fbakan\u0131 Ne\u00e7irvan Barzani olan b\u00f6lgesel y\u00f6netim \u00f6zerk bir yap\u0131d\u0131r, kendine ait bir bayra\u011f\u0131 bulunur; ter\u00f6r \u00f6rg\u00fct\u00fc Pkk ile kar\u0131\u015ft\u0131r\u0131lmamal\u0131d\u0131r.\n  PKK ise, T\u00fcrk\u00e7e tam ad\u0131 ile K\u00fcrdistan \u0130\u015f\u00e7i Partisi, T\u00fcrkiye\u2019nin do\u011fu ve g\u00fcneydo\u011fusu, Irak\u2019\u0131n kuzeyi, Suriye\u2019nin kuzeydo\u011fusu ve \u0130ran\u2019\u0131n kuzeybat\u0131s\u0131n\u0131 kapsayan b\u00f6lgede devlet kurmay\u0131 ama\u00e7layan ve bu ama\u00e7la s\u00f6z konusu topraklar\u0131n T\u00fcrkiye s\u0131n\u0131rlar\u0131 dahilinde kalan k\u0131sm\u0131na sahip olabilmek i\u00e7in askeri hedeflere, k\u00f6y korucular\u0131na ve sivillere kar\u015f\u0131 sald\u0131r\u0131lar d\u00fczenleyen yasa d\u0131\u015f\u0131 ayr\u0131l\u0131k\u00e7\u0131 silahl\u0131 \u00f6rg\u00fctt\u00fcr.\nPKK; T\u00fcrkiye\u2019nin do\u011fu ve g\u00fcneydo\u011fusu, Irak\u2019\u0131n kuzeyi, Suriye\u2019nin kuzeydo\u011fusu ve \u0130ran\u2019\u0131n kuzeybat\u0131s\u0131n\u0131 kapsayan b\u00f6lgede devlet kurmay\u0131 ama\u00e7lamaktad\u0131r.\nPKK Bayra\u011f\u0131\nPKK; Avrupa Birli\u011fi \u00fclkeleri, NATO, ABD, Avustralya, Japonya, Kanada, Kazakistan ve b\u00f6lgedeki T\u00fcrkiye, Suriye, Irak ve \u0130ran gibi bir\u00e7ok \u00fclke ve uluslararas\u0131 kurulu\u015f taraf\u0131ndan ter\u00f6r \u00f6rg\u00fct\u00fc olarak tan\u0131nmaktad\u0131r.\nMarksizm-Leninizm ve Maoizm ideolojilerine sahip bir ter\u00f6r \u00f6rg\u00fct\u00fc olan PKK bayra\u011f\u0131 ile, Irak K\u00fcrt B\u00f6lgesel Y\u00f6netiminin bayra\u011f\u0131 farkl\u0131d\u0131r.\nG\u00f6r\u00fc\u015fmelerde Yer Alan Bayrak\nMesud Barzani ve Binali Y\u0131ld\u0131r\u0131m g\u00f6r\u00fc\u015fmesinde de Irak K\u00fcrt B\u00f6lgesel Y\u00f6netimi bayra\u011f\u0131na yer verilmi\u015fti. Barzani\u2019nin T\u00fcrkiye ziyaretinden bir kare:\n  S\u00f6z konusu iddia do\u011frudur. Toplant\u0131 salonundaki masada T\u00fcrk bayra\u011f\u0131, Irak bayra\u011f\u0131 ve Irak K\u00fcrt B\u00f6lgesel Y\u00f6netimi bayra\u011f\u0131 yer alm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r. Ba\u015fbakan\u0131 Ne\u00e7irvan Barzani olan IKBY \u00f6zerk bir yap\u0131d\u0131r, kendine ait bir bayra\u011f\u0131 bulunur; ter\u00f6r \u00f6rg\u00fct\u00fc Pkk ile kar\u0131\u015ft\u0131r\u0131lmamal\u0131d\u0131r.\nKaynaklar: kaynak1, kaynak2, kaynak3, kaynak4, kaynak5, kaynak6, kaynak7, kaynak8, kaynak9\nVideo oynat\u0131c\u0131\nhttps://dogrula.org/wp-content/uploads/2018/02/dogrula.org_.mp4\n00:00\n00:07\n[Toplam:0    Ortalama:0/5] Hulusi Akar\u2019\u0131n K\u00fcrdistan Bayra\u011f\u0131 ile Ayn\u0131 Masada Oldu\u011fu \u0130ddias\u0131", "  \u0130hbar olarak dogrula org.\u2019a gelen T\u00fcbitak onayl\u0131 salavat projesi iddias\u0131, bir Twitter hesab\u0131nda ve pek \u00e7ok sosyal medya platformunda payla\u015f\u0131lm\u0131\u015f; ayr\u0131ca Ek\u015fi S\u00f6zl\u00fck\u2019te de yer alm\u0131\u015f.\n  Ancak s\u00f6z konusu iddia do\u011fru de\u011fildir; T\u00fcbitak ile bir ilgisi yoktur. Video, Batman\u2019da bir \u0130mam Hatip Lisesi\u2019nde bir grup \u00f6\u011frencinin salavat\u0131 te\u015fvik etmek amac\u0131yla okulun belli yerlerine ast\u0131klar\u0131 zikirmatiklerle, kendi i\u00e7lerinde ba\u015flatt\u0131klar\u0131 bir kampanyay\u0131 g\u00f6stermektedir. Oysa sosyal medyada videoya yaz\u0131 ili\u015ftirilmi\u015f ve ses efekti montajlanm\u0131\u015f.\nT\u00dcB\u0130TAK Onayl\u0131 Proje De\u011fil, \u2018Bir Salavat da Sen \u00c7ek\u2019 Kampanyas\u0131\n\u0130ddiaya konu olan videoya T\u00fcbitak onayl\u0131 salavat projesi yaz\u0131s\u0131 montajlanm\u0131\u015f ve belli k\u0131s\u0131mlar\u0131 kesilerek servis edilmi\u015f. Ayr\u0131ca ses efekti eklenmi\u015f. Videonun orijinali \u015f\u00f6yle:\n  2015 y\u0131l\u0131na ait bu videoda, Batman K\u0131z Anadolu \u0130mam Hatip Lisesi\u2019den bir grup \u00f6\u011frenci, okul i\u00e7inde ba\u015flatt\u0131klar\u0131 salavat projesini anlat\u0131yor.\nKampanyay\u0131 y\u00fcr\u00fcten \u00f6\u011frencilerden biri, \u201cToplad\u0131\u011f\u0131m\u0131z salavatlar 20 Ocak\u2019ta umreye giden arkada\u015f\u0131m\u0131z taraf\u0131ndan teslim edilecek. \u0130smen dua edilecek. 20 Ocak\u2019tan sonra da bu kampanyam\u0131z devam edecek. Ahir zaman fitnelerinden bir tanesi de yapt\u0131\u011f\u0131m\u0131z ya da duydu\u011fumuz \u015feylerden etkilenip de onu hayat\u0131m\u0131za ge\u00e7irmememiz. \u0130\u015fte bu y\u00f6nde en b\u00fcy\u00fck s\u0131k\u0131nt\u0131m\u0131z Efendimiz tan\u0131mamak. Tan\u0131mad\u0131\u011f\u0131n bir insan\u0131 sevemezsin, o y\u00fczden Efendimizi \u00e7ok iyi tan\u0131mal\u0131y\u0131z.\u201d diyor.\nProjeye Batman Merkez K\u0131z Anadolu \u0130mam Hatip Lisesi resmi web sitesinde de yer verilmi\u015f. Bu giri\u015fimin T\u00fcbitak ile hi\u00e7bir ba\u011flant\u0131s\u0131 bulunmuyor.\n  Okulun duvarlar\u0131na as\u0131lan bu yaz\u0131lar ve zikirmatiklerle, salavat \u00e7ekilmesi te\u015fvik edilmi\u015f.\nKampanya, T\u00fcbitak Destekli Projeler Veri Taban\u0131nda Yer Alm\u0131yor\n  T\u00fcbitak Ulakbim web sitesindeki, T\u00dcB\u0130TAK taraf\u0131ndan desteklenen ara\u015ft\u0131rma projelerinin 1965\u2019den g\u00fcn\u00fcm\u00fcze kesin raporlar\u0131n\u0131 i\u00e7eren T\u00dcB\u0130TAK Destekli Projeler Veri Taban\u0131 incelendi\u011finde, s\u00f6z konusu iddiaya dair bir bilgiye rastlanm\u0131yor. Proje raporlar\u0131n\u0131n tam metinlerine buradan ula\u015fabilirsiniz.\nAnahtar kelimeler b\u00f6l\u00fcm\u00fcne \u201csalavat\u201d yazd\u0131\u011f\u0131n\u0131zda da \u00e7\u0131kan sonu\u00e7lar aras\u0131nda s\u00f6z konusu proje yer alm\u0131yor.\n  G\u00f6r\u00fcld\u00fc\u011f\u00fc \u00fczere, T\u00fcbitak salavat projesi iddias\u0131 do\u011fru de\u011fil; video Batman\u2019da bir \u0130mam Hatip Lisesi \u00f6\u011frencilerinin salavat \u00e7ekmeyi te\u015fvik etmek amac\u0131yla okul i\u00e7inde ba\u015flatt\u0131klar\u0131 bir kampanya. T\u00fcbitak onay\u0131 ya da deste\u011fi bulunmuyor.\n  Kaynaklar: kaynak1, kaynak2, kaynak3, kaynak4, kaynak5, kaynak6, kaynak7\nVideo oynat\u0131c\u0131\nhttps://dogrula.org/wp-content/uploads/2018/02/dogrula.org_.mp4\n00:00\n00:07\n[Toplam:0    Ortalama:0/5] T\u00fcbitak Onayl\u0131 Salavat Projesi \u0130ddias\u0131", "  \u0130hbar olarak dogrula.org\u2019a gelen bir haberde, cep telefonlar\u0131n\u0131n u\u00e7ak modunda daha h\u0131zl\u0131 \u015farj olduklar\u0131 iddia edildi.\nS\u00f6z konusu iddia \u00e7o\u011funlukla do\u011frudur; telefon bataryas\u0131 u\u00e7ak modunda nispeten daha h\u0131zl\u0131 \u015farj olur, ancak \u015farj h\u0131z\u0131nda yaln\u0131zca 4 -11 dakika kadar tasarruf edilir.\nBu oran telefonun normal \u015farj edilme s\u00fcresiyle kar\u015f\u0131la\u015ft\u0131r\u0131ld\u0131\u011f\u0131nda, s\u00fcre\u00e7te b\u00fcy\u00fck bir fark olu\u015fturmamaktad\u0131r.\nTelefonunuzu \u015farj olurken u\u00e7ak moduna ald\u0131\u011f\u0131n\u0131zda, cep telefonu kuleleriyle ba\u011flant\u0131 kurmak ve GPS i\u015flevi ile konum belirlemeye \u00e7al\u0131\u015fmak gibi s\u00fcrekli olarak enerji harcayan s\u00fcreci engelleyerek telefondaki i\u015flemi yava\u015flatmam\u0131\u015f olursunuz.\n    G\u00fcn\u00fcm\u00fczde neredeyse b\u00fct\u00fcn insanlar, ak\u0131ll\u0131 telefonlar\u0131yla saatler ge\u00e7iriyor. TV izlerken, yemek yerken, egzersiz yaparken, hatta tuvaletteyken bile cep telefonu kullan\u0131l\u0131yor.\nBu y\u00fczden de bataryay\u0131 yenilemek gerekiyor, ancak baz\u0131 telefonlar\u0131n \u015farj olmas\u0131 saatler s\u00fcrebiliyor.\nU\u00e7ak Modunda \u015earj\n  Telefonunuzu \u015farj olurken u\u00e7ak moduna ald\u0131\u011f\u0131n\u0131zda, cep telefonu kuleleriyle ba\u011flant\u0131 kurmak ve GPS i\u015flevi ile konum belirlemeye \u00e7al\u0131\u015fmak gibi s\u00fcrekli olarak enerji harcayan s\u00fcreci engelleyerek telefondaki i\u015flemi yava\u015flatmam\u0131\u015f olursunuz.\nKullan\u0131c\u0131lar\u0131n i\u015fine yarayan bu taktik, g\u00fcvenilirdir ve mobil sa\u011flay\u0131c\u0131 Verizon taraf\u0131ndan da \u00f6nerilmektedir. Bunun nedeni, telefonunuz normal moddayken, s\u00fcrekli olarak baz istasyonlar\u0131na sinyal vermeye ve konumunuzu belirlemeye \u00e7al\u0131\u015fmas\u0131. Telefonunuz b\u00fcy\u00fck olas\u0131l\u0131kla uydu koordinatlar\u0131ndan ziyade cep telefonu \u015febekesini kullanarak konum koordinatlar\u0131n\u0131z\u0131 hesaplayan GPS destekli olsa da, bu fonksiyon hala \u00e7ok fazla enerji harcanmas\u0131na sebep olur. \u00c7\u00fcnk\u00fc konum bulma, telefonunuzun tam enerji tasarrufu sa\u011flayan uyku moduna girmesini engeller.\nU\u00e7ak moduna ge\u00e7ti\u011finizde, bu radyo yay\u0131nlar\u0131n\u0131n al\u0131m\u0131n\u0131 kapat\u0131rs\u0131n\u0131z ve telefonunuz nispeten daha h\u0131zl\u0131 \u015farj olur.\nU\u00e7ak Modunda \u015earj S\u00fcresi Ne Kadar K\u0131sal\u0131yor?\nAmerikan medya teknoloji sitesi CNET, bir telefonun bataryas\u0131n\u0131n u\u00e7ak modundayken ne kadar s\u00fcrede \u015farj edildi\u011fini kar\u015f\u0131la\u015ft\u0131rmak amac\u0131yla bir video yay\u0131nlad\u0131. CNET videosuna g\u00f6re:\n\u201cU\u00e7ak modunu etkinle\u015ftirmek, telefonunuzu normalde \u015farj etti\u011finizden d\u00f6rt- onbir dakika daha h\u0131zl\u0131 \u015farj olmas\u0131yla sonu\u00e7lan\u0131r. Ama sorunun devam\u0131 var, buna de\u011fer mi? Bizce hay\u0131r, de\u011fmez.\u201d\nBu y\u00fczden iddia do\u011fru; u\u00e7ak modu size birka\u00e7 dakika \u015farj s\u00fcresi kazand\u0131r\u0131yor. Ancak bu ekstra d\u00f6rt dakikan\u0131n \u015farj esnas\u0131nda t\u00fcm ba\u011flant\u0131lar\u0131n kopmas\u0131na de\u011fer olup olmad\u0131\u011f\u0131na karar vermek gerekiyor.\n  G\u00f6r\u00fcld\u00fc\u011f\u00fc \u00fczere s\u00f6z konusu iddia \u00e7o\u011funlukla do\u011frudur; telefon bataryas\u0131 u\u00e7ak modunda nispeten daha h\u0131zl\u0131 \u015farj olur, ancak \u015farj h\u0131z\u0131nda yaln\u0131zca 4 -11 dakika kadar tasarruf edilir.\nKaynaklar: kaynak1, kaynak2, kaynak3, kaynak4, kaynak5, kaynak6, kaynak7\nVideo oynat\u0131c\u0131\nhttps://dogrula.org/wp-content/uploads/2018/02/dogrula.org_.mp4\n00:00\n00:07\n[Toplam:0    Ortalama:0/5] Cep Telefonlar\u0131n\u0131n U\u00e7ak Modunda Daha H\u0131zl\u0131 \u015earj Oldu\u011fu \u0130ddias\u0131", "  \u0130hbar olarak dogrula.org\u2019a g\u00f6nderilen bu foto\u011frafta yer alan ki\u015finin, 1900\u2019l\u00fc y\u0131llarda New York sahilinde y\u00fczme e\u011fitmeni olarak \u00e7al\u0131\u015fan Nikola Tesla oldu\u011fu iddia edildi.\nAncak s\u00f6z konusu iddia do\u011fru de\u011fildir.\nS\u0131rp k\u00f6kenli Amerikal\u0131 mucit, fizik\u00e7i ve elektrofizik uzman\u0131 Nikola Tesla\u2019ya ait oldu\u011fu iddia edilen bu foto\u011fraf ge\u00e7ti\u011fimiz May\u0131s ay\u0131nda History Photographed adl\u0131 bir sayfada \u201cGen\u00e7 Nikola Tesla, bir k\u0131za y\u00fczme \u00f6\u011fretirken, 1900\u201d yorumuyla yer alm\u0131\u015f:\nYoung Nikola Tesla teaching a girl how to swim, 1900. pic.twitter.com/GHkUiU6Qft\n\u2014 History Photographed (@OldHistoryPics_) May 12, 2018\n  Di\u011fer bir Twitter sayfas\u0131 olan Weird History de ayn\u0131 kareyi 2017 y\u0131l\u0131nda
