Weird History (@WeirdHistoryPix) August 28, 2017\n  Bu iddialar\u0131n hi\u00e7biri do\u011fru de\u011fil, \u00e7\u00fcnk\u00fc foto\u011fraftaki ki\u015fi Nikola Tesla de\u011fil.\nNew York \u015eehir M\u00fczesi\u2019ne g\u00f6re, bu g\u00f6r\u00fcnt\u00fc 1898\u2019de \u00e7ekilmi\u015f ve foto\u011frafta Staten Island\u2019daki Midland Plaj\u0131\u2019nda bir erkek (\u201cy\u00fczme e\u011fitmeni\u201d olarak tan\u0131mlanm\u0131\u015f) ve bir kad\u0131n (\u201cy\u00fcz\u00fcc\u00fc\u201d olarak tan\u0131mlanm\u0131\u015f) g\u00f6steriliyor.\n  Foto\u011fraftaki ki\u015fi Nikola Tesla ile benzerlik g\u00f6steriyor. Ancak Tesla, 1898\u2019de (bu foto\u011fraf \u00e7ekildi\u011finde) yakla\u015f\u0131k 42 ya\u015f\u0131ndayd\u0131, foto\u011fraftaki adam ise daha gen\u00e7 g\u00f6r\u00fcn\u00fcyor. \u0130\u015fte \u201cY\u00fczme e\u011fitmeni\u201d ile 1896\u2019da \u00e7ekilmi\u015f Tesla\u2019n\u0131n bir g\u00f6r\u00fcnt\u00fcs\u00fc:\n\u0130ki foto\u011frafta g\u00f6r\u00fclen ki\u015filerin sa\u00e7 \u00e7izgisi ve kulaklar\u0131 belirgin \u015fekilde farkl\u0131d\u0131r.\nAyr\u0131ca Tesla\u2019n\u0131n o y\u0131llarda y\u00fczme e\u011fitmenli\u011fi e\u011filimi veya finansal ihtiyac\u0131 olmas\u0131 da pek olas\u0131 de\u011fildir; \u00e7\u00fcnk\u00fc kaynaklara g\u00f6re Tesla\u2019n\u0131n zaten birka\u00e7 ba\u015far\u0131l\u0131 patenti vard\u0131 ve 1898 itibar\u0131yla New York\u2019ta birka\u00e7 laboratuvar i\u015fletiyordu.\n  G\u00f6r\u00fcld\u00fc\u011f\u00fc \u00fczere iddia do\u011fru de\u011fildir; New York \u015eehir M\u00fczesi\u2019nde yer alan foto\u011fraf Tesla\u2019y\u0131 de\u011fil, \u2018y\u00fczme e\u011fitmeni\u2019 olarak ba\u015fka bir ki\u015fiyi g\u00f6stermektedir.\nKaynaklar: kaynak1, kaynak2, kaynak3, kaynak4, kaynak5, kaynak6, kaynak7\nVideo oynat\u0131c\u0131\nhttps://dogrula.org/wp-content/uploads/2018/02/dogrula.org_.mp4\n00:00\n00:07\n[Toplam:1    Ortalama:1/5] Foto\u011fraf\u0131n Y\u00fczme E\u011fitmeni Olarak Nikola Tesla\u2019y\u0131 G\u00f6sterdi\u011fi \u0130ddias\u0131", "  \u0130hbar olarak dogrula.org\u2019a gelen bu iddia, son y\u0131llarda sosyal medya ve Internet ortamlar\u0131nda s\u0131k\u00e7a g\u00fcndeme gelmektedir.\nDeodorantlar\u0131n gece s\u0131k\u0131ld\u0131\u011f\u0131nda, ya da antiperspiranlar\u0131n (ter \u00f6nleyici) gece kullan\u0131ld\u0131\u011f\u0131nda terlemeye kar\u015f\u0131 daha etkili olduklar\u0131 iddias\u0131 do\u011frudur.\n  Terlemeyi \u00f6nleyici deodorantlar \u00e7o\u011funlukla sabahlar\u0131 kullan\u0131l\u0131r. Ancak gece yatmadan \u00f6nce uygulanmas\u0131 \u00e7ok daha etkilidir.\nTerlemeyi \u00f6nleyici deodorantlar\u0131 (ya da roll-on) sabahlar\u0131, \u00f6zellikle du\u015ftan hemen sonra uygulamak, aktif bile\u015fenlerin ter kanallar\u0131n\u0131za girmesini ve t\u0131kanmas\u0131n\u0131 zorla\u015ft\u0131r\u0131r. Sabahlar\u0131, ter hacminiz tipik olarak gece oldu\u011fundan daha y\u00fcksektir ve terlemeyi \u00f6nlemek i\u00e7in kulland\u0131\u011f\u0131n\u0131z deodorant bu \u015fekilde terle birlikte yok olur.\nGece, deodorant kullanmak i\u00e7in en uygun zamand\u0131r \u00e7\u00fcnk\u00fc ter bezleriniz daha az aktif olur ve cildiniz daha kuru olur. Deodorant\u0131n i\u00e7indeki maddelerin etkisi genellikle yakla\u015f\u0131k 24 saat s\u00fcrer ve sabahlar\u0131 du\u015f al\u0131rken bu maddeler aktif kal\u0131r; \u00e7\u00fcnk\u00fc g\u00f6zenekler t\u0131kal\u0131 durumdad\u0131r.\n  Dermatolog dergisinde 18 ve 65 ya\u015f aras\u0131 kad\u0131nlar\u0131n \u00fczerinde yap\u0131lan bir \u00e7al\u0131\u015fmada, geceleri terlemeyi \u00f6nleyici madde kullanan ki\u015filerin, sabahlar\u0131 \u00fcr\u00fcnleri kullanan kad\u0131nlardan \u00fc\u00e7, yedi ve on g\u00fcn sonra ter oranlar\u0131nda \u00e7ok daha fazla azalma oldu\u011fu g\u00f6r\u00fclm\u00fc\u015ft\u00fcr.\nKonuyu \u00e7evreleyen daha fazla ara\u015ft\u0131rmaya ihtiya\u00e7 vard\u0131r, ancak ara\u015ft\u0131rmaya g\u00f6re, deodorant\u0131n ki\u015fi uyurken g\u00f6zeneklerde \u201cdurmas\u0131\u201d i\u00e7in gecenin uygun bir zaman sa\u011flad\u0131\u011f\u0131 d\u00fc\u015f\u00fcn\u00fclmektedir.\nMail Online\u2019ye konu\u015fan dan\u0131\u015fman dermatolog Dr Nick Low, bunun \u201cyeterince mant\u0131kl\u0131\u201d oldu\u011funu ifade etmi\u015ftir.\n\u201cSabah terlemeyi \u00f6nleyici uygularsan\u0131z, stres gibi duygusal tetikleyicilerin bir sonucu olarak terleme olas\u0131l\u0131\u011f\u0131n\u0131z daha y\u00fcksekse, \u00fcr\u00fcn hemen yok olur.\u201d\nAmerikan Dermatoloji Akademisi Ba\u015fkan\u0131 David Pariser de, yatmadan \u00f6nce deodorant kullanman\u0131n \u201cterlemeyi ger\u00e7ekten \u00f6nlemenin en iyi yolu\u201d oldu\u011funu s\u00f6ylemi\u015ftir.\n  TV doktoru Dawn Harper de, insanlar\u0131n deodorant\u0131 yanl\u0131\u015f \u015fekilde uygulad\u0131\u011f\u0131n\u0131 iddia etmektedir. Harper, uygulamay\u0131 geceleri yaparak, koltuk altlar\u0131 \u00fczerinde deodorant\u0131n daha etkili olmas\u0131n\u0131n sa\u011flanaca\u011f\u0131n\u0131 ifade etmi\u015ftir.\nGeceleri v\u00fccut \u0131s\u0131s\u0131 d\u00fc\u015fer, yani daha az terleriz. Ter bezleri daha az aktif oldu\u011funda ter kanallar\u0131 terlemeyi \u00f6nleyici olarak aliminyum bazl\u0131 aktif maddeyi daha fazla emebilir. Gecede, \u00fcr\u00fcn\u00fcn bu ter kanallar\u0131n\u0131 bat\u0131rma ve etkili bir \u015fekilde engelleme imkan\u0131 vard\u0131r. Sabahlar\u0131 ter bezleri daha aktiftir ve aktif bile\u015fenlerin cilde n\u00fcfuz etmesi ve olmas\u0131 gereken yere inmesi daha zordur.\nDu\u015ftan hemen sonra deodorant uygulamak hatal\u0131 bir i\u015flemdir. Antiperspiranlar \u00e7ok kuru ciltlere uyguland\u0131\u011f\u0131nda en etkilidir. Cildin y\u00fczeyi \u0131slaksa, al\u00fcminyuma kar\u015f\u0131 kimyasal reaksiyon terleme engelleme i\u015fleminin ger\u00e7ekle\u015fmesi i\u00e7in olmas\u0131 gereken g\u00f6zeneklerin i\u00e7inde de\u011fil, cildin d\u0131\u015f katmanlar\u0131nda ger\u00e7ekle\u015fir. Sabahlar\u0131 du\u015f ald\u0131\u011f\u0131n\u0131zda, \u00f6nceki gece uygulad\u0131\u011f\u0131n\u0131z deodorant ak\u0131p gitmez. Bile\u015fenlerin etkisi, du\u015f alma s\u0131ras\u0131nda bile yakla\u015f\u0131k 24 saat boyunca aktif kal\u0131r.\n  Hayat\u0131 kolayla\u015ft\u0131ran yarar\u0131na ra\u011fmen, antiperspiranlar proteinleri ter kanallar\u0131nda p\u0131ht\u0131la\u015ft\u0131r\u0131r, bu y\u00fczden m\u00fcmk\u00fcn oldu\u011funca seyrek kullan\u0131lmal\u0131d\u0131rlar.\nKaynaklar: kaynak1, kaynak2, kaynak3, kaynak4, kaynak5, kaynak6, kaynak7, kaynak8, kaynak9\nVideo oynat\u0131c\u0131\nhttps://dogrula.org/wp-content/uploads/2018/02/dogrula.org_.mp4\n00:00\n00:07\n[Toplam:1    Ortalama:5/5] Deodorantlar Gece S\u0131k\u0131ld\u0131\u011f\u0131nda Terlemeyi \u00d6nlemede Daha Etkili Olur \u0130ddias\u0131", "  Y\u0131llardan beri s\u00f6ylenen bir efsaneye g\u00f6re, beynimizin yaln\u0131zca %10\u2019unu kullanabiliyoruz.\nAncak bilinenin aksine, s\u00f6z konusu iddia do\u011fru de\u011fil; beynimizin tamam\u0131n\u0131 kullan\u0131yoruz.\n  \u015eehir Efsanesinin Kayna\u011f\u0131\nWashington \u00dcniversitesi\u2019ndeki Sinir M\u00fchendisli\u011fi Merkezi\u2019nden davran\u0131\u015fsal n\u00f6rofizyolog Eric Chudler, teorinin psikolog William James taraf\u0131ndan 1907 y\u0131l\u0131nda yazd\u0131\u011f\u0131 \u201cThe Energies of Men\u201d ara\u015ft\u0131rma yaz\u0131s\u0131yla pop\u00fclerle\u015fti\u011fini s\u00f6yl\u00fcyor.\nJames ara\u015ft\u0131rmas\u0131nda, \u201cbir kural olarak insanlar, sahip olduklar\u0131 g\u00fc\u00e7lerin sadece k\u00fc\u00e7\u00fck bir b\u00f6l\u00fcm\u00fcn\u00fc ve uygun ko\u015fullar alt\u0131nda kullanabildikleri kadar\u0131n\u0131 kulland\u0131klar\u0131n\u0131\u2019 yazm\u0131\u015ft\u0131.\nBeyin ara\u015ft\u0131rmac\u0131lar\u0131n\u0131n 20. y\u00fczy\u0131l\u0131n ilk yar\u0131s\u0131ndaki \u00e7al\u0131\u015fmalar\u0131 da bu efsanenin pop\u00fclerle\u015fmesine yard\u0131mc\u0131 olmu\u015ftu.\nBu efsanenin devam etmesinin bir di\u011fer nedeni de, psi\u015fik g\u00fc\u00e7leri a\u00e7\u0131klamak i\u00e7in paranormal taraftarlar\u0131 ve psi\u015fikler taraf\u0131ndan benimsenmesidir.\nYeti\u015fkin insan beyni yakla\u015f\u0131k 1,5 kilogram a\u011f\u0131rl\u0131\u011f\u0131ndad\u0131r ve n\u00f6ron ad\u0131 verilen sinir h\u00fccreleri i\u00e7erir. Bu h\u00fccrelerin ba\u011flanma ve ileti\u015fim kurma \u015fekli beyin fonksiyonunun temelidir.\nMelbourne\u2019deki Swinburne Teknoloji \u00dcniversitesi\u2019nde Bili\u015fsel Sinirbilim ve Psikoloji Profes\u00f6r\u00fc Con Stough, bir \u015fey \u00f6\u011frenirken beynimizin yeni ba\u011flant\u0131lar kurdu\u011funu s\u00f6yl\u00fcyor.\nProfes\u00f6r Stough, \u201cOn milyar h\u00fccre var ve her biri yeni ba\u011flant\u0131lar kurabiliyor, bazen her h\u00fccre y\u00fczlerce ba\u011flant\u0131 kurabiliyor, bu ger\u00e7ekten plastisite ve yeni olas\u0131l\u0131klar\u0131n olabilece\u011fini g\u00f6steriyor.\u201d a\u00e7\u0131klamas\u0131nda bulunmu\u015ftur.\nMelbourne\u2019deki Florey Sinirbilim ve Zihinsel Sa\u011fl\u0131k Enstit\u00fcs\u00fc\u2019nden Ashley Bush, d\u00fc\u015f\u00fcnceler ve hesaplama gibi fark\u0131ndal\u0131klar\u0131n asl\u0131nda beynin karma\u015f\u0131k i\u015flemlerinin yaln\u0131zca %10\u2019unu temsil edebilece\u011fini s\u00f6yl\u00fcyor.\nAncak Profes\u00f6r Bush, insan beyninin geri kalan\u0131n\u0131n yapacak \u00e7ok \u015feyi oldu\u011funu ve bilin\u00e7 d\u0131\u015f\u0131 s\u00fcre\u00e7leri s\u00fcrekli olarak ger\u00e7ekle\u015ftirdi\u011finis\u00f6yl\u00fcyor.\nBush, \u201cBeyin s\u00fcrekli tetikte ama biz bunun fark\u0131nda de\u011filiz\u2026 Uyurken bile beynin \u00e7o\u011fu aktif\u201d diyor.\n  Beyin, nab\u0131z ve duyular\u0131m\u0131zdan hayallerimiz ve duygular\u0131m\u0131za kadar her \u015feyi d\u00fczenler; b\u00f6ylece \u00e7ok me\u015fgul tutulur.\nDr. Chudler, \u201cBeynimizin farkl\u0131 k\u0131s\u0131mlar\u0131n\u0131, farkl\u0131 \u015feyler yapt\u0131\u011f\u0131m\u0131zda farkl\u0131 \u015fekillerde kullan\u0131yoruz, ancak beynin kullan\u0131lmayan hi\u00e7bir k\u0131sm\u0131 bulunmamaktad\u0131r\u201d diyor.\nBeyin ara\u015ft\u0131rmalar\u0131 konusunda uzmanlar\u0131n hi\u00e7biri beynimizin sadece %10\u2019unu kulland\u0131\u011f\u0131m\u0131z fikrini desteklemiyor.\nProfes\u00f6r Bush, beynimizin %90\u2019\u0131n\u0131n uykuda oldu\u011fu fikrinin \u201csa\u00e7mal\u0131k\u201d oldu\u011funu s\u00f6yl\u00fcyor.\nProfes\u00f6r Stough %10 iddias\u0131n\u0131n ger\u00e7ek olmad\u0131\u011f\u0131n\u0131 kabul ediyor. Ama ayn\u0131 zamanda beynin i\u00e7inde \u201cbiraz fazlal\u0131klar\u201d oldu\u011funu da s\u00f6yl\u00fcyor.\n\u201cBeynin nas\u0131l \u00e7al\u0131\u015ft\u0131\u011f\u0131n\u0131 ve nas\u0131l \u00f6\u011frendi\u011fimizi, ayn\u0131 zamanda beynin plastikli\u011fini; ne kadar b\u00fcy\u00fcleyici oldu\u011funu hala inceleyerek g\u00f6r\u00fcyoruz\u201d diyor.\nKonuyla ilgili kapsaml\u0131 bir \u015fekilde yazan Dr. Chudler, iddian\u0131n bir \u015fehir efsanesi oldu\u011funu s\u00f6yl\u00fcyor.\n  Snopes do\u011frulama sitesinde de bu iddian\u0131n \u015fehir efsanesi oldu\u011funa dair ilgili b\u00f6l\u00fcmleri g\u00f6rmek m\u00fcmk\u00fcn:\nPET taramalar\u0131 ve fMRI (fonksiyonel manyetik rezonans g\u00f6r\u00fcnt\u00fcleme) gibi g\u00f6r\u00fcnt\u00fcleme teknikleri, beynin b\u00fcy\u00fck \u00e7o\u011funlu\u011funun dinlenmeye ge\u00e7ti\u011fini a\u00e7\u0131k\u00e7a g\u00f6stermektedir. Ger\u00e7ekten de, baz\u0131 k\u00fc\u00e7\u00fck i\u015flevler bir seferde beynin sadece k\u00fc\u00e7\u00fck bir b\u00f6l\u00fcm\u00fcn\u00fc kullanabilse de, yeterince karma\u015f\u0131k bir dizi faaliyet veya d\u00fc\u015f\u00fcnce bi\u00e7imi asl\u0131nda beynin bir\u00e7ok b\u00f6l\u00fcm\u00fcn\u00fc kullanacakt\u0131r. \u0130nsanlar ayn\u0131 anda t\u00fcm kas gruplar\u0131n\u0131 kullanmad\u0131klar\u0131 gibi, ayn\u0131 zamanda t\u00fcm beyinlerini de kullanmazlar. Yemek yemek, televizyon izlemek veya okumak gibi herhangi bir etkinlik i\u00e7in beyninizin baz\u0131 b\u00f6l\u00fcmlerini kullanabilirsiniz. Bununla birlikte, b\u00fct\u00fcn bir g\u00fcn boyunca, beynin hemen hemen tamam\u0131 bir anda veya ba\u015fka bir zamanda kullan\u0131l\u0131r.\n\u201cEfsane, beyindeki fonksiyonlar\u0131n a\u015f\u0131r\u0131 lokalizasyonunu varsayar. Beynin \u2018kullan\u0131lm\u0131\u015f\u2019 veya \u2018gerekli\u2019 k\u0131s\u0131mlar\u0131 t\u00fcm organ\u0131n etraf\u0131na da\u011f\u0131lm\u0131\u015fsa, bu asl\u0131nda beynin \u00e7o\u011funun gerekli oldu\u011fu anlam\u0131na gelir. Ancak efsane, beynin \u2018kullan\u0131lm\u0131\u015f\u2019 b\u00f6l\u00fcm\u00fcn\u00fcn ayr\u0131 bir alan oldu\u011funu ve \u2018kullan\u0131lmayan\u2019 b\u00f6l\u00fcm\u00fcn yer kaplayan ancak esasen gereksiz olan bir ek veya bademcik gibi oldu\u011funu ima eder. Fakat beynin b\u00fct\u00fcn bu k\u0131s\u0131mlar\u0131 kullan\u0131lmazsa, beynin \u2018kullan\u0131lmam\u0131\u015f\u2019 k\u0131sm\u0131n\u0131n \u00e7\u0131kar\u0131lmas\u0131 veya hasar g\u00f6rmesi k\u00fc\u00e7\u00fck veya fark edilmemi\u015f olmal\u0131d\u0131r. Ancak kafa travmas\u0131, inme veya ba\u015fka bir beyin hasar\u0131 ge\u00e7irmi\u015f insanlar s\u0131kl\u0131kla ciddi \u015fekilde bozulmaktad\u0131r. Hi\u00e7 bir doktorun \u2018Ama neyse ki, o kur\u015fun kafatas\u0131na girdi\u011finde, sadece beynin kullanmayan % 90\u2019\u0131na zarar verdi.\u2019 Tabi ki b\u00f6yle bir \u015fey m\u00fcmk\u00fcn de\u011fil\u2026\n  Kaynaklar: kaynak1, kaynak2, kaynak3, kaynak4, kaynak5, kaynak6, kaynak7, kaynak8, kaynak9\nVideo oynat\u0131c\u0131\nhttps://dogrula.org/wp-content/uploads/2018/02/dogrula.org_.mp4\n00:00\n00:07\n[Toplam:2    Ortalama:5/5] Beynimizin Sadece %10\u2019unu Kullan\u0131yoruz \u0130ddias\u0131", "  Bir Instagram hesab\u0131nda payla\u015f\u0131lan bu g\u00f6rsel, yakla\u015f\u0131k 10 bin be\u011feni ve y\u00fczlerce yorum ald\u0131.\nAmazon\u2019un kurucusu ve Forbes\u2019e g\u00f6re d\u00fcnyan\u0131n en zengin ki\u015fisi olan Jeff Bezos\u2019un tercih etti\u011fi otomobilin Honda Accord oldu\u011fu iddias\u0131 do\u011frudur.\nAmazon\u2019un kurucusu Jeff Bezos milyarder olduktan sonra uzun bir s\u00fcre Honda Accord kullanmaya devam etmi\u015ftir, fakat Brad Stone\u2019nin \u201cThe Everything Store\u201d adl\u0131 kitab\u0131na g\u00f6re, 2013 itibar\u0131yla arac\u0131n\u0131 kullanmay\u0131 b\u0131rakm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r.\n  Amazon.com, Inc., k\u0131saca Amazon, Amerika Birle\u015fik Devletleri merkezli bir e-ticaret ve bulut bili\u015fim \u015firketidir. Jeff Bezos taraf\u0131ndan 5 Temmuz 1994\u2018te Amerika Birle\u015fik Devletleri\u2019nin Seattle \u015fehrinde kurulmu\u015ftur. Gerek toplam sat\u0131\u015f hacmi, gerekse piyasa de\u011feri a\u00e7\u0131s\u0131ndan d\u00fcnyan\u0131n en b\u00fcy\u00fck al\u0131\u015fveri\u015f sitesidir.\n1997\u2018de Amazon halka a\u00e7\u0131lm\u0131\u015f ve Bezos\u2019un zenginli\u011fi 12 milyar dolar\u0131n \u00fczerine \u00e7\u0131km\u0131\u015ft\u0131r.\nBu h\u0131zl\u0131 y\u00fckseli\u015fe ra\u011fmen Bezos, 1987 Chevy Blazer otomobilini m\u00fctevaz\u0131 bir \u015fekilde Honda Accord\u2019a y\u00fckseltti.\n1999 y\u0131l\u0131na ait bu videoda, Jeff Bezos\u2019u servet elde etmi\u015f olmas\u0131na ra\u011fmen, Honda Accord otomobilinin \u015fof\u00f6r koltu\u011funda g\u00f6rmek m\u00fcmk\u00fcn:\n  1999 y\u0131l\u0131nda \u201c60 Minutes\u201d adl\u0131 programa verdi\u011fi r\u00f6portajda Bezos\u2019un yan\u0131nda oturan sunucu Bob Simon, kendisinin milyon dolarlar kazanmas\u0131na ra\u011fmen neden bu arabay\u0131 kulland\u0131\u011f\u0131n\u0131 sordu\u011funda, Jeff Bezos g\u00fclerek, bunun harika bir araba oldu\u011funu ( \u201cthis is a perfectly good car.\u201d) s\u00f6ylemi\u015ftir:\n    Videoda ayr\u0131ca, Bezos\u2019un m\u00fctevaz\u0131 ofisi de g\u00f6r\u00fcl\u00fcyor:\n  Jeff Bezos GeekWire\u2019ye verdi\u011fi r\u00f6portajda Amazon\u2019un ilk g\u00fcnleri soruldu\u011funda, \u201c1987\u2019de paketleri postaneye Chevy Blazer\u2019imle kendim g\u00f6t\u00fcr\u00fcr ve bir g\u00fcn bir forkliftimiz olaca\u011f\u0131n\u0131 hayal ederdim\u201d diyor.\n  Brad Stone\u2019nin \u201cThe Everything Store\u201d adl\u0131 kitab\u0131na g\u00f6re, 2013 itibar\u0131yla Bezos hala Honda otomobil kullan\u0131yordu.\n  Biyografi tarz\u0131ndaki bu kitapta yazar Brad Stone, kitaplar\u0131n Bezos\u2019un liderlik ve d\u00fc\u015f\u00fcnce tarz\u0131n\u0131 nas\u0131l \u015fekillendirdi\u011fini anlat\u0131yor. Ayr\u0131ca kitaba g\u00f6re, Amazon \u00e7al\u0131\u015fanlar\u0131n\u0131n \u201cJeff\u2019in Okuma Listesi\u201d olarak adland\u0131rd\u0131\u011f\u0131 bir listeleri de bulunuyor.\n  Amazon\u2019un kurucusu ve Forbes\u2019e g\u00f6re d\u00fcnyan\u0131n en zengin ki\u015fisi olan Jeff Bezos\u2019un tercih etti\u011fi otomobilin Honda Accord oldu\u011fu iddias\u0131 do\u011frudur.\nJeff Bezos milyarder olduktan sonra uzun bir s\u00fcre Honda kullanmaya devam etmi\u015ftir, fakat Brad Stone\u2019nin \u201cThe Everything Store\u201d adl\u0131 kitab\u0131na oynat\u0131c\u0131\nhttps://dogrula.org/wp-content/uploads/2018/02/dogrula.org_.mp4\n00:00\n00:07\n[Toplam:0    Ortalama:0/5] Amazon\u2019un Kurucusu Jeff Bezos\u2019un Tercih Etti\u011fi Otomobil Honda Accord\u00a0\u0130ddias\u0131", "  \u0130hbar olarak dogrula.org\u2019a gelen bu payla\u015f\u0131mda, 1999 y\u0131l\u0131nda H\u00fcrriyet Gazetesinde, \u201cT\u00fcrbanl\u0131 memur uyar\u0131s\u0131z at\u0131lacak\u201d ba\u015fl\u0131kl\u0131 bir habere yer verildi\u011fi iddia edildi.\nS\u00f6z konusu haberin H\u00fcrriyet Gazetesinde yer ald\u0131\u011f\u0131 ve ba\u015f\u00f6rt\u00fcs\u00fcyle i\u015fe giden memurlar\u0131n Dan\u0131\u015ftay karar\u0131yla, uyar\u0131lmas\u0131na bile gerek kalmadan kamu g\u00f6revinden \u00e7\u0131kar\u0131lmas\u0131n\u0131n uygun bulundu\u011fu iddias\u0131 do\u011frudur.\nH\u00fcrriyet Gazetesi, 27 May\u0131s 1999\n  1999 y\u0131l\u0131nda al\u0131nan karar\u0131n detaylar\u0131na ili\u015fkin haber H\u00fcrriyet Gazetesinde \u015fu \u015fekilde yer alm\u0131\u015f:\n    Dan\u0131\u015ftay \u0130dari Dava Daireleri Genel Kurulu, kamuda uymas\u0131 gereken kurallar\u0131 bilmesine kar\u015f\u0131n, ba\u015f\u0131 a\u00e7\u0131k g\u00f6rev yapmay\u0131 kabul etmeyen memurun, \u2018uyar\u0131 cezas\u0131 verilmesine bile gerek olmaks\u0131z\u0131n\u2019kamu g\u00f6revinden \u00e7\u0131kar\u0131lmas\u0131n\u0131 uygun buldu. Genel Kurul, memurun ba\u015f\u00f6rt\u00fcs\u00fcyle i\u015fe gelmekte \u0131srar etmesini, \u2018ideolojik ve siyasi ama\u00e7larla kurumun huzurunu bozmak\u2019olarak de\u011ferlendirmi\u015f.\n  1999 y\u0131l\u0131nda Dan\u0131\u015ftay taraf\u0131ndan verilen s\u00f6z konusu karara dair yap\u0131lan haberleri pek \u00e7ok gazetede g\u00f6rmek m\u00fcmk\u00fcn.\nDan\u0131\u015ftay Ba\u015fkan\u0131 Ne Demi\u015fti?\nY\u00fcksek\u00f6\u011fretim Kurulu Y\u00fcksek Disiplin Kurulu, Cerrahpa\u015fa T\u0131p Fak\u00fcltesi\u2019nde hizmetli kadrosunda santral memuresi olarak \u00e7al\u0131\u015fan Z\u00fcheyla Zeybel\u2019i kamu g\u00f6revinden \u00e7\u0131karm\u0131\u015ft\u0131.\nD\u00f6nemin Dan\u0131\u015ftay Ba\u015fkan\u0131 Erol \u00c7\u0131rakman, t\u00fcrbanda \u0131srar edenin i\u015fine son verilebilece\u011fini, \u00fcniversitede ise \u00f6\u011frencinin kayd\u0131n\u0131n silinece\u011finia\u00e7\u0131klam\u0131\u015ft\u0131.\nBa\u015fkan\u0131n s\u00f6zleri, gazete ar\u015fivlerinde \u015fu \u015fekilde yer al\u0131yor:\n  G\u00f6r\u00fcld\u00fc\u011f\u00fc \u00fczere, Dan\u0131\u015ftay karar\u0131yla ba\u015f\u00f6rt\u00fcs\u00fcyle i\u015fe giden memurlar\u0131n, uyar\u0131lmas\u0131na bile gerek kalmadan kamu g\u00f6revinden \u00e7\u0131kar\u0131lmas\u0131n\u0131n uygun bulundu\u011fu iddias\u0131 do\u011frudur. S\u00f6z konusu karara ili\u015fkin haber 27 May\u0131s 1999\u2019da H\u00fcrriyet Gazetesinde de yer alm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r.\nKaynaklar: kaynak1, kaynak2, kaynak3, kaynak4, kaynak5, kaynak6\nVideo oynat\u0131c\u0131\nhttps://dogrula.org/wp-content/uploads/2018/02/dogrula.org_.mp4\n00:00\n00:07\n[Toplam:0    Ortalama:0/5] 1999\u2019da H\u00fcrriyet Gazetesinde Yer Alan, T\u00fcrbanl\u0131 Memurlar\u0131n Uyar\u0131s\u0131z At\u0131laca\u011f\u0131na Dair Dan\u0131\u015ftay Karar\u0131 \u0130ddias\u0131", "  A\u015f\u0131 olman\u0131n otizme yol a\u00e7t\u0131\u011f\u0131 konusundaki iddialar, \u0130nternet ve sosyal medya ortamlar\u0131nda s\u0131k\u00e7a tart\u0131\u015f\u0131lan bir konudur.\nA\u015f\u0131 olman\u0131n otizme yol a\u00e7t\u0131\u011f\u0131 iddias\u0131 do\u011fru de\u011fildir. A\u015f\u0131lar\u0131n otizme sebep oldu\u011fu iddias\u0131n\u0131 kan\u0131tlayan bir bilimsel yay\u0131n bulunmamaktad\u0131r.\nS\u00f6ylentiler Nas\u0131l Ba\u015flad\u0131?\nD\u00fcnyada a\u015f\u0131lar\u0131n otizme neden oldu\u011fu efsanesi yay\u0131ld\u0131\u011f\u0131nda, a\u015f\u0131lanma oranlar\u0131 d\u00fc\u015ft\u00fc ve \u00f6nlenebilir hastal\u0131klar\u0131n enfeksiyon oranlar\u0131 y\u00fckseldi. A\u015f\u0131lar ve otizm aras\u0131ndaki \u015fehir efsanesinin arkas\u0131ndaki ger\u00e7e\u011fi ebeveynlere ve \u015f\u00fcpheci insanlara anlatmak i\u00e7in bir infografik tasarland\u0131.\n  \u0130nsanlara k\u0131zam\u0131k, kabakulak ve k\u0131zam\u0131k\u00e7\u0131k gibi \u00e7ocukluk a\u015f\u0131lar\u0131n\u0131n otizme neden oldu\u011funu ilk olarak 1998 y\u0131l\u0131nda Lancet\u2019te a\u015f\u0131lar ile otizmin ba\u015flang\u0131c\u0131 aras\u0131nda bir ba\u011flant\u0131 bulduklar\u0131n\u0131 iddia eden bir \u00e7al\u0131\u015fma yay\u0131nlayan \u0130ngiliz bir cerrah ve t\u0131p ara\u015ft\u0131rmac\u0131s\u0131 Dr. Andrew Wakefield d\u00fc\u015f\u00fcnd\u00fcrd\u00fc.\nOtizm, sosyal, bili\u015fsel ve ileti\u015fim bozukluklar\u0131na neden olan bir beyin geli\u015fimi bozuklu\u011fudur. \u00c7ok hafif ile \u00e7ok \u015fiddetli aras\u0131nda de\u011fi\u015febilir ve herhangi bir \u00e7ocu\u011fun ba\u015f\u0131na gelebilece\u011fi gibi, etnik k\u00f6ken veya sosyoekonomik gruplar aras\u0131nda da geli\u015febilir. Ara\u015ft\u0131rmalar, \u00e7evresel bile\u015fenlere ek olarak otizmin genetik yatk\u0131nl\u0131\u011f\u0131na da i\u015faret etmektedir. Ulusal Otizm Derne\u011fi\u2019ne g\u00f6re, Otizm te\u015fhisinde son 20 y\u0131ldaki keskin art\u0131\u015f, yaln\u0131zca geneti\u011fe atfedilemez.\nThe Lancet makalesi yay\u0131mland\u0131\u011f\u0131nda, d\u00fcnya genelinde korku yayd\u0131. Ancak, 25.782.500 \u00e7ocu\u011fu kapsayan on y\u0131ll\u0131k bir ara\u015ft\u0131rmadan sonra, ara\u015ft\u0131rmac\u0131lar a\u015f\u0131larla otizm aras\u0131nda nedensel bir ili\u015fki olmad\u0131\u011f\u0131 sonucuna vard\u0131lar. Wakefield\u2019in makalesi, istatistiklere dayanmad\u0131\u011f\u0131, bir kontrol grubunun bulunmad\u0131\u011f\u0131, insanlar\u0131n a\u015f\u0131lama kay\u0131tlar\u0131n\u0131n net olmad\u0131\u011f\u0131 ve denek olarak sadece 12 \u00e7ocu\u011fu kapsayan k\u00fc\u00e7\u00fck bir grubun kullan\u0131m\u0131na dayand\u0131\u011f\u0131 i\u00e7in 2010 y\u0131l\u0131nda geri \u00e7ekildi.\nAra\u015ft\u0131rmac\u0131lar 1999\u2019da 500 \u00e7ocu\u011fu kullanarak bir \u00e7al\u0131\u015fma daha yapt\u0131lar. Otizm ile a\u015f\u0131lar aras\u0131nda ba\u011flant\u0131 bulunamad\u0131. Bilim adamlar\u0131 taraf\u0131ndan emin olmak i\u00e7in iki y\u0131l sonra 10.000 \u00e7ocuk kullanarak ba\u015fka bir \u00e7al\u0131\u015fma yay\u0131mland\u0131. Danimarka\u2019da 537.000 \u00e7ocu\u011fun kullan\u0131ld\u0131\u011f\u0131 \u00e7al\u0131\u015fmalar de\u011ferlendirildi ve daha sonra Finlandiya\u2019da 535.000 \u00e7ocuk \u00fczerinde daha \u00e7al\u0131\u015f\u0131ld\u0131. Wakefield\u2019in bulgular\u0131n\u0131 desteklemek \u015f\u00f6yle dursun, ara\u015ft\u0131rmalar\u0131na dair hi\u00e7bir yerde bir ba\u011flant\u0131 bulunamad\u0131.\n2012 y\u0131l\u0131nda 14.700.000 milyon \u00e7ocu\u011fu kullanarak bir meta-analiz daha yap\u0131ld\u0131. \u0130ncelenen 58 ara\u015ft\u0131rmac\u0131n\u0131n hi\u00e7birinde otizmle ba\u011flant\u0131 bulunamad\u0131, ancak Wakefield taraf\u0131ndan yay\u0131lan sahte bilgi y\u00fcz\u00fcnden milyonlarca \u00e7ocuk a\u015f\u0131lanmam\u0131\u015f oldu.\nBug\u00fcn her d\u00f6rt ebeveynden biri, a\u015f\u0131lar\u0131n sa\u011fl\u0131kl\u0131 \u00e7ocuklarda otizme neden oldu\u011funa inanmaktad\u0131r; bu y\u00fczden a\u015f\u0131larda s\u00fcrekli bir d\u00fc\u015f\u00fc\u015f ya\u015fanm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r. Hastal\u0131k Kontrol ve \u00d6nleme Merkezlerine g\u00f6re, son 20 y\u0131lda bebekler ve k\u00fc\u00e7\u00fck \u00e7ocuklara gerekli a\u015f\u0131lar yap\u0131lm\u0131\u015f olsayd\u0131, ya\u015famlar\u0131 boyunca yakalanacaklar\u0131 322 milyon hastal\u0131k, 21 milyon hastanede yat\u0131\u015f ve 732.000 \u00f6l\u00fcm \u00f6nlenecekti.\n  G\u00f6r\u00fcld\u00fc\u011f\u00fc \u00fczere, iddia do\u011fru de\u011fildir.\n1998 y\u0131l\u0131nda yay\u0131mlanarak bu \u015fehir efsanesine sebep olan Wakefield\u2019in makalesi, istatistiklere dayanmad\u0131\u011f\u0131, bir kontrol grubunun bulunmad\u0131\u011f\u0131, insanlar\u0131n a\u015f\u0131lama kay\u0131tlar\u0131n\u0131n net olmad\u0131\u011f\u0131 ve denek olarak sadece 12 \u00e7ocu\u011fu kapsayan k\u00fc\u00e7\u00fck bir grubun kullan\u0131m\u0131na dayand\u0131\u011f\u0131 i\u00e7in 2010 y\u0131l\u0131nda geri \u00e7ekilmi\u015ftir.\nKaynaklar: kaynak1, kaynak2, kaynak3, kaynak4, kaynak5, kaynak6\nVideo oynat\u0131c\u0131\nhttps://dogrula.org/wp-content/uploads/2018/02/dogrula.org_.mp4\n00:00\n00:07\n[Toplam:0    Ortalama:0/5] A\u015f\u0131lar Otizme Yol A\u00e7\u0131yor \u0130ddias\u0131", "  D\u00fcnyan\u0131n en \u00e7ok kullan\u0131lan mesajla\u015fma uygulamas\u0131 WhatsApp\u2019\u0131n, kullan\u0131c\u0131lar\u0131n mesaj iletme hakk\u0131n\u0131 (forward) 20\u2019den 5\u2019e d\u00fc\u015f\u00fcren bir karar ald\u0131\u011f\u0131 iddias\u0131 do\u011frudur.\nWhatsApp\u2019\u0131n, mesajla\u015fma hizmetinin yanl\u0131\u015f bilgilendirme ve yalan haberlerin yay\u0131lmas\u0131yla m\u00fccadele etmek i\u00e7in d\u00fcnya \u00e7ap\u0131nda yayd\u0131\u011f\u0131 yeni kurallar \u00e7er\u00e7evesinde, kullan\u0131c\u0131lar\u0131n be\u015f ki\u015fiden fazla ki\u015fiye mesaj iletmesi engellenecek.\nWhatsApp puts limit on message forwarding to fight fake news https://t.co/bPkH18g5NK\n\u2014 Guardian Tech (@guardiantech) January 21, 2019\n  Reuters\u2019in haberine g\u00f6re, \u015firketin politika ve ileti\u015fimden sorumlu ba\u015fkan yard\u0131mc\u0131s\u0131 Victoria Grand, Endonezya\u2019n\u0131n ba\u015fkenti Cakarta\u2019daki bir etkinlikte \u201cBug\u00fcnden itibaren d\u00fcnyan\u0131n d\u00f6rt bir yan\u0131nda be\u015f mesaj limiti uyguluyoruz\u201d dedi.\nWhatsApp yetkilisi, s\u0131n\u0131rlar\u0131n \u201cWhatsApp\u2019\u0131 tasarland\u0131\u011f\u0131 \u015fekilde, \u2018\u00f6zel bir mesajla\u015fma uygulamas\u0131\u2019 tutmas\u0131na yard\u0131mc\u0131 olaca\u011f\u0131n\u0131\u201d s\u00f6yledi.\nWhatsApp\u2019\u0131n ileti\u015fim sorumlusu Carl Woog da Guardian\u2019a, \u201cBe\u015fe d\u00fc\u015f\u00fcrd\u00fck, \u00e7\u00fcnk\u00fc bunun k\u00f6t\u00fcye kullan\u0131m\u0131 \u00f6nlemeye yard\u0131mc\u0131 olurken yak\u0131n arkada\u015flara ula\u015fmak i\u00e7in makul bir rakam oldu\u011funa inan\u0131yoruz.\u201d a\u00e7\u0131klamas\u0131nda bulunmu\u015ftur.\n  WhatsApp Bu Karar\u0131 Neden Ald\u0131?\nWhatsApp, 6 ay \u00f6nce yalan haberlerin yay\u0131lmas\u0131n\u0131 engellemek i\u00e7in Hindistan\u2019da mesajlar\u0131n ka\u00e7 kez iletilece\u011finin s\u0131n\u0131rlanaca\u011f\u0131n\u0131 s\u00f6ylemi\u015fti.\nBu karar, Hindistan\u2019da ya\u015fanan mafya lin\u00e7lerinin bir k\u0131sm\u0131n\u0131n WhatsApp gruplar\u0131nda dola\u015fan mesajlarla ger\u00e7ekle\u015fmesinden sonra al\u0131nd\u0131.\nHindistan h\u00fck\u00fcmeti, WhatsApp\u2019\u0131n duruma seyirci kalmas\u0131 halinde \u015firketin yasal sonu\u00e7larla kar\u015f\u0131la\u015fabilece\u011fi y\u00f6n\u00fcnde bir uyar\u0131 yapt\u0131. Web sitesinde yay\u0131nlanan bir blogda \u015firket, \u201cWhatsApp kullanan herkes i\u00e7in ge\u00e7erli olan mesaj iletimini s\u0131n\u0131rland\u0131rma ama\u00e7l\u0131 bir test ba\u015flatt\u0131\u011f\u0131n\u0131\u201d duyurdu.\nAncak Hintli kullan\u0131c\u0131lar i\u00e7in, mesaj iletme se\u00e7ene\u011fi daha da s\u0131n\u0131rl\u0131 olacak \u015fekilde belirlendi. Bir WhatsApp s\u00f6zc\u00fcs\u00fc BBC\u2019ye, bir ki\u015finin bir mesaj\u0131 yaln\u0131zca be\u015f kez iletebilece\u011fini s\u00f6yledi.\nWhatsApp, bu \u00f6nlemin iletilen mesajlar\u0131n s\u0131kl\u0131\u011f\u0131n\u0131 azaltaca\u011f\u0131n\u0131 umdu\u011funu eklemi\u015fti.\n200 milyondan fazla kullan\u0131c\u0131s\u0131 olan Hindistan, WhatsApp\u2019\u0131n en b\u00fcy\u00fck pazar\u0131.\nYakla\u015f\u0131k 1,5 milyar kullan\u0131c\u0131s\u0131 olan WhatsApp, platformun sahte haberleri, manip\u00fcle edilmi\u015f foto\u011fraflar\u0131, kayna\u011f\u0131 ve ge\u00e7erli\u011fi olmayan videolar\u0131 ve ses aldatmacalar\u0131n\u0131 yaymak i\u00e7in kullan\u0131ld\u0131\u011f\u0131na dair k\u00fcresel kayg\u0131n\u0131n ard\u0131ndan, uygulaman\u0131n k\u00f6t\u00fcye kullan\u0131m\u0131n\u0131 durdurman\u0131n yollar\u0131n\u0131 ar\u0131yor.\n  Yani WhatsApp yetkililerinin ald\u0131\u011f\u0131 karara g\u00f6re, art\u0131k bir mesaj\u0131 5\u2019ten fazla ki\u015fiye iletmek m\u00fcmk\u00fcn olmayacak.\nKaynaklar: kaynak1, kaynak2, kaynak3, kaynak4, kaynak5\nVideo oynat\u0131c\u0131\nhttps://dogrula.org/wp-content/uploads/2018/02/dogrula.org_.mp4\n00:00\n00:07\n[Toplam:1    Ortalama:5/5] WhatsApp\u2019ta Mesaj \u0130letme Hakk\u0131n\u0131n 20\u2019den 5\u2019e D\u00fc\u015f\u00fcr\u00fcld\u00fc\u011f\u00fc \u0130ddias\u0131", "\u0130nternet ve sosyal medya ortamlar\u0131nda payla\u015f\u0131larak haberlere konu olan, kafas\u0131n\u0131n arkas\u0131nda da y\u00fcz\u00fc bulunan Edward Mordrake vakas\u0131, d\u00fcnyan\u0131n en ilgin\u00e7 tarihi konular\u0131ndan biridir.\nT\u00fcrkiye\u2019de de pek \u00e7ok haber sitesine ve Ek\u015fi S\u00f6zl\u00fck ortam\u0131na konu olmu\u015ftur.\n19. yy\u2019da \u0130ngiltere\u2019de ya\u015fam\u0131\u015f olan Edward Mordrake\u2019nin (Mordake de deniliyor), t\u0131pta nadir g\u00f6r\u00fclen bir \u015fekilde ba\u015f\u0131n\u0131n arkas\u0131nda fazladan bir y\u00fczle do\u011fdu\u011fu iddia edilir.\nFakat s\u00f6z konusu iddia do\u011fru de\u011fildir. Kaynaklar detayl\u0131 ve bilimsel a\u00e7\u0131dan incelendi\u011finde, vakan\u0131n bir \u015fehir efsanesi oldu\u011funu g\u00f6rmek m\u00fcmk\u00fcn.\n\u0130nternet ortamlar\u0131nda varl\u0131\u011f\u0131n\u0131n kan\u0131t\u0131 olarak kullan\u0131lan foto\u011fraf da Edward Mordrake\u2019nin efsanesinden esinlenen sanat\u00e7\u0131 Ewart Schindler\u2019in yapt\u0131\u011f\u0131 bir heykeldir.\nEWART SCHINDLER taraf\u0131ndan, \u015fehir efsanesi Edward Mordrake\u2019ye ithafen yap\u0131lm\u0131\u015f bir sanat eseri\nEdward Mordrake Efsanesinin Hikayesi\nSon y\u0131llar\u0131n en ilgin\u00e7 tarihi olaylar\u0131ndan biri, on dokuzuncu y\u00fczy\u0131lda ya\u015fam\u0131\u015f bir \u0130ngiliz beyefendisi olan Edward Mordrake\u2019nin , (ya da daha eski kaynaklara g\u00f6re \u201cEdward Mordake\u201d) onu intihara s\u00fcr\u00fckleyecek bir medikal durumla do\u011fdu\u011fu iddias\u0131d\u0131r.\n  Efsaneye g\u00f6re, Mordrake\u2019nin ba\u015f\u0131n\u0131n arkas\u0131nda yemek yemeyen ve konu\u015fmayan ancak g\u00fcl\u00fcp a\u011flayabilen bir y\u00fcz\u00fcn daha oldu\u011fu; doktorlara bu \u2018\u015feytan y\u00fcz\u00fc\u2019 ondan almalar\u0131n\u0131, \u00e7\u00fcnk\u00fc gece kendisine korkun\u00e7 \u015feyler f\u0131s\u0131ldad\u0131\u011f\u0131n\u0131 s\u00f6yledi\u011fi iddia edilir. Buna ra\u011fmen doktorlar\u0131n hi\u00e7bir giri\u015fimde bulunmad\u0131\u011f\u0131 ve Mordake\u2019nin 23 ya\u015f\u0131nda intihar etti\u011fi s\u00f6ylenir.\n2000\u2019li y\u0131llarda pop\u00fcler hale getirilen bu vaka, 1896 y\u0131l\u0131nda bas\u0131lan Anomalies and Curiosities of Medicine adl\u0131 kitapta anlat\u0131l\u0131r.\nEdward Mordake\u2019nin me\u015fhur hikayesi, kaynaklardan al\u0131nm\u0131\u015f olmas\u0131na ra\u011fmen, burada belirtilen \u00fcn ve ilgiden kaynaklanmaktad\u0131r. \u0130lgili b\u00f6l\u00fcm \u00f6zetle \u015f\u00f6yle:\n\u201cTuhaf insani \u015fekil bozuklu\u011fu hikayelerinin en garip ve melankolik olanlar\u0131ndan birinin de Edward Mordake vakas\u0131 oldu\u011fu s\u00f6ylenir. Soylu olmas\u0131na ra\u011fmen hi\u00e7bir zaman \u00fcnvan\u0131n\u0131 talep etmemi\u015f ve 23 ya\u015f\u0131nda intihar etmi\u015ftir. Tamamen g\u00f6zlerden uzak ya\u015fam\u0131\u015f, kendi aile \u00fcyelerini bile ziyaret etmeyi reddetmi\u015ftir. \u0130yi meziyetleri ve derin bir bilgi sahibi olan ender yetenekli bir m\u00fczisyendi. Ba\u015f\u0131n\u0131n arkas\u0131nda bir kad\u0131n y\u00fcz\u00fc vard\u0131, sadece kafatas\u0131n\u0131n arka k\u0131sm\u0131n\u0131 kapl\u0131yordu. Mordake h\u0131\u00e7k\u0131rarak a\u011flarken, arkadaki y\u00fcz alayla g\u00fcl\u00fcms\u00fcyordu. Sesi hi\u00e7 duyulmuyordu; fakat Mordake\u2019nin dedi\u011fine g\u00f6re hi\u00e7 uyumuyor, ama onunla sadece cehennemde konu\u015fulan \u015feyleri konu\u015fuyordu. Hi\u00e7bir hayal g\u00fcc\u00fc bu korkun\u00e7 olay\u0131 tasvir edemezdi. Atalar\u0131n\u0131n affedilmemi\u015f k\u00f6t\u00fcl\u00fcklerinden dolay\u0131 bu \u015feytanla ya\u015fad\u0131\u011f\u0131n\u0131 d\u00fc\u015f\u00fcn\u00fcyordu. Sonucunda \u00f6l\u00fcm olsa bile bu anlams\u0131zl\u0131ktan kurtulmak istiyordu. Bu y\u00fczden doktorlar\u0131 Manvers and Treadwell\u2019e yalvar\u0131yordu. Dikkatli izlenmesine ra\u011fmen, zehir almay\u0131 ba\u015fard\u0131. \u00d6ld\u00fc\u011f\u00fc yerde \u201ciblis y\u00fcz\u00fcn\u00fcn\u201d g\u00f6m\u00fclmeden \u00f6nce imha edilmesini talep eden bir mektup b\u0131rakt\u0131. Kendi iste\u011fi \u00fczerine, mezar ta\u015f\u0131 veya mezar\u0131n\u0131 g\u00f6steren bir i\u015faret olmadan, \u0131ss\u0131z bir yere g\u00f6m\u00fcld\u00fc.\u201d\n  Hikaye inand\u0131r\u0131c\u0131 gelse de, asl\u0131nda \u015f\u00fcphelidir.\n\u0130lk olarak, Joseph Carey Merrick, nam-\u0131 di\u011fer \u2018Fil Adam\u2019 (Elephant Man)gibi ger\u00e7ek t\u0131bbi vakalar\u0131n anlat\u0131l\u0131\u015f bi\u00e7iminin aksine kitaptaki Mordake hikayesinin ilgili b\u00f6l\u00fcmlerinde yazar s\u00fcrekli \u2018iddialara g\u00f6re, anlat\u0131lanlara g\u00f6re\u2019 ifadelerini kullanm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r.\nAyr\u0131ca hikayede, \u2018geceleri \u015feytan ikizinin nefret dolu f\u0131s\u0131lt\u0131lar\u0131na maruz kalmas\u0131\u2019 gibi hi\u00e7bir bilimsel s\u00f6zelli\u011fi olmayan a\u011f\u0131r melankoliye yer verilmi\u015ftir.\nBununla birlikte, Victoria D\u00f6nemi tarihi kaynaklar\u0131 incelendi\u011finde, Mordake\u2019nin kendisini kurtarmalar\u0131n\u0131 istedi\u011fi iddia edilen doktorlar\u0131n ad\u0131na rastlanmam\u0131\u015ft\u0131r.\nMordrake ve onun \u201c\u015feytan ikizini\u201d g\u00f6sterdi\u011fi iddia edilen siyah-beyaz foto\u011fraf\u0131n k\u00f6keni (2007\u2019den beri internet ortamlar\u0131nda g\u00f6r\u00fclen) bilinmemektedir. \u201cVintage (klasik)\u201d g\u00f6r\u00fcn\u00fcm\u00fcne ra\u011fmen, g\u00f6r\u00fcnt\u00fc, orta-ge\u00e7 Victoria d\u00f6neminin (\u00f6rne\u011fin, \u0130ngiliz T\u0131p Dergisi\u2019nde yay\u0131nlanan Joseph Merrick\u2019in 1889 foto\u011fraf\u0131) tipik foto\u011fraf bask\u0131s\u0131nda g\u00f6r\u00fcld\u00fc\u011f\u00fcnden daha fazla \u00e7\u00f6z\u00fcn\u00fcrl\u00fck ve netlik sergilemektedir. Asl\u0131nda, Almanya\u2019n\u0131n Hamburg kentindeki Panoptikum Balmumu M\u00fczesi\u2019ndeki balmumu fig\u00fcr\u00fcn\u00fcn r\u00f6tu\u015flanm\u0131\u015f bir foto\u011fraf\u0131 gibi g\u00f6r\u00fcnmektedir:\nNormal \u015fartlarda yap\u0131\u015f\u0131k ikizler genetik olarak \u00f6zde\u015ftir, bu y\u00fczden her zaman ayn\u0131 cinsiyettendirler. Ancak Mordrake\u2018nin \u2018\u015feytan ikizinin\u2019 bir kad\u0131n y\u00fcz\u00fc oldu\u011fundan bahsedilmi\u015ftir. Bu da vakan\u0131n bilimsel olarak yalanlanmas\u0131n\u0131 sa\u011flamaktad\u0131r.\nAnomalies and Curiosities of Medicine kitab\u0131n\u0131n yazarlar\u0131 Gould ve Pyle, 1896\u2019da aktard\u0131klar\u0131 me\u015fhur Edward Mordake hikayesinine dair tek kaynak bulunmas\u0131na ra\u011fmen, \u00e7o\u011ful ifadelerle pek \u00e7ok kaynaktan bahsetmi\u015flerdir.\nMordrake hikayesi, 1895 y\u0131l\u0131nda \u201cThe Sunday Post\u201d ta ba\u015flam\u0131\u015ft\u0131r; \u00f6yk\u00fc, bir bal\u0131k kad\u0131n ve yar\u0131m yenge\u00e7 hikayesiyle beraber gazetede yer alm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r.\n\u201cPictures in History\u201d sayfas\u0131n\u0131n 3 milyondan fazla takip\u00e7isi vard\u0131r ve Schindler\u2019in eserinin foto\u011fraf\u0131n\u0131n yay\u0131nland\u0131\u011f\u0131 tarihte 78.000\u2019den fazla payla\u015f\u0131m\u0131 vard\u0131r. Sayfada, baz\u0131 me\u015fru tarihi foto\u011fraflar ve baz\u0131lar\u0131 inand\u0131r\u0131c\u0131 olan aldatmacalar payla\u015f\u0131lmaktad\u0131r. Ancak, Mordrake\u2019in ger\u00e7ek ba\u015f\u0131n\u0131n bir g\u00f6r\u00fcnt\u00fcs\u00fcn\u00fc asla payla\u015f\u0131lmam\u0131\u015ft\u0131r \u00e7\u00fcnk\u00fc Mordrake diye biri yoktur.\nVakan\u0131n edebi bir kreasyon oldu\u011funu s\u00f6ylemek m\u00fcmk\u00fcn.\nKaynaklar: kaynak1, kaynak2, kaynak3, kaynak4, kaynak5, kaynak6\nVideo oynat\u0131c\u0131\nhttps://dogrula.org/wp-content/uploads/2018/02/dogrula.org_.mp4\n00:00\n00:07\n[Toplam:0    Ortalama:0/5] \u0130ki Y\u00fcz\u00fc Olan Edward Mordrake\u00a0\u0130ddias\u0131", "  \u201c\u00dcnl\u00fc logolar neyi ifade ediyor?\u201d ba\u015fl\u0131kl\u0131 ara\u015ft\u0131rma yaz\u0131m\u0131zda, markalar\u0131n en b\u00fcy\u00fck reklam\u0131 olan baz\u0131 logolar\u0131 inceledik.\nMarkalar\u0131n kulland\u0131\u011f\u0131 pek \u00e7ok logonun gizli anlam\u0131 vard\u0131r. Zekice tasarlanan birka\u00e7 logonun hikayesine g\u00f6z atal\u0131m:\n  Amazon\n  E-ticaret ve bulut bili\u015fim \u015firketi Amazon\u2019un logosundaki sar\u0131 ok, \u201ca\u201d harfinden ba\u015flar ve \u201cz\u201d harfinde biter; a\u2019dan z\u2019ye her \u015feyi satt\u0131klar\u0131 anlam\u0131na gelir. Sar\u0131 ok ayn\u0131 zamanda bir g\u00fcl\u00fcmsemeyi temsil eder, okun ucu bir gamze veya g\u00fcl\u00fcmseme \u00e7izgisidir. Frans\u0131zca \u2018kav\u015fak\u2019 manas\u0131na gelen, Carrefour logosunun hem sol hem de sa\u011f taraf\u0131nda iki ok bulunur. \u0130ki ok aras\u0131nda sakl\u0131 olan, marka ad\u0131n\u0131 belirten \u201cC\u201d harfidir.\nUnilever\n  Birle\u015fik Krall\u0131k ve Hollanda merkezli, d\u00fcnyan\u0131n en b\u00fcy\u00fck yiyecek ve h\u0131zl\u0131 t\u00fcketim \u00fcr\u00fcnleri \u00fcreten \u015firketlerinden biri olan Unilever\u2019in pek \u00e7ok \u00fcr\u00fcn\u00fc vard\u0131r ve baz\u0131 \u00e7ekirdek \u00fcr\u00fcnlerinin birle\u015fimiyle \u2018U\u2019 \u015fekli olu\u015fturulmu\u015ftur.\nToblerone\n  Pop\u00fcler \u00e7ikolata Toblerone\u2019nin logosundaki da\u011f, \u0130svi\u00e7re\u2019deki Matterhorn Da\u011f\u0131\u2019n\u0131 simgeler. Her Pepsi \u00fcr\u00fcn\u00fc farkl\u0131 bir g\u00fcl\u00fc\u015f \u015fekline sahiptir; \u00f6rne\u011fin, Light Pepsi g\u00fcl\u00fc\u015f\u00fc orijinal Pepsi g\u00fcl\u00fc\u015f\u00fcnden daha k\u00fc\u00e7\u00fckt\u00fcr.\nT\u00fcrk Hava Yollar\u0131\n  THY logosundaki beyazl\u0131k, yaban kaz\u0131ndan ilham al\u0131narak tasarlanm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r. Logoya 3 farkl\u0131 a\u00e7\u0131dan bak\u0131ld\u0131\u011f\u0131nda, t-h-y harflerini g\u00f6rmek m\u00fcmk\u00fcn.\nApple\n  Apple logosunda kullan\u0131lan \u0131s\u0131r\u0131lm\u0131\u015f elma fig\u00fcr\u00fcn\u00fcn, bug\u00fcnk\u00fc anlamda ilk bilgisayarlar\u0131n \u00fcretiminde g\u00f6rev alan ve zehire bat\u0131rd\u0131\u011f\u0131 elmay\u0131 \u0131s\u0131rarak intihar eden Alan Turing\u2019e ithafen kullan\u0131ld\u0131\u011f\u0131 da s\u00f6ylenmektedir.\nZiraat Bankas\u0131\nBir ba\u015fa\u011f\u0131 sembolize eden Ziraat Bankas\u0131 logosu, \u2018T-C-Z-B\u201d harflerinden olu\u015fmu\u015ftur; logo, T\u00fcrkiye Cumhuriyeti Ziraat Bankas\u0131\u2019n\u0131 temsil eder.\nWikipedia\n  \u00c7e\u015fitli dillerdeki karakterlerin yaz\u0131l\u0131 oldu\u011fu yapboz par\u00e7alar\u0131ndan olu\u015fan bitmemi\u015f d\u00fcnya, \u015firketin bilgi al\u0131\u015fveri\u015fi portal\u0131 olma misyonunun \u201ceksik do\u011fas\u0131n\u0131\u201d ve kullan\u0131c\u0131 sunumlar\u0131na dayanan bir sitenin asla tamamlanamayaca\u011f\u0131 ger\u00e7e\u011fini temsil etmektedir.\nRay-Ban\n  G\u00fcne\u015f g\u00f6zl\u00fckleriyle \u00fcnl\u00fc Ray-Ban logosundaki \u201cB\u201d harfi, g\u00f6zl\u00fc\u011f\u00fc temsil eder.\nAyr\u0131ca logodaki \u201cray-ban\u201d dilimize \u00e7evrildi\u011finde \u201c\u0131\u015f\u0131ktan korumak, \u0131\u015f\u0131\u011f\u0131 yasaklamak\u201d anlam\u0131na da gelir.\nVodafone\n\u015eirketinin ismi; voice (ses) kelimesinden gelen VO, data (veri) kelimesinden gelen DA ve phone kelimesinden esinlenilen FONE hecelerinin birle\u015fmesinden olu\u015fur. Payla\u015f\u0131m, yakla\u015f\u0131k 24 bin kez be\u011fenildi.\nRomanya\u2019da bir \u015fehirde toplu ta\u015f\u0131ma arac\u0131nda kitap okuyanlar\u0131n otob\u00fcste \u00fccretsiz seyahat etti\u011fi iddias\u0131 k\u0131smen do\u011frudur. \u00c7\u00fcnk\u00fc bir sefere mahsus olan bu uygulama yaln\u0131zca 3 g\u00fcn boyunca, kitap okumay\u0131 te\u015fvik amac\u0131yla ger\u00e7ekle\u015ftirilmi\u015ftir.\n  S\u00f6z konusu giri\u015fim, 2015 y\u0131l\u0131nda Romanya\u2019n\u0131n kuzey bat\u0131s\u0131ndaki Klo\u015fvar(Cluj-Napoca) \u015fehrinde ya\u015fayan bir kitapsever olan Victor Miron taraf\u0131ndan, 2015 y\u0131l\u0131n\u0131n Haziran ay\u0131nda 3 g\u00fcn s\u00fcrecek \u015fekilde \u00f6nerilmi\u015ftir.\nMiron, \u201cDaha fazla insan\u0131 toplu ta\u015f\u0131mada kitap okumaya te\u015fvik etmek\u201d istedi\u011fini s\u00f6ylemi\u015f; bu fikrini kentin belediye ba\u015fkan\u0131 Emil Boc\u2019a \u00f6nererek ard\u0131ndan Facebook\u2019ta takip\u00e7ileriyle payla\u015fm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r.\n  Giri\u015fimin bir y\u0131l sonra (2016) uygulamaya konulmas\u0131 kararla\u015ft\u0131r\u0131lm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r. Miron, sanat web sitesi Bored Panda\u2019da \u201cOkumayanlar\u0131 ele\u015ftirmek yerine okuyanlar\u0131 \u00f6d\u00fcllendirerek te\u015fvik etmenin daha iyi oldu\u011funa inan\u0131yorum\u201d demi\u015ftir.\n    Ger\u00e7ek bir kitap a\u015f\u0131\u011f\u0131 olan Miron, kitap okuma te\u015fvikleri yapan pek \u00e7ok giri\u015fim ger\u00e7ekle\u015ftirmektedir. Bu giri\u015fimleri Miron\u2019un Facebook ve YouTube sayfas\u0131nda g\u00f6rmek m\u00fcmk\u00fcn.\n  S\u00f6z konusu iddia k\u0131smen do\u011frudur; proje, Cluj-Napoca\u2019n\u0131n (Kalo\u015fvar) 2015 Avrupa Gen\u00e7lik Ba\u015fkenti \u00fcnvan\u0131n\u0131 kazanmas\u0131n\u0131 kutlamak amac\u0131yla d\u00fczenlenen bir dizi etkinli\u011fin par\u00e7as\u0131d\u0131r.\nKaynaklar: kaynak1, k\u0131z\u0131 Mariam Kavakc\u0131\u2019n\u0131n Cumhurba\u015fkan\u0131 dan\u0131\u015fman\u0131 olmas\u0131n\u0131n ard\u0131ndan, sosyal medya ve \u0130nternet ortamlar\u0131nda bu foto\u011fraf payla\u015f\u0131ld\u0131 ve foto\u011fraftaki ki\u015finin Mariam Kavakc\u0131 oldu\u011fu iddia edildi.\nFoto\u011fraf\u0131n Merve Kavakc\u0131\u2019n\u0131n k\u0131z\u0131 Mariam Kavakc\u0131\u2019y\u0131 g\u00f6sterdi\u011fi iddias\u0131 do\u011fru de\u011fil.\nFoto\u011fraftaki ki\u015fi, Mariam Kavak\u00e7\u0131\u2019n\u0131n teyzesi modac\u0131 Elif photos and videos from AtypicalGurl (@atypicalgurl)www.instagram.com\n  Foto\u011fraflar detayl\u0131 incelendi\u011finde, e\u015farp ba\u011flama \u015fekli, ten rengi ve parma\u011f\u0131ndaki y\u00fcz\u00fckle s\u00f6z konusu ki\u015finin bu hesaptaki kad\u0131n oldu\u011fu g\u00f6r\u00fcl\u00fcyor.\n  2 foto\u011fraf kar\u015f\u0131la\u015ft\u0131r\u0131ld\u0131\u011f\u0131nda, kad\u0131nlar\u0131n parma\u011f\u0131ndaki y\u00fcz\u00fckten, g\u00f6rseldekilerin ayn\u0131 ki\u015fi oldu\u011fu da g\u00f6r\u00fcl\u00fcyor.\n  Nazreen Hussein\u2019in yer ald\u0131\u011f\u0131 bir Instagram foto\u011fraf\u0131na Elif Kavakc\u0131\u2019n\u0131n yapt\u0131\u011f\u0131 yorumdaki linke gidildi\u011finde, bu ki\u015finin profiline ula\u015fmak m\u00fcmk\u00fcn.\n  Foto\u011fraftaki ki\u015fiyi, milletvekili Ravza Kavakc\u0131 da takip ediyor. Bu da foto\u011fraftaki ki\u015finin Mariam Kavakc\u0131 de\u011fil, teyzesi Elif Kavakc\u0131\u2019n\u0131n bir arkada\u015f\u0131 olan Nazreen Hussein oldu\u011funu do\u011frular nitelikte.\nKaynaklar: kaynak1, kaynak2, kaynak3, kaynak4, kaynak5, kaynak6\nVideo oynat\u0131c\u0131\nhttps://dogrula.org/wp-content/uploads/2018/02/dogrula.org_.mp4\n00:00\n00:07\n[Toplam:2    Ortalama:3/5] Foto\u011fraftaki Ki\u015finin Mariam Kavakc\u0131 Oldu\u011fu \u0130ddias\u0131", "  \u0130hbar olarak dogrula.org\u2019a gelen bir haberde, Sabanc\u0131 ailesi \u00fcyelerinin Malta vatanda\u015fl\u0131\u011f\u0131na ge\u00e7ti\u011fi iddia edildi.\nT\u00fcrkiye\u2019den \u00e7ok say\u0131da \u00fcnl\u00fc zenginle birlikte, Sabanc\u0131 ailesinden birka\u00e7 ki\u015finin de ge\u00e7en y\u0131l Malta vatanda\u015fl\u0131\u011f\u0131na ge\u00e7ti\u011fi iddias\u0131 do\u011frudur.\nVatanda\u015fl\u0131k almaya hak kazan ki\u015filer, Malta\u2019n\u0131n Resmi Gazetesinde ilan edilmi\u015ftir.\nVatanda\u015fl\u0131k \u0130\u00e7in 650 bin Euroluk Yat\u0131r\u0131m\nMalta yasalar\u0131na g\u00f6re en az 650 bin euroluk gayrimenkul yat\u0131r\u0131m\u0131 (Malta Individual Investor Program) vatanda\u015fl\u0131k hakk\u0131 al\u0131nmas\u0131n\u0131 sa\u011fl\u0131yor.\n  G\u00f6r\u00fcld\u00fc\u011f\u00fc \u00fczere, sosyal medya ve \u0130nternet ortamlar\u0131nda yer alan s\u00f6z konusu iddia do\u011frudur. Sabanc\u0131 ailesinin 4 \u00fcyesi Malta vatanda\u015fl\u0131\u011f\u0131 alm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r.\n  Kaynaklar: kaynak1, kaynak2, kaynak3, kaynak4, kaynak5\nVideo oynat\u0131c\u0131\nhttps://dogrula.org/wp-content/uploads/2018/02/dogrula.org_.mp4\n00:00\n00:07\n[Toplam:1    Ortalama:5/5] Sabanc\u0131 Ailesi Malta Vatanda\u015fl\u0131\u011f\u0131na Ge\u00e7ti \u0130ddias\u0131", "The New York Times Gazetesi 2 0cak\u2019ta yay\u0131mlad\u0131\u011f\u0131 bir makalede, \u00e7eyrek milyondan fazla T\u00fcrk vatanda\u015f\u0131n\u0131n g\u00f6\u00e7 etti\u011fini yazd\u0131. New York Times, bu rakam\u0131n T\u00dc\u0130K verilerine ait oldu\u011funu iddia etti.\n  Ancak New York Times makalesinde yer alan s\u00f6z konusu iddia do\u011fru de\u011fildir.\nT\u00fcik verilerine g\u00f6re, T\u00fcrkiye\u2019den g\u00f6\u00e7 eden T\u00fcrkiye Cumhuriyeti vatanda\u015f\u0131say\u0131s\u0131 113 bin 326, T\u00fcrkiye\u2019den yurt d\u0131\u015f\u0131na g\u00f6\u00e7 eden T\u00fcrkiye Cumhuriyeti vatanda\u015f\u0131 ve yabanc\u0131 uyruklu ki\u015fi say\u0131s\u0131 toplam\u0131 ise 253 bin 640.\nCumhurba\u015fkanl\u0131\u011f\u0131, New York Times \u0130ddias\u0131n\u0131 Yalanlad\u0131\nCumhurba\u015fkanl\u0131\u011f\u0131 \u0130nsan Kaynaklar\u0131 Ofisi, s\u00f6z konusu iddiay\u0131 yalanlad\u0131 ve ger\u00e7ek rakamlar a\u00e7\u0131kland\u0131.\nBeyin G\u00f6\u00e7\u00fc Hakk\u0131nda Bas\u0131nda \u00c7\u0131kan Haberler \u0130le \u0130lgili A\u00e7\u0131klama\nT\u00dc\u0130K verilerine eri\u015fmek i\u00e7in link; https://t.co/2jHe5lAo1M pic.twitter.com/nz7ryakGnv\n\u2014 T.C. Cumhurba\u015fkanl\u0131\u011f\u0131 \u0130nsan Kaynaklar\u0131 Ofisi (@tccb_iko) January 5, 2019\n\u0130lgili T\u00dc\u0130K Verileri Ne Diyor?\nNew York Times makalesinde yer alan \u00e7eyrek milyon ifadesi incelendi\u011finde, bu rakam\u0131n yurtd\u0131\u015f\u0131na g\u00f6\u00e7 eden T\u00fcrk vatanda\u015flar\u0131n\u0131n ve yabanc\u0131 uyruklular\u0131n toplam\u0131n\u0131 ifade etti\u011fini g\u00f6rmek m\u00fcmk\u00fcn.\n  T\u00fcrkiye\u2019den g\u00f6\u00e7 eden T\u00fcrkiye Cumhuriyeti vatanda\u015f\u0131 say\u0131s\u0131 ise, Cumhurba\u015fkanl\u0131\u011f\u0131n\u0131n da ifade etti\u011fi gibi 113 bin 326.\n  G\u00f6r\u00fcld\u00fc\u011f\u00fc \u00fczere, New York Times makalesindeki iddia, ele ald\u0131\u011f\u0131 veri itibar\u0131yla do\u011fru de\u011fildir. T\u00fcik verilerine g\u00f6re, T\u00fcrkiye\u2019den g\u00f6\u00e7 eden T\u00fcrkiye Cumhuriyeti vatanda\u015f\u0131 say\u0131s\u0131 113 bin 326, T\u00fcrkiye\u2019den yurt d\u0131\u015f\u0131na g\u00f6\u00e7 eden T\u00fcrkiye Cumhuriyeti vatanda\u015f\u0131 ve yabanc\u0131 uyruklu ki\u015fi say\u0131s\u0131 toplam\u0131 ise 253 bin 640.\nKaynaklar: kaynak1, kaynak2, kaynak3\nVideo oynat\u0131c\u0131\nhttps://dogrula.org/wp-content/uploads/2018/02/dogrula.org_.mp4\n00:00\n00:07\n[Toplam:1    Ortalama:5/5] New York Times Gazetesinin T\u00fcrkiye\u2019den \u00dclke D\u0131\u015f\u0131na Yap\u0131lan Beyin G\u00f6\u00e7\u00fc \u0130ddias\u0131", "  Birka\u00e7 g\u00fcnd\u00fcr WhatApp gruplar\u0131nda at\u0131lan bir mesajda, WhatsApp ad\u0131yla piyasaya s\u00fcr\u00fclecek Martinelli adl\u0131 bir videodan bahsedildi. Mesajla gelen Whatsapp Gold uygulamas\u0131n\u0131n da a\u00e7\u0131lmamas\u0131 gerekti\u011fi, Martinelli vir\u00fcs\u00fcn\u00fcn mobil cihazdaki t\u00fcm verileri yok etti\u011fi iddia edildi.\n  Ge\u00e7en y\u0131l da g\u00fcndeme gelen ve mesaj gruplar\u0131nda yay\u0131lan s\u00f6z konusu iddia do\u011fru de\u011fildir.\nMartinelli videosu uyar\u0131s\u0131 bir aldatmacad\u0131r. \u0130lk olarak \u0130spanyolca yay\u0131lan bu haber, daha sonra \u0130ngilizce ve T\u00fcrk\u00e7e olarak terc\u00fcme edilmi\u015f ve payla\u015f\u0131lm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r. S\u00f6z konusu videonun bir aldatmaca oldu\u011fu, resmi \u0130spanyol kaynaklar taraf\u0131ndan bildirilmi\u015f.\nCircula por #WhatsApp este mensaje advirtiendo sobre el \"v\u00eddeo de Martinelli\"#Stopbulos, no lo compartas https://t.co/TtAb0aYNUE pic.twitter.com/R4aOovWAo3\n\u2014 Polic\u00eda Nacional (@policia) July 29, 2017\nMartinelli konulu mesaj, 2016\u2019dan beri kullan\u0131c\u0131lar\u0131 WhatsApp Gold adl\u0131sahte bir g\u00fcncelleme indirmeleri konusunda te\u015fvik ediyor.\nAncak WhatsApp Gold ad\u0131yla gelen mesaj\u0131n vir\u00fcs ta\u015f\u0131d\u0131\u011f\u0131 iddias\u0131 do\u011fru, yani bu ba\u015fl\u0131kla gelen bir mesaj\u0131n a\u00e7\u0131lmamas\u0131 gerekiyor. WhatsApp Gold isimli bir uygulama bulunmuyor, fakat bu uygulamaya dair payla\u015f\u0131lan mesajlardaki linklerde zararl\u0131 yaz\u0131l\u0131m bulunuyor.\nY\u00f6nlendirme linklerine t\u0131klanmas\u0131 sonucunda ki\u015fisel bilgilerin \u00e7al\u0131nmas\u0131, mobil cihaza vir\u00fcsl\u00fc uygulamalar\u0131n y\u00fcklenmesi, a\u015f\u0131r\u0131 mobil veri kullan\u0131m\u0131 gibi sorunlarla kar\u015f\u0131la\u015fmak m\u00fcmk\u00fcn.\nWhatsApp Gold Diye Bir Uygulama Bulunmuyor\nWhatsApp web sitesi incelendi\u011finde, WhatsApp Gold isimli bir uygulaman\u0131n bulunmad\u0131\u011f\u0131n\u0131 g\u00f6rmek m\u00fcmk\u00fcn.\nWhatsApp daha \u00f6nce WhatsApp Gold\u2019un bir aldatmaca oldu\u011funu onaylam\u0131\u015f ve \u201cPlus\u2019\u0131n WhatsApp ile hi\u00e7bir ili\u015fkisi olmad\u0131\u011f\u0131n\u0131 ve WhatsApp Plus\u2019\u0131 desteklemediklerini\u201d belirtmi\u015ftir.\nWhatsApp Gold ve Martinelli Videosu\nWhatsApp Gold, kullan\u0131c\u0131lar\u0131, mesajla\u015fma uygulamas\u0131n\u0131n geli\u015fmi\u015f \u00f6zelliklerini veren gizli bir g\u00fcncelleme oldu\u011funu d\u00fc\u015f\u00fcnmeye itmek i\u00e7in doland\u0131r\u0131c\u0131lar\u0131n olu\u015fturdu\u011fu bir aldatmacad\u0131r.\nMartinelli ise WhatsApp Gold ile ayn\u0131 mesajda bahsi ge\u00e7en bir kelimedir.\nMartinelli videosu nedir?\nMartinelli\u2019nin ne oldu\u011fu kimse taraf\u0131ndan bilinmemektedir. WhatsApp\u2019\u0131n bu kelimeyle ilgisi olan bir video g\u00f6nderdi\u011fine dair bir g\u00f6sterge yoktur. Ayr\u0131ca WhatsApp hi\u00e7bir \u015fekilde mesaj yoluyla video g\u00f6ndermemektedir.\nMartinelli ad\u0131n\u0131n ger\u00e7ek olan herhangi bir \u015feyle ilgili olmad\u0131\u011f\u0131n\u0131 kan\u0131tlamak gerekirse, kullan\u0131c\u0131lara gelen mesajlarda s\u00fcrekli olarak \u201cyar\u0131n\u201d piyasaya s\u00fcr\u00fclece\u011fi bilgisi yer al\u0131yor. Ancak ertesi g\u00fcn ya da sonraki g\u00fcnlerde kullan\u0131c\u0131lara s\u00f6z konusu Martinelli videosu gelmemi\u015ftir.\nBununla birlikte, WhatsApp\u2019tan gelen beklenmedik videolar\u0131 (WhatsApp g\u00fcncelleme gibi) a\u00e7maman\u0131z mant\u0131kl\u0131 olacakt\u0131r.\nKorku Mesaj\u0131 Y\u0131llar Sonra Neden Dola\u015f\u0131ma Girdi?\nWhatsApp Gold ve Martinelli vir\u00fcs\u00fcne dair mesaj ilk olarak 2016\u2019da dola\u015f\u0131ma girmi\u015fti.\n  D\u00fcnya \u00e7ap\u0131nda yay\u0131lan s\u00f6z konusu haber, WhatsApp uyglamas\u0131ndan gelen bildirimlerle pek \u00e7ok gazete ve dergi taraf\u0131ndan yalanlanm\u0131\u015ft\u0131.\nMobil mesajla\u015fman\u0131n b\u00fcy\u00fck bir kayna\u011f\u0131 haline geldi\u011finden beri, WhatsApp hakk\u0131nda pek \u00e7ok vir\u00fcs haberi g\u00fcndeme gelmektedir.\nBu konuda \u00fccretsiz u\u00e7ak bileti vaatleri veren ve kullan\u0131c\u0131lar\u0131n telefon numaralar\u0131n\u0131n de\u011fi\u015fmek \u00fczere oldu\u011funu bildiren pek \u00e7ok sahte mesaj tasarlanm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r.\nA\u011fustos 2018\u2019de Checkpoint\u2019teki g\u00fcvenlik ara\u015ft\u0131rmac\u0131lar\u0131, WhatsApp\u2019ta bilgisayar korsanlar\u0131n\u0131n bir grup sohbeti s\u0131ras\u0131nda birinin mesajlar\u0131na m\u00fcdahale etmeyi ve d\u00fczenlemeyi sa\u011flayan g\u00fcvenlik a\u00e7\u0131klar\u0131 bulmu\u015ftur.\n  WhatsApp\u2019a yap\u0131lan t\u00fcm g\u00fcncellemeler genellikle uygulaman\u0131n kendisi taraf\u0131ndan otomatik olarak ger\u00e7ekle\u015fir. Ekstra bir \u015fey vaat eden mesajlar\u0131n i\u00e7ine yerle\u015ftirilmi\u015f ba\u011flant\u0131lar\u0131 t\u0131klamaktan ka\u00e7\u0131n\u0131n.\nB\u00f6yle bir mesaj al\u0131rsan\u0131z, onu g\u00f6rmezden gelip hemen silmelisiniz.\n  G\u00f6r\u00fcld\u00fc\u011f\u00fc \u00fczere, WhatsApp\u2019ta yay\u0131nlanacak Martinelli videosu iddias\u0131 do\u011fru de\u011fildir, dola\u015f\u0131mda olan mesajlarda s\u0131k\u00e7a bahsedilen bu vir\u00fcse dair hi\u00e7bir videoya rastlanmam\u0131\u015ft\u0131r. S\u00f6z konusu mesaj yaln\u0131zca panik olu\u015fturmak i\u00e7in tasarlanm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r.\nKaynaklar: kaynak1, kaynak2, kaynak3, kaynak4, kaynak5, kaynak6, kaynak7, kaynak8\nVideo oynat\u0131c\u0131\nhttps://dogrula.org/wp-content/uploads/2018/02/dogrula.org_.mp4\n00:00\n00:07\n[Toplam:0    Ortalama:0/5] WhatsApp\u2019ta Yay\u0131nlanacak Martinelli Videosu \u0130ddias\u0131", "  2017 sonunda, d\u00fcnya \u00e7ap\u0131nda 68,5 milyon insan zul\u00fcm, \u00e7at\u0131\u015fma, \u015fiddet veya insan haklar\u0131 ihlalleri sonucu zorla yerlerinden edildi. Bu, bir \u00f6nceki y\u0131la g\u00f6re 2,9 milyon insan\u0131n artmas\u0131yd\u0131 ve d\u00fcnyan\u0131n zorla yerlerinden edilmi\u015f n\u00fcfus rekor seviyede kald\u0131.\n25.4 milyon m\u00fclteci (\u015fimdiye kadar g\u00f6r\u00fclen en y\u00fcksek rakam)\n40 milyon \u00fclke i\u00e7inde yerinden edilmi\u015f insan\n3.1 milyon s\u0131\u011f\u0131nmac\u0131\nD\u00fcnyada her 2 saniyede bir ki\u015fi yerinden ediliyor; bu da her dakika yerinden edilmi\u015f 30 ki\u015fi oluyor demek.\nD\u00fcnya genelinde her 110 ki\u015fiden 1\u2018i s\u0131\u011f\u0131nmac\u0131, \u00fclke i\u00e7inde yerinden edilmi\u015f veya m\u00fclteci.\nG\u00f6\u00e7men, s\u0131\u011f\u0131nmac\u0131 ve m\u00fclteci kavramlar\u0131 aras\u0131ndaki farka yaz\u0131dan ula\u015fabilirsiniz.\n  UH\u0130M\u2019in verilerine g\u00f6re, \u00fclkesini terk eden insan say\u0131s\u0131 2008 y\u0131l\u0131nda 42 milyon iken 2018 itibari ile bu say\u0131 70 milyona ula\u015fm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r. G\u00fcn\u00fcm\u00fczde 70milyonluk bu n\u00fcfusun yaln\u0131zca 22.5 milyonluk k\u0131sm\u0131 m\u00fclteci stat\u00fcs\u00fcne sahiptir. Yap\u0131lan ara\u015ft\u0131rmalar g\u00f6z \u00f6n\u00fcnde bulunduruldu\u011funda, bug\u00fcn d\u00fcnya genelinde ortalama her 113 ki\u015fiden birinin zorla yerinden edildi\u011fi anla\u015f\u0131lmaktad\u0131r.\nAvrupa \u00dclkelerinde M\u00fcltecilerin Maruz Kald\u0131\u011f\u0131 \u015eiddet\n  Yunanistan\u2019\u0131n Midilli Adas\u0131\u2019nda bulunan Moria M\u00fclteci Kamp\u0131 cinsel ve psikolojik \u015fiddetin ya\u015fand\u0131\u011f\u0131, 3 bin ki\u015filik alana s\u0131k\u0131\u015ft\u0131r\u0131lm\u0131\u015f 8 bin insan\u0131n bulundu\u011fu bir kamp.\nMSF Midilli Klini\u011fi\u2019nin ruh sa\u011fl\u0131\u011f\u0131 faaliyet direkt\u00f6r\u00fc Giovanna Bonvini, \u201cMidilli\u2019de insanlar\u0131n ruh sa\u011fl\u0131\u011f\u0131nda b\u00f6yle b\u00fcy\u00fck bir \u00e7\u00f6k\u00fc\u015f ya\u015fanmas\u0131n\u0131n bir sebebi, travmatik deneyimlerle buraya gelenlerin, Avrupa\u2019ya s\u0131\u011f\u0131nmay\u0131, insanca davran\u0131\u015f g\u00f6rmeyi beklerken tam tersiyle kar\u015f\u0131la\u015fmas\u0131, burada yine \u015fiddetin, yine insanl\u0131k d\u0131\u015f\u0131 \u015fartlar\u0131n i\u00e7inde kalmalar\u0131,\u201d diyor.\nGe\u00e7ti\u011fimiz A\u011fustos ay\u0131nda BM M\u00fclteci Ajans\u0131, Moria kamp\u0131ndaki durumun \u201ckaynama noktas\u0131na\u201d ula\u015ft\u0131\u011f\u0131 konusunda Yunan makamlar\u0131n\u0131 uyarm\u0131\u015f ve yetkilileri \u201caday\u0131 en k\u0131sa s\u00fcrede dezenfekte etme\u201d prosed\u00fcrlerini h\u0131zland\u0131rmaya \u00e7a\u011f\u0131rm\u0131\u015f. BMMYK ayr\u0131ca \u201crahats\u0131z edici derecede yetersiz s\u0131hhi tesisler, sinirli topluluklar aras\u0131nda m\u00fccadele, artan cinsel taciz ve sald\u0131r\u0131 seviyeleri ve artan t\u0131bbi ve psikososyal bak\u0131m ihtiyac\u0131\u201d konusundaki endi\u015felerini dile getirmi\u015f. Ancak kampta bir iyile\u015ftirme s\u00f6z konusu de\u011fil.\n  Ge\u00e7ti\u011fimiz y\u0131l Yunanistan\u2019a 21.326 ki\u015fi gelmi\u015f ve en az yar\u0131s\u0131n\u0131n yolculu\u011fu Midilli\u2019de son bulmu\u015f. Avrupa\u2019ya ge\u00e7erken denizde tahminen 1.642 ki\u015fi \u00f6lm\u00fc\u015f ya da kaybolmu\u015f. Resmiyete d\u00f6k\u00fclmeyen vakalar da g\u00f6z \u00f6n\u00fcne al\u0131nd\u0131\u011f\u0131nda durumun vehametini g\u00f6rmek m\u00fcmk\u00fcn.\nAdadan aktar\u0131ld\u0131\u011f\u0131na g\u00f6re, cinsel \u015fiddet kamp i\u00e7inde ve d\u0131\u015f\u0131nda h\u0131zla b\u00fcy\u00fcyen bir sorun.\nAvrupa Birli\u011fi Temel Haklar Ajans\u0131 (FRA) verileri, s\u0131\u011f\u0131nmac\u0131lar\u0131 ve g\u00f6\u00e7menleri hedef alan \u015fiddet, taciz, tehdit ve yabanc\u0131 d\u00fc\u015fmanl\u0131k konu\u015fmalar\u0131n\u0131n Avrupa Birli\u011fi genelinde yayg\u0131n oldu\u011funu ve devlet yetkilileri, \u00f6zel \u015firketler veya bireyler veya taraftar gruplar taraf\u0131ndan i\u015flendi\u011fini g\u00f6stermektedir.\nMacaristan\u200a\u2014\u200aAlmanya s\u0131n\u0131r\u0131nda yap\u0131lan bu r\u00f6portaj videosunda, m\u00fcltecilere uygulanan psikolojik ve fiziksel \u015fiddetin boyutlar\u0131 ele al\u0131nm\u0131\u015f:\n  Press Tv haberine g\u00f6re, \u00fclkelerinde sava\u015ftan ka\u00e7an m\u00fclteciler daha iyi bir ya\u015fam aray\u0131\u015f\u0131 i\u00e7inde \u00e7o\u011funlukla Avrupa\u2019ya gidiyor. Fakat ya\u015fad\u0131klar\u0131na bak\u0131lacak olursa, zihinlerinde tasvir ettikleri Avrupa asl\u0131nda \u00e7ok farkl\u0131; m\u00fclteciler resmi olarak gittikleri her yerde ac\u0131 \u00e7ekmeye mahkum.\n  RT\u2019nin bu haberinde de, m\u00fcltecilerin Avrupa polisi taraf\u0131ndan d\u00f6v\u00fcld\u00fc\u011f\u00fc g\u00f6steriliyor:\n  D\u00fcnyan\u0131n en bar\u0131\u015f\u00e7\u0131l ve g\u00fcvenililir \u00fclkelerinden oldu\u011fu varsay\u0131lan \u0130sve\u00e7\u2019te de m\u00fclteciler bir dizi protesto ve \u015fiddet olaylar\u0131 ile kar\u015f\u0131la\u015fm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r.\n  Fransa\u2019da ise m\u00fcltecilere y\u00f6nelik polis \u015fiddeti dikkat \u00e7ekiyor.\n\u0130nsan Haklar\u0131 \u0130zleme \u00d6rg\u00fct\u00fc (HRW), Frans\u0131z h\u00fck\u00fcmetine, kuzeydeki Calais kasabas\u0131ndaki m\u00fcltecilere y\u00f6nelik polis \u015fiddetini sonland\u0131rma y\u00f6n\u00fcnde bask\u0131 yap\u0131yor.\n  \u0130talya da m\u00fcltecileri ho\u015f kar\u015f\u0131lamayan \u00fclkelerden biri:\n  M\u00fcltecilerin Avrupa\u2019da g\u00fcvenli bir yer bulmaya \u00e7al\u0131\u015ft\u0131klar\u0131 insanlar taraf\u0131ndan \u00f6nemsenmiyor. Avrupa Birli\u011fi \u00fclkelerinin s\u0131n\u0131rlar\u0131 \u00e7ok kuvvetlendirilmi\u015f durumda ve m\u00fclteciler i\u00e7eri girebilse bile, Avrupa s\u0131n\u0131r polisinin m\u00fcltecilere Avrupa Birli\u011fi d\u0131\u015f\u0131na i\u015fkence yapt\u0131\u011f\u0131, d\u00f6vd\u00fc\u011f\u00fc ve onlar\u0131 yasad\u0131\u015f\u0131 olarak s\u0131n\u0131r d\u0131\u015f\u0131 etti\u011fi bildiriliyor.\nKaynaklar: kaynak1, kaynak2, kaynak3, kaynak4, kaynak5, kaynak6, kaynak7, kaynak8, kaynak9, kaynak10, kaynak11\n[Toplam:1    Ortalama:5/5] Ara\u015ft\u0131rma: M\u00fcltecilerin Avrupa\u2019da Maruz Kald\u0131klar\u0131 \u015eiddet", "  Beyin \u00e7ok karma\u015f\u0131k ve mucizelerle dolu bir yap\u0131da yarat\u0131lm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r. Bu y\u00fczden de insan v\u00fccudunun en \u00f6nemli organlar\u0131ndan biri olan beyinle alakal\u0131 pek \u00e7ok iddia ortaya at\u0131lmaktad\u0131r.\n\u0130nsan beynindeki n\u00f6ron say\u0131s\u0131n\u0131n evrendeki y\u0131ld\u0131zlar\u0131n say\u0131s\u0131ndan fazla oldu\u011fu iddias\u0131 da bunlardan biridir.\nAncak bu iddia do\u011fru de\u011fildir; bir \u015fehir efsanesi olmaktan \u00f6teye ge\u00e7memektedir.\nEvrendeki Y\u0131ld\u0131z Say\u0131s\u0131\nUniverse Today yay\u0131nc\u0131s\u0131 ve Astronomy Cast e\u015fba\u015fkan\u0131 Fraser Cain ara\u015ft\u0131rmas\u0131na ortalama bir galakside yakla\u015f\u0131k 100 ila 400 milyar y\u0131ld\u0131z oldu\u011fu tahminiyle ba\u015flam\u0131\u015ft\u0131r. Evrende yakla\u015f\u0131k 100 milyar galaksinin var oldu\u011fu tahmin edilmektedir; Cain, biraz geni\u015f formatl\u0131 Matematik hesaplar\u0131yla, evrende yakla\u015f\u0131k 10 sekstilyon (10 milyar milyar) y\u0131ld\u0131z oldu\u011funu s\u00f6ylemektedir. Yani rakamla yaz\u0131ld\u0131\u011f\u0131 \u015fekliyle:\n10.000.000.000.000.000.000.000 y\u0131ld\u0131z.\nY\u0131ld\u0131zlar\u0131n say\u0131s\u0131 konusunda pek \u00e7ok ara\u015ft\u0131rma yap\u0131lm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r. G\u00f6kbilimciler, on y\u0131l \u00f6nce bu soruyu cevaplamak i\u00e7in \u00e7al\u0131\u015fmalar ba\u015flatm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r.\nBilim adamlar\u0131 bu ara\u015ft\u0131rmaya evrenin bir b\u00f6l\u00fcm\u00fcn\u00fcn parlakl\u0131k yo\u011funlu\u011funu \u00f6l\u00e7erek ba\u015flad\u0131lar; bu, o alandaki \u0131\u015f\u0131\u011f\u0131n ne kadar oldu\u011funun tespit edilmesidir.\nDaha sonra bu miktar\u0131, bu \u0131\u015f\u0131k miktar\u0131n\u0131 olu\u015fturmak i\u00e7in gereken y\u0131ld\u0131z say\u0131s\u0131n\u0131 hesaplamak i\u00e7in kulland\u0131lar. Olduk\u00e7a matematiksel bir zorluk s\u00f6z konusuydu.\n  Bat\u0131 Avustralya\u2019daki Uluslararas\u0131 Radyo Astronomi Ara\u015ft\u0131rmalar\u0131 Merkezi\u2019nde profes\u00f6r olan ve bu konuda \u00e7al\u0131\u015fan bilim adamlar\u0131ndan g\u00f6kbilimci Simon Driver, \u201cHer t\u00fcr y\u0131ld\u0131z\u0131 temsil edebilecek bir y\u0131ld\u0131z t\u00fcr\u00fcne sahip olabilece\u011finizi varsaymal\u0131s\u0131n\u0131z\u201d diyor.\n\u201c\u00d6yleyse, ortalama olarak, tipik bir \u0131\u015f\u0131k \u015fiddeti veren tipik bir k\u00fctle y\u0131ld\u0131z\u0131 oldu\u011funu varsayal\u0131m; bu nedenle, e\u011fer evrenin bir k\u0131sm\u0131n\u0131n bu miktarda \u0131\u015f\u0131\u011f\u0131 \u00fcretti\u011fini biliyorsam, bunun ka\u00e7 tane y\u0131ld\u0131za e\u015fit oldu\u011funu s\u00f6yleyebilirim.\u201d\nEvrenin 13,8 milyar ya\u015f\u0131nda oldu\u011funu bildi\u011fimiz i\u00e7in hacim olarak 13,8 milyar \u0131\u015f\u0131k y\u0131l\u0131 bir alanda oldu\u011fumuzu varsayabiliriz. Ancak bir g\u00f6zlem var: evren potansiyel olarak sonsuz b\u00fcy\u00fckl\u00fc\u011fe sahip.\nDriver, \u201cEvrenin s\u0131n\u0131rl\u0131 bir ya\u015f\u0131 oldu\u011funu biliyoruz\u200a\u2014\u200a13.8 milyar y\u0131l \u00f6nce ba\u015flam\u0131\u015f oldu\u011funu biliyoruz\u200a\u2014\u200afakat uzamsal olarak boyut sonsuz olabilir\u201d diyor. Bununla birlikte, bu sonsuz kabarc\u0131\u011fa \u201cg\u00f6zlemlenebilir\u201d evren ad\u0131 verildi\u011fini de biliyoruz.\nT\u00fcm bu hesaplamalar ve bile\u015fenler sonucunda, Driver ve meslekta\u015flar\u0131 g\u00f6zlemlenebilir evrende 22 s\u0131f\u0131r veya 70 bin milyon, milyon, milyon y\u0131ld\u0131zoldu\u011funu s\u00f6yl\u00fcyor.\n70.000.000.000.000.000.000 y\u0131ld\u0131z.\nBeyindeki N\u00f6ron Say\u0131s\u0131\n  Yeti\u015fkin bir insan\u0131n beyninde san\u0131ld\u0131\u011f\u0131 kadar n\u00f6ron bulunmamaktad\u0131r. Ayr\u0131ca n\u00f6ron say\u0131s\u0131 evrendeki y\u0131ld\u0131z say\u0131s\u0131yla k\u0131yasland\u0131\u011f\u0131nda olduk\u00e7a az bir rakam olarak g\u00f6r\u00fcnmektedir.\nBilim d\u00fcnyas\u0131ndaki geleneksel kan\u0131ya g\u00f6re, ortalama bir insan beyninde yakla\u015f\u0131k 100 milyar n\u00f6ron (veya sinir h\u00fccresi) ve n\u00f6ronlar\u0131 desteklemeye ve korumaya yarayan daha bir\u00e7ok n\u00f6roglia (veya glial h\u00fccre) vard\u0131r. Her bir n\u00f6ron, 10.000\u2019e kadar ba\u015fka n\u00f6rona ba\u011flanabilir, bu da sinyalleri birbirlerine tahminen 1.000 trilyon sinaptik ba\u011flant\u0131 yoluyla iletir.\nAncak Guardian makalesinde de yer alan bir \u00e7al\u0131\u015fmaya g\u00f6re, Brezilyal\u0131 bir ara\u015ft\u0131mac\u0131 olan Dr Suzana Herculano-Houzel ve ekibi, farkl\u0131 ya\u015flarda d\u00f6rt yeti\u015fkin erkek \u00fczerinde bir \u00e7al\u0131\u015fma yaparak \u015fu sonuca varm\u0131\u015flard\u0131r:\n\u201c\u0130nsan beyninin ortalama olarak 86 milyar n\u00f6rona sahip oldu\u011funu bulduk. \u015eimdiye kadar bakt\u0131\u011f\u0131m\u0131z beyinlerden hi\u00e7birinde 100 milyar n\u00f6ron bulunmuyor.\u201d\nBaz\u0131 kaynaklar ise n\u00f6ronlarla birlikte sinaps (sinir ba\u011flant\u0131lar\u0131)say\u0131s\u0131n\u0131n toplam\u0131n\u0131n evrendeki y\u0131ld\u0131z say\u0131s\u0131ndan fazla oldu\u011funu savunur.\nAncak bug\u00fcne kadar ya\u015fam\u0131\u015f b\u00fct\u00fcn insanlar\u0131n beynindeki sinaps say\u0131s\u0131 bir araya getirilip topland\u0131\u011f\u0131nda dahi evrendeki toplam y\u0131ld\u0131z say\u0131s\u0131yla k\u0131yaslanamaz.\nKaynaklar: kaynak1,kaynak2, kaynak3, kaynak4, kaynak5, kaynak6\nVideo oynat\u0131c\u0131\nhttps://dogrula.org/wp-content/uploads/2018/02/dogrula.org_.mp4\n00:00\n00:07\n[Toplam:1    Ortalama:5/5] Beynimizdeki N\u00f6ron Say\u0131s\u0131 Y\u0131ld\u0131zlar\u0131n Toplam\u0131ndan Fazlad\u0131r \u0130ddias\u0131", "  Ka\u00e7 Saat Oldu adl\u0131 Twitter hesab\u0131nda yap\u0131lan bir payla\u015f\u0131mda, Cumhuriyet Halk Partisi\u2019nin \u0130stanbul belediye ba\u015fkan aday\u0131 Ekrem \u0130mamo\u011flu\u2019nun tan\u0131t\u0131m toplant\u0131s\u0131nda kullan\u0131lan g\u00f6rsellerin, Cumhurba\u015fkan\u0131 Recep Tayyip Erdo\u011fan\u2019\u0131n mitinginden al\u0131nd\u0131\u011f\u0131 iddia edildi.\nY\u00fczlerce etkile\u015fim alan s\u00f6z konusu iddia do\u011frudur. Ekrem \u0130mamo\u011flu\u2019nun tan\u0131t\u0131m toplant\u0131s\u0131nda ekrana, Recep Tayyip Erdo\u011fan bandanas\u0131 kullanan bir vatanda\u015f\u0131n yer ald\u0131\u011f\u0131 miting foto\u011fraf\u0131 yans\u0131t\u0131lm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r. CHP s\u00f6zc\u00fcs\u00fc konuya ili\u015fkin, \u201cHerhangi bir nedenle g\u00f6zden ka\u00e7m\u0131\u015f olabilir.\u201d a\u00e7\u0131klamas\u0131nda bulunmu\u015ftur.\nCHP\u2019nin \u0130stanbul belediye ba\u015fkan aday\u0131 Ekrem \u0130mamo\u011flu\u2019nun tan\u0131t\u0131m toplant\u0131s\u0131nda kulland\u0131\u011f\u0131 g\u00f6rsellerin Ba\u015fkan Recep Tayyip Erdo\u011fan\u2019\u0131n mitinglerinden al\u0131nd\u0131\u011f\u0131 anla\u015f\u0131lal\u0131 \u00e7ok olmad\u0131.\nRezilsin CHP pic.twitter.com/wl6Ar5n1RU\n\u2014 Ka\u00e7 Saat Oldu (@kacsaatoldutv) December 27, 2018\nErdo\u011fan Mitinginden Al\u0131nan G\u00f6rsel\n  Salondan \u00e7ekilen bir videoda, aday Ekrem \u0130mamo\u011flu\u2019nun konu\u015fmas\u0131 esnas\u0131nda yans\u0131t\u0131lan foto\u011fraf T\u00fcrk bayraklar\u0131 ta\u015f\u0131yan vatanda\u015flar\u0131 g\u00f6steriyor.\nFoto\u011frafa yak\u0131ndan bak\u0131ld\u0131\u011f\u0131nda ise, bir kad\u0131n\u0131n kafas\u0131ndaki bandanada \u2018Recep Tayyip Erdo\u011fan\u2019 yazd\u0131\u011f\u0131 g\u00f6r\u00fcl\u00fcyor.\nCHP \u0130stanbul B\u00fcy\u00fck\u015fehir Belediye Ba\u015fkan Aday\u0131 Ekrem \u0130mamo\u011flu'nun tan\u0131t\u0131m toplant\u0131s\u0131nda AK Parti'nin miting foto\u011fraflar\u0131n\u0131n kullan\u0131lmas\u0131 #Sosyalmedyadag\u00fcndem oldu.\nFoto\u011frafta, Recep Tayyip Erdo\u011fan yaz\u0131l\u0131 bandanalar\u0131n kullan\u0131ld\u0131\u011f\u0131 g\u00f6r\u00fcl\u00fcyor. pic.twitter.com/js1QDrrTtQ\n\u2014 Az \u00d6nce Oldu (@azonceoldu) December 27, 2018\n    \u0130stanbul Hali\u00e7\u2019te d\u00fczenlenen t\u00f6rende adayl\u0131\u011f\u0131 ilan edilen Ekrem \u0130mamo\u011flu\u2019nun tan\u0131t\u0131m toplant\u0131s\u0131nda k\u00fcrs\u00fcn\u00fcn arkas\u0131ndaki ekrandan yans\u0131t\u0131lan karelerden biri de bu foto\u011fraf.\nVideonun tamam\u0131n\u0131 buradaki linke t\u0131klayarak izleyebilirsiniz.\nCHP Bas\u0131n S\u00f6zc\u00fcs\u00fc G\u00f6zden Ka\u00e7m\u0131\u015f Olabilece\u011fini S\u00f6yledi\nChp Bas\u0131n S\u00f6zc\u00fcs\u00fc Faik \u00d6ztrak, foto\u011fraf\u0131n sorulmas\u0131 \u00fczerine g\u00fcl\u00fcmseyerek \u201cHerhangi bir nedenle g\u00f6zden ka\u00e7m\u0131\u015f olabilir\u201d dedi.\nG\u00fcrsel Tekin\u2019in Salondan G\u00f6r\u00fcnt\u00fc Payla\u015ft\u0131\u011f\u0131 \u0130ddia Edildi\nAk\u015fam Gazetesinin haberine g\u00f6re, bu kare G\u00fcrsel Tekin taraf\u0131ndan da foto\u011fraflanm\u0131\u015f.\nKaynaklar: kaynak1, kaynak2, kaynak3, kaynak4, kaynak5\nVideo oynat\u0131c\u0131\nhttps://dogrula.org/wp-content/uploads/2018/02/dogrula.org_.mp4\n00:00\n00:07\n[Toplam:1    Ortalama:5/5] CHP\u2019nin \u0130stanbul Belediye Ba\u015fkan Aday\u0131n\u0131n Tan\u0131t\u0131m Toplant\u0131s\u0131nda Kullan\u0131lan G\u00f6rselin Erdo\u011fan\u2019\u0131n Mitinginden Al\u0131nd\u0131\u011f\u0131\u00a0\u0130ddias\u0131", "  Bir \u0130nternet gazetesi olan Diken, Twitter hesab\u0131nda yapt\u0131\u011f\u0131 bir payla\u015f\u0131mda Statista ara\u015ft\u0131rma \u015firketinin bir verisini payla\u015farak, T\u00fcrkiye\u2019nin kad\u0131nlara cinsel tacizde liste ba\u015f\u0131nda oldu\u011funu iddia etti.\nAncak s\u00f6z konusu iddia do\u011fru de\u011fildir. Diken, istatisti\u011fin ba\u015fl\u0131\u011f\u0131n\u0131 yanl\u0131\u015f \u00e7evirmi\u015ftir. Statista\u2019n\u0131n istatisti\u011findeki ba\u015fl\u0131kta Where Sexual Harassment Is Seen As The Biggest Issue yazmaktad\u0131r. Bu c\u00fcmle dilimize \u00e7evrildi\u011finde kar\u015f\u0131l\u0131\u011f\u0131, Cinsel Tacizin En B\u00fcy\u00fck Sorun Olarak G\u00f6r\u00fcld\u00fc\u011f\u00fc Yerler olacakt\u0131r.\n  Pek \u00e7ok Twitter kullan\u0131c\u0131s\u0131 payla\u015f\u0131mdaki \u00e7eviri yanl\u0131\u015fl\u0131\u011f\u0131na dair tepkilerini dile getirmi\u015ftir ancak Diken yanl\u0131\u015f ba\u015fl\u0131kla istatistik sunan payla\u015f\u0131m\u0131n\u0131 kald\u0131rmam\u0131\u015ft\u0131r.\nT\u00fcrkiye \u2018kad\u0131nlara cinsel taciz\u2019de \u2018liste ba\u015f\u0131\u2019https://t.co/VOMQBd9oWZ pic.twitter.com/dTJZxqIhKX\n\u2014 Diken (@DikenComTr) December 25, 2018\nS\u00f6z Konusu Statista \u0130statisti\u011fi\nStatista ara\u015ft\u0131rma \u015firketi taraf\u0131ndan 8 Mart D\u00fcnya Kad\u0131nlar G\u00fcn\u00fcnde yay\u0131mlanan bu istatistik, Cinsel Tacizin En B\u00fcy\u00fck Sorun Olarak G\u00f6r\u00fcld\u00fc\u011f\u00fc Yerler (Where Sexual Harassment Is Seen As The Biggest Issue) ba\u015fl\u0131\u011f\u0131yla veriler sunmu\u015f. Ancak bu ba\u015fl\u0131\u011f\u0131n Diken hesab\u0131nda yaz\u0131ld\u0131\u011f\u0131 gibi \u2018T\u00fcrkiye\u2019nin kad\u0131nlara cinsel tacizde liste ba\u015f\u0131nda oldu\u011fu\u2019 \u015feklinde \u00e7evrilmesi pek sa\u011fl\u0131kl\u0131 de\u011fildir.\n  \u0130statistikte ayr\u0131ca \u2018Cinsel tacizin kad\u0131nlar\u0131n kar\u015f\u0131la\u015ft\u0131\u011f\u0131 en b\u00fcy\u00fck sorun oldu\u011funa kat\u0131lanlar\u0131n n\u00fcfustaki pay\u0131\u2019 \u015feklinde bir alt ba\u015fl\u0131k kullan\u0131lm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r. Buradan da verilerin cinsel taciz olaylar\u0131n\u0131n ne kadar \u00f6nemsendi\u011fi bilgisini sundu\u011fu anlam\u0131 \u00e7\u0131kar\u0131labilir.\n    \u00c7eviri ve a\u00e7\u0131klamalar\u0131n s\u0131n\u0131rlar\u0131 zorland\u0131\u011f\u0131nda, bu istatistikten en fazla \u2018T\u00fcrkiye ve Hindistan\u2019da kad\u0131nlar\u0131n, kar\u015f\u0131la\u015ft\u0131klar\u0131 en b\u00fcy\u00fck sorunun cinsel taciz oldu\u011funu s\u00f6ylemeleri muhtemeldir\u2019 anlam\u0131 \u00e7\u0131kar\u0131labilir. Ancak bu ifade bile ba\u015fl\u0131 ba\u015f\u0131na \u2018T\u00fcrkiye\u2019nin kad\u0131nlara cinsel tacizde liste ba\u015f\u0131nda oldu\u011fu\u2019 manas\u0131na gelemez.\nK\u0131sacas\u0131, bu infografik ya\u015fanan taciz vakalar\u0131n\u0131 de\u011fil, \u2018taciz vakalar\u0131n\u0131n hangi \u00fclke vatanda\u015flar\u0131 taraf\u0131ndan ne kadar \u00f6nemsendi\u011fini\u2019 i\u015faret eden verileri sunmu\u015ftur.\nTaciz ve Tecav\u00fcz Olaylar\u0131na Dair Yap\u0131lm\u0131\u015f Baz\u0131 \u0130statistikler\nTecav\u00fcz su\u00e7unun en fazla i\u015flendi\u011fi \u00fclkeler\nKaynak: Wonderslist#BernaLac\u0131n#BernaLacinYaln\u0131zDe\u011fildir\nBerna La\u00e7in pic.twitter.com/BWtQXhT2td\n\u2014 Do\u011fru Veri (@dogru_veri) July 4, 2018\n\u00dclkeler Baz\u0131nda Tecav\u00fcz ve Sald\u0131r\u0131 \u015eikayetleri ( her 100.000 ki\u015fi i\u00e7inden)\nKaynak: @UNODC #kad\u0131n #1\u015eeyYaz #\u015fiddet
