2018\nEdit\u00f6r\u00fcn notu: \u015eunu da belirtmek gerekir ki, Diken taraf\u0131ndan servis edilen haberin ba\u015fl\u0131\u011f\u0131 hatal\u0131 olsa da, bu durum \u00fclkemizde taciz vakalar\u0131n\u0131n az oldu\u011fu ya da ya\u015fanmad\u0131\u011f\u0131 anlam\u0131na gelmez, ya\u015fanan cinsel taciz su\u00e7lar\u0131 hi\u00e7bir \u015fekilde az\u0131msanamaz ve g\u00f6z ard\u0131 edilemez.\nKaynaklar: kaynak1, kaynak2, kaynak3, kaynak4\nVideo oynat\u0131c\u0131\nhttps://dogrula.org/wp-content/uploads/2018/02/dogrula.org_.mp4\n00:00\n00:07\n[Toplam:1    Ortalama:5/5] T\u00fcrkiye\u2019nin Kad\u0131nlara Cinsel Tacizde Liste Ba\u015f\u0131 Oldu\u011fu \u0130ddias\u0131", "  \u0130hbar olarak dogrula.org\u2019a g\u00f6nderilen bu payla\u015f\u0131mda, foto\u011fraf\u0131n Ukrayna\u2019da g\u00fcne\u015f enerjisi depolayan banklar\u0131 g\u00f6sterdi\u011fi ve bu banklardan telefon \u015farj edilebilece\u011fi iddia edildi.\nS\u00f6z konusu iddia do\u011frudur.\nUkraynal\u0131 bir firma, teknolojik cihazlar\u0131n yenilenebilir enerjiyle \u015farj edilmesini m\u00fcmk\u00fcn k\u0131lan yerle\u015fik g\u00fcne\u015f panelli banklar tasarlam\u0131\u015ft\u0131r. Bu banklar, Ukrayna\u2019n\u0131n ba\u015fkenti Kiev\u2019deki Khreshchatyk Caddesi\u2019ndeki metro istasyonunun yak\u0131n\u0131nda bulunuyor.\n  G\u00fcne\u015f panellerinin bulundu\u011fu bu banklar sayesinde, cep telefonunuzu veya di\u011fer ayg\u0131tlar\u0131n\u0131z\u0131 bank\u0131n i\u00e7ine yerle\u015ftirilmi\u015f USB ba\u011flant\u0131 noktalar\u0131n\u0131 kullanarak \u015farj edebiliyorsunuz.\nAyn\u0131 Banklardan Ba\u015fka \u00dclkelerde de Var\nDinlenirken cihaz\u0131n\u0131z\u0131 \u015farj edebilece\u011finiz banklar Wi-Fi hizmeti de sa\u011fl\u0131yor. Abd\u2019de pek \u00e7ok yerde g\u00fcne\u015f paneli bulunan bu banklara rastlayabilirsiniz.\n  Washington\u2019da da bulunan ak\u0131ll\u0131 banklar\u0131n hava kalitesini, g\u00fcr\u00fclt\u00fc seviyelerini ve yaya aktivitesini takip etmek i\u00e7in sens\u00f6rler ile donat\u0131labilece\u011fi de ilgili haberlerde mevcut.\n  H\u0131rvatistan\u2019da da g\u00fcne\u015f enerjisi kullanan ak\u0131ll\u0131 banklardan g\u00f6rmek m\u00fcmk\u00fcn:\n  G\u00f6r\u00fcld\u00fc\u011f\u00fc \u00fczere, dinlenirken ak\u0131ll\u0131 cihazlar\u0131n\u0131z\u0131 \u015farj edebilece\u011finiz ak\u0131ll\u0131 banklar\u0131n geli\u015ftirildi\u011fi iddias\u0131 do\u011fru. Son y\u0131llarda olduk\u00e7a pop\u00fcler olan bu banklar\u0131n \u00fcretimi daha da geli\u015ftirilerek pek \u00e7ok \u00f6zellikle donat\u0131lmaya devam etmektedir.\nKaynaklar: kaynak1, kaynak2, kaynak3, kaynak4, kaynak5, kaynak6, kaynak7, kaynak8\nVideo oynat\u0131c\u0131\nhttps://dogrula.org/wp-content/uploads/2018/02/dogrula.org_.mp4\n00:00\n00:07\n[Toplam:1    Ortalama:5/5] Foto\u011fraf\u0131n Ukrayna\u2019da G\u00fcne\u015f Enerjisi Depolayan Banklar\u0131 G\u00f6sterdi\u011fi \u0130ddias\u0131", "  BirG\u00fcn Gazetesi 19 Aral\u0131k tarihinde yapt\u0131\u011f\u0131 bir Twitter payla\u015f\u0131m\u0131nda, Erdo\u011fan\u2019\u0131n \u201cMedeniyet esasta bir in\u015faat faaliyetidir\u201d dedi\u011fini iddia eden bir habere yer verdi.\nAncak Recep Tayyip Erdo\u011fan\u2019\u0131n \u201cMedeniyet esasta bir in\u015faat faaliyetidir\u201d dedi\u011fi iddias\u0131 do\u011fru de\u011fildir. Erdo\u011fan, konu\u015fmas\u0131n\u0131n ilgili b\u00f6l\u00fcm\u00fcnde\u201cMedeniyet esasta bir in\u015fa faaliyetidir\u201d demi\u015ftir.\nGelen tepkiler \u00fczerine BirG\u00fcn Gazetesi bu payla\u015f\u0131m\u0131 sayfas\u0131ndan kald\u0131rd\u0131.\nGazetenin web sayfas\u0131nda da Erdo\u011fan\u2019\u0131n \u201cMedeniyet esasta bir in\u015faat faaliyetidir\u201d dedi\u011fi y\u00f6n\u00fcnde haber yap\u0131ld\u0131 ancak daha sonra web sayfas\u0131ndan da kald\u0131r\u0131ld\u0131:\n  BirG\u00fcn Gazetesi ger\u00e7ek olmayan haber ba\u015fl\u0131\u011f\u0131n\u0131n tepki \u00e7ekmesi \u00fczerine s\u00f6z konusu haberi web sayfas\u0131nda \u201cT\u00fcrkiye, e\u011fitim ve k\u00fclt\u00fcr-sanat politikalar\u0131nda arzu etti\u011fimiz mesafeyi kat edemedi\u201d ba\u015fl\u0131\u011f\u0131yla tekrar yay\u0131mlad\u0131.\nBirG\u00fcn web sitesinin att\u0131\u011f\u0131 ger\u00e7ek olmayan ba\u015fl\u0131\u011f\u0131 Google aramalar\u0131nda da g\u00f6rmek m\u00fcmk\u00fcn:\nErdo\u011fan \u201cMedeniyet Esasta bir \u0130n\u015fa Faaliyetidir\u201d Diyor\nCumhurba\u015fkanl\u0131\u011f\u0131 K\u00fclt\u00fcr ve Sanat B\u00fcy\u00fck \u00d6d\u00fclleri t\u00f6reninde konu\u015fan Erdo\u011fan, konu\u015fmas\u0131n\u0131n ilgili b\u00f6l\u00fcm\u00fcnde \u201cMedeniyet esasta bir in\u015fa faaliyetidir\u201d demi\u015ftir.\nKonu\u015fmadan ilgili b\u00f6l\u00fcmler \u015f\u00f6yle:\nMedeniyet, esasta bir in\u015fa faaliyetidir, temelinde ilim ve hikmet vard\u0131r. Bizim tarihimizde ilim ve sanat insanlar\u0131n\u0131n m\u00fcstesna bir yeri vard\u0131r. Akl\u0131m\u0131z\u0131 kullanmam\u0131z ve ge\u00e7mi\u015ften ders \u00e7\u0131karmam\u0131z laz\u0131md\u0131r. Biz bu alanda zenginiz. Bize d\u00fc\u015fen g\u00f6rev, medeniyetimizin 3 tasavvurunu; kalbiselimi, zevkiselimi, akl\u0131selimi kendi tarihimizde, kendi ge\u00e7mi\u015fimizde aramak, bulmak, yeniden yorumlamak ve gelece\u011fe ta\u015f\u0131makt\u0131r.\nSon 16 y\u0131lda demokrasi ve ekonomide b\u00fcy\u00fck devrimlere imza atan T\u00fcrkiye e\u011fitim ve k\u00fclt\u00fcr-sanat politikalar\u0131nda arzu etti\u011fimiz mesafeyi kat edemedi. Bunun sadece devlet projeleri ve kamu imkanlar\u0131yla sa\u011flanmas\u0131 m\u00fcmk\u00fcn de\u011fildir. K\u00fclt\u00fcr sanat alan\u0131nda yeni ve b\u00fcy\u00fck ad\u0131mlar\u0131 hep beraber ataca\u011f\u0131z.Bug\u00fcn medeniyet co\u011frafyam\u0131z\u0131n ya\u015fad\u0131\u011f\u0131 sorunlar ilme, tevekk\u00fcle, azme yeteri kadar sar\u0131lm\u0131yor olmam\u0131zdan kaynaklan\u0131yor.\n  Yanl\u0131\u015f haber ba\u015fl\u0131\u011f\u0131, baz\u0131 haber siteleri ve Twitter kullan\u0131c\u0131lar\u0131 taraf\u0131ndan da payla\u015f\u0131lm\u0131\u015f. Saadet Partisi \u0130stanbul Milletvekili Cihangir \u0130slam da yanl\u0131\u015f haber ba\u015fl\u0131\u011f\u0131ndan yola \u00e7\u0131karak payla\u015f\u0131mda bulunmu\u015f:\nMedeniyet (uygarl\u0131k) i\u00e7in bu do\u011frudur ve in\u015faata denk d\u00fc\u015fen bu taraf hayvanlarda da mevcuttur.\nHem de m\u00fchendislik harikalar\u0131 olarak.\nBir yap\u0131n\u0131n insana \u00f6zg\u00fc olan y\u00f6n\u00fc ise mimaridir.\nBuna da medeniyet de\u011fil \"K\u00fclt\u00fcr\" diyoruz.\nEtik ve esteti\u011fi de i\u00e7eriyor. https://t.co/PBG2ey3VCr\n\u2014 cihangir islam (@cihangirislam) December 20, 2018\n  G\u00f6r\u00fcld\u00fc\u011f\u00fc \u00fczere, Erdo\u011fan\u2019\u0131n \u201cMedeniyet esasta bir in\u015faat faaliyetidir\u201d dedi\u011fi iddias\u0131 do\u011fru de\u011fildir. Cumhurba\u015fkanl\u0131\u011f\u0131 K\u00fclt\u00fcr ve Sanat B\u00fcy\u00fck \u00d6d\u00fclleri t\u00f6reninde konu\u015fan Erdo\u011fan, konu\u015fmas\u0131n\u0131n ilgili b\u00f6l\u00fcm\u00fcnde \u201cMedeniyet esasta bir in\u015fa faaliyetidir\u201d demi\u015ftir. BirG\u00fcn Gazetesi Erdo\u011fan\u2019\u0131n ifadesini de\u011fi\u015ftirerek Twitter ve web sayfalar\u0131nda payla\u015fm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r; ancak gelen tepkiler \u00fczerine bu payla\u015f\u0131mlar\u0131 kald\u0131rm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r.\n  Kaynaklar: kaynak1, kaynak2, kaynak3, kaynak4, kaynak5\nVideo oynat\u0131c\u0131\nhttps://dogrula.org/wp-content/uploads/2018/02/dogrula.org_.mp4\n00:00\n00:07\n[Toplam:1    Ortalama:5/5] Erdo\u011fan\u2019\u0131n \u201cMedeniyet Esasta Bir \u0130n\u015faat Faaliyetidir\u201d Dedi\u011fi \u0130ddias\u0131", "  Sosyal medya platformlar\u0131nda payla\u015f\u0131lan bu iddia, binlerce be\u011feni ve yorum etkile\u015fimi ald\u0131. Ayn\u0131 iddia, baz\u0131 haber sitelerinde de payla\u015f\u0131ld\u0131.\nCoca Cola\u2019n\u0131n Energy Brands markas\u0131n\u0131n, telefonunu 365 g\u00fcn kullanmayan ki\u015fiye 100 bin dolar verece\u011fi iddias\u0131 do\u011frudur.\n    Coca-Cola Company yan kurulu\u015fu olan Energy Brands \u015firketinin Vitaminwater markas\u0131 taraf\u0131ndan d\u00fczenlenen yar\u0131\u015fma, Vitaminwater Twitter hesab\u0131nda da duyurulmu\u015ftur.\nlearned from the pain n turned out amazin ! pic.twitter.com/8ACDV4dWvB\n\u2014 dan *\u30fb\u00b0\u2606. (@gIimmerin) December 17, 2018\na year without a smartphone? https://t.co/NN0bGBprv9\n\u2014 vitaminwater\u00ae (@vitaminwater) December 14, 2018\n  1 y\u0131l s\u00fcrecek olan yar\u0131\u015fmaya son kat\u0131l\u0131m tarihi de 8 Ocak 2019 olarak belirlenmi\u015f.\nYar\u0131\u015fmaya dair yap\u0131lan Twitter payla\u015f\u0131mlar\u0131, Coca-Cola web sitesinde de payla\u015f\u0131lm\u0131\u015f:\n  Yar\u0131\u015fma i\u00e7in Twitter ortam\u0131nda #NoPhoneForAYear ve #contest hashtagleri kullan\u0131l\u0131yor.\n  \u015eirket yar\u0131\u015fma kurallar\u0131na g\u00f6re 22 Ocak tarihinde yar\u0131\u015fmac\u0131lar\u0131 se\u00e7ecek ve onlara 1996 d\u00f6nemine ait bir cep telefonu verecek. Se\u00e7ilen yar\u0131\u015fmac\u0131lar\u0131n ba\u015fkalar\u0131na ait olan telefon ve tabletleri kullanmas\u0131 da yasak olacak, ancak kat\u0131l\u0131mc\u0131lar bilgisayar ve laptop kullanabilecek. Google Home ve Amazon Echo gibi cihazlar\u0131 kullanmak da sorun olmayacak.\n1 seneyi tamamlayan yar\u0131\u015fmac\u0131lar 100.000 dolar, 6 ay dayanabilenler ise 10.000 dolar \u00f6d\u00fcl alacak.\n  Coca-Cola\u2019n\u0131n sponsor oldu\u011fu bu yar\u0131\u015fma ulusal ve sadece 18 ya\u015f ve \u00fcst\u00fc Amerikal\u0131lar kat\u0131labiliyor.\n  Kaynaklar: kaynak1, kaynak2, kaynak3, kaynak4, kaynak5, kaynak6\nVideo oynat\u0131c\u0131\nhttps://dogrula.org/wp-content/uploads/2018/02/dogrula.org_.mp4\n00:00\n00:07\n[Toplam:1    Ortalama:5/5] Coca Cola\u2019n\u0131n Energy Brands Markas\u0131, Telefonunu 365 G\u00fcn Kullanmayan Ki\u015fiye 100 bin Dolar Verecek \u0130ddias\u0131", "  ABD Ba\u015fkan\u0131 Donald Trump\u2019\u0131n 1 dolar maa\u015f ald\u0131\u011f\u0131 iddias\u0131, ba\u015fkanl\u0131\u011f\u0131ndan bu yana g\u00fcndeme gelen konulardan biridir.\nAncak Trump\u2019\u0131n ba\u015fkanl\u0131k g\u00f6revinden dolay\u0131 1 dolar maa\u015f ald\u0131\u011f\u0131 iddias\u0131 do\u011fru de\u011fildir; Donald Trump ABD ba\u015fkan\u0131 olarak 400.000 dolar maa\u015f almaktad\u0131r.\nY\u0131ll\u0131k 400.000 dolar maa\u015f alan Trump bu parayla federal kurumlara ba\u011f\u0131\u015f yap\u0131yor.\n\u20181 Dolar\u2019 \u0130fadesi Nereden Geliyor?\nBu ifade, Trump\u2019\u0131n kendisi taraf\u0131ndan kullan\u0131lm\u0131\u015f. Trump 2016 y\u0131l\u0131nda yapt\u0131\u011f\u0131 bir a\u00e7\u0131klamada, ABD Ba\u015fkan\u0131 olarak maa\u015f almayaca\u011f\u0131n\u0131 s\u00f6ylemi\u015f. Kat\u0131ld\u0131\u011f\u0131 bir programda, bu g\u00f6reve maa\u015f i\u00e7in gelmedi\u011fini, yasal zorunluluktan \u00f6t\u00fcr\u00fc temsili olarak 1 dolar alaca\u011f\u0131n\u0131 ifade etmi\u015f.\nDonald Trump says he will not take a salary as president https://t.co/f2DG9RTH6J pic.twitter.com/Cl8bUzYZyj\n\u2014 Washington Examiner (@dcexaminer) November 14, 2016\nAncak b\u00fct\u00fcn Amerikan ba\u015fkanlar\u0131 gibi, Trump da maa\u015f al\u0131yor.\nTrump Y\u0131lda 400.000 Dolar Maa\u015f Al\u0131yor\n  ABD Ba\u015fkan\u0131 Donald Trump\u2019a, y\u0131lda 400.000 dolar maa\u015f, ayr\u0131ca y\u0131lda 50.000 dolarl\u0131k ekstra harcama \u00f6dene\u011fi, 100.000 dolarl\u0131k vergiye tabi olmayan bir seyahat hesab\u0131 ve e\u011flence i\u00e7in 19.000 dolar \u00f6deniyor.\nCNBC Make It, ABD ba\u015fkanlar\u0131na verilen maa\u015flar\u0131n bug\u00fcnk\u00fc de\u011ferini belirlemek amac\u0131yla bir enflasyon hesaplay\u0131c\u0131s\u0131 kullanm\u0131\u015f. Bir \u00f6nceki ba\u015fkanlar\u0131n kazand\u0131klar\u0131yla kar\u015f\u0131la\u015ft\u0131r\u0131ld\u0131\u011f\u0131nda, Trump\u2019a \u00f6denen y\u0131lda 400.000 dolarl\u0131k maa\u015f\u0131n pek de fazla olmad\u0131\u011f\u0131 ortaya \u00e7\u0131km\u0131\u015f.\nTrump 1 Dolar Ald\u0131\u011f\u0131n\u0131 Kan\u0131tlamay\u0131 Reddetmi\u015f\n  Ba\u015fkanl\u0131\u011f\u0131 \u00f6ncesinde ortaya at\u0131lan iddialardan biri de, Trump\u2019\u0131n 400.000 dolar maa\u015f\u0131n\u0131 hay\u0131r kurumlar\u0131na ba\u011f\u0131\u015flayaca\u011f\u0131yd\u0131.\nAncak, Beyaz Saray ve Hazine, ba\u015fkan\u0131n 400,000 dolarl\u0131k gelirini ba\u011f\u0131\u015flad\u0131\u011f\u0131n\u0131 kan\u0131tlayamam\u0131\u015ft\u0131.\nDonald Trump, se\u00e7im kampanyas\u0131 boyunca ba\u015fkanl\u0131k maa\u015f\u0131n\u0131 almay\u0131 kabul etmeyece\u011fini vaat etmesine ra\u011fmen, 400.000 dolarl\u0131k y\u0131ll\u0131k maa\u015f\u0131n\u0131 hay\u0131r kurumuna ba\u011f\u0131\u015flad\u0131\u011f\u0131n\u0131 kan\u0131tlamay\u0131 reddetmi\u015f.\nIndependent gazetesinin bu konuya ili\u015fkin bilgi almak ad\u0131na yetkililerle g\u00f6r\u00fc\u015fme talepleri de g\u00f6z ard\u0131 edilmi\u015f.\nBas\u0131n S\u00f6zc\u00fcs\u00fc Maa\u015f\u0131n\u0131 Ba\u011f\u0131\u015flad\u0131\u011f\u0131n\u0131 S\u00f6ylemi\u015f\nBeyaz Saray Bas\u0131n S\u00f6zc\u00fcs\u00fc Sarah Huckabee Sanders, Politifact web sitesine Trump\u2019\u0131n maa\u015f\u0131n\u0131 ba\u011f\u0131\u015flad\u0131\u011f\u0131 konusunda a\u00e7\u0131klama yapm\u0131\u015f.\n  Net geliri tahmini 3 milyar dolar olan Donald Trump\u2019\u0131n 2017 y\u0131l\u0131nda ba\u015fkanl\u0131k maa\u015f\u0131n\u0131 ba\u011f\u0131\u015flad\u0131\u011f\u0131na dair haberler de mevcut.\nMaa\u015f\u0131n\u0131n Ne Kadar\u0131n\u0131 Ba\u011f\u0131\u015flad\u0131\u011f\u0131 Belli De\u011fil\nTrump\u2019\u0131n ba\u011f\u0131\u015f yapt\u0131\u011f\u0131 baz\u0131 kurumlar\u0131n bilgisine ula\u015fmak m\u00fcmk\u00fcn, ancak 400.000 dolar\u0131n ne kadar\u0131n\u0131 ba\u011f\u0131\u015flad\u0131\u011f\u0131 tam olarak belli de\u011fil.\nTrump \u015fimdiye dek federal kurumlara maa\u015f\u0131n\u0131n d\u00f6rtte birine denk gelen miktarda ba\u011f\u0131\u015fta bulunmu\u015f.\nProud to accept $78k donation from @POTUS of his first quarter salary on behalf of @NatlParkService #FindYourPark pic.twitter.com/HWvbNkvC82\n\u2014 Secretary Ryan Zinke (@SecretaryZinke) April 3, 2017\nTrump\u2019\u0131n ABD K\u00fc\u00e7\u00fck \u0130\u015fletmeler \u0130daresi\u2019ne de ba\u011f\u0131\u015fta bulundu\u011fu haberleri mevcut.\n  G\u00f6r\u00fcld\u00fc\u011f\u00fc \u00fczere, ABD Ba\u015fkan\u0131 Donald Trump\u2019\u0131n y\u0131ll\u0131k maa\u015f\u0131 1 dolar de\u011fil, 400.000 dolar. Ancak maa\u015f\u0131n\u0131 almak yerine ba\u011f\u0131\u015flad\u0131\u011f\u0131 haberleri de kaynaklarda yer alan bilgilerden biri.\nKaynaklar: kaynak1, kaynak2, kaynak3, kaynak4, kaynak5, kaynak6, kaynak7, kaynak8, kaynak9, kaynak10\nVideo oynat\u0131c\u0131\nhttps://dogrula.org/wp-content/uploads/2018/02/dogrula.org_.mp4\n00:00\n00:07\n[Toplam:1    Ortalama:5/5] ABD Ba\u015fkan\u0131 Trump\u2019\u0131n 1 Dolar Maa\u015f Ald\u0131\u011f\u0131 \u0130ddias\u0131", "  Twitter, Instagram ve Facebook platformlar\u0131nda payla\u015f\u0131lan bu g\u00f6rselin, Erzurum\u2019daki Hasan Basri t\u00fcrbesinin bug\u00fcnk\u00fc halini g\u00f6sterdi\u011fi iddia edildi.\n\u00c7ok katl\u0131 binalar\u0131n aras\u0131nda bulunan ve toprak k\u00fctle \u00fczerinde kald\u0131\u011f\u0131 g\u00f6r\u00fclen foto\u011fraf ger\u00e7ektir, s\u00f6z konusu iddia do\u011frudur. T\u00fcrbe, Erzurum\u2019un merkez Yakutiye il\u00e7esindeki Hasan-\u0131 Basri mahallesinde ba\u015flat\u0131lan kentsel d\u00f6n\u00fc\u015f\u00fcm projesine dahil edilmi\u015ftir.\nKentsel D\u00f6n\u00fc\u015f\u00fcm ve Cazibe Merkezi Projesi\n  Yakutiye Belediyesi\u2019nin \u201cKentsel D\u00f6n\u00fc\u015f\u00fcm ve Cazibe Merkezi Projesi\u201d ad\u0131 alt\u0131nda yapt\u0131\u011f\u0131 \u00e7al\u0131\u015fmada, \u00e7evre sakinleri t\u00fcrbenin y\u0131k\u0131lmas\u0131na izin vermedi\u011fi i\u00e7in bu foto\u011fraf ortaya \u00e7\u0131km\u0131\u015f.\n    \u00c7evre sakinleri t\u00fcrbenin y\u0131k\u0131lmas\u0131na raz\u0131 olmad\u0131\u011f\u0131 i\u00e7in de projede de\u011fi\u015fiklik yap\u0131lm\u0131\u015f.\nProje kapsam\u0131nda binalar aras\u0131nda yer alacak olan t\u00fcrbenin g\u00f6r\u00fcnt\u00fcs\u00fc\n  Proje \u00e7al\u0131\u015fmas\u0131 kapsam\u0131nda in\u015faat alan\u0131 g\u00f6r\u00fcnt\u00fcs\u00fc\n  Belediye Ba\u015fkan\u0131 Ali Korkut\u2019un A\u00e7\u0131klamas\u0131\nYakupiye Belediye Ba\u015fkan\u0131 Ali Korkut, t\u00fcrbeye ili\u015fkin iddialar \u00fczerine Twitter hesab\u0131ndan yaz\u0131l\u0131 a\u00e7\u0131klama yapm\u0131\u015f.\nAli Korkut, \"T\u00fcrbe yalanlar\u0131 hi\u00e7 bitmiyor\" pic.twitter.com/NVCJVO4gBK\n\u2014 Ali Korkut (@AliKorkutyakuti) June 2, 2018\n  A\u00e7\u0131klamada t\u00fcrbenin ger\u00e7ek olmad\u0131\u011f\u0131 ifadeleri de yer al\u0131yor. T\u00fcrbeye ili\u015fkin baz\u0131 ifadeler \u015f\u00f6yle:\n\u201cOtopark in\u015fas\u0131 i\u00e7in t\u00fcrbenin etraf\u0131 bo\u015falt\u0131lm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r. Otopark\u0131n istinat duvarlar\u0131 yap\u0131ld\u0131ktan sonra \u00fcst\u00fc toprakla kapat\u0131lacak, t\u00fcrbeyle ayn\u0131 seviyeye getirilecektir. B\u00f6ylece t\u00fcrbe rekreasyon alan\u0131 i\u00e7erisinde kalacak.\u201d\n\u201cErzurum tarihiyle ilgili bilimsel eserlerde Hasan-i Basri\u2019nin Erzurum ile en k\u00fc\u00e7\u00fck bir ba\u011f\u0131nt\u0131s\u0131 olmad\u0131\u011f\u0131 ger\u00e7e\u011fini yineliyorum. Rivayetler \u00fczerine 1993 y\u0131l\u0131nda Erzurum Belediyesi taraf\u0131ndan ucube bir yap\u0131 ihdas edilmi\u015f. Ad\u0131 Hasan-i Basri t\u00fcrbesi olmu\u015f. B\u00fct\u00fcn mesele budur. Hasan-i Basri\u2019nin makam\u0131 Irak Basra\u2019dad\u0131r ancak bilindik \u00e7evreler bu yalan\u0131 pompalamaya devam ediyor.\u201d\nErzurum\u2019da yerel bir gazetede bu t\u00fcrbe hakk\u0131ndaki ifade \u015fu \u015fekilde:\n  Yaz\u0131da ayr\u0131ca \u201cErzurum\u2019da Hasan-i Basri hazretleri ad\u0131na a\u00e7\u0131lm\u0131\u015f bir zaviye (tekke) mevcut. G\u00fcn\u00fcm\u00fczde i\u015faret edilen yer makamd\u0131r. Buras\u0131 Necati G\u00fcll\u00fcl\u00fc Bey\u2019in belediye ba\u015fkanl\u0131\u011f\u0131 d\u00f6neminde \u00e7evre d\u00fczenlemesi yap\u0131larak t\u00fcrbe haline getirilmi\u015ftir.\u201d ifadesi mevcut.\n  \u0130n\u015faat halindeki binalar\u0131n aras\u0131nda bir toprak y\u0131\u011f\u0131n\u0131n\u0131n \u00fczerinde bulunan t\u00fcrbe g\u00f6r\u00fcnt\u00fcs\u00fc sosyal medyada photoshop \u00fcr\u00fcn\u00fc olarak da payla\u015f\u0131lm\u0131\u015f, ancak g\u00f6r\u00fcnt\u00fc ger\u00e7ek.\nKaynaklar: kaynak1, kaynak2, kaynak3, kaynak4, kaynak5, kaynak6, kaynak7, kaynak8\nVideo oynat\u0131c\u0131\nhttps://dogrula.org/wp-content/uploads/2018/02/dogrula.org_.mp4\n00:00\n00:07\n[Toplam:1    Ortalama:5/5] Erzurum\u2019daki Hasan Basri T\u00fcrbesinin Bug\u00fcnk\u00fc Halini G\u00f6sterdi\u011fi \u0130ddia Edilen Foto\u011fraf", "  Geleneksel inanca g\u00f6re, bir ar\u0131 ki\u015fiyi yaln\u0131zca bir kez sokabilir ve soktuktan sonra da \u00f6l\u00fcr. Peki bu bilgi ger\u00e7ekten do\u011fru mu?\nS\u00f6z konusu iddia do\u011fru de\u011fildir. Soktuktan sonra \u00f6len yaln\u0131zca di\u015fi bal ar\u0131lar\u0131d\u0131r. Yaban ar\u0131s\u0131, e\u015fek ar\u0131s\u0131, bombus ar\u0131s\u0131 gibi ar\u0131lar\u0131n \u00e7o\u011fu birden fazla kez sokar ve ya\u015famaya devam eder.\nAr\u0131lar\u0131n \u00c7o\u011fu Birden Fazla Kez Sokabilir\nGe\u00e7ici ve k\u00fc\u00e7\u00fck etkilerine ra\u011fmen, e\u011fer bir ar\u0131 taraf\u0131ndan sokulduysan\u0131z, ar\u0131n\u0131n bir nevi intihar etti\u011fini bilerek rahat edebilirsiniz. Ancak ar\u0131lar ki\u015fiyi soktuktan sonra ger\u00e7ekten \u00f6l\u00fcrler mi? Cevap, ar\u0131ya ba\u011fl\u0131.\nBal ar\u0131lar\u0131 ki\u015fiyi soktuktan sonra \u00f6l\u00fcrler, ama bombus ar\u0131lar\u0131 ve di\u011fer ar\u0131lar; yaban ar\u0131lar\u0131 ve e\u015fek ar\u0131lar\u0131 sizi sokabilir ve ya\u015famaya devam eder.\nAr\u0131 sokmas\u0131 yayg\u0131n ve a\u011fr\u0131l\u0131d\u0131r, ancak nadiren \u00f6l\u00fcmc\u00fcl olup, her 1000 vakadan yaln\u0131zca bir ya da ikisi \u00f6l\u00fcmle sonu\u00e7lan\u0131r. Bir yaban ar\u0131s\u0131, e\u015fek ar\u0131s\u0131 veya bal ar\u0131s\u0131n\u0131n sokmas\u0131 sonucu ya\u015fanan his, y\u0131ld\u0131r\u0131m \u00e7arpmas\u0131yla ayn\u0131d\u0131r. Ar\u0131 sokmalar\u0131 tipik olarak k\u0131sa bir lokal s\u0131zlama-yanmaya ve o b\u00f6lgede s\u0131n\u0131rl\u0131 iltihaplanmaya neden olur.\n  Bal ar\u0131s\u0131\n  E\u015fek Ar\u0131s\u0131 ve Bal Ar\u0131s\u0131\nAr\u0131 Sokmas\u0131 Nas\u0131l Ger\u00e7ekle\u015fir?\nAr\u0131 sokmas\u0131, bir di\u015fi ar\u0131 ya da yaban ar\u0131s\u0131n\u0131n cildinize konup ovipozit\u00f6r\u00fcn\u00fc (yumurtlama borusu) size kar\u015f\u0131 kulland\u0131\u011f\u0131nda ortaya \u00e7\u0131kar. Sokma i\u015flemi boyunca ar\u0131, sokma aparat\u0131n\u0131n i\u011fneye benzeyen k\u0131sm\u0131ndaki zehirli keselerden cildinize zehirler pompalar.\n\u0130\u011fnenin kendisi, t\u0131rt\u0131klar\u0131 olan iki \u00e7engel aras\u0131ndad\u0131r. Ar\u0131 ya da yaban ar\u0131s\u0131 sizi soktu\u011funda bu sivri u\u00e7lar cildinize g\u00f6m\u00fcl\u00fcr.\nSar\u0131 ar\u0131lar\u0131n, e\u015fek ar\u0131s\u0131 ve yaban ar\u0131s\u0131n\u0131n i\u011fnesinde yer alan sivri u\u00e7lar p\u00fcr\u00fczs\u00fcz oldu\u011fu i\u00e7in, ar\u0131 sokma i\u015flemi bittikten sonra kendisine zarar vermeden i\u011fnesini \u00e7\u0131karabilir. Bu y\u00fczden bu ar\u0131lar soktuktan sonra \u00f6lmez.\nBal Ar\u0131lar\u0131 Soktuklar\u0131nda Neden \u00d6l\u00fcr?\nBal ar\u0131lar\u0131n\u0131n i\u011fnesi, olduk\u00e7a b\u00fcy\u00fck, geriye d\u00f6n\u00fck dikenlere sahiptir. Ar\u0131 ki\u015fiyi soktu\u011funda, bu t\u0131rt\u0131klar bedeninize girerek ar\u0131lar\u0131n i\u011fnesini geri \u00e7ekmesini imkans\u0131z k\u0131lar.\n  Ar\u0131 soktuktan sonra u\u00e7arken, t\u00fcm batma aparat\u0131 karn\u0131ndan \u00e7ekilir ve cildinize b\u0131rak\u0131l\u0131r. Bu abdominal y\u0131rt\u0131lman\u0131n bir sonucu olarak da bal ar\u0131s\u0131 \u00f6l\u00fcr. B\u00f6ylece, bir bal ar\u0131s\u0131 sadece bir kez sokabilir. Bal ar\u0131lar\u0131 b\u00fcy\u00fck sosyal kolonilerde ya\u015fad\u0131\u011f\u0131 i\u00e7in, grup kovanlar\u0131n\u0131 savunmak i\u00e7in birka\u00e7 \u00fcyeyi feda edebilir.\nYaln\u0131zca Di\u015fi Bal Ar\u0131s\u0131 Sokar\nYaln\u0131zca i\u015f\u00e7i ar\u0131lar olarak da bilinen di\u015fi bal ar\u0131lar\u0131 sokar. Erkek bal ar\u0131lar\u0131n\u0131n i\u011fnesi yoktur. Her kovanda 60.000 i\u015f\u00e7i ar\u0131 vard\u0131r; bunu birka\u00e7 y\u00fcz erkek ar\u0131 ve bir di\u015fi krali\u00e7e ar\u0131 takip eder.\n\u0130\u015f\u00e7i ar\u0131lar\u0131 koloni i\u00e7in tek kullan\u0131ml\u0131k askerler gibidir; tek i\u015flevleri \u00f6z toplamak, tozla\u015fmak ve \u00fcss\u00fc savunmakt\u0131r. Hepsi k\u0131s\u0131r kad\u0131nlard\u0131r. Krali\u00e7e b\u00fct\u00fcn yumurtalar\u0131 b\u0131rak\u0131r ve di\u011ferleri onlar\u0131 d\u00f6ller.\n  Krali\u00e7e ar\u0131 yaln\u0131zca, ba\u015fka bir krali\u00e7eye kar\u015f\u0131 hakimiyet i\u00e7in sava\u015f\u0131rken sokar.\nE\u015fek ar\u0131s\u0131 ve yaban ar\u0131s\u0131 sald\u0131rgan olarak bilinirken, bal ar\u0131lar\u0131 uysald\u0131r ve tipik olarak sadece tehdit edildi\u011finde sald\u0131r\u0131rlar.\nBombus Ar\u0131s\u0131\nT\u00fcyl\u00fc bir yap\u0131s\u0131 olan bombus ar\u0131s\u0131, bal ar\u0131s\u0131yla benzerlik g\u00f6stermesiyle bilinir. Ancak bal ar\u0131s\u0131 soktuktan sonra \u00f6l\u00fcr fakat bombus ar\u0131s\u0131 \u00f6lmez.\nBombus ar\u0131lar\u0131n\u0131n kolonileri, bal ar\u0131s\u0131 kolonilerinden k\u00fc\u00e7\u00fckt\u00fcr. Bal ar\u0131lar\u0131na nispeten daha \u015fi\u015fman ve t\u00fcyl\u00fc bir g\u00f6r\u00fcnt\u00fcleri vard\u0131r. Yaln\u0131zca kendileri beslenecekleri miktarda bal yaparlar. Tahrik edildiklerinde sokarlar ve \u00f6lmezler.\nBal ar\u0131s\u0131 i\u011fnesinin aksine, bombus ar\u0131s\u0131 i\u011fnesinin t\u0131rt\u0131klar\u0131 yoktur, bundan dolay\u0131 i\u011fnesini geri rahat\u00e7a \u00e7ekebilir, bu nedenle bombus ar\u0131s\u0131 defalarca sokabilir.\nBambus Ar\u0131s\u0131 (solda) ve Bal Ar\u0131s\u0131\n  G\u00f6r\u00fcld\u00fc\u011f\u00fc gibi, soktuktan sonra \u00f6len yaln\u0131zca di\u015fi bal ar\u0131lar\u0131d\u0131r. Yaban ar\u0131s\u0131, e\u015fek ar\u0131s\u0131, bombus ar\u0131s\u0131 gibi ar\u0131lar\u0131n \u00e7o\u011fu birden fazla kez sokar ve ya\u015famaya devam eder. Ar\u0131lar bir kez sokar ve soktuktan sonra \u00f6l\u00fcr iddias\u0131 do\u011fru de\u011fildir.\n  Kaynaklar: kaynak1, kaynak2, kaynak3, kaynak4\nVideo oynat\u0131c\u0131\nhttps://dogrula.org/wp-content/uploads/2018/02/dogrula.org_.mp4\n00:00\n00:07\n[Toplam:1    Ortalama:5/5] Ar\u0131lar Bir Kez Sokar ve Soktuktan Sonra \u00d6l\u00fcr \u0130ddias\u0131", "Sat\u0131\u015f ve gelirinizi art\u0131rmak i\u00e7in gereken baz\u0131 pazarlama stratejileri ba\u015fl\u0131kl\u0131 ara\u015ft\u0131rma yaz\u0131m\u0131zda, b\u00fcy\u00fcyen bir marka i\u00e7in gereken etkili baz\u0131 sat\u0131\u015f stratejilerini inceledik.\n\u0130nsanlar Fayda Sat\u0131n Al\u0131r\nKullan\u0131c\u0131lar \u00fcr\u00fcnleri sat\u0131n almaz, \u00fcr\u00fcn\u00fcn verece\u011fi sonu\u00e7lar\u0131 sat\u0131n al\u0131r. M\u00fc\u015fterinizin \u00fcr\u00fcn veya hizmetinizi kullanarak elde edece\u011fi t\u00fcm avantajlar\u0131n bir listesini yaparak, ideal m\u00fc\u015fteri tan\u0131mlama s\u00fcrecinizi ba\u015flatabilirsiniz.\nM\u00fc\u015fterinizi A\u00e7\u0131k\u00e7a Tan\u0131mlay\u0131n\n\u00dcr\u00fcn\u00fcn\u00fcz\u00fc sat\u0131n alma olas\u0131l\u0131\u011f\u0131 en y\u00fcksek olan ve hemen sat\u0131n alan ki\u015fi kim? Bu m\u00fc\u015fterinin bir avatar\u0131n\u0131 olu\u015fturun.\nBelirli sorular sorun:\nKa\u00e7 ya\u015f\u0131nda?\nErkek mi kad\u0131n m\u0131?\n\u00c7ocuklar\u0131 var m\u0131?\nNe kadar para kazan\u0131yor?\nE\u011fitimi var m\u0131?\nSorunu A\u00e7\u0131k\u00e7a Belirleyin\nM\u00fc\u015fterinizin \u00e7\u00f6zebilece\u011fi bir sorunu var m\u0131? M\u00fc\u015fterinizi do\u011fru bir \u015fekilde tan\u0131mlad\u0131ysan\u0131z, sorunlar\u0131n\u0131 \u00e7\u00f6zmek i\u00e7in size \u00f6deme yapacaklard\u0131r.\nBazen problemler a\u00e7\u0131k ve nettir. Bazen ise a\u00e7\u0131k de\u011fildir, ya da belirsizdir.\nBazen m\u00fc\u015fteri i\u00e7in bir problem mevcut de\u011fildir. Problem yoksa, m\u00fc\u015fteri \u00fcr\u00fcn\u00fcn\u00fcz\u00fc sat\u0131n almayacakt\u0131r.\nSosyal Medya Pazarlamas\u0131n\u0131 Kullan\u0131n\n\u00dcr\u00fcn\u00fcn\u00fcz\u00fc m\u00fc\u015fterilerinize ula\u015ft\u0131rman\u0131n hi\u00e7 olmad\u0131\u011f\u0131 kadar \u00e7ok yolu vard\u0131r. \u00dcstelik hepsi bedava. Facebook, Twitter ve blog gibi sosyal medyay\u0131 ara\u00e7lar\u0131n\u0131 kullanarak b\u00fcy\u00fck avantaj elde edebilirsiniz. M\u00fc\u015fterilerinizle bu kanallar \u00fczerinden ili\u015fkiler kurarak, her zamankinden daha fazla insana eri\u015febilirsiniz.\n\u0130\u00e7erik pazarlamas\u0131n\u0131n faydalar\u0131ndan baz\u0131lar\u0131 \u015funlard\u0131r:\nNitelikli m\u00fc\u015fteri adaylar\u0131na daha fazla eri\u015fim.\n\u00dcr\u00fcn\u00fcn\u00fcz\u00fc satmak i\u00e7in daha fazla kanal.\nM\u00fc\u015fterileri elde etmek i\u00e7in daha d\u00fc\u015f\u00fck maliyetler.\nVerilerin \u0130nternette ne kadar h\u0131zl\u0131 \u00fcretildi\u011fini g\u00f6steren grafikler.\nSat\u0131\u015fa Ba\u015flad\u0131\u011f\u0131n\u0131zda 100 \u00c7a\u011fr\u0131 Y\u00f6ntemini Deneyin\nSat\u0131\u015f \u00f6ncesinde 100 m\u00fc\u015fteriye olabildi\u011fince h\u0131zl\u0131 ula\u015f\u0131n. \u00dcr\u00fcn\u00fcn\u00fcz\u00fc satarken korkusuz olmal\u0131s\u0131n\u0131z. Burada sat\u0131\u015f sonu\u00e7lar\u0131na de\u011fil, ne kadar insana ula\u015ft\u0131\u011f\u0131n\u0131za odaklanmal\u0131s\u0131n\u0131z.\nDo\u011fru Fiyat\u0131 Se\u00e7in\nDo\u011fru fiyat\u0131 belirlemek i\u00e7in rakipleriniz hakk\u0131nda pazar ara\u015ft\u0131rmas\u0131 yap\u0131n. Y\u00fcksek fiyatl\u0131 bir \u00fcr\u00fcn\u00fcn\u00fcz varsa, m\u00fc\u015fterilerinize kaliteyi g\u00f6sterin. Fiyat, \u00fcr\u00fcn\u00fcn \u201calg\u0131lanan de\u011feri\u201d ile belirlenebilir. \u00dcr\u00fcn\u00fcn\u00fcz\u00fc rakiplerinizden \u00fcst\u00fcn g\u00f6sterebilir; daha y\u00fcksek bir fiyat alabilirsiniz.\nUygun M\u00fczakere Tekniklerini \u00d6\u011frenin\nNitelikli m\u00fczakereciler genellikle her iki taraf i\u00e7in de tatmin edici olan bir \u00e7\u00f6z\u00fcm ya da d\u00fczenleme bulmak konusunda endi\u015fe eder. Her iki taraf\u0131n da m\u00fczakerenin sonu\u00e7lar\u0131ndan memnun oldu\u011fu \u201ckazan-kazan\u201d durumlar\u0131n\u0131 ararlar.\nEn iyi m\u00fczakereciler \u015fu 3 niteli\u011fe sahiptir:\n\u0130htiyac\u0131 olan \u015feyi tam olarak \u00f6\u011frenmek i\u00e7in iyi sorular sorar.\nSab\u0131rl\u0131d\u0131r.\n\u00c7ok iyi haz\u0131rlan\u0131r.\nEtkili Sunumlar Yap\u0131n\nSat\u0131\u015fta, m\u00fc\u015fterilere yarat\u0131c\u0131 ve \u00e7ekici bir sat\u0131\u015f sunumu yapmak \u00f6nemlidir. Bir\u00e7ok yoldan biri, PowerPoint\u2019i kullanarak etkili bir sunum olu\u015fturmakt\u0131r.\nM\u00fc\u015fterilerinizi Kazanmaya Bak\u0131n\n\u201cBir kere m\u00fc\u015fteri, her zaman m\u00fc\u015fteri.\u201d\nBir m\u00fc\u015fteri \u00fcr\u00fcn\u00fcn\u00fcz\u00fc sat\u0131n ald\u0131ktan sonra bu, onlarla ili\u015fkinizin sonu olmamal\u0131d\u0131r. M\u00fc\u015fterinizle g\u00fc\u00e7l\u00fc bir ili\u015fki kurmaya odaklan\u0131n. Sat\u0131\u015f sonras\u0131 devam eden ili\u015fki, aran\u0131zda daha fazla g\u00fcven olu\u015fturacak ve \u00fcr\u00fcn\u00fcn\u00fcze de\u011fer katacakt\u0131r.\nPotansiyel M\u00fc\u015fterilere Harika Bir \u015eeyi Bedava Sunun\nM\u00fc\u015fterinize gereken \u00f6n izlemeyi verirseniz, ideal m\u00fc\u015fterinin \u00fcr\u00fcn\u00fcn\u00fcz\u00fc sat\u0131n alma olas\u0131l\u0131\u011f\u0131 daha y\u00fcksektir.\nSat\u0131\u015f Mesaj\u0131n\u0131z Net Olsun\n\u00dcr\u00fcnlerinizin bir ya da iki yarar\u0131n\u0131 se\u00e7in ve bunlar\u0131 a\u00e7\u0131k\u00e7a sat\u0131\u015f ba\u015fl\u0131\u011f\u0131nda belirtin. M\u00fc\u015fterilerinize, \u00fcr\u00fcnlerinizin onlara ne yarar sa\u011flayaca\u011f\u0131n\u0131 tam olarak a\u00e7\u0131klay\u0131n. A\u00e7\u0131k olun. \u00dcr\u00fcn\u00fcn\u00fcz\u00fcn birden fazla avantaj\u0131 varsa, farkl\u0131 m\u00fc\u015fteriler i\u00e7in ili\u015fkilendirebilecekleri sat\u0131\u015f mesajlar\u0131 olu\u015fturun.\nKaynak: Brian Tracy, sat\u0131\u015f e\u011fitmeni\nVideo oynat\u0131c\u0131\nhttps://dogrula.org/wp-content/uploads/2018/02/dogrula.org_.mp4\n00:00\n00:07\n[Toplam:0    Ortalama:0/5] Sat\u0131\u015f ve Gelirinizi Art\u0131rmak \u0130\u00e7in Gereken Baz\u0131 Pazarlama Stratejileri", "  Uzay ke\u015ffiyle ilgili en pop\u00fcler efsanelerden biri, \u00c7in Seddi\u2019nin uzaydan g\u00f6r\u00fclebilen insan yap\u0131m\u0131 tek yap\u0131 oldu\u011fudur. Yaln\u0131zca T\u00fcrkiye\u2019de de\u011fil, d\u00fcnyada bir fenomen olan; \u00c7in Seddi\u2019nin uzaydan g\u00f6r\u00fclebildi\u011fi iddias\u0131 do\u011fru de\u011fildir.\nGer\u00e7ek \u015fu ki, \u00c7in Seddi al\u00e7ak D\u00fcnya y\u00f6r\u00fcngesinden bile \u00e7\u0131plak g\u00f6zle kolayca g\u00f6r\u00fclmez. Ve \u015f\u00fcphesiz, Apollo astronotlar\u0131n\u0131n \u00c7in Seddi\u2019ni Ay\u2019dan g\u00f6rebildikleri de \u015fehir efsanesidir.\n  Kanadal\u0131 astronot Chris Hadfield, 2012\u20132013 y\u0131llar\u0131nda Uluslararas\u0131 Uzay \u0130stasyonu\u2019nda be\u015f ay ge\u00e7irmi\u015f ve \u00c7in Seddi\u2019nin uzaydan g\u00f6r\u00fcnebilirli\u011fi ile ilgili ger\u00e7ekleri yinelemi\u015ftir. Hadfield , \u201c\u00c7in Seddi, \u00e7\u0131plak g\u00f6zle y\u00f6r\u00fcngeden g\u00f6r\u00fcnmez. \u00c7ok dar ve tabiat\u0131n do\u011fal konturleriyle benzer renktedir.\u201d demi\u015ftir.\n  I've not seen the Great Wall of China from space, and neither did the Chinese astronauts. With a big enough camera lens & clear air, maybe.\n\u2014 Chris Hadfield (@Cmdr_Hadfield) March 5, 2013\n  Hadfiel payla\u015f\u0131m\u0131nda, \u201cBen uzaydan \u00c7in Seddi\u2019ni g\u00f6rmedim, \u00c7inli astronotlarda ayn\u0131 \u015fekilde. A\u00e7\u0131k havada, yeteri kadar b\u00fcy\u00fck bir kamera lensinden, belki.\u201d demi\u015ftir.\n  Ayr\u0131ca, \u00c7in\u2019in ilk astronotu Yang Liwei, 2003 y\u0131l\u0131nda uzaya gitti\u011finde, \u00c7in Seddi\u2019nin yap\u0131s\u0131n\u0131 uzay arac\u0131n\u0131n cam\u0131ndan g\u00f6rmedi\u011fini s\u00f6ylemi\u015ftir.\nNASA, \u00c7in Seddi\u2019nin ilk kan\u0131tlanabilir g\u00f6r\u00fcnt\u00fcs\u00fcn\u00fcn ABD\u2019li astronotu Leroy Chiao taraf\u0131ndan 2004 y\u0131l\u0131nda bir yak\u0131nla\u015ft\u0131rma objektifi kullanarak Uluslararas\u0131 Uzay \u0130stasyonu\u2019ndaki penceresinden \u00e7ekildi\u011fini do\u011frulam\u0131\u015ft\u0131r. Astronot, Pekin\u2019in yakla\u015f\u0131k 200 mil kuzeyindeki \u0130\u00e7 Mo\u011folistan\u2019\u0131n bir b\u00f6lgesinin foto\u011fraf\u0131n\u0131 \u00e7ekmi\u015ftir; ancak Chiao\u2019nun kendisi, \u00e7\u0131plak g\u00f6zleriyle duvar\u0131 g\u00f6rmedi\u011fini ve resimde duvar\u0131n g\u00f6r\u00fcn\u00fcp g\u00f6r\u00fcnmedi\u011finden emin olmad\u0131\u011f\u0131n\u0131 s\u00f6ylemi\u015ftir.\nNASA web sitesinden al\u0131nan foto\u011fraflar:\n\u0130nsan Yap\u0131m\u0131 Yap\u0131lar Uzaydan G\u00f6r\u00fclebilir mi?\nUzay \u0130stasyonu astronotlar\u0131, Giza\u2019daki antik piramitleri g\u00f6rmenin nispeten kolay oldu\u011funu s\u00f6ylemi\u015flerdir, ancak en \u00e7ok g\u00f6r\u00fclebilenler, yollar ya da bo\u011fazlar boyunca uzanan k\u00f6pr\u00fclerdir. Bu \u00f6zellikler Chris Hadfieldtaraf\u0131ndan payla\u015f\u0131lan bu g\u00f6r\u00fcnt\u00fc gibi, manzara \u00fczerinde d\u00fcz \u00e7izgiler olarak \u00f6ne \u00e7\u0131kar:\nThe Pyramids at Giza, Egypt \u2013 can you see them? pic.twitter.com/aP43h0pl\n\u2014 Chris Hadfield (@Cmdr_Hadfield) January 2, 2013\n  Bununla beraber, \u015fehirler \u00fcrettikleri \u0131\u015f\u0131k y\u00fcz\u00fcnden gece uzaydan g\u00f6r\u00fclebilir. NASA\u2019n\u0131n 2012\u2019de Suomi NPP uydular\u0131ndan \u00e7\u0131kard\u0131\u011f\u0131 baz\u0131 \u00e7arp\u0131c\u0131 \u015fehir \u0131\u015f\u0131klar\u0131 g\u00f6r\u00fcnt\u00fcleri \u015f\u00f6yledir:\n  G\u00f6r\u00fcld\u00fc\u011f\u00fc \u00fczere, \u00c7in Seddi\u2019nin uzaydan g\u00f6r\u00fclebildi\u011fi iddias\u0131 do\u011fru de\u011fildir.\nKaynaklar: kaynak1, kaynak2, kaynak3, kaynak4, kaynak5, kaynak6, kaynak7\nVideo oynat\u0131c\u0131\nhttps://dogrula.org/wp-content/uploads/2018/02/dogrula.org_.mp4\n00:00\n00:07\n[Toplam:0    Ortalama:0/5] \u00c7in Seddi\u2019nin Uzaydan G\u00f6r\u00fclebildi\u011fi \u0130ddias\u0131", "  Sosyal medyada payla\u015f\u0131lan bu g\u00f6rsel, yakla\u015f\u0131k 57 bin kez payla\u015f\u0131ld\u0131, y\u00fczlerce be\u011feni ve yorum ald\u0131.\n\u0130srail taraf\u0131ndan Filistinlileri \u00f6ld\u00fcrmek i\u00e7in \u00fcretilen a\u011fr\u0131 kesicinin 6 g\u00fcnde ki\u015fiyi \u00f6ld\u00fcrd\u00fc\u011f\u00fc ve de\u011fi\u015fik \u00fclkelerde yanl\u0131\u015fl\u0131kla kullan\u0131l\u0131p test edildi\u011fi iddialar\u0131 do\u011fru de\u011fildir.\nParacetamol Tablets Ip Nedir?\n\u00d6ncelikle, Paracetamol adl\u0131 ilac\u0131 \u0130srail\u2019in \u00fcretti\u011fi iddias\u0131 do\u011fru de\u011fil.\nG\u00f6rseldeki ila\u00e7, Zentiva ila\u00e7 firmas\u0131 taraf\u0131ndan \u00fcretilen bir a\u011fr\u0131 kesicidir. Zentiva, genel merkezi Prag, \u00c7ekya\u2019da bulunan bir firmad\u0131r. Zentiva\u2019n\u0131n resmi web sitesindeki \u201cWho we are\u201d (Biz kimiz) sayfas\u0131nda, Prag ve B\u00fckre\u015f\u2019te \u00fcretim yerleri bulundu\u011funu g\u00f6rmek m\u00fcmk\u00fcn.\n  Bunu, Zentiva\u2019n\u0131n LinkedIn sayfas\u0131nda da g\u00f6rmek m\u00fcmk\u00fcn:\n  Paracetamol 500mg Tablets \u0130nternet ortam\u0131nda arat\u0131ld\u0131\u011f\u0131nda, ila\u00e7 bilgilerinin yer ald\u0131\u011f\u0131 \u015fu siteye ula\u015f\u0131labiliyor. Sitede \u00fcretici firma ve ilac\u0131n pazarlama yetki sahibi a\u00e7\u0131k\u00e7a g\u00f6r\u00fclebiliyor. Verilen adres ise Birle\u015fik Krall\u0131k\u2019ta g\u00f6r\u00fcn\u00fcyor.\n  Yani ilac\u0131n \u00fcretim ve da\u011f\u0131t\u0131m a\u015famalar\u0131nda \u0130srailli firmalar\u0131n olmas\u0131 s\u00f6z konusu de\u011fil.\nZentiva, \u0130srail Men\u015feili \u0130la\u00e7 Firmalar\u0131 Aras\u0131nda Yer Alm\u0131yor\nDetayl\u0131 bir ara\u015ft\u0131rma sonucunda, Zentiva\u2019n\u0131n \u0130srail men\u015feili ila\u00e7 firmalar\u0131 aras\u0131nda yer almad\u0131\u011f\u0131 bilgisine de ula\u015fmak m\u00fcmk\u00fcn.\n\u0130lac\u0131n \u00d6l\u00fcmc\u00fcl Vir\u00fcs Ta\u015f\u0131d\u0131\u011f\u0131 \u0130ddialar\u0131\nBu ila\u00e7, \u0130srail taraf\u0131ndan Filistinlileri \u00f6ld\u00fcrmek i\u00e7in \u00fcretildi\u011fi iddialar\u0131ndan ba\u011f\u0131ms\u0131z olarak, \u0130nternet ortam\u0131nda k\u00f6t\u00fc \u015f\u00f6hret sahibi. Sebebi ise \u00f6l\u00fcmc\u00fcl \u2018Machupo\u2019 vir\u00fcs\u00fc ta\u015f\u0131d\u0131\u011f\u0131 iddialar\u0131yla g\u00fcndeme gelmi\u015f olmas\u0131.\n2017 y\u0131l\u0131n\u0131n ba\u015f\u0131nda, Paracetamol P-500 adl\u0131 ilac\u0131n d\u00fcnyan\u0131n en tehlikeli vir\u00fcslerinden biri olan \u2018machupo\u2019 vir\u00fcs\u00fcn\u00fc i\u00e7erdi\u011finin doktorlar taraf\u0131ndan kan\u0131tland\u0131\u011f\u0131n\u0131 ortaya atan bir Facebook payla\u015f\u0131m\u0131 yap\u0131ld\u0131 ve viral oldu.\n  Ancak iddian\u0131n sahte oldu\u011fu, fact-check sitesi Snopes taraf\u0131ndan da haber yap\u0131ld\u0131.\n  Endonezyal\u0131 ve Malezyal\u0131 yetkililer, ortaya at\u0131lan iddian\u0131n bir \u2018\u015faka\u2019 oldu\u011funu duyurmu\u015ftur.\nMalezya Sa\u011fl\u0131k Bakanl\u0131\u011f\u0131, ila\u00e7 yap\u0131m s\u00fcrecinde vir\u00fcslerin hayatta kalamayaca\u011f\u0131n\u0131 s\u00f6yleyerek paracetamol iddias\u0131n\u0131n uydurma haber oldu\u011funu do\u011frulam\u0131\u015ft\u0131r.\n  Ayr\u0131ca, Machupo vir\u00fcs\u00fcn\u00fcn Paracetamol P-500 isimli ila\u00e7ta bulundu\u011funa dair bir rapora da rastlanmam\u0131\u015ft\u0131r.\nAncak her ne kadar bu ila\u00e7ta \u00f6l\u00fcmc\u00fcl bir vir\u00fcs bulunmasa da, y\u00fcksek dozda al\u0131nan ila\u00e7lar\u0131n karaci\u011fere zarar verdi\u011fi ger\u00e7e\u011fi yads\u0131namaz.\n  G\u00f6r\u00fcld\u00fc\u011f\u00fc \u00fczere, g\u00f6rseldeki ila\u00e7 \u0130srailli bir firma taraf\u0131ndan de\u011fil, \u00c7ekya k\u00f6kenli Zentiva firmas\u0131 taraf\u0131ndan \u00fcretilmi\u015f bir a\u011fr\u0131 kesicidir. Ayr\u0131ca, Paracetamol P-500 adl\u0131 ilac\u0131n \u00f6l\u00fcmc\u00fcl bir vir\u00fcs ta\u015f\u0131d\u0131\u011f\u0131 iddias\u0131n\u0131n da as\u0131ls\u0131z oldu\u011fu kan\u0131tlanm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r.\nKaynaklar: kaynak1, kaynak2, kaynak3, kaynak4, kaynak5, kaynak6, kaynak7\nVideo oynat\u0131c\u0131\nhttps://dogrula.org/wp-content/uploads/2018/02/dogrula.org_.mp4\n00:00\n00:07\n[Toplam:1    Ortalama:5/5] \u0130srail\u2019in Filistinlileri \u00d6ld\u00fcrmek \u0130\u00e7in \u0130la\u00e7 \u00dcretti\u011fi \u0130ddias\u0131", "  Sosyal medya ve \u0130nternet ortamlar\u0131nda payla\u015f\u0131lan bu g\u00f6rsel, binlerce kez payla\u015f\u0131ld\u0131, pek \u00e7ok yorum ve be\u011feni ald\u0131.\nBarcelona futbol kul\u00fcb\u00fc oyuncusu Lionel Messi\u2019nin Atat\u00fcrk bask\u0131l\u0131 ti\u015f\u00f6rt giydi\u011fi iddias\u0131 do\u011fru de\u011fildir; g\u00f6rsel montajlanarak olu\u015fturulmu\u015ftur.\n  2007 y\u0131l\u0131nda oynanan Barcelona\u200a\u2014\u200aReal Madrid ma\u00e7\u0131nda att\u0131\u011f\u0131 gol sonras\u0131 sevincini g\u00f6steren Messi\u2019nin formas\u0131n\u0131n alt\u0131ndaki ti\u015f\u00f6rtte asl\u0131nda \u0130spanyolca \u201cFuerza t\u00edo\u201d yani \u201cg\u00fc\u00e7l\u00fc ol amca\u201d yazmaktad\u0131r. \u0130spanya ligi La Liga\u2019n\u0131n resmi Twitter hesab\u0131ndan Messi\u2019nin ti\u015f\u00f6rt\u00fcnde yazan\u0131 g\u00f6rmek m\u00fcmk\u00fcn:\nThe day a LEGEND was born #OnThisDay 11 years ago, a 19 year-old Leo Messi scored this stunning #ElClasico hat-trick vs Real Madrid! #LaLigaHistory pic.twitter.com/zKB454XPno\n\u2014 LaLiga (@LaLigaEN) March 10, 2018\n    Messi, ti\u015f\u00f6rt\u00fcnde yazan \u201cFuerza t\u00edo\u201d yani \u201cg\u00fc\u00e7l\u00fc ol amca\u201d yaz\u0131s\u0131n\u0131n sebebini de \u015f\u00f6yle a\u00e7\u0131klam\u0131\u015f:\n  \u201cMesaj, bana bir baba gibi olan, ayn\u0131 zamanda vaftiz babam da olan amcam i\u00e7indi. O Arjantin\u2019de, d\u00fcn babas\u0131n\u0131 kaybetti.\u201d\n  G\u00f6r\u00fcld\u00fc\u011f\u00fc \u00fczere, Messi\u2019nin Atat\u00fcrk bask\u0131l\u0131 ti\u015f\u00f6rt giydi\u011fi iddias\u0131 do\u011fru de\u011fil, Messi\u2019nin ti\u015f\u00f6rt\u00fcne Atat\u00fcrk foto\u011fraf\u0131 montajlanm\u0131\u015f.\nKaynaklar: kaynak1, kaynak2, kaynak3\nVideo oynat\u0131c\u0131\nhttps://dogrula.org/wp-content/uploads/2018/02/dogrula.org_.mp4\n00:00\n00:07\n[Toplam:2    Ortalama:5/5] Messi\u2019nin Atat\u00fcrk Bask\u0131l\u0131 Ti\u015f\u00f6rt Giydi\u011fi \u0130ddias\u0131", "  Sosyal medya ortamlar\u0131 ve \u0130nternet haber platformlar\u0131 taraf\u0131ndan payla\u015f\u0131lan bu g\u00f6rsel \u00fczerinden, G\u00fcney Afrika\u2019da bir futbolcuya ma\u00e7\u0131n adam\u0131 \u00f6d\u00fcl\u00fc olarak 5GB mobil data hediye edildi\u011fi iddia edildi.\nS\u00f6z konusu iddia do\u011frudur.\nFoto\u011fraftaki futbolcu, G\u00fcney Afrika S\u00fcper Ligi tak\u0131mlar\u0131ndan Mamelodi Sundowns FC\u2019nin 33 ya\u015f\u0131ndaki orta saha oyuncusu Hlompho Kekana. Ma\u00e7\u0131n adam\u0131 se\u00e7ilen futbolcuya, tak\u0131m\u0131n sponsoru olan telekom\u00fcnikasyon \u015firketi TELKOM 5GB mobil data hediye etmi\u015f.\n  Ma\u00e7\u0131n adam\u0131 se\u00e7ilen Hlompho Kekana\u2019n\u0131n 5GB \u00f6d\u00fcl\u00fc haberini, prestijli futbol dergilerinden Four Four Two\u2019da da g\u00f6rmek m\u00fcmk\u00fcn.\nSosyal Medyada da Mizah Konusu Haline Gelmi\u015f\nFutbolcuya hediye edilen 5GB mobil data, onayl\u0131 bir Twitter hesab\u0131ndan da payla\u015f\u0131larak binlerce yorum ve be\u011feni alm\u0131\u015f:\nResmi Twitter'da g\u00f6r\u00fcnt\u00fcle\nB/R Football\n\u2714\n@brfootball\nMamelodi Sundowns player:\n\u2014Wins Man of the Match\n\u2014Awarded 5GB of data as a prize\n\u2014Gets told to use it by next opponents to \"tweet about your defeat\" \n\n1.248\n15:26 - 9 Oca 2018\n759 ki\u015fi bunun hakk\u0131nda konu\u015fuyor\nTwitter Reklamlar\u0131'na ili\u015fkin bilgiler ve gizlilik\nResmi Twitter'da g\u00f6r\u00fcnt\u00fcle\nTrev\n@Tokyo_Trev\nI knew this country was rubbish when we gave a man of the match 5GB of data\n11,4 B\n22:30 - 6 Oca 2018\n11 B ki\u015fi bunun hakk\u0131nda konu\u015fuyor\nTwitter Reklamlar\u0131'na ili\u015fkin bilgiler ve gizlilik\nMobil Data \u00d6d\u00fcl\u00fc Daha \u00d6nce de Verilmi\u015f\nTELKOM \u015firketinin Twitter hesab\u0131ndaki bir payla\u015f\u0131m\u0131nda, sponsor oldu\u011fu futbol kul\u00fcplerinde ma\u00e7\u0131n adam\u0131 se\u00e7ilen bir futbolcuya daha 5GB mobil data \u00f6d\u00fcl\u00fc verdi\u011fi g\u00f6r\u00fcl\u00fcyor:\nResmi Twitter'da g\u00f6r\u00fcnt\u00fcle\nTelkom Knockout\n@TelkomKnockout\nRT @OptimizeAgency: #TKO2014 @Orlando_Pirates man of the match #Pumgyo @TelkomKnockout \n1\n18:00 - 5 Eki 2014\nTelkom Knockout adl\u0131 ki\u015finin di\u011fer Tweetlerini g\u00f6r\nTwitter Reklamlar\u0131'na ili\u015fkin bilgiler ve gizlilik\n  2013\u2019te, Mamelodi Sundowns tak\u0131m\u0131ndan Andile Jali de TELKOM\u2019dan 2900 Rand (para birimi) kont\u00f6r kazanm\u0131\u015f:\nResmi Twitter'da g\u00f6r\u00fcnt\u00fcle\nOrlando Pirates FC\n\u2714\n@orlandopirates\nMan of the Match is Andile Jali \n25\n18:56 - 23 Kas 2013\n98 ki\u015fi bunun hakk\u0131nda konu\u015fuyor\nTwitter Reklamlar\u0131'na ili\u015fkin bilgiler ve gizlilik\n  Telkom\u2019un Twitter hesab\u0131nda yapt\u0131\u011f\u0131 bir payla\u015f\u0131mda, Kaizer Chiefs oyuncusu Lebogang Manyama\u2019n\u0131n da 20GB hediye kazand\u0131\u011f\u0131 g\u00f6r\u00fcl\u00fcyor:\nResmi Twitter'da g\u00f6r\u00fcnt\u00fcle\nTelkom Knockout\n@TelkomKnockout\nRT @SuperSportFC: Congratulations to @Lebza08Manyama for winning the man of the match award  #TKO2014 \n23:22 - 8 Kas 2014\nTelkom Knockout adl\u0131 ki\u015finin di\u011fer Tweetlerini g\u00f6r\nTwitter Reklamlar\u0131'na ili\u015fkin bilgiler ve gizlilik\n  SuperSport United tak\u0131m\u0131ndan Clayton Daniels de bu \u00f6d\u00fcl\u00fc alanlardan:\nResmi Twitter'da g\u00f6r\u00fcnt\u00fcle\nSuperSport United FC\n\u2714\n@SuperSportFC\nShout out to Clayton Daniels for winning the #TKO2014 man of the match #SkeemaDiChamps \n1\n11:17 - 30 Kas 2014\nSuperSport United FC adl\u0131 ki\u015finin di\u011fer Tweetlerini g\u00f6r\nTwitter Reklamlar\u0131'na ili\u015fkin bilgiler ve gizlilik\nInstagram\u2019da da TELKOM Knockout yar\u0131\u015fmas\u0131nda 50GB hediye data kazanan bir ba\u015fka futbolcunun foto\u011fraf\u0131 mevcut:\n    TELKOM\u2019un \u201cTelkom Knockout\u201d adl\u0131 Twitter hesab\u0131ndan, s\u00f6z konusu yar\u0131\u015fma hakk\u0131nda bilgi ve foto\u011fraflara ula\u015fmak m\u00fcmk\u00fcn.\nKaynaklar: kaynak1, kaynak2, kaynak3, kaynak4, kaynak5, kaynak6, kaynak7, kaynak8, kaynak9\nVideo oynat\u0131c\u0131\nhttps://dogrula.org/wp-content/uploads/2018/02/dogrula.org_.mp4\n00:00\n00:07\n[Toplam:1    Ortalama:5/5] G\u00fcney Afrika\u2019da Ma\u00e7\u0131n Adam\u0131 Olan Futbolcuya 5GB \u0130nternet Hediye Edildi\u011fi \u0130ddias\u0131", "  \u0130hbar olarak dogrula.org\u2019a gelen bu payla\u015f\u0131m, 5 binden fazla be\u011feni ald\u0131.\nS\u00f6z konusu payla\u015f\u0131mda Hipoten\u00fcs\u2019\u00fcn, \u00fcnl\u00fc filozof ve matematik\u00e7i Pisagor\u2019un kar\u0131s\u0131n\u0131n ad\u0131 oldu\u011fu iddia edildi.\nAncak kula\u011fa e\u011flenceli gelen bu iddia do\u011fru de\u011fildir. Hipoten\u00fcs kelimesinin etimolojisi ve Pisagor\u2019un hayat\u0131 incelendi\u011finde s\u00f6z konusu iddian\u0131n \u015fehir efsanesi oldu\u011funu g\u00f6rmek m\u00fcmk\u00fcn.\nPisagor ve Hipoten\u00fcs\nPisagor ya da Pythagoras, M.\u00d6. 570\u200a\u2014\u200aM.\u00d6. 500\u2013490 y\u0131llar\u0131 aras\u0131nda ya\u015fam\u0131\u015f olan \u0130yonyal\u0131 filozof, matematik\u00e7i ve Pisagorculuk olarak bilinen ak\u0131m\u0131n kurucusudur. En iyi bilinen \u00f6nermesi, kendi ad\u0131yla an\u0131lan Pisagor teoremidir. \u201cSay\u0131lar\u0131n babas\u0131\u201d olarak bilinir.\nBir dik \u00fc\u00e7genin hipoten\u00fcs\u00fc, daima dik a\u00e7\u0131n\u0131n kar\u015f\u0131s\u0131ndaki kenard\u0131r. Bu, bir dik \u00fc\u00e7gendeki en uzun kenard\u0131r. Di\u011fer iki kenar kar\u015f\u0131 kenar ve kom\u015fu kenar olarak adland\u0131r\u0131l\u0131r.\n\u00dc\u00e7genin kenarlar\u0131n\u0131n her birinin uzunluklar\u0131n\u0131n karelerinin toplam\u0131, \u00fc\u00e7genin hipoten\u00fcs\u00fcn\u00fcn uzunlu\u011funun karesiyle ayn\u0131d\u0131r.\nBilim, sanat, m\u00fchendislik ve mimarl\u0131kta bir\u00e7ok uygulamaya sahip olan bu \u00f6zellik Pisagor Teoremi olarak adland\u0131r\u0131lmaktad\u0131r.\nHipoten\u00fcs Kelimesinin Etimolojisi\nFrans\u0131zca hypot\u00e9nuse (dik \u00fc\u00e7gende dik a\u00e7\u0131n\u0131n kar\u015f\u0131s\u0131ndaki kenar) s\u00f6zc\u00fc\u011f\u00fc etimolojik olarak incelendi\u011finde Latince hipotenusadan geldi\u011fi g\u00f6r\u00fclebilir.\nYunancas\u0131 da hipoteinousa/ hypoteinein olan kelime, hypo\u2013 \u201calt\u201d ekinin teinein \u201cgermek\u201d fiiliyle birle\u015fmesi sonucu \u201calt\u0131ndan germe\u201d \u015feklinde olu\u015fmu\u015ftur.\nHipoten\u00fcs Kelimesini Platon da Kullanm\u0131\u015f\n  Hipoten\u00fcs s\u00f6zc\u00fc\u011f\u00fcn\u00fcn Platon\u2019un Timaeus\u2019unda kullan\u0131ld\u0131\u011f\u0131 bilgisini kaynaklarda g\u00f6rmek m\u00fcmk\u00fcn.\n    The Metaphysics of the Pythagorean Theorem adl\u0131 kitapta, hipoten\u00fcs teriminin Platon taraf\u0131ndan (Timaeus 54 D\u2019de) ya da bir ba\u015fka yerde kullan\u0131ld\u0131\u011f\u0131 bilgisi yer al\u0131yor.\nPisagor\u2019un Kar\u0131s\u0131n\u0131n Krotonlu Theano Oldu\u011fu S\u00f6yleniyor\n  Kaynaklara bak\u0131ld\u0131\u011f\u0131nda, Pisagor\u2019un kar\u0131s\u0131n\u0131n filozof Krotonlu Theano oldu\u011fu bilgisine rastlan\u0131yor. Hatta Theano\u2019nun filozof de\u011fil, besteci ve \u015fair oldu\u011fu; ikilinin 5 \u00e7ocuk sahibi oldu\u011fu da rivayet edilen bilgilerden.\nEski kad\u0131n filozoflar\u0131n anlat\u0131ld\u0131\u011f\u0131 Ancient Women Philosophers: 600 B.C.-500 A. D. isimli kitapta da Theano\u2019nun Pisagor\u2019un kar\u0131s\u0131 oldu\u011fu bilgisi yer al\u0131yor.\n  Baz\u0131 kaynaklar ise Pisagor\u2019un hi\u00e7 evlenmedi\u011fini, Theano\u2019nun ise Pisagor\u2019un \u00f6\u011frencisi oldu\u011funu s\u00f6yl\u00fcyor.\nHer ne kadar Pisagor\u2019un evli olup olmad\u0131\u011f\u0131 bilgisi net de\u011filse de, hayat\u0131ndaki kad\u0131n\u0131n isminin \u2018hipoten\u00fcs\u2019 olmad\u0131\u011f\u0131 ortada.\n  T\u00fcm bilgiler ele al\u0131nd\u0131\u011f\u0131nda, hipoten\u00fcs\u00fcn Pisagor\u2019un kar\u0131s\u0131n\u0131n ad\u0131 oldu\u011fu iddias\u0131n\u0131n e\u011flenceli bir \u015fehir efsanesinden \u00f6teye ge\u00e7medi\u011fi g\u00f6r\u00fcl\u00fcyor.\n  Kaynaklar: kaynak1, kaynak2, kaynak3, kaynak4, kaynak5, kaynak6, kaynak7, kaynak8, kaynak9, kaynak10, kaynak11\nVideo oynat\u0131c\u0131\nhttps://dogrula.org/wp-content/uploads/2018/02/dogrula.org_.mp4\n00:00\n00:07\n[Toplam:1    Ortalama:5/5] Hipoten\u00fcs, Pisagor\u2019un Kar\u0131s\u0131n\u0131n Ad\u0131d\u0131r \u0130ddias\u0131", "  \u0130hbar olarak dogrula.org\u2019a gelen bir haber g\u00f6rselinde, Hindistan\u2019\u0131n ruhani lideri Mahatma Gandhi\u2019nin gen\u00e7 bir kad\u0131nla dans etti\u011fi g\u00f6r\u00fcl\u00fcyor.\nAncak foto\u011fraftaki ki\u015finin Mahatma Gandhi oldu\u011fu iddias\u0131na do\u011fru ya da yanl\u0131\u015f demek m\u00fcmk\u00fcn de\u011fil. Foto\u011fraf ve ilgili haberler incelendi\u011finde, kaynaklardaki yetersizlik sebebiyle s\u00f6z konusu iddian\u0131n yar\u0131 do\u011fru oldu\u011funu s\u00f6yleyebiliriz.\nPek \u00e7ok sosyal platformda dola\u015f\u0131mda olan bu foto\u011fraftaki ki\u015finin Gandhi, onunla dans eden kad\u0131n\u0131n ise \u0130ngiltere Krali\u00e7esi II. Elizabeth oldu\u011fu da iddialar aras\u0131nda.\n\" Very Rare Picture\" Mahatma Gandhi, 2 nd Queen Elizabeth are in a dance party\u2026 pic.twitter.com/YmoliJa3PU\n\u2014 Khaleej Mag (@KhaleejMag) January 26, 2016\nGandhi\u2019nin Kollar\u0131 ve Sandaletleri\nFoto\u011fraftaki ki\u015finin kulaklar\u0131, kafas\u0131, v\u00fccut yap\u0131s\u0131 ve g\u00f6zl\u00fckleri Gandhi\u2019yle benzerlik g\u00f6steriyor.\nFakat o ki\u015finin kollar\u0131na bak\u0131ld\u0131\u011f\u0131nda kasl\u0131 oldu\u011fu g\u00f6r\u00fcl\u00fcyor, ancak Gandhi olduk\u00e7a zay\u0131ft\u0131 ve ileri ya\u015f\u0131nda kollar\u0131nda g\u00f6r\u00fcn\u00fcr derecede kas\u0131 bulunmuyordu. Ayr\u0131ca Gandhi\u2019nin kendi elleriyle yapt\u0131\u011f\u0131 ve her zaman giydi\u011fi s\u00f6ylenen sandaletleri de foto\u011fraftaki sandaletlerle uyu\u015fmuyor.\nFoto\u011fraftaki ki\u015finin a\u015f\u0131r\u0131 kemerli g\u00f6r\u00fcnen burnu da Gandhi\u2019nin burnuyla tam olarak benze\u015fmiyor.\nFoto\u011fraftaki Adam\u0131n Avustralyal\u0131 Bir Akt\u00f6r Oldu\u011fu S\u00f6yleniyor\nBu foto\u011frafla alakal\u0131 yerli kaynaklara bak\u0131ld\u0131\u011f\u0131nda, hemen hepsindefoto\u011fraftaki ki\u015finin Sidney\u2019de bir yard\u0131m etkinli\u011finde Gandhi\u2019yi canland\u0131ran Avustralyal\u0131 bir akt\u00f6r oldu\u011fu s\u00f6yleniyor, ancak o akt\u00f6r\u00fcn kim oldu\u011funa dair bir bilgi mevcut de\u011fil.\n  Baz\u0131 kaynaklarda ise foto\u011fraftaki ki\u015finin Mahatma Gandhi oldu\u011fu, Gandhi\u2019nin Londra\u2019da dans derslerine kat\u0131ld\u0131\u011f\u0131 s\u00f6yleniyor. Hatta giyimini ve tarz\u0131n\u0131 Londra\u2019da de\u011fi\u015ftirdi\u011fi dahi iddia edilmi\u015f.\n  Bollywood\u2019un halkla ili\u015fkiler uzman\u0131 oldu\u011fu yaz\u0131lan Dale Bhagwagar adl\u0131 ki\u015finin foto\u011fraf hakk\u0131ndaki \u015fu a\u00e7\u0131klamas\u0131 da \u0130nternet ortamlar\u0131nda dola\u015f\u0131yor:\n  A\u00e7\u0131klamada, Gandhi\u2019nin kollar\u0131n\u0131n s\u0131ska oldu\u011fu vurgulan\u0131yor ve ulusal liderler ve toplumun simgeleriyle ilgili bu t\u00fcr yanl\u0131\u015f payla\u015f\u0131mlar\u0131n toplumlara uzun vadede olumsuz etkileri olaca\u011f\u0131 s\u00f6yleniyor.\nKaynaklar: kaynak1, kaynak2, kaynak3, kaynak4, kaynak5, kaynak6, kaynak7, kaynak8\nVideo oynat\u0131c\u0131\nhttps://dogrula.org/wp-content/uploads/2018/02/dogrula.org_.mp4\n00:00\n00:07\n[Toplam:1    Ortalama:5/5] Foto\u011frafta Dans Eden Ki\u015finin Mahatma Gandhi Oldu\u011fu \u0130ddias\u0131", "  Hulusi Akar ad\u0131yla a\u00e7\u0131lan bir Twitter hesab\u0131nda payla\u015f\u0131lan bu g\u00f6rselde, foto\u011fraftaki ki\u015finin Milli Savunma Bakan\u0131 Hulusi Akar\u2019\u0131n k\u0131z\u0131 oldu\u011fu iddia edildi. S\u00f6z konusu g\u00f6rsel yakla\u015f\u0131k 6 bin be\u011feni, 700\u2019den fazla payla\u015f\u0131m ve binlerce yorum ald\u0131.\n  Sn. Bakan\u0131m\u0131z k\u0131z\u0131 ile birlikte. pic.twitter.com/Fq3kgnWo0E\n\u2014 Hulusi AKAR (@Msb_HulisiAKAR) December 2, 2018\n  Ancak s\u00f6z konusu iddia do\u011fru de\u011fildir. Hulusi Akar\u2019\u0131n k\u0131z\u0131 Serra Akar, 30\u2019lu ya\u015flar\u0131nda olan kad\u0131n do\u011fum uzman\u0131 bir doktordur.\n  Hulusi Akar\u2019\u0131n Twitter Hesab\u0131 Yok\n\u00d6ncelikle, Milli Savunma Bakan\u0131 Hulusi Akar\u2019\u0131n Twitter hesab\u0131 bulunmuyor. Bunu Cumhurba\u015fkan\u0131 Dan\u0131\u015fman\u0131 \u0130smail Cesur resmi Twitter hesab\u0131ndan duyurmu\u015ftur.\nSevgili twitter kullan\u0131c\u0131lar\u0131, Milli Savunma Bakan\u0131m\u0131z Say\u0131n Hulusi Akar'\u0131n herhangi bir twitter hesab\u0131 bulunmamaktad\u0131r. Ortaya \u00e7\u0131kan b\u00fct\u00fcn twitter hesaplar\u0131 sahtedir. L\u00fctfen itibar etmeyiniz.\n\u2014 Ismail Cesur (@icesur) August 1, 2018\nHulusi Akar\u2019\u0131n K\u0131z\u0131n\u0131n Doktor Oldu\u011fu Bilgisi Dola\u015f\u0131yor\nMilli Savunma Bakan\u0131 Hulusi Akar\u2019\u0131n k\u0131z\u0131n\u0131n Hacettepe \u00dcniversitesi T\u0131p Fak\u00fcltesi mezunu bir doktor oldu\u011fu bilgisi Posta Gazetesinde yer alm\u0131\u015f.\n  Hacettepe \u00dcniversitesi T\u0131p Fak\u00fcltesi Mezunu Serra Akar\nHacettepe \u00dcniversitesi\u2019nde 2009 y\u0131l\u0131nda payla\u015f\u0131lan y\u00f6netim kurulu g\u00fcndeminde Serra Akar ad\u0131na rastlamak m\u00fcmk\u00fcn.\nSerra Akar 2009 y\u0131l\u0131nda staj ba\u015fvurusu yapm\u0131\u015f g\u00f6r\u00fcn\u00fcyor. Genelde 5. y\u0131lda interne olan ba\u015fvuru sahiplerinin yurt d\u0131\u015f\u0131na staja gitme s\u00fcreleri ve yakla\u015f\u0131k 18 ya\u015f\u0131nda okula ba\u015flad\u0131klar\u0131 g\u00f6z \u00f6n\u00fcne al\u0131nd\u0131\u011f\u0131nda Serra Akar\u2019\u0131n tahmini olarak 23 ya\u015flar\u0131nda staj ba\u015fvurusu yapt\u0131\u011f\u0131 anla\u015f\u0131l\u0131yor. S\u00f6z konusu kaynak 2009 y\u0131l\u0131na ait, yani \u00fczerinden 8 y\u0131l ge\u00e7mi\u015f. Bu da Hulusi Akar\u2019\u0131n k\u0131z\u0131n\u0131n ortalama 32-33 ya\u015flar\u0131nda oldu\u011funu g\u00f6steriyor.\n\u0130yi bir \u0130nternet ara\u015ft\u0131rmas\u0131 yap\u0131ld\u0131\u011f\u0131nda, Serra Akar\u2019\u0131n kad\u0131n do\u011fum uzman\u0131 bir doktor oldu\u011fu bilgisine de ula\u015fmak m\u00fcmk\u00fcn. Ayr\u0131ca s\u00f6z konusu kaynaklarda babas\u0131n\u0131n ismi de yer al\u0131yor.\nYanl\u0131\u015f Bilgi Oldu\u011fu S\u00f6ylenmi\u015f\nGazeteci Y\u0131ld\u0131ray O\u011fur Twitter payla\u015f\u0131m\u0131nda bu g\u00f6rselle alakal\u0131 olarak, \u201cTweetin alt\u0131n\u0131 \u201c\u00e7ok \u015f\u00fck\u00fcr bug\u00fcnleri de g\u00f6rd\u00fck\u201d diyenler doldurmu\u015f ama Hulusi Akar\u2019\u0131n k\u0131z\u0131 bu ya\u015fta de\u011fil, doktor. Zaten bu hesap da kendisinin de\u011fil. \u0130yice Facebook\u2019a d\u00f6nd\u00fc bu site\u2026\u201d yaz\u0131l\u0131 bir payla\u015f\u0131mda bulunmu\u015f.\nTweetin alt\u0131n\u0131 \u201c\u00e7ok \u015f\u00fck\u00fcr bug\u00fcnleri de g\u00f6rd\u00fck\u201d diyenler doldurmu\u015f ama Hulusi Akar\u2019\u0131n k\u0131z\u0131 bu ya\u015fta de\u011fil, doktor. Zaten bu hesap da kendisinin de\u011fil. \u0130yice Facebook\u2019a d\u00f6nd\u00fc bu site\u2026 https://t.co/dW02vt99C9\n\u2014 Y\u0131ld\u0131ray O\u011fur (@yildarado) December 2, 2018\n  1952 do\u011fumlu Hulusi Akar\u2019\u0131n iki \u00e7ocu\u011funun oldu\u011fu bilgisi do\u011fru, ancak sosyal medyada payla\u015f\u0131lan g\u00f6rsel yeni. Yani g\u00f6rselde 15 ya\u015flar\u0131nda bulunan k\u0131z\u0131n Hulusi Akar\u2019\u0131n k\u0131z\u0131 olmas\u0131 m\u00fcmk\u00fcn g\u00f6r\u00fcnm\u00fcyor. Hulusi Akar\u2019\u0131n e\u015fi \u015eule Akar\u2019la foto\u011fraflar\u0131 mevcut, ancak \u00e7ocuklar\u0131n\u0131n foto\u011fraflar\u0131 \u0130nternet payla\u015f\u0131mlar\u0131nda yer almam\u0131\u015f.\nKaynaklar: kaynak1, kaynak2, kaynak3, kaynak4, kaynak5, kaynak6\nVideo oynat\u0131c\u0131\nhttps://dogrula.org/wp-content/uploads/2018/02/dogrula.org_.mp4\n00:00\n00:07\n[Toplam:1    Ortalama:5/5] Foto\u011fraftaki Ki\u015finin Hulusi Akar\u2019\u0131n K\u0131z\u0131 Oldu\u011fu \u0130ddias\u0131", "  Pinterest, Imgur and Reddit gibi platformlarda s\u0131k\u00e7a payla\u015f\u0131lan bu g\u00f6rselin, \u0130rlanda\u2019da oldu\u011fu iddia edilmektedir. Ancak b\u00f6yle bir ada-\u015fatonun varoldu\u011fu iddias\u0131 do\u011fru de\u011fildir.\nBu g\u00f6rsel asl\u0131nda Tayland\u2019daki \u201cJames Bond Island\u201d olarak da bilinen Khao Phing Kan adas\u0131d\u0131r ve Almanya\u2019n\u0131n Baden-W\u00fcrttemberg kentinde bulunan Svabya Alpleri (Swabian Alb) yak\u0131nlar\u0131ndaki Lichtenstein \u015eatosu\u2019nun bir k\u0131sm\u0131 da adan\u0131n \u00fczerine montajlanm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r.\nKhao Phing Kan Adas\u0131, Phuket, Tayland\nLichtenstein \u015eatosu, Baden-W\u00fcrttemberg, Almanya\nGoogle G\u00f6rsellerde Yer Al\u0131yor\n\u201cCastle island Ireland\u201d yazarak Google g\u00f6rselleri tarad\u0131\u011f\u0131n\u0131zda, bu photoshop hilesine dair yap\u0131lan payla\u015f\u0131mlar\u0131 g\u00f6rebilirsiniz.\n  G\u00f6r\u00fcld\u00fc\u011f\u00fc \u00fczere, s\u00f6z konusu g\u00f6rsel iki farkl\u0131 foto\u011fraf\u0131n montajlanmas\u0131yla olu\u015fturulmu\u015ftur.\nKaynaklar: kaynak1, kaynak2\nVideo oynat\u0131c\u0131\nhttps://dogrula.org/wp-content/uploads/2018/02/dogrula.org_.mp4\n00:00\n00:07\n[Toplam:0    Ortalama:0/5] Adan\u0131n \u00dczerinde Bulunan \u015eato G\u00f6rseli \u0130ddias\u0131", "  H\u0131rvatistan Cumhurba\u015fkan\u0131ndan \u00f6rnek davran\u0131\u015f ba\u015fl\u0131\u011f\u0131yla servis edilen bu g\u00f6rsel, y\u00fczlerce yorum ve be\u011feni ald\u0131, binlerce kez payla\u015f\u0131ld\u0131.\nAncak H\u0131rvatistan Cumhurba\u015fkan\u0131 Kolinda Grabar-Kitarovi\u0107\u2019in H\u0131rvatistan\u2019daki kriz sebebiyle maa\u015f\u0131n\u0131 %50 indirdi\u011fi, cumhurba\u015fkanl\u0131\u011f\u0131 ve ba\u015fbakanl\u0131k u\u00e7a\u011f\u0131n\u0131 satt\u0131\u011f\u0131, 35 adet Mercedes makam arac\u0131n\u0131 satarak elde edilen geliri devlet hazinesine aktard\u0131\u011f\u0131, konsolos maa\u015flar\u0131n\u0131 %60 d\u00fc\u015f\u00fcrd\u00fc\u011f\u00fc ve i\u015f\u00e7ilere verilen asgari \u00fccrete zam yapt\u0131\u011f\u0131 iddialar\u0131n\u0131n hi\u00e7biri do\u011fru de\u011fildir.\nH\u0131rvatistan h\u00fck\u00fcmetinde Kolinda Grabar-Kitarovi\u0107\u2019in cumhurba\u015fkanl\u0131\u011f\u0131 b\u00fcy\u00fck \u00f6l\u00e7\u00fcde semboliktir, H\u0131rvat h\u00fck\u00fcmetindeki ger\u00e7ek g\u00fc\u00e7, ba\u015fbakan Andrej Plenkovi\u00e7\u2019e aittir. Bu da Kolinda Grabar-Kitarovi\u0107\u2019in yetkisiyle al\u0131nan kararlar do\u011frultusunda ortaya at\u0131lan iddialar\u0131n as\u0131ls\u0131z oldu\u011funun en temel kan\u0131t\u0131d\u0131r.\nY\u00fcr\u00fctme yetkisinin cumhurba\u015fkan\u0131nda olmad\u0131\u011f\u0131, H\u0131rvat h\u00fck\u00fcmetinin web sitesinde yaz\u0131lmaktad\u0131r.\n    AFP\u2019nin fact check haberinde de yer alan iddia ilk olarak Arap\u00e7a olarak; daha sonra Somali, Frans\u0131z, \u0130spanyol ve Portekiz\u2019de sosyal medyada payla\u015f\u0131larak viral olmu\u015f.\nCumhurba\u015fkanl\u0131\u011f\u0131 U\u00e7a\u011f\u0131n\u0131n Sat\u0131ld\u0131\u011f\u0131 \u0130ddias\u0131 Do\u011fru De\u011fil\nH\u0131rvat Cumhurba\u015fkan\u0131 Kolinda Grabar-Kitarovi\u0107\u2019in cumhurba\u015fkanl\u0131\u011f\u0131 u\u00e7a\u011f\u0131n\u0131 satmak gibi bir yetkisi bulunmuyor. H\u0131rvat h\u00fck\u00fcmetinin, web sitesinde de yer alan resmi bir devlet u\u00e7a\u011f\u0131 var ve Ba\u015fbakan ile parlamento \u00fcyeleri u\u00e7a\u011f\u0131 Cumhurba\u015fkan\u0131 kadar kullanabiliyor.\nSaraybosna\u2019da Ocak ay\u0131nda \u00e7ekilen bu foto\u011frafta u\u00e7a\u011f\u0131 g\u00f6rmek m\u00fcmk\u00fcn:\n35 adet Mercedes Makam Arac\u0131n\u0131 Satarak Elde Edilen Geliri Devlet Hazinesine Aktard\u0131\u011f\u0131 \u0130ddias\u0131 Do\u011fru De\u011fil\nH\u0131rvat Cumhurba\u015fkan\u0131n\u0131n b\u00f6yle bir sat\u0131\u015f yapt\u0131\u011f\u0131 haberi hi\u00e7bir resmi kaynakta yer alm\u0131yor. Ayr\u0131ca, bu ara\u00e7lar\u0131 satmak istese bile bunu yapmaya yetkisi yok.\nKendi Maa\u015f\u0131n\u0131 %50 D\u00fc\u015f\u00fcrd\u00fc\u011f\u00fc \u0130ddias\u0131 Do\u011fru De\u011fil\nKolinda Grabar-Kitarovi\u0107 bu karar\u0131 verme yetkisine de sahip de\u011fil. H\u0131rvat cumhurba\u015fkanl\u0131\u011f\u0131 ofisinin AFP\u2019ye verdi\u011fi demece g\u00f6re, \u201cKendi de dahil olmak \u00fczere kimsenin maa\u015f\u0131 cumhurba\u015fkan\u0131n\u0131n yetkisi alt\u0131nda de\u011fil.\u201d\nAyr\u0131ca, 2015\u2019te g\u00f6reve ba\u015flad\u0131\u011f\u0131ndan beri Kolinda Grabar-Kitarovi\u0107\u2019in maa\u015f\u0131 y\u00fckselmi\u015f; ayda 3,069 avrodan 3,340 avroya \u00e7\u0131km\u0131\u015f.\nKonsolos Maa\u015flar\u0131n\u0131 %60 D\u00fc\u015f\u00fcrd\u00fc\u011f\u00fc ve \u0130\u015f\u00e7ilere Verilen Asgari \u00dccrete Zam Yapt\u0131\u011f\u0131 \u0130ddialar\u0131 da Do\u011fru De\u011fil\nH\u0131rvatistan cumhurba\u015fkan\u0131n\u0131n bu gibi kararlar\u0131 alma yetkisi de bulunmuyor. Yukar\u0131da belirtildi\u011fi gibi, Kolinda Grabar-Kitarovi\u0107\u2019in Cumhurba\u015fkanl\u0131\u011f\u0131 b\u00fcy\u00fck \u00f6l\u00e7\u00fcde temsili. Cumhurba\u015fkan\u0131 d\u0131\u015f politikay\u0131 h\u00fck\u00fcmetle koordine ediyor ve silahl\u0131 kuvvetlerin ba\u015f\u0131nda komutan olarak yer al\u0131yor. Ancak H\u0131rvat ekonomisine gelince, bu i\u015fi \u00e7o\u011funlukla ba\u015fbakan ve parlamento y\u00fcr\u00fct\u00fcyor.\nAyr\u0131ca, emeklilik sistemi ve maa\u015flar da ba\u015fkan\u0131n kontrol\u00fcnde de\u011fil.\n  G\u00f6r\u00fcld\u00fc\u011f\u00fc \u00fczere Kolinda Grabar-Kitarovi\u0107\u2019in cumhurba\u015fkanl\u0131\u011f\u0131 b\u00fcy\u00fck \u00f6l\u00e7\u00fcde semboliktir; H\u0131rvat h\u00fck\u00fcmetindeki ger\u00e7ek g\u00fc\u00e7 ba\u015fbakan Andrej Plenkovi\u00e7\u2019e aittir. Cumhurba\u015fkan\u0131n\u0131n u\u00e7ak ve makam arac\u0131 satma yetkisi yoktur. Ayr\u0131ca, emeklilik sistemi ve maa\u015flar da ba\u015fkan\u0131n kontrol\u00fcnde de\u011fildir. Kendisinin maa\u015f\u0131 da 2015\u2019te g\u00f6reve geldi\u011finden bu yana artm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r.\nSosyal medyada yer alan iddialar bunlarla da s\u0131n\u0131rl\u0131 de\u011fil. Kolinda Grabar-Kitarovi\u0107\u2019in D\u00fcnya Kupas\u0131 i\u00e7in \u00fccretsiz izin ald\u0131\u011f\u0131, ticari u\u00e7akla seyahat etti\u011fi, stratejik kamu sekt\u00f6rlerini en y\u00fcksek teklif verenlere satmay\u0131 reddederek \u00fclkesini korudu\u011fu, S\u0131rbistan\u2019dan gelen g\u00f6\u00e7menleri engellemek i\u00e7in 2015\u2019te s\u0131n\u0131rlar\u0131 kapatmaya karar
