kaynak10, kaynak11, kaynak12, kaynak13, kaynak14, kaynak15, kaynak16\nVideo oynat\u0131c\u0131\nhttps://dogrula.org/wp-content/uploads/2018/02/dogrula.org_.mp4\n00:00\n00:07\n[Toplam:2    Ortalama:5/5] Ara\u015ft\u0131rma: Vladimir Putin\u2019e Ait Oldu\u011fu \u0130ddia Edilen Sahte Foto\u011fraf ve Videolar", "  Sat\u0131r Aras\u0131 isimli bir TV program\u0131nda, Fransa\u2019da yap\u0131lan bir \u00e7al\u0131\u015fma \u00fczerine, kolada alkol olup olmad\u0131\u011f\u0131 konusu tart\u0131\u015f\u0131ld\u0131.\n  Coca-Cola ve Pepsi s\u00f6zc\u00fclerinin a\u00e7\u0131klamalar\u0131 ve bilimsel makalelerdeki analizler ele al\u0131nd\u0131\u011f\u0131nda, iddian\u0131n do\u011fru oldu\u011funu s\u00f6ylemek m\u00fcmk\u00fcn.\nAra\u015ft\u0131rma, 60 Millions de Consommateurs Dergisinde Yer Alm\u0131\u015f\nKolalarda bulunan eser miktardaki alkol iddias\u0131, 27 Haziran 2012\u2019de, Frans\u0131z dergisi 60 Millions de Consommateurs (60 Milyon T\u00fcketici)\u2019da g\u00fcndeme gelmi\u015f.\n  Makalede a\u015fa\u011f\u0131da ayr\u0131nt\u0131l\u0131 \u015fekilde ele ald\u0131\u011f\u0131m\u0131z, kolada bulunan eser miktardaki alkolden bahsedilmi\u015f:\n\u0130ddia 2012 Y\u0131l\u0131nda G\u00fcndeme Gelmi\u015f\nParis merkezli National Institute of Consumption (INC) taraf\u0131ndan yap\u0131lan testlere g\u00f6re, Coca-Cola ve Pepsi gibi \u00f6nde gelen kolalar\u0131n yar\u0131s\u0131ndan fazlas\u0131 eser miktarda alkol i\u00e7eriyor.\n52 gazl\u0131 i\u00e7ece\u011fin incelenmesinin ard\u0131ndan bu sonuca var\u0131lan \u00e7al\u0131\u015fmaya g\u00f6re, %2 natural flavouring k\u0131sm\u0131ndaki y\u00fczdelik alkol miktar\u0131na ait.\n\u00c7al\u0131\u015fma, alkol seviyesinin her 1 litrede 10 mg kadar, yani yakla\u015f\u0131k % 0.001 oran\u0131nda oldu\u011funu \u00f6ne s\u00fcr\u00fcyor.\n  \u0130ngiliz Dailymail gazetesinin web sitesinde de, ara\u015ft\u0131rmaya g\u00f6re i\u00e7lerinde alkol bulunan kola markalar\u0131ndan baz\u0131lar\u0131n\u0131n Coca-Cola, Pepsi Cola, Coca-Cola Classic Light ve Coke Zero oldu\u011fu bilgisine yer verildi.\nUluslararas\u0131 ajanslardan gelen bilgiye g\u00f6re, her iki \u015firket de (Pepsi ve Coca-Cola) do\u011fal meyvenin bir miktar alkol mayaland\u0131r\u0131p \u00fcretebilece\u011fini \u00f6ne s\u00fcrm\u00fc\u015ft\u00fcr.\n\u201cYap\u0131m A\u015famas\u0131nda Alkol Kullan\u0131lm\u0131\u015f Olabilir\u201d\nAmerikal\u0131 haber sitesi Huffington Post\u2019un haberinde, Coca-Cola Fransa\u2019dan Michel Pepin\u2019in, \u2018kolada bulunan alkol miktar\u0131n\u0131n, yap\u0131m s\u00fcrecinden gelmesinin olas\u0131 oldu\u011funu\u2019 s\u00f6yledi\u011fi bilgisine yer verilmi\u015f.\n\u201cIt is possible that traces of alcohol come from the process\u2019 of making Coca-Cola according to its secret recipe,\u201d said Michel Pepin from Coca-Cola France, reports Channels TV.\nPepsi s\u00f6zc\u00fcs\u00fcn\u00fcn, \u2018Pepsi Cola tarifi alkol i\u00e7ermese de baz\u0131 me\u015frubatlar\u0131n kullan\u0131lan malzemelerden dolay\u0131 eser miktarda alkol i\u00e7erebilece\u011fini kabul etti\u011fi\u2019 de haberde yer alan bilgilerden.\n\u0130statistiklerle Coca-Cola ve Pepsi T\u00fcketimi\nAlkols\u00fcz i\u00e7ecek end\u00fcstrisinin iki devi, k\u00fcresel rekabette uzun bir ge\u00e7mi\u015fi payla\u015f\u0131yor. Coca-Cola, 2015 y\u0131l\u0131nda 44.292 milyon dolar net ciroya sahip oldu ve PepsiCo da ayn\u0131 d\u00f6nemde 63.06 milyar dolarl\u0131k bir rakam kaydetti.\nPepsi\u2019nin marka de\u011feri 10,025 milyon dolar olarak tahmin edilirken, 2010 statista.com raporuna g\u00f6re Coca-Cola\u2019n\u0131n markas\u0131 67 bin 749 milyon dolar seviyesinde bulunuyor.\nEn Fazla Kola T\u00fcketen \u00dclkeler\nStatista istatistik \u015firketinin 1991\u20132012 y\u0131llar\u0131 aras\u0131ndaki kola t\u00fcketimi (Coca-Cola) istatisti\u011finde, T\u00fcrkiye listede bulunan 36 \u00fclke i\u00e7erisinde 20. s\u0131rada yer alm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r.\nKolan\u0131n Sa\u011fl\u0131\u011f\u0131m\u0131z \u00dczerindeki Etkisi\n  Kolada, obezite dahil bir dizi sa\u011fl\u0131k problemi ile ili\u015fkilendirilen \u00e7ok miktarda \u015feker bulunuyor. Her bir kutu kola yakla\u015f\u0131k 10 tatl\u0131 ka\u015f\u0131\u011f\u0131 \u015feker i\u00e7eriyor.\nAyr\u0131ca bir ba\u015fka \u00e7al\u0131\u015fmaya g\u00f6re, kola aromal\u0131 i\u00e7eceklere karamel rengini veren kimyasal kanser riskini art\u0131rabilir. \u00c7ocuklarda alerjik problemlere neden oldu\u011fu kan\u0131tlanan kolan\u0131n t\u00fcketilmemesi tavsiye ediliyor, ancak ailelerin bu konuda yeterince \u00f6nlem ald\u0131\u011f\u0131 s\u00f6ylenemez.\n4-metilimidazol (4-MI) olarak bilinen kimyasal, bir katk\u0131 maddesi ve bu sebeple ABD\u2019de gazl\u0131 i\u00e7eceklerdeki miktar\u0131 d\u00fc\u015f\u00fcr\u00fclm\u00fc\u015f, ancak bu \u00f6nlem d\u00fcnyan\u0131n ba\u015fka yerlerinde benimsenmemi\u015f.\nCoca-cola web sitesinde, kolan\u0131n i\u00e7indeki maddeler \u015fu \u015fekilde yer al\u0131yor:\nCoca-Cola ve Pepsi s\u00f6zc\u00fclerinin a\u00e7\u0131klamalar\u0131 ve bilimsel makalelerdeki analizler ele al\u0131nd\u0131\u011f\u0131nda, iddian\u0131n do\u011fru oldu\u011funu s\u00f6ylemek m\u00fcmk\u00fcn.\nKaynaklar: kaynak1, kaynak2, kaynak3, kaynak4, kaynak5, kaynak6, kaynak7, kaynak8, kaynak9\n[Toplam:2    Ortalama:5/5] Frans\u0131z Ara\u015ft\u0131rma \u015eirketinin Coca-Cola ve Pepsi Alkol \u0130\u00e7eriyor \u0130ddias\u0131", "  Ozan Bing\u00f6l adl\u0131 kullan\u0131c\u0131 Twitter hesab\u0131ndan yapt\u0131\u011f\u0131 bir payla\u015f\u0131mda, 7,25 TL\u2019ye sat\u0131lan biradan al\u0131nan verginin 4,32 TL, 10 TL\u2019ye sat\u0131lan sigaradan al\u0131nan verginin 8,16 TL oldu\u011funu iddia etti.\nVergi uzman\u0131 Ozan Bing\u00f6l\u2019\u00fcn binlerce etkile\u015fim alan, bira ve sigaradan al\u0131nan vergiye dair s\u00f6z konusu iddias\u0131 do\u011frudur. Her ne kadar s\u00f6z konusu payla\u015f\u0131m yakla\u015f\u0131k 1 y\u0131l \u00f6ncesine ait olsa da, vergi oranlar\u0131n\u0131n alkol ve sigara fiyat\u0131n\u0131n b\u00fcy\u00fck bir k\u0131sm\u0131n\u0131 olu\u015fturdu\u011fu do\u011fru.\nAlkoll\u00fc \u0130\u00e7eceklerden Al\u0131nan Vergi Oran\u0131\n4760 say\u0131l\u0131 \u00f6zel T\u00fcketim Vergisi Kanununun (12/3) maddesi gere\u011fince g\u00fcncellenen listede g\u00f6r\u00fcld\u00fc\u011f\u00fc \u00fczere, alkoll\u00fc i\u00e7eceklerden al\u0131nan vergi oranlar\u0131 \u015fu \u015fekildedir:\nSigaradan Al\u0131nan Vergi Oran\u0131\nYine 4760 say\u0131l\u0131 \u00f6zel T\u00fcketim Vergisi Kanununun (12/3) maddesi gere\u011fince g\u00fcncellenen listede g\u00f6r\u00fcld\u00fc\u011f\u00fc \u00fczere, t\u00fct\u00fcn i\u00e7eren sigaralardan al\u0131nan vergi tutar\u0131 a\u015fa\u011f\u0131daki gibidir:\nAsgari maktu vergi tutar\u0131, sigaran\u0131n d\u00fc\u015f\u00fck fiyatla sat\u0131lmas\u0131n\u0131 engellemeye y\u00f6nelik bir unsurdur.\n10 TL\u2019lik bir sigarada ne kadar vergi y\u00fck\u00fcn\u00fcn oldu\u011fu \u015fu \u015fekilde hesaplan\u0131r:\nSigar\u0131n\u0131n perakende sat\u0131\u015f fiyat\u0131 ile vergi oran\u0131 \u00e7arp\u0131l\u0131r, bulunan rakam asgari maktu vergi tutar\u0131ndan b\u00fcy\u00fckse \u00e7arp\u0131m sonucu bulunan nispi vergi; d\u00fc\u015f\u00fck ise asgari maktu vergi tutar\u0131 esas al\u0131n\u0131r. Bu durumda 10 liral\u0131k sigarada 6.3 TL\u2019lik (10 TL X %63) nispi vergi, asgari maktu vergi tutar\u0131n\u0131n \u00fcst\u00fcnde kald\u0131\u011f\u0131 i\u00e7in 6.3 TL\u2019lik nispi vergi esas al\u0131n\u0131r. Ayr\u0131ca her bir paket sigara i\u00e7in yukar\u0131daki tablodan g\u00f6r\u00fclece\u011fi \u00fczere 0.42 TL\u2019lik maktu vergi bulunmaktad\u0131r.\nHer ne kadar s\u00f6z konusu payla\u015f\u0131m yakla\u015f\u0131k 1 y\u0131l \u00f6ncesine ait olsa da, vergi oranlar\u0131n\u0131n alkol ve sigara fiyat\u0131n\u0131n b\u00fcy\u00fck bir k\u0131sm\u0131n\u0131 olu\u015fturdu\u011funu 4760 say\u0131l\u0131 \u00f6zel T\u00fcketim Vergisi Kanununun (12/3) maddesi gere\u011fince g\u00fcncellenen listede g\u00f6rmek m\u00fcmk\u00fcn.\nSigaralarda En Y\u00fcksek Vergi Uygulayan \u00dclkeler\nD\u00fcnya Sa\u011fl\u0131k \u00d6rg\u00fct\u00fc (WHO)\u2019n\u00fcn Avrupa \u00fclkelerini kapsayan 2015 y\u0131l\u0131 verilerine g\u00f6re, sigaralarda en y\u00fcksek vergi uygulayan \u00fclkeler \u015fu \u015fekildedir:\n  Kaynaklar: kaynak1, kaynak2, kaynak3, kaynak4\nVideo oynat\u0131c\u0131\nhttps://dogrula.org/wp-content/uploads/2018/02/dogrula.org_.mp4\n00:00\n00:07\n[Toplam:4    Ortalama:5/5] Alkol ve T\u00fct\u00fcne Verilen 39 TL\u2019nin 25 TL\u2019si Vergidir \u0130ddias\u0131", "  T\u00fcrkiye\u2019de alkol t\u00fcketimi ba\u015fl\u0131kl\u0131 yaz\u0131m\u0131zda, veriler ve istatistiklerle \u00fclkemizdeki alkol t\u00fcketme oranlar\u0131n\u0131 inceledik.\nAlkol T\u00fcketimine Genel Bak\u0131\u015f\nAlkol insanlar \u00fczerinde g\u00fc\u00e7l\u00fc bir etkiye sahiptir ve tarih boyunca alkol\u00fcn g\u00fcc\u00fcn\u00fc anlamak ve y\u00f6netmek i\u00e7in \u00e7aba sarf edilmi\u015ftir.\nAlkol\u00fcn etkileri a\u015fa\u011f\u0131dakiler de dahil olmak \u00fczere \u00e7e\u015fitli fakt\u00f6rlere ba\u011fl\u0131 olarak ki\u015fiden ki\u015fiye de\u011fi\u015fir:\nNe kadar i\u00e7ti\u011finiz\nNe s\u0131kl\u0131kla i\u00e7ti\u011finiz\nYa\u015f\u0131n\u0131z\nSa\u011fl\u0131k durumunuz\nAile ge\u00e7mi\u015finiz\n\u0130lk yudumunuzu al\u0131r almaz alkol kan dola\u015f\u0131m\u0131n\u0131za girer. Alkol\u00fcn anl\u0131k etkileri yakla\u015f\u0131k 10 dakika i\u00e7inde g\u00f6r\u00fclebilir. \u0130\u00e7ti\u011finizde, kan dola\u015f\u0131m\u0131n\u0131zdaki alkol miktar\u0131 olan, kandaki alkol konsantrasyonunuzu (BAC) y\u00fckseltirsiniz. BAC\u2019\u0131n\u0131z ne kadar y\u00fcksekse, alkol\u00fcn etkisi daha da artar. Bu etkiler \u015funlar\u0131 i\u00e7erebilir:\nKar\u015f\u0131 koyma kuvvetinin azalmas\u0131, konu\u015fma bozuklu\u011fu, motor bozuklu\u011fu (v\u00fccutta bir b\u00f6lgenin k\u0131smen veya tamamen fonksiyon kayb\u0131 ya\u015famas\u0131), kafa kar\u0131\u015f\u0131kl\u0131\u011f\u0131, haf\u0131za sorunlar\u0131, konsantrasyon problemleri, koma, solunum problemleri, \u00f6l\u00fcm.\nAyr\u0131ca, uzun s\u00fcreli alkol kullan\u0131m bozuklu\u011fu, tiamin (vitamin B1) eksikli\u011fine ba\u011fl\u0131 bir beyin bozuklu\u011fu olan Wernicke-Korsakoff sendromu ile sonu\u00e7lanabilir. Alkol kullan\u0131m bozuklu\u011fu olanlarda B1 vitamini eksikli\u011fi yayg\u0131nd\u0131r.\nAlkol T\u00fcketimine Tamamen Kar\u015f\u0131 Olunmas\u0131 Gerekti\u011fini Savunan \u201cThe Guardian\u201d Makalesi\nThe Guardian gazetesinin web sitesinde yer alan makalenin ba\u015fl\u0131\u011f\u0131 \u015f\u00f6yle:\n\u00d6nemli bir \u00e7al\u0131\u015fmaya g\u00f6re, \u2018Sa\u011fl\u0131kl\u0131 d\u00fczeyde bir alkol t\u00fcketim miktar\u0131 yok\u2019.\nMakalede, \u201cH\u00fck\u00fcmetler insanlara alkolden tamamen uzakla\u015fmay\u0131 tavsiye etmeli\u201d ifadesi yer al\u0131yor.\nAlkol\u00fcn etkileri \u00fczerine yap\u0131lan en b\u00fcy\u00fck ve en ayr\u0131nt\u0131l\u0131 ara\u015ft\u0131rmaya g\u00f6re, \u2018nadiren al\u0131nan alkol dahi h\u00fck\u00fcmetler taraf\u0131ndan yasaklanmal\u0131.\u2019\n\u00c7al\u0131\u015fmaya ili\u015fkin baz\u0131 \u00f6nemli veriler \u015f\u00f6yle:\nRapora g\u00f6re alkol 2006 y\u0131l\u0131nda 2.8 milyon ki\u015finin \u00f6l\u00fcm\u00fcne sebep oldu. \u00d6l\u00fcmlerin %20\u2032sini de 15 ile 49 ya\u015f grubundaki ki\u015filer olu\u015fturdu.\nRaporda, mevcut alkol i\u00e7me al\u0131\u015fkanl\u0131klar\u0131 hakk\u0131nda, \u201cbug\u00fcn gereken politika uygulanmazsa gelecekteki n\u00fcfusun sa\u011fl\u0131\u011f\u0131 i\u00e7in korkun\u00e7 sonu\u00e7lar\u0131n ortaya \u00e7\u0131kaca\u011f\u0131\u201d ifadesi yer al\u0131yor.\nAyr\u0131ca raporun en dikkat \u00e7ekici b\u00f6l\u00fcmlerinden biri de \u015fu c\u00fcmle:\n\u201c\u00c7o\u011fu ulusal kaynakta, g\u00fcnde bir veya iki bardak \u015farap veya biran\u0131n sa\u011fl\u0131\u011fa yararlar\u0131 oldu\u011funu \u00f6ne s\u00fcr\u00fcyorlar, ancak ara\u015ft\u0131rma sonu\u00e7lar\u0131m\u0131z, g\u00fcvenli bir i\u00e7me seviyesinin hi\u00e7 olmad\u0131\u011f\u0131n\u0131 g\u00f6steriyor.\u201d\nAlkol kullan\u0131m\u0131, \u00f6zellikle kad\u0131nlarda 50 ya\u015f\u0131n \u00fczerinde b\u00fcy\u00fck bir kanser sebebidir. Kad\u0131nlarda kanser \u00f6l\u00fcmlerinin %27.1\u2018inin, erkeklerde ise %50\u2018sinin alkol alma al\u0131\u015fkanl\u0131klar\u0131na ba\u011fl\u0131 oldu\u011fu bulunmu\u015ftur.\nDaha gen\u00e7 insanlarda ise, alkolle ba\u011flant\u0131l\u0131 en b\u00fcy\u00fck \u00f6l\u00fcm nedenleri t\u00fcberk\u00fcloz (\u00f6l\u00fcmlerin %1.4\u2018\u00fc), yol kazalar\u0131 yaralanmalar\u0131 (%1.2) ve kendine zarar verme (%1.1).\nT\u00fcrkiye Alkol T\u00fcketim \u0130statistikleri\nOur World In Data web sitesinde, D\u00fcnya Bankas\u0131 (World Bank) 2015 verileri, T\u00fcrkiye\u2019de alkol t\u00fcketimi istatisti\u011fini \u015fu \u015fekilde vermi\u015ftir:\nT\u00fcrkiye\u2019de bir y\u0131lda ki\u015fi ba\u015f\u0131na d\u00fc\u015fen alkol t\u00fcketimi, 2.4 litredir.\nT\u00fcrkiye\u2019de Bira T\u00fcketimi\nD\u00fcnya Sa\u011fl\u0131k \u00d6rg\u00fct\u00fc (WHO)\u2019n\u00fcn 2014 verilerine g\u00f6re, T\u00fcrkiye\u2019de bir y\u0131lda ki\u015fi ba\u015f\u0131na d\u00fc\u015fen bira t\u00fcketimi, 0.83 litredir.\n  Y\u0131llara g\u00f6re bira t\u00fcketimine bakt\u0131\u011f\u0131m\u0131zda, bu oran\u0131n son y\u0131llarda d\u00fczenli \u015fekilde artt\u0131\u011f\u0131n\u0131 g\u00f6r\u00fcyoruz.\n  T\u00fcrkiye\u2019de \u015earap T\u00fcketimi\nD\u00fcnya Sa\u011fl\u0131k \u00d6rg\u00fct\u00fc (WHO)\u2019n\u00fcn 2014 verilerine g\u00f6re, T\u00fcrkiye\u2019de bir y\u0131lda ki\u015fi ba\u015f\u0131na d\u00fc\u015fen \u015farap t\u00fcketimi, 0.13 litredir.\n  Yine D\u00fcnya Sa\u011fl\u0131k \u00d6rg\u00fct\u00fc\u2019n\u00fcn 2010 verilerine g\u00f6re, T\u00fcrkiye\u2019de \u015farap t\u00fcketim oran\u0131 %8,6\u2018d\u0131r.\n  T\u00fcrkiye\u2019de Alkol Kullan\u0131m Bozuklu\u011fu ve Tekrarlanma S\u0131kl\u0131\u011f\u0131\nSa\u011fl\u0131k \u00d6l\u00e7\u00fcmleri De\u011ferlendirme Enstit\u00fcs\u00fc (IHME)\u2019n\u00fcn 2016 verilerine g\u00f6re, T\u00fcrkiye\u2019de alkol kullan\u0131m bozuklu\u011fu olanlar\u0131n oran\u0131 %0.89\u2018dur.\nT\u00fcrkiye\u2019de Alkol Kullan\u0131m Bozuklu\u011fundan Kaynakl\u0131 \u00d6l\u00fcmler\nSa\u011fl\u0131k \u00d6l\u00e7\u00fcmleri De\u011ferlendirme Enstit\u00fcs\u00fc (IHME)\u2019n\u00fcn 2016 verilerine g\u00f6re, T\u00fcrkiye\u2019de her 100.000 ki\u015fide alkol kullan\u0131m bozuklu\u011fundan kaynakl\u0131 \u00f6l\u00fcm say\u0131s\u0131 0.21\u2019dir.\n  Grafi\u011fe bakt\u0131\u011f\u0131m\u0131zda, T\u00fcrkiye\u2019de bu say\u0131n\u0131n ge\u00e7mi\u015ften g\u00fcn\u00fcm\u00fcze do\u011fru d\u00fc\u015f\u00fc\u015fte oldu\u011fu g\u00f6r\u00fcl\u00fcyor.\n  Kaynaklar: kaynak1, kaynak2, kaynak3, kaynak4, kaynak5\nVideo oynat\u0131c\u0131\nhttps://dogrula.org/wp-content/uploads/2018/02/dogrula.org_.mp4\n00:00\n00:07\n[Toplam:3    Ortalama:5/5] Ara\u015ft\u0131rma: T\u00fcrkiye\u2019de Alkol T\u00fcketimi", "\u0130hbar olarak dogrula.org\u2019a g\u00f6nderilen bir haberde, y\u00fczleri yanm\u0131\u015f bir grup k\u0131z \u00e7ocu\u011funun yer ald\u0131\u011f\u0131 bir g\u00f6rsel, \u0130slami terbiye ad\u0131na y\u00fczlerine kezzap at\u0131ld\u0131\u011f\u0131 iddias\u0131yla payla\u015f\u0131l\u0131yor.\nAncak s\u00f6z konusu iddia do\u011fru de\u011fildir; g\u00f6rseldeki k\u0131z \u00e7ocuklar\u0131n\u0131n y\u00fczlerine \u0130slami terbiye ad\u0131 alt\u0131nda kezzap at\u0131ld\u0131\u011f\u0131 iddias\u0131 as\u0131ls\u0131zd\u0131r. \u0130lk olarak Bayram Turan adl\u0131 Facebook kullan\u0131c\u0131s\u0131n\u0131n bu yorumla yayd\u0131\u011f\u0131 haber, pek \u00e7ok platformda ayn\u0131 ger\u00e7ek d\u0131\u015f\u0131 yorumla payla\u015f\u0131lm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r.\n  2005 y\u0131l\u0131na ait bu foto\u011fraf, \u0130ran\u2019\u0131n bir k\u00f6y\u00fcndeki ilkokulda \u00e7\u0131kan yang\u0131nda y\u00fczleri bu \u015fekilde yanm\u0131\u015f olan \u00e7ocuklar\u0131 g\u00f6steriyor.\n  Uydurma haberde yer alan, \u201cPakistan\u2019da ve \u00e7o\u011fu \u0130slam \u00fclkelerinde kad\u0131nlar\u0131n cezaland\u0131r\u0131lmalar\u0131 aras\u0131nda y\u00fcze kezzap atmak tamamen yasal\u201d ifadesi de kesinlikle do\u011fru de\u011fil.\nG\u00f6rseldeki \u00c7ocuklar\u0131n Yang\u0131nda Y\u00fczleri Yanm\u0131\u015f\n  2005 y\u0131l\u0131na ait olan g\u00f6rseldeki \u00e7ocuklar, \u0130ran\u2019\u0131n Doroodzan k\u00f6y\u00fcndeki Shahid Rahimi ilkokulunda \u00e7\u0131kan bir yang\u0131nda bu \u015fekilde yanm\u0131\u015f.\n  S\u0131n\u0131fa giren \u00f6\u011frencilerden birinin ya\u011f \u0131s\u0131t\u0131c\u0131s\u0131na \u00e7arpmas\u0131 sonucu \u0131s\u0131t\u0131c\u0131 d\u00fc\u015fm\u00fc\u015f ve yang\u0131n \u00e7\u0131km\u0131\u015f.\n  \u00c7ocuklara onlarca kez tedavi uygulanm\u0131\u015f ancak tam bir cerrahi operasyon i\u00e7in 18 ya\u015f\u0131na girmeleri gerekti\u011fi s\u00f6ylenmi\u015f.\n  \u015eimdi \u00e7oktan 18 ya\u015f\u0131na giren \u00f6\u011frenciler hala ameliyat olam\u0131yor \u00e7\u00fcnk\u00fc aileleri zaten yeterince operasyon paras\u0131 vermi\u015f; ayr\u0131ca videoda devletten de bu konuda destek g\u00f6rmedikleri s\u00f6yleniyor.\n  S\u00f6z konusu iddiay\u0131 ortaya atan Facebook hesab\u0131n\u0131 inceledi\u011finizde, bu t\u00fcr nefret diliyle yaz\u0131lan pek \u00e7ok payla\u015f\u0131m oldu\u011fu g\u00f6r\u00fcl\u00fcyor. Ayr\u0131ca iddia sahibi Bayram Turan, \u0130slami terbiye ad\u0131na y\u00fczlerine kezzap at\u0131ld\u0131\u011f\u0131 iddias\u0131yla payla\u015ft\u0131\u011f\u0131 \u00e7ocuk g\u00f6rselini de sayfas\u0131ndan kald\u0131rm\u0131\u015f.\nKaynaklar: kaynak1, kaynak2, kaynak3\nVideo oynat\u0131c\u0131\nhttps://dogrula.org/wp-content/uploads/2018/02/dogrula.org_.mp4\n00:00\n00:07\n[Toplam:3    Ortalama:5/5] \u0130slami Terbiye Ad\u0131na K\u0131z \u00c7ocuklar\u0131n\u0131n Y\u00fczlerine Kezzap At\u0131ld\u0131\u011f\u0131\u00a0\u0130ddias\u0131", "  Sosyal medya ve \u0130nternet ortamlar\u0131nda yer alan bu g\u00f6rsel, pek \u00e7ok ki\u015fi taraf\u0131ndan payla\u015f\u0131larak viral olmu\u015ftur.\nAncak 100 bin Suriyelinin memur olaca\u011f\u0131 iddias\u0131 do\u011fru de\u011fildir. T\u00fcrkiye\u2019de devlet memuru olabilmek i\u00e7in T\u00fcrk vatanda\u015f\u0131 olmak gerekiyor.\nDevlet Memuru Olmak \u0130\u00e7in \u00d6ncelikle T\u00fcrk Vatanda\u015f\u0131 Olmak Gerekiyor\n  657 say\u0131l\u0131 Devlet Memurlar\u0131 kanununun 48. Maddesine g\u00f6re, T\u00fcrkiye\u2019de devlet memuru olabilmek i\u00e7in T\u00fcrk vatanda\u015f\u0131 olmak gerekiyor.\nAyr\u0131ca Resmi Gazete\u2019deki kanun, y\u00f6netmelik ve ilanlarda s\u00f6z konusu iddiaya dair al\u0131nm\u0131\u015f bir karara rastlanmamaktad\u0131r.\n  Milli E\u011fitim Bakanl\u0131\u011f\u0131n\u0131n B\u00f6yle Bir Duyurusu Yok\nS\u00f6z konusu iddiada yer alan, bakanl\u0131\u011f\u0131n duyuru yapt\u0131\u011f\u0131na dair yaz\u0131lanlar da as\u0131ls\u0131zd\u0131r. Milli E\u011fitim Bakanl\u0131\u011f\u0131 web sitesi ve duyurular\u0131nda b\u00f6yle bir habere rastlanmamaktad\u0131r.\nBakanl\u0131\u011f\u0131n \u0130nternet sitesinde yer alan duyurular\u0131n tamam\u0131na buradan ula\u015fabilirsiniz.\nSuriyelilere Vatanda\u015fl\u0131k Konusu\n5901 say\u0131l\u0131 T\u00fcrk Vatanda\u015fl\u0131\u011f\u0131 Kanunu yabanc\u0131lar\u0131n vatanda\u015fl\u0131\u011fa al\u0131nmalar\u0131 i\u00e7in \u00fc\u00e7 usul \u00f6ng\u00f6rm\u00fc\u015ft\u00fcr.\nGenel h\u00fck\u00fcmlere g\u00f6re vatanda\u015f olmak i\u00e7in \u00f6ncelikle g\u00f6\u00e7menin T\u00fcrkiye\u2019de en az 5 y\u0131l s\u00fcren ge\u00e7erli ikametinin olmas\u0131 gerekmektedir. Suriyelilerin stat\u00fcs\u00fc ge\u00e7ici koruma stat\u00fcs\u00fcd\u00fcr. Ge\u00e7ici Koruma stat\u00fcs\u00fc ile ge\u00e7irilen s\u00fcre vatanda\u015fl\u0131\u011fa ba\u015fvuru i\u00e7in bir hak do\u011furmamaktad\u0131r.\nT\u00fcrkiye\u2019de ge\u00e7ici ikamet stat\u00fcs\u00fcnde bulunan bir Suriyeli on y\u0131l T\u00fcrkiye\u2019de bulunsa da vatanda\u015fl\u0131\u011fa ba\u015fvuru hakk\u0131 kazanamamaktad\u0131r. Ge\u00e7ici koruma y\u00f6netmeli\u011finin 25. Maddesinde bu husus net olarak d\u00fczenlenmi\u015ftir: \u201cGe\u00e7ici koruma kimlik belgesi, T\u00fcrkiye\u2019de kal\u0131\u015f hakk\u0131 sa\u011flar. Ancak bu belge Kanunda d\u00fczenlenen ikamet izni veya ikamet izni yerine ge\u00e7en belgelere e\u015fde\u011fer say\u0131lmaz, uzun d\u00f6nem ikamet iznine ge\u00e7i\u015f hakk\u0131 tan\u0131maz, s\u00fcresi ikamet izni toplam\u0131nda dikkate al\u0131nmaz ve sahibine T\u00fcrk vatanda\u015fl\u0131\u011f\u0131na ba\u015fvuru hakk\u0131 sa\u011flamaz.\u201d\n  G\u00f6r\u00fcld\u00fc\u011f\u00fc \u00fczere, 100 bin Suriyelinin memur olaca\u011f\u0131 iddias\u0131 do\u011fru de\u011fildir. Resmi Gazete\u2019de ve Milli E\u011fitim Bakanl\u0131\u011f\u0131 kaynaklar\u0131nda buna dair kanun ya da duyuru yer almamaktad\u0131r. T\u00fcrkiye\u2019de devlet memuru olabilmek i\u00e7in T\u00fcrk vatanda\u015f\u0131 olmak gerekmektedir.\n  Edit\u00f6r\u00fcn Notu: Benzer \u015fekilde viral olan, \u201c95 Suriyeli \u00d6\u011fretmen Memur Olarak G\u00f6reve Atand\u0131 \u0130ddias\u0131\u201d ba\u015fl\u0131kl\u0131 i\u00e7eri\u011fimize buradan ula\u015fabilirsiniz.\nKaynaklar: kaynak1, kaynak2, kaynak3, kaynak4, kaynak5, kaynak6\nVideo oynat\u0131c\u0131\nhttps://dogrula.org/wp-content/uploads/2018/02/dogrula.org_.mp4\n00:00\n00:07\n[Toplam:1    Ortalama:5/5] 100 bin Suriyeli Memur Olacak \u0130ddias\u0131", "  T.D.\u2019nin yeri adl\u0131 Twitter hesab\u0131nda, Osmanl\u0131 \u0130mparatorlu\u011funun 34. padi\u015fah\u0131 II. Abd\u00fclhamid\u2019in en net g\u00f6r\u00fcnt\u00fclerini i\u00e7erdi\u011fi iddia edilen bir video payla\u015f\u0131ld\u0131. Video y\u00fczlerce kez be\u011fenildi ve payla\u015f\u0131ld\u0131.\nSultan II. Abdulhamid\u2019in en net videosu. Huzura \u00e7\u0131kan Theodor Herzl. #Abd\u00fclhamidsizY\u00fczY\u0131l pic.twitter.com/GVGxKJOzqd\n\u2014 T.D.\u2019nin yeri (@divanuyesi) February 10, 2018\n  Ancak s\u00f6z konusu videonun Sultan II. Abd\u00fclhamid\u2019i g\u00f6sterdi\u011fi iddias\u0131 do\u011fru de\u011fildir. G\u00f6r\u00fcnt\u00fclerin Siyonizmin kurucular\u0131ndan Theodor Herzl\u2019in hayat\u0131n\u0131n anlat\u0131ld\u0131\u011f\u0131 \u201c Theodor Herzl\u201d adl\u0131 filmden al\u0131nd\u0131\u011f\u0131na dair veriler ve haberler a\u011f\u0131rl\u0131ktad\u0131r.\nTheodor Herlz, 1921 Filmi\n  Sultan II. Abd\u00fclhamid\u2019in Theodor Herlz ile konu\u015ftu\u011fu sahnenin g\u00f6rselini, 1921 yap\u0131m\u0131 Theodor Herlz adl\u0131 filmde g\u00f6rmek m\u00fcmk\u00fcn.\nA\u015fa\u011f\u0131daki sitede yer alan g\u00f6rsellere bak\u0131ld\u0131\u011f\u0131nda, videonun bir filmden al\u0131nd\u0131\u011f\u0131 ihtimali g\u00fc\u00e7leniyor, \u00e7\u00fcnk\u00fc g\u00f6rsellerin sonuncusunda oyuncular\u0131n isimlerinin (cast of appearance) yer ald\u0131\u011f\u0131 g\u00f6rsel mevcut.\nVideoya ait filmler incelendi\u011finde, 2 farkl\u0131 filme rastl\u0131yoruz. Theodor Herlz,1921 ve Wandering Jew. Fakat yukar\u0131daki web sitesinde yer alan g\u00f6rsel ve oyuncu kadrosu, iki filmin birle\u015fimi gibi olu\u015fturulmu\u015f.\n  G\u00f6rselde, filmde oynayan oyuncular\u0131n ad\u0131 yer al\u0131yor:\n  G\u00f6r\u00fcnt\u00fcy\u00fc Google\u2019den arad\u0131\u011f\u0131n\u0131zda, arama motoru sizi s\u00f6z konusu filme y\u00f6nlendiriyor, ancak siteye girdi\u011finizde videonun \u0130nternet ortam\u0131ndan silindi\u011fini g\u00f6r\u00fcyorsunuz.\nVideonun \u201cWandering Jew, 1933\u201d Adl\u0131 Ba\u015fka Bir Filme Ait Olma \u0130htimali de Var\n  Sultan II. Abd\u00fclhamid ve Theodor Herlz\u2019in g\u00f6r\u00fcnt\u00fclerinin yer ald\u0131\u011f\u0131 vdeo baz\u0131 kaynaklarda 1933 yap\u0131m\u0131 Wandering Jew filminden bir sahne olarak yer almaktad\u0131r, ancak filme ait videolarda bu sahneye rastlanm\u0131yor.\nAyn\u0131 Adl\u0131 Bir Ba\u015fka Film: The Wandering Jew, 1921\n  Avusturya yap\u0131m\u0131 olan bu film ise 1921 y\u0131l\u0131nda \u00e7ekilmi\u015f olarak g\u00f6r\u00fcl\u00fcyor:\n  Yukar\u0131daki film, ismi benzer olan s\u00f6z konusu 1933 yap\u0131m\u0131 filmle ayn\u0131 gibi g\u00f6r\u00fcnse de, oyuncu kadrosu tamam\u0131yla farkl\u0131.\nOrtak noktas\u0131 Theodor Herlz Olan Bu Filmler Hakk\u0131nda Yaz\u0131lm\u0131\u015f Bir Makale\nModern Siyonizmin kurucusu Theodor Herlz\u2019i konu alan pek \u00e7ok filmin \u00e7ekildi\u011fine dair bilgilerin yer ald\u0131\u011f\u0131 bu makaleden de anla\u015f\u0131ld\u0131\u011f\u0131 \u00fczere, s\u00f6z konusu Sultan II. Abd\u00fclhamid videosunun bu filmlerden birine ait olma ihtimali olduk\u00e7a y\u00fcksek.\nMakalenin tamam\u0131na buradan ula\u015fabilirsiniz.\n  Bir kullan\u0131c\u0131 taraf\u0131ndan Youtube\u2019de payla\u015f\u0131lan s\u00f6z konusu videonun a\u00e7\u0131klama k\u0131sm\u0131nda da g\u00f6r\u00fcnt\u00fclerin ger\u00e7ek oldu\u011funa dair delil niteli\u011finde bir a\u00e7\u0131klama sunulmam\u0131\u015ft\u0131r:\nG\u00f6r\u00fcnt\u00fclerin Ger\u00e7ek Olma \u0130htimali Neden D\u00fc\u015f\u00fck?\n    Sultan II. Abd\u00fclhamid\u2019in foto\u011fraflar\u0131 incelendi\u011finde, g\u00f6r\u00fcnt\u00fclerdeki ki\u015fiyle benzerli\u011fi olmad\u0131\u011f\u0131 s\u00f6ylenebilir.\nHafif kamburu olan ve y\u00fcz\u00fc fazlaca sivri olmayan Sultan, videoda bu halinden farkl\u0131 g\u00f6sterilmi\u015f.\nII. Abd\u00fclhamid\u2019in mevcut foto\u011fraflar\u0131:\n  Oysa s\u00f6z konusu videodaki Abd\u00fclhamid daha farkl\u0131 g\u00f6r\u00fcn\u00fcyor:\n  Sultan II. Abd\u00fclhamid\u2019e ait oldu\u011fu ispat edilen tek videonun, Rus ar\u015fivlerinden al\u0131nan bu \u201cCuma Selaml\u0131\u011f\u0131\u201d videosu oldu\u011fu s\u00f6yleniyor.\n  Osmanl\u0131 padi\u015fahlar\u0131ndan Sultan II. Abd\u00fclhamid\u2019in selamla\u015fmas\u0131, giyim tarz\u0131 ve fizi\u011fine dair genel g\u00f6r\u00fcn\u00fcm\u00fc ve hareketleri incelendi\u011finde, s\u00f6z konusu videodaki ki\u015finin o olmad\u0131\u011f\u0131 ihtimalinin daha y\u00fcksek oldu\u011fu g\u00f6r\u00fclmektedir.\nKaynaklar: kaynak1, kaynak2, kaynak3, kaynak4, kaynak5, kaynak6, kaynak7, kaynak8, kaynak9, kaynak10\n  Video oynat\u0131c\u0131\nhttps://dogrula.org/wp-content/uploads/2018/02/dogrula.org_.mp4\n00:00\n00:07\n[Toplam:2    Ortalama:4.5/5] Ara\u015ft\u0131rma: Video Sultan Abd\u00fclhamid\u2019in Ger\u00e7ek G\u00f6r\u00fcnt\u00fclerini mi \u0130\u00e7eriyor?", "  Ge\u00e7ti\u011fimiz g\u00fcnlerde Resmi Gazete\u2019de, T\u00fcrk vatanda\u015f\u0131 olmak isteyen yabanc\u0131lar i\u00e7in yeni bir d\u00fczenleme yay\u0131mlanm\u0131\u015ft\u0131. Bu d\u00fczenleme \u00fczerine, sosyal medya ve \u0130nternet ortamlar\u0131nda T\u00fcrkiye\u2019den ev alan yabanc\u0131lara vatanda\u015fl\u0131\u011f\u0131n verilmesi konusu hakk\u0131nda g\u00fcndem olu\u015ftu; \u00e7e\u015fitli yorumla sebebiyle kafa kar\u0131\u015f\u0131kl\u0131\u011f\u0131 ortaya \u00e7\u0131kt\u0131.\nBu y\u00fczden, T\u00fcrkiye\u2019den vatanda\u015fl\u0131k alma ve konut sahipli\u011fi konusunu inceledik.\nResmi Gazete\u2019deki D\u00fczenleme\n\u00d6ncelikle \u015funu s\u00f6ylemek gerekiyor; y\u00f6netmelikteki de\u011fi\u015fiklik, Mart 2017\u2018de kararla\u015ft\u0131r\u0131lm\u0131\u015f.\n  Y\u00f6netmeli\u011fin 20. maddesine eklenen bent \u015f\u00f6yle:\n  T\u00fcrk Vatanda\u015fl\u0131\u011f\u0131 Kanununun Uygulanmas\u0131na \u0130li\u015fkin Y\u00f6netmelikte De\u011fi\u015fiklik Yap\u0131lmas\u0131na Dair Y\u00f6netmeli\u011fe g\u00f6re, D\u00fczenlemeye g\u00f6re sermaye tutar\u0131 2 milyon dolardan 500 bin dolara, istihdam miktar\u0131 100 ki\u015fiden 50 ki\u015fiye, bankalarda bulundurulmas\u0131 \u015fart\u0131 aranan mevduat miktar\u0131 ise 3 milyon dolardan 500 bin dolara d\u00fc\u015f\u00fcr\u00fcld\u00fc.\nBu hamlenin amac\u0131n\u0131n T\u00fcrkiye daha fazla yabanc\u0131 yat\u0131r\u0131mc\u0131 \u00e7ekmek ve konut sat\u0131\u015flar\u0131n\u0131 art\u0131rmak oldu\u011fu vurguland\u0131.\nBu de\u011fi\u015fiklik, may\u0131s ay\u0131nda \u00e7\u0131kmas\u0131 beklenen Torba Yasa\u2019ya eklenecek.\nYat\u0131r\u0131m Kar\u015f\u0131l\u0131\u011f\u0131nda Vatanda\u015fl\u0131k Vermek \u00dclkeler Aras\u0131nda Rekabeti Art\u0131r\u0131yor ve D\u00fcnyada Trend\n  ABD\nVoice of America (Amerika\u2019n\u0131n Sesi) yay\u0131n kurulu\u015funun web sitesinde yer alan habere g\u00f6re, 500 bin dolarl\u0131k yat\u0131r\u0131m kar\u015f\u0131l\u0131\u011f\u0131nda Amerikan vatanda\u015fl\u0131\u011f\u0131n\u0131n yolunu a\u00e7an EB-5 yat\u0131r\u0131m vizesine olan talep patlamas\u0131 nedeniyle, alt s\u0131n\u0131r\u0131 500 bin dolar olan bu vize t\u00fcr\u00fcnde yat\u0131r\u0131m\u0131n en az 800 bin dolardan ba\u015flamas\u0131 karar\u0131 al\u0131nm\u0131\u015f ancak karar uluslararas\u0131 rekabetin artmas\u0131 nedeniyle bir\u00e7ok kez kongrede uzat\u0131lm\u0131\u015ft\u0131.\nAncak ge\u00e7ti\u011fimiz hafta kongre karar\u0131yla EB-5 yat\u0131r\u0131mlar\u0131nda alt s\u0131n\u0131r olan 500 bin dolar miktar\u0131n\u0131n 6 ay daha uygulamada olmas\u0131na karar verildi.\n  D\u0130\u011eER \u00dcLKELERDE DURUM NE?\nYine habere g\u00f6re, baz\u0131 \u00fclkeler d\u00fc\u015f\u00fck bedeller kar\u015f\u0131l\u0131\u011f\u0131nda k\u0131sa zamanda yabanc\u0131 bir ki\u015fiye vatanda\u015fl\u0131k sa\u011flayabiliyor.\nGerekli yat\u0131r\u0131mlar yap\u0131ld\u0131ktan sonra bekleme s\u00fcresi ve \u015fartlar \u00fclkelere g\u00f6re de\u011fi\u015fiyor. Dominik gibi baz\u0131 \u00fclkeler 100 bin dolar kar\u015f\u0131l\u0131\u011f\u0131nda hemen vatanda\u015fl\u0131k veriyor.\n\u0130svi\u00e7re y\u0131ll\u0131k en az 250 bin frankl\u0131k yat\u0131r\u0131m yap\u0131ld\u0131ktan sonra vatanda\u015fl\u0131\u011f\u0131 12 y\u0131l sonra veriyor. Macaristan\u2019da ise alt s\u0131n\u0131r 250 bin euro olsa da vatanda\u015fl\u0131k i\u00e7in en az 8 y\u0131l beklemek gerekiyor.\nLetonya\u2019da vatanda\u015fl\u0131k i\u00e7in en az yat\u0131r\u0131m 35 bin euro ve yasalara g\u00f6re en az 10 y\u0131l bekleme s\u00fcresi konulmu\u015f.\nD\u00fcnya Ekonomik Forumu\u2019nun 2016 y\u0131l\u0131 verilerine g\u00f6re yat\u0131r\u0131m ve konut al\u0131m\u0131 kar\u015f\u0131l\u0131\u011f\u0131nda vatanda\u015fl\u0131k veren \u00fclkelerdeki yat\u0131r\u0131m tutarlar\u0131\n  K\u0131br\u0131s: 2,5 milyon euro\nDominika: 100 bin dolar\nGrenada: 250 bin dolar\nMalta: 1,15 milyon euro\nAvusturalya: 5 milyon Avusturalya dolar\u0131\nBulgaristan: 5 milyon euro\nKanada: Eyaletlere g\u00f6re 350\u2013800 bin Kanada dolar\u0131\nFransa: 10 milyon euro\nMacaristan: 250 bin euro\nYunanistan: 250 bin euro\n\u0130rlanda: 250 bin euro\nLetonya: 35 bin euro\nYeni Zelanda: 1,5 milyon Yeni Zelanda dolar\u0131\nPortekiz: 500 bin euro\nSingapur: 2,5 milyon Singapur dolar\u0131\n\u0130spanya: 500 bin euro\n\u0130ngiltere: 1 milyon pound\nKarara \u0130li\u015fkin Sekt\u00f6r Yorumlar\u0131 Olumlu\nGayrimenkul ve Gayrimenkul Yat\u0131r\u0131m Ortakl\u0131\u011f\u0131 Derne\u011fi (GYODER) Y\u00f6netim Kurulu Ba\u015fkan\u0131 Feyzullah Yetgin:\n\u201cArt\u0131k yava\u015f yava\u015f i\u015fler ray\u0131na girmeye ba\u015flad\u0131. Mesela turizmde hem gelir hem de turist say\u0131s\u0131 a\u00e7\u0131s\u0131ndan hedefler y\u00fckseltildi. Gelen turist say\u0131lar\u0131 da artt\u0131. Bunlar\u0131n hepsi birbirine ba\u011fl\u0131\u2026\u201d\n\u201cBu y\u0131l zaten yabanc\u0131ya konut sat\u0131\u015f\u0131nda ciddi art\u0131\u015f bekliyorduk. Ancak bu de\u011fi\u015fiklikle birlikte 9\u201310 milyar dolarl\u0131k band\u0131 yakalayabiliriz.\u201d\n\u00d6zyurtlar Holding Y\u00f6netim Kurulu Ba\u015fkan\u0131 Tamer \u00d6zyurt:\n\u201cGe\u00e7 kal\u0131nm\u0131\u015f ama \u00e7ok isabetli bir karar. Sat\u0131\u015flara \u015fimdiden yans\u0131d\u0131\u011f\u0131n\u0131 s\u00f6yleyebilirim.\u201d\n\u201cNormalde ge\u00e7en y\u0131l yap\u0131lan 4,6 milyar dolarl\u0131k yabanc\u0131ya konut sat\u0131\u015f\u0131n\u0131n bu y\u0131l 7,5 milyar dolar civar\u0131nda olmas\u0131n\u0131 bekliyorduk. Ancak bu kararla birlikte 10 milyar dolar\u0131 bulabilir.\u201d\nFuzul Grup Y\u00f6netim Kurulu \u00dcyesi ve Nevita Inernational Y\u00f6netim Kurulu Ba\u015fkan\u0131 Faruk Akbal:\n\u201cAncak rakam hala \u00e7ok d\u00fc\u015f\u00fck. Mart 2016-Mart 2017 aras\u0131nda Amerika\u2019da yabanc\u0131lar 284 bin gayrimenkul sat\u0131n ald\u0131 ve 153 milyar dolar \u00f6dedi. Bu rakama ula\u015fmak zor belki ama h\u00fck\u00fcmetimizin devreye almaya haz\u0131rland\u0131\u011f\u0131 vatanda\u015fl\u0131k ve oturum hakk\u0131 bedel s\u0131n\u0131r\u0131n\u0131n 300 bin dolara \u00e7ekilmesiyle geometrik bir b\u00fcy\u00fcme imkans\u0131z olmayacak ve bir \u0130spanya \u00f6rne\u011fini k\u0131sa vadede yakalayabilece\u011fiz. Son bir y\u0131lda \u0130spanya\u2019da yabanc\u0131ya sat\u0131lan konut adedi 50 bin\u2026 D\u00fczenleme ile y\u0131ll\u0131k 50 bin adet konut sat\u0131\u015f\u0131n\u0131 yakalayabiliriz. 2020 gibi bu rakamlara \u00e7ok yakla\u015faca\u011f\u0131m\u0131z\u0131 d\u00fc\u015f\u00fcn\u00fcyorum.\u201d\nEge Yap\u0131 Y\u00f6netim Kurulu Ba\u015fkan\u0131 \u0130nan\u00e7 Kabaday\u0131:\n\u201cYabanc\u0131ya sat\u0131\u015fta \u00f6n\u00fcm\u00fczde daha \u00e7ok yol var. Toplam sat\u0131\u015flar\u0131n i\u00e7erisindeki pay\u0131 sadece y\u00fczde 1,5\u2019ler seviyesinde. Bir\u00e7ok \u00fclke yabanc\u0131ya gayrimenkul satmak i\u00e7in adeta yar\u0131\u015f\u0131yor. Bu konuya sadece ekonomik olarak bakmamak laz\u0131m. T\u00fcrkiye Cumhuriyeti vatanda\u015f\u0131 olan bir yabanc\u0131, kendi \u00fclkesinde \u00fclkemizin tan\u0131t\u0131m\u0131n\u0131 yapacak, hatta \u00fclkemizin tan\u0131t\u0131m el\u00e7isi olacakt\u0131r. \u00dclkemizden konut alan bir yabanc\u0131 beyaz e\u015fyadan g\u0131daya, elektronik \u00fcr\u00fcnlerden z\u00fcccaciyeye, mobilyadan bir evin temel ihtiya\u00e7lar\u0131na kadar bir\u00e7ok sat\u0131n alma yap\u0131yor. Yabanc\u0131ya vatanda\u015fl\u0131k \u015fartlar\u0131n\u0131n kolayla\u015ft\u0131r\u0131lmas\u0131 sadece gayrimenkul sekt\u00f6r\u00fcn\u00fc de\u011fil, t\u00fcm sekt\u00f6rleri olumlu y\u00f6nde etkileyecek bir ad\u0131m olacakt\u0131r. D\u00fczenleme ile beraber ekonomide etkisini h\u0131zl\u0131 bir \u015fekilde g\u00f6rece\u011fimizi \u00f6ng\u00f6r\u00fcyorum.\u201d\nBabacan Holding Y\u00f6netim Kurulu Ba\u015fkan\u0131 \u0130brahim Babacan:\n\u201cYasa y\u00fcr\u00fcrl\u00fc\u011fe girdi\u011fi tarihte yat\u0131r\u0131m yapanlar\u0131 da kapsayacak \u015fekilde uygulan\u0131rsa yabanc\u0131lara sat\u0131lan konut rakamlar\u0131nda ciddi bir art\u0131\u015f sa\u011flanabilir. 300 bin dolar alt\u0131ndaki yat\u0131r\u0131mlar i\u00e7in de farkl\u0131 uygulamalar getirilebilir. B\u00f6ylece gayrimenkul ve in\u015faat sekt\u00f6r\u00fc a\u00e7\u0131s\u0131ndan f\u0131rsatlar \u00fclkesi olan T\u00fcrkiye, t\u00fcrl\u00fc nedenlerden dolay\u0131 yat\u0131r\u0131ma \u00e7ekimser yakla\u015fanlar\u0131 radar\u0131na alabilecek.\n1 milyon dolarl\u0131k tutar\u0131 yakalayamayan ya da \u00e7e\u015fitli nedenlerle yat\u0131r\u0131mlar\u0131n\u0131 durduran yat\u0131r\u0131mc\u0131lar, T\u00fcrkiye ekonomisi i\u00e7in ciddi bir potansiyel olu\u015fturuyor. 300 bin dolar alt\u0131ndaki yat\u0131r\u0131mlar i\u00e7in kalan tutar nakdi olarak al\u0131nabilece\u011fi gibi vatanda\u015fl\u0131k almak isteyenlerin konut yat\u0131r\u0131m\u0131 yapmalar\u0131 ve belli bir s\u00fcre ellerinde tutmalar\u0131 \u015fart ko\u015fularak daha geni\u015f bir kitleye hitap edilebilir. Bu sayede m\u00fctekabiliyet yasas\u0131 sonras\u0131 T\u00fcrkiye\u2019den ev alm\u0131\u015f ve kurdaki hareketlilik gibi nedenlerle yeni yat\u0131r\u0131m yapmayanlar\u0131 da harekete ge\u00e7irerek ciddi bir d\u00f6viz giri\u015fi sa\u011flanabilir. Bu konuda yap\u0131lan d\u00fczenleme, yabanc\u0131 yat\u0131r\u0131mc\u0131 a\u00e7\u0131s\u0131ndan T\u00fcrkiye\u2019ye olan ilgiyi destekleyerek 10 milyar dolar\u0131n \u00fczerinde bir hacim olu\u015fturabilir.\u201d\nDemir \u0130n\u015faat Y\u00f6netim Kurulu Ba\u015fkan\u0131 Hamit Demir:\n\u201cOysa \u00fclkemize y\u00f6nelik yabanc\u0131 hayranl\u0131\u011f\u0131n\u0131 yat\u0131r\u0131m anlam\u0131nda kazan\u00e7 sa\u011flayacak \u015fekilde ele alarak ilerlemek gerekiyor. Yabanc\u0131 yat\u0131r\u0131mc\u0131ya vatanda\u015fl\u0131k hakk\u0131 getiren yasa bu haliyle yeterli yat\u0131r\u0131mc\u0131 \u00e7ekmiyor.\u201d\n\u201cB\u00f6ylece T\u00fcrkiye, gayrimenkul ve in\u015faat sekt\u00f6r\u00fcnde ba\u015frol oynayan prestijli ve kazan\u00e7l\u0131 yat\u0131r\u0131m projeleriyle bekleme pozisyonunda kalan yabanc\u0131 yat\u0131r\u0131mc\u0131lar i\u00e7in ciddi bir cazibe merkezi olabilir.\u201d\nKonutder Y\u00f6netim Kurulu Ba\u015fkan\u0131 Z. Altan Elmas:\n\u201cYabanc\u0131ya konut sat\u0131\u015f\u0131 rekor seviyesinde artarak devam ediyor. 2017 y\u0131l\u0131n\u0131n Haziran ay\u0131na g\u00f6re y\u00fczde 7 oran\u0131nda art\u0131\u015f ile 2 bin 60 adet konut sat\u0131\u015f\u0131 ger\u00e7ekle\u015fti. Yabanc\u0131 yat\u0131r\u0131mc\u0131n\u0131n \u00fclkemize olan ilgisi her ge\u00e7en g\u00fcn art\u0131yor. 2018 y\u0131l\u0131n\u0131 rekor konut sat\u0131\u015f\u0131yla kapataca\u011f\u0131m\u0131z\u0131 d\u00fc\u015f\u00fcn\u00fcyorum. \u00dclkemize \u00e7ok ciddi d\u00f6viz girdisi sa\u011flayan yabanc\u0131ya konut sat\u0131\u015f\u0131n\u0131 art\u0131rmam\u0131z \u015fart.\u201d\nAta Kurumsal Dan\u0131\u015fmanl\u0131k Y\u00f6netim Kurulu Ba\u015fkan\u0131 Murat Sar\u0131usta:\n\u201c2019 y\u0131l\u0131nda yabanc\u0131lara konut sat\u0131\u015f\u0131n\u0131n 13\u201314 milyar dolar olaca\u011f\u0131n\u0131 tahmin ediyorum. Program devam etti\u011fi s\u00fcrece her sene bu miktar\u0131n katlanarak artaca\u011f\u0131n\u0131 s\u00f6yleyebilirim ancak belirli bir s\u00fcre sonra bu uygulaman\u0131n durdurulaca\u011f\u0131n\u0131 ve tekrar 1 milyon dolara s\u0131n\u0131r\u0131na ge\u00e7ilece\u011fini d\u00fc\u015f\u00fcn\u00fcyorum. Ayr\u0131ca mesele sadece emlak sekt\u00f6r\u00fcne de\u011fil, ekonominin di\u011fer t\u00fcm alanlar\u0131na da olumlu \u015fekilde yans\u0131yacakt\u0131r. Buradan konut alanlar gelip burada bir hayat kurmak isteyen insanlar. Burada \u015firket kuruyorlar, \u00e7ocuklar\u0131 buradaki okullara gidiyor. Kendi \u00fclkelerindeki banka hesaplar\u0131n\u0131 T\u00fcrkiye\u2019deki bankalara ta\u015f\u0131yorlar. K\u0131sacas\u0131 300 bin dolarl\u0131k yat\u0131r\u0131m\u0131n en az 2\u20133 kat\u0131 daha i\u00e7 piyasaya harcama yap\u0131l\u0131yor. Bu da ekonomimize can suyu verilmesi anlam\u0131na gelir.\u201d\nKaynaklar: kaynak1, kaynak2, kaynak3, kaynak4\nVideo oynat\u0131c\u0131\nhttps://dogrula.org/wp-content/uploads/2018/02/dogrula.org_.mp4\n00:00\n00:07\n[Toplam:1    Ortalama:5/5] T\u00fcrkiye\u2019den Vatanda\u015fl\u0131k Alma Konusu", "  T\u00fcrkiye G\u00f6n\u00fcll\u00fcleri adl\u0131 Facebook sayfas\u0131nda, Cumhurba\u015fkan\u0131 Recep Tayyip Erdo\u011fan\u2019\u0131n Almanya Ye\u015filler Partisi milletvekili Cem \u00d6zdemir\u2019le tokala\u015fmad\u0131\u011f\u0131 iddia edildi. Bu iddia binlerce be\u011feni ve yorum, yakla\u015f\u0131k 2 binden fazla payla\u015f\u0131m ald\u0131.\nAncak s\u00f6z konusu iddia do\u011fru de\u011fildir.\nBu g\u00f6r\u00fcnt\u00fcler, Erdo\u011fan\u2019\u0131n Almanya ziyareti esnas\u0131nda \u00e7ekilmi\u015fti.\nCumhurba\u015fkan\u0131 Erdo\u011fan ve \u00d6zdemir Tokala\u015fm\u0131\u015f\nAlmanya\u2019n\u0131n medya kurulu\u015fu DW\u2019nin web sitesinde yer alan haberdeki foto\u011frafta, Recep Tayyip Erdo\u011fan ve Cem \u00d6zdemir\u2019in tokala\u015ft\u0131\u011f\u0131 g\u00f6r\u00fcl\u00fcyor.\n  Erdo\u011fan ve \u00d6zdemir\u2019in el s\u0131k\u0131\u015ft\u0131\u011f\u0131n\u0131 g\u00f6steren ayn\u0131 kareyi Alman gazetesi Bild\u2019de de g\u00f6rmek m\u00fcmk\u00fcn.\n  Bir ba\u015fka Alman gazetesi Der Tagesspiegel\u2019de de yer alm\u0131\u015f olan foto\u011fraf:\n  S\u00f6z konusu iddian\u0131n as\u0131ls\u0131z oldu\u011fu videoda da g\u00f6r\u00fcl\u00fcyor:\nYe\u015filler Partisi\u2019nden Cem \u00d6zdemir, \u2018T\u00fcrkiye Kar\u015f\u0131tl\u0131\u011f\u0131yla\u2019 Tan\u0131n\u0131yor\nAlman Ye\u015filler Partisi milletvekili Cem \u00d6zdemir\u2019in, T\u00fcrkiye kar\u015f\u0131t\u0131 pek \u00e7ok a\u00e7\u0131klamas\u0131 \u0130nternet ortamlar\u0131nda ve haberlerde yer al\u0131yor.\nCem \u00d6zdemir, Almanya Milli Tak\u0131m\u0131\u2019n\u0131n D\u00fcnya Kupas\u0131\u2019ndan elenmesi konusunda dahi T\u00fcrkiye ve Erdo\u011fan kar\u015f\u0131t\u0131 s\u00f6ylemlerde bulunmu\u015f.\nKaynkalar: kaynak1, kaynak2, kaynak3, kaynak4, kaynak5, kaynak6, kaynak7\nVideo oynat\u0131c\u0131\nhttps://dogrula.org/wp-content/uploads/2018/02/dogrula.org_.mp4\n00:00\n00:07\n[Toplam:3    Ortalama:4/5] Cumhurba\u015fkan\u0131 Erdo\u011fan\u2019\u0131n Alman Ye\u015filler Partisi\u2019nden Cem \u00d6zdemir\u2019le Tokala\u015fmad\u0131\u011f\u0131 \u0130ddias\u0131", "Hazine ve Maliye Bakan\u0131 Berat Albayrak\u2019\u0131n \u201cMcKinsey ile \u00e7al\u0131\u015fmaya karar verdik\u201d a\u00e7\u0131klamas\u0131ndan sonra g\u00fcndemden d\u00fc\u015fmeyen McKinsey Dan\u0131\u015fmanl\u0131k \u015eirketi konusunu inceledik.\nMcKinsey Dan\u0131\u015fmanl\u0131k\n  McKinsey \u015firketi web sitesinde misyonunu \u201cM\u00fc\u015fterilerimize performanslar\u0131nda belirgin fark yaratacak kal\u0131c\u0131 iyile\u015ftirmeler konusunda destek vermenin yan\u0131nda, yetenekli ki\u015filer i\u00e7in cazip, heyecan yaratan ve bu ki\u015fileri elinde tutmay\u0131 ba\u015faran bir \u015firket olabilmektir.\u201d \u015feklinde a\u00e7\u0131kl\u0131yor.\nSitede \u015firketin m\u00fc\u015fteri profili ve geni\u015f dan\u0131\u015fmanl\u0131k yelpazesinden de bahsediliyor. \u015eirketin, 60\u2019tan fazla \u00fclkede ofisi var ve t\u00fcm d\u00fcnyada sosyal, \u00f6zel ve kamu kurulu\u015flar\u0131na dan\u0131\u015fmanl\u0131k hizmeti veriyor.\n  Euronews\u2019in haberine g\u00f6re, 92 y\u0131ll\u0131k ge\u00e7mi\u015fi olan McKinsey bir\u00e7ok analiste g\u00f6re d\u00fcnyan\u0131n en prestijli, ayn\u0131 zamanda kurumsal y\u00f6netimlerde en fazla a\u011f\u0131rl\u0131\u011f\u0131 olan \u015firketlerden biri olarak g\u00f6r\u00fcl\u00fcyor.\nHaberde, \u00fclkeler genel olarak bir ba\u015fka \u00fclkede i\u015f ili\u015fkilerini geli\u015ftirmek ve belli mekanizmalar \u00fczerinde etkili olmak i\u00e7in lobi ve dan\u0131\u015fmanl\u0131kfirmalar\u0131yla anla\u015f\u0131r, ifadeleri mevcut.\nHazine ve Maliye Bakanl\u0131\u011f\u0131\u2019n\u0131n A\u00e7\u0131klamas\u0131\nT\u00fcrk ekonomisinin y\u00f6netiminin ABD\u2019ye teslim edildi\u011fi iddialar\u0131 son g\u00fcnlerin en \u00e7ok konu\u015fulan konular\u0131ndan biri. Bu y\u00fczden de baz\u0131 ekonomistler ve bakanl\u0131k, konuya a\u00e7\u0131kl\u0131k getirmek i\u00e7in a\u00e7\u0131klamalarda bulunuyor. Art niyetli provokasyonlarla s\u00fcrecin baltaland\u0131\u011f\u0131 ifade ediliyor.\nBas\u0131n a\u00e7\u0131klamas\u0131nda, s\u00fcre\u00e7te yer alacak olan ki\u015filerin tamam\u0131n\u0131n mevcut bakanl\u0131k \u00e7al\u0131\u015fanlar\u0131 oldu\u011fu dile getirilen a\u00e7\u0131klamada, d\u00fcnyadaki en ba\u015far\u0131l\u0131 \u00f6rnekleri analiz etmek i\u00e7in dan\u0131\u015fmanl\u0131\u011fa gerek g\u00f6r\u00fcld\u00fc\u011f\u00fc s\u00f6yleniyor.\nAyn\u0131 art niyetli koro, provokasyon i\u00e7in kar\u015f\u0131m\u0131zdad\u0131r. Akla hayale gelmeyecek ve tamamen art niyetli de\u011ferlendirmeler yap\u0131lm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r.\nD\u00f6n\u00fc\u015f\u00fcm ve De\u011fi\u015fim Ofisi, d\u00fcnyadaki ba\u015far\u0131l\u0131 uygulamalar\u0131n analizi i\u00e7in dan\u0131\u015fmanl\u0131k alacakt\u0131r. pic.twitter.com/AvBaLG5XAy\n\u2014 Hazine ve Maliye Bakanl\u0131\u011f\u0131 (@MaliyeBakanligi) September 29, 2018\nDan\u0131\u015fmanl\u0131k Hakk\u0131nda Ekonomist Yorumu\nEkonomist Mert Y\u0131lmaz\u2019\u0131n a\u00e7\u0131klama yapt\u0131\u011f\u0131 bir videoda, konunun analizini dinlemek m\u00fcmk\u00fcn.\nY\u0131lmaz, McKinsey konusunda bir \u2018kamu g\u00f6revi y\u00fcr\u00fctt\u00fc\u011f\u00fcn\u00fc\u2019 s\u00f6yl\u00fcyor. Ayr\u0131ca, dan\u0131\u015fmanl\u0131k konusunda al\u0131nan karar\u0131n yerinde oldu\u011funa dair ifadeleri mevcut.\nEkonomist Mert Y\u0131lmaz \u00e7ekti\u011fi ikinci videoda, analizinden sonra ald\u0131\u011f\u0131 sert ele\u015ftiriler \u00fczerine de konu\u015fmu\u015f.\n  Amerika\u2019n\u0131n Sesi web sitesinde yaz\u0131lm\u0131\u015f olan, \u201cGe\u00e7mi\u015ften G\u00fcn\u00fcm\u00fcze Finansal Krizler\u201d kitab\u0131n\u0131n yazar\u0131 Murat Kaykusuz\u2019un dan\u0131\u015fmanl\u0131k hakk\u0131daki g\u00f6r\u00fc\u015fleri:\n  McKinsey\u2019nin Twitter hesab\u0131n\u0131 inceledi\u011finizde, verdi\u011fi ekonomik dan\u0131\u015fmanl\u0131klar hakk\u0131nda bilgilere ula\u015fman\u0131z m\u00fcmk\u00fcn.\n  Uzmanlar, \u2018T\u00fcrk ekonomisinin ABD\u2019ye teslim edildi\u011fi\u2019 \u015feklinde alg\u0131 operasyonu y\u00fcr\u00fct\u00fcld\u00fc\u011f\u00fcn\u00fc s\u00f6yl\u00fcyor.\nKaynaklar: kaynak1, kaynak2, kaynak3, kaynak4, kaynak5, kaynak6\nVideo oynat\u0131c\u0131\nhttps://dogrula.org/wp-content/uploads/2018/02/dogrula.org_.mp4\n00:00\n00:07\n[Toplam:1    Ortalama:5/5] McKinsey Dan\u0131\u015fmanl\u0131k \u015eirketi", "  \u0130hbar olarak dogrula.org\u2019a gelen bu iddia, sosyal medya ve \u0130nternet ortamlar\u0131nda payla\u015f\u0131larak viral olmu\u015ftur.\nAncak iddia edildi\u011fi gibi, 95 Suriyeli \u00f6\u011fretmenin memur olarak g\u00f6reve atand\u0131\u011f\u0131 haberi do\u011fru de\u011fildir.\nT\u00fcrkiye genelinde Suriyeli \u00f6\u011frencilere y\u00f6nelik e\u011fitim \u00e7al\u0131\u015fmalar\u0131 kapsam\u0131nda, UNICEF ortakl\u0131\u011f\u0131yla yap\u0131lan projede Ge\u00e7ici E\u011fitim Merkezleri a\u00e7\u0131larak ge\u00e7ici istihdam sa\u011flanm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r.\nBu e\u011fitimler 2016 y\u0131l\u0131ndan bu yana verilmektedir.\n  Devlet Memuru Olman\u0131n \u0130lk \u015eart\u0131 T\u00fcrk Vatanda\u015f\u0131 Olmak\n657 say\u0131l\u0131 Devlet Memurlar\u0131 kanununun 48. Maddesine g\u00f6re, T\u00fcrkiye\u2019de devlet memuru olabilmek i\u00e7in T\u00fcrk vatanda\u015f\u0131 olmak gerekiyor. Bu y\u00fczden, Suriyeli \u00f6\u011fretmenlerin memur olarak atand\u0131\u011f\u0131 haberi do\u011fru de\u011fil.\nSuriyelilerin T\u00fcrk vatanda\u015f\u0131 oldu\u011funa dair yay\u0131lan as\u0131ls\u0131z haberleri daha \u00f6nce do\u011frulam\u0131\u015ft\u0131k.\nE\u011fitimlerin Finansman\u0131 UNICEF\nProje, MEB \u00d6\u011fretmen Yeti\u015ftirme ve Geli\u015ftirme Genel M\u00fcd\u00fcrl\u00fc\u011f\u00fc taraf\u0131ndan y\u00fcr\u00fct\u00fcl\u00fcyor ve finansman\u0131 UNICEF.\nBelgenin tamam\u0131na buradan ula\u015fabilirsiniz.\nT\u00fcrkiye\u2019deki Ge\u00e7ici E\u011fitim Merkezleri projesini UNICEF T\u00fcrkiye web sitesinde de g\u00f6rmek m\u00fcmk\u00fcn.\nG\u00f6rev Yeri Okul De\u011fil, E\u011fitim Merkezi\n\u0130ddia edildi\u011fi gibi Suriyeli \u00f6\u011fretmenler memur olarak okula atanmam\u0131\u015f. G\u00f6rselde iddia edilen ortaokul de\u011fil, Antalya Merkez \u00c7aml\u0131bel Halk E\u011fitimi Merkezi.\nProje kapsam\u0131nda e\u011fitime tabi tutulan 95 \u00f6\u011fretmen, e\u011fitim tamamland\u0131ktan sonra E\u011fitim Merkezinde Suriyeli \u00f6\u011frencilere ders verecek.\n  Halk E\u011fitim Merkezinin web sitesi incelendi\u011finde, Suriyelilere ili\u015fkin Ge\u00e7ici E\u011fitim Merkezlerine dair belge ve bilgilere ula\u015fmak m\u00fcmk\u00fcn.\n  Ge\u00e7ici koruma alt\u0131ndaki \u00e7ocuklar\u0131n e\u011fitim alan\u0131nda ya\u015fad\u0131\u011f\u0131 sorunlara \u00e7\u00f6z\u00fcm bulmak amac\u0131yla Milli E\u011fitim Bakanl\u0131\u011f\u0131\u2019na ba\u011fl\u0131 olarak 21 ilde 425 Ge\u00e7ici E\u011fitim Merkezi a\u00e7\u0131lm\u0131\u015f ve bu okullarda g\u00f6rev yapan Suriyeli \u00f6\u011fretmenler i\u00e7in ge\u00e7ici istihdam sa\u011flanm\u0131\u015f.\n  G\u00f6r\u00fcld\u00fc\u011f\u00fc \u00fczere iddia do\u011fru de\u011fildir. T\u00fcrkiye\u2019de devlet memuru olabilmek i\u00e7in T\u00fcrk vatanda\u015f\u0131 olmak gerekiyor. T\u00fcrkiye genelinde Suriyeli \u00f6\u011frencilere y\u00f6nelik e\u011fitim \u00e7al\u0131\u015fmalar\u0131 kapsam\u0131nda, UNICEF ortakl\u0131\u011f\u0131yla yap\u0131lan projede Ge\u00e7ici E\u011fitim Merkezleri a\u00e7\u0131larak ge\u00e7ici istihdam sa\u011flanm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r.\nKaynaklar: kaynak1, kaynak2, kaynak3, kaynak4, kaynak5, kaynak6\nVideo oynat\u0131c\u0131\nhttps://dogrula.org/wp-content/uploads/2018/02/dogrula.org_.mp4\n00:00\n00:07\n[Toplam:3    Ortalama:5/5] 95 Suriyeli \u00d6\u011fretmen Memur Olarak G\u00f6reve Atand\u0131 \u0130ddias\u0131", "  Cumhuriyet Halk Partisi Trabzon Milletvekili Haluk Pek\u015fen Twitter hesab\u0131nda, \u201c\u0130STANBUL 3.Havaliman\u0131n\u0131n ad\u0131n\u0131 kim koydu? \u0130stanbul 3.Havaliman\u0131n\u0131n k\u0131salt\u0131lm\u0131\u015f ad\u0131:LTMF olmu\u015f.Yani ad\u0131 esas\u0131nda iki ay \u00f6nce konmu\u015f. THY d\u00f6rtl\u00fc kod sisteminde bu ismi b\u00fct\u00fcn D\u00fcnya\u2019ya duyurmu\u015f.LTMF ne demektir?Bu harfler hangi ismin k\u0131salt\u0131lm\u0131\u015f halidir? Bu skandal\u0131n sorumlusu kimdr\u201d yaz\u0131l\u0131 bir payla\u015f\u0131mda bulundu.\n\u0130STANBUL 3.Havaliman\u0131n\u0131n ad\u0131n\u0131 kim koydu?\n\u0130stanbul 3.Havaliman\u0131n\u0131n k\u0131salt\u0131lm\u0131\u015f ad\u0131:LTMF olmu\u015f.Yani ad\u0131 esas\u0131nda iki ay \u00f6nce konmu\u015f.\nTHY d\u00f6rtl\u00fc kod sisteminde bu ismi b\u00fct\u00fcn D\u00fcnya\u2019ya duyurmu\u015f.LTMF ne demektir?Bu harfler hangi ismin k\u0131salt\u0131lm\u0131\u015f halidir?\nBu skandal\u0131n sorumlusu kimdr\n\u2014 Haluk Pek\u015fen (@halukpeksen) September 27, 2018\n  Haluk Pek\u015fen\u2019in \u2018skandal\u2019 olarak nitelendirdi\u011fi payla\u015f\u0131m\u0131ndaki gibi, 3. havaliman\u0131na herhangi bir ki\u015finin isminin k\u0131salt\u0131lm\u0131\u015f halinin verildi\u011fi iddias\u0131 do\u011fru de\u011fildir.\nLTFM, havac\u0131lar\u0131 u\u00e7u\u015f ve yer emniyetini etkileyebilecek baz\u0131 \u00f6nemli durumlardan haberdar etmek i\u00e7in yay\u0131mlanan bildiri olan NOTAM taraf\u0131ndan \u0130stanbul Yeni Havaliman\u0131\u2019na verilen ICAO kodudur. L harfi, T\u00fcrkiye\u2019nin i\u00e7inde bulundu\u011fu b\u00f6lgeyi, yani G\u00fcney Avrupa\u2019y\u0131, T harfi ise T\u00fcrkiye\u2019yi ifade eder. Lve T harflerinden sonra yap\u0131lan d\u00fczenlemedeki harfler de belirlenen s\u0131ralamaya g\u00f6re verilir.\nAyr\u0131ca Pek\u015fen iddias\u0131nda, LTFM yerine LTMF yazm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r.\nLTFM Nedir?\nLTFM, havac\u0131lar\u0131 u\u00e7u\u015f ve yer emniyetini etkileyebilecek baz\u0131 \u00f6nemli durumlardan haberdar etmek i\u00e7in yay\u0131mlanan bildiri olan NOTAM (notice to airmen) taraf\u0131ndan \u0130stanbul Yeni Havaliman\u0131\u2019na verilen ICAO (Uluslararas\u0131 Sivil Havac\u0131l\u0131k \u00d6rg\u00fct\u00fc) kodudur.\n  L harfi, T\u00fcrkiye\u2019nin i\u00e7inde bulundu\u011fu b\u00f6lgeyi, yani G\u00fcney Avrupa\u2019y\u0131 ifade eder. Fransa, \u0130spanya ve \u0130talya da L kodunu alm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r.\n  T harfi de T\u00fcrkiye\u2019yi ifade etmektedir. L ve T harflerinden sonra yap\u0131lan d\u00fczenlemedeki harfler de belirlenen s\u0131ralamaya g\u00f6re verilir.\n\u00d6rne\u011fin, Sabiha G\u00f6k\u00e7en Havaliman\u0131\u2019n\u0131n ICAO kodu LTFJ\u2019dir. Burada L ve Tharflerinden sonra F harfinin verilmesi, \u0130stanbul Yeni Havaliman\u0131na\u2019da Fharfinin verilmesine (LTFM) a\u00e7\u0131kl\u0131k getirmi\u015ftir; yani kod belirlenen bir s\u0131ralamaya g\u00f6re verilmi\u015ftir.\n\u0130stanbul Atat\u00fcrk Havaliman\u0131\u2019n\u0131n kodu da LTBA\u2019d\u0131r. B harfi burada \u0130stanbul merkezli kontrol\u00fc ifade etmi\u015ftir.\n  Ayr\u0131ca 3. Havaliman\u0131\u2019n\u0131n, Uluslararas\u0131 Havayolu Ta\u015f\u0131y\u0131c\u0131lar\u0131 Birli\u011fi (IATA) olarak \u00fc\u00e7 harften olu\u015fan \u00f6zel kodu IST\u2019dir.\n  \u0130stanbul Yeni Havaliman\u0131\u2019na ta\u015f\u0131nmas\u0131 operasyonu ve IATA (Uluslararas\u0131 Hava Ta\u015f\u0131mac\u0131l\u0131\u011f\u0131 Birli\u011fi) kodunun kullan\u0131m\u0131 t\u00fcm d\u00fcnyaya duyurulmu\u015ftur.\n  G\u00f6r\u00fcld\u00fc\u011f\u00fc \u00fczere, Haluk Pek\u015fen\u2019in \u2018skandal\u2019 olarak nitelendirdi\u011fi payla\u015f\u0131m\u0131ndaki gibi, \u0130stanbul 3. havaliman\u0131na herhangi bir ki\u015finin isminin k\u0131salt\u0131lm\u0131\u015f halinin verildi\u011fi iddias\u0131 do\u011fru de\u011fildir.\nKaynaklar: kaynak1, kaynak2, kaynak3, kaynak4, kaynak5, kaynak6\nVideo oynat\u0131c\u0131\nhttps://dogrula.org/wp-content/uploads/2018/02/dogrula.org_.mp4\n00:00\n00:07\n[Toplam:4    Ortalama:5/5] CHP Milletvekilinin 3. Havaliman\u0131n\u0131n LTFM Koduyla \u0130lgili \u0130ddias\u0131", "  Yeni Akit, Vatan gibi pek \u00e7ok gazetenin haberinde yer verdi\u011fi ve sosyal medya payla\u015f\u0131mlar\u0131yla viral olan, ABD Ba\u015fkan\u0131 Donald Trump\u2019\u0131n BM Genel Kurulu\u2019nda yapt\u0131\u011f\u0131 konu\u015fma esnas\u0131nda Cumhurba\u015fkan\u0131 Recep Tayyip Erdo\u011fan\u2019\u0131n salonu terk etti\u011fi iddias\u0131 do\u011fru de\u011fildir.\n\u0130ddiaya dair b\u00f6yle bir g\u00f6r\u00fcnt\u00fc ya da haber, BM ile ili\u015fkili yabanc\u0131 bas\u0131n kaynaklar\u0131nda yer almam\u0131\u015ft\u0131r.\nCumhurba\u015fkan\u0131 Erdo\u011fan, Trump\u2019\u0131n konu\u015fmas\u0131n\u0131n ard\u0131ndan kendisinin yapaca\u011f\u0131 konu\u015fma i\u00e7in salonun arka taraf\u0131na ge\u00e7mi\u015ftir.\nAyr\u0131ca, Birle\u015fmi\u015f Milletler Genel Kurulu\u2019nun resmi web sitesinde de haberler b\u00f6l\u00fcm\u00fc incelendi\u011finde, Trump konu\u015furken Erdo\u011fan\u2019\u0131n salonu terk etti\u011fine dair bir habere rastlanmamaktad\u0131r.\n  Erdo\u011fan Konu\u015fma S\u0131ras\u0131 Geldi\u011fi \u0130\u00e7in Kalk\u0131yor\nVideoda Trump\u2019\u0131n konu\u015fmas\u0131n\u0131n ard\u0131ndan kendisinin yapaca\u011f\u0131 konu\u015fma i\u00e7in Erdo\u011fan\u2019\u0131n BM g\u00f6revlileri e\u015fli\u011finde salonun arka taraf\u0131na do\u011fru ge\u00e7ti\u011fi g\u00f6r\u00fcl\u00fcyor.\n  ABD Ba\u015fkan\u0131 Trump 3. s\u0131rada konu\u015fma yapm\u0131\u015ft\u0131. 4. s\u0131radaki konu\u015fmac\u0131n\u0131n da Cumhurba\u015fkan\u0131 Erdo\u011fan olmas\u0131, salonu terk etti\u011finin de\u011fil, konu\u015fma s\u0131ras\u0131n\u0131 beklemek \u00fczere salonun arka taraf\u0131na ge\u00e7ti\u011finin i\u015fareti.\nErdo\u011fan\u2019\u0131n Salonu Terk Etti\u011fi Haberi Gazeteciler Taraf\u0131ndan da Yalanland\u0131\nDonald Trump\u2019\u0131n BM Genel Kurulu\u2019nda yapt\u0131\u011f\u0131 konu\u015fma esnas\u0131nda Cumhurba\u015fkan\u0131 Recep Tayyip Erdo\u011fan\u2019\u0131n salonu terk etti\u011fi iddias\u0131, gazeteci C\u00fcneyt \u00d6zdemir ve Rag\u0131p Soylu taraf\u0131ndan da yalanland\u0131.\nErdo\u011fan'\u0131n salonu terk etmesi gibi bir \u015fey yok.. Daha \u00f6nce yazd\u0131\u011f\u0131m gibi sonraki konu\u015fma s\u0131ras\u0131 Erdo\u011fan'da o da BM k\u00fcrs\u00fcs\u00fcn\u00fcn arkas\u0131ndaki salona ge\u00e7iyor.\n\u2014 c\u00fcneyt \u00f6zdemir (@cuneytozdemir) September 25, 2018\nTrump konu\u015furken, Erdo\u011fan salonu terk etti haberleri uydurma. Erdo\u011fan\u2019\u0131n Salonu Terk Etti\u011fi \u0130ddias\u0131", "  D\u00fc\u015f\u00fcnen Deli adl\u0131 Facebook sayfas\u0131nda payla\u015f\u0131lan bu g\u00f6rsel, binlerce etkile\u015fim alarak yorumlarda alay konusu edildi.\nAncak s\u00f6z konusu g\u00f6rselin uluslararas\u0131 turizm fuar\u0131nda \u00e7ekilen bir foto\u011fraf oldu\u011fu iddias\u0131 do\u011fru de\u011fildir.\n2012 y\u0131l\u0131na ait olan bu foto\u011fraf, Rize M\u00fcft\u00fcl\u00fc\u011f\u00fcn\u00fcn d\u00fczenledi\u011fi \u2018Bayan Haf\u0131zlar \u0130\u00e7in \u0130cazet Merasimi\u2019 program\u0131nda \u00e7ekilmi\u015f.\n  K\u0131z Kuran kurslar\u0131nda haf\u0131zl\u0131klar\u0131n\u0131 tamamlayan \u00f6\u011frencilerin t\u00f6renlerde b\u00f6yle k\u0131yafetler giymesinin \u00f6rnekleri de mevcut.\nKaynaklar: kaynak1, kaynak2, kaynak3, kaynak4, kaynak5\nVideo oynat\u0131c\u0131\nhttps://dogrula.org/wp-content/uploads/2018/02/dogrula.org_.mp4\n00:00\n00:07\n[Toplam:2    Ortalama:5/5] Foto\u011fraf\u0131n Uluslararas\u0131 Turizm Fuar\u0131nda \u00c7ekildi\u011fi \u0130ddias\u0131", "Sosyal medya ve baz\u0131 \u0130nternet sitelerinde yer alan, MEB\u2019in yeni m\u00fcfredat\u0131nda sihir ve ruh \u00e7a\u011f\u0131rma diye bir dersin yer ald\u0131\u011f\u0131 iddias\u0131 do\u011fru de\u011fildir.\nMilli E\u011fitim Bakanl\u0131\u011f\u0131 m\u00fcfredat\u0131nda sihir ve ruh \u00e7a\u011f\u0131rma isimli bir ders yoktur; ders Temel Dini Bilgiler, konu Ruhsal \u0130htiya\u00e7lar\u0131 Kar\u015f\u0131lamada Yanl\u0131\u015f Uygulamalar, konu ba\u015fl\u0131\u011f\u0131 alt\u0131nda incelenen ise sihir, b\u00fcy\u00fc ve ruh \u00e7a\u011f\u0131rma gibi y\u00f6neli\u015flerdir.\nDersin Ad\u0131 Sihir ve Ruh \u00c7a\u011f\u0131rma De\u011fil, Se\u00e7meli Temel Dini Bilgiler Dersi\n  2012 y\u0131l\u0131nda Temel Dini Bilgiler dersi MEB m\u00fcfredat\u0131nda yer alm\u0131\u015f olan, \u201cRuhsal \u0130htiya\u00e7lar\u0131 Kar\u015f\u0131lamada Yanl\u0131\u015f Uygulamalar\u201d konu ba\u015fl\u0131\u011f\u0131 alt\u0131nda sihir, b\u00fcy\u00fc, u\u011fur inanc\u0131, falc\u0131l\u0131k, ruh \u00e7a\u011f\u0131rma, medyumluk ve kehanet gibi y\u00f6neli\u015fler anlat\u0131l\u0131yordu. Ancak 2017 y\u0131l\u0131na gelindi\u011finde, ruh \u00e7a\u011f\u0131rma ve medyumluk m\u00fcfredattan \u00e7\u0131kar\u0131ld\u0131.\nLise Temel Dini Bilgiler (\u0130slam 1\u20132) dersinde, \u201cRuhsal ihtiya\u00e7lar\u0131 kar\u015f\u0131lamada yanl\u0131\u015f uygulamalar\u201d \u00fcnitesinde ruh \u00e7a\u011f\u0131rma ve medyumluk konusuna yer verilmi\u015fti.\n  Ancak 2017 y\u0131l\u0131na gelindi\u011finde m\u00fcfredat de\u011fi\u015fti.\nYerine, Ortaokul Temel Dini Bilgiler (\u0130slam 1\u20132) dersi konusu olarak 6. s\u0131n\u0131fta cin ve \u015feytan, Lise Temel Dini Bilgiler (\u0130slam 1\u20132) dersinde ise, ruh \u00e7a\u011f\u0131rma ve medyumluk yerine reenkarnasyon (ruhun s\u00fcrekli olarak tekrar bedenle\u015fmesi) ve tenas\u00fch (\u00f6len kimsenin ruhunun insan veya hayvan bedenine ge\u00e7erek ona hayat vermesi) konular\u0131n\u0131n i\u015flenece\u011fi m\u00fcfredatta yer alm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r.\n  Ayr\u0131ca m\u00fcfredatta bu derslerin kazan\u0131mlar\u0131 olarak \u00f6\u011frenci, \u201cCin ve \u015feytanla ilgili toplumda var olan yanl\u0131\u015f bilgileri fark eder.\u201d ve \u201cKazan\u0131m i\u015flenirken \u0130slam\u2019\u0131n a\u015f\u0131r\u0131l\u0131klardan (itikadi ve amel\u00ee sapmalardan, hurafelerden) uzak bir din oldu\u011funa ve d\u00fcnya-ahiret dengesini g\u00f6zetti\u011fine de\u011finilecektir.\u201d ifadeleri yer alm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r.\n  M\u00fcfredattan da anla\u015f\u0131laca\u011f\u0131 \u00fczere, iddia edildi\u011fi gibi MEB\u2019in yeni m\u00fcfredat\u0131nda sihir ve ruh \u00e7a\u011f\u0131rma diye bir dersin yer almas\u0131 s\u00f6z konusu de\u011fildir.\nKaynaklar: kaynak1, kaynak2, kaynak3, kaynak4, kaynak5\nVideo oynat\u0131c\u0131\nhttps://dogrula.org/wp-content/uploads/2018/02/dogrula.org_.mp4\n00:00\n00:07\n[Toplam:2    Ortalama:5/5] MEB\u2019in Yeni M\u00fcfredat\u0131nda Sihir ve Ruh \u00c7a\u011f\u0131rma Dersi \u0130ddias\u0131", "  Bir G\u00fcn Gazetesi Twitter sayfas\u0131nda ve pek \u00e7ok Internet sitesinde, Kuveyt\u2019te 3 boyutlu yaz\u0131c\u0131 d\u00fckkan\u0131n\u0131n putperestlik su\u00e7lamas\u0131yla kapat\u0131ld\u0131\u011f\u0131 iddia edildi.\nResmi Twitter'da g\u00f6r\u00fcnt\u00fcle\nBirG\u00fcn Gazetesi\n\u2714\n@BirGun_Gazetesi\nKuveyt'te 3 boyutlu yaz\u0131c\u0131 d\u00fckkan\u0131 'putperestlik' su\u00e7lamas\u0131yla kapat\u0131ld\u0131\nhttps://\ngoo.gl/zKDHRt\n  41\n11:51 - 21 Eyl 2018\n39 ki\u015fi bunun hakk\u0131nda konu\u015fuyor\nTwitter Reklamlar\u0131'na ili\u015fkin bilgiler ve gizlilik\n  Sayfada yer alan, Kuveyt\u2019te 3 boyutlu yaz\u0131c\u0131 d\u00fckkan\u0131 putperestlik su\u00e7lamas\u0131yla kapat\u0131ld\u0131 iddias\u0131 \u00e7o\u011funlukla do\u011frudur.\n3D tarama teknolojisiyle m\u00fc\u015fterilerinin oyuncak modellerini \u00fcreten d\u00fckkan\u0131n kapat\u0131ld\u0131\u011f\u0131na dair haber ve sosyal medya payla\u015f\u0131mlar\u0131na ula\u015fmak m\u00fcmk\u00fcn.\nKuveyt gazetesi Al-Qabas\u2019a g\u00f6re, d\u00fckkan 16 Eyl\u00fcl\u2019de kapat\u0131lm\u0131\u015f, raflardaki heykeller ortadan kalkm\u0131\u015f.\n  S\u00f6z konusu iddia, haber kaynaklar\u0131nda \u201cKuveyt\u2019te s\u00f6zde putlara kar\u015f\u0131 ba\u015flat\u0131lan \u015fiddetli kampanyadan sonra, bir heykelcik d\u00fckkan\u0131 garip bir \u015fekilde kapat\u0131ld\u0131 ve t\u00fcm modelleri ortadan kald\u0131r\u0131ld\u0131\u201d ifadeleriyle yer ald\u0131.\nHaberde, kapat\u0131lan ma\u011fazan\u0131n isminin verilmedi\u011fi, ancak sosyal medya kullan\u0131c\u0131lar\u0131na g\u00f6re, teknoloji \u015firketi DOOB 3D\u2019nin Kuveyt \u015fubesi oldu\u011fu iddialar\u0131ndan bahsediliyor. Ayr\u0131ca s\u00f6z konusu haberi BBC kaynaklar\u0131nda da g\u00f6rmek m\u00fcmk\u00fcn.\n  \u0130ddiay\u0131 Destekleyen Twitter Payla\u015f\u0131mlar\u0131\nTwitter onay\u0131 bulunan bu hesapta, Abdulrahman el-Nassar isimli \u015fah\u0131s d\u00fckkan\u0131n kapat\u0131ld\u0131\u011f\u0131n\u0131 memnuniyetle kar\u015f\u0131layan bir payla\u015f\u0131m yapm\u0131\u015f. Etkile\u015fimi y\u00fcksek olan payla\u015f\u0131mda, iddian\u0131n aksi bir yorum g\u00f6r\u00fclm\u00fcyor.\n\u0639\u0628\u062f\u0627\u0644\u0631\u062d\u0645\u0646 \u0627\u0644\u0646\u0635\u0627\u0631\n\u2714\n@alnassar_kw\n\u0627\u0644\u062d\u0645\u062f\u0644\u0644\u0647 \u0631\u0628 \u0627\u0644\u0639\u0627\u0644\u0645\u064a\u0646 ..\n\u0648\u0634\u0643\u0631\u0627 \u062c\u0632\u064a\u0644\u0627 \u0644\u0644\u0623\u062e\u0648\u0629 \u0627\u0644\u0645\u0633\u0624\u0648\u0644\u064a\u0646 ..\n\u062a\u0645 \u0625\u063a\u0644\u0627\u0642 \u0627\u0644\u0645\u062d\u0644 ..#\u0627\u0635\u0646\u0627\u0645_\u0641\u064a_\u0627\u0644\u0643\u0648\u064a\u062a\n157\n22:39 - 16 Eyl 2018\nTwitter Reklamlar\u0131'na ili\u015fkin bilgiler ve gizlilik\n266 ki\u015fi bunun hakk\u0131nda konu\u015fuyor\nDin Adam\u0131 \u015eeyh Osman el-Khamis\u2019in Vaaz\u0131\n\u0130ddiada, pop\u00fcler din adam\u0131 \u015eeyh Osman el-Khamis\u2019in \u201c3 boyutlu yaz\u0131c\u0131lar\u0131 kullanarak insanlar\u0131n ger\u00e7ek\u00e7i kopyalar\u0131n\u0131 olu\u015fturmada uzmanla\u015fan ma\u011fazan\u0131n derhal kapat\u0131lmas\u0131 i\u00e7in \u00e7a\u011fr\u0131da bulunmas\u0131ndan sonra\u201d bu hamlenin ger\u00e7ekle\u015fti\u011fi bilgisi yer alm\u0131\u015ft\u0131.\n\u0130ddia edildi\u011fi gibi \u015eeyh Osman el-Khamis bu konu hakk\u0131nda bir vaaz vermi\u015f ve bunu kendi Twitter hesab\u0131ndan da payla\u015fm\u0131\u015f:\n\u062f. \u0639\u062b\u0645\u0627\u0646 \u0627\u0644\u062e\u0645\u064a\u0633\n@othmanalkamees\n\u0627\u0644\u0633\u0624\u0627\u0644\n.\n\u0645\u0627 \u0627\u0644\u0648\u0627\u062c\u0628 \u0641\u0639\u0644\u0647 \u062a\u062c\u0627\u0647 Reklamlar\u0131'na ili\u015fkin bilgiler ve gizlilik\n  \u015eeyh Osman\u2019\u0131n yak\u0131n zamanda verdi\u011fi bir vaaz s\u0131ras\u0131nda \u201cBu d\u00fckkan\u0131n yapt\u0131\u011f\u0131 \u015fey, alkol satmaktan \u00e7ok ve daha tehlikeli bir \u015feydir, \u00e7\u00fcnk\u00fc baz\u0131 insanlar \u00e7ocuklar\u0131n\u0131n putlar\u0131n\u0131 yap\u0131yor olabilir\u201d demesi baz\u0131 Twitter kullan\u0131c\u0131lar\u0131 taraf\u0131ndan desteklenen bir d\u00fc\u015f\u00fcnce olarak payla\u015f\u0131lm\u0131\u015f:\n\u0639\u0628\u062f\u0627\u0644\u0631\u062d\u0645\u0646 konu \u00fczerine payla\u015f\u0131lan videolardan biri:\nHaber Sosyal Medyada G\u00fcndem Oldu\nOlay sosyal medyada putperestlik hakk\u0131nda bir tart\u0131\u015fma ba\u015flatt\u0131. \u201cKuveyt\u2019teki putlar\u201d \u201c#\u0623\u0635\u0646\u0627\u0645_\u0641\u064a_\u0627\u0644\u0643\u0648\u064a\u062a\u201d adl\u0131 hashtag, 21.000\u2019den fazla kullan\u0131ld\u0131.\nMa\u011fazan\u0131n kapat\u0131lmas\u0131ndan sonra, baz\u0131 Twitter kullan\u0131c\u0131lar\u0131n\u0131n konuyu espri malzemesi yapt\u0131\u011f\u0131 g\u00f6r\u00fcl\u00fcyor:\nResmi Twitter'da g\u00f6r\u00fcnt\u00fcle\n\u062f. \u0635\u0627\u0644\u062d \u0639\u0628\u062f\u0627\u0644\u0631\u062d\u064a\u0645 \u062a\u0639\u0627\u0644\u0649 (\u0645\u064e\u0627 \u0647\u064e\u0630\u0650\u0647\u0650 \u0627\u0644\u062a\u064e\u0651\u0645\u064e\u0627\u062b\u0650\u064a\u0644 12 Eyl 2018\n934 ki\u015fi bunun hakk\u0131nda konu\u015fuyor\nTwitter Reklamlar\u0131'na ili\u015fkin bilgiler ve gizlilik\nResmi Twitter'da #\u0627\u0635\u0646\u0627\u0645_\u0641\u064a_\u0627\u0644\u0643\u0648\u064a\u062a\n9\n13:10 - 17 Eyl 2018\n\u0633\u064a\u062f\u0625\u0633\u0645\u0627\u0639\u064a\u0644 \u0628\u0647\u0628\u0647\u0627\u0646\u064a adl\u0131 ki\u015finin di\u011fer Tweetlerini g\u00f6r\nTwitter Reklamlar\u0131'na ili\u015fkin bilgiler ve gizlilik\n3D Teknolojisiyle \u00dcretilen Heykelin G\u00f6r\u00fcnt\u00fcs\u00fc\n  Ma\u011fazan\u0131n kapat\u0131ld\u0131\u011f\u0131 haberlerine ra\u011fmen, DOOB 3D web sitesinde Kuveyt \u015fubesine rastlamak m\u00fcmk\u00fcn:\n  Ma\u011faza sahibinin \u201c2018 y\u0131l\u0131nda bir d\u00fckkan a\u00e7aca\u011f\u0131m\u0131z\u0131 ve heykel satt\u0131\u011f\u0131m\u0131z i\u00e7in birilerinin \u015firketimizi su\u00e7layaca\u011f\u0131n\u0131 hi\u00e7 d\u00fc\u015f\u00fcnmezdim\u201d dedi\u011fi de BBC haber kaynaklar\u0131nda yer al\u0131yor.\nDOOB 3D taraf\u0131ndan herhangi bir yalanlaman\u0131n yap\u0131lmamas\u0131 da iddiay\u0131 destekler nitelikte.\n  Kaynaklar: kaynak1, kaynak2, kaynak3, kaynak4, kaynak5, kaynak6, kaynak7, kaynak8, kaynak9, kaynak10, kaynak11, kaynak12, kaynak13, kaynak14, kaynak15, kaynak16, kaynak17\nVideo oynat\u0131c\u0131\nhttps://dogrula.org/wp-content/uploads/2018/02/dogrula.org_.mp4\n00:00\n00:07\n[Toplam:2    Ortalama:5/5] Kuveyt\u2019te 3 Boyutlu Yaz\u0131c\u0131 D\u00fckkan\u0131 Putperestlik Su\u00e7lamas\u0131yla Kapat\u0131ld\u0131 \u0130ddias\u0131", "  Sir Alex Cansin adl\u0131 Twitter kullan\u0131c\u0131s\u0131 taraf\u0131ndan yap\u0131lan payla\u015f\u0131mda, \u201cM\u00fcft\u00fcl\u00fckten dev hizmet.. Seyyar Kabe bu hafta Ad\u0131yaman\u2019da. Kabe\u2019de tur at, \u015feytana s\u0131n\u0131rs\u0131z ta\u015f, limitsiz ibadet 10 lira.\u201d ifadeleriyle bir iddia ortaya at\u0131ld\u0131.\nM\u00fcft\u00fcl\u00fckten dev hizmet..\nSeyyar kabe bu hafta Ad\u0131yaman\u2019da.\nKabe\u2019de tur at, \u015feytana s\u0131n\u0131rs\u0131z ta\u015f,\nLimitsiz ibadet 10 lira.\nOh mis gibi ticaret..\nHalk\u0131 maymun ettiniz cahillikten.. pic.twitter.com/PpIuKAckk8\n\u2014 Sir Alex Cansin (@Cansinn1907) September 17, 2018\n  Payla\u015f\u0131mda yer alan, Ad\u0131yaman M\u00fcft\u00fcl\u00fc\u011f\u00fc\u2019n\u00fcn 10 TL kar\u015f\u0131l\u0131\u011f\u0131nda Kabe maketi etraf\u0131nda tavaf yapt\u0131rd\u0131\u011f\u0131 iddias\u0131 do\u011fru de\u011fildir.\nAd\u0131yaman\u2019da hac ibadetini yapmak i\u00e7in kutsal topraklara gidecek olan hac\u0131 adaylar\u0131 i\u00e7in bilgilendirme ama\u00e7l\u0131 temsili tavaf yapt\u0131r\u0131lm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r. Para kar\u015f\u0131l\u0131\u011f\u0131nda tavaf yapt\u0131r\u0131l\u0131p \u015feytan ta\u015flat\u0131lmas\u0131 hadisesi s\u00f6z konusu de\u011fildir.\nAyr\u0131ca payla\u015f\u0131mda yer alan g\u00f6rsel, 2012 y\u0131l\u0131nda yap\u0131lm\u0131\u015f temsili tavaf uygulamas\u0131ndan.\nM\u00fcft\u00fcl\u00fck bah\u00e7esinde ger\u00e7ekle\u015ftirilen programda, \u201cSay, ihram giyme, hac nedir, hac s\u00fcresinde yap\u0131lmas\u0131 gerekenler, ihrama girme, niyet ve Kabe\u2019yi tavaf etme\u201d gibi konularda bilgi verildi\u011fi ifade edilmi\u015ftir.\n  Ad\u0131yaman\u2019da benzer temsili tavaf uygulamas\u0131 haberleri 2012, 2014 ve 2015 y\u0131llar\u0131nda da yap\u0131lm\u0131\u015f.\n  G\u00f6r\u00fcld\u00fc\u011f\u00fc \u00fczere, para kar\u015f\u0131l\u0131\u011f\u0131nda tavaf yapt\u0131r\u0131l\u0131p \u015feytan ta\u015flat\u0131lmas\u0131 hadisesi s\u00f6z konusu de\u011fildir.\nKaynaklar: kaynak1, kaynak2, kaynak3, kaynak4, kaynak5\nVideo oynat\u0131c\u0131\nhttps://dogrula.org/wp-content/uploads/2018/02/dogrula.org_.mp4\n00:00\n00:07\n[Toplam:3    Ortalama:5/5] Ad\u0131yaman M\u00fcft\u00fcl\u00fc\u011f\u00fc\u2019n\u00fcn 10 TL Kar\u015f\u0131l\u0131\u011f\u0131nda Kabe Maketi Etraf\u0131nda Tavaf Yapt\u0131rd\u0131\u011f\u0131 \u0130ddias\u0131", "  ILKGUL MENZIL isimli Instagram kullan\u0131c\u0131s\u0131n\u0131n payla\u015ft\u0131\u011f\u0131 bu foto\u011fraf, yakla\u015f\u0131k 58 bin kez be\u011fenildi, bine yak\u0131n yorum ald\u0131.\n  Foto\u011fraf, g\u00fcn bat\u0131m\u0131nda g\u00f6ky\u00fcz\u00fcnde spiral \u015feklinde olu\u015fan bulutlar\u0131 g\u00f6steriyor; ancak ufukta ger\u00e7ekle\u015fti\u011fi g\u00f6sterilen bu g\u00f6r\u00fcnt\u00fc iddias\u0131 do\u011fru de\u011fil. Video ve g\u00f6r\u00fcnt\u00fc, dijital foto\u011fraf d\u00fczenleme program\u0131yla olu\u015fturulmu\u015ftur.\nBu g\u00f6r\u00fcnt\u00fc seyahat foto\u011fraf\u00e7\u0131s\u0131 \u0130lkg\u00fcl Menzil taraf\u0131ndan olu\u015fturulmu\u015f ve \u201cF\u0131rt\u0131nal\u0131 G\u00fcnbat\u0131m\u0131\u201d yorumuyla Facebook hesab\u0131nda da payla\u015f\u0131lm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r. Menzil g\u00f6r\u00fcnt\u00fcn\u00fcn ger\u00e7ek olmad\u0131\u011f\u0131n\u0131; foto\u011fraf\u0131n kendisi taraf\u0131ndan d\u00fczenlendi\u011fini \u201cedited by me\u201d yorumuyla ifade etmi\u015ftir.\nFoto\u011fraf\u00e7\u0131 g\u00f6r\u00fcnt\u00fcn\u00fcn \u201ccanl\u0131 versiyonunu\u201d kendi Instagram sayfas\u0131nda payla\u015ft\u0131\u011f\u0131n\u0131 s\u00f6yledi\u011fi g\u00f6rselin dijital olarak olu\u015fturuldu\u011funa dair ipucu niteli\u011finde bir yorumda da bulunmu\u015ftur.\n    Ayr\u0131ca, viral olan g\u00f6r\u00fcnt\u00fcn\u00fcn alternatif bir versiyonuna ula\u015fmak m\u00fcmk\u00fcn. Ancak bu g\u00f6r\u00fcnt\u00fcn\u00fcn kim taraf\u0131ndan \u00e7ekildi\u011fi bilgisi net de\u011fildir.\n    Kullan\u0131c\u0131n\u0131n Instagram sayfas\u0131nda dijital programlarla olu\u015fturulmu\u015f pek \u00e7ok foto\u011fraf g\u00f6rmek m\u00fcmk\u00fcn. Bu g\u00f6r\u00fcnt\u00fcn\u00fcn de ger\u00e7ek olmad\u0131\u011f\u0131; foto\u011fraf \u00fczerinde d\u00fczenleme yap\u0131ld\u0131\u011f\u0131 anla\u015f\u0131lmaktad\u0131r.\n  Kaynaklar: kaynak1, kaynak2, kaynak3, kaynak4\nVideo oynat\u0131c\u0131\nhttps://dogrula.org/wp-content/uploads/2018/02/dogrula.org_.mp4\n00:00\n00:07\n[Toplam:2    Ortalama:3.5/5] G\u00fcn Bat\u0131m\u0131nda G\u00f6ky\u00fcz\u00fcnde Spiral \u015eeklinde Bulutlar\u0131n Olu\u015ftu\u011funu G\u00f6steren Foto\u011fraf \u0130ddias\u0131", "  Mizah abisi adl\u0131 Instagram sayfas\u0131nda, Gaziantep\u2019te yaln\u0131zca Suriyelilerin tedavi g\u00f6rebilece\u011fi \u00f6zel bir hastane kuruldu\u011fu iddia edildi. Yine iddiaya g\u00f6re tamamen \u00fccretsiz olan bu hastane T\u00fcrk vatanda\u015flar\u0131n\u0131n giri\u015fi yasak.\nPayla\u015f\u0131m yakla\u015f\u0131k 20 bin be\u011feni ve y\u00fczlerce yorum ald\u0131, ancak sayfada yer alan s\u00f6z konusu iddia \u00e7o\u011funlukla yanl\u0131\u015ft\u0131r.\n\u00d6ncelikle poliklinik devlet taraf\u0131ndan de\u011fil, dernekler vas\u0131tas\u0131ylakurulmu\u015ftur. Ayr\u0131ca g\u00f6rseldeki, Suriyeli Kad\u0131n ve \u00c7ocuk Bak\u0131m Klini\u011fi de\u011fil, KHK ile kapat\u0131lan Gaziantep \u00d6zel Primer Hastanesi\u2019dir. Klinikte sadece Suriyelilerin tedavi g\u00f6rd\u00fc\u011f\u00fc do\u011fru, ancak iddian\u0131n geri kalan\u0131 ger\u00e7e\u011fi yans\u0131tm\u0131yor.\nAyr\u0131ca bu hastanenin ek bina ile b\u00fcy\u00fct\u00fclmesi de, kapat\u0131lan hastanenin Gaziantep Devlet Hastanesi\u2019ne ba\u011flanmas\u0131 kapsam\u0131nda yap\u0131lan bir \u00e7al\u0131\u015fma; yani Suriyelilerle ilgisi olmayan bir durum s\u00f6z konusu.\nG\u00f6rseldeki Hastane KHK ile Kapat\u0131lan Primer Hospital\n\u0130ddian\u0131n g\u00f6rselinde yer alan, Gaziantep Primer Hospital. FET\u00d6 ba\u011flant\u0131s\u0131 sebebiyle kayyum atanan Hastane, 15 Temmuz darbe giri\u015fiminden sonra OHAL kapsam\u0131nda kapat\u0131lm\u0131\u015f.\n  FET\u00d6/PDY ile ba\u011flant\u0131l\u0131 oldu\u011fu belirlenen Gaziantep\u2019teki \u00d6zel Primer Hastanesi, 2016 y\u0131l\u0131nda Gaziantep \u015eehit Dr. Ersin Arslan Devlet Hastanesi\u2019ne devredilmi\u015f.\nSuriyeli Kad\u0131n ve \u00c7ocuk Bak\u0131m Klini\u011fi ve KHK ile kapat\u0131lan \u00d6zel Primer Hastanesi\u2019nin Gaziantep\u2019in \u015eehitkamil il\u00e7esinde bulunmas\u0131, s\u00f6z konusu iddiada yer alan hastanenin Suriyeliler i\u00e7in kuruldu\u011funu d\u00fc\u015f\u00fcnd\u00fcrm\u00fc\u015f olabilir, ancak binalar farkl\u0131 caddeler \u00fczerinde.\nSuriyeli Kad\u0131n ve \u00c7ocuklar i\u00e7in Dernekler Taraf\u0131ndan Kurulan Poliklinik\nSuriyeli Kad\u0131n ve \u00c7ocuk Bak\u0131m Klini\u011fi\n  K\u0131talararas\u0131 Doktorlar Derne\u011fi (PAC) ve S\u0131n\u0131r Tan\u0131mayan Doktorlar (MSF) Gaziantep\u2019te Suriyeli kad\u0131n ve \u00e7ocuklar i\u00e7in poliklinik kurmu\u015ftur.\nAral\u0131k 2015\u2019te kurulan Kad\u0131n ve \u00c7ocuk Bak\u0131m poliklini\u011finin kurulma amac\u0131na dair yaz\u0131ya buradan ula\u015fabilirsiniz.\nKaynaklar: kaynak1, kaynak2, kaynak4, kaynak5, kaynak6, kaynak7, kaynak8\n[Toplam:3    Ortalama:5/5] Gaziantep\u2019te Yaln\u0131zca Suriyelilerin Tedavi G\u00f6rebilece\u011fi Hastane Kuruldu \u0130ddias\u0131", "Devlet ba\u015fkanlar\u0131 ve e\u015fleri aras\u0131ndaki ya\u015f farklar\u0131 ba\u015fl\u0131kl\u0131 yaz\u0131m\u0131zda, liderlerin ve e\u015flerinin ya\u015flar\u0131n\u0131 ara\u015ft\u0131rarak, ya\u015f fark\u0131 konusunu inceledik.\nDonald Trump ve Melania Trump\u200a\u2014\u200aABD\nMelania Trump 48, Donald Trump ise 72 ya\u015f\u0131nda; \u00e7iftin aras\u0131nda 24 ya\u015f fark bulunuyor.\nVladimir Putin ve Eski E\u015fi Ludmi\u0142a Putina\u200a\u2014\u200aRusya\n1983 ile 2014 y\u0131llar\u0131 aras\u0131nda evli kalan \u00e7iftin ya\u015f fark\u0131 6 idi. Vladimir Putin 66, eski e\u015fi Ludmi\u0142a Putina ise 60 ya\u015f\u0131ndad\u0131r.\nXi Jinping ve Peng Liyuan\u200a\u2014\u200a\u00c7in\n\u00c7in Devlet Ba\u015fkan\u0131 Xi Jinping 66, e\u015fi Peng Liyuan ise 56 ya\u015f\u0131ndad\u0131r; \u00e7iftin aras\u0131nda 10 ya\u015f fark bulunuyor.\nRecep Tayyip Erdo\u011fan ve Emine Erdo\u011fan\u200a\u2014\u200aT\u00fcrkiye\nBa\u015fkan Recep Tayyip Erdo\u011fan 64, e\u015fi Emine Erdo\u011fan ise 63 ya\u015f\u0131nda; \u00e7iftin aras\u0131nda 2 ya\u015f fark var.\nEmmanuel Macron ve Brigitte Macron\nEmmanuel Macron 41, e\u015fi Brigitte Macron ise 65 ya\u015f\u0131nda; Fransa Cumhurba\u015fkan\u0131 Emmanuel Macron e\u015finden 24 ya\u015f k\u00fc\u00e7\u00fck.\nTheresa May ve Philip May\u200a\u2014\u200a\u0130ngiltere\n\u0130ngiltere Ba\u015fbakan\u0131 Theresa May 62, e\u015fi Philip May ise 61 ya\u015f\u0131nda;
