\u00e7iftin aras\u0131ndaki ya\u015f fark\u0131 29.\nAndrzej Duda ve Agata Kornhauser-Duda\u200a\u2014\u200aPolonya\nPolonya Cumhurba\u015fkan\u0131 Andrzej Duda, 1972 do\u011fumlu olan e\u015fiyle ayn\u0131 ya\u015ftad\u0131r.\nHamad bin Halife es-Sani ve Moza bint Nas\u0131r\u200a\u2014\u200aKatar\nEski Katar Emiri Hamad bin Halife es-Sani 66, Moza bint Nas\u0131r ise 59 ya\u015f\u0131ndad\u0131r, \u00e7iftin aras\u0131ndaki ya\u015f fark\u0131 7.\n  Kaynaklar: wikipedia, kaynak1, kaynak2, kaynak3\nVideo oynat\u0131c\u0131\nhttps://dogrula.org/wp-content/uploads/2018/02/dogrula.org_.mp4\n00:00\n00:07\n[Toplam:3    Ortalama:4/5] Ara\u015ft\u0131rma: Devlet Ba\u015fkanlar\u0131 ve E\u015fleri Aras\u0131ndaki Ya\u015f\u00a0Farklar\u0131", "  Ar\u015fiv Tarih adl\u0131 sayfan\u0131n Twitter hesab\u0131nda payla\u015ft\u0131\u011f\u0131 videonun nesli t\u00fckenen kauai oo ku\u015funa ait son ses kayd\u0131 oldu\u011fu iddias\u0131 do\u011frudur.\n  Bu sesi canl\u0131 dinleme ihtimaliniz yok. \u00c7\u00fcnk\u00fc bu g\u00fczel ses Kauai ku\u015funun son bireyne aitti. Soyu t\u00fckendi. Bu ses 1987'de kaydedildi. Olmayan di\u015filerine kur yap\u0131yordu. pic.twitter.com/XvyuTNq7E1\n\u2014 Ar\u015fiv Tarih (@arsivtarih) December 29, 2017\nKauai Oo (Moho braccatus) Ku\u015funun Nesli T\u00fckenmi\u015f\nS\u00f6z konusu videoda resmedildi\u011fi gibi ba\u015f\u0131, kanatlar\u0131 ve kuyru\u011fu siyah olan ku\u015fun t\u00fcylerinin geri kalan\u0131 kahverengidir.\n  Bacaklar\u0131nda alt\u0131n sar\u0131s\u0131 t\u00fcyleri olan, g\u00f6zleri a\u00e7\u0131k sar\u0131; uzunlu\u011fu ise 19\u201321.5 cm olan ku\u015fun 1985\u2019ten bu yana neslinin t\u00fckenmi\u015f oldu\u011fu varsay\u0131lmaktad\u0131r.\n  D\u00fcnya Do\u011fay\u0131 Koruma Birli\u011fi (IUCN) K\u0131rm\u0131z\u0131 Liste\u2019sinde Hawaii\u2019de ya\u015fam\u0131\u015f olan bu k\u00fc\u00e7\u00fck kauai oo ku\u015funun neslinin t\u00fckendi\u011fini g\u00f6rmek m\u00fcmk\u00fcn.\n  Ayr\u0131ca s\u00f6z konusu tweetteki ses kayd\u0131n\u0131n yan\u0131 s\u0131ra, kauai oo ku\u015funun \u00f6t\u00fc\u015f\u00fcn\u00fcn kaydedildi\u011fi bir ba\u015fka video ar\u015fivlerde yer almaktad\u0131r. \u0130ddiada yer alan ses kayd\u0131yla \u00f6rt\u00fc\u015fen bu kay\u0131ttaki ku\u015fun \u00f6t\u00fc\u015f\u00fc, iddian\u0131n do\u011fru oldu\u011funu g\u00f6stermektedir. Videoya buradan ula\u015fabilirsiniz.\n  Kauai oo ku\u015funun ses kayd\u0131na ili\u015fkin videoyu Discovery Channel belgeselinde de g\u00f6rmek m\u00fcmk\u00fcn.\nMacaulay Library web sitesinden de \u201cKauai oo\u201d \u015feklinde arama yapt\u0131\u011f\u0131n\u0131zda, ses kayd\u0131yla alakal\u0131 videolara ula\u015fabilirsiniz.\n  G\u00f6r\u00fcld\u00fc\u011f\u00fc gibi, neslinin t\u00fckenmi\u015f oldu\u011fu belgelenen kauai oo ku\u015funun \u00f6t\u00fc\u015f\u00fcn\u00fcn kaydedildi\u011fi videoya dair iddia do\u011frudur.\nKaynaklar: kaynak1, kaynak2, kaynak3, kaynak4, kaynak5, kaynak6, kaynak7, kaynak8, kaynak9, kaynak10\nVideo oynat\u0131c\u0131\nhttps://dogrula.org/wp-content/uploads/2018/02/dogrula.org_.mp4\n00:00\n00:07\n[Toplam:4    Ortalama:5/5] 1987\u2019de Nesli T\u00fckenen Kauai Oo Ku\u015funa Ait Son Ses Kayd\u0131 \u0130ddias\u0131", "Meral Ak\u015fener Sosyal Medya isimli Facebook sayfas\u0131nda payla\u015f\u0131lan bu belge g\u00f6rseli, binlerce yorum ve etkile\u015fim ald\u0131; 4 binden fazla ki\u015fi taraf\u0131ndan payla\u015f\u0131ld\u0131. B\u00f6ylece WhatsApp grup mesajlar\u0131nda da yer ald\u0131.\nAncak T\u00fcrkiye Varl\u0131k Fonu A.\u015e\u2019ye dair belge iddias\u0131 do\u011fru de\u011fil. G\u00f6rselde yer alan, sonradan haz\u0131rlanm\u0131\u015f sahte bir belge. \u0130ddian\u0131n as\u0131ls\u0131z oldu\u011funu Resmi Gazete\u2019de ve T\u00fcrkiye Varl\u0131k Fonu Y\u00f6netimi A. \u015e. web sitesinde g\u00f6rmek m\u00fcmk\u00fcn.\nT\u00fcrkiye Varl\u0131k Fonu Y\u00f6netimi Anonim \u015eirketi Y\u00f6netim Kurulunun Resmi Gazete\u2019de yer alan ba\u015fkan, vekil ve \u00fcyeleri \u015f\u00f6yle:\n      Belgenin sahte oldu\u011funu pek \u00e7ok sebepten \u00f6t\u00fcr\u00fc anlamak m\u00fcmk\u00fcn. \u00d6ncelikle b\u00f6yle bir belgenin resmi belge olmas\u0131 i\u00e7in, yaz\u0131m hatas\u0131n\u0131n bulunmamas\u0131 gerekiyor. Fakat sahte belgedeki bu hata dikkat \u00e7ekiyor:\n  C\u00fcmledeki ifadenin do\u011fru say\u0131lmas\u0131 i\u00e7in \u2018ba\u015fkan\u0131na atanm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r\u2019 de\u011fil, \u2018ba\u015fkanl\u0131\u011f\u0131na atanm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r\u2019 yaz\u0131lmas\u0131 gerekirdi. Yani dil bilgisi hatas\u0131yap\u0131lm\u0131\u015f. Ayr\u0131ca 6 \u00fcyesi de Resmi Gazete\u2019de belli olan y\u00f6netim kurulu i\u00e7in yukar\u0131daki sahte belge sadece Recep Tayyip Erdo\u011fan ad\u0131n\u0131 yazm\u0131\u015f.\nAyr\u0131ca, bu belgenin Resmi Gazete\u2019de yay\u0131mlanmad\u0131\u011f\u0131na dair bir di\u011fer i\u015faret, belgelerdeki yaz\u0131 fontlar\u0131n\u0131n uyu\u015fmamas\u0131.\n    Bug\u00fcn haberlerde yer alan di\u011fer bir bilgi de, AA\u2019dan gelen bilgiye g\u00f6re, Varl\u0131k Fonu y\u00f6netim kurulu \u00fcyelerinin maa\u015f almayacak olmas\u0131yd\u0131.\n  T\u00fcrkiye Varl\u0131k Fonu Y\u00f6netimi Anonim \u015eirketinin Kurulmas\u0131 ile Baz\u0131 Kanunlarda De\u011fi\u015fiklik Yap\u0131lmas\u0131na Dair Kanun, 26 A\u011fustos 2016 tarihinde Resmi Gazete\u2019de yay\u0131mlanarak y\u00fcr\u00fcrl\u00fc\u011fe girmi\u015fti.\n    Dola\u015f\u0131mda olan belge iddias\u0131n\u0131n as\u0131ls\u0131z oldu\u011funu Resmi Gazete\u2019de ve T\u00fcrkiye Varl\u0131k Fonu Y\u00f6netimi A. \u015e. web sitesinde g\u00f6rmek m\u00fcmk\u00fcn.\nKaynaklar: kaynak1, kaynak2, kaynak3, kaynak5, kaynak6, kaynak7\nVideo oynat\u0131c\u0131\nhttps://dogrula.org/wp-content/uploads/2018/02/dogrula.org_.mp4\n00:00\n00:07\n[Toplam:6    Ortalama:5/5] T\u00fcrkiye Varl\u0131k Fonu Y\u00f6netimi A.\u015e\u2019ye Dair Payla\u015f\u0131lan Belge \u0130ddias\u0131", "  D\u00fc\u015f\u00fcnen Deli adl\u0131 Facebook sayfas\u0131ndan yay\u0131lan ve sosyal medyada dola\u015f\u0131mda olan bu iddia pek \u00e7ok \u0130nternet ortam\u0131nda payla\u015f\u0131larak etkile\u015fim almaktad\u0131r. Ayn\u0131 ifadelerle haz\u0131rlanan g\u00f6rseller baz\u0131 Instagram, Facebook ve Twitter sayfalar\u0131nda da payla\u015f\u0131lmaktad\u0131r.\n  Ancak Tar\u0131m ve Orman Bakan\u0131 Bekir Pakdemirli\u2019nin millet \u015farbon hastal\u0131\u011f\u0131na yakalan\u0131yorsa demek ki et alabiliyorlar dedi\u011fi iddias\u0131 do\u011fru de\u011fildir. Bakan\u0131n a\u00e7\u0131klamalar\u0131, yapt\u0131\u011f\u0131 konu\u015fmalar ve Twitter hesab\u0131 incelendi\u011finde, b\u00f6yle bir a\u00e7\u0131klama yapt\u0131\u011f\u0131na rastlanmam\u0131\u015ft\u0131r. Ayr\u0131ca muhalif medya organlar\u0131n\u0131n \u0130nternet ve TV yay\u0131nlar\u0131nda da bakan Pakdemirli\u2019nin bu s\u00f6zleri s\u00f6yledi\u011fine dair bir habere yer verilmemi\u015ftir.\n\u015earbon Hastal\u0131\u011f\u0131 ve Bakan Pakdemirli\u2019ye Dair As\u0131ls\u0131z \u0130ddialar Ortaya At\u0131l\u0131yor\nT\u00fcrkiye\u2019de \u015farbon hastal\u0131\u011f\u0131 konusunda en b\u00fcy\u00fck bilgi kirlili\u011fi \u0130nternet ortamlar\u0131nda payla\u015f\u0131lan as\u0131ls\u0131z iddialardan kaynaklan\u0131yor. \u00d6zellikle de Tar\u0131m ve Orman Bakan\u0131 Bekir Pakdemirli \u00fczerinden ortaya at\u0131lan sahte haberler, k\u0131sa s\u00fcre i\u00e7ince y\u00fczbinlerce ki\u015fiye ula\u015farak kaos ve infiale neden oluyor.\nYAYILAN SAHTE HABERLERDEN BAZILARI\n\u0130Y\u0130 Parti Genel Ba\u015fkan Dan\u0131\u015fman\u0131n\u0131n Mamak\u2019ta \u015farbon vakas\u0131 g\u00f6r\u00fcld\u00fc\u011f\u00fc iddias\u0131 as\u0131ls\u0131z haberlerden biri:\n  Bakanl\u0131k bu iddiay\u0131 da yalanlad\u0131.\nMamak \u0130l\u00e7esinde \u015earbon Vakalar\u0131n\u0131n G\u00f6r\u00fcld\u00fc\u011f\u00fc \u0130ddialar\u0131na \u0130li\u015fkin Bas\u0131n A\u00e7\u0131klamas\u0131https://t.co/vcwaaOqI3U pic.twitter.com/N2cSXofZYX\n\u2014 T.C. Ankara Valili\u011fi (@AnkaraValiligi) September 12, 2018\n    Bakanl\u0131k iddiay\u0131 yalanlamas\u0131na ra\u011fmen haber yay\u0131lmaya devam ediyor.\nYozgat\u2019ta \u015farbon g\u00f6r\u00fcld\u00fc\u011f\u00fc de as\u0131ls\u0131z haberlerden. A\u015fa\u011f\u0131daki Twitter hesab\u0131n\u0131n sahte oldu\u011fu, resimdeki ki\u015finin de asl\u0131nda ABD\u2019li bir ortodontist oldu\u011fu ortaya \u00e7\u0131km\u0131\u015f.\n    Ayr\u0131ca ayn\u0131 foto\u011fraf, Samsun\u2019un Tepecik Mahallesi\u2019nde ortaya \u00e7\u0131kan bir \u015farbon vakas\u0131 olarak servis edilmi\u015f.\n  \u0130stanbul\u2019da bekleyen bir gemide \u015farbonlu hayvanlar\u0131n bulundu\u011fu iddias\u0131 da ger\u00e7e\u011fi yans\u0131tmayan haberler aras\u0131nda yer ald\u0131:\n    Bu haberin k\u0131sa s\u00fcrede yay\u0131lmas\u0131n\u0131n ard\u0131ndan, Tar\u0131m ve Orman Bakanl\u0131\u011f\u0131 bas\u0131n a\u00e7\u0131klamas\u0131 yaparak iddiay\u0131 yalanlad\u0131.\nBug\u00fcn baz\u0131 bas\u0131n yay\u0131n kurulu\u015flar\u0131nda yay\u0131nlanan haberlerde \u0130stanbul Ah\u0131rkap\u0131 a\u00e7\u0131klar\u0131nda i\u00e7inde \u015farbon hastal\u0131\u011f\u0131 ta\u015f\u0131yan b\u00fcy\u00fckba\u015f hayvanlar\u0131n bulundu\u011fu bir geminin bekletildi\u011fi iddia edilmektedir. Bu iddia kesinlikle as\u0131ls\u0131z ve yaland\u0131r. pic.twitter.com/tIkJD9eYLa\n\u2014 Tar\u0131m ve Orman Bakanl\u0131\u011f\u0131 (@TCTarim) September 6, 2018\n  Sosyal medyada payla\u015f\u0131l\u0131p ger\u00e7e\u011fi yans\u0131tmayan g\u00f6rsellerden biri de, \u015farbon hastal\u0131\u011f\u0131ndan \u00f6len bir ki\u015finin cenazesinden oldu\u011fu iddia edilen foto\u011fraf:\n    Foto\u011fraf asl\u0131nda 2017 y\u0131l\u0131nda Gaziantep\u2019teki bir iplik fabrikas\u0131nda \u00e7\u0131kan yang\u0131nda \u00f6len i\u015f adam\u0131 Tuncay Kara\u2019n\u0131n cenazesine ait.\n    A\u015fa\u011f\u0131daki g\u00f6rsel de Brezilya\u2019dan T\u00fcrkiye\u2019ye getirilen hayvanlara eziyet edildi\u011fi \u015feklinde servis edilmi\u015f. Ancak bu iddia da do\u011fru de\u011fil.\n    Foto\u011fraf asl\u0131nda Avustralya\u2019dan. G\u00f6rseldeki hayvan\u0131n foto\u011fraf\u0131 da Maysora gemisinde ta\u015f\u0131n\u0131rken \u00e7ekilmi\u015f.\n    Bakan Pakdemirli\u2019ye ait oldu\u011fu iddia edilen bu ifadeler de ger\u00e7e\u011fi yans\u0131tm\u0131yor. Bas\u0131n yay\u0131n organlar\u0131 ve ilgili sosyal medya hesaplar\u0131 incelendi\u011finde bakan Bekir Pakdemirli\u2019nin bu \u015fekilde bir a\u00e7\u0131klama yapt\u0131\u011f\u0131na rastlanmam\u0131\u015ft\u0131r.\n    G\u00f6r\u00fcld\u00fc\u011f\u00fc \u00fczere, yap\u0131lan payla\u015f\u0131mlar hi\u00e7bir \u015fekilde ger\u00e7e\u011fi yans\u0131tm\u0131yor. Bu haberlerin yer ald\u0131\u011f\u0131 sosyal medya ve \u0130nternet sayfalar\u0131n\u0131 inceledi\u011finizde, bu \u015fekilde toplumun kutupla\u015fmas\u0131na neden olan ve nefret s\u00f6ylemleri i\u00e7eren sahte haberlere \u00e7ok\u00e7a rastlayabilirsiniz.\nKaynaklar: kaynak1, kaynak2, kaynak3, kaynak4, kaynak5, kaynak6, kaynak7, kaynak8, kaynak9, kaynak10, kaynak11, kaynak13, kaynak14\nVideo oynat\u0131c\u0131\nhttps://dogrula.org/wp-content/uploads/2018/02/dogrula.org_.mp4\n00:00\n00:07\n[Toplam:6    Ortalama:4.8/5] Bakan Pakdemirli\u2019nin Millet \u015earbon Hastal\u0131\u011f\u0131na Yakalan\u0131yorsa Demek ki Et Alabiliyorlar Dedi\u011fi \u0130ddias\u0131", "Sosyal medya payla\u015f\u0131mlar\u0131 ve \u0130nternet ortamlar\u0131nda s\u0131k\u00e7a yer alm\u0131\u015f olan, eski futbolcu Adriano\u2019nun (36) Brezilya\u2019da bir uyu\u015fturucu \u00e7etesinin lideri oldu\u011fu iddias\u0131 do\u011fru de\u011fildir.\n  Daily Star adl\u0131 \u0130nternet sitesinden yay\u0131lan iddia, pek \u00e7ok medya organ\u0131 taraf\u0131ndan \u201ceski Brezilyal\u0131 futbolcu zor zamanlar ge\u00e7iriyor\u201d ifadeleriyle haber yap\u0131lm\u0131\u015f.\n\u0130ddialara g\u00f6re d\u00fcnya y\u0131ld\u0131z\u0131 eski Brezilyal\u0131 futbolcu Adriano Leite Ribeiro\u2019nun, Rio\u2019da favela ad\u0131 verilen gecekondu b\u00f6lgesinde \u00e7ete lideri olarak ya\u015fad\u0131\u011f\u0131 g\u00f6r\u00fclm\u00fc\u015ft\u00fcr. (Favela, Brezilya\u2019daki gecekondu mahallelerine verilen isim.)\n  2016 y\u0131l\u0131nda ortaya at\u0131lan iddialara g\u00f6re, Brezilya ile Copa America\u2019y\u0131 kazanan eski Inter Milan oyuncusu Adriano \u00e7ete \u00fcyeleriyle favelada ya\u015famak zorunda kalm\u0131\u015f.\nKaynak olarak \u201cBrezilyal\u0131 kaynaklar\u201d diye bahsedilen bu haberlere g\u00f6re, Adriano\u2019nun G\u00fcney Amerika\u2019n\u0131n en tehlikeli gruplar\u0131ndan biri olan Comando Vermelho \u00e7etesiyle yak\u0131n ili\u015fkisi bulunuyor.\nBu hikayeyi ortaya \u00e7\u0131karan ana olay ise, Rio\u2019daki favelalarda bir berbere giden Adriano\u2019un g\u00f6r\u00fcnt\u00fclerinin sosyal medyada payla\u015f\u0131l\u0131p yay\u0131lmas\u0131.\nG\u00f6r\u00fcnt\u00fc ilk olarak Adriano taraf\u0131ndan kendi Instagram profilinde payla\u015f\u0131lm\u0131\u015f.\n\u0130ddialar\u0131n as\u0131ls\u0131z oldu\u011funu Adriano\u2019nun Instagram hesab\u0131nda yapt\u0131\u011f\u0131 payla\u015f\u0131mlarda ve aktif olarak kulland\u0131\u011f\u0131 Twitter hesab\u0131nda g\u00f6rmek m\u00fcmk\u00fcn.\nAdriano bu g\u00f6r\u00fcnt\u00fcleri \u201cin my community\u201d (kendi mahallemde) notuyla payla\u015fm\u0131\u015f.\nAyr\u0131ca Adriano\u2019nun Instagram profiline bak\u0131ld\u0131\u011f\u0131nda, Brezilya\u2019daki ailesini ve arkada\u015flar\u0131n\u0131 ziyaret etti\u011fini ve \u00e7ocuklar\u0131yla orada vakit ge\u00e7irdi\u011fini g\u00f6rmek m\u00fcmk\u00fcn.\n  Brezilyal\u0131 kaynak Ego\u2019ya g\u00f6re, Adriano berberiyle birlikte Vila Cruzeiro\u2019da \u00e7ektirdi\u011fi foto\u011frafta \u201ck\u00f6klerini asla unutamayaca\u011f\u0131n\u0131\u201d belirten bir g\u00f6r\u00fcnt\u00fc veriyor.\n  Ayr\u0131ca, s\u00f6zle\u015fmesinin oldu\u011fu kul\u00fcp Miami United FC\u2019nin web sitesinde hala Adriano\u2019yu g\u00f6rmek m\u00fcmk\u00fcn.\nBu g\u00f6r\u00fcnt\u00fclerden sonra pek \u00e7ok makale yay\u0131ndan kald\u0131r\u0131lm\u0131\u015f ve Adriano\u2019nun \u00e7ete \u00fcyesi oldu\u011fu hakk\u0131nda yap\u0131lan Twitter payla\u015f\u0131mlar\u0131 silinmi\u015ftir.\nHace unos a\u00f1os Adriano tem meu respeito\u2026 pic.twitter.com/HfFSaGkzci\n\u2014 RACIONAIS VIDA LOKA (@FraseRacionaiss) 4 July 2016\n  Ancak T\u00fcrkiye ve d\u00fcnya medyas\u0131nda bu konuya dair iddialar ortaya at\u0131lmaya ve Adriano\u2019nun \u00e7ete lideri/ uyu\u015fturucu baronu oldu\u011fu haberleri yap\u0131lmaya devam etmektedir.\nKaynaklar: kaynak1, kaynak3, kaynak4, kaynak5, kaynak6, kaynak7, kaynak8, kaynak9, kaynak10\nVideo oynat\u0131c\u0131\nhttps://dogrula.org/wp-content/uploads/2018/02/dogrula.org_.mp4\n00:00\n00:07\n[Toplam:5    Ortalama:5/5] Eski Futbolcu Adriano\u2019nun Brezilya\u2019da Bir Uyu\u015fturucu \u00c7etesinin Lideri Oldu\u011fu \u0130ddias\u0131", "S\u0131rad\u0131\u015f\u0131 1 Bilgi sayfas\u0131nda yer alan ve pek \u00e7ok etkile\u015fim alan, NASA Mars\u2019taki karbondioksiti \u015fekere \u00e7evirene 1 milyon dolar \u00f6d\u00fcl verecek iddias\u0131 do\u011frudur.\nNASA, web sitesinden 1 milyon dolara varan \u00f6d\u00fcll\u00fc bir Karbondioksit D\u00f6n\u00fc\u015f\u00fcm Yar\u0131\u015fmas\u0131 d\u00fczenledi\u011fini, yar\u0131\u015fman\u0131n Nisan 2019\u2019da sonu\u00e7lanaca\u011f\u0131n\u0131 duyurmu\u015ftur.\nNASA, karbondioksit d\u00f6n\u00fc\u015f\u00fcm yar\u0131\u015fmas\u0131n\u0131 web sitesinden duyurdu\nAmerika Birle\u015fik Devletleri\u2019nin uzay program\u0131 \u00e7al\u0131\u015fmalar\u0131ndan sorumlu kurum olan NASA, web sitesinden duyurdu\u011fu haberde ilgili b\u00f6l\u00fcmler \u015f\u00f6yle:\nKarbondioksit, Mars atmosferi i\u00e7inde kolayca ve bolca bulunan bir kaynakt\u0131r. NASA\u2019n\u0131n Centennial Challenges program\u0131 kapsam\u0131nda y\u00fcr\u00fctt\u00fc\u011f\u00fc yeni CO2 D\u00f6n\u00fc\u015f\u00fcm Yar\u0131\u015fmas\u0131, karbondioksiti faydal\u0131 bile\u015fiklere d\u00f6n\u00fc\u015ft\u00fcrmenin yeni yollar\u0131n\u0131 arayan bir kamu rekabeti.\nKarbon ve oksijen \u015fekerin molek\u00fcler yap\u0131 ta\u015flar\u0131d\u0131r. Karbondioksitten glikoz \u00fcretebilen verimli sistemler geli\u015ftirmek, d\u00fcnya \u00fczerindeki biyo-\u00fcretim teknolojisinin geli\u015fmesine yard\u0131mc\u0131 olacakt\u0131r.\nYar\u0131\u015fma iki a\u015famaya ayr\u0131lm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r. 1. a\u015famada ekipler, karbondioksiti glikoza d\u00f6n\u00fc\u015ft\u00fcrmek i\u00e7in fiziksel-kimyasal yakla\u015f\u0131mlar\u0131n ayr\u0131nt\u0131lar\u0131n\u0131 i\u00e7eren bir d\u00f6n\u00fc\u015f\u00fcm sisteminin tasar\u0131m\u0131n\u0131 ve tan\u0131m\u0131n\u0131 sunmal\u0131d\u0131r.\nNASA, Nisan 2019\u2018da a\u00e7\u0131klanacak yar\u0131\u015fma sonucunda se\u00e7ilen be\u015f tak\u0131ma 50\u2019\u015fer bin dolar \u00f6d\u00fcl verecek. 750 bin dolar \u00f6d\u00fcle varan 2. a\u015famada, toplam 1 milyon dolarl\u0131k \u00f6d\u00fcl i\u00e7in m\u00fccadele verilecek.\nNASA\u2019n\u0131n Centennial Challenges program\u0131 kapsam\u0131nda y\u00fcr\u00fct\u00fclen CO2 D\u00f6n\u00fc\u015f\u00fcm Yar\u0131\u015fmas\u0131\u2019n\u0131n duyurusu Twitter hesab\u0131ndan da yap\u0131ld\u0131:\nIdeas wanted! We are developing a new competition \u2013 CO2 Conversion Challenge \u2013 to convert carbon dioxide into other products that could enable humans to thrive on Mars and on Earth. RFI open for comments at https://t.co/7ECbIA2xDf pic.twitter.com/3jPBahBwIW\n\u2014 Centennial Challenge (@NASAPrize) May 1, 2018\nKarbondioksit D\u00f6n\u00fc\u015f\u00fcm Yar\u0131\u015fmas\u0131\nNASA web sitesindeki duyuruda linki verilen Karbondioksit D\u00f6n\u00fc\u015f\u00fcm Yar\u0131\u015fmas\u0131 web sitesi de \u015f\u00f6yle:\n  ABD TV kanallar\u0131ndan biri olan ABC News ve \u0130ngiliz The Daily Mail gazetesinin web sitelerinden de habere ula\u015fmak m\u00fcmk\u00fcn.\nKaynaklar: kaynak1, kaynak2, kaynak3, kaynak4, kaynak5, kaynak6\nVideo oynat\u0131c\u0131\nhttps://dogrula.org/wp-content/uploads/2018/02/dogrula.org_.mp4\n00:00\n00:07\n[Toplam:1    Ortalama:5/5] NASA Mars\u2019taki Karbondioksiti \u015eekere D\u00f6n\u00fc\u015ft\u00fcrene 1 Milyon Dolar \u00d6d\u00fcl Verecek \u0130ddias\u0131", "Utan\u00e7 G\u00fcnl\u00fc\u011f\u00fc isimli Twitter sayfas\u0131 yapt\u0131\u011f\u0131 videolu payla\u015f\u0131mda, Suriye\u2019nin Humus kentindeki Esed okullar\u0131 \u00f6\u011frencilerine Nazi e\u011fitimi veriyor iddias\u0131nda bulundu.\nAncak sayfada yer alan s\u00f6z konusu videoda \u00f6\u011frencilerin Nazi selam\u0131 verdi\u011fi iddias\u0131 do\u011fru de\u011fildir.\nSuriye\u2019de \u00e7ocuklar okullar\u0131na gittiklerinde her sabah ulusal mar\u015flar\u0131n\u0131 s\u00f6yledikten sonra s\u0131n\u0131flar\u0131na da\u011f\u0131l\u0131yorlar. Bu mar\u015f esnas\u0131nda yapt\u0131klar\u0131 selamlama da (Nazi selam\u0131na benzetilen), uluslar\u0131n\u0131 \u00f6verken s\u00f6yledikleri c\u00fcmleye binaen yap\u0131l\u0131yor.\n\u015eam\u2019da bir okulda kaydedilen s\u00f6z konusu video:\n  Yine okullardaki sabah selamlamas\u0131na bir ba\u015fka \u00f6rnek:\n  Bu selam\u0131n verildi\u011fi sabah t\u00f6renine ait YouTube videolar\u0131na ula\u015fmak m\u00fcmk\u00fcn:\n  Ulusal mar\u015f\u0131n sonunda verilen selamlamaya t\u00f6renlerde de rastlamak m\u00fcmk\u00fcn:\n  Nazi selam\u0131na benzetilmesi baz\u0131 programlara da konu olan bu video Facebook\u2019ta da payla\u015f\u0131lm\u0131\u015f. S\u00f6z konusu videoya yorum yapan Suriyeliler, \u00e7ocuklar\u0131n\u0131n yapt\u0131\u011f\u0131 bu selamlamay\u0131 kendilerinin de yapt\u0131\u011f\u0131n\u0131 ve bunun Nazi selam\u0131yla alakas\u0131 olmad\u0131\u011f\u0131n\u0131 dile getirmi\u015f.\n  S\u00f6z konusu videoda Suriyeli \u00e7ocuklar\u0131n Nazi selam\u0131 (Hitler selam\u0131) verdikleri iddias\u0131 do\u011fru de\u011fildir.\nKaynaklar: kaynak1 , kaynak2, kaynak3, kaynak4, kaynak5\nVideo oynat\u0131c\u0131\nhttps://dogrula.org/wp-content/uploads/2018/02/dogrula.org_.mp4\n00:00\n00:07\n[Toplam:1    Ortalama:5/5] Suriye\u2019nin Humus Kentindeki Esed Okullar\u0131 \u00d6\u011frencilerine Nazi E\u011fitimi Veriyor \u0130ddias\u0131", "Sosyal medyada yer alan payla\u015f\u0131mlar aras\u0131nda en \u00e7ok etkile\u015fim alan konulardan biri de Suudi Arabistan\u2019da kullan\u0131lan Starbucks logosunun farkl\u0131 oldu\u011fu iddialar\u0131.\nSuudi Arabistan\u2019\u0131n \u015fehirlerinde yer alan Starbucks kahve d\u00fckkanlar\u0131na bakt\u0131\u011f\u0131m\u0131zda, iddian\u0131n k\u0131smen do\u011fru oldu\u011funu s\u00f6ylemek m\u00fcmk\u00fcn.\nBunun sebebi, logo de\u011fi\u015fiminin y\u0131llar \u00f6ncesiyle farkl\u0131l\u0131k g\u00f6stermesi. \u00d6rne\u011fin; Mekke ve Medine\u2019de bulunan baz\u0131 Starbucks d\u00fckkanlar\u0131nda logo bulunmamas\u0131 (Mekke ve Medine \u015fehirlerinde); baz\u0131lar\u0131nda mevcut logonun kullan\u0131lmas\u0131, baz\u0131lar\u0131nda ise (ge\u00e7mi\u015f y\u0131llarda) tasar\u0131m\u0131 farkl\u0131 olan yeni bir logo kullan\u0131lmas\u0131.\nAncak, bu d\u00fckkanlar\u0131n hepsinde kullan\u0131lan bardaklarda deniz k\u0131z\u0131 temal\u0131 mevcut logo bulunuyor.\n\u0130ddian\u0131n k\u0131smen do\u011fru oldu\u011funu g\u00f6stermek ad\u0131na, Suudi Arabistan\u2019\u0131n muhtelif \u015fehirlerinde yer alan Starbucks d\u00fckkanlar\u0131ndan farkl\u0131 y\u0131llarda payla\u015f\u0131lan foto\u011fraflar\u0131 derledik.\n  MEKKE\nLogonun de\u011fi\u015fti\u011fini g\u00f6r\u00fcyoruz.\nMekke, 2012\n  Mekke\u2019deki bu d\u00fckkanda ise orijinal logo mevcut.\nMekke, 2018\n  Mekke\u2019deki bu d\u00fckkanda logo bulunmuyor.\nMekke, 2018\nMED\u0130NE\nD\u00fckkanda logo bulunmuyor.\nMedine, 2018\n  2013 y\u0131l\u0131na ait foto\u011frafta ise orijinal logo mevcut.\nMedine, 2013\n  2012 y\u0131l\u0131na ait foto\u011frafta logonun de\u011fi\u015fti\u011fi g\u00f6r\u00fcl\u00fcyor.\nMedine, 2012\nR\u0130YAD\nRiyad, 2018\nC\u0130DDE\nCidde, 2017\nCidde, 2018\nDAMMAM\nDammam, 2017\nDammam, 2010\n  G\u00f6r\u00fcld\u00fc\u011f\u00fc \u00fczere, farkl\u0131 y\u0131llara ve \u015fehirlere ait g\u00f6rsellere bak\u0131ld\u0131\u011f\u0131nda, Suudi Arabistan\u2019da yer alan Starbucks d\u00fckkanlar\u0131nda hem mevcut logonun, hem de de\u011fi\u015ftirilen logonun kullan\u0131ld\u0131\u011f\u0131n\u0131 g\u00f6rmek m\u00fcmk\u00fcn. Bununla beraber, Mekke ve Medine\u2019de logonun yer almad\u0131\u011f\u0131 d\u00fckkanlara da rastlanabilir. Bu da iddian\u0131n k\u0131smen do\u011fru oldu\u011funu g\u00f6steriyor.\nKaynaklar: kaynak1, kaynak2, kaynak3, kaynak4, kaynak5, kaynak6, kaynak7, kaynak8, kaynak10, kaynak11, kaynak12\nVideo oynat\u0131c\u0131\nhttps://dogrula.org/wp-content/uploads/2018/02/dogrula.org_.mp4\n00:00\n00:07\n[Toplam:2    Ortalama:5/5] Suudi Arabistan\u2019da Kullan\u0131lan Starbucks Logosunun Farkl\u0131 Oldu\u011fu \u0130ddias\u0131", "Dogrula.org\u2019a gelen bir ihbarda, Ermeni Hastanesi Ba\u015fhekim Yard\u0131mc\u0131s\u0131 Dr. Tar\u0131k Turfan\u2019dan geldi\u011fi iddia edilen bir Whatsapp mesaj\u0131n\u0131n dola\u015f\u0131mda oldu\u011fu kaydedildi.\nMesajda Tuncay Ako\u011flu isimli bir \u015fah\u0131s, kendisine Ermeni Hastanesi Ba\u015fhekim Yard\u0131mc\u0131s\u0131 Dr. Tar\u0131k Turfan\u2019dan gelen bir bilgiden bahsederek \u015farbon hastal\u0131\u011f\u0131na de\u011finiyor:\nSevgili arkadaslarim\nSize dostum ve kardesim gibi sevdigim guvendigim Ermeni Hastahanesi Bashekim Yardimcisi Dr Tarik Turfan dan gelen bir bilgiyi ulastiriyorum\nDe\u011ferli Dostlar,\n\u015earbon hastal\u0131\u011f\u0131 ve salg\u0131n\u0131 ile ilgili etrafta \u00e7ok yayg\u0131n ve bir s\u00fcr\u00fc \u00e7e\u015fitli bilgi ve haber dola\u015fmakta, yo\u011fun yaz\u0131l\u0131p \u00e7izilmektedir. Ben, bu yo\u011funlu\u011fa kat\u0131l\u0131p s\u0131radan bilgiler iletecek de\u011filim. Ancak, de\u011ferli s\u0131n\u0131f arkada\u015f\u0131m\u0131z ve hayat\u0131 boyunca \u00e7ok ba\u015far\u0131l\u0131 veterinerlik yapm\u0131\u015f bulunan Mehmet Orhan Tolon dostumuzun biraz \u00f6nce bana telefonda iletti\u011fi baz\u0131 \u00f6nemli hususlar\u0131 sizlere de yaz\u0131p, dikkatinize sunmak istedim.\n1. T\u00fcrkiye\u2019deki \u015farbon salg\u0131n\u0131, \u015fu anda, bilinen ve tahmin edilen boyutlar\u0131n \u00e7ok \u00e7ok \u00fcst\u00fcnde ve ciddi bir durumdad\u0131r.\n2. Eve et ve et \u00fcr\u00fcnleri almay\u0131 durdurman\u0131n yan\u0131s\u0131ra, d\u0131\u015far\u0131da da yemek yenmemesi, eve sipari\u015f verilmemesi gerekmektedir.\n3. Et t\u00fcketimi yan\u0131s\u0131ra, en az onun kadar \u00f6nemli olarak, s\u00fct ve s\u00fct \u00fcr\u00fcnlerinde de dikkatli olunmas\u0131 gerekmektedir.\n4. \u00d6zellikle dondurma kesinlikle bu s\u0131n\u0131ftad\u0131r.\n5. Ayr\u0131ca, peynir, tereya\u011f\u0131 gibi \u00fcr\u00fcnler i\u00e7in de \u00f6zenli olmak gerekir.\n6. \u015earbon, hayvan d\u0131\u015f\u0131nda da bulundu\u011fu ortamda \u00e7ok uzun seneler ya\u015famakta imi\u015f. \u00d6rne\u011fin, 10 (on) senelik bir hayvan postundan, bir \u00e7ocu\u011fa bula\u015fma vakas\u0131n\u0131n ya\u015fand\u0131\u011f\u0131n\u0131 bile s\u00f6ylemekte Orhan Tolon arkada\u015f\u0131m\u0131z.\nDolay\u0131s\u0131yla, Orhan ile birlikte tekrar \u00f6zenli ve dikkatli olman\u0131z\u0131 hat\u0131rlat\u0131r\u0131z. Her daim sa\u011fl\u0131kl\u0131 g\u00fcnlerde olunuz.\nSelamlar ve sevgiler.\nTuncay Ako\u011flu\n  Dogrula.org\u2019un Surp P\u0131rgi\u00e7 Ermeni Hastanesi\u2019ndeki yetkiliden ald\u0131\u011f\u0131 bilgi ve a\u00e7\u0131klamaya g\u00f6re, s\u00f6z konusu iddia do\u011fru de\u011fildir.\nErmeni Hastanesi\u2019nin WhatsApp ihbar hatt\u0131 olan 0549 610 11 75 numaras\u0131na mesaj b\u0131rakt\u0131\u011f\u0131m\u0131zda, kar\u015f\u0131daki ki\u015fi taraf\u0131ndan \u015fu a\u00e7\u0131klama g\u00f6nderilmi\u015ftir:\n  WhatsApp ihbar hatt\u0131ndan bu konuya dair bilgi talep etti\u011finiz takdirde, bu a\u00e7\u0131klamay\u0131 mesaj olarak alman\u0131z m\u00fcmk\u00fcn.\nGerekli a\u00e7\u0131klamaya yaln\u0131zca WhatsApp ihbar hatt\u0131ndan ula\u015f\u0131labiliyor.\nKonuya Dair Bilgilendirme Maili\nDr. Tar\u0131k Turfan Taraf\u0131ndan Yap\u0131lan A\u00e7\u0131klama\n  A\u00e7\u0131klaman\u0131n ilgili b\u00f6l\u00fcmleri al\u0131nm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r, tamam\u0131na buradan ula\u015fabilirsiniz.\n\u201cMESAJ BANA WHATSAPP\u2019TAN GELDI. BILDI\u011eINIZ GIBI YA\u015eAYIN, MESAJDA YAZILANLAR KANITLANMI\u015e BILGILER DE\u011eIL. \u0130NSANLAR PANIK OLMU\u015e DURUMDA. BU VERILERIN DO\u011eRULU\u011eU KANITLANMAMI\u015e. \u0130NSANLAR KORKUYA VE PANI\u011eE KAPILMASIN VE ISTEDIKLERI GIBI YA\u015eASIN\u201d\n  Dola\u015f\u0131mda yer alan ve Dr.Tar\u0131k Turfan\u2019a ait oldu\u011fu iddi edilen s\u00f6z konusu mesaj ger\u00e7e\u011fi yans\u0131tmamaktad\u0131r.\nKaynak: https://surppirgic.com/\n[Toplam:5    Ortalama:5/5] Ermeni Hastanesi Ba\u015fhekim Yard\u0131mc\u0131s\u0131 Dr. Tar\u0131k Turfan\u2019dan Geldi\u011fi \u0130ddia Edilen WhatsApp Mesaj\u0131", "\u0130nsan v\u00fccudundaki b\u00fct\u00fcn damarlar\u0131n u\u00e7 uca eklendi\u011finde D\u00fcnya\u2019y\u0131 4 defa sarabilecek uzunlukta oldu\u011fu iddias\u0131 do\u011frudur.\nYeti\u015fkin bir insan\u0131n atardamarlar\u0131, damarlar\u0131 ve k\u0131lcal damarlar\u0131 u\u00e7 uca eklendi\u011fi zaman yakla\u015f\u0131k 100.000 mil, yani d\u00fcnyay\u0131 neredeyse d\u00f6rt kez saracak uzunluktad\u0131r.\n  100.000 mil, yakla\u015f\u0131k 160.934 km\u2019dir. D\u00fcnya\u2019n\u0131n \u00e7evresinin Ekvator\u2019dan ge\u00e7ecek \u015fekilde hesaplanan uzunlu\u011funun 40.075 km oldu\u011fu ger\u00e7e\u011fini g\u00f6z \u00f6n\u00fcne ald\u0131\u011f\u0131m\u0131zda, insan v\u00fccudunun toplam damar uzunlu\u011funun D\u00fcnya\u2019n\u0131n \u00e7evresinin uzunlu\u011fundan yakla\u015f\u0131k 4 kat fazla oldu\u011funu g\u00f6rebiliriz.\n  1888 y\u0131l\u0131ndan beri yay\u0131mlanmakta olan \u00fcnl\u00fc ABD dergisi National Geographic dergisinin yay\u0131mlad\u0131\u011f\u0131 videoda, insan v\u00fccudundaki b\u00fct\u00fcn damarlar\u0131n u\u00e7 uca eklendi\u011finde D\u00fcnya\u2019y\u0131 4 defa sarabilecek uzunlukta oldu\u011funu g\u00f6rmek m\u00fcmk\u00fcn.\nIf lined up, your blood vessels could wrap around the Earth 4 times. Learn more weird facts about your body: pic.twitter.com/w6X4MQPxcG\n\u2014 National Geographic (@NatGeo) December 10, 2016\n  Cildimizin her bir 6.5 santimetrekaresinde (1 in\u00e7 kare), v\u00fccut \u0131s\u0131s\u0131n\u0131n d\u00fczenlenmesi i\u015flevini g\u00f6ren, uzunlu\u011fu 4.5 metreye varan kan damarlar\u0131 bulunur. Damarlar v\u00fccudun kan\u0131n\u0131n yakla\u015f\u0131k y\u00fczde 65\u2018ini tutar.\n  Kaynaklar: kaynak1, kaynak2, kaynak3, kaynak4, kaynak5, kaynak6\nVideo oynat\u0131c\u0131\nhttps://dogrula.org/wp-content/uploads/2018/02/dogrula.org_.mp4\n00:00\n00:07\n[Toplam:5    Ortalama:5/5] V\u00fccudumuzdaki Damarlar Birbirine Eklendi\u011finde D\u00fcnya\u2019y\u0131 4 Kez Sarabilir \u0130ddias\u0131", "\u00c7al\u0131\u015fma s\u00fcresi, bir ki\u015finin \u00fccret kar\u015f\u0131l\u0131\u011f\u0131 emek harcad\u0131\u011f\u0131 s\u00fcreyi ifade eder.\nBir bireyin \u00fccretli emek harcad\u0131\u011f\u0131 zaman miktar\u0131, \u00e7al\u0131\u015fma zaman\u0131 olarak adland\u0131r\u0131l\u0131r.\nHer \u00fclke, vatanda\u015flar\u0131n\u0131n maksimum \u00e7al\u0131\u015fma saatlerini ve asgari dinlenme s\u00fcresini belirleyen yasalar koyarak d\u00fczenler. \u00dclkeler, \u00e7al\u0131\u015fanlar\u0131n \u00e7al\u0131\u015fma saatlerini g\u00fcn, hafta, ay veya y\u0131l ba\u015f\u0131na s\u0131n\u0131rland\u0131ran standart \u00e7al\u0131\u015fma saatleri belirlemi\u015ftir. D\u00fcnyadaki \u00e7o\u011fu \u00fclkede ortalama \u00e7al\u0131\u015fma saatleri haftada 40 ila 44 saat aras\u0131ndad\u0131r.\nBununla birlikte, baz\u0131 \u00fclkeler ortalamadan daha uzun \u00e7al\u0131\u015fma saatlerine sahiptir. Bu \u00fclkeler a\u015fa\u011f\u0131da incelenecektir.\nEn Y\u00fcksek \u00c7al\u0131\u015fma Saatlerine Sahip \u00dclkeler\nMeksika\u200a\u2014\u200aY\u0131lda 2246 Saat\nMeksika\u2019da, maksimum \u00e7al\u0131\u015fma saatlerinin haftada 48 saat olmas\u0131 yasa taraf\u0131ndan zorunlu k\u0131l\u0131nm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r. Yayg\u0131n olarak uygulanan \u00e7al\u0131\u015fma yasalar\u0131, \u00f6zel sekt\u00f6r \u00e7al\u0131\u015fanlar\u0131n\u0131n fazladan \u00fccret \u00f6demeden fazladan saatlerce \u00e7al\u0131\u015fabilece\u011fi anlam\u0131na gelir. Meksika\u2019da i\u015fsizlik korkusu ve i\u015fverenlerin \u00e7al\u0131\u015fanlara k\u00f6t\u00fc muamelesi vard\u0131r. Bu, bir\u00e7ok ki\u015finin neden 48 saatlik \u00e7al\u0131\u015fma haftas\u0131n\u0131 g\u00f6z ard\u0131 etti\u011fini ve kendilerini daha da zorlad\u0131\u011f\u0131n\u0131 a\u00e7\u0131klamaktad\u0131r.\nG\u00fcney Kore\u200a\u2014\u200aY\u0131lda 2113 Saat\nG\u00fcney Kore h\u00fck\u00fcmeti \u00e7al\u0131\u015fma saatlerini k\u0131saltmak; dinlenme ve bo\u015f zamanlar\u0131n\u0131 art\u0131rmak i\u00e7in \u00e7al\u0131\u015fmalar yapmaktad\u0131r. Haftada ortalama \u00e7al\u0131\u015fma saatleri, be\u015f i\u015f g\u00fcn\u00fc i\u00e7inde da\u011f\u0131t\u0131lan 40 saattir. H\u00fck\u00fcmet ayr\u0131ca \u015firketlerin haftada 12 saatten fazla ve hafta sonlar\u0131 16 saatten fazla talep etmelerini yasaklam\u0131\u015ft\u0131r. Yine 2013 y\u0131l\u0131nda h\u00fck\u00fcmet, resmi tatil g\u00fcnlerinin say\u0131s\u0131n\u0131 16\u2019ya \u00e7\u0131karm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r. Ancak, bu yasalar\u0131n hayata ge\u00e7irilmi\u015f olmas\u0131na ra\u011fmen, ortalama \u00e7al\u0131\u015fma saatleri y\u00fcksektir.\nYunanistan\u200a\u2014\u200aY\u0131lda 2042 Saat\nYunanistan, OECD\u2019ye g\u00f6re Avrupa\u2019n\u0131n en y\u00fcksek \u00e7al\u0131\u015fma saatlerine sahiptir. Yunanistan\u2019da g\u00fcnl\u00fck ortalama \u00e7al\u0131\u015fma saatleri, be\u015f g\u00fcnl\u00fck bir haftada 8 saattir. Eurostat\u2019a g\u00f6re, Yunanistan\u2019daki \u00e7al\u0131\u015fanlar, i\u015fyerinde haftada ortalama 42 saat ge\u00e7irmektedir. Bu, y\u0131lda ortalama 2042 saattir. Yunanistan\u2019daki mevcut ekonomik durum, fazla mesai saatleri i\u00e7in artan talebe katk\u0131da bulunmaktad\u0131r. Ancak, Yunanistan\u2019\u0131n g\u00f6zlemlenen 12 resmi tatil g\u00fcn\u00fc vard\u0131r ve \u00e7al\u0131\u015fma saatlerini bir \u00f6l\u00e7\u00fcde d\u00fc\u015f\u00fcrmektedir. Bununla birlikte, Yunanistan \u00e7al\u0131\u015fma saatleri bak\u0131m\u0131ndan hala \u00fc\u00e7\u00fcnc\u00fc en y\u00fcksek \u00fclkekonumundad\u0131r.\n\u015eili\u200a\u2014\u200aY\u0131lda 1988 Saat\n\u015eili\u2019deki \u00e7al\u0131\u015fma yasalar\u0131, \u00e7al\u0131\u015fma saatlerini alt\u0131 g\u00fcnl\u00fck bir haftada da\u011f\u0131t\u0131lmak \u00fczere 45 saat olarak \u015fart ko\u015fmaktad\u0131r. G\u00fcnde en fazla 10 saat \u00e7al\u0131\u015fmak normaldir (normal 8 saatlik ve 2 saatlik fazla mesai). \u00c7al\u0131\u015fanlar\u0131n\u0131 10 saatten daha uzun s\u00fcre \u00e7al\u0131\u015fmak zorunda b\u0131rakan i\u015fverenler, yasaya g\u00f6re cezaland\u0131r\u0131l\u0131r. H\u00fck\u00fcmet bu kurallar\u0131n uygulanmas\u0131n\u0131 sa\u011flamak i\u00e7in \u00e7al\u0131\u015fmaktad\u0131r. Bu kural yerli hizmet\u00e7iler ve bak\u0131c\u0131lar i\u00e7in ge\u00e7erli de\u011fildir. T\u00fcm h\u00fck\u00fcmet \u00e7abalar\u0131na ra\u011fmen, \u015eili hala OECD y\u0131ll\u0131k \u00e7al\u0131\u015fma s\u00fcresi bak\u0131m\u0131ndan y\u00fcksektedir.\nD\u00fcnyada \u00c7al\u0131\u015fma Saati \u0130statistikleri\nY\u0131llara g\u00f6re de\u011fi\u015fiklik g\u00f6steren verilerde, \u00e7al\u0131\u015fma saatlerinin en fazla oldu\u011fu \u00fclkelerin aras\u0131nda T\u00fcrkiye\u2019yi g\u00f6rmek m\u00fcmk\u00fcn.\nListenin tamam\u0131na buradan ula\u015fabilirsiniz.\n  Amerika Birle\u015fik Devletleri\u2019nde, i\u015f\u00e7i ba\u015f\u0131na \u00e7al\u0131\u015fma saati y\u0131ll\u0131k 1,779 saat iken, kom\u015fusu Kanada\u2019da toplam 1,691 saate ula\u015fmaktad\u0131r. Fransa\u2019daki insanlar y\u0131lda ortalama 1,482 saat \u00e7al\u0131\u015f\u0131rken, Almanya\u2019da bu rakam toplamda sadece 1,371 saattir.\n  Listenin tamam\u0131na buradan ula\u015fabilirsiniz.\nNot: \u0130statistiklerin kayna\u011f\u0131 Ekonomik \u0130\u015fbirli\u011fi ve Kalk\u0131nma \u00d6rg\u00fct\u00fcd\u00fcr (OECD).\nKaynaklar: Kaynak1, kaynak2, kaynak3, kaynak4\nVideo oynat\u0131c\u0131\nhttps://dogrula.org/wp-content/uploads/2018/02/dogrula.org_.mp4\n00:00\n00:07\n[Toplam:5    Ortalama:5/5] D\u00fcnyada \u00c7al\u0131\u015fma Saatleri", "Bekir Bica adl\u0131 bir sosyal medya kullan\u0131c\u0131s\u0131, Twitter payla\u015f\u0131m\u0131nda u\u00e7ak biletinin en ucuz oldu\u011fu \u00fclkelerden birinin T\u00fcrkiye oldu\u011funu iddia etmi\u015ftir.\nU\u00e7ak biletinin en ucuz oldu\u011fu \u00fclkelerden biri T\u00fcrkiye.\nBizden daha ucuz sadece 3 \u00fclke var.\n100 km i\u00e7in D\u00fcnya'daki bilet fiyatlar\u0131 \u015e\u00f6yle: pic.twitter.com/tACoSS77Ur\n\u2014 Bekir Bica (@bekirbica) June 14, 2018\n  2017 verilerine g\u00f6re, u\u00e7ak biletinin en ucuz oldu\u011fu \u00fclkelerden birinin T\u00fcrkiye oldu\u011fu iddias\u0131 do\u011frudur.\nAra\u015ft\u0131rmada d\u00fcnyan\u0131n en \u00e7ok ziyaret edilen 80 \u00fclkesinin k\u0131sa mesafeli ve uzun mesafeli u\u00e7u\u015flar\u0131 hesaba kat\u0131lm\u0131\u015f; bir milyonun \u00fczerinde seyahat i\u00e7in y\u00fcksek ve d\u00fc\u015f\u00fck sezonluk u\u00e7u\u015f maliyetlerini kullanarak, 100 km yolculuk ba\u015f\u0131na ortalama bir bilet maliyeti hesaplanm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r. T\u00fcm para birimi d\u00f6n\u00fc\u015f\u00fcmleri 25 Nisan 2017\u2019den itibaren yap\u0131lm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r.\nKiwi.com\u2019un 2017 U\u00e7u\u015f Fiyat Endeksi listesinin tamam\u0131na buradan ula\u015fabilirsiniz.\nD\u00fcnyada U\u00e7ak Biletinin En Ucuz Oldu\u011fu \u00dclkeler\nU\u00e7ak bileti \u00fccretleri g\u00fcne hatta saate g\u00f6re de\u011fi\u015febilir ve yak\u0131t fiyatlar\u0131ndan para birimi d\u00f6n\u00fc\u015ft\u00fcrme oranlar\u0131na kadar olan her \u015feydeki hareketler taraf\u0131ndan y\u00f6nlendirilir. Dolay\u0131s\u0131yla, giden u\u00e7u\u015flar\u0131n ortalama maliyeti \u00fclkeden \u00fclkeye \u00f6nemli \u00f6l\u00e7\u00fcde de\u011fi\u015febilmektedir.\nGOBankingRates, s\u00fcrekli dalgalanan bilet fiyatlar\u0131nda yolculara yard\u0131mc\u0131 olmak i\u00e7in Kiwi.com\u2019un 2017 U\u00e7u\u015f Fiyat Endeksi\u2019ne ba\u015fvurmu\u015ftur. U\u00e7u\u015f arama motoru \u015firketi, 80 \u00fclkede giden yolcu seyahatinin ortalama fiyat\u0131n\u0131 bulmak i\u00e7in 1 milyondan fazla u\u00e7u\u015fu analiz etmi\u015ftir. T\u00fcm u\u00e7u\u015f aramalar\u0131nda y\u00fcksek ve d\u00fc\u015f\u00fck mevsimler hesaba kat\u0131lm\u0131\u015f ve fiyatlarda ayn\u0131 seyahat tarihleri baz al\u0131nm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r.\n\u0130\u015fte 100 km ba\u015f\u0131na ortalama u\u00e7u\u015f maliyeti en d\u00fc\u015f\u00fck olan \u00fclkelerin 11\u2019den geriye do\u011fru yap\u0131lan s\u0131ralamas\u0131:\n11. G\u00fcney Afrika\n100 km ba\u015f\u0131na ortalama maliyet: 7,25 ABD dolar\u0131\n10. \u0130spanya\n100 km ba\u015f\u0131na ortalama maliyet: 7,08 ABD dolar\u0131\n9. \u0130sve\u00e7\n100 km ba\u015f\u0131na ortalama maliyet: 6,96 ABD dolar\u0131\n8. politikayla u\u011fra\u015fmaya devam ediyor ve sosyal medyay\u0131 da aktif \u015fekilde kullanarak g\u00fcncel olaylar hakk\u0131nda yorumlarda bulunuyor.\nBuradan Ahmedinejad\u2019\u0131n ziyaretine dair pek \u00e7ok foto\u011frafa ula\u015fmak m\u00fcmk\u00fcn.\nAhmedinejad ve Twitter\nS\u0131k\u0131 bir Twitter kullan\u0131c\u0131s\u0131 olan Ahmedinejad\u2019\u0131n ofisinden payla\u015ft\u0131\u011f\u0131 bu foto\u011fraf da onun Tahran\u2019da bulundu\u011funun ve \u00e7obanl\u0131k yapmad\u0131\u011f\u0131n\u0131n g\u00f6stergesi. Ahmedinejad twitinde, \u201cBug\u00fcn yo\u011fun bir g\u00fcn ge\u00e7irdim. Fakat Twitter i\u00e7in her zaman vakit ay\u0131r\u0131r\u0131m\u201d diyor.\nHad a busy day today . But I always make time for #Twitter pic.twitter.com/YDQ63xy6bk\n\u2014 Mahmoud Ahmadinejad (@Ahmadinejad1956) August 28, 2018\nAyr\u0131ca aktif bir Twitter kullan\u0131c\u0131s\u0131 olan Ahmedinejad\u2019\u0131n \u2018bio\u2019sunda onun kendisi hakk\u0131nda yazd\u0131klar\u0131n\u0131 g\u00f6rmek m\u00fcmk\u00fcn. Bunlar\u0131n aras\u0131nda ve Ahmedinejad\u2019\u0131n payla\u015ft\u0131\u011f\u0131 foto\u011fraflarda da \u201c\u00e7obanl\u0131k yapt\u0131\u011f\u0131na dair\u201d herhangi bir veriye rastlanm\u0131yor.\n  \u0130ran eski Cumhurba\u015fkan\u0131 Mahmoud Ahmedinejad\u2019\u0131n bir de web sitesi bulunuyor. Buradan da yak\u0131n tarihli pek \u00e7ok foto\u011frafa ula\u015f\u0131labiliyor.\nSitenin Twitter hesab\u0131 da mevcut, oradan da her g\u00fcn yap\u0131lan payla\u015f\u0131mlar\u0131 ve Ahmedinejad\u2019\u0131n en g\u00fcncel foto\u011fraflar\u0131n\u0131 g\u00f6rmek m\u00fcmk\u00fcn.\n    G\u00f6r\u00fcld\u00fc\u011f\u00fc gibi, \u0130ran\u2019\u0131n eski Cumhurba\u015fkan\u0131 k\u00f6y\u00fcnden \u00e7obanl\u0131k yapm\u0131yor, aksine politikayla u\u011fra\u015fmaya devam ediyor ve sosyal medyay\u0131 da aktif \u015fekilde kullanarak g\u00fcncel olaylar hakk\u0131nda yorumlarda bulunuyor.\nKaynakalar: kaynak1, kaynak2, kaynak3, kaynak4, kaynak5\n[Toplam:6    Ortalama:4.8/5] Ahmedinejad\u2019\u0131n K\u00f6y\u00fcnde \u00c7obanl\u0131k Yapt\u0131\u011f\u0131 \u0130ddias\u0131", "Cavbella_84 adl\u0131 Twitter kullan\u0131c\u0131s\u0131n\u0131n 30ARTI isimli hesaptan al\u0131nt\u0131lad\u0131\u011f\u0131; 3. havaliman\u0131 projesi kapsam\u0131nda ini\u015f-kalk\u0131\u015f yapan her u\u00e7ak i\u00e7in Bulgaristan\u2019a para \u00f6denece\u011fini iddia eden payla\u015f\u0131m\u0131, yakla\u015f\u0131k 4 bin kez be\u011fenildi ve yakla\u015f\u0131k 3 bin kez payla\u015f\u0131larak \u00e7ok say\u0131da etkile\u015fim ald\u0131.\n\u00dc\u00c7\u00dcNC\u00dc HAVAL\u0130MANINDA SKANDAL\n'\u0130ni\u015f-kalk\u0131\u015f yapan her u\u00e7ak i\u00e7in Bulgaristan'a para \u00f6denecek'\n'Hangi milli ve yerli planlaman\u0131n \u00fcr\u00fcn\u00fc?\u2026'\nBu millet Mustafa Kemal Atat\u00fcrk'e ve cumhuriyete olan d\u00fc\u015fmanl\u0131\u011f\u0131n\u0131n bedelini ileride \u00e7ok a\u011f\u0131r bedellerle \u00f6deyecek..\npic.twitter.com/vRorBXbiEX\n\u2014 Ilknur (@Cavbella_84) August 29, 2018\nBu iddialar\u0131n temeli, CHP Genel Ba\u015fkan Yard\u0131mc\u0131s\u0131 Gamze Akku\u015f \u0130lgezdi\u2019nin meclise sundu\u011fu soru \u00f6nergesiydi. \u0130lgezdi, 3. havaliman\u0131ndan kalkan u\u00e7aklar\u0131n, pistlerin do\u011frultusu nedeniyle Bulgaristan hava sahas\u0131n\u0131 kullanmak zorunda kalaca\u011f\u0131n\u0131 s\u00f6ylemi\u015fti.\nAncak, ini\u015f-kalk\u0131\u015f yapan her u\u00e7ak i\u00e7in Bulgaristan\u2019a para \u00f6denece\u011fi iddias\u0131 do\u011fru de\u011fildir.\nUla\u015ft\u0131rma ve Altyap\u0131 Bakanl\u0131\u011f\u0131ndan yap\u0131lan a\u00e7\u0131klamayla, s\u00f6z konusu iddia yalanlanm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r.\nUla\u015ft\u0131rma ve Altyap\u0131 Bakanl\u0131\u011f\u0131 \u0130lgezdi\u2019nin \u0130ddias\u0131n\u0131 Yalanlad\u0131\nUla\u015ft\u0131rma ve Altyap\u0131 Bakanl\u0131\u011f\u0131n\u0131n bas\u0131n a\u00e7\u0131klamas\u0131na y\u00f6nelik yapt\u0131\u011f\u0131 Twitter payla\u015f\u0131m\u0131:\n3. Havaliman\u0131 i\u00e7in Bulgaristan'a para \u00f6denece\u011fi iddias\u0131na yalanlama https://t.co/jhgQord6vl pic.twitter.com/aUWTyBraQ5\n\u2014 ANADOLU AJANSI (@anadoluajansi) August 30, 2018\n  Bas\u0131n a\u00e7\u0131klamas\u0131na buradan ula\u015fabilirsiniz.\n    A\u00e7\u0131klamada, \u201cHerhangi bir i\u00e7 hat u\u00e7u\u015funun Yeni Havaliman\u0131na ini\u015fi ya da kalk\u0131\u015f\u0131 i\u00e7in kullanaca\u011f\u0131 rotalar\u0131n tamam\u0131 \u00fclkemiz hava sahas\u0131 i\u00e7indedir. Herhangi bir i\u00e7 hat u\u00e7u\u015funun Bulgaristan, Romanya veya bir ba\u015fka \u00fclke hava sahas\u0131n\u0131 kullanmas\u0131 ve bunun kar\u015f\u0131l\u0131\u011f\u0131nda hazineden para \u00f6denmesi iddias\u0131 tamamen ger\u00e7ek d\u0131\u015f\u0131d\u0131r\u201d ifadesi yer alm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r.\nKaynaklar: kaynak1, kaynak2, kaynak3, kaynak4, kaynak5, kaynak6\nVideo oynat\u0131c\u0131\nhttps://dogrula.org/wp-content/uploads/2018/02/dogrula.org_.mp4\n00:00\n00:07\n[Toplam:6    Ortalama:4.7/5] 3. Havalimandan Kalkacak U\u00e7aklar \u0130\u00e7in Bulgaristan\u2019a Para \u00d6denece\u011fi \u0130ddias\u0131", "\u00c7irkin Anonim Profili adl\u0131 bir Twitter kullan\u0131c\u0131s\u0131 taraf\u0131ndan payla\u015f\u0131lan bu g\u00f6rselde, billboarddaki reklamda solda ba\u015f\u0131 a\u00e7\u0131k olarak aynaya bakan bir k\u0131z kendisini tesett\u00fcrl\u00fc bir doktor olarak g\u00f6r\u00fcyor.\nK\u0131zlar\u0131m\u0131z yar\u0131nlar\u0131m\u0131z. T\u00fcrgev k\u0131zlar\u0131n\u0131z\u0131 Bizim yurtlara yazd\u0131r\u0131n biz tesett\u00fcre sokar\u0131z yoksa ilerde ba\u015f\u0131 a\u00e7\u0131k yollu olurlar afi\u015fi bast\u0131rm\u0131\u015f pic.twitter.com/faypfyFCNU\n\u2014 \u00c7irkin Anonim Profili (@kaygisizhan) August 28, 2018\nS\u00f6z konusu iddia do\u011fru de\u011fildir; billboarddaki T\u00fcrgev reklam\u0131na ait oldu\u011fu ileri s\u00fcr\u00fclen g\u00f6rsel iki ayr\u0131 foto\u011fraf\u0131n birle\u015ftirilmesi, yani afi\u015fe tesett\u00fcrl\u00fc doktor foto\u011fraf\u0131n\u0131n montajlanmas\u0131yla olu\u015fturulmu\u015ftur.\n  T\u00fcrgev Vakf\u0131\u2019n\u0131n resmi web sitesinde de g\u00f6r\u00fcld\u00fc\u011f\u00fc \u00fczere, ba\u015f\u0131 a\u00e7\u0131k olan k\u0131z bir aynada kendisini ba\u015f\u0131 a\u00e7\u0131k bir ressam olarak g\u00f6r\u00fcyor.\nBillboarddaki Ger\u00e7ek Reklam G\u00f6rselleri\nKa\u011f\u0131thane Belediyesi billboard\u0131ndaki tesett\u00fcrl\u00fc k\u0131z\u0131n afi\u015fi \u015f\u00f6yle:\nT\u00fcrgev Vakf\u0131 Reklamlar\u0131ndaki Foto\u011fraflar\u0131n Asl\u0131\nT\u00fcrgev Vakf\u0131 web sitesinden talep ederek ula\u015ft\u0131\u011f\u0131m\u0131z g\u00f6rseller \u015f\u00f6yle:\n  G\u00f6r\u00fcld\u00fc\u011f\u00fc \u00fczere, s\u00f6z konusu iddiada iki ayr\u0131 foto\u011fraftaki k\u0131z tek g\u00f6rselde birle\u015ftirilmi\u015f. Yani T\u00fcrgev Vakf\u0131 billboard reklam\u0131na ait s\u00f6z konusu iddia ger\u00e7e\u011fi yans\u0131tm\u0131yor; g\u00f6rsel bir photoshop \u00fcr\u00fcn\u00fc.\nKaynaklar: kaynak1, kaynak2\nVideo oynat\u0131c\u0131\nhttps://dogrula.org/wp-content/uploads/2018/02/dogrula.org_.mp4\n00:00\n00:07\n[Toplam:5    Ortalama:4.8/5] T\u00fcrgev Reklam\u0131nda Ba\u015f\u0131 A\u00e7\u0131k Bir K\u0131z\u0131n Aynada Tesett\u00fcrl\u00fc Olarak G\u00f6sterildi\u011fi \u0130ddias\u0131", "Cesur Y\u00fcrek Fatih Portakal adl\u0131 Facebook sayfas\u0131nda yap\u0131lan bu payla\u015f\u0131m, binlerce yorum ald\u0131 ve yakla\u015f\u0131k 900 kez payla\u015f\u0131ld\u0131. S\u00f6z konusu g\u00f6rselde yer alan, h\u0131rs\u0131zl\u0131kta d\u00fcnya 3.\u2019s\u00fc, yolsuzlukta d\u00fcnya 2.\u2019si, r\u00fc\u015fvette d\u00fcnya 1,\u2019si oldu\u011fumuz iddias\u0131 do\u011fru de\u011fildir.\nD\u00fcnya \u00e7ap\u0131ndaki ara\u015ft\u0131rma \u015firketleri taraf\u0131ndan yap\u0131lan istatistikler incelendi\u011finde, T\u00fcrkiye\u2019nin h\u0131rs\u0131zl\u0131kta d\u00fcnya 3.\u2019s\u00fc, yolsuzlukta d\u00fcnya 2.\u2019si, r\u00fc\u015fvette d\u00fcnya 1,\u2019si oldu\u011fu bilgisine rastlanmamaktad\u0131r.\nD\u00dcNYA HIRSIZLIK, YOLSUZLUK ve R\u00dc\u015eVET \u0130STAT\u0130ST\u0130KLER\u0130\n\u00dclkeler Baz\u0131nda H\u0131rs\u0131zl\u0131k ve Soygun Oranlar\u0131\nA\u015fa\u011f\u0131da yer alan g\u00f6rseldeki The Global Economy \u00fclkeler baz\u0131nda h\u0131rs\u0131zl\u0131k istatisti\u011finde, en fazla h\u0131rs\u0131zl\u0131k olaylar\u0131n\u0131n ya\u015fand\u0131\u011f\u0131 33 \u00fclke listelenmi\u015ftir; fakat T\u00fcrkiye bu listede yer almam\u0131\u015ft\u0131r.\n    Ayn\u0131 kaynakta T\u00fcrkiye\u2019nin yer ald\u0131\u011f\u0131 b\u00f6lgeyi spesifik olarak aratt\u0131\u011f\u0131n\u0131zda da kar\u015f\u0131n\u0131za T\u00fcrkiye \u00e7\u0131kmayacakt\u0131r.\n  Knoema\u2019n\u0131n web sitesinde yer alan World Data Atlas h\u0131rs\u0131zl\u0131k oranlar\u0131 istatisti\u011finde de detayl\u0131 tarama yap\u0131ld\u0131\u011f\u0131nda ilk 62 \u00fclke aras\u0131nda yer almayanT\u00fcrkiye\u2019ye, listenin alt s\u0131ralar\u0131nda rastlamak m\u00fcmk\u00fcn. T\u00fcrkiye bu listede 93.s\u0131rada.\nYaln\u0131zca ilgili b\u00f6l\u00fcmlerin ekran g\u00f6r\u00fcnt\u00fcs\u00fcn\u00fc ald\u0131\u011f\u0131m\u0131z listenin tamam\u0131na buradan ula\u015fabilirsiniz.\n  H\u0131rs\u0131zl\u0131k vakas\u0131n\u0131n her 100. 000 ki\u015fi i\u00e7inden 13.8 oldu\u011fu T\u00fcrkiye\u2019nin grafi\u011fi a\u015fa\u011f\u0131daki gibidir.\n  110 \u00fclkenin listelendi\u011fi ayn\u0131 istatistik sitesinde yer alan d\u00fcnya soygun oranlar\u0131nda T\u00fcrkiye 75. s\u0131rada yer al\u0131yor.\nYaln\u0131zca ilgili b\u00f6l\u00fcmlerin ekran g\u00f6r\u00fcnt\u00fcs\u00fcn\u00fc ald\u0131\u011f\u0131m\u0131z listenin tamam\u0131na buradan ula\u015fabilirsiniz.\n  A\u015fa\u011f\u0131da yer alan g\u00f6rseldeki World Bank \u00fclkeler baz\u0131nda su\u00e7 ve h\u0131rs\u0131zl\u0131k istatisti\u011finde, T\u00fcrkiye\u2019nin 144 \u00fclke aras\u0131nda 109. oldu\u011funu g\u00f6rmek m\u00fcmk\u00fcn.\n    Actualitix istatistik sitesindeki Birle\u015fmi\u015f Milletler Uyu\u015fturucu ve Su\u00e7 Ofisi\u2019nin (UNODC) g\u00fcncel verilerine g\u00f6re, T\u00fcrkiye soygunda ilk 10\u2019da yer alm\u0131yor.\n    108 \u00fclkenin bulundu\u011fu listede T\u00fcrkiye 59. s\u0131rada yer al\u0131yor.\n    Listede T\u00fcrkiye\u2019den bildirilen soygun vakas\u0131 her 100. 000 ki\u015fi i\u00e7inden 161,5iken, ilk s\u0131rada yer alan Hollanda\u2019da bu rakam her 100.000 ki\u015fi i\u00e7inden 1.720.\n  \u00dclkeler Baz\u0131nda Yolsuzluk ve R\u00fc\u015fvet Oranlar\u0131\nTransparency International\u2019\u0131n web sitesinde yer alan, 180 \u00fclke ve b\u00f6lgeyi kapsayan endeks, 0 ile 100 aras\u0131nda bir \u00f6l\u00e7ek kullan\u0131yor. Buna g\u00f6re, \u00fclkeye verilen puan ne kadar y\u00fcksekse, yolsuzluk oran\u0131 o kadar az.\nListede 1. s\u0131rada yer alan Yeni Zelanda\u2019n\u0131n puan\u0131 100 \u00fczerinden 89 iken, T\u00fcrkiye\u2019nin puan\u0131 100 \u00fczerinden 40.\nAyr\u0131ca rapor, \u00fclkelerin \u00e7o\u011funlu\u011funun yolsuzlu\u011fun sona ermesi konusunda \u00e7ok az ilerleme kaydetti\u011fini ya da hi\u00e7 ilerleme kaydetmedi\u011fini vurguluyor.\nTransparency International\u2019\u0131n web sitesindeki, Yolsuzluk Endexi 2017\u2018de yer alan \u00fclkeler baz\u0131nda yolsuzluk istatisti\u011finde T\u00fcrkiye 180 \u00fclke aras\u0131nda 81. s\u0131rada yer al\u0131yor.\n    Listede yolsuzlu\u011fun en az yap\u0131ld\u0131\u011f\u0131 \u00fclkeden en \u00e7ok yap\u0131ld\u0131\u011f\u0131 \u00fclkeye do\u011fru bir s\u0131ralama yap\u0131lm\u0131\u015f.\n  Statista\u2019n\u0131n istatisti\u011fine bakt\u0131\u011f\u0131m\u0131zda da, yolsuzluk endeksinde T\u00fcrkiye\u2019nin ilk 10 aras\u0131nda dahi olmad\u0131\u011f\u0131n\u0131 g\u00f6rmek m\u00fcmk\u00fcn.\n  Ayn\u0131 \u015fekilde d\u00fcnyada yolsuzlu\u011fun en fazla yap\u0131ld\u0131\u011f\u0131 \u00fclkeleri listeleyen Ranker istatistik sayfas\u0131nda da T\u00fcrkiye\u2019nin s\u0131ralamas\u0131 mevcut.\n  Sayfada T\u00fcrkiye 97. s\u0131rada yer al\u0131yor.\n  U.S. News en fazla r\u00fc\u015fvet ve yolsuzluk yap\u0131lan \u00fclkeler istatisti\u011finde de T\u00fcrkiye ilk s\u0131ralarda yer alm\u0131yor.\nD\u00fcnyan\u0131n en \u00f6nde gelen i\u015f dergilerinden olan Forbes\u2019in haberinde de T\u00fcrkiye\u2019nin yolsuzluk istatisti\u011findeki s\u0131ralamas\u0131n\u0131 g\u00f6rmek m\u00fcmk\u00fcn.\n  Trading Economics web sitesinde yer alan, G20 \u00fclkelerinin s\u0131ralamas\u0131n\u0131n verildi\u011fi ayr\u0131nt\u0131l\u0131 listede, T\u00fcrkiye\u2019nin bir \u00f6nceki y\u0131la g\u00f6re hanesine 6 puan ekledi\u011fini g\u00f6r\u00fcyoruz. Bu durum az da olsa bir ilerleme kaydedildi\u011fini g\u00f6steriyor.\n  Pek \u00e7ok ara\u015ft\u0131rma \u015firketinin d\u00fcnya \u00e7ap\u0131nda ge\u00e7erlili\u011fi olan verileri incelendi\u011finde, h\u0131rs\u0131zl\u0131kta d\u00fcnya 3.\u2019s\u00fc, yolsuzlukta d\u00fcnya 2.\u2019si, r\u00fc\u015fvette d\u00fcnya 1,\u2019si oldu\u011fumuz iddias\u0131n\u0131n do\u011fru olmad\u0131\u011f\u0131n\u0131 g\u00f6rebiliriz.\nKaynaklar: kaynak1, kaynak2, kaynak3, kaynak4, kaynak5, kaynak6, kaynak7, kaynak8, kaynak9, kaynak10, kaynak11, kaynak12, kaynak13, kaynak14, Yolsuzlukta D\u00fcnya 2.\u2019si, R\u00fc\u015fvette D\u00fcnya 1.\u2019si Oldu\u011fumuz \u0130ddias\u0131", "Dogrula.org\u2019a ihbar olarak g\u00f6nderilen, kullan\u0131c\u0131lara WhatsApp\u2019tan gelen bu g\u00f6rseldeki a\u00e7\u0131klaman\u0131n \u0130stanbul \u0130l Emniyet M\u00fcd\u00fcr\u00fc Mustafa \u00c7al\u0131\u015fkan\u2019a ait oldu\u011fu iddias\u0131 do\u011fru de\u011fildir.\nYaz\u0131, \u0130stanbul \u0130l Emniyet Genel M\u00fcd\u00fcr\u00fc Mustafa \u00c7al\u0131\u015fkan\u2019\u0131n de\u011fil, Hac ve Umre Seyahat Acentalar\u0131 Derne\u011fi (HURSAD) Ba\u015fkan Yard\u0131mc\u0131s\u0131 Muharrem G\u00fcldemir\u2019in, devlete destek amac\u0131yla yapt\u0131\u011f\u0131 bas\u0131n a\u00e7\u0131klamas\u0131ndan.\nG\u00fcldemir, Ba\u015fkan Recep Tayyip Erdo\u011fan\u2019\u0131n yapt\u0131\u011f\u0131 \u00e7a\u011fr\u0131 do\u011frultusunda, dolarla yapt\u0131klar\u0131 hac ve umre programlar\u0131n\u0131 iptal ederek, ellerinden geldi\u011fince sald\u0131r\u0131lar kar\u015f\u0131s\u0131nda devlete destek olacaklar\u0131n\u0131 belirtmi\u015ftir.\nBir k\u0131sm\u0131 de\u011fi\u015ftirlerek Emniyet Genel M\u00fcd\u00fcr\u00fcn\u00fcn a\u00e7\u0131klamas\u0131 oldu\u011fu s\u00f6ylenen ve asl\u0131nda G\u00fcldemir\u2019e ait olan a\u00e7\u0131klaman\u0131n asl\u0131 \u015f\u00f6yle:\nhttps://t.co/4URwSucKoA\n\u2014 MUHARREM G\u00dcLDEM\u0130R (@GULDEMIR) August 16, 2018\n\u201cBedelini hep beraber \u00f6deyece\u011fimiz, adeta ekonomi sava\u015f\u0131 verdi\u011fimiz bu s\u00fcre\u00e7te kar\u015f\u0131 akt\u00f6rlerin \u00fclkemize taarruzlar\u0131ndan biri olan ekonomimizi \u00e7\u00f6kertme ama\u00e7l\u0131 olarak yapt\u0131klar\u0131 ve T\u00fcrk liras\u0131n\u0131 de\u011fersizle\u015ftirme operasyonunda hepimiz, g\u00fcc\u00fcm\u00fcz yetti\u011fi ve elimizden geldi\u011fi kadar devletimizin yan\u0131nda olmal\u0131y\u0131z. G\u00fcn birlik olma g\u00fcn\u00fcd\u00fcr.\u201d\n\u201cCumhurba\u015fkan\u0131m\u0131z\u0131n yapm\u0131\u015f oldu\u011fu \u00e7a\u011fr\u0131 do\u011frultusunda dolarla yapm\u0131\u015f oldu\u011fumuz hac ve umre programlar\u0131m\u0131z\u0131 iptal ederek, kar\u0131nca karar\u0131nca elimizden geldi\u011fi kadar bu sald\u0131r\u0131lar kar\u015f\u0131s\u0131nda devletimize destek olaca\u011f\u0131z. Bundan sonraki programlar\u0131m\u0131z uzman turizm ve hac ve umre firmalar\u0131 olarak, para birimimiz T\u00fcrk Liras\u0131 baz al\u0131narak yap\u0131lacakt\u0131r. Gerekirse bir y\u0131l boyunca hac ve umre programlar\u0131m\u0131z\u0131 durdurabiliriz. Bu konuda t\u00fcm sekt\u00f6rleri duyarl\u0131 olmaya davet ediyoruz. Her daim devletimizin ve T\u00fcrkiye Cumhurba\u015fkan\u0131m\u0131z Recep Tayyip Erdo\u011fan\u2019\u0131n yan\u0131nday\u0131z.\u201d\nBu a\u00e7\u0131klamaya, (HURSAD) Ba\u015fkan Yard\u0131mc\u0131s\u0131 Muharrem G\u00fcldemir\u2019in Twitter hesab\u0131ndan ve y\u00f6nlendirdi\u011fi haber linkinden ula\u015fmak m\u00fcmk\u00fcn.\nA\u00e7\u0131klamada yer alan baz\u0131 ifadelerin benzer olmas\u0131, asl\u0131nda yaz\u0131n\u0131n kopya edildi\u011fini ve \u0130stanbul \u0130l Emniyet M\u00fcd\u00fcr\u00fc Mustafa \u00c7al\u0131\u015fkan\u2019a ait oldu\u011fu iddia edilen a\u00e7\u0131klaman\u0131n ger\u00e7e\u011fi yans\u0131tmad\u0131\u011f\u0131n\u0131 g\u00f6stermi\u015ftir. \u0130ki a\u00e7\u0131lamadan ayn\u0131 olan c\u00fcmleler \u015f\u00f6yle:\nDevlete destek olmak ama\u00e7l\u0131 bas\u0131n a\u00e7\u0131klamas\u0131 yapan Mustafa G\u00fcldemir\u2019in konu ile ilgili \u00e7a\u011fr\u0131 yapt\u0131\u011f\u0131 ba\u015fka Twitter payla\u015f\u0131mlar\u0131 da mevcut:\nArt\u0131k dolara son herdaim devletimizin yan\u0131nda yapaca\u011f\u0131z..T\u00fcm Abd \u00fcr\u00fcnlerine hep beraber boykotta olacaz #BoycottUsa pic.twitter.com/OfQrHdIudf\n\u2014 MUHARREM G\u00dcLDEM\u0130R (@GULDEMIR) August 15, 2018\n  Ayr\u0131ca, \u0130stanbul \u0130l Emniyet M\u00fcd\u00fcrl\u00fc\u011f\u00fc web sitesi incelendi\u011finde, s\u00f6z konusu iddiaya ait bir bas\u0131n a\u00e7\u0131klamas\u0131na rastlanmam\u0131\u015ft\u0131r.\nKaynaklar: kaynak1, kaynak2, kaynak3, kaynak4\nVideo oynat\u0131c\u0131\nhttps://dogrula.org/wp-content/uploads/2018/02/dogrula.org_.mp4\n00:00\n00:07\n[Toplam:2    Ortalama:5/5] \u0130stanbul \u0130l Emniyet M\u00fcd\u00fcr\u00fc\u2019n\u00fcn Yapt\u0131\u011f\u0131 \u0130ddia Edilen\u00a0A\u00e7\u0131klama", "Bu sabah dogrula.org\u2019a gelen bir ihbar mesaj\u0131nda, kullan\u0131c\u0131lara sabah saatlerinde PKK ter\u00f6r \u00f6rg\u00fct\u00fcn\u00fcn propagandas\u0131n\u0131 yapan b\u00f6yle bir mesaj geldi\u011fi iddia edildi. \u201cMersin153\u201d olarak \u0130nternet ortamlar\u0131nda da yay\u0131lan mesaj\u0131n pek \u00e7ok ki\u015fiye g\u00f6nderildi\u011fi \u00f6\u011frenildi.\nMesajda \u201cKomutan Agit\u2019le baslayan 15 Agustos dirilis bayramimiz kurtulus ve zafer bayramina d\u00f6n\u00fcsecektir. Bug\u00fcn K\u00fcrdistan\u2019da Agit\u2019lesen milyonlar en b\u00fcy\u00fck intikam\u2019in sahibi olacaklardir. Kahrolsun Fasizm, Yasasin 15 Agustos ruhu, Yasasin \u00d6nder APO, Yasasin PKK\u2026 AriHackTeam Kurdish Hackers B002\u201d ifadeleri yer ald\u0131.\nMersin B\u00fcy\u00fck\u015fehir Belediyesi\u2019nin A\u00e7\u0131klamas\u0131\nKonunun ard\u0131ndan Mersin B\u00fcy\u00fck\u015fehir Belediyesi mesajda kullan\u0131lan 153 k\u0131sm\u0131n\u0131n belediyeye ait 444 2 153 hatt\u0131 ile benzerli\u011fi nedeniyle Twitter hesab\u0131ndan a\u00e7\u0131klama yapt\u0131.\nBelediye, propaganda i\u00e7erikli s\u00f6z konusu SMS\u2019in Mersin B\u00fcy\u00fck\u015fehir Belediyesi ve SMS paneliyle ilgisi olmad\u0131\u011f\u0131n\u0131 ifade etti.\nGece 04.00-04.30 saatleri aras\u0131nda MERS\u0130N153 kullan\u0131c\u0131 ad\u0131yla vatanda\u015flar\u0131m\u0131za SMS atarak yasa d\u0131\u015f\u0131 ter\u00f6r \u00f6rg\u00fct\u00fc propagandas\u0131 yapan grubun ve s\u00f6z konusu propaganda i\u00e7erikli SMS\u2019in Mersin B\u00fcy\u00fck\u015fehir Belediyesi ve SMS panelimizle herhangi bir ilgisi yoktur. Bilginize. pic.twitter.com/LzyVHAaroD\n\u2014 Mersin B\u00fcy\u00fck\u015fehir Belediyesi (@mersin_bld) August 16, 2018\nSistemlerin Sald\u0131r\u0131ya U\u011fram\u0131\u015f Olmas\u0131\nDogrula.org\u2019un ilgili operat\u00f6r \u015firketinden ald\u0131\u011f\u0131 bilgiye g\u00f6re, 16 A\u011fustos Per\u015fembe g\u00fcn\u00fc sabaha kar\u015f\u0131 toplu Sms hizmeti verilen bir \u00e7\u00f6z\u00fcm orta\u011f\u0131 olan X (isim gizli tutuluyor) isimli \u015firketin uhdesinde olan sistemlerden 9 milyon numaraya ter\u00f6r \u00f6rg\u00fct\u00fc PKK propogandas\u0131 i\u00e7eren ve g\u00f6ndericisi Mersin Belediyesi olarak g\u00f6r\u00fcnen tek bir SMS g\u00f6nderilmi\u015ftir. G\u00f6nderilen Sms 4 milyonu a\u015fk\u0131n aboneye ula\u015fm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r. \u00c7\u00f6z\u00fcm orta\u011f\u0131ndan sistemlerinin sald\u0131r\u0131ya u\u011frad\u0131\u011f\u0131 ve bu i\u015flemin kontrolleri d\u0131\u015f\u0131nda ger\u00e7ekle\u015ftirildi\u011fi bilgisi verilmi\u015ftir. \u0130lk olarak ilgili firman\u0131n eri\u015fim yetkileri engellenmi\u015ftir. Konu ile ilgili inceleme ve ara\u015ft\u0131rmalar devam etmektedir.\n  Mersin Belediyesi, siber g\u00fcvenlik uzmanlar\u0131 ile emniyet g\u00fc\u00e7lerinin konuyla ilgili gerekli \u00e7al\u0131\u015fmalar\u0131 y\u00fcr\u00fctt\u00fc\u011f\u00fcn\u00fc a\u00e7\u0131klam\u0131\u015ft\u0131r.\nVideo oynat\u0131c\u0131\nhttps://dogrula.org/wp-content/uploads/2018/02/dogrula.org_.mp4\n00:00\n00:07\n  [Toplam:3    Ortalama:4.3/5] \u201cMersin 153\u201d Ad\u0131yla At\u0131lan SMS\u00a0\u0130ddias\u0131", "Odatv web sitesinde bug\u00fcn \u201cCumhurba\u015fkanl\u0131\u011f\u0131 sistemine ge\u00e7ti Atat\u00fcrk\u2019\u00fc kald\u0131rd\u0131\u201d man\u015fetiyle, \u201cCumhurba\u015fkanl\u0131\u011f\u0131 Kararnamesi ile kurulan Strateji ve B\u00fct\u00e7e Ba\u015fkanl\u0131\u011f\u0131\u2019n\u0131n sitesinde tart\u0131\u015fma yaratacak bir geli\u015fme ya\u015fand\u0131\u201d ifadelerine yer veren bir haber yer ald\u0131. Ayn\u0131 haberi Cumhuriyet gazetesi de web sitesine ta\u015f\u0131d\u0131.\nOdatv web sitesinde yer alan s\u00f6z konusu iddia do\u011fru de\u011fildir.\n\u201cSitenin 12 A\u011fustos g\u00fcnk\u00fc sayfas\u0131nda ise Atat\u00fcrk\u2019\u00fcn yer ald\u0131\u011f\u0131 fark edilirken, foto\u011fraf\u0131n yeni kald\u0131r\u0131ld\u0131\u011f\u0131 anla\u015f\u0131ld\u0131\u201d yaz\u0131s\u0131yla Odatv web sitesinde yer verilen, T.C. Cumhurba\u015fkanl\u0131\u011f\u0131 Strateji ve B\u00fct\u00e7e Ba\u015fkanl\u0131\u011f\u0131 sitesinde yer ald\u0131\u011f\u0131 s\u00f6ylenen Atat\u00fcrk resmi sayfaya montajlanm\u0131\u015f.\n\u201c\u0130\u015fte 12 A\u011fustos tarihinde Atat\u00fcrk foto\u011frafl\u0131 site\u201d ba\u015fl\u0131\u011f\u0131yla payla\u015f\u0131lan ve men\u00fc \u00e7ubu\u011funun \u00fczerine ta\u015fm\u0131\u015f olan bu foto\u011fraf, photoshop tekni\u011fi kullan\u0131larak olu\u015fturulmu\u015f.\nOdatv haberin devam\u0131nda \u201c\u0130\u015fte Atat\u00fcrk\u2019\u00fc kald\u0131rd\u0131ktan sonra o site\u201dba\u015fl\u0131\u011f\u0131yla ba\u015fka bir foto\u011fraf daha payla\u015ft\u0131. Ancak bu g\u00f6rsel de ger\u00e7e\u011fi yans\u0131tm\u0131yor.\nT.C. Cumhurba\u015fkanl\u0131\u011f\u0131 Strateji ve B\u00fct\u00e7e Ba\u015fkanl\u0131\u011f\u0131 web sitesi\nAyn\u0131 g\u00f6r\u00fcnt\u00fc T.C. Cumhurba\u015fkanl\u0131\u011f\u0131 Strateji ve B\u00fct\u00e7e Ba\u015fkanl\u0131\u011f\u0131 sitesinde Atat\u00fcrk foto\u011fraf\u0131yla yer al\u0131yor:\n  Odatv haberini kopyalayarak web sitesine ta\u015f\u0131yan Cumhuriyet de ayn\u0131 montajl\u0131 g\u00f6rsellere yer verdi ve as\u0131ls\u0131z olan s\u00f6z konusu iddiay\u0131 haber yapt\u0131.\nAyr\u0131ca, Cumhuriyet\u2019in Atat\u00fcrk foto\u011fraf\u0131n\u0131n kald\u0131r\u0131ld\u0131\u011f\u0131n\u0131 iddia ederek link verdi\u011fi sayfa da kullan\u0131c\u0131lar\u0131 Cumhurba\u015fkanl\u0131\u011f\u0131 Strateji ve B\u00fct\u00e7e Ba\u015fkanl\u0131\u011f\u0131 sitesine y\u00f6nlendirmiyor. Yani iddia edilen s\u00f6z konusu sayfay\u0131 g\u00f6rmek m\u00fcmk\u00fcn de\u011fil, \u00e7\u00fcnk\u00fc Cumhurba\u015fkanl\u0131\u011f\u0131 Strateji ve B\u00fct\u00e7e Ba\u015fkanl\u0131\u011f\u0131 sitesine dair b\u00f6yle bir g\u00f6r\u00fcnt\u00fc kaydedilmemi\u015f.\nS\u00f6z konusu linke t\u0131klad\u0131\u011f\u0131n\u0131zda, yine Cumhuriyet\u2019in sayfas\u0131na y\u00f6nlendiriliyorsunuz:\n  Odatv ve Cumhuriyet gazetesi haberlerinde yer alan iddia do\u011fru de\u011fidir.\nKaynaklar: kaynak1, kaynak2, kaynak3\nVideo oynat\u0131c\u0131\nhttps://dogrula.org/wp-content/uploads/2018/02/dogrula.org_.mp4\n00:00\n00:07\n[Toplam:1    Ortalama:5/5] Odatv\u2019nin Cumhurba\u015fkanl\u0131\u011f\u0131 Sistemine Ge\u00e7ti Atat\u00fcrk\u2019\u00fc Kald\u0131rd\u0131 \u0130ddias\u0131", "Nev\u015fin Meng\u00fc\u2019n\u00fcn A\u00e7 Kal\u0131r\u0131z Ama Reisimizin Arkas\u0131nda Dururuz Dedi\u011fi \u0130ddias\u0131 ba\u015fl\u0131kl\u0131 i\u00e7eri\u011fimizde, televizyon habercisi ve sunucusu olan Nev\u015fin Meng\u00fc\u2019n\u00fcn bir videoda ge\u00e7en s\u00f6ylemlerini inceledik. \u0130ddiaya g\u00f6re Nev\u015fin Meng\u00fc, kendi sundu\u011fu \u201cNev\u015fin Meng\u00fc ile Bire Bir\u201d isimli programda, \u201cKarde\u015fim ne ise ne, dolar isterse 8 lira olsun. Amerika bizim reisimize operasyon \u00e7ekiyor biz de sonuna kadar reisimizin arkas\u0131nda duraca\u011f\u0131z. A\u00e7 kalmak gerekiyorsa anas\u0131n\u0131 satay\u0131m ben de a\u00e7 kal\u0131r\u0131m.\u201d dedi\u011fi iddia edilmi\u015ftir. Ancak bu iddia do\u011fru de\u011fildir. \n#FazlaS\u00f6zeGerekYok\nNev\u015fin Meng\u00fc\u2019den hi\u00e7 beklenmedik davran\u0131\u015f:))\nGerekti\u011finde milli duru\u015f nedir \u00f6\u011frenin Kemalistler!\nErdo\u011fan\u2019\u0131n yan\u0131nday\u0131m \u00e7\u0131k\u0131\u015f\u0131 pic.twitter.com/hZfhrwVjQX\n\u2014 hulya yurt (@hulyayurt_) August 9, 2018\nSon g\u00fcnlerde dolar\u0131n h\u0131zla y\u00fckselmesinin ard\u0131ndan, sosyal medyada dolar ve ekonomiyle alakal\u0131 bir\u00e7ok payla\u015f\u0131m yap\u0131lm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r. S\u00f6z konusu video, sosyal medyada \u00e7ok fazla payla\u015f\u0131lm\u0131\u015f ve etkile\u015fim alm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r. Nev\u015fin Meng\u00fc\u2019n\u00fcn dolarla ilgili tepkisini dile getirdi\u011finin iddia edildi\u011fi video, trol ama\u00e7l\u0131 olu\u015fturulmu\u015f bir videodur ve Nev\u015fin Meng\u00fc\u2019n\u00fcn kendi s\u00f6ylemlerini yans\u0131tmamaktad\u0131r. \nNev\u015fin Meng\u00fc, Dw T\u00fcrk\u00e7e isimli kanalda sundu\u011fu \u201cNev\u015fin Meng\u00fc ile Bire Bir\u201d adl\u0131 program\u0131nda, T\u00fcrkiye ekonomisinin gidi\u015fat\u0131n\u0131 de\u011ferlendirmek \u00fczere ekonomist Atilla Ye\u015filada\u2019y\u0131 davet etmi\u015ftir. 17 Temmuz 2018 tarihinde yap\u0131lan programda, T\u00fcrkiye ekonomisi \u00fczerinde \u00e7e\u015fitli de\u011ferlendirmeler yap\u0131lm\u0131\u015f ve sonras\u0131nda Nev\u015fin Meng\u00fc, genel olarak insanlardan g\u00f6rd\u00fc\u011f\u00fc s\u00f6ylemleri dile getirmi\u015ftir.\nA\u015fa\u011f\u0131daki videoda, 17 Temmuz 2018 tarihinde yap\u0131lan programda konuyla ilgili tart\u0131\u015fma sonras\u0131nda Nev\u015fin Meng\u00fc, iddiada bahsi ge\u00e7en s\u00f6ylemleri \u00f6rnek vererek s\u00f6ylemi\u015ftir:\nProgram\u0131n tamam\u0131 izlendi\u011finde, Nev\u015fin Meng\u00fc\u2019n\u00fcn \u201cKarde\u015fim ne ise ne, dolar isterse 8 lira olsun. Amerika bizim reisimize operasyon \u00e7ekiyor biz de sonuna kadar reisimizin arkas\u0131nda duraca\u011f\u0131z\u201d \u015feklinde s\u00f6yledi\u011fi iddia edilen c\u00fcmlelerin videonun orijinal halinden kesilerek olu\u015fturuldu\u011fu g\u00f6r\u00fclebilmektedir.\nKaynaklar: Dw T\u00fcrk\u00e7e, Youtube, Twitter\nVideo oynat\u0131c\u0131\n00:00\n00:00\n1. \u201cdogrula.org\u201d\n0:07\n[Toplam:1    Ortalama:5/5] Nev\u015fin Meng\u00fc\u2019n\u00fcn A\u00e7 Kal\u0131r\u0131z Ama Reisimizin Arkas\u0131nda Dururuz Dedi\u011fi \u0130ddias\u0131", "Cumhurba\u015fkan\u0131 Ba\u015fdan\u0131\u015fman\u0131 Oktay Saral Twitter hesab\u0131ndan \u201cbarkodu 869 ile ba\u015flayan \u00fcr\u00fcnlerin T\u00fcrk Mal\u0131 oldu\u011funu\u201d belirten bir payla\u015f\u0131m yapt\u0131. Ancak s\u00f6z konusu iddia k\u0131smen do\u011frudur.\nBir \u00fcr\u00fcn\u00fcn barkodunun 869 ile ba\u015flamas\u0131, o \u00fcr\u00fcn\u00fcn T\u00fcrkiye\u2019de \u00fcretilmi\u015f oldu\u011funun garantisi de\u011fildir.\nAyn\u0131 \u015fekilde, bir \u00fcr\u00fcn\u00fcn 869 d\u0131\u015f\u0131nda bir numara ile ba\u015flamas\u0131, o \u00fcr\u00fcn\u00fcn T\u00fcrkiye d\u0131\u015f\u0131nda \u00fcretilmi\u015f oldu\u011funun g\u00f6stergesi de de\u011fildir.\nBarkod numaras\u0131 869 ile ba\u015flayan \u00fcr\u00fcnler T\u00fcrk Mal\u0131d\u0131r.\nYerli mal\u0131 kullanmak hepimizin ortak \u00f6devidir.#Kazanaca\u011f\u0131z#yerlimalikullan #yerlimalikullanmakvatandaslikgorevidir pic.twitter.com/Fnp4nSVDVk\n\u2014 Oktay SARAL (@oktay_saral) August 12, 2018\nT\u00fcrk Mal\u0131 ve Yerli Mal\u0131 Aras\u0131ndaki Fark Nedir?\nYerli mal\u0131, bir \u00fclkede yeti\u015ftirilen ve \u00fcretilen mallar\u0131n geneline verilen add\u0131r. T\u00fcrk mal\u0131 ise T\u00fcrkiye\u2019de yeti\u015ftirilen ya da \u00fcretilen mallar olarak genellenebilir.\nT\u00fcrkiye\u2019de \u00fcretilen mallar\u0131n etiketlerinde T\u00fcrk Mal\u0131 (TM) ya da Made in Turkey (Made in T\u00fcrkiye) yaz\u0131lar\u0131 bulunmaktad\u0131r.\n869 barkod numaras\u0131na ait, pek \u00e7ok yabanc\u0131 \u00fclke mal\u0131na rastlamak m\u00fcmk\u00fcnd\u00fcr.\nGS1 Barkod Sistemi\nTicari \u00fcr\u00fcnlerin, yerlerin, ta\u015f\u0131ma birimlerinin ve demirba\u015flar\u0131n standart olarak tan\u0131mlanmas\u0131n\u0131 ve bilgi sistemlerine otomatik olarak aktar\u0131lmas\u0131n\u0131 sa\u011flayan, barkod teknolojileri temelli k\u00fcresel veri ve uygulama standartlar\u0131d\u0131r.\nBarkod, verilerin g\u00f6rsel \u00f6zellikli makinelerin okuyabilmesi i\u00e7in \u00e7e\u015fitli kodlama y\u00f6ntemleriyle sunulmas\u0131d\u0131r. GS1organizasyonu taraf\u0131ndan belirlenen GTIN (global trade identification number) numaras\u0131, \u00fcr\u00fcn\u00fcn \u00fcretildi\u011fi yere dair kesin bir bilgi i\u00e7ermez. \u015eirketler herhangi bir \u00fclkeden GTIN al\u0131p, mallar\u0131n\u0131n \u00fcretimini ve sat\u0131\u015f\u0131n\u0131 ba\u015fka \u00fclkelerde yapabilir.\nGS1-869/868 Barkod Numaras\u0131 ile \u0130lgili A\u00e7\u0131klama\nMarket al\u0131\u015fveri\u015flerinizde g\u00f6rd\u00fc\u011f\u00fcn\u00fcz \u00fcr\u00fcnlerin barkod numaralar\u0131na bakt\u0131\u011f\u0131n\u0131zda, 869 barkod numaras\u0131yla ba\u015flayan pek \u00e7ok yabanc\u0131 \u00fcr\u00fcne rastlaman\u0131z m\u00fcmk\u00fcnd\u00fcr.\nKaynaklar: kaynak1, kaynak2, kaynak3, kaynak4, kaynak5, kaynak6\nVideo oynat\u0131c\u0131\nhttps://dogrula.org/wp-content/uploads/2018/02/dogrula.org_.mp4\n00:00\n00:07\n[Toplam:2    Ortalama:5/5] Barkod Numaras\u0131 869 ile Ba\u015flayan \u00dcr\u00fcnler T\u00fcrk Mal\u0131d\u0131r \u0130ddias\u0131", "Emre O\u011fuz adl\u0131 Twitter kullan\u0131c\u0131s\u0131 taraf\u0131ndan kullan\u0131lan bu foto\u011fraf, sosyal medyada yay\u0131lm\u0131\u015f ve etkile\u015fime sebep olmu\u015ftu. Daha sonra s\u00f6z konusu kullan\u0131c\u0131 twitini silmi\u015fti.\nFoto\u011fraf\u0131n T\u00fcrkiye\u2019de bir okul gezisinden oldu\u011fu iddias\u0131 do\u011fru de\u011fildir.\nYakla\u015f\u0131k 5 ay \u00f6ncesine ait olan bu foto\u011fraf, Romanya\u2019da bir okul gezisinden sonra \u00e7ekilmi\u015ftir.\nDo\u011fru olmad\u0131\u011f\u0131 ortaya \u00e7\u0131kan bu foto\u011fraf tepkiye sebep olarak sosyal ortamlarda payla\u015f\u0131lmaya devam ediyor.\n\u00dclkeyi k\u00f6t\u00fclemek moda olmu\u015f: pic.twitter.com/qYDPjBTDmm\n\u2014 \u0130nci Caps (@incicaps) August 11, 2018\nFoto\u011fraf Romanya\u2019n\u0131n Focsani Kentinden\nRomanya\u2019n\u0131n Focsani kentinde bir ta\u015f\u0131mac\u0131l\u0131k \u015firketinin m\u00fcd\u00fcr\u00fc olan Cosmin Nicolae, Focsani\u2019deki bir okuldan gelen \u00f6\u011frencilerin geride b\u0131rakt\u0131\u011f\u0131 bu \u00e7\u00f6plerle dolu otob\u00fcs\u00fc \u00e7ekerek Facebook\u2019ta payla\u015fm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r.\n\u015eirket sahibi Cosmin Nikolae foto\u011frafta \u201c2018\u2019de Romanya\u2019daki E\u011e\u0130T\u0130M\u0130N en iyi aynas\u0131\u201d ifadesine yer vermi\u015fti.\n\u0130nternet sitelerinde \u201cfelaket\u201d olarak adland\u0131r\u0131lan bu foto\u011fraf, \u00e7ocuklar\u0131n ailelerini de ele\u015ftiren yorumlarla payla\u015f\u0131ld\u0131.\nS\u00f6z konusu g\u00f6rsel T\u00fcrkiye\u2019den de\u011fil, Romanya\u2019n\u0131n Focsana kentindendir.\nKanaklar: kaynak1, kaynak2, kaynak3, kaynak4\nVideo Foto\u011fraf", "Zeynep T\u00fcrky\u0131lmaz adl\u0131 Facebook kullan\u0131c\u0131s\u0131n\u0131n 15 Temmuz\u2019da teslim olan askerlere yap\u0131lan i\u015fkence oldu\u011funu ileri s\u00fcrerek, \u201cTESL\u0130M OLAN 22 ASKER\u0130 DOMUZ BA\u011eI \u0130LE \u00d6LD\u00dcRENLER, LANET OLSUN, KANLARINDA BO\u011eULUN \u0130N\u015eALLAH\u201d notuyla payla\u015ft\u0131\u011f\u0131 s\u00f6z konusu iddia do\u011fru de\u011fildir.\n15 Temmuz darbe giri\u015fiminde domuz ba\u011f\u0131yla \u00f6ld\u00fcr\u00fclen 22 askerimizin \u0130stanbul\u2019da bulundu\u011fu iddias\u0131 ger\u00e7e\u011fi yans\u0131tmamaktad\u0131r. G\u00f6r\u00fcnt\u00fcler T\u00fcrkiye\u2019den de\u011fildir.\n27 May\u0131s 2014 y\u0131l\u0131na ait olan bu g\u00f6rsel, Ukrayna h\u00fck\u00fcmet g\u00fc\u00e7leri ile yap\u0131lan \u00e7at\u0131\u015fmalarda \u00f6ld\u00fcr\u00fclen Rus yanl\u0131s\u0131 silahl\u0131 kuvvetlerin cesetlerini g\u00f6stermektedir.\n27 May\u0131s 2014 Sal\u0131 g\u00fcn\u00fc AP\u2019den (Associated Press) Vadim Ghirda taraf\u0131ndan \u00e7ekilen bu foto\u011fraf, Ukrayna\u2019n\u0131n Donetsk kentinde bir \u015fehir morguna aittir.\n\u0130ngiliz Dailymail gazetesinin haberine g\u00f6re, ayr\u0131l\u0131k\u00e7\u0131 Donetsk Halk Cumhuriyeti\u2019nden Leonid Baranov, yakla\u015f\u0131k 30 direni\u015f\u00e7inin Sal\u0131 g\u00fcn\u00fc Baranov, sava\u015f\u00e7\u0131lar\u0131n h\u00fck\u00fcmet taraf\u0131ndan vuruldu\u011fu s\u0131rada yaraland\u0131\u011f\u0131n\u0131ve bir kamyona g\u00f6t\u00fcr\u00fcld\u00fckten sonra Donetsk\u2019teki bir hastane morguna getirildi\u011fini s\u00f6yledi\u011fi haberine yer verdi.\nBaranov ayr\u0131ca 100 kadar isyanc\u0131n\u0131n \u00f6ld\u00fcr\u00fcld\u00fc\u011f\u00fcn\u00fc, y\u00fczlerce yaral\u0131 oldu\u011funu ve bir\u00e7ok cesedin hen\u00fcz h\u00fck\u00fcmet kontrol\u00fcndeki b\u00f6lgelerden \u00e7\u0131kar\u0131lmad\u0131\u011f\u0131n\u0131 s\u00f6ylemi\u015fti.\nAP gazetecileri de Kalinin morguna y\u0131\u011f\u0131lm\u0131\u015f \u00e7ok say\u0131da cesedin foto\u011fraf\u0131n\u0131 \u00e7ekmi\u015fti. Ayr\u0131ca ayn\u0131 sald\u0131r\u0131larda \u00f6len sivillerin de foto\u011fraflar\u0131 medyaya yans\u0131m\u0131\u015ft\u0131.\nS\u00f6z konusu sayfada payla\u015f\u0131lan, 15 Temmuz darbe giri\u015fiminde domuz ba\u011f\u0131yla \u00f6ld\u00fcr\u00fclen 22 askerimizin \u0130stanbul\u2019da bulundu\u011fu iddias\u0131 do\u011fru de\u011fildir.\nkaynaklar: kaynak1, kaynak2, kaynak3, kaynak4\nVideo oynat\u0131c\u0131\nhttps://dogrula.org/wp-content/uploads/2018/02/dogrula.org_.mp4\n00:00\n00:07\n[Toplam:4    Ortalama:5/5] 15 Temmuz Darbe Giri\u015fimi S\u0131ras\u0131nda Askerlerin Domuz Ba\u011f\u0131 \u0130le \u00d6ld\u00fcr\u00fcld\u00fc\u011f\u00fc \u0130ddias\u0131", "Sosyal medyada dola\u015f\u0131mda olan bu g\u00f6rselde yazan, M\u0131s\u0131r\u2019da \u0130srail ve ABD aleyhine propaganda yapan 75 haf\u0131z\u0131n idam\u0131na karar verildi\u011fi iddias\u0131 \u00e7o\u011funlukla yanl\u0131\u015ft\u0131r.\nM\u0131s\u0131r\u2019da 75 protestocu hakk\u0131nda idam karar\u0131 verilmi\u015ftir ancak bu ki\u015filer \u0130srail ve ABD aleyhine propaganda yapt\u0131klar\u0131 i\u00e7in de\u011fil, 2013 y\u0131l\u0131nda se\u00e7ilmi\u015f cumhurba\u015fkan\u0131 Muhammed Mursi\u2019nin devrilmesine kar\u015f\u0131 yap\u0131lan 2013 protestosuna kat\u0131ld\u0131klar\u0131 i\u00e7in bu cezaya \u00e7arpt\u0131r\u0131lm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r.\nAyr\u0131ca s\u00f6z konusu ki\u015filerin haf\u0131z olduklar\u0131 bilgisine rastlanmam\u0131\u015ft\u0131r.\nFoto\u011frafta yer alan \u015fah\u0131slardan biri, M\u00fcsl\u00fcman Karde\u015fler liderlerinden Muhammed Biltaci\u2019dir. 2014 y\u0131l\u0131na ait olan foto\u011fraf Biltaci\u2019nin Kahire\u2019deki duru\u015fmas\u0131ndan al\u0131nm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r.\nKahire mahkemesi, M\u00fcsl\u00fcman Karde\u015fler\u2019in (Muslim Brotherhood) k\u0131demli \u00fcyelerinin de aralar\u0131nda bulundu\u011fu 75 protestocuyu \u00f6l\u00fcm cezas\u0131na \u00e7arpt\u0131rm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r.\nYasa d\u0131\u015f\u0131 \u00f6rg\u00fct kabul edilen M\u00fcsl\u00fcman Karde\u015fler\u2019in k\u0131demli \u00fcyeleri, Kahire\u2019deki Cezaevi Mahkemesi taraf\u0131ndan, M\u0131s\u0131r\u2019\u0131n ba\u015fkenti Kahire\u2019deki Rabia Meydan\u0131\u2019ndaki oturma eylemine kat\u0131lmalar\u0131 nedeniyle idam cezas\u0131na \u00e7arpt\u0131r\u0131lanlar aras\u0131nda bulunuyor.\nDava, M\u00fcsl\u00fcman Karde\u015fler lideri Muhammed Bedii ve foto muhabiri Mahmoud Abu Zeid de dahil olmak \u00fczere 739 san\u0131\u011f\u0131 kaps\u0131yor.\nKarar\u0131n, M\u0131s\u0131r\u2019\u0131n ba\u015fl\u0131ca \u0130slami yasal yetkilisi olan B\u00fcy\u00fck M\u00fcft\u00fc\u2019ye g\u00f6nderilmesi gerekiyor, ancak m\u00fcft\u00fcn\u00fcn karar\u0131 ba\u011flay\u0131c\u0131 de\u011fil ve mahkemeler taraf\u0131ndan nadir de olsa g\u00f6z ard\u0131 ediliyor. 2014 y\u0131l\u0131nda M\u00fcft\u00fc, ayn\u0131 olay\u0131n bir par\u00e7as\u0131 olan M\u00fcsl\u00fcman Karde\u015fler lideri Muhammed Bedii i\u00e7in verilen idam karar\u0131n\u0131 reddetmi\u015fti, fakat Bedii \u00f6m\u00fcr boyu hapse mahkum edildi.\nDevlet elindeki Al-Ahram haber sitesine g\u00f6re, son karar\u0131n 8 Eyl\u00fcl\u2019de verilmesi bekleniyor.\nUluslararas\u0131 Af \u00d6rg\u00fct\u00fc Cumartesi g\u00fcn\u00fc yapt\u0131\u011f\u0131 a\u00e7\u0131klamada, yarg\u0131laman\u0131n adil olmad\u0131\u011f\u0131n\u0131 ve san\u0131klar\u0131n yeterli bir savunma sunma haklar\u0131n\u0131n reddedildi\u011fini s\u00f6yledi.\n#Egypt: The verdict for @ShawkanZeid in the Rabaa dispersal case has been postponed to 8 September. 75 other men in the same case remain at risk of the death penalty. No members of the security forces have been held responsible for the violent dispersal of the Rabaa protest.\n\u2014 AmnestyInternational (@amnesty) July 28, 2018\n\u0130nsan haklar\u0131 savunucular\u0131 da, gazetecilerin ve bir\u00e7ok bar\u0131\u015f\u00e7\u0131l protestocunun ayn\u0131 davada yarg\u0131lanmas\u0131n\u0131 ele\u015ftirdiler.\n  Cumhurba\u015fkan\u0131 Abdul Fettah El Sisi\u2019nin 2014 y\u0131l\u0131nda iktidara gelmesinden bu yana yetkililer, devleti zay\u0131flatmaya \u00e7al\u0131\u015fan ter\u00f6ristlere ve sabotajc\u0131lara yap\u0131lan bask\u0131y\u0131 me\u015frula\u015ft\u0131rmaya \u00e7al\u0131\u015f\u0131yor. Y\u00fczlerce siyasi muhalif, yasad\u0131\u015f\u0131 bir \u00f6rg\u00fcte \u00fcye olmak ya da sald\u0131r\u0131 plan\u0131 yapmak su\u00e7lar\u0131ndan \u00f6l\u00fcm cezas\u0131na \u00e7arpt\u0131r\u0131l\u0131yor.\nKaynaklar: Kaynak1, kaynak2, kaynak3, kaynak4, kaynak5, kaynak6, kaynak7, kaynak8, kaynak9, kaynak10, kaynak11\nVideo oynat\u0131c\u0131\nhttps://dogrula.org/wp-content/uploads/2018/02/dogrula.org_.mp4\n00:00\n00:07\n[Toplam:4    Ortalama:5/5] M\u0131s\u0131r\u2019da \u0130srail ve ABD Aleyhine Propaganda Yapan 75 Haf\u0131z\u0131n \u0130dam\u0131na Karar Verildi\u011fi \u0130ddias\u0131", "\u0130nsan v\u00fccudunda 3 in\u00e7 (7.62) uzunlu\u011funda bir \u00e7ivi yap\u0131labilecek miktarda demir bulundu\u011fu iddias\u0131 do\u011frudur.\n1 in\u00e7 demir \u00e7ivi 2.54 cm; 3 in\u00e7 bir \u00e7ivi de yakla\u015f\u0131k 7,62 cm uzunlu\u011fundad\u0131r. Bu \u00f6l\u00e7\u00fcdeki demir bir \u00e7ivinin a\u011f\u0131rl\u0131\u011f\u0131 da yakla\u015f\u0131k 4.17 gramd\u0131r. Bu a\u011f\u0131rl\u0131k, sa\u011fl\u0131kl\u0131 bir bireyde bulunan ortalama demir miktar\u0131ndad\u0131r.\n  Demir, kan \u00fcretimi i\u00e7in vazge\u00e7ilmez bir elementtir. V\u00fccuttaki demirinin yakla\u015f\u0131k %70\u2019i, kan\u0131m\u0131z\u0131n hemoglobin denilen k\u0131rm\u0131z\u0131 kan h\u00fccrelerinde ve miyoglobin ad\u0131 verilen kas h\u00fccrelerinde bulunur. Hemoglobin, kandaki oksijeni akci\u011ferlerden dokulara aktarmak i\u00e7in gereklidir.\nOrtalama bir erke\u011fin v\u00fccudunda yakla\u015f\u0131k 4 gram, ortalama bir kad\u0131n\u0131n v\u00fccudunda ise yakla\u015f\u0131k 3.5 gram demir bulunur; \u00e7ocuklarda genellikle 3 gram veya daha az miktarda demir vard\u0131r.\nSosyal medya ve \u0130nternet ortamlar\u0131nda payla\u015f\u0131lan, insan v\u00fccudunda bulunan demirle 3 in\u00e7 uzunlu\u011funda bir \u00e7ivi yap\u0131labilece\u011fi bilgisi, pek \u00e7ok yabanc\u0131 kaynakta da mevcuttur.\nDakota Mitchell ve Lee Haroun taraf\u0131ndan yaz\u0131lan \u201cIntroduction to Health Care\u201d adl\u0131 kitapta da bu bilgiye yer verilmi\u015ftir:\nIndiana \u00dcniversitesi\u2019nin sitesinde yer alan bir makalede de bu bilgiye rastlamak m\u00fcmk\u00fcn:\n12 A\u011fustos 1997\u2019de yay\u0131mlanan Weekly World News gazetesinde de s\u00f6z konusu bilgi yer alm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r:\nThe Fountain: A Doctor\u2019s Prescription to Make 60 the New 30 kitab\u0131 da bu bilgiye yer veren t\u0131bbi kaynaklardan biri:\nV\u00fccudun Demir Gereksinimi\nHer kan ba\u011f\u0131\u015f\u0131ndan \u00f6nce v\u00fccudun \u201cdemir seviyesi\u201d kontrol edilir. Demir v\u00fccutta kendili\u011finden olu\u015fmaz; yedi\u011finiz besinlerden emilmesi gerekir. Yeti\u015fkin bir insan\u0131n g\u00fcnl\u00fck minimum demir gereksinimi 1.8 mg\u2019dir.
