T\u00fcketti\u011finiz demirin sadece %10 ila %30\u2019u v\u00fccut taraf\u0131ndan emilir ve kullan\u0131l\u0131r.\nDemir bak\u0131m\u0131ndan zengin baz\u0131 yiyecekler aras\u0131nda her t\u00fcrl\u00fc k\u0131rm\u0131z\u0131 ve beyaz et, karaci\u011fer, deniz \u00fcr\u00fcnleri, soya peyniri, ye\u015fil sebzeler, m\u0131s\u0131r, patates, domates, pancar ve lahana say\u0131labilir.\nKaynaklar: Kaynak1, kaynak2, kaynak3, kaynak4, kaynak5, kaynak6, kaynak7\nVideo oynat\u0131c\u0131\nhttps://dogrula.org/wp-content/uploads/2018/02/dogrula.org_.mp4\n00:00\n00:07\n[Toplam:6    Ortalama:5/5] V\u00fccuttaki Demir Miktar\u0131 ile 3 \u0130n\u00e7 (7.62 cm) Uzunlu\u011funda \u00c7ivi Yap\u0131labilir \u0130ddias\u0131", "Belli aral\u0131klarla sosyal medyada payla\u015f\u0131larak g\u00fcndem olan g\u00f6rsellerden biri haline gelen, \u0130ran \u015fah\u0131n\u0131n e\u015fi Anis al Doleh\u2019nin foto\u011fraflar\u0131n\u0131 ve s\u00f6z konusu iddiay\u0131 inceledik. Foto\u011fraflarda yer alan t\u00fcm kad\u0131nlar\u0131n \u0130ran \u015fah\u0131n\u0131n hareminden oldu\u011fu do\u011frudur, ancak \u0130ran \u015fah\u0131n\u0131n kar\u0131s\u0131na a\u015f\u0131k olan 145 ki\u015fiden 13\u2019\u00fcn\u00fcn reddedildi\u011fi i\u00e7in intihar etti\u011fi iddias\u0131 do\u011fru de\u011fildir.\n47 y\u0131l boyunca h\u00fck\u00fcm s\u00fcrm\u00fc\u015f olan \u0130ran \u015fah\u0131 Nasireddin \u015eah Qajar\u2019\u0131n (Nasser al-Din Shah) \u201ce\u015fsiz\u201d olarak adland\u0131r\u0131lan e\u015fi Anis el-Doleh\u2019e (Anis al Dawla \u2013 Anis al Dowleh) a\u015f\u0131k olan 145 ki\u015fiden 13\u2019\u00fcn\u00fcn reddedildi\u011fi i\u00e7in intihar etti\u011fine dair bir bilgiye rastlanmamaktad\u0131r. S\u00f6z konusu iddian\u0131n kayna\u011f\u0131, 9Gag adl\u0131 e\u011flence sitesinde yer alan g\u00f6rsellerdir.\nAyr\u0131ca, dola\u015f\u0131mdaki g\u00f6rselde yer alan kad\u0131nlar\u0131n her biri Qajar ailesinden farkl\u0131 ki\u015filerdir. Kendi d\u00f6nemlerinin be\u011fenilen ve u\u011fruna \u015fiirler yaz\u0131lan kad\u0131nlar\u0131ndan olan Qajar haremi kad\u0131nlar\u0131 hakk\u0131nda pek \u00e7ok a\u015fk hikayesi mevcuttur. \u015eah\u0131n k\u0131zlar\u0131 feminist, ulusalc\u0131 ve entelekt\u00fcel \u00f6zellikleriyle de \u00fcnl\u00fcd\u00fcr.\nNasireddin \u015eah\u2019\u0131n sanata \u00e7ok d\u00fc\u015fk\u00fcn oldu\u011fu ve \u00e7ocukken \u0130ngiltere\u2019ye yapt\u0131\u011f\u0131 ziyaretlerde ilgi alan\u0131na girmi\u015f olan foto\u011fraf\u00e7\u0131l\u0131\u011f\u0131 \u0130ran\u2019da da hayata ge\u00e7irmenin bir zorunluluk oldu\u011funu d\u00fc\u015f\u00fcnd\u00fc\u011f\u00fc rivayet edilir.\n\u015eah\u0131n haremindeki foto\u011fraflar, foto\u011fraf sanat\u00e7\u0131s\u0131 Antoin Sevruguin taraf\u0131ndan \u00e7ekilmi\u015ftir. Sevruguin daha sonra G\u00fclistan Saray\u0131\u2019nda \u201cfoto\u011fraf\u00e7\u0131\u201d olmu\u015f ve her t\u00fcrl\u00fc konuyu ele alm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r. \u201cSaray foto\u011fraf\u00e7\u0131s\u0131\u201d \u00fcnvan\u0131 alan Sevruguin, ilk ba\u015flarda yaln\u0131zca \u015fah\u0131n ve erkeklerin foto\u011fraflar\u0131n\u0131 \u00e7ekmi\u015fti, \u00e7\u00fcnk\u00fc kad\u0131nlar\u0131n y\u00fcz\u00fcn\u00fc foto\u011fraflamak kesinlikle yasakt\u0131.\n\u015eah\u0131n foto\u011fraf tutkusu ve h\u00fck\u00fcmdarl\u0131k yetkisi, bu yasa\u011f\u0131 kald\u0131rmas\u0131na neden oldu ve saray foto\u011fraf\u00e7\u0131s\u0131n\u0131n yakla\u015f\u0131k 100 kad\u0131ndan olu\u015fan haremini foto\u011fraflamas\u0131na izin verdi.\nNasser al-Din Shah Qajar\nNasireddin \u015eah\u2019\u0131n kar\u0131s\u0131 \u201ce\u015fsiz\u201d Anis el-Doleh (Anis al Dawla)\nQajar kad\u0131nlar\u0131n\u0131n ince t\u00fcylerden olu\u015fan b\u0131y\u0131klar\u0131 ve kal\u0131n ka\u015flar\u0131, Carla Serena\u2019n\u0131n kitab\u0131nda da yer verdi\u011fi bir konudur. Kad\u0131nlar\u0131n g\u00fczelle\u015fmek amac\u0131yla ka\u015flar\u0131n\u0131 birle\u015ftirdi\u011fi ve dudaklar\u0131n\u0131n \u00fczerine makyajla ince b\u0131y\u0131k \u00e7izdi\u011fi kitapta da yer alm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r.\nNasireddin \u015eah\u2019\u0131n k\u0131z\u0131 Zahra Khanum Taj al-Saltanah\nNasireddin \u015eah\u2019\u0131n k\u0131z\u0131 \u0130smet el Doleh ( Esmat al-Dowleh)\n  Nasireddin \u015eah\u2019\u0131n di\u011fer e\u015fi Shams\nal Dawlah\n\u0130ran \u015eah\u0131n\u0131n Hareminin Belgeseli (Nasseredin Shah and His 84 Wives)\nKal\u0131n ve Birle\u015fik Ka\u015flar ile B\u0131y\u0131kla \u015eekillenmi\u015f Y\u00fcz G\u00fczelli\u011fi Alg\u0131s\u0131\nKad\u0131ns\u0131 g\u00fczellik ideali zamanla de\u011fi\u015febilir. Qajar d\u00f6neminde, kad\u0131n g\u00fczelli\u011finin alg\u0131s\u0131 kal\u0131n bir ka\u015fla (abru-ye peyvasteh) ve b\u0131y\u0131kla \u015fekillenmi\u015f bir y\u00fczd\u00fc. \u00d6rne\u011fin, Qajar h\u00fck\u00fcmdar\u0131 Nas\u0131r el-Din \u015eah\u2019\u0131n hareminin kad\u0131nlar\u0131, bu \u00e7arp\u0131c\u0131 \u00f6zelliklere sahip olmad\u0131klar\u0131 taktirde y\u00fczlerine b\u0131y\u0131k \u00e7izmek ve ka\u015flar\u0131n\u0131 birle\u015ftirmek i\u00e7in makyaj teknikleri kullanm\u0131\u015flard\u0131r.\nQajar D\u00f6nemi\u2019ne Ait \u201cG\u00fczel Kad\u0131n\u201d \u0130l\u00fcstrasyonlar\u0131\n  Her ne kadar d\u00f6nemin g\u00fczellik alg\u0131s\u0131 bu \u015fekilde ve mevcut foto\u011fraflardaki ki\u015filer ger\u00e7ek olsa da, \u0130ran \u015fah\u0131n\u0131n kar\u0131s\u0131na a\u015f\u0131k olan 145 ki\u015fiden 13\u2019\u00fcn\u00fcn reddedildi\u011fi i\u00e7in intihar etti\u011fine dair bir bilgiye rastlanmam\u0131\u015ft\u0131r. S\u00f6z konusu ifade, \u201cmeme\u201d (genellikle esprili ve yarat\u0131c\u0131 bir bi\u00e7imde de\u011fi\u015ftirilerek, internet \u00fczerinden yay\u0131lm\u0131\u015f video veya deyi\u015f) olarak yay\u0131lm\u0131\u015f ve \u00fclkemizde de T\u00fcrk\u00e7e hali payla\u015f\u0131larak viral olmu\u015ftur.\nKaynaklar: Kaynak1, kaynak2, kaynak3, kaynak4, kaynak5, kaynak6, kaynak7, kaynak8, kaynak9\nVideo oynat\u0131c\u0131\nhttps://dogrula.org/wp-content/uploads/2018/02/dogrula.org_.mp4\n00:00\n00:07\n[Toplam:7    Ortalama:5/5] \u0130ran \u015eah\u0131n\u0131n Kar\u0131s\u0131na A\u015f\u0131k Olan 145 Ki\u015fiden 13\u2019\u00fcn\u00fcn Reddedildi\u011fi \u0130\u00e7in \u0130ntihar Etti\u011fi \u0130ddias\u0131", "Sosyal medyada bir anda g\u00fcndem olan, TRT \u00c7ocuk kanal\u0131n\u0131n \u201cMaysa ve Bulut\u201d adl\u0131 \u00e7izgi filminde e\u015fe\u011fe tecav\u00fcz edildi\u011fi iddias\u0131 do\u011fru de\u011fildir. Trt \u00c7ocuk kanal\u0131 ve \u00e7izgi filmin yap\u0131mc\u0131s\u0131 olan \u015firket, e\u015fe\u011fe tecav\u00fcz edildi\u011fi iddialar\u0131na a\u00e7\u0131kl\u0131k getiren g\u00f6r\u00fcnt\u00fc ve yaz\u0131l\u0131 metinlerle olay\u0131n ger\u00e7ek d\u0131\u015f\u0131 oldu\u011funu belirtmi\u015ftir.\nS\u00f6z konusu sahnedeki efektlerin yanl\u0131\u015f anla\u015f\u0131lmas\u0131yla insanlar e\u015fe\u011fe tecav\u00fcz edildi\u011fini s\u00f6yleyerek sosyal medyada payla\u015f\u0131mlar yapt\u0131lar ve bu konu h\u0131zla yay\u0131larak T\u00fcrkiye g\u00fcndemine oturdu.\nBunun \u00fczerine TRT \u00c7ocuk kanal\u0131 ve \u00e7izgi filmin yap\u0131mc\u0131s\u0131 birbiri ard\u0131na a\u00e7\u0131klamalarda bulundu. A\u00e7\u0131klamalarda, \u201cR\u00fczgardan \u00f6t\u00fcr\u00fc sallanan \u015falvar\u0131n g\u00f6r\u00fcnd\u00fc\u011f\u00fc bu sahne; hastal\u0131kl\u0131 bir zihnin \u00fcr\u00fcn\u00fc olarak ak\u0131l d\u0131\u015f\u0131 bir iftirayla yorumland\u0131.\u201d ifadeleri yer ald\u0131.\nE\u015fe\u011fe tecav\u00fcz edildi\u011fi iddia edilen sahne:\nOlay\u0131n ard\u0131ndan TRT \u00c7ocuk Twitter hesab\u0131ndan bir dizi a\u00e7\u0131klama yapt\u0131. Kanal s\u00f6z konusu iddia hakk\u0131nda, \u201cKendi sap\u0131k yakla\u015f\u0131mlar\u0131n\u0131; TRT \u00c7ocuk ve y\u00f6r\u00fcklerin hayat\u0131n\u0131n anlat\u0131ld\u0131\u011f\u0131 \u201dMaysa ve Bulut\u201d \u00e7izgi filmini de alet eden bu a\u015fa\u011f\u0131l\u0131k iftiray\u0131, b\u00fct\u00fcn varl\u0131\u011f\u0131m\u0131zla ve inanc\u0131m\u0131zla reddediyoruz.\u201d dedi.\nKamuoyuna sayg\u0131yla duyurulur. pic.twitter.com/BTbnDb7WTn\n\u2014 TRT \u00c7ocuk (@trtcocuk) August 5, 2018\n  Maysa ve Bulut\u2019un yay\u0131ndaki hali ve ya\u011fmur efekti kald\u0131r\u0131ld\u0131\u011f\u0131nda ilgili sahnenin orijinali a\u015fa\u011f\u0131daki gibidir. #trtcocuk #k\u0131n\u0131yoruz #maysavebulut #millidegerimiz pic.twitter.com/oXFJno1q5j\n\u2014 TRT \u00c7ocuk (@trtcocuk) August 5, 2018\n  Maysa ve Bulut\u2019ta g\u00f6r\u00fcnt\u00fcn\u00fcn \u00fczerine ya\u011fmur efekti hissi vermek i\u00e7in karartma, esinti ile YouTube'daki \u00e7\u00f6z\u00fcn\u00fcrl\u00fc\u011f\u00fcn d\u00fc\u015f\u00fck olmas\u0131 sahnenin flula\u015fmas\u0131na neden olmu\u015ftur. #trtcocuk #maysavebulut pic.twitter.com/DH3v4MFvWq\n\u2014 TRT \u00c7ocuk (@trtcocuk) August 5, 2018\n  Ya\u011fmur efekti kald\u0131r\u0131ld\u0131\u011f\u0131nda ilgili sahne! \u015eiddetli f\u0131rt\u0131na sahnesinde; oba genel g\u00f6r\u00fcnt\u00fcs\u00fc. R\u00fczgar her\u015feyi u\u00e7uruyor. Bir oba sakini e\u015fe\u011fini f\u0131rt\u0131nan\u0131n \u015fiddetiyle zorlanarak ah\u0131ra g\u00f6t\u00fcrmeye \u00e7al\u0131\u015f\u0131yor.F\u0131rt\u0131nan\u0131n savurdu\u011fu e\u015fyalar\u0131 ve tarhanay\u0131 toplamaya \u00e7al\u0131\u015fan oba kad\u0131nlar\u0131 var. pic.twitter.com/u0CFSB8ZLy\n\u2014 TRT \u00c7ocuk (@trtcocuk) August 5, 2018\n\u00c7izgi filmin yap\u0131mc\u0131s\u0131 olan Resimli Filim Animasyon St\u00fcdyosu, Facebook hesab\u0131ndan s\u00f6z konusu iddiaya a\u00e7\u0131kl\u0131k getiren a\u00e7\u0131klamalarda bulundu:\n    MAYSA VE BULUT\nMAYSA VE BULUT\u2019UN YAYINDAKI HALI VE YA\u011eMUR EFEKTI KALDIRILDI\u011eINDA ILGILI SAHNENIN ORIJINALI A\u015eA\u011eIDAKI GIBIDIR. #TRTCOCUK #KINIYORUZ #MAYSAVEBULUT #MILLIDEGERIMIZ\nRESIMLI FILIM ANIMASYON ST\u00dcDYOSU PAYLA\u015eTI: 5 A\u011eUSTOS 2018 PAZAR\nKonuya dair bir payla\u015f\u0131m da TRT Haber Twitter hesab\u0131ndan yap\u0131ld\u0131. Kanal s\u00f6z konusu iddiay\u0131 \u201c\u00e7irkin kampanya\u201d olarak nitelendirdi:\nT\u00fcrkiye\u2019nin en \u00e7ok izlenen \u00e7ocuk kanal\u0131 TRT \u00c7ocuk ahlaks\u0131z bir iftira kampanyas\u0131n\u0131n hedefi oldu. @trtcocuk bu \u00e7irkin kampanyaya yapt\u0131\u011f\u0131 sert bir a\u00e7\u0131klamayla yan\u0131t verdi. \u0130ftiraya konu olan g\u00f6r\u00fcnt\u00fcn\u00fcn orjinali de payla\u015f\u0131ld\u0131.https://t.co/pKZkM7aJr7 pic.twitter.com/ZlFzSSBCyb\n\u2014 TRT HABER (@trthaber) August 5, 2018\nOyuncu ve yap\u0131mc\u0131 \u015eahan G\u00f6kbakar da konu \u00fczerine Instagram hesab\u0131ndan \u015fu payla\u015f\u0131m\u0131 yaparak s\u00f6z konusu iddiay\u0131 \u201chasta sap\u0131k bir zihniyetin\u201d \u00fcr\u00fcn\u00fc olarak nitelendirdi:\n  Sosyal medyan\u0131n g\u00fcndemine oturan, TRT \u00c7ocuk kanal\u0131nda g\u00f6sterilen \u201cMaysa ve Bulut\u201d adl\u0131 \u00e7izgi filmde e\u015fe\u011fe tecav\u00fcz edildi\u011fi iddias\u0131 do\u011fru de\u011fildir.\nKaynak: trt\u00e7ocuk1, trt\u00e7ocuk2, trt\u00e7ocuk3, trt\u00e7ocuk4, trthaber, resimlifilim1, resimlifilim2, instagram\nVideo oynat\u0131c\u0131\nhttps://dogrula.org/wp-content/uploads/2018/02/dogrula.org_.mp4\n00:00\n00:07\n[Toplam:5    Ortalama:4.8/5] TRT \u00c7ocuk \u00c7izgi Filminde E\u015fe\u011fe Tecav\u00fcz Edildi\u011fi \u0130ddias\u0131", "T\u00fcrkiye\u2019deki Starbucks Say\u0131s\u0131 Avrupa \u00dclkelerinden Daha Fazla \u0130ddias\u0131 ba\u015fl\u0131kl\u0131 i\u00e7eri\u011fimizde, dogrula.org\u2019a gelen bir ihbar\u0131 inceledik. \u0130hbara g\u00f6re, bir kahve zinciri olan Starbucks\u2019\u0131n Avrupa\u2019daki \u00fclkelerden \u00e7ok daha fazla ma\u011fazas\u0131n\u0131n oldu\u011fu iddia edilmi\u015ftir. Bu iddia do\u011frudur. \nAyn\u0131 iddia, ge\u00e7ti\u011fimiz g\u00fcnlerde Twitter \u00fczerinden farkl\u0131 bir \u015fekilde de payla\u015f\u0131lm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r. Yap\u0131lan payla\u015f\u0131mda, Starbucks ma\u011faza say\u0131lar\u0131n\u0131 g\u00f6steren bir grafik oldu\u011fu iddia edilen g\u00f6rselde, baz\u0131 \u00fclkelerde say\u0131 \u00e7ok az iken, T\u00fcrkiye\u2019deki Starbucks say\u0131s\u0131n\u0131n 408 oldu\u011fu iddia edilmi\u015ftir.\nYukar\u0131daki payla\u015f\u0131m, 1600 \u00fczerinde be\u011feni alarak sosyal medyada \u00e7e\u015fitli tart\u0131\u015fmalara neden olmu\u015ftur. Ancak verilen grafikteki veriler, g\u00fcncel olmamakla birlikte say\u0131lar ger\u00e7e\u011fe yak\u0131n bir de\u011feri yans\u0131tmaktad\u0131r.\nT\u00fcrkiye\u2019de Ka\u00e7 Tane Starbucks Var?\n\u00c7e\u015fitli ara\u015ft\u0131rma \u015firketleri taraf\u0131ndan yap\u0131lan \u00e7al\u0131\u015fmalar g\u00f6z \u00f6n\u00fcnde bulunduruldu\u011funda, \u00fclkelere g\u00f6re Starbucks say\u0131lar\u0131n\u0131n ne kadar oldu\u011fu anla\u015f\u0131lmaktad\u0131r. Merkezi ABD, Washington\u2019da bulunan Starbucks, 1971 y\u0131l\u0131nda a\u00e7\u0131lm\u0131\u015f ve g\u00fcn\u00fcm\u00fczde toplamda 76 \u00fclkede faaliyet g\u00f6stermektedir.\nStatista isimli istatistik portal\u0131nda, 2018 May\u0131s ay\u0131 itibariyle Avrupa\u2019da bulunan Starbucks say\u0131lar\u0131 verilmi\u015ftir. Sadece Avrupa \u00fclkelerini g\u00f6steren veriler incelendi\u011finde, T\u00fcrkiye en fazla Starbucks bar\u0131nd\u0131ran ikinci \u00fclke konumundad\u0131r. Buna g\u00f6re, Birle\u015fik Krall\u0131kta 982, T\u00fcrkiye\u2019de 428, Almanya\u2019da 157, Fransa\u2019da 154 adet Starbucks ma\u011fazas\u0131 vard\u0131r. Bu durumda T\u00fcrkiye\u2019de bulunan Starbucks say\u0131s\u0131 Avrupa\u2019daki \u00e7o\u011fu \u00fclkeden daha fazlad\u0131r.\nDi\u011fer istatistik platformlar\u0131n\u0131n yapt\u0131\u011f\u0131 farkl\u0131 zamanl\u0131 \u00e7al\u0131\u015fmalara da bak\u0131ld\u0131\u011f\u0131nda Starbucks\u2019\u0131n T\u00fcrkiye\u2019deki ma\u011faza say\u0131s\u0131n\u0131n, bir\u00e7ok Avrupa \u00fclkesinden fazla oldu\u011fu g\u00f6r\u00fclebilmektedir.\nKnoema\u2018n\u0131n 1992 y\u0131l\u0131ndan 2018\u2019e kadar olan Starbucks say\u0131lar\u0131n\u0131 g\u00f6steren \u00e7al\u0131\u015fmas\u0131nda ise sadece Avrupa de\u011fil, t\u00fcm d\u00fcnya genelinde olan ma\u011faza say\u0131lar\u0131 dikkate al\u0131nm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r. 2018\u2019in ikinci \u00e7eyre\u011fi olarak payla\u015f\u0131lan listeye g\u00f6re ise T\u00fcrkiye 6. s\u0131rada yer almaktad\u0131r.\nAmerika Birle\u015fik Devletleri merkezli olan Starbucks\u2019\u0131n ma\u011faza say\u0131s\u0131n\u0131n en fazla oldu\u011fu yer, 5 bin 895 ile ABD\u2019dir. S\u0131ras\u0131yla G\u00fcney Kore, Meksika, Birle\u015fik Krall\u0131k ve Tayvan\u2019\u0131n \u00fcst s\u0131ralarda oldu\u011fu grafikte T\u00fcrkiye alt\u0131nc\u0131 s\u0131rada yer almaktad\u0131r.\n<span data-mce-type=\"bookmark\" style=\"display: inline-block; width: 0px; overflow: hidden; line-height: 0;\" class=\"mce_SELRES_start\">\ufeff</span><span data-mce-type=\"bookmark\" style=\"display: inline-block; width: 0px; overflow: hidden; line-height: 0;\" class=\"mce_SELRES_start\">\ufeff</span><span data-mce-type=\"bookmark\" style=\"display: inline-block; width: 0px; overflow: hidden; line-height: 0;\" class=\"mce_SELRES_start\">\ufeff</span>\nYukar\u0131daki haritaya bak\u0131ld\u0131\u011f\u0131nda ise, 2018 y\u0131l\u0131n\u0131n ilk \u00e7eyre\u011finde verilen ma\u011faza say\u0131lar\u0131n\u0131n Avrupa\u2019da daha az oldu\u011fu anla\u015f\u0131lmaktad\u0131r. T\u00fcrkiye de, Starbucks ma\u011faza say\u0131lar\u0131n\u0131n en fazla bulundu\u011fu ye\u015fil b\u00f6lgelerde yer almaktad\u0131r.\nJames Brockbank isimli bir ki\u015finin bir blog sitesinde yazm\u0131\u015f oldu\u011fu yaz\u0131da, Starbucks\u2019\u0131n say\u0131lar\u0131 n\u00fcfusa g\u00f6re oranlanm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r. A\u015fa\u011f\u0131daki listede her 1 milyon ki\u015fiye d\u00fc\u015fen Starbucks say\u0131s\u0131 verilmi\u015ftir. Buna g\u00f6re n\u00fcfus bazl\u0131 bak\u0131ld\u0131\u011f\u0131nda ABD\u2019de her 1 milyon ki\u015fiye d\u00fc\u015fen Starbucks say\u0131s\u0131 41 iken, T\u00fcrkiye\u2019de bu say\u0131 4,08\u2019dir. Ancak liste b\u00fct\u00fcn\u00fcyle incelendi\u011finde, Almanya, Fransa, \u0130spanya, Bel\u00e7ika gibi \u00fclkeler, s\u0131ralamada yine T\u00fcrkiye\u2019nin a\u015fa\u011f\u0131s\u0131nda kalmaktad\u0131r.\n  Kaynaklar: Statista, SilverDoor, Knoema, Business Wire, expandedramblings.com\nVideo oynat\u0131c\u0131\n00:00\n00:00\n1. \u201cdogrula.org\u201d\n0:07\n[Toplam:4    Ortalama:5/5] T\u00fcrkiye\u2019deki Starbucks Say\u0131s\u0131 Avrupa \u00dclkelerinden Daha Fazla \u0130ddias\u0131", "Neil Armstrong\u2019un Uzay Giysisindeki Botlar\u0131n Ay\u2019da B\u0131rakt\u0131\u011f\u0131 S\u00f6ylenen Ayak \u0130zleri ile Uyu\u015fmad\u0131\u011f\u0131 \u0130ddias\u0131 ba\u015fl\u0131kl\u0131 yaz\u0131m\u0131zda, Snopes\u2019in ele ald\u0131\u011f\u0131 Ay\u2019daki ayak izlerinin gizemi konusuna yer verdik.\nS\u00f6z konusu izlerin Neil Armstrong\u2019un ayak izleriyle uyu\u015fmad\u0131\u011f\u0131 iddias\u0131 do\u011fru de\u011fildir.\nApollo 11 misyonu, 20 Temmuz 1969\u2019da Ay\u2019\u0131n y\u00fczeyine inen Ay gezi mod\u00fcl\u00fcnden (LEM) beri komplo teorisyenlerine malzeme olmu\u015ftur. Bunun gibi Ay y\u00fczeyiyle ilgili pek \u00e7ok iddiay\u0131 \u00e7\u00fcr\u00fcten Snopes, A\u011fustos 2016\u2019da, Ay y\u00fczeyi boyunca y\u00fcr\u00fcm\u00fc\u015f ilk insan olan astronot Neil Armstrong\u2019un botlar\u0131n\u0131 inceleyerek sahte bir Ay ini\u015finin kan\u0131tlar\u0131n\u0131n bulunabilece\u011fini g\u00f6steren yeni bir maddeye rastlam\u0131\u015ft\u0131r:\nYukar\u0131daki g\u00f6rselde yer alan foto\u011fraflar\u0131n ikisi de ger\u00e7ektir: Neil Armstrong\u2019un uzay giysisi solda, ayak izleri ise sa\u011fda g\u00f6r\u00fclmektedir. Neil Armstrong\u2019un Apollo 11 uzay giysisinin foto\u011fraf\u0131 astronom Phil Plaittaraf\u0131ndan \u00e7ekilmi\u015ftir. Ayn\u0131 \u015fekilde tarihi giysiler Smithsonian\u2019\u0131n Ulusal Hava ve Uzay M\u00fczesi taraf\u0131ndan korunmu\u015f ve 2015 y\u0131l\u0131nda Apollo 11 astronotlar\u0131 Ay\u2019da y\u00fcr\u00fcd\u00fcklerini (ayak izlerini de dahil) foto\u011fraflam\u0131\u015flard\u0131.\nAncak yukar\u0131da g\u00f6r\u00fclen ayak izi, Neil Armstrong\u2019a de\u011fil, Armstrong\u2019a Ay boyunca e\u015flik eden di\u011fer astronot Buzz Aldrin\u2019a aittir. Aldrin, bilim adamlar\u0131n\u0131n Ay y\u00fczeyinin gerilme mukavemetini incelemesine izin vermek i\u00e7in kendi ayak izinin foto\u011fraf\u0131n\u0131 \u00e7ekmi\u015ftir ve bu foto\u011fraf, Aldrin uzay arac\u0131ndan Ay y\u00fczeyine inerken Armstrong taraf\u0131ndan \u00e7ekilen foto\u011fraftaki ayak iziyle uyu\u015fmaktad\u0131r.\nHer hal\u00fckarda, Armstrong\u2019un botlar\u0131n\u0131n taban\u0131, Ay y\u00fczeyi foto\u011fraflar\u0131nda g\u00f6r\u00fclen izlerle de e\u015fle\u015fmi\u015ftir. Armstrong, Apollo 11 misyonunda \u00e7o\u011funlukla yukar\u0131da resmedilen k\u0131yafeti giyse de, o ve Aldrin Ay\u2019\u0131n y\u00fczeyine ad\u0131m atmadan \u00f6nce botlar\u0131na lastik t\u0131rt\u0131l\u0131 olan iki b\u00fcy\u00fck galo\u015f da dahil fazladan birka\u00e7 tane daha taban takm\u0131\u015flard\u0131r:\nApollo 11 Ay ini\u015finin foto\u011fraflar\u0131, Armstrong\u2019un Ay\u2019\u0131n y\u00fczeyinde bu tabanlar\u0131 takt\u0131\u011f\u0131n\u0131 a\u00e7\u0131k\u00e7a g\u00f6stermektedir:\nKaynaklar: Snopes, flickr, slate, nasa, lakehighlands\nVideo oynat\u0131c\u0131\nhttps://dogrula.org/wp-content/uploads/2018/02/dogrula.org_.mp4\n00:00\n00:07\n[Toplam:6    Ortalama:5/5] Neil Armstrong\u2019un Uzay Giysisindeki Botlar\u0131n Ay\u2019da B\u0131rakt\u0131\u011f\u0131 S\u00f6ylenen Ayak \u0130zleri ile Uyu\u015fmad\u0131\u011f\u0131 \u0130ddias\u0131", "\u0130srail\u2019deki ABD B\u00fcy\u00fckel\u00e7ili\u011fini Limak Holding Yap\u0131yor \u0130ddias\u0131 ba\u015fl\u0131kl\u0131 yaz\u0131m\u0131zda, ge\u00e7ti\u011fimiz g\u00fcnlerde konu\u015fulan bir iddiay\u0131 ele ald\u0131k. \u0130ddiaya g\u00f6re, Amerika Birle\u015fik Devletlerinin Kud\u00fcs\u2019te yapt\u0131rmay\u0131 d\u00fc\u015f\u00fcnd\u00fc\u011f\u00fc b\u00fcy\u00fckel\u00e7ili\u011fin T\u00fcrkiye merkezli Limak Holding taraf\u0131ndan yapt\u0131r\u0131laca\u011f\u0131 s\u00f6ylenmi\u015ftir. Ancak bu iddia do\u011fru de\u011fildir. \nABD Kud\u00fcs\u2019\u00fc ba\u015fkent olarak tan\u0131mas\u0131n\u0131n ard\u0131ndan, b\u00fcy\u00fckel\u00e7ilik binas\u0131n\u0131 da Kud\u00fcs\u2019e ta\u015f\u0131mak istemi\u015ftir. Kud\u00fcs\u2019teki el\u00e7ilik binas\u0131 i\u00e7in de, aralar\u0131nda T\u00fcrk in\u015faat \u015firketi Limak\u2019\u0131n da oldu\u011fu bir konsorsiyumun yap\u0131laca\u011f\u0131 iddia edilmi\u015ftir. S\u00f6z konusu iddia, sosyal medyada ve \u00e7e\u015fitli haber sitelerinde yay\u0131nlanm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r.\nABD\u2019nin \u0130srail B\u00fcy\u00fckel\u00e7ili\u011fini yapacak olan firman\u0131n T\u00fcrk in\u015faat firmas\u0131 Limak Holding oldu\u011fu iddias\u0131 \u00e7e\u015fitli \u015fekillerde yaz\u0131lm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r. Ancak bu haberler incelendi\u011finde, haber i\u00e7eri\u011finde iddian\u0131n ger\u00e7ek olmad\u0131\u011f\u0131 da a\u00e7\u0131klanm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r.\nBir\u00e7ok gazetede ayn\u0131 \u015fekilde yay\u0131mlanan haberde, \u201cABD\u2019nin Kud\u00fcs B\u00fcy\u00fckel\u00e7ili\u011fi in\u015faat\u0131n\u0131 Limak Holding yapacak!\u201d \u015feklinde ba\u015fl\u0131klar at\u0131lm\u0131\u015f ancak haberlerin en sonunda, Limak Holding\u2019in Kud\u00fcs b\u00fcy\u00fckel\u00e7ili\u011fi projesinde yer almayaca\u011f\u0131 belirtilmi\u015ftir. Haber ba\u015fl\u0131\u011f\u0131 ve i\u00e7eri\u011finde yer alan bilgiler ile haber sonunda verilen bilgiler birbirleriyle \u00e7eli\u015fmektedir.\nAl Monitor\u2018da yazan Amberin Zaman isimli gazeteci, ABD b\u00fcy\u00fckel\u00e7ili\u011finin Kud\u00fcs\u2019e ta\u015f\u0131nmas\u0131 ile ilgili bir yaz\u0131 yazm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r. ABD as\u0131ll\u0131 Desbuild Incorporated ile ortak bir giri\u015fimde bulunan Limak Holding, BD\u2019nin Kud\u00fcs\u2019teki ge\u00e7ici el\u00e7ilik binas\u0131n\u0131n in\u015fas\u0131na kat\u0131lmay\u0131 reddetmi\u015ftir.\nTwitter hesab\u0131ndan yazd\u0131\u011f\u0131 yaz\u0131ya ili\u015fkin olarak, \u201cMaryland merkezli m\u00fcteahhit Desbuild Incorporated ile ortak giri\u015fiminde bulunan bir T\u00fcrk m\u00fcteahhit dev orta\u011f\u0131 olan Limak Holding, ABD\u2019nin Kud\u00fcs\u2019teki ge\u00e7ici el\u00e7ilik binas\u0131n\u0131n in\u015fas\u0131na kat\u0131lmay\u0131 reddetti.\u201d \u015feklinde bir payla\u015f\u0131m yapm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r.\n  Al Monitor gazetesine gelen mailde, Limak Holding ile 2012 y\u0131l\u0131ndan bu yana i\u015f birli\u011fi giri\u015fiminde bulunan, ABD as\u0131ll\u0131 Desbuild\u2018in direkt\u00f6r\u00fc Prakash Hosadurga, iddiayla ilgili de\u011ferlendirme yapm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r.\nHosadurga, bundan 5 y\u0131l \u00f6nce Limak ile Ba\u011fdat\u2019ta ger\u00e7ekle\u015fecek olan bir proje i\u00e7in bir araya geldiklerini ve bu projeyi tamamlad\u0131klar\u0131n\u0131 s\u00f6ylemi\u015ftir. \u0130ki y\u0131l \u00f6ncesinde de ABD h\u00fck\u00fcmeti, in\u015faat projeleri i\u00e7in aralar\u0131nda Limak\u2019\u0131n da bulundu\u011fu belirli firmalarla 5 y\u0131ll\u0131\u011f\u0131na bir anla\u015fma imzalam\u0131\u015ft\u0131r. Ancak ABD ile anla\u015fmas\u0131 s\u00fcren Limak, bu anla\u015fma kapsam\u0131nda b\u00fcy\u00fckel\u00e7ilik projesi teklifine kat\u0131lmak istememi\u015ftir. Desbuild direkt\u00f6r\u00fcn\u00fcn a\u00e7\u0131klamas\u0131na g\u00f6re, tamamlanmas\u0131 istenen ABD b\u00fcy\u00fckel\u00e7ili\u011finin Kud\u00fcs\u2019teki projesine kat\u0131lmay\u0131 reddetmi\u015ftir.\nLimak\u2019\u0131n \u00f6nceki y\u0131llarda ABD\u2019de birlikte i\u015f yapt\u0131\u011f\u0131 Desbuid direkt\u00f6r\u00fc Hosadurga, Desbuild\u2019in Limak olmadan da bu projeyi y\u00f6netebilece\u011fini s\u00f6ylemi\u015ftir.\nKaynaklar: Al Monitor, Twitter, Bloomberg, gazetemanifesto.com, evrensel.net, politikyol.net\nVideo oynat\u0131c\u0131\n00:00\n00:00\n1. \u201cdogrula.org\u201d\n0:07\n[Toplam:5    Ortalama:5/5] \u0130srail\u2019deki ABD B\u00fcy\u00fckel\u00e7ili\u011fini Limak Holding Yap\u0131yor \u0130ddias\u0131", "Aral\u0131k 2017\u2019de, yeni bir Facebook algoritmas\u0131n\u0131n kullan\u0131c\u0131lar\u0131n haber kayna\u011f\u0131ndaki i\u00e7eriklerin g\u00f6r\u00fcnd\u00fc\u011f\u00fc arkada\u015flar\u0131n say\u0131s\u0131n\u0131n k\u0131s\u0131tlad\u0131\u011f\u0131 s\u00f6ylentisi yay\u0131lm\u0131\u015ft\u0131.\nSosyal medyada payla\u015f\u0131lan ve etkile\u015fimi y\u00fcksek olan Facebook\u2019un yeni algoritmas\u0131 sadece 26 arkada\u015f\u0131n payla\u015f\u0131mlar\u0131n\u0131 g\u00f6steriyor iddias\u0131 do\u011fru de\u011fildir.\nFacebook, sayfan\u0131zdaki g\u00f6nderileri yaln\u0131zca belirli ki\u015filerle ula\u015facak \u015fekilde s\u0131n\u0131rlamam\u0131\u015ft\u0131r.\nGer\u00e7ek \u015fu ki, hi\u00e7 kimse Facebook\u2019un algoritmalar\u0131n\u0131n nas\u0131l \u00e7al\u0131\u015ft\u0131\u011f\u0131n\u0131 tam olarak bilmemektedir.\nBununla birlikte, bu de\u011fi\u015fikliklerin amac\u0131n\u0131n, i\u015fletme ve yay\u0131nc\u0131lar taraf\u0131ndan olu\u015fturulan reklam i\u00e7eriklerini de\u011fil, aile \u00fcyeleri ve arkada\u015flar taraf\u0131ndan payla\u015f\u0131lan g\u00f6nderilerin etkile\u015fimini artt\u0131rmak (s\u0131n\u0131rlamak de\u011fil) oldu\u011fu belirtilmi\u015ftir. Facebook kurucusu Mark Zuckerberg\u2019in s\u00f6z konusu payla\u015f\u0131m\u0131 \u015fu \u015fekildedir:\nAyr\u0131ca bu s\u00f6ylentilerin ard\u0131ndan, Facebook\u2019tan haber kayna\u011f\u0131 g\u00fcncellemesi konusunda a\u00e7\u0131klama yap\u0131lm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r. G\u00fcncellemenin amac\u0131n\u0131n, \u201ctavsiye isteyen bir arkada\u015f\u0131n\u0131z\u0131n, seyahat i\u00e7in mekan \u00f6nerileri arayan tan\u0131d\u0131\u011f\u0131n\u0131z\u0131n g\u00f6nderilerine ve haber, makale, video gibi kar\u015f\u0131l\u0131kl\u0131 yorum yapmaya ve tepki vermeye te\u015fvik eden payla\u015f\u0131mlara daha fazla yer verilmesi\u201d oldu\u011fu ifade edilmi\u015ftir.\nSnopes\u2019in haberinde belirtti\u011fine g\u00f6re, kendileri bu s\u0131n\u0131rlama iddias\u0131n\u0131n do\u011fru olup olmad\u0131\u011f\u0131n\u0131 sormak i\u00e7in Facebook ile ba\u011flant\u0131ya ge\u00e7mi\u015f, bir temsilci onlara bu dedikodular\u0131n as\u0131ls\u0131z oldu\u011funu s\u00f6ylemi\u015ftir. Viral olan pek \u00e7ok Facebook algoritmas\u0131 haberinde oldu\u011fu gibi, bu s\u00f6ylentilerin de \u201cyanl\u0131\u015f y\u00f6nlendirilmi\u015f\u201d ve \u201cetkisiz\u201d oldu\u011fu ifade edilmi\u015ftir.\nKaynak: facebook, facebook2\nVideo oynat\u0131c\u0131\nhttps://dogrula.org/wp-content/uploads/2018/02/dogrula.org_.mp4\n00:00\n00:07\n[Toplam:4    Ortalama:4.8/5] Facebook\u2019un Yeni Algoritmas\u0131 Sadece 26 Arkada\u015f\u0131n Payla\u015f\u0131mlar\u0131n\u0131 G\u00f6steriyor \u0130ddias\u0131", "\u0130ddiaya g\u00f6re, Tayland\u2019da bir ma\u011farada haftalarca mahsur kalan \u00e7ocuklar kurtar\u0131ld\u0131ktan sonra, Ba\u015fkan Trump\u2019la g\u00f6r\u00fc\u015fmemek i\u00e7in ma\u011faraya geri d\u00f6nmeyi tercih ettiler. Ancak Snopes\u2019in analizine g\u00f6re, ma\u011faradan kurtar\u0131lan Taylandl\u0131 \u00e7ocuklar\u0131n Trump\u2019la g\u00f6r\u00fc\u015fmemek i\u00e7in ma\u011faraya geri d\u00f6nd\u00fc\u011f\u00fc iddias\u0131 do\u011fru de\u011fildir.\nYa\u015flar\u0131 11 ile 17 aras\u0131nda de\u011fi\u015fen 12 \u00e7ocuk ve 25 ya\u015f\u0131ndaki antren\u00f6rleri 23 Haziran\u2019da gezi i\u00e7in gittikleri ma\u011farada sular\u0131n birden y\u00fckselmesiyle mahsur kalm\u0131\u015ft\u0131. Ekip, riskli operasyonlar neticesinde 9 g\u00fcn sonra (mahsur kal\u0131\u015flar\u0131n\u0131n 18. g\u00fcn\u00fcnde) bulunmu\u015ftu.\n11 Temmuz 2018\u2019de Burrard Street Journal web sitesi, Taylandl\u0131 birka\u00e7 \u00e7ocu\u011fun kurtar\u0131ld\u0131ktan sonra Beyaz Saray\u2019da Ba\u015fkan Trump\u2019la g\u00f6r\u00fc\u015fmektense iki hafta mahsur kald\u0131klar\u0131 su dolu ma\u011faraya d\u00f6nmeyi tercih ettiklerine dair bir makale yay\u0131nland\u0131.\nMakalenin ilgili b\u00f6l\u00fcm\u00fc:\nWASHINGTON, DC\u200a\u2014\u200aAmerikan Ba\u015fkan\u0131 Donald Trump\u2019\u0131n, kurtar\u0131lan Taylandl\u0131 \u00e7ocuklara teklif etti\u011fi Beyaz Saray ziyareti geri \u00e7evrildi ve \u00e7ocuklar oy birli\u011fiyle su dolu ma\u011faraya geri d\u00f6nmeye karar verdiler.\n\u015eu anda % 95\u2019in \u00fczerinde suyla dolu olan ma\u011fara, \u00f6zellikle g\u00f6\u00e7men olarak g\u00f6r\u00fclen ve ICE ( ABD G\u00f6\u00e7menlik ve G\u00fcmr\u00fck Muhafaza) taraf\u0131ndan g\u00f6zalt\u0131nda tutulan gen\u00e7 \u00e7ocuklar i\u00e7in Beyaz Saray\u2019dan daha cazip g\u00f6r\u00fcld\u00fc.\n\u00c7ocuklar\u0131n futbol antren\u00f6r\u00fc, \u201cCehenneme gidip d\u00f6nd\u00fcler ve \u015fimdi onlar\u0131 ba\u015fka bir cehenneme g\u00f6ndermek mi istiyorsunuz? Hay\u0131r. Bu \u00e7ocuklar yeterince \u00e7ekti.\u201d dedi.\nWeb sitesinde yer alan bu ifadelerin hi\u00e7biri do\u011fru de\u011fildir.\nBaz\u0131 okurlar haberi ger\u00e7ek sansa da, makale \u201chakk\u0131nda\u201d b\u00f6l\u00fcm\u00fcnde sitenin i\u00e7eri\u011finin hiciv niteli\u011fini a\u00e7\u0131k\u00e7a belirten \u00fcnl\u00fc Kanada merkezli bir e\u011flence sitesi olan Burrard Street Journal\u2019in (\u201cBS Journal\u201d olarak da bilinir) mevcut ABD y\u00f6netiminin g\u00f6\u00e7men politikas\u0131n\u0131 tiye ald\u0131\u011f\u0131 bir yaz\u0131d\u0131r.\nKaynaklar: bbc, bbc2, archive, bsjournal\nVideo oynat\u0131c\u0131\nhttps://dogrula.org/wp-content/uploads/2018/02/dogrula.org_.mp4\n00:00\n00:07\n[Toplam:6    Ortalama:5/5] Ma\u011faradan Kurtar\u0131lan Taylandl\u0131 \u00c7ocuklar\u0131n Trump\u2019la G\u00f6r\u00fc\u015fmemek \u0130\u00e7in Ma\u011faraya Geri D\u00f6nd\u00fc\u011f\u00fc \u0130ddias\u0131", "Cep Telefonu Kullan\u0131ld\u0131\u011f\u0131 \u0130\u00e7in Araban\u0131n Patlad\u0131\u011f\u0131 \u0130ddias\u0131 ba\u015fl\u0131kl\u0131 i\u00e7eri\u011fimizde, bir benzin istasyonunda meydana gelen patlaman\u0131n cep telefonundan kaynakl\u0131 olup olmad\u0131\u011f\u0131n\u0131 inceledik. G\u00fcvenlik kameralar\u0131na yakalanan videoda, bir benzin istasyonunda patlama oldu\u011fu g\u00f6r\u00fclmektedir. \u0130ddiaya g\u00f6re patlaman\u0131n, araban\u0131n arka koltu\u011funda oturan bir \u00e7ocu\u011fun cep telefonu kulland\u0131\u011f\u0131 i\u00e7in meydana geldi\u011fi belirtilmi\u015ftir. Ancak bu iddia do\u011fru de\u011fildir. \nBrezilya\u2019da bir benzin istasyonunda ger\u00e7ekle\u015fen patlaman\u0131n cep telefonu kullan\u0131m\u0131yla bir ilgisi bulunmamaktad\u0131r. Ayr\u0131ca d\u00fcnya \u00fczerinde cep telefonlar\u0131n\u0131n, ara\u00e7lar\u0131n patlamas\u0131na sebebiyet verdi\u011fine dair bir kan\u0131t yoktur.\nSnopes\u2018tan ele al\u0131nan iddiaya g\u00f6re, bir Facebook hesab\u0131nda, Brezilya\u2019n\u0131n S\u00e3o Gon\u00e7alo kentindeki bir benzin istasyonunda meydana gelen patlaman\u0131n nedeninin, araban\u0131n i\u00e7indeki \u00e7ocuklar\u0131n telefon kullanmas\u0131ndan dolay\u0131 oldu\u011fu iddia edilmi\u015ftir.\n\u201c### UYARI !!!! #### Bu korkun\u00e7 kaza ger\u00e7ekle\u015fene kadar, s\u00fcr\u00fcc\u00fc benzin al\u0131rken \u00e7ocuklar\u0131 konu\u015fup mesajla\u015fmak \u00fczere cep telefonu kullanyordu. Telefon ve wi-fi sinyalleri bu kazaya sebep oldu. L\u00fctfen benzin al\u0131rken telefon kullanmay\u0131n.\u201d\nVideonun payla\u015f\u0131ld\u0131\u011f\u0131 g\u00f6nderide, ara\u00e7 s\u00fcr\u00fcc\u00fcs\u00fcn\u00fcn yak\u0131t almak i\u00e7in d\u0131\u015far\u0131 \u00e7\u0131kt\u0131\u011f\u0131 s\u0131rada, arac\u0131n i\u00e7inde bulunan \u00e7ocuklar\u0131 cep telefonu kulland\u0131\u011f\u0131 ve telefona ba\u011fl\u0131 olan W\u0130-F\u0130 a\u011f sinyallerinin arac\u0131n patlamas\u0131na yol a\u00e7t\u0131\u011f\u0131 iddia edilmi\u015f ve benzin istasyonundayken telefon kullan\u0131lmamas\u0131 gerekti\u011fi vurgulanm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r.\nAncak haberin orijinal haline bak\u0131ld\u0131\u011f\u0131nda, meydana gelen patlaman\u0131n telefon kullan\u0131m\u0131yla ilgili olmad\u0131\u011f\u0131 anla\u015f\u0131lmaktad\u0131r. 8 Nisan 2017 tarihinde ger\u00e7ekle\u015fen olayda, otomobilin i\u00e7inde olan 27 ya\u015f\u0131ndaki bir kad\u0131n hayat\u0131n\u0131 kaybetmi\u015f ve beraberinde 2 ki\u015fi yaralanm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r. Medyana gelen patlama, Brezilya\u2019n\u0131n bir\u00e7ok yerel ve ulusal gazetelerinde haber yap\u0131lm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r. Bu haberler incelendi\u011finde, patlaman\u0131n cep telefonundan kaynakl\u0131 meydana geldi\u011fine dair herhangi bir bilgi yoktur.\n\u0130ncelenen haberler genel olarak patlaman\u0131n nedenini, do\u011fal gaz t\u00fcp\u00fcn\u00fcn i\u00e7inde bas\u0131n\u00e7 birikmesinden kaynakl\u0131 oldu\u011funu belirtmi\u015flerdir. Baz\u0131 haber kaynaklar\u0131nda ise, patlaman\u0131n sebebinin net olarak anla\u015f\u0131lmas\u0131 i\u00e7in bilir ki\u015fi raporunun beklendi\u011fi s\u00f6ylenmi\u015ftir.\nBenzinlikte Telefon Kullanmak Tehlikeli mi?\nBenzin istasyonlar\u0131nda cep telefonu kullanman\u0131n, bir patlamaya sebebiyet verdi\u011fine uzun y\u0131llarca inan\u0131lm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r. Benzin istasyonlar\u0131na, cep telefonu kullan\u0131lmamas\u0131na y\u00f6nelik uyar\u0131 levhalar\u0131 konulmas\u0131 da insanlar\u0131n zihninde herhangi bir patlamaya maruz kalacaklar\u0131 d\u00fc\u015f\u00fcncesi uyand\u0131rm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r.\nAmerika Birle\u015fik Devletlerinin eyaletler aras\u0131 ve uluslararas\u0131 ileti\u015fim kanallar\u0131n\u0131 denetleyen resmi kurumu Federal \u0130leti\u015fim Kurulu (FCC), benzin istasyonlar\u0131nda cep telefonu kullan\u0131m\u0131yla ilgili bir rapor yay\u0131nlam\u0131\u015ft\u0131r. 2016 y\u0131l\u0131nda yay\u0131nlanan rapor, bir arac\u0131n benzin istasyonunda yak\u0131t dolumu yap\u0131l\u0131rken, mobil telefon kullanman\u0131n tehlikeli oldu\u011fu s\u00f6ylentilerine kar\u015f\u0131 uyarmaktad\u0131r.\n  FCC\u2019nin raporuna g\u00f6re, s\u00f6ylentilerde cep telefonundan yay\u0131lan sinyallerin patlamalara neden oldu\u011fu iddialar\u0131n\u0131n herhangi bir kan\u0131t\u0131 yoktur. Kablosuz telefonlar\u0131n yan\u0131c\u0131 maddeleri tutu\u015fturabilecek k\u0131v\u0131lc\u0131mlar olu\u015fturma potansiyeli \u00fczerine \u00e7al\u0131\u015fmalar yap\u0131lm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r. \u00c7al\u0131\u015fmalar genel olarak, bir cep telefonu bataryas\u0131ndan gelen bir k\u0131v\u0131lc\u0131m\u0131n \u00e7ok hassas ko\u015fullarda gaz buhar\u0131n\u0131 tutu\u015fturmas\u0131 i\u00e7in teorik olarak m\u00fcmk\u00fcn olsa da, bir kablosuz telefonun kullan\u0131m\u0131nda bir yang\u0131na veya patlamaya neden oldu\u011funa dair belgelenmi\u015f bir olay olmad\u0131\u011f\u0131 sonucuna var\u0131lm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r.\n  Yine yay\u0131nlanan rapora g\u00f6re, bilimsel testler, kablosuz telefonlar ve yak\u0131t buharlar\u0131 aras\u0131nda tehlikeli bir ba\u011flant\u0131 kurulmam\u0131\u015ft\u0131r. Ayr\u0131ca bununla ilgili bug\u00fcne kadar meydana gelen bir olaya rastlanmam\u0131\u015ft\u0131r. Kablosuz telefon \u00fcreticileri ve yak\u0131t \u015firketleri benzin istasyonlar\u0131nda bulunan \u201ccep telefonu kullanmak yasakt\u0131r\u201d gibi uyar\u0131lar\u0131 bir \u00f6nlem olarak vermektedirler.\nKaynaklar: Snopes, FFC, Youtube, Extra, Macaubenselife, O Sao Gon\u00e7alo, Bhaz\nVideo oynat\u0131c\u0131\n00:00\n00:00\n1. \u201cdogrula.org\u201d\n0:07\n[Toplam:5    Ortalama:5/5] Cep Telefonu Kullan\u0131ld\u0131\u011f\u0131 \u0130\u00e7in Araban\u0131n Patlad\u0131\u011f\u0131 \u0130ddias\u0131", "Trump Dr. \u00d6z\u2019\u00fc Spor, Sa\u011fl\u0131k Ve Beslenmeden Sorumlu Dan\u0131\u015fma Konseyi\u2019ne dahil etti iddias\u0131, ABD ve T\u00fcrkiye bas\u0131n\u0131nda geni\u015f yer bulmu\u015f bir konudur; Beyaz Saray bas\u0131n a\u00e7\u0131klamas\u0131 ve Dr. \u00d6z\u2019\u00fcn att\u0131\u011f\u0131 twitte de g\u00f6r\u00fcld\u00fc\u011f\u00fc \u00fczere, iddia do\u011frudur.\nSnopes\u2019in do\u011frulamas\u0131nda da yer verdi\u011fi \u00fczere, Beyaz Saray bas\u0131n a\u00e7\u0131klamas\u0131na g\u00f6re, 4 May\u0131s 2018 tarihinde ABD Ba\u015fkan\u0131 Donald J. Trump a\u015fa\u011f\u0131daki ki\u015fileri iki y\u0131ll\u0131k bir s\u00fcre i\u00e7in Spor, Fitness ve Beslenme ile ilgili Ba\u015fkan Konseyi\u2019ne \u00fcye olarak atamak istedi\u011fini duyurmu\u015ftu:\n  Ba\u015fkan\u0131n Spor, Fitness ve Beslenme Konseyi (PCSFN)\nPCSFN (President\u2019s Council on Sports, Fitness & Nutrition,) t\u00fcm Amerikal\u0131lar\u0131n d\u00fczenli fiziksel aktivite ve iyi beslenmeyi i\u00e7eren sa\u011fl\u0131kl\u0131 bir ya\u015fam tarz\u0131n\u0131 benimsemeleri i\u00e7in \u00e7al\u0131\u015f\u0131r, e\u011fitir ve g\u00fc\u00e7lendirir. Konsey, 1956\u2019dan beri te\u015fvik etmek amac\u0131yla her ya\u015ftan insan\u0131 motive eden programlar ve giri\u015fimler yapm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r.\nABD\u2019de ya\u015fayan T\u00fcrk-Amerikan hekim ve sunucu olan Mehmet Cengiz \u00d6z, halk aras\u0131nda bilinen ad\u0131yla Dr Oz, Trump taraf\u0131ndan sunulan di\u011fer pek \u00e7ok aday gibi bir televizyon ki\u015fili\u011fidir. 2000\u2019li y\u0131llar\u0131n ba\u015f\u0131nda Oprah Winfrey Show\u2019da bir sa\u011fl\u0131k uzman\u0131 olarak ortaya \u00e7\u0131kt\u0131ktan sonra y\u0131ld\u0131z\u0131 parlam\u0131\u015ft\u0131r. Kendisi kardiyotorasik (g\u00f6\u011f\u00fcs ve kalp-damar cerrahisi) cerraht\u0131r.\nColumbia \u00dcniversitesi\u2019nde ba\u015fkan yard\u0131mc\u0131s\u0131 ve cerrahi profes\u00f6r\u00fc oan Mehmet \u00d6z, halen New York Presbyterian Hastanesi\u2019nde Kalp ve Damar Enstit\u00fcs\u00fc ve Tamamlay\u0131c\u0131 \u0130la\u00e7 Program\u0131n\u0131 y\u00f6netmektedir. Dr. \u00d6z, 2009 y\u0131l\u0131ndan bu yana ABD televizyonlar\u0131nda yay\u0131nlanan \u201cThe Dr. Oz Show\u201d adl\u0131 sa\u011fl\u0131k ve kaliteli ya\u015famla i\u00e7erikli bir talk show yapmaktad\u0131r. Pek \u00e7ok takip\u00e7isi olan \u00d6z, \u00e7ok sevilen ve takip edilen bir TV ki\u015fili\u011fi haine gelmi\u015ftir.\nDonald Trump 2016 y\u0131l\u0131nda The Dr. Oz Show\u2019a konuk olmu\u015ftu. Trump\u2019un ki\u015fisel doktoru Harold Bornstein\u2019den  ald\u0131\u011f\u0131 kapsaml\u0131 bilgileri inceleyen \u00d6z, \u201cBu kay\u0131tlar hastalar\u0131mdan birine ait olsayd\u0131, \u00e7ok mutlu olurdum ve onu evine g\u00f6nderirdim\u201d diyerek Trump\u2019\u0131n sa\u011fl\u0131k durumunun iyi oldu\u011funa i\u015faret etmi\u015fti.\nSa\u011fl\u0131k Haberleri \u0130ncelemeleri taraf\u0131ndan ger\u00e7ekle\u015ftirilen Dr. Oz Show\u2019un 2018 tarihli bir analizinde, \u201cDr. Oz \u015fovunda yap\u0131lan a\u00e7\u0131klamalar\u0131n %78\u2019inin kan\u0131ta dayal\u0131 t\u0131bbi ilkeler, toplum \u00f6nerileri veya yetki beyanlar\u0131 ile uyu\u015fmad\u0131\u011f\u0131\u201d sonucuna var\u0131lm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r. \u015eovun i\u00e7eri\u011finin \u00e7o\u011funun yay\u0131n s\u0131ras\u0131nda reklam\u0131 yap\u0131lan \u00fcr\u00fcnlerle do\u011frudan ili\u015fkili oldu\u011fu s\u00f6ylenmi\u015ftir.\nDr. Mehmet \u00d6z ve konuklar\u0131n\u0131n bir\u00e7ok iddias\u0131 herhangi bir ara\u015ft\u0131rmaya dayand\u0131r\u0131lamam\u0131\u015ft\u0131r ancak 4 May\u0131s 2018 g\u00fcn\u00fc atm\u0131\u015f oldu\u011fu bu tweet, ger\u00e7ekten de Spor, Sa\u011fl\u0131k Ve Beslenmeden Sorumlu Dan\u0131\u015fma Konseyi\u2019nde bir g\u00f6rev \u00fcstlendi\u011fini g\u00f6stermektedir.\nI've been supporting children\u2019s health programs with @HealthCorps and appreciate the need to improve lifestyle opportunities for our youth. Serving on @FitnessGov offers a platform to amplify the best practices shown to work across our school systems. https://t.co/dOgapXQinI\n\u2014 Dr. Mehmet Oz (@DrOz) May 4, 2018\nTwitte yazan: @HealthCorps ile \u00e7ocuk sa\u011fl\u0131\u011f\u0131 programlar\u0131n\u0131 destekliyorum ve gen\u00e7lerimiz i\u00e7in ya\u015fam tarz\u0131  f\u0131rsatlar\u0131n\u0131 iyile\u015ftirme ihtiyac\u0131n\u0131 takdir ediyorum. @FitnessGov\u2019da hizmet vermek, okul sistemimizde \u00e7al\u0131\u015fmada g\u00f6sterilen uygulamalar\u0131 geli\u015ftirmek i\u00e7in bir platform sunuyor.\nEdit\u00f6r\u00fcn notu: Haberin bir k\u0131sm\u0131, Snopes fact-checking sitesinden al\u0131nm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r.\nKaynaklar: whitehouse, hhs, wikipedia, youtube, healthnewsreview, thedrozshow, twitter\nVideo oynat\u0131c\u0131\nhttps://dogrula.org/wp-content/uploads/2018/02/dogrula.org_.mp4\n00:00\n00:07\n[Toplam:5    Ortalama:5/5] Trump Dr. \u00d6z\u2019\u00fc Spor, Sa\u011fl\u0131k ve Beslenmeden Sorumlu Dan\u0131\u015fma Konseyi\u2019ne Dahil Etti \u0130ddias\u0131", "ABD Ba\u015fkan\u0131 Donald Trump\u2019\u0131n e\u015fi First Lady Melania Trump\u2019\u0131n, g\u00f6\u00e7men \u00e7ocuklar\u0131 ziyarete giderken giydi\u011fi cekette \u201cGer\u00e7ekten umursam\u0131yorum, ya sen?\u201d yazd\u0131\u011f\u0131 iddias\u0131 do\u011frudur.\nMelania Trump 21 Haziran 2018 y\u0131l\u0131nda, ailelerinden ayr\u0131lan s\u0131n\u0131r b\u00f6lgesindeki g\u00f6\u00e7men \u00e7ocuklar\u0131 ziyaret etti\u011fi yolculuk esnas\u0131nda \u00fczerindeki cekette yaz\u0131lanlar sosyal medyada geni\u015f yank\u0131 uyand\u0131rm\u0131\u015ft\u0131.\nFirst Lady\u2019nin arkas\u0131nda \u201cI REALLY DON\u2019T CARE DO U\u201d (Ger\u00e7ekten Umursam\u0131yorum, Ya Sen?) yazan ve boyal\u0131 tasar\u0131m\u0131 olan ordu-ye\u015fili ceketi, sosyal medyada h\u0131zla yay\u0131ld\u0131. CNN\u2019in Beyaz Saray muhabiri Jim Acosta, foto\u011fraflar\u0131n ve Melania Trump\u2019\u0131n giydi\u011fi k\u0131yafetin ger\u00e7ek oldu\u011funu Twitter hesab\u0131ndan hemen do\u011frulad\u0131.\nTwitte yazan: FLOTUS (Melania Trump\u2019un Twitter s\u00f6zc\u00fcs\u00fc) Bayan Trump\u2019\u0131n s\u0131n\u0131rdaki \u00e7ocuklar\u0131 ziyaret ederken bu ceketi giydi\u011fini do\u011frulad\u0131. S\u00f6zc\u00fc: \u201cBu yaln\u0131zca bir ceket. Gizli bir mesaj yoktu. Bug\u00fcn Texas\u2019a yap\u0131lan \u00f6nemli ziyaretten sonra umar\u0131m medya Melania\u2019n\u0131n gard\u0131robuna odaklanmay\u0131 tercih etmez.\n  Jim Acosta\u2019n\u0131n g\u00f6zlemi di\u011fer muhabirler taraf\u0131ndan foto\u011fraflarla do\u011fruland\u0131:\nTwitte yazan: First Lady\u2019nin Texas\u2019taki g\u00f6\u00e7men aileleri ziyaret ederken u\u00e7akta giydi\u011fi 39 dolarl\u0131k Zara cekette,  \u201cI REALLY DON\u2019T CARE DO U\u201d (Ger\u00e7ekten Umursam\u0131yorum, Ya Sen?) yazmaktad\u0131r.\nTwitte yazan: Bu sabah u\u00e7a\u011fa binerken @Flotus (Melania Trump), asker ye\u015fili tarz\u0131nda bir @Zara ceket giydi. Ancak arkas\u0131nda, \u201cI REALLY DON\u2019T CARE DO U\u201d (Ger\u00e7ekten Umursam\u0131yorum, Ya Sen?) yaz\u0131yordu. Talihsiz bir terzilik karar\u0131\u2026\n  Melania Trump\u2019\u0131n \u0130leti\u015fim Direkt\u00f6r\u00fc Stephanie Grisham da, Twitter\u2019deki ceket tart\u0131\u015fmas\u0131na de\u011findi ve First Lady\u2019nin ayn\u0131 g\u00fcn i\u00e7inde giyindi\u011fi farkl\u0131 bir soluk sar\u0131 ceketle oldu\u011fu videosunu payla\u015ft\u0131:\nTwitte yazan: Bug\u00fcnk\u00fc \u00e7ocuklarla olan Texas ziyareti Melania Trump\u2019\u0131 \u00e7ok etkiledi. Media zaman\u0131n\u0131 ve enerjisini Melania\u2019n\u0131n gard\u0131robuna odaklanmak yerine, onun \u00e7ocuklara yard\u0131m etmek i\u00e7in g\u00f6sterdi\u011fi \u00e7aba ve hareketlere odaklanmaya harcarsa \u00e7ocuklar\u0131n yarar\u0131na \u00e7ok \u015fey ba\u015farm\u0131\u015f oluruz.\n.@FLOTUS: \"We all know they are here without their families, and I want to thank you for your hard work, your compassion, and your kindness you're giving them in these difficult times.\" https://t.co/atwSL8nqq6 pic.twitter.com/iK44O5dgis\n\u2014 Fox News (@FoxNews) June 21, 2018\n  Ba\u015fkan Trump daha sonra e\u015finin ceketindeki mesaj\u0131n \u201cSahte Haber Medyas\u0131\u201dna at\u0131fta bulundu\u011funu  s\u00f6yleyen bir tweet att\u0131:\nTwitte yazan: Melania\u2019n\u0131n ceketinde yazan \u201cI REALLY DON\u2019T CARE DO U\u201d (Ger\u00e7ekten Umursam\u0131yorum, Ya Sen?), Sahte Haber Medyas\u0131\u2019na at\u0131fta bulunuyor. Melania onlar\u0131n ne kadar sahtekar olduklar\u0131n\u0131 \u00f6\u011frendi ve art\u0131k ger\u00e7ekten umurunda de\u011fil!\nInStyle dergisine g\u00f6re, \u201cI REALLY DON\u2019T CARE DO U\u201d (Ger\u00e7ekten Umursam\u0131yorum, Ya Sen?) ceketi, Zara\u2019n\u0131n 39 dolara sat\u0131lm\u0131\u015f olan ge\u00e7en sezon \u00fcr\u00fcn\u00fc.\nEdit\u00f6r\u00fcn notu: Haber, Snopes fact-checking sitesinden al\u0131nm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r.\nKaynaklar: Twitter1, Twitter2, Twitter3, Twitter4, Twitter5, Instyle\nVideo oynat\u0131c\u0131\nhttps://dogrula.org/wp-content/uploads/2018/02/dogrula.org_.mp4\n00:00\n00:07\n[Toplam:7    Ortalama:5/5] Melania Trump\u2019\u0131n G\u00f6\u00e7men \u00c7ocuklar\u0131 Ziyarete Giderken \u00dcst\u00fcnde \u201cGer\u00e7ekten Umursam\u0131yorum, Ya Sen?\u201d Yaz\u0131l\u0131 Ceket Giydi\u011fi\u00a0\u0130ddias\u0131", "\u201c200 TL \u00dczerine Cumhurba\u015fkan\u0131 Erdo\u011fan\u2019\u0131n Resminin Bas\u0131ld\u0131\u011f\u0131 \u0130ddias\u0131\u201dba\u015fl\u0131kl\u0131 i\u00e7eri\u011fimizde, sosyal medyada son birka\u00e7 y\u0131ld\u0131r g\u00fcndeme gelen ve farkl\u0131 bir\u00e7ok hesap taraf\u0131ndan payla\u015f\u0131lan bir iddiay\u0131 inceledik. Bu iddia, Cumhurba\u015fkan\u0131 Erdo\u011fan\u2019\u0131n resminin 200 T\u00fcrk Liras\u0131 (TL) \u00fczerine bas\u0131ld\u0131\u011f\u0131na ili\u015fkindir, ancak s\u00f6z konusu iddia do\u011fru de\u011fildir.\nSosyal medyada payla\u015f\u0131lan ve etkile\u015fim alan bir payla\u015f\u0131mda Cumhurba\u015fkan\u0131 Recep Tayyip Erdo\u011fan\u2019\u0131n resminin 200 TL \u00fczerine bas\u0131ld\u0131\u011f\u0131 iddia edilmi\u015ftir. Ancak Darphane ve Damga Matbaas\u0131 Genel M\u00fcd\u00fcrl\u00fc\u011f\u00fc taraf\u0131ndan banknot (ka\u011f\u0131t para) \u015feklinde para bas\u0131m\u0131 yap\u0131lmamaktad\u0131r. Banknot \u015feklindeki paralar, Merkez Bankas\u0131 taraf\u0131ndan bas\u0131lmaktad\u0131r. Ancak yine de hem Darphane ve Damga Matbaas\u0131 Genel M\u00fcd\u00fcrl\u00fc\u011f\u00fcn\u00fcn hem de Merkez Bankas\u0131n\u0131n verileri incelenmi\u015f ve payla\u015f\u0131mlardaki iddian\u0131n do\u011fru olmad\u0131\u011f\u0131 sonucuna ula\u015f\u0131lm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r.\nT\u00fcrkiye Cumhuriyet Merkez Bankas\u0131n\u0131n resmi sitesinde bulunan \u201cBanknotlar\u201d b\u00f6l\u00fcm\u00fcnde dola\u015f\u0131mdaki banknotlar ve \u00f6zelliklerine yer verilmi\u015ftir. Bu b\u00f6l\u00fcmde 200 T\u00fcrk Liras\u0131\u2019n\u0131n 27 Mart 2017 tarihinde dola\u015f\u0131ma \u00e7\u0131kt\u0131\u011f\u0131 3. tertipteki halinin \u00f6rne\u011fi bulunmaktad\u0131r. Buna g\u00f6re 200 TL\u2019nin \u00f6rnek g\u00f6r\u00fcn\u00fcm\u00fcnde Cumhurba\u015fkan\u0131 Recep Tayyip Erdo\u011fan\u2019\u0131n resminin/portresinin yer almad\u0131\u011f\u0131 g\u00f6r\u00fclmektedir. Dola\u015f\u0131ma \u00e7\u0131kan son tertip 200 TL\u2019nin \u00f6n ve arka y\u00fczlerinin g\u00f6r\u00fclebildi\u011fi \u00f6rne\u011fi \u015f\u00f6yle:\n\u0130ddia konusu payla\u015f\u0131mda s\u00f6z konusu 200 TL\u2019lerin darphanede bas\u0131ld\u0131\u011f\u0131 ve bekletildi\u011fi iddia edilmi\u015ftir. Ancak darphanede ka\u011f\u0131t para bas\u0131lmamaktad\u0131r. Darphanede bas\u0131m\u0131 ve da\u011f\u0131t\u0131m\u0131 yap\u0131lan de\u011ferler \u015f\u00f6yledir: madeni ufakl\u0131k (metal para) ve hat\u0131ra para, Cumhuriyet alt\u0131n sikkeleri ile Cumhuriyet ziynet alt\u0131nlar\u0131n\u0131n bas\u0131m\u0131, resmi m\u00fch\u00fcrlerin, madalyon, madalya ve ni\u015fanlar\u0131n \u00fcretimi, her \u00e7e\u015fit vize ve har\u00e7 pullar\u0131 ile de\u011ferli ka\u011f\u0131tlar (hisse senedi, tahvil, bono vb.)\nDarphanede bas\u0131lan bu de\u011ferler de kamuoyunun bilgisi d\u0131\u015f\u0131nda bas\u0131lamamaktad\u0131r. Dolay\u0131s\u0131yla hat\u0131ra paralar\u0131 dahil olmak \u00fczere darphanede bas\u0131lan t\u00fcm paralara dair veriler kamuoyuyla payla\u015f\u0131lmaktad\u0131r.\nSon olarak s\u00f6z konusu sahte payla\u015f\u0131mlara konu olan iddia g\u00f6rseli, 01.01.2009 tarihinde dola\u015f\u0131ma \u00e7\u0131kan 1.tertip 200 TL\u2019nin montajlanm\u0131\u015f halidir. Payla\u015f\u0131mlardaki montajl\u0131 200 TL\u2019nin \u00fczerinde bulunan Ba\u015fkan ve Ba\u015fkan Yard\u0131mc\u0131s\u0131 imzalar\u0131, 1 Ocak 2009 y\u0131l\u0131nda dola\u015f\u0131ma \u00e7\u0131kan 1. tertip banknotlardakiyle ayn\u0131d\u0131r.\nMontajl\u0131 G\u00f6rsel ve \u00fczerindeki imzalar:\nDola\u015f\u0131m tarihi 01.01.2009 olan orijinal 200 TL ve \u00fczerindeki imzalar:\nAyr\u0131ca montajl\u0131 g\u00f6rselin \u00fczerinde b\u00fcy\u00fck ihtimalle g\u00f6rseli haz\u0131rlayan veya payla\u015fan Facebook hesab\u0131n\u0131n adresi bulunmaktad\u0131r. Montajl\u0131 g\u00f6rselin \u00fcst taraf\u0131nda T\u00fcrkiye Cumhuriyet Merkez Bankas\u0131 yazan k\u0131s\u0131mda da Cumhurba\u015fkan\u0131 Erdo\u011fan\u2019\u0131n resminin montajlanmas\u0131 sebebiyle, \u201cBankas\u0131\u201d kelimesinin netli\u011fi bozulmu\u015ftur.\nYukar\u0131da yer alan t\u00fcm a\u00e7\u0131klamalara ra\u011fmen yine de iddia hakk\u0131nda bilgi almak \u00fczere Darphane ve Damga Matbaas\u0131 Genel M\u00fcd\u00fcrl\u00fc\u011f\u00fc ile g\u00f6r\u00fc\u015fmelerde bulunduk ve \u201cs\u00f6z konusu iddialar\u0131n do\u011fru olmad\u0131\u011f\u0131, Darphane\u2019de sadece madeni (metal) para bas\u0131ld\u0131\u011f\u0131\u201d cevab\u0131n\u0131 ald\u0131k.\nKaynaklar: tcmb.gov, tcmb.gov 2, facebook, tcmb.gov 3, darphane.gov, darphane.gov 2, darphane.gov 3, tcmb.gov 4\nVideo oynat\u0131c\u0131\nhttps://dogrula.org/wp-content/uploads/2018/02/dogrula.org_.mp4\n00:00\n00:07\n[Toplam:6    Ortalama:4.7/5] 200 TL \u00dczerine Cumhurba\u015fkan\u0131 Erdo\u011fan\u2019\u0131n Resminin Bas\u0131ld\u0131\u011f\u0131 \u0130ddias\u0131", "Nil Timsah\u0131na \u0130stanbul\u2019da Tecav\u00fcz Edildi \u0130ddias\u0131 ba\u015fl\u0131kl\u0131 yaz\u0131m\u0131zda, ge\u00e7ti\u011fimiz g\u00fcnlerde bir forum sitesinde yap\u0131lan bir payla\u015f\u0131mda yer alan iddiay\u0131 inceledik. \u0130ddiaya g\u00f6re \u0130stanbul\u2019da bir hayvanat bah\u00e7esinde g\u00f6revli bir ki\u015fi taraf\u0131ndan Nil timsah\u0131 t\u00fcr\u00fcne tecav\u00fcz edilmi\u015ftir.\n\u0130stanbul\u2019da Nil timsah\u0131na tecav\u00fcz edildi\u011fi iddia edilmi\u015f ve tecav\u00fcz eden ki\u015finin 57 ya\u015f\u0131nda N.K. oldu\u011fu s\u00f6ylenmi\u015ftir. \u0130ddiada, tecav\u00fcz zanl\u0131s\u0131n\u0131n hayvanat bah\u00e7esinde bir temizlik g\u00f6revlisi oldu\u011fu ve 6 ay boyunca timsaha tecav\u00fcz etti\u011fi belirtilmi\u015ftir. Ancak bu iddia do\u011fru de\u011fildir. \nS\u00f6z konusu iddia, haber sitelerinde ayr\u0131nt\u0131l\u0131 olarak yaz\u0131lm\u0131\u015f ve normal bir haber olarak okuyuculara sunulmu\u015ftur. Haberde su\u00e7u i\u015fledi\u011fi iddia edilen zanl\u0131n\u0131n, timsahlar\u0131n ceylan, geyik gibi masum ve savunmas\u0131z hayvanlara sald\u0131r\u0131p yedi\u011fini ve bu nedenle intikam almak i\u00e7in tecav\u00fcz edildi\u011fi iddia edilmi\u015ftir.\n\u0130ddia, ge\u00e7ti\u011fimiz y\u0131llarda da haber olarak payla\u015f\u0131lm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r ancak Haberde belirtilen tecav\u00fcz olay\u0131 ve sonras\u0131nda verilen mahkeme karar\u0131 hayal \u00fcr\u00fcn\u00fc olup ger\u00e7e\u011fi yans\u0131tmamaktad\u0131r.  Ge\u00e7ti\u011fimiz y\u0131llarda da payla\u015f\u0131lan iddian\u0131n herhangi bir kayna\u011f\u0131 yoktur. \u0130ddia, daha \u00f6nceden var olan ancak g\u00fcn\u00fcm\u00fczde sitesine ula\u015f\u0131lamayan, mizahi haberler payla\u015fan Kirpi adl\u0131 internet sitesinden dola\u015f\u0131ma koyulmu\u015ftur. Bu sitede, do\u011fruluk niteli\u011fi ta\u015f\u0131mayan, mizahi nitelikli \u2018fake\u2019 haberler yap\u0131lmakta olup, \u201c\u0130stanbul\u2019da timsaha tecav\u00fcz etti\u201d \u015feklinde payla\u015f\u0131lan haber de do\u011frulu\u011fu yans\u0131tmamaktad\u0131r.\nKirpi isimli \u2018fake\u2019 haber sitesi, dipnot olarak payla\u015f\u0131lan haberlerin ger\u00e7ek olmad\u0131\u011f\u0131na dair bir not yazm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r.\nKirpi isimli internet sitesi, daha \u00f6ncesinde do\u011fruluk niteli\u011fi ta\u015f\u0131mayan haberler payla\u015fmakta idi. Sitede, Nihat Hatipo\u011flu ile de do\u011fruluk niteli\u011fi ta\u015f\u0131mayan bir haber payla\u015f\u0131lm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r. Haberde \u201cNihat Hatipo\u011flu Y\u00d6K \u00fcyeli\u011fine se\u00e7ilmesi \u00fczerine yapt\u0131\u011f\u0131 a\u00e7\u0131klamada, \u00e7an e\u011frisi sisteminin Yahudi ve Hristiyan gelene\u011fi oldu\u011funu ifade ederek, bu sistemi en k\u0131sa zamanda de\u011fi\u015ftireceklerini s\u00f6yledi.\u201d \u015feklinde bir c\u00fcmle kullan\u0131lm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r.\nNihat Hatipo\u011flu haberi gibi, \u0130stanbul\u2019da timsaha tecav\u00fcz edildi\u011fi ve tecav\u00fcz eden ki\u015finin beraat ald\u0131\u011f\u0131 y\u00f6n\u00fcndeki haber de ger\u00e7ek nitelikte olmay\u0131p, sahte bir haberdir.\nKaynaklar: kirpice.com, kirpice.com 2, forum.donanimhaber, dunyasozluk.com, eksisozluk.com\nVideo oynat\u0131c\u0131\n00:00\n00:00\n1. \u201cdogrula.org\u201d\n0:07\n[Toplam:2    Ortalama:5/5] Nil Timsah\u0131na \u0130stanbul\u2019da Tecav\u00fcz Edildi \u0130ddias\u0131", "Google iPhone kullan\u0131c\u0131lar\u0131n\u0131n verilerini izinsiz kulland\u0131\u011f\u0131 i\u00e7in kullan\u0131c\u0131lara ceza \u00f6deyecek iddias\u0131, ge\u00e7ti\u011fimiz aylarda a\u00e7\u0131lan bir davayla g\u00fcndeme gelmi\u015ftir.\nGoogle, \u0130ngiltere\u2019deki 4,4 milyon iPhone kullan\u0131c\u0131s\u0131n\u0131n ki\u015fisel bilgilerinin \u201cgizli izlenmesi ve toplanmas\u0131\u201d iddias\u0131yla y\u00fcksek mahkemede 3,2 milyar sterlinlik bir davada yarg\u0131lanmaktad\u0131r. Bu y\u00fczden iddia k\u0131smen do\u011frudur, ancak dava sonu\u00e7lanmad\u0131\u011f\u0131 i\u00e7in Google\u2019nin iPhone kullan\u0131c\u0131lar\u0131na tazminat \u00f6demesi kesinle\u015fmemi\u015ftir.\n\u201cGoogle You Owe Us\u201d (Google Bize Bor\u00e7lusun) olarak bilinen, iPhone kullan\u0131c\u0131lar\u0131n\u0131 temsil eden bir grup taraf\u0131ndan duru\u015fmada mahkemeye sunulan belgelere g\u00f6re, 4,4 milyon ki\u015finin bilgileri Alfabe Inc. taraf\u0131ndan Apple Inc.\u2019in iPhone varsay\u0131lan gizlilik ayarlar\u0131n\u0131 atlayarak yasa d\u0131\u015f\u0131 bir \u015fekilde topland\u0131.\nKampanyaya liderlik eden Richard Lloyd, Google\u2019nin Haziran 2011 ile \u015eubat 2012 aras\u0131nda, Apple\u2019nin iPhone\u2019lerine y\u00fckledi\u011fi varsay\u0131lan taray\u0131c\u0131 olan Safari\u2019de depolanan verileri elde etmek i\u00e7in \u00f6zel bir teknoloji kulland\u0131\u011f\u0131n\u0131 iddia etti. Bu teknoloji, \u0130nternet \u00fczerinden insanlar\u0131 takip eden \u00e7erezleri veya k\u00fc\u00e7\u00fck dosyalar\u0131 planlayabiliyor ve daha sonra \u0130nternetteki reklamlar\u0131 ki\u015fiselle\u015ftirmek i\u00e7in kullan\u0131labilecek verileri almak i\u00e7in bunlar\u0131 kullanabiliyor.\nLloyd ayr\u0131ca, mahkemeden istediklerinin, etkilenen be\u015f milyon insan\u0131 temsil etmelerine izin vermeleri oldu\u011funu, veri haklar\u0131n\u0131n ihlal edildi\u011fini ve Google\u2019nin hesap vermesi gerekti\u011fini s\u00f6yledi.\nLloyd\u2019un yasal davada hareket eden Orta\u011f\u0131 James Oldnall ise: \u201cGoogle\u2019\u0131n bu verileri k\u00f6t\u00fcye kullanmas\u0131ndan kaynaklanan toplam tutarlar\u0131n b\u00fcy\u00fck olmas\u0131 muhtemel olsa da, her bireyin u\u011frad\u0131\u011f\u0131 zarar nispeten k\u00fc\u00e7\u00fckt\u00fcr.\u201d demi\u015ftir.\nOldnall ayr\u0131ca, verilerin \u201c\u00f6nemli bir yeni para birimi\u201d haline geldi\u011fini ve b\u00fcy\u00fck \u015firketler i\u00e7in de\u011ferli oldu\u011funu; t\u00fcketicilerin kendilerine verilen haklar\u0131 etkili bir \u015fekilde polise devredebilecek y\u00f6ntemlere ihtiya\u00e7 duyduklar\u0131n\u0131 s\u00f6ylemi\u015ftir.\nGizlilik, Apple \u015firketinden Samsung Electronics Co.\u2019ya ve Google \u015firketine kadar d\u00fcnyan\u0131n en pop\u00fcler cihazlar\u0131n\u0131n \u00fcreticileri i\u00e7in \u00f6nemli bir konu olmu\u015ftur. 2015 y\u0131l\u0131nda Apple, iPhone ve iPad kullan\u0131c\u0131lar\u0131n\u0131n, web sitelerinde reklamlar\u0131 engelleyebilece\u011fi bir yaz\u0131l\u0131m\u0131n kullan\u0131c\u0131lar\u0131n verilerinin nas\u0131l topland\u0131\u011f\u0131 ve kullan\u0131ld\u0131\u011f\u0131 konusunda daha fazla kontrol sa\u011flaman\u0131n bir yolu olarak cihazlar\u0131nda kullan\u0131lmas\u0131na izin vermi\u015fti.\nOlas\u0131 zarar, 1 Haziran 2011 ile 15 \u015eubat 2012 tarihleri aras\u0131nda herhangi bir zamanda \u0130ngiltere ve Galler\u2019de bulunan, Apple ID\u2019si ile  (App Store\u2019da uygulama, oyun ve m\u00fczik indirmek i\u00e7in kulland\u0131\u011f\u0131n\u0131z hesap ve iTunes), ve Safari\u2019yi ana taray\u0131c\u0131lar\u0131 olarak kullanan iPhone sahiplerini kaps\u0131yor.\nMahkeme, a\u015fa\u011f\u0131daki kriterleri kar\u015f\u0131layan herkesin, Google You Owe Us tazminat talebinde bulunabilece\u011fini s\u00f6yledi:\n1 Haziran 2011 ile 12 \u015eubat 2012 tarihleri aras\u0131nda \u0130ngiltere ve Galler\u2019de bulunan\nO zaman bir Apple ID\u2019si olan\nBir iPhone sahibi olan ya da olmak \u00fczere olan\n\u0130nternete eri\u015fmek i\u00e7in Safari taray\u0131c\u0131s\u0131n\u0131 kullanan\nSafari taray\u0131c\u0131s\u0131nda varsay\u0131lan g\u00fcvenlik ayarlar\u0131n\u0131 koruyan\nGoogle\u2019nin \u201cReklam tercihi y\u00f6neticisi\u201d arac\u0131l\u0131\u011f\u0131yla izleme ve derlemeyi devre d\u0131\u015f\u0131 b\u0131rakmayan\n31 May\u0131s 2017\u2019de \u0130ngiltere ve Galler\u2019de ikamet eden\nGoogle davay\u0131 kaybederse, davac\u0131 grup iPhone kullan\u0131c\u0131lar\u0131n\u0131n tazminat almak i\u00e7in kay\u0131t yapmas\u0131n\u0131 isteyecek.\n\u015eirket ise iddialar\u0131 reddediyor ve etkilenmi\u015f olanlar\u0131 tan\u0131mlaman\u0131n imkans\u0131z oldu\u011funu iddia ediyor.\nBir Google s\u00f6zc\u00fcs\u00fc: \u201cBu yeni de\u011fil \u2013 daha \u00f6nce de benzer davalarda kendimizi savunduk. Durumda hi\u00e7bir \u015fekilde hakl\u0131l\u0131k pay\u0131 oldu\u011funa inanm\u0131yoruz ve buna itiraz edece\u011fiz.\u201d a\u00e7\u0131klamas\u0131nda bulunmu\u015ftur.\nBirle\u015fik Krall\u0131k\u2019ta t\u00fcr\u00fcn\u00fcn ilk b\u00fcy\u00fck yasal iddias\u0131 oldu\u011fu s\u00f6ylenen davan\u0131n gelecek y\u0131l ba\u015flayaca\u011f\u0131 bildirildi.\nDavan\u0131n T\u00fcrkiye\u2019deki iPhone kullan\u0131c\u0131lar\u0131n\u0131 kapsad\u0131\u011f\u0131na dair herhangi bir a\u00e7\u0131klama ya da bilgi bulunmamaktad\u0131r.\nKaynaklar: Googleyouoweus, googleyouoweus2, bloomberg, thesun, mishcon\nVideo oynat\u0131c\u0131\nhttps://dogrula.org/wp-content/uploads/2018/02/dogrula.org_.mp4\n00:00\n00:07\n[Toplam:2    Ortalama:3/5] Google iPhone Kullan\u0131c\u0131lar\u0131n\u0131n Verilerini \u0130zinsiz Kulland\u0131\u011f\u0131 \u0130\u00e7in Kullan\u0131c\u0131lara Ceza \u00d6deyecek \u0130ddias\u0131", "Pinnertest ve YorkTest\u2019in Sahte Oldu\u011fu \u0130ddias\u0131 ba\u015fl\u0131kl\u0131 yaz\u0131m\u0131zda, son d\u00f6nemlerde Adnan Oktar\u2019\u0131n g\u00f6zalt\u0131na al\u0131nmas\u0131 ile g\u00fcndeme gelen ve zay\u0131flama y\u00f6ntemi olarak bir\u00e7ok ki\u015fi taraf\u0131ndan tercih edilen Pinnertest gibi testlerin ger\u00e7ek olmad\u0131\u011f\u0131 iddias\u0131n\u0131 inceledik. \u0130ddia \u00e7o\u011funlukla do\u011frudur. Pinnertest\u2019in de dahil oldu\u011fu g\u0131da duyarl\u0131l\u0131\u011f\u0131 amac\u0131yla yap\u0131lan g\u0131da intolerans\u0131 testleri ve test sonucu uygulanan tedaviler, t\u0131pta tart\u0131\u015fmal\u0131 bir konu olmu\u015ftur. Bilimsel olarak kan\u0131tlanm\u0131\u015f bir ge\u00e7erlili\u011fi yoktur.\nSon zamanlarda internet ortam\u0131nda giderek yayg\u0131nla\u015fan Pinnertest, hangi g\u0131da veya g\u0131dalara kar\u015f\u0131 insan v\u00fccudunun dayan\u0131ks\u0131z ya da diren\u00e7li oldu\u011funu \u00f6\u011frenmek isteyen binlerce ki\u015fi taraf\u0131ndan kullan\u0131lmaktad\u0131r. Ancak yap\u0131lan ara\u015ft\u0131rmalar neticesinde, Pinnertest gibi uygulamalar\u0131n\u0131n ve test sonucunda belirlenen tedavi y\u00f6ntemlerinin insan sa\u011fl\u0131\u011f\u0131na bir\u00e7ok zarar\u0131 oldu\u011fu a\u00e7\u0131klanm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r.\nPinnertest Nedir, Nas\u0131l Yap\u0131l\u0131r?\nPinnertest, t\u0131bbi tan\u0131m\u0131yla \u201cherhangi bir yiyece\u011fe kar\u015f\u0131 IgG4 s\u0131n\u0131f\u0131ndan antikorlar\u0131n belirlenmesi o ki\u015finin o yiyecekle kar\u015f\u0131la\u015ft\u0131\u011f\u0131 ve ba\u011f\u0131\u015f\u0131kl\u0131k sisteminin onu yabanc\u0131 bir protein gibi alg\u0131lad\u0131\u011f\u0131\u201d anlam\u0131na gelmektedir.\nG\u0131da intolerans\u0131 testlerinden biri olan Pinnertest, insan sa\u011fl\u0131\u011f\u0131 \u00fczerinde besin duyarl\u0131l\u0131\u011f\u0131 ve g\u0131da hassasiyeti gibi \u00f6l\u00e7\u00fcmler yapmay\u0131 vadetmektedir. Bu testlerin iddias\u0131na g\u00f6re, v\u00fccuda al\u0131nan baz\u0131 g\u0131dalar\u0131n neden oldu\u011fu intolerans, beden \u00fczerinde \u00e7e\u015fitli tepkilere ve hassasiyetlere neden olmaktad\u0131r. V\u00fccudun baz\u0131 g\u0131dalara g\u00f6stermi\u015f oldu\u011fu tepkilerin de kilo alma, mide hastal\u0131klar\u0131, akne ve sivilce gibi cilt rahats\u0131zl\u0131klar\u0131, gaz, \u015fi\u015fkinlik, kab\u0131zl\u0131k, depresyon, solunum yolu hastal\u0131klar\u0131 ve baz\u0131 kronik hastal\u0131klara yol a\u00e7t\u0131\u011f\u0131 s\u00f6ylenmektedir. Ancak g\u00fcn\u00fcm\u00fczde bu testler, \u00f6zellikle kilo verme amac\u0131yla talep edilmektedir.\nG\u0131da intolerans\u0131 testleri, kanda IgG olarak adland\u0131r\u0131lan proteinleri incelemeye \u00e7al\u0131\u015fmaktad\u0131r. Ancak bilimsel makalelere g\u00f6re, bu molek\u00fcllerin testte \u00e7\u0131kmas\u0131, o molek\u00fcllere kar\u015f\u0131 a\u015f\u0131r\u0131 duyarl\u0131l\u0131\u011f\u0131 veya alerjiyi g\u00f6stermemektedir.\nG\u0131da intolerans\u0131 testleri, parmak ucuna i\u011fne bat\u0131r\u0131larak kan \u00f6rne\u011finin al\u0131nmas\u0131yla yap\u0131lmaktad\u0131r. Pinnertest de, testi yapt\u0131rmak isteyenlerin belirli miktar para \u00f6demesi sonucu, i\u00e7inde i\u011fne, kan \u00f6rne\u011fi i\u00e7in numune pedi ve ki\u015fisel bilgilerin yaz\u0131lmas\u0131n\u0131 istenilen bir formun kullan\u0131c\u0131ya g\u00f6nderilmesi ile yap\u0131lmaktad\u0131r. A\u015fa\u011f\u0131daki videoda da nas\u0131l uyguland\u0131\u011f\u0131 g\u00f6r\u00fclebilmektedir:\nP\u0130NNERTEST'\u0130 EVDE NASIL YAPAB\u0130L\u0130R\u0130Z? SIZDEN GELEN SORU VE \u00d6NERILER ARASINDA EN \u00d6NEMLI KISIMLARDAN BIRI DE TESTIN KARGO ILE G\u00d6NDERIMI SONRASI EVDE NASIL YAPILACA\u011eI HAKKINDA IDI. BUNUNLA ALAKALI VIDEO'DA YER ALAN Y\u00d6NTEMLERLE YALNIZCA 4 DAKIKA'DA TESTI GER\u00c7EKLE\u015eTIREBILIRSINIZ. SIZE KILO ALDIRAN YADA HASTA EDEN GIDALARI BILIYOR MUSUNUZ? #HAYATIMIDEGISTIRENTEST HTTP://GOO.GL/WZMQ13 AYRICA 0 212 215 51 20 NUMARALI TELEFONDAN BILGI ALABILIRSINIZ.\nPINNERTEST ILE SA\u011eLIKLI YA\u015eAM PAYLA\u015eTI: 11 \u015eUBAT 2015 \u00c7AR\u015eAMBA\nKendilerine g\u00f6nderilen Pinnnertest\u2019i uygulayan kullan\u0131c\u0131lar, ald\u0131klar\u0131 kan \u00f6rne\u011fini test \u015firketine kargo ile g\u00f6ndermektedir. Daha sonra \u015firket, kullan\u0131c\u0131n\u0131n hangi g\u0131dalara duyarl\u0131 oldu\u011funu, neleri yememesi gerekti\u011finin yazd\u0131\u011f\u0131 bir rapor \u00e7\u0131karmaktad\u0131r. Kullan\u0131c\u0131lar da, rapora g\u00f6re hareket ederek bir tedavi y\u00f6ntemi benimsemekte ve bu \u015fekilde fazla kilolar\u0131ndan kurtulmay\u0131 ama\u00e7lamaktad\u0131r.\nAra\u015ft\u0131rmalar Zararl\u0131 Oldu\u011funu G\u00f6steriyor\nT\u0131p d\u00fcnyas\u0131nda, genel olarak g\u0131da intolerans\u0131 testlerinin g\u00fcvenilmez oldu\u011fu ve test sonu\u00e7lar\u0131na g\u00f6re verilen raporlar\u0131 uygulaman\u0131n farkl\u0131 sa\u011fl\u0131k sorunlar\u0131na yol a\u00e7abilece\u011fi kan\u0131s\u0131 vard\u0131r.\nInsider\u2018\u0131n yay\u0131nlad\u0131\u011f\u0131 bir makalede, \u00f6zellikle Instagram \u00fczerinden pazarlanan g\u0131da intolerans\u0131 testlerinin g\u00fcvenilmez oldu\u011fu yaz\u0131lm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r. \u00dcnl\u00fclerin reklam\u0131n\u0131 yapt\u0131\u011f\u0131 Pinnertest, Kanada Alerji ve Klinik \u0130mm\u00fcnoloji Derne\u011fi ve Amerikan Alerji Ast\u0131m ve \u0130mm\u00fcnoloji Akademisi gibi \u00e7ok say\u0131da bilimsel kurulu\u015f taraf\u0131ndan g\u00fcvenilmez olarak a\u00e7\u0131klanm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r. Bu testin g\u0131daya olumsuz reaksiyonlar\u0131 te\u015fhis etmek veya gelecekteki olu\u015fabilecek reaksiyonlar\u0131 \u00f6ng\u00f6rmek i\u00e7in kullanmas\u0131n\u0131 destekleyen hi\u00e7bir ara\u015ft\u0131rma yoktur. Amerikan Alerji Ast\u0131m ve \u0130mm\u00fcnoloji Akademisi de, bu t\u00fcr testlerin g\u0131da alerjisi veya intolerans\u0131n tan\u0131s\u0131nda hi\u00e7bir rol oynamad\u0131\u011f\u0131n\u0131 vurgulamaktad\u0131r.\nSense About Science\u2018\u0131n y\u00f6neticisi Tracey Brown, alerji ve g\u0131da intoleranslar\u0131n\u0131n giderek yayg\u0131nla\u015fmas\u0131 ile yanl\u0131\u015f tan\u0131lar\u0131na neden olduklar\u0131n\u0131 s\u00f6ylemi\u015ftir. Bu testlerin bilim i\u00e7in b\u00fcy\u00fck bir karma\u015faya yol a\u00e7t\u0131\u011f\u0131n\u0131, yanl\u0131\u015f yorumlamalar yap\u0131larak yanl\u0131\u015f te\u015fhisler kondu\u011funu belirtmi\u015ftir. Ayn\u0131 zamanda maliyet a\u00e7\u0131s\u0131ndan y\u00fcksek olan g\u0131da intolerans\u0131 testlerinin gereksiz oldu\u011fu ifade edilmi\u015ftir.\nProf. Dr. Ahmet Rasim K\u00fc\u00e7\u00fckusta\u2019n\u0131n 2016 y\u0131l\u0131nda Vatan gazetesinde yay\u0131nlad\u0131\u011f\u0131 yaz\u0131da, g\u0131da intolerans\u0131 testlerinin, v\u00fccudun hangi besinlere duyarl\u0131 oldu\u011fu veya tahamm\u00fcl edemedi\u011fi bulunamaz \u015feklinde a\u00e7\u0131klama yapm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r. Bu testlerin sonucunda verilen tedavi y\u00f6ntemine g\u00f6re, kronik yorgunlu\u011fun, kab\u0131zl\u0131\u011f\u0131n, migrenin, romatizman\u0131n, sedefin ve daha bir\u00e7ok hastal\u0131\u011f\u0131n iyile\u015fmesine katk\u0131 sa\u011flamad\u0131\u011f\u0131n\u0131 s\u00f6ylemi\u015ftir.\nPinnertest\u2019in Adnan Oktar ile \u0130li\u015fkisi Nedir?\nDiken\u2018in haberine g\u00f6re, Pinnertest\u2019in Adnan Oktar\u2019\u0131n m\u00fcridi Ferit Erdem Rahvanc\u0131\u2019ya ait bir \u015firket oldu\u011fu iddia edilmi\u015ftir. Haberde, Pinnertest\u2019in \u00f6nceden \u201cYorktest\u201d ad\u0131yla sahte g\u0131da intolerans\u0131 testleri yapt\u0131\u011f\u0131 ve bunun sonucunda sahte raporlar haz\u0131rlad\u0131\u011f\u0131 \u00f6ne s\u00fcr\u00fclm\u00fc\u015ft\u00fcr. Bir Twitter hesab\u0131ndan, Adnan Oktar g\u00f6z alt\u0131na al\u0131nmadan yakla\u015f\u0131k bir ay \u00f6nce, 11 May\u0131s 2018 tarihinde, Ferit Erdem Rahvanc\u0131\u2019n\u0131n Yorktest firmas\u0131n\u0131n T\u00fcrkiye distrib\u00fct\u00f6r\u00fc oldu\u011funu iddia eden bir payla\u015f\u0131m yap\u0131lm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r:\nBu iddialara ili\u015fkin olarak Pinnertest, kendi sitesinden bir a\u00e7\u0131klama yay\u0131nlam\u0131\u015ft\u0131r. A\u00e7\u0131klamaya g\u00f6re, ge\u00e7ti\u011fimiz g\u00fcnlerde g\u00f6zalt\u0131na al\u0131nan ve 19 Temmuz 2018 itibariyle tutuklanan Adnan Oktar ve \u00f6rg\u00fct\u00fcn\u00fcn, Pinnertest ile hi\u00e7bir ili\u015fkisinin bulunmad\u0131\u011f\u0131 iddia edilmi\u015ftir. Ferit Erdem Rahvanc\u0131\u2019ya ait Gateway firmas\u0131 ile bir y\u0131l \u00f6nce ortakl\u0131k s\u00f6zle\u015fmesini feshettiklerini ve T\u00fcrkiye\u2019de herhangi bir distrib\u00fct\u00f6rl\u00fcklerinin olmad\u0131\u011f\u0131n\u0131 ifade etmi\u015flerdir.\nPinnertest taraf\u0131ndan yap\u0131lan a\u00e7\u0131klamada, testin bilimsel bir metod oldu\u011fu ve g\u00fcvenilirli\u011fi ile ilgili iddialar\u0131n ger\u00e7ek d\u0131\u015f\u0131 oldu\u011fu s\u00f6ylenmi\u015ftir ancak bug\u00fcne kadar yap\u0131lan bilimsel \u00e7al\u0131\u015fmalar g\u00f6z \u00f6n\u00fcnde bulunduruldu\u011funda, g\u0131da intolerans\u0131 testlerinin bilim d\u00fcnyas\u0131nda g\u00fcvenilmez olarak adland\u0131r\u0131ld\u0131\u011f\u0131 ve uzmanlar taraf\u0131ndan tavsiye edilmedi\u011fi a\u00e7\u0131k\u00e7a g\u00f6r\u00fclmektedir.\nKaynaklar: Facebook, Twitter, Sence About Science, The Guardian, Insider, aacijournal.biomedcentral.com, diken.com.tr, ahmetrasimkucukusta.com, pinner.com.tr, yalansavar.org\n[Toplam:4    Ortalama:5/5] Pinnertest ve Yorktest\u2019in Sahte Oldu\u011fu \u0130ddias\u0131", "\u201cVideonun \u0130stanbul\u2019daki Sel G\u00f6r\u00fcnt\u00fclerini G\u00f6sterdi\u011fi \u0130ddias\u0131\u201d ba\u015fl\u0131kl\u0131 i\u00e7eri\u011fimizde sosyal medyada \u201cya\u011fmur\u201d etiketi ile payla\u015f\u0131lan ve etkile\u015fim alan bir videonun, \u0130stanbul/Kartal\u2019dan oldu\u011fu iddias\u0131n\u0131 inceledik. S\u00f6z konusu iddia do\u011fru de\u011fildir.\n#ya\u011fmur etkisini g\u00f6stermeye ba\u015flad\u0131\nKartal Belediyesi y\u00fczen \u00e7\u00f6p kamyonu konteynerleri projesi pic.twitter.com/zjamkwFcIG\n\u2014 erzincan\u2019l\u0131 marcelo (@onuraydin1973) 18 Temmuz 2018\n18.07.2018 tarihinde \u0130stanbul\u2019da aniden ba\u015flayan ya\u011fmur ya\u011f\u0131\u015f\u0131ndan sonra Twitter\u2019da \u201cya\u011fmur\u201d etiketi alt\u0131nda payla\u015f\u0131lan ve \u0130stanbul/Kartal\u2019da \u00e7ekildi\u011fi iddia edilen videodaki g\u00f6r\u00fcnt\u00fcler, Ankara/Mamak\u2019ta 5 May\u0131s 2018 tarihinde ya\u015fanan sel felaketi s\u0131ras\u0131nda \u00e7ekilmi\u015ftir. Videoda ak\u0131nt\u0131ya kap\u0131lan konteynerlerin \u00fczerinde \u201cMAMAK BELED\u0130YES\u0130\u201d yazd\u0131\u011f\u0131 g\u00f6r\u00fclmektedir.\nMamak\u2019ta Bo\u011fazi\u00e7i Mahallesi, Ne\u015fet Erta\u015f Caddesinde 5 May\u0131s 2018 tarihinde ya\u015fanan sel felaketini g\u00f6steren videoda arka tarafta yer alan i\u015f yerleri, Google Haritalar uygulamas\u0131nda Bo\u011fazi\u00e7i Mahallesi, Ne\u015fet Erta\u015f Caddesinin sokak g\u00f6r\u00fcn\u00fcm\u00fcnden de g\u00f6r\u00fclebilmektedir.\nAyr\u0131ca iddia konusu olarak payla\u015f\u0131lan video, 5 May\u0131s 2018 tarihinden itibaren YouTube\u2019a Ankara/Mamak\u2019ta ya\u015fanan sel felaketi ile ili\u015fkili ba\u015fl\u0131klarla bir \u00e7ok defa y\u00fcklenmi\u015ftir.\n5 May\u0131s 2018 tarihinde ya\u015fanan bu sel felaketi, haberlere de konu olmu\u015f ve konu ile alakal\u0131 Ankara Valili\u011fi de a\u00e7\u0131klama yapm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r. Ankara Valili\u011finin ilgili a\u00e7\u0131klamas\u0131 \u015f\u00f6yle:\nMamak \u0130l\u00e7esi Bo\u011fazi\u00e7i Mahallesinde Ya\u015fanan Sel Felaketinde Ma\u011fdur Olan Vatanda\u015flar\u0131m\u0131za Yap\u0131lacak Desteklere \u0130li\u015fkin A\u00e7\u0131klama\n5 May\u0131s 2018 Cumartesi g\u00fcn\u00fc \u00f6\u011fle saatlerinde meydana gelen sel felaketi sonucunda; ev, i\u015f yeri ve ara\u00e7lar\u0131 zarar g\u00f6ren vatanda\u015flar\u0131m\u0131z\u0131n zarar\u0131n\u0131n kar\u015f\u0131lanmas\u0131 amac\u0131yla ba\u015flat\u0131lan hasar tespit \u00e7al\u0131\u015fmalar\u0131 sonu\u00e7lanm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r.\nHasar tespit \u00e7al\u0131\u015fmalar\u0131 sonucunda, sel felaketinde zarar g\u00f6ren;\n10 konut ile 61 i\u015f yeri sahibine toplam 605.250 TL,\n81 ara\u00e7 sahibine ise 584.600 TL yard\u0131m yap\u0131lmas\u0131na karar verilmi\u015ftir.\nKonut ve i\u015f yerleri zarar g\u00f6renlere, 06.05.2018 g\u00fcn\u00fc 18.00 itibar\u0131yla \u00f6demelere ba\u015flanm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r.\nAra\u00e7lar\u0131 zarar g\u00f6ren vatanda\u015flar\u0131m\u0131za da 07.05.2018 g\u00fcn\u00fc saat 09.00\u2019dan itibaren \u00f6deme yap\u0131lacakt\u0131r.\nYard\u0131mlar, Mamak \u0130l\u00e7esi Bo\u011fazi\u00e7i Mahallesinde bulunan Tenzile Erdo\u011fan Aile Merkezinde yap\u0131lmaktad\u0131r.\nKamuoyuna sayg\u0131yla duyurulur.\nSon olarak Mamak\u2019ta ya\u015fanan sel felaketi ile alakal\u0131 medyada yer alan haberlerde de iddia konusu videodaki b\u00f6lgeden g\u00f6rseller kullan\u0131lm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r.\nKaynaklar: twitter, google, youtube, youtube 2, youtube 3, youtube 4, ankara.gov, h\u00fcrriyet, sabah\nVideo oynat\u0131c\u0131\nhttps://dogrula.org/wp-content/uploads/2018/02/dogrula.org_.mp4\n00:00\n00:07\n[Toplam:4    Ortalama:3/5] Videonun \u0130stanbul\u2019daki Sel G\u00f6r\u00fcnt\u00fclerini G\u00f6sterdi\u011fi \u0130ddias\u0131", "Atat\u00fcrk\u00e7\u00fcler adl\u0131 Facebook sayfas\u0131nda \u201cL\u00fcbnanl\u0131 M\u00fcsl\u00fcman 9 ya\u015f\u0131ndaki k\u0131zla nikah k\u0131yd\u0131\u2026.d\u00fcnya bunu konu\u015fuyor\u2026\u00e7ok yaz\u0131k maalesef bu yarat\u0131klar M\u00fcsl\u00fcman\u201d yorumuyla payla\u015f\u0131lan bu g\u00f6rsel, yakla\u015f\u0131k 1.200 be\u011feni, 8.000 payla\u015f\u0131m ve hakaret i\u00e7eren binlerce yorum etkile\u015fimi ald\u0131.\n  Videoda 12 ya\u015f\u0131nda bir \u00e7ocuk makyajl\u0131 ve gelinlik giymi\u015f haliyle, kendisinden neredeyse 40 ya\u015f b\u00fcy\u00fck bir adamla d\u00fc\u011f\u00fcn foto\u011fraf\u0131 \u00e7ektiriyor.\nAncak sayfada yer alan s\u00f6z konusu L\u00fcbnanl\u0131 M\u00fcsl\u00fcman 9 ya\u015f\u0131ndaki k\u0131zla nikah k\u0131yd\u0131 iddias\u0131 do\u011fru de\u011fildir.\nVideo, Sivil Toplum Kurulu\u015fu Olan \u201cKafa\u201d (Yeter Art\u0131k) Taraf\u0131ndan Olu\u015fturuldu\n2 y\u0131l \u00f6ncesine ait olan ve uluslararas\u0131 tepkilere yol a\u00e7an bu video, Arap\u00e7a \u201cyeter art\u0131k\u201d anlam\u0131na gelen \u201cKAFA\u201d isimli L\u00fcbnanl\u0131 sivil toplum kurulu\u015fu taraf\u0131ndan, L\u00fcbnan\u2019daki \u00e7ocuk gelin evlenmelerine tepki olarak \u00e7ekilmi\u015f. Yani videoda yer alan s\u00f6z konusu gelin ve damat birer akt\u00f6r.\nPayla\u015f\u0131ld\u0131\u011f\u0131ndan bu g\u00fcne kadar 3.8 milyondan fazla g\u00f6r\u00fcnt\u00fclenen bu klip, L\u00fcbnan, Suriye ve d\u00fcnyan\u0131n d\u00f6rt bir yan\u0131ndaki \u00e7ocuk ya\u015ftaki k\u0131zlar\u0131n evlenmeye zorland\u0131\u011f\u0131 durumlara dikkat \u00e7ekiyor.\nSivil toplum kurulu\u015fu KAFA, s\u00f6z konusu videoyu Facebook ve YouTube hesab\u0131nda payla\u015fm\u0131\u015ft\u0131:\n  KAFA (YETER ARTIK) adl\u0131 kurulu\u015f, web siteleri olan http://www.kafa.org.lb/\u2019de, L\u00fcbnan\u2019da ya\u015fanan \u015fiddet ve istismar konular\u0131na dikkat \u00e7eken \u00e7al\u0131\u015fmalar yaparak \u00e7e\u015fitli kampanyalar y\u00fcr\u00fct\u00fcyor.\nKAFA grubunun slogan\u0131 \u201cEnough violence and exploitation (\u015fiddete ve istismara yeter art\u0131k\u201d).\nKurulu\u015fun sitesinde yer alan misyonu ise \u015f\u00f6yle a\u00e7\u0131klanm\u0131\u015f:\n\u201c\u015eiddet ve \u0130stismara Yeter diyen KAFA, \u00f6zg\u00fcr bir toplum yaratarak kad\u0131nlara yap\u0131lan sosyal, ekonomik ve hukuki ataerkil ayr\u0131mc\u0131l\u0131\u011f\u0131 ortadan kald\u0131rmay\u0131 ama\u00e7layan feminist, laik, L\u00fcbnan, kar amac\u0131 g\u00fctmeyen, h\u00fck\u00fcmet d\u0131\u015f\u0131 bir L\u00fcbnanl\u0131 sivil toplum kurulu\u015fudur.\nKAFA, 2005 y\u0131l\u0131ndaki kurulu\u015fundan bu yana kad\u0131nlara kar\u015f\u0131 her t\u00fcrl\u00fc istismar ve \u015fiddeti ortadan kald\u0131rmay\u0131 hedeflemektedir. Toplumsal cinsiyet e\u015fitli\u011fini sa\u011flamak i\u00e7in \u00e7aba harcam\u0131\u015ft\u0131r.\u201d\n  L\u00fcbnanl\u0131 sivil toplum kurulu\u015funun web sitesi, Facebook ve Youtube sayfalar\u0131 incelendi\u011finde, kad\u0131n ve \u00e7ocuk istismar\u0131na dikkat \u00e7eken pek \u00e7ok kampanya videosu g\u00f6rmek m\u00fcmk\u00fcn.\n  Atat\u00fcrk\u00e7\u00fcl\u00fck adl\u0131 Facebook sayfas\u0131, videoyu payla\u015f\u0131p L\u00fcbnanl\u0131 M\u00fcsl\u00fcman adamla 9 ya\u015f\u0131ndaki k\u0131z\u0131n evlendi\u011fini s\u00f6ylemi\u015f, \u00e7ocuk evlili\u011fine kar\u015f\u0131 olup istismar olaylar\u0131na dikkat \u00e7eken bir sivil toplum kurulu\u015funun y\u00fcr\u00fctt\u00fc\u011f\u00fc kampanyay\u0131 as\u0131ls\u0131z bir iddia ve yorumla ele alm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r. Sayfan\u0131n s\u00f6z konusu iddias\u0131 do\u011fru de\u011fildir.\nKaynaklar: Kaynak1, kaynak2, kaynak3, kaynak4\nVideo oynat\u0131c\u0131\nhttps://dogrula.org/wp-content/uploads/2018/02/dogrula.org_.mp4\n00:00\n00:07\n[Toplam:3    Ortalama:5/5] L\u00fcbnanl\u0131 M\u00fcsl\u00fcman 9 Ya\u015f\u0131ndaki K\u0131zla Nikah K\u0131yd\u0131 \u0130ddias\u0131", "TRT Diyanet\u2019te 15 Temmuz Y\u0131l D\u00f6n\u00fcm\u00fcnde S\u00f6zleri Fetullah G\u00fclen\u2019e Ait \u015eark\u0131 Yay\u0131nland\u0131 m\u0131?\nTRT\u2019nin 15 Temmuz Y\u0131l D\u00f6n\u00fcm\u00fcnde S\u00f6zleri Fetullah G\u00fclen\u2019e Ait \u015eark\u0131 Yay\u0131nlad\u0131\u011f\u0131 \u0130ddias\u0131 sosyal medyada ve haber sitelerinde g\u00fcndeme gelmi\u015f ve tepki \u00e7ekmi\u015ftir. S\u00f6z konusu iddia do\u011fru de\u011fildir.\nTRT Diyanet kanal\u0131nda s\u00f6zleri Fetullah G\u00fclen\u2019e ait \u015fark\u0131n\u0131n yay\u0131nland\u0131\u011f\u0131 iddias\u0131 do\u011frudur, ancak bu yay\u0131n\u0131n 15 Temmuz darbe giri\u015fiminin y\u0131l d\u00f6n\u00fcm\u00fcnde yap\u0131ld\u0131\u011f\u0131 iddias\u0131 yanl\u0131\u015ft\u0131r. \u201cAhmet Hatipo\u011flu ile Tasavvuf Musikisi\u201d adl\u0131 program\u0131n 2012 y\u0131l\u0131na ait ar\u015fivlenmi\u015f bir b\u00f6l\u00fcm\u00fc 22 Haziran 2018 tarihinde yay\u0131nlanm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r. Program\u0131n 2012 y\u0131l\u0131na ait ar\u015fivlenmi\u015f ilgili b\u00f6l\u00fcm\u00fcnde, s\u00f6zleri FET\u00d6 silahl\u0131 ter\u00f6r \u00f6rg\u00fct\u00fc lideri Fetullah G\u00fclen taraf\u0131ndan yaz\u0131lm\u0131\u015f \u015fark\u0131n\u0131n 22 Haziran 2018 tarihinde yay\u0131nlanmas\u0131 \u00fczerine, Diyanet \u0130\u015fleri Ba\u015fkanl\u0131\u011f\u0131 devreye girmi\u015ftir. Yay\u0131ndan bir g\u00fcn sonra yani 23 Haziran 2018 tarihinde yay\u0131ndan sorumlu personel hakk\u0131nda idari soru\u015fturma ba\u015flat\u0131lm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r. Adli soru\u015fturma s\u00fcreci hala devam etmekte olup, idari soru\u015fturma neticesinde, sorumlulu\u011fu tespit edilen personelin g\u00f6revine son verilmi\u015ftir.\nDiyanet \u0130\u015fleri Ba\u015fkanl\u0131\u011f\u0131\u2019dan A\u00e7\u0131klama\n\u0130lgili yay\u0131n 22 Haziran tarihinde yap\u0131lm\u0131\u015f olmas\u0131na ra\u011fmen, 14 Temmuz 2018 tarihinde sosyal medyada bu yay\u0131n\u0131n 15 Temmuz\u2019un y\u0131l d\u00f6n\u00fcm\u00fcnde yap\u0131ld\u0131\u011f\u0131 iddialar\u0131 yer alm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r. S\u00f6z konusu iddialar do\u011fru de\u011fildir.
