Bu iddialar\u0131n bir\u00e7ok sosyal medya hesab\u0131 taraf\u0131ndan payla\u015f\u0131lmas\u0131 \u00fczerine Diyanet \u0130\u015fleri Ba\u015fkanl\u0131\u011f\u0131n\u0131n resmi \u0130nternet sitesinde 14.07.2018 tarihinde a\u00e7\u0131klama yap\u0131lm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r. \u0130lgili a\u00e7\u0131klama \u015f\u00f6yle:\nBASIN A\u00c7IKLAMASI\nBug\u00fcn baz\u0131 medya organlar\u0131nda TRT Diyanet ile ilgili yer alan haberlere ili\u015fkin a\u015fa\u011f\u0131daki a\u00e7\u0131klaman\u0131n yap\u0131lmas\u0131 uygun g\u00f6r\u00fclm\u00fc\u015ft\u00fcr.\n2012 y\u0131l\u0131 ar\u015fivlerinde yer alan \u201cAhmet Hatipo\u011flu ile Tasavvuf Musikisi\u201d program\u0131n\u0131n TRT Diyanet ekran\u0131nda 22.06.2018 tarihinde yay\u0131nland\u0131\u011f\u0131 ve yay\u0131n esnas\u0131nda bestesi Devlet Musikisi Tasavvuf M\u00fczi\u011fi Korosu \u015eefi Ahmet Hatipo\u011flu\u2019na ait olan bir eserin g\u00fcftesinde Fetullah\u00e7\u0131 Ter\u00f6r \u00d6rg\u00fct\u00fc/Paralel Devlet Yap\u0131lanmas\u0131 eleba\u015f\u0131 Fethullah G\u00fclen\u2019in isminin ge\u00e7ti\u011fi fark edilmi\u015ftir.\nGerek\u00e7esi her ne olursa olsun, b\u00f6yle bir yanl\u0131\u015f\u0131 tasvip etmek kesinlikle m\u00fcmk\u00fcn de\u011fildir.\nBu nedenle Ba\u015fkanl\u0131\u011f\u0131m\u0131z taraf\u0131ndan s\u00f6z konusu programla ilgili ihmalde kas\u0131t ihtimalinin bulunup bulunmad\u0131\u011f\u0131n\u0131 tespit etmek \u00fczere derhal harekete ge\u00e7ilmi\u015f, 23.06.2018 tarihinde yay\u0131ndan sorumlu personel hakk\u0131nda idari soru\u015fturma ivedilikle ba\u015flat\u0131lm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r.\n\u0130dari soru\u015fturma neticesinde, sorumlulu\u011fu tespit edilen personelin g\u00f6revine son verilmi\u015f olup adli soru\u015fturma s\u00fcreci devam etmektedir. Diyanet \u0130\u015fleri Ba\u015fkanl\u0131\u011f\u0131, din istismar\u0131 konusunda milletimizi bilin\u00e7lendirmeyi ve hain ter\u00f6r \u00f6rg\u00fct\u00fc FET\u00d6 ile m\u00fccadeleyi kesintisiz s\u00fcrd\u00fcrmektedir.\nKamuoyuna sayg\u0131yla arz olunur.\nD\u0130YANET \u0130\u015eLER\u0130 BA\u015eKANLI\u011eI\nSon olarak Diyanet \u0130\u015fleri Ba\u015fkanl\u0131\u011f\u0131n\u0131n TRT Diyanet yetkilisi ile durumla alakal\u0131 yeni bir geli\u015fme olup olmad\u0131\u011f\u0131na yapt\u0131\u011f\u0131m\u0131z g\u00f6r\u00fc\u015fmede, \u201cbu konuda resmi bas\u0131n a\u00e7\u0131klamas\u0131 yap\u0131ld\u0131\u011f\u0131 ve daha fazla bilgi veremeyecekleri\u201d cevab\u0131n\u0131 ald\u0131k.\nKaynaklar: diyanet.gov, twitter, twitter 2, twitter 3, gercekgundem\nVideo oynat\u0131c\u0131\nhttps://dogrula.org/wp-content/uploads/2018/02/dogrula.org_.mp4\n00:00\n00:07\n[Toplam:4    Ortalama:4/5] TRT\u2019nin 15 Temmuz Y\u0131l D\u00f6n\u00fcm\u00fcnde S\u00f6zleri Fetullah G\u00fclen\u2019e Ait \u015eark\u0131 Yay\u0131nlad\u0131\u011f\u0131 \u0130ddias\u0131", "PKK\u2019l\u0131 \u015eemdin Sak\u0131k\u2019\u0131n Karde\u015fi AK Parti Milletvekili \u0130ddias\u0131 ba\u015fl\u0131kl\u0131 i\u00e7eri\u011fimizde, ge\u00e7ti\u011fimiz g\u00fcnlerde Cesur Y\u00fcrek Fatih Portakal isimli Facebook sayfas\u0131nda payla\u015f\u0131lan iddiay\u0131 ele ald\u0131k. Ter\u00f6r \u00f6rg\u00fct\u00fc PKK\u2019n\u0131n militan\u0131 olan \u015eemdin Sak\u0131k\u2019\u0131n karde\u015fi Nam\u0131k Sak\u0131k\u2019\u0131n Ak Parti\u2019den milletvekili oldu\u011fu iddia edilmi\u015ftir. Ancak bu iddia do\u011fru de\u011fildir. \nFacebook\u2019ta Cesur Y\u00fcrek Fatih Portakal isimli bir sayfada yap\u0131lan payla\u015f\u0131m, bin 600\u2019\u00fcn \u00fczerinde be\u011feni alm\u0131\u015f ve \u00fc\u00e7 binin \u00fczerinde payla\u015f\u0131lm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r. PKK\u2019l\u0131 \u015eemdin Sak\u0131k\u2019\u0131n karde\u015fleri olan Nam\u0131k Sak\u0131k ve S\u0131rr\u0131 Sak\u0131k, AK Parti\u2019den milletvekili olmam\u0131\u015flard\u0131r. Nam\u0131k Sak\u0131k, 24 Haziran se\u00e7imleri \u00f6ncesinde Ak Parti\u2019den milletvekili aday aday\u0131 olmu\u015f ancak adayl\u0131k talebi kabul edilmemi\u015ftir.\nPKK\u2019l\u0131 \u015eemdin Sak\u0131k\nPKK militan\u0131 \u015eemdin Sak\u0131k\u2018\u0131n karde\u015fi olan Nam\u0131k Sak\u0131k, ge\u00e7ti\u011fimiz 24 Haziran se\u00e7imlerinde, bir a\u00e7\u0131klama yapm\u0131\u015f ve Ak Parti\u2019den milletvekili aday aday\u0131 oldu\u011funu a\u00e7\u0131klam\u0131\u015ft\u0131r. Ayn\u0131 zamanda HDP\u2019li S\u0131rr\u0131 Sak\u0131k\u2019\u0131n da a\u011fabeyi olan Nam\u0131k Sak\u0131k, soy isminin PKK ile \u00f6zde\u015fle\u015fti\u011fini ancak kendisinin ter\u00f6r \u00f6rg\u00fct\u00fc PKK ile bir ba\u011f\u0131n\u0131n olmad\u0131\u011f\u0131n\u0131 belirterek;\n\u201cEvet benim soy ismim Sak\u0131k. Sak\u0131k soy ismi PKK ile e\u015fle\u015fmi\u015f ama ben beynimi, y\u00fcre\u011fimi hi\u00e7 kimseye ipotek olarak sunmad\u0131m. K\u00fcrtlerin hepsi HDP\u2019li de\u011fil, PKK\u2019l\u0131 olamaz. PKK ve HDP K\u00fcrtleri temsil edemez \u00e7\u00fcnk\u00fc K\u00fcrtler sosyalist, solcu, ulusalc\u0131 olmaz, ideolojileri bu de\u011fil. Hepsi, y\u00fczde doksan\u0131 muhafazakard\u0131r. Ben hayat\u0131m boyunca hi\u00e7 HDP\u2019li olmad\u0131m, PKK\u2019l\u0131 olmad\u0131m. \u00c7\u00fcnk\u00fc ben solcu, sosyalist, ulusalc\u0131 bir beyine sahip de\u011filim. Ben muhafazakar bir insan\u0131m. O ideoloji benim ideolojim de\u011fil.\u201d \u015feklinde a\u00e7\u0131klama yapm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r.\nAk Parti\u2019den aday adayl\u0131\u011f\u0131 ba\u015fvurusu yapan Nam\u0131k Sak\u0131k\u2018\u0131n ismi, Ak Parti\u2019nin 24 Haziran se\u00e7imleri \u00f6ncesinde milletvekilleri adaylar\u0131n\u0131 a\u00e7\u0131klad\u0131\u011f\u0131 listede bulunmamaktad\u0131r.\nT\u00fcrkiye B\u00fcy\u00fck Millet Meclisinin kendi sitesinde bulunan milletvekilleri listesinde de Nam\u0131k Sak\u0131k yoktur.\nTBMM Milletvekilleri Listesi\n\u015eemdin Sak\u0131k\u2019\u0131n di\u011fer bir karde\u015fi olan S\u0131rr\u0131 Sak\u0131k, Ak Parti\u2019den de\u011fil, bir d\u00f6nem HDP\u2019den milletvekili olmu\u015ftur. Daha \u00f6ncesinde, Demokrasi Partisi ile Demokratik Toplum Partisi\u2019nin kurulu\u015funa kat\u0131lm\u0131\u015f, 19., 23. ve 24. d\u00f6nemlerde de Mu\u015f milletvekili olarak T\u00fcrkiye B\u00fcy\u00fck Millet Meclisi\u2019ne girmi\u015ftir.\n1 Haziran 2014 y\u0131l\u0131nda yap\u0131lan se\u00e7imlerde A\u011fr\u0131 Belediye Ba\u015fkan\u0131 olan S\u0131rr\u0131 Sak\u0131k, 2017 y\u0131l\u0131nda ter\u00f6r \u00f6rg\u00fct\u00fc PKK\u2019ya olan yanda\u015fl\u0131\u011f\u0131ndan dolay\u0131 g\u00f6revinden al\u0131nm\u0131\u015f ve A\u011fr\u0131 Belediyesine kayyum atanm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r. 24 Haziran 2018 se\u00e7imlerinde, HDP\u2019nin Manisa\u2019dan aday g\u00f6sterdi\u011fi S\u0131rr\u0131 Sak\u0131k, milletvekili se\u00e7ilememi\u015ftir.\nNitekim iddiada belirtildi\u011fi \u00fczere, PKK\u2019l\u0131 \u015eemdin Sak\u0131k\u2019\u0131n iki karde\u015fi Nam\u0131k Sak\u0131k ve S\u0131rr\u0131 Sak\u0131k, Ak Parti\u2019den milletvekili de\u011fillerdir.\nKaynaklar: T\u00fcrkiye B\u00fcy\u00fck Millet Meclisi, Youtube, Facebook, Gazete Duvar, Ak Parti Milletvekilleri Listesi, Cumhuriyet\nVideo oynat\u0131c\u0131\n00:00\n00:00\n1. \u201cdogrula.org\u201d\n0:07\n  [Toplam:6    Ortalama:4.3/5] PKK\u2019l\u0131 \u015eemdin Sak\u0131k\u2019\u0131n Karde\u015fi AK Parti Milletvekili \u0130ddias\u0131", "Johnson & Johnson Firmas\u0131n\u0131n, Talk Pudras\u0131 Nedeniyle Kansere Yakaland\u0131\u011f\u0131n\u0131 S\u00f6yleyen 22 Kad\u0131na 4.7 Milyar Tazminat \u00d6demeye Mahkum Edildi\u011fi \u0130ddias\u0131, Onedio G\u00fcndem Twitter sayfas\u0131nda payla\u015f\u0131larak y\u00fczlerce etkile\u015fim ald\u0131.\nJohnson & Johnson firmas\u0131n\u0131n talk pudras\u0131 nedeniyle kansere yakaland\u0131\u011f\u0131n\u0131 s\u00f6yleyen 22 kad\u0131na 4.7 milyar dolar tazminat \u00f6demeye mahkum edildi\u011fi iddias\u0131 do\u011frudur.\nNew York Times, The Telegraph, Reuters kaynaklar\u0131na ve Washington Post\u2019tan Lindsey Bever\u2019in haberine g\u00f6re, ABD\u2019nin Missouri eyaleti mahkemesi, Johnson & Johnson\u2019a, \u015firketin talk pudras\u0131 \u00fcr\u00fcnlerinin yumurtal\u0131k kanserine yol a\u00e7t\u0131\u011f\u0131n\u0131 iddia eden 22 kad\u0131na, sebep oldu\u011fu zarar\u0131 kar\u015f\u0131lamas\u0131 i\u00e7in 4,69 milyar dolar \u00f6demesini h\u00fckmetmi\u015ftir.\n12 Temmuz Per\u015fembe g\u00fcn\u00fc ger\u00e7ekle\u015fen davada j\u00fcri \u00fcyeleri firmaya kad\u0131nlar\u0131n zarar\u0131n\u0131 kar\u015f\u0131lamas\u0131 i\u00e7in 550 milyon dolar, ayr\u0131ca ceza niteli\u011finde 4,14 milyar dolarl\u0131k cezai tazminat davas\u0131 a\u00e7t\u0131. \u0130ddialara g\u00f6re firma, talk pudras\u0131n\u0131n yumurtal\u0131k kanserine yol a\u00e7t\u0131\u011f\u0131 konusunda \u00e7ok fazla tart\u0131\u015fma olmas\u0131na ra\u011fmen akci\u011fer kanserine yol a\u00e7an bir madde olan asbest ile kirletilmi\u015f pudra satm\u0131\u015ft\u0131.\nJohnson & Johnson firmas\u0131n\u0131n yapt\u0131\u011f\u0131 a\u00e7\u0131klama\nJohnson & Johnson yapt\u0131\u011f\u0131 a\u00e7\u0131klamada, \u201ckarar\u0131n derin bir hayal k\u0131r\u0131kl\u0131\u011f\u0131\u201d oldu\u011funu s\u00f6yledi.\n\u201cJohnson & Johnson, \u00fcr\u00fcnlerinin asbest i\u00e7ermedi\u011finden ve yumurtal\u0131k kanserine neden olmad\u0131\u011f\u0131ndan ve mevcut t\u00fcm temyiz ila\u00e7lar\u0131n\u0131 s\u00fcrd\u00fcrme niyetinde oldu\u011fundan emin. Temyiz s\u00fcrecinden ge\u00e7mi\u015f olan bu mahkemede Johnson & Johnson\u2019a kar\u015f\u0131 her t\u00fcrl\u00fc karar tersine d\u00f6nd\u00fc ve bu davada yer alan birden fazla hata, tersine \u00e7evrilmi\u015f olan \u00f6nceki davalardakilerden daha k\u00f6t\u00fcyd\u00fc.\u201d\nTalk pudras\u0131 on y\u0131llard\u0131r bebeklerde kullan\u0131lm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r. Kad\u0131nlar da teri emmesi ve kokular\u0131 azaltmas\u0131 i\u00e7in pudra kullan\u0131rlar.\nGe\u00e7en sene St. Louis \u015eehri Devre Mahkemesinde yap\u0131lan \u015fikayete g\u00f6re, hijyen amac\u0131yla d\u00fczenli olarak \u201cJohnson\u2019s Baby Powder\u201d ve \u201cShower to Shower\u201d \u00fcr\u00fcnlerini kullanan kad\u0131nlar, kendilerinde yumurtal\u0131k kanseri geli\u015fti\u011fini s\u00f6ylediler.\nWashington Post\u2019tan Laurie McGinley\u2019in haberine g\u00f6re, talk pudras\u0131n\u0131n yumurtal\u0131k kanserine yol a\u00e7\u0131p a\u00e7mayaca\u011f\u0131 konusu tart\u0131\u015fmal\u0131d\u0131r; h\u00fck\u00fcmet ara\u015ft\u0131rmac\u0131lar\u0131 da dahil olmak \u00fczere bir\u00e7ok uzman, kan\u0131tlar\u0131n zay\u0131f oldu\u011funu iddia etmektedir.\nTalk pudras\u0131 zararl\u0131 m\u0131? \nMcGinley, talk pudras\u0131n\u0131n kozmetik ve ki\u015fisel bak\u0131m \u00fcr\u00fcnlerinde kullan\u0131lan bir mineral oldu\u011funu bildirmi\u015ftir. Amerikan Kanser Toplulu\u011funa g\u00f6re talk pudras\u0131 do\u011fal haliyle solundu\u011funda, akci\u011ferlerde kansere neden asbest maddesini i\u00e7erebilir. Ancak derne\u011fe g\u00f6re, modern \u00fcr\u00fcnlerde kullan\u0131lan bir form olan asbestsiz talk pudras\u0131n\u0131n benzer bir risk olu\u015fturup olu\u015fturmad\u0131\u011f\u0131 belli de\u011fil. \u00d6zellikle yumurtal\u0131k kanseri ile ilgili olarak, Amerikan Kanser Derne\u011fi, \u201cbaz\u0131 \u00e7al\u0131\u015fmalarda biraz daha fazla risk oldu\u011fu rapor edilmi\u015f ve baz\u0131lar\u0131nda hi\u00e7  kanser art\u0131\u015f\u0131 bildirilmemi\u015ftir\u201d a\u00e7\u0131klamas\u0131nda bulunmu\u015ftur.\nMcGinley \u015f\u00f6yle devam etmi\u015ftir:\nTalk konusundaki tart\u0131\u015fmalar on y\u0131l \u00f6nce ba\u015flad\u0131. 1970\u2019lerin ba\u015f\u0131nda, bilim adamlar\u0131 yumurtal\u0131k t\u00fcm\u00f6rlerinde talk partik\u00fclleri ke\u015ffettiler. 1982\u2019de Harvard ara\u015ft\u0131rmac\u0131s\u0131 Daniel Cramer, talk pudras\u0131 ve yumurtal\u0131k kanseri aras\u0131nda bir ba\u011flant\u0131 oldu\u011funu bildirdi. \u00c7al\u0131\u015fmas\u0131n\u0131n ard\u0131ndan, daha \u00e7ok talk pudras\u0131 kullan\u0131c\u0131lar\u0131n\u0131n d\u00fczenli olarak yumurtal\u0131k kanseri riskini art\u0131rd\u0131\u011f\u0131 bulunmu\u015ftur. Bir noktada J & J\u2019nin \u00fcr\u00fcnlerine uyar\u0131 koymas\u0131n\u0131 tavsiye eden Cramer, \u015firketi dava eden kad\u0131nlar i\u00e7in s\u0131k s\u0131k bir uzman tan\u0131k oldu.\nKaynaklar: twitter, New York Times, Reuters, The Telegraph, Washingtonpost, Washingtonpost2, ncbi, ncbi2, youtube\nVideo oynat\u0131c\u0131\nhttps://dogrula.org/wp-content/uploads/2018/02/dogrula.org_.mp4\n00:00\n00:07\n[Toplam:5    Ortalama:5/5] Johnson & Johnson Firmas\u0131n\u0131n Kansere Yakaland\u0131\u011f\u0131n\u0131 S\u00f6yleyen Kad\u0131nlara Tazminat \u00d6demeye Mahkum Edildi\u011fi \u0130ddias\u0131", "\u201cBerat Albayrak\u2019\u0131n \u201816 Y\u0131ll\u0131k Enkaz\u0131 Devrald\u0131k\u2019 Dedi\u011fi \u0130ddias\u0131\u201d ba\u015fl\u0131kl\u0131 i\u00e7eri\u011fimizde, sosyal medyada bir\u00e7ok kullan\u0131c\u0131 taraf\u0131ndan payla\u015f\u0131lan Hazine ve Maliye Bakan\u0131 Berat Albayrak\u2019\u0131n, \u201c16 Y\u0131ll\u0131k enkaz\u0131 devrald\u0131k. Bu enkaz\u0131n toplanmas\u0131 k\u0131sa vadede olmayacakt\u0131r. Merkez bankas\u0131n\u0131n kasas\u0131 tam tak\u0131r.\u201d \u015feklinde a\u00e7\u0131klama yapt\u0131\u011f\u0131 iddias\u0131n\u0131 inceledik. S\u00f6z konusu iddia do\u011fru de\u011fildir.\nBerat Albayrak\u2019\u0131n iddia konusu payla\u015f\u0131mlardaki gibi bir a\u00e7\u0131klamas\u0131 bulunmamaktad\u0131r. \u0130ddia, sosyal medyada bir Twitter kullan\u0131c\u0131s\u0131n\u0131n 11 Temmuz\u2019da yapt\u0131\u011f\u0131 payla\u015f\u0131m \u00fczerine di\u011fer kullan\u0131c\u0131lar aras\u0131nda farkl\u0131la\u015farak yay\u0131lm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r. S\u00f6z konusu payla\u015f\u0131m \u015f\u00f6yle:\n\u201cBerat Albayrak\u2019\u0131n birazdan \u00e7\u0131k\u0131p \u201916 Y\u0131ll\u0131k enkaz\u0131 devrald\u0131k. Bu enkaz\u0131n toplanmas\u0131 k\u0131sa vadede olmayacakt\u0131r. Merkez bankas\u0131n\u0131n kasas\u0131 tam takir.\u2019 Demesini bekliyorum\u2026\u201d\nBu payla\u015f\u0131mdan sonra, at\u0131lan tweeti yanl\u0131\u015f yorumlayan baz\u0131 sosyal medya kullan\u0131c\u0131lar\u0131 Berat Albayrak\u2019\u0131n ger\u00e7ekten b\u00f6yle bir a\u00e7\u0131klamas\u0131 olmu\u015f gibi payla\u015f\u0131m yapm\u0131\u015flar ve bilerek veya bilmeyerek asl\u0131 olmayan bir iddian\u0131n yay\u0131lmas\u0131n\u0131 sa\u011flam\u0131\u015flard\u0131r.\n        G\u00f6r\u00fcld\u00fc\u011f\u00fc \u00fczere, yanl\u0131\u015f olan bir iddia dahi sosyal medyada \u00e7ok h\u0131zl\u0131 bir \u015fekilde do\u011fruymu\u015f gibi yay\u0131labilmektedir. Dolay\u0131s\u0131yla kar\u015f\u0131la\u015f\u0131lan her payla\u015f\u0131ma itibar edilmemeli, \u00f6ncelikle kayna\u011f\u0131 sorgulanmal\u0131d\u0131r.\nMerkez Bankas\u0131 \u0130statistikleri\nMerkez Bankas\u0131\u2019n\u0131n d\u00fczenli aral\u0131klarla yay\u0131nlad\u0131\u011f\u0131 istatistikler ve raporlar incelenerek Merkez Bankas\u0131\u2019n\u0131n durumuna dair fikir edinilebilir.\nMerkez Bankas\u0131\u2019n\u0131n resmi \u0130nternet sitesinden yukar\u0131daki g\u00f6rselde g\u00f6sterildi\u011fi gibi \u0130statistikler k\u0131sm\u0131ndan istenilen istatistikler, veriler, raporlar incelenebilir. Buraya t\u0131klayarak Merkez Bankas\u0131\u2019n\u0131n resmi \u0130nternet sitesine ula\u015fabilirsiniz.\nKaynaklar: facebook, twitter, twitter 2, twitter 3, twitter 4, twitter 5, twitter 6, twitter 7, twitter 8, tcmb.gov\nVideo oynat\u0131c\u0131\nhttps://dogrula.org/wp-content/uploads/2018/02/dogrula.org_.mp4\n00:00\n00:07\n[Toplam:7    Ortalama:4.1/5] Berat Albayrak\u2019\u0131n \u201c16 Y\u0131ll\u0131k Enkaz\u0131 Devrald\u0131k\u201d Dedi\u011fi \u0130ddias\u0131", "\u201cAmbulanslar\u0131n Hasta Yak\u0131n\u0131 145 TL \u00d6demezse Osmangazi K\u00f6pr\u00fcs\u00fc\u2019nden Ge\u00e7emedi\u011fi \u0130ddias\u0131\u201d ba\u015fl\u0131kl\u0131 i\u00e7eri\u011fimizde, dogrula.org\u2019a ihbar olarak gelen, ayn\u0131 zamanda hem sosyal medyada hem de \u0130nternet sitelerinde payla\u015f\u0131lan ve etkile\u015fim alan bir iddiay\u0131 inceledik. \u0130ddiaya g\u00f6re; Osmangazi K\u00f6pr\u00fcs\u00fc\u2019n\u00fc kullanmak zorunda kalan ambulanslar, hasta sahibi 145 TL \u00f6demezse k\u00f6pr\u00fcden ge\u00e7ememektedir. S\u00f6z konusu iddia do\u011fru de\u011fildir.\n\u00d6ncelikle Karayollar\u0131 Genel M\u00fcd\u00fcrl\u00fc\u011f\u00fc taraf\u0131ndan i\u015fletilen k\u00f6pr\u00fc ve otoyollar\u0131 kullanan ambulanslar Bakanlar ge\u00e7i\u015f \u00fccretinden muaft\u0131r. 2003/6254 say\u0131l\u0131 Bakanlar Kurulu Karar\u0131 ve Sa\u011fl\u0131k Bakanl\u0131\u011f\u0131 taraf\u0131ndan yay\u0131nlanan 2010\u201340 say\u0131l\u0131 Genelge ve Karayollar\u0131 Genel M\u00fcd\u00fcrl\u00fc\u011f\u00fcn\u00fcn Sorumlulu\u011fu Alt\u0131nda Bulunan Otoyollar ile Eri\u015fme Kontrol\u00fcn\u00fcn Uyguland\u0131\u011f\u0131 Karayollar\u0131nda Ge\u00e7i\u015f \u00dccretlerinin Belirlenmesi ve Uygulanmas\u0131na \u0130li\u015fkin Y\u00f6netmelik uyar\u0131nca, Karayollar\u0131 Genel M\u00fcd\u00fcrl\u00fc\u011f\u00fc taraf\u0131ndan i\u015fletilen otoyol ve k\u00f6pr\u00fclerde sa\u011fl\u0131k ula\u015f\u0131m ara\u00e7lar\u0131, ge\u00e7i\u015f \u00fccretlerinden muaf tutulmu\u015ftur.\nAncak Osmangazi K\u00f6pr\u00fcs\u00fc, Karayollar\u0131 Genel M\u00fcd\u00fcrl\u00fc\u011f\u00fc (KGM) taraf\u0131ndan de\u011fil, OTOYOL Yat\u0131r\u0131m ve \u0130\u015fletme A.\u015e. taraf\u0131ndan i\u015fletilmektedir. Dolay\u0131s\u0131yla Karayollar\u0131 Genel M\u00fcd\u00fcrl\u00fc\u011f\u00fc taraf\u0131ndan i\u015fletilen k\u00f6pr\u00fc ve otoyollarda uygulanan prosed\u00fcrden farkl\u0131 bir uygulama s\u00f6z konusudur.\nOTOYOL Yat\u0131r\u0131m ve \u0130\u015fletme A.\u015e. dahil olmak \u00fczere t\u00fcm \u00f6zel i\u015fletmecilerinin i\u015fletti\u011fi otoyol ve k\u00f6pr\u00fclerde, in\u015faat ve i\u015fletme g\u00f6revi 3996 say\u0131l\u0131 Yap-\u0130\u015flet-Devret Kanunu \u00e7er\u00e7evesinde yap\u0131lmakta olup, bu otoyol ve k\u00f6pr\u00fcler belirtilen Bakanlar Kurulu Karar\u0131na tabi de\u011fildir. Tabi olunan 6001 Say\u0131l\u0131 Karayollar\u0131 Genel M\u00fcd\u00fcrl\u00fc\u011f\u00fcn\u00fcn Te\u015fkilat ve G\u00f6revleri Hakk\u0131ndaki Kanunun 14. maddesinin 3. bendinde \u00fccretsiz ge\u00e7i\u015flerle ilgili olarak,\n\u201c24/11/1994 tarihli ve 4046 say\u0131l\u0131 \u00d6zelle\u015ftirme Uygulamalar\u0131 Hakk\u0131nda Kanun, 3465 say\u0131l\u0131 Kanun ve 3996 say\u0131l\u0131 Kanun h\u00fck\u00fcmlerine g\u00f6re i\u015fletme hakk\u0131 verilen veya devredilen karayollar\u0131nda ge\u00e7i\u015f \u00fccretinin belirlenmesine ili\u015fkin esas ve usuller ile \u00fccretsiz ge\u00e7i\u015f yapmas\u0131na izin verilecek olanlar s\u00f6zle\u015fmelerde d\u00fczenlenir.\u201d\nifadesi yer almaktad\u0131r. Yani, \u00fccretsiz ge\u00e7ebilen ara\u00e7lar\u0131n durumlar\u0131n\u0131n KGM ile \u00d6zel \u0130\u015fletmeci \u015firket aras\u0131nda otoyol ve k\u00f6pr\u00fcn\u00fcn in\u015faat\u0131 ve i\u015fletmesine y\u00f6nelik imzalanm\u0131\u015f olan s\u00f6zle\u015fmede tan\u0131mlanaca\u011f\u0131 belirtilmektedir.\n\u0130lgili husus, OTOYOL A.\u015e. ve KGM aras\u0131nda imzalanan s\u00f6zle\u015fme eklerinde,\n\u201cOtoyolda olabilecek herhangi bir kaza veya ola\u011fand\u0131\u015f\u0131 durumlarda, trafik g\u00fcvenli\u011finin ve otoyolun g\u00fcvenli\u011finin sa\u011flanmas\u0131 amac\u0131 ile polis, jandarma, itfaiye, sa\u011fl\u0131k kurulu\u015fu gibi birimler ve yine herhangi bir kaza, ola\u011fan ve/veya ola\u011fan d\u0131\u015f\u0131 durumlarda \u0130darenin ve m\u00fc\u015favir firman\u0131n kontrol amac\u0131yla g\u00f6revlendirdi\u011fi birimlerin otoyolu \u00fccretsiz olarak kullanmalar\u0131 sa\u011flanacakt\u0131r.\u201d\n\u015feklinde d\u00fczenlenmi\u015ftir.\nBelirtilen d\u00fczenlemeden dolay\u0131 otoyolu ve k\u00f6pr\u00fcy\u00fc kullanan ambulanslar \u201cOtoyolda ger\u00e7ekle\u015fen herhangi bir kaza veya ola\u011fand\u0131\u015f\u0131 duruma\u201dm\u00fcdahale etmek amac\u0131 ile gelmesi d\u0131\u015f\u0131ndaki t\u00fcm durumlarda \u00fccret \u00f6demektedirler. Ancak, bu \u00f6demeler payla\u015f\u0131mlarda iddia edildi\u011fi gibi kesinlikle \u201chasta veya hasta yak\u0131n\u0131ndan\u201d talep edilmemektedir. \u00dccreti \u00f6demekle ambulans\u0131n ba\u011fl\u0131 oldu\u011fu kurum veya kurulu\u015f y\u00fck\u00fcml\u00fc tutulmu\u015ftur. Yani ya Sa\u011fl\u0131k Bakanl\u0131\u011f\u0131na ait hastane ya da \u00f6zel hastane ge\u00e7i\u015f \u00fccretini \u00f6demekle y\u00fck\u00fcml\u00fcd\u00fcr. Sa\u011fl\u0131k Bakanl\u0131\u011f\u0131, kendilerine ba\u011fl\u0131 kurumlara (\u0130l Sa\u011fl\u0131k M\u00fcd\u00fcrl\u00fckleri) bu y\u00f6nde b\u00fct\u00e7e tahsis etmektedir. Yine Sa\u011fl\u0131k Bakanl\u0131\u011f\u0131nca hizmetin aksamadan sa\u011flanmas\u0131n\u0131 temin amac\u0131na y\u00f6nelik olarak resmi ambulanslar i\u00e7in H\u0131zl\u0131 Ge\u00e7i\u015f Sistemi (HGS) ve Otomatik Ge\u00e7i\u015f Sistemi (OGS) aboneli\u011fi yap\u0131lmas\u0131 talimat\u0131 verilmi\u015ftir. Bu uygulama ile ambulanslar\u0131n ula\u015fmas\u0131 gereken noktaya engelsiz bir \u015fekilde, vakit kayb\u0131 ya\u015fanmadan ula\u015fabilmesi sa\u011flanmaktad\u0131r.\n\u0130ddia konusu g\u00f6rselde ge\u00e7i\u015f \u00fccretlerinin 145 TL oldu\u011fu da iddia edilmi\u015ftir. Ancak bu iddia da do\u011fru de\u011fildir. Karayollar\u0131 Genel M\u00fcd\u00fcrl\u00fc\u011f\u00fcn\u00fcn resmi \u0130nternet sitesinde yay\u0131nlanan 2018 y\u0131l\u0131 Osmangazi K\u00f6pr\u00fcs\u00fc ge\u00e7i\u015f \u00fccretleritarifesine g\u00f6re 2. s\u0131n\u0131f ara\u00e7 grubuna dahil olan ambulanslar\u0131n ge\u00e7i\u015f \u00fccreti, 114.80 TL\u2019dir. Ara\u00e7 s\u0131n\u0131flar\u0131 ise ilgili Karayollar\u0131 Y\u00f6netmeli\u011fi\u2019nin 5. maddesinde d\u00fczenlenmektedir ve bu d\u00fczenlemeye g\u00f6re Ambulanslar da 2 numaral\u0131 ara\u00e7 s\u0131n\u0131f\u0131na dahildir. Aks (dingil) aral\u0131\u011f\u0131na g\u00f6re belirlenen ara\u00e7 s\u0131n\u0131flar\u0131 aras\u0131nda, aks aral\u0131\u011f\u0131 3.20 metre ve \u00fczeri olan her t\u00fcrl\u00fc iki aksl\u0131 ara\u00e7, 2 numaral\u0131 ara\u00e7 s\u0131n\u0131f\u0131 grubuna dahildir. Buna g\u00f6re ambulanslar da iki aksl\u0131 ve aks aral\u0131\u011f\u0131 3.20 ve \u00fczeri olan bir ara\u00e7 grubuna dahil oldu\u011fundan, 2.s\u0131n\u0131f ara\u00e7lar aras\u0131nda yer almaktad\u0131r.\nGiri\u015f\u200a\u2014\u200a\u00e7\u0131k\u0131\u015f gi\u015felerine ve yine ara\u00e7 s\u0131n\u0131f\u0131na g\u00f6re belirlenen, Osmangazi K\u00f6pr\u00fcs\u00fc\u2019n\u00fcn de g\u00fczergah i\u00e7erisinde yer ald\u0131\u011f\u0131 Gebze-Orhangazi-\u0130zmir otoyolunun (\u0130zmit K\u00f6rfez ge\u00e7i\u015fi ve ba\u011flant\u0131 yollar\u0131 dahil) daha detayl\u0131 olan \u00fccret tablosu da Karayollar\u0131 Genel M\u00fcd\u00fcrl\u00fc\u011f\u00fc taraf\u0131ndan yay\u0131nlanan 2018 Y\u0131l\u0131 Ge\u00e7i\u015f \u00dccretleri Tablosunda listelenmi\u015ftir. Bu tabloya g\u00f6re, Bursa Kuzey giri\u015f gi\u015fesini kullanan 2. s\u0131n\u0131f bir arac\u0131n \u00f6deyece\u011fi ge\u00e7i\u015f \u00fccreti (146.65 TL) haricinde hi\u00e7bir 2. s\u0131n\u0131f arac\u0131n ge\u00e7i\u015f \u00fccreti 145 TL de\u011fildir. Buna g\u00f6re \u00fccret tarifeleri listesi a\u015fa\u011f\u0131daki gibidir.\nKarayollar\u0131 Genel M\u00fcd\u00fcrl\u00fc\u011f\u00fc Taraf\u0131ndan \u0130\u015fletilen K\u00f6pr\u00fclerdeki Uygulama Nas\u0131l?\n2003/6254 say\u0131l\u0131 Bakanlar Kurulu Karar\u0131 ve Sa\u011fl\u0131k Bakanl\u0131\u011f\u0131 taraf\u0131ndan yay\u0131nlanan 2010\u201340 say\u0131l\u0131 Genelge ve Karayollar\u0131 Genel M\u00fcd\u00fcrl\u00fc\u011f\u00fcn\u00fcn Sorumlulu\u011fu Alt\u0131nda Bulunan Otoyollar ile Eri\u015fme Kontrol\u00fcn\u00fcn Uyguland\u0131\u011f\u0131 Karayollar\u0131nda Ge\u00e7i\u015f \u00dccretlerinin Belirlenmesi ve Uygulanmas\u0131na \u0130li\u015fkin Y\u00f6netmelik uyar\u0131nca, Karayollar\u0131 Genel M\u00fcd\u00fcrl\u00fc\u011f\u00fc taraf\u0131ndan i\u015fletilen otoyol ve k\u00f6pr\u00fclerde sa\u011fl\u0131k ula\u015f\u0131m ara\u00e7lar\u0131, ge\u00e7i\u015f \u00fccretlerinden muaf tutulmu\u015ftur.\nBakanlar Kurulu karar\u0131 ve Sa\u011fl\u0131k Bakanl\u0131\u011f\u0131 genelgesi ve ilgili Karayollar\u0131 Y\u00f6netmeli\u011fi\u2019ne g\u00f6re k\u00f6pr\u00fc ve otoyol ge\u00e7i\u015flerinde ambulanslar\u0131n \u00fccret \u00f6demekten muaf tutuldu\u011fu belirtilmesine ra\u011fmen, yine de iddia hakk\u0131nda g\u00f6r\u00fc\u015fmek \u00fczere ambulanslar\u0131n ba\u011fl\u0131 bulundu\u011fu Acil Sa\u011fl\u0131k Hizmetleri Genel M\u00fcd\u00fcrl\u00fc\u011f\u00fc Daire Koordinat\u00f6r\u00fc ve Karayollar\u0131 Genel M\u00fcd\u00fcrl\u00fc\u011f\u00fc ile ileti\u015fime ge\u00e7tik. G\u00f6r\u00fc\u015fmelerimiz sonucunda, ambulanslar\u0131n KGM taraf\u0131ndan i\u015fletilen k\u00f6pr\u00fclerdeki ge\u00e7i\u015fi s\u0131ras\u0131nda bu \u00fccretlerden muaf oldu\u011fu bilgisini do\u011frulad\u0131k.\nAmbulanslar\u0131n KGM Taraf\u0131ndan \u0130\u015fletilen K\u00f6pr\u00fc ve Otoyol Ge\u00e7i\u015f \u00dccretlerinden Muaf Olmas\u0131na Dair Hukuki Kaynaklar\nAmbulanslar\u0131n Karayollar\u0131 Genel M\u00fcd\u00fcrl\u00fc\u011f\u00fc (KGM) taraf\u0131ndan i\u015fletilen k\u00f6pr\u00fc ve otoyollardan ge\u00e7i\u015f \u00fccretinden muaf olmas\u0131 konusunda Sa\u011fl\u0131k Bakanl\u0131\u011f\u0131 \u0130dari ve Mali \u0130\u015fler Dairesi Ba\u015fkanl\u0131\u011f\u0131 taraf\u0131ndan yay\u0131nlanan 2010\u201340 say\u0131l\u0131 Sa\u011fl\u0131k Ula\u015f\u0131m Ara\u00e7lar\u0131 Genelgesi\u2019nin B b\u00f6l\u00fcm\u00fcnde yer alan 5. maddede \u015fu d\u00fczenleme yap\u0131lm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r:\nGenelge\u2019de bahsi ge\u00e7en Bakanlar Kurulu\u2019nun 2003/6254 say\u0131l\u0131 Karar\u0131\u2019n\u0131n 1. maddesine g\u00f6re ise, 28/1/2002 tarihli ve 2002/3654 say\u0131l\u0131 Kararnamenin eki olan Karar\u2019a a\u015fa\u011f\u0131daki madde eklenmi\u015ftir:\n\u201cMadde 21\u200a\u2014\u200aSa\u011fl\u0131k Bakanl\u0131\u011f\u0131na ait resmi ambulanslar\u0131n otoyol ve Bo\u011faz K\u00f6pr\u00fclerinden ge\u00e7i\u015flerinde, ad\u0131 ge\u00e7en Bakanl\u0131k 8/1/2002 tarihli ve 4736 say\u0131l\u0131 Kanunun 1 inci maddesinin birinci f\u0131kras\u0131 h\u00fckm\u00fcnden muaft\u0131r.\u201d\nBakanlar Kurulu Karar\u0131 ile eklenen madde 21\u2019de ge\u00e7en 4736 say\u0131l\u0131 Kanunun 1. maddesinin birinci f\u0131kras\u0131 da \u015f\u00f6yle:\nMadde 1\u200a\u2014\u200aGenel b\u00fct\u00e7eye dahil daireler ile katma b\u00fct\u00e7eli idareler, bunlara ba\u011fl\u0131 d\u00f6ner sermayeli kurulu\u015flar, kanunla kurulan fonlar, kefalet sand\u0131klar\u0131, sosyal g\u00fcvenlik kurulu\u015flar\u0131, genel ve katma b\u00fct\u00e7elerin transfer tertiplerinden yard\u0131m alan kurulu\u015flar, kamu iktisadi te\u015febb\u00fcsleri ve ba\u011fl\u0131 ortakl\u0131klar\u0131 ile m\u00fcesseseleri, il \u00f6zel idareleri ve belediyeler ile bunlar\u0131n kurduklar\u0131 birlik, m\u00fcessese ve i\u015fletmeler, \u00f6zel b\u00fct\u00e7eli kurulu\u015flar, \u00f6zelle\u015ftirme i\u015flemleri tamamlan\u0131ncaya kadar, 24.11.1994 tarihli ve 4046 say\u0131l\u0131 Kanuna t\u00e2bi kurulu\u015flar ve \u00f6zel hukuk h\u00fck\u00fcmlerine t\u00e2bi, kamunun \u00e7o\u011funluk hissesine sahip oldu\u011fu kurulu\u015flar, kamu banka ve kurulu\u015flar\u0131 ile bunlara ba\u011fl\u0131 i\u015f yerleri ve di\u011fer kamu kurum ve kurulu\u015flar\u0131nca \u00fcretilen mal ve hizmet bedellerinde i\u015fletmecilik gere\u011fi yap\u0131lmas\u0131 gereken ticar\u00ee indirimler hari\u00e7 herhangi bir ki\u015fi veya kuruma \u00fccretsiz veya indirimli tarife uygulanmaz.\nKarayollar\u0131 Genel M\u00fcd\u00fcrl\u00fc\u011f\u00fcn\u00fcn \u0130lgili Y\u00f6netmeli\u011fi\nKarayollar\u0131 Genel M\u00fcd\u00fcrl\u00fc\u011f\u00fcn\u00fcn Sorumlulu\u011fu Alt\u0131nda Bulunan Otoyollar ile Eri\u015fme Kontrol\u00fcn\u00fcn Uyguland\u0131\u011f\u0131 Karayollar\u0131nda Ge\u00e7i\u015f \u00dccretlerinin Belirlenmesi ve Uygulanmas\u0131na \u0130li\u015fkin Y\u00f6netmeli\u011fi\u2018nin 8. maddesinde de ge\u00e7i\u015f \u00fccreti muafiyetine dair d\u00fczenlemeler s\u00f6z konusudur. Buna g\u00f6re, trafik kazas\u0131, yang\u0131n ve benzeri olaylara m\u00fcdahale i\u00e7in g\u00f6revlendirilen ambulanslar\u0131n, itfaiye ara\u00e7lar\u0131n\u0131n, sivil savunma ara\u00e7lar\u0131n\u0131n ve di\u011fer g\u00f6revli ara\u00e7lar\u0131n \u00fccret \u00f6demeyece\u011fi belirtilmi\u015ftir.\nSonu\u00e7 olarak, Karayollar\u0131 Genel M\u00fcd\u00fcrl\u00fc\u011f\u00fc taraf\u0131ndan i\u015fletilen k\u00f6pr\u00fclerde ambulanslar ge\u00e7i\u015f \u00fccretinden muaft\u0131r. Ancak Osmangazi K\u00f6pr\u00fcs\u00fc KGM taraf\u0131ndan i\u015fletilmemektedir. Ancak yine de payla\u015f\u0131mlardaki iddia do\u011fru de\u011fildir. \u00c7\u00fcnk\u00fc Osmangazi K\u00f6pr\u00fcs\u00fc\u2019n\u00fc kullanan ambulanslar\u0131n ge\u00e7i\u015fi i\u00e7in yine hasta sahibinden \u00fccret talep edilmemektedir. Ayr\u0131ca ambulanslar da, ola\u011fan d\u0131\u015f\u0131 bir duruma m\u00fcdahale amac\u0131yla Osmangazi K\u00f6pr\u00fcs\u00fc\u2019n\u00fc kullan\u0131yorsa \u00fccrete tabi de\u011fildir. Otoyolda ger\u00e7ekle\u015fen herhangi bir kaza veya ola\u011fan d\u0131\u015f\u0131 duruma m\u00fcdahale etmek amac\u0131 ile gelmesi d\u0131\u015f\u0131ndaki t\u00fcm durumlarda ise \u00fccrete tabidirler. \u00dccreti \u00f6demekle de ambulans\u0131n ba\u011fl\u0131 oldu\u011fu kurum veya kurulu\u015f y\u00fck\u00fcml\u00fc tutulmu\u015ftur. Ayr\u0131ca iddia konusu payla\u015f\u0131mlardaki 145 TL ge\u00e7i\u015f \u00fccreti bilgisi de yanl\u0131\u015ft\u0131r. Osmangazi K\u00f6pr\u00fcs\u00fc\u2019n\u00fc kullanan ambulanslar i\u00e7in ge\u00e7i\u015f \u00fccreti 114.80 TL\u2019dir.\nKaynaklar: kgm.gov, kgm.gov 2, kgm.gov 3, kgm.gov 4, mevzuat.gov, saglik.gov, saglik.gov 2, acilafet.gov, resmigazete.gov, resmigazete.gov 2, mevzuat.gov 2, isletme.otoyolas, h\u00fcrriyet, resmigazete.gov 3, acilafet.gov 2, archive.is\nVideo oynat\u0131c\u0131\nhttps://dogrula.org/wp-content/uploads/2018/02/dogrula.org_.mp4\n00:00\n00:07\n[Toplam:5    Ortalama:5/5] Ambulanslar\u0131n Hasta Yak\u0131n\u0131 145 TL \u00d6demezse Osmangazi K\u00f6pr\u00fcs\u00fc\u2019nden Ge\u00e7emedi\u011fi \u0130ddias\u0131", "ODT\u00dc\u2019de Pankart A\u00e7anlar\u0131n Diplomalar\u0131 \u0130ptal Edildi ba\u015fl\u0131kl\u0131 i\u00e7eri\u011fimizde, ODT\u00dc mezuniyet t\u00f6reninde Cumhurba\u015fkan\u0131 Recep Tayyip Erdo\u011fan\u2019a hakaret i\u00e7erikli pankart a\u00e7an gen\u00e7lerin diplomalar\u0131n\u0131n ellerinden al\u0131nd\u0131\u011f\u0131 iddias\u0131n\u0131 inceledik.\n6 Temmuz 2018 tarihinde d\u00fczenlenen ODT\u00dc 2017\u20132018 y\u0131l\u0131 Akademik Diploma T\u00f6reninde, pankart ge\u00e7i\u015fleri olmu\u015ftur. Pankartlar\u0131 ta\u015f\u0131yan birka\u00e7 gen\u00e7, pankartlar\u0131n hakaret i\u00e7erikli oldu\u011fu gerek\u00e7esiyle g\u00f6z alt\u0131na al\u0131nm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r. G\u00f6zalt\u0131na al\u0131nan \u00f6\u011frenciler ile alakal\u0131 okul diplomalar\u0131n\u0131n iptal edildi\u011fine y\u00f6nelik bir iddia ortaya at\u0131lm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r. Ancak bu iddia do\u011fru de\u011fildir. \nODT\u00dc\u2019de hakaret i\u00e7erikli pankart a\u00e7an gen\u00e7ler g\u00f6z alt\u0131na al\u0131nm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r ancak gen\u00e7lerin diplomalar\u0131n\u0131n iptal oldu\u011funa y\u00f6nelik, okul y\u00f6netiminde ve bas\u0131nda herhangi bir kayna\u011fa ula\u015f\u0131lamam\u0131\u015ft\u0131r. Gazeteler ve haber programlar\u0131na konu olan, ODT\u00dc Mezuniyet t\u00f6reni s\u0131ras\u0131nda a\u00e7\u0131lan baz\u0131 pankartlarla ilgili medyada haberler yap\u0131lm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r. Yap\u0131lan haberler incelendi\u011finde, 4 ODT\u00dc\u2019l\u00fc gencin hakaret i\u00e7erikli pankart a\u00e7t\u0131klar\u0131 gerek\u00e7esiyle tutukland\u0131\u011f\u0131 bilgisi ge\u00e7mektedir. Ancak bu gen\u00e7lerin ODT\u00dc diplomalar\u0131n\u0131n iptal edildi\u011fine dair bir ibare ge\u00e7memektedir.\nCNN T\u00fcrk, Anadolu Ajans\u0131 ve di\u011fer bas\u0131n yay\u0131n organlar\u0131n\u0131n yapt\u0131\u011f\u0131 haberlerde g\u00f6r\u00fclebilece\u011fi \u00fczere, diploma iptaline ili\u015fkin bir ibare yoktur. Cumhurba\u015fkan\u0131 Erdo\u011fan\u2019a y\u00f6nelik hakaret i\u00e7erikli pankart a\u00e7an d\u00f6rt ODT\u00dc \u00f6\u011frencisi ve bir matbaa \u00e7al\u0131\u015fan\u0131 g\u00f6z alt\u0131na al\u0131nm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r. Ard\u0131ndan matbaa \u00e7al\u0131\u015fan\u0131 serbest b\u0131rak\u0131larak 4 ki\u015fi hakk\u0131nda tutuklama karar\u0131 \u00e7\u0131kar\u0131lm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r.\nYap\u0131lan haberlere g\u00f6re, Ankara Emniyet M\u00fcd\u00fcrl\u00fc\u011f\u00fcndeki i\u015flemlerin ard\u0131ndan adliyeye getirilen \u015f\u00fcpheliler, soru\u015fturmay\u0131 y\u00fcr\u00fcten savc\u0131ya ifade verdikten sonra mahkemeye sevk edilmi\u015ftir. N\u00f6bet\u00e7i Sulh Ceza Hakimli\u011fince sorgulanan ki\u015filerden pankart\u0131 ta\u015f\u0131yan D.C.Y, B.A. ve F.E.D. ile pankart\u0131 haz\u0131rlad\u0131\u011f\u0131 tespit edilen \u00d6.K, tutukland\u0131. Pankart\u0131 bast\u0131\u011f\u0131 belirlenen \u015e.D. ise serbest b\u0131rak\u0131lm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r.\nODT\u00dc Mezunlar\u0131 Derne\u011fi, internet sitesinde g\u00f6zalt\u0131 ve tutuklama kararlar\u0131na y\u00f6nelik iki ayr\u0131 a\u00e7\u0131klama yay\u0131nlam\u0131\u015ft\u0131r. Yap\u0131lan bu a\u00e7\u0131klamalara istinaden, diploma iptaline dair bir duyuru yay\u0131nlanmam\u0131\u015ft\u0131r.\nODT\u00dc Mezunlar\u0131 Derne\u011fi, mensuplar\u0131n\u0131n g\u00f6zalt\u0131na al\u0131nmas\u0131na kar\u015f\u0131 \u201cODT\u00dc \u00fczerinden y\u00fcr\u00fct\u00fclen nefret kampanyalar\u0131n\u0131 ve T\u00fcrkiye\u2019nin her d\u00f6neminde \u00f6nc\u00fc bir rol oynam\u0131\u015f bir \u00fcniversitenin hedef g\u00f6sterilmesini k\u0131n\u0131yor; ODT\u00dc\u2019y\u00fc, \u00f6\u011frencilerimizi, mezunlar\u0131m\u0131z\u0131, bilimi ve \u00f6zg\u00fcrl\u00fckleri her ko\u015fulda savunaca\u011f\u0131m\u0131z\u0131 bildiriyoruz.\u201d \u015feklinde a\u00e7\u0131klama yapm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r.\nKaynaklar: CNN T\u00fcrk, Anadolu Ajans\u0131, ODT\u00dc Mezunlar\u0131 Derne\u011fi, HaberT\u00fcrk\nVideo oynat\u0131c\u0131\n00:00\n00:00\n1. \u201cdogrula.org\u201d\n0:07\n[Toplam:5    Ortalama:5/5] ODT\u00dc\u2019de Pankart A\u00e7anlar\u0131n Diplomalar\u0131 \u0130ptal Edildi\u00a0\u0130ddias\u0131", "Nev\u015fehir\u2019de Bir K\u00f6pek \u00c7\u00f6p Kamyonunda Ezilerek \u00d6ld\u00fcr\u00fcld\u00fc \u0130ddias\u0131yla Nev\u015fehir/ Ac\u0131g\u00f6l\u2019de kaydedilerek sosyal medyada dola\u015f\u0131mda olan bu video k\u0131sa zaman i\u00e7inde binlerce etkile\u015fim alarak T\u00fcrkiye g\u00fcndemine oturdu.\nAncak, \u201cNev\u015fehir\u2019de Bir K\u00f6pek \u00c7\u00f6p Kamyonunda Ezilerek \u00d6ld\u00fcr\u00fcld\u00fc \u0130ddias\u0131\u201d do\u011fru de\u011fildir.\nNev\u015fehir/Ac\u0131g\u00f6l Belediyesi \u2013 11 temmuz 2018 \u2013 21:55\nk\u00f6pekleri, canl\u0131-canl\u0131 \u00e7\u00f6p arabas\u0131nda ezerek \u00f6ld\u00fcr\u00fcyorlar!! pic.twitter.com/GEbc1nBv4b\n\u2014 \u2295\u011fuzhan (@ozzycore) July 12, 2018\nAc\u0131g\u00f6l Belediye Ba\u015fkan\u0131 Ercan Erta\u015f\u2019\u0131n Tv8 kanal\u0131na yapt\u0131\u011f\u0131 a\u00e7\u0131klama:\n\u201cResmi 199 say\u0131l\u0131 kanun gere\u011fi, sokak hayvanlar\u0131n\u0131 rehabilite etmek belediyeye y\u00fcklenmi\u015f bir kanun h\u00fckm\u00fcd\u00fcr. Bunu gere\u011fi olarak hayvanlar\u0131m\u0131z\u0131 rehabilite ediyoruz. Bar\u0131naklar\u0131n\u0131 yiyeceklerini kar\u015f\u0131l\u0131yoruz. Bizim gibi hayvan haklar\u0131na dikkat eden bir belediyenin lin\u00e7 kampanyas\u0131na maruz kalmas\u0131 bizi derinden yaralad\u0131. Sizdeki g\u00f6r\u00fcnt\u00fcleri \u015f\u00f6yle a\u00e7\u0131klayabiliriz. Bir tane hafif yaralanm\u0131\u015f hayvan sokakta vatanda\u015fa sald\u0131rgan tav\u0131rlar sergilerken yats\u0131 namaz\u0131na gitmekte olan bir vatanda\u015f belediyeye ihbarda bulunuyor ve gerekli i\u015flemin yap\u0131lmas\u0131 isteniyor.\nVatanda\u015flar\u0131n ve sokak hayvanlar\u0131n\u0131n g\u00fcvenli\u011fini sa\u011flamak amac\u0131yla arkada\u015flar\u0131m\u0131z m\u00fcdahale ediyor. M\u00fcdahale konusunu tasvip etmiyoruz. Orada kesinlikle bahsedildi\u011fi gibi \u00f6ld\u00fcr\u00fclme yok. G\u00f6r\u00fcnt\u00fcy\u00fc detayl\u0131 incelerseniz arkada\u015f\u0131m\u0131z\u0131n elinde bir hayvan yakalama aparat\u0131 var. Hayvan yakalama aparat\u0131yla hayvan\u0131 rahats\u0131z etmeden yormadan almak isterler.\nG\u00f6r\u00fcnt\u00fclerdeki \u00e7\u00f6p \u00f6\u011f\u00fct\u00fcc\u00fc de\u011fil. O \u00e7\u00f6p kullanmakta kulland\u0131\u011f\u0131m\u0131z bir ara\u00e7ta de\u011fil. Arkas\u0131ndaki kapaktan dolay\u0131 hayvanlar\u0131m\u0131z d\u0131\u015far\u0131 \u00e7\u0131kmas\u0131n diye bir kapa\u011f\u0131 var. \u00c7\u00f6p \u00f6\u011f\u00fct\u00fcc\u00fc falan de\u011fil. Hayvan yakalama aparat\u0131yla hayvan kullan\u0131l\u0131yor, uyu\u015fturucu dahi kullan\u0131lm\u0131yor. Kapak kapat\u0131l\u0131rken hayvan\u0131n t\u0131rna\u011f\u0131na dahi zarar gelmiyor. Hayvan\u0131 serbest b\u0131rakt\u0131k. Ufak tefek yaralar\u0131 tedavi edilip do\u011fal ortam\u0131na b\u0131rak\u0131ld\u0131. Onu yakalamaktaki o muameleyi yapan arkada\u015flar\u0131m\u0131zla ilgili idari soru\u015fturma ba\u015flat\u0131ld\u0131. Hayvan\u0131n itlaf edildi\u011fi iddialar yanl\u0131\u015ft\u0131r.\u201d\nNev\u015fehir Belediyesi\u2019nden A\u00e7\u0131klama\n\u201c\u0130nternette bir sosyal payla\u015f\u0131m sitesinde Nev\u015fehir Belediyesi etiketi kullan\u0131larak, bir sokak k\u00f6pe\u011finin \u00e7\u00f6p kamyonu i\u00e7erisinde itlaf edildi\u011fi izlenimi veren g\u00f6r\u00fcnt\u00fcler payla\u015f\u0131lmakta. S\u00f6z konusu g\u00f6r\u00fcnt\u00fcler incelendi\u011finde, olay\u0131n belediyemiz s\u0131n\u0131rlar\u0131 i\u00e7erisinde ger\u00e7ekle\u015fmedi\u011fi ve g\u00f6r\u00fcnt\u00fcdeki \u015fah\u0131slar\u0131n ve \u00e7\u00f6p kamyonunun Nev\u015fehir Belediyesi ile hi\u00e7bir ilgisinin olmad\u0131\u011f\u0131 anla\u015f\u0131lm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r. Nev\u015fehir Belediyesi sokak k\u00f6peklerinin rehabilitasyonlar\u0131 y\u00f6n\u00fcnde 2000 Evler Mahallesi\u2019nde kurdu\u011fu K\u00f6pek Bar\u0131nma Merkezi kanal\u0131yla kanunda \u00f6ng\u00f6rd\u00fc\u011f\u00fc y\u00f6netmelik \u00e7er\u00e7evesinde uygulamalar ger\u00e7ekle\u015ftirmektedir. Kamuoyuna sayg\u0131 ile duyurulur.\u201d\nAc\u0131g\u00f6l Belediyesi bas\u0131n a\u00e7\u0131klamas\u0131\nA\u00e7\u0131klama metnine buradan ula\u015fabilirsiniz.\nEdit\u00f6r\u00fcn Notu: Sokak hayvanlar\u0131na yap\u0131lan i\u015fkence, eziyet ve tecav\u00fczlerin olduk\u00e7a fazla ya\u015fand\u0131\u011f\u0131 \u00fclkemizde, insanlar\u0131n tepkisini \u00e7eken olaylara da bir katliam oldu\u011fu \u015feklide yakla\u015fmas\u0131n\u0131 ola\u011fan g\u00f6r\u00fcyoruz. \u0130nsanlar\u0131n hassasiyetle yakla\u015ft\u0131\u011f\u0131 hayvanlar\u0131n durumu konusu, \u00e7\u00f6z\u00fclmeyi bekleyen problemlerden bir tanesi. Ancak bu videoda bir k\u00f6pe\u011fin ezilerek \u00f6ld\u00fcr\u00fclmesine dair bir g\u00f6r\u00fcnt\u00fcye rastlanm\u0131yor.\nVideoda, g\u00f6revlilerin arac\u0131n i\u00e7ine hayvan itti\u011fi g\u00f6r\u00fcl\u00fcyor. Hayvanlar\u0131n ezilerek \u00f6ld\u00fcr\u00fcld\u00fc\u011f\u00fcne dair bir g\u00f6r\u00fcnt\u00fc yans\u0131m\u0131yor; ayr\u0131ca hayvan\u0131 ittikten sonra kapa\u011f\u0131n kapanmas\u0131 da, k\u00f6pe\u011fin kafas\u0131n\u0131n arada s\u0131k\u0131\u015fmamas\u0131 i\u00e7in yap\u0131lan bir hamle olarak yans\u0131yor.\nVideoyu \u00e7eken ve izleyen vatanda\u015flar\u0131n bulunmas\u0131 da, k\u00f6pek ezme katliam\u0131n\u0131n yap\u0131lmad\u0131\u011f\u0131n\u0131 destekler nitelikte. Aksi bir durum s\u00f6z konusu olsayd\u0131, \u00e7evreden m\u00fcdahalelerin olaca\u011f\u0131 ya da bu i\u015fin sokak ortas\u0131nda insanlar taraf\u0131ndan tepki \u00e7ekmek pahas\u0131na yap\u0131lmayaca\u011f\u0131 d\u00fc\u015f\u00fcn\u00fcl\u00fcyor. Kapak kapanmadan hemen \u00f6nce i\u00e7erideki k\u00f6pe\u011fin arac\u0131n i\u00e7 k\u0131sm\u0131na \u00e7ekildi\u011fi g\u00f6r\u00fcl\u00fcyor. G\u00f6r\u00fcnt\u00fcdeki s\u00fcre\u00e7 boyunca k\u00f6pe\u011fin havl\u0131yor olmas\u0131 da ya\u015fad\u0131\u011f\u0131na dair bir i\u015faret olarak g\u00f6r\u00fcl\u00fcyor.\nAs\u0131ls\u0131z haberlerin \u00e7abucak ve kolayl\u0131kla yay\u0131ld\u0131\u011f\u0131 bir \u00fclke olan T\u00fcrkiye, kutupla\u015fmalar\u0131n da etkisiyle provokatif olaylar\u0131n yay\u0131lmas\u0131na m\u00fcsait bir \u00fclke konumunda.\nVideo oynat\u0131c\u0131\nhttps://dogrula.org/wp-content/uploads/2018/02/dogrula.org_.mp4\n00:00\n00:07\n[Toplam:5    Ortalama:5/5] Nev\u015fehir\u2019de Bir K\u00f6pek \u00c7\u00f6p Kamyonunda Ezilerek \u00d6ld\u00fcr\u00fcld\u00fc \u0130ddias\u0131", "@rzznyks ve @SunaVarol_ adl\u0131 Twitter kullan\u0131c\u0131lar\u0131n\u0131n Hollanda \u00fcniversiteleri ve T\u00fcrkiye \u00fcniversitelerini konu alan payla\u015f\u0131mlar\u0131 binlerce etkile\u015fim alm\u0131\u015ft\u0131.\nKonya kadar y\u00fcz \u00f6l\u00e7\u00fcm\u00fc, 18 milyon n\u00fcfusu olan Hollanda'n\u0131n, 30 \u00fcniversitesinden 11 tanesi d\u00fcnyan\u0131n en iyi 200 \u00fcniversitesi aras\u0131na giriyor;\nBiz hala ortaokul,lise,\u00fcniversite \u00f6\u011frencilerine ter\u00f6rist muamelesi yap\u0131yor,akl\u0131m\u0131za geldik\u00e7e dayaktan ge\u00e7iriyoruz\u2026#Kad\u0131k\u00f6yde\u0130\u015fkenceVar\n\u2014 Suna Varol (@SunaVarol_) June 8, 2018\n18 milyon n\u00fcfusu olan Hollanda\u2019n\u0131n 30 \u00fcniversitesinden 11 tanesinin d\u00fcnyan\u0131n en iyi 200 \u00fcniversitesi aras\u0131nda oldu\u011fu iddias\u0131 do\u011frudur.\nTimes Higher Education\u2019un D\u00fcnya \u00dcniversiteler S\u0131ralamas\u0131 2018\nTimes Higher Education\u2019un D\u00fcnya \u00dcniversiteler S\u0131ralamas\u0131 2018 listesinde, d\u00fcnyadaki en iyi 1000 \u00fcniversite s\u0131ralanm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r ve ilk 200 aras\u0131nda T\u00fcrkiye \u00fcniversiteleri yer almazken, Hollanda\u2019dan 13 \u00fcniversite bulunumaktad\u0131r.\nS\u0131ralama; \u00f6\u011fretim, ara\u015ft\u0131rma, bilgi aktar\u0131m\u0131 ve uluslararas\u0131 bak\u0131\u015f a\u00e7\u0131s\u0131ndan ara\u015ft\u0131rma yo\u011funlu\u011funa g\u00f6re \u00fcniversiteleri t\u00fcm temel g\u00f6revleri \u00fczerinden de\u011ferlendiren tek k\u00fcresel \u00fcniversite performans tablosu. Ara\u015ft\u0131rmada ayr\u0131ca \u00f6\u011frenciler, akademisyenler, \u00fcniversite liderleri, end\u00fcstri ve h\u00fck\u00fcmetler taraf\u0131ndan g\u00fcvenilen en kapsaml\u0131 ve dengeli kar\u015f\u0131la\u015ft\u0131rmalar\u0131 sa\u011flamak i\u00e7in 13 adet \u00f6zenle kalibre edilmi\u015f performans g\u00f6stergesi kullan\u0131ld\u0131\u011f\u0131 belirtilmi\u015ftir.\nEdit\u00f6r\u00fcn notu: Hollanda n\u00fcfusu: 17,085,850\nKaynaklar: twitter1, twitter2, timeshigher education, the2\nVideo oynat\u0131c\u0131\nhttps://dogrula.org/wp-content/uploads/2018/02/dogrula.org_.mp4\n00:00\n00:07\n[Toplam:5    Ortalama:5/5] 18 Milyon N\u00fcfusu Olan Hollanda\u2019n\u0131n 30 \u00dcniversitesinden 11 Tanesinin D\u00fcnyan\u0131n En \u0130yi 200 \u00dcniversitesi Aras\u0131nda Oldu\u011fu \u0130ddias\u0131", "Aztec Chia \u00dcr\u00fcn\u00fcn\u00fcn Show Haber\u2019de Reklam\u0131n\u0131n Yap\u0131ld\u0131\u011f\u0131 \u0130ddias\u0131 ba\u015fl\u0131kl\u0131 yaz\u0131m\u0131zda, Aztec Chia isimli bir \u00fcr\u00fcn\u00fcn ge\u00e7ti\u011fi videonun, Show TV\u2019nin ana haberinde yay\u0131nlad\u0131\u011f\u0131 bir video oldu\u011fu iddia edilmi\u015ftir. Ancak bu iddia do\u011fru de\u011fildir. \nCeren Sunay isimli bir vatanda\u015f\u0131n bir y\u0131l gibi bir s\u00fcrede 50 kilo vermesi \u00fczerine, Show TV kendisiyle r\u00f6portaj yaparak bir haber yay\u0131nlanm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r. \u201c50 kilo verdi, ailesi tan\u0131yamad\u0131\u201d ba\u015fl\u0131\u011f\u0131yla yap\u0131lan haberde, Ceren Sunay\u2019\u0131n zay\u0131flama s\u00fcreci anlat\u0131lm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r. Ancak videonun sonunda, nas\u0131l zay\u0131flad\u0131\u011f\u0131na dair bir \u00fcr\u00fcn\u00fcn reklam\u0131 verilmi\u015ftir. \u0130ddiaya g\u00f6re, haberi yap\u0131lan ki\u015finin Aztec Chia isimli bir \u00fcr\u00fcn ile zay\u0131flad\u0131\u011f\u0131 s\u00f6ylenmi\u015f ve Show Haber ad\u0131 alt\u0131nda bir video yay\u0131nlanm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r.\nOrijinal Video Montajlanm\u0131\u015f\nShow Haber\u2019in canl\u0131 yay\u0131nda yay\u0131nlam\u0131\u015f oldu\u011fu haberin son b\u00f6l\u00fcm\u00fc kesilmi\u015f ve 25. saniyeden sonra yukar\u0131daki r\u00f6portaj k\u0131sm\u0131 eklenerek montaj yap\u0131lm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r. Ceren Sunay\u2019\u0131n,\n\u201cT\u00fcm \u00f6\u011f\u00fcnlerimde, Chia ile haz\u0131rlad\u0131\u011f\u0131m salatalar\u0131 ve yemekleri t\u00fcketmeye ba\u015flad\u0131m. \u00c7ok fazla tok tutarak fazla yememi engelledi, k\u0131sa s\u00fcrede h\u0131zl\u0131 ve sa\u011fl\u0131kl\u0131 kilo vermemi sa\u011flad\u0131. Verdi\u011fim kilolardan dolay\u0131 art\u0131k insanlar beni tan\u0131makta g\u00fc\u00e7l\u00fck \u00e7ekiyor.\u201d \n\u015feklindeki r\u00f6portaj\u0131n\u0131n ard\u0131ndan \u201cm\u00fc\u015fteri memnuniyeti\u201d ve \u201cAztec Chia\u201d isimli \u00fcr\u00fcn\u00fcn reklam\u0131 \u00e7\u0131kmaktad\u0131r. Show Haber\u2019in orijinal videosuna eklenerek montaj yap\u0131ld\u0131\u011f\u0131 anla\u015f\u0131lmaktad\u0131r. Videonun orijinal halinde ise, hi\u00e7bir cerrahi operasyon ge\u00e7irmedi\u011fi, tamamen d\u00fczenli beslenme ve d\u00fczenli spor yaparak zay\u0131flad\u0131\u011f\u0131 ifade edilmi\u015ftir. Muhabirin \u201cCeren bunu nas\u0131l yapt\u0131n?\u201d sorusu \u00fczerine verilen cevab\u0131 ise \u015fu \u015fekildedir:\n\u201cA\u011f\u0131rl\u0131kl\u0131 protein besleniyorum, meyvenin bile dozunu \u00e7ok s\u0131n\u0131rl\u0131 seviyede t\u00fcketmeye \u00e7al\u0131\u015f\u0131yorum. Yan\u0131mda d\u00fczeni olarak ara \u00f6\u011f\u00fcnlerimi ta\u015f\u0131yorum.\u201d Bunlar\u0131n yan\u0131 s\u0131ra, uzman kontrol\u00fcnde zay\u0131flamak gerekti\u011fini belirtmi\u015ftir. Videonun orijinal halini a\u015fa\u011f\u0131dan izleyebilirsiniz:\nVideonun son k\u0131sm\u0131nda ise, di\u011fer videodaki reklam olarak verilen \u00fcr\u00fcn\u00fcn yerine, Ceren Sunay\u2019\u0131n Instagram hesab\u0131 verilmi\u015f ve merak edilen sorular\u0131 buradan yan\u0131tlad\u0131\u011f\u0131 belirtilmi\u015ftir. Habere konu olan Ceren Sunay ad\u0131na, cerenanlatiyor isimli bir blog sitesi a\u00e7\u0131lm\u0131\u015f ve reklam verilen Chia \u00fcr\u00fcn\u00fcn oldu\u011fu video buraya da eklenmi\u015ftir.\nYukar\u0131da, blog sitesinden al\u0131nan video g\u00f6r\u00fcnt\u00fcs\u00fcnde ge\u00e7en \u201cChia Mucizesi ile Tan\u0131\u015ft\u0131 Hayat\u0131 De\u011fi\u015fti\u201d alt band\u0131, haberin orijinal halinde bulunmamaktad\u0131r.\nChia Nedir?\nChia, Meksika ve Gualtemala k\u00f6kenli, i\u00e7erinde lif, omega-3 ve protein bulunan bir bitki tohumudur. Tarihte zay\u0131flamaya faydal\u0131 oldu\u011funa inan\u0131lan bu tohumlar, G\u00fcney Amerika\u2019da yeti\u015fen ve bir t\u00fcr ada\u00e7ay\u0131 olan Salvia hispanica\u2019n\u0131n bir tohumudur. D\u00fc\u015f\u00fck kalorili, y\u00fcksek  protein ve kalsiyum i\u00e7erdi\u011fine inan\u0131ld\u0131\u011f\u0131 i\u00e7in beslenmede bir\u00e7ok insan taraf\u0131ndan tercih edilmektedir.\nBilimsel olarak, sadece bir zay\u0131flama arac\u0131 g\u00f6r\u00fclmemekte olup zay\u0131flamaya yard\u0131mc\u0131 olabilece\u011fi kabul edilmektedir. Bunun yan\u0131 s\u0131ra, g\u00fc\u00e7l\u00fc antioksidan i\u00e7eri\u011fi nedeniyle pek \u00e7ok faydas\u0131n\u0131n oldu\u011funa inan\u0131lmaktad\u0131r.\nCDC olarak bilinen, Hastal\u0131k Kontrol ve \u00d6nleme Merkezleri (Centers for Disease Control and Prevention), kamuoyunu chia tozu ve tohumu i\u00e7eren \u00fcr\u00fcnlerde salmonella enfeksiyonuna kar\u015f\u0131 uyarmaktad\u0131r. G\u0131da zehirlenmelerinin en yayg\u0131n nedenlerinden biri olan bir grup bakterinin ad\u0131 olan Salmonella, enfeksiyon, ishal, ate\u015f, ve kar\u0131n kramplar\u0131 \u015feklinde geli\u015fir. Eczanelerde, internet ortam\u0131nda ve bir\u00e7ok yerde sat\u0131lan Chia tohumlar\u0131n\u0131n, dikkat edilerek sat\u0131n al\u0131nmas\u0131 gerekti\u011fi bildirilmi\u015ftir.\nPosta Gazetesinin 12 Mart 2017 tarihinde yapt\u0131\u011f\u0131 Chia Tohumu Zay\u0131flat\u0131yor mu ba\u015fl\u0131kl\u0131 haberinde, Ceyna Uysal isimli Beslenme ve Diyet Uzman\u0131n\u0131n Chia tohumu ile ilgili yapt\u0131\u011f\u0131 a\u00e7\u0131klamalara yer verilmi\u015ftir. Bu a\u00e7\u0131klamalara g\u00f6re, kilo verdirmedi\u011fini s\u00f6yleyerek fazla t\u00fcketilmesine kar\u015f\u0131 uyar\u0131larda bulunmu\u015ftur. Haberde, ABD\u2019de yap\u0131lan bir ara\u015ft\u0131rma ile Chia tohumunun zay\u0131flatmad\u0131\u011f\u0131n\u0131n kan\u0131tland\u0131\u011f\u0131 iddia edilmi\u015ftir. \u201cTokluk s\u00fcresini uzatt\u0131\u011f\u0131na dair veriler bulunsa da, bilim insanlar\u0131 tok tutma etkisinin lif i\u00e7eri\u011fine ba\u011fl\u0131 oldu\u011funu, bunun di\u011fer besinlerle de sa\u011flanabilinece\u011fini d\u00fc\u015f\u00fcn\u00fcyor\u201d denilmi\u015ftir.\nFaydal\u0131 oldu\u011fu kadar zararlar\u0131n\u0131n da oldu\u011fu bilinen tohum hakk\u0131nda, bir\u00e7ok \u00e7al\u0131\u015fma yap\u0131lm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r. Kanada\u2019daki Toronto\u2019daki St. Michael Hastanesi taraf\u0131ndan yap\u0131lan bir ara\u015ft\u0131rma, Chia tohumlar\u0131n\u0131n, kan bas\u0131nc\u0131n\u0131 tehlikeli seviyelere d\u00fc\u015f\u00fcrme potansiyeline sahip oldu\u011funu ve baz\u0131 ki\u015filerde alerjik etki yapt\u0131\u011f\u0131n\u0131 g\u00f6stermi\u015ftir. Bu nedenle, d\u00fc\u015f\u00fck tansiyon hastalar\u0131n\u0131n ve alerji potansiyeli olanlar\u0131n kesinlikle kullanmamalar\u0131 gerekti\u011fi belirtilmi\u015ftir.\nKaynaklar: Youtube 1, Youtube 2, Centers for Disease Control and Prevention, Posta, seedguides, beyazgazete.com, cerenanlatiyor.bid, healthline.com\nVideo oynat\u0131c\u0131\n00:00\n00:00\n1. \u201cdogrula.org\u201d\n0:07\n[Toplam:5    Ortalama:5/5] Aztec Chia \u00dcr\u00fcn\u00fcn\u00fcn Show Haber\u2019de Reklam\u0131n\u0131n Yap\u0131ld\u0131\u011f\u0131 \u0130ddias\u0131", "\u201cDevlet Tiyatrolar\u0131 Kapat\u0131ld\u0131 \u0130ddias\u0131\u201d ba\u015fl\u0131kl\u0131 i\u00e7eri\u011fimizde sosyal medyada g\u00fcndeme gelen ve baz\u0131 \u0130nternet gazetelerinde de yer alan 703 say\u0131l\u0131 KHK ile Devlet Tiyatrolar\u0131n\u0131n kapat\u0131ld\u0131\u011f\u0131 iddias\u0131n\u0131 inceledik. S\u00f6z konusu iddia do\u011fru de\u011fildir.\n703 say\u0131l\u0131 KHK ile birlikte bakanl\u0131klara ba\u011fl\u0131 ve ilgili bir\u00e7ok kamu kurumunun te\u015fkilat\u0131na dair h\u00fck\u00fcmler yeniden d\u00fczenlenmektedir, kurumlar kapat\u0131lmamaktad\u0131r. Cumhuriyet gazetesinin Twitter hesab\u0131ndan payla\u015ft\u0131\u011f\u0131 iddiaya dair Devlet Tiyatrolar\u0131n\u0131n resmi sitesinden bas\u0131n a\u00e7\u0131klamas\u0131 yap\u0131lm\u0131\u015f ve s\u00f6z konusu iddialar\u0131n do\u011fru olmad\u0131\u011f\u0131 ifade edilmi\u015ftir. \u0130lgili a\u00e7\u0131klama \u015f\u00f6yle:\nBASIN A\u00c7IKLAMASI\n\u201c\u0130lk Kararname ile Sanata Darbe: Devlet Tiyatrolar\u0131 Kapat\u0131ld\u0131\u201d y\u00f6n\u00fcnde yaz\u0131l\u0131 ve g\u00f6rsel medyada baz\u0131 haberler yer almaktad\u0131r. S\u00fcre\u00e7 hakk\u0131nda kamuoyunu do\u011fru bilgilendirmek i\u00e7in Devlet Tiyatrolar\u0131 olarak bir a\u00e7\u0131klama yap\u0131lmas\u0131 ihtiyac\u0131 do\u011fmu\u015ftur. 703 say\u0131l\u0131 Kanun H\u00fckm\u00fcnde Kararname ile birlikte sadece Devlet Tiyatrolar\u0131n\u0131n de\u011fil; Bakanl\u0131\u011f\u0131m\u0131za ba\u011fl\u0131 ve ilgili bir\u00e7ok kamu kurumunun te\u015fkilat\u0131na dair h\u00fck\u00fcmleri yeniden d\u00fczenlenmektedir. \n703 say\u0131l\u0131 Kanun H\u00fckm\u00fcnde Kararnameden sonra \u00e7\u0131kar\u0131lan Cumhurba\u015fkanl\u0131\u011f\u0131 1\u2019inci Kararnamesinin Ge\u00e7ici 1\u2019inci Maddesinde ise \u201c2/7/2018 tarihli ve 703 say\u0131l\u0131 Kanun H\u00fckm\u00fcnde Kararname ile te\u015fkilatlar\u0131na ili\u015fkin kanun veya kanun h\u00fckm\u00fcnde kararnameleri y\u00fcr\u00fcrl\u00fckten kald\u0131r\u0131lan kamu kurum ve kurulu\u015flar\u0131ndan m\u00fcnhas\u0131ran devir ve ge\u00e7i\u015f h\u00fck\u00fcmleri d\u00fczenlenenler d\u0131\u015f\u0131nda kalanlar hakk\u0131nda ilgili Cumhurba\u015fkanl\u0131\u011f\u0131 kararnamesiyle d\u00fczenleme yap\u0131l\u0131ncaya kadar y\u00fcr\u00fcrl\u00fckten kald\u0131r\u0131lan h\u00fck\u00fcmlerin uygulanmas\u0131na devam olunur\u201d ifadesi yer almaktad\u0131r. \nYani anla\u015f\u0131laca\u011f\u0131 \u00fczere Devlet Tiyatrolar\u0131 Genel M\u00fcd\u00fcrl\u00fc\u011f\u00fcn\u00fcn kapat\u0131lmas\u0131 s\u00f6z konusu de\u011fildir. Yap\u0131lan d\u00fczenlemelerin kurumlar\u0131n kapat\u0131lmas\u0131yla ilgili gibi g\u00f6sterilerek haberle\u015ftirilmesi ve kamuoyunda \u2018Devlet Tiyatrolar\u0131 art\u0131k yok\u2019 alg\u0131s\u0131 olu\u015fturmaya \u00e7al\u0131\u015fmak tamamen art niyetli bir zihniyetin \u00fcr\u00fcn\u00fcd\u00fcr. Devlet Tiyatrolar\u0131 \u00fczerinde sistematik bir \u015fekilde yanl\u0131\u015f alg\u0131 olu\u015fturmaya \u00e7al\u0131\u015fan bu tarz haberleri ve yap\u0131lan a\u00e7\u0131klamalar\u0131 \u015fiddetle k\u0131n\u0131yoruz ve kamuoyunun takdirine sunuyoruz.\nA\u00e7\u0131klama metnine ula\u015fmak i\u00e7in t\u0131klay\u0131n\u0131z.\n703 say\u0131l\u0131 KHK\u2019ya ula\u015fmak i\u00e7in t\u0131klay\u0131n\u0131z.\n703 say\u0131l\u0131 KHK\u2019n\u0131n 68. maddesinde 5441 say\u0131l\u0131 Devlet Tiyatrosu Kurulu\u015fu Hakk\u0131nda Kanuna dair d\u00fczenlemeler s\u00f6z konusudur. Ancak bunlar Devlet Tiyatrolar\u0131n\u0131n kapat\u0131lmas\u0131na ili\u015fkin d\u00fczenlemeler olmay\u0131p, kurumlar\u0131n te\u015fkilatlanmas\u0131na ili\u015fkin d\u00fczenlemelerdir.\nDevlet Tiyatrolar\u0131 taraf\u0131ndan yap\u0131lan a\u00e7\u0131klamada da ifade edilen 1 numaral\u0131 Cumhurba\u015fkanl\u0131\u011f\u0131 Kararnamesinin ge\u00e7ici 1. maddesinde \u015fu h\u00fck\u00fcmler s\u00f6z konusu:\nDevlet Opera ve Balesi Kapat\u0131l\u0131yor \u0130ddias\u0131\nSosyal medyada benzer \u015fekilde Devlet Opera ve Balesi i\u00e7in de \u201ckapat\u0131l\u0131yor\u201d iddialar\u0131 g\u00fcndeme gelmi\u015f ve etkile\u015fim alm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r. Ancak bu iddia da do\u011fru de\u011fildir.\nDevlet Opera ve Balesi Genel M\u00fcd\u00fcrl\u00fc\u011f\u00fcn\u00fcn resmi \u0130nternet sitesinde, Devlet Opera ve Balesi Genel M\u00fcd\u00fcr\u00fc ve Genel Sanat Y\u00f6netmeni Murat Karahan taraf\u0131ndan a\u00e7\u0131klama yap\u0131lm\u0131\u015f ve iddialar\u0131n do\u011fru olmad\u0131\u011f\u0131 belirtilmi\u015ftir.S\u00f6z konusu a\u00e7\u0131klama \u015f\u00f6yle:\nDe\u011ferli Kamuoyumuza Duyuru,\nBaz\u0131 bas\u0131n organlar\u0131 ve sosyal medyada dile getirilen \u201cDevlet Opera ve Balesi ile Devlet Tiyatrolar\u0131 kapat\u0131l\u0131yor\u201d \u015feklinde yap\u0131lan haberler as\u0131ls\u0131z ve ger\u00e7e\u011fi yans\u0131tmamaktad\u0131r.\nYeni sisteme ge\u00e7i\u015f s\u00fcrecinde Devlet Opera ve Balesi \u201cBa\u011fl\u0131 Kurulu\u015f\u201d olmas\u0131 sebebi ile, ayn\u0131 stat\u00fcdeki di\u011fer kurulu\u015flar gibi \u00f6n\u00fcm\u00fczdeki d\u00f6nemde yay\u0131mlanacak Cumhurba\u015fkanl\u0131\u011f\u0131 Kararnameleri ile sistemdeki yeni stat\u00fcleri ile faaliyetlerine ayn\u0131 \u015fekilde devam edecektir.\nD\u00fcnya\u2019da \u00e7ok az \u00fclkeye nasip olan k\u00f6kl\u00fc bir Opera ve Bale gelene\u011fine sahip \u00fclkemizde bu g\u00fczide kurumlar\u0131m\u0131z\u0131n faaliyetleri hi\u00e7bir aksamaya u\u011framadan ayn\u0131 \u015fevk, heyecan ve ba\u015far\u0131 ile devam etmektedir.\nSayg\u0131lar\u0131mla\nMurat Karahan \nDevlet Opera ve Balesi Genel M\u00fcd\u00fcr\u00fc ve Genel Sanat Y\u00f6netmeni\nA\u00e7\u0131klama metnine ula\u015fmak i\u00e7in t\u0131klay\u0131n\u0131z.\nKaynaklar: devtiyatro.gov, operabale.gov, twitter, twitter 2, twitter 3, resmigazete.gov\nVideo oynat\u0131c\u0131\nhttps://dogrula.org/wp-content/uploads/2018/02/dogrula.org_.mp4\n00:00\n00:07\n[Toplam:6    Ortalama:5/5] Devlet Tiyatrolar\u0131 Kapat\u0131ld\u0131 \u0130ddias\u0131", "Lise Tercihinde \u0130mam Hatip Yazmak Zorunlu \u0130ddias\u0131 ba\u015fl\u0131kl\u0131 yaz\u0131m\u0131zda, orta\u00f6\u011fretime ge\u00e7i\u015f s\u0131nav\u0131 tercihlerinde ortaya at\u0131lan iddiay\u0131 ele ald\u0131k. 2 Haziran\u2019da yap\u0131lan Liseye Ge\u00e7i\u015f S\u0131nav\u0131n\u0131n (LGS) sonu\u00e7lar\u0131n\u0131n a\u00e7\u0131klanmas\u0131n\u0131n ard\u0131ndan, tercihlerle ilgili olarak, 5 tercihten birinin \u0130mam Hatip Lisesi yaz\u0131lmas\u0131n\u0131n zorunlu oldu\u011fu iddia edildi. Ancak bu iddia do\u011fru de\u011fildir. \nSosyal medyada ve \u00e7e\u015fitli gazetelerde iddia ile ilgili payla\u015f\u0131mlar ve haberler yap\u0131lm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r. S\u00f6zc\u00fc gazetesinin haberine g\u00f6re, tercihlerle alakal\u0131 olarak k\u0131lavuzda, LGS\u2019de derece alan ve ilk 120 bine giren \u00f6\u011frencilerin dahi imam hatip lisesi tercihi yapmalar\u0131n\u0131n zorunlu oldu\u011fu iddia edildi. Buna g\u00f6re, toplamda sadece 5 tercih hakk\u0131 \u00f6\u011frencilerin, imam hatip lisesi tercihi yapmad\u0131\u011f\u0131 taktirde, s\u0131navla \u00f6\u011frenci alan okullar\u0131n ekran\u0131n\u0131n a\u00e7\u0131lmayaca\u011f\u0131 iddia edildi.\nMilli E\u011fitim Bakan\u0131 A\u00e7\u0131klama Yapt\u0131\nMilli E\u011fitim eski Bakan\u0131 \u0130smet Y\u0131lmaz, ge\u00e7ti\u011fimiz g\u00fcnlerde Sivas\u2019ta yapt\u0131\u011f\u0131 konu\u015fmada, s\u0131nav ve tercihlerle ilgili iddialara yan\u0131t verdi. Bakan Y\u0131lmaz, lise tercihinde \u0130mam Hatip zorunlu oldu iddias\u0131na y\u00f6nelik, \u201cT\u00fcrkiye genelinde hi\u00e7bir noktada \u00f6\u011frencilerin istemedikleri okullara zorunlu olarak y\u00f6nlendirilmesi s\u00f6z konusu de\u011fil.\u201d \u015feklinde a\u00e7\u0131klama yapt\u0131.\nBunun yan\u0131s\u0131ra, okullar\u0131n a\u00e7\u0131kland\u0131\u011f\u0131 listede \u0130mam Hatip okullar\u0131n\u0131n \u00e7ok oldu\u011fu \u015feklindeki iddialara ise, \u201cVelev ki biz bunu yapt\u0131k. Kim buralara g\u00f6nderecek. Diyelim biz imam hatipi se\u00e7tik, veli se\u00e7medi. Bo\u015f kalacak m\u0131, kalacak. Y\u00fczde 62 Fen Lisesi, 28 bin \u00f6\u011frenci i\u00e7in imam hatip a\u00e7\u0131ld\u0131\u011f\u0131nda herkes imam hatipe mi gidecek. Veriler y\u00fczde 62 fen lisesi diyor, y\u00fczde 23 imam hatip diyor. Y\u00fczde 23 y\u00fczde 62\u2019den belli de\u011fil. \u0130mam hatipe yerle\u015ftirme oran\u0131n\u0131 y\u00fczde 23 \u00f6ng\u00f6r\u00fcyoruz.\u201d diyerek yan\u0131t verdi.\nK\u0131lavuzda Yer Alm\u0131yor\nMilli E\u011fitim Bakanl\u0131\u011f\u0131n\u0131n yay\u0131nlad\u0131\u011f\u0131 2018 y\u0131l\u0131 Orta\u00f6\u011fretime Ge\u00e7i\u015f Tercih ve Yerle\u015ftirme k\u0131lavuzunda, tercihlerle alakal\u0131 merak edilen sorular yan\u0131tlanm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r. Lise tercihlerini yapmak isteyen \u00f6\u011frencilerin hangi ad\u0131mlar\u0131 izleyece\u011fi k\u0131lavuzda s\u0131ras\u0131yla belirtilmi\u015ftir. 13 Temmuz 2018\u2019e kadar s\u00fcren tercihler i\u00e7in \u00f6\u011frenciler, puanlar\u0131na g\u00f6re istedi\u011fi okullar\u0131 tercih yapabileceklerdir.\nPuan \u00fcst\u00fcnl\u00fc\u011f\u00fc ve yap\u0131lan tercihler do\u011frultusunda kazan\u0131lan okullar\u0131n, \u0130mam Hatip okulu olma gibi bir zorunlulu\u011fu bulunmamaktad\u0131r. \u00d6\u011frenciler ilk \u00f6nce, yerel yerle\u015ftirme ile \u00f6\u011frenci alan okullar ekran\u0131ndan tercihlerini yapabilmektedir. Buna g\u00f6re, yap\u0131lan tercihlerde yerel yerle\u015ftirme ile 5 okul, merkezi s\u0131navla \u00f6\u011frenci alan okullar i\u00e7in 5 okul ve pansiyonlu okullardan 5 okul olmak \u00fczere toplamda en fazla 15 okul tercihinde bulunabileceklerdir.\nA\u015fa\u011f\u0131da, yerel yerle\u015ftirme ve di\u011fer \u015fekilde \u00f6\u011frenci alan okullar i\u00e7in nas\u0131l tercih yap\u0131laca\u011f\u0131 \u00f6rnek olarak verilmi\u015ftir. \u0130mam Hatip Liselerinin k\u0131lavuzda isimlerinin ge\u00e7ti\u011fi k\u0131s\u0131mlar, Anadolu Lisesi, Mesleki ve Teknik Anadolu Lisesi, Anadolu \u0130mam Hatip Lisesi \u015feklinde herhangi birinden tercih yap\u0131laca\u011f\u0131 belirtilmi\u015ftir.\nBunlara g\u00f6re, tercihleri yaparken \u0130mam Hatip okullar\u0131n\u0131 se\u00e7menin zorunlu oldu\u011funa dair herhangi bir bilgi yoktur, \u00f6\u011frenciler istedikleri okullar\u0131 tercih yapabilmektedir.\nKaynaklar: S\u00f6zc\u00fc, 2018 Tercih ve Yerle\u015ftirme K\u0131lavuzu, HaberT\u00fcrk, ogretmenlerhaber.com, memurlar.net\nVideo oynat\u0131c\u0131\n00:00\n00:00\n1. \u201cdogrula.org\u201d\n0:07\n[Toplam:5    Ortalama:5/5] Lise Tercihinde \u0130mam Hatip Yazmak Zorunlu \u0130ddias\u0131", "\u201cYeni KHK ile \u0130dari Hakim Olabilme \u015eartlar\u0131nda Neler De\u011fi\u015fti?\u201d ba\u015fl\u0131kl\u0131 i\u00e7eri\u011fimizde 9 Temmuz 2018 tarihli Resmi Gazetede yay\u0131mlanan 703 say\u0131l\u0131 KHK ile idari hakim olabilme \u015fartlar\u0131nda yap\u0131lan de\u011fi\u015fiklikleri inceledik.\n9 Temmuz 2018 tarihli Resmi Gazetede yay\u0131mlanan 703 say\u0131l\u0131 KHK\u2019n\u0131n ilgili maddesi \u015f\u00f6yle:\nKHK\u2019n\u0131n 136. maddesinde d\u00fczenlenen ve de\u011fi\u015fikli\u011fe konu olan Hakimler ve Savc\u0131lar Kanununun 8. maddesinin de\u011fi\u015fiklik \u00f6ncesi hali \u015f\u00f6yle:\nDaha \u00f6nceki d\u00fczenlemede, \u0130\u0130BF (\u0130ktisadi ve \u0130dari Bilimler Fak\u00fcltesi) mezunlar\u0131na y\u00fczde 20 oran\u0131nda kontenjan ayr\u0131lm\u0131\u015fken, 703 say\u0131l\u0131 KHK ile bu \u00f6zel d\u00fczenleme kald\u0131r\u0131lm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r. Yeni d\u00fczenleme ile bakanl\u0131k ihtiya\u00e7 durumuna g\u00f6re kendi belirleyece\u011fi hukuk d\u0131\u015f\u0131ndaki ba\u015fka bir alandan da al\u0131m yapabilecektir. Ancak bu al\u0131mlar hala s\u0131nav \u015fart\u0131na ba\u011fl\u0131d\u0131r. Yani \u201cbakanl\u0131\u011f\u0131n ihtiya\u00e7 duyaca\u011f\u0131 di\u011fer alanlarda en az d\u00f6rt y\u0131ll\u0131k \u00fcniversite mezunu olmak\u201d\u015feklindeki ifade ile 4 y\u0131ll\u0131k lisans diplomas\u0131 olanlar\u0131n idari yarg\u0131 s\u0131nav\u0131na girebilmesi sa\u011flanm\u0131\u015f oldu. B\u00f6ylece hukuk d\u0131\u015f\u0131ndaki b\u00f6l\u00fcmlerden mezun olan bireylerin idari yarg\u0131 s\u0131nav\u0131na girebilmeleri \u00f6n\u00fcndeki yasal engel kald\u0131r\u0131lm\u0131\u015f oldu ve say\u0131sal, s\u00f6zel vb. b\u00f6l\u00fcm ay\u0131r\u0131m\u0131 olmaks\u0131z\u0131n her 4 y\u0131ll\u0131k lisans mezununun idari yarg\u0131 s\u0131nav\u0131na girebilmesi m\u00fcmk\u00fcn k\u0131l\u0131nd\u0131.\nYarg\u0131\u00e7lar Sendikas\u0131 Y\u00f6netim Kurulu Ba\u015fkan Yard\u0131mc\u0131s\u0131 Nuh H\u00fcseyin K\u00f6se de \u015fahsi Twitter hesab\u0131ndan konuyla alakal\u0131 payla\u015f\u0131mlarda bulunmu\u015f ve yeni d\u00fczenlemeyi de\u011ferlendirmi\u015ftir.\n\u0130dari Hakimlik Nedir? \u0130dari Hakimlik S\u0131nav\u0131 Nas\u0131l Uygulanmaktad\u0131r?\n\u0130dari hakimlik, idare mahkemeleri, vergi mahkemeleri ve Dan\u0131\u015ftay\u2019da g\u00f6rev yapan hakim kadrosuna verilen isimdir.\n\u0130dari Yarg\u0131 Hakimli\u011fi Adayl\u0131\u011f\u0131 s\u0131nav\u0131 \u00d6SYM taraf\u0131ndan test us\u00fbl\u00fcnde ger\u00e7ekle\u015ftirilmektedir. Bu yaz\u0131l\u0131 a\u015faman\u0131n ard\u0131ndan da bakanl\u0131\u011f\u0131n yapaca\u011f\u0131 s\u00f6zl\u00fc a\u015fama ile mesle\u011fe giri\u015f ger\u00e7ekle\u015fmektedir. Yaz\u0131l\u0131 s\u0131navda hukuk alanlar\u0131 \u00e7o\u011funlukta olmak \u00fczere, iktisat \u2013 maliye, genel k\u00fclt\u00fcr ve genel yetenek alanlar\u0131ndan da soru sorulmaktad\u0131r. Yaz\u0131l\u0131 s\u0131nav oturumlar halinde yap\u0131lmakta olup, soru say\u0131s\u0131 da\u011f\u0131l\u0131m\u0131 a\u015fa\u011f\u0131daki \u015fekildedir:\nAnayasa Hukuku(7)\n\u0130dare Hukuku(7)\n\u0130YUK(7)\nCeza Hukuku \u2013 Genel (7)\nMedeni Hukuk(7)\nMedeni Us\u00fbl Hukuku(7)\nBor\u00e7lar Hukuku \u2013 Genel (7)\nVergi Usul Hukuku(7)\nVergi Hukuku(7)\n\u0130ktisat-Maliye(7)\nGenel K\u00fclt\u00fcr (Tarih-Vatanda\u015fl\u0131k) + Genel Yetenek (T\u00fcrk\u00e7e-Matematik (Toplam 30)\nKaynaklar: mevzuat.gov, resmigazete.gov, twitter, Hakim Olabilme \u015eartlar\u0131nda Neler De\u011fi\u015fti?", "\u201cNun Vakf\u0131\u2019na \u00d6zel Yasa \u00c7\u0131kar\u0131ld\u0131\u011f\u0131 \u0130ddias\u0131\u201d ba\u015fl\u0131kl\u0131 yaz\u0131m\u0131zda, \u201cBerat Albayrak\u2019\u0131n karde\u015finin kurucusu oldu\u011fu Nun Vakf\u0131\u2019n\u0131n Bakanlar Kurulu karar\u0131yla vergiden muaf tutuldu\u011fu\u201d haberlerine konu olan vak\u0131flar\u0131n vergi muafiyeti konusunu inceledik.\nBirG\u00fcn, Diken, T24, Odatv gibi gazetelerde yer alan, Nun Vakf\u0131\u2019na \u00f6zel yasa \u00e7\u0131kar\u0131ld\u0131\u011f\u0131 iddias\u0131 do\u011fru de\u011fildir.\nResmi Gazete\u2019deki ilgili kanun maddelerine bak\u0131ld\u0131\u011f\u0131nda, Nun Vakf\u0131\u2019n\u0131n vergiden muaf tutulmas\u0131na ili\u015fkin ayr\u0131cal\u0131kl\u0131 bir durumun s\u00f6z konusu olmad\u0131\u011f\u0131 g\u00f6r\u00fclm\u00fc\u015ft\u00fcr.\nResmi Gazete\u2019de yay\u0131mlanarak y\u00fcr\u00fcrl\u00fc\u011fe giren ilgili kanun maddesinde, \u201cGelirlerinin en az \u00fc\u00e7te ikisini nevi itibar\u0131yla genel, katma ve \u00f6zel b\u00fct\u00e7eli idarelerin b\u00fct\u00e7eleri i\u00e7inde yer alan bir hizmetin veya hizmetlerin yerine getirilmesini ama\u00e7 edinmek \u00fczere kurulan vak\u0131flara, Maliye Bakanl\u0131\u011f\u0131n\u0131n \u00f6nerisi \u00fczerine Bakanlar Kurulunca vergi muafiyeti tan\u0131nabilir.\u201d ifadesi yer almaktad\u0131r.\nKanun maddesinin i\u00e7eri\u011fine buradan ula\u015fabilirsiniz.\nVergi Muafiyeti i\u00e7in Gereken \u015eartlar\n\u201cBakanlar Kurulunca vergi muafiyeti tan\u0131nacak vakf\u0131n; sa\u011fl\u0131k, sosyal yard\u0131m, e\u011fitim, bilimsel ara\u015ft\u0131rma ve geli\u015ftirme, k\u00fclt\u00fcr ve \u00e7evre koruma ile a\u011fa\u00e7land\u0131rma konular\u0131nda faaliyette bulunmay\u0131 ama\u00e7 edinmi\u015f olmas\u0131 gerekir. Vakf\u0131n faaliyet konusu bu say\u0131lanlardan birisi veya birden fazlas\u0131 ile ilgili olabilir. Ancak, vergi muafiyeti talebinde bulunacak vakf\u0131n bu faaliyetlerinin kamuya a\u00e7\u0131k ve Devletin kamu hizmeti y\u00fck\u00fcn\u00fc azalt\u0131c\u0131 etki yapacak d\u00fczeyde olmas\u0131 gerekir.\u201d\n\u201cVak\u0131flar\u0131n Bakanlar Kurulunca vergi muafiyeti tan\u0131nan vak\u0131f stat\u00fcs\u00fcne al\u0131nmas\u0131ndan ama\u00e7; bu suretle onlara \u00e7e\u015fitli vergiler a\u00e7\u0131s\u0131ndan sa\u011flanacak ba\u011f\u0131\u015f\u0131kl\u0131klar yoluyla ve ba\u011f\u0131\u015f yap\u0131lmas\u0131n\u0131 te\u015fvik suretiyle finansman a\u00e7\u0131s\u0131ndan g\u00fc\u00e7lendirilmesini sa\u011flamak ve devletin asli g\u00f6revleri aras\u0131nda bulunan ve yerine getirilemeyen baz\u0131 hizmetlerin bu vak\u0131flar arac\u0131l\u0131\u011f\u0131 ile g\u00f6r\u00fclmesini sa\u011flamakt\u0131r.\u201d\nNun E\u011fitim ve K\u00fclt\u00fcr Vakf\u0131 Gereken Kriterleri Kar\u015f\u0131l\u0131yor mu?\n  Nun E\u011fitim ve K\u00fclt\u00fcr Vakf\u0131 web sitesinin ana sayfas\u0131ndaki \u201chakk\u0131m\u0131zda\u201d b\u00f6l\u00fcm\u00fcne bak\u0131ld\u0131\u011f\u0131nda, vakf\u0131n istenen ve vergiden muaf tutulmas\u0131 i\u00e7in gereken kriterleri kar\u015f\u0131lad\u0131\u011f\u0131 g\u00f6r\u00fclmektedir.\n\u0130lgili kanun maddelerine bakt\u0131\u011f\u0131m\u0131zda, Nun Vakf\u0131\u2019na \u00f6zel yasa \u00e7\u0131kar\u0131ld\u0131\u011f\u0131 iddias\u0131n\u0131n as\u0131ls\u0131z oldu\u011funu g\u00f6r\u00fcyoruz. Sebebi ise, vakf\u0131n vergi muafiyeti i\u00e7in aranan \u015fartlar\u0131 halihaz\u0131rda yerine getiriyor olmas\u0131 ve gereken hizmetlerin vak\u0131f taraf\u0131ndan verilmesi.\nKaynaklar: Resmigazete, denetimakademisi, denetimakademisi2,\nVideo oynat\u0131c\u0131\nhttps://dogrula.org/wp-content/uploads/2018/02/dogrula.org_.mp4\n00:00\n00:07\n[Toplam:5    Ortalama:5/5] Nun Vakf\u0131\u2019na \u00d6zel Yasa \u00c7\u0131kar\u0131ld\u0131\u011f\u0131 \u0130ddias\u0131", "Kenan Sofuo\u011flu\u2019nun Arac\u0131n\u0131n Vergiden Muaf Oldu\u011fu \u0130ddias\u0131 ba\u015fl\u0131kl\u0131 yaz\u0131m\u0131zda, Ak Parti Sakarya Milletvekili olan Kenan Sofuo\u011flu ile ilgili g\u00fcndeme gelen iddiay\u0131 inceledik. Ge\u00e7ti\u011fimiz g\u00fcnlerde, Kenan Sofuo\u011flu\u2019nun TBMM\u2019ye l\u00fcks arabas\u0131 Lamborghini marka arac\u0131 ile gelmesi sosyal medyada g\u00fcndem olmu\u015f ve ara\u00e7la ilgili birtak\u0131m iddialar ortaya at\u0131lm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r.\nSosyal medya ile birlikte \u00e7e\u015fitli gazetelerde de Ak Parti Sakarya Milletvekili Kenan Sofuo\u011flu\u2019nun Lamborghini marka arac\u0131n\u0131n vergilerden muaf tutuldu\u011fu iddia edilmi\u015ftir. Ancak bu iddia do\u011fru de\u011fildir. \nOda Tv ve sonras\u0131nda ba\u015fka \u0130nternet gazetelerinin yapt\u0131\u011f\u0131 haberlerde, Kenan Sofuo\u011flu\u2019nun arac\u0131, \u201cvergiden muaf\u201d olarak yay\u0131nlanm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r.\nS\u00f6z konusu iddia ile ilgili \u00e7\u0131kan haberlerde, Lamborghini marka ara\u00e7 Kenan Sofuo\u011flu\u2019nun yabanc\u0131 uyruklu e\u015finin \u00fczerine kay\u0131tl\u0131 bilgisi verilmi\u015ftir. Nitekim bu do\u011frudur, Kenan Sofuo\u011flu yapt\u0131\u011f\u0131 a\u00e7\u0131klamada arac\u0131n e\u015finin \u00fczerine kay\u0131tl\u0131 oldu\u011funu belirtmi\u015ftir. Yabanc\u0131 uyruklular\u0131n ta\u015f\u0131t al\u0131m\u0131na y\u00f6nelik baz\u0131 ara\u00e7lar vergiden muaf tutulmu\u015ftur. Ancak Sofuo\u011flu\u2019nun \u201cMK\u201d plakal\u0131 arac\u0131 bu kapsam\u0131n d\u0131\u015f\u0131ndad\u0131r.\nGelir \u0130daresi Ba\u015fkanl\u0131\u011f\u0131n\u0131n, Maliye Bakanl\u0131\u011f\u0131na yazd\u0131\u011f\u0131 \u201cYabanc\u0131 Uyruklulara Ait Ta\u015f\u0131tlara \u0130li\u015fkin Genel Yaz\u0131\u201d kapsam\u0131nda vergiden muaf tutulmas\u0131 gereken ara\u00e7lar\u0131n plakalar\u0131 belirtilmi\u015ftir. G\u00fcmr\u00fck Kanununun 9. maddesi gere\u011fince, diplomatik, konsolosluk ve uluslararas\u0131 kurulu\u015f temsilcilikleri idari ve teknik personel stat\u00fcs\u00fc kapsam\u0131na giren ta\u015f\u0131tlar vergiden muaf tutulmu\u015ftur. Karayollar\u0131 Trafik Y\u00f6netmeli\u011finin 55. maddesine g\u00f6re, \u201cCA ile ba\u015flayan ve CZ\u201dde biten, beyaz zemin \u00fczerine ye\u015fil harf grubundan veya beyaz zemin \u00fczerine mavi \u201cB\u201d harf grubundan olu\u015fan baz\u0131 plakalar verilmektedir.\n1997 y\u0131l\u0131nda g\u00f6nderilen yaz\u0131da, \u201cCA ile ba\u015flayan ve CZ\u201d de biten harf gruplar\u0131na giren plakal\u0131 ara\u00e7lar\u0131n vergiden muaf tutulmas\u0131 gerekti\u011fi kararla\u015ft\u0131r\u0131lm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r. Ancak \u201cMA ile ba\u015flayan ve MZ\u201d ile biten beyaz zemin \u00fczerine siyah harf gruplar\u0131ndan olu\u015fan plakalar bu uygulaman\u0131n d\u0131\u015f\u0131nda tutulmu\u015ftur:\nKenan Sofuo\u011flu A\u00e7\u0131klama Yapt\u0131 \nEski milli motosiklet\u00e7i olan Ak Parti Sakarya Milletvekili Kenan Sofuo\u011flu, arac\u0131 ile ilgili hakk\u0131nda \u00e7\u0131kan iddialara ili\u015fkin a\u00e7\u0131klama yapm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r. Arac\u0131n, e\u015fi Looman Sofuo\u011flu \u00fczerine kay\u0131tl\u0131 oldu\u011funu ve arac\u0131n y\u0131ll\u0131k 36 bin TL vergisini \u00f6dedi\u011fini ifade eden Sofuo\u011flu, di\u011fer ara\u00e7lar\u0131n\u0131n da vergilerini \u00f6dedi\u011fini belirtmi\u015ftir.\n\u201cAra\u00e7, e\u015fim Julia Looman Sofuo\u011flu \u00fczerine kay\u0131tl\u0131. Devletin ilk arac\u0131 al\u0131rken tan\u0131m\u0131\u015f oldu\u011fu hak s\u00f6z konusu. Vergi \u00f6denmedi\u011fi iddialar\u0131 do\u011fru de\u011fil. Devlete ara\u00e7 i\u00e7in 700 bin $ teminat g\u00f6sterdim, her y\u0131l 50-60 bin TL teminat masraf\u0131, 36 bin TL vergi \u00f6d\u00fcyorum. Ara\u00e7, e\u015fim Julia Looman Sofuo\u011flu \u00fczerine kay\u0131tl\u0131. Kanunen ara\u00e7 sahibinin e\u015fi de kullanabiliyor. Devletin ilk arac\u0131 al\u0131rken tan\u0131m\u0131\u015f oldu\u011fu bir hak s\u00f6z konusu, bunu kulland\u0131m. \u00dczerime kay\u0131tl\u0131 ba\u015fka l\u00fcks spor otomobil ve motorsikletlerim var. Vergilerimi \u00f6d\u00fcyorum.\u201d\nKaynaklar: Oda Tv, Ahval, Gelir \u0130daresi Ba\u015fkanl\u0131\u011f\u0131, G\u00fcmr\u00fck Kanunu, Ta\u015f\u0131t Kanunu, Twitter\nVideo oynat\u0131c\u0131\n00:00\n00:00\n1. \u201cdogrula.org\u201d\n0:07\n[Toplam:5    Ortalama:5/5] Kenan Sofuo\u011flu\u2019nun Arac\u0131n\u0131n Vergiden Muaf Oldu\u011fu \u0130ddias\u0131", "T\u00fcrkiye bas\u0131n\u0131nda yer alan, \u0130ngiltere Krali\u00e7esi II. Elizabeth\u2019in \u00f6lmesi durumunda ger\u00e7ekle\u015ftirilecek cenaze t\u00f6reninin provas\u0131n\u0131n yap\u0131ld\u0131\u011f\u0131 iddias\u0131 do\u011frudur.\n\u0130ngiliz Dailymail gazetesinin haberine g\u00f6re, bakanlar, krali\u00e7enin \u00f6l\u00fcm\u00fc \u00fczerine yap\u0131lacak olan 10 g\u00fcnl\u00fck ulusal yas i\u00e7in \u2018Castle Dove (Kale G\u00fcvercini)\u2019 ad\u0131nda gizli tutulan bir prova yap\u0131yorlar.\n\u0130ddiaya g\u00f6re \u201cKale G\u00fcvercini\u201d olarak bilinen provada, kabinedeki bakanlar h\u00fck\u00fcmdar\u0131n \u00f6l\u00fcm\u00fcnden sonraki g\u00fcn ne yap\u0131laca\u011f\u0131n\u0131 tart\u0131\u015f\u0131yor.\n\u201cLondon Bridge (Londra K\u00f6pr\u00fcs\u00fc)\u201dolarak bildirilen bu plan, 92 ya\u015f\u0131ndaki krali\u00e7enin St Paul Katedrali\u2019nde rahats\u0131zland\u0131\u011f\u0131 haftada planlanm\u0131\u015f. Ancak bu plan, krali\u00e7enin spesifik bir hastal\u0131\u011f\u0131ndan duyulan endi\u015fe y\u00fcz\u00fcnden de\u011fil.\nSunday Times gazetesine g\u00f6re, bakanlar krali\u00e7enin \u00f6l\u00fcm\u00fc \u00fczerine yap\u0131lacak 10 g\u00fcnl\u00fck ulusal yas i\u00e7in prova yapt\u0131. Ayr\u0131ca ba\u015fka bir kayna\u011fa g\u00f6re bu prova \u201cbenzeri g\u00f6r\u00fclmemi\u015f\u201d bir \u00f6l\u00e7ekte yap\u0131lm\u0131\u015f.\nGe\u00e7en y\u0131l da Guardian gazetesi konu hakk\u0131nda, krali\u00e7enin \u00f6l\u00fcm\u00fcn\u00fcn ard\u0131ndan yeni h\u00fck\u00fcmeti ilan etmek \u00fczere b\u00fct\u00fcn Parlamento Konseyi\u2019nin toplanaca\u011f\u0131n\u0131 anlatan \u00e7ok say\u0131da ayr\u0131nt\u0131 bildirmi\u015fti.\nBuna g\u00f6re, krali\u00e7e \u00f6ld\u00fc\u011f\u00fcnde Buckingham Saray\u0131\u2019ndaki bir u\u015fa\u011f\u0131n, d\u00fcnya medyas\u0131na ve haber ajanslar\u0131na ihbarda bulunulurken, kap\u0131lara bir bildirim ili\u015ftirece\u011fi s\u00f6ylendi.\nAyr\u0131ca s\u00f6z konusun durumda televizyon ve radyo istasyonlar\u0131n\u0131n da h\u00fcz\u00fcnl\u00fc ve mahzun m\u00fcziklerle haz\u0131rlanm\u0131\u015f haberlere yer verece\u011fi bildirildi.\nPrens Charles\u2019in, kral olduktan sonraki g\u00fcnlerde ve haftalarda \u0130sko\u00e7ya ve Galler\u2019e erken bir ziyarette bulunaca\u011f\u0131 da iddia edildi.\nKrali\u00e7e \u00f6ld\u00fc\u011f\u00fcnde bedeni Westminster Hall\u2019da kalarak halk\u0131n kendisine sayg\u0131lar\u0131n\u0131 sunmas\u0131 sa\u011flanacak.\nKrali\u00e7e 2. Elizabeth Hakk\u0131nda\nII. Elizabeth, \u0130ngiliz Milletler Toplulu\u011fu \u00fcyesi elli \u00fc\u00e7 \u00fclkeden on alt\u0131s\u0131n\u0131n krali\u00e7esidir. Ayn\u0131 zamanda Topluluk Ba\u015fkan\u0131 ve \u0130ngiltere Kilisesi Y\u00fcksek Valisi\u2019dir. 6 \u015eubat 1952\u2018de tahta \u00e7\u0131kt\u0131\u011f\u0131nda Topluluk Ba\u015fkan\u0131 ve yedi \u00fclkenin krali\u00e7esi olmu\u015ftur.\nDo\u011fum tarihi: 21 Nisan 1926 (92 ya\u015f\u0131nda), Mayfair, Londra, Birle\u015fik Krall\u0131k\nTam ad\u0131: Elizabeth Alexandra Mary\nE\u015fi: Philip Mountbatten (1947\u2019den beri)\n\u00c7ocuklar\u0131: Charles, Anne Mountbatten-Windsor, Andrew, Edward Mountbatten-Windsor\nEbeveynleri: Elizabeth Bowes-Lyon, VI. George\nKarde\u015fi: Margaret Windsor\nKaynaklar: mirror.co.uk, dailymail, guardian, wikipedia, times\nVideo oynat\u0131c\u0131\nhttps://dogrula.org/wp-content/uploads/2018/02/dogrula.org_.mp4\n00:00\n00:07\n[Toplam:5    Ortalama:5/5] Krali\u00e7e 2. Elizabeth\u2019in Cenaze Provas\u0131n\u0131n Yap\u0131ld\u0131\u011f\u0131 \u0130ddias\u0131", "\u201cTren Kazas\u0131 Olan B\u00f6lgede Bak\u0131m Yap\u0131lmad\u0131\u011f\u0131 \u0130ddias\u0131\u201d ba\u015fl\u0131kl\u0131 i\u00e7eri\u011fimizde Tekirda\u011f\u2019\u0131n \u00c7orlu \u0130l\u00e7esinde d\u00fcn ak\u015fam saatlerinde meydana gelen tren kazas\u0131 ile ilgili olarak, kazan\u0131n oldu\u011fu tren hatt\u0131nda bak\u0131m yap\u0131lmad\u0131\u011f\u0131 iddias\u0131n\u0131 inceledik. S\u00f6z konusu iddia do\u011fru de\u011fildir.\nTekirda\u011f\u2019\u0131n \u00c7orlu \u0130l\u00e7esinde meydana gelen elim tren kazas\u0131yla alakal\u0131 sosyal medyada ve haber sitelerinde bir\u00e7ok payla\u015f\u0131m yap\u0131lmaktad\u0131r. Kazan\u0131n bir ihmal sonucu oldu\u011fu ve s\u00f6z konusu tren hatt\u0131nda bak\u0131m yap\u0131lmad\u0131\u011f\u0131 iddias\u0131 da g\u00fcndeme gelmi\u015ftir. Bu iddialarla alakal\u0131 hem Ula\u015ft\u0131rma, Denizcilik ve Haberle\u015fme Bakanl\u0131\u011f\u0131 ve Bakan Ahmet Arslan hem de Tekirda\u011f Valili\u011fi a\u00e7\u0131klamalarda bulunmu\u015ftur. Ula\u015ft\u0131rma, Denizcilik ve Haberle\u015fme Bakanl\u0131\u011f\u0131 taraf\u0131ndan s\u00f6z konusu tren kazas\u0131 ile ilgili d\u00fcn a\u00e7\u0131klama yap\u0131lm\u0131\u015f ve kazan\u0131n, a\u015f\u0131r\u0131 ya\u011fmur ya\u011f\u0131\u015flar\u0131 nedeniyle menfez ile ray aras\u0131ndaki topra\u011f\u0131n bo\u015falmas\u0131ndan kaynakland\u0131\u011f\u0131 belirtilmi\u015ftir. A\u00e7\u0131klaman\u0131n ilgili k\u0131sm\u0131 \u015f\u00f6yle:\n08 Temmuz 2018 tarihinde Uzunk\u00f6pr\u00fc-Halkal\u0131 aras\u0131nda 6 vagon, 362 yolcu ve 6 personel ile seferini yapan 12703 trenin Balabanl\u0131-\u00c7orlu aras\u0131 Km 162\u2019de seyri esnas\u0131nda, saat 17.00 s\u0131ralar\u0131nda dizide bulunan 5 vagon raydan \u00e7\u0131karak devrilmi\u015ftir.
