Ancak bu bedelin vatanda\u015flardan, kesinlikle kanunen ya da zorla al\u0131nmas\u0131 gibi bir durum s\u00f6z konusu de\u011fildir.\nYeni kimlik kartlar\u0131ndan 2016, 2017 ve 2018 y\u0131llar\u0131 i\u00e7inde, vatanda\u015fl\u0131k aidat\u0131 al\u0131nmas\u0131na ili\u015fkin herhangi bir kanun teklifi ya da tasar\u0131s\u0131 yoktur. TBMM kay\u0131tlar\u0131nda, yeni kimlik kartlar\u0131 i\u00e7in 90 TL gibi bir \u00f6deme yap\u0131lmas\u0131 bilgisi bulunmamaktad\u0131r. Son \u00fc\u00e7 y\u0131lda, may\u0131s ay\u0131nda yap\u0131lan payla\u015f\u0131mlar i\u00e7in, TBMM\u2019nin sayfas\u0131nda kabul edilen kanunlar aras\u0131nda da, iddiayla ilgili herhangi bir kanuna rastlanmam\u0131\u015ft\u0131r.\nYeni kimlik bedelleri ise, kimlik yenileme, kimlik de\u011fi\u015fimi gibi i\u015flemlerde 2018 y\u0131l\u0131 itibariyle 18 lira 50 kuru\u015f olmu\u015ftur. N\u00fcfus ve Vatanda\u015fl\u0131k \u0130\u015fleri Genel M\u00fcd\u00fcrl\u00fc\u011f\u00fcnde ve Resmi Gazete\u2018de yay\u0131mlanan Muhasebat Genel M\u00fcd\u00fcrl\u00fc\u011f\u00fcn\u00fcn tebli\u011finde, 2018 y\u0131l\u0131 i\u00e7in kimlik kart\u0131 de\u011fi\u015ftirme bedelleri yer almaktad\u0131r. Vatanda\u015flar\u0131n yeni kimlik almalar\u0131 ya da ba\u015fka bir durum i\u00e7in 90 TL \u00f6deyecekleri iddias\u0131 ger\u00e7e\u011fi yans\u0131tmamaktad\u0131r.\nKaynaklar: Facebook, Twitter, BirG\u00fcn, Resmi Gazete, TBMM, N\u00fcfus ve Vatanda\u015fl\u0131k \u0130\u015fleri Genel M\u00fcd\u00fcrl\u00fc\u011f\u00fc\nVideo oynat\u0131c\u0131\n00:00\n00:00\n1. \u201cdogrula.org\u201d\n0:07\n[Toplam:6    Ortalama:5/5] Herkesten Al\u0131nacak 90 TL Vatanda\u015fl\u0131k Aidat\u0131n\u0131n Kanunen Kabul Edildi\u011fi \u0130ddias\u0131", "\u201cG\u00f6rselin Cumhurba\u015fkan\u0131 R. Tayyip Erdo\u011fan\u2019\u0131n Cuma Namaz\u0131 Konvoyunu G\u00f6sterdi\u011fi \u0130ddias\u0131\u201d ba\u015fl\u0131kl\u0131 i\u00e7eri\u011fimizde, Cumhurba\u015fkan\u0131 Recep Tayyip Erdo\u011fan\u2019\u0131n Cuma namaz\u0131na giderken kendisine e\u015flik eden korumalar\u0131 g\u00f6sterdi\u011fi iddias\u0131yla payla\u015f\u0131lan g\u00f6rseli inceledik.\nAKP Genel Ba\u015fkan\u0131, gerekirse tek ba\u015f\u0131ma cepheye giderim demi\u015f.\n\u00d6nce tek ba\u015f\u0131na camiye git.\n\"Not bu bir filim seti de\u011fil pic.twitter.com/buM2K8khg8\n\u2014 Nur hlc (@NurHlc) April 27, 2018\nSosyal medyada bir\u00e7ok hesap taraf\u0131ndan payla\u015f\u0131lan ve yay\u0131lan, toplamda 10 binin \u00fczerinde etkile\u015fim alan bir g\u00f6rsele g\u00f6re, korumalar\u0131n \u00e7evreledi\u011fi \u00e7ok kalabal\u0131k bir konvoyun yer ald\u0131\u011f\u0131 foto\u011fraf\u0131n, Cumhurba\u015fkan\u0131 Recep Tayyip Erdo\u011fan\u2018\u0131n Cuma namaz\u0131na gitti\u011fi s\u0131rada \u00e7ekildi\u011fi iddia edilmi\u015ftir. S\u00f6z konusu iddia DO\u011eRU DE\u011e\u0130LD\u0130R. \nAsl\u0131nda foto\u011fraf, ABD ba\u015fkan\u0131 olan George W. Bush ve e\u015fine e\u015flik eden korumalar\u0131 ve konvoyu g\u00f6stermektedir. Bush\u2019un 2005 y\u0131l\u0131nda Beyaz Saray\u2019\u0131n yan giri\u015fine do\u011fru gitmek \u00fczere makam arac\u0131yla ilerledi\u011fi s\u0131rada \u00e7ekilen bu foto\u011fraf\u0131n, \u0130nternet\u2019te Google g\u00f6rseller ile arat\u0131ld\u0131\u011f\u0131nda 2005\u2019den itibaren farkl\u0131 ba\u015fl\u0131k ve iddialarla bir\u00e7ok defa payla\u015f\u0131ld\u0131\u011f\u0131n\u0131 g\u00f6rmek m\u00fcmk\u00fcn.\nSadece g\u00f6rseldeki detaylar incelenerek dahi foto\u011fraf\u0131n Cumhurba\u015fkan\u0131 Erdo\u011fan\u2019\u0131n camiye giderken \u00e7ekilmi\u015f konvoyu olmad\u0131\u011f\u0131 sonucuna ula\u015fmak m\u00fcmk\u00fcn. Mesela g\u00f6rseldeki arabalar\u0131n \u00fczerindeki bayraklar T\u00fcrk bayra\u011f\u0131 de\u011fil. Ayr\u0131ca iddiaya konu olan g\u00f6rseldeki arabalarda iki farkl\u0131 bayrak bulunurken (ABD bayra\u011f\u0131 ve ABD Ba\u015fkanl\u0131k bayra\u011f\u0131), Cumhurba\u015fkan\u0131 Erdo\u011fan\u2019\u0131n makam arac\u0131n\u0131n \u00fczerindeki her iki bayrak da T\u00fcrk bayra\u011f\u0131d\u0131r.\n  Bir di\u011fer detay ise Cumhurba\u015fkan\u0131 Erdo\u011fan\u2019\u0131n makam arac\u0131n\u0131n markas\u0131 Mercedes S600 iken, iddia g\u00f6rselindeki araban\u0131n Cadillac DTS marka bir limuzin olmas\u0131d\u0131r. Foto\u011fraf\u0131n 2005 y\u0131l\u0131nda \u00e7ekilmi\u015f olmas\u0131 sebebiyle o d\u00f6nem Ba\u015fbakan olan Recep Tayyip Erdo\u011fan\u2019\u0131n makam arac\u0131 incelendi\u011finde, 2005 y\u0131l\u0131ndaki Ba\u015fbakanl\u0131k makam arac\u0131n\u0131n markas\u0131n\u0131n da yine Mercedes oldu\u011fu g\u00f6r\u00fclmektedir. \nBir di\u011fer detay ise iddiaya konu olan g\u00f6rseldeki korumalar aras\u0131nda 5-6 ki\u015finin siyahi olmas\u0131d\u0131r. Devlet ba\u015fkanlar\u0131n\u0131n neredeyse tamam\u0131n\u0131n yak\u0131n korumalar\u0131 g\u00fcvenlik nedeniyle kendi \u00fclke vatanda\u015flar\u0131 aras\u0131ndan se\u00e7ilmektedir. Bu d\u00fcnya \u00fczerinde hemen hemen her \u00fclkede b\u00f6yledir. Siyahi bir T\u00fcrk vatanda\u015f Cumhurba\u015fkan\u0131 Erdo\u011fan\u2019\u0131n korumas\u0131 olabilir. Ancak yak\u0131n korumalar aras\u0131nda ayn\u0131 anda siyahi T\u00fcrk vatanda\u015flardan 5-6 ki\u015finin denk gelmesi pek olas\u0131 g\u00f6r\u00fcnmemektedir. Dolay\u0131s\u0131yla t\u00fcm bu sebepler bir araya geldi\u011finde ilgili g\u00f6rselin, Cumhurba\u015fkan\u0131 Recep Tayyip Erdo\u011fan\u2019\u0131n Cuma namaz\u0131na giderken kendisine e\u015flik eden korumalar\u0131 g\u00f6sterdi\u011fi iddias\u0131n\u0131n do\u011fru olmad\u0131\u011f\u0131 sonucuna ula\u015f\u0131lmaktad\u0131r.\nKaynaklar: gettyimages, gettyimages 2, wikiwand, wikiwand 2, webtekno, hurriyet, arsiv.sabah, memurlar, magicnet, beautifulmustang, xn--80akhohgpqo0g.xn, basik.ru, vnarod.livejournal\nVideo oynat\u0131c\u0131\nhttps://dogrula.org/wp-content/uploads/2018/02/dogrula.org_.mp4\n00:00\n00:07\n[Toplam:5    Ortalama:4.8/5] G\u00f6rselin Cumhurba\u015fkan\u0131 R. Tayyip Erdo\u011fan\u2019\u0131n Cuma Namaz\u0131 Konvoyunu G\u00f6sterdi\u011fi \u0130ddias\u0131", "Suriyelilere K\u0131z\u0131lay Kart ile 930 TL Verildi\u011fi \u0130ddias\u0131 ba\u015fl\u0131kl\u0131 yaz\u0131m\u0131zda, Suriyelilere \u00f6zel olarak, i\u00e7inde 930 T\u00fcrk Liras\u0131 bulunan K\u0131z\u0131lay Kart verildi\u011fi iddias\u0131n\u0131 ele ald\u0131k. Bu iddia do\u011fru de\u011fildir. \nY\u0131lmaz \u00d6zdil ve Onurlu Yazarlar isimli Facebook sayfas\u0131nda yap\u0131lan bir payla\u015f\u0131mda, Suriyelilere ayl\u0131k harcamalar\u0131 i\u00e7in 930 TL verildi\u011fi iddia edilmi\u015f ve bu g\u00f6nderi 51 bin \u00fczerinde payla\u015f\u0131lm\u0131\u015f ve 7 binden fazla be\u011feni alm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r.\nYap\u0131lan payla\u015f\u0131mdaki K\u0131z\u0131lay Kart\u2018\u0131n foto\u011fraf\u0131 oldu\u011fu iddia edilen g\u00f6rsel, ger\u00e7e\u011fi yans\u0131tmamaktad\u0131r. G\u00f6rsel \u00fczerindeki \u201cSuriyeliler i\u00e7indir\u201d ve \u201cAyl\u0131k 930 TL. Yard\u0131m Kart\u0131d\u0131r\u201d ifadeleri kart \u00fczerine sonradan eklenmi\u015f olup g\u00f6rsel montajlanm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r.\nA\u015fa\u011f\u0131daki foto\u011fraflara dikkatli bak\u0131ld\u0131\u011f\u0131nda, orijinal olan ile montajl\u0131 olan halinde, kart numaralar\u0131n\u0131n ayn\u0131 oldu\u011fu ve gri ile k\u0131rm\u0131z\u0131 renkle yaz\u0131lan yaz\u0131lar\u0131n sonradan montajla eklendi\u011fi a\u00e7\u0131k\u00e7a g\u00f6r\u00fclebilmektedir. Ayr\u0131ca g\u00f6rselin bilerek netli\u011finin kaybettirildi\u011fi anla\u015f\u0131lmaktad\u0131r. Foto\u011fraf\u0131n orijinal hali, Anadolu Ajans\u0131\u2018n\u0131n 2014 y\u0131l\u0131nda yapt\u0131\u011f\u0131 bir haberden al\u0131nm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r.\nBirle\u015fmi\u015f Milletler Fonuyla K\u0131z\u0131lay Kart\nT\u00fcrkiye\u2019de bulunan 4 milyon civar\u0131ndaki m\u00fclteciden 1 milyon 301 bin 900\u2019\u00fcne verilen K\u0131z\u0131lay Kart, Avrupa Birli\u011finin (AB) \u0130nsani Yard\u0131m ve Sivil Koruma birimi olan ECHO taraf\u0131ndan fonlanmaktad\u0131r. \nT\u00fcrk K\u0131z\u0131lay\u0131 Genel Ba\u015fkan\u0131 Kerem K\u0131n\u0131k\u2018\u0131n K\u0131z\u0131lay Kart ile ilgili yapt\u0131\u011f\u0131 a\u00e7\u0131klamaya g\u00f6re:\n\u201c\u2026 \u00d6zellikle ya\u015f gruplar\u0131 a\u00e7\u0131s\u0131ndan bakt\u0131\u011f\u0131m\u0131zda, 1,3 milyon kullan\u0131c\u0131n\u0131n yakla\u015f\u0131k y\u00fczde 61\u2019i 17 ya\u015f\u0131n alt\u0131ndaki \u00e7ocuklardan, y\u00fczde 51\u2019i kad\u0131nlardan, y\u00fczde 6\u2019s\u0131 da engelli bireyi bulunan ailelerden olu\u015fuyor. Bu \u015fu anlama geliyor; program en fazla k\u0131r\u0131lgan, yard\u0131ma ve korunmaya ihtiyac\u0131 olan m\u00fcltecileri se\u00e7mi\u015f. Bu program\u0131 sadece Suriyelilere uygulam\u0131yoruz. K\u0131z\u0131lay Kart\u2018tan faydalanan y\u00fczde 91 kullan\u0131c\u0131 Suriyeli ama onun d\u0131\u015f\u0131nda da 65 farkl\u0131 vatanda\u015fl\u0131ktan insan var. Bunun i\u00e7inde ABD, Bel\u00e7ika, Fransa gibi AB \u00fcyesi \u00fclke vatanda\u015f\u0131 da var ama a\u011f\u0131rl\u0131kl\u0131 olarak Irak, Afganistan, Libya, \u0130ran, M\u0131s\u0131r gibi \u00fclkelerden insanlar buluyor.\u201d\n2016 y\u0131l\u0131nda yap\u0131lan bir ba\u015fka haber sitesinde de, K\u0131z\u0131lay Karta AB \u0130nsani Yard\u0131m Komisyonunun 348 milyon euro maddi kaynak sa\u011flad\u0131\u011f\u0131 bilgisi bulunmaktad\u0131r:\n\u201cT\u00fcrk K\u0131z\u0131lay\u0131, Aile ve Sosyal Politikalar Bakanl\u0131\u011f\u0131 ve Birle\u015fmi\u015f Milletler D\u00fcnya G\u0131da Program\u0131 birlikteli\u011fiyle y\u00fcr\u00fct\u00fclen \u201cYabanc\u0131lara Y\u00f6nelik Sosyal Uyum Yard\u0131m Program\u0131\u201d kapsam\u0131nda, kamplar d\u0131\u015f\u0131nda bulunan Suriye vatanda\u015f\u0131 ve \u0130l G\u00f6\u00e7 \u0130daresi Genel M\u00fcd\u00fcrl\u00fc\u011f\u00fcne kay\u0131tl\u0131 di\u011fer s\u0131\u011f\u0131nmac\u0131lara her ay ki\u015fi ba\u015f\u0131 y\u00fczer lira nakdi yard\u0131m\u201d yap\u0131laca\u011f\u0131 ifadeleri yer almaktad\u0131r.\nAB \u0130nsani Yard\u0131m Yetkilisi olan Sara McHattie ise, yapt\u0131\u011f\u0131 a\u00e7\u0131klamada, uygulanan program\u0131n bir i\u015f birli\u011fi i\u00e7inde oldu\u011funu belirterek \u015funlar\u0131 s\u00f6ylemi\u015ftir:\n\u201c\u2026Biz T\u00fcrk h\u00fckumetine ba\u011fl\u0131 kurulu\u015flarla harika bir i\u015f birli\u011fi i\u00e7erisindeyiz. Kontrat\u0131 \u00e7oktan imzalanm\u0131\u015f ve devam eden projeler var. S\u00f6z konusu projeleri durdurmak i\u00e7in herhangi bir sebep yok.\u201d \nKaynaklar: Facebook, Anadolu Ajans\u0131, Kamupersoneli.net, TRT, T\u00fcrk K\u0131z\u0131lay\u0131 \nVideo oynat\u0131c\u0131\n00:00\n00:00\n1. \u201cdogrula.org\u201d\n0:07\n[Toplam:2    Ortalama:5/5] Suriyelilere K\u0131z\u0131lay Kart ile 930 TL Verildi\u011fi \u0130ddias\u0131", "Son g\u00fcnlerde pek \u00e7ok yay\u0131n kurulu\u015fu taraf\u0131ndan yap\u0131lan haberde, Suudi Arabistan ile Vatikan\u2019\u0131n, Medine\u2019de kilise in\u015fas\u0131 konusunda anla\u015ft\u0131\u011f\u0131 yer alm\u0131\u015ft\u0131. Bu iddiay\u0131 T\u00fcrkiye ve d\u00fcnya bas\u0131n\u0131 man\u015fetlerine ta\u015f\u0131m\u0131\u015f ve T\u00fcrkiye\u2019de neredeyse b\u00fct\u00fcn medya organlar\u0131, Vatikan ve Suudi Arabistan\u2019\u0131n kilise in\u015fas\u0131 konusunda anla\u015ft\u0131\u011f\u0131n\u0131 yazm\u0131\u015ft\u0131.\nSuudi Veliaht Prensi Muhammed bin Salman, kad\u0131nlar\u0131 \u00f6zg\u00fcrle\u015ftirmeyi, m\u00fczik ve sinemay\u0131 tan\u0131tmay\u0131 ve yolsuzlu\u011fu k\u0131rmay\u0131 i\u00e7eren tarihi bir reform \u00e7abalar\u0131nda oldu\u011fu i\u00e7in, s\u00f6z konusu haber iddialar\u0131 g\u00fc\u00e7lendirmi\u015fti.\nAncak Reuters haber ajans\u0131n\u0131n haberine g\u00f6re, Vatikan s\u00f6zc\u00fcs\u00fc bu haberin \u2018do\u011fru olmad\u0131\u011f\u0131n\u0131\u2018 a\u00e7\u0131klam\u0131\u015ft\u0131r.\nKilise in\u015fas\u0131 iddias\u0131n\u0131 \u0130ngilizce yay\u0131n yapan M\u0131s\u0131r\u2019dan Egypt Independent adl\u0131 bir web sitesi ortaya atm\u0131\u015ft\u0131. Ancak sayfan\u0131n haber linkine t\u0131kland\u0131\u011f\u0131nda, \u201c\u00fczg\u00fcn\u00fcz, arad\u0131\u011f\u0131n\u0131z sayfa bulunam\u0131yor\u201d uyar\u0131s\u0131 g\u00f6r\u00fclmektedir. Sayfada iddia metnine ula\u015f\u0131lamamaktad\u0131r.\nSitede yer alan ve Suudi Arabistan\u2019da Hristiyanlar i\u00e7in kilise in\u015fa edilece\u011fi haberinin kopyas\u0131na buradan ula\u015fabilirsiniz.\nSitede yer alan haberin temeli, ge\u00e7ti\u011fimiz ay Dinler Aras\u0131 Diyalog Kurucu Konseyi Ba\u015fkan\u0131 olan Vatikan yetkililerinden Kardinal Jean-Louis Tauran\u2019\u0131n Suudi Arabistan\u2019a ziyareti olmu\u015ftu.\nRoma\u2019n\u0131n kendi resmi kaynaklar\u0131ndan onaylanan anla\u015fmadaki bir ayr\u0131nt\u0131ya g\u00f6re, Suudi ve Vatikan yetkililerinind\u00fczenli dinler aras\u0131 diyalog zirveleri d\u00fczenleyece\u011fi ortaya \u00e7\u0131km\u0131\u015ft\u0131.\nKardinal Suudi Arabistan\u2019\u0131 ziyaretinde ayr\u0131ca M\u00fcsl\u00fcman \u00fclkeyi b\u00fct\u00fcn vatanda\u015flar\u0131na e\u015fit davranmaya \u00e7a\u011f\u0131rm\u0131\u015ft\u0131.\nSuudi Arabistan, b\u00f6lgedeki tek Hristiyan kilisesi olmayan \u00fclkedir.\nSuudi Arabistan\u2019da Hristiyanlar\u0131n ibadet edece\u011fi kilise bulunmamaktad\u0131r. Suudi, Hristiyanlar\u0131n \u00fclkeye yabanc\u0131 i\u015f\u00e7iler olarak girmelerine izin veriyor, ancak onlar\u0131n inan\u00e7lar\u0131n\u0131 a\u00e7\u0131k\u00e7a uygulamalar\u0131na izin vermiyor.\nKaynaklar: kaynak1, kaynak2, kaynak3, kaynak4\n[Toplam:3    Ortalama:3.3/5] Suudi Arabistan\u2019da Kilise Yap\u0131laca\u011f\u0131 \u0130ddias\u0131", "Erdo\u011fan\u2019\u0131n Ak\u015fener\u2019e Zilli Meral Dedi\u011fi \u0130ddias\u0131 ba\u015fl\u0131kl\u0131 yaz\u0131m\u0131zda, \u0130nternet ortamlar\u0131nda h\u0131zla yay\u0131lan s\u00f6z konusu ifadelerin do\u011fru olup olmad\u0131\u011f\u0131n\u0131 ara\u015ft\u0131rd\u0131k.\nK\u0131\u015f G\u00fcne\u015fi adl\u0131 bir Facebook kullan\u0131c\u0131s\u0131 ve @sahinmengu adl\u0131 bir Twitter kullan\u0131c\u0131s\u0131n\u0131n payla\u015ft\u0131\u011f\u0131 ve pek\u00e7ok etkile\u015fim alarak sosyal medyada yay\u0131lan, Erdo\u011fan\u2019\u0131n \u0130yi Parti Genel Ba\u015fkan\u0131 Meral Ak\u015fener i\u00e7in \u201cMahalle k\u00f6\u015felerinde sak\u0131z \u00e7i\u011fnemeyi bile bilmeyen zilli Meral \u00fclke y\u00f6netecekmi\u015f. Hadi oradan Kemal\u2019in eteklisi\u201d ifadelerini kulland\u0131\u011f\u0131 iddias\u0131 yanl\u0131\u015ft\u0131r. S\u00f6z konusu iddian\u0131n hi\u00e7bir kayna\u011f\u0131 yoktur.\n\"Zilli Meral\" laf\u0131 herhangi bir insan\u0131n a\u011fz\u0131na yak\u0131\u015fmaz, hele bir memleketin Cumhurba\u015fkan\u0131n\u0131n a\u011fz\u0131na hi\u00e7 yak\u0131\u015fmaz.\n\u2014 sahin mengu (@sahinmengu) May 6, 2018\n6 May\u0131s 2018 tarihli \u0130stanbul kongre kay\u0131tlar\u0131 ve kongre \u00f6ncesinde yap\u0131lan miting kay\u0131tlar\u0131nda bu ifadelerin hi\u00e7birine rastlanmam\u0131\u015ft\u0131r. Hatta Recep Tayyip Erdo\u011fan, konu\u015fmalar\u0131nda Meral Ak\u015fener\u2019in ismini dahi kullanmam\u0131\u015ft\u0131r. Cumhurba\u015fkan\u0131, AK Parti \u0130stanbul \u0130l Kongresi\u2019nde konu\u015fmas\u0131 boyunca se\u00e7im manifestosunu a\u00e7\u0131klam\u0131\u015ft\u0131.\n6 May\u0131s 2018 tarihli \u0130stanbul \u0130l Kongresi \u00f6ncesi halka hitap\n6 May\u0131s 2018 tarihli \u0130stanbul \u0130l Kongresi\nKaynkaklar: youtube1, youtube2, twitter, facebook\n[Toplam:10    Ortalama:3.7/5] Erdo\u011fan\u2019\u0131n Ak\u015fener\u2019e Zilli Meral Dedi\u011fi \u0130ddias\u0131", "\u201cVideonun Atak Helikopterlerini G\u00f6sterdi\u011fi \u0130ddias\u0131\u201d ba\u015fl\u0131kl\u0131 i\u00e7eri\u011fimizde Twitter\u2019da payla\u015f\u0131lan bir videodaki helikopterlerle ilgili iddiay\u0131 inceledik.\nThoughts? pic.twitter.com/X2iQd8y8nJ\n\u2014 USA Military (@USAMilitaryUSA) May 5, 2018\nSosyal medyada USA Military isimli hesap taraf\u0131ndan payla\u015f\u0131lan bir videoya gelen yorumlarda, videodaki helikopterlerin T\u00fcrk Silahl\u0131 Kuvvetleri taraf\u0131ndan kullan\u0131lan Atak helikopterleri oldu\u011fu iddia edildi. S\u00f6z konusu iddia DO\u011eRUDUR.\nThey are Turkish Helicopters fron EFES 2018.\n\u2014 x (@rammravened) May 5, 2018\nVideo, USA Military isimli ABD ordusu hayranlar\u0131 taraf\u0131ndan olu\u015fturulmu\u015f resmi olmayan bir hesaptan payla\u015f\u0131lm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r. Payla\u015f\u0131m\u0131n alt\u0131nda Robbie Pabst isimli kullan\u0131c\u0131, helikopterleri ABD ordusuna ait sanm\u0131\u015f ve \u201cBizim taraf\u0131m\u0131zda olduklar\u0131 i\u00e7in \u00e7ok mutluyum\u201d \u015feklinde bir yorum yapm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r. Bunun \u00fczerine x isimli kullan\u0131c\u0131 yoruma cevap olarak, \u201cOnlar EFES 2018\u2019den T\u00fcrk helikopterleri\u201d demi\u015ftir.\nVideodaki helikopterlerin EFES 2018 tatbikatlar\u0131 s\u0131ras\u0131nda \u00e7ekilmi\u015f Atak helikopterleri oldu\u011fu bilgisi do\u011frudur. Video, EFES 2018 tatbikatlar\u0131n\u0131n yap\u0131ld\u0131\u011f\u0131 tarihlerde TSK resmi YouTube sayfas\u0131nda payla\u015f\u0131lm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r. TSK taraf\u0131ndan payla\u015f\u0131lan videolarda helikopterlerin farkl\u0131 a\u00e7\u0131lardan \u00e7ekilmi\u015f g\u00f6r\u00fcnt\u00fcleri de mevcuttur.\nAyn\u0131 video, benzer tarihlerde hem TSK\u2019dan videolar payla\u015fan bir ba\u015fka YouTube hesab\u0131 taraf\u0131ndan hem de bir\u00e7ok farkl\u0131 hesap taraf\u0131ndan EFES 2018 tatbikatlar\u0131 kapsam\u0131nda payla\u015f\u0131lm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r. Bu videolarda kayda alan ki\u015finin T\u00fcrk\u00e7e konu\u015ftu\u011fu da duyulmakta ve Atak helikopterlerinden bahsetti\u011fi anla\u015f\u0131lmaktad\u0131r.\nKaynaklar: TSK (YouTube), TSK (YouTube) 2, TSK (YouTube) 3, TSK (YouTube) 4, Twitter, wikiwand, TSK, TSK 2\nVideo oynat\u0131c\u0131\nhttps://dogrula.org/wp-content/uploads/2018/02/dogrula.org_.mp4\n00:00\n00:07\n[Toplam:4    Ortalama:5/5] Videonun Atak Helikopterlerini G\u00f6sterdi\u011fi \u0130ddias\u0131", "B\u00fct\u00fcn Suriyelilere Vatanda\u015fl\u0131k Verilece\u011fi \u0130ddias\u0131 ba\u015fl\u0131kl\u0131 yaz\u0131m\u0131zda, ge\u00e7en y\u0131ldan bu yana sosyal medyada ve internet ortamlar\u0131nda s\u0131k\u00e7a yer alan ve kafa kar\u0131\u015f\u0131kl\u0131\u011f\u0131na sebep olan Suriyelilerin T\u00fcrk vatanda\u015fl\u0131\u011f\u0131na ge\u00e7ip ge\u00e7meyece\u011fi konusunu ara\u015ft\u0131rd\u0131k.\nB\u00f6ylesine yanl\u0131\u015f anlamalara ve yorumlamalara sebebiyet verecek konuya a\u00e7\u0131kl\u0131k getirmek ad\u0131na 26. D\u00f6nem 3.Yasama Y\u0131l\u0131 Mart 2018 tarihli T\u00fcrkiye B\u00fcy\u00fck Millet Meclisi \u0130nsan Haklar\u0131n\u0131 \u0130nceleme Komisyonu M\u00fclteci Haklar\u0131 Alt Komisyonu G\u00f6\u00e7 Ve Uyum Raporu\u2019nu inceledik ve s\u00f6z konusu iddialara do\u011frulama niteli\u011finde derlemeler yapt\u0131k.\nM\u00fclteci Haklar\u0131 Alt Komisyonu ve g\u00f6revleri hakk\u0131nda bilgi sahibi olmak istiyorsan\u0131z t\u0131klay\u0131n.\nV.1.17.Ge\u00e7ici Koruma Alt\u0131ndaki Suriyeliler ve Vatanda\u015fl\u0131k:\n5901 say\u0131l\u0131 T\u00fcrk Vatanda\u015fl\u0131\u011f\u0131 Kanunu yabanc\u0131lar\u0131n vatanda\u015fl\u0131\u011fa al\u0131nmalar\u0131 i\u00e7in \u00fc\u00e7 usul \u00f6ng\u00f6rm\u00fc\u015ft\u00fcr. Bunlar genel h\u00fck\u00fcmlere g\u00f6re vatanda\u015fl\u0131\u011fa al\u0131nma, evlenme yolu ile vatanda\u015fl\u0131\u011fa al\u0131nma ve istisnai usulle vatanda\u015fl\u0131\u011fa al\u0131nma \u015feklindedir.\nGenel h\u00fck\u00fcmlere g\u00f6re vatanda\u015f olmak i\u00e7in \u00f6ncelikle g\u00f6\u00e7menin T\u00fcrkiye\u2019de en az 5 y\u0131l s\u00fcren ge\u00e7erli ikametinin olmas\u0131 gerekmektedir. Suriyelilerin stat\u00fcs\u00fc ge\u00e7ici koruma stat\u00fcs\u00fcd\u00fcr. Ge\u00e7ici Koruma stat\u00fcs\u00fc ile ge\u00e7irilen s\u00fcre vatanda\u015fl\u0131\u011fa ba\u015fvuru i\u00e7in bir hak do\u011furmamaktad\u0131r.\nT\u00fcrkiye\u2019de ge\u00e7ici ikamet stat\u00fcs\u00fcnde bulunan bir Suriyeli on y\u0131l T\u00fcrkiye\u2019de bulunsa da vatanda\u015fl\u0131\u011fa ba\u015fvuru hakk\u0131 kazanamamaktad\u0131r. Ge\u00e7ici koruma y\u00f6netmeli\u011finin 25. Maddesinde bu husus net olarak d\u00fczenlenmi\u015ftir: \u201cGe\u00e7ici koruma kimlik belgesi, T\u00fcrkiye\u2019de kal\u0131\u015f hakk\u0131 sa\u011flar. Ancak bu belge Kanunda d\u00fczenlenen ikamet izni veya ikamet izni yerine ge\u00e7en belgelere e\u015fde\u011fer say\u0131lmaz, uzun d\u00f6nem ikamet iznine ge\u00e7i\u015f hakk\u0131 tan\u0131maz, s\u00fcresi ikamet izni toplam\u0131nda dikkate al\u0131nmaz ve sahibine T\u00fcrk vatanda\u015fl\u0131\u011f\u0131na ba\u015fvuru hakk\u0131 sa\u011flamaz.\u201d\nT\u00fcrk vatanda\u015fl\u0131\u011f\u0131na ge\u00e7ebilmek i\u00e7in bir di\u011fer usul ise \u2018istisnai vatanda\u015fl\u0131k\u2019 yoludur. Bu usule g\u00f6re, T\u00fcrkiye\u2019ye sanayi tesisi getiren veya bilimsel, ekonomik, k\u00fclt\u00fcrel, sosyal ve sportif anlamda \u00fclkeye katk\u0131 sa\u011flayan veya katk\u0131 sa\u011flayaca\u011f\u0131 d\u00fc\u015f\u00fcn\u00fclen ki\u015filerin s\u00fcre, ikamet vb. \u015fartlar aranmaks\u0131z\u0131n do\u011frudan T\u00fcrk vatanda\u015fl\u0131\u011f\u0131na al\u0131nmas\u0131 m\u00fcmk\u00fcnd\u00fcr. Bu usulde vas\u0131fl\u0131 ki\u015filerin T\u00fcrk vatanda\u015fl\u0131\u011f\u0131na h\u0131zl\u0131 bir \u015fekilde al\u0131nmas\u0131 gayesi g\u00fcd\u00fclmektedir. Bu y\u00f6ntemle ekonomik g\u00fcce, akademik ve mesleki yetene\u011fe sahip bir potansiyelin ba\u015fka co\u011frafyalara do\u011fru akmas\u0131n\u0131 durdurarak, \u00fclkemizde kalmas\u0131n\u0131 ve katma de\u011fer olu\u015fturmas\u0131n\u0131 sa\u011flamak ad\u0131na, bir neslin kaybolup gitmesine izin vermemek ad\u0131na son 6 y\u0131lda yakla\u015f\u0131k 30.000 Suriyelinin vatanda\u015fl\u0131\u011fa ge\u00e7i\u015fi ger\u00e7ekle\u015ftirilmi\u015ftir.\nSuriyelilerin yakla\u015f\u0131k 10.000 kadar\u0131 bir T\u00fcrk anne ve/veya babadan oldu\u011fu i\u00e7in veya evlenme yoluyla vatanda\u015fl\u0131k alm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r. Bu konuyu spek\u00fclatif malzeme yapanlar\u0131n geli\u015fmi\u015f \u00fclkelere do\u011fru ak\u0131\u015f\u0131 yada ka\u00e7\u0131\u015f\u0131 g\u00f6zden ka\u00e7\u0131rmamalar\u0131 gerekir. \u00d6zellikle Almanya vas\u0131fl\u0131 m\u00fcltecilere ikincil koruma ba\u015fta olmak \u00fczere daimi stat\u00fc ve vatanda\u015fl\u0131k verme konusunda a\u00e7\u0131k davrand\u0131\u011f\u0131 i\u00e7in 267.500\u2019den fazla vas\u0131fl\u0131 Suriyelinin Almanya\u2019ya kabul edilip daha do\u011frusu dev\u015firilip ya\u015fama kar\u0131\u015ft\u0131\u011f\u0131 Avrupa \u0130statistik Ofisi/Eurostat rakamlar\u0131ndan anla\u015f\u0131lmaktad\u0131r.\nKamuoyunda Suriyelilere vatanda\u015fl\u0131k verilip verilmemesi tart\u0131\u015fmalar\u0131 esnas\u0131nda bu konuda referanduma gidilmesi ve buna g\u00f6re karar verilmesi y\u00f6n\u00fcnde g\u00f6r\u00fc\u015fler ortaya at\u0131lm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r. Bu g\u00f6r\u00fc\u015f hukuk devleti yakla\u015f\u0131m\u0131na ve insan haklar\u0131 anlay\u0131\u015f\u0131na uygun de\u011fildir. Hukuk devletinde temel hak ve \u00f6zg\u00fcrl\u00fcklerin referandum konusu yap\u0131lmamas\u0131 esast\u0131r. Ge\u00e7ici koruma alt\u0131nda \u00fclkemizde bulunan 3,4 milyon Suriyelinin vatanda\u015fl\u0131\u011fa al\u0131nmas\u0131 gibi bir durum s\u00f6z konusu de\u011fildir. \u00dclkemizde ya\u015fayan Suriyelilerin %1\u2019inin vatanda\u015fl\u0131k ald\u0131\u011f\u0131 ortada iken, T\u00fcrkiye\u2019de bulunan Suriyelilerin \u00e7ok \u00f6nemli bir k\u0131sm\u0131na vatanda\u015fl\u0131k verildi\u011fi haberleri, \u015fehir efsanesi olman\u0131n \u00f6tesine ge\u00e7memektedir.\n\u00dclkemizde do\u011fmu\u015f 250.000\u2019den fazla Suriyeli bebek do\u011fmu\u015ftur. T\u00fcrkiye\u2019de toprak esas\u0131na dayal\u0131 vatanda\u015fl\u0131k alma usul\u00fc bulunmamakta, vatanda\u015f olmak i\u00e7in ki\u015finin annesi veya babas\u0131ndan en az birisinin T\u00fcrk vatanda\u015f\u0131 olmas\u0131 \u015fart\u0131 aranmaktad\u0131r. T\u00fcrkiye\u2019de do\u011fmu\u015f olan Suriyeli \u00e7ocuklar\u0131n vatans\u0131z stat\u00fcs\u00fcnde kalmas\u0131, kay\u0131p bir neslin olu\u015fmas\u0131 demektir. Bu kapsamda, T\u00fcrkiye\u2019de do\u011fmu\u015f olan Suriyeli \u00e7ocuklara vatanda\u015fl\u0131k verilmesi konusunda etki analizini i\u00e7eren bir \u00e7al\u0131\u015fma yap\u0131l\u0131p, sonucuna g\u00f6re mevzuat d\u00fczenlemesine gidilebilir.\nV.1.19.Suriyeli M\u00fcltecilerle \u0130lgili Do\u011fru Bilinen Yanl\u0131\u015flar:\nYanl\u0131\u015f bilgi: Suriyeliler istedi\u011fi \u00fcniversiteye s\u0131navs\u0131z giriyor.\nDo\u011frusu: Suriyeli \u00f6\u011frenciler i\u00e7in \u00f6zel bir d\u00fczenleme yok. Suriyeli \u00f6\u011frenciler, di\u011fer yabanc\u0131 uyruklu \u00f6\u011frenciler gibi \u201cT\u00fcrkiye Burslar\u0131n\u0131n\u201d, Yabanc\u0131 Uyruklu \u00d6\u011frenci S\u0131nav\u0131n\u0131n veya yatay ge\u00e7i\u015fin gereklerini sa\u011flamadan \u00fcniversitelere giremezler.\nYanl\u0131\u015f Bilgi: Suriyeli \u00f6\u011frencilerin \u201ctamam\u0131na\u201d devlet b\u00fct\u00e7esinden kar\u015f\u0131l\u0131ks\u0131z burs veriliyor.\nDo\u011frusu: Sadece Yurt D\u0131\u015f\u0131 T\u00fcrkler Ba\u015fkanl\u0131\u011f\u0131na \u201cT\u00fcrkiye Burslar\u0131\u201d \u00fczerinden ba\u015fvuru yapan ve ba\u015far\u0131 ba\u015fta olmak \u00fczere belirli kriterleri kar\u015f\u0131layan di\u011fer \u00fclkelerden gelen \u00f6\u011frencilerde oldu\u011fu gibi s\u0131n\u0131rl\u0131 say\u0131daki Suriyeli \u00f6\u011frenciye burs verilmektedir.\nYanl\u0131\u015f Bilgi: TOK\u0130 taraf\u0131ndan yap\u0131lan sosyal konutlar Suriyelilere bedava veriliyor.\nDo\u011frusu: TOK\u0130\u2019den sosyal konut alabilmenin ilk \u015fart\u0131 T.C. vatanda\u015f\u0131 olmakt\u0131r. Suriyeliler T\u00fcrk vatanda\u015f\u0131 olmad\u0131klar\u0131 i\u00e7in TOK\u0130\u2019den bedava de\u011fil parayla bile sosyal konut alamazlar.\nYanl\u0131\u015f Bilgi: Suriyeliler ara\u00e7lar\u0131 i\u00e7in MTV \u00f6demiyor.\nDo\u011frusu: T\u00fcrkiye\u2019den ara\u00e7 sat\u0131n alan veya kendi arac\u0131n\u0131 T\u00fcrkiye\u2019ye getiren Suriyeliler kay\u0131t yapt\u0131rarak T\u00fcrkiye\u2019den plaka almak zorundad\u0131rlar. Ayr\u0131ca bu ara\u00e7lar\u0131 i\u00e7in motorlu ta\u015f\u0131tlar vergisi \u00f6demekle, sigorta ve fenni muayene gibi i\u015flemleri yapt\u0131rmakla y\u00fck\u00fcml\u00fcd\u00fcrler.\nYanl\u0131\u015f bilgi: Suriyeliler se\u00e7imlerde oy kullan\u0131yor.\nDo\u011frusu: T\u00fcrkiye\u2019de yap\u0131lan se\u00e7imlerde ve halk oylamalar\u0131nda oy kullanabilmek i\u00e7in ilk \u015fart T\u00fcrkiye Cumhuriyeti Vatanda\u015f\u0131 olmakt\u0131r. T\u00fcrkiye Cumhuriyeti Vatanda\u015f\u0131 olmayan biri se\u00e7imlerde asla oy kullanamaz. Hi\u00e7bir yabanc\u0131n\u0131n se\u00e7imlerde oy kullanma hakk\u0131 yoktur.\nYanl\u0131\u015f bilgi: Suriyelilere maa\u015f ba\u011flan\u0131yor.\nDo\u011frusu: Suriyelilere maa\u015f ba\u011flan\u0131lmas\u0131 s\u00f6z konusu de\u011fil. Belli \u015fartlar\u0131 ta\u015f\u0131yan t\u00fcm s\u0131\u011f\u0131nmac\u0131lara AB katk\u0131s\u0131 ile finanse edilen b\u00fct\u00e7eden ayl\u0131k 120 TL yard\u0131m yap\u0131lmaktad\u0131r. Bak\u0131ma muhta\u00e7 engelli, yetim, \u00f6ks\u00fcz \u00e7ocu\u011fun bulunan ve kad\u0131nlar taraf\u0131ndan ge\u00e7imi sa\u011flanan (\u00e7al\u0131\u015fma \u00e7a\u011f\u0131nda erkek olmayan) aileler bu yard\u0131mdan yararland\u0131r\u0131lmaktad\u0131r. Kas\u0131m 2016\u2019da ba\u015flayan Sosyal uyum yard\u0131m\u0131 ile temel insani ve ya\u015famsal ihtiya\u00e7lar\u0131n kar\u015f\u0131lanmas\u0131 hedeflenmektedir.\nKaynaklar: kaynak1, kaynak2, kaynak3, kaynak4\nVideo oynat\u0131c\u0131\nhttps://dogrula.org/wp-content/uploads/2018/02/dogrula.org_.mp4\n00:00\n00:07\n[Toplam:5    Ortalama:4.8/5] B\u00fct\u00fcn Suriyelilere Vatanda\u015fl\u0131k Verilece\u011fi \u0130ddias\u0131", "\u201cCaner Toygar\u2019\u0131n Ak Parti Milletvekili Aday\u0131 Oldu\u011fu \u0130ddias\u0131\u201d ba\u015fl\u0131kl\u0131 i\u00e7eri\u011fimizde bir d\u00f6nem kat\u0131ld\u0131\u011f\u0131 evlilik programlar\u0131yla \u00fcnlenen Caner Toygar\u2019\u0131n Ak Parti\u2019den milletvekili aday\u0131 oldu\u011fu iddias\u0131n\u0131 inceledik. S\u00f6z konusu iddia DO\u011eRU DE\u011e\u0130LD\u0130R.\nBBG evinde \u00fcn kazanan, G\u00fclben Ergen'in program\u0131nda ba\u015f\u0131nda bardak k\u0131ran, Esra Erol'da evlenip kar\u0131s\u0131n\u0131 darp edince Serap Ezg\u00fc'ye konu olan Caner Toygar da milletvekili aday\u0131. Diyeceklerim bu kadar.\n\u2014 MAKBULE (@_Sehrazatt_) May 2, 2018\nCaner Toygar Ak Parti\u2019den Milletvekili Aday\u0131 m\u0131 Oldu?\n\u00d6ncelikle sosyal medyada ve baz\u0131 haber sitelerinde se\u00e7imle alakal\u0131 payla\u015f\u0131mlar\u0131n bir k\u0131sm\u0131nda, milletvekili aday\u0131 ile milletvekili aday adayl\u0131\u011f\u0131 ifadelerinin kar\u0131\u015ft\u0131r\u0131ld\u0131\u011f\u0131 tespit edilmi\u015ftir. Kat\u0131ld\u0131\u011f\u0131 evlilik programlar\u0131yla \u00fcnlenen Caner Toygar, Ak Parti\u2019den milletvekili aday\u0131 olmam\u0131\u015ft\u0131r. Caner Toygar, kendi sosyal medya hesab\u0131ndan da duyurusunu yapt\u0131\u011f\u0131 \u00fczere, milletvekili aday adayl\u0131\u011f\u0131 i\u00e7in ba\u015fvuru yapm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r. Ancak milletvekili olmak i\u00e7in aday adayl\u0131\u011f\u0131 ba\u015fvurusunu belirli \u015fartlar\u0131* sa\u011flayan herkes yapabilir. Yani aday adayl\u0131\u011f\u0131 ba\u015fvurusu yapmak ki\u015fi tasarrufunda oldu\u011fu i\u00e7in siyasi partiler ba\u015fvuru yapan ki\u015fileri se\u00e7emez. Her se\u00e7im d\u00f6neminde milletvekili aday adayl\u0131\u011f\u0131 i\u00e7in belirli s\u00fcrelerde isteyenler ba\u015fvurulabilir. Ba\u015fvuru s\u00fcreci tamamlan\u0131nca da siyasi partiler bu aday adaylar\u0131 listesinden de\u011ferlendirme yaparak, milletvekili adaylar\u0131n\u0131 belirler. Dolay\u0131s\u0131yla ko\u015fullar\u0131 sa\u011flayan birisi aday adayl\u0131\u011f\u0131 ba\u015fvurusunda bulununca, an\u0131nda bir siyasi partinin milletvekili aday\u0131 olmaz. Yani sonu\u00e7 olarak, aday adayl\u0131\u011f\u0131 i\u00e7in ba\u015fvurmak ki\u015fi tasarrufunda, ba\u015fvuran ki\u015filer aras\u0131ndan milletvekili adaylar\u0131n\u0131 belirlemek ise siyasi partinin tasarrufundad\u0131r.\nAyr\u0131ca Ak Parti\u2019de milletvekili aday adayl\u0131\u011f\u0131 i\u00e7in ba\u015fvuru s\u00fcresi, hen\u00fcz 2 May\u0131s \u00c7ar\u015famba g\u00fcn\u00fc itibariyle sona ermi\u015ftir. Yani parti taraf\u0131ndan listelerin de\u011ferlendirilmesi sona ermemi\u015f, milletvekili adaylar\u0131 kesinle\u015fmemi\u015ftir. Dolay\u0131s\u0131yla Caner Toygar\u2019\u0131n Ak Parti\u2019den milletvekili aday\u0131 oldu\u011fu iddias\u0131, bu arg\u00fcman do\u011frultusunda da do\u011fru de\u011fildir.\n*Milletvekilli\u011fi \u0130\u00e7in Aranan \u015eartlar\nMilletvekili aday adayl\u0131\u011f\u0131 i\u00e7in ba\u015fvuru yapabilmek, \u00f6ncelikle Anayasa\u2019da (md. 76) ve Milletvekili Se\u00e7imi Kanunu\u2019nda (md. 10 \u2013 11) \u00f6ng\u00f6r\u00fclm\u00fc\u015f \u015fartlar\u0131 sa\u011flamay\u0131 gerektirir. Bu \u015fartlar\u0131 \u015f\u00f6yle s\u0131ralayabiliriz:\n18 ya\u015f\u0131n\u0131 doldurmu\u015f olmak\nT\u00fcrkiye Cumhuriyeti vatanda\u015f\u0131 olmak\nEn az ilkokul mezunu olmak\nAskerlik hizmetini yapm\u0131\u015f olmak\nK\u0131s\u0131tl\u0131 olmamak\nKamu hizmetlerinden yasakl\u0131 olmamak\nTaksirli su\u00e7lar hari\u00e7, toplam bir y\u0131l veya daha fazla hapis veya s\u00fcresi ne olursa olsun a\u011f\u0131r hapis cezas\u0131na h\u00fck\u00fcm giymi\u015f olmamak\nAffa u\u011fram\u0131\u015f olsalar bile baz\u0131 su\u00e7lardan h\u00fck\u00fcm giymemi\u015f olmak;\n   Basit ve nitelikli zimmet, irtik\u00e2p, r\u00fc\u015fvet, h\u0131rs\u0131zl\u0131k, doland\u0131r\u0131c\u0131l\u0131k, sahtecilik, inanc\u0131 k\u00f6t\u00fcye kullanma, dolanl\u0131 iflas gibi y\u00fcz k\u0131zart\u0131c\u0131 su\u00e7lar ile istimal ve istihlak ka\u00e7ak\u00e7\u0131l\u0131\u011f\u0131 d\u0131\u015f\u0131nda kalan ka\u00e7ak\u00e7\u0131l\u0131k su\u00e7lar\u0131, resm\u00ee ihale ve al\u0131m sat\u0131mlara fesat kar\u0131\u015ft\u0131rma veya Devlet s\u0131rlar\u0131n\u0131 a\u00e7\u0131\u011fa vurma su\u00e7lar\u0131ndan biriyle mahk\u00fbm olmamak,\n   T\u00fcrk Ceza Kanununun \u0130kinci Kitab\u0131n\u0131n, birinci bab\u0131nda yaz\u0131l\u0131 su\u00e7lardan veya bu su\u00e7lar\u0131n i\u015flenmesini aleni olarak tahrik etme su\u00e7undan mahkum olmamak,\n   Ter\u00f6r eylemlerinden mahk\u00fbm olmamak,\n   T\u00fcrk Ceza Kanununun 536 nc\u0131 maddesinin birinci, ikinci ve \u00fc\u00e7\u00fcnc\u00fc f\u0131kralar\u0131nda yaz\u0131l\u0131 eylemlerle ayn\u0131 Kanunun 537 nci maddesinin birinci, ikinci, \u00fc\u00e7\u00fcnc\u00fc, d\u00f6rd\u00fcnc\u00fc ve be\u015finci f\u0131kralar\u0131nda yaz\u0131l\u0131 eylemleri siyasi ve ideolojik ama\u00e7larla i\u015flemekten mahkum olmamak.\nKaynaklar: Twitter, Instagram, mevzuat.gov, mevzuat.gov 2, internethaber\nVideo \u0130ddias\u0131", "\u201cCumhurba\u015fkan\u0131 R. Tayyip Erdo\u011fan\u2019\u0131n Rak\u0131 \u0130\u00e7ti\u011fi Foto\u011fraf \u0130ddias\u0131\u201d ba\u015fl\u0131kl\u0131 i\u00e7eri\u011fimizde Cumhurba\u015fkan\u0131 Recep Tayyip Erdo\u011fan\u2019\u0131n rak\u0131 i\u00e7ti\u011fi iddias\u0131yla payla\u015f\u0131lan g\u00f6rseli inceledik.\nSosyal medyada ve baz\u0131 haber sitelerinde payla\u015f\u0131lan bir foto\u011frafta, Cumhurba\u015fkan\u0131 Recep Tayyip Erdo\u011fan\u2019\u0131n rak\u0131 i\u00e7ti\u011fi iddia edilmi\u015ftir. S\u00f6z konusu iddia DO\u011eRU DE\u011e\u0130LD\u0130R.\nSosyal medyadaki payla\u015f\u0131mlarda Cumhurba\u015fkan\u0131 R. Tayyip Erdo\u011fan\u2018\u0131n rak\u0131 i\u00e7ti\u011fi iddias\u0131yla payla\u015f\u0131lan g\u00f6rsel ile Muharrem \u0130nce\u2018nin Ramazan ay\u0131nda i\u00e7ki i\u00e7ti\u011fi g\u00f6rsel kar\u015f\u0131la\u015ft\u0131r\u0131lm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r.  Cumhurba\u015fkan\u0131 Erdo\u011fan\u2019\u0131n rak\u0131 i\u00e7ti\u011fi iddias\u0131yla payla\u015f\u0131lan g\u00f6rsel, asl\u0131nda foto\u011fraf\u0131n orijinali k\u0131rp\u0131larak olu\u015fturulmu\u015ftur. Orijinal foto\u011fraflarda Cumhurba\u015fkan\u0131 Erdo\u011fan\u2019\u0131n rak\u0131 de\u011fil, ayran i\u00e7ti\u011fi g\u00f6r\u00fclmektedir. Cumhurba\u015fkan\u0131n\u0131n, 1990 y\u0131l\u0131nda Necmettin Erbakan ile birlikte kat\u0131ld\u0131\u011f\u0131 bir etkinlikte yedikleri yemek s\u0131ras\u0131nda \u00e7ekilmi\u015f orijinal foto\u011fraflar \u015f\u00f6yle:\nFoto\u011fraflar\u0131 payla\u015fan SiyasetArsivi kullan\u0131c\u0131 adl\u0131 Twitter hesab\u0131nda etkinli\u011fin 1990 y\u0131l\u0131nda Refah Partisi taraf\u0131ndan d\u00fczenlenen bir iftar organizasyonu oldu\u011fu belirtilmi\u015ftir.\nKaynaklar: odatv, facebook, Twitter (siyasetarsivi)\nVideo oynat\u0131c\u0131\nhttps://dogrula.org/wp-content/uploads/2018/02/dogrula.org_.mp4\n00:00\n00:07\n[Toplam:7    Ortalama:3.7/5] Cumhurba\u015fkan\u0131 R. Tayyip Erdo\u011fan\u2019\u0131n Rak\u0131 \u0130\u00e7ti\u011fi Foto\u011fraf \u0130ddias\u0131", "CHP \u0130l Ba\u015fkan\u0131n\u0131n Temel Karamollao\u011flu\u2019na Katil Dedi\u011fi \u0130ddias\u0131 ba\u015fl\u0131kl\u0131 yaz\u0131m\u0131zda inceledi\u011fimiz, Cumhuriyet Halk Partisi(CHP) \u0130stanbul \u0130l Ba\u015fkan\u0131 Canan Kaftanc\u0131o\u011flu\u2018nun, Saadet Partisi Genel Ba\u015fkan\u0131 Temel Karamollao\u011flu\u2018na katil diyerek tweet att\u0131\u011f\u0131 iddias\u0131 do\u011frudur. \nCanan Kaftanc\u0131o\u011flu\u2018nun \u015fahsi Twitter hesab\u0131ndan atm\u0131\u015f oldu\u011fu tweet, 24 Haziran\u2019da yap\u0131lacak Cumhurba\u015fkanl\u0131\u011f\u0131 se\u00e7imi i\u00e7in yap\u0131lan Cumhuriyet Halk Partisi \u2013 Saadet Partisi \u2013 \u0130yi Parti \u2013 Demokrat Parti ittifak\u0131yla son g\u00fcnlerde tekrar g\u00fcndeme gelmi\u015ftir. Fatih Tezcan, att\u0131\u011f\u0131 tweette, CHP \u0130stanbul \u0130l Ba\u015fkan\u0131 Kaftanc\u0131o\u011flu\u2019nun, Temel Karamollao\u011flu\u2019na katil dedi\u011fini iddia etmi\u015f ve bunun \u00fczerine birtak\u0131m yorumlar yazm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r.\nFatih Tezcan\u2019\u0131n Tweeti\nFatih Tezcan\u2018\u0131n iddias\u0131nda bahsi ge\u00e7en tweeti, Canan Kaftanc\u0131o\u011flu 21 Haziran 2012 tarihinde ki\u015fisel hesab\u0131ndan kendisi atm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r. Sivas Katliam\u0131 anmas\u0131yla ilgili, panel d\u00fczenleyen bir kurumun Temel Karamollao\u011flu\u2018nu davet etmesi \u00fczerine, bu duruma tepki g\u00f6stererek, bunun bir katil aklama oldu\u011funu belirterek Karamollao\u011flu\u2018nu katil \u015feklinde itham etmi\u015ftir.\nCHP \u0130stanbul \u0130l Ba\u015fkan\u0131 Canan Kaftanc\u0131o\u011flu\u2019nun Tweeti -1\nCanan Kaftanc\u0131o\u011flu\u2018nun 2011 y\u0131l\u0131nda att\u0131\u011f\u0131 di\u011fer bir tweette ise, Temel Karamollao\u011flu\u2019ndan Sivas san\u0131\u011f\u0131 olarak bahsetmi\u015ftir:\nCHP \u0130stanbul \u0130l Ba\u015fkan\u0131 Canan Kaftanc\u0131o\u011flu\u2019nun Tweeti \u2013 2\nSivas Katliam\u0131 d\u00f6neminde Sivas Belediye Ba\u015fkan\u0131 olan Temel Karamollao\u011flu\u2018nun Fatih Altayl\u0131\u2019n\u0131n sundu\u011fu Teke Tek program\u0131nda yapt\u0131\u011f\u0131 a\u00e7\u0131klamalar\u0131na g\u00f6re,\n\u201cSivas olaylar\u0131n\u0131n ya\u015fand\u0131\u011f\u0131 y\u0131l T\u00fcrkiye\u2019nin en karanl\u0131k y\u0131llar\u0131. Elimde delil yok ama uzaktan planland\u0131\u011f\u0131 kanatini ta\u015f\u0131yorum. O g\u00fcn askerin yemin t\u00f6reni var ama askerler izinliler. Bir de bu gariplik var. Bana do\u011frudan do\u011fruya emniyet m\u00fcd\u00fcr\u00fcn\u00fcn gelip gen\u00e7ler toplanm\u0131\u015f slogan at\u0131yorlar dedi\u011fi zaman, valiye s\u00f6yleyin dedim. Benim m\u00fcdahalem kalabal\u0131\u011f\u0131 da\u011f\u0131tt\u0131. Merkezde topland\u0131, polis m\u00fcdahale edemedi. Emniyet m\u00fcd\u00fcr\u00fc gelince yine konu\u015ftum ama bunlara engel olamad\u0131m. Bir foto\u011fraf \u00e7ekiyorlar, alt\u0131na da Temel Karamollao\u011flu diye yaz\u0131yorlar. O adam ben de\u011filim. Burada bir su\u00e7lamaya gidildi. Benimle ilgili bir dava a\u00e7\u0131lmad\u0131. Geldiler ifadelerimiz al\u0131nd\u0131. B\u00f6yle bir hadisenin benim belediye ba\u015fkanl\u0131\u011f\u0131m s\u0131ras\u0131nda meydana gelmesi \u00fcz\u00fcc\u00fc. Herkes \u015fundan emin olmal\u0131 ki benim g\u00fcc\u00fcm nispetinde ne istendiyse hepsinin arkas\u0131ndan gittim. Kas\u0131tl\u0131 olarak iftira kampanyas\u0131 ba\u015flat\u0131ld\u0131 ve tuttu.\u201d \ndiyerek, kendisine y\u00f6neltilen iddialar\u0131 reddetmi\u015ftir.\nKaynaklar: Twitter, Twitter 2, Teke Tek Program\u0131\n[Toplam:5    Ortalama:5/5] CHP \u0130l Ba\u015fkan\u0131n\u0131n Temel Karamollao\u011flu\u2019na Katil Dedi\u011fi \u0130ddias\u0131", "Suriyelilere S\u0131navs\u0131z \u00dcniversite, Bedava Telefon \u0130ddialar\u0131 ba\u015fl\u0131kl\u0131 i\u00e7eri\u011fimizde, Suriyelerin s\u0131navs\u0131z \u00fcniversiteye gittiklerini, para \u00f6demeden telefon kart\u0131 da\u011f\u0131t\u0131ld\u0131\u011f\u0131 iddialar\u0131n\u0131 ele ald\u0131k. Sosyal medyada s\u0131k s\u0131k g\u00fcndeme gelen bu iddialar ger\u00e7e\u011fi yans\u0131tmamakta olup, Suriyelilerin s\u0131navs\u0131z \u00fcniversitelere yerle\u015fti\u011fi ve bedava telefon kart\u0131 kulland\u0131klar\u0131 iddialar\u0131 do\u011fru de\u011fildir. \n1- Suriyelilere S\u0131navs\u0131z \u00dcniversite \u0130ddias\u0131\nSuriyeli \u00f6\u011frencilerin s\u0131nava tabi tutulmadan, \u015farts\u0131z, ko\u015fulsuz olarak \u00fcniversitelere girebildikleri iddias\u0131 ger\u00e7e\u011fi yans\u0131tmamaktad\u0131r. Suriyeli \u00fcniversite \u00f6\u011frencileri, di\u011fer yabanc\u0131 uyruklu \u00f6\u011frenciler gibi ayn\u0131 \u015fartlara tabi tutulmakta ve onlar gibi baz\u0131 prosed\u00fcrleri yerine getirerek T\u00fcrkiye\u2019deki \u00fcniversitelere girebilmektedir. T\u00fcrkiye\u2019de \u00f6\u011frenim g\u00f6ren yabanc\u0131 uyruklu \u00f6\u011frencilere ili\u015fkin y\u00f6netmeli\u011fe g\u00f6re, bu \u015fartlar belirtilmi\u015ftir.\nBuna g\u00f6re, Suriyeli bir \u00f6\u011frencinin bu haktan yararlanabilmesi i\u00e7in \u00f6n lisans, lisans veya y\u00fcksek lisans e\u011fitimine ba\u015flam\u0131\u015f ve yar\u0131da kalm\u0131\u015f olmas\u0131 gerekiyor. Bunun i\u00e7in di\u011fer yabanc\u0131 uyruklu \u00f6\u011frenciler gibi Yabanc\u0131 Uyruklu \u00d6\u011frenci S\u0131nav\u0131(Y\u00d6S)\u2019na girmeleri gerekmektedir. Suriyeli \u00f6\u011frenciler, kendi \u00fclkelerinde yar\u0131da b\u0131rakt\u0131klar\u0131 \u00fcniversite e\u011fitimlerine T\u00fcrkiye\u2019deki \u00fcniversitelerde istenilen ko\u015fullar\u0131 sa\u011flayarak, not ortalamalar\u0131n\u0131n belirli bir seviyede olmas\u0131 istenmektedir.\n\u00d6zel durumlarda Y\u00d6K, Resmi Gazetede yay\u0131mlanan y\u00f6netmeli\u011fe g\u00f6re, \u015fiddet olaylar\u0131 ve insani kriz nedeniyle e\u011fitim ve \u00f6\u011fretimin s\u00fcrd\u00fcr\u00fclemez oldu\u011fu \u00fclkelerdeki \u00f6\u011frenciler belirli \u015fartlar ve usullere g\u00f6re T\u00fcrkiye\u2019deki \u00fcniversitelere yatay ge\u00e7i\u015f ba\u015fvurusu yapabilmektedir.\nBuna ek olarak, Y\u00d6K\u2019\u00fcn 2012-2013 e\u011fitim \u00f6\u011fretim y\u0131l\u0131nda yapt\u0131\u011f\u0131 d\u00fczenlemede 7 \u00fcniversiteye yatay ge\u00e7i\u015f i\u00e7in \u201c\u00f6zel \u00f6\u011frenci\u201d stat\u00fcs\u00fc getirilmi\u015ftir. Suriye ve M\u0131s\u0131r\u2019da e\u011fitim g\u00f6rmekteyken ara vermek zorunda kalan T\u00fcrk vatanda\u015flar\u0131, bu \u00fclkelerin vatanda\u015flar\u0131 ve yabanc\u0131 uyruklu vatanda\u015flar\u0131, yatay ge\u00e7i\u015f i\u00e7in istenen belgelere sahip de\u011filse, a\u015fa\u011f\u0131da belirlenen 7 \u00fcniversitede resmi kay\u0131t yapt\u0131r\u0131lmadan sadece ders g\u00f6rebilecekleri belirtilmi\u015ftir. \u00d6zel \u00f6\u011frencilik stat\u00fcs\u00fcnde e\u011fitim hakk\u0131 verilen bu \u00f6\u011frenciler, \u00f6\u011frencilik haklar\u0131ndan yararlanmamakta ve \u00fcniversiteye resmi olarak kay\u0131t olmamaktad\u0131r.\n2- Suriyelilere Bedava Telefon Kart\u0131 \u0130ddias\u0131\nBir di\u011fer iddiaya g\u00f6re ise, Suriyelere bedava telefon da\u011f\u0131t\u0131laca\u011f\u0131, telefon faturalar\u0131n\u0131n ise vatanda\u015flar taraf\u0131ndan \u00f6denece\u011fi iddia edilmi\u015ftir. Ancak bu iddia da ger\u00e7e\u011fi yans\u0131tmamaktad\u0131r. Baz\u0131 yay\u0131n organlar\u0131nda bu iddia, \u201cSuriyelilerin telefon faturalar\u0131n\u0131 da biz \u00f6deyece\u011fiz\u201d ba\u015fl\u0131\u011f\u0131yla haber yap\u0131lm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r.\nG\u00f6\u00e7 \u0130daresi Genel M\u00fcd\u00fcrl\u00fc\u011f\u00fc\u2018n\u00fcn resmi Twitter hesab\u0131ndan yap\u0131lan a\u00e7\u0131klamaya g\u00f6re, telefon arama kart\u0131 ihalesinin \u00e7arp\u0131t\u0131ld\u0131\u011f\u0131 ifade edilmi\u015ftir. \u0130halenin yap\u0131lmas\u0131n\u0131n amac\u0131, yabanc\u0131 \u00fclke vatanda\u015flar\u0131n\u0131n konsolosluklar\u0131 ve \u00fclkelerinin makamlar\u0131yla belge temini a\u00e7\u0131s\u0131ndan ileti\u015fimin h\u0131zland\u0131r\u0131lmas\u0131 ve s\u0131n\u0131r d\u0131\u015f\u0131 edilme i\u015flemlerinin kolayla\u015ft\u0131r\u0131lmas\u0131d\u0131r.\nBuna g\u00f6re, telefon kart\u0131 al\u0131mlar\u0131 yaln\u0131zca sava\u015f ve \u015fiddet ortam\u0131ndaki \u00fclkelerinden s\u0131\u011f\u0131narak T\u00fcrkiye\u2019ye gelen Suriye vatanda\u015flar\u0131n\u0131 de\u011fil, G\u00f6\u00e7 \u0130daresi\u2019nin Geri G\u00f6nderme Merkezlerinde s\u0131n\u0131r d\u0131\u015f\u0131 edilmek \u00fczere tutulan ve ileti\u015fimlerini sa\u011flayamayan s\u0131n\u0131rl\u0131 say\u0131daki yabanc\u0131 \u00fclke vatanda\u015flar\u0131n\u0131 kapsamaktad\u0131r.\nTBMM G\u00f6\u00e7 ve Uyum Alt Komisyonu Ba\u015fkan\u0131 Atay Uslu, Suriyelilere bedava telefon kart\u0131 da\u011f\u0131t\u0131ld\u0131\u011f\u0131 iddias\u0131na ili\u015fkin, medyada \u00e7\u0131kan haberlerin ger\u00e7e\u011fi yans\u0131tmad\u0131\u011f\u0131n\u0131 belirterek, \u201cSadece T\u00fcrkiye\u2019deki Geri G\u00f6nderme Merkezlerinde kalan ekonomik durumu zay\u0131f g\u00f6\u00e7menler avukatlar\u0131n\u0131, yak\u0131nlar\u0131n\u0131 ya da kendi \u00fclkelerini \u00fccretsiz arayabilecekler.\u201d dedi.\nKaynaklar: Y\u00d6K 1, Y\u00d6K 2, Y\u00d6K Yatay Ge\u00e7i\u015f Duyurusu, G\u00f6\u00e7 \u0130daresi\n[Toplam:6    Ortalama:4.7/5] Suriyelilere S\u0131navs\u0131z \u00dcniversite, Bedava Telefon \u0130ddialar\u0131", "YSK\u2019n\u0131n Cumhurba\u015fkanl\u0131\u011f\u0131 \u0130\u00e7in \u00dcniversite Mezunu Olma \u015eart\u0131n\u0131 Kald\u0131rd\u0131\u011f\u0131 \u0130ddias\u0131 ba\u015fl\u0131kl\u0131 yaz\u0131m\u0131zda, se\u00e7im d\u00f6neminde ortaya at\u0131lan iddialardan biri olan konuyu ele ald\u0131k.\nD\u00fcn itibar\u0131yla sosyal medya ve \u0130nternet kanallar\u0131nda yay\u0131lan payla\u015f\u0131mlarda, YSK\u2019n\u0131n (Y\u00fcksek Se\u00e7im Kurulu) Cumhurba\u015fkan\u0131 adayl\u0131\u011f\u0131 i\u00e7in gereken lisans diplomas\u0131 \u015fart\u0131n\u0131 kald\u0131rd\u0131\u011f\u0131 iddia edilmi\u015fti.\nAncak s\u00f6z konusu haberlerde yer alan, Y\u00fcksek Se\u00e7im Kurulu\u2019nun 24 Haziran 2018 se\u00e7imlerinde Cumhurba\u015fkanl\u0131\u011f\u0131 i\u00e7in diploma \u015fart\u0131n\u0131 kald\u0131rd\u0131\u011f\u0131 iddias\u0131 yanl\u0131\u015ft\u0131r.\nResmi Gazete\u2019de yay\u0131mlanan 327 say\u0131l\u0131 kararda, 2838 say\u0131l\u0131 Kanun\u2019un 10 ve 11. maddelerine g\u00f6re noter veya siyasi parti yetkililerince onaylanm\u0131\u015f diploma belgesi istendi\u011fi belirtilmi\u015ftir.\n327 No\u2019lu Karar\nMilletvekili Se\u00e7im Kanunu\u2019nda yer alan maddelerde Cumhurba\u015fkan\u0131 olabilmek i\u00e7in diploma \u015fart\u0131n\u0131n arand\u0131\u011f\u0131 net bir \u015fekilde g\u00f6r\u00fclmektedir.\n27 Nisan 2018 tarihli karar\u0131n \u201cSONU\u00c7\u201d ba\u015fl\u0131kl\u0131 b\u00f6l\u00fcm\u00fcnde yer alan bilgide ayr\u0131ca, gerekli belgelerin e-Devlet kap\u0131s\u0131ndan al\u0131nm\u0131\u015f olanlar\u0131n\u0131n da kabul edilece\u011fi ifade edilmi\u015ftir.\n327 No\u2019lu Karar\nErdo\u011fan\u2019\u0131n Diploma Konusu Tekrar G\u00fcndemde\nYSK\u2019n\u0131n diploma karar\u0131 \u00fczerine, Erdo\u011fan\u2019\u0131n lisans diplomas\u0131n\u0131n olmad\u0131\u011f\u0131 iddialar\u0131 tekrar g\u00fcndeme gelmeye ba\u015flad\u0131. Dogrula.org taraf\u0131ndan incelenmi\u015f olan Cumhurba\u015fkan\u0131 Recep Tayyip Erdo\u011fan\u2019\u0131n \u00fcniversite okumad\u0131\u011f\u0131 iddias\u0131n\u0131n ayr\u0131nt\u0131l\u0131 ara\u015ft\u0131rma yaz\u0131s\u0131na buradan ula\u015fabilirsiniz.\nKaynak: resmigazete.gov\nVideo oynat\u0131c\u0131\nhttps://dogrula.org/wp-content/uploads/2018/02/dogrula.org_.mp4\n00:00\n00:07\n[Toplam:5    Ortalama:5/5] YSK\u2019n\u0131n Cumhurba\u015fkanl\u0131\u011f\u0131 \u0130\u00e7in \u00dcniversite Mezunu Olma \u015eart\u0131n\u0131 Kald\u0131rd\u0131\u011f\u0131 \u0130ddias\u0131", "MHP Se\u00e7im Otob\u00fcs\u00fcnde Erdo\u011fan\u2019\u0131n Foto\u011fraf\u0131n\u0131n Bulundu\u011fu \u0130ddias\u0131 ba\u015fl\u0131kl\u0131 i\u00e7eri\u011fimizde, sosyal medyada g\u00fcndeme gelen Milliyet\u00e7i Hareket Partisi(MHP)\u2019nin se\u00e7im otob\u00fcs\u00fcn\u00fcn \u00fczerinde Cumhurba\u015fkan\u0131 Erdo\u011fan\u2018\u0131n foto\u011fraf\u0131n\u0131n yer ald\u0131\u011f\u0131 iddias\u0131n\u0131 ele ald\u0131k. Bu iddia do\u011fru de\u011fildir. \n\u0130Y\u0130 Parti isimli bir Facebook sayfas\u0131nda, MHP se\u00e7im otob\u00fcs\u00fcn\u00fcn \u00fczerinde Cumhurba\u015fkan\u0131 Erdo\u011fan\u2018\u0131n foto\u011fraf\u0131n\u0131n oldu\u011fu bir payla\u015f\u0131m yap\u0131lm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r. Bu payla\u015f\u0131m 1300 civar\u0131nda be\u011feni ve 6000 \u00fczerinde payla\u015f\u0131m alarak Facebook \u00fczerinde h\u0131zla yay\u0131lm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r.\nFoto\u011fraf Montajl\u0131 \nFoto\u011frafta bulunan MHP se\u00e7im otob\u00fcs\u00fc, 7 Haziran 2015 genel se\u00e7imlerinde y\u00fcr\u00fct\u00fclen se\u00e7im kampanyas\u0131 i\u00e7in haz\u0131rlanm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r. Foto\u011fraf\u0131n orijinal halinde, otob\u00fcs\u00fcn \u00fczerinde Recep Tayyip Erdo\u011fan\u2018\u0131n de\u011fil, MHP Genel Ba\u015fkan\u0131 Devlet Bah\u00e7eli\u2018nin foto\u011fraf\u0131 yer almaktad\u0131r.\n\u0130nc Ara\u015ft\u0131rma ve \u0130leti\u015fim Dan\u0131\u015fmanl\u0131\u011f\u0131 adl\u0131 \u015firketin, 7 Haziran 2015 genel se\u00e7im kampanyas\u0131 b\u00fcnyesinde yapt\u0131\u011f\u0131 \u00e7al\u0131\u015fmalarda, s\u00f6z konusu otob\u00fcs\u00fcn oldu\u011fu foto\u011fraf\u0131n orijinal hali bulunmaktad\u0131r. \u015eirketin resmi websitesindeki foto\u011fraf\u0131n as\u0131l halinde Devlet Bah\u00e7eli\u2018nin oldu\u011fu a\u00e7\u0131k\u00e7a g\u00f6r\u00fclmektedir.\nBozkurt Caps isimli Facebook sayfas\u0131nda da, foto\u011fraf\u0131n montaj oldu\u011fu belirtilmi\u015f ve se\u00e7im otob\u00fcs\u00fcn\u00fcn \u00fczerinde MHP Genel Ba\u015fkan\u0131 Devlet Bah\u00e7eli\u2018nin bulundu\u011fu bir payla\u015f\u0131m yap\u0131lm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r.\nMHP Mitinglerinde Kullan\u0131lm\u0131\u015f \n7 Haziran 2015 se\u00e7imleri i\u00e7in MHP, \u201cBizimle Y\u00fcr\u00fc T\u00fcrkiye\u201d slogan\u0131n\u0131 afi\u015flerde, otob\u00fcslerde ve yapt\u0131\u011f\u0131 \u00e7e\u015fitli se\u00e7im kampanyalar\u0131nda kullanm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r. Ayr\u0131ca MHP\u2019nin bu slogan\u0131 7 Haziran se\u00e7imlerinden sonra tekrardan kullan\u0131lmam\u0131\u015f, yerine ba\u015fka sloganlar kullan\u0131lm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r.\nBu sloganla ve Devlet Bah\u00e7eli\u2018nin foto\u011fraflar\u0131yla giydirilen otob\u00fcslerde, illere g\u00f6re farkl\u0131 adaylar\u0131n foto\u011fraflar\u0131 da bulunmaktad\u0131r. Ancak hi\u00e7birinde Erdo\u011fan\u2018\u0131n foto\u011fraf\u0131 kullan\u0131lmam\u0131\u015ft\u0131r. A\u015fa\u011f\u0131daki foto\u011fraflarda da g\u00f6r\u00fclebilece\u011fi \u00fczere, Mersin, \u00c7orum, \u00c7ank\u0131r\u0131 ve \u0130stanbul olmak \u00fczere 4 farkl\u0131 ilde kullan\u0131lan otob\u00fcslerin \u00f6rneklerini g\u00f6rebilirsiniz.\n\u0130stanbul, 2015\n\u00c7orum, 2015\n\u00c7ank\u0131r\u0131, 2015\nMersin, 2015\nKaynaklar: \u0130NC Ara\u015ft\u0131rma, Facebook, ortadogugazetesi.net, corumtime.com, haberci18.com\nVideo oynat\u0131c\u0131\n00:00\n00:00\n1. \u201cdogrula.org\u201d\n0:07\n[Toplam:6    Ortalama:5/5] MHP Se\u00e7im Otob\u00fcs\u00fcnde Erdo\u011fan\u2019\u0131n Foto\u011fraf\u0131n\u0131n Bulundu\u011fu \u0130ddias\u0131", "Adnan Menderes Havaliman\u0131 Ak Parti D\u00f6neminde Yap\u0131lmad\u0131 \u0130ddias\u0131 ba\u015fl\u0131kl\u0131 yaz\u0131m\u0131zda, Cumhurba\u015fkan\u0131 Erdo\u011fan\u2019\u0131n s\u00f6zleri \u00fczerine \u0130zmir Adnan Menderes Havaliman\u0131\u2019nda yap\u0131lan de\u011fi\u015fiklikleri ara\u015ft\u0131rd\u0131k.\nCumhuriyet Halk Partisi Genel Ba\u015fkan Yard\u0131mc\u0131s\u0131 ve \u0130zmir milletvekili Tuncay \u00d6zkan (@ATuncayOzkan), Twitter hesab\u0131nda yapt\u0131\u011f\u0131 bir payla\u015f\u0131mda, \u201cErdo\u011fan 1987\u2019de a\u00e7\u0131lan \u0130zmir Adnan Menderes Havaliman\u0131\u2019n\u0131 AKP\u2019nin yapt\u0131\u011f\u0131n\u0131 s\u00f6yledi\u201d iddias\u0131nda bulunmu\u015ftu.\nTuncay \u00d6zkan\u2019\u0131n iddias\u0131 \u00e7o\u011funlukla yanl\u0131\u015f, \u00e7\u00fcnk\u00fc Erdo\u011fan\u2019\u0131n \u201cdo\u011fru d\u00fcr\u00fcst bir havaliman\u0131 yoktu\u201d ifadesi, Adnan Menderes Havaliman\u0131\u2019n\u0131 Ak Parti\u2019nin yapt\u0131\u011f\u0131 anlam\u0131na gelmemektedir. Erdo\u011fan\u2019\u0131n s\u00f6ylemine konu olan ifadenin asl\u0131n\u0131 i\u00e7eri\u011fin devam\u0131nda g\u00f6rebilirsiniz.\n28 Nisan g\u00fcn\u00fc AK Parti\u2019nin \u0130zmir 6. Ola\u011fan \u0130l Kongesi\u2019nin ard\u0131ndan d\u00fczenlenen mitingde halka hitap eden Cumhurba\u015fkan\u0131 Recep Tayyip Erdo\u011fan\u2019\u0131n havaliman\u0131 \u00fczerine s\u00f6yledikleri \u015fu \u015fekildeydi;\n\u201cKarde\u015flerim. Yahu bundan 15 sene \u00f6nce, ah karde\u015flerim ahh. \u015eu koskaca \u0130zmir\u2019in do\u011fru d\u00fcr\u00fcst bir havaliman\u0131 var m\u0131yd\u0131? Ya biz geldik, Adnan Menderes Havaliman\u0131\u2019n\u0131 yapt\u0131k ya.\u201d\nCumhurba\u015fkan\u0131 Erdo\u011fan\u2019\u0131n \u201cdo\u011fru d\u00fcr\u00fcst\u201d bir havaliman\u0131 olmad\u0131\u011f\u0131n\u0131 s\u00f6ylemesi \u00fczerine, Ak Parti d\u00f6neminde Adnan Menderes Havaliman\u0131\u2019nda yap\u0131lan de\u011fi\u015fiklik ve yenileme projelerini inceledik.\nY\u0131llara G\u00f6re \u0130zmir Adnan Menderes Havaliman\u0131 Yenileme Projeleri\n\u0130zmir Adnan Menderes Havaliman\u0131, 17 Kas\u0131m 1987 tarihinde hizmete girmi\u015ftir.\n2000\u2019li y\u0131llara gelindi\u011finde ortaya \u00e7\u0131kan kapasite ihtiyac\u0131 nedeniyle DHM\u0130, Adnan Menderes Havaliman\u0131 D\u0131\u015f Hatlar Terminali\u2019ni geni\u015fletmek \u00fczere yola \u00e7\u0131k\u0131lm\u0131\u015f; projenin yap-i\u015flet-devret modeliyle olu\u015fturulmas\u0131 kararla\u015ft\u0131r\u0131larak 5 milyon yolculuk terminal yap\u0131lmas\u0131 \u00f6ng\u00f6r\u00fclm\u00fc\u015ft\u00fc.\n\u00d6ng\u00f6r\u00fclenden sekiz ay \u00f6nce bitirilen yeni terminal 9 Eyl\u00fcl 2006\u2019da a\u00e7\u0131ld\u0131. Kas\u0131m 2011\u2019de Adnan Menderes Havaliman\u0131 \u0130\u00e7 Hatlar Terminali\u2019nin yenilenmesi, i\u00e7in bir ihale a\u00e7\u0131ld\u0131. Yeni terminalin temeli 15 Haziran 2012\u2019de at\u0131ld\u0131.\nEski d\u0131\u015f hatlar terminali yenilenerek 11 May\u0131s 2017\u2018den sonra i\u00e7 hatlar terminali olarak hizmet vermeye ba\u015flad\u0131.\n\u0130\u00e7 Hatlar Terminali yeni terminal in\u015faat\u0131 \u00e7er\u00e7evesinde y\u0131k\u0131ld\u0131 ve 1 Ocak 2012\u2019den itibaren D\u0131\u015f Hatlar terminali ortak kullan\u0131lma a\u00e7\u0131ld\u0131.\n2014 Y\u0131l\u0131nda Hizmete Giren Yeni \u0130\u00e7 Hatlar Terminali Binas\u0131n\u0131n A\u00e7\u0131l\u0131\u015f T\u00f6reninde Konu\u015fan Erdo\u011fan\u2019\u0131n S\u00f6zleri \n\u201cY\u0131lda 20 milyon yolcu kapasitesi ile hizmet verecek \u015fu muhte\u015fem terminal binas\u0131 g\u00fczel \u0130zmir\u2019e yak\u0131\u015fan \u0130zmir\u2019i temsil eden bir eser oldu. Gerek d\u0131\u015f gerek i\u00e7 hatlar binas\u0131 \u015fu iki tesis yap\u0131lmadan \u00f6nce buradaki \u0130zmir havaliman\u0131n\u0131n binas\u0131n\u0131 bir d\u00fc\u015f\u00fcn\u00fcn. Acaba bu g\u00fczel \u0130zmir\u2019e \u00f6yle bir havaliman\u0131 yak\u0131\u015f\u0131yor muydu? Nereden geliyor nereden \u00e7\u0131k\u0131yorduk adeta bir gecekondu gibi. Biz buna tahamm\u00fcl edemedik. Dedik ki; \u2018Hemen bir ad\u0131m atal\u0131m.\u2019 Yeni bir kaynak meydana getirmek suretiyle bir ad\u0131m att\u0131k. D\u0131\u015f hatlar binas\u0131ndan ba\u015flamak \u00fczere \u00f6nce 110 bin metrekarelik kapal\u0131 alana sahip terminal binas\u0131 yapt\u0131k. O bize yetmezdi, mevcut gecekonduyu y\u0131kmam\u0131z gerekiyordu. \u015eu anda \u00e7at\u0131s\u0131 alt\u0131nda bulundu\u011fumuz yakla\u015f\u0131k d\u0131\u015f hatlar binas\u0131n\u0131n 2 kat\u0131 b\u00fcy\u00fckl\u00fc\u011f\u00fcndeki binay\u0131 bitirmi\u015f olduk. Burada huzuru, refah\u0131 g\u00f6r\u00fcyorsunuz. Bizim iktidar\u0131n\u0131z huzur, mutluluk iktidar\u0131d\u0131r. Laf \u00fcretmedik, icraat \u00fcrettik. Buras\u0131n\u0131n mimar\u0131 bir T\u00fcrk; ayr\u0131ca gurur vesilesi. Laf de\u011fil hizmet \u00fcretme \u015fiar\u0131m\u0131z\u0131n en somut \u00fcretme \u00f6rne\u011fi olan Binali bey\u2019 \u00e7al\u0131\u015fmalar\u0131nda ba\u015far\u0131lar diliyorum. Huzurlu g\u00fcveni keyifli yolculuklar diliyorum.\u201d\nS\u00fcrekli Yenilenen \u0130zmir Adnan Menderes Havaliman\u0131\u2019n\u0131n \u00d6zellikleri\nToplam 30 milyon yolcuya rahatl\u0131kla hizmet verebiliyor.\nT\u00fcrkiye\u2019nin en b\u00fcy\u00fck i\u00e7 hatlar terminali; 210 bin metrekare kapal\u0131 alana sahip.\n\u0130\u00e7 hatlar terminalinin tek ba\u015f\u0131na kapasitesi 20 milyon yolcu.\nD\u0131\u015f hatlar terminali ise 110 bin metrekare ve y\u0131lda 10 milyon yolcu kullan\u0131yor.\n\u0130ZBAN ve karayollar\u0131na ba\u011flant\u0131 var.\nAlt-\u00fcst yollar\u0131, yolcu gidi\u015f, yolcu geli\u015f, VIP, CIP i\u00e7 d\u0131\u015f hatlarda toplam 17 k\u00f6pr\u00fc var.\nOtopark kapasitesi 5 bin 500.\n\u015eehir merkezine 18 kilometre uzakl\u0131kta.\n21 bin 319 metrekarek kargo terminali\n\u0130ki adet 3240\u00d745 metre ebatlar\u0131nda pist\n37 adet u\u00e7ak park yeri olan iki apron bulunuyor.\nAdnan Menderes Havaliman\u0131 yolcu say\u0131s\u0131 4 kat artm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r.\nD\u0131\u015f hatlar terminali 140 milyon euro yat\u0131r\u0131mla, i\u00e7 hatlar terminali 245 milyon euro yat\u0131r\u0131mla yenilenmi\u015ftir.\n8 bin metrekarelik otopark\nToplam 2 bin 353 metrekareye yay\u0131lan ma\u011fazalar\n2537 aral\u0131k kapal\u0131 otopark ve 3 bin ara\u00e7l\u0131k a\u00e7\u0131k otopark\n107 bin 699 metrekare b\u00fcy\u00fckl\u00fckte d\u0131\u015f hatlar terminali\n64 check-in kontuar\u0131\n40 asans\u00f6r\n30 y\u00fcr\u00fcyen merdiven ve 666 metre y\u00fcr\u00fcyen bant\nSaatte 5 bin bagaj kapasitesi\n291 bin 267 metrekare toplam in\u015faat alan\u0131\nS\u00fcrekli yenileme projeleri kapsam\u0131nda, Ak Parti iktidar\u0131 boyunca Adnan Menderes Havaliman\u0131\u2019nda yap\u0131lan de\u011fi\u015fikliklere bak\u0131ld\u0131\u011f\u0131nda, Erdo\u011fan\u2019\u0131n mitingde s\u00f6yledi\u011fi \u201cKarde\u015flerim. Yahu bundan 15 sene \u00f6nce, ah karde\u015flerim ahh. \u015eu koskaca \u0130zmir\u2019in do\u011fru d\u00fcr\u00fcst bir havaliman\u0131 var m\u0131yd\u0131? Ya biz geldik, Adnan Menderes Havaliman\u0131\u2019n\u0131 yapt\u0131k ya.\u201d s\u00f6zlerini neden s\u00f6yledi\u011fi daha net bir \u015fekilde ortaya \u00e7\u0131kmaktad\u0131r.\n\u00d6zkan\u2019\u0131n s\u00f6zleri k\u0131smen do\u011frudur ancak Ak Parti D\u00f6neminde havaliman\u0131n\u0131n yolcu kapasitesi 2 kat\u0131na \u00e7\u0131kar\u0131lm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r; 10 milyon yolcu kapasitesi olan i\u00e7 hatlar terminalinin yolcu kapasitesi 20 milyon olmu\u015ftur. 1987 y\u0131l\u0131nda yap\u0131lan havaliman\u0131 talebi kar\u015f\u0131lamad\u0131\u011f\u0131 ve k\u00fc\u00e7\u00fck oldu\u011fu i\u00e7in par\u00e7a par\u00e7a y\u0131k\u0131larak yeniden yap\u0131lm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r. Son derece modern hale getirilerek Ak Parti yenileme \u00e7al\u0131\u015fmalar\u0131yla pek \u00e7ok \u00f6d\u00fcl alm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r.\nHavaliman\u0131n\u0131 yenileme kapsam\u0131nda ba\u015flat\u0131lan \u00e7al\u0131\u015fmayla ilgili yap\u0131lan haberde de g\u00f6r\u00fclece\u011fi \u00fczere, \u0130zmir Adnan Menderes Havaliman\u0131\u2019n\u0131n \u201ck\u00f6hne g\u00f6r\u00fcn\u00fcm\u00fcnden \u00e7\u0131kar\u0131lmas\u0131\u201d planlanmaktayd\u0131.\nResmi A\u00e7\u0131klamalar ve \u0130statistiklerle Kapasite Art\u0131\u015f\u0131 ve Yenileme G\u00f6stergeleri\nVerilere bakt\u0131\u011f\u0131m\u0131z zaman, Erdo\u011fan\u2019\u0131n da s\u00f6zlerinde kasttetti\u011fi gibi, \u0130zmir Adnan Menderes Havaliman\u0131\u2019n\u0131n Ak Parti d\u00f6neminde s\u00fcrekli bir yenileme ve iyile\u015ftirme projeleriyle neredeyse yeniden in\u015fa edildi\u011fi g\u00f6r\u00fclmektedir.\n2003 y\u0131l\u0131nda sivil havac\u0131l\u0131\u011f\u0131n etkinle\u015ftirilmesi y\u00f6n\u00fcnden al\u0131nm\u0131\u015f olan kararlar ve at\u0131lan ad\u0131mlar\u0131n, \u00e7al\u0131\u015fma \u00f6zelinde incelenen \u0130zmir Adnan Menderes Havaalan\u0131 verileri do\u011frultusunda olumlu sonu\u00e7 verdi\u011fi s\u00f6ylenebilir.\n2000 y\u0131l\u0131nda 2,5 milyon olan ta\u015f\u0131ma kapasitesi, 2017 y\u0131l\u0131nda 12,8 milyon olmu\u015ftur.\n\u0130zmir Adnan Menderes Havaliman\u0131 Yolcu \u0130statistikleri\n\u0130zmir Havaliman\u0131\u2019n\u0131n web sitesinde yap\u0131lan a\u00e7\u0131klamada da bu de\u011fi\u015fim net bir \u015fekilde g\u00f6r\u00fclmektedir.\n\u201cD\u00f6nemin \u015fartlar\u0131na uygun olarak in\u015fa edilen havaliman\u0131m\u0131zda ilerleyen y\u0131llarda \u00f6zel havayolu \u015firketlerinin kurulmas\u0131 ve u\u00e7u\u015flar\u0131na ba\u015flamas\u0131 nedeniyle terminal ve apron kapasite yetersizli\u011fi kendini g\u00f6stermeye ba\u015flad\u0131. Bu ba\u011flamda yeni d\u0131\u015f hatlar terminali, i\u00e7 hatlar terminali ve ilave apron yap\u0131m\u0131yla s\u00f6z konusu s\u0131k\u0131nt\u0131lar a\u015f\u0131lm\u0131\u015f oldu. Web sayfam\u0131z istatistikler b\u00f6l\u00fcm\u00fcnden de anla\u015f\u0131laca\u011f\u0131 \u00fczere her ge\u00e7en y\u0131l art\u0131\u015f g\u00f6steren u\u00e7ak ve yolcu trafi\u011fine paralel olarak ortaya \u00e7\u0131kan ve \u00e7\u0131kabilecek s\u0131k\u0131nt\u0131lar\u0131 giderebilmek amac\u0131yla \u00e7al\u0131\u015fmalar halen devam etmektedir.\u201d\nAdnan Menderes Havaliman\u0131\u2019n\u0131n 2002 ve 2017 Y\u0131llar\u0131na Ait Uydu G\u00f6r\u00fcnt\u00fcleri\n2002 ve 2017 y\u0131llar\u0131na ait olan uydu g\u00f6r\u00fcnt\u00fcleri kar\u015f\u0131la\u015ft\u0131r\u0131ld\u0131\u011f\u0131na, havaliman\u0131na eklenen binalar\u0131 ve geni\u015flemeyi g\u00f6rmek m\u00fcmk\u00fcn.\nAdnan Menderes Havaliman\u0131 2002 y\u0131l\u0131 uydu g\u00f6r\u00fcnt\u00fcs\u00fc\nTerminal ve bina say\u0131lar\u0131 artm\u0131\u015f g\u00f6r\u00fcn\u00fcyor;\nAdnan Menderes Havaliman\u0131 2017 y\u0131l\u0131 uydu g\u00f6r\u00fcnt\u00fcs\u00fc\nDaha yak\u0131ndan bakacak olursak;\nAdnan Menderes Havaliman\u0131 2018 y\u0131l\u0131 uydu g\u00f6r\u00fcnt\u00fcs\u00fc\nKaynaklar: twitter, h\u00fcrriyet, arkitera, wikipedia, tepeinsaat, hurarsiv, youtube, youtube2\nadnanmenderesairport, adnanmenderesdhmi, deu.edu, googleearth, TAV\nVideo oynat\u0131c\u0131\nhttps://dogrula.org/wp-content/uploads/2018/02/dogrula.org_.mp4\n00:00\n00:07\n[Toplam:8    Ortalama:4.9/5] Adnan Menderes Havaliman\u0131 Ak Parti D\u00f6neminde Yap\u0131lmad\u0131 \u0130ddias\u0131", "Suriyeli \u0130\u015f Adam\u0131n\u0131n Milletvekili Aday\u0131 Se\u00e7ildi\u011fi \u0130ddias\u0131 ba\u015fl\u0131kl\u0131 i\u00e7eri\u011fimizde, son g\u00fcnlerde sosyal medyada tepki \u00e7eken ve baz\u0131 medya organlar\u0131nda haber yap\u0131lan bir iddiaya g\u00f6re Suriyeli olan Muhammed Erdo\u011fan isimli bir i\u015f adam\u0131n\u0131n Ak Parti\u2019den milletvekili aday\u0131 olup olmad\u0131\u011f\u0131n\u0131 ele ald\u0131k. T\u00fcrk vatanda\u015fl\u0131\u011f\u0131 olan Suriyeli i\u015f adam\u0131 Muhammed Erdo\u011fan\u2019\u0131n, milletvekili aday\u0131 olarak se\u00e7ildi\u011fi iddias\u0131 do\u011fru de\u011fildir. \u0130\u015f adam\u0131 Erdo\u011fan, aday adayl\u0131\u011f\u0131 ba\u015fvurusu yapm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r.\nSosyal medyada \u00e7ok etkile\u015fim alan 27 Nisan 2018 tarihli a\u015fa\u011f\u0131daki payla\u015f\u0131ma g\u00f6re Muhammed Erdo\u011fan\u2018\u0131n Ak Parti\u2019den milletvekili aday\u0131 oldu\u011fu iddia edilmi\u015ftir. Ancak milletvekili aday adayl\u0131\u011f\u0131 ba\u015fvurular\u0131n\u0131n 2 May\u0131s 2018 tarihinde sona erecektir. Bu sebeple adaylar hen\u00fcz kesinle\u015fmemi\u015ftir. Ba\u015fvuru tarihleri bittikten sonra, partilerin adaylar\u0131n\u0131 tek tek de\u011ferlendirerek a\u00e7\u0131klayaca\u011f\u0131 tarihe kadar milletvekili adaylar\u0131 net bir \u015fekilde belli de\u011fildir. \nMilletvekili Olma \u015eartlar\u0131\nMilletvekili olmak i\u00e7in baz\u0131 \u015fartlar Anayasam\u0131z\u0131n 76. maddesinde belirlenmi\u015ftir. Buna g\u00f6re,\n18 ya\u015f\u0131n\u0131 doldurmu\u015f olmak,\nT\u00fcrkiye Cumhuriyeti vatanda\u015f\u0131 olmak,\nEn az ilkokul mezunu olmak,\nAskerlik hizmetini yapm\u0131\u015f olmak,\nK\u0131s\u0131tl\u0131 olmamak,\nKamu hizmetlerinden yasakl\u0131 olmamak,\nTaksirli su\u00e7lar hari\u00e7, toplam bir y\u0131l veya daha fazla hapis ile a\u011f\u0131r hapis cezas\u0131 almam\u0131\u015f olmak,\nY\u00fcz k\u0131zart\u0131c\u0131 su\u00e7 i\u015flememi\u015f olmak; ka\u00e7ak\u00e7\u0131l\u0131k, resmi ihale ile al\u0131m sat\u0131mlara fesat kar\u0131\u015ft\u0131rmam\u0131\u015f olmak,\nDevlet s\u0131rlar\u0131n\u0131 a\u00e7\u0131\u011fa vurma, ideolojik veya anar\u015fik eylemlere kat\u0131l\u0131p bu su\u00e7lardan birinden h\u00fck\u00fcm giymemi\u015f olmak.\nBu \u015fartlar\u0131 yerine getiren her T\u00fcrk vatanda\u015f\u0131 siyasi partiden aday olabilir ya da ba\u011f\u0131ms\u0131z aday olarak se\u00e7ime kat\u0131labilir.\nMuhammed Erdo\u011fan isimli Suriyeli i\u015f adam\u0131n\u0131n, milletvekili olma \u015fartlar\u0131ndan \u201cT\u00fcrk vatanda\u015f\u0131 olmak\u201d ko\u015fulunu sa\u011flay\u0131p sa\u011flamad\u0131\u011f\u0131, iddiaya y\u00f6nelik gelen tepkiler aras\u0131ndad\u0131r. Ancak Muhammed Erdo\u011fan T\u00fcrkiye\u2019ye uzun s\u00fcre \u00f6nce gelmi\u015f ve T\u00fcrkiye Cumhuriyeti vatanda\u015f\u0131 olmak i\u00e7in aranan ko\u015fullar\u0131 yerine getirmi\u015f ve vatanda\u015fl\u0131\u011fa hak kazanm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r.\nMuhammed Erdo\u011fan Kimdir?\n\u0130\u015f adam\u0131 Erdo\u011fan\u2019a telefonla ula\u015fmam\u0131z sonucunda, kendisinin Suriye\u2019deki \u00e7at\u0131\u015fmalardan ka\u00e7arak 2012 y\u0131l\u0131nda Bursa\u2019ya yerle\u015fti\u011fi ve yerle\u015ftikten bir s\u00fcre sonra T\u00fcrkiye Cumhuriyeti vatanda\u015f\u0131 oldu\u011fu bilgisini ald\u0131k. Buna g\u00f6re, milletvekili adayl\u0131\u011f\u0131 i\u00e7in gereken \u015fartlar\u0131 sa\u011flayan Muhammed Erdo\u011fan, Bursa\u2018dan Ak Parti milletvekili aday adayl\u0131\u011f\u0131 i\u00e7in ba\u015fvuru yapm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r.\nM\u00fclteci olmad\u0131\u011f\u0131 ve y\u0131llard\u0131r T\u00fcrkiye\u2019de i\u015f adam\u0131 oldu\u011fu beyan edilen i\u015f adam\u0131n\u0131n, Muhammed El \u015eeyhuni olan ismini, T\u00fcrk vatanda\u015f\u0131 olduktan sonra Muhammed Erdo\u011fan olarak de\u011fi\u015ftirdi\u011fi bildirilmi\u015ftir.\nBir haber sitesinin 2012 y\u0131l\u0131nda yapt\u0131\u011f\u0131 haberde de g\u00f6r\u00fclece\u011fi \u00fczere, Suriyeli i\u015f adam\u0131, Hama kentindeki \u00e7at\u0131\u015fmalardan ka\u00e7arak T\u00fcrkiye\u2018ye gelmi\u015ftir. 1984 do\u011fumlu bir i\u00e7 mimar olan Erdo\u011fan, Suriye\u2019de kendi kurdu\u011fu turizm \u015firketini 2012 y\u0131l\u0131nda T\u00fcrkiye\u2019de a\u00e7m\u0131\u015ft\u0131r.\nAk Parti\u2019nin milletvekili aday adaylar\u0131 i\u00e7in haz\u0131rlad\u0131\u011f\u0131 se\u00e7im k\u0131lavuzundaki bro\u015f\u00fcrde ise, milletvekili adaylar\u0131n\u0131n kullanacaklar\u0131 afi\u015fler, kartvizitler ve sosyal medya \u015fablonlar\u0131n\u0131n nas\u0131l olaca\u011f\u0131 a\u00e7\u0131klanm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r. K\u0131lavuzdaki \u015fablonlar\u0131n arka plan renkleri mavi veya k\u0131rm\u0131z\u0131 olarak belirlenmi\u015f olup, iddiada payla\u015f\u0131lan sar\u0131 arka planl\u0131 g\u00f6rsel ile a\u015fa\u011f\u0131da adaylar i\u00e7in belirtilen \u015fablonlar\u0131n arka planlar\u0131 ve stilleriyle de uyu\u015fmamaktad\u0131r. \nDolay\u0131s\u0131yla Muhammed Erdo\u011fan\u2019\u0131n milletvekili aday\u0131 oldu\u011fu iddias\u0131yla payla\u015f\u0131lan g\u00f6rselin, Ak Parti\u2019nin a\u00e7\u0131klad\u0131\u011f\u0131 k\u0131lavuzdaki \u015fablonlarla ayn\u0131 olmad\u0131\u011f\u0131 g\u00f6r\u00fclmektedir.\nBursa yerel gazetelerinden birinin haberine g\u00f6re ise, Bursa\u2019dan Ak Parti milletvekili aday aday\u0131 olarak ba\u015fvuranlar\u0131n resmi olmayan listesi yay\u0131mlanm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r. Bu listede ise, Suriyeli i\u015f adam\u0131 Muhammed Erdo\u011fan\u2019\u0131n ismi, milletvekili aday\u0131 olarak de\u011fil, aday adayl\u0131\u011f\u0131na ba\u015fvuran ki\u015filerin aras\u0131nda ge\u00e7mektedir.\nKaynaklar: TBMM, NTV, Twitter, haberler.com, akadayadaylari.com, muhammederdogan.com, cumhuriyet.com.tr, lodoshaber.com, Bas\u0131n \u0130lan Kurumu\nVideo oynat\u0131c\u0131\n00:00\n00:00\n1. \u201cdogrula.org\u201d\n0:07\n[Toplam:5    Ortalama:4.8/5] Suriyeli \u0130\u015f Adam\u0131n\u0131n Ak Parti Milletvekili Aday\u0131 Se\u00e7ildi\u011fi \u0130ddias\u0131", "\u201cTutuklu Halime G\u00fclsu\u2019nun \u0130la\u00e7lar\u0131 Verilmedi\u011fi \u0130\u00e7in \u00d6ld\u00fc\u011f\u00fc \u0130ddias\u0131\u201d ba\u015fl\u0131kl\u0131 i\u00e7eri\u011fimizde, \u201csilahl\u0131 ter\u00f6r \u00f6rg\u00fct\u00fcne \u00fcye olma\u201d su\u00e7undan dolay\u0131 tutuklanan Halime G\u00fclsu isimli \u015fahs\u0131n, ila\u00e7lar\u0131n\u0131n verilmemesi sebebiyle \u00f6ld\u00fc\u011f\u00fc iddias\u0131n\u0131 inceledik. S\u00f6z konusu iddia DO\u011eRU DE\u011e\u0130LD\u0130R.\nSosyal medyada ve baz\u0131 haber sitelerinde, Halime G\u00fclsu isimli tutuklu \u015fahs\u0131n, hastal\u0131\u011f\u0131 dolay\u0131s\u0131yla almas\u0131 gereken ila\u00e7lar\u0131n\u0131n ceza infaz kurumundayken verilmemesi sebebiyle \u00f6ld\u00fc\u011f\u00fc iddias\u0131 g\u00fcndeme gelmi\u015ftir. Bunun \u00fczerine Halime G\u00fclsu hakk\u0131ndaki iddia ile ilgili olarak Tarsus Cumhuriyet Ba\u015fsavc\u0131l\u0131\u011f\u0131 28.04.2018 tarihinde bas\u0131n a\u00e7\u0131klamas\u0131 yapm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r.\nA\u00e7\u0131klamaya g\u00f6re;\nMersin 4. Sulh Ceza Hakimli\u011fince 03.03.2018 tarihinde \u201csilahl\u0131 ter\u00f6r \u00f6rg\u00fct\u00fcne \u00fcye olma\u201d su\u00e7undan tutuklanan Halime G\u00fclsu, ayn\u0131 tarihte Tarsus Kad\u0131n Kapal\u0131 Ceza \u0130nfaz Kurumuna al\u0131nm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r. Beraberinde getirmi\u015f oldu\u011fu ila\u00e7lar ise kurum doktoru taraf\u0131ndan kontrol edilmi\u015f ve bir g\u00fcn sonra kendisine teslim edilmi\u015ftir.\n14.03.2018 tarihinde kurumun aile hekimi taraf\u0131ndan tutuklunun muayenesi yap\u0131lm\u0131\u015f ve Tarsus Devlet Hastanesi Dahiliye Poliklini\u011fi\u2019ne sevk edilmi\u015ftir.\n16.03.2018 tarihinde, Tarsus Devlet Hastanesi Dahiliye Poliklini\u011finde yap\u0131lan muayenesi sonucu, tutuklunun SLE (Sisitemik Lupus Eritematozus) kontrol\u00fc yap\u0131lm\u0131\u015f ve kan tetkiki verilmi\u015ftir.\n17.03.2018 tarihinde tutuklu rahats\u0131zlanm\u0131\u015f ve bunun \u00fczerine 112 acil ambulans ekibi \u00e7a\u011fr\u0131lm\u0131\u015f ve tedavisi yapt\u0131r\u0131lm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r. Kullanm\u0131\u015f oldu\u011fu ila\u00e7lar\u0131n bitmesi sonucu yenisi temin edilmi\u015f ve kendisine teslim edilmi\u015ftir. Yine de karde\u015finin kuruma getirdi\u011fi ila\u00e7lar da al\u0131nm\u0131\u015f ve tutukluya teslim edilmi\u015ftir.\n11.04.2018 tarihinde, kurum aile hekimi taraf\u0131ndan yap\u0131lan muayene sonucu re\u00e7ete d\u00fczenlenmi\u015f ve tutuklu Tarsus Devlet Hastanesi Dahiliye Poliklini\u011fi\u2019ne sevk edilmi\u015ftir.\n16.04.2018 tarihinde, Tarsus Devlet Hastanesi Dahiliye Poliklini\u011fi\u2019ndeki tedavisi sonucu tutuklunun, Mersin Devlet Hastanesi Romatoloji Poliklini\u011fi\u2019ne g\u00f6nderilmesine karar verilmi\u015f ve tutuklu sevk edilmi\u015ftir.\n25.04.2018 tarihinde, tutuklunun Mersin \u015eehir Hastanesi Romatoloji Poliklini\u011fi\u2019nde muayene ve tetkikleri yap\u0131lm\u0131\u015f ve \u201cSonu\u00e7lar\u0131 ile tekrar kontrol uygundur.\u201d notu yaz\u0131lm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r.\n27.04.2018 g\u00fcn\u00fc saat 22:47\u2019de Halime G\u00fclsu isimli tutuklu rahats\u0131zlanm\u0131\u015f ve bunun \u00fczerine 112 acil ekibi kuruma \u00e7a\u011fr\u0131lm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r. Yap\u0131lan muayene sonucu tutuklu, saat 23:31\u2019de kurumdan \u00e7\u0131kart\u0131lm\u0131\u015f ve Tarsus Devlet Hastanesi Ana Bina Acil Poliklini\u011fi\u2019ne sevk edilmi\u015ftir. Halime G\u00fclsu, Tarsus Devlet Hastanesi Acil Poliklini\u011fi\u2019nde saat 00:24\u2019te muayeneye al\u0131nm\u0131\u015f, tetkik ve tedavisi yap\u0131lm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r. Daha sonra kuruma d\u00f6nmek \u00fczere ring arac\u0131na al\u0131nm\u0131\u015f, ancak ara\u00e7ta tekrar rahats\u0131zland\u0131\u011f\u0131 i\u00e7in ara\u00e7 hareket etmeden yeniden acil servise g\u00f6t\u00fcr\u00fclm\u00fc\u015ft\u00fcr. Halime G\u00fclsu, saat 03.10\u2019da vefat etmi\u015f olup, \u00f6l\u00fcm sebebi olarak eldeki bulgulara g\u00f6re kalp krizi oldu\u011fu doktor taraf\u0131ndan belirtilmi\u015ftir. Yine de n\u00f6bet\u00e7i Cumhuriyet Savc\u0131s\u0131 taraf\u0131ndan \u00f6l\u00fc muayene i\u015flemi yap\u0131larak klasik otopsi i\u015flemi i\u00e7in Adana Adli T\u0131p Kurumuna g\u00f6nderilmi\u015ftir. Olayla ilgili olarak adli ve idari soru\u015fturma da ba\u015flat\u0131lm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r.\n(A\u00e7\u0131klaman\u0131n orijinal metnine ula\u015fmak i\u00e7in buraya t\u0131klayabilirsiniz.)\nAdana Cumhuriyet Ba\u015fsavc\u0131l\u0131\u011f\u0131 taraf\u0131ndan tutulan otopsi tutana\u011f\u0131 ise a\u015fa\u011f\u0131da yer almaktad\u0131r. Buna g\u00f6re standart prosed\u00fcre uygun olarak tetkik i\u00e7in gerekli \u00f6rnekler al\u0131nm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r ve ayr\u0131nt\u0131l\u0131 rapor haz\u0131rlanacakt\u0131r.\nKaynaklar: tarsus.adalet.gov.tr, s\u00f6zc\u00fc, aa, twitter\nVideo oynat\u0131c\u0131\nhttps://dogrula.org/wp-content/uploads/2018/02/dogrula.org_.mp4\n00:00\n00:07\n[Toplam:5    Ortalama:5/5] Tutuklu Halime G\u00fclsu\u2019nun \u0130la\u00e7lar\u0131 Verilmedi\u011fi \u0130\u00e7in \u00d6ld\u00fc\u011f\u00fc \u0130ddias\u0131", "Futbolculardan Al\u0131nan Vergi Kul\u00fcplere \u0130ade Ediliyor \u0130ddias\u0131 ba\u015fl\u0131kl\u0131 yaz\u0131m\u0131zda, bir Twitter kullan\u0131c\u0131s\u0131n\u0131n sosyal medyada payla\u015f\u0131p \u00e7ok say\u0131da etkile\u015fim ald\u0131\u011f\u0131 konuyu ara\u015ft\u0131rd\u0131k.\nSuna Varol (@SunaVarol_) adl\u0131 Twitter kullan\u0131c\u0131s\u0131 hesab\u0131nda yapt\u0131\u011f\u0131 bir payla\u015f\u0131mda, \u00fclkelere g\u00f6re futbolcular\u0131n \u00f6dedi\u011fi vergi oranlar\u0131n\u0131 yazm\u0131\u015f, T\u00fcrkiye\u2019de bu oran\u0131n %0 oldu\u011funu iddia etmi\u015ftir. Hesap ayr\u0131ca, futbolculardan %15 vergi al\u0131nd\u0131\u011f\u0131n\u0131 ancak bu verginin kul\u00fcplere iade edildi\u011fini yazm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r.\nS\u00f6z konusu payla\u015f\u0131mda yer alan, \u201cT\u00fcrkiye\u2019de futbolcular\u0131n %0 vergi verdi\u011fi\u201d iddias\u0131 ger\u00e7e\u011fi yans\u0131tmamakla birlikte; ayn\u0131 payla\u015f\u0131mda bulunan \u201cal\u0131nan %15 verginin kul\u00fcplere iade edildi\u011fi\u201d iddias\u0131 k\u0131smen do\u011frudur.\n\u015e\u00f6yle ki, iddiada yer alan\u0131n aksine futbolcular %15 vergi \u00f6demektedir ve ilgili kanunda yap\u0131lan de\u011fi\u015fikli\u011fe g\u00f6re, futbolculardan kesilen vergiler AMAT\u00d6R BRAN\u015eLARA HARCANMASI \u0130\u00c7\u0130N kul\u00fcplere geri iade edilecektir.\nCumhurba\u015fkan\u0131 Recep Tayyip Erdo\u011fan\u2019\u0131n onaylam\u0131\u015f oldu\u011fu ve Resmi Gazete\u2019de yay\u0131nlanan 7103 say\u0131l\u0131 \u201cVergi Kanunlar\u0131 ile Baz\u0131 Kanun ve Kanun H\u00fckm\u00fcnde Kararnamelerde De\u011fi\u015fiklik Yap\u0131lmas\u0131 Hakk\u0131nda Kanun\u201da g\u00f6re, futbolculardan kesilen gelir vergilerinin amat\u00f6r bran\u015flara harcanmas\u0131 i\u00e7in kul\u00fcplere geri iade edilmesine karar verilmi\u015ftir.\nKanunda Yap\u0131lan De\u011fi\u015fiklik\n(\u0130lgili b\u00f6l\u00fcmler al\u0131nm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r. Metnin tamam\u0131na buradan ula\u015fabilirsiniz.)\nMADDE 35\u2013 21/5/1986 tarihli ve 3289 say\u0131l\u0131 Spor Genel M\u00fcd\u00fcrl\u00fc\u011f\u00fcn\u00fcn Te\u015fkilat ve G\u00f6revleri Hakk\u0131nda Kanuna a\u015fa\u011f\u0131daki ek madde eklenmi\u015ftir.\n\u201cSporcu \u00fccretlerinden tevkif yoluyla al\u0131nan gelir vergisinin iadesi\u201d\nEK MADDE 12\u2013 Spor Genel M\u00fcd\u00fcrl\u00fc\u011f\u00fc, T\u00fcrkiye Futbol Federasyonu ve ba\u011f\u0131ms\u0131z spor federasyonlar\u0131na tescil edilmi\u015f olan ve T\u00fcrkiye\u2019de faaliyette bulunan spor kul\u00fcpleri ve sportif alanda faaliyette bulunan sermaye \u015firketleri taraf\u0131ndan sporculara \u00f6denen \u00fccretlerden tevkif edilerek ilgili vergi dairesine kanuni s\u00fcresinde beyan edilen ve \u00f6denen gelir vergisi tutarlar\u0131, ilgili i\u015fverence T\u00fcrkiye\u2019de kurulu bankalarda a\u00e7\u0131lm\u0131\u015f olan \u00f6zel hesaplara, \u00f6demeyi takip eden be\u015f i\u015f g\u00fcn\u00fc i\u00e7inde ilgili vergi dairesi taraf\u0131ndan 4/1/1961 tarihli ve 213 say\u0131l\u0131 Vergi Usul Kanunu h\u00fck\u00fcmlerine g\u00f6re, bu maddenin d\u00f6rd\u00fcnc\u00fc f\u0131kras\u0131 kapsam\u0131ndaki alacaklar hari\u00e7, 21/7/1953 tarihli ve 6183 say\u0131l\u0131 Amme Alacaklar\u0131n\u0131n Tahsil Usul\u00fc Hakk\u0131nda Kanunun 23 \u00fcnc\u00fc maddesi h\u00fckm\u00fc uygulanmaks\u0131z\u0131n red ve iade edilir.\n\u00d6zel hesaba aktar\u0131lan tutarlar a\u015fa\u011f\u0131daki harcamalar d\u0131\u015f\u0131nda kullan\u0131lamaz.\na) Amat\u00f6r spor dallar\u0131nda sportif faaliyet g\u00f6steren sporculara, bunlar\u0131n \u00e7al\u0131\u015ft\u0131r\u0131c\u0131lar\u0131na ve di\u011fer spor elemanlar\u0131na yap\u0131lan \u00fccret ve \u00fccret say\u0131lan \u00f6demeler (Bu hesaptan yap\u0131lan \u00f6deme, her bir sporcu, \u00e7al\u0131\u015ft\u0131r\u0131c\u0131 ve di\u011fer spor elemanlar\u0131 i\u00e7in y\u0131ll\u0131k olarak 31/12/1960 tarihli ve 193 say\u0131l\u0131 Gelir Vergisi Kanununun 103 \u00fcnc\u00fc maddesinde yaz\u0131l\u0131 tarifenin \u00fc\u00e7\u00fcnc\u00fc gelir diliminde yer alan ve ilgili y\u0131lda \u00fccretler i\u00e7in ge\u00e7erli olan tutar\u0131n \u00fc\u00e7 kat\u0131n\u0131 a\u015famaz.),\nb) Bu f\u0131kran\u0131n (a) bendi kapsam\u0131ndaki sporcu, \u00e7al\u0131\u015ft\u0131r\u0131c\u0131lar ve di\u011fer spor elemanlar\u0131n\u0131n, sportif faaliyetlerine ili\u015fkin ia\u015fe, ibate, seyahat, sa\u011fl\u0131k, e\u011fitim-\u00f6\u011fretim harcamalar\u0131 ile amat\u00f6r spor dallar\u0131na ili\u015fkin haz\u0131rl\u0131k kamplar\u0131, m\u00fcsabaka, malzeme ve ekipman, federasyon vize, lisans, tescil ve kat\u0131l\u0131m harcamalar\u0131.\n\u00d6zel hesaba aktar\u0131lan iade tutarlar\u0131 ile bu hesaptan yap\u0131lan harcamalar, gelir ve kurumlar vergisi uygulamalar\u0131nda gelir, gider, indirim veya maliyet olarak dikkate al\u0131namaz.\n\u00d6zel hesaptan ama\u00e7 d\u0131\u015f\u0131 kullan\u0131lan vergi iadeleri, ama\u00e7 d\u0131\u015f\u0131 kullan\u0131ld\u0131\u011f\u0131 vergilendirme d\u00f6nemine ili\u015fkin gelir (stopaj) vergisi olarak \u00f6zel hesap a\u00e7\u0131lan m\u00fckellef ad\u0131na 213 say\u0131l\u0131 Kanundaki esaslara g\u00f6re vergi ziya\u0131 cezas\u0131 kesilerek tarh edilir ve gecikme faizi hesaplan\u0131r.\nilgili kanun\nD\u00fcnyada Futbolculardan Al\u0131nan Vergi Oranlar\u0131\nS\u00f6z konusu iddiada yer alan, d\u00fcnyada futbolculardan al\u0131nan vergi oranlar\u0131 da tam olarak ger\u00e7ek verileri sunmamaktad\u0131r.\n\u00dclkelerin futbolculardan ald\u0131klar\u0131 vergi oranlar\u0131 \u015fu \u015fekildedir:\n\u0130sve\u00e7: %59\nPortekiz: %56,5\n\u0130spanya: %56\nFransa: %49\nAvusturya: %50\n\u0130talya: %46,2\nAlmanya: %47,4\n\u0130ngiltere: %45\nT\u00fcrkiye: %15\nVergi oran\u0131 neden d\u00fc\u015f\u00fck?
