Ard\u0131ndan, Nev\u015fin Meng\u00fc\u2019n\u00fcn beyan\u0131na g\u00f6re, emniyet m\u00fcd\u00fcr\u00fc taraf\u0131ndan kendisine, herhangi bir g\u00f6zalt\u0131 karar\u0131 olmad\u0131\u011f\u0131n\u0131 ve olayla ilgilenilece\u011fi s\u00f6ylenmi\u015ftir.\nBurak Meng\u00fc\u2019n\u00fcn olayla ilgili yapt\u0131\u011f\u0131 payla\u015f\u0131m\u0131ndan 3 g\u00fcn sonra yani 20 Mart Sal\u0131 g\u00fcn\u00fcn\u00fcn ilk saatlerinde Nev\u015fin Meng\u00fc, iddiay\u0131 yaz\u0131s\u0131na ta\u015f\u0131d\u0131. Karde\u015finin kemerle d\u00f6v\u00fcld\u00fc\u011f\u00fcnden ve darp edilerek Dudullu civar\u0131na b\u0131rak\u0131ld\u0131\u011f\u0131ndan bahseden yaz\u0131s\u0131nda, s\u00f6z konusu iddiay\u0131 \u015fu \u015fekilde dile getirdi:\n\u201cBurak cumartesi \u00f6\u011fleden sonra bana \u201ceve geldiler\u201d diye mesaj att\u0131. Polis mi? diye sordum, \u201cevet\u201d dedi. Burak\u2019a bir t\u00fcr rozet gibi bir \u015fey g\u00f6stermi\u015fler. Buras\u0131 asl\u0131nda bana sorarsan\u0131z ilgin\u00e7, Burak\u2019\u0131n telefonunu almad\u0131lar. Hyundai Accent tipi bir arabaya bindirip yola koyuldular. Burak, davalar\u0131 nedeniyle gerginli\u011fe al\u0131\u015fk\u0131n ama bu sefer farkl\u0131 hissetti\u011fini yazd\u0131 bana \u201cgaliba beni \u00f6ld\u00fcrecekler bu sefer\u201d diye mesaj att\u0131. Ben hep Burak\u2019\u0131 sakinle\u015ftirmeye \u00e7al\u0131\u015ft\u0131m. \u201cVatan\u2019a gitmiyoruz ikinci k\u00f6pr\u00fcden ge\u00e7tik\u201d deyince, hemen tweet atmam\u0131z gerekti\u011fini s\u00f6yledim. Olay sosyal medyaya ta\u015f\u0131n\u0131nca siyasilerin haberi oldu, milletvekilleri araya girdi, \u0130stanbul Emniyet M\u00fcd\u00fcr\u00fc\u2019ne ula\u015f\u0131ld\u0131. O s\u0131rada Burak bana mesaj att\u0131 \u201ctartaklad\u0131lar att\u0131lar\u201d diye. Dudullu civarlar\u0131nda b\u0131rakm\u0131\u015flar. S\u0131rt\u0131na kemerle birka\u00e7 kez vurmu\u015flar.\u201d\nM\u00fcvekkilinin Yan\u0131nda Oldu\u011fu Ortaya \u00c7\u0131kt\u0131\n\u0130stanbul Asayi\u015f \u015eube Gasp B\u00fcro Amirli\u011fi taraf\u0131ndan iddiayla ilgili yap\u0131lan incelemeye g\u00f6re, kamera kay\u0131tlar\u0131na ula\u015f\u0131ld\u0131. Avukat Burak Meng\u00fc\u2019n\u00fcn, ka\u00e7\u0131r\u0131ld\u0131\u011f\u0131n\u0131 s\u00f6yledi\u011fi g\u00fcn, asl\u0131nda bir m\u00fcvekkiliyle bulu\u015ftu\u011fu ortaya \u00e7\u0131kt\u0131. Polisin verdi\u011fi bilgiye g\u00f6re Ni\u015fanta\u015f\u0131\u2019ndaki bir hastaneden \u00e7\u0131kan Burak Meng\u00fc, bir m\u00fcvekkilinin arac\u0131na bindi. Daha sonra Anadolu yakas\u0131na ge\u00e7ti ve ard\u0131ndan yine yan\u0131ndaki m\u00fcvekkiliyle Avrupa yakas\u0131na d\u00f6nd\u00fc.\nBurak Meng\u00fc ve Nev\u015fin Meng\u00fc\u2019n\u00fcn iddias\u0131n\u0131n ger\u00e7e\u011fi yans\u0131tmad\u0131\u011f\u0131 g\u00f6r\u00fclmektedir. Yaz\u0131lanlarla ilgili herhangi bir darp ya da ka\u00e7\u0131r\u0131lma olay\u0131na rastlanmam\u0131\u015ft\u0131r.\nOlay\u0131n asl\u0131n\u0131n, \u0130stanbul Asayi\u015f \u015eubenin verdi\u011fi g\u00f6r\u00fcnt\u00fclere g\u00f6re ortaya \u00e7\u0131kmas\u0131n\u0131n ard\u0131ndan Nev\u015fin Meng\u00fc, konuyla ilgili sosyal medya hesab\u0131ndan k\u0131sa bir a\u00e7\u0131klamada bulunmu\u015ftur:\nMeng\u00fc\u2019n\u00fcn m\u00fcvekkilinin ifadesinin al\u0131nmas\u0131n\u0131n ard\u0131ndan da, herhangi bir g\u00f6zalt\u0131 olmad\u0131\u011f\u0131na dair incelemeler do\u011fruland\u0131. M\u00fcvekkil H.K.T ise, \u201cB\u00fct\u00fcn  g\u00fcn beraberdik. Neden \u00f6yle bir \u015fikayette bulunmu\u015f anlamad\u0131m\u201d \u015feklinde ifade vermi\u015f ve sonras\u0131nda Burak Meng\u00fc \u015fikayetini geri \u00e7ekmi\u015ftir. Polisin ise Meng\u00fc hakk\u0131nda \u201csu\u00e7 uydurmaktan\u201d i\u015flem yaparak dosyay\u0131 savc\u0131l\u0131\u011fa g\u00f6nderdi\u011fi \u00f6\u011frenildi. Savc\u0131l\u0131\u011f\u0131n soru\u015fturma yapmas\u0131 bekleniyor.\nPolisin, Burak Meng\u00fc hakk\u0131nda \u201csu\u00e7 uydurmaktan\u201d i\u015flem yaparak dosyay\u0131 savc\u0131l\u0131\u011fa g\u00f6nderdi\u011fi belirtilmi\u015ftir.\nKaynaklar: Twitter, Twitter 2, Birg\u00fcn.net\nVideo oynat\u0131c\u0131\n00:00\n00:00\n1. \u201cdogrula.org\u201d\n0:07\n[Toplam:6    Ortalama:5/5] Burak Meng\u00fc\u2019n\u00fcn Polis Taraf\u0131ndan Darp Edildi\u011fi \u0130ddias\u0131", "Adidas okyanus art\u0131klar\u0131ndan ayakkab\u0131 \u00fcretti iddias\u0131n\u0131 sizler i\u00e7in ele ald\u0131k. Adidas, okyanuslar\u0131 temizlemek ve temiz tutmak i\u00e7in fark\u0131ndal\u0131k olu\u015fturmay\u0131 ama\u00e7layan uluslararas\u0131 bir organizasyon olan Parley ile birlikte, okyanus at\u0131klar\u0131ndan ayakkab\u0131 \u00fcretmi\u015ftir. Nitekim, bu iddia do\u011frudur. \nAdidas, bal\u0131k a\u011flar\u0131 ve okyanusa d\u00f6k\u00fclen plastik at\u0131klarla ayakkab\u0131 \u00fcretimi projesi i\u00e7in 2015 y\u0131l\u0131nda Parley ile antla\u015fma yapm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r. 2016 y\u0131l\u0131nda \u00fcretimine ba\u015flanan ayakkab\u0131lar\u0131n \u00fcst k\u0131sm\u0131n\u0131n %95\u2019i, Maldivler yak\u0131nlar\u0131nda toplanan ve okyanus plasti\u011finden olu\u015fan dokuya sahiptir. Ayr\u0131ca ayakkab\u0131lar\u0131n geri kalan k\u0131s\u0131mlar\u0131 da b\u00fcy\u00fck oranda geri d\u00f6n\u00fc\u015ft\u00fcr\u00fclm\u00fc\u015f malzemelerden yap\u0131lmaktad\u0131r. \u00dcretilen ayakkab\u0131lara \u201cUltraBOOST Uncaged Parley\u201d ismi verilmi\u015ftir.\nAdidas Y\u00f6netim Kurulu Ba\u015fkan Yard\u0131mc\u0131s\u0131 Eric Liedtke, projeyle alakal\u0131 olarak \u201c2017 y\u0131l\u0131nda Parley Ocean Plastic\u2019\u0131 kullanarak bir milyon \u00e7ift ayakkab\u0131 yapaca\u011f\u0131z ve nihai amac\u0131m\u0131z tedarik zincirindeki i\u015flenmemi\u015f plasti\u011fi elimine etmektir.\u201d \u015feklinde a\u00e7\u0131klamada bulunmu\u015ftur.\nAdidas, 2016 y\u0131l\u0131nda izledi\u011fi bir politikayla, bu ayakkab\u0131lar\u0131n ilk olarak 7000 \u00e7iftini sat\u0131\u015fa \u00e7\u0131karm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r. Halen sat\u0131\u015f\u0131 bulunan ayakkab\u0131lar, 112, 200 ve 230 dolara sat\u0131lmaktad\u0131r. 2017 y\u0131l\u0131nda ise toplamda 1 milyon \u00e7ift ayakkab\u0131 satan Adidas, yapt\u0131\u011f\u0131 bu uygulama ile, k\u00fcresel \u00e7evre kirlili\u011fine kar\u015f\u0131 dikkat \u00e7ekmi\u015ftir.\nBu organizasyonda Adidas ile i\u015f birli\u011fi yapan Parley\u2018in kurucusu Cyrill Gutsch ise, projenin ba\u015flang\u0131c\u0131n\u0131 \u015fu \u015fekilde ifade etmi\u015ftir: \u201cKimse okyanuslar\u0131 yaln\u0131z kurtaramaz. Her birimiz \u00e7\u00f6z\u00fcmde bir rol oynayabiliriz. Yarat\u0131c\u0131 end\u00fcstrilerin ellerinde kusurlu materyalleri, \u00fcr\u00fcnleri ve i\u015f modellerini yeniden icat etmek var. T\u00fcketici, de\u011fi\u015fim talebini art\u0131rabilir.\u201d\nAt\u0131klardan Futbol Formas\u0131 da \u00dcretildi \nAdidas ve Parley, geri d\u00f6n\u00fc\u015f\u00fcml\u00fc olarak plastikten ayakkab\u0131 geli\u015ftirerek okyanus kirlili\u011fi konusundan fark\u0131ndal\u0131k yaratmak amac\u0131yla, ayakkab\u0131 d\u0131\u015f\u0131nda farkl\u0131 \u00fcr\u00fcnler de \u00fcretmeye ba\u015flam\u0131\u015ft\u0131r. Bu \u00fcr\u00fcnler aras\u0131nda, ko\u015fu ayakkab\u0131s\u0131n\u0131n yan\u0131 s\u0131ra, erkek ve kad\u0131nlar i\u00e7in mayo \u00fcr\u00fcnleri, futbol formalar\u0131 da vard\u0131r.\nAdidas ve Parley, Bayern M\u00fcnih ile Real Madrid i\u00e7in okyanus at\u0131klar\u0131ndan yap\u0131lan kuma\u015fla forma \u00fcretmi\u015ftir. Tak\u0131mlar\u0131n logosunu ta\u015f\u0131yan formalardan Real Madrid i\u00e7in olan\u0131 tamamen beyazken, Bayern Munich i\u00e7in \u00fcretilen forma ise k\u0131rm\u0131z\u0131 olarak tasarlanm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r.\nMayolar\u0131n yap\u0131ld\u0131\u011f\u0131 malzeme ise, k\u0131y\u0131 b\u00f6lgelerinden denizlere at\u0131lan \u00e7\u00f6pler ve kullan\u0131lm\u0131\u015f bal\u0131k a\u011flar\u0131 gibi plastik at\u0131klardan olu\u015fturulmaktad\u0131r. Bu at\u0131klar i\u015flenerek, naylon ipli\u011fe d\u00f6n\u00fc\u015ft\u00fcr\u00fclmekte ve bu ipliklerle klora diren\u00e7li dayan\u0131kl\u0131 bir kuma\u015f olu\u015fturulmaktad\u0131r.\nAyn\u0131 zamanda Nike da, plastik at\u0131klarla birlikte forma yapmaktad\u0131r. K\u00fcresel futbol alan\u0131nda, malzeme ba\u015f\u0131na ortalama 13 adet geri d\u00f6n\u00fc\u015ft\u00fcr\u00fclm\u00fc\u015f plastik \u015fi\u015fe kullanmaktad\u0131r. Formalar\u0131n \u015fort kuma\u015flar\u0131, %100 geri d\u00f6n\u00fc\u015ft\u00fcr\u00fclm\u00fc\u015f polyester ile \u00fcretilmekte ve di\u011fer jarse kuma\u015flar ise yakla\u015f\u0131k %96 oran\u0131nda geri d\u00f6n\u00fc\u015ft\u00fcr\u00fclm\u00fc\u015f polyesterle \u00fcretilmektedir. Malzemenin olu\u015fturulmas\u0131 i\u00e7in 28 futbol sahas\u0131n\u0131 kapsayacak kadar, yakla\u015f\u0131k 16 milyon geri d\u00f6n\u00fc\u015ft\u00fcr\u00fclm\u00fc\u015f plastik \u015fi\u015fe kullan\u0131lm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r.\nKaynaklar: Parley, Business Ht, The Verge, Facebook, Independent, News Nike, sporttechie.com, Telegraph, Adidas\nVideo oynat\u0131c\u0131\n00:00\n00:00\n1. \u201cdogrula.org\u201d\n0:07\n[Toplam:3    Ortalama:5/5] Adidas Okyanus At\u0131klar\u0131ndan Ayakkab\u0131 \u00dcretti \u0130ddias\u0131", "As\u0131m\u2019\u0131n Nesli Ne Demek ba\u015fl\u0131kl\u0131 yaz\u0131m\u0131zda, \u0130stiklal \u015fairimiz Mehmet Akif Ersoy\u2019un (20 Aral\u0131k 1873 \u2013 27 Aral\u0131k 1936) Safahat eserinin As\u0131m adl\u0131 b\u00f6l\u00fcm\u00fcnde yer alan ve \u00c7anakkale \u015eehitlerine \u015fiirinde ge\u00e7en As\u0131m\u2019\u0131n nesli ifadesinin anlam\u0131na yer verece\u011fiz.\nMehmet Akif Ersoy\u2019un Safahat kitab\u0131n\u0131n 6. b\u00f6l\u00fcm\u00fcn\u00fc olu\u015fturan As\u0131m; \u00f6zlenen ve umutlanan ideal T\u00fcrk genci olarak sembolle\u015ftirilmi\u015ftir. As\u0131m\u2019\u0131n kim oldu\u011funa y\u00f6nelik bir ba\u015fka rivayet ise, bahsi ge\u00e7en ki\u015finin peygamber Hz. Muhammed (sav)\u2019in zaman\u0131nda ya\u015fam\u0131\u015f ve ona iman etmi\u015f olan sahabe As\u0131m bin Sabit oldu\u011fudur. Mehmet Akif, \u00c7anakkale \u015eehitlerine \u015fiirinde ge\u00e7en As\u0131m\u2019\u0131n nesli ifadesiyle karakterli, ahlakl\u0131, erdemli, bilgili; kendisinde g\u00fczel ve kahramanca \u00f6zellikleri bar\u0131nd\u0131ran bir gen\u00e7 modelinden bahsetmektedir.\nMehmet Akif Ersoy\u2019un bahsetti\u011fi As\u0131m, Safahat\u2019in 6. ve son b\u00f6l\u00fcm\u00fcn\u00fcn ad\u0131d\u0131r. \u015eairin uzt Herkes\u00e7e bilinen \u00c7anakkale \u015eehitlerine \u015fiiri, bu eserde yer al\u0131r. 1924 y\u0131l\u0131nda yay\u0131nlanm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r. Konu\u015fma \u00fcslubuyla ve hikaye \u015feklinde yaz\u0131lm\u0131\u015f bu eserde As\u0131m, bir insanda olmas\u0131 gereken t\u00fcm erdemlere b\u00fcr\u00fcnm\u00fc\u015f olan, duru\u015fu ve ahlak\u0131yla \u00f6rnek bir gen\u00e7 olarak anlat\u0131lm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r. As\u0131m \u00fczerinden M\u00fcsl\u00fcman gen\u00e7lik idealize edilmi\u015f, \u00fcstat Mehmet Akif bu gen\u00e7li\u011fe \u201cAs\u0131m\u2019\u0131n nesli\u201d ad\u0131n\u0131 vermi\u015ftir.  Dolay\u0131s\u0131yla, \u015fiirde ge\u00e7en As\u0131m\u2019\u0131n nesli ifadesini en iyi \u015fekilde idrak etmenin yolu, bu b\u00f6l\u00fcm\u00fcn tamam\u0131n\u0131 anlayabilmekten ge\u00e7er.\nSafahat\u2019in b\u00f6l\u00fcm\u00fc As\u0131m\u2019dan baz\u0131 dizeler:\n\u201c\u2026Bu cihetten, hani, hi\u00e7 y\u0131lmas\u0131n, o\u011flum, g\u00f6z\u00fcn\u00fcz;\nS\u00e2de Garb\u2019\u0131n, yal\u0131n\u0131z ilmine d\u00f6ns\u00fcn y\u00fcz\u00fcn\u00fcz.\nO \u00e7ocuklarla beraber, gece g\u00fcnd\u00fcz, didinin;\nGiden \u00fc\u00e7 y\u00fcz senelik ilmi s\u0131k elden edinin.\nFen diy\u00e2r\u0131nda s\u0131zan n\u00e2-m\u00fcten\u00e2h\u00ee p\u0131nar\u0131,\nHem i\u00e7in, hem getirin yurda o n\u00e2fi\u2019 sular\u0131.\nAyn\u0131 menba\u2019lar\u0131 ihy\u00e2 i\u00e7in art\u0131k burada,\nKafan\u0131z i\u015flesin, o\u011flum, kanal olsun arada\u2026\u201d\nMehmet Akif Ersoy\n\u015eair Mehmet Akif Ersoy, \u00c7anakkale Sava\u015f\u0131 da dahil olmak \u00fczere hi\u00e7bir sava\u015fta bulunmam\u0131\u015f, muharebenin ya\u015fand\u0131\u011f\u0131 \u00c7anakkale\u2019yi ve sava\u015fa dair hi\u00e7bir foto\u011fraf\u0131 g\u00f6rmemi\u015ftir. Ona bu m\u0131sralar\u0131 ve \u0130stiklal Mar\u015f\u0131\u2019n\u0131 yazd\u0131ran derin tasavvur g\u00fcc\u00fc, onun ne kadar b\u00fcy\u00fck ve yetenekli bir \u015fair oldu\u011funun g\u00f6stergesidir.\nMehmet Akif Ersoy\u2019un \u00c7anakkale \u015eehitlerine adl\u0131 \u015fiirinde ge\u00e7en As\u0131m\u2019\u0131n nesli:\n\u201cO benim sun\u2019-i bed\u00ee\u2019im, onu \u00e7i\u011fnetme\u201d dedi.\n\u00c2s\u0131m\u2019\u0131n nesli\u2026diyordum ya\u2026nesilmi\u015f ger\u00e7ek:\n\u0130\u015fte \u00e7i\u011fnetmedi n\u00e2m\u00fbsunu, \u00e7i\u011fnetmeyecek.\n\u2026\n\u201c\u2026Sen ki, son ehl-i sal\u00eebin k\u0131rarak savletini,\n\u015eark\u0131n en sevgili sult\u00e2n\u0131 Sal\u00e2hadd\u00een\u2019i,\nK\u0131l\u0131\u00e7 Arslan gibi icl\u00e2line ettin hayran\u2026\nSen ki, \u0130sl\u00e2m\u2019\u0131 ku\u015fatm\u0131\u015f, bo\u011fuyorken h\u00fcsran,\nO demir \u00e7enberi g\u00f6\u011fs\u00fcnde k\u0131r\u0131p par\u00e7alad\u0131n;\nSen ki, r\u00fbhunla beraber gezer ecr\u00e2m\u0131 ad\u0131n;\nSen ki, a\u2019s\u00e2ra g\u00f6m\u00fclsen ta\u015facaks\u0131n\u2026Heyh\u00e2t,\nSana gelmez bu ufuklar, seni almaz bu cih\u00e2t\u2026\nEy \u015feh\u00eed o\u011flu \u015feh\u00eed, isteme benden makber,\nSana \u00e2g\u00fb\u015funu a\u00e7m\u0131\u015f duruyor Peygamber\u2026\u201d\nBir di\u011fer yorumda, Mehmet Akif\u2019in As\u0131m olarak bahsetti\u011fi gencin peygamber zaman\u0131nda ya\u015fam\u0131\u015f ve ona biat etmi\u015f olan As\u0131m bin Sabit oldu\u011fu s\u00f6ylenir. As\u0131m\u2019\u0131n nesli olarak g\u00f6sterilen \u00f6rnek \u015fahsiyetin, sahabe As\u0131m bin Sabit\u2019ten ilham al\u0131nd\u0131\u011f\u0131 en kuvvetli iddialardand\u0131r.\n\u201cSen ki as\u0131m\u0131n neslinin, \u00e7i\u011fnetme n\u00e2musunu.\nAt \u00fcst\u00fcnden korkunun ve gafletin k\u00e2busunu.\nAte\u015fler yak\u0131p Nemrut misali, atsalar seni.\nSak\u0131n h\u00e2! Terk etmiyesin, iman\u0131n\u0131, dinini.\u201d\nSahabe As\u0131m bin Sabit, \u0130slamiyet\u2019i yaymak i\u00e7in \u00e7\u0131kt\u0131\u011f\u0131 bir seferde tuza\u011fa d\u00fc\u015f\u00fcr\u00fcl\u00fcp esir edilmek istenmi\u015ftir. Ancak o teslim olmak istememi\u015f, d\u00fc\u015fmanlar\u0131yla m\u00fccadele ederken \u015fu s\u00f6zleri s\u00f6ylemi\u015ftir:\n\u201cBen m\u00fc\u015friklerin himayesine hayat\u0131m boyunca girmemek \u00fczere yeminliyim. Vallahi kafirlere teslim olmam. Allah\u2019\u0131m durumumu Rasulullaha haberdar et.\u201d\nSahabe As\u0131m, \u015fehit d\u00fc\u015fmek \u00fczereyken \u015fu duay\u0131 yapm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r: \u201cAllah\u2019\u0131m senin dinini korumaya \u00e7al\u0131\u015ft\u0131m. Sen de benim cesedimi m\u00fc\u015friklerden koru!\u201d \nNakledilene g\u00f6re, o g\u00fcn orada \u015fehit d\u00fc\u015fen As\u0131m\u2019\u0131n ba\u015f\u0131n\u0131 kesip kar\u015f\u0131l\u0131\u011f\u0131nda \u00f6d\u00fcl almak isterler. Ancak o esnada bir ar\u0131 s\u00fcr\u00fcs\u00fc gelip, cesedin \u00fczerinde k\u00fcmelenir. B\u00f6ylece sahabeye kimse yakla\u015famaz. Ak\u015fam olunca da m\u00fcthi\u015f bir ya\u011fmur ya\u011far. Sel sular\u0131 As\u0131m\u2019\u0131n cesedini bilinmeyen bir yere s\u00fcr\u00fckler. Dolay\u0131s\u0131yla d\u00fc\u015fmanlar\u0131 onun v\u00fccuduna el s\u00fcremez.\nMehmet Akif\u2019in \u0130stiklal Mar\u015f\u0131\u2019n\u0131n sekizinci k\u0131tas\u0131nda bu sahabeden etkilendi\u011fi s\u00f6ylenir. Yazd\u0131\u011f\u0131 \u0130stiklal Mar\u015f\u0131 dizeleri, sahabenin durumuyla ili\u015fkilendirilir.\n\u201cRuhumun senden, \u0130lahi,  \u015fudur ancak emeli:\nDe\u011fmesin mabedimin g\u00f6\u011fs\u00fcne namahrem eli.\u201d \nAkif\u2019in \u201cAs\u0131m\u2019\u0131n Nesli Projesi\u201d\n(Bu b\u00f6l\u00fcm, tarih\u00e7i Mustafa Arma\u011fan\u2019\u0131n, \u201cAs\u0131m\u2019\u0131n Nesli Nedir\u201d konulu \u201cTarih Aynas\u0131\u201d adl\u0131 program\u0131ndan al\u0131nm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r.)\n1913 y\u0131l\u0131nda \u015fair Mehmet Akif As\u0131m eseriyle olduk\u00e7a karanl\u0131k bir tablo \u00e7izmi\u015ftir.\nASIM\u2019dan\nBana d\u00fcny\u00e2da ne yer kald\u0131, em\u00een ol, ne de y\u00e2r;\nArar\u0131m g\u00f6\u00e7mek i\u00e7in ba\u015fka zemin, ba\u015fka diy\u00e2r.\nBunalan r\u00fbhuma ister bir uzun boylu sefer;\nYa\u015famaktan ne \u00e7\u0131kar g\u00fcnlerim olduk\u00e7a heder?\nBir g\u00fcler \u00e7ehre sezip g\u00fcld\u00fc\u011f\u00fc yoktur y\u00fcz\u00fcm\u00fcn;\nGeceden fark\u0131n\u0131 g\u00f6rm\u00fc\u015f de\u011filim g\u00fcnd\u00fcz\u00fcm\u00fcn.\nSeneler var ki har\u00e2b olmad\u0131\u011f\u0131m g\u00fcn bilmem;\nGezerim abdala \u00e7\u0131km\u0131\u015f gibi sersem sersem.\n\u2026\nSorar\u0131m kendime: Gurbette mi, hayrette miyim?\nYoklar\u0131m ta\u015flar\u0131, topraklar\u0131: \u0130zler kan izi;\nYurdumun kan kusuyor mosmor uzanm\u0131\u015f denizi!\n\u2026\nYurdu ba\u015ftanba\u015fa v\u00eer\u00e2neye d\u00f6nm\u00fc\u015f T\u00fcrk\u2019\u00fcn;\nD\u00fcnk\u00fc \u015fen, \u015f\u00e2t\u0131r ocaklar yat\u0131yor yerde bug\u00fcn.\n\u2026\nNerde Ertu\u011frul\u2019u koynunda b\u00fcy\u00fctm\u00fc\u015f obalar?\nHani Osman gibi, Orhan gibi g\u00fcrb\u00fcz babalar?\n\u2026\nBug\u00fcn art\u0131k biri yok\u2026 Hepsi masal, hepsi yalan!\nBir onulmaz yarad\u0131r, varsa y\u00fcreklerde kalan.\nBu atmosfer Akif\u2019i, \u201cbu karanl\u0131k nas\u0131l a\u015f\u0131l\u0131r, nas\u0131l y\u0131k\u0131l\u0131r; bu g\u00fcn\u00fcm\u00fcz\u00fc ve gelece\u011fimizi nas\u0131l ayd\u0131nlat\u0131r\u0131z?\u201d aray\u0131\u015f\u0131na g\u00f6t\u00fcrm\u00fc\u015ft\u00fcr. \u015eair kendisinin i\u00e7inde bulundu\u011fu nesli \u015fu dizelerle anlatm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r:\nZerk etmediler kalbime bir damla \u00fcm\u00eed.\nHoca, d\u00fcny\u00e2da ya\u015fanmaz, ya\u015famaktan nevm\u00eed.\nDaha mektepte \u00e7ocuktuk, bizi y\u0131ld\u0131rd\u0131 hayat;\nOysa hi\u00e7 korku nedir bilmeyecektik, heyhat!\nNeslim \u00fcrkekmi\u015f, evet, yoktu ki \u00fcrk\u00fctmeyeni;\n\u201cY\u00fcr\u00fc o\u011flum!\u201d diye te\u015fci\u2019 edecek yerde beni,\nDiktiler kar\u015f\u0131ma bir kapkara m\u00fcstakbel ki,\n\u00d6yle korkun\u00e7 olamaz hortlasa devler belki!\nBana d\u00fcny\u00e2ya \u00e7\u0131karken \u201cbatacaks\u0131n!\u201d dediler\u2026\n\u00c7\u0131kmadan batmay\u0131 \u00f6\u011fren, ne kadar sa\u00e7ma h\u00fcner!\nYe\u2019si ezber bilirim, azmi y\u00fcz\u00fcnden tan\u0131mam;\nOkutan b\u00f6yle okutmu\u015ftu, be\u011fendin mi imam?\nO neslin neden gelecekten \u00fcmidini kesti\u011fi, bundan daha g\u00fczel anlat\u0131lamazd\u0131.\nPeki bunun kabahati kimde? \u00dcstat, onu da k\u0131saca anlatm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r:\nBir \u0131\u015f\u0131k g\u00f6steren olsayd\u0131 e\u011fer, tek bir \u0131\u015f\u0131k,\nBiz o zulmetleri bin par\u00e7a edip \u00e7\u0131km\u0131\u015ft\u0131k.\n\u0130ki \u00fc\u00e7 y\u00fcz senedir serpemiyor bizde \u015feb\u00e2b;\n\u00c7\u00fcnk\u00fc b\u00ee\u00e7\u00e2renin \u00e2t\u00eesine \u00eem\u00e2n\u0131 har\u00e2b.\nHissi yok, fikri bozuk, azmini dersen: Mefl\u00fbc\u2026\nHani r\u00fbhunda o haks\u0131zl\u0131\u011fa isyan, o hur\u00fbc?\n\u2026\nYe\u2019si tekf\u00eer eden \u00eem\u00e2n\u0131ma olsun ki yemin,\nBize telk\u00een-i \u00fcm\u00eed etmediler, yoksa bu din,\nYine d\u00fcnyalara yaym\u0131\u015ft\u0131 ye\u015fil g\u00f6lgesini;\nYine hakk\u0131n sesi bo\u011fmu\u015ftu dal\u00e2lin sesini.\nHer \u015fey k\u00f6t\u00fcye giderken, insanlar hissizle\u015fmi\u015fken Akif, As\u0131m\u2019\u0131n Nesli Projesi\u2019yle nas\u0131l bir d\u00f6n\u00fc\u015f\u00fcm ger\u00e7ekle\u015fecekti? Toplumun \u00c7anakkale \u00f6ncesi durumu buydu.. Bir \u00fcmit a\u015f\u0131s\u0131 laz\u0131md\u0131. Bu \u00fcmit nereden bulunacakt\u0131?\nDo\u011frudan do\u011fruya Kur\u2019an\u2019dan al\u0131p ilham\u0131,\nAsr\u0131n idrakine s\u00f6yletmeliyiz \u0130sl\u00e2m\u2019\u0131.\nBu beyit, \u00fcmidini kaybetmi\u015f bir neslin, as\u0131l kaynakla bulu\u015fmas\u0131 gerekti\u011fini anlatmaktad\u0131r. Peki \u00fcmitle nas\u0131l bulu\u015fulacak?\nAkif, As\u0131m eserinde bir hocayla konu\u015fmaktad\u0131r. Hocan\u0131n As\u0131m ad\u0131nda bir o\u011flu vard\u0131r. Mehmet Akif, As\u0131m\u2019\u0131n nesliyle karanl\u0131\u011f\u0131n ayd\u0131nlanaca\u011f\u0131n\u0131 s\u00f6yledi\u011finde, hoca buna pek inanmaz. Bunun \u00fczerine \u015fair, As\u0131m\u2019\u0131n neslini k\u00fc\u00e7\u00fck g\u00f6rmemek gerekti\u011fini s\u00f6yler; \u015fu g\u00fczel dizelerle hocaya cevap verir:\n\u00c2s\u0131m\u2019\u0131n nesline m\u00fcnk\u00e2d olacak istikb\u00e2l.\n\u201cPeki bu As\u0131m\u2019\u0131n ne fazileti vard\u0131r?\u201d diye sorar hoca.\nNe faz\u00eelet mi? \u00c7ocuklar ko\u015fuyor, a\u00e7 \u00e7\u0131plak,\nCebheden cebheye arslan gibi hi\u00e7 durm\u0131yarak.\nYine vard\u0131r bir \u00f6l\u00fcm korkusu arslanda bile;\nY\u00fczg\u00f6z olmu\u015f bu \u00e7ocuklar \u00f6l\u00fcm\u00fcn \u015fahs\u0131yle!\nCebhenin her biri bir k\u0131t\u2019ada, etr\u00e2f\u0131 deniz;\nKara dersen daha deh\u015fetli: Ne yol var, ne de iz.\nHarek\u00e2t\u0131n g\u00f6r\u00fcyorsun ya, Hocam, en kolay\u0131,\nYal\u0131n ayak Kafkas\u2019\u0131 tutmak, ba\u015f a\u00e7\u0131k S\u00een\u00e2\u2019y\u0131!\nYap\u0131l\u0131r zannediyorsan, bakal\u0131m, sen de soyun\u2026\nK\u0131t\u2019a kapmak, k\u00f6\u015fe kapmak de\u011fil art\u0131k bu oyun.\nBurada, \u201ck\u0131t\u2019a kapmak oyunu\u201d ifadesine dikkat etmek gerekiyor. Bununla Akif, Mehmet\u00e7i\u011fin I. D\u00fcnya Sava\u015f\u0131\u2019nda cepheden cepheye, k\u0131talar \u00fczerinde yapt\u0131\u011f\u0131 m\u00fccadeleyi anlat\u0131r. \u0130\u015fte tam burada Mehmet Akif, \u00c7anakkale \u015eehitlerine \u015fiirini d\u00f6kt\u00fcr\u00fcr.\n\u015eU BO\u011eAZ HARB\u0130 NED\u0130R ?\n\u201c\u015eu Bo\u011faz Harbi nedir? Var m\u0131 ki d\u00fcnyada e\u015fi?\nEn kes\u00eef ordular\u0131n y\u00fckleniyor d\u00f6rd\u00fc be\u015fi\u201d\ndiyerek Mehmet\u00e7i\u011fin b\u00fcy\u00fck at\u0131l\u0131mlar\u0131n\u0131 anlatmaya ba\u015flar. Orada Mehmet\u00e7ik sadece emperyalistlere ders vermekle kalmam\u0131\u015f; ayn\u0131 zamanda bu milletin \u00f6l\u00fc zannedilen tarihini de aya\u011fa kald\u0131rm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r. \u201cBizden bir \u015fey olmaz, biz bu b\u00fcy\u00fck \u00fclkelere kar\u015f\u0131 aciziz\u201d, diyenlere en b\u00fcy\u00fck dersi vermi\u015ftir. Bu b\u00fcy\u00fck i\u015f kar\u015f\u0131s\u0131nda Akif, a\u015fa\u011f\u0131daki dizelerle onlar\u0131 Bedir Sava\u015f\u0131\u2019n\u0131 yapan sahabenin yan\u0131na yerle\u015ftirmi\u015ftir. \u00c7\u00fcnk\u00fc zaferin kazan\u0131lmamas\u0131 durumunda, \u0130slam\u2019\u0131n son dirili\u015f hatt\u0131 k\u0131r\u0131lacakt\u0131r.\n\u201cNe b\u00fcy\u00fcks\u00fcn ki kan\u0131n kurtar\u0131yor Tevh\u00eed\u2019i\u2026\nBedr\u2019in arslanlar\u0131 ancak, bu kadar \u015fanl\u0131 idi\u2026\u201d\nAs\u0131m askerden d\u00f6ner, m\u00fctareke olmu\u015ftur. As\u0131m son derece duyarl\u0131 hale gelmi\u015ftir. Ramazan g\u00fcnleri sokaklarda sigara i\u00e7enlere ve sarho\u015flara kaba kuvvet uygular. Karakolluk olur. Nasihatleri dinlemez. Bir g\u00fcn Akif ona; \u201cbu i\u015f kaba kuvvetle olmaz. Biz bu toplumu d\u00fczelteceksek, toplumun kuruyan p\u0131narlar\u0131na, Kuran\u2019\u0131n \u00e7a\u011flayan p\u0131narlar\u0131ndan ak\u0131tmam\u0131z laz\u0131m. Bunu ilimle yapacaks\u0131n\u0131z. Siz \u00c7anakkale zaferini kazand\u0131n\u0131z. Ama ancak zafer ge\u00e7ti. \u015eimdi sorunlar\u0131m\u0131zla ba\u015f ba\u015fay\u0131z. E\u011fer biz cehalet ve e\u011fitim sorunlar\u0131n\u0131 halledemezsek, tekrar \u00c7anakkeleleri ya\u015famak ka\u00e7\u0131n\u0131lmaz olur\u201d, der. Bundan sonra As\u0131m Berlin\u2019e gidecek, ilim tahsil edecek, hem kendisine hem de milletine bu ilim p\u0131narlar\u0131n\u0131n suyunu ak\u0131tacakt\u0131r.\nAkif e\u011fitim meselesini, do\u011frudan \u00c7anakkale Sava\u015f\u0131\u2019n\u0131n devam\u0131 olarak konumland\u0131r\u0131r. Dolay\u0131s\u0131yla, e\u011fer biz e\u011fitimin \u00c7anakkalesini ba\u015faramazsak, I. \u00c7anakkale yar\u0131m kalm\u0131\u015f demektir.\nS\u00f6z\u00fcn \u00f6z\u00fc \u015fudur ki; Akif\u2019in As\u0131m\u2019\u0131n Nesli Projesi, e\u011fitimin \u00c7anakkale Zaferini kazanmak \u00fczerine kuruludur.\nKaynaklar: antoloji, mehmetakifara\u015ft\u0131rmalar\u0131, revolvy, mahmutselcuk.com, manisadenge, MustafaArma\u011fan, hurfikir, izu\nVideo oynat\u0131c\u0131\nhttps://dogrula.org/wp-content/uploads/2018/02/dogrula.org_.mp4\n00:00\n00:07\n[Toplam:4    Ortalama:5/5] As\u0131m\u2019\u0131n Nesli Ne Demek?", "\u201cHaciz Nedir? \u0130potek (Rehin) Nedir? Haciz ile \u0130potek Fark\u0131\u201d ba\u015fl\u0131kl\u0131 i\u00e7eri\u011fimizde, \u201chaciz nedir, nas\u0131l yap\u0131l\u0131r, haczedilen e\u015fyalar\u0131n sat\u0131\u015f\u0131 nas\u0131l olur, haczedilen e\u015fyalar nas\u0131l geri al\u0131n\u0131r, ipotek nedir, rehin nedir, ipotek ve rehin nas\u0131l kald\u0131r\u0131l\u0131r, haciz ile ipotek fark\u0131 nedir\u201d gibi pek \u00e7ok sorunun cevab\u0131n\u0131 bulabilirsiniz.\nHaciz Nedir?\nHaciz, para alacaklar\u0131n\u0131n \u00f6denmesini sa\u011flamak i\u00e7in bor\u00e7luya ait mal ve haklara icra dairesi taraf\u0131ndan hukuken el konulmas\u0131d\u0131r. Haciz ancak bor\u00e7luya ait olan ve paraya \u00e7evrilmesi m\u00fcmk\u00fcn olan mal ve haklar \u00fczerinde uygulanabilir. Haciz denildi\u011finde halk aras\u0131nda genellikle icra i\u015flemlerinin t\u00fcm\u00fcn\u00fc kapsayan bir ifade anla\u015f\u0131lsa da asl\u0131nda haciz, sadece icra takibi i\u015flemlerinin bir a\u015famas\u0131d\u0131r.\nHaciz \u0130\u015flemi Nedir? Nas\u0131l Yap\u0131l\u0131r? \nHaciz i\u015flemi, icra memurunun g\u00f6zetiminde alaca\u011f\u0131n tahsili i\u00e7in yeterli miktarda e\u015fyan\u0131n tespit edilmesi ve haciz tutana\u011f\u0131na aktar\u0131lmas\u0131d\u0131r. Alacakl\u0131 talep ederse, haciz tutana\u011f\u0131na ge\u00e7irilen e\u015fyalar, bor\u00e7lunun evinden al\u0131narak yediemin depolar\u0131na g\u00f6t\u00fcr\u00fclebilir veya bor\u00e7luya yediemin olarak b\u0131rak\u0131labilir.\nTalep etmeleri halinde alacakl\u0131 veya alacakl\u0131 vekili, haciz i\u015flemi ger\u00e7ekle\u015ftirilen yerde bulunabilir. \u0130\u015flem s\u0131ras\u0131nda icra memuru beyan ve talepleri haciz zapt\u0131na yazmakla y\u00fck\u00fcml\u00fcd\u00fcr. Dolay\u0131s\u0131yla haciz tutana\u011f\u0131 dikkatle okunmal\u0131 ve sonra imzalanmal\u0131d\u0131r. Talepler tutana\u011fa yaz\u0131lmazsa, bu husus talep eden taraf\u0131ndan tutana\u011fa yaz\u0131labilir ve imzalanabilir ya da taleplerin yaz\u0131lmamas\u0131 sebebiyle ilgili taraf tutana\u011f\u0131 imzalamaktan ka\u00e7\u0131nabilir. Haciz i\u015flemleri, icra memuru taraf\u0131ndan ger\u00e7ekle\u015ftirilmektedir. Bu i\u015flemler s\u0131ras\u0131nda kanuna ayk\u0131r\u0131 bir durum s\u00f6z konusu olursa, icra mahkemesine \u015fikayet davas\u0131 a\u00e7\u0131labilir.\nEmekli Maa\u015flar\u0131 Haczedilebilir mi?\nNormalde emekli maa\u015flar\u0131 kural olarak haczedilemez. Ancak takip kesinle\u015fmi\u015f ve bor\u00e7lu onay vermi\u015fse emekli maa\u015f\u0131 haczedilebilir olur. Emekli maa\u015flar\u0131nda haczin kald\u0131r\u0131lmas\u0131 s\u00fcreye ba\u011fl\u0131 de\u011fildir ve i\u015flem icra m\u00fcd\u00fcrl\u00fc\u011f\u00fcnden talep edilir.\nHaczedilen E\u015fyalar\u0131n Sat\u0131\u015f\u0131 Nas\u0131l Olur?\nAlacakl\u0131 talep ederse haciz i\u015flemi konusu e\u015fyalar, yediemin depolar\u0131na g\u00f6t\u00fcr\u00fcl\u00fcr. Sat\u0131\u015f i\u015flemi i\u00e7in s\u00fcre\u00e7 kanuni prosed\u00fcre uygun olarak s\u00fcrd\u00fcr\u00fcl\u00fcr ve s\u00f6z konusu e\u015fyalar icra m\u00fcd\u00fcrl\u00fckleri taraf\u0131ndan sat\u0131l\u0131r. Sat\u0131\u015f bedeli de alacakl\u0131ya \u00f6denir.\nHaczedilen E\u015fyalar Nas\u0131l Geri Al\u0131n\u0131r?\nHaczedilen e\u015fyalar geri al\u0131nabilir mi? Evet, al\u0131nabilir. Ancak bunun i\u00e7in \u00f6ncelikle icra takibine neden olan bor\u00e7 ve icra masraflar\u0131 \u00f6denmelidir. Ayr\u0131ca e\u015fyalar\u0131n tutuldu\u011fu yediemin deposunun \u00f6demesi de bor\u00e7lu taraf\u0131ndan ger\u00e7ekle\u015ftirilir.\nBunun d\u0131\u015f\u0131nda bir de haczedilen e\u015fyalar\u0131n sat\u0131\u015f\u0131 i\u00e7in e\u015fyan\u0131n t\u00fcr\u00fcne g\u00f6re haciz \u00f6mr\u00fc s\u00fcresince i\u015flem yap\u0131lmam\u0131\u015fsa da haciz d\u00fc\u015fer. Bu durumda icra dairesinden s\u00f6z konusu haczin kald\u0131r\u0131lmas\u0131 talep edilir ve e\u015fyalar s\u00fcrece uygun \u015fekilde geri al\u0131nabilir.\n\u0130potek (Rehin) Nedir?\n\u0130potek, do\u011fmu\u015f veya do\u011fmas\u0131 muhtemel bir alaca\u011f\u0131n teminat alt\u0131na al\u0131nmas\u0131 amac\u0131yla ta\u015f\u0131nmaz \u00fczerinde uygulanan i\u015fleme denir. \u0130potek i\u015flemi ile s\u00f6z konusu ta\u015f\u0131nmaza ipotek konuldu\u011funa dair, ta\u015f\u0131nmaz\u0131n tapu siciline bir \u015ferh d\u00fc\u015f\u00fclmektedir. \u0130potek i\u015flemi bir banka taraf\u0131ndan ger\u00e7ekle\u015ftirilebilece\u011fi gibi bir ki\u015fi taraf\u0131ndan da ger\u00e7ekle\u015ftirilebilmektedir. Ancak kredi \u00e7ekimi gibi uygulamalar dolay\u0131s\u0131yla ipotek i\u015flemi genellikle bankalar taraf\u0131ndan ger\u00e7ekle\u015ftirilmektedir. Ta\u015f\u0131nmazlara uygulanan ipotek i\u015flemleri tapu siciline tescil edilir.\n\u0130potek Kald\u0131rma \u0130\u015flemi Nas\u0131l Yap\u0131l\u0131r?\n\u0130pote\u011fin kald\u0131r\u0131lmas\u0131 i\u00e7in ilgili ta\u015f\u0131nmaz \u00fczerine ipote\u011fi gerekli k\u0131lan borcun tamam\u0131yla \u00f6denmi\u015f olmas\u0131 gerekir. Aksi halde ipotekli mal sat\u0131l\u0131r ve alacakl\u0131 alaca\u011f\u0131n\u0131 bu mal\u0131n sat\u0131\u015f\u0131ndan elde edilen bedelden kar\u015f\u0131lar. Yani \u00f6ncelikle bor\u00e7 \u00f6denmelidir. Bor\u00e7 \u00f6denmi\u015fse, ipotek fek yaz\u0131s\u0131 yani ipote\u011fin kald\u0131r\u0131lmas\u0131 yaz\u0131s\u0131, al\u0131nmal\u0131d\u0131r. Bu yaz\u0131da belgenin bor\u00e7lu ki\u015fi ad\u0131na d\u00fczenlenmi\u015f olmas\u0131 \u00f6nemlidir. Daha sonra ipote\u011fin kald\u0131r\u0131lmas\u0131 yaz\u0131s\u0131 ile birlikte Tapu Sicil M\u00fcd\u00fcrl\u00fc\u011f\u00fcne gidilmelidir. \u0130lgili m\u00fcd\u00fcrl\u00fck, ipote\u011fin kald\u0131r\u0131lmas\u0131na ili\u015fkin inceleme ve de\u011ferlendirmelerini yapar ve ipote\u011fin kald\u0131r\u0131lmas\u0131 uygunsa, ta\u015f\u0131nmaz \u00fczerinde var olan ipotek \u015ferhi silinir ve ta\u015f\u0131nmaz ipotekli olmaktan kurtulur.\nBazen ipote\u011fe konu olan bor\u00e7 \u00f6denmi\u015f olmas\u0131na ra\u011fmen ipote\u011fin kald\u0131r\u0131lmas\u0131 i\u00e7in gerekli i\u015flemler yap\u0131lmad\u0131\u011f\u0131 i\u00e7in sorunlar ya\u015fanabilmektedir. Dolay\u0131s\u0131yla e\u011fer ipotek konusu bor\u00e7 ortadan kalkm\u0131\u015fsa, ipote\u011fin de kald\u0131r\u0131lmas\u0131 i\u00e7in gereken kanuni i\u015flemlerin yap\u0131lmas\u0131 gerekir.\nRehin Nedir?\nRehin, bir alaca\u011f\u0131n g\u00fcvencesi olarak alacak \u00f6denmedi\u011fi takdirde bu alaca\u011f\u0131n kar\u015f\u0131lanmas\u0131 amac\u0131 ile alacakl\u0131ya verilen e\u015fya ya da hakt\u0131r. Ba\u015fkas\u0131na devredilebilen alacaklar ve di\u011fer haklar \u00fczerinde de rehin kurulabilir. Ta\u015f\u0131n\u0131rlar, sadece zilyetli\u011fin alacakl\u0131ya devri suretiyle rehnedilebilir. \u0130potekten farkl\u0131 olarak, rehin i\u015flemi tapu siciline de\u011fil, ilgili ta\u015f\u0131n\u0131r\u0131n siciline tescil edilir. \u00d6rne\u011fin, motorlu ta\u015f\u0131tlara uygulanan rehin i\u015flemleri, trafik siciline tescil edilir.\n  Rehin Nas\u0131l Kald\u0131r\u0131l\u0131r?\nAlaca\u011f\u0131n \u00f6denmesi suretiyle veya ba\u015fka bir sebeple rehin hakk\u0131 sona erebilir. Alacakl\u0131, rehinli ta\u015f\u0131n\u0131r mal\u0131 hak sahibine geri vermekle y\u00fck\u00fcml\u00fcd\u00fcr. Ancak alacakl\u0131, alaca\u011f\u0131n\u0131n tamam\u0131n\u0131 almad\u0131k\u00e7a rehinli ta\u015f\u0131n\u0131r\u0131 veya onun bir k\u0131sm\u0131n\u0131 geri vermek zorunda de\u011fildir.\nAlacakl\u0131, \u00f6denmeyen alaca\u011f\u0131n\u0131n rehnin paraya \u00e7evrilmesi yoluyla \u00f6denmesini isteyebilir. Rehin hakk\u0131, alacakl\u0131ya as\u0131l alacak ile birlikte s\u00f6zle\u015fme faizlerinin, takip giderlerinin ve gecikme faizinin g\u00fcvencesini sa\u011flar.\nHaciz ile \u0130potek Fark\u0131? \nHaciz, g\u00fcvence alt\u0131na al\u0131nmam\u0131\u015f bir alaca\u011f\u0131n ifas\u0131n\u0131n ger\u00e7ekle\u015ftirilmemesi sebebiyle alacak de\u011ferinde mala el konulmas\u0131, icra dairesinin takibinde uygulanan i\u015flemlerin bir par\u00e7as\u0131d\u0131r. \u0130potek ise, do\u011fmu\u015f veya do\u011fmam\u0131\u015f bir borcun, alacakl\u0131 taraf\u0131ndan g\u00fcvence alt\u0131na al\u0131nmas\u0131d\u0131r.\nBu alacaklardan hangisi \u00f6nce tesis edilmi\u015fse o alacak \u00f6nce gelir. Ancak uygulamada fiilen haczin \u00f6ne ge\u00e7mesi m\u00fcmk\u00fcn de\u011fildir. \u00c7\u00fcnk\u00fc hacizli bir mal\u0131n \u00fczerine rehin ya da ipotek hakk\u0131 kurulamaz. Bu konuda \u0130cra \u0130flas Kanununun s\u0131ra cetveline ve Bor\u00e7lar Kanununun menkul rehnine ili\u015fkin h\u00fck\u00fcmleri etkilidir. \u00dczerinde haciz veya rehin (ipotek) olsa da, s\u00f6z konusu mal, bir ki\u015finin mal-varl\u0131\u011f\u0131na dahildir. Dolay\u0131s\u0131yla haczi ger\u00e7ekle\u015ftirilebilir. Ancak, \u00f6rne\u011fin ipotekli bir ev s\u00f6z konusuysa ve ev bir ba\u015fkas\u0131 taraf\u0131ndan haczedilir, icra dairesi taraf\u0131ndan da s\u00fcre\u00e7 sat\u0131\u015fa kadar ilerletilirse, sat\u0131\u015fta, ipotekli alacakl\u0131n\u0131n alaca\u011f\u0131, \u00f6nceliklidir. Yani sat\u0131\u015f paras\u0131ndan ilk alaca\u011f\u0131n\u0131, ipotekte ilk s\u0131rada olan ki\u015fi al\u0131r.\nKaynaklar: taa.gov.tr, yetishukuk.com, hukukiyardim.gov.tr, hukukiyardim.gov.tr 2, topo.av.tr, haybergursoy.blogspot\nVideo oynat\u0131c\u0131\nhttps://dogrula.org/wp-content/uploads/2018/02/dogrula.org_.mp4\n00:00\n00:07\n[Toplam:5    Ortalama:4.8/5] Haciz Nedir? \u0130potek (Rehin) Nedir? Haciz ile \u0130potek Fark\u0131", "Coney Adas\u0131, ABD\n\u0130nsan sergilenen hayvanat bah\u00e7eleri human zoo iddias\u0131n\u0131 dogrula.org olarak ele ald\u0131k. Bir ilkel toplum \u00f6rne\u011fi insan sergilenen hayvanat bah\u00e7elerinin 19. ve 20. y\u00fczy\u0131lda var oldu\u011fu iddias\u0131 do\u011frudur. \n\u0130nsan sergilenen hayvanat bah\u00e7eleri, 1800\u2018lerden 1960\u2032lara kadar Almanya, \u0130ngiltere, \u0130sve\u00e7, \u0130talya, Bel\u00e7ika, Hollanda, \u0130spanya ve Amerika Birle\u015fik Devletleri gibi pek \u00e7ok \u00fclkede faaliyet g\u00f6stermekteydi.\nGenelde ya\u015fam alanlar\u0131m\u0131zda g\u00f6rmedi\u011fimiz t\u00fcrden hayvanlar\u0131n sergilendi\u011fi hayvanat bah\u00e7elerinin pek \u00e7ok amac\u0131 vard\u0131r. Bunlardan en makul olanlar\u0131, insanlara hayvanlar\u0131 tan\u0131tmak, \u00e7ocuklar\u0131 bilgilendirmek \u015feklindedir. Ancak do\u011fal ya\u015fam alanlar\u0131ndan kopar\u0131lan bu canl\u0131lar\u0131n hayvanat bah\u00e7elerinde sergilenmesinin do\u011frulu\u011fu g\u00fcn\u00fcm\u00fczde tart\u0131\u015f\u0131l\u0131rken; bundan elli, altm\u0131\u015f y\u0131l kadar \u00f6nce bir canl\u0131 t\u00fcr\u00fc olarak insanlar\u0131n da sergilenmi\u015f oldu\u011funu g\u00f6rmekteyiz.\n\u0130sterseniz insan sergilenen hayvanat bah\u00e7elerinin hangi ama\u00e7la olu\u015fturuldu\u011funu ve bunlar\u0131n d\u00fcnyadaki \u00f6rneklerine bakal\u0131m.\nD\u00fcnyadan \u0130nsan Hayvanat Bah\u00e7eleri \u00d6rnekleri\nMedeniyetin ba\u015f rol\u00fc olarak g\u00f6rd\u00fc\u011f\u00fcm\u00fcz Avrupa\u2018da, Afrikal\u0131lar, Uzak Do\u011fulular ve Eskimolar\u2019dan olan bir\u00e7ok insan, yak\u0131n ge\u00e7mi\u015fte hayvanat bah\u00e7elerinde sergilenmekteydi. En medeni \u00fclkelerden kabul etti\u011fimiz \u0130ngiltere, \u0130sve\u00e7, Almanya, \u0130talya, ABD, Bel\u00e7ika ve Hollanda\u2019ya asl\u0131nda medeniyetin ne kadar ge\u00e7 geldi\u011fi a\u00e7\u0131k\u00e7a g\u00f6r\u00fclmektedir.\n\u201c\u0130nsan hayvanat bah\u00e7esi\u201d olarak bilinen g\u00f6steriler, d\u00fcnyan\u0131n d\u00f6rt bir yan\u0131ndan ancak \u00f6zellikle Afrika\u2019dan yerli halklar\u0131n ka\u00e7\u0131r\u0131lmas\u0131yla olu\u015fturuluyordu. Genellikle, g\u00f6steriler i\u00e7in hayvanat bah\u00e7eleri tarz\u0131nda in\u015fa edilmi\u015f k\u00f6ylerde sergileniyorlar ve ayn\u0131 zamanda \u00f6deme yapan halk\u0131n e\u011flencesi i\u00e7in farkl\u0131 insan t\u00fcr\u00fc olarak sahne al\u0131yorlard\u0131.\nVideo oynat\u0131c\u0131\n00:00\n00:00\n1. \u201cinsan sergilenen hayvanat bah\u00e7eleri\u201d\n0:15\nA\u015fa\u011f\u0131daki foto\u011frafta, 1900\u2019l\u00fc y\u0131llar\u0131n ba\u015flar\u0131nda New York\u2019ta bir hayvanat bah\u00e7esinde daire i\u00e7inde oturanlar Filipinler yerlileridir. Beyaz Amerikal\u0131lar, bariyerlerin arkas\u0131ndan yerlileri izlemektedir:\nNew York, ABD\nBir di\u011fer foto\u011fraf ise Bel\u00e7ika\u2019dan. Afrikal\u0131 olan k\u00fc\u00e7\u00fck bir k\u0131z, 1958 y\u0131l\u0131nda Bel\u00e7ika\u2019n\u0131n ba\u015fkenti Br\u00fcksel\u2019de sergilenmekteydi. Tahta \u00e7itlerin arkas\u0131ndan onu izleyen ziyaret\u00e7iler, kendilerinden farkl\u0131 g\u00f6rd\u00fckleri k\u00fc\u00e7\u00fck k\u0131za ekmek uzatmaktad\u0131rlar.\nBr\u00fcksel, Bel\u00e7ika\nBu foto\u011fraf ise Alman bir zoolog olan Lutz Heck, 1931 y\u0131l\u0131nda Afrika\u2019dan getirdi\u011fi anne ve \u00e7ocuklar\u0131yla bir filin \u00f6n\u00fcnde poz vermektedir.\nABD, Chicago\u2018da bulunan bu sergide ise, Eskimo bir k\u0131z \u00e7ocu\u011fu yan\u0131ndaki k\u00f6pekle birlikte D\u00fcnya Fuar\u0131nda sergilenmekteydi.\nChicago, ABD\nSon foto\u011fraf da Fransa\u2019n\u0131n ba\u015fkenti Paris\u2018ten. 1931 y\u0131l\u0131nda d\u00fczenlenen Paris D\u00fcnya Fuar\u0131ndaki insan sergisi, d\u00f6neminde b\u00fcy\u00fck yank\u0131 bularak 34 milyon ziyaret\u00e7iye ula\u015fm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r.\nParis, Fransa\nKaynaklar: Global Research, The Guardian, listelist.com, exposingtruth.com, mirror.co.uk, spiegel.de\nVideo oynat\u0131c\u0131\n00:00\n00:00\n1. \u201cdogrula.org\u201d\n0:07\n[Toplam:6    Ortalama:5/5] \u0130nsan Sergilenen Hayvanat Bah\u00e7eleri Human Zoo \u0130ddias\u0131", "\u201cGrowth Plus Nedir? Ger\u00e7ekten Boy Uzat\u0131yor mu? Kullan\u0131c\u0131 Yorumlar\u0131\u201d ba\u015fl\u0131kl\u0131 i\u00e7eri\u011fimizde boy uzat\u0131c\u0131 \u00f6zellikli oldu\u011fu iddia edilen Growth Plus \u00fcr\u00fcn\u00fcn\u00fc inceledik.\nGrowth Plus \u00fcr\u00fcn\u00fcne dair takip\u00e7i say\u0131s\u0131 \u00e7ok olan bir\u00e7ok sosyal medya hesab\u0131nda tan\u0131t\u0131m yap\u0131lmaktad\u0131r. Ancak bu sosyal medya hesaplar\u0131, sadece reklam anla\u015fmas\u0131 dolay\u0131s\u0131yla payla\u015f\u0131m yapt\u0131\u011f\u0131 ve \u00fcr\u00fcn\u00fc incelemedi\u011fi i\u00e7in asl\u0131nda tehlikeli bir giri\u015fimde bulunmaktad\u0131r. \u00c7\u00fcnk\u00fc insanlar bu hesaplara g\u00fcvenip, \u00fcr\u00fcn\u00fcn ger\u00e7ekten i\u015fe yarad\u0131\u011f\u0131n\u0131 d\u00fc\u015f\u00fcnerek, sat\u0131n almaktad\u0131rlar.\nGrowth Plus Nedir? \u0130\u015fe Yar\u0131yor mu?\nGrowth Plus, boy uzat\u0131c\u0131 \u00f6zellikli ve tamamen do\u011fal i\u00e7erikli oldu\u011fu iddia edilen bitki \u00e7ay\u0131 olarak ya da toz halinde sat\u0131\u015f\u0131 yap\u0131lan bir \u00fcr\u00fcnd\u00fcr. \u00dcr\u00fcn\u00fcn tan\u0131t\u0131m\u0131n\u0131n yap\u0131ld\u0131\u011f\u0131 site ve sosyal medya hesaplar\u0131nda, \u00fcr\u00fcn\u00fc kullanan ki\u015filerin 1 ayda 2-4 cm, 2 ayda 4-6 cm, 4 ayda 6-8 cm, 6 ayda 10-12 cm uzamas\u0131n\u0131n m\u00fcmk\u00fcn oldu\u011fu iddia edilmi\u015ftir. Ancak bu iddia do\u011fru de\u011fildir.\nGrowth Plus Neden \u0130\u015fe Yaram\u0131yor?\nBoy uzamas\u0131n\u0131 genel itibariyle etkileyen \u00fc\u00e7 fakt\u00f6r vard\u0131r: Genetik kapasite, beslenme, hormonlar. Metabolizmada bir anormallik olmad\u0131\u011f\u0131 m\u00fcddet\u00e7e boy uzunlu\u011funda bir alt s\u0131n\u0131r vard\u0131r. Boy uzamas\u0131n\u0131 etkileyen herhangi bir sa\u011fl\u0131k problemi olmad\u0131k\u00e7a da, eri\u015fkin bir insan\u0131n boy uzunlu\u011fu bu alt s\u0131n\u0131r\u0131n a\u015fa\u011f\u0131s\u0131nda olamaz. Yani \u00f6rne\u011fin; genetik kapasitesi 150 \u2013 185 cm aras\u0131nda olan bir birey, hi\u00e7bir takviye kullanmasa da zaman i\u00e7erisinde boyu 150 santimetrenin \u00fczerine \u00e7\u0131kacakt\u0131r ama 185 cm\u2019e ula\u015fmas\u0131 i\u00e7in hormonlar ve beslenme de \u00f6nemlidir. Genetik kapasitedeki en \u00fcst seviyeye \u00e7\u0131kabilmek i\u00e7in hormonlar\u0131n etkili oldu\u011fu belirtildi\u011finde, genellikle sadece b\u00fcy\u00fcme hormonu tek ba\u015f\u0131na yeterliymi\u015f gibi alg\u0131lan\u0131r. Ancak o da tek ba\u015f\u0131na yeterli de\u011fildir. Boy uzunlu\u011fu i\u00e7in metabolizmada hormonlar\u0131 destekleyecek bir\u00e7ok etken vard\u0131r. Bunlardan en \u00f6nemlisi beslenme olmakla beraber, uyku kalitesi ve saatleri, fiziksel egzersizler, kan de\u011ferleri gibi bir\u00e7ok etken b\u00fcy\u00fcme hormonunu etkilemektedir.\nB\u00fcy\u00fcme plaklar\u0131, yani kemik u\u00e7lar\u0131ndaki b\u00fcy\u00fcme alanlar\u0131nda bulunan h\u00fccrelerin \u00e7o\u011falmas\u0131 laz\u0131m ki, kemikler ve dolay\u0131s\u0131yla boy uzayabilsin. \u0130\u015fte hormonlar, bu h\u00fccrelerin \u00e7o\u011falmas\u0131n\u0131 tetiklemektedir. Ancak h\u00fccrelerin sa\u011fl\u0131kl\u0131 bir \u015fekilde \u00e7o\u011falmas\u0131 ve korunabilmesi i\u00e7in gerekli olan baz\u0131 besin ve minerallerin v\u00fccutta bulunmas\u0131 gerekir. E\u011fer b\u00fcy\u00fcme plaklar\u0131 kapanm\u0131\u015fsa bir insan kemik olarak daha fazla uzayamaz. B\u00fcy\u00fcme plaklar\u0131 kapand\u0131ktan sonra, sadece t\u0131bbi ve cerrahi m\u00fcdahalelerle boy uzamas\u0131 m\u00fcmk\u00fcn olabilir. Dolay\u0131s\u0131yla b\u00fcy\u00fcme plaklar\u0131 kapal\u0131 bir insan\u0131n, i\u00e7ece\u011fi boy uzatma \u00f6zellikli herhangi bir bitki \u00e7ay\u0131 ya da toz bir i\u015fe yaramayacakt\u0131r. B\u00fcy\u00fcme plaklar\u0131 hen\u00fcz a\u00e7\u0131k olan bir bireyin ise bu tarz bitki \u00e7aylar\u0131na ihtiyac\u0131 yoktur. Do\u011fru beslenmek, uyku saatleri ve kalitesine dikkat etmek, egzersiz yapmak gibi y\u00f6ntemlerle sa\u011fl\u0131kl\u0131 bir \u015fekilde genetik kapasitedeki boy \u00fcst s\u0131n\u0131r\u0131na ula\u015fmak m\u00fcmk\u00fcn. B\u00fcy\u00fcme plaklar\u0131n\u0131n kapal\u0131 ve a\u00e7\u0131kken nas\u0131l g\u00f6r\u00fcnd\u00fc\u011f\u00fcn\u00fc a\u015fa\u011f\u0131daki g\u00f6rsellerden g\u00f6zlemlemek m\u00fcmk\u00fcn.\nGrowth Plus Zararl\u0131 m\u0131?\nGrowth Plus\u2019\u0131n tan\u0131t\u0131m\u0131n\u0131n yap\u0131ld\u0131\u011f\u0131 \u0130nternet sitelerinde \u00fcr\u00fcn\u00fcn i\u00e7erisinde Ashwaganda (morsalk\u0131m, hint ginsengi, k\u0131\u015f kiraz\u0131) bitkisinin bulundu\u011fu iddia ediliyor. Ashwaganda bitkisinin do\u011fru kullan\u0131m\u0131 halinde bir\u00e7ok faydas\u0131n\u0131n oldu\u011funu s\u00f6ylemek m\u00fcmk\u00fcn. Ancak boy uzatma gibi bir \u00f6zelli\u011fi bulunmuyor. Growth Plus sitelerinde yap\u0131lan tan\u0131t\u0131mlarda \u00fcr\u00fcn\u00fcn herkes i\u00e7in uygun oldu\u011fu iddia edilmekte ancak \u00f6zellikle s\u00fcrekli d\u00fc\u015f\u00fck kan \u015fekerine sahip ki\u015filerin, otoimm\u00fcn bozukluklar sebebiyle hasta olanlar\u0131n, hamilelerin ve emziren annelerin Ashwaganda bitkisini kullanmamas\u0131 tavsiye edilmektedir. Dolay\u0131s\u0131yla \u00fcr\u00fcn\u00fc kullanan bireylerin, bunu bilmemeleri halinde \u00fcr\u00fcn sayesinde boylar\u0131 uzamayaca\u011f\u0131 gibi, zarar g\u00f6rmeleri dahi m\u00fcmk\u00fcn.\nGrowth Plus Doland\u0131r\u0131c\u0131l\u0131\u011f\u0131\nGrowth Plus\u2019\u0131n neden i\u015fe yaramad\u0131\u011f\u0131n\u0131 ve zararl\u0131 olabilce\u011fini a\u00e7\u0131klad\u0131k. \u015eimdi ise bu \u00fcr\u00fcn\u00fcn bir sahtekarl\u0131k malzemesi olup olmad\u0131\u011f\u0131ndan bahsedelim. Growth Plus reklamlar\u0131yla genellikle sosyal medyada kar\u015f\u0131la\u015f\u0131lmaktad\u0131r. Ancak \u00fcr\u00fcn\u00fcn tan\u0131t\u0131m\u0131n\u0131 yapan resmi bir hesap yoktur. Bir\u00e7ok sosyal medya hesab\u0131 ayn\u0131 \u00fcr\u00fcn\u00fc satt\u0131\u011f\u0131n\u0131 iddia etmektedir. Bu durum \u00fcr\u00fcnle alakal\u0131 \u015f\u00fcpheleri artt\u0131rmaktad\u0131r. \u00c7\u00fcnk\u00fc resmi sat\u0131\u015f sayfas\u0131 olan hi\u00e7bir firma, sosyal medyada ba\u015fka sayfalar\u0131n (aralar\u0131nda bir anla\u015fma olmad\u0131k\u00e7a) \u00fcr\u00fcnlerinin sat\u0131\u015f\u0131n\u0131 yapmas\u0131na m\u00fcsaade etmez. Fakat sadece Instagram\u2019da bile Growth Plus sat\u0131\u015f\u0131 yapan onlarca hesap bulunmaktad\u0131r. Bunlar aras\u0131ndan bu i\u00e7eri\u011fi haz\u0131rlad\u0131\u011f\u0131m\u0131z tarihte aktif olan baz\u0131 hesaplar \u015f\u00f6yle:\ngrowthplustr, growthplusviptr, growthplusvip, growthplus, growthplusofficialtr, growthplus.turkiye, growthplustrr\nGrowth Plus ile alakal\u0131 \u015f\u00fcphe \u00e7eken bir ba\u015fka durum da \u00fcr\u00fcn\u00fcn sitesinin kolay ula\u015f\u0131labilir olmamas\u0131d\u0131r. Arama motorlar\u0131na Growth Plus yaz\u0131ld\u0131\u011f\u0131nda \u00e7\u0131kan sitelerden aras\u0131ndan sadece bir tanesi \u00fcr\u00fcnle do\u011frudan ba\u011flant\u0131l\u0131 gibi g\u00f6r\u00fclmektedir. Ancak bu site de arac\u0131 site gibi konumland\u0131r\u0131lm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r. \u00c7\u00fcnk\u00fc bu siteye girildi\u011finde sadece \u00fcr\u00fcn\u00fcn g\u00f6rsellerinden olu\u015fan bir sayfa g\u00f6r\u00fcnt\u00fclenmekte ve sayfan\u0131n a\u015fa\u011f\u0131s\u0131nda Instagram sayfas\u0131na y\u00f6nlendiren bir linkten ba\u015fka bir \u015fey bulunmamaktad\u0131r. Y\u00f6nlendirilen Instagram hesab\u0131n\u0131n bio k\u0131sm\u0131nda bulunan linkten \u00fcr\u00fcn\u00fcn sat\u0131\u015f\u0131n\u0131n yap\u0131ld\u0131\u011f\u0131 as\u0131l siteye ula\u015f\u0131labilmektedir.\nAs\u0131l siteye ula\u015f\u0131nca da \u00fcr\u00fcnle alakal\u0131 \u00e7eli\u015fkili olan durumlarla kar\u015f\u0131la\u015f\u0131lmaktad\u0131r. \u00d6rne\u011fin, sitedeki baz\u0131 yerlerde \u00fcr\u00fcn\u00fcn ABD\u2019de \u00fcretildi\u011fi ve oradan ithal edildi\u011fi belirtilmi\u015f, baz\u0131 yerlerde ise Avrupa\u2019da ortaya \u00e7\u0131kt\u0131\u011f\u0131 ve yay\u0131ld\u0131\u011f\u0131 s\u00f6ylenmi\u015ftir.\nAyr\u0131ca sitedeki s\u00f6zde kullan\u0131c\u0131lar\u0131n yorumlar\u0131 \u00e7ok benzer olup, yap\u0131lan yaz\u0131m hatalar\u0131 bile neredeyse ayn\u0131d\u0131r. \u00dcstelik t\u00fcm kullan\u0131c\u0131lar\u0131n profil foto\u011fraflar\u0131yla, Growth Plus sitesine g\u00f6nderdikleri foto\u011fraflar da ayn\u0131d\u0131r.\nGrowth Plus Kullananlar\u0131n Yorumlar\u0131\nT\u00fcm bu \u015f\u00fcpheli durumlara ra\u011fmen boyunun uzamas\u0131 \u00fcmidiyle bu \u00fcr\u00fcn\u00fc sat\u0131n alan ki\u015filerin say\u0131s\u0131 maalesef \u00e7ok fazla. Bu ki\u015filerden baz\u0131lar\u0131, \u00fcr\u00fcn\u00fc kulland\u0131ktan sonra \u0130nternet\u2019te farkl\u0131 sitelerde konuyla alakal\u0131 yorumlar yapm\u0131\u015f ve \u00fcr\u00fcn\u00fcn i\u015fe yaramad\u0131\u011f\u0131n\u0131, sat\u0131\u015f\u0131 ger\u00e7ekle\u015ftirenlerin doland\u0131r\u0131c\u0131l\u0131k yapt\u0131\u011f\u0131n\u0131 ifade etmi\u015flerdir. Bu yorumlardan baz\u0131lar\u0131 \u015f\u00f6yle:\n\u00dcr\u00fcn hakk\u0131nda olumlu yorum yapanlar\u0131n neredeyse tamam\u0131 ise ya\u015flar\u0131n\u0131n 12-20 aras\u0131nda oldu\u011funu belirtmi\u015ftir. Dolay\u0131s\u0131yla zaten bu ki\u015filer geli\u015fim d\u00f6neminde olduklar\u0131 i\u00e7in \u00fcr\u00fcn sayesinde boylar\u0131n\u0131n uzad\u0131\u011f\u0131n\u0131 s\u00f6ylemek pek m\u00fcmk\u00fcn de\u011fildir. \nGrowth Plus Benzeri \u00dcr\u00fcnler\nGrowth Plus gibi boy uzat\u0131c\u0131 \u00f6zellikte oldu\u011fu iddia edilen, ancak boy uzamas\u0131na etki etmeyen farkl\u0131 birka\u00e7 \u00fcr\u00fcn ve kullan\u0131c\u0131 yorumlar\u0131 da \u015f\u00f6yle:\nJmexy Growth\nBoy uzat\u0131c\u0131 \u00f6zellikte oldu\u011fu iddia edilen sprey. \u00dcr\u00fcne dair bir yorum:\nKIMI \nBoy uzat\u0131c\u0131 \u00f6zellikte oldu\u011fu iddia edilen tabanl\u0131k. \u00dcr\u00fcne dair bir yorum:\nSuper Growth \nBoy uzat\u0131c\u0131 \u00f6zellikte oldu\u011fu iddia edilen bir ba\u015fka sprey. Super Growth \u00fcr\u00fcn\u00fcn yorumland\u0131\u011f\u0131 bir\u00e7ok sitede yorumlar silinmi\u015f oldu\u011fu i\u00e7in \u00fcr\u00fcne dair a\u00e7\u0131klama mahiyetindeki videodan bilgi edinebilirsiniz.\n  Kaynaklar: growthplustr.com, Instagram, growthplus-tr.com, fitekran, fitekran 2, YouTube, shortsupport\nVideo oynat\u0131c\u0131\nhttps://dogrula.org/wp-content/uploads/2018/02/dogrula.org_.mp4\n00:00\n00:07\n  [Toplam:39    Ortalama:3.3/5] Growth Plus Nedir? Ger\u00e7ekten Boy Uzat\u0131yor mu? Kullan\u0131c\u0131 Yorumlar\u0131", "Kuran-\u0131 Kerim ilk olarak Venedik\u2019te bas\u0131ld\u0131 iddias\u0131n\u0131 sizler i\u00e7in ele ald\u0131k. Kuran\u2019\u0131n ilk kez \u0130talya\u2019n\u0131n bir \u015fehri olan Venedik\u2018te bas\u0131ld\u0131\u011f\u0131n\u0131, matbaan\u0131n nas\u0131l Avrupa\u2019da geli\u015fti\u011fini geni\u015f bir \u00e7er\u00e7eveden sunmadan \u00f6nce bu iddian\u0131n do\u011fru oldu\u011funu belirtelim.\nG\u00fcn\u00fcm\u00fczden 30 y\u0131l kadar \u00f6nce, Venedik adalar\u0131ndan birinin \u00fczerinde bulunan bir k\u00fct\u00fcphanede 500 ya\u015f\u0131nda bir kitab\u0131n hayatta kalan tek versiyonu ke\u015ffedilmi\u015ftir. Bu kitap, \u0130slam dininin kutsal kitab\u0131 olan Kuran\u2019\u0131n ilk bas\u0131l\u0131 kopyas\u0131d\u0131r. Yani d\u00fcnyan\u0131n ilk bas\u0131l\u0131 Kuran\u2019\u0131 Venedik\u2019te \u00fcretilmi\u015ftir. \nBulunan kitab\u0131n dikkat \u00e7ekici \u00f6zelli\u011fi, Arap\u00e7as\u0131 zay\u0131f kimseler taraf\u0131ndan bas\u0131lm\u0131\u015f olmas\u0131d\u0131r. Bu giri\u015fim, hareket edebilir basma harflerle Arap\u00e7a el yaz\u0131s\u0131n\u0131 yeniden \u00fcretmeyi ama\u00e7layan ilk dalga olmu\u015ftur. Bilindi\u011fi \u00fczere, Arap\u00e7a\u2019daki harflerin \u00e7ok say\u0131da farkl\u0131 yaz\u0131m \u015fekilleri vard\u0131r. Her harf, birle\u015fti\u011fi harfe ve konumuna g\u00f6re \u015fekil de\u011fi\u015ftirmektedir. Bu nedenle bas\u0131m\u0131 \u00e7ok zor olmu\u015ftur. Nitekim bu ilk bas\u0131l\u0131 kitapta da bir\u00e7ok yaz\u0131m hatas\u0131 bulunmu\u015ftur.\nVenedik\u2019te bas\u0131lan Kuran\u2019\u0131n n\u00fcshas\u0131\n1537 ya da 1538\u2019de iki Venedikli baba ve o\u011ful olan Paganini ve Alessandro Paganini bas\u0131m i\u015fini halka a\u00e7m\u0131\u015ft\u0131r. Ancak bas\u0131m hatalar\u0131 oldu\u011fu i\u00e7in, Papa taraf\u0131ndan t\u00fcm kopyalar\u0131n\u0131n yak\u0131lmas\u0131 emredilmi\u015ftir. Y\u00fczy\u0131llar boyunca, b\u00fct\u00fcn bask\u0131lar\u0131n  kayboldu\u011fu d\u00fc\u015f\u00fcn\u00fcl\u00fcyordu. Fakat, 1987 y\u0131l\u0131nda profes\u00f6r Angela Nuovo, Venedik\u2019te bulunan Isola di San Michele Franciscan Friars\u2018\u0131n k\u00fct\u00fcphanesinde Kuran\u2019\u0131n tek bir kopyas\u0131n\u0131 bulmu\u015ftur.\nDiyanet \u0130\u015fleri Ba\u015fkanl\u0131\u011f\u0131n\u0131n resmi bir makalesine g\u00f6re de, ilk Kuran-\u0131 Kerim\u2019in bas\u0131m\u0131 1530 y\u0131l\u0131nda \u0130talyan matbaac\u0131 Paganini taraf\u0131ndan Venedik\u2019te yap\u0131lm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r:\n\u0130lk Kuran-\u0131 Kerim Neden Venedik\u2019te Bas\u0131ld\u0131?\nM\u00fcsl\u00fcmanlar, y\u00fczy\u0131llar boyunca matbaay\u0131 kabul etmemi\u015f ve bu hatal\u0131 bas\u0131lm\u0131\u015f kitap da onlar\u0131n aras\u0131nda ra\u011fbet g\u00f6rmemi\u015ftir. Kitab\u0131n t\u00fcm kopyalar\u0131 imha edilmi\u015ftir. Bat\u0131 d\u00fcnyas\u0131nda kalan tek bas\u0131m\u0131 da hala Venedik k\u00fct\u00fcphanesindedir. \n800 y\u0131l \u00f6nce \u0130slami bilimin ba\u015far\u0131l\u0131 olmas\u0131n\u0131n nedenlerinden biri, Arap harflerin yaz\u0131m\u0131n\u0131n 70\u2019ten fazla farkl\u0131 \u015feklinin bulunmas\u0131d\u0131r. Bu durum, bir\u00e7ok \u00fclkeden alimin tek ve ortak bir dil ile ileti\u015fim kurmas\u0131n\u0131 sa\u011flam\u0131\u015ft\u0131r. Her ne kadar tats\u0131z olaylara sebebiyet vermi\u015f olsa da Do\u011fu ile ticaret, Venedik\u2019in k\u00fclt\u00fcrel ya\u015fant\u0131s\u0131na b\u00fcy\u00fck zenginlik katm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r. Venedikli t\u00fcccarlar Do\u011fu\u2019ya gidecekleri zaman kendilerine sakal tavsiye edilmi\u015ftir. Hatta Do\u011fu\u2019nun ya\u015fant\u0131s\u0131na uyum sa\u011flamaya y\u00f6nelik k\u0131lavuzlara dahi sahiptirler. Venediklilerin M\u00fcsl\u00fcman kom\u015fular\u0131yla ticareti; b\u00f6lgede \u0130slam\u2019\u0131n etkisini daha da g\u00fc\u00e7lendirmi\u015ftir. Arap kahve k\u00fclt\u00fcr\u00fcn\u00fcn yayg\u0131nla\u015fmas\u0131n\u0131n yan\u0131 s\u0131ra, \u0130slami mimari de kemerleri ve dekorasyonuyla kendini hissettirmeye ba\u015flam\u0131\u015ft\u0131r.\nBunlar\u0131 takip eden s\u00fcre\u00e7te,  Arap\u00e7a kitaplar da Venedikli alimler aras\u0131nda ra\u011fbet g\u00f6rmeye ba\u015flam\u0131\u015f ve 9.y\u00fczy\u0131lda cebir \u00fczerine yaz\u0131lan b\u00fcy\u00fck Arap\u00e7a metin 12.y\u00fczy\u0131lda Latince\u2019ye \u00e7evrilmi\u015ftir. Yine ayn\u0131 y\u00fczy\u0131lda Arap\u00e7a astronomik tablolar incelenmi\u015f ve 15.y\u00fczy\u0131lda \u0130bn-i Sina\u2019n\u0131n t\u0131p \u00fczerine yazd\u0131\u011f\u0131 \u201cEl-Kanun Fi\u2019t T\u0131b\u201d isimli b\u00fcy\u00fck kitab\u0131 yay\u0131nlanm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r.\nBu \u00f6\u011frenme ak\u0131n\u0131, b\u00fcy\u00fck bir tarihsel de\u011fi\u015fimi de beraberinde getirmi\u015ftir. Bilimin, Bat\u0131\u2019ya hareket etmeye ba\u015flam\u0131\u015ft\u0131r. 1500\u2018l\u00fc y\u0131llardan sonra ger\u00e7ekle\u015fen b\u00fcy\u00fck bulu\u015flar art\u0131k Avrupa\u2019dan \u00e7\u0131kacakt\u0131r.\nMatbaan\u0131n bulu\u015fuyla birlikte bilimsel d\u00fc\u015f\u00fcncelerin h\u0131zl\u0131 yay\u0131lmas\u0131, bat\u0131da R\u00f6nesans\u2019\u0131 h\u0131zland\u0131r\u0131rken; sembolleri ve fazladan harfleri sebebiyle Arap\u00e7a dilinin etkile\u015fimini ve \u0130slami bilimi geride b\u0131rakm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r. Bat\u0131da bulunan matbaa, \u0130slami bilimin durmas\u0131nda kilit nokta olmu\u015ftur. Avrupa ise Yunanl\u0131lar\u0131n ve Araplar\u0131n bilgisini bu yeni teknolojiyle sentez edebilme yoluna gitmi\u015ftir. Galileo ve onun gibi bilim adamlar\u0131 da R\u00f6nesans\u2019\u0131 zirvede tutmay\u0131 ba\u015farm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r.\nNot: Bu i\u00e7erik, g\u00f6n\u00fcll\u00fc edit\u00f6r\u00fcm\u00fcz taraf\u0131ndan yaz\u0131lm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r. Siz de sitemizde g\u00f6n\u00fcll\u00fc edit\u00f6r olmak ister misiniz? Linke t\u0131klayarak hemen ba\u015fvurunuzu yapabilirsiniz.\nKaynaklar: diyanet.gov.tr, Edinburgh \u00dcniversitesi, History of information, bible-quran.com, Kolombiya \u00dcniversitesi\nVideo oynat\u0131c\u0131\n00:00\n00:00\n1. \u201cdogrula.org\u201d\n0:07\n[Toplam:7    Ortalama:4.6/5] Kuran-\u0131 Kerim \u0130lk Olarak Venedik\u2019te Bas\u0131ld\u0131 \u0130ddias\u0131", "Se\u00e7im \u0130ttifak\u0131 Nedir? D\u00fcnyadan Se\u00e7im \u0130ttifak\u0131 \u00d6rnekleri konulu yaz\u0131m\u0131zda, se\u00e7im ittifak\u0131n\u0131 detayland\u0131rarak inceleyece\u011fiz.\n\u201cCumhur \u0130ttifak\u0131\u201d, Adalet ve Kalk\u0131nma Partisi (AKP) ile Milliyet\u00e7i Hareket Partisi (MHP)\u2019nin, se\u00e7imlere ittifak (anla\u015fma, uyu\u015fma, ba\u011fla\u015fma) \u00e7at\u0131s\u0131 alt\u0131nda kat\u0131ld\u0131klar\u0131 bir \u00e7e\u015fit anla\u015fmad\u0131r. Cumhur, \u201chalk\u201d demektir.\nBir se\u00e7im ittifak\u0131; iki partili se\u00e7im anla\u015fmas\u0131, se\u00e7im pakt\u0131, se\u00e7im s\u00f6zle\u015fmesi, se\u00e7im koalisyonu veya se\u00e7im blo\u011fu \u015feklinde olabilir.\nSe\u00e7im \u00f6ncesi ittifaklar, liberal demokrasilerde yayg\u0131n bir olgudur. Sadece Bat\u0131 Avrupa\u2019da, 1946 ile 2012 y\u0131llar\u0131 aras\u0131nda 200\u2019den fazla se\u00e7im \u00f6ncesi koalisyon kurulmu\u015ftur. Se\u00e7im \u00f6ncesi koalisyonlar\u0131n bi\u00e7imleri, partiden partiye ve \u00fclkeden \u00fclkeye de\u011fi\u015fir.\n\u00c7o\u011fu demokraside, tek partiler yasama deste\u011finin \u00e7o\u011funlu\u011funa hakim olamazlar. B\u00f6ylece, y\u00fcr\u00fctme yetkisini kullanmak isteyen siyasi partiler genellikle bir t\u00fcr koalisyona girmek zorunda kal\u0131rlar. Se\u00e7imden \u00f6nce ba\u015fka bir parti veya partilerle se\u00e7im koalisyonu olu\u015fturabilir, ya da se\u00e7im zaman\u0131nda ba\u011f\u0131ms\u0131z olarak rekabet edebilir ve sonras\u0131nda bir h\u00fck\u00fcmet koalisyonu olu\u015fturabilirler.\nSe\u00e7im ittifak\u0131 nas\u0131l yap\u0131l\u0131r?\n\u0130ttifak i\u00e7indeki partilerin her birinin kendi politikalar\u0131 vard\u0131r, fakat ortak hedefler ve ideoloji lehine farkl\u0131l\u0131klar\u0131 ge\u00e7ici olarak bir kenara b\u0131rakmay\u0131 se\u00e7erler. Baz\u0131 durumlarda, belirli bir aday\u0131n ya da partinin iktidar\u0131 ele ge\u00e7irmesini engellemek i\u00e7in, kaynaklar\u0131 bir araya getirmeyi kabul eden, \u00e7ok farkl\u0131 politika hedefleri olan taraflarca da bir se\u00e7im ittifak\u0131 olu\u015fturulabilir.\nSe\u00e7imden sonra olu\u015fan bir koalisyondan farkl\u0131 olarak, bir se\u00e7im ittifak\u0131nda ortaklar genellikle birbirlerine kar\u015f\u0131 aday g\u00f6stermezler, ancak destek\u00e7ilerini di\u011fer ittifak \u00fcyelerinden adaylara oy vermeye te\u015fvik ederler. Bu partiler genellikle se\u00e7im sonras\u0131nda i\u015fbirli\u011fini devam ettirmeyi ama\u00e7lar; \u00f6rne\u011fin ortak g\u00f6r\u00fc\u015flere sahip olduklar\u0131 konularda birlikte kampanya y\u00fcr\u00fctmek gibi.\nAyr\u0131ca k\u00fc\u00e7\u00fck partiler, b\u00fcy\u00fck partinin aday\u0131n\u0131 onaylamay\u0131 veya aday g\u00f6stermeyi teklif ederek, aday\u0131n platformunu etkileyebilir.\nCumhur \u0130ttifak\u0131\nAdalet ve Kalk\u0131nma Partisi Genel Ba\u015fkan Yard\u0131mc\u0131s\u0131 ve Se\u00e7im \u0130\u015fleri Ba\u015fkan\u0131 Ahmet Sorgun konu\u015fmas\u0131nda, yerel se\u00e7imlerin 24 Mart 2019\u2018da, Cumhurba\u015fkanl\u0131\u011f\u0131 ve Milletvekili genel se\u00e7iminin de 3 Kas\u0131m 2019\u2018da yap\u0131laca\u011f\u0131n\u0131 s\u00f6ylemi\u015fti. Ancak Cumhurba\u015fkan\u0131 Recep Tayyip Erdo\u011fan 18 Nisan\u2019da yapt\u0131\u011f\u0131 erken se\u00e7im a\u00e7\u0131klamas\u0131yla, yerel se\u00e7imlerin 24 Haziran 2018\u2019de yap\u0131laca\u011f\u0131n\u0131 duyurmu\u015ftur.\nSe\u00e7im ittifak\u0131 kanun teklifi maddeleri;\nKaynak/ AA\nMHP ile yap\u0131lacak \u201ccumhur ittifak\u0131\u201dnda, her iki partinin milletvekili say\u0131s\u0131n\u0131n artaca\u011f\u0131 hesaplanm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r.\nAyr\u0131ca, ittifak yapan partiler a\u00e7\u0131s\u0131ndan y\u00fczde 10 baraj\u0131 sorunu da olmayacak. \u0130ttifakta yer alan bir partinin oy oran\u0131 y\u00fczde 10\u2019un alt\u0131nda kalsa bile toplam oy oran\u0131 y\u00fczde 10\u2019nun \u00fczerindeyse alt\u0131nda kalan parti de baraj\u0131 ge\u00e7mi\u015f say\u0131lacak.\nSe\u00e7imlere kat\u0131lma yeterlili\u011fi bulunan 9 parti alfabetik s\u0131rayla \u015f\u00f6yle:\nAdalet ve Kalk\u0131nma Partisi\nBa\u011f\u0131ms\u0131z T\u00fcrkiye Partisi\nB\u00fcy\u00fck Birlik Partisi\nCumhuriyet Halk Partisi\nDemokrat Parti\nHalklar\u0131n Demokratik Partisi\nMilliyet\u00e7i Hareket Partisi\nSaadet Partisi\nVatan Partisi\nse\u00e7im ittifak\u0131 oy pusulas\u0131\nSe\u00e7im ittifak\u0131 nedir? Se\u00e7im \u00f6ncesi koalisyon olu\u015fumu nas\u0131ld\u0131r?\nSe\u00e7im \u00f6ncesi koalisyonlar olu\u015fturma ko\u015fullar\u0131 sistematik olarak ara\u015ft\u0131r\u0131lmam\u0131\u015f olsa da, koalisyon olu\u015fumunu etkileyen fakt\u00f6rler hakk\u0131nda iki ana hipotez bulunabilir.\nSe\u00e7im \u00f6ncesi ittifaklar\u0131n orant\u0131s\u0131z se\u00e7im sistemlerinde ortaya \u00e7\u0131kma olas\u0131l\u0131\u011f\u0131n\u0131n daha y\u00fcksek oldu\u011fu, varsay\u0131mlardan biridir.\n\u00c7o\u011funluk / \u00e7o\u011ful se\u00e7im sistemleri genellikle daha b\u00fcy\u00fck partilerden yararlan\u0131r. Parti sisteminde ikiden fazla rakip parti varsa, b\u00fcy\u00fck partiler yasama organ\u0131nda \u00e7o\u011funlu\u011fa ula\u015fma \u015fans\u0131n\u0131 ve dolay\u0131s\u0131yla h\u00fck\u00fcmetin bir par\u00e7as\u0131 olma \u015fanslar\u0131n\u0131 geni\u015fletmek i\u00e7in se\u00e7im \u00f6ncesi ittifaklar arama e\u011filimindedir. Bu t\u00fcr se\u00e7im sistemlerinde, taraflar oylar\u0131n\u0131 payla\u015fabilirler.\nSiyasi partiler, kampanya stratejilerini koordine ederek ve bazen siyasi programlar\u0131n\u0131 uyumlu hale getirerek, mecliste fazla sandalye kazanma \u015fans\u0131n\u0131 art\u0131rmaya \u00e7al\u0131\u015f\u0131rlar. Bazen bir siyasi parti, potansiyel koalisyon orta\u011f\u0131na oy vermek i\u00e7in se\u00e7menlerine taktik tavsiyelerde bulunabilir. Bu, \u00f6zellikle se\u00e7menlerin bir oy pusulas\u0131nda iki oyu kullanabilecekleri ve oylar\u0131n\u0131 b\u00f6lme imkan\u0131na sahip olduklar\u0131 ve bu nedenle bir oy pusulas\u0131yla iki farkl\u0131 partiyi destekleyebilecekleri se\u00e7im sistemlerinde yap\u0131l\u0131r.\nSe\u00e7im \u00f6ncesi koalisyonlar\u0131n, se\u00e7menlerin oy vermeden \u00f6nce olas\u0131 h\u00fck\u00fcmet alternatiflerini tespit etmelerine imkan tan\u0131d\u0131\u011f\u0131 i\u00e7in yard\u0131mc\u0131 nitelikte oldu\u011fu s\u00f6ylenir. Se\u00e7menler \u00f6nerilen koalisyonlardan birini do\u011frudan destekleyebilir ve bu nedenle yeni h\u00fck\u00fcmeti daha me\u015fru bir \u015fekilde kar\u015f\u0131layabilir.\nCumhuriyet tarihindeki se\u00e7im koalisyonlar\u0131\nB\u00fclent Ecevit, Necmettin Erbakan\nCumhuriyet tarihinin ilk koalisyon h\u00fck\u00fcmeti 20 Kas\u0131m 1961\u2019de \u0130smet \u0130n\u00f6n\u00fc ba\u015fkanl\u0131\u011f\u0131nda Cumhuriyet Halk Partisi ile Adalet Partisi aras\u0131nda kurulmu\u015ftur. 1961-1965 aras\u0131nda koalisyon h\u00fck\u00fcmetleriyle ge\u00e7en bir d\u00f6nemden sonra, 1965-1971 aras\u0131nda tek parti \u00e7o\u011funlu\u011funa dayal\u0131 h\u00fck\u00fcmetler kurulabilmi\u015ftir. \u00d6zellikle 1991-1999 y\u0131llar\u0131 aras\u0131ndaki 28 \u015eubat S\u00fcreci olarak bilinen \u201cara rejim\u201d de dahil, T\u00fcrkiye 8.5 y\u0131lda 8 farkl\u0131 koalisyon veya az\u0131nl\u0131k h\u00fck\u00fcmeti taraf\u0131ndan y\u00f6netilmi\u015ftir.\nD\u00fcnyadan se\u00e7im ittifak\u0131 \u00f6rnekleri\nSe\u00e7imlerden \u00f6nce parti koalisyonlar\u0131n\u0131n olu\u015fumu, se\u00e7menlere, partinin istikrarl\u0131 bir koalisyonla \u00fclkeyi y\u00f6netebilece\u011fi y\u00f6n\u00fcnde bir i\u015faret veya a\u00e7\u0131k bir g\u00f6steri olarak yorumlan\u0131r. Bu durum \u00f6zellikle, muhalefet partilerinin iktidardaki tek parti h\u00fck\u00fcmetine kar\u015f\u0131 se\u00e7im koalisyonlar\u0131 kurmay\u0131 ba\u015fard\u0131\u011f\u0131 durumlarda ge\u00e7erli olabilir. B\u00fcy\u00fck bir parti \u00e7ok uzun bir s\u00fcre iktidarda kald\u0131ysa, muhalefet partileri h\u00fck\u00fcmeti de\u011fi\u015ftirmeye \u00e7al\u0131\u015fmak i\u00e7in birbirleriyle daha yak\u0131n (yani ideolojik olarak) ittifaklar kurmak isteyebilirler.\nSe\u00e7im koalisyonlar\u0131 nadir g\u00f6r\u00fclen bir olay de\u011fildir. 1946 ve 2002 y\u0131llar\u0131 aras\u0131nda, 23 geli\u015fmi\u015f \u00fclkenin parlamentosunda 240 se\u00e7im koalisyonu yap\u0131lm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r.\nBu 240 se\u00e7im koalisyonunun 70 tanesi (%29.2) se\u00e7im sonras\u0131nda h\u00fck\u00fcmeti kurmu\u015ftur.\nAyr\u0131ca, 1946 ve 2002 y\u0131llar\u0131 aras\u0131nda yap\u0131lan 364 yasama se\u00e7iminin 174 tanesinde (%47,8) en az bir se\u00e7im ittifak\u0131 vard\u0131r.\nD\u00fcnyadan \u00f6rnekler:\nBirle\u015fik Krall\u0131k\u2019ta Sendikac\u0131 ve Sosyalist Koalisyon\nYeni Zelanda\u2019da Anti-Kapitalist \u0130ttifak\n\u0130srail\u2019deki Siyonist Birlik\nUkrayna\u2019da faaliyet g\u00f6steren Yulia Timo\u015fenko Blo\u011fu, 2001-2011\nPortekiz\u2019deki Coliga\u00e7\u00e3o Democr\u00e1tica Unit\u00e1ria (\u00dcniter Demokratik Koalisyon)\nBirle\u015fik Krall\u0131k\u2019ta \u0130\u015f\u00e7i Kooperatifi\nUlster Muhafazakarlar\u0131 ve \u0130ttifaklar\u0131 \u2013 Birle\u015fik Krall\u0131k\u2019ta Yeni Kuvvet\n\u0130ngiltere\u2019de sosyalist ittifak ve sayg\u0131nl\u0131k koalisyonu\nG\u00fcney Afrika\u2019da \u00dc\u00e7l\u00fc \u0130ttifak (ANC ve SACP dahil)\nVenezuela\u2019daki Mesa de la Unidad Democr\u00e1tica\nBirle\u015fik Krall\u0131k\u2019ta ilerici ittifak (\u00f6nerilen)\nKaynaklar: aceproject, citeseerx, AA, kas.de, bbc,notendur\nVideo oynat\u0131c\u0131\nhttps://dogrula.org/wp-content/uploads/2018/02/dogrula.org_.mp4\n00:00\n00:07\n[Toplam:7    Ortalama:5/5] Se\u00e7im \u0130ttifak\u0131 Nedir? D\u00fcnyadan Se\u00e7im \u0130ttifak\u0131 \u00d6rnekleri", "C\u0130MER Nedir?\n\u201cCimer Nedir?\u201d C\u0130MER; Cumhurba\u015fkanl\u0131\u011f\u0131 \u0130leti\u015fim Merkezi (Cimer), Cumhurba\u015fkan\u0131m\u0131z Recep Tayyip Erdo\u011fan\u2019\u0131n iste\u011fi \u00fczerine hayata ge\u00e7irilen vatanda\u015flar\u0131n kolayl\u0131kla sorunlar\u0131n\u0131 iletebilmesi, sorunlar\u0131n\u0131n \u00e7\u00f6z\u00fclmesi, \u015fikayet ve taleplerinin de\u011ferlendirilmesi i\u00e7in hizmete a\u00e7\u0131lm\u0131\u015f bir sistemdir. Yani sadece \u015fikayet hatt\u0131 de\u011fil, ayn\u0131 zamanda \u00f6neri hatt\u0131 olarak da kullan\u0131lmaktad\u0131r.\nC\u0130MER \u015eikayet Hatt\u0131?\n\u201cC\u0130MER \u015fikayet hatt\u0131\u201cna T\u00fcrkiye Cumhuriyeti Cumhurba\u015fkanl\u0131\u011f\u0131 web sitesinden ve C\u0130MER yaz\u0131l\u0131 linke t\u0131klayarak ula\u015fabilirsiniz. C\u0130MER\nC\u0130MER\u2019e Ba\u015fvuru Nas\u0131l Yap\u0131l\u0131r?\nC\u0130MER\u2019e ba\u015fvurunun nas\u0131l yap\u0131ld\u0131\u011f\u0131n\u0131 yaz\u0131m\u0131zda g\u00f6rsellerle ad\u0131m ad\u0131m anlataca\u011f\u0131z.\n\u00d6nemli Not: Ger\u00e7e\u011fi yans\u0131tmayan \u015fikayetler ve \u00f6nerilerin engellenmesi a\u00e7\u0131s\u0131ndan sadece T.C. vatanda\u015f\u0131 olan, girdi\u011fi bilgilerle n\u00fcfusa kay\u0131tl\u0131 oldu\u011fu bilgileri uyu\u015fan ba\u015fvurular ge\u00e7erli say\u0131l\u0131r.\nAd\u0131n\u0131z, soyad\u0131n\u0131z ve T.C. kimlik no b\u00f6l\u00fcm\u00fcn\u00fc kimli\u011finizde yaz\u0131ld\u0131\u011f\u0131 \u015fekilde eksiksiz doldurunuz. Kimlik numaras\u0131 do\u011frula butonuna t\u0131klay\u0131n\u0131z.\nArd\u0131ndan sayfadaki g\u00fcvenlik kodunu do\u011fru bir \u015fekilde giriniz. E-posta b\u00f6l\u00fcm\u00fcne aktif kulland\u0131\u011f\u0131n\u0131z bir mail adresini yaz\u0131n\u0131z. E-posta do\u011frula butonuna bast\u0131ktan sonra mailinize bir do\u011frulama linki gelecektir.\nLinke t\u0131klad\u0131ktan sonra ba\u015fvuru ekran\u0131 a\u00e7\u0131lacakt\u0131r.\nA\u00e7\u0131lan ekranda bilgilerinizi eksiksiz ve do\u011fru bir \u015fekilde doldurup, dilek ve \u015fikayetlerinizi yaz\u0131p, g\u00f6nder butonuna t\u0131klad\u0131ktan sonra C\u0130MER\u2019e ba\u015fvurunuz g\u00f6nderilecektir.\nYap\u0131lan her ba\u015fvuruya kanuni s\u00fcre\u00e7 \u00e7ervesinde mutlaka 1 ay i\u00e7inde geri d\u00f6n\u00fc\u015f yap\u0131lacakt\u0131r. C\u0130MER halen geli\u015ftirilmekte olan bir sistemdir. Ba\u015fvuru sorgulama sistemi bulunmamaktad\u0131r. \u00c7al\u0131\u015fmalara devam edilmektedir. Ba\u015fvurunuzun durumunu ileti\u015fim adreslerinden \u00f6\u011frenebilirsiniz.\nC\u0130MER \u0130leti\u015fim\n\u201cC\u0130MER ileti\u015fim\u201d adresleri a\u015fa\u011f\u0131da verilmi\u015ftir.\nCumhurba\u015fkanl\u0131\u011f\u0131 \u0130leti\u015fim Merkezi Telefon Numaras\u0131 : 0 (312) 525 55 55\nFaks : 0 (312) 525 58 31\nE-Posta:  cumhurbaskanligi@tccb.gov.tr\nC\u0130MER Adresi: Cumhurba\u015fkanl\u0131\u011f\u0131 K\u00fclliyesi 06560 Be\u015ftepe-Ankara\nC\u0130MER\u2019in Faydas\u0131\n\u201cC\u0130MER\u2019in faydas\u0131\u201d bir vatanda\u015f\u0131n bir kamu kurumunda ya\u015fad\u0131\u011f\u0131 s\u0131k\u0131nt\u0131y\u0131 devletin  zirvesine iletmesi ve denetim yap\u0131lmas\u0131n\u0131 sa\u011flar. B\u00f6ylelikle \u015fikayette bulunulan kamu kurumu ile ilgili m\u00fcracatlar de\u011ferlendirilir. Vatanda\u015f\u0131n ma\u011fduriyeti giderilir.\nBimer ve Cimer Aras\u0131ndaki Fark Nedir?\nBimer ve Cimer aras\u0131ndaki fark, Bimer(Ba\u015fbakanl\u0131k \u0130leti\u015fim Merkezi), C\u0130MER ise Cumhurba\u015fkanl\u0131\u011f\u0131 \u0130leti\u015fim Merkezidir. Bimer ve Cimerin kurulma amac\u0131; vatanda\u015f\u0131n Ba\u015fbakanl\u0131k ve Cumhurba\u015fkanl\u0131\u011f\u0131 makam\u0131 ile do\u011frudan ileti\u015fim kurabilmesidir. Genel ama\u00e7lar\u0131 vatanda\u015flar\u0131n kamu kurumlar\u0131ndaki ma\u011fduriyetlerinin giderilmesidir.\nYaz\u0131n\u0131n PDF\u2019ine ula\u015fmak i\u00e7in t\u0131klay\u0131n\u0131z. cimer nedir nas\u0131l basvuru yap\u0131l\u0131r\nBimer ile ilgili detayl\u0131 bilgi almak i\u00e7in buraya veya a\u015fa\u011f\u0131daki g\u00f6rsele t\u0131klay\u0131n\u0131z.\nKaynak: basvuru.tccb.gov.tr, bimer-nedir\nVideo oynat\u0131c\u0131\n00:00\n00:00\n1. \u201cdogrula.org\u201d\n0:07\n[Toplam:6    Ortalama:4.5/5] C\u0130MER Nedir? Nas\u0131l Ba\u015fvuru Yap\u0131l\u0131r?", "\u201cFacebook\u2019ta Yoruma 99 Yaz\u0131nca Foto\u011fraf De\u011fi\u015fiyor \u0130ddias\u0131\u201d ba\u015fl\u0131kl\u0131 i\u00e7eri\u011fimizde \u201cH\u00fcz\u00fcnl\u00fc \u015fair, Haberler.com, Sorgunlum, Komeditime, Cizre Spor, G\u00fcl Cenneti, Allah a\u015fk\u0131, Ad\u0131yaman Ka\u015fk\u00f6y \u201d gibi bir\u00e7ok farkl\u0131 Facebook sayfas\u0131nda yer alan, payla\u015f\u0131mlarda yorum olarak \u201c99\u201d yaz\u0131ld\u0131\u011f\u0131nda g\u00f6rselin de\u011fi\u015fti\u011fi iddias\u0131n\u0131 inceledik. S\u00f6z konusu iddia do\u011fru de\u011fildir.\n  Bu tarz payla\u015f\u0131mlar, merak uyand\u0131rarak takip\u00e7i \u00e7ekmek i\u00e7in kas\u0131tl\u0131 olarak yap\u0131lan payla\u015f\u0131mlard\u0131r. S\u00f6z konusu payla\u015f\u0131mlar\u0131n yorum k\u0131sm\u0131na 99 yaz\u0131ld\u0131\u011f\u0131nda hi\u00e7bir \u015fey de\u011fi\u015fmemektedir. Facebook\u2019ta herhangi bir i\u00e7eri\u011fe yazd\u0131\u011f\u0131n\u0131z yorum, payla\u015f\u0131m\u0131n g\u00f6r\u00fcn\u00fc\u015f\u00fcn\u00fc de\u011fi\u015ftirmez. Bu duruma istisna olabilecek sadece bir uygulama vard\u0131r. O da Facebook\u2019ta yorum k\u0131sm\u0131na yaz\u0131lan baz\u0131 kelimelerin g\u00f6rsel efektlerle desteklenmesine ili\u015fkin Facebook taraf\u0131ndan yap\u0131lan \u00f6zel bir uygulamad\u0131r. Bununla alakal\u0131 olarak yazd\u0131\u011f\u0131m\u0131z i\u00e7eri\u011fi buraya t\u0131klayarak okuyabilirsiniz. Ancak Facebook\u2019un bu \u00f6zelli\u011fi d\u0131\u015f\u0131nda, herhangi bir sayfa ya da ki\u015finin payla\u015f\u0131m\u0131na yapaca\u011f\u0131n\u0131z yorum, o i\u00e7erikte hi\u00e7bir de\u011fi\u015fikli\u011fe sebep olmayacakt\u0131r.\nBenzer \u015fekilde sayfadaki payla\u015f\u0131mlar\u0131n, sadece sayfay\u0131 be\u011fenmeniz halinde de\u011fi\u015fece\u011fini s\u00f6yleyen ifadelere de inanmamal\u0131s\u0131n\u0131z. Bu tarz s\u00f6ylemlerin ve payla\u015f\u0131mlar\u0131n genel amac\u0131, daha fazla takip\u00e7i ve etkile\u015fime sahip olmakt\u0131r. Dolay\u0131s\u0131yla denemek i\u00e7in dahi yapaca\u011f\u0131n\u0131z her yorum ve be\u011feni, as\u0131ls\u0131z s\u00f6ylemlerle yap\u0131lan payla\u015f\u0131mlar\u0131 desteklemi\u015f olacakt\u0131r. \u00c7\u00fcnk\u00fc payla\u015f\u0131mlara yap\u0131lan yorum ve be\u011feniler, etkile\u015fimi art\u0131rd\u0131\u011f\u0131 i\u00e7in sosyal medyada ve arama sonu\u00e7lar\u0131nda g\u00f6r\u00fcn\u00fcrl\u00fc\u011f\u00fc artacakt\u0131r.\nPayla\u015f\u0131mlarda sadece merak uyand\u0131rmak, dikkat \u00e7ekmek i\u00e7in \u201cg\u00fclmekten \u00f6leceksin\u201d gibi ifadeler kullan\u0131lmakta ya da \u201ckalp rahats\u0131zl\u0131\u011f\u0131 olanlar ve \u00e7ocuklar izlemesin, denemesin\u201d tarz\u0131nda uyar\u0131lar yaz\u0131lmaktad\u0131r. Bu ve bunun gibi uyar\u0131lar, payla\u015f\u0131mlarda s\u00f6ylenenlerin ger\u00e7ek oldu\u011funun d\u00fc\u015f\u00fcn\u00fclmesi, dikkate al\u0131nmas\u0131, s\u00f6ylenilenlerin ger\u00e7ekle\u015ftirilmesi i\u00e7in bilin\u00e7li olarak yaz\u0131lmaktad\u0131r. Dolay\u0131s\u0131yla b\u00f6yle uyar\u0131lar\u0131 dikkate almamal\u0131, yap\u0131lan y\u00f6nlendirmeler sonucu yorum veya be\u011feni yap\u0131l\u0131rsa i\u00e7erikte bir \u015feylerin de\u011fi\u015fece\u011fine inanmamal\u0131s\u0131n\u0131z.\nBu konuya benzer \u015fekilde yoruma \u201c7\u201d yaz\u0131ld\u0131\u011f\u0131nda foto\u011fraf\u0131n de\u011fi\u015fti\u011fi iddias\u0131n\u0131, buraya veya a\u015fa\u011f\u0131daki g\u00f6rsele t\u0131klayarak okuyabilirsiniz.\nKaynaklar: (Facebook sayfalar\u0131) H\u00fcz\u00fcnl\u00fc \u015fair, Haberler.com, Sorgunlum, Komeditime, Cizre Spor, G\u00fcl Cenneti, Allah a\u015fk\u0131, Ad\u0131yaman Ka\u015fk\u00f6y\nVideo oynat\u0131c\u0131\nhttps://dogrula.org/wp-content/uploads/2018/02/dogrula.org_.mp4\n00:00\n00:07\n[Toplam:6    Ortalama:5/5] Facebook\u2019ta Yoruma 99 Yaz\u0131nca Foto\u011fraf De\u011fi\u015fiyor \u0130ddias\u0131", "B\u0130MER nedir? B\u0130MER neyi hedeflemi\u015ftir? B\u0130MER\u2019e Nereden Ba\u015fvuru Yap\u0131l\u0131r? B\u0130MER ihbar hatt\u0131 nedir? B\u0130MER mektup yoluyla nas\u0131l ula\u015fabilirim? B\u0130MER\u2019e internetten ba\u015fvuru yapmak nas\u0131l oluyor? B\u0130MER ba\u015fvuru sonucu ne zaman sonu\u00e7lan\u0131r? Bu yaz\u0131m\u0131zda B\u0130MER hakk\u0131nda merak edilenleri cevaplayaca\u011f\u0131z.\nB\u0130MER\u2019in a\u00e7\u0131l\u0131m\u0131 Ba\u015fbakanl\u0131k \u0130leti\u015fim Merkezidir. 2006/3 Say\u0131l\u0131 Ba\u015fbakanl\u0131k Genelgesiyle y\u00fcr\u00fcrl\u00fc\u011fe girmi\u015ftir. Anayasam\u0131z\u0131n 74 \u00fcnc\u00fc maddesindede yer alan Vatanda\u015flara tan\u0131nan Anayasal haklar aras\u0131nda dilek\u00e7e ve bilgi edinme haklar\u0131 mevcuttur. \u0130nternet adresi: https://www.bimer.gov.tr/ \u2018dir. Halk\u0131n sorunlar\u0131n\u0131 do\u011frudan iletti\u011fi B\u0130MER sisteminin yaz\u0131l\u0131m\u0131, Bilgi \u0130\u015flem Dairesi Ba\u015fkanl\u0131\u011f\u0131 taraf\u0131ndan yap\u0131lm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r. Vatanda\u015flar\u0131n kamuyla ilgili, talep, \u015fikayet, ihbar, g\u00f6r\u00fc\u015f ve \u00f6nerilerini al\u0131p, ileti\u015fim kanallar\u0131n\u0131 a\u00e7\u0131k tutan bu sistem, her vatanda\u015f\u0131n m\u00fcracaatlar\u0131n\u0131 her zaman yapabilmesi imkan\u0131n\u0131 sunmaktad\u0131r.\nB\u0130MER Neyi Hedeflemi\u015ftir?\nB\u0130MER, vatanda\u015flardan gelen talepleri, h\u0131zl\u0131 ve etkin bir \u015fekilde de\u011ferlendirip, takip ve denetimini yapmay\u0131 hedeflemi\u015ftir. Sorunlar\u0131 \u00e7\u00f6zen, \u00f6nerileri hayata ge\u00e7iren bir sistemdir. B\u0130MER, vatanda\u015f\u0131n sorular\u0131na cevap verip, bilgi vermek, \u015fikayette bulunan durumlar\u0131 denetlemek, dilek ve \u00f6nerileri sonu\u00e7land\u0131rmay\u0131 hedeflemi\u015ftir.\n B\u0130MER\u2019e Nereden Ba\u015fvuru Yap\u0131l\u0131r?\nB\u0130MER\u2019e Alo 150\u2019den ve https://www.bimer.gov.tr/ internet sitesinden ba\u015fvuru yapabilirsiniz. B\u0130MER\u2019e mektupla da ula\u015fabilirsiniz.\n B\u0130MER \u0130hbar Hatt\u0131 Nedir?\nB\u0130MER ihbar hatt\u0131 Alo 150\u2019dir. Alo 150\u2019ye hem ev telefonundan hem cep telefonundan ula\u015fmak m\u00fcmk\u00fcnd\u00fcr. Verilmesi zorunlu bilgiler, T.C. kimlik numaras\u0131 ve anne k\u0131zl\u0131k soyad\u0131n\u0131n ilk ve son harfleridir. Bilgiler yanl\u0131\u015f oldu\u011funda m\u00fcracaat ge\u00e7ersiz say\u0131lmaktad\u0131r. Hangi ilden aran\u0131rsa o ilin valili\u011finde g\u00f6revli bir halkla ili\u015fkiler personeli cevap verir. Vatanda\u015f m\u00fcracaat ederken, ki\u015fisel bilgileri elektronik ortamda al\u0131n\u0131r. Al\u0131nan \u015fikayet, \u00f6neri veya talep yetkili taraf\u0131ndan kaymakaml\u0131\u011fa, b\u00f6lge m\u00fcd\u00fcrl\u00fc\u011f\u00fcne ya da il m\u00fcd\u00fcrl\u00fc\u011f\u00fcne g\u00f6nderilir. \u0130nceleme yap\u0131ld\u0131ktan sonra Ba\u015fbakanl\u0131\u011fa g\u00f6ndererek sonu\u00e7 al\u0131n\u0131r. Sonu\u00e7lanan m\u00fcracaat ile ilgili vatanda\u015fa bilgi verilir, daha sonra B\u0130MER sistemine kaydedilir.\nB\u0130MER Mektup Yoluyla Nas\u0131l Ula\u015fabilirim?\nB\u0130MER\u2019e mektup yoluyla ula\u015fabilirsiniz. Mektup yoluyla ba\u015fbakanl\u0131k, bakanl\u0131klar, valilikler ve kaymakaml\u0131klardaki halkla ili\u015fkiler b\u00fcrolar\u0131na yollayabilirsiniz. Ad-soyad, adres bilgileri, telefon ve imza ile birlikte talep ve \u015fikayetleri k\u0131sa ve \u00f6z olarak aktarabilirsiniz.\nB\u0130MER\u2019e \u0130nternet\u2019ten Ba\u015fvuru Yapmak Nas\u0131l Oluyor?\n\u0130nternet\u2019ten ba\u015fvuru yapmak i\u00e7in T.C. kimlik bilgileri \u015fartt\u0131r. Ad- soyad, anne k\u0131zl\u0131k soyad\u0131, cep telefonun do\u011fru yaz\u0131lmas\u0131 gerekir. Cep telefonuna gelen do\u011frulama kodu ile ba\u015fvuru ekran\u0131na giri\u015f yap\u0131l\u0131r. \u0130leti\u015fim bilgilerinin vatanda\u015f taraf\u0131ndan eksiksiz doldurmas\u0131 gerekir. Aktar\u0131lan bilgi, istek, \u015fikayetin a\u00e7\u0131k, anla\u015f\u0131l\u0131r ve net olmas\u0131 gerekir.\nBa\u015fvuru Sorgusu\nBa\u015fvuru sorgusu k\u0131sm\u0131ndan da yap\u0131lan ba\u015fvurunun sorgulamas\u0131n\u0131 yapabilir, neticesini \u00f6\u011frenebilirsiniz.\nB\u0130MER Ba\u015fvuru Sonucu Ne Zaman Sonu\u00e7lan\u0131r?\nEn ge\u00e7 otuz g\u00fcn i\u00e7inde gerek\u00e7eli olarak cevap verilir. Bilgi Edinme Hakk\u0131 Kanunu\u2019na g\u00f6re yap\u0131lan ba\u015fvurularda ise bu s\u00fcre 15 i\u015f g\u00fcn\u00fc olarak belirlenmi\u015ftir.\nYaz\u0131m\u0131z\u0131n PDF dosyas\u0131 i\u00e7in linke t\u0131klay\u0131n\u0131z. B\u0130MER PDF\nC\u0130MER (Cumhurba\u015fkanl\u0131\u011f\u0131 \u0130leti\u015fim Merkezi) yaz\u0131m\u0131z i\u00e7in linke t\u0131klayabilirsiniz.\nKAYNAK: bimer, bimer 2, bimer 3\nVideo oynat\u0131c\u0131\n00:00\n00:00\n1. \u201cdogrula.org\u201d\n0:07\n  [Toplam:8    Ortalama:5/5] B\u0130MER Nedir? Nas\u0131l Ba\u015fvuru Yap\u0131l\u0131r?", "Pi G\u00fcn\u00fc nedir, Pi G\u00fcn\u00fc nas\u0131l kutlanmaktad\u0131r ba\u015fl\u0131kl\u0131 i\u00e7eri\u011fimizde, Pi G\u00fcn\u00fcn\u00fcn \u00f6nemini, nas\u0131l ortaya \u00e7\u0131kt\u0131\u011f\u0131n\u0131 ve bu g\u00fcnde yap\u0131lan \u00e7e\u015fitli etkinlikleri sizlere sunmaya \u00e7al\u0131\u015faca\u011f\u0131z.\nPi say\u0131s\u0131n\u0131n 3,14 olarak kabul edilmesi nedeniyle Pi G\u00fcn\u00fc, \u00fc\u00e7\u00fcnc\u00fc ay\u0131n on d\u00f6rd\u00fc olan 14 Mart g\u00fcn\u00fc d\u00fcnya \u00e7ap\u0131nda \u00e7e\u015fitli etkinliklerle kutlanmaktad\u0131r.
