\u00c7ok \u0130zlenen Filmler (2017) ve Oscar \u00d6d\u00fclleri", "\u201cRekt\u00f6r\u00fcn 28 Ki\u015fiyi Eleyip O\u011flunu Ara\u015ft\u0131rma G\u00f6revlisi Yapt\u0131\u011f\u0131 \u0130ddias\u0131\u201d ba\u015fl\u0131kl\u0131 i\u00e7eri\u011fimizde Hakkari \u00dcniversitesi rekt\u00f6r\u00fc Prof. Dr. \u00d6mer Paki\u015f\u2018in o\u011flunun ara\u015ft\u0131rma g\u00f6revlisi oldu\u011fu eleme s\u00fcrecinde, kendisinden daha yukar\u0131da yer alan 28 ki\u015finin elendi\u011fi iddias\u0131n\u0131 ara\u015ft\u0131rd\u0131k. S\u00f6z konusu iddia do\u011frudur.\nAra\u015ft\u0131rma G\u00f6revlisi \u00d6n De\u011ferlendirme Sonu\u00e7lar\u0131\nHakkari \u00dcniversitesi resmi web sitesinde yay\u0131nlanan \u0130lahiyat Fak\u00fcltesine al\u0131nacak ara\u015ft\u0131rma g\u00f6revlileri i\u00e7in yap\u0131lan \u00f6n de\u011ferlendirme sonu\u00e7lar\u0131na g\u00f6re, rekt\u00f6r \u00d6mer Paki\u015f\u2019in o\u011flu Halit Ziya Paki\u015f 66,8308 puanla 29. s\u0131rada yer ald\u0131\u011f\u0131 g\u00f6r\u00fclebiliyor. Listede Halit Ziya Paki\u015f\u2019ten daha y\u00fcksek puan alanlardan 16 ki\u015finin farkl\u0131 nedenlerle \u201cs\u0131nava giremeyecek\u201d olarak nitelendirildi\u011fi g\u00f6r\u00fclmektedir. Halit Ziya Paki\u015f ise puanlamada 29. s\u0131rada yer almas\u0131na ra\u011fmen s\u0131nava girmeye hak kazananlar aras\u0131nda yer al\u0131yor. \u0130lgili de\u011ferlendirme raporuna ula\u015fmak i\u00e7in buraya t\u0131klay\u0131n\u0131z.\nS\u0131nav Sonu\u00e7lar\u0131\nBu de\u011ferlendirmeden sonra ise s\u0131nava girmeye hak kazananlardan 8 ki\u015fi s\u0131nava girmemi\u015ftir. \u00d6n de\u011ferlendirme puanlamas\u0131nda en y\u00fcksek puanla 1. s\u0131rada yer alan M. G\u00fcltekin ve ayn\u0131 puanlamada 4. s\u0131rada bulunan Y. Tiker ise s\u0131nav\u0131 kazanamam\u0131\u015ft\u0131r. A\u00e7\u0131klanan s\u0131nav sonu\u00e7lar\u0131na g\u00f6re s\u0131nav\u0131 kazanan 2 ki\u015fiden biri \u00d6mer Paki\u015f\u2019in o\u011flu Halit Ziya Paki\u015f, di\u011feri de \u00f6n de\u011ferlendirmede 28. s\u0131rada bulunan E. Akdo\u011fan olmu\u015ftur.\nKamu Denet\u00e7ili\u011fi Kurumu Hakkari \u00dcniversitesi Rekt\u00f6rl\u00fc\u011f\u00fcn\u00fc \u00c7a\u011f\u0131rd\u0131\nTemmuz 2017 raporunda duruma dair de\u011ferlendirme yapan Kamu Denet\u00e7ili\u011fi Kurumu, Hakkari \u00dcniversitesi \u0130lahiyat Fak\u00fcltesi \u0130slam Tarihi ve Sanatlar\u0131 B\u00f6l\u00fcm\u00fc T\u00fcrk \u0130slam Edebiyat\u0131 ve \u0130slam Sanatlar\u0131 Anabilim Dal\u0131nda bo\u015f bulunan iki adet ara\u015ft\u0131rma g\u00f6revlisi kadrosu i\u00e7in yap\u0131lan s\u0131nav\u0131n iptal edilmesi ve yenilenmesi y\u00f6n\u00fcnde tavsiye karar\u0131 vermi\u015ftir.\nAncak 28 \u015eubat 2018\u2018de Kamu Denet\u00e7ili\u011fi Kurumu resmi web sitesinde yay\u0131nlanan a\u00e7\u0131klamaya g\u00f6re, KDK\u2019n\u0131n verdi\u011fi tavsiye kararlar\u0131na uymayan idareler TBMM\u2019ye \u00e7a\u011f\u0131r\u0131lm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r ve bunlar aras\u0131nda Hakkari \u00dcniversitesi Rekt\u00f6rl\u00fc\u011f\u00fc de bulunmaktad\u0131r.\nTBMM\u2019de yap\u0131lan de\u011ferlendirme \u00fczerine s\u00f6z konusu olay g\u00fcndeme gelmi\u015f ve tepki \u00e7ekmi\u015ftir.\nRekt\u00f6r \u00d6mer Paki\u015f\u2019in A\u00e7\u0131klamas\u0131\nTepkiler \u00fczerine \u00d6mer Paki\u015f de a\u00e7\u0131klama yapm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r. H\u00fcrriyet gazetesinin haberine g\u00f6re, Hakkari \u00dcniversitesi rekt\u00f6r\u00fc Prof. Dr. \u00d6mer Paki\u015f\u2019in a\u00e7\u0131klamas\u0131 \u015f\u00f6yle:\n\u201cS\u0131nava eksik evrakla girenleri, s\u0131nava almam\u0131z s\u00f6z konusu de\u011fil. Bununla ilgili elenen epeyce m\u00fcracaat say\u0131s\u0131 oluyor.S\u0131nava girmesi gereken adaylar\u0131n tamam\u0131 s\u0131nava girmiyor. Baz\u0131 adaylar o s\u0131nava girmek i\u00e7in m\u00fcracaat ediyor ama s\u0131nava girmiyor. Yani \u015f\u00f6yle diyeyim: S\u0131nava m\u00fcracaat edenlerin yar\u0131s\u0131 eksik evrakla, yar\u0131s\u0131 da s\u0131nava kat\u0131lm\u0131yor. Yani bir s\u0131nava 30 ki\u015fi m\u00fcracaat ettiyse a\u015fa\u011f\u0131 yukar\u0131 6 ki\u015fi kat\u0131l\u0131yor. \u015eimdi bu s\u0131navda da ayn\u0131 \u015fey olmu\u015f. S\u0131nava kat\u0131l\u0131p da kazanmayan veya s\u0131nava m\u00fcracaat edip de, s\u0131nava giremeyen hi\u00e7bir aday mahkemeye de m\u00fcracaat etmemi\u015f. Mahkeme kap\u0131s\u0131 herkese a\u00e7\u0131kt\u0131r. Niye bug\u00fcne kadar mahkemeye ba\u015fvurmam\u0131\u015flar? \u015eimdi 2.5 sene aradan ge\u00e7mi\u015f, birileri bunu pi\u015firmeye \u00e7al\u0131\u015f\u0131yor maalesef. Per\u015fembe g\u00fcn\u00fc bu konu ile ilgili Hakkari\u2019de bas\u0131n toplant\u0131s\u0131 d\u00fczenleyece\u011fim. Bu haberle ilgili mahkeme s\u00fcrecini ba\u015flataca\u011f\u0131z. Haberi yapan gazetedeki bilgiler yanl\u0131\u015f. Bu adaylar\u0131n puanlar\u0131 birbirine \u00e7ok yak\u0131n. Ayr\u0131ca yaz\u0131l\u0131 s\u0131nav yap\u0131l\u0131yor. Bu yaz\u0131l\u0131 s\u0131navda hi\u00e7birisi \u00f6n de\u011ferlendirmede birinci s\u0131rada de\u011fil.\u201d\nSonu\u00e7 olarak, \u00f6n de\u011ferlendirmede 18 ki\u015fi elenmi\u015ftir. Halit Ziya Paki\u015f\u2019ten y\u00fcksek puan alan 16 ki\u015fi, farkl\u0131 sebeplerle \u201cs\u0131nava giremez\u201d olarak de\u011ferlendirilmi\u015ftir. De\u011ferlendirme sonras\u0131nda s\u0131nava girmeye hak kazanan 12 ki\u015fiden 8\u2019i s\u0131nava girmemi\u015f ve s\u0131nava kat\u0131lan 4 ki\u015fiden de, \u00f6n de\u011ferlendirmede en y\u00fcksek puan\u0131 alan 2 ki\u015fi s\u0131nav\u0131 kazanamam\u0131\u015ft\u0131r. S\u0131nav\u0131 kazanan ve ara\u015ft\u0131rma g\u00f6revlisi olan 2 ki\u015fi de \u00f6n de\u011ferlendirmede 28. ve 29. s\u0131rada yer almaktad\u0131r.\nAra\u015ft\u0131rma g\u00f6revlisi se\u00e7im s\u00fcrecinde 28 ki\u015fi farkl\u0131 nedenlerle s\u00fcrece devam edememi\u015ftir. Ancak \u00f6n de\u011ferlendirmede 18 ki\u015finin elendi\u011fi g\u00f6r\u00fclebildi\u011finden iddian\u0131n do\u011fruluk y\u00fczdesini %90 olarak belirledik.\nKaynaklar:\nilahiyat.hu.edu.tr, ilahiyat.hu.edu.tr 2, ombudsman.gov.tr, ombudsman.gov.tr 2, h\u00fcrriyet\nVideo oynat\u0131c\u0131\nhttps://dogrula.org/wp-content/uploads/2018/02/dogrula.org_.mp4\n00:00\n00:07\n[Toplam:7    Ortalama:3.3/5] Rekt\u00f6r\u00fcn 28 Ki\u015fiyi Eleyip O\u011flunu Ara\u015ft\u0131rma G\u00f6revlisi Yapt\u0131\u011f\u0131 \u0130ddias\u0131", "Ta\u015ftan yap\u0131lan ka\u011f\u0131t yaz\u0131m\u0131zda; \u0131slanmayan, y\u0131rt\u0131lmayan, yanmayan ve mermer at\u0131klar\u0131ndan \u00fcretilen ka\u011f\u0131t konusunu inceledik.\nTayvan\u2019da bir \u015firket, ta\u015ftan ka\u011f\u0131t \u00fcretilen bir metot geli\u015ftirdi. Mermer madenlerinin at\u0131klar\u0131ndan yap\u0131lan ka\u011f\u0131t, sa\u011flam ve suya dayan\u0131kl\u0131 olmas\u0131yla avantaj sa\u011fl\u0131yor. Bu ka\u011f\u0131tlar y\u0131rt\u0131lm\u0131yor, yanm\u0131yor ve su ge\u00e7irmiyor. \u00dcretilen y\u00fcksek kaliteli ekolojik ka\u011f\u0131t, \u00e7evreye zarar veren geleneksel ka\u011f\u0131t \u00fcretimine harika bir alternatif.\nGeleneksel olarak ka\u011f\u0131t, odun \u00f6z\u00fcnden elde edilen sel\u00fcloz elyaflardan yap\u0131l\u0131r. Bir ton ka\u011f\u0131t \u00fcretmek i\u00e7in yakla\u015f\u0131k 20 a\u011fa\u00e7 gerekti\u011fi tahmin edilmektedir. Her y\u0131l 340 milyon ton ka\u011f\u0131t t\u00fcketilmesinin ormanlar\u0131m\u0131z\u0131n gelece\u011fi i\u00e7in bir meydan okuma oldu\u011fu a\u015fikar. Ancak Tayvanl\u0131 bir \u015firket, \u00e7evre dostu bir alternatif buldu \u2013 ah\u015fab\u0131 mermerle de\u011fi\u015ftirdi.\nY\u0131rt\u0131lmayan ta\u015f ka\u011f\u0131d\u0131\n1998\u2019de kurulan Tayvan Lung Meng Technology (TLMT), madenlerden toplanan mermer at\u0131\u011f\u0131ndan l\u00fcks bir ka\u011f\u0131t \u00fcretilmesine olanak tan\u0131yan bir teknoloji geli\u015ftirdi.\nTa\u015f, i\u00e7erdi\u011fi kalsiyum karbonat\u0131n %80\u2019ini \u00e7\u0131karmak i\u00e7in ezildi. Daha sonra toksik olmayan bir plastik re\u00e7ine ile birle\u015ftirilerek su ile so\u011futulmadan kaynama noktas\u0131na getirildi.\nSonu\u00e7 olarak; hafif, y\u0131rt\u0131lmas\u0131 zor ve \u00e7ok \u015fa\u015f\u0131rt\u0131c\u0131 \u015fekilde \u2013 yang\u0131n, su ve zararl\u0131lara kar\u015f\u0131 dayan\u0131kl\u0131 olan \u00e7ok kaliteli bir ka\u011f\u0131t \u00fcretilmi\u015f oldu.\nIslanmayan ta\u015f ka\u011f\u0131t\nTa\u015f ka\u011f\u0131t sa\u011flaml\u0131\u011f\u0131n\u0131n \u00f6tesinde, \u00e7ok ilgin\u00e7 s\u00fcrd\u00fcr\u00fclebilir \u00f6zelliklere sahip.\nBirincisi, mermer at\u0131k kullanmak otomatik olarak odun kaynaklar\u0131n\u0131 koruyor. Geleneksel ka\u011f\u0131t \u00fcretimiyle kar\u015f\u0131la\u015ft\u0131r\u0131ld\u0131\u011f\u0131nda, mermer ka\u011f\u0131t sadece az miktarda su gerektiriyor ve \u00e7ok az CO2 sal\u0131n\u0131m\u0131 oluyor. TLMT web sitesine g\u00f6re, bir ton geleneksel ka\u011f\u0131d\u0131n bir ton mermer ka\u011f\u0131tla de\u011fi\u015ftirilmesi, 20 a\u011fa\u00e7 ve 28.000 litre su tasarrufu sa\u011fl\u0131yor, 900 kg CO2 emisyonunu \u00f6nl\u00fcyor.\nBuna ek olarak, ta\u015f ka\u011f\u0131t kolayca geri d\u00f6n\u00fc\u015ft\u00fcr\u00fclebiliyor. Daha fazla ka\u011f\u0131t \u00fcretmek i\u00e7in yeniden kullan\u0131labiliyor veya geri d\u00f6n\u00fc\u015ft\u00fcr\u00fclm\u00fc\u015f plastik kullanan \u00fcr\u00fcnlere dahil edilebiliyor. \u00dcstelik ta\u015f ka\u011f\u0131tlar \u0131\u015f\u0131kta par\u00e7alanma \u00f6zelli\u011fine sahip, uzun s\u00fcre g\u00fcne\u015fe maruz kald\u0131\u011f\u0131nda bozuluyor.\n\u00c7oktan 40 \u00fclkeye ihra\u00e7 edildi\nta\u015f ka\u011f\u0131ttan \u00fcretilen paket ve kaplar\nBu giri\u015fim patentlidir ve Avrupa ve Amerika\u2019da k\u0131rk \u00fclkeye pazarlanm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r.\nta\u015f ka\u011f\u0131ttan \u00fcretilen takvim\nMermer ka\u011f\u0131t \u00e7o\u011funlukla s\u0131zd\u0131rmazl\u0131k \u00f6zelli\u011fine gereksinim duyan restoranlarda po\u015fet yap\u0131m\u0131nda kullan\u0131l\u0131yor. Ayr\u0131ca; takvim, lamba, \u00e7anta, davetiye, kartvizit, bro\u015f\u00fcr, etiket, harita, bilet, afi\u015f vb. \u00e7e\u015fitli \u00fcr\u00fcnler de mermer ka\u011f\u0131t kullan\u0131larak yap\u0131l\u0131yor.\nta\u015f ka\u011f\u0131ttan \u00fcretilen saks\u0131\nBeyaz Saray Tarihi Derne\u011fi, ta\u015f ka\u011f\u0131tlar\u0131 hediye \u00e7antalar\u0131 i\u00e7in kullanan TLMT m\u00fc\u015fterilerinden bir tanesi.\nT\u00fcrkiye\u2019de y\u0131llard\u0131r sat\u0131\u015f\u0131 yap\u0131lan ta\u015f ka\u011f\u0131d\u0131n fiyat\u0131 da \u015f\u00f6yle:\nEn incesi 168 gram olarak sat\u0131\u015fa sunulan ta\u015f ka\u011f\u0131d\u0131n fiyat\u0131 1.12 TL.\n170 gram sel\u00fcloz ka\u011f\u0131d\u0131n fiyat\u0131 ise 83 kuru\u015f.\nKaynaklar: bbc, livingcircular, taskagit, youtube1, youtube2, youtube3\nVideo oynat\u0131c\u0131\nhttps://dogrula.org/wp-content/uploads/2018/02/dogrula.org_.mp4\n00:00\n00:07\n  [Toplam:7    Ortalama:4.3/5] Ta\u015ftan Yap\u0131lan Ka\u011f\u0131t", "\u201cGoogle\u2019da en \u00e7ok arat\u0131lan kelimeler\u201d adl\u0131 yaz\u0131m\u0131zda, Google\u2019\u0131n 2017 y\u0131l\u0131nda T\u00fcrkiye\u2019de en \u00e7ok arat\u0131lan kelimeler raporundan bahsedece\u011fiz.\nGoogle arama motoru aranan kelimeleri 6 kategoride a\u00e7\u0131klad\u0131. Bu kategorileri nas\u0131l belirlediklerini ise \u015fu \u015fekilde a\u00e7\u0131klam\u0131\u015flard\u0131r: \u201cListeler, 2016 y\u0131l\u0131na k\u0131yasla 2017\u2019de kullan\u0131c\u0131 trafi\u011fi a\u00e7\u0131s\u0131ndan y\u00fcksek s\u0131\u00e7rama yapan arama terimlerine dayan\u0131r.\u201d\nGoogle\u2019da Arat\u0131lan Genel Aramalar \n\u201cGoogle\u2019da arat\u0131lan genel \u015fekildedir.\nKrep\nA\u015fure\nG\u00fclla\u00e7\nEnginar\nKuymak\n\u0130\u00e7li K\u00f6fte\nM\u00fccver\nPankek\nTrile\u00e7e\nHumus\nGoogle\u2019da Arat\u0131lan Oynama- Erol Evgin\n\u0130\u00e7erikte payla\u015ft\u0131\u011f\u0131m\u0131z raporda sadece T\u00fcrkiye verileri bulunmaktad\u0131r. Google\u2019\u0131n haz\u0131rlad\u0131\u011f\u0131 k\u00fcresel rakamlar\u0131n da bulundu\u011fu videoyu sizlerle payla\u015f\u0131yoruz.\nSon 30 g\u00fcnde Google\u2019da en \u00e7ok aranan kelimeleri sizler i\u00e7in derledik.\nmina ba\u015faran\nregaip kandili nedir\ne devlet miras sorgulama\nstephen hawking\nfenerbah\u00e7e galatasaray\nsen anlat karadeniz son b\u00f6l\u00fcm izle\n\u00e7iftlik bank\n\u00f6sym giri\u015f\na\u00f6l\n\u00f6sym\nKaynak: Google Trends\nVideo oynat\u0131c\u0131\n00:00\n00:00\n1. \u201cdogrula.org\u201d\n0:07\n[Toplam:3    Ortalama:5/5] Google\u2019da En \u00c7ok Arat\u0131lan Kelimeler", "Ukrayna\u2019da teknolojik yaya ge\u00e7idi oldu\u011fu iddias\u0131n\u0131 dogrula.org olarak inceledik. Twitter \u00fczerinden yap\u0131lan bir payla\u015f\u0131mda, Ukrayna\u2019da lazerli bir sistemle teknolojik olarak kullan\u0131lan bir yaya ge\u00e7idinin oldu\u011fu iddia edilmi\u015ftir. Ancak bu iddia do\u011fru de\u011fildir.\n\u0130ddiada, yayalar kar\u015f\u0131ya ge\u00e7mek istedi\u011finde ara\u00e7lar\u0131, k\u0131rm\u0131z\u0131 bir duvar gibi bir lazer \u0131\u015f\u0131\u011f\u0131 kar\u015f\u0131lamaktad\u0131r. Ayn\u0131 \u015fekilde ara\u00e7lar\u0131n ge\u00e7i\u015fi serbest oldu\u011funda ise yayalar, \u00fczerinde saniyelerin akt\u0131\u011f\u0131 sanal k\u0131rm\u0131z\u0131 bir bariyer g\u00f6rmektedir.\nB\u00f6yle bir yaya ge\u00e7idinde hala k\u0131rm\u0131z\u0131 \u0131\u015f\u0131kta ge\u00e7enler olur mu? Ka\u00e7 kaza \u00f6nlenir, ka\u00e7 can kurtulur? Teknolojiyi hayat\u0131n i\u00e7inde, insan faydas\u0131 i\u00e7in nerelerde basit\u00e7e kullabilirize g\u00fczel bir \u00f6rnek, Ukrayna\u2019da bir yaya ge\u00e7idi. pic.twitter.com/JFdP47aBpm\n\u2014 Ismail Butun (@ismail_butun) February 28, 2018\nUkrayna\u2019daki yaya ge\u00e7idi videosunun orijinal halinde yap\u0131lan a\u00e7\u0131klamalara ve Rus medyas\u0131na bak\u0131ld\u0131\u011f\u0131nda ise, videonun ger\u00e7ekte var olan bir sistemi yans\u0131tmad\u0131\u011f\u0131 ve bir proje oldu\u011fu anla\u015f\u0131lmaktad\u0131r.\nVideonun a\u00e7\u0131klama k\u0131sm\u0131nda \u00f6zetle \u015funlar yazmaktad\u0131r:\n\u201cChernigov\u2018da bir yaya ge\u00e7idi fikrini nas\u0131l buldunuz? Bu bir lazer yaya ge\u00e7idi konseptidir. \nFikir, lazer projeksiyon sistemlerinin, yaya ge\u00e7it alan\u0131ndaki ana yolun her iki taraf\u0131na da uygulanaca\u011f\u0131 fikridir. \nYol kurallar\u0131na uymayan s\u00fcr\u00fcc\u00fclere kar\u015f\u0131, ihlalleri gidermek i\u00e7in b\u00f6yle bir lazer sistemi bir alg\u0131lay\u0131c\u0131 g\u00f6revi g\u00f6rebilir ve kameralar harekete ge\u00e7erek araban\u0131n plakas\u0131n\u0131 kaydeder. Bu sistem, s\u00fcr\u00fcc\u00fclerin yaya ge\u00e7idinde \u00f6nceden durmas\u0131n\u0131 da sa\u011flayabilir.\u201d\nAyr\u0131ca bu lazerli yaya ge\u00e7idi projesine ili\u015fkin yap\u0131lan bir haberde de benzer \u015fekilde a\u00e7\u0131klamalar vard\u0131r. Bu lazer sistemi, proje sahiplerine g\u00f6re trafik kurallar\u0131na uymayanlara kar\u015f\u0131 bir d\u00fczeltme g\u00f6revi \u00fcstelenecek ve trafik d\u00fczeninin iyile\u015fmesinde \u00f6nemli bir rol oynayacakt\u0131r.\nD\u00fcnyadan Lazerli Yaya Ge\u00e7idi Fikirleri\nUkrayna\u2019daki lazerli yaya ge\u00e7idi projesinin benzer projeleri ba\u015fka \u00fclkeler taraf\u0131ndan da olu\u015fturulmu\u015ftur. Ama\u00e7lar\u0131, trafi\u011fi d\u00fczenlemek ve kazalar\u0131 en aza indirmek olan bu tarz projeler geni\u015f kitleler taraf\u0131ndan ilgi g\u00f6rmektedir. Ancak yine ger\u00e7ek oldu\u011fu zannedilerek izlenmeye ve payla\u015f\u0131lmaya devam edilmektedir.\nB\u00f6yle projelerin ger\u00e7ek hayatta da yarar sa\u011flamas\u0131 umuduyla di\u011fer \u00fclkeler i\u00e7in yap\u0131lan \u00f6rnek fikirlere bakal\u0131m:\nKazakistan\u2018da trafik \u0131\u015f\u0131klar\u0131 olarak adland\u0131r\u0131lan bu video \u00fczerinde ayn\u0131 sistemle sanal bir yaya ge\u00e7idi olu\u015fturulmu\u015ftur. Yayalar\u0131n g\u00fcvenli\u011fi i\u00e7in olu\u015fturulan bu video da, Ukrayna\u2019daki sistemle hemen hemen ayn\u0131d\u0131r.\nA\u015fa\u011f\u0131daki g\u00f6rselde olan fikir ise G\u00fcney Koreli Hanyoung Lee tasarlam\u0131\u015ft\u0131r. Di\u011ferlerinde oldu\u011fu gibi bu fikirde de ama\u00e7, yayalar\u0131n ge\u00e7i\u015fini daha dikkat \u00e7ekici hale getirmek ve s\u00fcr\u00fcc\u00fclerin daha temkinli davranmalar\u0131n\u0131 sa\u011flamakt\u0131r.\nKaynaklar: Youtube, autogeek.com.ua, Twitter, Gajitz, Youtube 2\n[Toplam:8    Ortalama:5/5] Ukrayna\u2019da Teknolojik Yaya Ge\u00e7idi Oldu\u011fu \u0130ddias\u0131", "Kuru \u00fcz\u00fcm\u00fcn faydalar\u0131 nedir adl\u0131 i\u00e7eri\u011fimizde, kuru \u00fcz\u00fcm\u00fcn sa\u011fl\u0131\u011fa olan etkisini ve faydalar\u0131n\u0131 kapsaml\u0131 bir \u015fekilde inceledik. Mineraller a\u00e7\u0131s\u0131ndan kendisini en \u00fcst s\u0131raya ta\u015f\u0131yan kuru \u00fcz\u00fcm, yap\u0131lan ara\u015ft\u0131rmalar do\u011frultusunda sindirim sisteminin \u00e7al\u0131\u015fmas\u0131nda b\u00fcy\u00fck yarar sa\u011fl\u0131yor. \u015eimdi sizlere kuru \u00fcz\u00fcm\u00fcn hangi v\u00fccut k\u0131s\u0131mlar\u0131nda faydal\u0131 oldu\u011funu sunaca\u011f\u0131z.\nG\u00f6z: \u201cMakula dejenerasyonu\u201d diye de bilinen \u201csar\u0131 nokta\u201d hastal\u0131\u011f\u0131n\u0131n riskini en fazla azaltan yiyece\u011fin kuru \u00fcz\u00fcm oldu\u011fu bilinmektedir.\nYakla\u015f\u0131k 110 bin ki\u015finin kat\u0131l\u0131m\u0131yla ger\u00e7ekle\u015ftirilen ara\u015ft\u0131rman\u0131n \u201cArchives of Ophthalmology\u201d de yay\u0131nlanan sonucuna g\u00f6re g\u00fcnde 3 kase meyve yemek makula dejenerasyonu riskini azalt\u0131yor ve bir kase 1 avu\u00e7 kuru \u00fcz\u00fcme kar\u015f\u0131l\u0131k geliyor.\nSindirim: Kad\u0131nlarda ve erkeklerde ya\u015fanan sindirim sistemi sorununun \u00e7\u00f6z\u00fcm\u00fcn\u00fc uzmanlar d\u00fczenli olarak al\u0131nan lif besini ile d\u00fczenlenebilece\u011fini s\u00f6yl\u00fcyor. Bunun yan\u0131nda sindirim sorununun en b\u00fcy\u00fck sonu\u00e7lar\u0131ndan olan kab\u0131zl\u0131\u011f\u0131 g\u00fcnde bir avu\u00e7 kuru \u00fcz\u00fcm\u00fcn giderdi\u011fi de uzmanlar\u0131n a\u00e7\u0131klamalar\u0131 aras\u0131nda.\nKemik Sa\u011fl\u0131\u011f\u0131: Osteoporoza kar\u015f\u0131 koruma sa\u011flayan ve ayn\u0131 zamanda menopozdan sonraki d\u00f6nemde uygulanan \u00f6strojen tedavisine yard\u0131mc\u0131 olan boron minerali yine kuru \u00fcz\u00fcm\u00fcn i\u00e7erisinde yeterli miktarda bulunuyor.\nDiyet: \u015eekerli haz\u0131r g\u0131dalar gibi aniden kan \u015fekerini y\u00fckseltmeyen kuru \u00fcz\u00fcm ayn\u0131 zamanda uzun s\u00fcreli tokluk hissini vermesi sebebiyle diyet \u00f6\u011f\u00fcnlerinde tercih edilen bir besindir. Mineral ve vitamin i\u00e7ermesi sayesinde iyi bir enerji sa\u011flamas\u0131yla da bilinir.\nKuru \u00dcz\u00fcm Neye \u0130yi Gelir?\nYap\u0131lan ara\u015ft\u0131rmalar sonucunda ise kar\u015f\u0131m\u0131za \u015fu a\u00e7\u0131klamalar \u00e7\u0131kmaktad\u0131r;\nOndokuz May\u0131s \u00dcniversitesi (OM\u00dc) Ziraat Fak\u00fcltesi Bah\u00e7e Bitkileri B\u00f6l\u00fcm\u00fc \u00d6\u011fretim \u00dcyesi Prof. Dr. H\u00fcseyin \u00c7elik, gen\u00e7le\u015fmek ve zay\u0131flamak isteyenlerin kad\u0131nlar\u0131n g\u00fczellik iksiri olan kara \u00fcz\u00fcm t\u00fcketmesini istedi.\n\u201c\u00dcz\u00fcmdeki inositol, kolesterol d\u00fczeyini azaltmaya yard\u0131mc\u0131d\u0131r. Bu besindeki B1 vitamini kan \u015fekerinin yak\u0131lmas\u0131, kalp sa\u011fl\u0131\u011f\u0131n\u0131n korunmas\u0131 ve \u00f6\u011frenme gibi beyin fonksiyonlar\u0131 i\u00e7in gerekli olan bir vitamindir. Ya\u015flanmaya kar\u015f\u0131 korudu\u011fu gibi, alkol ve sigaran\u0131n zararl\u0131 etkilerini de azalt\u0131r. V\u00fccuttaki ya\u011flar\u0131n erimesi i\u00e7in yard\u0131mc\u0131 olur. Kabuk ve \u00e7ekirdekleri ba\u011f\u0131rsak metabolizmas\u0131n\u0131 h\u0131zland\u0131r\u0131r.\nKara \u00fcz\u00fcm, v\u00fccutta ya\u011flar\u0131n erimesine yard\u0131mc\u0131 olarak cildin taze ve temiz bir g\u00f6r\u00fcn\u00fcm almas\u0131n\u0131 sa\u011flar. \u0130\u00e7erdi\u011fi maddeler sayesinde g\u00fczellik iksiri olarak nitelendiriliyor. Bir salk\u0131m kara \u00fcz\u00fcm veya buna e\u015f de\u011fer kurutulmu\u015f kara \u00fcz\u00fcm, v\u00fccudu ve beyin h\u00fccrelerini zindele\u015ftiriyor. Bir kilo \u00fcz\u00fcm; bin 150 gram s\u00fct, 390 gram et, 300 gram ekmek ve bin 200 gram patatese e\u015fde\u011ferdir. Bu nedenle de ayn\u0131 zamanda bayanlar i\u00e7in en ideal rejim men\u00fcs\u00fcd\u00fcr.\u201d\nProf. Dr. Kenan Kayna\u015f da, \u00fcz\u00fcm \u00e7ekirde\u011finin insan bedeninde kanser olu\u015fumunu \u00f6nleyen, kalp, damar ve \u015feker hastal\u0131\u011f\u0131na iyi gelen omega 3 ve 6 ya\u011f asidi a\u00e7\u0131s\u0131ndan \u00e7ok zengin oldu\u011funu ve Kara \u00fcz\u00fcm suyunda bulunan flavonoids adl\u0131 maddenin kalp hastal\u0131klar\u0131na kar\u015f\u0131 koruyucu etkisi oldu\u011fu belirtti.\nG\u00fcnde Bir Avu\u00e7 Kuru \u00dcz\u00fcm Yemenin Faydalar\u0131\nKolesterol\u00fcn dengede olmas\u0131na yard\u0131mc\u0131 olur.\nKalp sa\u011fl\u0131\u011f\u0131n\u0131n korunmas\u0131nda etkilidir.\n\u0130\u00e7eri\u011findeki lifler ile v\u00fccutta bulunan safran\u0131n at\u0131m\u0131n\u0131 kolayla\u015ft\u0131r\u0131r.\n\u0130yi bir toksin at\u0131c\u0131d\u0131r.\nBa\u011f\u0131rsak d\u00fczenini sa\u011flar.\nA\u011f\u0131z kokusuna ve di\u011fer a\u011f\u0131z yaralar\u0131na iyi gelir.\nKaraci\u011fer rahats\u0131zl\u0131klar\u0131na kar\u015f\u0131 koruyucudur.\nHaf\u0131zay\u0131 g\u00fc\u00e7lendirici \u00f6zelli\u011fi vard\u0131r.\n\u00d6zellikle \u00e7ocuklarda kemik geli\u015fimine faydal\u0131 olur.\nKuru \u00dcz\u00fcm\u00fcn Besin De\u011feri\n26 gram/50 adet kuru \u00fcz\u00fcm;\n78 kalori\n1 gram besin lifi\n0,6 mg C vitamini\n9 mcg K vitamini\n2 mg niasin\n3 mcg folat\n13 mg kalsiyum\n5 mg demir\n3 mg magnezyum\n3 mg fosfor\n195 mg potasyum\n3 mg sodyum\n1 mg \u00e7inko\n1 mg bak\u0131r\n1 mg manganez\n2 mcg selenyum\n8 mg omega 3 ya\u011f asidi\n5 mg omega 6 ya\u011f asidi\n4 gram su i\u00e7erir.\nKuru \u00dcz\u00fcm\u00fcn Yan Etkileri ve Dikkat Edilmesi Gereken Durumlar\nKuru \u00fcz\u00fcm \u00e7ekirde\u011fini yeme konusunda tansiyonu olanlar, \u015fi\u015fman olanlar, \u015feker hastal\u0131\u011f\u0131 olanlar, egzamas\u0131 olanlar dikkatli t\u00fcketmelidir. Bunun yan\u0131 s\u0131ra hen\u00fcz \u00e7ok taze olan \u00fcz\u00fcmleri yemekte ba\u011f\u0131rsaklar\u0131 etkileyerek kar\u0131n \u015fi\u015fli\u011fi yapar. G\u00fcn i\u00e7erisinde bir avu\u00e7tan fazla kuru \u00fcz\u00fcm t\u00fcketmek kan \u015fekerini y\u00fckseltmeye sebep olabilir. Diyabet rahats\u0131zl\u0131\u011f\u0131 olanlar bu t\u00fcketimi a\u015fmamaya dikkat etmelidir.\nKaynaklar: gidabilinci.com, faydalar.gen.tr, iyigelenyiyecekler.com, saglikhaberleri.com, stylecraze.com\nVideo oynat\u0131c\u0131\n00:00\n00:00\n1. \u201cdogrula.org\u201d\n0:07\n[Toplam:2    Ortalama:4.5/5] Kuru \u00dcz\u00fcm\u00fcn Faydalar\u0131 Nedir?", "TRT 208 \u015eark\u0131y\u0131 Yasaklad\u0131 iddias\u0131n\u0131 inceledik.\nSosyal medyada ve bir\u00e7ok haber sitesinde 142 T\u00fcrk\u00e7e, 66 K\u00fcrt\u00e7e olmak \u00fczere 208 \u015fark\u0131n\u0131n, s\u00f6zleri nedeniyle TRT taraf\u0131ndan yasakland\u0131\u011f\u0131 ve yay\u0131nlanmad\u0131\u011f\u0131 iddia edilmi\u015ftir. Hep Sonradan: Kederli bir ak\u015fam i\u00e7mi\u015fiz, sarho\u015fuz hepsi bu\nBeng\u00fc \u2013 Hodri Meydan: Korkmad\u0131m ben intihardan, kim ya\u015farm\u0131\u015f ayr\u0131l\u0131kta\nS\u0131la \u2013 Afitap: Bilen baks\u0131n \u015fu fal\u0131m\u0131za, kald\u0131k m\u0131 hac\u0131ya hocaya?\nNazan \u00d6ncel \u2013 Sakin Ol \u015eampiyon: Arkandan konu\u015facak m\u0131y\u0131m, s\u00f6vecek mi sayacak m\u0131y\u0131m?\nBu \u015fark\u0131lar aras\u0131nda en fazla 6112 say\u0131l\u0131 kanunun 8.maddesi 1.f\u0131kras\u0131n\u0131n h bendi gere\u011fi yasaklananlar\u0131n oldu\u011fu g\u00f6r\u00fclmektedir. (6112 say\u0131l\u0131 kanun 8/1(h): Yay\u0131n hizmetleri; alkol, t\u00fct\u00fcn \u00fcr\u00fcnleri ve uyu\u015fturucu gibi ba\u011f\u0131ml\u0131l\u0131k yap\u0131c\u0131 madde kullan\u0131m\u0131 ile kumar oynamay\u0131 \u00f6zendirici nitelikte olamaz.)\nTRT yapt\u0131\u011f\u0131 kamuoyu a\u00e7\u0131klamas\u0131nda, \u201c2016 y\u0131l\u0131nda konusunun uzmanlar\u0131 taraf\u0131ndan denetlenen 32.848 program i\u00e7erisinden sadece 2 TV program\u0131, 30 TV reklam spotu, 8 radyo reklam spotu ve 208 m\u00fczik eseri yasal gerek\u00e7elerle yay\u0131nlanmam\u0131\u015f\u201d oldu\u011funu belirtmi\u015ftir. TRT y\u00f6netiminin TRT K\u0130T Alt Komisyonunda CHP \u0130zmir milletvekili Atila Sertel\u2019in sorusu \u00fczerine yasaklanan 2 TV program\u0131na dair, yapt\u0131\u011f\u0131 a\u00e7\u0131klama \u015f\u00f6yle:\nTRT M\u00fczik\u2019in Payla\u015f\u0131mlar\u0131\nSosyal medyada geni\u015f yer bulan konuyla ilgili olarak, TRT M\u00fczik Twitter hesab\u0131ndan baz\u0131 payla\u015f\u0131mlarda bulunmu\u015ftur.\nKaynaklar: medya.trt.net, mevzuat.gov, NTV, trthaber, T24\nVideo oynat\u0131c\u0131\nhttps://dogrula.org/wp-content/uploads/2018/02/dogrula.org_.mp4\n00:00\n00:07\n[Toplam:8    Ortalama:4.9/5] TRT 208 \u015eark\u0131y\u0131 Yasaklad\u0131 \u0130ddias\u0131", "Diyabet Nedir? Diyabette sahte tedavi y\u00f6ntemlerini dogrula.org olarak inceledik. \u015eeker hastal\u0131\u011f\u0131 (diyabet) tedavisi i\u00e7in piyasada \u00e7ok fazla \u00fcr\u00fcn bulunmaktad\u0131r. \u00dcr\u00fcnlerden bahsetmeden \u00f6nce diyabetin ne oldu\u011funa ve tedavi bi\u00e7imlerine bir g\u00f6z atal\u0131m.\nDiyabet Nedir? Nas\u0131l Tedavi Edilir?\nDiyabet ya da bilinen di\u011fer ad\u0131yla \u015feker hastal\u0131\u011f\u0131, v\u00fccuttaki pankreas adl\u0131 salg\u0131 bezinin yeterli miktarda ins\u00fclin hormonu \u00fcretmemesi ya da \u00fcretti\u011fi ins\u00fclin hormonunun etkili bir \u015fekilde kullan\u0131lamamas\u0131 durumunda geli\u015fen bir hastal\u0131kt\u0131r. \u0130ns\u00fclin hormonu ise v\u00fccutta kan \u015fekerinin d\u00fczenlenmesinde rol oynayan hormonlar\u0131n en \u00f6nemlisidir. Bu hormonun etkili bir \u015fekilde kullan\u0131lamamas\u0131 durumunda enerjiye d\u00f6n\u00fc\u015fmesi gereken glukoz, kanda birikerek kan \u015fekerinin y\u00fckselmesine neden olur.\nDiyabetin iki tipi vard\u0131r:\nI. Tip Diyabet: V\u00fccudun ins\u00fclin \u00fcreten h\u00fccrelere sald\u0131rd\u0131\u011f\u0131 ve tahrip etti\u011fi, dolay\u0131s\u0131yla ins\u00fclin \u00fcretilmedi\u011fi durumlard\u0131r. Kandaki glikozun h\u0131zla y\u00fckselmesine neden olmaktad\u0131r. Birinci tip diyabette mutlaka ins\u00fclin kullan\u0131lmal\u0131d\u0131r. Genellikle 30 ya\u015f\u0131ndan \u00f6nce ba\u015flar ve hastalar normal kiloda veya zay\u0131ft\u0131r. Diyabetli ki\u015filerin yakla\u015f\u0131k y\u00fczde 10\u2019u birinci tip diyabete sahiptir.\nII. Tip Diyabet: V\u00fccut yeterli ins\u00fclin yapmaz ya da yapt\u0131\u011f\u0131 ins\u00fclin d\u00fczg\u00fcn \u00e7al\u0131\u015fmaz, yani kan \u015fekeri artar. Genelikle genetik ve \u00e7evresel fakt\u00f6rler nedeniyle olu\u015fur. Genellikle 40 ya\u015f\u0131ndan sonra ba\u015flar. Diyabetli olan ki\u015filerin %90\u2019\u0131 ikinci tip diyabet hastas\u0131d\u0131r.\nHer iki tipte de diyabet, zamanla kalp hastal\u0131\u011f\u0131, inme, b\u00f6brek hastal\u0131\u011f\u0131, g\u00f6z problemleri, di\u015f hastal\u0131\u011f\u0131,  ayak sorunlar\u0131 ve sinir hasar\u0131 gibi sorunlara yol a\u00e7ar.\nDiyabetin Tedavisi Nas\u0131ld\u0131r?\nDiyabet, kan \u015fekerini istenilen s\u0131n\u0131r\u0131n alt\u0131na indirmek i\u00e7in farkl\u0131 \u015fekillerde tedavi edilebilir. Ancak kesin \u00e7\u00f6z\u00fcm olarak kullan\u0131lan bir tedavi bi\u00e7imi yoktur. Diyabette ba\u015fl\u0131ca tedaviler \u015funlard\u0131r:\nT\u0131bbi beslenme tedavisi\nEgzersiz \u2013 Fiziksel aktivite\nKan \u015fekerini d\u00fc\u015f\u00fcren ila\u00e7lar (Haplar ve ins\u00fclin)\nE\u011fitim\nDiyabet hastas\u0131n\u0131n kendini izlemesi\nSahte Tedavi Y\u00f6ntemleri \nDiyabet hastal\u0131\u011f\u0131 i\u00e7in ara\u015ft\u0131r\u0131lm\u0131\u015f bir\u00e7ok tedavi \u00e7e\u015fidi vard\u0131r. Diyet planlamalar\u0131, \u00e7e\u015fitli egzersizler ve doktor g\u00f6zetiminde verilen ila\u00e7lar gibi. Ancak diyabeti \u00f6nleme, tedavi etme ve hatta iyile\u015ftirme konusunda vaat edilen yasa d\u0131\u015f\u0131 pazarlanan \u00fcr\u00fcnler piyasada \u00e7ok\u00e7a bulunmaktad\u0131r. Normal tedavilerin d\u0131\u015f\u0131nda sat\u0131lan bu tarz \u00fcr\u00fcnler ciddi risk ta\u015f\u0131maktad\u0131r.\nABD G\u0131da ve \u0130la\u00e7 \u0130daresi (FDA) t\u00fcketicilere bu t\u00fcr \u00fcr\u00fcnleri kullanmamalar\u0131 i\u00e7in yasa d\u0131\u015f\u0131 pazarlanm\u0131\u015f \u00fcr\u00fcnler pazar\u0131n\u0131 ve t\u00fcketici \u015fikayetlerini ara\u015ft\u0131rmaktad\u0131r. \u00d6rne\u011fin, zararl\u0131 i\u00e7erikler i\u00e7erebilir veya re\u00e7etesiz \u00fcr\u00fcnler olarak pazarlanmalar\u0131 gerekti\u011finde tezgah \u00fcst\u00fc \u00fcr\u00fcnler olarak yanl\u0131\u015f pazarlanabilir. Yasa d\u0131\u015f\u0131 pazarlanan bu \u00fcr\u00fcnler, ki\u015filerin diyabet i\u00e7in etkili tedavileri ertelemelerine veya kesmelerine neden olursa ek bir risk ta\u015f\u0131r.\nYan\u0131lt\u0131c\u0131 Diyabet \u0130la\u00e7lar\u0131\nYasa d\u0131\u015f\u0131 olan diyabet ila\u00e7lar\u0131n\u0131n, \u0130nternet \u00fczerinden reklam\u0131 ve sat\u0131\u015f\u0131 yap\u0131lmaktad\u0131r. Ancak baz\u0131 \u00fcr\u00fcnler reklam konusunda yasal olmayan yollara da ba\u015fvurmaktad\u0131rlar. Bunlardan bir tanesi de Diasin isimli ila\u00e7t\u0131r.\nDiasin Nedir?\nDamla \u015feklinde sat\u0131lan bir \u00fcr\u00fcn olan Diasin, \u015feker hastal\u0131\u011f\u0131na kesin \u00e7\u00f6z\u00fcm slogan\u0131yla \u0130nternet \u00fczerinden sat\u0131\u015f\u0131 yap\u0131lan bir \u00fcr\u00fcnd\u00fcr.\nA\u015fa\u011f\u0131daki videoda g\u00f6rebilece\u011finiz bu \u00fcr\u00fcn, sanki NTV\u2019de yay\u0131nlanm\u0131\u015f ve baz\u0131 \u00fcnl\u00fc isimler taraf\u0131ndan \u00fcr\u00fcn hakk\u0131nda yorum yap\u0131lm\u0131\u015f gibi yans\u0131t\u0131lm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r.\nAncak videonun orijinal halinin \u0130nternet \u00fczerinden pazarlanan Diasin isimli bir \u00fcr\u00fcnle alakas\u0131 yoktur. NTV\u2019nin \u201cDiyabet art\u0131k kader de\u011fil\u201d ba\u015fl\u0131kl\u0131 haberinden al\u0131nan video, montajlanarak reklam haline getirilmi\u015ftir. \u0130nsanlar\u0131 yan\u0131ltmak ve \u00fcr\u00fcn\u00fcn sat\u0131\u015f\u0131n\u0131 artt\u0131rmak i\u00e7in yap\u0131lan sahte videonun ger\u00e7ek hali a\u015fa\u011f\u0131daki gibidir:\nYine ayn\u0131 \u00fcr\u00fcnle ilgili, \u00fcr\u00fcn\u00fcn kendi internet sitesinde farkl\u0131 bir yan\u0131lt\u0131c\u0131 reklam yap\u0131lm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r. A\u015fa\u011f\u0131daki g\u00f6rselde, s\u00f6z konusu \u00fcr\u00fcn\u00fc \u00f6nerdi\u011fi iddia edilen Hikmet Pamir Alptekin isimli bir doktora rastlanmam\u0131\u015ft\u0131r. Bir hayal \u00fcr\u00fcn\u00fc olan Hikmet Pamir Alptekin ismiyle kullan\u0131lan g\u00f6rseldeki ki\u015fi asl\u0131da Dr. Nowzaradan\u2018d\u0131r.\nDr. Nowzaradan, TLC ekranlar\u0131nda A\u011f\u0131r Ya\u015famlar isimli bir program d\u00fczenlemektedir. 70 ya\u015f\u0131nda olan Dr. Nowzaradan bu programda, a\u015f\u0131r\u0131 kilolu ki\u015fileri tedavi ederek ya\u015famlar\u0131n\u0131 de\u011fi\u015ftirmeyi ama\u00e7lamaktad\u0131r.\nDiasin Kullan\u0131c\u0131 Yorumlar\u0131\nDiasin hakk\u0131nda baz\u0131 kullan\u0131c\u0131lar taraf\u0131ndan da olumsuz yorumlar yap\u0131lm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r. S\u00f6z konusu \u00fcr\u00fcn\u00fcn, yan\u0131lt\u0131c\u0131 bir ila\u00e7 oldu\u011fu ve etik olmayan reklam y\u00f6ntemleriyle piyasaya s\u00fcr\u00fcld\u00fc\u011f\u00fc anla\u015f\u0131lmaktad\u0131r.\nSa\u011fl\u0131k Bakanl\u0131\u011f\u0131 Onayl\u0131 \u0130la\u00e7lar Ne Anlama Geliyor?\n\u0130nternet \u00fczerinden pazarlanan \u00fcr\u00fcnlerin \u00fczerinden genelikle \u201cBakanl\u0131k onayl\u0131\u201d tabiri vard\u0131r. Ancak \u00fcr\u00fcnlerin \u00fczerinde bahsedilen bakanl\u0131k Sa\u011fl\u0131k Bakanl\u0131\u011f\u0131 de\u011fil, G\u0131da, Tar\u0131m ve Hayvanc\u0131l\u0131k Bakanl\u0131\u011f\u0131\u2019d\u0131r.\nG\u0131da, Tar\u0131m ve Hayvanc\u0131l\u0131k Bakanl\u0131\u011f\u0131 taraf\u0131ndan haz\u0131rlanan 5996 say\u0131 ve 11.06.2010 tarihli \u2018Veteriner Hizmetleri, Bitki Sa\u011fl\u0131\u011f\u0131, G\u0131da ve Yem Kanunu\u201d kapsam\u0131nda;\n\u201cTakviye Edici G\u0131dalar, normal beslenmeyi takviye etmek amac\u0131yla, vitamin, mineral, protein, karbonhidrat, lif, ya\u011f asidi, amino asit gibi besin \u00f6\u011felerinin veya bunlar\u0131n d\u0131\u015f\u0131nda besleyici veya fizyolojik etkileri bulunan bitki, bitkisel ve hayvansal kaynakl\u0131 maddeler, biyoaktif maddeler ve benzeri maddelerin konsantre ve ekstraktlar\u0131n\u0131n tek ba\u015f\u0131na veya kar\u0131\u015f\u0131mlar\u0131n\u0131n, kaps\u00fcl, tablet, pastil, tek kullan\u0131ml\u0131k toz paket, s\u0131v\u0131 ampul, damlal\u0131kl\u0131 \u015fi\u015fe ve di\u011fer benzeri s\u0131v\u0131 ve toz formlarda haz\u0131rlanarak g\u00fcnl\u00fck al\u0131m dozu belirlenmi\u015f \u00fcr\u00fcnler olarak tan\u0131mlanm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r.\u201d\nKanunda belirtilen takviye g\u0131da, kilo vermeye yard\u0131mc\u0131 g\u0131da olarak standartlara uygun belgesi al\u0131nan bu \u00fcr\u00fcnler Bakanl\u0131k onayl\u0131 olarak sat\u0131\u015fa sunulmaktad\u0131r. Ancak riskli ve sahte olan \u00fcr\u00fcnleri pazarlayan firmalar, \u00fcr\u00fcne sonradan endikasyonlar eklemektedir.\nBuradaki en \u00f6nemli husus, tedavi ama\u00e7la sat\u0131n al\u0131nan ve insan sa\u011fl\u0131\u011f\u0131na \u00f6nemli d\u00fczeyde etki edecek bu tarz ila\u00e7lar sat\u0131n al\u0131n\u0131rken, G\u0131da, Tar\u0131m ve Hayvanc\u0131l\u0131k Bakanl\u0131\u011f\u0131 onay\u0131n\u0131n yan\u0131 s\u0131ra Sa\u011fl\u0131k Bakanl\u0131\u011f\u0131n\u0131n izni ve onay\u0131n\u0131n da olmas\u0131na dikkat edilmesi gerekmektedir.\nKaynaklar: Diyabetevi, ResmiGazete, Medikal Akademi, Diabetes, Kullan\u0131c\u0131 Yorumlar\u0131\nVideo oynat\u0131c\u0131\n00:00\n00:00\n1. \u201cdogrula.org\u201d\n0:07\n[Toplam:18    Ortalama:3.7/5] Diyabet Nedir?
