Peygamberin bu tecr\u00fcbesi, olgu ve olaylar aras\u0131nda g\u00f6ksel bir etkinin veya e\u015f zamanl\u0131l\u0131\u011f\u0131n bulunmad\u0131\u011f\u0131n\u0131n kan\u0131t\u0131d\u0131r.\nK\u0131sacas\u0131, \u0130slamiyette el fal\u0131, y\u0131ld\u0131z fal\u0131, kahve fal\u0131 gibi t\u00fcrleri olan falc\u0131l\u0131k yasaklanm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r, sebebi ise Allah\u2019tan ba\u015fka hi\u00e7 kimsenin gelecekten haberdar olmad\u0131\u011f\u0131, meleklerin ve peygamberlerin de kendilerine bildirilmedik\u00e7e gelecekten haber veremeyece\u011fidir.\nAstroloji Hakk\u0131nda \u0130lgin\u00e7 Bilgiler\n1999\u2019da yap\u0131lan bir ara\u015ft\u0131rmaya g\u00f6re bur\u00e7 ve astroloji, \u0130nternette en \u00e7ok aranan iki konudur.\nAstroloji hem bir sanat hem de baz\u0131lar\u0131na g\u00f6re bir bilim olarak kabul edilir. Astroloji sanatt\u0131r \u00e7\u00fcnk\u00fc farkl\u0131 y\u00f6nleri bir araya getirmek ve ki\u015finin karakter \u00f6zelliklerine ili\u015fkin bir fikir olu\u015fturmak i\u00e7in yorumlamaya ihtiya\u00e7 vard\u0131r. Bununla birlikte, astrolojinin matematiksel k\u0131sm\u0131 da bir bilim olarak kabul edilir; \u00e7\u00fcnk\u00fc bu, astronomi ve matematik anlay\u0131\u015f\u0131 gerektirir.\nPapa Julius II\nSixtus IV, bur\u00e7 \u00e7izen ve yorumlayan ilk Katolik papazd\u0131r, Leo X ve Paul III (Hristiyan din adamlar\u0131), astrologlara tavsiyede bulunmu\u015ftur, Julius II (Hristiyan din adam\u0131) ise ta\u00e7 giyme tarihini astrolojiye g\u00f6re se\u00e7mi\u015ftir.\nAstroloji, Nazi Almanyas\u0131 diktat\u00f6r\u00fc Adolf Hitler i\u00e7in \u00e7ok \u00f6nemliydi. Alman liderin \u0130kinci D\u00fcnya Sava\u015f\u0131 boyunca astrologlara dan\u0131\u015ft\u0131\u011f\u0131 d\u00fc\u015f\u00fcn\u00fclmektedir.\nKaynaklar: horoscope  personaltao  astrostyle   islamcity\nastroloji   astrovedik  zodiac-signs   maya  y\u00fckselen   mayaburcu\nyoutube  youtube2  youtube3  youtube4\nVideo oynat\u0131c\u0131\nhttps://dogrula.org/wp-content/uploads/2018/02/dogrula.org_.mp4\n00:00\n00:07\n[Toplam:6    Ortalama:4.5/5] Bur\u00e7lar\u0131n \u00d6zellikleri", "Mikrodalga f\u0131r\u0131n insan sa\u011fl\u0131\u011f\u0131na zararl\u0131 m\u0131 sorusunu sizler i\u00e7in ara\u015ft\u0131rd\u0131k. Nesnel bilgiler \u0131\u015f\u0131\u011f\u0131nda haz\u0131rlam\u0131\u015f oldu\u011fumuz yaz\u0131m\u0131z, bu konu hakk\u0131nda gereken bilgileri size sunacakt\u0131r.\nG\u00fcn i\u00e7erisinde t\u00fcketti\u011fimiz besinlerin \u0131s\u0131tma veya pi\u015firme i\u015flevini mikro dalgalar arac\u0131l\u0131\u011f\u0131yla yapan f\u0131r\u0131n \u00e7e\u015fidine mikrodalga f\u0131r\u0131n denir.\nMikrodalga F\u0131r\u0131n Nas\u0131l Bulundu?\nDr. Spencer, 1946 y\u0131l\u0131nda \u201cMagnetorn\u201d ile \u00e7al\u0131\u015f\u0131rken cebinde bulunan \u00e7ikolatalar\u0131n eridi\u011fini fark etmesi \u00fczerine \u00e7e\u015fitli yiyecek t\u00fcrleri ile \u00e7al\u0131\u015farak mikro dalga f\u0131r\u0131n\u0131n icat edilmesini sa\u011flam\u0131\u015ft\u0131r. Yap\u0131lan ilk mikro dalga f\u0131r\u0131n\u0131n 1.8 metre ve 340 kg a\u011f\u0131rl\u0131\u011f\u0131nda oldu\u011fu kay\u0131tlara ge\u00e7mi\u015ftir. Evde kullan\u0131lan ilk mikrodalga f\u0131r\u0131nlar 1955\u2019te Tappan \u015eirketi taraf\u0131ndan \u00fcretilip sat\u0131\u015fa \u00e7\u0131kar\u0131lmaya ba\u015flanm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r.\nBu \u015fekilde hayat\u0131m\u0131za giren ve g\u00fcn\u00fcm\u00fczde en \u00e7ok Amerika\u2019da kullan\u0131m\u0131 bulunan mikro dalga f\u0131r\u0131nlar hakk\u0131ndaki yarar ve zarar tart\u0131\u015fmas\u0131 g\u00fcn\u00fcm\u00fczde halen devam etmektedir.\nMikrodalga f\u0131r\u0131nda iyonize olmayan radyasyon, yani d\u00fc\u015f\u00fck frekansl\u0131 ve d\u00fc\u015f\u00fck enerjili elektro manyetik dalgalar kullan\u0131l\u0131r. Mikrodalga f\u0131r\u0131n\u0131n i\u00e7erisinde 60 Hz\u2019lik enerjiyi mikro dalgalara d\u00f6n\u00fc\u015ft\u00fcren ve \u2018\u2019Magnetorn\u2019\u2019 ad\u0131 verilen bir par\u00e7a vard\u0131r. Bu dalgalar f\u0131r\u0131n i\u00e7erisine koymu\u015f oldu\u011funuz su molek\u00fcllerinin \u00fczerinde titre\u015ftirme i\u015flemi yaparak yeme\u011fin \u0131s\u0131nmas\u0131n\u0131 sa\u011flar. Burada bilinmesi gereken en \u00f6nemli nokta, mikro dalga f\u0131r\u0131n\u0131n\u0131n i\u00e7erisine konulmu\u015f olan yiyeceklerin su katk\u0131l\u0131 olmas\u0131na dikkat etmek ve gerekirse i\u00e7ine su eklemektir.\nBir di\u011fer bilinmesi gereken \u00f6nemli nokta ise, f\u0131r\u0131n i\u00e7erisine konulan kab\u0131n \u0131s\u0131nmamas\u0131n\u0131n yan\u0131nda yeme\u011fin \u0131s\u0131nmas\u0131n\u0131n sebebinin mikro dalgalar\u0131n yaln\u0131zca sulu maddeleri \u0131s\u0131tma \u00f6zelli\u011finin olmas\u0131d\u0131r. Yemek kab\u0131n\u0131n \u0131s\u0131nmama sebebi de budur.\nMikrodalga F\u0131r\u0131n\u0131n \u00d6zellikleri \nPlastik, cam ve porselenler taraf\u0131ndan alg\u0131lanmaz.\nBu dalgalar emilmeye ba\u015flay\u0131nca atomik \u0131s\u0131ya d\u00f6n\u00fc\u015fmektedir.\nYa\u011f, \u015feker ve su gibi maddeler taraf\u0131ndan emilmektedir.\nMetaller taraf\u0131ndan ise yans\u0131t\u0131l\u0131r.\nMikrodalga F\u0131r\u0131n Kanser Yapar M\u0131?\nBu konu hakk\u0131nda yap\u0131lan ara\u015ft\u0131rmalar sonucunda iki ayr\u0131 g\u00f6r\u00fc\u015f ortaya \u00e7\u0131km\u0131\u015ft\u0131r. Mikrodalga f\u0131r\u0131nlar\u0131n kansere sebep olabilece\u011fini savunanlar ve mikrodalga f\u0131r\u0131nlar\u0131n yaln\u0131zca yiyecek \u00fczerindeki vitaminleri azaltt\u0131\u011f\u0131n\u0131 savunanlar.\n\u0130svi\u00e7re\u2019de yap\u0131lan bir laboratuar ara\u015ft\u0131rmas\u0131n\u0131n sonucuna g\u00f6re mikrodalga f\u0131r\u0131nlarda \u0131s\u0131t\u0131lan veya pi\u015firilen s\u00fct/s\u00fct \u00fcr\u00fcnleri ve sebzeleri t\u00fcketen insanlar\u0131n kalp at\u0131\u015flar\u0131nda ve kan bas\u0131n\u00e7lar\u0131nda de\u011fi\u015fimler meydana gelmi\u015ftir. Buna neden olan \u015fey ise insan sa\u011fl\u0131\u011f\u0131na direkt etkisi olup g\u00f6zle g\u00f6r\u00fclmeyen radyasyondur.\nBunun yan\u0131 s\u0131ra \u0130ngiltere Kanser Ara\u015ft\u0131rma Merkezleri\u2019nde yap\u0131lan bir ara\u015ft\u0131rma sonucunda mikrodalga f\u0131r\u0131nlar\u0131n hi\u00e7bir \u015fekilde insan sa\u011fl\u0131\u011f\u0131na zarar vermedi\u011fi a\u00e7\u0131klanm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r. Evinde bu f\u0131r\u0131nlara sahip olan ki\u015filerin do\u011fru kullan\u0131m\u0131 sonucunda herhangi bir zarar g\u00f6rmeyeceklerini savunan ara\u015ft\u0131rma merkezi, bu cihazlardan gelen radyasyonun insan\u0131 etkilemeyecek derecede az oldu\u011funu ve herhangi bir tehlike olu\u015fturmad\u0131\u011f\u0131n\u0131, yapmam\u0131z gereken \u015feyin daima mikro dalga f\u0131r\u0131nlar\u0131 kapal\u0131 ve g\u00fcvenli bir \u015fekilde kullanmam\u0131z gerekti\u011fini s\u00f6yl\u00fcyor.\nBu bilgilere dayanarak konuyu genel \u00e7er\u00e7evede a\u00e7\u0131klayacak olursak \u015funlar\u0131 s\u00f6yleyebiliriz; \u0130lk olarak mikrodalga f\u0131r\u0131nlar\u0131n\u0131n i\u00e7inde bulunan dalgalar yiyeceklere radyasyon g\u00f6ndermeyip f\u0131r\u0131n i\u00e7erisindeki suyu harekete ge\u00e7irmek amac\u0131yla titre\u015fimler g\u00f6nderir ve bu frekans dalgalar\u0131 besinlerin i\u00e7ine etki eder. Bunun yan\u0131nda ye\u015fillikleri mikrodalgalarda \u0131s\u0131tt\u0131\u011f\u0131m\u0131z zaman dalgalar besin i\u00e7indeki suyu \u0131s\u0131tt\u0131k\u00e7a su ile beraber besinler de yiyece\u011fin d\u0131\u015f\u0131na \u00e7\u0131k\u0131p vitaminini yitirebilir.\nSat\u0131n al\u0131na mikrodalga f\u0131r\u0131nda bir bozukluk olmad\u0131\u011f\u0131 m\u00fcddet\u00e7e ve radyasyonun d\u0131\u015far\u0131 s\u0131zmamas\u0131 i\u00e7in kapaklar\u0131n\u0131n tamamen kapal\u0131 olmas\u0131 tehlikeyi \u00f6nlemektedir. Bunun yan\u0131nda mikrodalga \u00e7al\u0131\u015f\u0131rken kar\u015f\u0131s\u0131nda durup etkisine do\u011frudan maruz kalmak sa\u011fl\u0131k i\u00e7in zararl\u0131d\u0131r. Metallerin, plastiklerin f\u0131r\u0131n i\u00e7ine konulmamas\u0131 \u00f6nemli olan bir di\u011fer noktad\u0131r. Bu maddeler yap\u0131lar\u0131ndan \u00f6t\u00fcr\u00fc radyasyonu i\u00e7ine al\u0131p kanserojen kimyasallara d\u00f6n\u00fc\u015fmesine sebep olurlar.\nMikrodalga F\u0131r\u0131nlar\u0131n Zararlar\u0131n\u0131 \u00d6nlemek \u0130\u00e7in Neler Yap\u0131lmal\u0131?\nMikrodalga \u00e7al\u0131\u015ft\u0131r\u0131lmadan \u00f6nce kapa\u011f\u0131 tamamen kapal\u0131 olmal\u0131d\u0131r.\nF\u0131r\u0131n i\u00e7erisine metal e\u015fyalar ya da folyo ile kapl\u0131 yiyecekler ve plastik \u00fcr\u00fcnler konulmamal\u0131d\u0131r.\nF\u0131r\u0131n bo\u015fken \u00e7al\u0131\u015ft\u0131r\u0131lmamal\u0131d\u0131r.\nF\u0131r\u0131n \u0131slak alanlarla temas etmemelidir.\nDi\u011fer s\u0131cak ev aletlerinden uzak tutulmal\u0131d\u0131r.\nDerin kaplar de\u011fil daha \u00e7ok s\u0131\u011f kaplar tercih edilmelidir.\nF\u0131r\u0131n i\u00e7inin temizli\u011fi belli aral\u0131klarla yap\u0131lmal\u0131d\u0131r.\nYa\u011fda k\u0131zartmaya uygun yiyecekler mikrodalga f\u0131r\u0131nlarda \u0131s\u0131t\u0131lmamal\u0131d\u0131r.\nHerhangi bir tehlike an\u0131nda f\u0131r\u0131n\u0131n elektrik ile ba\u011f\u0131 kesilmelidir.\nNot: Bu i\u00e7erik, g\u00f6n\u00fcll\u00fc edit\u00f6r\u00fcm\u00fcz taraf\u0131ndan yaz\u0131lm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r. Siz de sitemizde g\u00f6n\u00fcll\u00fc edit\u00f6r olmak ister misiniz? Linke t\u0131klayarak hemen ba\u015fvurunuzu yapabilirsiniz.\nKaynaklar: G\u0131dabilinci, zararlar\u0131.com, relfe.com, Imperial College London\nVideo oynat\u0131c\u0131\n00:00\n00:00\n1. \u201cdogrula.org\u201d\n0:07\n[Toplam:6    Ortalama:5/5] Mikrodalga F\u0131r\u0131n Sa\u011fl\u0131\u011fa Zararl\u0131 m\u0131?", "\u201c\u0130zban nedir, \u0130zmirliler neden isyan ediyor\u201d ba\u015fl\u0131kl\u0131 haberimizi okuyarak, son birka\u00e7 g\u00fcnd\u00fcr g\u00fcndem olan \u0130zban ve \u0130zban\u2019da yeni uygulama hakk\u0131nda bilgi sahibi olabilirsiniz.\n\u0130zban Nedir?\n\u0130zban, \u0130zmir\u2019deki Alia\u011fa-Sel\u00e7uk aras\u0131ndaki banliy\u00f6 hatt\u0131nda hizmet veren, havaliman\u0131 ba\u011flant\u0131l\u0131, en b\u00fcy\u00fck kent i\u00e7i rayl\u0131 toplu ta\u015f\u0131ma sistemlerinden biridir. Anadolu\u2019daki ilk demir yolu hatt\u0131 olarak 1856 y\u0131l\u0131nda hizmete giren \u0130zmir-Ayd\u0131n demir yolu ile 1863\u2019te hizmete giren \u0130zmir-Kasaba demir yolu hatlar\u0131n\u0131n \u00fczerinde in\u015fa edilen \u0130zban, TCDD ile \u0130zmir B\u00fcy\u00fck\u015fehir Belediyesi\u2019nin y\u00fczde 50 ortakl\u0131klar\u0131yla kurulmu\u015ftur.\n2010 y\u0131l\u0131nda 31 istasyonla ba\u015flayan \u0130zban, daha sonra istasyon say\u0131s\u0131n\u0131 40\u2019a \u00e7\u0131kararak toplamda 136 km uzunlu\u011funda olan bir hatt\u0131r. Bu \u00f6zelli\u011fi ile T\u00fcrkiye\u2019nin en uzun \u015fehir i\u00e7i banliy\u00f6 hatt\u0131 konumundad\u0131r.\n\u0130zban, 2018 verileriyle toplamda 73 trene sahiptir ve g\u00fcnl\u00fck olarak en az 300 bin ki\u015filik yolcu ta\u015f\u0131maktad\u0131r.\n\u0130zban Yeni Uygulama Nedir?\nAlia\u011fa\u2019dan Sel\u00e7uk\u2019a hizmet veren kent i\u00e7i banliy\u00f6 sistemi \u0130zban\u2019da 15 \u015eubat Per\u015fembe g\u00fcn\u00fcnden itibaren \u201cArt\u0131 Para\u201d ad\u0131 verilen yeni sisteme ge\u00e7ilmi\u015ftir. Art\u0131 para sistemine g\u00f6re, yolcular\u0131n bindikleri her istasyonun farkl\u0131 bir \u00fccreti vard\u0131r. Bu uygulamaya g\u00f6re yolcular\u0131n, 25 kilometreye kadar olan seyahatlerini 2,86 lira \u00f6deyerek yapabilecekleri ve sonras\u0131nda gitti\u011fi her kilometre ba\u015f\u0131na 7 kuru\u015f daha \u00f6deyecekleri kararla\u015ft\u0131r\u0131lm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r.\n\u00d6rne\u011fin; Alsancak \u0130stasyonundan ilk bini\u015fini yapan yolcular\u0131n toplu ta\u015f\u0131ma kartlar\u0131ndaki bakiyeye g\u00f6re gidilebilecek en uzak nokta olan Alsancak-Sel\u00e7uk \u00fccreti kadar (Tam: 6,50 TL, \u00d6\u011frenci: 3,73 TL, \u00d6\u011fretmen: 4,80 TL) bloke konulacakt\u0131r. Yolcunun gitti\u011fi mesafe 25 kilometre i\u00e7erisinde yer al\u0131yorsa tam i\u00e7in 2,86 TL, \u00f6\u011fretmen i\u00e7in 2,20 TL, \u00f6\u011frenci ve 60 ya\u015f i\u00e7in 1.65 TL tahsil edilecektir.\nMesafe, 25 kilometrenin \u00fczerindeyse her kilometre i\u00e7in ayr\u0131ca ba\u015flang\u0131\u00e7taki blokenin i\u00e7inden tam i\u00e7in 7 kuru\u015f, \u00f6\u011fretmen i\u00e7in 5 kuru\u015f, \u00f6\u011frenci ve 60 ya\u015f i\u00e7in 4 kuru\u015f daha ek \u00fccret al\u0131nacakt\u0131r.\nArt\u0131 Para Sistemine Tepkiler\n\u0130zmir B\u00fcy\u00fck\u015fehir Belediyesi taraf\u0131ndan 2018 Ocak\u2019ta toplu ta\u015f\u0131ma \u00fccretlerine yap\u0131lan y\u00fczde 10\u2019luk zamdan sonra, 15 \u015eubat 2018 tarihinden itibaren de \u0130zban\u2019da kilometre bazl\u0131 fiyat al\u0131nmas\u0131 \u00fczerine vatanda\u015flar tepki g\u00f6stermi\u015ftir.\nTam biletin \u00fccretinin, ilk binilen durakta kesildi\u011fini \u00f6\u011frenen yolcular, indikleri durakta para iadesi almak i\u00e7in kuyruk olu\u015fmas\u0131ndan ve yeni sistemde ula\u015f\u0131m kartlar\u0131na \u00f6ncekine nazaran daha fazla tutar y\u00fcklenmesi gerekti\u011fi i\u00e7in tepkilerini dile getirmi\u015flerdir.\n\u0130zmir B\u00fcy\u00fck\u015fehir Belediye Ba\u015fkan\u0131 Kocao\u011flu A\u00e7\u0131klad\u0131\n\u0130zmir B\u00fcy\u00fck\u015fehir Belediye Ba\u015fkan\u0131 Kocao\u011flu, ge\u00e7ti\u011fimiz hafta Bornova TV\u2019de yay\u0131nlanan Kent G\u00fcndemi isimli programda, \u0130zban\u2019da art\u0131 para uygulamas\u0131 hakk\u0131nda \u015funlar\u0131 s\u00f6yledi:\n\u201cNe yaparsan\u0131z yap\u0131n \u0130zmir bir sallan\u0131r sonra ta\u015flar yerli yerine oturur. Alia\u011fa-Menderes, Alia\u011fa-Sel\u00e7uk oldu. Yar\u0131n da Bergama\u2019ya gidecek, belki K\u0131n\u0131k\u2019a gidecek. 136 kilometreyi bug\u00fcn tek biletle gitsin iddias\u0131nda bulunmak do\u011fru de\u011fil. Bu i\u015fin adaleti var. Bizim yolcumuzun b\u00fcy\u00fck b\u00f6l\u00fcm\u00fc \u015eirinyer ve \u00c7i\u011fli istasyonu aras\u0131nda. Onlar\u0131 etkileyen bir \u015fey yok. B\u00fcy\u00fck bir b\u00f6l\u00fcm y\u00fckleyecek sonra geri kesilecek. \u00d6deyecekleri 2.86 TL\u2019dir. Ayn\u0131 \u00fccrettir.\u201d\nKaynaklar: izban.com.tr, youtube, eshot.gov.tr, alia\u011fa ekspres\n[Toplam:7    Ortalama:4.4/5] \u0130zban Nedir? \u0130zmirliler Neden \u0130syan Ediyor?", "\u201cEVET Yaz 5523\u2019e G\u00f6nder Hediye \u00c7eki Kazan \u0130ddias\u0131\u201d ba\u015fl\u0131kl\u0131 i\u00e7eri\u011fimizde sosyal medyada kar\u015f\u0131la\u015f\u0131lan bir doland\u0131r\u0131c\u0131l\u0131k tuza\u011f\u0131n\u0131 inceledik.\n5523 Doland\u0131r\u0131c\u0131l\u0131\u011f\u0131\n\u00c7o\u011funlukla Facebook \u00fczerinden yap\u0131lmas\u0131 sebebiyle, hemen hemen herkesin ba\u015f\u0131na gelebilme olas\u0131l\u0131\u011f\u0131 olan hediye \u00e7eki doland\u0131r\u0131c\u0131l\u0131\u011f\u0131 nas\u0131l kar\u015f\u0131m\u0131za \u00e7\u0131k\u0131yor? \u00d6ncelikle Facebook\u2019taki herhangi bir arkada\u015f\u0131n\u0131zdan \u201cselam, iyi g\u00fcnler, merhaba\u201d vb. yazan bir selamlama mesaj\u0131 geliyor. Siz bu mesaj\u0131n ger\u00e7ekten o arkada\u015f\u0131n\u0131zdan geldi\u011fini sanarak cevap verdi\u011finizde, \u201cYeni bir i\u015fe girdim, hediye \u00e7eki verdiler. Baz\u0131 tan\u0131d\u0131klar\u0131ma da\u011f\u0131t\u0131yorum. Sana da g\u00f6ndereyim mi?\u201d \u015feklinde ya da  \u201ct\u00fcrk telekom hediye \u00e7eki da\u011f\u0131t\u0131yor, sen de akl\u0131ma geldin, ben sana s\u00f6yleyince evet yaz\u0131p 5523\u2018e g\u00f6nder\u201d veya \u201cMediaMarkt\u2019\u0131n 39.y\u0131l\u0131na \u00f6zel hediye \u00e7eki da\u011f\u0131t\u0131yorum. Seni de d\u00fc\u015f\u00fcnd\u00fcm. Senin cep numaran fatural\u0131 m\u0131yd\u0131?\u201d gibi mesajlar geliyor. Hatt\u0131n\u0131z\u0131n fatural\u0131 olmamas\u0131 durumunda, etraf\u0131n\u0131zdaki ki\u015filer aras\u0131nda fatural\u0131 hatt\u0131 olan birisinin olup olmad\u0131\u011f\u0131n\u0131 soran doland\u0131r\u0131c\u0131lar, konu\u015fman\u0131n devam\u0131nda farkl\u0131 sorular y\u00f6neltip, sizi \u015f\u00fcphelendirmemeye de \u00e7al\u0131\u015f\u0131yorlar. Daha sonra 200 TL\u2019den 2000 TL\u2019ye kadar hediye \u00e7eki kazanma \u015fans\u0131n\u0131z\u0131n oldu\u011funu ve telefonunuzun mesaj b\u00f6l\u00fcm\u00fcne EVET yaz\u0131p 5523\u2018e, 2020\u2018ye veya 7979\u2018a (farkl\u0131 numaralara da olabilir) g\u00f6ndermeniz ya da telefonunuza gelen mesaja ONAY vermeniz durumunda, kampanyaya giri\u015f kodunun gelece\u011fini s\u00f6yleyen doland\u0131r\u0131c\u0131lar, bu y\u00f6ntemle bir\u00e7ok ki\u015fiyi kand\u0131r\u0131yorlar.\nE\u011fer bu talimatlar\u0131 takip eder, uygularsan\u0131z ve hatt\u0131n\u0131z mobil \u00f6demelere a\u00e7\u0131ksa, telefonunuzdan bir oyuna en az 60 ile 200 TL aras\u0131nda olmak \u00fczere para \u00f6demi\u015f oluyorsunuz. Oasis games, Nfinitity Games gibi oyun platformlar\u0131n\u0131n sistemi dolay\u0131s\u0131yla, doland\u0131r\u0131c\u0131lar\u0131n bu y\u00f6ntemi uygulayarak, oyunlarda kendilerine daha geni\u015f se\u00e7enekler sa\u011flamas\u0131 m\u00fcmk\u00fcn oluyor. Bir\u00e7ok ki\u015fi ataca\u011f\u0131 bir mesaj y\u00fcz\u00fcnden b\u00f6yle bir \u015feyle kar\u015f\u0131la\u015faca\u011f\u0131n\u0131 tahmin etmedi\u011fi ve konu\u015ftu\u011fu ki\u015finin de arkada\u015f\u0131 oldu\u011funu sand\u0131\u011f\u0131 i\u00e7in bu durumdan ilk a\u015famada \u015f\u00fcphelenmiyor. Ancak mobil \u00f6deme y\u00f6ntemiyle faturaya yans\u0131yan bir bedel \u00f6demeyi kabul etmi\u015f oluyorlar ve bunun fark\u0131na var\u0131ld\u0131\u011f\u0131nda da art\u0131k \u00e7ok ge\u00e7 olmu\u015f oluyor.\nBir\u00e7ok ki\u015fiden gelen \u015fikayetler sonucu Oasis, bu duruma kar\u015f\u0131 uyar\u0131 mesajlar\u0131 g\u00f6ndermek gibi bir tedbir alm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r. Ancak bu tedbirin yeterli oldu\u011funu s\u00f6ylemek pek m\u00fcmk\u00fcn de\u011fil. \u00c7\u00fcnk\u00fc doland\u0131r\u0131c\u0131l\u0131k ma\u011fduru ki\u015filer, bilmeyerek oyun kredisi sat\u0131n alma talebinde bulundu\u011funda \u201cOasis\u2019den 60 TL de\u011ferinde oyun paras\u0131 sat\u0131n almak i\u00e7in bu mesaj\u0131 EVET yazarak, cevaplay\u0131n\u0131z. Bu i\u015flemi siz ba\u015flatmad\u0131ysan\u0131z l\u00fctfen bu mesaja cevap vermeyiniz.\u201d \u015feklinde bir uyar\u0131 mesaj\u0131 geliyor. Ancak bu mesaj her zaman ula\u015fmayabiliyor.\nB\u00f6yle durumlarda e\u011fer s\u0131k kullanm\u0131yorsan\u0131z mobil \u00f6demeyi kapatman\u0131z\u0131n bir\u00e7ok doland\u0131r\u0131c\u0131l\u0131k tuza\u011f\u0131n\u0131n \u00f6n\u00fcne ge\u00e7mek i\u00e7in yararl\u0131 oldu\u011funu s\u00f6ylemek m\u00fcmk\u00fcn. Aksi takdirde b\u00f6yle doland\u0131r\u0131c\u0131l\u0131k y\u00f6ntemleri kar\u015f\u0131s\u0131nda operat\u00f6rlerin yapabilece\u011fi pek bir \u015fey oldu\u011funu s\u00f6yleyemeyiz.\nBir\u00e7ok farkl\u0131 versiyonuna rastlaman\u0131n m\u00fcmk\u00fcn oldu\u011fu s\u00f6z konusu doland\u0131r\u0131c\u0131l\u0131k y\u00f6ntemiyle ilgili, \u0130nternet\u2019te yer alan baz\u0131 \u015fikayetler \u015f\u00f6yle:\nBir akrabam\u0131n Facebook hesab\u0131n\u0131 \u00e7alarak Teknosa\u2019dan hediye \u00e7eki kazand\u0131n\u0131z mesaj\u0131 atmak i\u00e7in EVET yaz 5523\u2019e g\u00f6nder muhabbetinden 180 tl faturadan habersizce \u00e7ekildi! Bir\u00e7ok insan bu \u015fekilde ma\u011fdur edilmi\u015f buna bir \u00e7\u00f6z\u00fcm yok mu? \u0130nternet siteleri neden kontrol alt\u0131na al\u0131nam\u0131yor?\u2022\nNfinity Games arkada\u015f\u0131m\u0131n Facebook hesab\u0131n\u0131 ele ge\u00e7irmi\u015f. T\u00fcrk Telekom \u00e7ekili\u015fi diye onaylanmas\u0131 gereken mesaj g\u00f6nderdiler anneme. 3-4 kez evet yaz\u0131lmas\u0131 istenmi\u015f. Haks\u0131z yere 84\u2019 er liradan 251 lira yans\u0131tm\u0131\u015flar faturaya. Arad\u0131k T\u00fcrk Telekom bununla ilgili bir \u015fey yapamayaca\u011f\u0131n\u0131 s\u00f6yledi. Ama hi\u00e7bir \u00f6nlem al\u0131nm\u0131yor anla\u015f\u0131lan. B\u00f6yle bir kand\u0131rmaya T\u00fcrk Telekom\u2019un izin vermemesi laz\u0131m. \u015eikayetlerde g\u00f6rd\u00fc\u011f\u00fcm kadar\u0131yla Nfinity Games hi\u00e7bir \u015fikayeti dikkate alm\u0131yor. 2 \u015firkette memnun san\u0131r\u0131m. Bunun i\u00e7in T\u00fcrk Telekom\u2019a da Nfinity Games\u2019e de gerekli i\u015flemi ba\u015flataca\u011f\u0131m.\u2022\nBug\u00fcn \u00e7ok sevdi\u011fim bir karde\u015fimden Facebook \u00fczerinden bir mesaj ald\u0131m. \u201cMigros\u2019tan hediye \u00e7eki da\u011f\u0131t\u0131yorum da seni de d\u00fc\u015f\u00fcnd\u00fcm senin tel fatural\u0131m\u0131yd\u0131\u201d. Ben de evet diye cevaplad\u0131ktan sonra \u201csana gelen mesaj\u0131 hemen EVET yaz\u0131p cevapla ne kazand\u0131\u011f\u0131na bakay\u0131m mesajda 60 TL yaz\u0131yor o reklam ama\u00e7l\u0131d\u0131r tamamen \u00fccretsizdir dedi. Eminsin de\u011fil mi \u00fccretsiz oldu\u011funa diye sordu\u011fumda ise \u201cbir \u015fey olmaz can\u0131m\u201d diye yan\u0131t ald\u0131m. Yard\u0131m olsun diye yapt\u0131m. Biz mesaj\u0131 att\u0131ktan sonra emniyetten doland\u0131r\u0131c\u0131lar\u0131n tuza\u011f\u0131na d\u00fc\u015fmeyin diye mesaj geldi. Ancak i\u015f i\u015ften ge\u00e7mi\u015fti. Biz bu tuza\u011fa d\u00fc\u015ft\u00fck.\u2022\nFacebook\u2019ta polis olan bir abimin hesab\u0131na girerek bize de Teknosa\u2019dan hediye \u00e7eki g\u00f6nderece\u011fim diye bir mesaj att\u0131. Gelen mesajlar\u0131 evet yaz\u0131p g\u00f6nder dedi. Bizde polis oldu\u011fu g\u00fcvenerek g\u00f6nderdik ve 60 TL kesildi . Biz de \u015fikayet\u00e7iyiz ve \u015fikayet i\u00e7in siber su\u00e7lara \u015fikayet ettik.\u2022\nKaynaklar:\nsikayetvar, sikayetvar 2, h\u00fcrriyet, webtekno, dolandiricilik.org, haberekspres, blog.milliyet, sikayetim, cumhuriyet, tgrthaber, blog.milliyet 2\nVideo oynat\u0131c\u0131\nhttps://dogrula.org/wp-content/uploads/2018/02/dogrula.org_.mp4\n00:00\n00:07\n[Toplam:5    Ortalama:5/5] \u201cEVET Yaz 5523\u2019e G\u00f6nder Hediye \u00c7eki Kazan\u201d \u0130ddias\u0131", "T\u00fcrk askerinin Afrin\u2019de zeytinya\u011f\u0131 \u00e7ald\u0131\u011f\u0131 iddias\u0131n\u0131 dogrula.org olarak inceledik. Sosyal medyada yap\u0131lan baz\u0131 payla\u015f\u0131mlarda, T\u00fcrk askerlerinin Afrin\u2019de sivil halktan zeytinya\u011f\u0131 \u00e7alarak bir araca y\u00fckledikleri iddia edilmi\u015ftir. Ancak bu iddia do\u011fru de\u011fildir. \n\u0130ddia tamamen ger\u00e7ek d\u0131\u015f\u0131 olup, g\u00f6r\u00fcnt\u00fcdeki tenekeler zeytinya\u011f\u0131n\u0131 de\u011fil, vatanda\u015flar taraf\u0131ndan T\u00fcrk askerlerine g\u00f6nderilen bal tenekelerini g\u00f6stermektedir.\nAncak sosyal medyada yap\u0131lan bu payla\u015f\u0131mlar, gelen tepkiler \u00fczerine daha sonradan silinmi\u015f veya hesaplar ask\u0131ya al\u0131nm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r.\nZeytinya\u011f\u0131 De\u011fil Bal Tenekesi \nT\u00fcrk askerinin Afrin\u2019de zeytinya\u011f\u0131 \u00e7ald\u0131\u011f\u0131 iddias\u0131n\u0131n aksine, zeytinya\u011f\u0131 yerine i\u00e7inde bal olan tenekeler T\u00fcrk askerine yard\u0131m olarak gelmi\u015ftir.\nAfrin Operasyonu ba\u015flad\u0131\u011f\u0131ndan bug\u00fcne, T\u00fcrk askerlerine vatanda\u015flar taraf\u0131ndan \u00e7e\u015fitli g\u0131da yard\u0131mlar\u0131 yap\u0131lmaktad\u0131r. Ge\u00e7ti\u011fimiz g\u00fcnlerde Konyal\u0131 iki bal \u00fcreticisi, Afrin Operasyonuna destek i\u00e7in T\u00fcrk askerlerine 1 ton bal g\u00f6ndermek istemi\u015flerdir. Bir ton bal\u0131, otuz tenekenin i\u00e7ine koyarak arabalar\u0131na y\u00fckleyen vatanda\u015flar, ballar\u0131 Kilis\u2019te bulunan \u015eehit Jandarma Astsubay Mehmet Deveci K\u0131\u015flas\u0131na teslim etmi\u015ftir.\nYerel haber kaynaklar\u0131nda ge\u00e7en olay\u0131n asl\u0131, a\u015fa\u011f\u0131daki videoda da g\u00f6r\u00fclmektedir:\nEdit\u00f6r Notu: T\u00fcrk Silahl\u0131 Kuvvetlerini itibars\u0131zla\u015ft\u0131rmaya ve karalamaya y\u00f6nelik, sosyal medya \u00fczerinden kayna\u011f\u0131 belirtilmeyerek bir\u00e7ok iddia ortaya at\u0131lmaktad\u0131r. Bu iddiay\u0131 ele al\u0131rken \u201cT\u00fcrk askerlerinin zeytinya\u011f\u0131 \u00e7ald\u0131\u011f\u0131\u201d ifadesinde, mecburen T\u00fcrk askeri ve \u00e7almak fiilini bir arada kulland\u0131\u011f\u0131m\u0131zdan dolay\u0131 rahats\u0131zl\u0131k duydu\u011fumuzu ifade etmek isteriz.\nKaynaklar: Facebook, Konya Haber\nVideo oynat\u0131c\u0131\n00:00\n00:00\n1. \u201cdogrula.org\u201d\n0:07\n[Toplam:5    Ortalama:5/5] Afrin\u2019de Zeytinya\u011f\u0131 \u00c7al\u0131nd\u0131\u011f\u0131 \u0130ddias\u0131", "Konya\u2019da uzay istasyonu oldu\u011fu ve orada sava\u015f u\u00e7a\u011f\u0131, tank ve uzay gemisi \u00fcretildi\u011fi iddialar\u0131 yanl\u0131\u015ft\u0131r.\nFacebook\u2019ta 2023 Dirili\u015f \u2013 @2023dirilis isimli bir sayfa, Konya\u2019daki gizli uzay \u00fcss\u00fcnde bor ile \u00e7al\u0131\u015fan, hem uzay gemisi hem de sava\u015f u\u00e7a\u011f\u0131 olan bir ara\u00e7 \u00fcretildi\u011fini iddia ederek, sahte bilgiler ve sapt\u0131r\u0131lm\u0131\u015f g\u00f6rsellerle g\u00fcndem olu\u015fturup payla\u015f\u0131mlar yapmaktad\u0131r.\nSon y\u0131llarda s\u0131k\u00e7a duyulan \u201cKonya Uzay \u00dcss\u00fc\u201d mevzusuna at\u0131fta bulunarak sahte payla\u015f\u0131mlar yapan sayfan\u0131n i\u00e7erikleri okundu\u011funda, yaz\u0131lanlar\u0131n ger\u00e7ekle ba\u011fda\u015fmad\u0131\u011f\u0131 a\u00e7\u0131k\u00e7a g\u00f6r\u00fclmektedir. Photoshop kullan\u0131larak g\u00f6rsel yerle\u015ftirilen bu foto\u011fraflar ger\u00e7ek de\u011fildir.\nBelirli bir partinin propagandas\u0131n\u0131 yap\u0131yormu\u015f gibi alg\u0131 olu\u015fturan 2023 Dirili\u015f hesab\u0131, uydurma haber ve foto\u015fop (photoshop) kullan\u0131larak yap\u0131lan sahte g\u00f6rsellerle insanlara yanl\u0131\u015f, de\u011fersiz ve yalan haberler sunmaktad\u0131r. Halk\u0131n manevi duygular\u0131n\u0131 s\u00f6m\u00fcrerek inan\u00e7lara ve \u015fahsiyetlere hakaret eden, kar\u015f\u0131t g\u00f6r\u00fc\u015flere tahamm\u00fcls\u00fczl\u00fc\u011f\u00fc alenen te\u015fvik eden ve nefret su\u00e7u i\u015fleyen bu hesap, benzeri olan y\u00fczlercesinden yaln\u0131zca biridir.\nYoutube\u2019den sahte payla\u015f\u0131mlar yapan bir di\u011fer hesap da Alee271. Sayfa, mant\u0131ktan uzak ve insan akl\u0131yla dalga ge\u00e7en g\u00f6nderilerin yer ald\u0131\u011f\u0131 videolar yay\u0131nl\u0131yor.\nKonya Uzay \u00dcss\u00fc Ger\u00e7ek mi?\n\u00c7ok say\u0131da vatanda\u015f\u0131n do\u011frulu\u011funu ara\u015ft\u0131rmadan payla\u015ft\u0131\u011f\u0131 bu foto\u011fraf, Konya\u2019da bulunan gizli uzay istasyonu olarak internette yay\u0131lm\u0131\u015ft\u0131.\nSon y\u0131llarda trol hesaplarda payla\u015f\u0131larak yay\u0131lan, Konya\u2019da bir uzay \u00fcss\u00fcne ait oldu\u011fu iddia edilen g\u00f6rsel, asl\u0131nda ABD\u2019nin New Mexico eyaletinde bulunan ve d\u00fcnyan\u0131n ilk ticari uzay \u00fcss\u00fc olan Spaceport America.\nSpaceport America, daha \u00f6nce herhangi bir havaliman\u0131 veya federal altyap\u0131ya sahip olmayan ticari kullan\u0131c\u0131lar i\u00e7in \u00f6zel olarak tasarlanan ve in\u015fa edilen ilk uzay \u00fcss\u00fcd\u00fcr.\nSpaceport America, New Mexico, ABD\n\u0130nternette yap\u0131lan sahte payla\u015f\u0131mlara konu olan Konyal\u0131 bilim adamlar\u0131, Konya\u2019da tank \u00fcretilmesi ve Konya\u2019da gizli uzay \u00fcss\u00fc bulundu\u011fu iddialar\u0131 kurgusal. \u0130ddialar\u0131n ortak noktas\u0131 Konya\u2019da, T\u00fcrkiye\u2019nin ilk bilim merkezi olan \u201cKonya Bilim Merkezi\u201d bulunuyor ancak, orada tank ya da uzay gemisi \u00fcretilmesi s\u00f6z konusu de\u011fil.\nKonya Bilim Merkezi\nGen\u00e7lere, olaylara bilimsel bir bak\u0131\u015f a\u00e7\u0131s\u0131yla yakla\u015fabilme olana\u011f\u0131 sa\u011flayan Konya Bilim Merkezi, 2014 y\u0131l\u0131nda T\u00fcbitak te\u015fviki ve \u00e7e\u015fitli fonlarla desteklenerek kurulmu\u015ftur. B\u00fcnyesinde 146 sergi \u00fcnitesi bulunan merkez, her ya\u015ftan ve her kesimden insana hitap etmektedir. V\u00fccudumuz Sergisi, Temel Ad\u0131mlar Sergisi, Bilimin Sultanlar\u0131 Sergisi, D\u00fcnyam\u0131z Sergisi, Evrenimiz ve Yeni Ufuklar gibi farkl\u0131 sergi \u00fcniteleriyle \u00e7ocuklar\u0131 ve gen\u00e7leri bilimle bulu\u015fturmaktad\u0131r.\nMini Tank\nKonya efsanelerinde yer alan gizli tank yap\u0131m\u0131 iddialar\u0131 as\u0131ls\u0131z, fakat Konya\u2019da bir firma, insans\u0131z kara arac\u0131 olan mini bir tank \u00fcretmi\u015ftir. Bir\u00e7ok \u00f6zelli\u011fi olan ve \u00f6zel ama\u00e7la \u00fcretilen mini tank Ankebot, \u00f6zel bir giri\u015fim projesi. \u0130ncelenen robot, Savunma Sanayii M\u00fcste\u015farl\u0131\u011f\u0131\u2019ndan haber bekliyor.\n\u00d6zellikle sosyal medya arac\u0131l\u0131\u011f\u0131yla yay\u0131lan ve kayna\u011f\u0131 belli olmayan, son derece u\u00e7 ve mant\u0131ktan uzak yaz\u0131lar, T\u00fcrkiye\u2019nin askeri operasyonlar\u0131n\u0131 de\u011fersizle\u015ftirmekten ve TSK\u2019y\u0131 itibars\u0131zla\u015ft\u0131rmaktan \u00f6teye ge\u00e7memektedir. Akla ayk\u0131r\u0131 ifadelerle yaz\u0131lm\u0131\u015f ve b\u00f6ylesine bilin\u00e7sizce yap\u0131lan payla\u015f\u0131mlar, alg\u0131 y\u00f6nlendirme ya da operasyonel bir \u00e7al\u0131\u015fma \u015f\u00fcphesi ta\u015f\u0131maktad\u0131r. \u0130nternet ve sosyal medya kullan\u0131c\u0131lar\u0131n\u0131n dikkat etmesi gereken konulardan en \u00f6nemlisi, haberin hangi kaynaktan geldi\u011fine bakmak ve do\u011frulu\u011funu teyit etmeden bilgi ve g\u00f6rsel payla\u015f\u0131m\u0131 yapmaktan ka\u00e7\u0131nmakt\u0131r.\nKaynaklar: fb  youtube   thefutureofthings   spaceportamerica   kbm   T\u00fcbitak\nVideo oynat\u0131c\u0131\nhttps://dogrula.org/wp-content/uploads/2018/02/dogrula.org_.mp4\n00:00\n00:07\n[Toplam:16    Ortalama:4.6/5] Konya\u2019da Uzay \u0130stasyonu \u0130ddias\u0131", " Twitter\u2019da En \u00c7ok Takip Edilenler", "Ka\u011f\u0131t toplay\u0131c\u0131lar\u0131na ceza kesildi\u011fi iddias\u0131n\u0131 ara\u015ft\u0131rd\u0131k. Yeni Geri D\u00f6n\u00fc\u015f\u00fcm Yasas\u0131 kapsam\u0131nda ka\u011f\u0131t toplayan i\u015f\u00e7ilerden 20 bin lira, toplay\u0131c\u0131lardan ka\u011f\u0131t alan firmalara ise 140 bin lira ceza kesilece\u011fi iddia edilmi\u015ftir. Ancak iddia tam olarak do\u011fru de\u011fildir. Kesilen ceza, 2005 y\u0131l\u0131ndan beri y\u00fcr\u00fcrl\u00fckte olan, lisans\u0131 bulunmayan at\u0131k ka\u011f\u0131t toplama i\u015finde faaliyet g\u00f6steren firmalara y\u00f6nelik bir cezad\u0131r.\n\u0130ddia, Ocak 2016\u2019da tart\u0131\u015f\u0131lan Geri D\u00f6n\u00fc\u015f\u00fcm Yasas\u0131 \u00fczerine ortaya at\u0131lm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r. Ancak sosyal medyada son g\u00fcnlerde tekrar g\u00fcndeme gelmi\u015ftir.\nKa\u011f\u0131t Toplay\u0131c\u0131lar\u0131na Yasal D\u00fczenleme Geldi Mi?\n7 Nisan 2016 tarihinde \u0130zmir Milletvekili Ertu\u011frul K\u00fcrk\u00e7\u00fc, at\u0131k ka\u011f\u0131t i\u015f\u00e7ilerine ili\u015fkin, d\u00f6nemin \u00c7evre ve \u015eehircilik Bakan\u0131 Fatma G\u00fcldemet Sar\u0131\u2019ya yaz\u0131l\u0131 soru \u00f6nergesi sunmu\u015ftur. Bakan Sar\u0131 taraf\u0131ndan cevaplanan \u00f6nergede, T\u00fcrkiye\u2019de faaliyet g\u00f6steren at\u0131k ka\u011f\u0131t toplama i\u015finde faaliyet g\u00f6steren i\u015f\u00e7ilere y\u00f6nelik sorular sorulmu\u015ftur.\nY\u00f6neltilen soru \u00f6nergesindeki sorulara linkten ula\u015fabilirsiniz. Bakan Fatma G\u00fcldemet Sar\u0131\u2019n\u0131n yaz\u0131l\u0131 soru \u00f6nergesine verdi\u011fi cevap ise \u015fu \u015fekildedir:\nBakan Sar\u0131\u2019n\u0131n yaz\u0131l\u0131 soru \u00f6nergesine verdi\u011fi cevap\nYeni D\u00f6n\u00fc\u015f\u00fcm Yasas\u0131 olarak g\u00fcndeme gelen iddiadaki ceza i\u015flemleri, cevaplanan \u00f6nergeye g\u00f6re, 2005 y\u0131l\u0131nda Ambalaj At\u0131klar\u0131n\u0131n Kontrol\u00fc Y\u00f6netmeli\u011fi kapsam\u0131nda uygulanmaya ba\u015flanm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r. Uygulamada lisans\u0131 olmayan firmalar\u0131n denetimleri sonucu ortaya \u00e7\u0131kan cezai i\u015flemler, 2005 y\u0131l\u0131ndan bu yana y\u00fcr\u00fcrl\u00fcktedir. Ancak denetimlerin aksamas\u0131 sonucu ve ihtiya\u00e7lardan \u00f6t\u00fcr\u00fc, y\u00f6netmelik revize edilerek 2011 y\u0131l\u0131nda tekrar yay\u0131mlanm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r. 2011 y\u0131l\u0131ndan sonra ise, Yeni D\u00f6n\u00fc\u015f\u00fcm Yasas\u0131 olarak farkl\u0131 bir d\u00fczenleme yap\u0131lmam\u0131\u015ft\u0131r.\nBakan Sar\u0131\u2019dan A\u00e7\u0131klama \n\u00c7evre ve \u015eehircilik Eski Bakan\u0131 Fatma G\u00fcldemet Sar\u0131, iddian\u0131n g\u00fcndeme geldi\u011fi 2016 y\u0131l\u0131n\u0131n Ocak ay\u0131nda yapt\u0131\u011f\u0131 bas\u0131n a\u00e7\u0131klamas\u0131nda konuyla ilgili \u015funlar\u0131 s\u00f6ylemi\u015ftir:\n\u201cBug\u00fcn kamuoyunda, ceza kesiliyor derken, sanki cezay\u0131 at\u0131k toplay\u0131c\u0131lar\u0131na kesilmi\u015f gibi g\u00f6steren olay asl\u0131nda tamamen bu firmalar\u0131n denetlenmesi sonucunda, \u00e7e\u015fitli sebeplerle y\u00f6netmeli\u011fe ayk\u0131r\u0131 bulunmu\u015f olan baz\u0131 problemlerine kesilmi\u015f cezalard\u0131r. Her i\u015fletmenin, her fabrikan\u0131n zaman zaman denetlendi\u011fi gibi bakanl\u0131\u011f\u0131m\u0131z\u0131n sorumlulu\u011fu alt\u0131nda olan lisansl\u0131 firmalar\u0131 eskiden oldu\u011fu gibi 2015 y\u0131l\u0131nda da denetledik.\n\u00d6zellikle sokakta at\u0131k toplayan vatanda\u015flar\u0131m\u0131z\u0131 suistimal eden, onlar\u0131 kullanan bir anlay\u0131\u015f var. Sokakta at\u0131k toplayanlar\u0131n \u00e7al\u0131\u015fma ortamlar\u0131; hem i\u015f hem de sa\u011fl\u0131k anlam\u0131nda yetersizdir. Bu nedenle; at\u0131k toplayanlara karde\u015flerimize, at\u0131klar\u0131n\u0131 teslim ettikleri firmalarca sahip \u00e7\u0131k\u0131lmas\u0131 gerekiyor.\nEn basitinden bu ki\u015filere uygun k\u0131yafet, eldiven, maske ve daha modernize edilmi\u015f ara\u00e7larla destek olunabilir. Bu konularla ilgili olarak; bakanl\u0131klarla, lisansl\u0131 firmalarla ve belediyelerle bir araya gelmeyi planl\u0131yoruz. At\u0131k toplay\u0131c\u0131lar\u0131m\u0131z\u0131n sa\u011fl\u0131klar\u0131n\u0131 ve uygun i\u015f ko\u015fullar\u0131n\u0131 \u00e7ok \u00f6nemsiyoruz. Onlara \u00e7ok de\u011fer veriyoruz, vermeye de devam edece\u011fiz.\u201d \nAyr\u0131ca Bakan Sar\u0131, 2015 y\u0131l\u0131 i\u00e7erisinde 48 bin 651 denetim yap\u0131ld\u0131\u011f\u0131n\u0131 ve bunun sonucunda 119 firmaya idari yapt\u0131r\u0131m cezas\u0131 uyguland\u0131\u011f\u0131n\u0131 ifade etmi\u015ftir.\nSonu\u00e7 olarak, lisans\u0131 olmayan ka\u011f\u0131t firmalar\u0131na ceza kesildi\u011fi iddias\u0131 do\u011frudur. Fakat, ka\u011f\u0131t toplayan i\u015f\u00e7ilere ceza kesilmesine y\u00f6nelik yasal bir durumla veya herhangi bir olayla kar\u015f\u0131la\u015f\u0131lmam\u0131\u015ft\u0131r. Ceza alan firmalar\u0131n, toplanan ka\u011f\u0131tlar\u0131 almama ihtimaline kar\u015f\u0131, ka\u011f\u0131t toplayan i\u015f\u00e7iler ma\u011fduriyetlerini dile getirerek tepki g\u00f6stermi\u015flerdir.\nKaynaklar: Resmi Gazete, TBMM Yaz\u0131l\u0131 Soru \u00d6nergesi, CNNT\u00dcRK\nVideo oynat\u0131c\u0131\n00:00\n00:00\n1. \u201cdogrula.org\u201d\n0:07\n[Toplam:7    Ortalama:5/5] Ka\u011f\u0131t Toplay\u0131c\u0131lar\u0131na Ceza Kesildi\u011fi \u0130ddias\u0131", "Orgeneral Hasan I\u011fs\u0131z\u2019\u0131n k\u0131z\u0131n\u0131n bar\u0131\u015f bildirisine imza att\u0131\u011f\u0131 iddias\u0131 ba\u015fl\u0131kl\u0131 i\u00e7eri\u011fimizde, s\u00f6z konusu iddiay\u0131 ele ald\u0131k. Sosyal medya \u00fczerinde yap\u0131lan bir payla\u015f\u0131mda, Emekli Orgeneral Hasan I\u011fs\u0131z\u2018\u0131n k\u0131z\u0131 Asl\u0131 I\u011fs\u0131z\u2018\u0131n Bar\u0131\u015f \u0130\u00e7in Akademisyenler Bildirisine imza att\u0131\u011f\u0131 iddia edilmi\u015ftir. Bu iddia do\u011frudur. Sosyal medya \u00fczerinde de, iddiayla ilgili \u00e7e\u015fitli tepkiler payla\u015f\u0131lm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r.\n10 Ocak 2016 tarihinde \u201cBu su\u00e7a ortak olmayaca\u011f\u0131z\u201c ba\u015fl\u0131kl\u0131 \u201cBar\u0131\u015f i\u00e7in akademisyen bildirisi\u201c, 1128 imza ile kamuoyuna duyurulmu\u015f olup, daha sonra \u00e7e\u015fitli akademisyenler taraf\u0131ndan iki binin \u00fczerinde imzalanm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r. Bildiri ve bildirideki imza listesi, \u00e7e\u015fitli yay\u0131n kurulu\u015flar\u0131 taraf\u0131ndan kamuoyu ile payla\u015f\u0131lm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r. Emekli Orgeneral Hasan I\u011fs\u0131z\u2019\u0131n k\u0131z\u0131 Asl\u0131 I\u011fs\u0131z\u2018\u0131n ismi de bahsi ge\u00e7en bildiride bulunmaktad\u0131r. \n  Emekli Orgeneral Hasan I\u011fs\u0131z, k\u0131z\u0131yla ilgili iddia \u00fczerine bir a\u00e7\u0131klama yapma gere\u011fi duymu\u015f ve I\u011fs\u0131z\u2019\u0131n Ergenekon davas\u0131ndaki avukat\u0131 olan Murat Erg\u00fcn arac\u0131l\u0131\u011f\u0131yla a\u015fa\u011f\u0131daki a\u00e7\u0131klama yap\u0131lm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r. Em. Org. I\u011fs\u0131z, k\u0131z\u0131n\u0131n hedef g\u00f6sterilerek, konunun ele\u015ftiri boyutunu a\u015fmas\u0131 ve bununla birlikte bir lin\u00e7 kampanyas\u0131na d\u00f6n\u00fc\u015ft\u00fcr\u00fcld\u00fc\u011f\u00fcnden \u00fcz\u00fcnt\u00fc duydu\u011funu ifade etmi\u015ftir.\nK\u0131z\u0131 Asl\u0131 I\u011fs\u0131z\u2018\u0131n d\u00fc\u015f\u00fcncelerinde \u00f6zg\u00fcr bir birey oldu\u011funu, kendisinin ve ailesinin yurt d\u0131\u015f\u0131nda bir \u00fcniversitede g\u00f6revli olmas\u0131ndan gurur duydu\u011funu belirtmi\u015ftir. Ayr\u0131ca Emekli Orgeneral Hasan I\u011fs\u0131z, s\u00f6z konusu bar\u0131\u015f bildirisine k\u0131z\u0131ndan farkl\u0131 d\u00fc\u015f\u00fcnerek \u015fahs\u0131n\u0131n kat\u0131lmad\u0131\u011f\u0131n\u0131 s\u00f6ylemi\u015ftir.\nEm. Org. Hasan I\u011fs\u0131z\u2019\u0131n avukat\u0131 Murat Erg\u00fcn\u2019\u00fcn a\u00e7\u0131klamas\u0131\nKaynaklar: Twitter, Twitter 2, T24, ABC Gazetesi, sanalbas\u0131n\nVideo oynat\u0131c\u0131\n00:00\n00:00\n1. \u201cdogrula.org\u201d\n0:07\n[Toplam:2    Ortalama:4.5/5] Orgeneral Hasan I\u011fs\u0131z\u2019\u0131n K\u0131z\u0131n\u0131n Bar\u0131\u015f Bildirisine \u0130mza Att\u0131\u011f\u0131 \u0130ddias\u0131", "\u201ce-Devlet Soya\u011fac\u0131 Sorgulama A\u00e7\u0131ld\u0131 m\u0131? Soya\u011fac\u0131 Nas\u0131l \u00d6\u011frenilir?\u201d ba\u015fl\u0131kl\u0131 i\u00e7eri\u011fimizden, yo\u011fun talep dolay\u0131s\u0131yla sistemin bekletmelere neden olmas\u0131 \u00fczerine ge\u00e7ici olarak durdurulan e-Devlet soya\u011fac\u0131 sorgulama hizmetinin, tekrar aktif olup olmad\u0131\u011f\u0131n\u0131 \u00f6\u011frenebilirsiniz.\n08.02.2018 tarihinde e-Devlet \u00fczerinden hizmete giren ancak yo\u011fun talep dolay\u0131s\u0131yla sistem kaynakl\u0131 bekletmeler ya\u015fanmas\u0131 sebebiyle, 09.02.2018 tarihinde ge\u00e7ici olarak durdurulan soya\u011fac\u0131 sorgulama sistemi, tekrar hizmet vermeye ba\u015flam\u0131\u015ft\u0131r. Ancak tekrar benzer sorunlarla kar\u015f\u0131la\u015fmamak ad\u0131na, sistem \u00fczerinden sorgulama talebi olu\u015fturuldu\u011funda, ba\u015fvuru zaman\u0131na g\u00f6re talep s\u0131raya ekleniyor.\ne-Devlet\u2018in resmi sitesinde sunulan hizmet sayesinde, vatanda\u015flar\u0131n belirli bir tarihe (1800\u2019l\u00fc y\u0131llara) kadar soya\u011fac\u0131n\u0131 \u00f6\u011frenebilmesi m\u00fcmk\u00fcnd\u00fcr. Soya\u011fac\u0131n\u0131 \u00f6\u011frenmek isteyenler i\u00e7in, bu sisteme nas\u0131l giri\u015f yap\u0131laca\u011f\u0131n\u0131 ve i\u015flemlerin nas\u0131l tamamlanaca\u011f\u0131n\u0131 ad\u0131m ad\u0131m a\u00e7\u0131klad\u0131\u011f\u0131m\u0131z k\u0131lavuza ula\u015fmak i\u00e7in buraya t\u0131klay\u0131n\u0131z.\nKaynaklar:\nturkiye.gov.tr, dogrula.org\nVideo oynat\u0131c\u0131\nhttps://dogrula.org/wp-content/uploads/2018/02/dogrula.org_.mp4\n00:00\n00:07\n[Toplam:7    Ortalama:4.6/5] e-Devlet Soya\u011fac\u0131 Sorgulama A\u00e7\u0131ld\u0131 m\u0131? Soya\u011fac\u0131 Nas\u0131l \u00d6\u011frenilir?", "\u201cFacebook\u2019ta BFF Ye\u015fil Olursa Hesap G\u00fcvende \u0130ddias\u0131\u201d ba\u015fl\u0131kl\u0131 i\u00e7eri\u011fimizde son g\u00fcnlerde Facebook\u2019ta dikkat \u00e7eken \u201cyorum olarak BFF yaz\u0131n, ye\u015fil olursa hesab\u0131n\u0131z g\u00fcvende\u201d iddias\u0131n\u0131 inceledik. S\u00f6z konusu iddia do\u011fru de\u011fildir.\nFacebook\u2019ta bir\u00e7ok hesap taraf\u0131ndan, \u201cFacebook payla\u015f\u0131m\u0131na yorum olarak \u201cBFF\u201d yaz\u0131ld\u0131ktan sonra, e\u011fer \u201cBFF\u201d ye\u015fil oluyorsa hesap g\u00fcvende, e\u011fer olmuyorsa da hesap g\u00fcvende de\u011fil\u201d \u015feklinde payla\u015f\u0131mlar yap\u0131lmaktad\u0131r. BFF, \u201cBest Friends Forever (Sonsuza Kadar En iyi Arkada\u015f)\u201d ifadesinin k\u0131saltmas\u0131d\u0131r. Facebook\u2019ta yorum k\u0131sm\u0131na \u201cBFF\u201d yaz\u0131ld\u0131\u011f\u0131nda, k\u0131saltman\u0131n ye\u015fil rengine d\u00f6n\u00fc\u015ft\u00fc\u011f\u00fc do\u011frudur. Bu renk de\u011fi\u015fimine ek olarak bir de animasyon olu\u015fmaktad\u0131r. Ancak bu durumun Facebook hesab\u0131n\u0131n g\u00fcvenli\u011fiyle hi\u00e7bir alakas\u0131 yoktur. Bu renk de\u011fi\u015fimi ve animasyon, Facebook\u2019un baz\u0131 \u00f6zel kelimeler i\u00e7in etkinle\u015ftirdi\u011fi bir uygulamad\u0131r. Benzer \u015fekilde \u201cTebrikler\u201d yaz\u0131nca da g\u00f6rsel efektler olu\u015fmaktad\u0131r. Facebook, \u00f6zel kelimeler i\u00e7in ge\u00e7erli olan bu uygulamay\u0131 bir\u00e7ok dilde kullan\u0131c\u0131lara sunmaktad\u0131r.\nBe\u011feni, yorum, etkile\u015fim say\u0131s\u0131n\u0131 art\u0131rmak isteyen Facebook hesaplar\u0131 zaman zaman b\u00f6yle as\u0131ls\u0131z payla\u015f\u0131mlar yapmaktad\u0131r. B\u00f6yle uygulamalardan haberdar olmayan bir\u00e7ok ki\u015fi de hesaplar\u0131n\u0131n g\u00fcvenli\u011finden endi\u015fe edip, payla\u015f\u0131mlarda s\u00f6ylenenleri takip etmektedir. Bu ve buna benzer payla\u015f\u0131mlarla kar\u015f\u0131la\u015ft\u0131\u011f\u0131n\u0131zda, hesab\u0131n\u0131z\u0131n g\u00fcvenlik durumuna dair hemen endi\u015feye kap\u0131lmamal\u0131s\u0131n\u0131z. Facebook\u2019un T\u00fcrk\u00e7e olarak da yay\u0131nlad\u0131\u011f\u0131 g\u00fcvenlik ve giri\u015f ayarlar\u0131n\u0131 kontrol ederek, hesab\u0131n\u0131z\u0131n g\u00fcvenlik durumuna dair ger\u00e7ek bilgilere ula\u015fabilirsiniz. Ayr\u0131ca yine g\u00fcvenlik ve giri\u015f ayarlar\u0131 b\u00f6l\u00fcm\u00fcnden y\u00f6nlendirmeleri takip ederek, hesab\u0131n\u0131za y\u00f6nelik g\u00fcvenlik ihlali durumlar\u0131na kar\u015f\u0131 \u00f6nlem alabilirsiniz.\nFacebook\u2019ta hangi animasyonun hangi kelimelerle aktif oldu\u011funa dair listeyi g\u00f6rmek i\u00e7in buraya t\u0131klay\u0131n\u0131z.\nKaynaklar:\nsocialmediatoday, medium\nVideo oynat\u0131c\u0131\nhttps://dogrula.org/wp-content/uploads/2018/02/dogrula.org_.mp4\n00:00\n00:07\n[Toplam:10    Ortalama:4.2/5] Facebook\u2019ta BFF Ye\u015fil Olursa Hesap G\u00fcvende \u0130ddias\u0131", "\u201cFalcon Heavy Nedir? Ba\u015far\u0131s\u0131z Oldu\u011fu \u0130ddias\u0131\u201d ba\u015fl\u0131kl\u0131 i\u00e7eri\u011fimizde, SpaceX taraf\u0131ndan \u00fcretilen \u201cFalcon Heavy\u201d isimli uzay arac\u0131 ile 06.02.2018 tarihinde ger\u00e7ekle\u015ftirilen f\u0131rlatmay\u0131 ve misyonuna dair ba\u015far\u0131s\u0131z oldu\u011fu iddias\u0131n\u0131 inceledik.\nElon Musk\u2018\u0131n 2002 y\u0131l\u0131nda kurdu\u011fu SpaceX \u015firketinin ge\u00e7ti\u011fimiz g\u00fcnlerde ger\u00e7ekle\u015ftirdi\u011fi ba\u015far\u0131s\u0131n\u0131 duymayan kalmam\u0131\u015ft\u0131r. Peki Falcon Heavy tam olarak nedir? Falcon Heavy ile Mars\u2019a ara\u00e7 m\u0131 g\u00f6ndermeye \u00e7al\u0131\u015f\u0131ld\u0131? Yoksa farkl\u0131 bir misyonu mu var? Ger\u00e7ekten ba\u015far\u0131s\u0131z m\u0131 oldu? gibi bir\u00e7ok sorunun cevab\u0131n\u0131 yaz\u0131m\u0131zdan okuyabilirsiniz.\nFalcon Heavy Nedir? \nFalcon Heavy, Elon Musk\u2018\u0131n sahibi oldu\u011fu uzay ara\u015ft\u0131rmalar\u0131 ve ta\u015f\u0131mac\u0131l\u0131\u011f\u0131 \u015firketi olan SpaceX taraf\u0131ndan tasarlanm\u0131\u015f ve \u00fcretilmi\u015f olan, yeniden kullan\u0131labilir \u00f6zellikli bir a\u011f\u0131r y\u00fck f\u0131rlatma arac\u0131d\u0131r. Al\u00e7ak d\u00fcnya y\u00f6r\u00fcngesine 63,800 kg a\u011f\u0131rl\u0131k ta\u015f\u0131ma kapasitesi ve rakiplerine g\u00f6re maliyetin \u00fc\u00e7te biri kadar harcamaya sahip olma \u00f6zellikleriyle \u00f6n plana \u00e7\u0131kan Falcon Heavy, 27 adet ilk-a\u015fama motoruna sahip olup, \u015fu anda d\u00fcnyan\u0131n en g\u00fc\u00e7l\u00fc operasyonel (f\u0131rlat\u0131lm\u0131\u015f olan) roketi konumundad\u0131r. \u00d6zellikleri saymakla bitmeyen bu ara\u00e7ta, \u015fu ana kadar yap\u0131lm\u0131\u015f en verimli motor olma \u00f6zelli\u011fine sahip, yine SpaceX taraf\u0131ndan \u00fcretilen Merlin motorlar kullan\u0131lm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r. 70 metre uzunlu\u011funda ve 12.2 metre geni\u015fli\u011finde olan Falcon Heavy, ana rokete ba\u011fl\u0131 2 adet destek kald\u0131r\u0131c\u0131 (booster) yan rokete sahiptir. Bu h\u0131z kazand\u0131r\u0131c\u0131 destekler, SpaceX\u2019in daha \u00f6nceden de ba\u015far\u0131yla misyonlar\u0131n\u0131 tamamlam\u0131\u015f olan Falcon 9 f\u0131rlatma ara\u00e7lar\u0131d\u0131r. Daha \u00f6nceden hem kalk\u0131\u015f hem de belirlenen konuma tekrar geri d\u00f6n\u00fc\u015f\u00fcn\u00fc ba\u015far\u0131yla tamamlam\u0131\u015f olan Falcon 9 ile ilgili haz\u0131rlanm\u0131\u015f k\u0131sa belgeseli izleyerek, SpaceX\u2019in Falcon Heavy\u2018de yan roket olarak kulland\u0131\u011f\u0131 Falcon 9 roketleriyle ilgili daha \u00e7ok fikir edinebilirsiniz. Falcon 9 belgeseli:\nFalcon Heavy, ta\u015f\u0131ma b\u00f6l\u00fcm\u00fcndeki kompozit kaplamas\u0131 sayesinde, uydular\u0131, Al\u00e7ak d\u00fcnya y\u00f6r\u00fcngesinde, Yer dura\u011fan aktar\u0131m y\u00f6r\u00fcngesinde ve \u00f6tesindeki istikametlere var\u0131ncaya kadar koruma \u00f6zelli\u011fine sahiptir. Zaten SpaceX\u2019in 06.01.2018 tarihinde ger\u00e7ekle\u015ftirdi\u011fi f\u0131rlatma ile Falcon Heavy arac\u0131, Elon Musk\u2019\u0131n kurucu ortakl\u0131\u011f\u0131n\u0131 yapt\u0131\u011f\u0131 Tesla\u2018n\u0131n arabalar\u0131ndan birisini bu korumal\u0131 sistem sayesinde ba\u015far\u0131yla uzaya g\u00f6ndermi\u015ftir. Araban\u0131n, uzayda 6 ayl\u0131k bir yolculuk yapmas\u0131 ve Mars\u2019\u0131n y\u00f6r\u00fcngesine oturtulmas\u0131 planlanm\u0131\u015ft\u0131. Ancak planlanan rotay\u0131 a\u015ft\u0131\u011f\u0131 i\u00e7in, araban\u0131n Mars ile J\u00fcpiter aras\u0131ndaki Asteroit ku\u015fa\u011f\u0131na do\u011fru bir y\u00f6r\u00fcngeye y\u00f6nelece\u011fi \u00f6ng\u00f6r\u00fcl\u00fcyor. Elon Musk\u2018\u0131n uzun vadede esas hedefi, Mars\u2019a yolculu\u011fun g\u00fcvenli, kolay ve uygun fiyata yap\u0131labiliyor olmas\u0131n\u0131 ve nihayetinde Mars\u2019\u0131n kolonile\u015ftirilmesini sa\u011flamakt\u0131r. Ancak, bir\u00e7ok haber sitesinde iddia edildi\u011fi \u00fczere, Falcon Heavy\u2018nin 6 \u015eubat\u2019ta ger\u00e7ekle\u015ftirdi\u011fi misyonunda ta\u015f\u0131nan y\u00fcke dair planlanan hedef, arabay\u0131 Mars\u2019a g\u00f6ndermek de\u011fil, Mars\u2019\u0131n y\u00f6r\u00fcngesine oturtmakt\u0131. Peki 6 \u015eubat\u2019ta yap\u0131lan f\u0131rlatman\u0131n t\u00fcm hedefleri nelerdi ve ne kadar\u0131 ba\u015far\u0131ya ula\u015ft\u0131?\nFalcon Heavy Test U\u00e7u\u015fu Hedefleri\nSpaceX\u2019in 6 \u015eubat 2018 tarihinde Florida\u2019daki Kennedy Uzay Merkezi\u2019nden ger\u00e7ekle\u015ftirdi\u011fi Falcon Heavy f\u0131rlatma misyonu, asl\u0131nda bir test u\u00e7u\u015fuydu. SpaceX\u2019in bu test u\u00e7u\u015fu i\u00e7in hedefleri daha detayl\u0131 bir \u015fekilde yay\u0131nlanm\u0131\u015f olsa da, temel olarak hedefleri \u015f\u00f6yle s\u0131ralamak m\u00fcmk\u00fcn:\n\u0130lk A\u015famada;\n27 roket motorunun ayn\u0131 anda ate\u015flenmesi\nMotorlar\u0131n titre\u015fimden zarar g\u00f6rmeden \u00e7al\u0131\u015fmay\u0131 s\u00fcrd\u00fcrmesi\n3 roketin iti\u015f kuvvetleri aras\u0131nda dengenin sa\u011flanmas\u0131\nMaksimum dinamik bas\u0131nc\u0131n (Max Q) ba\u015far\u0131yla ge\u00e7ilmesi\nDestek kald\u0131r\u0131c\u0131 yan roketlerin (boosters), ana roketten ba\u015far\u0131yla ayr\u0131lmas\u0131\nAna roketin y\u00fck ta\u015f\u0131ma b\u00f6l\u00fcm\u00fcnden ba\u015far\u0131yla ayr\u0131lmas\u0131\nY\u00fck ta\u015f\u0131ma b\u00f6l\u00fcm\u00fcndeki koruyucu kapa\u011f\u0131n sorunsuz a\u00e7\u0131lmas\u0131\nsa\u011flan\u0131rsa, uzaya Tesla\u2019n\u0131n \u201cmidnight-cherry\u201d rengindeki \u201cTesla Roadster\u201d model arabas\u0131 teslim edilecekti. \u0130lk a\u015famaya dair planlanan t\u00fcm hedefler ba\u015far\u0131yla ger\u00e7ekle\u015ftirildi ve \u015fof\u00f6r koltu\u011funda SpaceX\u2019in \u201cStarman\u201d ad\u0131n\u0131 verdi\u011fi maket astronotun oturdu\u011fu Tesla arabas\u0131, ba\u015far\u0131yla uzayda yerini ald\u0131.\n\u0130kinci a\u015famada ise;\n\u0130lk a\u015famada ana roketten ayr\u0131lan destek kald\u0131r\u0131c\u0131 yan roketlerin, geri d\u00f6n\u00fc\u015f i\u00e7in motorlar\u0131n\u0131n ate\u015flenmesi\nYan roketlerin, \u00f6nceden belirlenen rotay\u0131 izleyerek, karadaki platformlar\u0131na sorunsuz ini\u015f ger\u00e7ekle\u015ftirmesi\n\u0130lk a\u015famada y\u00fck ta\u015f\u0131ma b\u00f6l\u00fcm\u00fcnden ayr\u0131lan ana roketin, geri d\u00f6n\u00fc\u015f motorlar\u0131n\u0131n ate\u015flenmesi\nAna roketin, \u00f6nceden belirlenen rotay\u0131 izleyerek, Atlantik (Atlas) Okyanusu\u2019ndaki platforma sorunsuz ini\u015f ger\u00e7ekle\u015ftirmesi\nsa\u011flan\u0131rsa, bu test u\u00e7u\u015funun planlanan t\u00fcm hedefleri ger\u00e7ekle\u015ftirilmi\u015f olacakt\u0131. Ancak, ikinci a\u015famaya dair hedeflerden yan roketlerle ilgili k\u0131s\u0131m ba\u015far\u0131yla ger\u00e7ekle\u015ftirilirken, ana roketin ini\u015f hedefi ba\u015far\u0131s\u0131z oldu. Yani yan roketler, Cape Canaveral Hava Kuvvetleri \u00dcss\u00fc\u2019nde bulunan platforma neredeyse e\u015f-zamanl\u0131 olarak sorunsuz ini\u015f ger\u00e7ekle\u015ftirdi. Ancak ana roket, do\u011fru rotay\u0131 izlemesine ra\u011fmen, ini\u015f i\u00e7in ate\u015flenen motorlarda sorun olu\u015fmas\u0131 sebebiyle, Atlas Okyanusu\u2019ndaki \u00d6zerk uzay-liman\u0131 insans\u0131z gemisine ba\u015far\u0131l\u0131 bir ini\u015f ger\u00e7ekle\u015ftiremedi.\nStarman\u2019in Uzaydan G\u00f6r\u00fcnt\u00fcleri \nStarman\u2019in bulundu\u011fu arabada, David Bowie\u2019den \u201cSpace Oddity\u201d \u015fark\u0131s\u0131 \u00e7almakta ve arac\u0131n torpido g\u00f6z\u00fcnde \u201cOtostop\u00e7unun Galaksi Rehberi (The Hitchhiker\u2019s Guide to the Galaxy)\u201d kitab\u0131 bulunmaktad\u0131r. Ara\u00e7 ekran\u0131nda ise, kitaba at\u0131f olarak \u201cDon\u2019t Panic\u201d yani \u201cPanik yapma\u201d ifadesi yer almaktad\u0131r. SpaceX\u2018in resmi YouTube sayfas\u0131nda payla\u015f\u0131lan videodan, Starman\u2019in uzaydaki g\u00f6r\u00fcnt\u00fclerini izlemek m\u00fcmk\u00fcn.\nStarman \u015eimdi Nerede?\nSpaceX\u2019in uzaya g\u00f6nderdi\u011fi Tesla Roadster araban\u0131n tam olarak nerede oldu\u011funu devaml\u0131 olarak hesaplayan bir internet sitesine g\u00f6re, bu i\u00e7eri\u011fin olu\u015fturuldu\u011fu anda Starman a\u015fa\u011f\u0131daki konumdad\u0131r:\nFalcon Heavy Test U\u00e7u\u015fu\nFalcon Heavy ile 06.02.2018 tarihinde ger\u00e7ekle\u015ftirdi\u011fi test u\u00e7u\u015funu, yine resmi YouTube kanal\u0131nda canl\u0131 yay\u0131nlayan SpaceX, daha sonra bu videoyu kanal\u0131na y\u00fcklemi\u015ftir. Videoda 21:49\u2018dan itibaren kalk\u0131\u015f i\u00e7in 10\u2019dan geri-say\u0131m ve Falcon Heavy test u\u00e7u\u015fu g\u00f6r\u00fcnt\u00fclerini izleyebilirsiniz.\nFalcon 9 ve Falcon Heavy Fiyatland\u0131rmas\u0131\nPerformanslar\u0131 ve kapasiteleri d\u00fc\u015f\u00fcn\u00fcld\u00fc\u011f\u00fcnde, fiyatland\u0131rman\u0131n uygun oldu\u011fu kabul edilen Falcon 9 ve Falcon Heavy i\u00e7in fiyatland\u0131rma \u015f\u00f6yledir:\nSpaceX Neden Ba\u015far\u0131l\u0131?\nSpaceX\u2019in \u00fcretti\u011fi roketlerin tekrar kullan\u0131labilir olmas\u0131, uzay ta\u015f\u0131mac\u0131l\u0131\u011f\u0131 a\u00e7\u0131s\u0131ndan \u00e7ok \u00f6nemlidir. \u00c7\u00fcnk\u00fc bilindi\u011fi \u00fczere normalde roketlerin y\u00fck ta\u015f\u0131ma kabini d\u0131\u015f\u0131ndaki k\u0131s\u0131mlar\u0131, y\u00f6r\u00fcnge d\u0131\u015f\u0131na \u00e7\u0131kt\u0131ktan sonra a\u015famalar halinde ayr\u0131l\u0131r. Bu k\u0131s\u0131mlar, ayr\u0131ld\u0131klar\u0131 konuma g\u00f6re ya uzayda at\u0131k haline gelir ya da D\u00fcnya\u2019da okyanusa d\u00fc\u015fer. Her 2 durumda da roketin ayr\u0131lan k\u0131s\u0131mlar\u0131 kullan\u0131lamaz hale gelir ve her yeni f\u0131rlatma i\u00e7in bu k\u0131s\u0131mlar mecburen yeniden \u00fcretilir. \u0130\u015fte SpaceX, bu konuda \u00e7al\u0131\u015fmalar ba\u015flatm\u0131\u015f ve 2011 senesinde duyurusunu yapt\u0131\u011f\u0131 yeniden kullan\u0131labilir roketlerle ilgili g\u00fcn\u00fcm\u00fcze kadar bir\u00e7ok ba\u015far\u0131l\u0131 geli\u015fme kaydetmi\u015ftir. Ancak roketleri ba\u015far\u0131yla indirmek, asl\u0131nda san\u0131landan \u00e7ok daha zordur. \u00c7\u00fcnk\u00fc ayr\u0131lan roketler, \u00f6ncelikle e\u011fimi do\u011fru ayarlamal\u0131 ve ini\u015f tak\u0131m\u0131 motorlar\u0131n\u0131 ate\u015flemeyi ba\u015farmal\u0131d\u0131r. Sonra ini\u015f s\u00fcresince do\u011fru rotada kalmal\u0131, belirlenen platforma dengeli \u015fekilde ini\u015f yapmal\u0131 ve son olarak ini\u015ften sonra da dengesini sa\u011flamal\u0131, devrilmemelidir.\nBu s\u00fcre\u00e7te SpaceX, \u00f6ncelikle 21 Aral\u0131k 2015 tarihinde ilk defa bir Falcon 9 roketini ba\u015far\u0131l\u0131 bir \u015fekilde karada belirlenen platforma indirmi\u015ftir. Daha sonraki denemelerinde ba\u015far\u0131s\u0131z ini\u015fler olsa da, SpaceX taraf\u0131ndan bir\u00e7ok ba\u015far\u0131l\u0131 ini\u015f ger\u00e7ekle\u015ftirilmi\u015ftir. Hatta sadece karada de\u011fil, okyanusta konumland\u0131r\u0131lm\u0131\u015f insans\u0131z platformlara dahi ba\u015far\u0131l\u0131 ini\u015fler ger\u00e7ekle\u015ftirilmi\u015ftir. B\u00f6ylece roketlerin yeniden kullan\u0131labilir olabilece\u011fini g\u00f6steren SpaceX, uzaya ara\u00e7 g\u00f6ndermenin \u00e7ok daha ucuza sa\u011flanabilece\u011fini de g\u00f6stermi\u015ftir.\nKaynaklar:\nSpaceX, SpaceX 2, SpaceX 3, SpaceX 4, SpaceX 5, SpaceX 6, whereisroadster, do\u011fru veri, wikizero\nVideo oynat\u0131c\u0131\nhttps://dogrula.org/wp-content/uploads/2018/02/dogrula.org_.mp4\n00:00\n00:07\n[Toplam:9    Ortalama:5/5] Falcon Heavy Nedir? Ba\u015far\u0131s\u0131z Oldu\u011fu \u0130ddias\u0131", "Continental T\u00fcrkiye\u2019yi haritadan sildi iddias\u0131n\u0131 ara\u015ft\u0131rd\u0131k. \u0130ddiaya g\u00f6re, Continental lastik \u015firketi, bir reklam videosu yay\u0131nlam\u0131\u015f ve bu videoda g\u00f6sterilen haritada T\u00fcrkiye\u2018yi silmi\u015ftir. Sosyal medyada tepkilere neden olan bu iddia do\u011frudur.\nContinental\u2019in yay\u0131nlad\u0131\u011f\u0131 reklam videosunda T\u00fcrkiye, Akdeniz olarak g\u00f6sterilmi\u015ftir. T\u00fcrkiye\u2019de de faaliyet g\u00f6steren lastik \u015firketinin sitesindeki reklam videosu, Powertrain isimli teknolojiyi tan\u0131tmak ama\u00e7l\u0131 Almanca olarak yay\u0131nlanm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r.\nHarita \u00fczerinde sar\u0131 renk kullan\u0131larak Powertrain teknolojisinin aktif bulundu\u011fu \u00fclkeler g\u00f6sterilmi\u015ftir. Ancak T\u00fcrkiye\u2019nin olmad\u0131\u011f\u0131 haritada, Ortado\u011fu ve Avrupa\u2019n\u0131n orta k\u0131sm\u0131 kocaman bir Akdeniz olarak kar\u015f\u0131m\u0131za \u00e7\u0131km\u0131\u015ft\u0131r.\n\u00dclkemizde de hizmet g\u00f6steren Alman lastik \u015firketi Continental, reklam filminde T\u00fcrkiye\u2019yi haritadan sildi. Araban\u0131za lastik alaca\u011f\u0131n\u0131z zaman akl\u0131n\u0131zda bulunsun. pic.twitter.com/2cC505MZpU\n\u2014 Tuhaf Ama Sahici (@tuhafamasahici) February 9, 2018\nContinental \u00d6z\u00fcr Diledi\nContinental, gelen tepkiler \u00fczerine tan\u0131t\u0131m videosunu kendi internet sitesinden kald\u0131rd\u0131. Ard\u0131ndan \u015firket, videodaki hatan\u0131n bir grafik hatas\u0131ndan kaynakland\u0131\u011f\u0131n\u0131 s\u00f6yleyerek \u00f6z\u00fcr diledi:\n\u201cSosyal medyada yer alan payla\u015f\u0131mlar sayesinde Continental Otomotiv Global sayfas\u0131nda grafik hatas\u0131 olan bir videonun yer ald\u0131\u011f\u0131n\u0131n fark\u0131na vard\u0131k. T\u00fcm sosyal medya kullan\u0131c\u0131lar\u0131na bize bu hatay\u0131 bildirdikleri i\u00e7in te\u015fekk\u00fcr ederiz. Videonun hemen kald\u0131r\u0131ld\u0131\u011f\u0131n\u0131 bildirmek isteriz. Derin \u00fcz\u00fcnt\u00fc i\u00e7erisindeyiz. T\u00fcm kamuoyundan \u00f6z\u00fcr dileriz.\u201d\nKaynak: Twitter, Continental, Facebook Continental\nVideo oynat\u0131c\u0131\n00:00\n00:00\n1. \u201cdogrula.org\u201d\n0:07\n[Toplam:7    Ortalama:5/5] Continental T\u00fcrkiye\u2019yi Haritadan Sildi \u0130ddias\u0131", "Twitter\u2019de @ArzuPrlk06 kullan\u0131c\u0131 ad\u0131yla, Konyal\u0131 bilim adamlar\u0131n\u0131n 6 g\u00fcnde tank yapt\u0131\u011f\u0131n\u0131 iddia eden bir hesap, sahte bilgiler ve sapt\u0131r\u0131lm\u0131\u015f g\u00f6rsellerle g\u00fcndem olu\u015fturup payla\u015f\u0131mlar yapm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r. Twitter hesab\u0131nda kendisinin haber spikeri, gazeteci, sunucu ve seslendirmen oldu\u011funu yazan Arzu Parlak isimli kullan\u0131c\u0131n\u0131n Twitter sayfas\u0131nda yer alan tank iddialar\u0131 b\u00fct\u00fcn\u00fcyle yanl\u0131\u015ft\u0131r.\nS\u00f6z konusu ifadeyle; \u2018Konyal\u0131 bilim adamlar\u0131n\u0131n 6 g\u00fcnde d\u00fcnyay\u0131 k\u0131skand\u0131racak tank yapt\u0131\u011f\u0131 ve bu renk de\u011fi\u015ftirme \u00f6zelli\u011fine sahip tanklar\u0131n Irak tank\u0131ym\u0131\u015f gibi Kerk\u00fck\u2019e girdi\u011fi\u2019 iddias\u0131 do\u011fru de\u011fildir. \nAyr\u0131ca, g\u00f6rsellerle birlikte yaz\u0131lan \u2018Recep Tayyip Erdo\u011fan\u2019\u0131n Konyal\u0131 bilim adamlar\u0131n\u0131 k\u00fclliyeye davet ederek daha \u00f6nce hi\u00e7bir \u00fclkenin cesaret edemedi\u011fi, tamam\u0131yla borla \u00e7al\u0131\u015fan bir tank yapma emri verdi\u011fi\u2019 iddias\u0131 da as\u0131ls\u0131zd\u0131r.\nPlan\u0131n \u201cson derece gizli\u201d oldu\u011funun yaz\u0131ld\u0131\u011f\u0131 payla\u015f\u0131mda, gizlili\u011fin a\u00e7\u0131\u011fa \u00e7\u0131km\u0131\u015f olmas\u0131 ya da gizli olmas\u0131 gereken bir olay\u0131n bu kullan\u0131c\u0131 taraf\u0131ndan biliniyor ve yay\u0131l\u0131yor olmas\u0131 tuhafl\u0131\u011f\u0131 da uydurma haberin boyutunu g\u00f6stermektedir.\nG\u00f6rselde yer alan TSK tank envanteri aras\u0131nda, Afrin operasyonu kapsam\u0131nda s\u0131n\u0131ra konu\u015fland\u0131r\u0131lm\u0131\u015f ve Akkor Savunma Sistemi\u2018yle donat\u0131lm\u0131\u015f tanklar bulunmaktad\u0131r; ancak bunlardan herhangi birinin borla \u00e7al\u0131\u015ft\u0131\u011f\u0131 ve renk de\u011fi\u015ftirdi\u011fi iddias\u0131 uydurmad\u0131r. B\u00f6yle bir tank bilgisi, Savunma Bakanl\u0131\u011f\u0131 ve TSK taraf\u0131ndan payla\u015f\u0131lmam\u0131\u015ft\u0131r.\nG\u00f6rsellerde yer alan tanklar, yakla\u015f\u0131k be\u015f ay \u00f6nce Habur S\u0131n\u0131r Kap\u0131s\u0131\u2019nda ba\u015flat\u0131lm\u0131\u015f olan askeri tatbikattan. T\u00fcrk Silahl\u0131 kuvvetleri (TSK), yakla\u015f\u0131k 100 adet askeri ara\u00e7la yapt\u0131\u011f\u0131 tatbikat\u0131 \u015fu \u015fekilde duyurmu\u015ftu:\n\u201cT\u00fcrk Silahl\u0131 Kuvvetleri taraf\u0131ndan 18 Eyl\u00fcl 2017 tarihinde Silopi/Habur b\u00f6lgesinde bir tatbikat ba\u015flat\u0131lm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r. Bu tatbikatla e\u015f zamanl\u0131 olarak ter\u00f6rle m\u00fccadele kapsam\u0131nda s\u0131n\u0131r b\u00f6lgesinde operasyonlar\u0131n icras\u0131na devam edilmektedir.\u201d\nAkla ayk\u0131r\u0131 ifadelerle yaz\u0131lm\u0131\u015f ve b\u00f6ylesine bilin\u00e7sizce yap\u0131lan payla\u015f\u0131mlar, alg\u0131 y\u00f6nlendirme ya da operasyonel bir \u00e7al\u0131\u015fma \u015f\u00fcphesi ta\u015f\u0131maktad\u0131r. \u00d6zellikle sosyal medya arac\u0131l\u0131\u011f\u0131yla yay\u0131lan ve kayna\u011f\u0131 belli olmayan, son derece u\u00e7 ve mant\u0131ktan uzak yaz\u0131lar,  T\u00fcrkiye\u2019nin askeri operasyonlar\u0131n\u0131 de\u011fersizle\u015ftirmekten ve TSK\u2019y\u0131 itibars\u0131zla\u015ft\u0131rmaktan \u00f6teye ge\u00e7memektedir.\nS\u00f6z konusu payla\u015f\u0131mlar\u0131yla Twitter kullan\u0131c\u0131lar\u0131n\u0131n tepkisini \u00e7eken @ArzuPrlk06, yazd\u0131\u011f\u0131 uydurma haberleri sayfas\u0131ndan kald\u0131rmam\u0131\u015f, sosyal medya \u00fczerinden kendisine yap\u0131lan k\u00f6t\u00fc yorumlar hakk\u0131nda dava a\u00e7aca\u011f\u0131n\u0131 duyurmu\u015ftur.\nVideo oynat\u0131c\u0131\nhttps://dogrula.org/wp-content/uploads/2018/02/dogrula.org_.mp4\n00:00\n00:07\nKAYNAK: millisavunma  twitter   bik   ne-dir.org\n[Toplam:7    Ortalama:5/5] Konyal\u0131 Bilim Adamlar\u0131n\u0131n 6 G\u00fcnde Tank Yapt\u0131\u011f\u0131 \u0130ddias\u0131", "D\u00fcnyan\u0131n en b\u00fcy\u00fck y\u00fczer LNG terminalinin BOTA\u015e b\u00fcnyesinde T\u00fcrkiye\u2019de oldu\u011fu iddias\u0131, bas\u0131nda yer almaya ba\u015flad\u0131\u011f\u0131 g\u00fcnden beri merak konusu olmu\u015ftur. Enerji Bakanl\u0131\u011f\u0131\u2019ndan yap\u0131lan a\u00e7\u0131klama do\u011frultusunda, y\u00fczer LNG terminalinin d\u00fcnyan\u0131n en b\u00fcy\u00fc\u011f\u00fc oldu\u011fu iddias\u0131 do\u011frudur.\nLNG VE FSRU NED\u0130R?\nLNG \u201cS\u0131v\u0131 Do\u011fal Gaz\u201d (LNG-Liquified Natural Gas) nedir?\nS\u0131v\u0131la\u015ft\u0131r\u0131lm\u0131\u015f Do\u011fal Gaz (LNG), depolama ta\u015f\u0131mac\u0131l\u0131\u011f\u0131n\u0131n kolayl\u0131\u011f\u0131 ve g\u00fcvenli\u011fi i\u00e7in do\u011falgaz\u0131 s\u0131v\u0131 formuna d\u00f6n\u00fc\u015ft\u00fcrmede kullan\u0131lan metan\u0131n ve baz\u0131 etan kar\u0131\u015f\u0131m\u0131n\u0131n bir bile\u015fimidir. Yakla\u015f\u0131k -256 dereceye kadar so\u011futulur, b\u00f6ylece geni\u015f do\u011fal gaz arz\u0131 olan \u00fclkelerden, \u00fcrettiklerinden daha fazla do\u011falgaz isteyen \u00fclkelere ta\u015f\u0131n\u0131r. S\u0131v\u0131 durumda, do\u011fal gaz alan\u0131n 1/600\u2019\u00fcn\u00fc al\u0131r, boru hatt\u0131 nakliyesi m\u00fcmk\u00fcn olmad\u0131\u011f\u0131nda gemi ve depolamay\u0131 \u00e7ok daha kolay hale getirir. Uzmanlar, d\u00fcnya enerji t\u00fcketimi artt\u0131k\u00e7a, LNG ticaretinin \u00f6neminin artaca\u011f\u0131n\u0131 \u00f6ng\u00f6rmektedir.\nFSRU (Floating Storage Regasification Unit) nedir?\nS\u0131v\u0131la\u015ft\u0131r\u0131lm\u0131\u015f do\u011falgaz depolama ve gazla\u015ft\u0131rma \u00fcnitesi olan FSRU, s\u0131v\u0131la\u015ft\u0131r\u0131lm\u0131\u015f do\u011fal gaz LNG\u2019yi okyanus kanallar\u0131 boyunca naklederken ve aktar\u0131rken gereken hayati bir bile\u015fendir. FSRU, LNG aktar\u0131m\u0131 i\u00e7in kullan\u0131lan \u00f6zel bir gemi tipi olarak adland\u0131r\u0131labilir.\n\u00c7evre dostu LNG yak\u0131t unsuru oldu\u011fu i\u00e7in, ta\u015f\u0131mas\u0131 kolay de\u011fildir. Herhangi bir hafif \u00e7atlakl\u0131k, okyanus ekosisteminin daha da bozulmas\u0131na, yak\u0131t israf\u0131na ve denizlerde can kayb\u0131na sebep olabilir.\nT\u00fcrkiye, Akdeniz sahilinde bulunan Hatay D\u00f6rtyol liman\u0131nda, \u00fclkenin ikinci y\u00fczer depolama ve yeniden gazla\u015ft\u0131rma birimini (FSRU) devreye alm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r.\nD\u00fcnyan\u0131n en b\u00fcy\u00fck FSRU\u2019su olan MOL FSRU Challenger, 10 Ekim\u2019de Japon armat\u00f6r\u00fcn\u00fcn bir birimi olan MOL LNG Transport (Europe) Ltd\u2019de sahibine teslim edildikten sonra Kas\u0131m ay\u0131nda T\u00fcrkiye\u2019ye gelmi\u015ftir. MOL FSRU Challenger, Eyfel Kulesi\u2018nden uzundur.\nFSRU, 263.000 metrek\u00fcp LNG depolama kapasitesine ve yeniden sevkiyat ve gaz aktarma \u00f6zelliklerine sahip. Birim ayr\u0131ca, g\u00fcnde 540 milyon metrek\u00fcp gaz bo\u015faltma kapasitesine sahiptir.\nBota\u015f, Bota\u015f-D\u00f6rtyol FSRU terminali ad\u0131 verilen proje i\u00e7in ithalat terminali olarak kullan\u0131lmak \u00fczere gemiyi MOL\u2019dan kiralam\u0131\u015ft\u0131r.\nT\u00fcrkiye\u2019nin Enerji ve Tabii Kaynaklar Bakan\u0131 Berat Albayrak a\u00e7\u0131l\u0131\u015f t\u00f6reninde yapt\u0131\u011f\u0131 konu\u015fmada, \u00fclkenin FSRU\u2019lar vas\u0131tas\u0131yla boru hatt\u0131 gaz\u0131na olan ba\u011f\u0131ml\u0131l\u0131\u011f\u0131n\u0131 azaltmay\u0131 ama\u00e7lad\u0131\u011f\u0131n\u0131 s\u00f6ylemi\u015ftir.\nBakan, FSRU\u2019lar\u0131 kullanarak iletim ve da\u011f\u0131t\u0131m hatlar\u0131n\u0131n yat\u0131r\u0131m maliyetlerinin ve nakliye masraflar\u0131n\u0131n en aza indirgendi\u011fini a\u00e7\u0131klam\u0131\u015ft\u0131r.\nHat\u0131rlatmak gerekirse, T\u00fcrkiye\u2019nin ilk FSRU\u2019su Nept\u00fcn, Aral\u0131k 2017\u2019de \u0130zmir\u2019de ba\u015flat\u0131lm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r. LNG tesisi, Candarl\u0131 K\u00f6rfezi\u2019nin g\u00fcneybat\u0131s\u0131ndaki \u00c7akmakl\u0131 k\u00f6y\u00fcn\u00fcn biti\u015fi\u011findeki Alia\u011fa sanayi b\u00f6lgesinde yer almaktad\u0131r.\nBa\u015fta g\u00fcney Avrupa\u2019da olmak \u00fczere, LNG ticareti yapan \u0130svi\u00e7re merkezli MET International AG\u2019nin CEO\u2019su Gyorgy Vargha, \u201cT\u00fcrkiye\u2019nin ge\u00e7en k\u0131\u015ftan daha fazla ithalat yapmas\u0131n\u0131 bekliyoruz, zaten ge\u00e7en k\u0131\u015f da talebi art\u0131rm\u0131\u015flard\u0131. T\u00fcrkiye b\u00fcy\u00fcyen bir pazar\u201d dedi. 2030 y\u0131l\u0131na kadar \u00fclkede de\u011fi\u015fken talep \u00f6ng\u00f6ren Bloomberg New Energy Finance\u2019ye g\u00f6re T\u00fcrkiye, y\u0131l\u0131n ilk yar\u0131s\u0131nda \u00c7in, G\u00fcney Kore ve Japonya\u2018dan sonra LNG ithalat\u0131nda en h\u0131zl\u0131 b\u00fcy\u00fcyen pazar oldu.\nVideo oynat\u0131c\u0131\nhttps://dogrula.org/wp-content/uploads/2018/02/dogrula.org_.mp4\n00:00\n00:07\nKAYNAKLAR: lngworldnews  vesselfinder marineinsight  gcaptain\n[Toplam:8    Ortalama:4.4/5] D\u00fcnyan\u0131n En B\u00fcy\u00fck Y\u00fczer LNG Terminali T\u00fcrkiye\u2019de \u0130ddias\u0131", "\u201cCHP\u2019li Vekillerin HDP Kongresine Kat\u0131ld\u0131\u011f\u0131 \u0130ddias\u0131\u201d ba\u015fl\u0131kl\u0131 i\u00e7eri\u011fimizde, 11.02.2018 tarihli HDP kongresine dair iddialar\u0131 inceledik.\n\u201c\u0130nternethaber\u201d adl\u0131 haber sitesinin bug\u00fcn ger\u00e7ekle\u015fen HDP kongresine dair yay\u0131nlad\u0131\u011f\u0131 haberinde, CHP Mersin Milletvekili Aytu\u011f At\u0131c\u0131 ve CHP\u2019nin son kurultay\u0131nda PM aday\u0131 olmu\u015f Onur Ak\u0131n\u2018\u0131n HDP kongresine kat\u0131ld\u0131\u011f\u0131 iddia edilmi\u015ftir. Ancak haberde iddia edildi\u011fi \u00fczere Aytu\u011f At\u0131c\u0131 ve Onur Ak\u0131n, HDP kongresine kat\u0131lmam\u0131\u015ft\u0131r. S\u00f6z konusu iddia yanl\u0131\u015ft\u0131r. CHP\u2019li Aytu\u011f At\u0131c\u0131 ile HDP kongresinde partinin e\u015f genel ba\u015fkanl\u0131\u011f\u0131na se\u00e7ilen Sezai Temelli\u2019yi ve Onur Ak\u0131n ile de eski HDP milletvekili Saruhan Olu\u00e7\u2019u kar\u0131\u015ft\u0131rd\u0131\u011f\u0131 iddias\u0131 do\u011frudur. \u201cCHP Milletvekili Aytu\u011f At\u0131c\u0131 ve PM \u00fcyesi aday\u0131 Onur Ak\u0131n, Pervin Buldan\u2019\u0131n yan\u0131 ba\u015f\u0131ndayd\u0131\u201d \u015feklinde alt-ba\u015fl\u0131kla yay\u0131nlanan haber, sosyal medyada geni\u015f yer bulmu\u015f ve gelen tepkiler \u00fczerine yapt\u0131\u011f\u0131 kar\u0131\u015f\u0131kl\u0131\u011f\u0131 fark eden site sorumlular\u0131, bir s\u00fcre sonra haberi siteden kald\u0131rm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r. Ancak Google\u2019da ilgili habere dair arama yap\u0131ld\u0131\u011f\u0131nda, g\u00f6r\u00fcnt\u00fclenen sonu\u00e7lar aras\u0131ndan hen\u00fcz s\u00f6z konusu haber kald\u0131r\u0131lmad\u0131\u011f\u0131 i\u00e7in, sitenin ger\u00e7ekten b\u00f6yle bir haber yapt\u0131\u011f\u0131 kolayl\u0131kla do\u011frulanabilir. G\u00f6r\u00fcnt\u00fclenen sonu\u00e7larda haberin ba\u015fl\u0131\u011f\u0131n\u0131n alt\u0131nda yer alan meta a\u00e7\u0131klamas\u0131 k\u0131sm\u0131ndan, sitenin ger\u00e7ekten CHP\u2019li vekillerle HDP\u2019li isimleri kar\u0131\u015ft\u0131rd\u0131\u011f\u0131 g\u00f6r\u00fclmektedir.\nAyr\u0131ca Google\u2019da g\u00f6rsel aramas\u0131 yap\u0131ld\u0131\u011f\u0131nda ise hala sonu\u00e7lar aras\u0131nda g\u00f6r\u00fcnt\u00fclenen habere ait g\u00f6rselin, silinen haberin ba\u015fl\u0131\u011f\u0131n\u0131 ta\u015f\u0131d\u0131\u011f\u0131 g\u00f6r\u00fclmektedir. Dolay\u0131s\u0131yla \u0130nternethaber\u2019in yapt\u0131\u011f\u0131 yanl\u0131\u015f haber, birden fazla \u015fekilde kolayl\u0131kla do\u011frulanabilmektedir.\nCHP\u2019li Vekiller HDP Kongresine Kat\u0131ld\u0131 m\u0131?\nCHP\u2019den Aytu\u011f At\u0131c\u0131\u2019n\u0131n ve CHP PM \u00fcyesi aday\u0131 Onur Ak\u0131n\u2019\u0131n kat\u0131ld\u0131\u011f\u0131 iddias\u0131n\u0131n yanl\u0131\u015f oldu\u011funu a\u00e7\u0131klad\u0131ktan sonra, HDP kongresi ile ilgili bir ba\u015fka iddia olan CHP\u2019li ba\u015fka vekillerin HDP kongresine kat\u0131ld\u0131\u011f\u0131 iddias\u0131n\u0131 inceledik. CHP\u2019yi temsilen CHP Grup Ba\u015fkanvekili Engin Altay\u2019\u0131n HDP kongresine kat\u0131ld\u0131\u011f\u0131 iddias\u0131 do\u011frudur. Dolay\u0131s\u0131yla CHP Mersin Milletvekili Aytu\u011f At\u0131c\u0131\u2018n\u0131n HDP kongresine kat\u0131ld\u0131\u011f\u0131 iddias\u0131 yanl\u0131\u015f olmakla beraber, CHP Grup Ba\u015fkanvekili ve \u0130stanbul Milletvekili Engin Altay\u2019\u0131n, HDP kongresine kat\u0131ld\u0131\u011f\u0131 iddias\u0131 do\u011frudur.\nVideo oynat\u0131c\u0131\nhttps://dogrula.org/wp-content/uploads/2018/02/dogrula.org_.mp4\n00:00\n00:07\nKaynaklar:\ninternethaber, archive.org, cumhuriyet\n[Toplam:9    Ortalama:4.9/5] CHP\u2019li Vekillerin HDP Kongresine Kat\u0131ld\u0131\u011f\u0131 \u0130ddias\u0131", "Dogrula.org taraf\u0131ndan yay\u0131nlanan Bas\u0131n Yay\u0131n Kurulu\u015flar\u0131 2017 Clickbait Raporu\u2018nda 23 kurulu\u015f incelenmi\u015f ve toplamda 1150 habere tek tek bak\u0131larak sonu\u00e7lar olu\u015fturulmu\u015ftur. T\u00fcrkiye\u2019de ve d\u00fcnyada ilk kez yap\u0131lan Clickbait Raporumuzda, bas\u0131n yay\u0131n kurulu\u015flar\u0131n\u0131n takip\u00e7i kaybetmesine sebebiyet vermemek ad\u0131na listede sadece Clickbait\u2019i en az yapan ilk 5 bas\u0131n yay\u0131n kurulu\u015funun ismine yer verilmi\u015ftir. \u0130simlerini gizledi\u011fimiz di\u011fer bas\u0131n yay\u0131n kurulu\u015flar\u0131na bilgilendirme yap\u0131lacakt\u0131r.\n2017 Clickbait Puanlamas\u0131, Dogrula.org\nRapora konu olan Clickbait\u2018in tan\u0131m\u0131 nedir, nas\u0131l ve neden yap\u0131l\u0131r sorular\u0131n\u0131n cevab\u0131na bakacak olursak;\nClickbait Nedir?\nBir haberi,okuyucular\u0131 istenilen sayfaya y\u00f6nlendirmek i\u00e7in farkl\u0131la\u015ft\u0131r\u0131lm\u0131\u015f, anla\u015f\u0131labilir olmayan, dikkat \u00e7ekici ba\u015fl\u0131k veya g\u00f6rsellerle olu\u015fturup sunmakt\u0131r. Kelime anlam\u0131 olrak \u201ct\u0131k yemi\u201d ya da \u201ct\u0131k tuza\u011f\u0131\u201d olarak da bilinen Clickbait, haberlerin kalitesini d\u00fc\u015f\u00fcren, anla\u015f\u0131labilir ve etik olmayan y\u00f6ntemlerle yap\u0131lan ilgi \u00e7ekmeye odakl\u0131 bir y\u00f6ntemdir.\nNormal haliyle dikkat \u00e7ekmeyece\u011fi ve tamam\u0131n\u0131n okunmayaca\u011f\u0131 d\u00fc\u015f\u00fcn\u00fclen haberlerde ba\u015fl\u0131klar veya g\u00f6rseller farkl\u0131la\u015ft\u0131r\u0131larak Clickbait olu\u015fturulabilmektedir. \u00d6rne\u011fin; \u201cYeni hali g\u00f6renleri \u015fa\u015f\u0131rtt\u0131!\u201c, \u201cG\u00f6zlerinize inanamayacaks\u0131n\u0131z\u201c, \u201cFla\u015f Fla\u015f!\u201d gibi ba\u015fl\u0131klarla ve anla\u015f\u0131labilir olmayan, bulan\u0131k, dikkat \u00e7ekici ya da alakas\u0131z g\u00f6rsellerle yap\u0131l\u0131r.\nClickbait Neden Yap\u0131l\u0131r?\nClickbait\u2019in as\u0131l amac\u0131, bir haberin t\u0131klanmas\u0131 ve okunmas\u0131 i\u00e7in okuyucuyu gerek haberin ba\u015fl\u0131\u011f\u0131yla gerek g\u00f6rseliyle merak ettirmek ve haberin bulundu\u011fu sayfay\u0131 ziyaret etmesi konusunda ikna etmektir. Clickbait\u2019li olan haber, internet sitesinin sayfa g\u00f6r\u00fcnt\u00fclenme say\u0131s\u0131n\u0131 artt\u0131rmas\u0131, sosyal medyadaki etkile\u015fimlerin \u00e7o\u011falmas\u0131 ve daha \u00e7ok reklama t\u0131klanmas\u0131 gibi nedenler i\u00e7in yap\u0131lmaktad\u0131r. Ancak bunlar bir avantaj gibi g\u00f6z\u00fckse de asl\u0131nda Clickbait haber yapan veya payla\u015fan kurulu\u015flara d\u00fc\u015f\u00fcn\u00fcld\u00fc\u011f\u00fcnden daha \u00e7ok zarar vermektedir. Okuyucular kand\u0131r\u0131lm\u0131\u015f olma hissine kap\u0131larak bir daha Clickbait haber yapan yay\u0131n kurulu\u015flar\u0131n\u0131n sosyal medya hesaplar\u0131n\u0131 veya internet sitelerini takip etmekten vazge\u00e7ebilirler. Bu durum da bas\u0131n yay\u0131n kurulu\u015flar\u0131na kar\u015f\u0131 duyulan g\u00fcvenin sars\u0131lmas\u0131na yol a\u00e7ar.\nDogrula.org olarak Clickbait Raporunu olu\u015fturmaktaki amac\u0131m\u0131z, Clickbait\u2019in yayg\u0131nla\u015fmas\u0131n\u0131 \u00f6nlemek, kamuoyunun yanl\u0131\u015f bilgilendirilmesini engellemek, kaliteli habercili\u011fin geli\u015fmesine y\u00f6n vermek ve bu alanda fark\u0131ndal\u0131k bilinci olu\u015fturmakt\u0131r.\nT\u00fcrkiye\u2019de ve d\u00fcnyada ilk olarak haz\u0131rlanan bu rapor, kesinlikle yay\u0131n kurulu\u015flar\u0131n\u0131 veya yap\u0131lan haberlerin i\u00e7eriklerini ele\u015ftirmek veya onlar\u0131 yarg\u0131lamak i\u00e7in yap\u0131lmam\u0131\u015ft\u0131r.\nClickbait \u00d6rnekleri\nClickbait yap\u0131l\u0131rken genel olarak ba\u015fvurulan y\u00f6ntemlere g\u00f6re; ba\u015fl\u0131\u011f\u0131n a\u00e7\u0131klay\u0131c\u0131 olmamas\u0131, ba\u015fl\u0131\u011f\u0131n i\u00e7erikle uyumsuzlu\u011fu, tamamlanmayan ba\u015fl\u0131k kullan\u0131lmas\u0131, g\u00f6rselin anla\u015f\u0131labilir olmamas\u0131 ve g\u00f6rselin i\u00e7erikle uyumsuzlu\u011fu olarak 5 tane kriter belirledik. Bu kriterler kapsam\u0131nda birka\u00e7 \u00f6rnek verelim:\n1- Ba\u015fl\u0131\u011f\u0131n A\u00e7\u0131klay\u0131c\u0131 ve Anla\u015f\u0131l\u0131r Olmamas\u0131yla Yap\u0131lan Clickbait:\nA\u00e7\u0131klay\u0131c\u0131 olarak verilmeyen, bir olayla veya bir durumla ilgili bilgilerin ne, nerede, nas\u0131l, neden ve kim oldu\u011fu kasti bir \u015fekilde belirtilmeyen ba\u015fl\u0131klar\u0131n kullan\u0131ld\u0131\u011f\u0131 haberlerde yap\u0131lan Clickbait t\u00fcr\u00fcd\u00fcr. \u201c\u00d6yle bir \u015fey yapt\u0131 ki!\u201d, \u201cYeni hali g\u00f6renleri \u015fa\u015f\u0131rtt\u0131!\u201d gibi ba\u015fl\u0131klar bu kritere g\u00f6re yap\u0131lan bir Clickbait \u00f6rne\u011fidir.\nYukar\u0131daki \u201cFla\u015f \u0130stanbul\u2019da Polisi Alarma Ge\u00e7iren Olay\u201d \u015feklindeki haber ba\u015fl\u0131\u011f\u0131nda g\u00f6r\u00fcld\u00fc\u011f\u00fc \u00fczere a\u00e7\u0131klay\u0131c\u0131 olmayan bir ba\u015fl\u0131k kullan\u0131lm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r. Ancak sadece haberin i\u00e7eri\u011finin okunmas\u0131 halinde a\u00e7\u0131k\u00e7a anla\u015f\u0131lan bu payla\u015f\u0131mda ama\u00e7, dikkat \u00e7ekmek ve okuyucuyu merak ettirmek ve okuyucunun habere y\u00f6nelmesini sa\u011flamakt\u0131r.\n2- Ba\u015fl\u0131\u011f\u0131n \u0130\u00e7erikle Uyumsuz Oldu\u011fu Clickbait:\nNormal ko\u015fullarda kamuoyunun dikkatini pek fazla \u00e7ekmeyen haberleri okutmak i\u00e7in kullan\u0131l\u0131r. Bu kritere g\u00f6re yap\u0131lan haberler, daha \u00e7ok \u00f6nemsiz bir durumu abartarak veya as\u0131ls\u0131z olan bir haberi do\u011fruymu\u015f gibi alg\u0131lanmas\u0131 i\u00e7in uyumsuz bir ba\u015fl\u0131k atarak olu\u015fturulur.\n\u201cDolarda ak\u015fam saatlerinde sert d\u00fc\u015f\u00fc\u015f\u201d ba\u015fl\u0131kl\u0131 haberde ilgi \u00e7eken k\u0131s\u0131m dolar\u0131n fiyat\u0131n\u0131n normal seyrinden daha \u00e7ok ve daha h\u0131zl\u0131 olarak d\u00fc\u015ft\u00fc\u011f\u00fc alg\u0131s\u0131 vard\u0131r. Ancak haber i\u00e7eri\u011fine bak\u0131ld\u0131\u011f\u0131nda dolar\u0131n sert ve \u00e7ok de\u011fil, san\u0131ld\u0131\u011f\u0131ndan k\u00fc\u00e7\u00fck bir farkla 0,03 lira yani, 3,95 liradan 3,92 liraya d\u00fc\u015ft\u00fc\u011f\u00fc anla\u015f\u0131lmaktad\u0131r.\n3- Tamamlanmayan ba\u015fl\u0131k kullan\u0131larak yap\u0131lan Clickbait:\nHaberin devam\u0131 bilerek verilmeyen ba\u015fl\u0131kta i\u00e7eri\u011fin tamam\u0131n\u0131 g\u00f6rmek isteyen okuyucunun habere t\u0131klamas\u0131 ama\u00e7lan\u0131r. Haber a\u00e7\u0131ld\u0131\u011f\u0131nda ise, genelde merak uyand\u0131rmayan, alakas\u0131z ya da \u00f6nemsiz bir haberle kar\u015f\u0131la\u015f\u0131lmaktad\u0131r. Dikkat \u00e7ekmek amac\u0131yla olu\u015fturulan bu ba\u015fl\u0131klarda c\u00fcmlenin sonunda genellikle \u00fc\u00e7 nokta kullan\u0131l\u0131r.\nYukar\u0131daki \u201cB\u00fcy\u00fck tart\u0131\u015fmalara gebe\u2026 Sak\u0131n yemeyin! \u00c7\u00fcnk\u00fc\u2026\u201d ba\u015fl\u0131kl\u0131 haber, tamamlanmayan ba\u015fl\u0131k kriterinin kapsam\u0131na girmektedir. Ayn\u0131 zamanda a\u00e7\u0131klay\u0131c\u0131 olmad\u0131\u011f\u0131 i\u00e7in ba\u015fl\u0131\u011f\u0131n a\u00e7\u0131klay\u0131c\u0131 olmamas\u0131 kriterine de girmektedir. Genelde bu tarz ba\u015fl\u0131klar, ilk bak\u0131ld\u0131\u011f\u0131nda akla gelen durumu de\u011fil san\u0131lan\u0131n aksine \u00f6nemsiz bir durumu ifade eder.\n4- G\u00f6rselin Anla\u015f\u0131labilir Olmamas\u0131yla Yap\u0131lan Clickbait:\nG\u00f6rselin, olmas\u0131 gereken haller d\u0131\u015f\u0131nda kasten bulan\u0131k hale getirilmesi ve merak uyand\u0131rmak amac\u0131yla foto\u011fraflar\u0131n netli\u011finin kaybettirilmesi bu kriterin i\u00e7ine girmektedir.\n\u201c\u00dcnl\u00fc isme kanser te\u015fhisi konuldu\u201d ba\u015fl\u0131\u011f\u0131 ve beraberinde kasti olarak bulan\u0131kla\u015ft\u0131r\u0131lan g\u00f6rsel tam anlam\u0131yla Clickbait \u00f6rne\u011fidir. Haberde merak ettirilen \u00fcnl\u00fc ismin kim oldu\u011fu bilgisi ancak haberin i\u00e7eri\u011fine t\u0131kland\u0131\u011f\u0131nda anla\u015f\u0131lmaktad\u0131r.\n5- G\u00f6rselin \u0130\u00e7erikle Uyumsuz Oldu\u011fu Clickbait:\nG\u00f6rselin haber i\u00e7eri\u011finden ba\u011f\u0131ms\u0131z, alakas\u0131z bir olay\u0131, ki\u015fiyi veya durumu g\u00f6stermesi halleri, g\u00f6rselin i\u00e7erikle uyumsuzlu\u011fu kriterinde de\u011ferlendirilmi\u015ftir. Daha \u00e7ok olayla ilgisi olmayan, dikkat \u00e7ekmek ad\u0131na bir g\u00f6rseli payla\u015farak yap\u0131lan Clickbait t\u00fcr\u00fcd\u00fcr.\nYukar\u0131daki haberde, \u201cDirili\u015f Ertu\u011frul ger\u00e7e\u011fi\u201d, \u201c\u00fcnl\u00fc oyuncu son noktay\u0131 koydu\u201d \u015feklindeki g\u00f6rselin \u00fczerindeki yaz\u0131lar i\u00e7erikle alakas\u0131z olup merak uyand\u0131rmak amac\u0131yla yaz\u0131lm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r. \u00d6yle ki haber i\u00e7eri\u011finde oyuncu Engin Altan D\u00fczyatan\u2019\u0131n bir banka reklam\u0131nda oynad\u0131\u011f\u0131 ve kazand\u0131\u011f\u0131 para ile ilgili s\u00f6yledi\u011fi c\u00fcmleler vard\u0131r.\nRapora G\u00f6re En Az Clickbait Yapan Yay\u0131n Kurulu\u015flar\u0131\nBelirledi\u011fimiz 5 kritere g\u00f6re, rapora konu olan her bir haber dikkatle okunarak incelenmi\u015f ve buna g\u00f6re sonu\u00e7lar olu\u015fturulmu\u015ftur.
