Yu, bu esnada ger\u00e7ek bir fet\u00fcs\u00fc kulland\u0131\u011f\u0131n\u0131 da iddia ediyor.\nZhu, \u2018\u0130nsan Yiyen\u2019 eseri i\u00e7in t\u0131p fak\u00fcltesinden \u00e7al\u0131nan bebeklerin cesetlerini pi\u015firdi\u011fini, etin tad\u0131n\u0131n \u00e7ok k\u00f6t\u00fc oldu\u011funu ve defalarca kustu\u011funu, ancak buna ra\u011fmen \u2018sanat u\u011fruna\u2018 bebek cesedi yemek zorunda kald\u0131\u011f\u0131n\u0131 s\u00f6yledi.\nCeset yeme performans\u0131 sonras\u0131nda kamuoyuna yapt\u0131\u011f\u0131 yorumlarda Zhu Yu, ba\u015fta skandal olarak g\u00f6r\u00fclen sosyal ve k\u00fclt\u00fcrel varsay\u0131mlar\u0131 g\u00f6receli hale getirmeye \u00e7al\u0131\u015f\u0131rken ayn\u0131 zamanda skandal niteli\u011findeki hareketin \u00f6nemini ele almaya \u00e7al\u0131\u015ft\u0131\u011f\u0131n\u0131 ifade etti: \u201cHer zaman bizi kusturan bir soru; yani, neden insanlar insan yiyemiyor?\u201d\nZhu Yu, \u201cNihai amac\u0131m, insanl\u0131\u011f\u0131n insan yiyemeyece\u011fi d\u00fc\u015f\u00fcncesine kar\u015f\u0131 bir protesto olarak insanlar\u0131n yenilebilece\u011fini ilan etmektir\u201d demi\u015ftir.\nHalk\u0131n tepkisi \u00fczerine Yu, \u201cHi\u00e7bir din yamyaml\u0131\u011f\u0131 yasaklam\u0131yor; insanlar\u0131n insan yemesine engel olan herhangi bir yasa bulam\u0131yorum, ahlak ile yasalar aras\u0131ndaki bo\u015flu\u011fun avantaj\u0131n\u0131 kulland\u0131m ve bunun \u00fczerinde \u00e7al\u0131\u015fmaya ba\u015flad\u0131m\u201d demi\u015ftir. \u00c7inli Yu ayr\u0131ca, t\u0131p fak\u00fcltesinden \u00e7al\u0131nan ger\u00e7ek bir cenini kulland\u0131\u011f\u0131n\u0131 iddia etmi\u015ftir.\nZhu\u2019nun s\u00f6zde performans sanat\u0131 eseri g\u00f6r\u00fcnt\u00fcleri, e-postalarla yay\u0131lan anti-\u00c7in propagandalar\u0131nda da kullan\u0131l\u0131yor. K\u0131sa metinler eklenen g\u00f6r\u00fcnt\u00fclerde servis edilen yemek, \u00c7in\u2019in \u201cen s\u0131cak yeme\u011fi\u201d olarak tan\u0131t\u0131l\u0131yor, \u00f6l\u00fc fet\u00fcslerin yakla\u015f\u0131k 100\u2013120 dolara sat\u0131ld\u0131\u011f\u0131 s\u00f6yleniyor. Al\u0131c\u0131lar\u0131n postalar\u0131 iletmeleri te\u015fvik edilerek metinlerin \u0130ngilizce ve Korece \u00e7evirileri ilave ediliyor; \u0130nternet kullan\u0131c\u0131 taban\u0131 aras\u0131nda s\u00f6ylentileri yaymak i\u00e7in sahte dedikodular \u00fcretiliyor.\nAyr\u0131ca, internet ortamlar\u0131nda dola\u015fan \u00c7in\u2019de fet\u00fcs \u00e7orbas\u0131 hikayesinin de sahte foto\u011fraflarla yap\u0131lm\u0131\u015f bir aldatmaca oldu\u011fu; s\u00f6z konusu foto\u011fraflardan baz\u0131lar\u0131n\u0131n protesto ama\u00e7l\u0131 olu\u015fturuldu\u011fu ortaya \u00e7\u0131km\u0131\u015ft\u0131r.\n\u00c7inlilerin fet\u00fcs yemedi\u011fi ger\u00e7e\u011fiyle beraber; \u00c7in\u2019de \u00fcretilen ve \u00f6l\u00fc fet\u00fcslerin etinden yap\u0131lan tozlar\u0131 i\u00e7eren baz\u0131 haplar bulunmu\u015ftur.\nA\u011fustos 2011\u2019den bu yana, G\u00fcney Koreli g\u00fcmr\u00fck yetkilileri \u00c7in\u2019den ka\u00e7ak yolla gelen 17.000\u2019den fazla bebek eti tozu bulunan hap ele ge\u00e7irmi\u015fti. \u00c7inli makamlar, haplar\u0131n \u00c7in\u2019de \u00fcretildi\u011fine dair iddialar\u0131 reddetmi\u015fti. Sa\u011fl\u0131k Bakanl\u0131\u011f\u0131 s\u00f6zc\u00fcs\u00fc, ge\u00e7ti\u011fimiz A\u011fustos ay\u0131nda yap\u0131lan bir soru\u015fturmada insan eti i\u00e7eren haplar\u0131n \u00c7in\u2019de \u00fcretildi\u011fine dair bir delil olmad\u0131\u011f\u0131n\u0131 belirtmi\u015fti.\nKore G\u00fcmr\u00fck Servisi taraf\u0131ndan ele ge\u00e7irilen, insan eti tozu ile doldurulmu\u015f kaps\u00fcller\nAyr\u0131ca bir ba\u015fka iddiaya g\u00f6re, G\u00fcney Kore yetkilileri Seul\u2019de yay\u0131nlanan k\u00fcrtaj yapan \u00c7inli doktorlar \u00fczerine yap\u0131lm\u0131\u015f bir belgeselde, doktorlar\u0131n k\u00fcrtaj sonras\u0131nda fet\u00fcsleri yedi\u011finin fark\u0131na vard\u0131. Belgeseldeki bir \u00c7inli doktorun, buzdolab\u0131ndan fet\u00fcs \u00e7\u0131kard\u0131\u011f\u0131 g\u00f6r\u00fcld\u00fc.\n\u00d6zetle, t\u00fcm \u00c7inlilerin cenin yedi\u011fi iddias\u0131 as\u0131ls\u0131zd\u0131r; bir ki\u015finin s\u00f6zde sanat amac\u0131yla fet\u00fcs yemesinden yola \u00e7\u0131k\u0131larak b\u00fct\u00fcn \u00c7in hakl\u0131n\u0131n fet\u00fcs yedi\u011fini s\u00f6ylemek m\u00fcmk\u00fcn de\u011fildir.\nDo\u011fruluk Y\u00fczdesi\nKaynaklar\nsnopes    says   wereblog   youtube      nedir.org\n[Toplam:17    Ortalama:3.6/5] \u00c7inlilerin Cenin Yedi\u011fi \u0130ddias\u0131", "Bug\u00fcn ya\u015fayan insan n\u00fcfusunun, \u00f6len n\u00fcfustan daha fazla oldu\u011fu iddias\u0131n\u0131 ara\u015ft\u0131rd\u0131k. Ancak d\u00fcnya \u00fczerinde bug\u00fcne kadar ya\u015fam\u0131\u015f insan say\u0131s\u0131, \u00f6len insan say\u0131s\u0131ndan fazla de\u011fildir. Bu iddia ger\u00e7e\u011fi yans\u0131tmamakla birlikte do\u011fru de\u011fildir. \nBir Instagram sayfas\u0131n\u0131n yapt\u0131\u011f\u0131 payla\u015f\u0131m, do\u011fru olarak alg\u0131lanarak 2000\u2019in \u00fczerinde be\u011feni say\u0131s\u0131 alm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r. Peki ger\u00e7ekten, g\u00fcn\u00fcm\u00fczde ya\u015fayan n\u00fcfusla, ge\u00e7mi\u015fte \u00f6len insan n\u00fcfusu aras\u0131nda say\u0131 bak\u0131m\u0131ndan yak\u0131nl\u0131k var m\u0131d\u0131r, bakal\u0131m.\nY\u0131llara G\u00f6re D\u00fcnya N\u00fcfusu\nGe\u00e7mi\u015f y\u00fczy\u0131llara dair n\u00fcfus hakk\u0131nda kesin ve net bir sonuca ula\u015fmak tam olarak m\u00fcmk\u00fcn de\u011fildir. Ancak d\u00fcnya n\u00fcfusu \u00fczerine ciddi \u00e7al\u0131\u015fmalar yapan bir\u00e7ok ara\u015ft\u0131rmac\u0131 vard\u0131r. En kapsaml\u0131 olarak, milattan \u00f6nce 10.000 y\u0131l\u0131ndan bu yana tahmini n\u00fcfus hesaplamalar\u0131 yap\u0131lm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r. Colin McEvedy ve Richard Jones isimli iki ara\u015ft\u0131rmac\u0131 1978 y\u0131l\u0131nda, Massimo Livi Bacci ise 2001 y\u0131l\u0131nda, milattan \u00f6nce 10.000 y\u0131l\u0131ndan ba\u015flayarak n\u00fcfusa dair \u00e7al\u0131\u015fmalar yapm\u0131\u015flard\u0131r.\nD\u00fcnya n\u00fcfusu \u00fczerinde \u00e7al\u0131\u015fan di\u011fer ara\u015ft\u0131rmac\u0131lar ise milattan \u00f6nce 2000 y\u0131l\u0131ndan veya milattan sonraki y\u0131llardan ba\u015flayarak g\u00fcn\u00fcm\u00fcze kadar ara\u015ft\u0131rm\u0131\u015flard\u0131r.\nMilattan \u00f6nce 10 bin y\u0131l\u0131ndan ba\u015flayarak d\u00fcnya n\u00fcfusuna g\u00f6z atal\u0131m. A\u015fa\u011f\u0131da, McEvedy ve Jones, Durand, Gallant, Livi-Bacci gibi ara\u015ft\u0131rmac\u0131lar\u0131n raporlar\u0131ndan \u00f6zetle olu\u015fturdu\u011fumuz tabloda ortalama de\u011ferler, sadece alt ve \u00fcst s\u0131n\u0131r i\u00e7in de\u011fil her bir \u00e7al\u0131\u015fma dikkate al\u0131narak hesaplanm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r.\nBuna g\u00f6re insan \u00f6mr\u00fcn\u00fc ortalama 100 y\u0131l d\u00fc\u015f\u00fcnsek dahi, her y\u00fcz y\u0131lda bir n\u00fcfus yenilenmekte ve d\u00fcnya n\u00fcfusu giderek artmaktad\u0131r. Milattan \u00f6nce her y\u00fcz y\u0131l i\u00e7in ortalama de\u011fer dikkate al\u0131nd\u0131\u011f\u0131nda en az 6 Milyar insan\u0131n ya\u015fay\u0131p \u00f6lm\u00fc\u015f oldu\u011fu g\u00f6r\u00fclebilir.\nMilattan g\u00fcn\u00fcm\u00fcze kadar ise n\u00fcfus 1500-2000 y\u0131l\u0131 aras\u0131nda sava\u015flar, hastal\u0131klar olmas\u0131na ra\u011fmen h\u0131zl\u0131 art\u0131\u015f g\u00f6stermi\u015f ve toplamda 7 milyar\u0131 a\u015fk\u0131n bir n\u00fcfusa ula\u015f\u0131lm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r.\nMilattan g\u00fcn\u00fcm\u00fcze, aral\u0131klarla toplam n\u00fcfus\nMilad\u0131n ba\u015flang\u0131c\u0131ndan g\u00fcn\u00fcm\u00fcze kadar ya\u015fayan ve \u00f6lm\u00fc\u015f olan n\u00fcfus, en y\u00fcksek de\u011ferler dikkate al\u0131nmadan ortalama veriler \u00fczerinden kabataslak hesapland\u0131\u011f\u0131nda en az 20 milyard\u0131r.  \n\u00d6zetle; Milattan \u00f6nce en az 6 milyar ve milattan sonra en az 20 milyar insan\u0131n \u00f6ld\u00fc\u011f\u00fc g\u00f6z \u00f6n\u00fcnde bulunduruldu\u011funda, ya\u015fayan insan say\u0131s\u0131 \u00f6len insan say\u0131s\u0131ndan daha azd\u0131r. Milattan \u00f6nceki n\u00fcfus hesaba kat\u0131lmasa bile, toplamda \u00f6len en az 26 milyar insan, Amerika Birle\u015fik Devletleri N\u00fcfus Say\u0131m B\u00fcrosu (U.S. Census Bureau) verilerine g\u00f6re, 2 Ocak 2018 itibariyle \u015fu an ya\u015fayan 7 milyar 444 Milyon insandan her ko\u015fulda daha fazlad\u0131r.\nDo\u011fruluk Y\u00fczdesi\nKaynaklar: Census.gov, Our World in Data, scottmanning.com, cia.gov\n[Toplam:7    Ortalama:4.9/5] Bug\u00fcn Ya\u015fayan \u0130nsan Say\u0131s\u0131 \u00d6len \u0130nsan Say\u0131s\u0131ndan Fazlad\u0131r \u0130ddias\u0131", "\u0130\u015fe gitmemek i\u00e7in kendini b\u0131\u00e7aklad\u0131\u011f\u0131 iddias\u0131n\u0131 inceledik. Japonya\u2019n\u0131n Aichi prefekt\u00f6rl\u00fc\u011f\u00fcnde bir adam\u0131n i\u015fe gitmemek i\u00e7in kendisini b\u0131\u00e7aklad\u0131\u011f\u0131 iddia edilmi\u015ftir. S\u00f6z konusu iddia do\u011frudur.\n22 \u015eubat 2017 tarihinde sabah saat 07:20\u2019de, Aichi prefekt\u00f6rl\u00fc\u011f\u00fcndeki Kasugai \u015fehrinde ya\u015fayan 54 ya\u015f\u0131ndaki Masaru Miura, Nagoya metro istasyonunun banyosunda yakla\u015f\u0131k 13 cm uzunlu\u011fundaki b\u0131\u00e7akla, sol kal\u00e7as\u0131ndan kendini b\u0131\u00e7aklam\u0131\u015ft\u0131r. Kendini b\u0131\u00e7aklamas\u0131n\u0131n ard\u0131ndan polis karakoluna giden adam, \u201cTan\u0131mad\u0131\u011f\u0131m bir adam beni arkamdan b\u0131\u00e7aklad\u0131\u201d diyerek polise yalan ifade vermi\u015ftir.\nYakla\u015f\u0131k 2,5 cm uzunlu\u011fundaki yaras\u0131n\u0131n tedavisi i\u00e7in Miura\u2019y\u0131 beklerken, olayla ilgili daha fazla ara\u015ft\u0131rma yapmaya ba\u015flayan polis, Miura\u2019n\u0131n ifadesinde tutars\u0131zl\u0131klar oldu\u011funu fark etmi\u015ftir.  Miura, nihayetinde yalan s\u00f6yledi\u011fini ve kendisini b\u0131\u00e7aklad\u0131\u011f\u0131n\u0131 itiraf etmi\u015ftir. Polis, ayn\u0131 g\u00fcn \u00f6\u011fleden sonra yalan ihbarla polisin g\u00f6revine m\u00fcdahale etti\u011fi i\u00e7in Miura\u2019y\u0131 tutuklam\u0131\u015ft\u0131r.\nMiura, b\u0131\u00e7a\u011f\u0131 metro istasyonunun yak\u0131n\u0131nda bir \u00e7al\u0131l\u0131kta buldu\u011funu iddia etmi\u015ftir. Miura\u2019n\u0131n s\u00f6ylemlerinden polisin aktard\u0131\u011f\u0131na g\u00f6re, \u201ci\u015fe gitmek istemedi\u011fi i\u00e7in bunu yapt\u0131\u011f\u0131\u201d ve \u201ce\u011fer yaralan\u0131rsa i\u015fe gitmek zorunda kalmayaca\u011f\u0131n\u0131 d\u00fc\u015f\u00fcnd\u00fc\u011f\u00fc\u201d ifadeleri yer alm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r.\nJapon medyas\u0131, Masaru Miura\u2019n\u0131n i\u015f stresinden dolay\u0131 zihinsel bunal\u0131m i\u00e7erisinde olabilece\u011fini ve bu y\u00fczden b\u00f6yle bir olay\u0131n ger\u00e7ekle\u015fmi\u015f olabilece\u011fini aktarm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r.\n3 G\u00fcn Sonra Ayn\u0131 Olay Ger\u00e7ekle\u015fti\nMasaru Miura\u2019n\u0131n olay\u0131ndan 3 g\u00fcn sonra 25 \u015eubat tarihinde ise benzer bir olay yine Japonya\u2019da ger\u00e7ekle\u015fmi\u015ftir. Bu defa Fukuoka prefekt\u00f6rl\u00fc\u011f\u00fcn\u00fcn Kurume \u015fehrinde, pi\u015fmi\u015f \u00fcr\u00fcn imalat\u0131 yapan bir \u015firkette \u00e7al\u0131\u015fan bir adam, Masaru Miura\u2019n\u0131nkine benzer \u015fekilde, tan\u0131mad\u0131\u011f\u0131 biri taraf\u0131ndan b\u0131\u00e7akland\u0131\u011f\u0131n\u0131 iddia etmi\u015ftir. Polise verdi\u011fi ifadesinde, otoparkta arabas\u0131ndan indikten sonra, birisinin s\u0131rt \u00e7antas\u0131n\u0131 \u00e7almaya \u00e7al\u0131\u015ft\u0131\u011f\u0131n\u0131 ve direnince de b\u0131\u00e7akland\u0131\u011f\u0131n\u0131 iddia eden 26 ya\u015f\u0131ndaki adam, dirse\u011findeki derin b\u0131\u00e7ak yaras\u0131 sebebiyle tedavi edilmek \u00fczere hastaneye g\u00f6t\u00fcr\u00fclm\u00fc\u015ft\u00fcr.\nPolis ilk ba\u015fta olay\u0131, yaralanmayla sonu\u00e7lanan bir h\u0131rs\u0131zl\u0131k vakas\u0131 olarak de\u011ferlendirmi\u015ftir. Ancak daha sonradan b\u0131\u00e7akland\u0131\u011f\u0131n\u0131 iddia eden adam\u0131n, asl\u0131nda \u00fczerinde b\u0131\u00e7ak bulundurdu\u011funun ortaya \u00e7\u0131kmas\u0131 \u00fczerine soru\u015fturman\u0131n seyri de\u011fi\u015fmi\u015ftir. Polisin devam eden sorgulamalar\u0131n\u0131n \u00fczerine adam kendisini b\u0131\u00e7aklad\u0131\u011f\u0131n\u0131 itiraf etmi\u015ftir. \u0130\u015fe gitmek istemedi\u011fi i\u00e7in bunu yapt\u0131\u011f\u0131n\u0131 s\u00f6yleyen adam, sahte ihbar sebebiyle K\u00fc\u00e7\u00fck Su\u00e7lar Yasas\u0131n\u0131 ihlal etti\u011fi i\u00e7in tutuklanm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r.\nNeden i\u015fe gitmek istemediklerine dair her 2 olayda da detay verilmemesine ra\u011fmen, a\u015f\u0131r\u0131 i\u015f y\u00fck\u00fcn\u00fcn olu\u015fturdu\u011fu stres y\u00fcz\u00fcnden oldu\u011fu tahmin edilmektedir. Maalesef Japonya\u2019da \u00e7ok yayg\u0131n olan bu durum sebebiyle b\u00f6yle olaylar ya\u015fanmaktad\u0131r.\nDo\u011fruluk Y\u00fczdesi\nKaynaklar:\njapankyo, japankyo 2, tomonewsjapan (youtube) , sankei, ne-dir\n[Toplam:7    Ortalama:5/5] \u0130\u015fe Gitmemek \u0130\u00e7in Kendini B\u0131\u00e7aklad\u0131\u011f\u0131 \u0130ddias\u0131", "\u0130stanbul Ba\u011fc\u0131lar\u2019da birbirlerine havai fi\u015fek s\u0131kt\u0131lar iddias\u0131n\u0131 ara\u015ft\u0131rd\u0131k. D\u00fcn ak\u015fam bir Twitter kullan\u0131c\u0131s\u0131 taraf\u0131ndan yap\u0131lan bir payla\u015f\u0131ma g\u00f6re, bir grup gen\u00e7 ellerindeki havai fi\u015fekleri birbirlerine s\u0131kmaktad\u0131r. Ancak olay\u0131n Ba\u011fc\u0131lar\u2019da oldu\u011fu iddias\u0131 do\u011fru de\u011fildir.\nG\u00f6r\u00fcnt\u00fcler \u015eikago\u2019dan\nTwitter\u2019da birbirlerine havai fi\u015fekle sald\u0131ran grubu g\u00f6steren payla\u015f\u0131m Ba\u011fc\u0131lar\u2019da de\u011fil, ABD\u2018de, \u015eikago\u2018nun Near West Side semtinde \u00e7ekilmi\u015ftir. \u00dcstelik 31 Aral\u0131k 2017\u2019de gibi payla\u015f\u0131lan video, asl\u0131nda 2015 y\u0131l\u0131na aittir. Olay ger\u00e7ekte, iki rakip \u00e7etenin aras\u0131nda geli\u015fmi\u015f ve haber kaynaklar\u0131 taraf\u0131ndan herhangi bir hasar ya da yaralanma olmad\u0131\u011f\u0131 belirtilmi\u015ftir. \nVideoyu ba\u015f\u0131ndan ve sonundan kesen veya kesilmi\u015f haliyle payla\u015fan Ozan D. isimli Twitter kullan\u0131c\u0131s\u0131 olay\u0131 Ba\u011fc\u0131lar\u2019da gibi g\u00f6stermi\u015ftir. Ba\u015fbakan Binali Y\u0131ld\u0131r\u0131m, kat\u0131ld\u0131\u011f\u0131 bir etkinlikteki konu\u015fmas\u0131nda, \u0130ngiltere\u2019deki \u0130nternet h\u0131z\u0131n\u0131n T\u00fcrkiye\u2019deki \u0130nternet h\u0131z\u0131ndan daha yava\u015f oldu\u011funu ifade etmi\u015ftir. S\u00f6z konusu iddia sabit geni\u015fbant \u0130nternet h\u0131z\u0131 i\u00e7in do\u011fru de\u011fildir. Ancak, mobil \u0130nternet h\u0131z\u0131 i\u00e7in do\u011frudur.\nSabit Geni\u015fbant \u0130nternet H\u0131z\u0131\nSpeedtest, K\u00fcresel \u0130ndeks raporlar\u0131 alt\u0131nda ayl\u0131k olarak D\u00fcnya\u2019da \u0130nternet h\u0131zlar\u0131na dair verileri payla\u015fmaktad\u0131r. Kas\u0131m ay\u0131nda da \u00fclkelerin mobil ve sabit geni\u015fbant \u0130nternet h\u0131zlar\u0131na dair veriler a\u00e7\u0131klanm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r. Buna g\u00f6re \u0130ngiltere, sabit geni\u015fbant \u0130nternet h\u0131z\u0131nda 50.90 Mbps indirme (download) h\u0131z\u0131na sahip ve listede 26. s\u0131rada yer almaktad\u0131r. T\u00fcrkiye, sabit geni\u015fbant \u0130nternet h\u0131z\u0131nda 16.30 Mbps indirme h\u0131z\u0131na sahip ve 84. s\u0131rada yer almaktad\u0131r.\n\u0130ngiltere\u2019nin listedeki s\u0131ralamas\u0131\nT\u00fcrkiye\u2019nin listedeki s\u0131ralamas\u0131\nMobil \u0130nternet H\u0131z\u0131\nSpeedtest\u2019in Kas\u0131m ay\u0131nda yay\u0131nlad\u0131\u011f\u0131 ayn\u0131 ayl\u0131k rapora g\u00f6re, mobil \u0130nternet h\u0131z\u0131nda \u0130ngiltere, 26.75 indirme (download) Mbps h\u0131z\u0131na sahip ve listede 43. s\u0131rada yer almaktad\u0131r. T\u00fcrkiye ise mobil \u0130nternet h\u0131z\u0131nda, 31.20 indirme (download) Mbps h\u0131z\u0131na sahip ve listede 32. s\u0131rada yer almaktad\u0131r. T\u00fcrkiye, bu ara\u015ft\u0131rmaya g\u00f6re mobil \u0130nternet h\u0131z\u0131nda sadece \u0130ngiltere\u2019den de\u011fil, Fransa, ABD, \u0130talya, Almanya gibi bir\u00e7ok \u00fclkeden daha h\u0131zl\u0131 \u0130nternet\u2019e sahiptir.\nT\u00fcrkiye\u2019nin listedeki s\u0131ralamas\u0131\n\u0130ngiltere\u2019nin listedeki s\u0131ralamas\u0131\nD\u00fcnya\u2019n\u0131n En H\u0131zl\u0131 \u0130nternet\u2019ine Sahip 10 \u00dclke\nHem statista hem de fastmetrics ara\u015ft\u0131rma sitelerinin do\u011frulad\u0131\u011f\u0131 verilere g\u00f6re, 2017\u2019nin ilk \u00e7eyre\u011fi itibar\u0131yla D\u00fcnya\u2019n\u0131n en h\u0131zl\u0131 \u0130nternet\u2019ine sahip \u00fclkelerin listelendi\u011fi grafik \u015f\u00f6yle:\nDo\u011fruluk Y\u00fczdesi\nKaynaklar:\nspeedtest, fastmetrics, statista, do\u011fru veri\n[Toplam:5    Ortalama:5/5] \u0130ngiltere\u2019de \u0130nternet T\u00fcrkiye\u2019den Yava\u015f \u0130ddias\u0131", "Kamera fla\u015f\u0131n\u0131 engelleyen aksesuar olarak bilinen \u015fallar son zamanlarda g\u00fcndemde. \u0130ddiaya g\u00f6re, paparaziler taraf\u0131ndan rahats\u0131z edilmek istenmeyen \u00fcnl\u00fcler, bu \u015fal\u0131 kullanarak adeta g\u00f6r\u00fcnmez oluyorlar. Aksesuarla birlikte foto\u011fraf \u00e7ekildi\u011finde, gece veya g\u00fcnd\u00fcz ay\u0131rt etmeksizin kamera fla\u015f\u0131n\u0131n bloke edildi\u011fi iddias\u0131 do\u011frudur.\nMerkezi Londra\u2019da bulunan ISHU markas\u0131 b\u00fcnyesinde \u00fcretilen bu aksesuarlar\u0131n e\u015farptan kravata, telefon k\u0131l\u0131f\u0131ndan \u015fapkaya kadar bir\u00e7ok \u00e7e\u015fidi bulunmaktad\u0131r. I\u015f\u0131\u011f\u0131 son derece yans\u0131tan bir kuma\u015ftan \u00fcretilen bu aksesuarlar, foto\u011fraf makinesindeki fla\u015f \u0131\u015f\u0131\u011f\u0131n\u0131 \u00e7ok parlak bir hale getirdi\u011fi i\u00e7in foto\u011frafta aksesuar d\u0131\u015f\u0131ndaki her \u015feyin karanl\u0131k g\u00f6r\u00fcnmesine neden oluyor.\nNereden Esinlenildi?\nYabanc\u0131 bas\u0131nda anti-paparazi \u015fal olarak adland\u0131r\u0131lan \u00fcr\u00fcn, 28 ya\u015f\u0131ndaki Hintli Saif Siddiqui taraf\u0131ndan tasarlanm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r. Temel amac\u0131n\u0131n insanlar\u0131 mahremiyetin ger\u00e7ekte ne kadar \u00f6nemli oldu\u011fu konusunda bilgilendirmek oldu\u011funu belirten tasar\u0131mc\u0131, bu fikrin akl\u0131na ilk olarak 2009 y\u0131l\u0131nda geldi\u011fini s\u00f6ylemi\u015ftir. 2009 y\u0131l\u0131nda arkada\u015flar\u0131n\u0131n foto\u011fraf\u0131na bakan Saif Siddiqui, foto\u011fraf\u0131n bisikletin reflekt\u00f6r\u00fcnden gelen \u0131\u015f\u0131k taraf\u0131ndan manip\u00fcle edildi\u011fini fark etmi\u015ftir. Bu fikir \u00fczerine hareket eden gen\u00e7 tasar\u0131mc\u0131 ilk \u00fcr\u00fcn\u00fcn\u00fc Ishu markas\u0131yla 2015 y\u0131l\u0131n\u0131n Ekim ay\u0131nda piyasaya s\u00fcrm\u00fc\u015ft\u00fcr.\nAksesuar\u0131n tasar\u0131mc\u0131s\u0131 Saif Siddiqui\nAksesuarlar\u0131n \u00fcreticisi Ishu, kendi internet sitesinde sadece moda d\u00fcnyas\u0131 i\u00e7in de\u011fil; g\u00fcvenlik, gizlilik, yenilenebilir enerji ve teknoloji sekt\u00f6r\u00fc i\u00e7in \u00fcr\u00fcnler tasarlad\u0131klar\u0131n\u0131 belirtiyor. Saif Siddiqui, \u00fcr\u00fcnlerle ilgili yapt\u0131\u011f\u0131 a\u00e7\u0131klamada \u015funlar\u0131 s\u00f6yl\u00fcyor:\n\u201cISHU tek ba\u015f\u0131na \u00fcnl\u00fcleri hedef almaz. \u0130nsanlar g\u00f6r\u00fcnmez olman\u0131n s\u00fcper bir g\u00fc\u00e7 oldu\u011funu unutuyorlar. San\u0131r\u0131m d\u00fcnya \u00fczerindeki insanlar a\u015f\u0131r\u0131 maruz kalm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r. Herkes bug\u00fcnlerde sosyal medyada ve herkes telefonlar\u0131nda bir kamera var. Sonu\u00e7 olarak, herkes be\u011fenip be\u011fenmedi\u011finiz bir ki\u015finin resmini t\u0131klayabilir ve \u00e7evrimi\u00e7i olarak payla\u015fabilir. ISHU, hissediyorum, onlar\u0131n gizlilikleri \u00fczerinde kendilerini kontrol etmelerini sa\u011fl\u0131yor. Asl\u0131nda bunu, \u00f6zel anlar\u0131 ki\u015fisel olarak korumak i\u00e7in bir \u00e7\u00f6z\u00fcm olarak g\u00f6r\u00fcyorum.\u201d \nAnti Paparazi Olarak Biliniyor\nAksesuarlar\u0131n en yayg\u0131n\u0131 olarak kullan\u0131lan \u015fallar\u0131n fiyatlar\u0131 ise 355 ile 300 sterlin aras\u0131nda yani 1000 ile 1800 TL civar\u0131nda de\u011fi\u015fmektedir. Ayr\u0131ca Paris, New York ve Los Angeles gibi yerlerde de sat\u0131\u015f ma\u011fazas\u0131 bulunan ISHU \u00fcr\u00fcnleri, yabanc\u0131 bas\u0131nda modern \u00e7a\u011f\u0131n g\u00f6r\u00fcnmezlik pelerini ya da anti paparazi olarak adland\u0131r\u0131lmaktad\u0131r.\nParis Hilton, Cameron Diaz, Joe Jonas ve Major Lazer gibi \u00fcnl\u00fcler, magazin bas\u0131n\u0131 taraf\u0131ndan rahats\u0131z edilmemek ve foto\u011fraflar\u0131n\u0131n izinsiz \u00e7ekilmesini engellemek i\u00e7in Saif\u2019in tasarlad\u0131\u011f\u0131 aksesuarlar\u0131 kullan\u0131yor:\nParis Hilton\n\u015eark\u0131c\u0131 Major Lazer\nRus-\u0130svi\u00e7reli model Xenia Tchoumitcheva\nDo\u011fruluk Y\u00fczdesi\nKaynaklar: Ishu, Thehindu, Bloomberg, Telegraph, Youtube\n[Toplam:3    Ortalama:5/5] Kamera Fla\u015f\u0131n\u0131 Engelleyen \u015eal \u0130ddias\u0131", "\u0130ki denizin birbirine kar\u0131\u015fmad\u0131\u011f\u0131 iddias\u0131, son y\u0131llarda s\u0131k\u00e7a tart\u0131\u015f\u0131lan ve denizbilimciler taraf\u0131ndan ke\u015ffedilen en \u00f6nemli olaylardan biridir. Yap\u0131lan ara\u015ft\u0131rmalara ve incelemelere g\u00f6re, iki denizin bulu\u015ftu\u011fu yerde sular\u0131n\u0131n birbirine kar\u0131\u015fmad\u0131\u011f\u0131 iddias\u0131 do\u011frudur.\nModern o\u015finografi bilimi, iki farkl\u0131 denizin bulu\u015ftu\u011fu yerde, aralar\u0131nda haloklin olarak tan\u0131mlanan, \u00f6rt\u00fck ve ge\u00e7ilemeyen do\u011fal bir bariyer bulundu\u011funu ortaya koymu\u015ftur. Haloklin, iki farkl\u0131 su k\u00fctlesi aras\u0131nda sudan yap\u0131lm\u0131\u015f bir duvard\u0131r. Bu b\u00f6l\u00fcnmez sucul b\u00f6lme, denizleri kendi s\u0131cakl\u0131\u011f\u0131, tuzluluk derecesi, oksijen konsantrasyonu, bile\u015fimi ve yo\u011funlu\u011fu bulunan iki deniz olarak ay\u0131r\u0131r. T\u0131pk\u0131 ya\u011f ve sirke gibi bu iki su da tamamen kar\u0131\u015fmaz.\nBu noktada Cebelitar\u0131k Bo\u011faz\u0131\u2018nda Akdeniz ve Atlas Okyanusu\u2018nun kesi\u015fti\u011fi bir durum vard\u0131r. \u00d6z\u00fcnde iki deniz birbirinden farkl\u0131d\u0131r. Akdeniz\u2019de su, Atlas Okyanusu\u2019ndaki suya k\u0131yasla orta derecede s\u0131cak, tuzlu ve az yo\u011funluktad\u0131r. Akdeniz\u2019in suyu Cebelitar\u0131k e\u015fi\u011fi \u00fczerinden Atlas Okyanusu\u2019na girdi\u011finde, kendi s\u0131cakl\u0131\u011f\u0131, tuzlulu\u011fu ve nispeten az yo\u011funluk \u00f6zellikleri ile yakla\u015f\u0131k 1000 metre derinlikle Atlas Okyanusu\u2019na birka\u00e7 y\u00fcz kilometre ilerler ve b\u00f6ylece yatay bir haloklin meydana getirir. B\u00fcy\u00fck dalgalar, gelgitler ve g\u00fc\u00e7l\u00fc su alt\u0131 ak\u0131nt\u0131lar\u0131na ra\u011fmen, Akdeniz\u2019den gelen akarsu ak\u0131\u015f\u0131, Atlantik Okyanusu\u2019nun sa\u011flam ve seyreltilmemi\u015f yolu boyunca seyreder.\nHaloklinler, hali\u00e7 veya yeralt\u0131 nehir sistemlerinde de g\u00f6r\u00fcl\u00fcr. Meksika\u2018n\u0131n g\u00fcneyindeki Yucatan Yar\u0131madas\u0131, su alt\u0131 ka\u015fifleri ve ma\u011fara dalg\u0131\u00e7lar\u0131n\u0131n bir su k\u00fctlesinden di\u011ferine ge\u00e7ti\u011fi bir\u00e7ok pop\u00fcler haloklin dal\u0131\u015f alan\u0131na sahiptir.\nA\u015fa\u011f\u0131daki resimler, Alaska k\u0131y\u0131lar\u0131n\u0131 ve Danimarka\u2019da bulunan ve \u00c7in Seddi\u2019ne benzeyen Skagen\u2019deki ender g\u00f6r\u00fclen dikey bariyer \u00f6rneklerini i\u00e7ermektedir.\nFrans\u0131z okyanus uzman\u0131, deniz subay\u0131 ve sinema y\u00f6netmeni Jacques-Yves Cousteau (1910 \u2013 1997), sular\u0131n kar\u0131\u015fmad\u0131\u011f\u0131 hadisesini tespit etmi\u015ftir. Kaptan Cousteau\u2019nun \u015fu a\u00e7\u0131klamalar\u0131 mevcuttur:\nKaptan Cousteau\n\u201c1962\u2019de Alman bilim insanlar\u0131, K\u0131z\u0131ldeniz ve Hint Okyanusu sular\u0131n\u0131n, Aden K\u00f6rfezi ile K\u0131z\u0131ldeniz\u2019in birle\u015fti\u011fi Bab-ul-Mandab Bo\u011faz\u0131\u2019nda birbirleriyle kar\u0131\u015fmad\u0131\u011f\u0131n\u0131 s\u00f6yledi. B\u00f6ylece Atlas Okyanusu\u2019nun ve Akdeniz\u2019in sular\u0131n\u0131n birbirleriyle kar\u0131\u015f\u0131k olup olmad\u0131\u011f\u0131n\u0131 incelemeye ba\u015flad\u0131k. \u00d6nce, do\u011fal tuzluluk ve yo\u011funlu\u011fu ile i\u00e7erdi\u011fi hayat\u0131 bulmak i\u00e7in Akdeniz\u2019deki suyu analiz ettik. Atlas Okyanusu\u2019nda da ayn\u0131 i\u015flemi tekrarlad\u0131k. \u0130ki su k\u00fctlesi Cebelitar\u0131k\u2019ta binlerce y\u0131ld\u0131r birbirleriyle bulu\u015fuyordu. Buna g\u00f6re, iki su k\u00fctlesi birbiriyle kar\u0131\u015fm\u0131\u015f olmal\u0131 ve tuzluluk ve yo\u011funluk bak\u0131m\u0131ndan ayn\u0131 veya en az\u0131ndan benzer \u00f6zellikte olmal\u0131yd\u0131. Aksine, iki denizin birbirine en yak\u0131n olan yerlerinde bile, her su k\u00fctlesi \u00f6z varl\u0131\u011f\u0131n\u0131 korudu. Ba\u015fka bir deyi\u015fle, iki denizin bulu\u015ftu\u011fu noktada bir perde su, iki denize ait sular\u0131n kar\u0131\u015fmas\u0131n\u0131 engelledi.\u201d\n\u0130ki denizin bulu\u015ftu\u011fu ancak kar\u0131\u015fmad\u0131\u011f\u0131 yer\n\u0130ki denizin birbirine kar\u0131\u015fmamas\u0131n\u0131n bir ba\u015fka ispat\u0131 da y\u00fczey gerilimidir. Denizlerin farkl\u0131 yo\u011funluklara sahip olmas\u0131ndan kaynaklanan y\u00fczey gerilimi, bir duvar gibi sular\u0131n\u0131n birbirine kar\u0131\u015fmas\u0131n\u0131 engeller. Y\u00fczey gerilimi, fizikokimyada bir s\u0131v\u0131n\u0131n y\u00fczey katman\u0131n\u0131n esnek bir tabakaya benzer \u00f6zellikler g\u00f6stermesinden kaynaklanan etkiye verilen add\u0131r. Bu etki baz\u0131 b\u00f6ceklerin su \u00fczerinde y\u00fcr\u00fcmesine olanak verir. Bir gazla bir s\u0131v\u0131n\u0131n ya da birbirleriyle kar\u0131\u015fmayan iki s\u0131v\u0131n\u0131n temas y\u00fczeyleri gerilmi\u015f esnek bir zara benzer.\nA\u011f\u0131rl\u0131kl\u0131 olarak;\nKimyasal ve mineral bile\u015fimi nedeniyle iki okyanusun sular\u0131 birbirine kar\u0131\u015fmaz.\nYo\u011funluk fark\u0131 da bunun bir sebebidir. Yo\u011funluk fark\u0131 farkl\u0131 tuzluluk ve s\u0131cakl\u0131klar\u0131n bir fonksiyonudur.\nAk\u0131mlar\u0131n y\u00f6n\u00fc sular\u0131n birbirine kar\u0131\u015fmas\u0131n\u0131n daha da zor hale gelmesine sebep olur.\nokyanus ak\u0131nt\u0131lar\u0131\nD\u00fcnyan\u0131n bir\u00e7ok yerinde, iki su k\u00fctlesinin birbirine kar\u0131\u015fmamas\u0131 olay\u0131 g\u00f6r\u00fclmektedir. A\u015fa\u011f\u0131da yer alan baz\u0131 g\u00f6rsellerle bu iddia desteklenmektedir.\nRio Negro\u2019nun ve Amazon Nehri\u2019nin Brezilya\u2019da y\u00fcz y\u00fcze gelmesi\nLytton\u2019daki Thompson ve Fraser nehirlerinin birle\u015fmesi, Kanada\nKoblenz\u2019deki Mosel ve Ren nehirlerinin birle\u015fmesi, Almanya\nCanyonlands Ulusal Park\u0131, ABD\nDenizlerin kar\u0131\u015fmamas\u0131 hadisesiyle ilgili Kuran\u2019da Hz. Muhammed\u2019e \u015fu ayetler bildirilmi\u015ftir:\n* O, birbirine kavu\u015fmak \u00fczere iki denizi sal\u0131verdi. (Ama) aralar\u0131nda bir engel vard\u0131r; birbirlerine kar\u0131\u015fmazlar. Art\u0131k rabbinizin nimetlerinden hangisini ink\u00e2r edebilirsiniz? (Rahman Suresi / 19,20,21)\n* Birinin suyu tatl\u0131 ve kolay i\u00e7imli, di\u011ferininki tuzlu ve ac\u0131 olan iki denizi sal\u0131verip aralar\u0131na da, kar\u0131\u015fmalar\u0131na engel olan bir s\u0131n\u0131r koyan Allah\u2019t\u0131r. (Furkan Suresi / 53)\n* \u015eu iki \u00e7e\u015fit su k\u00fctlesi birbirine e\u015fit olmaz; birisi tatl\u0131d\u0131r, susuzlu\u011fu giderir ve i\u00e7imi g\u00fczeldir, \u00f6tekisi ise tuzlu ve ac\u0131d\u0131r. \u0130kisinden de taze et yersiniz ve tak\u0131naca\u011f\u0131n\u0131z s\u00fcs e\u015fyalar\u0131 \u00e7\u0131kar\u0131rs\u0131n\u0131z. Gemilerin denizi yararak gittiklerini g\u00f6r\u00fcrs\u00fcn ki bu da O\u2019nun lutfuna n\u00e2il olman\u0131z ve O\u2019na \u015f\u00fckretmeniz i\u00e7indir. (Fat\u0131r Suresi / 12)\n* Peki yery\u00fcz\u00fcn\u00fc yerle\u015fmeye elveri\u015fli k\u0131lan, vadilerinden nehirler ak\u0131tan, yerde sars\u0131lmaz da\u011flar yaratan, iki deniz aras\u0131na engel koyan kim? Allah\u2019tan ba\u015fka bir tanr\u0131 m\u0131? Do\u011frusu onlar\u0131n \u00e7o\u011fu ger\u00e7e\u011fi bilmiyorlar. (Neml Suresi / 61)\nKAYNAKLAR: mehranbanaei  divediscover  whoi   answi  earth.nullschool   merklisite    youtube  ne-dir.org\nVideo oynat\u0131c\u0131\nhttps://dogrula.org/wp-content/uploads/2018/02/dogrula.org_.mp4\n00:00\n00:07\n[Toplam:23    Ortalama:3.9/5] \u0130ki Denizin Birbirine Kar\u0131\u015fmad\u0131\u011f\u0131 \u0130ddias\u0131", "Kar tanelerinin birbirine benzemedi\u011fi iddias\u0131n\u0131, uzun zamand\u0131r bir yerlerden s\u00fcrekli duymaktay\u0131z. \u00d6yle ki, bunun bir \u015fehir efsanesi oldu\u011funu bile d\u00fc\u015f\u00fcnm\u00fc\u015f olabiliriz.\nKar taneleri \u00fczerinde bir\u00e7ok farkl\u0131 ara\u015ft\u0131rmalar yap\u0131lm\u0131\u015f ve kar tanelerinin birbirinin ayn\u0131s\u0131 olma ihtimalinin olmad\u0131\u011f\u0131 ya da bu ihtimalin \u00e7ok d\u00fc\u015f\u00fck oldu\u011fu sonucuna ula\u015f\u0131lm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r. Nitekim bu iddia do\u011frudur.\nKar Taneleri Nas\u0131l Olu\u015fur?\nBir kar tanesi, \u00fc\u00e7 temel bile\u015feni olan buz kristali, su buhar\u0131 ve toz par\u00e7ac\u0131klar\u0131ndan olu\u015fmaktad\u0131r. Buz kristalleri, mikroskobik toz par\u00e7ac\u0131klar\u0131 \u00fczerinde olu\u015fan su buhar\u0131n\u0131n donmas\u0131yla ger\u00e7ekle\u015fir. Toz par\u00e7ac\u0131klar\u0131, polen, volkanik k\u00fcl, hatta g\u00f6k ta\u015f\u0131 gibi meteorlar da dahil olmak \u00fczere bir\u00e7ok farkl\u0131 yerlerden gelebilir.\nKar taneleri, su damlac\u0131klar\u0131 ve buz kristallerinin oldu\u011fu \u00e7ok so\u011fuk bulutlarda olu\u015fur. Bu damlac\u0131klar kendilerini buz kristallerine ba\u011flarken donarlar ve daha da b\u00fcy\u00fcyerek b\u00fcy\u00fck bir buz kristali olu\u015ftururlar. B\u00f6ylelikle birka\u00e7 tane buz kristali bir araya gelerek bir kar tanesi olu\u015fturan kar kristalleri genellikle alt\u0131gen \u015feklinde b\u00fcy\u00fcrler.\nAyn\u0131 bulut \u00fczerinde bir\u00e7ok kar tanesi olu\u015fabilmesine ra\u011fmen, molek\u00fcler yap\u0131lar\u0131 veya yery\u00fcz\u00fcne inerken yapt\u0131klar\u0131 yolculuklar \u015fekil ve boyutlar\u0131n\u0131 etkilemektedir.\nKar Taneleri Birbirine Benzemez Mi?\nPenn State\u2018deki meteoroloji do\u00e7entli\u011fi yapm\u0131\u015f olan Hans Verlinde, her kar tanesinin benzersiz oldu\u011funu ve hepsini g\u00f6zlemleyemedi\u011fimiz i\u00e7in bunu kesin olarak bilemeyece\u011fimizi s\u00f6ylemi\u015ftir. Ancak ard\u0131ndan \u015funu eklemi\u015ftir:\n\u201c\u0130ki e\u015fde\u011fer veya benzer buz kristali bulma ihtimalini ele alabiliriz, ki bu da \u00e7ok k\u00fc\u00e7\u00fck bir ihtimal. Kristaller ne kadar b\u00fcy\u00fck olursa ve farkl\u0131 b\u00fcy\u00fcme yollar\u0131 i\u00e7in \u00f6zg\u00fcrl\u00fck ne kadar b\u00fcy\u00fck olursa ve \u00f6zde\u015f kristallerin makroskopik g\u00f6rsel d\u00fczeyde bile bulunma ihtimali o kadar d\u00fc\u015f\u00fck olur.\u201d \nKaliforniya Teknoloji Enstit\u00fcs\u00fc\u2018nde fizik profes\u00f6r\u00fc olan ve kar kristalleri \u00fczerinde ara\u015ft\u0131rmalar yapan Kenneth Libbrecht, so\u011fuk b\u00f6lgelere giderek kar tanelerinin mikroskobik g\u00f6r\u00fcnt\u00fclerini inceliyor ve elde etti\u011fi g\u00f6r\u00fcnt\u00fcleri referans alarak kendi laboratuvar\u0131nda buz kristallerini olu\u015fturuyor.\nLibbrecht\u2019e g\u00f6re, karma\u015f\u0131k bir kar kristali yak\u0131ndan incelendi\u011finde, kristallerin y\u00fczlerce ayr\u0131 \u00f6zelli\u011fi oldu\u011fu g\u00f6r\u00fclebilir. Ayr\u0131ca, kar kristallerinin b\u00fcy\u00fck \u00e7o\u011funlu\u011funun simetrik olmad\u0131\u011f\u0131n\u0131 belirtmi\u015ftir. Libbrecht, evrenin t\u00fcm zamanlar\u0131nda ya\u011fan karlar\u0131 kurcalasan\u0131z da birbirinin ayn\u0131s\u0131 olan kar tanelerine rastlama ihtimaliniz dahi olmad\u0131\u011f\u0131n\u0131 s\u00f6ylemektedir.\nDo\u011fruluk Y\u00fczdesi\nKaynaklar: PennState, snowcrystals, Pbs, its.caltech.edu, tubitak\n[Toplam:3    Ortalama:5/5] Kar Tanelerinin Birbirine Benzemedi\u011fi \u0130ddias\u0131", " Drone Nedir? Nerelerde Kullan\u0131l\u0131r?", "\u201cPisagor, \u00f6\u011frencisini \u00f6ld\u00fcrd\u00fc\u201d, \u201cPisagor, Hippasus\u2019u \u00f6ld\u00fcrd\u00fc\u201d iddialar\u0131 ile uzun denilebilecek bir s\u00fcredir \u0130nternet\u2019te kar\u015f\u0131la\u015fmak m\u00fcmk\u00fcn. Baz\u0131 payla\u015f\u0131mlarda Pisagor\u2019un Hippasus\u2019u \u00f6ld\u00fcrd\u00fc\u011f\u00fc, baz\u0131lar\u0131nda ise Hippasus\u2019u \u00f6ld\u00fcrtt\u00fc\u011f\u00fc iddia edilmektedir. \u0130ddia ile ilgili farkl\u0131 senaryolar s\u00f6z konusu olsa da, Hippasus\u2019un \u00f6l\u00fcm\u00fcn\u00fcn Pisagor\u2019la ba\u011flant\u0131l\u0131 oldu\u011fu iddias\u0131 do\u011frudur.\nPisagor\u2019un Kurallar\u0131n\u0131 Bozan Hippasus\nG\u00fcn\u00fcm\u00fczde irrasyonel say\u0131lar\u0131n varl\u0131\u011f\u0131yla ilgili kimin buldu\u011fu sorusu soruldu\u011funda, antik Yunan matematik\u00e7i Pisagor\u2018un okuluna at\u0131f yap\u0131lmaktad\u0131r. Ancak irrasyonel say\u0131lar\u0131 ke\u015ffeden asl\u0131nda Pisagor\u2019un \u00f6\u011frencilerinden biri olan Hippasus\u2018tur. Peki Hippasus bunu nas\u0131l bulmu\u015ftur? K\u0131sa kenar\u0131n\u0131n uzunlu\u011fu 1 olan bir ikizkenar dik \u00fc\u00e7gen d\u00fc\u015f\u00fcn\u00fcn. Bu \u00fc\u00e7genin uzun kenar\u0131 2\u2019nin karek\u00f6k\u00fc olmaktad\u0131r. 2\u2019nin karek\u00f6k\u00fc ise hi\u00e7bir iki do\u011fal say\u0131n\u0131n b\u00f6l\u00fcm\u00fcne e\u015fit de\u011fildir. \u0130\u015fte bu \u00e7\u00f6z\u00fcmlemeyle Hippasus, Pisagor\u2019un do\u011fal say\u0131lardan ba\u015fka say\u0131lar\u0131 kabul etmemesine kar\u015f\u0131 bir ispatta bulunmu\u015ftur. Yani Pisagor\u2019un iddia etti\u011fi gibi her \u015fey do\u011fal say\u0131 de\u011fildir, do\u011fal say\u0131larla elde edilemeyen say\u0131lar da vard\u0131r.\n\u0130\u015fte bundan sonraki olaylar\u0131n nas\u0131l geli\u015fti\u011fiyle ilgili, Hippasus\u2018un bo\u011fularak \u00f6lmesi d\u0131\u015f\u0131nda kesin bir bilgi yoktur. Ancak konuya dair bir\u00e7ok farkl\u0131 s\u00f6ylenti mevcuttur. Bir s\u00f6ylentiye g\u00f6re; say\u0131lara mutlak bir inan\u00e7la ba\u011fl\u0131 olan Pisagor\u2019un takip\u00e7ilerinden birisi olan Metanpontumlu Hippasus, dik kenarlar\u0131 1 birim olan bir dik \u00fc\u00e7genin hipoten\u00fcs uzunlu\u011funun rasyonel bir say\u0131 olmad\u0131\u011f\u0131n\u0131 kan\u0131tlay\u0131nca, yani s\u00f6z konusu \u00fc\u00e7gende hipoten\u00fcs uzunlu\u011funun 2\u2019nin karek\u00f6k\u00fc oldu\u011funu bulunca, durumu kabullenemeyen Pisagor, Hippasus\u2019un kan\u0131tlar\u0131n\u0131n aksini g\u00f6sterememi\u015f ve a\u00e7\u0131k denizde Hippasus\u2019u bir tekneden suya att\u0131rm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r.\nBir di\u011fer rivayete g\u00f6re, Hippasus\u2018un irrasyonel say\u0131lar\u0131n varl\u0131\u011f\u0131n\u0131 ispat\u0131ndan sonra Pisagor, bu say\u0131lar\u0131n evrenin d\u00fczenine ayk\u0131r\u0131 oldu\u011funu d\u00fc\u015f\u00fcnm\u00fc\u015f ve \u00f6\u011frencilerine bu say\u0131lar\u0131n varl\u0131\u011f\u0131n\u0131 a\u00e7\u0131klamay\u0131 yasaklam\u0131\u015ft\u0131r. Rivayete g\u00f6re daha sonradan insanlar\u0131n merakla sorula sormas\u0131 \u00fczerine, Hippasus\u2019un varl\u0131\u011f\u0131na katlanamam\u0131\u015f ve tekneden bizzat kendisi itekleyerek, \u00f6ld\u00fcrm\u00fc\u015ft\u00fcr.\nDi\u011fer bir s\u00f6ylentiye g\u00f6re ise, bir deniz yolculu\u011funda irrasyonel say\u0131lar\u0131n varl\u0131\u011f\u0131yla ilgili yasa\u011fa dair sorunlar\u0131n\u0131 dile getiren Hippasus, yan\u0131ndaki Pisagorcu arkada\u015flar\u0131 taraf\u0131ndan ba\u015fkalar\u0131 duymas\u0131n diye tekneden at\u0131lm\u0131\u015f ve \u00f6ld\u00fcr\u00fclm\u00fc\u015ft\u00fcr.\nAralar\u0131ndan en \u00e7ok kabul g\u00f6ren ba\u015fka bir s\u00f6ylentiye g\u00f6re ise, Hippasus\u2018un ispatlad\u0131\u011f\u0131 irrasyonel say\u0131lar, do\u011fan\u0131n ve kutsallar\u0131n d\u00fczenine ayk\u0131r\u0131 kabul edilmekteydi. \u00c7\u00fcnk\u00fc Pisagor\u2019a g\u00f6re normalin d\u0131\u015f\u0131nda olan bir say\u0131 t\u00fcr\u00fc \u00e7\u00f6z\u00fcmlenmi\u015fti. Baz\u0131lar\u0131 ise bu durumu \u015f\u00f6yle yorumluyordu; Hippasus, bilmesi gerekenden fazlas\u0131n\u0131 ara\u015ft\u0131r\u0131yor ve bu Tanr\u0131lar\u0131 k\u0131zd\u0131rabilir. Bu y\u00fczden rivayete g\u00f6re, Hippasus\u2019un f\u0131rt\u0131nal\u0131 bir g\u00fcnde kutsala ayk\u0131r\u0131l\u0131k etti\u011fi i\u00e7in, Tanr\u0131lar taraf\u0131ndan cezaland\u0131r\u0131ld\u0131\u011f\u0131 ve dengesini kaybederek denize d\u00fc\u015ft\u00fc\u011f\u00fc kabul edilmektedir.\nBaz\u0131 kaynaklara g\u00f6re ise Hippasus ve Pisagor, siyasi konularda anla\u015famam\u0131\u015ft\u0131r ve Hippasus\u2019un \u00f6l\u00fcm\u00fcne sebep olan \u015fey, irrasyonel say\u0131y\u0131 ispat etmesi de\u011fil, Pisagor ile aralar\u0131nda sorun haline gelen siyasi uyu\u015fmazl\u0131klard\u0131r.\nT\u00fcm bu s\u00f6ylentiler sadece halk aras\u0131nda konu\u015fulmam\u0131\u015ft\u0131r. Baz\u0131 kaynaklarda Hippasus\u2018tan, \u201cPappus\u201d olarak bahsedilmi\u015f, baz\u0131lar\u0131nda da tarih\u00e7i yazarlar taraf\u0131ndan hi\u00e7 isim belirtilmemi\u015ftir. Ancak kaynaklarda yer alan detaylardan dolay\u0131 Hippasus\u2019tan bahsedildi\u011fi anla\u015f\u0131lmaktad\u0131r. Hepsinin detaylar\u0131 ve i\u015fleyi\u015fi farkl\u0131 olmas\u0131na ra\u011fmen, ortak bir noktalar\u0131 vard\u0131r: Hippasus denizde bo\u011fularak \u00f6lm\u00fc\u015ft\u00fcr ve \u00f6l\u00fcm\u00fcnde de Pisagor do\u011frudan veya dolayl\u0131 olarak etkili olmu\u015ftur.\nDo\u011fruluk Y\u00fczdesi\nKaynaklar:\nThe life of Pythagoras, matematiksel, wilbourhall, theoi, wikizero, esoterx, hippasus.wordpress, reddit, ne-dir.org\n[Toplam:6    Ortalama:3.2/5] Pisagor, \u00d6\u011frencisini \u00d6ld\u00fcrd\u00fc \u0130ddias\u0131", "Londra\u2019n\u0131n y\u00fczde 40\u2019\u0131n\u0131n ye\u015fil alan olmas\u0131yla ilgili \u00e7e\u015fitli ara\u015ft\u0131rmalar yap\u0131ld\u0131\u011f\u0131 \u00f6ne s\u00fcr\u00fclm\u00fc\u015f ve konuyla ilgili baz\u0131 haber ve blog siteleri taraf\u0131ndan haberler yay\u0131nlanm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r. Londra\u2019yla ilgili bir ba\u015fka iddia ise, yine ye\u015fil alan\u0131n \u015fehrin y\u00fczde 47\u2019sini olu\u015fturdu\u011fu iddias\u0131d\u0131r.\nBu iddialar tam olarak do\u011fru de\u011filse de do\u011fruya yak\u0131nd\u0131r. Londra\u2019n\u0131n resmi sitelerinde yay\u0131nlanan raporlara g\u00f6re, ye\u015fil alan y\u00fczdesi 47 veya 40\u2019a hen\u00fcz ula\u015fmam\u0131\u015ft\u0131r. \nLondra\u2019n\u0131n Ye\u015fil Alan Y\u00fczdesi Ka\u00e7?\nLondra\u2019daki kamusal ye\u015fil alan oran\u0131, 2015 y\u0131l\u0131 i\u00e7in B\u00fcy\u00fck Londra Ye\u015fil Alan Bilgileri (GIGL) taraf\u0131ndan yap\u0131lan ara\u015ft\u0131rmaya g\u00f6re y\u00fczde 33\u2018t\u00fcr.\nAncak kamusal ye\u015fil alan d\u0131\u015f\u0131nda, ki\u015fisel m\u00fclklerin bah\u00e7eleri, sivil alanlar, \u015fehir \u00e7iftlikleri, a\u00e7\u0131k spor tesisleri, mezarl\u0131klar ve di\u011fer ye\u015fil alanlar da say\u0131ld\u0131\u011f\u0131nda \u015fehir i\u00e7indeki oran y\u00fczde 38.96 olmaktad\u0131r:\nAyr\u0131ca resmi Londra Veri Deposu taraf\u0131ndan da \u015fehir i\u00e7i ye\u015fil alan oran\u0131 ayn\u0131 y\u0131l i\u00e7in %38,3 olarak yay\u0131nlanm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r. Yap\u0131lan ye\u015fil alan ara\u015ft\u0131rmalar\u0131nda, bir\u00e7ok parametre kullan\u0131lm\u0131\u015f ve yak\u0131n sonuca ula\u015f\u0131lm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r.\nS\u00f6z konusu iddian\u0131n y\u00fczde 47 veya y\u00fczde 40 olmad\u0131\u011f\u0131 net bir \u015fekilde g\u00f6r\u00fclse de, sonu\u00e7lar asl\u0131nda %40\u2018a yak\u0131nd\u0131r. Do\u011fal ye\u015fil alan bak\u0131m\u0131ndan d\u00fcnyan\u0131n \u00f6nde gelen \u015fehirlerinden olan Londra, ye\u015fil alan muhafaza etme ve geli\u015ftirme konusunda bir \u00f6rnek te\u015fkil etmektedir.\nLondra ye\u015fil alan haritas\u0131, Ulusal Ar\u015fiv, \u0130ngiltere\nYe\u015fil alan bak\u0131m\u0131ndan d\u00fcnyan\u0131n en iyi \u015fehirleri Moskova, Hong Kong, Shenzen, Sidney ve Viyana olsa da Londra da bu konuda ba\u015far\u0131l\u0131 \u015fehirlerdendir. Londra\u2019n\u0131n \u00fclke i\u00e7indeki ye\u015fil alan verilerine g\u00f6z atacak olursak;\nBirle\u015fik Krall\u0131k\u2018ta ye\u015fil alan \u00f6d\u00fcllendirmesi ve tan\u0131t\u0131m\u0131 \u00e7er\u00e7evesinde \u00e7al\u0131\u015fmalar yapan Green Flag Award (Ye\u015fil Bayrak \u00d6d\u00fcl\u00fc), \u0130ngiltere\u2019nin \u015fehirlerini \u00f6d\u00fcllendirmi\u015ftir. 2010 verilerine g\u00f6re Londra\u2019n\u0131n \u00f6d\u00fcl say\u0131s\u0131 14\u2019t\u00fcr. \nLondra\u2019da kullan\u0131m s\u0131kl\u0131\u011f\u0131na g\u00f6re kamusal ye\u015fil alan ve parklar\u0131n y\u00fczdeleri ise g\u00fcnl\u00fck, haftal\u0131k, ayl\u0131k olarak s\u0131n\u0131fland\u0131r\u0131lm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r. A\u015fa\u011f\u0131daki tabloya bak\u0131ld\u0131\u011f\u0131nda parklar\u0131 ve ye\u015fil alanlar\u0131 g\u00fcnl\u00fck ya da ayl\u0131k kullananlar\u0131n yan\u0131 s\u0131ra haftal\u0131k kullananlar\u0131n say\u0131s\u0131 en fazlad\u0131r.\nLondra\u2019n\u0131n ye\u015fil alanlar\u0131ndan birka\u00e7 kare:\nDo\u011fruluk Y\u00fczdesi\nKaynaklar: GIGL, London Datastore, World Cities Culture Forum, Office of the Deputy Prime Minister, Independent, Londra Meclisi, Ulusal Ar\u015fiv\n[Toplam:2    Ortalama:5/5] Londra\u2019n\u0131n Y\u00fczde 40\u2019\u0131n\u0131n Ye\u015fil Oldu\u011fu \u0130ddias\u0131", "400 y\u0131l dayanan batarya \u00fcretildi iddias\u0131, bilim d\u00fcnyas\u0131 i\u00e7in b\u00fcy\u00fck heyecana neden olmu\u015ftu. California Irvine \u00dcniversitesi\u2019nde (UCI) doktora e\u011fitimi alan gen\u00e7 \u00f6\u011frenci Mya Le Thai\u2019nin, tesad\u00fcfen 400 y\u0131l dayanan batarya \u00fcretti\u011fi iddias\u0131 do\u011fru.\nCalifornia Irvine \u00dcniversitesi\u2018ndeki doktora \u00f6\u011frencisinin \u00fcretti\u011fi \u015farj edilebilir pillerin birka\u00e7 y\u00fczy\u0131l boyunca dayanma ihtimali var. Bu, daha uzun \u00f6m\u00fcrl\u00fc diz\u00fcst\u00fc bilgisayarlar ve ak\u0131ll\u0131 telefonlar ve daha az lityum-iyon pilin depolama alanlar\u0131nda y\u0131\u011f\u0131lmas\u0131 anlam\u0131na geliyor.\nBa\u015fka bir deyi\u015fle, bo\u015falan bir pilin 500\u2019\u00fcnc\u00fc dolumundan sonra bataryan\u0131n \u00f6mr\u00fc biter ve yeni bir batarya almak gerekir. S\u00f6z konusu icat, 400 y\u0131l boyunca kullan\u0131lacak bir pil de\u011fil, d\u00f6ng\u00fcy\u00fc artt\u0131rmaya y\u00f6nelik bir bulu\u015ftur. Birka\u00e7 y\u00fcz \u015farj d\u00f6ng\u00fcs\u00fc 2 y\u0131l kullan\u0131ma tekab\u00fcl ederken, 400 y\u0131la kadar dayanabilecek d\u00f6ng\u00fcye sahip pil \u00fcretimi ba\u015far\u0131yla sonu\u00e7lanm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r.\nMya Le Thai, manganez ve pleksi benzeri elektrolit jel ve alt\u0131n nanotel kaplamas\u0131 (genellikle \u00e7ok fazla \u015farjdan sonra par\u00e7alan\u0131r) ile deney yapt\u0131 ve pili 30.000 kez d\u00f6n\u00fc\u015ft\u00fcr\u00fclebildi. \u015e\u00f6yle ki, bir diz\u00fcst\u00fc bilgisayar bataryas\u0131 sadece 300-500 \u015farj d\u00f6ng\u00fcs\u00fc kapasitesine sahiptir.\nCalifornia Irvine \u00dcniversitesi\u2019ndeki ara\u015ft\u0131rma ekibi, bataryalardaki potansiyel kullan\u0131m i\u00e7in nanoteller denedi, ancak \u00e7ok fazla \u015farj d\u00f6ng\u00fcs\u00fcnden sonra zamanla ince, k\u0131r\u0131lgan tellerin \u00e7atlam\u0131\u015f oldu\u011funu ve par\u00e7aland\u0131\u011f\u0131n\u0131 farketti. Bir \u015farj d\u00f6ng\u00fcs\u00fc, bir pil tamamen dolu haldeyken tamamen bo\u015f hale gelmesi ve tekrar tam olarak dolmas\u0131d\u0131r.\nDoktora \u00f6\u011frencisi Mya Le Thai\nOrtalama laptop bataryas\u0131 300 ila 500 \u015farj d\u00f6ng\u00fcs\u00fcne sahip oldu\u011fu i\u00e7in Thailand\u2019l\u0131 \u00f6\u011frencinin bulu\u015fu ak\u0131l almaz olarak adland\u0131r\u0131l\u0131yor. \u00dcniversitede geli\u015ftirilen s\u00f6z konusu nanobataryan\u0131n \u00fc\u00e7 ayda 200.000 devirden ge\u00e7ti\u011fi s\u00f6ylendi. Bu da ortalama bir diz\u00fcst\u00fc bilgisayar\u0131n batarya \u00f6mr\u00fcn\u00fc yakla\u015f\u0131k 400 y\u0131l uzat\u0131r. \u00dcniversitenin kimya departman\u0131 ba\u015fkan\u0131 Reginald Penner, \u201cB\u00fcy\u00fck resime bakt\u0131\u011f\u0131m\u0131zda, inceledi\u011fimiz nanotelleri dengelemek \u00e7ok basit bir yol olabilecek. E\u011fer bu genel olarak do\u011fru \u00e7\u0131karsa, toplum i\u00e7in b\u00fcy\u00fck bir geli\u015fme olur.\u201d a\u00e7\u0131klamas\u0131nda bulundu.\nDoktora \u00f6\u011frencisi Thai ise, \u201cBu ara\u015ft\u0131rma bir nanotel temelli pil elektrotunun uzun \u00f6m\u00fcrl\u00fc olabilece\u011fini ve bu t\u00fcr pillerin ger\u00e7ek olmas\u0131n\u0131 sa\u011flayaca\u011f\u0131m\u0131z\u0131 kan\u0131tl\u0131yor.\u201d dedi.\nKe\u015fif, deney a\u015famas\u0131nda olsa da, batarya d\u00fcnyas\u0131 i\u00e7in olduk\u00e7a m\u00fcthi\u015f bir geli\u015fme.\nAra\u015ft\u0131rmac\u0131lar, bu bataryan\u0131n \u00fcretilmesi i\u00e7in gerekli olan alt\u0131n nanotelin fiyatlar\u0131 artt\u0131raca\u011f\u0131n\u0131 biliyor, bu nedenle, nikelin seri \u00fcretimin yerini alabilece\u011fini \u00f6neriyor. Alt\u0131n nanotel pilleri b\u00fcy\u00fck olas\u0131l\u0131kla pahal\u0131 olaca\u011f\u0131ndan, UCI ara\u015ft\u0131rmac\u0131lar\u0131 benzer sonu\u00e7lar\u0131n nikel ile kaplanm\u0131\u015f nanotelleri kullanarak elde edilebilece\u011fine inan\u0131yor. Her iki durumda da sonu\u00e7lar umut verici.\nNe yaz\u0131k ki, nano batarya hala geli\u015fim a\u015famas\u0131nda, yani muhtemelen ticari pazara ula\u015fabilmesi i\u00e7in olduk\u00e7a uzun bir yol var.\nDo\u011fruluk Y\u00fczdesi\nKAYNAKLAR\nforbes     money.good.is    mnn      recorbatteries      ne-dir.org\n[Toplam:2    Ortalama:5/5] 400 Y\u0131l Dayanan Batarya \u00dcretildi \u0130ddias\u0131", " \u0130ngiliz Cerrah\u0131n Karaci\u011fere \u0130sim Yazd\u0131\u011f\u0131 \u0130ddias\u0131", "T\u00fcrkiye\u2018den 911\u2018i aray\u0131nca 112\u2018ye y\u00f6nlendirme yap\u0131ld\u0131\u011f\u0131 iddias\u0131 son birka\u00e7 y\u0131ld\u0131r konu\u015fulmaktad\u0131r. Ayr\u0131ca zaman zaman g\u00fcndeme gelen bu iddia dolay\u0131s\u0131yla insanlar, acil numara servisi olan bu hatlar\u0131 aray\u0131p, me\u015fgul etmektedir. 911\u2019i aray\u0131nca 112\u2019ye y\u00f6nlendirme yap\u0131ld\u0131\u011f\u0131 iddias\u0131 do\u011frudur.\n911 Nedir?\n911, Kuzey Amerika i\u00e7in ge\u00e7erli olan acil durum telefon numaras\u0131d\u0131r. ABD\u2019de \u00f6zel hizmetler i\u00e7in belirlenen 3 haneli N11 kodlar\u0131 denilen bir sistem mevcuttur ve bu sistem FCC (Federal \u0130leti\u015fim Kurulu) taraf\u0131ndan y\u00f6netilmektedir. ABD\u2019de bu sisteme g\u00f6re belirlenmi\u015f olan 911 hatt\u0131, sadece acil durumlarda kullan\u0131lmaktad\u0131r. Di\u011fer hallerde, mesela acil olmayan durumlar ya da telefon \u015fakas\u0131 gibi kullan\u0131mlar i\u00e7in 911 arand\u0131\u011f\u0131nda, bu durum su\u00e7 te\u015fkil edebilir.\nT\u00fcrkiye\u2019de 911 nolu hat aran\u0131ld\u0131\u011f\u0131 zaman, sistem otomatik olarak T\u00fcrkiye i\u00e7in acil durum hatt\u0131 olan 112\u2019ye y\u00f6nlendirme yap\u0131lacak \u015fekilde d\u00fczenlenmi\u015ftir.\n911\u2019i Aray\u0131nca Ne oluyor?\n112 Acil \u00c7a\u011fr\u0131 Merkezi yetkilileriyle yapt\u0131\u011f\u0131m\u0131z g\u00f6r\u00fc\u015fmeler sonucu, T\u00fcrkiye\u2019den 911 acil hatt\u0131 aran\u0131ld\u0131\u011f\u0131 zaman 112\u2019ye y\u00f6nlendirme yap\u0131ld\u0131\u011f\u0131 bilgisini do\u011frulad\u0131k. Ayr\u0131ca T\u00fcrkiye i\u00e7in ge\u00e7erli olan di\u011fer acil durum servislerinin numaralar\u0131 da 112 acil servis hatt\u0131 alt\u0131nda toplanm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r. Bu konuda T.C. \u0130\u00e7i\u015fleri Bakanl\u0131\u011f\u0131 taraf\u0131ndan al\u0131nan kararla, 112 Acil \u00c7a\u011fr\u0131 Merkezinin yapm\u0131\u015f oldu\u011fu a\u00e7\u0131klama \u015fu \u015fekildedir:\n112\u2019yi Me\u015fgul Etmeyin\n112 Acil \u00c7a\u011fr\u0131 hatt\u0131, hayati tehlike olu\u015fturan durum ortaya \u00e7\u0131kt\u0131\u011f\u0131nda aranmas\u0131 gereken \u00fccretsiz olarak hizmet veren hayati derecede \u00f6nemli bir hatt\u0131r. 112 Acil \u00c7a\u011fr\u0131 hatt\u0131 arand\u0131\u011f\u0131nda ad-soyad, kar\u015f\u0131la\u015f\u0131lan sa\u011fl\u0131k sorununun tam olarak ne oldu\u011fu ve adres bilgilerinin a\u00e7\u0131k ve anla\u015f\u0131l\u0131r bir bi\u00e7imde belirtilmesi zaman kayb\u0131n\u0131n ya\u015fanmamas\u0131 i\u00e7in son derece \u00f6nemlidir. Hayati tehlike durumu olmayanlar taraf\u0131ndan me\u015fgul edilmesi nedeniyle ger\u00e7ek sa\u011fl\u0131k yard\u0131m\u0131na ihtiyac\u0131 olan hasta ve vak\u0131alara ula\u015fmada ge\u00e7 kal\u0131nmakta veya ula\u015f\u0131lamamaktad\u0131r.\n2013 y\u0131l\u0131nda 112 Acil \u00c7a\u011fr\u0131 hatt\u0131 toplam 115.456.427 kez aranm\u0131\u015f olup bu \u00e7a\u011fr\u0131lar\u0131n sadece 3.980.464\u2019\u00fc acil durum olarak i\u015flem g\u00f6rm\u00fc\u015f, 111.475.963 \u00e7a\u011fr\u0131 ise as\u0131ls\u0131z ihbar olarak de\u011ferlendirilmi\u015ftir.\n2014 y\u0131l\u0131nda 112 Acil \u00c7a\u011fr\u0131 hatt\u0131 toplam 118.260.579 kez aranm\u0131\u015f olup bu \u00e7a\u011fr\u0131lar\u0131n sadece 4.027.2015\u2019i acil durum olarak i\u015flem g\u00f6rm\u00fc\u015f, 113.866.695 \u00e7a\u011fr\u0131 ise as\u0131ls\u0131z ihbar olarak de\u011ferlendirilmi\u015ftir.\n112 Acil \u00c7a\u011fr\u0131 numaras\u0131 i\u00e7in bu suistimal durumlar\u0131n\u0131n neden oldu\u011fu l\u00fczumsuz aramalar\u0131n oran\u0131 %95\u2019lere kadar \u00e7\u0131kabilmekte, bu da hem hizmetin etkilili\u011fini hem de etkin sunumunu olumsuzla\u015ft\u0131rmaktad\u0131r. 112 Acil \u00c7a\u011fr\u0131 hatt\u0131n\u0131n gereksiz me\u015fgul edilmesinden dolay\u0131 hem zaman hem i\u015f g\u00fcc\u00fc kayb\u0131 ger\u00e7ekle\u015fmekte, bunlardan daha \u00f6nemlisi ger\u00e7ek acil durumlara ula\u015f\u0131m zorla\u015fmaktad\u0131r. Herkesin bir g\u00fcn 112 Acil \u00c7a\u011fr\u0131 Hatt\u0131n\u0131 aramaya ihtiyac\u0131 olabilece\u011fi unutulmamal\u0131d\u0131r.\nYapt\u0131r\u0131mlar\n112 Acil \u00c7a\u011fr\u0131 Merkezinin gereksiz aranmas\u0131 konusu, Kabahatler kanunu ve 112 Acil \u00c7a\u011fr\u0131 Merkezleri Kurulu\u015f, G\u00f6rev ve \u00c7al\u0131\u015fma Y\u00f6netmeli\u011finde d\u00fczenlenmi\u015ftir. Y\u00f6netmeli\u011fin 23. Maddesi f\u0131kra 2\u2019ye g\u00f6re, \u00e7a\u011fr\u0131 merkezini as\u0131ls\u0131z ihbar etti\u011fi anla\u015f\u0131lan ki\u015filere 250 TL idari para cezas\u0131 verilmektedir. Tekrarland\u0131\u011f\u0131 durumda ise bu cezan\u0131n 2 kat\u0131 uygulanmaktad\u0131r.\nDo\u011fruluk Y\u00fczdesi\nKaynaklar:\n112.gov.tr, mevzuat.gov.tr, nationalnanpa.com, wikizero, 112.gov.tr 2, dergipark.gov.tr\n[Toplam:1    Ortalama:5/5] T\u00fcrkiye\u2019den 911\u2019i Aray\u0131nca 112\u2019ye Y\u00f6nlendirildi\u011fi \u0130ddias\u0131", "Angelina Jolie\u2018ye benzemek i\u00e7in 50 defa ameliyat oldu\u011fu iddia edilen 17 ya\u015f\u0131ndaki Sahar Tabar\u2018\u0131n foto\u011fraflar\u0131 haberlerde ve sosyal medyada g\u00fcnlerdir payla\u015f\u0131lmaktad\u0131r. \u0130ranl\u0131 k\u0131zla ilgili sadece Angelina Jolie\u2018ye benzemek i\u00e7in 50 defa estetik operasyon ge\u00e7irdi\u011fi de\u011fil, daha fazlas\u0131 da iddia edilmektedir. Ancak s\u00f6z konusu iddialar do\u011fru de\u011fildir. \nSahar Tabar\u2019\u0131n ger\u00e7ek hali\nTabar\u2019la ilgili ayn\u0131 zamanda \u201c\u00d6l\u00fc Gelin\u201d isimli animasyon filmdeki karaktere de benzemeye \u00e7al\u0131\u015ft\u0131\u011f\u0131 iddia edilmi\u015ftir. Sosyal medyada yer alan yorumlar \u00fczerinden do\u011frulama yapmadan haber yay\u0131n\u0131 ve payla\u015f\u0131mlar yap\u0131ld\u0131\u011f\u0131 i\u00e7in, bir s\u00fcredir yanl\u0131\u015f iddialarla ve negatif yorumlarla kar\u015f\u0131la\u015fan Sahar Tabar, Sputnik\u2019in haberine g\u00f6re RIA muhabiri Anush Dolukhanyan ile r\u00f6portaj yapm\u0131\u015f ve kendisi ile ilgili iddialara cevap vermi\u015ftir.\n\u201cGer\u00e7ek hayatta nas\u0131l g\u00f6r\u00fcn\u00fcyorsun? Instagram\u2019daki foto\u011fraflar ger\u00e7ek mi?\u201d sorusuna, foto\u011fraflar\u0131n ger\u00e7ek olmad\u0131\u011f\u0131, Photoshop ve makyajla o g\u00f6r\u00fcnt\u00fcye ula\u015ft\u0131\u011f\u0131 cevab\u0131n\u0131 veren Sahar Tabar, her foto\u011fraf yay\u0131nlad\u0131\u011f\u0131nda y\u00fcz\u00fcn\u00fc daha da komik, e\u011flenceli hale getirdi\u011fini ifade etmi\u015ftir. Takip\u00e7ilerinin ger\u00e7ek y\u00fcz\u00fcn\u00fcn o \u015fekilde olmad\u0131\u011f\u0131n\u0131 bildi\u011fini s\u00f6ylemi\u015ftir. Bir\u00e7ok insan\u0131n d\u00fc\u015f\u00fcnd\u00fc\u011f\u00fcn\u00fcn aksine asl\u0131nda Angelina Jolie\u2018ye ya da \u201c\u00d6l\u00fc Gelin\u201ce benzemek gibi bir y\u00f6neliminin de olmad\u0131\u011f\u0131n\u0131 belirten Tabar, \u201cBenzerliklerimiz oldu\u011funu kabul ediyorum ama ben kimse gibi g\u00f6r\u00fcnmek istemedim. Amac\u0131m bu de\u011fildi.\u201d demi\u015ftir.\nBu zamana kadar ka\u00e7 defa estetik operasyon ge\u00e7irdi\u011fi soruldu\u011funda ise, rinoplasti, dudak botoksu, liposuction operasyonlar\u0131 ge\u00e7irdi\u011fini ve bunda bir k\u00f6t\u00fcl\u00fck g\u00f6rmedi\u011fini, bir\u00e7ok insan\u0131n benzer operasyonlar yapt\u0131rd\u0131\u011f\u0131n\u0131 ifade etmi\u015ftir. \u0130ranl\u0131 Sahar Tabar, Tahran\u2019da bir estetik operasyonun ortalama 10 milyon Riyal (T\u00fcrk Liras\u0131yla yakla\u015f\u0131k 1000 TL) oldu\u011funu da ifade etmi\u015ftir.\nSahar Tabar\u2019\u0131n, sosyal medyada viral olan g\u00f6r\u00fcnt\u00fcleri \u00fczerine 49 kiloya d\u00fc\u015fmek i\u00e7in diyet yapt\u0131\u011f\u0131 s\u00f6ylentileri de ortaya \u00e7\u0131km\u0131\u015ft\u0131. Kilo vermek i\u00e7in diyet yapt\u0131\u011f\u0131n\u0131n do\u011fru oldu\u011funu s\u00f6yleyen Sahar Tabar, sadece 5-7 kilo verdi\u011fini ve mevcut kilosunun 54 kg oldu\u011funu s\u00f6ylemi\u015ftir.\nAilesinin plastik cerrahiye s\u0131cak bakmamas\u0131 sebebiyle, ba\u015flang\u0131\u00e7ta Sahar\u2019\u0131n operasyon yapt\u0131rmamas\u0131 i\u00e7in \u00e7ok direndiklerini ancak \u015fimdi tamamen destek olduklar\u0131n\u0131 belirten Sahar Tabar, kendisi i\u00e7in de en \u00f6nemli \u015feyin ailesinin deste\u011fi oldu\u011funu s\u00f6ylemi\u015ftir.\n\u0130nsanlar sokakta beni g\u00f6rd\u00fc\u011f\u00fcnde normal tepkiler veriyorlar. Beni tan\u0131yorlar, sesleniyorlar, konu\u015fuyoruz, sar\u0131l\u0131yoruz. Hi\u00e7bir olumsuzluk hissetmedim, beni destekliyorlar.\nSon olarak Sahar Tabar\u2019a, \u201cSon birka\u00e7 hafta i\u00e7inde internette seninle alakal\u0131 \u00e7ok say\u0131da olumsuz yorumlar yap\u0131lmakta, bu seni \u00fcz\u00fcyor mu?\u201d sorusu sorulmu\u015ftur. Bu soruya \u201cBenim i\u00e7in en \u00f6nemli \u015fey, ailem ve Allah taraf\u0131ndan kabul g\u00f6rmek ve bunlara da sahibim. D\u00fcnya\u2019n\u0131n geri kalan\u0131n\u0131n d\u00fc\u015f\u00fcnceleri \u00f6nemli de\u011fil, onlar\u0131n olumsuzlu\u011funu g\u00f6rmezden geliyorum\u201d \u015feklinde cevap vermi\u015ftir.\nKendi Instagram hesab\u0131ndan payla\u015ft\u0131\u011f\u0131 bir yaz\u0131da da benzer a\u00e7\u0131klamalarda bulunan Sahar Tabar, 50 defa ameliyat ge\u00e7irmedi\u011fini ve yabanc\u0131 medyan\u0131n \u00f6nyarg\u0131l\u0131 bir tav\u0131rla haber yapt\u0131\u011f\u0131n\u0131 ifade etmi\u015ftir. \u201cBunu yapanlar\u0131n 18. y\u00fczy\u0131lda ya\u015fad\u0131\u011f\u0131n\u0131, teknoloji ve makyajdan haberleri olmad\u0131\u011f\u0131n\u0131 d\u00fc\u015f\u00fcnd\u00fcm\u201d diyen Sahar Tabar, ailesinin ve kendisinin su\u00e7land\u0131\u011f\u0131n\u0131 ve ac\u0131mas\u0131zca yarg\u0131land\u0131\u011f\u0131n\u0131 belirtmi\u015f ve  \u201c\u015f\u00fcphesiz ayn\u0131 \u015feylerle kar\u015f\u0131la\u015facaklar\u201d demi\u015ftir.\nDo\u011fruluk Y\u00fczdesi\nKaynaklar:\nsputniknews, theepochtimes, Instagram (Sahar Tabar)\n[Toplam:1    Ortalama:5/5] Angelina Jolie\u2019ye Benzemek \u0130\u00e7in 50 Ameliyat \u0130ddias\u0131", "U\u00e7akta cep telefonu kullanmak, y\u0131llard\u0131r bilinen uygulamalara g\u00f6re yasakt\u0131r. Kimileri bir \u015fehir efsanesi oldu\u011funu d\u00fc\u015f\u00fcnse de u\u00e7u\u015f esnas\u0131nda cep telefonu kullanman\u0131n \u00f6l\u00fcmc\u00fcl tehlikelere yol a\u00e7aca\u011f\u0131n\u0131 d\u00fc\u015f\u00fcnen insanlar da vard\u0131r. Peki ger\u00e7ekten u\u00e7akta cep telefonu kullanmak, u\u00e7a\u011f\u0131 d\u00fc\u015f\u00fcrebilecek derecede riskli midir?\nBug\u00fcne kadar cep telefonlar\u0131yla alakal\u0131 bir\u00e7ok olas\u0131 tehlike durumlar\u0131 konu\u015fulmu\u015f ancak cep telefonu kullan\u0131m\u0131ndan kaynakl\u0131 u\u00e7ak d\u00fc\u015fme vakas\u0131na rastlanmam\u0131\u015ft\u0131r.\n\u00d6yle ki u\u00e7aklardaki telefon yasa\u011f\u0131n\u0131n kullan\u0131m\u0131 g\u00fcndeme gelmi\u015f ve bu y\u00f6nde \u00e7al\u0131\u015fmalar yap\u0131lm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r. Resmi kurumlar taraf\u0131ndan yap\u0131lan \u00e7al\u0131\u015fmalar sonucu, u\u00e7akta cep telefonu kullan\u0131m\u0131yla ilgili birtak\u0131m verilere ula\u015f\u0131lm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r. \u00c7al\u0131\u015fmalara g\u00f6z atmadan \u00f6nce, hangi \u00fclkeler bu yasa\u011f\u0131 kullan\u0131yor, hangileri kald\u0131rd\u0131 onlara bir bakal\u0131m.\nNeden Yasak?\nNeden yasak oldu\u011fuyla ilgili kesin bir ara\u015ft\u0131rma sonucu bulunmamakla birlikte cep telefonlar\u0131, u\u00e7aktaki sisteme zarar verece\u011fi d\u00fc\u015f\u00fcn\u00fcld\u00fc\u011f\u00fcnden dolay\u0131 d\u00fcnya genelinde yasakt\u0131r. U\u00e7akta seyr\u00fcsefer yaparken, 3000 metrenin yani yakla\u015f\u0131k 10 bin fit alt\u0131nda, cep telefonlar\u0131n\u0131n kullan\u0131m\u0131na izin verilmemektedir. Bu irtafadan daha y\u00fcksek olan yerlerde, elektronik di\u011fer cihazlara (diz\u00fcst\u00fc bilgisayar, m\u00fczik \u00e7alar vb.) izin verilmektedir. Baz\u0131 hava yolu \u015firketlerinde telefonlara, u\u00e7u\u015f modunda olmas\u0131 \u015fart\u0131yla, sadece wifi hizmeti i\u00e7in izin verilmektedir.\nCep telefonlar\u0131 ve di\u011fer elektronik cihazlar, u\u00e7aktaki navigasyon, kuleyle irtibat ve aviyonik sistemlerin kullan\u0131lmas\u0131n\u0131 engelleyebilmektedir. Yani cep telefonlar\u0131, u\u00e7aktaki aviyonik sistemlerdeki frekanslara yak\u0131n bir de\u011ferde ise sinyaller bozulabilir ve u\u00e7u\u015f tehlikeye girebilir. B\u00f6ylelikle, cihazlardaki bozulan frekanslar, u\u00e7a\u011f\u0131n d\u00fc\u015fmesine yol a\u00e7abilir.\nBu yasa\u011f\u0131n tedbir ama\u00e7l\u0131 konuldu\u011fu d\u00fc\u015f\u00fcn\u00fclmektedir. Zira, bug\u00fcne kadar cep telefonundan kaynakl\u0131 sinyallerden d\u00fc\u015fen bir u\u00e7ak kay\u0131tlara ge\u00e7memi\u015ftir.\nAncak kesin olmasa da baz\u0131 pilotlar\u0131n bildirimine g\u00f6re, elektronik cihazlardan kaynaklanan vakalar da vard\u0131r. U\u00e7aktaki sistemlerin cep telefonlar\u0131 veya di\u011fer elektronik cihazlar\u0131n sinyallerinden etkilendi\u011fi ve cihazlar kapat\u0131l\u0131nca u\u00e7aktaki sistemlerin normale d\u00f6nd\u00fc\u011f\u00fc s\u00f6ylenmektedir.\nRisk Unsuru Ta\u015f\u0131yor Mu?\nD\u00fcnyan\u0131n en b\u00fcy\u00fck havac\u0131l\u0131k \u015firketlerinden olan Boeing\u2018in m\u00fchendisleri cep telefonu ve sinyal yayan di\u011fer elektronik cihazlar \u00fczerinden bir \u00e7al\u0131\u015fma yapt\u0131. Boeing, cep telefonu gibi sinyal yayan cihazlar d\u0131\u015f\u0131ndaki ki\u015fisel elektronik cihazlar\u0131 laboratuvar ve u\u00e7ak ortam\u0131nda test etti. \u00c7al\u0131\u015fma sonucunda cihazlarla, u\u00e7aktaki sinyal ili\u015fkisi aras\u0131nda bir korelasyon tespit edilememi\u015ftir.\nEski Boeing m\u00fchendisi Kenny Kirchoff da,\u201dBir telefonun u\u00e7a\u011f\u0131 d\u00fc\u015f\u00fcrebilece\u011fi kesin de\u011fil. Asl\u0131nda sorun bu de\u011fil, sorun u\u00e7a\u011f\u0131n kritik a\u015famalar\u0131 s\u0131ras\u0131nda u\u00e7a\u011fa m\u00fcdahale etmek ve pilotlar i\u00e7in daha fazla \u00e7al\u0131\u015fmaya neden olmas\u0131d\u0131r.\u201cdedi .\nNasa\u2019n\u0131n \u00e7al\u0131\u015fmas\u0131nda ise, Havac\u0131l\u0131k Emniyet Raporlama Sistemi (ASRS: Aviation Safety Reporting System)\u2019deki raporlarda, elektronik cihazlarla u\u00e7a\u011f\u0131n d\u00fc\u015fmesi aras\u0131nda g\u00fc\u00e7l\u00fc bir ili\u015fki sa\u011flayamad\u0131\u011f\u0131 tespit edilmi\u015ftir.\nBaz\u0131 U\u00e7aklarda \u0130zin Veriliyor\nFederal \u0130leti\u015fim Kurulu (FCC), 1991 y\u0131l\u0131nda u\u00e7u\u015flarda yapt\u0131\u011f\u0131 \u00e7a\u011fr\u0131 yasa\u011f\u0131n\u0131n kald\u0131r\u0131lmas\u0131n\u0131 ge\u00e7ti\u011fimiz y\u0131llarda g\u00fcndeme getirdi. Ancak yasa\u011f\u0131 hala kald\u0131rmayan FCC, sorunun oldu\u011funa dair kesin bir kan\u0131t sunmam\u0131\u015ft\u0131r. U\u00e7aklarda telefon kullan\u0131m\u0131n\u0131n g\u00fcr\u00fclt\u00fcye sebebiyet vermesini ve di\u011fer yolcular\u0131 rahats\u0131z etmesini \u00f6nlemek istemektedir.\nFederal Havac\u0131l\u0131k Kurulu\u2018na (FAA) g\u00f6re, \u201cModern teknolojiler havada g\u00fcvenli ve g\u00fcvenilir bir \u015fekilde mobil hizmetler sunabilir. Eski ve k\u0131s\u0131tlay\u0131c\u0131 kurallar\u0131m\u0131z\u0131 g\u00f6zden ge\u00e7irmenin zaman\u0131 geldi.\u201d Bu a\u00e7\u0131klaman\u0131n ard\u0131ndan cep telefonlar\u0131n\u0131n kullan\u0131m\u0131na izin verilece\u011fi d\u00fc\u015f\u00fcn\u00fcld\u00fc ancak hen\u00fcz yasal bir dayana\u011f\u0131 yok.\n\u0130ngiliz Sivil Havac\u0131l\u0131k Kurulu taraf\u0131ndan yap\u0131lan 2000 y\u0131l\u0131ndaki bir ara\u015ft\u0131rmada, cep telefonunun, kokpite veya di\u011fer aviyonik ekipman yerinin yak\u0131n\u0131nda kullan\u0131lmas\u0131 durumunda, eski donan\u0131mlar\u0131n (1984 standartlar\u0131yla uyumlu) g\u00fcvenlik d\u00fczeylerini a\u015faca\u011f\u0131na karar verildi. Bu t\u00fcr te\u00e7hizat yeni u\u00e7aklarda bile halen kullan\u0131lmaktad\u0131r. Bu nedenle, rapor, motorlar \u00e7al\u0131\u015f\u0131rken t\u00fcm u\u00e7aklarda cep telefonlar\u0131n\u0131n kullan\u0131m\u0131n\u0131 k\u0131s\u0131tlayan mevcut politikan\u0131n y\u00fcr\u00fcrl\u00fckte kalmas\u0131 gerekti\u011fi sonucuna var\u0131yor.\nAncak baz\u0131 hava yolu \u015firketleri, inisiyatif alarak u\u00e7aklarda cep telefonu kullan\u0131m\u0131na izin vermektedir:\nU\u00e7akta cep telefonu kullan\u0131m\u0131na izin veren \u015firketler\nBBC\u2018nin haberine g\u00f6re, Amerika Birle\u015fik Devletleri\u2019nde yap\u0131lan bir ara\u015ft\u0131rmaya kat\u0131lan her 10 yolcudan d\u00f6rd\u00fc, u\u00e7u\u015f s\u0131ras\u0131nda elektronik cihazlar\u0131n\u0131 her zaman kapatmad\u0131\u011f\u0131n\u0131 itiraf etti. Cep telefonu kullan\u0131m\u0131na izin vermeyen \u015firketlerin u\u00e7aklar\u0131nda da, telefon kapat\u0131lmad\u0131\u011f\u0131 durumlarda ciddi sorunlara yol a\u00e7t\u0131\u011f\u0131n\u0131n kesin bir kan\u0131t\u0131 yoktur.\nDo\u011fruluk Y\u00fczdesi\nKaynaklar: BBC, Boeing, ViewFromTheWing, FCC, Travel Leisure, Traveler, FAA\n[Toplam:1    Ortalama:5/5] U\u00e7akta Cep Telefonu Kullanmak Tehlikeli Mi?", "Fesle\u011fenin sigaray\u0131 b\u0131rakt\u0131rd\u0131\u011f\u0131 iddias\u0131 \u00fczerine yapt\u0131\u011f\u0131m\u0131z ara\u015ft\u0131rmaya g\u00f6re, fesle\u011fen \u00e7i\u011fneyerek sigaran\u0131n b\u0131rak\u0131labilece\u011fi iddias\u0131 do\u011fru.\nSigaraya ba\u015flad\u0131ktan sonra, nikotinin ba\u011f\u0131ml\u0131l\u0131k yapan etkileri y\u00fcz\u00fcnden ki\u015finin sigaray\u0131 b\u0131rakmas\u0131 neredeyse imkans\u0131z hale gelebilir. Nikotin, en a\u011f\u0131r ba\u011f\u0131ml\u0131l\u0131k yapan maddelerden biridir ve sigara hastal\u0131k, sakatl\u0131k ve \u00f6l\u00fcm\u00fcn \u00f6nde gelen \u00f6nlenebilir nedenidir.\nNikotin solunum yoluyla akci\u011ferler taraf\u0131ndan emilir; hem beyinde hem de kan dola\u015f\u0131m\u0131nda en y\u00fcksek seviyelere ula\u015fabilir. Bir sigara i\u00e7ildi\u011finde nikotin 10 saniye i\u00e7inde beyine ula\u015f\u0131r.\nHer sabah ve ak\u015fam yakla\u015f\u0131k 2-3 fesle\u011fen yapra\u011f\u0131 al\u0131p \u00e7i\u011fnemek ve yutmak t\u00fct\u00fcn kullan\u0131m\u0131na olan ihtiyac\u0131 azaltmaya yard\u0131mc\u0131 olur ve ayn\u0131 zamanda daha \u00f6nceki t\u00fct\u00fcn kullan\u0131m\u0131ndan kaynaklanan sorunlar\u0131 iyile\u015ftirir. \u00dcnl\u00fc Onkolog (kanserbilimci) Prof. Dr. Erkan Topuz da fesle\u011fen \u00e7i\u011fnemenin sigaray\u0131 b\u0131rakmak i\u00e7in son derece etkili bir y\u00f6ntem oldu\u011funu a\u00e7\u0131klam\u0131\u015ft\u0131r.\nFesle\u011fen yapraklar\u0131, y\u0131llarca sigara i\u00e7ilmesine ba\u011fl\u0131 olarak h\u00fccrelerinizde olu\u015fan hasarlar\u0131n onar\u0131lmas\u0131na yard\u0131m eden antioksidan bak\u0131m\u0131ndan zengindir. Nikotin iste\u011fini azaltmaya yol a\u00e7arak insanlar\u0131n sigara i\u00e7meyi b\u0131rakmalar\u0131na yard\u0131mc\u0131 olur. Sigara i\u00e7mek yerine taze fesle\u011fen yapraklar\u0131 \u00e7i\u011fnemek sigaran\u0131n v\u00fccuda verdi\u011fi zararlar\u0131 ciddiye alan ki\u015filere yard\u0131mc\u0131 olacakt\u0131r.\nFesle\u011fen \u00e7ok g\u00fc\u00e7l\u00fc anti-stres bile\u015fikleri olan bir bitkidir ve ki\u015filerin sigaray\u0131 b\u0131rakmaya \u00e7al\u0131\u015f\u0131rken kar\u015f\u0131la\u015fabilecekleri zorluklar\u0131 azaltmada \u00f6nemli rol oynar. Sigara i\u00e7me iste\u011fi ba\u015f g\u00f6sterdi\u011finde \u00e7i\u011fnenen birka\u00e7 adet fesle\u011fen yapra\u011f\u0131n\u0131n, mentol damlalar\u0131 gibi bo\u011fazda so\u011futma etkisi vard\u0131r ve bu sayede ki\u015finin sigara i\u00e7me iste\u011fi kontrol alt\u0131na al\u0131nabilir.\nYakla\u015f\u0131k 30 gram kuru fesle\u011fen yapra\u011f\u0131 g\u00fcnl\u00fck A ve K vitamini gereksinimini kar\u015f\u0131lamak i\u00e7in yeterlidir. Kuru fesle\u011fen yapraklar\u0131 ayr\u0131ca C vitamini, B6 vitamini, folat, niasin, E vitamini, manganez, kalsiyum, demir, bak\u0131r, potasyum, \u00e7inko ve magnezyum kayna\u011f\u0131d\u0131r. Kuru fesle\u011fen yapraklar\u0131 %25 oran\u0131nda diyet lifleri bak\u0131m\u0131ndan da zengindir. Fesle\u011fen tohumlar\u0131 \u00e7imlenme i\u00e7in gereken karbonhidrat, vitamin, mineral ve ya\u011flarla doludur. Fesle\u011fen ya\u011f\u0131, sa\u011fl\u0131\u011fa yararlar\u0131 olan \u00e7e\u015fitli u\u00e7ucu ya\u011flar\u0131n kayna\u011f\u0131d\u0131r.\nFesle\u011fen Yapra\u011f\u0131 ve Fesle\u011fen Koklaman\u0131n Faydalar\u0131 Nelerdir?\nA\u011f\u0131z yaralar\u0131na kar\u015f\u0131 \u015fifal\u0131 bir bitkidir.\nSivrisinekleri uzakla\u015ft\u0131r\u0131c\u0131 etkisi vard\u0131r. \u00d6zellikle yaz aylar\u0131nda her evde bulunmas\u0131 gereken bir bitkidir.\nKanser hastalar\u0131na iyi gelir. Kanser d\u00fc\u015fman\u0131 bir bitkidir.\nAkci\u011fer fonksiyonlar\u0131n\u0131 art\u0131r\u0131c\u0131 \u00f6zelli\u011fi vard\u0131r.\n\u0130\u00e7erisinde \u00f6nemli miktarda A, C ve E vitamini bar\u0131nd\u0131r\u0131r.\nBa\u011f\u0131\u015f\u0131kl\u0131k sistemini kuvvetlendirir. Ate\u015f, so\u011fuk alg\u0131nl\u0131\u011f\u0131 ve gribe kar\u015f\u0131 yarar sa\u011flar.\n\u0130\u00e7erisinde bulunan potasyum sayesinde kalp ve beyin sa\u011fl\u0131\u011f\u0131 i\u00e7in \u00f6nemlidir.\n\u0130\u00e7erdi\u011fi B6 vitamini beyin ve sinir fonksiyonlar\u0131n\u0131n sa\u011fl\u0131\u011f\u0131n\u0131 korur.\nAst\u0131m, bron\u015fit, t\u00fcberk\u00fcloz ve akci\u011fer kanserine kar\u015f\u0131 olduk\u00e7a faydal\u0131 bir bitkidir.\nB\u00f6brekteki ta\u015flar\u0131n b\u00fcy\u00fcmesine engel olur.\n\u00d6nemli \u00f6l\u00e7\u00fcde stres \u00f6nleyicidir. Stresi \u00f6nlemek i\u00e7in g\u00fcn i\u00e7inde 3 fincana kadar fesle\u011fen \u00e7ay\u0131 i\u00e7ebilirsiniz. \u00c7ay\u0131n ard\u0131ndan alaca\u011f\u0131n\u0131z du\u015f sizi sakinle\u015ftirecek, stresi \u00f6nleyecektir.\n\u0130\u00e7erisindeki folik asit sayesinde gebelikte \u015fifa sa\u011flar. Kolon kanserine kar\u015f\u0131 faydal\u0131d\u0131r.\nDemir bar\u0131nd\u0131rmas\u0131 sebebiyle kans\u0131zl\u0131\u011f\u0131 engeller.\n\u0130\u00e7erisindeki fosfor, kemik ve di\u015f yap\u0131s\u0131n\u0131n sa\u011fl\u0131\u011f\u0131 i\u00e7in \u00f6nemlidir.\nB\u00f6cek \u0131s\u0131rmalar\u0131nda a\u011fr\u0131y\u0131 kesici \u00f6zelli\u011fi vard\u0131r. Is\u0131rman\u0131n oldu\u011fu b\u00f6lgeye s\u00fcr\u00fclerek uygulan\u0131r.\nDo\u011fruluk Y\u00fczdesi\nKAYNAKLAR\ndavidwolfe    boldsky     wellnessdose     youtube    organikgunler\n[Toplam:2    Ortalama:4.5/5] Fesle\u011fenin Sigaray\u0131 B\u0131rakt\u0131rd\u0131\u011f\u0131 \u0130ddias\u0131", "\u0130nternete y\u00fczde 50 zam geldi ba\u015fl\u0131\u011f\u0131yla, baz\u0131 yay\u0131n organlar\u0131 haber yaparak 2018 itibariyle genel internet kullan\u0131m\u0131na y\u00fczde 50 zam geldi\u011fini iddia etmi\u015flerdir. Vergi oran\u0131na zam geldi\u011fi iddias\u0131 do\u011frudur ancak durum internet \u00fccretine y\u00fczde 50 zam geldi olarak anla\u015f\u0131lmaktad\u0131r.\nS\u00f6z konusu haberde, 7 Aral\u0131k\u2019ta y\u00fcr\u00fcrl\u00fc\u011fe giren torba yasayla birlikte Motorlu Ta\u015f\u0131tlar Vergisinden, \u00d6zel \u0130leti\u015fim Vergisine(\u00d6\u0130V) kadar bir\u00e7ok alana zam geldi\u011fi iddialar\u0131 bulunmaktad\u0131r. Haberde internete y\u00fczde 50 zam geldi iddias\u0131 bulunurken asl\u0131nda durum daha farkl\u0131d\u0131r.\nSputnik\u2019in Haberi\n  Bakandan A\u00e7\u0131klama\nMaliye Bakan\u0131 Naci A\u011fbal, TBMM\u2019ye sevk edilen ve torba yasa olarak bilinen \u201cBaz\u0131 Vergi Kanunlar\u0131 ile Kanun ve Kanun H\u00fckm\u00fcnde Kararnamelerde De\u011fi\u015fiklik Yap\u0131lmas\u0131na Dair Kanun Tasar\u0131s\u0131\u2019n\u0131n\u201d i\u00e7eri\u011fine ili\u015fkin yaz\u0131l\u0131 a\u00e7\u0131klamada bulunmu\u015ftur.\nMaliye Bakan\u0131 Naci A\u011fbal\u2018\u0131n, \u00d6zel \u0130leti\u015fim Vergisi hakk\u0131ndaki a\u00e7\u0131klamalar\u0131na g\u00f6re, cep telefonu g\u00f6r\u00fc\u015fmelerinden y\u00fczde 25, sabit telefon g\u00f6r\u00fc\u015fmelerinden y\u00fczde 15, data ve internet hizmetlerinden y\u00fczde 5 oran\u0131nda al\u0131nan \u00d6\u0130V, y\u00fczde 7,5 olarak tek oranda yeniden d\u00fczenlenmi\u015ftir.\nNaci A\u011fbal uygulamay\u0131, \u201cB\u00f6ylece vatanda\u015flar\u0131m\u0131z Telekom hizmetlerinin vergilendirilmesindeki karma\u015f\u0131k yap\u0131dan kurtuluyor ve vergi oranlar\u0131 a\u015fa\u011f\u0131 indiriliyor.\u201d \u015feklinde ifade etmi\u015ftir.\n\u00d6\u0130V\u2019nin Sabitlenmesi Ne Anlama Geliyor?\n\u0130nternet i\u00e7in \u00f6denen toplam \u00fccretin, art\u0131k y\u00fczde 50 daha fazlas\u0131 \u00f6denece\u011fi anla\u015f\u0131lan haber ba\u015fl\u0131\u011f\u0131nda, vatanda\u015flar zam konusunda \u00e7ok farkl\u0131 bir durumla kar\u015f\u0131 kar\u015f\u0131ya olduklar\u0131n\u0131 d\u00fc\u015f\u00fcnmektedir.\nAsl\u0131na bak\u0131ld\u0131\u011f\u0131nda y\u00fczde 50 zam, \u00f6denen \u00fccrette de\u011fil vergi oran\u0131ndad\u0131r. Y\u00fczde 5 olan vergi oran\u0131n\u0131n y\u00fczde 7.5\u2019e \u00e7\u0131kar\u0131lmas\u0131 toplamda y\u00fczde 50 art\u0131\u015ft\u0131r.\n\u00d6rne\u011fin, internet \u00fccreti ayl\u0131k 50 lira olsun diyelim. Kullan\u0131c\u0131, bu yeni sabitleme uygulamas\u0131yla 50 TL\u2019nin y\u00fczde 50 fazlas\u0131 yani 75 lira de\u011fil, 53 TL 75 Kuru\u015f \u00f6deyecektir. Zamdan \u00f6nceki fiyat\u0131 ise y\u00fczde 5 vergi oran\u0131yla birlikte 52 TL 50 Kuru\u015f olacakt\u0131.\n2017 \u0130nternet \u00dccretleri \n2016\u2019n\u0131n son aylar\u0131n\u0131n ve 2017\u2019nin internet \u00fccretleri resmi verilere g\u00f6re \u015fu \u015fekildedir:\nTU\u0130K, 2017\n2015\u2018in son ay\u0131nda 75,4412 TL, 2016\u2018n\u0131n son ay\u0131nda 81,7459 TL olan internet \u00fccretleri 2017 y\u0131l\u0131 itibariyle 54,1051 TL olmu\u015ftur. \u00d6nceki y\u0131llarda %5 olan oran\u0131n da, 2017 sonundan itibaren %7,5\u2019te sabitlenece\u011fi a\u00e7\u0131klanm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r.\n\u00d6zetle, kullan\u0131c\u0131n\u0131n faturas\u0131na yans\u0131yan vergi oran\u0131 %50 de\u011fil, %7,5\u2018tir.\nDo\u011fruluk Y\u00fczdesi\nKaynaklar: 1-Sputnik 2-Anadolu Ajans\u0131 3-2017 \u0130nternet \u00dccretleri \n[Toplam:0    Ortalama:0/5] \u0130nternete Y\u00fczde 50 Zam Geldi \u0130ddias\u0131", "\u201cSar\u0131\u015f\u0131nlar Aptal M\u0131d\u0131r? Sar\u0131\u015f\u0131nlar Aptal \u0130ddias\u0131\u201d ba\u015fl\u0131kl\u0131 i\u00e7eri\u011fimizde \u00e7o\u011funlukla merak uyand\u0131ran ve hakk\u0131nda tart\u0131\u015fmalar\u0131n \u00e7ok yayg\u0131n oldu\u011fu bir konu olan sar\u0131\u015f\u0131n insanlar\u0131n aptal oldu\u011fu iddias\u0131n\u0131 inceledik. Nedeni bilinmez ama bu konu o kadar ilgi \u00e7ekmektedir ki, sar\u0131\u015f\u0131nlar\u0131n aptal olmas\u0131n\u0131 konu edinen film serileri dahi vard\u0131r. Ancak sar\u0131\u015f\u0131nlar\u0131n aptal oldu\u011fu iddias\u0131 do\u011fru de\u011fildir. Hatta yap\u0131lan baz\u0131 anketlere g\u00f6re sar\u0131\u015f\u0131nlar, genellikle ortalaman\u0131n \u00fczerinde zeka seviyesine sahiptir.\nZeka Seviyeleri \nU.S. Bureau of Labor Statistics (ABD \u00c7al\u0131\u015fma \u0130statistikleri B\u00fcrosu), Ulusal Boylamsal Ara\u015ft\u0131rmalar serisinin, 1979 y\u0131l\u0131nda 14-22 ya\u015f aral\u0131\u011f\u0131nda olan gen\u00e7lerin takibiyle \u015fekillenen NLSY79 sonu\u00e7lar\u0131na g\u00f6re, Ohio \u00dcniversitesi \u00f6\u011fretim \u00fcyesi Jay Zagorsky bir alt de\u011ferlendirme yapm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r.\nDo\u011fal sa\u00e7 rengi ile IQ (Intelligence Quotient \u2013 Zeka Katsay\u0131s\u0131) aras\u0131ndaki ili\u015fkiye dair ara\u015ft\u0131rma yapan Zagorsky, \u0131rksal farkl\u0131l\u0131klar\u0131 bertaraf etmek ad\u0131na siyah ve latin k\u00f6kenlileri inceleme d\u0131\u015f\u0131nda b\u0131rakm\u0131\u015f ve beyaz \u0131rktaki sar\u0131\u015f\u0131nl\u0131k/zeka ili\u015fkisi \u00fczerine \u00e7al\u0131\u015fm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r. Bu \u00e7al\u0131\u015fman\u0131n sonucuna dair tablo \u015fu \u015fekildedir:\nZagorsky\u2019nin \u00e7al\u0131\u015fmas\u0131na g\u00f6re sar\u0131, kahverengi, k\u0131z\u0131l ve siyah sa\u00e7l\u0131 kad\u0131nlar\u0131n ortalama IQ de\u011ferleri s\u0131ras\u0131yla 103.2, 102.7, 101.2 ve 100.5 olarak bulunmu\u015ftur. Erkekler i\u00e7in de de\u011ferlendirme yapan ve sonu\u00e7lar\u0131 s\u0131ralayan Zagorsky, sar\u0131\u015f\u0131n erkeklerde de zeka gerili\u011fi olmad\u0131\u011f\u0131n\u0131 g\u00f6stermi\u015ftir.\nBu \u00e7al\u0131\u015fmalara g\u00f6re; kad\u0131nlar aras\u0131nda sar\u0131\u015f\u0131nlar en zeki grubu olu\u015ftururken, erkekler aras\u0131nda sar\u0131\u015f\u0131nlar ikinci en zeki grup olmu\u015ftur. Bu \u00e7al\u0131\u015fmadan yola \u00e7\u0131k\u0131larak, D\u00fcnya genelinde sar\u0131\u015f\u0131n kad\u0131nlar\u0131n en zeki kad\u0131n grubu oldu\u011fu sonucuna ula\u015f\u0131lamaz. Ancak sar\u0131\u015f\u0131nlar\u0131n aptal oldu\u011funa dair iddialar\u0131n do\u011fru olmad\u0131\u011f\u0131 sonucuna ula\u015f\u0131labilir.\nBirey tiplerine g\u00f6re ortalama IQ da\u011f\u0131l\u0131m\u0131 ise \u015fu \u015fekildedir:\nBu tabloya g\u00f6re, IQ seviyesi 125 ve \u00fczerinde olan kad\u0131nlar aras\u0131nda %4 oranla en fazla y\u00fczdeli\u011fe sahip kad\u0131nlar sar\u0131\u015f\u0131nlard\u0131r. Erkekler i\u00e7in de durum benzerdir. IQ seviyesi 125 ve \u00fczerinde olan erkekler aras\u0131nda sar\u0131\u015f\u0131n erkekler %5.4 ile en \u00e7ok y\u00fczdeli\u011fe sahip olmu\u015flard\u0131r.\nDo\u011fruluk Y\u00fczdesi\nKaynaklar:\n1. academia.edu, 2. news.osu.edu, 3. u.osu.edu, 4. sites.psu.edu, 5. bls.gov, 6. nlsinfo.org, 7. bilimfili\n[Toplam:3    Ortalama:5/5] Sar\u0131\u015f\u0131nlar Aptal M\u0131d\u0131r? Sar\u0131\u015f\u0131nlar Aptal \u0130ddias\u0131", "TRT\u2019nin bir yar\u0131\u015fma program\u0131nda ve haber yay\u0131n\u0131 s\u0131ras\u0131nda, \u0130srail\u2019in ba\u015fkenti olarak Kud\u00fcs\u2019\u00fc g\u00f6sterdi\u011fi iddias\u0131 bir\u00e7ok medya organ\u0131 taraf\u0131ndan haber yap\u0131ld\u0131 ve sosyal medyada da geni\u015f yer buldu. S\u00f6z konusu iddialar do\u011frudur.\nS\u00f6z konusu iddialardan ilki, 2014 y\u0131l\u0131 Eyl\u00fcl ay\u0131nda TRT taraf\u0131ndan \u00e7ocuklar i\u00e7in haz\u0131rlanan \u201cR\u00fczgar G\u00fcl\u00fc\u201d adl\u0131 yar\u0131\u015fma program\u0131nda Kud\u00fcs\u2018\u00fcn, \u0130srail\u2018in ba\u015fkenti olarak g\u00f6sterildi\u011fi iddias\u0131d\u0131r. \u0130ddia do\u011frudur.\nR\u00fczgar G\u00fcl\u00fc program\u0131na kat\u0131lan yar\u0131\u015fmac\u0131 \u00e7ocuklardan birisine, \u00fclkelerin ba\u015fkentlerinin soruldu\u011fu b\u00f6l\u00fcmde \u201cKud\u00fcs\u201d sorusu sorulmu\u015ftur. Soruda \u015fehre ait bir resimle beraber Kud\u00fcs\u2018\u00fcn, hangi \u00fclkenin ba\u015fkenti oldu\u011fu sorulmu\u015f ve \u015f\u0131klarda ise sadece \u0130srail ve \u0130svi\u00e7re verilmi\u015ftir. Yar\u0131\u015fmac\u0131 \u00e7ocuk cevap olarak \u201c\u0130srail\u201d demi\u015f ve cevab\u0131 do\u011fru kabul edilmi\u015ftir. Sosyal medyada payla\u015f\u0131lan yay\u0131na ait ilgili g\u00f6r\u00fcnt\u00fcleri, a\u015fa\u011f\u0131daki videonun 26. saniyesinden itibaren izleyebilirsiniz.\nBir di\u011fer iddia ise; TRT\u2018nin 2017 y\u0131l\u0131 Nisan ay\u0131nda alt \u015feritten yay\u0131nlad\u0131\u011f\u0131 haber ak\u0131\u015f\u0131 s\u0131ras\u0131nda \u0130srail\u2019in ba\u015fkentini \u201cKud\u00fcs\u201d olarak g\u00f6sterdi\u011fi iddias\u0131d\u0131r. \u0130ddia do\u011frudur.\nTRT\u2019nin A\u00e7\u0131klamas\u0131 \nTRT, konuya dair a\u00e7\u0131klama yapm\u0131\u015f ve durumun \u00e7al\u0131\u015fanlar\u0131n hatas\u0131ndan kaynakland\u0131\u011f\u0131n\u0131 ifade etmi\u015ftir. Eski yay\u0131nlara ait g\u00f6r\u00fcnt\u00fclerin, g\u00fcndemin Kud\u00fcs olmas\u0131 sebebiyle bilin\u00e7li olarak tekrar yay\u0131ld\u0131\u011f\u0131n\u0131 belirten TRT, bu hatalar\u0131n ger\u00e7ekle\u015fti\u011fi d\u00f6nemde durumun fark edilmesinin ard\u0131ndan s\u00f6z konusu \u00e7al\u0131\u015fanlarla ili\u015fi\u011finin kesildi\u011fini belirtmi\u015ftir.\n  Do\u011fruluk Y\u00fczdesi\nKaynaklar:\nTRT, TRT 2, Youtube\n[Toplam:1    Ortalama:5/5] TRT Kud\u00fcs\u2019\u00fc \u0130srail Ba\u015fkenti G\u00f6sterdi \u0130ddias\u0131", "Kud\u00fcs neden \u00f6nemlidir diye soruldu\u011funda ald\u0131\u011f\u0131m\u0131z cevaplar \u00fc\u00e7 semavi din olan \u0130slamiyet, Hristiyanl\u0131k ve Yahudilik i\u00e7in farkl\u0131d\u0131r. Oysaki tarihin en kadim \u015fehirlerinden olan Kud\u00fcs\u2019\u00fcn \u00f6nemi, insanl\u0131k i\u00e7in ortakt\u0131r.
