Bu g\u00fcn de resmi tatildir.\n30 A\u011fustos Zafer Bayram\u0131 Tatil mi?\n30 A\u011fustos Zafer Bayram\u0131 Sal\u0131 g\u00fcn\u00fcne denk gelmektedir. Bu g\u00fcn resmi tatil olarak ge\u00e7irilecektir.\n15 Temmuz Tatil mi?\nTBMM\u2019nin teklifi \u00fczerine \u201815 Temmuz G\u00fcn\u00fc Demokrasi ve Milli Birlik G\u00fcn\u00fc\u2019 resmi tatil olarak kabul edilmi\u015ftir. 2022 y\u0131l\u0131nda da aziz \u015fehitlerimizi ve gazilerimizi and\u0131\u011f\u0131m\u0131z bu g\u00fcn\u00fc tatil olarak ge\u00e7irece\u011fiz.\n29 Ekim Cumhuriyet Bayram\u0131 Resmi Tatil mi?\n2022 y\u0131l\u0131nda 29 Ekim g\u00fcn\u00fc Cumhuriyet Bayram\u0131 Cumartesi g\u00fcn\u00fcne denk gelmektedir. 29 Ekim Cumhuriyet Bayram\u0131 resmi tatildir.\nKAYNAK: http://www.takvim.com/2021_takvimi.html  www.tbmm.gov.tr , http://www.mevzuat.gov.tr/MevzuatMetin/1.5.2429.pdf\nVideo oynat\u0131c\u0131\n00:00\n00:00\n1. \u201cdogrula.org\u201d\n0:07\n[Toplam:7    Ortalama:5/5] 2022 Y\u0131l\u0131 Resmi Tatilleri Hangi G\u00fcnler?", "Be\u015f y\u0131ldan fazla bir s\u00fcredir sosyal medyada payla\u015f\u0131lan bir videoda, Fenerbah\u00e7e-Galatasaray ma\u00e7\u0131nda g\u00f6revli bir polisin, saha kenar\u0131ndan teknik direkt\u00f6r Mustafa Denizli\u2018ye taktik verdi\u011fi g\u00f6r\u00fclm\u00fc\u015ft\u00fc. Videoda Mustafa Denizli taraf\u0131ndan itilen polisin eski hakem B\u00fcnyamin Gezer oldu\u011fu iddia edilerek y\u0131llard\u0131r internette yay\u0131lmaktad\u0131r.\nPolislik de yapm\u0131\u015f olan eski hakem B\u00fcnyamin Gezer\u2018e ula\u015farak bu videonun asl\u0131n\u0131 kendisine sordum.\nG\u00f6r\u00fc\u015fmemizin ayr\u0131nt\u0131lar\u0131n\u0131 payla\u015fmadan \u00f6nce \u015funu belirtmeliyim ki, Mustafa Denizli\u2019ye taktik veren polisin B\u00fcnyamin Gezer oldu\u011fu iddias\u0131 as\u0131ls\u0131z ve yanl\u0131\u015f.\n\u00dcnl\u00fc videoya dair yapt\u0131\u011f\u0131m\u0131z konu\u015fmada B\u00fcnyamin Gezer\u2019e videonun \u2018hikayesini\u2019 sordum. Kendisi bana, \u2018hikayeyi insanlar\u0131n yaz\u0131p oynad\u0131klar\u0131n\u0131, yanl\u0131\u015f\u0131 do\u011fru gibi kabul ettirmeye \u00e7al\u0131\u015ft\u0131klar\u0131n\u0131\u2018 s\u00f6yledi.\nMa\u00e7\u0131n \u0130stanbul\u2019da oynand\u0131\u011f\u0131n\u0131 hat\u0131rlatan Gezer, \u2018hayat\u0131 boyunca \u0130stanbul\u2019da polislik yapmad\u0131\u011f\u0131n\u0131 ve bunun yeterli bir cevap oldu\u011funu\u2018 g\u00fclerek s\u00f6yledi.\nVideodaki polisin, B\u00fcnyamin Gezer\u2019in gen\u00e7li\u011fine benzetildi\u011fini ve kendisinin polis kimli\u011finden de yararlan\u0131larak bu yak\u0131\u015ft\u0131rman\u0131n yap\u0131ld\u0131\u011f\u0131n\u0131 s\u00f6yledi\u011fimde Gezer s\u00f6zlerine \u015f\u00f6yle devam etti: \u201cBabam Samsun Ondokuz May\u0131s Hastanesi\u2019nde yatarken o polis arkada\u015f\u0131 g\u00f6rd\u00fcm. Bana dedi ki, \u2018hocam benim verdi\u011fim takti\u011fi size yazd\u0131lar\u2019.\u201d\nB\u00fcnyamin Gezer, \u201cOrada (\u0130stanbul\u2019da oynanan ma\u00e7ta) meslekta\u015f\u0131m polis olarak g\u00f6rev yap\u0131yordu. Yani ben, bunu s\u00f6yleyen \u015fahs\u0131 da tan\u0131yorum ama ad\u0131n\u0131 ve soyad\u0131n\u0131 bilmiyorum.\u201d dedi ve \u201cBen hayat\u0131mda hi\u00e7 \u0130stanbul\u2019da polislik yapmad\u0131m.\u201d diyerek s\u00f6zlerini tamamlad\u0131.\nSon olarak esprili bir \u015fekilde Be\u015fikta\u015fl\u0131 oldu\u011fumu ve kendisinin hangi tak\u0131m\u0131 tuttu\u011funu sordu\u011fumda g\u00fclerek, \u201cHakemler tak\u0131m tutmaz.\u201d dedi.\nSosyal medyada y\u0131llard\u0131r yer alan bu videonun as\u0131ls\u0131z oldu\u011funu ilk kez ortaya \u00e7\u0131karan dogrula.org ve \u015fahs\u0131m ad\u0131na, bizimle g\u00f6r\u00fc\u015fmeyi kabul eden B\u00fcnyamin Gezer\u2019e te\u015fekk\u00fcr ediyorum.\nB\u00fcnyamin Gezer Kimdir?\n9 Aral\u0131k 1972 do\u011fumlu B\u00fcnyamin Gezer, eski S\u00fcper Lig hakemi ve emniyet mensubudur. Kendisi 2011 y\u0131l\u0131nda hakemli\u011fi b\u0131rakm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r. Halen aktif olarak merkez hakem kurulu ba\u015fkan vekilli\u011fi yapan Gezer, Amasyal\u0131d\u0131r.\nDo\u011fruluk Y\u00fczdesi\nKAYNAKLAR\nyoutube  dogrula.org r\u00f6portaj\n[Toplam:0    Ortalama:0/5] B\u00fcnyamin Gezer\u2019in Polisken Mustafa Denizli\u2019ye Taktik Verdi\u011fi \u0130ddias\u0131", "\u0130zmir Mar\u015f\u0131\u2018n\u0131n ge\u00e7mi\u015fine dair bir\u00e7ok iddia ve tart\u0131\u015fma s\u00f6z konusu olmu\u015ftur. Bu iddialardan en \u00e7ok konu\u015fulan\u0131 ise, \u0130zmir Mar\u015f\u0131\u2019n\u0131n Kafkasya Mar\u015f\u0131\u2018ndan uyarland\u0131\u011f\u0131 iddias\u0131d\u0131r. \u0130zmir Mar\u015f\u0131\u2019n\u0131n uyarlama oldu\u011fu iddias\u0131 do\u011frudur.\n\u0130zmir Mar\u015f\u0131\n\u0130zmir Mar\u015f\u0131, T\u00fcrk ordusunun Kurtulu\u015f Sava\u015f\u0131 s\u0131ras\u0131nda \u0130zmir\u2019e giri\u015fini konu alan nihavend makam\u0131nda bir mar\u015ft\u0131r. \u0130zmir Mar\u015f\u0131 olarak bilinen birden fazla mar\u015f bulunmaktad\u0131r. \u0130ddiaya konu olan \u0130zmir Mar\u015f\u0131 \u015fudur:\nEge \u00dcniversitesi Devlet T\u00fcrk Musikisi Konservatuar\u0131 taraf\u0131ndan, 2011 y\u0131l\u0131nda ilk say\u0131s\u0131 \u00e7\u0131kart\u0131lm\u0131\u015f olan dergide ge\u00e7en metne g\u00f6re; orijinalinde \u201cKafkasya da\u011flar\u0131nda \u00e7i\u00e7ekler a\u00e7ar\u201d olan mar\u015f, daha sonradan \u201c\u0130zmir\u2019in da\u011flar\u0131nda \u00e7i\u00e7ekler a\u00e7ar\u201d olarak d\u00f6n\u00fc\u015ft\u00fcr\u00fclm\u00fc\u015ft\u00fcr.\nEge \u00dcniversitesi Devlet T\u00fcrk Musikisi Konservatuar\u0131 Dergisi\nAyr\u0131ca, \u0130zmir\u2018de kurulan Esendere K\u00fclt\u00fcr Sanat Derne\u011fi\u2019nin haz\u0131rlam\u0131\u015f oldu\u011fu ar\u015five g\u00f6re, \u0130zzettin H\u00fcm\u00e2yi El\u00e7io\u011flu taraf\u0131ndan bestelenen mar\u015f\u0131n ad\u0131n\u0131n \u201cKafkasya Mar\u015f\u0131\u201d oldu\u011fu ve orijinalinde mar\u015f\u0131n \u201cKafkasya da\u011flar\u0131nda \u00e7i\u00e7ekler a\u00e7ar\u201d \u015feklinde ba\u015flad\u0131\u011f\u0131 g\u00f6r\u00fclmektedir.\n  Bu konuda ara\u015ft\u0131rma yapan Sol habere g\u00f6re ise, El\u00e7io\u011flu, mar\u015f\u0131 \u201cKafkasya Mar\u015f\u0131\u201d olarak, kendisinin de kat\u0131ld\u0131\u011f\u0131 rivayet edilen Kafkasya Cephesi\u2019ne ithafen 1914 senesinde bestelemi\u015ftir. Haberin devam\u0131nda da \u015f\u00f6yle a\u00e7\u0131klamalar vard\u0131r:\n\u201cBu bilgiyi Kemal Tahir, \u201cYorgun Sava\u015f\u00e7\u0131\u201d roman\u0131nda, Enver\u2019in ondan k\u00fc\u00e7\u00fck day\u0131s\u0131 Halil Pa\u015fa\u2019n\u0131n a\u011fz\u0131ndan, \u015fu \u015fekilde desteklemektedir: \u2018Umdu\u011fumuz gibi, Kafkasya da\u011flarnda \u00e7i\u00e7ekler a\u00e7sayd\u0131, d\u00fc\u015fman \u00f6n\u00fcm\u00fczden ka\u00e7sayd\u0131 bile biz, 95 bin ki\u015fi ile Turana ula\u015famazd\u0131k\u2026\u2019\nDolay\u0131s\u0131yla bizim \u0130zmir Mar\u015f\u0131 diye bildi\u011fimiz mar\u015f, esasen Kafkasya Mar\u015f\u0131 olarak yaz\u0131lm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r. Kurtulu\u015f Sava\u015f\u0131 s\u0131ras\u0131nda bir d\u00f6nem \u201c\u0130n\u00f6n\u00fc da\u011flar\u0131nda \u00e7i\u00e7ekler a\u00e7ar\u2026\u201d \u015feklinde de s\u00f6ylenen mar\u015f, muhtemeldir ki 9 Eyl\u00fcl 1922\u2019den sonraki bir tarihte \u0130zmir\u2019e ve Kemal Pa\u015fa\u2019ya uyarlanm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r.\u201d\nNaci \u00d6zg\u00fc\u00e7\nAyr\u0131ca H\u00fcrriyet\u2019in haberine g\u00f6re, \u0130zzettin H\u00fcmayi El\u00e7io\u011flu\u2019nun torununun o\u011flu ve ayn\u0131 zamanda Ankara Devlet Opera ve Balesi\u2019nin orkestra \u015fefi olan Naci \u00d6zg\u00fc\u00e7, \u0130zmir Mar\u015f\u0131 ile ilgili olarak \u015f\u00f6yle demi\u015ftir:\n\u201cBu mar\u015f\u0131n \u2018Kafkasya Mar\u015f\u0131\u2019 olarak babam\u0131n dedesi \u0130zzettin H\u00fcmayi El\u00e7io\u011flu taraf\u0131ndan bestelendi\u011fini ailemden \u00f6\u011frenmi\u015ftim. Yapt\u0131\u011f\u0131m ara\u015ft\u0131rmalarda; \u0130zzettin Bey\u2019in 38 ya\u015f\u0131ndayken, cephede besteledi\u011finin san\u0131ld\u0131\u011f\u0131n\u0131 g\u00f6rd\u00fcm. \u00c7ok \u00f6nemli bir bestek\u00e2r oldu\u011funu ba\u015fka kaynaklardan da do\u011frulatt\u0131m.\u201d\n  Mehmed Ali Bey\n\u201cKalan M\u00fczik\u201d taraf\u0131ndan haz\u0131rlanan ve Odeon Orkestras\u0131\u2019n\u0131n \u00e7ald\u0131\u011f\u0131 \u201cOsmanl\u0131 Mar\u015flar\u0131\u201d alb\u00fcm\u00fcnde yer alan \u0130zmir Mar\u015f\u0131 ise, tamamen farkl\u0131 bir mar\u015ft\u0131r. Bestecisi Mehmed Ali Bey\u2019dir. \u0130lk T\u00fcrk klarnet\u00e7isi ve T\u00fcrk klarnet gelene\u011finin b\u00fcy\u00fck ustas\u0131 say\u0131lan Mehmed Ali Bey, \u0130zmir Mar\u015f\u0131 ve Plevne Mar\u015f\u0131 gibi birer ba\u015fyap\u0131t say\u0131lacak mar\u015flar\u0131n yarat\u0131c\u0131s\u0131d\u0131r. Birden fazla \u0130zmir Mar\u015f\u0131 ad\u0131nda mar\u015f olmas\u0131 sebebiyle yanl\u0131\u015f anla\u015f\u0131lmalar s\u00f6z konusu olmu\u015ftur. Ancak \u0130zmir Mar\u015f\u0131 olarak bilinen Kafkasya Mar\u015f\u0131, 1914\u2019te bestelenmi\u015f, Mehmed Ali Bey ise 1893\u2019te vefat etmi\u015ftir. O y\u00fczden Kafkasya Mar\u015f\u0131\u2019ndan uyarlanan \u0130zmir Mar\u015f\u0131 ile Mehmed Ali Bey\u2019in besteledi\u011fi \u0130zmir Mar\u015f\u0131\u2019n\u0131n birbiriyle alakas\u0131 yoktur. Mehmed Ali Bey\u2019in besteledi\u011fi \u0130zmir Mar\u015f\u0131;\n\u0130zzettin H\u00fcmayi El\u00e7io\u011flu Kimdir?\n\u0130zmir Mar\u015f\u0131 olarak me\u015fhur olmu\u015f ancak Orijinalinin Kafkasya Mar\u015f\u0131 oldu\u011fu anla\u015f\u0131lan bestenin sahibi \u0130zzettin H\u00fcmayi El\u00e7io\u011flu, 1870\u2019li y\u0131llar\u0131n sonuna do\u011fru \u0130stanbul\u2019un Fatih il\u00e7esinde do\u011fmu\u015ftur. Nezaret g\u00f6revlisi olarak uzun s\u00fcre \u00e7al\u0131\u015fm\u0131\u015f ve daha sonra emekli olana kadar musiki \u00f6\u011fretmenli\u011fi yapm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r. Musiki \u00f6\u011frenmeye \u00e7ok k\u00fc\u00e7\u00fck ya\u015flarda ba\u015flayan El\u00e7io\u011flu, hem Do\u011fu hem Bat\u0131 musikisine hakimdi. Bir\u00e7ok \u00f6nemli eseri olan ve 3 Ekim 1950\u2019de vefat eden bestekar, Edirnekap\u0131 mezarl\u0131\u011f\u0131na defnedilmi\u015ftir.\nKafkasya Mar\u015f\u0131\n\u0130zmir Mar\u015f\u0131\u2019n\u0131n orijinal hali olan Kafkasya Mar\u015f\u0131\u2019n\u0131n seslendirilmi\u015f hali;\nDo\u011fruluk Y\u00fczdesi\nKaynaklar:\nege.edu.tr, eksd.org, eksd.org 2, haber.sol.org, H\u00fcrriyet, earsiv.sehir.edu.tr, Youtube, Youtube 2, Youtube 3\n[Toplam:1    Ortalama:5/5] \u0130zmir Mar\u015f\u0131\u2019n\u0131n Kafkasya Mar\u015f\u0131 Oldu\u011fu \u0130ddias\u0131", "Galatasaray Fan Club sayfas\u0131 Twitter\u2019da, Galatasaray\u2019\u0131n Real Madrid ma\u00e7\u0131nda yapt\u0131\u011f\u0131 koreografinin, BBC taraf\u0131ndan \u015eampiyonlar Ligi tarihinde yap\u0131lan en iyi koreografi se\u00e7ildi\u011fini iddia etmi\u015fti.\nAncak iddia do\u011fru de\u011fildir. Galatasaray\u2019\u0131n koreografisi BBC taraf\u0131ndan \u015eampiyonlar Ligi tarihindeki en iyi koreografi olarak se\u00e7ilmemi\u015ftir.\nBBC Se\u00e7medi\nBBC\u2019nin internet sitesinde Ciaran Varley taraf\u0131ndan 31 Ekim 2017 tarhinde, \u201cSome of the best tifos from the Champions League (\u015eampiyonlar Ligindeki En \u0130yi Tifolardan Baz\u0131lar\u0131)\u201d ba\u015fl\u0131\u011f\u0131 alt\u0131nda bir haber yap\u0131lm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r. Koreografi ifadesi i\u00e7in \u0130talyanca bir kelime olan \u201cTifo\u201d s\u00f6zc\u00fc\u011f\u00fc kullan\u0131lan haberde, farkl\u0131 futbol kul\u00fcplerine ait \u00e7e\u015fitli tarihlerde yap\u0131lan 8 koreografi \u00f6rne\u011fine yer verilmi\u015ftir.\nAralar\u0131nda Atletico Madrid, Sparak Moscow, Real Madrid, Legia Warsaw, Celtic gibi d\u00fcnyaca \u00fcnl\u00fc tak\u0131mlar\u0131n bulundu\u011fu haberde Galatasaray Spor Kul\u00fcb\u00fc de yer almaktad\u0131r. Habere, Galatasaray\u2019\u0131n Eyl\u00fcl 2013\u2019te Real Madrid ile yapt\u0131\u011f\u0131 ma\u00e7ta olu\u015fturulan koreografinin foto\u011fraf\u0131 da konulmu\u015ftur.\nHerhangi resmi bir kritere g\u00f6re se\u00e7ilmeyen koreografi \u00f6rnekleri, haberi yazan ki\u015fi taraf\u0131ndan be\u011fenilerek konulmu\u015f \u00f6rneklerdir.\nBBC\u2019nin Haberi\nDevam Eden Ankette Galatasaray Birinci\nBBC\u2019deki haberin son k\u0131sm\u0131nda okuyucular\u0131n oylamas\u0131 i\u00e7in i\u00e7erikteki koreografileri kapsayan bir anket olu\u015fturulmu\u015ftur. Sonucu, oy verildi\u011finde g\u00f6r\u00fcnen ankette Galatasaray, %62 ile en y\u00fcksek oy alan tak\u0131m durumundad\u0131r. Ancak anket haberin yay\u0131nland\u0131\u011f\u0131 tarihten itibaren devam etmektedir. Bu y\u00fczden anket sonu\u00e7lar\u0131ndaki y\u00fczdeler s\u00fcrekli de\u011fi\u015fmektedir.\nYeni\u015fafak\u2018\u0131n 1 Kas\u0131m 2017\u2019de yapt\u0131\u011f\u0131 habere g\u00f6re, Galatasaray %69 oranla birincidir. BBC haberine bakan okuyucular taraf\u0131ndan oylanan ankette Galatasaray hala birincili\u011fini korurken bug\u00fcn oran %62\u2018ye d\u00fc\u015fm\u00fc\u015ft\u00fcr.\nBBC\u2019nin Haberindeki Anket\nAnketin hala devam etmesi ve y\u00fczdelerin s\u00fcrekli de\u011fi\u015fmesi, Galatasaray\u2019\u0131n birincili\u011finin resmi veriler sonucu yap\u0131lan bir anketle de\u011fil, sitedeki habere gelen ve gelmeye devam eden okuyucular taraf\u0131ndan oyland\u0131\u011f\u0131n\u0131 g\u00f6stermektedir.\nForumlarda \u201cOylar\u0131m\u0131z\u0131 Kullanal\u0131m\u201d Ba\u015fl\u0131\u011f\u0131\nHaberin BBC\u2019de yay\u0131nland\u0131\u011f\u0131 g\u00fcn baz\u0131 forum sitelerinde Galatasaray koreografisine oy vermeye y\u00f6nelik ba\u015fl\u0131klar a\u00e7\u0131larak, taraftarlar ankete oy vermeye te\u015fvik edilmi\u015ftir:\nForum Donan\u0131m Haber\nGs Cimbom Forum\nAyr\u0131ca Ek\u015fi S\u00f6zl\u00fck\u2018te de \u201cBBC\u2019nin 2017 koreografi yar\u0131\u015fmas\u0131\u201d ba\u015fl\u0131\u011f\u0131 a\u00e7\u0131lm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r. Dolay\u0131s\u0131yla anketin bir BBC ara\u015ft\u0131rmas\u0131 sonucu de\u011fil, okuyucular\u0131n oy vererek sonucu belirledi\u011fi anla\u015f\u0131lmaktad\u0131r. \u015eu anki durumda Galatasaray %62 oyla birinci s\u0131radad\u0131r. Ancak anket hala devam etti\u011finden kesin bir sonuca varmak m\u00fcmk\u00fcn de\u011fildir.\n\u0130ddiaya konu olan koreografinin videosu:\nDo\u011fruluk Y\u00fczdesi\nKaynaklar:\n1-Galatasaray Fan Club 2-BBC 3-Donan\u0131mHaber 4-GsCimbom 5-Yeni\u015fafak 6-Ek\u015fi S\u00f6zl\u00fck\n[Toplam:1    Ortalama:5/5] Galatasaray Koreografisinin Birinci Oldu\u011fu \u0130ddias\u0131", "Ge\u00e7ti\u011fimiz g\u00fcnlerde sosyal medyada yer alan bir payla\u015f\u0131mda, Gazze\u2019de ya\u015fam hakk\u0131n\u0131 savunan Hollywood\u2018un \u00fcnl\u00fc sinema sanat\u00e7\u0131lar\u0131 Penelope Cruz ve e\u015fi Javier Bardem\u2018in, sekt\u00f6rdeki baz\u0131 yap\u0131mc\u0131 ve oyuncular taraf\u0131ndan d\u0131\u015fland\u0131\u011f\u0131 iddia edilmi\u015fti.\n\u0130spanyol sinema sanat\u00e7\u0131s\u0131 Penelope Cruz (43) ve Javier Bardem\u2019in (48), \u0130srail\u2019in eylemlerini k\u0131nayan ve \u201ckatliam\u201d yapt\u0131\u011f\u0131n\u0131 yazan a\u00e7\u0131k bir mektubu imzalamalar\u0131 ve Gazze\u2019ye destek vermeleri sebebiyle \u00fcst d\u00fczey Hollywood y\u00f6neticilerinden ciddi bir tepki ald\u0131klar\u0131 bildirildi.\nOscar sahibi evli akt\u00f6rler Penelope Cruz ve Javier Bardem, \u0130srail\u2019i \u201csoyk\u0131r\u0131m\u201d ile su\u00e7layan a\u00e7\u0131k bir mektubu imzalad\u0131lar. \u201cGazze bug\u00fcnlerde korku i\u00e7inde ya\u015f\u0131yor, kara, deniz ve havadan ku\u015fat\u0131l\u0131p sald\u0131r\u0131ya u\u011fruyor.\u201d dediler.\n\u00c7ift, \u0130spanya taraf\u0131ndan Avrupa Birli\u011fi\u2019ne yap\u0131lan, \u0130srail\u2019in Gazze\u2019deki askeri operasyonunu sona erdirme \u00e7a\u011fr\u0131s\u0131 olan yaz\u0131l\u0131 a\u00e7\u0131k mektubu imzalayan 100 film profesyoneli aras\u0131nda yer alm\u0131\u015ft\u0131.\nPenelope Cruz\nAncak yapt\u0131klar\u0131, Hollywood\u2019un \u00fcst d\u00fczey y\u00f6neticilerinin \u00f6fkesine ve onlar\u0131n kariyerlerinin sorgulanmas\u0131na yol a\u00e7t\u0131. Bir \u00fcst d\u00fczey y\u00f6netici, Hollywood Reporter\u2019e \u2018Javier ve Penelope\u2019ye \u00f6fkeli\u2018 oldu\u011funu ve \u2018\u00e7iftle tekrar \u00e7al\u0131\u015fmak isteyip istemedi\u011finden emin olmad\u0131\u011f\u0131n\u0131\u2018 s\u00f6yledi.\nPenelope Cruz\u2019un, \u201cmektubu imzalamaktaki niyetinin ve tek iste\u011finin hem \u0130srail hem de Gazze\u2019deki bar\u0131\u015f\u0131 sa\u011flamak\u201d oldu\u011funun net bir \u015fekilde a\u00e7\u0131klanmas\u0131na ra\u011fmen, kendisine inanmayan y\u00f6netici ve yap\u0131mc\u0131lar\u0131n oldu\u011fu da s\u00f6ylendi.\nPenelope Cruz\u2019un A\u00e7\u0131klamalar\u0131\nUSA Today gazetesinde yay\u0131nlanan bir bildiride aktris, grup mektubunu imzalarken, bu konuda \u2018uzman olmad\u0131\u011f\u0131n\u0131\u2018, bunun \u2018karma\u015f\u0131k\u2018 bir durum oldu\u011funu, \u2018tek iste\u011fi ve niyetinin Filistin ve \u0130srail\u2019de bar\u0131\u015f\u2018 oldu\u011funu vurgulam\u0131\u015ft\u0131.\nCruz, \u201cBu \u00f6nemli konuda yanl\u0131\u015f anla\u015f\u0131lmak istemiyorum, bu konuda uzman de\u011filim ve durumun karma\u015f\u0131kl\u0131\u011f\u0131n\u0131n fark\u0131nday\u0131m. Bu grup mektubunu imzalarken tek dile\u011fim ve niyetim hem \u0130srail hem de Gazze\u2019de bar\u0131\u015f olmas\u0131n\u0131 temenni etmemdi.\u201d dedi.\nKocas\u0131 akt\u00f6r Javier Bardem, konuyla ilgili tutumunu netle\u015ftiren ayr\u0131 bir bildiri yay\u0131mlayarak dava \u00fczerine \u015funlar\u0131 ekledi: \u201c\u0130mzam yaln\u0131zca bar\u0131\u015f\u0131 savunma anlam\u0131na geliyordu. Y\u0131k\u0131m ve nefret sadece daha fazla nefret ve y\u0131k\u0131m yarat\u0131r.\u201d\nAkademi \u00d6d\u00fcll\u00fc (Oscar) Bardem, \u201cBu, k\u00fc\u00e7\u00fck bir b\u00f6lgeye s\u0131k\u0131\u015ft\u0131r\u0131lm\u0131\u015f olan, insanlar\u0131n susuz b\u0131rak\u0131ld\u0131\u011f\u0131, hastanelerin, ambulanslar\u0131n ve \u00e7ocuklar\u0131n hedeflendi\u011fi ve ter\u00f6rist oldu\u011fu varsay\u0131m\u0131yla b\u00fct\u00fcn halka a\u00e7\u0131lan bir i\u015fgal sava\u015f\u0131\u201d dedi. \u0130spanyol gazetesi El Periodico\u2019ya g\u00f6nderdi\u011fi bir mektupta akt\u00f6r, fikirlerinin arkas\u0131nda durarak, \u201c\u015eu anda Gazze\u2019de ya\u015fanan deh\u015fete mesafeli veya tarafs\u0131z yakla\u015fmaya yer yok\u201d a\u00e7\u0131klamas\u0131nda bulundu.\nJavier Bardem\nMektup, sosyal medyada g\u00fc\u00e7l\u00fc bir tepki yaratt\u0131 ve muhafazak\u00e2r yorumcu Ben Shapiro (ele\u015ftirmen) taraf\u0131ndan \u201cantisemitik\u201d olarak damgaland\u0131: \u201cJavier Bardem ve Penelope Cruz\u2019un antisemitik olmalar\u0131ndan dolay\u0131, ancak \u0130spanya\u2019n\u0131n Yahudi nefreti nedeniyle bunun beklenmedik bir \u015fey olmad\u0131\u011f\u0131 i\u00e7in \u00fczg\u00fcn\u00fcm.\u201d yazan bir twitter payla\u015f\u0131m\u0131 yapt\u0131.\nEle\u015ftiriye tepki olarak Javier Bardem, \u201cBen ve e\u015fim (Penelope Cruz), baz\u0131lar\u0131 taraf\u0131ndan antisemitik olarak etiketlenmi\u015f durumday\u0131z, ki b\u00f6yle insanlar oldu\u011fumuzu asla kabul etmiyoruz. Antisemitizmden nefret ediyoruz. Sava\u015f\u0131n korkun\u00e7 ve ac\u0131 verici sonu\u00e7lar\u0131ndan nefret ediyoruz.\u201d dedi.\nOscar\u2019l\u0131 oyuncu Bardem, daha \u00f6nce de Gazze sorunu hakk\u0131nda konu\u015fmu\u015ftu.\n\u0130spanyol gazetesi El Diario\u2019ya konu\u015fan Bardem \u015funlar\u0131 s\u00f6ylemi\u015fti: \u201cBu barbarl\u0131\u011f\u0131 anlayam\u0131yorum. Yahudilerin ge\u00e7mi\u015fte ya\u015fad\u0131\u011f\u0131 korkun\u00e7 \u015feyleri g\u00f6z \u00f6n\u00fcne al\u0131rsak, onlar\u0131n Filistinlilere yapt\u0131klar\u0131 daha da ac\u0131mas\u0131z ve anla\u015f\u0131lmaz.\u201d\nFilistin\u2019de \u00f6ld\u00fcr\u00fclen \u00e7ocuklar \u00fczerine ise, \u201cEvet, bu adaletsizlik ve insanlar\u0131n \u00f6ld\u00fcr\u00fclmesi kar\u015f\u0131s\u0131nda \u00f6fkeliyim, utan\u0131yorum ve yaraland\u0131m. O \u00e7ocuklar \u00e7ocuklar\u0131m\u0131zd\u0131, \u00e7ok korkun\u00e7.\u201d dedi.\nFilistin\u2019e Destek Veren Baz\u0131 \u00dcnl\u00fcler\nOne Direction m\u00fczik grubundan Pakistan as\u0131ll\u0131 \u0130ngiliz Zayn Malik, 13 milyon takip\u00e7isine #FreePalestine (\u00f6zg\u00fcr Filistin) yazd\u0131ktan sonra Twitter\u2019de \u00f6l\u00fcm tehditleri ile bombard\u0131mana tutuldu. Tweet 130.000\u2019in \u00fczerinde retweet ald\u0131, ancak k\u0131sa zaman i\u00e7inde retweet yapan herkesin Malik ile ayn\u0131 g\u00f6r\u00fc\u015fte olmad\u0131\u011f\u0131 ortaya \u00e7\u0131kt\u0131.\nMia Farrow (73)\n  Aktris ve Unicef el\u00e7isi Mia Farrow, Twitter\u2019de \u015funlar\u0131 s\u00f6yledi: \u201c\u0130srail\u2019in Gazze\u2019ye y\u00f6nelik sald\u0131r\u0131lar\u0131n\u0131 ve antisemitizmin korkun\u00e7lu\u011funu tutkuyla protesto edebiliriz.\u201d Ayr\u0131ca Farrow, \u201cHamas\u2019\u0131 desteklemiyorum, her yerde \u00e7ocuklar\u0131 \u00f6nemsiyorum.\u201d dedi.\n  \u0130ngiliz m\u00fczik grubu Massive Attack, L\u00fcbnan\u2019daki Bourj el-Barajneh m\u00fclteci kamp\u0131n\u0131 ziyaret ettikten sonra, gen\u00e7 Filistinli m\u00fcltecileri desteklemek i\u00e7in \u2018sevgi ve ba\u011fl\u0131l\u0131k\u2018 konu\u015fmalar\u0131 yapt\u0131.\nSelena Gomez (25)\n  Eski Disney \u00e7ocuk y\u0131ld\u0131z\u0131 Selena Gomez, Instagram hesab\u0131nda \u201c\u0130nsanl\u0131k ile ilgili\u201d bir g\u00f6r\u00fcnt\u00fc yay\u0131nlad\u0131\u011f\u0131nda heyecana neden oldu. Gomez \u015funlar\u0131 yazd\u0131: \u201cGazze i\u00e7in dua et.\u201d\n  Rihanna (29)\nBarbadoslu \u015eark\u0131c\u0131 Rihanna, #FreePalestine (\u00f6zg\u00fcr Filistin) adl\u0131 bir tweet atm\u0131\u015f, ancak sekiz dakika sonra silmi\u015fti. Daha sonra bunun kaza sonucu yaz\u0131ld\u0131\u011f\u0131n\u0131 iddia etti.\n  Brian Eno (69)\nBritanyal\u0131 m\u00fczisyen ve yap\u0131mc\u0131 Brian Eno, \u0130srail\u2019in Gazze\u2019deki eylemini \u2018etnik temizlik\u2018 olarak adland\u0131rd\u0131 ve David Byrne\u2019nin web sitesinde a\u00e7\u0131k bir mektupta k\u0131nad\u0131.\nGazze\u2019deki Soyk\u0131r\u0131m \u00dczerine ABD\u2019li ve Avrupal\u0131 Sanat\u00e7\u0131lar\nAmerikal\u0131 ve Avrupal\u0131 film y\u0131ld\u0131zlar\u0131, televizyon \u00fcnl\u00fcleri ve m\u00fczisyenler, \u0130srail hakk\u0131ndaki g\u00f6r\u00fc\u015fleri d\u0131\u015f\u0131nda, ortak bir k\u00fclt\u00fcr payla\u015f\u0131yorlar.\nAmerikal\u0131 \u00fcnl\u00fcler \u0130srail\u2019i b\u00fcy\u00fck \u00f6l\u00e7\u00fcde desteklerken, Avrupal\u0131 meslekta\u015flar\u0131 \u00fclkeyi giderek \u201csoyk\u0131r\u0131m\u201d yapan \u201c\u0131rk\u00e7\u0131 ve ayr\u0131mc\u0131\u201d bir devlet olarak g\u00f6r\u00fcyorlar.\nMevcut \u00e7at\u0131\u015fma, Yahudi devletinin g\u00fcvenlik politikalar\u0131 \u00fczerine \u00fcnl\u00fc isimlerin hi\u00e7 olmad\u0131\u011f\u0131 kadar b\u00f6l\u00fcnmesine sebep oluyor.\nEn az\u0131ndan Amerikan y\u0131ld\u0131zlar\u0131, sivil kay\u0131plar hakk\u0131nda endi\u015felerini dile getirirken, b\u00fcy\u00fck oranda \u0130srail\u2019i destekliyor. Ancak Avrupal\u0131 \u00fcnl\u00fc meslekta\u015flar\u0131, \u0130srail\u2019i Filistinlilere kar\u015f\u0131 \u201ci\u015fgal ve imha sava\u015f\u0131\u201d y\u00fcr\u00fctmekle su\u00e7luyor.\nPink Floyd m\u00fczik grubundan Roger Waters ve Nick Mason, Rolling Stones m\u00fczik grubuna a\u00e7\u0131k bir mektup g\u00f6ndererek, kendilerinin planlad\u0131\u011f\u0131 gibi onlar\u0131 da \u0130srail\u2019de konser vermemeye \u00e7a\u011f\u0131rd\u0131.\nRoger Waters ve Nick Mason\nMektuba g\u00f6re Water ve Mason, \u201c\u015eu anda \u0130srail\u2019in yan\u0131nda yer almak, \u0130srail h\u00fck\u00fcmetinin adaletsiz ve \u0131rk\u00e7\u0131 rejiminin politikalar\u0131n\u0131 aklamak i\u00e7in kullanaca\u011f\u0131 bir propaganda yapmas\u0131n\u0131 sa\u011flar.\u201d dedi.\nMark Ruffalo (49)\nABD\u2019li akt\u00f6r, film y\u00f6netmeni, yap\u0131mc\u0131 ve senaryo yazar\u0131 Mark Ruffalo, Gazze\u2019de bir hastanenin bombalanmas\u0131 konusundaki kayg\u0131s\u0131n\u0131 tweet atarak belirterek, Daily Kos gazetesine \u201cGazze ile empati yapmak beni antisemitik, Hamas yanl\u0131s\u0131 ya da \u0130srail kar\u015f\u0131t\u0131 yapm\u0131yor, beni insan yap\u0131yor.\u201d dedi.\nKAYNAKLAR\nIndependent      Hollywoodreporter\n[Toplam:1    Ortalama:5/5] Gazze\u2019de Ya\u015fam Hakk\u0131n\u0131 Savunan Sanat\u00e7\u0131lar Hollywood\u2019da D\u0131\u015flan\u0131yor mu?", "Naz\u0131m Hikmet\u2019in kitab\u0131n\u0131n sans\u00fcrlendi\u011fi iddias\u0131n\u0131 ara\u015ft\u0131rd\u0131k. Baz\u0131 yay\u0131n organlar\u0131n\u0131n yapt\u0131\u011f\u0131 haberlere g\u00f6re, Naz\u0131m Hikmet\u2018in \u201cYa\u015famak G\u00fczel \u015eey Be Karde\u015fim\u201d adl\u0131 kitab\u0131n\u0131n Yap\u0131 Kredi Yay\u0131nlar\u0131 taraf\u0131ndan sans\u00fcrlenerek bas\u0131ld\u0131\u011f\u0131 iddia edildi.\nYap\u0131 Kredi yay\u0131nlar\u0131n\u0131n, \u201cYa\u015famak G\u00fczel \u015eey Be Karde\u015fim\u201d kitab\u0131n\u0131, baz\u0131 b\u00f6l\u00fcmlerindeki kelimelerde de\u011fi\u015fiklik yaparak bast\u0131\u011f\u0131 iddias\u0131 do\u011frudur. \nYa\u015famak G\u00fczel \u015eey Be Karde\u015fim, Yap\u0131 Kredi Yay\u0131nlar\u0131\nYap\u0131 Kredi Yay\u0131nlar\u0131na A\u00e7\u0131k Mektup\nNaz\u0131m Hikmet K\u00fclt\u00fcr Merkezi (NHKM) sans\u00fcrle ilgili, Yap\u0131 Kredi Yay\u0131nlar\u0131 Y\u00f6netim Kuruluna ve Naz\u0131m Hikmet\u2018in varislerine hitaben a\u00e7\u0131k bir mektup yay\u0131nlad\u0131. Mektupta, 2017 y\u0131l\u0131nda YKY taraf\u0131ndan bas\u0131lan Ya\u015famak G\u00fczel \u015eey Be Karde\u015fim roman\u0131n\u0131n 25 ayr\u0131 yerinde sans\u00fcr uygulanarak bas\u0131ld\u0131\u011f\u0131 belirtildi. Sans\u00fcrlenen k\u0131s\u0131mlar\u0131n siyasi sebepten oldu\u011funu s\u00f6yleyen NHKM, kitab\u0131n y\u0131llard\u0131r bir\u00e7ok \u00fclkede orijinal haliyle bas\u0131ld\u0131\u011f\u0131n\u0131 ifade etti.\n\u201cRoman\u0131 sans\u00fcrlemeyi s\u00fcrd\u00fcrd\u00fc\u011f\u00fcn\u00fcz 25 yerin tamam\u0131na yak\u0131n\u0131n\u0131n do\u011frudan kom\u00fcnizm ile ilgili oldu\u011fu g\u00f6r\u00fclmektedir.\nBu roman, nihai daktilo kopyalar\u0131n da ortaya koydu\u011fu gibi, N\u00e2z\u0131m Hikmet\u2019in kendisi taraf\u0131ndan yaz\u0131ld\u0131\u011f\u0131 \u00f6zg\u00fcn haliyle 1964\u2019te SSCB\u2019de (Rus\u00e7a), Bulgaristan\u2019da (T\u00fcrk\u00e7e) ve Fransa\u2019da (M\u00fcnevver Anda\u00e7\u2019\u0131n Frans\u0131zcaya \u00e7evirisiyle), do\u011fal olarak, sans\u00fcrs\u00fcz haliyle yay\u0131mlanm\u0131\u015f bulunmaktad\u0131r.\nBu roman, gayet iyi bildi\u011finiz gibi, yine Bulgaristan\u2019da, Bulgarcada, 1965 y\u0131l\u0131ndan itibaren sans\u00fcrs\u00fcz, \u00f6zg\u00fcn haliyle yay\u0131mlanm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r.\u201d\nAncak Abstrakt Dergisinin makalesine g\u00f6re, ilk olarak Romantika ad\u0131yla bas\u0131lan Ya\u015famak G\u00fczel \u015eey Be Karde\u015fim\u2019in YKY bask\u0131s\u0131nda 35 ayr\u0131 yerde sans\u00fcr uygulanm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r.\nKom\u00fcnizm Yerine Emek\u00e7i\n\u201cNaz\u0131m Hikmet\u2019in D\u00fcz yaz\u0131 Sanat\u0131\u201c ba\u015fl\u0131kl\u0131 makalede Ya\u015famak G\u00fczel \u015eey Be Karde\u015fim roman\u0131n\u0131 ele alan Rus filolog Prof. Dr. Svetlana N. Uturgauri, Naz\u0131m Hikmet\u2019in roman\u0131n\u0131n sonundaki bir \u015fiirine yer vermi\u015ftir.\n\u201cEmek\u00e7iyim \nSevday\u0131m tepeden t\u0131rna\u011fa,      Sevda: g\u00f6rmek, d\u00fc\u015f\u00fcnmek, anlamak \nSevda: do\u011fan \u00e7ocuk, y\u00fcr\u00fcyen ayd\u0131nl\u0131k,\nSevda: sal\u0131ncak kurmak y\u0131ld\u0131zlara,\nSevda: d\u00f6kmek \u00e7eli\u011fi kan ter i\u00e7inde \nEmek\u00e7iyim \nSevday\u0131m tepeden t\u0131rna\u011fa\u2026..\u201d\nRoman\u0131n i\u00e7indeki \u015fiir, 1962\u2019de tamamlanan kitab\u0131n yay\u0131nland\u0131\u011f\u0131 tarihten itibaren \u201cemek\u00e7iyim\u201d ifadesiyle bas\u0131lm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r. Sadece T\u00fcrk\u00e7e olarak de\u011fil, \u0130ngilizce olarak da i\u015f\u00e7iyim, emek\u00e7iyim anlam\u0131na gelen \u201cI\u2019m a worker\u201d ifadesiyle yay\u0131nlanan kitab\u0131n sonundaki \u015fiir, birka\u00e7 y\u0131l sonra Rus\u00e7aya ve Frans\u0131zcaya \u00e7evrilen bas\u0131mlar\u0131nda \u015fiir orijinal haliyle \u201ckom\u00fcnistim\u201d \u015feklindedir.\n  SoLHaber\u2018in yapt\u0131\u011f\u0131 habere g\u00f6re, Rus Filolog Svetlana N. Uturgauri\u2018nin makalesini \u00e7eviren E. Zeynep G\u00fcnal, sans\u00fcrle ilgili bir d\u00fczenleme yay\u0131nlad\u0131. \u201c\u00c7evirmenin Notu\u201d olarak sundu\u011fu a\u00e7\u0131klamada, \u015fiiri direkt olarak Adam Yay\u0131nlar\u0131n\u2019dan ald\u0131klar\u0131n\u0131 ve art\u0131k orijinal haliyle d\u00fczeltti\u011fini ifade etti:\n\u201cSvetlana N. Uturgauri\u2019nin bu makalesini 2007 y\u0131l\u0131nda YKY kitap-l\u0131k i\u00e7in \u00e7evirmi\u015ftik. \u00c7eviri Kas\u0131m ay\u0131 say\u0131s\u0131nda yay\u0131mlanm\u0131\u015ft\u0131. Bu \u00e7eviri s\u0131ras\u0131nda makalede romandan yap\u0131lan al\u0131nt\u0131lar i\u00e7in Adam Yay\u0131nlar\u0131\u2019n\u0131n 1987 bask\u0131s\u0131n\u0131 kullanm\u0131\u015ft\u0131k. Ancak 2017 y\u0131l\u0131 Ekim ay\u0131nda N\u00e2z\u0131m Hikmet\u2019in  \u201cYa\u015famak G\u00fczel \u015eey Be Karde\u015fim\u201d adl\u0131 e\u015fsiz roman\u0131n\u0131n sonunda yer alan \u015fiirin orijinalinde ilk dizenin Adam Yay\u0131nlar\u0131\u2019ndaki gibi \u201cEmek\u00e7iyim\u201d \u015feklinde de\u011fil, \u201cKom\u00fcnistim\u201d \u015feklinde  oldu\u011funu \u00f6\u011frendik. Bu \u015fiir Svetlana Uturgauri\u2019n\u0131n elinizdeki makalesinin Rus\u00e7a orijinalinde de \u201cKom\u00fcnistim\u201d dizesiyle yer al\u0131yordu ancak 2007\u2019de Adam Yay\u0131nlar\u0131\u2019nda mevcut oldu\u011fu i\u00e7in biz de \u015fiirin Adam Yay\u0131nlar\u0131\u2019ndaki metnini kullanma yoluna gitmi\u015ftik. Svetlana N.Uturgauri\u2019nin makale i\u00e7inde yer verdi\u011fi \u015fiirden \u00f6nce kulland\u0131\u011f\u0131 t\u00fcmcede savundu\u011fu d\u00fc\u015f\u00fcnce de \u201cemek\u00e7iyim\u201d s\u00f6zc\u00fc\u011f\u00fcyle de\u011fil, \u201cKom\u00fcnistim\u201d s\u00f6zc\u00fc\u011f\u00fcyle \u00f6rt\u00fc\u015fmektedir, yani t\u00fcmce N\u00e2z\u0131m\u2019\u0131n kulland\u0131\u011f\u0131 \u201cKom\u00fcnistim\u201d s\u00f6zc\u00fc\u011f\u00fcne g\u00f6re kurulmu\u015ftur. Dolay\u0131s\u0131yla N\u00e2z\u0131m\u2019\u0131n roman\u0131ndaki \u015fiirin asl\u0131na sad\u0131k kalmak, bir anlamda \u015fiire iade-i itibar etmek ve de en \u00f6nemlisi N\u00e2z\u0131m\u2019\u0131n hem \u015fair kimli\u011fine hem de politik inanc\u0131na sayg\u0131m\u0131z\u0131 g\u00f6stermek amac\u0131yla \u201cEmek\u00e7iyim\u201di, orijinali olan \u201cKom\u00fcnistim\u201d s\u00f6zc\u00fc\u011f\u00fcyle de\u011fi\u015ftirerek \u00e7evirinin yeniden yay\u0131mlanmas\u0131n\u0131 uygun g\u00f6rd\u00fck. (Ekim 2017)\u201d\nKitap Yeniden Bas\u0131lacak\nYap\u0131 Kredi Yay\u0131nlar\u0131 yetkililerinden ald\u0131\u011f\u0131m\u0131z bilgiye g\u00f6re; Ya\u015famak G\u00fczel \u015eey Be Karde\u015fim roman\u0131n\u0131n \u00f6n\u00fcm\u00fczdeki birka\u00e7 hafta i\u00e7inde d\u00fczeltilerek tekrar bas\u0131laca\u011f\u0131 s\u00f6ylendi. YKY Bas\u0131nla \u0130li\u015fkiler yetkililerine, kitab\u0131n neden sans\u00fcrl\u00fc bas\u0131ld\u0131\u011f\u0131n\u0131 sormam\u0131z \u00fczerine, bu konuda bilgi vermek istemediklerini belirttiler.\nAyr\u0131ca birka\u00e7 hafta sonra yeni bas\u0131m\u0131 \u00e7\u0131kacak olan kitab\u0131n arka k\u0131sm\u0131nda, bas\u0131m nedeninin ve s\u00f6z konusu iddialar\u0131n a\u00e7\u0131klanaca\u011f\u0131n\u0131 s\u00f6ylediler.\nDo\u011fruluk Y\u00fczdesi\nKaynaklar: 1-NHKM 2-BirG\u00dcn 3-SoLHaber 4-Abstrakt \n[Toplam:0    Ortalama:0/5] Naz\u0131m Hikmet\u2019in Kitab\u0131n\u0131n Sans\u00fcrlendi\u011fi \u0130ddias\u0131", "Yayg\u0131n bir \u015fehir efsanesinde, ya\u015fayan en b\u00fcy\u00fck organizman\u0131n 20. y\u00fczy\u0131l\u0131n sonunda Amerika\u2019da ke\u015ffedilen bal mantar\u0131 oldu\u011fu kabul edilir.\nYa\u015fayan en b\u00fcy\u00fck canl\u0131 organizman\u0131n bir mantar oldu\u011fu do\u011frudur. Scientific American isimli internet sitesinde yer alan, Garip Ama Do\u011fru: D\u00fcnyan\u0131n En B\u00fcy\u00fck Organizmas\u0131 Bir Mantar ba\u015fl\u0131kl\u0131 makalede, bal mantar\u0131n\u0131n b\u00fcy\u00fckl\u00fc\u011f\u00fc, \u201cmavi balina b\u00fcy\u00fckt\u00fcr, ancak Do\u011fu Oregon\u2019da geni\u015fleyen mantar kadar b\u00fcy\u00fck de\u011fildir\u201d \u015feklinde belirtilmi\u015ftir.\nBal Mantar\u0131 Nas\u0131l Ke\u015ffedildi\n1998 y\u0131l\u0131nda, ara\u015ft\u0131rmac\u0131lar Oregon\u2019da bulunan Malheur Ulusal Orman\u0131\u2019ndaki 112 a\u011fac\u0131n \u00f6l\u00fcm\u00fcn\u00fc ara\u015ft\u0131r\u0131rken, d\u00fcnyada ya\u015fayan en b\u00fcy\u00fck organizma olan bal mantar\u0131n\u0131 (Armillaria solipides) ke\u015ffederler.\nABD\u2019nin Oregon eyaletindeki Malheur Ulusal Orman\u0131\u2019nda ke\u015ffedilen ve 2.200 hektar alan\u0131 kaplayan dev mantar; bulundu\u011fu araziyi bir \u00f6rg\u00fc gibi sararak a\u011fa\u00e7lar\u0131n \u00f6l\u00fcm\u00fcne neden olmu\u015ftu.\nUzmanlar yakla\u015f\u0131k 5,6 km uzunlu\u011funda ve 15 futbol sahas\u0131ndan daha geni\u015f bir alan\u0131 kapsayan bu mantar\u0131n, \u00fc\u00e7 metre yerin alt\u0131na inebildi\u011fini ve 2 bin 400 y\u0131ldan beri \u2018boy att\u0131\u011f\u0131\u2019 hesaplad\u0131. B\u00f6ylelikle Bal Mantar\u0131, ya\u015fayan en b\u00fcy\u00fck organizma olmas\u0131n\u0131n yan s\u0131ra en ya\u015fl\u0131 canl\u0131 olarak da tarihe ge\u00e7ti.\nBal Mantar\u0131\u2019n\u0131n Ya\u015fam Alanlar\u0131\nBal Mantar\u0131, ABD\u2019nin bat\u0131 b\u00f6lgelerinde, \u00f6zellikle topra\u011f\u0131n asidik oldu\u011fu yerlerde bulunur. Bununla birlikte \u0130ngiltere, \u0130rlanda ve Avrupa K\u0131tas\u0131n\u0131n yan\u0131 s\u0131ra Asya\u2019n\u0131n baz\u0131 b\u00f6lgelerinde, Avusturalya, Yeni Zelanda ve Kuzey Amerika\u2019da da ya\u015fayan bir t\u00fcr oldu\u011fu bilinmektedir.\nBal Mantar\u0131 Nerelerde Kullan\u0131lmaktad\u0131r\nBal Mantar\u0131, yabani mantarlar aras\u0131nda bulunan en lezzetli mantar t\u00fcrlerinden biri olarak kabul edilmektedir. Ayr\u0131ca yayg\u0131n olarak \u00e7orbalarda ve kremal\u0131 soslarda kullan\u0131lmaktad\u0131r. Bununla beraber, Bal Mantar\u0131\u2019n\u0131n ila\u00e7larda kullan\u0131lmas\u0131 i\u00e7in laboratuvarda bir tak\u0131m testler yap\u0131lmakta, a\u011fa\u00e7lar\u0131n k\u00f6k hastal\u0131klar\u0131 ile ilgili tedavilerde uygulanmaktad\u0131r.\nDo\u011fruluk Y\u00fczdesi\nKaynaklar:\nscientificamerican.com, wikipedia.org, gaiadergi.com, first-nature.com, mantar.pro\n[Toplam:0    Ortalama:0/5] Ya\u015fayan En B\u00fcy\u00fck Canl\u0131n\u0131n Bir Mantar Oldu\u011fu \u0130ddias\u0131", "Son g\u00fcnlerde sosyal medyada s\u0131k\u00e7a yer alan, G\u00fcney Kore\u2018de bir bakan\u0131n k\u0131z\u0131n\u0131n, babas\u0131ndan torpil istedi\u011fi i\u00e7in bas\u0131n\u0131n kar\u015f\u0131s\u0131nda utan\u00e7 i\u00e7inde \u00f6z\u00fcr diledi\u011fi iddias\u0131 yanl\u0131\u015ft\u0131r.\ns\u00f6z konusu iddiaya ait payla\u015f\u0131m\nHavayolu \u015eirketi Ba\u015fkan\u0131 ve Ceo Yard\u0131mc\u0131s\u0131 Olan K\u0131z\u0131\n\u0130ddia edilen foto\u011fraf 2014 y\u0131l\u0131ndan. Bakan oldu\u011fu s\u00f6ylenen ki\u015fi Korean Air ve Hanjin Grubu ba\u015fkan\u0131 Cho Yang-ho. E\u011filip \u00f6z\u00fcr dileyen ise onun b\u00fcy\u00fck k\u0131z\u0131, ayn\u0131 zamanda holdingin de ba\u015fkan yard\u0131mc\u0131s\u0131 Cho Hyun Ah.\n40 ya\u015f\u0131ndaki CEO yard\u0131mc\u0131s\u0131, babas\u0131n\u0131n \u015firketi Korean Air ile New York-Seul seferinde yolculuk yaparken, kalk\u0131\u015ftan hemen sonra u\u00e7a\u011f\u0131 terminale geri d\u00f6nd\u00fcr\u00fcyor ve bu manevra, u\u00e7a\u011f\u0131n 20 dakika gecikmesine sebep oluyor. Sebebi ise u\u00e7aktayken kendisine kabin ekibinin \u015fefi taraf\u0131ndan \u201cistemedi\u011fi halde\u201d f\u0131nd\u0131k ikram edilmesi ve f\u0131nd\u0131\u011f\u0131n kasede de\u011fil de orijinal paketinde sunulmas\u0131.\nTan\u0131klara g\u00f6re \u2018business class\u2019 taraf\u0131nda oturan Cho, f\u0131nd\u0131k ikram\u0131n\u0131n ard\u0131ndan kabin m\u00fcd\u00fcr\u00fc Park Chang-Jin ve bir kad\u0131n g\u00f6revliyle tart\u0131\u015f\u0131yor, hostesi kokpitin kap\u0131s\u0131na itiyor. Daha sonra g\u00f6revlilere diz \u00e7\u00f6kt\u00fcr\u00fcp \u00f6z\u00fcr diletiyor. Ard\u0131ndan da kabin \u015fefini kovuyor.\n\u015eirket s\u00f6zc\u00fcs\u00fcn\u00fcn AFP haber ajans\u0131na verdi\u011fi demece g\u00f6re Cho, her iki personelin evlerini ziyaret etti, ancak evde bulunmad\u0131klar\u0131 i\u00e7in kap\u0131lar\u0131na \u00fcz\u00fclerek not b\u0131rakt\u0131.\nSavunma avukatlar\u0131, Heather Cho\u2018nun u\u00e7u\u015f rotas\u0131n\u0131 de\u011fi\u015ftirerek havac\u0131l\u0131k g\u00fcvenlik yasas\u0131n\u0131 ihlal etti\u011fi su\u00e7lamas\u0131n\u0131 reddetti.\nA\u00e7\u0131k ye\u015fil hapishane \u00fcniformas\u0131 giyen Cho, duru\u015fma s\u0131ras\u0131nda konu\u015fmad\u0131.\nAvukatlar\u0131 mahkemeye, Cho\u2019nun eylemleri i\u00e7in \u00fczg\u00fcn oldu\u011funu ancak kanunen cezay\u0131 hak etmedi\u011fini s\u00f6yledi.\nAyr\u0131ca kabin ekibine kar\u015f\u0131 \u015fiddet kulland\u0131\u011f\u0131n\u0131 da reddettiler.\nHeather Cho, \u00e7ifte diz \u00e7\u00f6kt\u00fcrd\u00fc\u011f\u00fcn\u00fc de reddetti. \u201cBen b\u00f6yle bir \u015fey duymad\u0131m, bu konuda hi\u00e7bir \u015fey bilmiyorum.\u201d dedi. Ancak birinci s\u0131n\u0131fta oturan bir ba\u015fka yolcu iki g\u00f6revliyi dizlerinin \u00fczerinde g\u00f6rd\u00fc\u011f\u00fcn\u00fc s\u00f6yledi. Yolcu, \u201c14 saatlik u\u00e7u\u015f s\u0131ras\u0131nda atmosfer \u00e7ok tehditkar ve korkun\u00e7tu. Cho\u2018nun sesi \u00f6ylesine y\u00fcksekti ki ekonomi s\u0131n\u0131f\u0131ndaki insanlar bile duyup o y\u00f6ne bakt\u0131lar.\u201d dedi.\nHanjin Grubun Ceo\u2019su ya\u015fl\u0131 Cho Yang-ho, tekrar itibar kazanma giri\u015fiminde bulunarak, bir dizi muhabirin \u00f6n\u00fcnde k\u0131z\u0131n\u0131n davran\u0131\u015flar\u0131ndan \u00f6t\u00fcr\u00fc \u00f6z\u00fcr diledi.\nAyr\u0131ca, k\u0131z\u0131n\u0131n Hanjin Grubu\u2019ndaki g\u00f6revinden istifa etmesine m\u00fcsaade edilmeden i\u015ften \u00e7\u0131kar\u0131ld\u0131\u011f\u0131n\u0131 a\u00e7\u0131klad\u0131.\nReuters\u2019in haberine g\u00f6re, \u201cKore Havayollar\u0131\u2018n\u0131n ba\u015fkan\u0131 ve bir baba olarak, k\u0131z\u0131m\u0131n aptalca davran\u0131\u015f\u0131n\u0131n yol a\u00e7t\u0131\u011f\u0131 sorundan dolay\u0131 G\u00fcney Kore halk\u0131ndan \u00f6z\u00fcr dilerim.\u201d dedi.\n\u201cBeni su\u00e7lay\u0131n, bu benim hatam. Onu d\u00fczg\u00fcn \u015fekilde yeti\u015ftirmedim\u201d a\u00e7\u0131klamas\u0131nda bulundu.\nAyr\u0131 bir bas\u0131n toplant\u0131s\u0131nda konu\u015fan Cho Hyun Ah (di\u011fer ad\u0131yla Heather Cho) da davran\u0131\u015f\u0131ndan dolay\u0131 \u00fczg\u00fcn oldu\u011funu belirterek bas\u0131n\u0131n kar\u015f\u0131s\u0131nda ba\u015f\u0131n\u0131 e\u011ferek \u00f6z\u00fcr diledi.\nHeather Cho, Kore Havayollar\u0131 ba\u015fkan\u0131 Cho Yang-ho\u2018nun \u00fc\u00e7 \u00e7ocu\u011funun en b\u00fcy\u00fc\u011f\u00fc. Karde\u015fleri de kendisi gibi Korean Air \u015firketinin y\u00f6neticileri olarak \u00e7al\u0131\u015f\u0131yor.\nDo\u011fruluk Y\u00fczdesi\nKAYNAKLAR\nBusinessinsider   Straitstimes    Dailymail\n[Toplam:2    Ortalama:5/5] Kore\u2019de Bakan\u0131n Torpil \u0130steyen K\u0131z\u0131n\u0131 Azarlad\u0131\u011f\u0131 \u0130ddias\u0131", "Pazartesi Sendromu Nedir?\nPazartesi sendromu (veya ba\u015fka k\u00fclt\u00fcrlerde pazar sabah\u0131), hafta sonunu ge\u00e7irdikten sonra pazartesi sabah\u0131 i\u015f ba\u015f\u0131na gelindi\u011finde ya\u015fanan bo\u015fluk hissi ve ama\u00e7s\u0131zl\u0131k duygusudur. \u0130nsanlar bu durumda bir \u015feyleri tamamlam\u0131\u015f olma duygusu, mutluluk, de\u011fi\u015fim hissi veya sadece hissizlik gibi birbirinden farkl\u0131 duygular ya\u015far. Sonra tekrar \u00e7al\u0131\u015fmaya ba\u015fland\u0131\u011f\u0131nda ki\u015filer \u00e7o\u011funlukla kendilerine, \u201cBen kimim ve burada ne yap\u0131yorum?\u201d sorusunu sorar.\nPazartesi sendromunun ba\u015fl\u0131ca nedeni, ki\u015finin kendine uygun bir i\u015fte \u00e7al\u0131\u015fmamas\u0131, nerede ve ne i\u00e7in \u00e7al\u0131\u015ft\u0131\u011f\u0131n\u0131n fark\u0131nda olmamas\u0131d\u0131r. B\u00f6yle durumlarda hissedilen duygu bo\u015fluk, hayal k\u0131r\u0131kl\u0131\u011f\u0131 ya da \u00f6fkedir.\nPazartesi sendromu, yorgunluk, ba\u015f d\u00f6nmesi, g\u00f6\u011f\u00fcs s\u0131k\u0131\u015fmas\u0131, abdominal \u015fi\u015fme, i\u015ftah kayb\u0131, v\u00fccut a\u011fr\u0131s\u0131, dikkatsizlik ve pazartesi g\u00fcn\u00fc \u00e7al\u0131\u015f\u0131rken g\u00f6r\u00fclen di\u011fer semptomlar\u0131 ifade eder. \u0130nsanlar pazartesiden cumaya kadar \u201cdinamik bir stereotip\u201d olu\u015fturan bir \u00e7al\u0131\u015fma \u00fczerine yo\u011funla\u015f\u0131r. Hafta sonu dinlendikten ve enerji harcayacak i\u015f d\u0131\u015f\u0131nda ki\u015fisel i\u015flerle ilgilendikten sonra insanlar, \u201cPazartesi sendromu\u201d olarak adland\u0131r\u0131lan ve pazartesi g\u00fcn\u00fc insanlar\u0131n i\u015fe ve \u00e7al\u0131\u015fmaya d\u00f6nd\u00fcklerinde uyum sa\u011flamalar\u0131n\u0131 zorla\u015ft\u0131ran durumu ya\u015farlar.\nNeden \u00dcstesinden Gelmek Gerekir?\nPazartesi sendromunun \u00fcstesinden gelmek gerekir \u00e7\u00fcnk\u00fc bu;\nDengeli bir i\u015f hayat\u0131n\u0131n / \u00f6zel hayat\u0131n ilk ad\u0131m\u0131d\u0131r.\nHayal k\u0131r\u0131kl\u0131\u011f\u0131na u\u011framan\u0131z\u0131 ve bo\u015flu\u011fa d\u00fc\u015fmenizi en aza indirir; bu da sizi daha mutlu bir insan haline getirir.\nPazartesi sendromunun \u00fcstesinden gelirseniz, yaln\u0131zca pazartesi sabah\u0131yla de\u011fil, benzer durum ve zamanlarla da ba\u015fa \u00e7\u0131kabilir hale gelirsiniz.\nBu sendromuyla ba\u015fa \u00e7\u0131kmaman\u0131n, psikolojik y\u0131pranma ya da depresyon gibi daha ciddi sonu\u00e7lar do\u011furma riski vard\u0131r.\nPazartesi Sendromu Nas\u0131l A\u015f\u0131l\u0131r?\nPazartesi sabah\u0131 sendromu, yaln\u0131zca ki\u015filer ama\u00e7lar\u0131 do\u011frultusunda hareket etmeye odaklan\u0131rsa a\u015f\u0131labilir. Bu yolculuk basit de\u011fildir ve bir zorunluluktur. Ki\u015filerin bu s\u00fcrece adapte olabilmek i\u00e7in s\u00fcreye ve yeterli enerjiye ihtiya\u00e7lar\u0131 vard\u0131r.\nPazartesi Sendromunu \u00d6nleme Y\u00f6ntemleri\n\u00c7al\u0131\u015fmalar\u0131n\u0131z\u0131 veya projelerinizi d\u00fczg\u00fcn bir \u015fekilde ayarlay\u0131n ve bir i\u015f program\u0131 olu\u015fturun. Program\u0131 tam olarak uygulay\u0131n ve cuma g\u00fcn\u00fc yapman\u0131z gereken i\u015fi bir sonraki pazartesi g\u00fcn\u00fcne b\u0131rakmay\u0131n.\nKendinize ne istedi\u011finizi sorun. Ba\u015fkalar\u0131n\u0131n beklentileri hakk\u0131nda endi\u015felenmeyin, psikolojik bask\u0131y\u0131 nas\u0131l kald\u0131raca\u011f\u0131n\u0131z\u0131 \u00f6\u011frenin. Bolca g\u00fcne\u015flenin; bu v\u00fccudunuzu hormon salg\u0131lamaya te\u015fvik eder ve depresyonun olumsuz etkisini yat\u0131\u015ft\u0131r\u0131r.\nEgzersiz yapmak iyi bir yoldur; v\u00fccudunuza ve hislerinize konsantre olman\u0131za ve t\u00fcm sorunlar\u0131n\u0131z\u0131 ge\u00e7ici olarak bir tarafa b\u0131rakman\u0131za yard\u0131mc\u0131 olur.\n\u0130\u015f verimlili\u011finizi art\u0131rmak ve i\u015f tutumunuzu geli\u015ftirmek i\u00e7in arkada\u015flar\u0131n\u0131z ve meslekta\u015flar\u0131n\u0131zla s\u00fcrekli ileti\u015fim kurun.\nY\u00fcr\u00fcy\u00fc\u015fe \u00e7\u0131k\u0131n ve pazar g\u00fcn\u00fcn\u00fc ferah ve sessiz bir ortamda ge\u00e7irin.\nPazar ak\u015fam\u0131 s\u0131cak bir banyo yap\u0131n, uyurken hafif m\u00fczik dinleyin.\nPazartesi g\u00fcn\u00fcn\u00fc sab\u0131rs\u0131zl\u0131kla bekleyece\u011finiz maddeler listeleyin.\nPazar g\u00fcn\u00fc ak\u015fam 23:00\u2019dan \u00f6nce yatmay\u0131 garantileyin, yorgunlu\u011funuzu atabilece\u011finiz rahatlat\u0131c\u0131 aromaterapiler uygulay\u0131n; lavanta iyi bir se\u00e7im olacakt\u0131r.\nPazartesi sabah\u0131 \u015firketinize veya okulunuza biraz erken giderek bir haftal\u0131k i\u015finizi organize edin.\nV\u00fccut metabolizmas\u0131n\u0131n y\u00fck\u00fcn\u00fc azaltmaya yard\u0131mc\u0131 olabilecek, daha az kolestrol i\u00e7eren yemekler se\u00e7in.\n\u00c7ok fazla kahve i\u00e7erek pazartesi sendromuna direnmeye \u00e7al\u0131\u015fmay\u0131n, \u00e7\u00fcnk\u00fc semptomlar daha da k\u00f6t\u00fcle\u015febilir.\nM\u00fckemmel bir makyaj ve yeni k\u0131yafetler be\u015f dakika i\u00e7inde ne\u015felenmenize yard\u0131mc\u0131 olabilir, bu arada g\u00fc\u00e7l\u00fc bir a\u011f\u0131z gargaras\u0131 kullanmak da ayn\u0131 etkiye sahiptir.\nKAYNAKLAR\nIft  Linkedin\n[Toplam:1    Ortalama:5/5] Pazartesi Sendromu", "Ge\u00e7ti\u011fimiz g\u00fcnlerde sosyal medyada payla\u015f\u0131lan ve son 1 y\u0131la ait zam oranlar\u0131n\u0131 g\u00f6sterdi\u011fi iddia edilen bir g\u00f6rsel sadece Twitter\u2019da 10 bin be\u011feni ald\u0131. S\u00f6z konusu g\u00f6rselde iddia edilen zam oranlar\u0131 do\u011fru de\u011fildir.\n    Son 1 y\u0131la ait zam oranlar\u0131n\u0131 g\u00f6rmek ad\u0131na, T\u00dc\u0130K\u2019in yay\u0131nlad\u0131\u011f\u0131 t\u00fcketici fiyat endeksini (T\u00dcFE) ve maa\u015f istatistiklerini inceledik.\nT\u00dcFE Nedir?\nT\u00dcFE, hanehalklar\u0131n\u0131n t\u00fcketimine y\u00f6nelik mal ve hizmet fiyatlar\u0131n\u0131n zaman i\u00e7indeki de\u011fi\u015fimini \u00f6l\u00e7mektedir. 2003 temel y\u0131ll\u0131 T\u00dcFE\u2019nin temel amac\u0131; piyasada t\u00fcketime konu olan mal ve hizmetlerin fiyatlar\u0131ndaki de\u011fi\u015fimi \u00f6l\u00e7erek enflasyon oran\u0131n\u0131 hesaplamakt\u0131r. Bu amaca y\u00f6nelik olarak hanehalklar\u0131n\u0131n, yabanc\u0131 ziyaret\u00e7ilerin ve kurumsal n\u00fcfusun yurti\u00e7inde yapt\u0131\u011f\u0131 t\u00fcm nihai parasal t\u00fcketim harcamalar\u0131 dikkate al\u0131nmaktad\u0131r.\nSon 1 y\u0131l\u0131n Zam Oranlar\u0131\nDo\u011falgaz 2017 Zam Oran\u0131\nS\u00f6z konusu payla\u015f\u0131mdaki maddelerin fiyat de\u011fi\u015fimlerini T\u00dcFE raporuna g\u00f6re s\u0131ras\u0131yla incelemek ve zam oran\u0131n\u0131 hesaplamak m\u00fcmk\u00fcn. \u0130ddiaya g\u00f6re do\u011falgaz zam oran\u0131 %34 olarak belirtilmi\u015ftir. T\u00dcFE raporlar\u0131na g\u00f6re do\u011falgaz i\u00e7in 2016 ile 2017 aras\u0131ndaki fiyat de\u011fi\u015fimleri \u015f\u00f6yle;\n2017 y\u0131l\u0131 i\u00e7in Kas\u0131m ve Aral\u0131k aylar\u0131n\u0131n fiyat ortalamalar\u0131 hen\u00fcz raporlanmad\u0131\u011f\u0131ndan, hem 2016 hem 2017 y\u0131l\u0131 i\u00e7in ortalama hesaplamas\u0131n\u0131 10 ay \u00fczerinden almak gerekmektedir. Buna g\u00f6re;\n2016 y\u0131l\u0131 do\u011falgaz i\u00e7in ilk 10 ay\u0131n fiyat ortalamas\u0131: 1,18692\n2017 y\u0131l\u0131 do\u011falgaz i\u00e7in ilk 10 ay\u0131n fiyat ortalamas\u0131: 1,12579\nBuna g\u00f6re 2016 ve 2017 y\u0131llar\u0131n\u0131n ilk 10 ay\u0131 i\u00e7in do\u011falgaz fiyat ortalamalar\u0131 hesapland\u0131\u011f\u0131nda bir zam yap\u0131lmad\u0131\u011f\u0131, hatta indirim uyguland\u0131\u011f\u0131 g\u00f6r\u00fclmektedir. 2016 y\u0131l\u0131n\u0131n sonu itibariyle do\u011falgaz fiyatlar\u0131na indirim uygulanaca\u011f\u0131 haberlerinin de medyada, Bas\u0131n \u0130lan Kurumu resmi web sitesinde ve Enerji ve Tabii Kaynaklar Bakanl\u0131\u011f\u0131 resmi web sitesinde yer ald\u0131\u011f\u0131 g\u00f6r\u00fclmektedir. Ayr\u0131ca T\u00dc\u0130K raporlar\u0131nda da do\u011falgaz ortalama birim fiyatlar\u0131n\u0131n 2017 y\u0131l\u0131 ilk \u00e7eyrek itibariyle d\u00fc\u015ft\u00fc\u011f\u00fc g\u00f6r\u00fclmektedir. Sonu\u00e7 olarak, do\u011falgaz i\u00e7in %34 oran\u0131nda zam yap\u0131ld\u0131\u011f\u0131 iddias\u0131 do\u011fru de\u011fildir.\nK\u00f6m\u00fcr 2017 Zam Oran\u0131\n\u0130ddiaya g\u00f6re k\u00f6m\u00fcr zam oran\u0131 %26 olarak belirtilmi\u015ftir. T\u00dcFE raporlar\u0131na g\u00f6re k\u00f6m\u00fcr fiyatlar\u0131 i\u00e7in 2016 ve 2017 fiyat de\u011fi\u015fimleri \u015f\u00f6yle;\n2016 y\u0131l\u0131 k\u00f6m\u00fcr i\u00e7in ilk 10 ay\u0131n fiyat ortalamas\u0131: 591,6019\n2017 y\u0131l\u0131 k\u00f6m\u00fcr i\u00e7in ilk 10 ay\u0131n fiyat ortalamas\u0131: 699,2102\nBuna g\u00f6re 2016 ve 2017 y\u0131llar\u0131n\u0131n ilk 10 ay\u0131 i\u00e7in k\u00f6m\u00fcr fiyat ortalamalar\u0131 hesapland\u0131\u011f\u0131nda \u00e7\u0131kan sonuca g\u00f6re, k\u00f6m\u00fcre uygulanan zam oran\u0131n\u0131n %18 oldu\u011fu g\u00f6r\u00fclmektedir.\nNormal Fiyat: 591,6019\nZam Tutar\u0131: 107,6083\nZaml\u0131 Fiyat: 699,2102\nZam Oran\u0131: %18,18930939877\nBu durumda, k\u00f6m\u00fcr zam oran\u0131n\u0131n %26 oldu\u011fu iddias\u0131 do\u011fru de\u011fildir.\nBenzin 2017 Zam Oran\u0131\n\u0130ddiaya g\u00f6re benzine uygulanan zam oran\u0131 %23 olarak belirtilmi\u015ftir. T\u00dcFE raporlar\u0131na g\u00f6re benzin fiyatlar\u0131 i\u00e7in 2016 ve 2017 fiyat de\u011fi\u015fimleri \u015f\u00f6yle;\n2016 y\u0131l\u0131 benzin i\u00e7in ilk 10 ay\u0131n fiyat ortalamas\u0131: 4,4405\n2017 y\u0131l\u0131 benzin i\u00e7in ilk 10 ay\u0131n fiyat ortalamas\u0131: 5,23928\nBuna g\u00f6re 2016 ve 2017 y\u0131llar\u0131n\u0131n ilk 10 ay\u0131 i\u00e7in benzin fiyat ortalamalar\u0131 hesapland\u0131\u011f\u0131nda \u00e7\u0131kan sonuca g\u00f6re, benzine uygulanan zam oran\u0131n\u0131n %17 oldu\u011fu g\u00f6r\u00fclmektedir.\nNormal Fiyat: 4,4405\nZam Tutar\u0131: 0,79878\nZaml\u0131 Fiyat: 5,23928\nZam Oran\u0131: %17,988514806891\nBu durumda, benzin zam oran\u0131n\u0131n %23 oldu\u011fu iddias\u0131 do\u011fru de\u011fildir.\nElektrik 2017 Zam Oran\u0131\n\u0130ddiaya g\u00f6re elektri\u011fe uygulanan zam oran\u0131 %19 olarak belirtilmi\u015ftir. T\u00dcFE raporlar\u0131nda yer alan elektrik fiyatlar\u0131 i\u00e7in 2016 ve 2017 fiyat de\u011fi\u015fimleri \u015f\u00f6yle;\n2016 y\u0131l\u0131 elektrik i\u00e7in ilk 10 ay\u0131n fiyat ortalamas\u0131: 0,41216\n2017 y\u0131l\u0131 elektrik i\u00e7in ilk 10 ay\u0131n fiyat ortalamas\u0131: 0,41182\nBuna g\u00f6re 2016 ve 2017 y\u0131llar\u0131n\u0131n ilk 10 ay\u0131 i\u00e7in elektrik fiyat ortalamalar\u0131 hesapland\u0131\u011f\u0131nda \u00e7\u0131kan sonuca g\u00f6re, elektri\u011fe bir zam yap\u0131lmad\u0131\u011f\u0131, hatta indirim uyguland\u0131\u011f\u0131 g\u00f6r\u00fclmektedir. 2016 y\u0131l\u0131n\u0131n sonu itibariyle elektrik i\u00e7in zam \u00f6ng\u00f6r\u00fclmedi\u011fini, maliyetlerin d\u00fc\u015fmesine dayal\u0131 olarak gelecek d\u00f6nemde tam tersine fiyatlarda %3-4 oran\u0131nda d\u00fc\u015f\u00fc\u015f olabilece\u011fine dair haberler medyada yer alm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r. T\u00dc\u0130K\u2019in T\u00dcFE de\u011ferlendirme raporlar\u0131nda da elektri\u011fin birim fiyat\u0131nda zam yap\u0131lmad\u0131\u011f\u0131 g\u00f6r\u00fclmektedir. Sonu\u00e7 olarak elektri\u011fe %19 zam yap\u0131ld\u0131\u011f\u0131 iddias\u0131 do\u011fru de\u011fildir.\n2017 Maa\u015f Zamm\u0131 Oranlar\u0131\nMemur ve Emekli Maa\u015flar\u0131 2017 Zam Oranlar\u0131\n2017 y\u0131l\u0131 Ocak ay\u0131ndan ge\u00e7erli olmak \u00fczere kamu g\u00f6revlileri ile emeklilerinin tamam\u0131n\u0131n maa\u015f ve \u00fccretlerinde %3 oran\u0131nda art\u0131\u015f sa\u011flanm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r. Ayn\u0131 d\u00f6nemde SSK ve Ba\u011f-Kur emekli ayl\u0131klar\u0131 ise bir \u00f6nceki d\u00f6nem ger\u00e7ekle\u015fen enflasyona ba\u011fl\u0131 olarak %4.73 oran\u0131nda art\u0131r\u0131lm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r.\n2017 y\u0131l\u0131 Temmuz ay\u0131ndan ge\u00e7erli olmak \u00fczere ise kamu \u00e7al\u0131\u015fanlar\u0131n\u0131n maa\u015f ve \u00fccretlerinde %4 oran\u0131nda genel zam \u00f6ng\u00f6r\u00fclm\u00fc\u015ft\u00fcr. 2017 y\u0131l\u0131 ilk alt\u0131 ay\u0131nda enflasyon %5,89 ger\u00e7ekle\u015fmi\u015ftir. Ger\u00e7ekle\u015fen bu enflasyon oran\u0131ndan kaynakl\u0131 olarak ilave %2,92 art\u0131\u015f ile birlikte kamu \u00e7al\u0131\u015fanlar\u0131n\u0131n ayl\u0131k ve \u00fccretlerinde Temmuz ay\u0131ndan ge\u00e7erli olmak \u00fczere toplamda %6,92 oran\u0131nda art\u0131\u015f yap\u0131lm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r.  Bu \u00e7er\u00e7evede aile yard\u0131m\u0131 \u00f6dene\u011fi dahil en d\u00fc\u015f\u00fck memur maa\u015f\u0131 2.558 TL\u2019den, 2.721 TL\u2019ye y\u00fckselmi\u015ftir.\n2017 y\u0131l\u0131 Temmuz ay\u0131nda memur emeklilerinin ayl\u0131klar\u0131nda da enflasyon zamm\u0131 dahil %6,92 oran\u0131nda art\u0131\u015f yap\u0131lm\u0131\u015f ve en d\u00fc\u015f\u00fck memur emekli ayl\u0131\u011f\u0131 1.750 TL\u2019den, 1.871 TL\u2019ye y\u00fckselmi\u015ftir.\nBu d\u00f6nemde, SSK ve Ba\u011f-Kur emekli ayl\u0131klar\u0131nda ise %5,89 oran\u0131nda art\u0131\u015f sa\u011flanm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r. B\u00f6ylece en d\u00fc\u015f\u00fck SSK emekli ayl\u0131\u011f\u0131 1.402 TL\u2019den 1.485 TL\u2019ye, en d\u00fc\u015f\u00fck esnaf Ba\u011f Kur emekli ayl\u0131\u011f\u0131 ise 1.256 TL\u2019den 1.330 TL\u2019ye y\u00fckselmi\u015ftir.\nS\u00f6z konusu art\u0131\u015flarla birlikte 2017 y\u0131l\u0131n\u0131n tamam\u0131nda kamu g\u00f6revlileri ile memur emeklilerinin maa\u015f ve \u00fccretlerinde k\u00fcm\u00fclatif bazda %10,1, SSK ve Ba\u011f-Kur emekli ayl\u0131klar\u0131na ise k\u00fcm\u00fclatif bazda %10,9 oran\u0131nda zam yap\u0131lm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r.\nSonu\u00e7 olarak memur ve emekli maa\u015flar\u0131na son 1 y\u0131lda toplam %3 zam yap\u0131ld\u0131\u011f\u0131 iddias\u0131 do\u011fru de\u011fildir.\nBuna g\u00f6re 2017 itibariyle memur maa\u015f (net) tablosu \u015f\u00f6yledir;\n2017 itibariyle en d\u00fc\u015f\u00fck emekli ayl\u0131\u011f\u0131 maa\u015f tablosu;\nMilletvekili Maa\u015f\u0131 2017 Zam Oran\u0131\nMilletvekilleri ve bakan maa\u015flar\u0131, T\u00fcrkiye B\u00fcy\u00fck Millet Meclisi \u00dcyelerinin \u00d6denek, Yolluk ve Emekliliklerine Dair Kanun h\u00fck\u00fcmleri \u00e7er\u00e7evesinde belirlenmektedir.\nBuna g\u00f6re, milletvekilleri en y\u00fcksek devlet memurunun maa\u015f\u0131 ile ayn\u0131 oranda maa\u015f almaktad\u0131r. En y\u00fcksek devlet memuru da Ba\u015fbakanl\u0131k M\u00fcste\u015far\u0131d\u0131r. Ba\u015fbakanl\u0131k M\u00fcste\u015far\u0131 i\u00e7in \u00f6denecek maa\u015f tutar\u0131 ise 3056 say\u0131l\u0131 Kanun\u2019da d\u00fczenlenmi\u015ftir.\nSosyal medyada geni\u015f yer alan payla\u015f\u0131mda, milletvekili maa\u015f\u0131na %45 oran\u0131nda zam yap\u0131ld\u0131\u011f\u0131 iddia edilmi\u015ftir. Ancak 2017 y\u0131l\u0131 itibariyle mevcut milletvekili maa\u015f\u0131, 16 bin 811 TL\u2019den 17 bin 969 TL\u2019ye y\u00fckselmi\u015ftir. Bu durumda 2017 y\u0131l\u0131 itibariyle milletvekili maa\u015f\u0131na yap\u0131lan zam hesapland\u0131\u011f\u0131nda %6.88 oran\u0131nda zam uyguland\u0131\u011f\u0131 g\u00f6r\u00fclmektedir.\nNormal Fiyat: 16,811\nZam Tutar\u0131: 1,158\nZaml\u0131 Fiyat: 17,969\nZam Oran\u0131: %6,88834691571\nSonu\u00e7 olarak, milletvekili maa\u015f\u0131na %45 oran\u0131nda zam yap\u0131ld\u0131\u011f\u0131 iddias\u0131 do\u011fru de\u011fildir. \nDo\u011fruluk Y\u00fczdesi\nKaynaklar:\nT\u00dc\u0130K \u2013 T\u00dcFE madde sepeti ve ortalama fiyatlar, T\u00dc\u0130K \u2013 T\u00dcFE rapor sistemi, Maliye.gov.tr, Bumko.gov.tr, Bumko.gov.tr 2, Bumko.gov.tr 3, Bik.gov.tr, Bik.gov.tr 2, Enerji.gov.tr, T\u00dc\u0130K \u2013 elektrik ve do\u011falgaz fiyatland\u0131rma b\u00fclteni, T\u00dc\u0130K \u2013 elektrik ve do\u011falgaz raporu de\u011ferlendirmesi, T\u00dc\u0130K 1, 3671 say\u0131l\u0131 Kanun, 3056 say\u0131l\u0131 Kanun, Vergihocasi.com, H\u00fcrriyet, S\u00f6zc\u00fc, Memurlar.net, zam.hesaplama.net\n[Toplam:2    Ortalama:5/5] Son 1 Y\u0131l\u0131n Zam Oranlar\u0131n\u0131 G\u00f6sterdi\u011fi \u0130ddia Edilen G\u00f6rsel", "Bitcoin nedir sorusu, s\u00fcrekli geli\u015fen teknoloji do\u011frultusunda, para birimleri de 2000\u2019li y\u0131llar\u0131n ba\u015flar\u0131ndan itibaren sorulmaya ba\u015flanm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r.\nSon d\u00f6nemlerde ad\u0131n\u0131 s\u0131k\u00e7a duydu\u011fumuz Bitcoin, merkezi bir kurulu\u015fa ba\u011fl\u0131 olmay\u0131p, Satoshi Nakamoto takma isimli ki\u015fi veya ki\u015filer taraf\u0131ndan tasarlanm\u0131\u015f dijital bir \u00f6deme sisteminin ad\u0131d\u0131r. Satoshi Nakamoto, 2008 y\u0131l\u0131nda \u201cCryptography Mailing List\u201d (Kriptografi Mail Listesi) ile Bitcoin protokollerini yay\u0131nlam\u0131\u015f, ard\u0131ndan da 2010 y\u0131l\u0131nda mail \u00fczerinden Bitcoinle ilgili \u00e7al\u0131\u015fmalar yapm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r.\nBitcoin Nereden Geldi?\nBitcoin asl\u0131nda, da\u011f\u0131n\u0131k bir veri taban\u0131 olan Blockchain\u2018in bir par\u00e7as\u0131d\u0131r. Peki Blockchain nedir diye soracak olursak;\nBlok zinciri anlam\u0131na gelen bu olu\u015fum, yine Satoshi Nakamoto taraf\u0131ndan icat edilerek son y\u0131llarda geli\u015fmekte olan bir teknolojidir. Blockchain, hayat\u0131n her alan\u0131nda yap\u0131lan al\u0131\u015fveri\u015fin, taraflar\u0131n anla\u015ft\u0131\u011f\u0131 \u00e7er\u00e7evede arac\u0131lar\u0131n ortadan kalkarak yap\u0131labildi\u011fi dijital bir ortamd\u0131r.\n\u0130lk olarak Bitcoin i\u00e7in tasarlanan Blockchain, g\u00fcn ge\u00e7tik\u00e7e teknoloji alan\u0131nda ba\u015fka kullan\u0131mlar bulmaktad\u0131r. Finansal i\u015flemlerin ve uluslararas\u0131 para transferlerinin yan\u0131 s\u0131ra, borsa i\u015flemlerinde, m\u00fczik platformlar\u0131 altyap\u0131s\u0131nda, oyun platformlar\u0131nda, m\u00fc\u015fteri sadakat programlar\u0131nda, belge payla\u015f\u0131m\u0131 ve saklanmas\u0131nda da kullan\u0131lan Blockchain teknolojisi her \u015feyin de\u011ferini kaydedebilecek \u015fekilde programlanabilen dijital bir muhasebe sistemi gibidir.\nABD Hazine Eski Bakan\u0131 Larry Summers, Bitcoin\u2019i \u015f\u00f6yle tan\u0131mlamaktad\u0131r: \u201cBitcoin asl\u0131nda faks makinesinin sahip oldu\u011fu \u00f6zellikler ile benzerdir. Bir faks makinesi doorstop (kap\u0131 durdurucu) gibidir. Yani b\u00fct\u00fcn elektronik sistemler \u00e7\u00f6kse dahi faks makinesi bilgi al\u0131\u015fveri\u015finde kap\u0131 tutucu bir g\u00f6rev \u00fcstlenerek ak\u0131\u015f\u0131 sa\u011flar. Herkesin faks makinesine sahip oldu\u011fu bir d\u00fcnyada bu durum olduk\u00e7a \u00f6nemlidir. \u0130\u015fte Bitcoin de finansal sistemlerin aksakl\u0131\u011f\u0131ndan etkilenmeyerek sizin i\u00e7in kap\u0131 tutan bir g\u00f6rev \u00fcstlenmektedir.\u201d\nD\u00fc\u011f\u00fcmlerden Olu\u015fuyor\nBilgi i\u015flem d\u00fc\u011f\u00fcmleri ad\u0131 verilen bir a\u011f sistemi Blockchain\u2019i olu\u015fturur. \u0130\u015flemleri de\u011ferlendirebilme ve aktarma g\u00f6revi yapan bir istemci kullanarak blok a\u011f\u0131na ba\u011fl\u0131 olan bilgisayar Blockchain\u2019e kat\u0131ld\u0131\u011f\u0131nda otomatik olarak indirilen Blockchain\u2019in bir kopyas\u0131n\u0131 al\u0131r. Her d\u00fc\u011f\u00fcm Blockchain\u2019in bir y\u00f6neticisidir ve merkezi olmayan a\u011fa g\u00f6n\u00fcll\u00fc olarak kat\u0131l\u0131r. Bununla birlikte a\u011fa her kat\u0131l\u0131m i\u00e7in Bitcoin kazanma te\u015fviki vard\u0131r.\nBlockchain\u2019de g\u00f6nderen ve al\u0131c\u0131 ki\u015finin kimli\u011fi ve g\u00f6nderilen tutar gizlenerek yeni bir blok olu\u015fur ve olu\u015fan bu blok \u015fifrelenerek di\u011fer bloklar\u0131n sonuna eklenir. B\u00fct\u00fcn blok zinciri a\u011f\u0131na da\u011f\u0131t\u0131l\u0131r ve \u00fczerine eklenen yeni bloklarla bu blok k\u0131r\u0131lamaz ve de\u011fi\u015ftirilemez hale gelir.\nBitcoin Nas\u0131l \u00dcretilir ve Kullan\u0131l\u0131r?\nBir veriyi ayn\u0131 anda milyonlarca ki\u015fiye g\u00f6nderen P2P (Peer to Peer) y\u00f6ntemiyle \u00e7al\u0131\u015fan Bitcoin, merkezi bir kurulu\u015fa ba\u011fl\u0131 olmad\u0131\u011f\u0131 gibi transferi kolay olan bir sistemdir.\nBitcoin\u2019in \u00fcretilmesi i\u015flemine Madencilik (Mining) denir. Madencili\u011fin temel amac\u0131, Bitcoin d\u00fc\u011f\u00fcmlerinin g\u00fcvenli, sald\u0131r\u0131lara kar\u015f\u0131 diren\u00e7li bir duruma eri\u015fmesini sa\u011flamakt\u0131r. Madencilik, Bitcoinleri sisteme dahil etmek i\u00e7in kullan\u0131lan mekanizmalard\u0131r. Madencilere, herhangi bir i\u015flem \u00fccreti ve yeni yarat\u0131lan madeni paralar\u0131n bir \u201cs\u00fcbvansiyonu\u201d \u00f6denir. Bitcoin madencili\u011fi, di\u011fer para yaratma s\u00fcre\u00e7lerini and\u0131rd\u0131\u011f\u0131 i\u00e7in, alt\u0131n madeninden para \u00e7\u0131karma s\u00fcrecine benzetilmektedir.\nYa\u015f\u0131 her ne olursa olsun bilgisayar kullanabilen, herhangi bir \u00fclkeden birisi Bitcoin adresi olu\u015fturabilir. Bankalar gibi uzun hesap olu\u015fturma rit\u00fcellerine ya da kimlik, pasaport veya di\u011fer evraklara gerek kalmaz. \u0130steyen herkes s\u0131n\u0131rs\u0131z Bitcoin hesab\u0131na sahip olabilir.\nBitcoinler \u00f6demeyi yapan adresten al\u0131c\u0131 adrese \u015fifrelenmi\u015f olarak imzalanarak g\u00f6nderilir. Her i\u015flemin a\u011fa haber vermesi sa\u011flan\u0131r ve blok zincirinde yerini al\u0131r. B\u00f6ylece eklenen Bitcoinler birden fazla  kullan\u0131lamaz.\nBitcoin\u2019in Avantajlar\u0131 ve Dezavantajlar\u0131 Nedir?\nBitcoin\u2019in di\u011fer parasal i\u015flemlere g\u00f6re faydalar\u0131 ve zararlar\u0131 bulunmaktad\u0131r.\nAvantajlar\u0131:\nBitcoin ile d\u00fcnyan\u0131n herhangi bir noktas\u0131na, herhangi bir zamanda para g\u00f6nderip almak m\u00fcmk\u00fcnd\u00fcr.\nBitcoin transferi yap\u0131l\u0131rken \u00fccretler, geleneksel y\u00f6ntemlerle ta\u015f\u0131nanlara k\u0131yasla \u00e7ok daha d\u00fc\u015f\u00fckt\u00fcr. Ayr\u0131ca uluslararas\u0131 havale i\u015flemleri birka\u00e7 g\u00fcnden bir haftaya kadar s\u00fcrebilirken, Bitcoin i\u015flemleri genelde bir saat kadar s\u00fcrer.\nBitcoin\u2019in en b\u00fcy\u00fck avantajlar\u0131ndan biri de, Bitcoin i\u015flemlerini tespit etmek, izlemek veya m\u00fcdahale etmek, h\u00fckumetler de dahil \u00fc\u00e7\u00fcnc\u00fc taraflar i\u00e7in m\u00fcmk\u00fcn olmad\u0131\u011f\u0131ndan, i\u015flem \u00fczerinden vergi al\u0131namamas\u0131d\u0131r.\nKullan\u0131c\u0131lar izlenemez. \u0130\u015flem yapan kullan\u0131c\u0131lar c\u00fczdan adreslerini bildirmedik\u00e7e, hi\u00e7 kimse onlar\u0131n i\u015flemlerini kontrol edemez. Ayr\u0131ca C\u00fczdan adresleri yay\u0131nlansa bile kolayl\u0131kla ba\u015fka adres olu\u015fturulabilir.\nAyr\u0131ca hi\u00e7 kimse, Bitcoin hesab\u0131na giri\u015f yapan ki\u015finin fiziksel olarak hesab\u0131na eri\u015fmedi\u011fi s\u00fcrece, paralar\u0131n\u0131 \u00e7alamaz. Birka\u00e7 kimlik do\u011frulama i\u015flemlerini gerektiren di\u011fer sistemlerin aksine Bitcoin fiziksel olarak eri\u015fimi gerektirir ve bu da \u00e7almay\u0131 zor hale getirir.\nDezavantajlar\u0131:\nKredi kart\u0131 ve banka i\u015flemlerinde, g\u00f6nderen \u00f6demeyi ters \u00e7evirme ya da geri alma durumuna sahiptir. Ancak Bitcoin, %100 olarak geri d\u00f6nd\u00fcr\u00fclemeyen ve geri al\u0131nmayan tek \u00f6deme y\u00f6ntemidir. Bu y\u00fczden Bitcoin g\u00f6nderirken g\u00fcvenilir veya do\u011fru ki\u015fiye g\u00f6nderdi\u011finizden emin olmal\u0131s\u0131n\u0131z.\nBitcoinler kaybedildi\u011fi zaman geri almak i\u00e7in kullanabilecek bir mekanizma yoktur. Bunun \u00f6n\u00fcne ge\u00e7ebilmek i\u00e7in en iyi y\u00f6ntem, Bitcoinleri internet ba\u011flant\u0131s\u0131 olmayan harddisklerde saklamakt\u0131r.\nBitcoin, izi s\u00fcr\u00fclemeyen bir sistemdir. \u0130zinin s\u00fcr\u00fclemez olmas\u0131, su\u00e7lar\u0131n rahat rahat i\u015flenebilmesi anlam\u0131na gelmektedir. Uyu\u015fturucu, kara para aklama gibi yasal olmayan durumlar i\u00e7in olduk\u00e7a uygun bir ortam haz\u0131rlamaktad\u0131r.\nG\u00fcn\u00fcm\u00fczde Bitcoin \u00f6deme yapmak amac\u0131ndan ziyade yat\u0131r\u0131m yapmak amac\u0131yla kullan\u0131lmaktad\u0131r. Bu da Bitcoin kullan\u0131m alanlar\u0131n\u0131 s\u0131n\u0131rland\u0131rmaktad\u0131r.\nBitcoin piyasas\u0131n\u0131n dalgal\u0131 kuru asl\u0131nda i\u00e7inde b\u00fcy\u00fck riskleri bar\u0131nd\u0131rmaktad\u0131r. Bitcoin\u2019in \u00e7ok h\u0131zl\u0131 olarak y\u00fckselmesi, her an h\u0131zl\u0131 bir d\u00fc\u015f\u00fc\u015f ya\u015fanmas\u0131n\u0131 da beraberinde getirebilir. O y\u00fczden risk a\u00e7\u0131s\u0131ndan, yap\u0131lan yat\u0131r\u0131mlar\u0131n dengeli ve temkinli yap\u0131lmas\u0131 gerekmektedir.\n\u00dclkelerin Bitcoin\u2019e Bak\u0131\u015f A\u00e7\u0131lar\u0131\nBaz\u0131 h\u00fckumetlerin Bitcoin\u2019i bir para birimi olarak kabul etmemelerinin en b\u00fcy\u00fck sebebi kontrol edilememesi ve yasal olmayan i\u015flemlere a\u00e7\u0131k kap\u0131 b\u0131rakmas\u0131d\u0131r. Ancak dezavantajlar\u0131na ra\u011fmen belirli \u00fclkeler taraf\u0131ndan kullan\u0131lmaya ba\u015flanm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r. Herhangi bir h\u00fckumet politikas\u0131na ve merkezi bir sisteme ba\u011fl\u0131 olmayan Bitcoin\u2019in yasal oldu\u011fu baz\u0131 \u00fclkeler \u015funlard\u0131r:\nABD: Bitcoin, Amerika Birle\u015fik Devletlerinde k\u0131smen yasald\u0131r. Asl\u0131nda ABD Hazine Mali Su\u00e7 Uygulamalar\u0131 A\u011f\u0131 ( FinCEN ), 2013 y\u0131l\u0131ndan bu yana dijital para birimi konusunda \u00f6zel rehberlik hizmeti alm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r. Bu s\u00fcre\u00e7 de Bitcoin\u2019i, bir para hizmetleri i\u015fletmesi olarak s\u0131n\u0131fland\u0131rm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r.\nKanada: Kanada\u2019n\u0131n Bitcoin ile olan ili\u015fkisi ABD ile benzerdir. Kanada Kazan\u00e7 Ajans\u0131 (CRA), Bitcoin dijital para birimini bir emtia olarak s\u0131n\u0131fland\u0131rd\u0131. Bu, Bitcoin\u2019deki i\u015flemlerin takas i\u015flemleri olarak alg\u0131land\u0131\u011f\u0131 anlam\u0131na gelir. Bu i\u015flemler sonucunda olu\u015fan gelir, i\u015fletme geliri olarak kabul edilir ve  Bitcoin\u2019in vergilendirilmesi kanuna tabidir.\nAvustralya: Avustralya, Bitcoin\u2019i zarars\u0131z bir arac\u0131 olarak alg\u0131lamaktad\u0131r. B\u00f6ylece Bitcoin\u2019i \u00fclke \u00e7ap\u0131nda sat\u0131n almaya ve madencili\u011fe izin verilir. Avustralya Vergi Dairesi (ATO), Bitcoin i\u015flemlerini takas uygulamalar\u0131 olarak s\u0131n\u0131fland\u0131rmaktad\u0131r . Bu nedenle, ilgili vergi kanunlar\u0131na tabidirler.\nAvrupa: Avrupa\u2019da baz\u0131 \u00fclkeler Bitcoin\u2019i desteklerken baz\u0131lar\u0131 de ya kay\u0131ts\u0131z kal\u0131yor ya da Bitcoin i\u00e7in \u00f6nlemler al\u0131yor. Avrupa \u00fclkeleri uzun s\u00fcredir Bitcoin pazar\u0131ndaki geli\u015fmeleri takip etmektedir. Ancak Avrupa Birli\u011fi taraf\u0131ndan, hala Bitcoin i\u00e7in belirli bir \u00e7er\u00e7eve metin yay\u0131nlanmam\u0131\u015ft\u0131r. B\u00f6ylece, her AB \u00fclkesi kendi vizyonunu dijital para birimi ile ili\u015fkili olarak geli\u015ftirmi\u015ftir.\nBitcoin\u2019i yasalla\u015ft\u0131ran Avrupa \u00fclkeleri \u015funlard\u0131r: Estonya, Danimarka, Bel\u00e7ika, \u0130svi\u00e7re, \u0130ngiltere, \u0130talya, Hollanda, Fransa ve G\u00fcney K\u0131br\u0131s\u2019t\u0131r.\nJaponya: 2017 Mart ay\u0131nda al\u0131nan bir kararla Japonya\u2019da da Bitcoin yasal olarak kabul edilmi\u015ftir.\nT\u00fcrkiye\u2019de Bitcoinle Al\u0131\u015fveri\u015f\n\u00dclkemizde genel olarak Bitcoin piyasas\u0131n\u0131n geni\u015fli\u011finden bahsedemeyiz ancak bir\u00e7ok i\u015fletme dijital para ile \u00f6deme yap\u0131lmas\u0131n\u0131 kabul etmektedir.\nSermaye Piyasas\u0131 Kurulu (SPK), Bitcoin\u2019i ayr\u0131nt\u0131l\u0131 olarak a\u00e7\u0131klad\u0131\u011f\u0131 bir rapor yay\u0131nlam\u0131\u015ft\u0131r. Raporda, T\u00fcrkiye\u2019de Bitcoin\u2019in yasal stat\u00fcs\u00fc ba\u015fl\u0131\u011f\u0131 alt\u0131nda Bankac\u0131l\u0131k D\u00fczenleme ve Denetleme Kurumu\u2018nun (BDDK) 2013 y\u0131l\u0131nda yapt\u0131\u011f\u0131 bas\u0131n a\u00e7\u0131klamas\u0131na yer vermi\u015ftir.\nBDDK\u2019n\u0131n a\u00e7\u0131klamas\u0131nda Bitcoin\u2019in, 6493 say\u0131l\u0131 \u201c\u00d6deme ve Menkul K\u0131ymet Mutabakat Sistemleri, \u00d6deme Hizmetleri ve Elektronik Para Kurulu\u015flar\u0131 Hakk\u0131nda Kanun\u201d kapsam\u0131nda olmad\u0131\u011f\u0131n\u0131 ve elektronik para olarak de\u011ferlendirilmedi\u011fi i\u00e7in g\u00f6zetim ve denetiminin m\u00fcmk\u00fcn olmad\u0131\u011f\u0131n\u0131 belirtilmi\u015ftir. Ayr\u0131ca a\u00e7\u0131klamada, Bitcoin sisteminde kimliklerin bilinmemesi sebebiyle, Bitcoin\u2019in yasa d\u0131\u015f\u0131 faaliyetlerde kullan\u0131labilece\u011fi, de\u011ferinin a\u015f\u0131r\u0131 oynak olmas\u0131, dijital c\u00fczdanlar\u0131n \u00e7al\u0131nabilmesi, kaybolabilmesi, usuls\u00fcz kullan\u0131labilmesi ve i\u015flemlerin geri d\u00f6nd\u00fcr\u00fclemez olmas\u0131n\u0131n risklere a\u00e7\u0131k oldu\u011fu da vurgulanm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r.\nKaynaklar: 1-Bitcoin 2-Bitcoin.org 3-Investopedia 4-Stanford University 5-MMM Turkey 6-Atoz Forex 7-Enerji G\u00fcnl\u00fc\u011f\u00fc 8-SPK 9-BDDK 10-oguzhankarakaya.com 11-melihguney.com\n[Toplam:0    Ortalama:0/5] Blockchain Teknolojisi ve Bitcoin", "\u201cCuma Mesajlar\u0131 Resimli 2018\u201d yaz\u0131m\u0131zda sizler i\u00e7in e\u015finize, dostunuza, akraban\u0131za, arkada\u015flar\u0131n\u0131za cuma g\u00fcnlerinde yollayabilece\u011finiz cuma mesajlar\u0131, cuma mesaj g\u00f6rsellerini payla\u015faca\u011f\u0131z.\nCuma g\u00fcn\u00fc i\u00e7in peygamberimiz bir hadisinde \u2018\u00dcmmetimin bayramlar\u0131 i\u00e7inde Cumadan daha k\u0131ymetli bayram yoktur ve o g\u00fcnk\u00fc iki rekat namaz, Cuma g\u00fcn\u00fc d\u0131\u015f\u0131ndaki bin rekattan de\u011ferlidir.\u2019 demi\u015ftir.
