Bayram arefesi 4 Haziran Sal\u0131 g\u00fcn\u00fcne denk gelmektedir. Bayram hafta i\u00e7ine denk geldi\u011fi i\u00e7in, kamu \u00e7al\u0131\u015fanlar\u0131 Pazartesi g\u00fcn\u00fc izin alabilir veya devlet o g\u00fcn\u00fc de resmi tatil olarak kabul edip birle\u015ftirirse Ramazan Bayram\u0131 tam 9 g\u00fcn olur.\n2019\u2019da resmi tatil g\u00fcn\u00fc Kurban Bayram\u0131 hafta sonuna m\u0131 denk geliyor?\nKamuda \u00e7al\u0131\u015fanlara bir k\u00f6t\u00fc haberim var. 2019\u2019da resmi tatil g\u00fcn\u00fc Kurban Bayram\u0131 arefesi Cumartesi g\u00fcn\u00fcne denk gelmektedir. Kamuda \u00e7al\u0131\u015fanlar cumartesi g\u00fcn\u00fc \u00e7al\u0131\u015fmad\u0131\u011f\u0131 i\u00e7in, resmi tatile denk gelmi\u015f olup, oradaki iki g\u00fcn\u00fcn hafta sonuna denk gelmesi belki de \u00fcz\u00fcc\u00fc olmu\u015ftur:)\n10 Kas\u0131m resmi tatil mi?\n10 Kas\u0131m Ulu \u00d6nder Atat\u00fcrk\u2019\u00fcn vefat\u0131d\u0131r. Bu y\u00fczden bizler i\u00e7in bir tatil de\u011fil yast\u0131r.\n1 May\u0131s resmi tatil mi?\nD\u00fcnya genelinde kutlanan \u0130\u015f\u00e7i ve Emek\u00e7iler Bayram\u0131, \u00c7ar\u015famba g\u00fcn\u00fcne denk gelmektedir. 1 May\u0131s \u0130\u015f\u00e7i ve Emek\u00e7iler Bayram\u0131 tatil olarak ge\u00e7irilecektir.\n19 May\u0131s tatil mi? Hangi g\u00fcne denk geliyor?\n2019 resmi tatil g\u00fcnlerinin i\u00e7erisinde olan 19 May\u0131s Atat\u00fcrk\u2019\u00fc Anma Gen\u00e7lik ve Spor Bayram\u0131 Pazar g\u00fcn\u00fcne denk gelmektedir.\n30 A\u011fustos Zafer Bayram\u0131 tatil mi?\n30 A\u011fustos Zafer Bayram\u0131 Cuma g\u00fcn\u00fcne denk gelmektedir. Cumartesi g\u00fcn\u00fc \u00e7al\u0131\u015fmayanlar i\u00e7in yine 3 g\u00fcnl\u00fck bir tatil s\u00f6z konusu.\n15 Temmuz tatil mi?\n15 Temmuz milletimizin darbe ve isyan giri\u015fimine kar\u015f\u0131 kahramanca m\u00fccadele ederek demokrasi tarihimizin mihenk ta\u015flar\u0131ndan birisi olmu\u015ftur. 15 Temmuz \u015fehitlerimizi ve gazilerimizi and\u0131\u011f\u0131m\u0131z g\u00fcnd\u00fcr ve  TBMM kanun tasar\u0131s\u0131na g\u00f6re resmi tatil g\u00fcn\u00fc olarak belirlenmesi teklif edilmi\u015ftir. Teklif kabul edilmi\u015ftir.\nKanun teklifi kabul maddeleri \u015fu \u015fekildedir:\nMADDE 1- (1) Ankara iline ba\u011fl\u0131 Kazan il\u00e7esinin ad\u0131 \u201cKahramankazan\u201d olarak de\u011fi\u015ftirilmi\u015ftir.\nMADDE 2\u2013 (1) 17/3/1981 tarihli ve 2429 say\u0131l\u0131 Ulusal Bayram ve Genel Tatiller Hakk\u0131nda Kanunun 2\u2019nci maddesinin birinci f\u0131kras\u0131nda yer alan \u201cve 1 May\u0131s g\u00fcn\u00fc\u201d ibareleri \u201c1 May\u0131s g\u00fcn\u00fc ve 15 Temmuz g\u00fcn\u00fc\u201d olarak ve birinci f\u0131kran\u0131n (C) bendi a\u015fa\u011f\u0131daki \u015fekilde de\u011fi\u015ftirilmi\u015ftir. \u201c(C) 1 Ocak g\u00fcn\u00fc y\u0131lba\u015f\u0131 tatili, 1 May\u0131s g\u00fcn\u00fc Emek ve Dayan\u0131\u015fma G\u00fcn\u00fc ve 15 Temmuz g\u00fcn\u00fc Demokrasi ve Milli Birlik G\u00fcn\u00fc tatilidir.\u201d\nMADDE 3- Bu kanun yay\u0131m\u0131 tarihinde y\u00fcr\u00fcrl\u00fc\u011fe girer.\nMADDE 4- Bu kanun h\u00fck\u00fcmlerini Bakanlar Kurulu y\u00fcr\u00fct\u00fcr.\n15 Temmuz\u2019un Tatil Olmas\u0131 \u0130\u00e7in Meclisten \u00c7\u0131kar\u0131lan Teklife Buraya T\u0131klayarak Ula\u015fabilirsiniz\nKAYNAK: www.tbmm.gov.tr\n[Toplam:9    Ortalama:4.6/5] 2019 y\u0131l\u0131 Resmi Tatilleri", "T\u00fcrkiye\u2019ye geli\u015fiyle birlikte g\u00fcndemde geni\u015f yer alan Elon Musk, An\u0131tkabir\u2019e ziyarette bulundu ve Instagram hesab\u0131ndan da ziyaretine dair bir g\u00f6rsel payla\u015ft\u0131. Bunun \u00fczerine sosyal medyada Madonna\u2019n\u0131n, Elon Musk\u2019\u0131n bu payla\u015f\u0131m\u0131na yorum yapt\u0131\u011f\u0131 iddia edildi. Madonna\u2019n\u0131n, Elon Musk\u2019\u0131n Instagram payla\u015f\u0131m\u0131na yorum yapt\u0131\u011f\u0131 iddias\u0131 do\u011frudur. \u0130lgili yoruma Instagram \u00e7al\u0131\u015fma sistemi sebebiyle link verilememekte olup, dogrula.org taraf\u0131ndan yakla\u015f\u0131k 26 bin yorum aras\u0131ndan bulunmu\u015f ve kontrol\u00fc sa\u011flanm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r.\n  Madonna, Elon Musk\u2019\u0131n An\u0131tkabir ziyaretine ait payla\u015ft\u0131\u011f\u0131 g\u00f6rselin alt\u0131na \u201cTesla arabam ne durumda?\u201d anlam\u0131na gelen bir yorum yapm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r. Madonna\u2019n\u0131n bu yorumu, sosyal medya kullan\u0131c\u0131lar\u0131 taraf\u0131ndan tepkiyle kar\u015f\u0131lanm\u0131\u015f ve bir\u00e7ok k\u00fcf\u00fcr i\u00e7eren yorum yap\u0131lm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r. Bir ba\u015fka iddia ise, bu k\u00fcf\u00fcr i\u00e7eren yorumlardan bir tanesinin Elon Musk taraf\u0131ndan be\u011fenilmi\u015f oldu\u011fu iddias\u0131d\u0131r.\nElon Musk taraf\u0131ndan be\u011fenildi\u011fi iddia edilen k\u00fcf\u00fcrl\u00fc yorum, ilgili yorumlar aras\u0131nda bulunamam\u0131\u015ft\u0131r. S\u00f6z konusu yorumun, kullan\u0131c\u0131 taraf\u0131ndan silinmi\u015f oldu\u011fu da iddia edilmektedir.\nElon Musk Kimdir?\nTam ad\u0131yla Elon Reeve Musk, 28 Haziran 1971 tarihinde do\u011fmu\u015f, G\u00fcney Afrika as\u0131ll\u0131, Amerikal\u0131 bir giri\u015fimcidir. SpaceX \u015firketinin ve The Boring Company\u2018nin kurucusudur. Tesla\u2018n\u0131n y\u00f6netiminde yer alan ve \u00fcr\u00fcn mimar\u0131 olan Elon Musk, yapay zeka ara\u015ft\u0131rmalar\u0131 \u015firketi olan OpenAI \u015firketinin de e\u015fba\u015fkan\u0131d\u0131r. Musk, beyinde elektrot implantasyonuyla insan\u0131n d\u00fc\u015f\u00fcncelerini bilgisayarlara y\u00fckleyip, bilgisayardan indirebilece\u011fi bir sistem \u00fczerine \u00e7al\u0131\u015fan ve bu sayede insanlar\u0131n bili\u015fsel kapasitesinin artt\u0131r\u0131labilece\u011fi d\u00fc\u015f\u00fcn\u00fclen Neuralink \u015firketinin de kurucusudur. SolarCity, Zip2 gibi \u015firketlerin de kurucular\u0131ndan olan Elon Musk, internet \u00fczerinden \u00e7al\u0131\u015fan bir \u00f6deme sistemi olan \u00fcnl\u00fc PayPal \u015firketinin de kurucular\u0131ndand\u0131r. PayPal, T\u00fcrkiye faaliyetlerini bir s\u00fcre \u00f6nce durdurmu\u015ftur.\nT\u00fcnel Projesi\nElon Musk, bir\u00e7ok konu\u015fma platformlar\u0131nda konu\u015fmac\u0131 olarak yer alm\u0131\u015f ve bunlara ili\u015fkin videolar\u0131 totalde milyonlarca defa izlenmi\u015ftir. Bu konu\u015fmalar\u0131ndan birisi olan ve kurucusu oldu\u011fu \u015firketlerden birisi olan The Boring Company\u2019nin faaliyetleri \u00fczerine konu\u015ftu\u011fu TED konu\u015fmas\u0131n\u0131 izleyerek, Elon Musk\u2019\u0131n merakla beklenen, trafikten etkilenmeden yolculuk yapabilmeyi m\u00fcmk\u00fcn k\u0131lacak t\u00fcnel projesine dair bilgi edinebilirsiniz.\nDo\u011fruluk Y\u00fczdesi\nKaynaklar:\nInstagram, Wikiwand, Youtube\n[Toplam:0    Ortalama:0/5] Elon Musk Payla\u015f\u0131m\u0131na Madonna\u2019n\u0131n Yorum Yapt\u0131\u011f\u0131 \u0130ddias\u0131", "2006 y\u0131l\u0131ndan beri ara ara g\u00fcndeme gelen AIDS uyar\u0131l\u0131, Adalet Bakanl\u0131\u011f\u0131 Bilgi \u0130\u015flem Dairesi taraf\u0131ndan g\u00f6nderildi\u011fi iddia edilen bir metin, son g\u00fcnlerde sosyal medyada ve WhatsApp gruplar\u0131nda s\u0131k\u00e7a payla\u015f\u0131lmaktad\u0131r.\nAncak bu metnin, Adalet Bakanl\u0131\u011f\u0131 taraf\u0131ndan yay\u0131nland\u0131\u011f\u0131 iddias\u0131 do\u011fru de\u011fildir. \u00dczerinde herhangi bir imza olmad\u0131\u011f\u0131 gibi, ne zaman yay\u0131nland\u0131\u011f\u0131n\u0131 belirten tarih de bulunmamaktad\u0131r.\nSahte metinde AIDS ve di\u011fer bula\u015f\u0131c\u0131 hastal\u0131klara kar\u015f\u0131 nelere dikkat edilmesi gerekti\u011fine dair bilgiler yer almaktad\u0131r. AIDS\u2019e yakalanmamak i\u00e7in toplu ortamlarda bulunan koltuklardan, restoranlarda kullan\u0131lan k\u00fcrdanlara kadar uyar\u0131lardan bahsedilmektedir. Ayr\u0131ca g\u00fcn\u00fcm\u00fczde art\u0131k yayg\u0131n olarak kullan\u0131lmayan Ankes\u00f6rl\u00fc telefonlardaki jetonlara da dikkat edilmesi gerekti\u011fini belirten metnin, y\u0131llar \u00f6ncesinde \u00e7\u0131kart\u0131ld\u0131\u011f\u0131 a\u00e7\u0131k\u00e7a anla\u015f\u0131lmaktad\u0131r.\nMetinde, AIDS ve Hepatit gibi bula\u015f\u0131c\u0131 hastal\u0131klar\u0131n yay\u0131lmas\u0131n\u0131 \u00f6nlemek i\u00e7in \u00e7e\u015fitli \u00f6nlemlere yer verilmi\u015ftir. Adalet Bakanl\u0131\u011f\u0131 Tetkik Hakimi olarak belirtilen Turan A\u00e7\u0131kme\u015fe ad\u0131yla yay\u0131nlanan belge, ilk olarak 2006 y\u0131l\u0131nda kar\u015f\u0131m\u0131za \u00e7\u0131kmaktad\u0131r. Ek\u015fi S\u00f6zl\u00fck\u2018te Turan A\u00e7\u0131kme\u015fe ba\u015fl\u0131\u011f\u0131 alt\u0131nda yaz\u0131lan yaz\u0131lar\u0131n ilki 2006 y\u0131l\u0131na aittir.\nBakanl\u0131ktan A\u00e7\u0131klama\nAdalet Bakanl\u0131\u011f\u0131 konuyla ilgili, ilk olarak 2007 y\u0131l\u0131nda sahte maille ilgili yaz\u0131l\u0131 a\u00e7\u0131klamada bulunmu\u015ftur:\n\u201cAdalet Bakanl\u0131\u011f\u0131 Bilgi \u0130\u015flem Dairesi Ba\u015fkanl\u0131\u011f\u0131- Halk\u0131m\u0131za Uyar\u0131: Son g\u00fcnlerde kar\u015f\u0131la\u015f\u0131lan, sosyal sa\u011fl\u0131k tehdidi olu\u015fturan, halka a\u00e7\u0131k yerlerde k\u00f6t\u00fc niyetli \u015fah\u0131slar\u0131n; Hepatit ve t\u00fcrevleri, AIDS; gibi bula\u015f\u0131c\u0131 hastal\u0131k da\u011f\u0131tma giri\u015fimleri ile ilgili istihbaratlar al\u0131nm\u0131\u015f ve bunlar\u0131n t\u00fcm yaz\u0131l\u0131, g\u00f6rsel bas\u0131n ve Internet arac\u0131l\u0131\u011f\u0131yla en h\u0131zl\u0131 \u015fekilde halk\u0131m\u0131za iletilmesi zorunlulu\u011fu do\u011fmu\u015ftur.\u201d\nAncak bu a\u00e7\u0131klamaya ra\u011fmen metnin y\u0131llar sonra g\u00fcndeme gelmesinin ard\u0131ndan Kas\u0131m 2016\u2018da, Adalet Bakanl\u0131\u011f\u0131 tekrardan bir a\u00e7\u0131klama yapma gere\u011fi daha duymu\u015ftur:\n\u201cSosyal medyada yay\u0131lan bu metin sahte ve uydurmad\u0131r.S\u00f6z konusu bildiri ile k\u00f6t\u00fc niyetli ki\u015fi ve ki\u015filerce toplumun hassas oldu\u011fu sa\u011fl\u0131k alan\u0131na y\u00f6nelik panik havas\u0131 olu\u015fturulmak istenilmektedir. Bu giri\u015fimin Adalet Bakanl\u0131\u011f\u0131 Bilgi \u0130\u015flem Dairesi Ba\u015fkanl\u0131\u011f\u0131 ismi kullan\u0131larak yap\u0131lmak istenilmesi sahte metne inand\u0131r\u0131c\u0131l\u0131k sa\u011flamay\u0131 ama\u00e7lamaktad\u0131r.\u201d\nA\u00e7\u0131klamada, metnin amac\u0131n\u0131n sa\u011fl\u0131k konusunda panik havas\u0131 olu\u015fturmak oldu\u011funu ifade eden Adalet Bakanl\u0131\u011f\u0131, metni haz\u0131rlayanlar ve sosyal medyada yayanlar hakk\u0131nda savc\u0131l\u0131\u011fa su\u00e7 duyurusunda bulunaca\u011f\u0131n\u0131 belirtmi\u015ftir.\nDo\u011fruluk Y\u00fczdesi\nKaynaklar:\n1-Adalet Bakanl\u0131\u011f\u0131 2-Facebook 3-H\u00fcrriyet 4-Ek\u015fi S\u00f6zl\u00fck 5-CnnT\u00fcrk\n[Toplam:0    Ortalama:0/5] Adalet Bakanl\u0131\u011f\u0131\u2019ndan AIDS Uyar\u0131s\u0131 Geldi \u0130ddias\u0131", "\u201c\u015eirince Neresidir? \u015eirince\u2019de Gezilecek Yerler\u201d Ba\u015fl\u0131kl\u0131 i\u00e7eri\u011fimizde \u015eirince Mahallesi ve \u015eirincede gezilecek yerleri inceledik.\n\u015eirince, \u0130zmir ilimizin Sel\u00e7uk il\u00e7esine ba\u011fl\u0131 olan k\u00fc\u00e7\u00fck ve eski mimarisini korumu\u015f turistik bir k\u00f6y\u00fcm\u00fczd\u00fcr. 6360 Say\u0131l\u0131 Kanunla mahalleye d\u00f6n\u00fc\u015ft\u00fcr\u00fclm\u00fc\u015ft\u00fcr. Yani art\u0131k \u015eirince k\u00f6y\u00fc de\u011fil \u015eirince mahallesidir. Ancak daha \u00e7ok \u015eirince K\u00f6y\u00fc olarak bilindi\u011fi i\u00e7in yaz\u0131m\u0131zda \u015eirince K\u00f6y\u00fc olarak ge\u00e7mektedir.\n\u015eirince\u2019de K\u0131yamet\n\u015eirince denildi\u011finde akl\u0131n\u0131za k\u0131yamet kopmayan k\u00f6y gelmesin. 21 Aral\u0131k 2012 y\u0131l\u0131nda Maya takvimine g\u00f6re k\u0131yametin kopaca\u011f\u0131 ama haritada bu k\u0131yametten \u015eirince\u2019nin etkilenmeyece\u011fi gibi inan\u0131\u015flar ortaya \u00e7\u0131km\u0131\u015ft\u0131r. \u201cNe mi oldu?\u201d Evet, \u015eirince\u2019de k\u0131yamet kopmad\u0131 ama d\u00fcnyada da kopmad\u0131. Bu inan\u0131\u015f \u015eirince\u2019ye yarad\u0131. Pansiyon i\u015fletmecileri sezonun en durgun d\u00f6neminde rezervasyon talebi patlamas\u0131 ya\u015fad\u0131. 21 Aral\u0131k\u2019tan haftalar hatta aylar \u00f6nce t\u00fcm odalar doldu. K\u0131yamet kopmad\u0131 ama esnaf mutluluktan koptu.\n\u015eirince\u2019nin Neyi Me\u015fhur?\n\u015eirince k\u00f6y\u00fcne gitti\u011finizde sizleri 2 katl\u0131 eski mimariden yap\u0131lma evler kar\u015f\u0131layacak. Gezmenize \u00f6nce karn\u0131n\u0131z\u0131 doyurarak ba\u015flayabilirsiniz. \u015eirince\u2019de ne yenir, ne i\u00e7ilir derseniz bunun cevab\u0131n\u0131 halk\u0131 veriyor.\n\u201cSelanik usul\u00fc sebzeli g\u00fcve\u00e7, g\u00f6zleme, organik otlardan yap\u0131lm\u0131\u015f mezeler, m\u00fcrver \u015furubu, dibek kahvesi ve \u00f6zel yap\u0131m \u015faraplar\u0131\u2026\u201d\nSuyu s\u0131k\u0131lan her t\u00fcrl\u00fc meyvenin \u015farab\u0131 yap\u0131lmakta olup, \u015farap mahzenleri olduk\u00e7a ilgi g\u00f6rmektedir. Hem tadabilirsiniz hem de hediye olarak sat\u0131n alabilirsiniz.\n\u015eirince\u2019de Gezilecek Yerler\n\u015eirince\u2019de Aziz John Baptist Kilisesi\n\u015eirince\u2019de Aziz John Baptist Kilisesi, k\u00f6y\u00fcn g\u00fcneyinde yer al\u0131r. Tarihi \u00e7ok eski zamanlara dayanan kilise, 1832 y\u0131l\u0131nda in\u015fa edilmi\u015f ve  Saint Jean\u2019e adanm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r. Kilisenin bir taraf\u0131nda \u015farap mahzeni bir taraf\u0131nda cafe bulunmaktad\u0131r.\n\u015eirince\u2019de Tiyatro Medresesi\n\u015eirince\u2019de Tiyatro Medresesi, Tiyatro medresesi olduk\u00e7a do\u011fal bir yap\u0131ya sahip olup, tiyatroyla ilgilenen vatanda\u015flar\u0131n veya \u00fcnl\u00fc sanatkarlar\u0131n bir araya gelmesi i\u00e7in yap\u0131lm\u0131\u015f bir toplanma alan\u0131d\u0131r. Tiyatrocu, m\u00fczisyen ve bir\u00e7ok sanat alan\u0131yla ilgilenen sanatkarlar taraf\u0131ndan projelerin geli\u015ftirildi\u011fi, etkinliklerin d\u00fczenlendi\u011fi bir alan haline gelmi\u015ftir.\n\u015eirince\u2019de Nesin Matematik K\u00f6y\u00fc\n\u015eirince\u2019de Nesin Matematik K\u00f6y\u00fc, Aziz Nesin\u2019in bir matematik enstit\u00fcs\u00fc kurulmas\u0131n\u0131 vasiyet etmesinden sonra, tamamen halk\u0131n ba\u011f\u0131\u015flar\u0131yla ve gen\u00e7lerin g\u00f6n\u00fcll\u00fc emekleriyle, imece usul\u00fcyle kurulmu\u015ftur. 2007\u2019den beri halka hizmet vermektedir. 7\u2019den 70\u2019e herkesin her seviyede matematik \u00f6\u011frendi\u011fi ve \u00f6\u011fretti\u011fi Nesin Vakf\u0131\u2019na ait bir k\u00f6yd\u00fcr. E\u011fitim ve ara\u015ft\u0131rma kurumu olarak ge\u00e7mektedir. K\u00f6y, Nesin Vakf\u0131na aittir.\n\u015eirince\u2019de Hodri Meydan Kulesi\n\u015eirince\u2019de Hodri Meydan Kulesi, Yazar Sevan Ni\u015fanyan\u2019\u0131n in\u015fa etti\u011fi 16 yap\u0131 hakk\u0131nda S\u0130T alan\u0131 kapsam\u0131nda bulunma gerek\u00e7esiyle y\u0131k\u0131m karar\u0131 \u00e7\u0131kmas\u0131ndan sonra yapt\u0131r\u0131lm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r. \u0130\u015fletti\u011fi restoran\u0131n yan\u0131na 12.5 metrelik Hodri Meydan kulesini yapt\u0131rm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r. Kulenin giri\u015fine de \u201cZalimin aczini g\u00f6rmek ve g\u00f6stermek i\u00e7in in\u015fa edildi\u201d yazd\u0131ran Ni\u015fanyan, meydan okumay\u0131 s\u00fcrd\u00fcrm\u00fc\u015ft\u00fcr. Kule\u2019nin bir tarihi ve amac\u0131 bulunmamaktad\u0131r.\nEfes\u2019te Serbest Para\u015f\u00fct \u2013 Skydive\nEfes\u2019te Serbest Para\u015f\u00fct, T\u00fcrkiye\u2019de serbest para\u015f\u00fct deneyimi i\u00e7in olduk\u00e7a uygun bir yerdir. \u015eirince\u2019ye 8 km uzakl\u0131ktad\u0131r. Efes Havaliman\u0131\u2019nda tandem serbest para\u015f\u00fct yapabilir veya AFF (Accelerated Free Fall) e\u011fitimi alabilirsiniz.\nAyn\u0131 zamanda \u015eirince\u2019de de\u011fil ama \u015eirince\u2019ye 40 dk uzakl\u0131kta KEY Klasik Araba M\u00fczesi ve 20 dakika mesafede olan Efes Antik Kenti\u2019ni ziyaret etmeyi unutmay\u0131n.\nKaynak; tbmm.gov.tr/kanunlar, tiyatromedresesi.org, nesinkoyleri.org\nVideo oynat\u0131c\u0131\n00:00\n00:00\n1. \u201cdogrula.org\u201d\n0:07\n[Toplam:5    Ortalama:4.2/5] \u015eirince Neresidir? \u015eirince\u2019de Gezilecek Yerler", "Her \u00fclkede yeralt\u0131 hazinelerine dair \u015fehir efsaneleri vard\u0131r.\nBizdeki \u015fehir efsanesi de \u015fu \u015fekilde: \u201dHali\u00e7\u2019in dibi alt\u0131n doluymu\u015f; Japonlar, \u2018Hali\u00e7\u2019i temizleriz, ama \u00e7\u0131kan ne var ne yok bizim olur\u2019 demi\u015fler.\u201d\nEfsaneye g\u00f6re, d\u00f6nemin \u0130stanbul B\u00fcy\u00fck\u015fehir Belediye Ba\u015fkan\u0131 Bedrettin Dalan, Japonlara Hali\u00e7\u2019i temizletmek istemi\u015f, Japonlar temizlemek kar\u015f\u0131l\u0131\u011f\u0131nda Hali\u00e7\u2019in dibinde \u00e7\u0131kacak her \u015feye talip olmu\u015flar. Hal b\u00f6yle olunca da, proje ask\u0131ya al\u0131nm\u0131\u015f. Bunun sebebi ise, Bizansl\u0131lar\u0131n \u0130stanbul\u2019un fethi s\u0131ras\u0131nda, alt\u0131nlar\u0131n\u0131n T\u00fcrklerin eline ge\u00e7mesindense, denize atmalar\u0131ym\u0131\u015f. Ayr\u0131ca, Osmanl\u0131\u2019dan ka\u00e7an \u0130mparator J\u00fcstinyen\u2019in gemisi de Hali\u00e7\u2019ten \u00e7\u0131kmadan batm\u0131\u015f; alt\u0131nlarla birlikte suya g\u00f6m\u00fclm\u00fc\u015ft\u00fcr. Yine efsaneye g\u00f6re, Osmanl\u0131 d\u00f6neminde, seferden d\u00f6nen kalyonlardan baz\u0131lar\u0131 (yelkenle ve k\u00fcrekle yol alan sava\u015f gemilerinin en b\u00fcy\u00fc\u011f\u00fc), ganimetlerini karaya \u00e7\u0131karamadan batm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r. Ba\u015fka bir s\u00f6ylentiye g\u00f6re ise, dipteki alt\u0131n de\u011fil, \u00e7ok de\u011ferli bir seramik \u00e7amuruymu\u015f. Yine efsaneye g\u00f6re, kuyumcu d\u00fckkanlar\u0131ndan \u00e7\u0131kan at\u0131k kanallar\u0131 Hali\u00e7\u2019e bo\u015fal\u0131yormu\u015f. Ayr\u0131ca \u0130stanbul ku\u015fat\u0131l\u0131nca, kuyumcu sahipleri mallar\u0131 d\u00fc\u015fman\u0131n eline ge\u00e7mesin diye alt\u0131nlar\u0131n\u0131 Hali\u00e7\u2019e atm\u0131\u015f. B\u00f6ylece, Hali\u00e7\u2019in dibinde tonlarca alt\u0131n yatmaktaym\u0131\u015f.\nOysa, Hali\u00e7\u2019in temizlik s\u00fcreci, Cumhurba\u015fkan\u0131 Recep Tayyip Erdo\u011fan\u2018\u0131n \u0130stanbul B\u00fcy\u00fck\u015fehir Belediye Ba\u015fkanl\u0131\u011f\u0131 d\u00f6neminde \u201cHali\u00e7 \u00c7evre Koruma Projesi\u201d ismiyle yeniden ba\u015flat\u0131lm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r. 1997\u2019de yap\u0131lan ihale ile Hali\u00e7 temizli\u011fini Amerikan T\u00fcrk ortak yap\u0131m\u0131 bir \u015firket alm\u0131\u015f, temizlik sonucunda ilk etapta tarama yap\u0131lm\u0131\u015f ve 5 milyon metrek\u00fcpl\u00fck \u00e7amur, d\u00f6\u015fenen dev borularla Alibeyk\u00f6y\u2019deki eski ta\u015f ocaklar\u0131na pompalanm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r. 1997\u2019de ba\u015flayan bu \u00e7al\u0131\u015fma 1999\u2019da tamamlanm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r. Bu s\u00fcre\u00e7te alt\u0131na rastlanmam\u0131\u015ft\u0131r. Hazine efsanesine ili\u015fkin yap\u0131lan bir ihbara g\u00f6re, Hali\u00e7\u2019te bulunan s\u00f6zde 50 ton alt\u0131n\u0131n eritilmi\u015ftir. Polisin ba\u015flatt\u0131\u011f\u0131 incelemede, iddiay\u0131 kan\u0131tlar nitelikte bir belge bulunmam\u0131\u015ft\u0131r. T\u00fcnelin her noktas\u0131n\u0131 inceleyen polis ekipleri definecilerin buldu\u011fu iddia edilen 50 ton alt\u0131n\u0131n izine rastlayamam\u0131\u015ft\u0131r.\nHali\u00e7\u2019in dibinde bulundu\u011fu s\u00f6ylenen 50 ton alt\u0131n efsanesi hakk\u0131nda tarih\u00e7iler, bu b\u00f6lgede k\u00fc\u00e7\u00fck kal\u0131nt\u0131lar olabilece\u011fini s\u00f6yl\u00fcyor ancak, 50 ton alt\u0131n\u0131n bulunmas\u0131n\u0131n imkans\u0131z oldu\u011funun alt\u0131n\u0131 \u00e7iziyor. B\u00f6lgede Bizans imparatorunun yazl\u0131k saray ve kas\u0131rlar\u0131n\u0131n bulundu\u011funu ifade eden tarih\u00e7iler, bu kadar \u00e7ok alt\u0131n\u0131n oldu\u011funa ihtimal vermediklerini s\u00f6yl\u00fcyor.\nTarih\u00e7i Prof. Dr. \u0130lber Ortayl\u0131 konuya ili\u015fkin: \u201c\u0130stanbul\u2019un belli yerlerinde hep alt\u0131n \u00e7\u0131kard\u0131 eskiden. Mesela Cerrahpa\u015fa\u2019da her kaz\u0131da alt\u0131n \u00e7\u0131kard\u0131. \u00c7\u00fcnk\u00fc oras\u0131 hem Bizans hem Osmanl\u0131 devrinde varl\u0131kl\u0131 s\u0131n\u0131flar\u0131n oturdu\u011fu b\u00f6lgeydi. Hask\u00f6y\u2019de de ayn\u0131 durum olabilir. Hali\u00e7\u2019te Bizans gemilerinin batt\u0131\u011f\u0131 da biliniyor. Ama bal\u00e7\u0131\u011f\u0131n i\u00e7indeki gemiye t\u00fcnelle ula\u015f\u0131lamaz tabii. 50 ton alt\u0131n da \u00e7ok fazla. Bildi\u011fim kadar\u0131yla Amerika\u2018n\u0131n ke\u015ffinden sonra bu kadar \u00e7ok alt\u0131n bulundu.\u201d a\u00e7\u0131klamas\u0131n\u0131 yapm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r.\n\u201cTarihte Hask\u00f6y\u201d kitab\u0131n\u0131n yazar\u0131 Do\u00e7. Dr. S\u00fcleyman Faruk G\u00f6nc\u00fco\u011flu: \u201cHask\u00f6y civar\u0131nda Bizans d\u00f6nemine ait yazl\u0131k saray ve kas\u0131r yap\u0131lar\u0131 bulundu\u011fu kaynaklarda ge\u00e7er. Buradaki sarn\u0131\u00e7 da bu yap\u0131lar\u0131n alt mimarisi olabilir. Alt\u0131n bulunup bulunmad\u0131\u011f\u0131 konusunda net bir \u015fey s\u00f6ylemek m\u00fcmk\u00fcn de\u011fil. Halk\u0131m\u0131zda tarihi kal\u0131nt\u0131n\u0131n oldu\u011fu yerde hazine bulundu\u011fu alg\u0131s\u0131 var. S\u0131rlar ilgi uyand\u0131r\u0131yor. Bu kadar b\u00fcy\u00fck hazine olsayd\u0131, \u015fimdiye dek ortaya \u00e7\u0131kard\u0131 diye d\u00fc\u015f\u00fcn\u00fcyorum.\u201d demi\u015ftir.\nHali\u00e7\u2019in dibindeki alt\u0131nlar konusunda bir ba\u015fka rivayete g\u00f6re, Fatih \u0130stanbul\u2019u fethetti\u011fi zaman, Bizansl\u0131lar gizli hazinelerini T\u00fcrklere b\u0131rakmamak i\u00e7in, \u201cKutsal hazinelerimizi T\u00fcrklere verece\u011fimize denize d\u00f6keriz.\u201d derler. Hazinelerini Avrupa\u2019ya ka\u00e7\u0131rmaya \u00e7al\u0131\u015fan baz\u0131 Bizansl\u0131lar\u0131n ba\u015f\u0131na t\u00fcrl\u00fc olaylar gelir. Hazineye sahip olmaya \u00e7al\u0131\u015fan bir Rum, e\u015fkiyalar ve birtak\u0131m kervan sahipleri olur. En sonunda \u2018Kutsal Bizans Hazinesi\u2019 Bilecik\u2019in K\u00fcpl\u00fc K\u00f6y\u00fc yak\u0131nlar\u0131ndaki K\u0131s\u0131k Kaya\u2019da bir kuyuya g\u00f6m\u00fcl\u00fcr. Bahsi ge\u00e7en Rum, e\u015fkiyalar taraf\u0131ndan i\u015fkence edilerek \u00f6ld\u00fcr\u00fcl\u00fcnce hazinenin yerini bilen kimse kalmaz.\nRivayetin do\u011frulu\u011fu bilinmez, ancak K\u0131s\u0131kl\u0131 Kaya\u2019da yap\u0131lan \u00e7al\u0131\u015fmalar s\u0131ras\u0131nda b\u00f6yle bir kuyu ortaya \u00e7\u0131km\u0131\u015ft\u0131r.\nKaynaklar: Tarihkomplo   Hurriyet    Gphaber    Kuplukoyu\n[Toplam:2    Ortalama:3/5] Hali\u00e7\u2019in Dibinin Alt\u0131n Dolu Oldu\u011fu \u0130ddias\u0131", "D\u00fcnya akademik performans\u0131na g\u00f6re \u201cen iyi \u00fcniversite s\u0131ralamas\u0131n\u0131\u201d yapan bir \u00e7ok kurulu\u015f vard\u0131r. Bu listeleri haz\u0131rlayan kurumlar uygulad\u0131klar\u0131 kriterlerden dolay\u0131 uzmanlar taraf\u0131ndan ele\u015ftirilse de, s\u00f6z konusu kurumlar ele\u015ftiriler do\u011frultusunda de\u011fi\u015fiklikler yapmamaktad\u0131rlar. Bu da uygulanan kriterlerden dolay\u0131 yay\u0131nlanan listelerde farkl\u0131 sonu\u00e7lar\u0131n olu\u015fmas\u0131na neden olmaktad\u0131r.\n\u00d6rne\u011fin temel amac\u0131, d\u00fcnya \u00fcniversiteleri i\u00e7in bilimsel yay\u0131nlar\u0131n kalitesini ve miktar\u0131n\u0131 yans\u0131tan akademik performans g\u00f6stergelerine dayal\u0131 bir s\u0131ralama sistemi geli\u015ftirmek olan URAP\u2019\u0131n s\u0131ralamas\u0131n\u0131 ABD merkezli U.S. News ve \u0130ngiltere merkezli Y\u00fcksek\u00f6\u011fretim Derecelendirme Kurulu\u015fu QS\u2018nin verileriyle kar\u015f\u0131la\u015ft\u0131rd\u0131\u011f\u0131m\u0131zda \u00e7ok farkl\u0131 sonu\u00e7larla kar\u015f\u0131la\u015fmaktay\u0131z. Bununla beraber AB verilerinden faydalan\u0131larak haz\u0131rlanan s\u0131ralama ise bu \u00e7eli\u015fkiyi derinle\u015ftirmektedir.\nURAP\u2019\u0131n D\u00fcnya S\u0131ralamas\u0131\nTemel amac\u0131, d\u00fcnya \u00fcniversiteleri i\u00e7in bilimsel yay\u0131nlar\u0131n kalitesini ve miktar\u0131n\u0131 yans\u0131tan akademik performans g\u00f6stergelerine dayal\u0131 bir s\u0131ralama sistemi geli\u015ftirmek olan ve ODT\u00dc Enformatik Enstit\u00fcs\u00fc b\u00fcnyesinde laboratuvar ara\u015ft\u0131rmas\u0131 yapan URAP, 2500 \u00fcniversitenin makale ve di\u011fer dok\u00fcmanlar\u0131n\u0131 de\u011ferlendirerek 2017-2018 s\u0131ralamas\u0131n\u0131 belirledi.\nURAP\u2019\u0131n 2017-2018 D\u00fcnya S\u0131ralamas\u0131nda yer alan 2 bin 500 \u00fcniversitenin makale ve at\u0131f puanlar\u0131n\u0131 hesaplayarak belirledi\u011fi listede ODT\u00dc 532, \u0130stanbul \u00dcniversitesi 540, Hacettepe \u00dcniversitesi 543, \u0130stanbul Teknik \u00dcniversitesi 559, Ankara \u00dcniversitesi 652, Ege \u00dcniversitesi 653, Gazi \u00dcniversitesi 669, Bo\u011fazi\u00e7i \u00dcniversitesi 699, Bilkent \u00dcniversitesi 840 ve Erciyes \u00dcniversitesi 878. s\u0131rada yer ald\u0131.\nURAP\u2019\u0131n 2017-2018 D\u00fcnya S\u0131ralamas\u0131\nQS\u2019nin D\u00fcnya S\u0131ralamas\u0131\nEn iyi \u00fcniversiteler s\u0131ralamas\u0131 i\u00e7in d\u00fcnya genelinde yakla\u015f\u0131k 9000 \u00fcniversiteyi g\u00f6z \u00f6n\u00fcnde bulundurularak, 3000 \u00fcniversiteyi de\u011ferlendirmeye alan \u0130ngiltere merkezli QS\u2018nin g\u00f6stergeleri URAP\u2019tan farkl\u0131 bir sonu\u00e7 vermektedir. QS\u2019nin belirledi\u011fi s\u0131ralamada Bilkent \u00dcniversitesi 421. s\u0131rada yer almaktad\u0131r.\nQS\u2019nin 2017-2018 D\u00fcnya S\u0131ralamas\u0131\nURAP\u2019tan farkl\u0131 olarak ilk 400 \u00fcniversiteye \u00f6zel bir yer veren QS\u2019nin 2018 D\u00fcnya S\u0131ralamas\u0131nda \u00f6zel \u00fcniversiteler aras\u0131nda Bilkent \u00dcniversitesi 421, Ko\u00e7 \u00dcniversitesi 431, Sabanc\u0131 \u00dcniversitesi 461. s\u0131rayla \u00f6ne \u00e7\u0131kmaktad\u0131rlar. Devlet \u00fcniversiteleri aras\u0131nda ise 471. s\u0131rada yine URAP g\u00f6stergelerinden farkl\u0131 olarak Orta Do\u011fu Teknik \u00dcniversitesi (ODT\u00dc) ilk s\u0131rada yer almaktad\u0131r.\nODT\u00dc\u2019n\u00fcn QS 2017-2018 S\u0131ralamas\u0131ndaki Yeri\nU.S. News\u2018in D\u00fcnya S\u0131ralamas\u0131\nD\u00fcnyada en g\u00fcvenilir \u2018en iyi \u00fcniversiteler\u2018 s\u0131ralamas\u0131n\u0131 veren  U.S. News\u2018in 2018 s\u0131ralamas\u0131na bakt\u0131\u011f\u0131m\u0131zda ise, 74 \u00fclkeden se\u00e7ilmi\u015f 1250 \u00fcniversite aras\u0131nda ilk 200\u2019de yer alan tek T\u00fcrkiye \u00dcniversitesinin 190. s\u0131rayla Bo\u011fazi\u00e7i \u00dcniversitesi oldu\u011fu g\u00f6r\u00fclmektedir.\nUS. News, \u2018D\u00fcnyan\u0131n En \u0130yi \u00dcniversiteleri S\u0131ralamas\u0131n\u0131\u2018 \u00fcniversitelerin global/b\u00f6lgesel ara\u015ft\u0131rmalarda sayg\u0131nl\u0131k, yay\u0131n, kitap, konferans say\u0131lar\u0131, yay\u0131nlara yap\u0131lan at\u0131flar, uluslararas\u0131 i\u015fbirli\u011fi gibi 13 kritere g\u00f6re belirlemektedir.\nBuna g\u00f6re T\u00fcrkiye\u2019den en iyi dereceyi yapan Bo\u011fazi\u00e7i \u00dcniversitesi 190, ODT\u00dc ise 314. s\u0131rada yer almaktad\u0131r.\nU.S News\u2019in 2017-2018 S\u0131ralamas\u0131\nAB D\u00fcnya S\u0131ralamas\u0131\nY\u00fcksek dereceli \u00fcniversiteleri \u00f6\u011frenme ortamlar\u0131, bilimsel makale \u00fczerindeki etki, program \u00e7e\u015fitlili\u011fi, uluslararas\u0131 odaklanma gibi g\u00f6stergelerden yararlanarak D\u00fcnya \u00dcniversitelerinin Akademik S\u0131ralamas\u0131n\u0131 haz\u0131rlayan AB verilerinde ise, 301. s\u0131ra band\u0131nda Ko\u00e7 \u00dcniversitesi yer almaktad\u0131r. URAP, QS ve U.S. News de genel olarak bu s\u0131ralamalarda k\u00fcresel ve b\u00f6lgesel sayg\u0131nl\u0131\u011f\u0131, akademik yay\u0131nlar\u0131, kitaplar, bildiriler, at\u0131flar, uluslararas\u0131 i\u015fbirli\u011fi gibi kriterleri g\u00f6z \u00f6n\u00fcne al\u0131yor olmalar\u0131na ra\u011fmen belirledikleri \u00fcniversite s\u0131ralamalar\u0131 farkl\u0131 olmaktad\u0131r.\nS\u0131ralamalar\u0131n Birbirinden Farkl\u0131 Olmas\u0131n\u0131n Sebebi Nedir?\nURAP s\u0131ralamay\u0131 belirlerken, yukar\u0131da belirtti\u011fimiz kriterler d\u0131\u015f\u0131nda 2500 \u00fcniversitenin \u00f6\u011fretim \u00fcyesi ba\u015f\u0131na d\u00fc\u015fen toplam bilimsel dok\u00fcman say\u0131s\u0131n\u0131 ve doktora \u00f6\u011frenci say\u0131s\u0131n\u0131 da baz almaktad\u0131r. U.S News, 1250 \u00fcniversiteyi akademik etkinlik ve kategorilendirilmi\u015f at\u0131flar\u0131n y\u00fczdeli\u011fine g\u00f6re s\u0131ralamaktad\u0131r. D\u00fcnya s\u0131ralamas\u0131nda benzer kriterleri kullanan QS ise \u00e7e\u015fitli \u00fcniversitelere mensup akademisyenlerin ve i\u015fveren g\u00f6r\u00fc\u015flerini; ki\u015fi ba\u015f\u0131na d\u00fc\u015fen at\u0131f say\u0131s\u0131n\u0131, \u00f6\u011fretim \u00fcyesi ba\u015f\u0131na d\u00fc\u015fen \u00f6\u011frenci say\u0131s\u0131, yabanc\u0131 \u00f6\u011fretim \u00fcyesi oran\u0131 ve yabanc\u0131 \u00f6\u011frenci oran\u0131 gibi \u00f6l\u00e7\u00fcleri de s\u0131ra belirlemede kullanmaktad\u0131r.\nD\u00fcnyan\u0131n En \u0130yi \u00dcniversiteleri s\u0131ralamas\u0131nda T\u00fcrkiye\u2019de ilk 10\u2019a giren \u00fcniversiteler:\nKaynaklar:\nAkademik Performansa G\u00f6re \u00dcniversite S\u0131ralamas\u0131 (URAP) 2017-2018, QS World University Rankings 2017-2018, US News & World Report 2017-2018, mastersportal.eu\n[Toplam:1    Ortalama:1/5] T\u00fcrk \u00dcniversitelerinin D\u00fcnyadaki Yeri 2018", "2020 y\u0131l\u0131 resmi tatilleri ne zaman ba\u015fl\u0131yor ve hangi g\u00fcnlere denk geliyor? Bu hepimizin merak etti\u011fi bir soru. 2020 y\u0131l\u0131 resmi tatilleri toplam 16 g\u00fcnd\u00fcr.\n2020 y\u0131l\u0131 resmi tatilleri \u015fu \u015fekildedir;\n1 Ocak Y\u0131lba\u015f\u0131\n23 Nisan Ulusal Egemenlik ve \u00c7ocuk Bayram\u0131\n1 May\u0131s Emek ve Dayan\u0131\u015fma G\u00fcn\u00fc\n19 May\u0131s Atat\u00fcrk\u2019\u00fc Anma, Gen\u00e7lik ve Spor Bayram\u0131\n23 May\u0131s Ramazan Bayram\u0131 Arefesi\n24 May\u0131s Ramazan Bayram\u0131 1. g\u00fcn\n25 May\u0131s Ramazan Bayram\u0131 2. g\u00fcn\n26 May\u0131s Ramazan Bayram\u0131 3. g\u00fcn\n15 Temmuz Demokrasi Bayram\u0131\n30 Temmuz Kurban Bayram\u0131 Arefesi\n31 Temmuz Kurban Bayram\u0131 1. g\u00fcn\n1 A\u011fustos Kurban Bayram\u0131 2. g\u00fcn\n2 A\u011fustos Kurban Bayram\u0131 3. g\u00fcn\n3 A\u011fustos Kurban Bayram\u0131 4. g\u00fcn\n30 A\u011fustos Zafer Bayram\u0131\n29 Ekim Cumhuriyet Bayram\u0131\n2020 y\u0131l\u0131 Ramazan (\u015eeker) Bayram\u0131 hafta sonuna m\u0131 denk geliyor?\n2020 y\u0131l\u0131 Ramazan bayram\u0131 arefesi cumartesi g\u00fcn\u00fcne denk gelmektedir. 2019\u2019da Ramazan Bayram\u0131 hafta i\u00e7ine denk geldi\u011fi i\u00e7in kamuda \u00e7al\u0131\u015fanlar 9 g\u00fcn tatil yapm\u0131\u015flard\u0131, ama bu y\u0131l b\u00f6yle olmayacak. Cumartesi g\u00fcn\u00fc Ramazan Bayram\u0131 arefesinden itibaren ba\u015flayan tatil, Sal\u0131 g\u00fcn\u00fc, yani Ramazan Bayram\u0131n\u0131n son g\u00fcn\u00fc bitiyor. Bilindi\u011fi \u00fczere kamuda \u00e7al\u0131\u015fanlar i\u00e7in hafta sonu tatili; yani hafta sonundan ba\u015flayan tatil kamu \u00e7al\u0131\u015fanlar\u0131 i\u00e7in \u00e7ok da sevindirici bir haber de\u011fil.\n2020\u2019de resmi tatil g\u00fcn\u00fc olan Kurban Bayram\u0131 hafta sonuna m\u0131 denk geliyor?\n2019 y\u0131l\u0131 Kurban Bayram\u0131 bilindi\u011fi \u00fczere hafta sonuna denk geldi\u011fi i\u00e7in k\u0131sa ge\u00e7mi\u015fti. 2020\u2019de Kurban Bayram\u0131 hafta i\u00e7ine denk gelmektedir. Fakat Per\u015fembe g\u00fcn\u00fcnden denk geldi\u011fi i\u00e7in yine hafta sonuna yakalan\u0131yor :). Kamuda \u00e7al\u0131\u015fanlar 2020 y\u0131l\u0131nda 5 g\u00fcn tatil yapacaklar.\n10 Kas\u0131m resmi tatil mi?\nUlu \u00d6nder Atat\u00fcrk\u2019\u00fcn \u00f6l\u00fcm y\u0131l d\u00f6n\u00fcm\u00fc her y\u0131l oldu\u011fu gibi \u00fclkemizde yas g\u00fcn\u00fcd\u00fcr.\n1 May\u0131s resmi tatil mi?\n2020 y\u0131l\u0131 resmi tatil takvimine g\u00f6re 1 May\u0131s Cuma g\u00fcn\u00fcne denk gelmektedir. 1 May\u0131s \u0130\u015f\u00e7i ve Emek\u00e7iler Bayram\u0131 olan bu g\u00fcn tatil olarak ge\u00e7irilecektir.\n19 May\u0131s tatil mi? Hangi g\u00fcne denk geliyor?\n2020 resmi tatillerin i\u00e7erisinde olan 19 May\u0131s Atat\u00fcrk\u2019\u00fc Anma Gen\u00e7lik ve Spor Bayram\u0131 Sal\u0131 g\u00fcn\u00fcne denk gelmektedir. Bu g\u00fcn de resmi tatildir.\n30 A\u011fustos Zafer Bayram\u0131 tatil mi?\n30 A\u011fustos Zafer Bayram\u0131 Pazar g\u00fcn\u00fcne denk gelmektedir. 2019 y\u0131l\u0131 30 A\u011fustos Zafer Bayram\u2019\u0131nda \u00fc\u00e7 g\u00fcnl\u00fck bir tatil ge\u00e7iren kamu \u00e7al\u0131\u015fanlar\u0131, 2020 y\u0131l\u0131nda Pazar g\u00fcn\u00fc olmas\u0131 sebebiyle hafta sonuna denk geldi\u011fi i\u00e7in ekstra bir tatil g\u00fcn\u00fc ge\u00e7irmeyeceklerdir.\n15 Temmuz tatil mi?\n15 Temmuz aziz \u015fehitlerimiz ve gazilerimizi anma g\u00fcn\u00fcd\u00fcr. TBMM\u2019nin teklifi \u00fczerine \u201815 Temmuz G\u00fcn\u00fc Demokrasi ve Milli Birlik G\u00fcn\u00fc\u2019 resmi tatil olarak kabul edilmi\u015ftir. 2020 y\u0131l\u0131nda da aziz \u015fehitlerimizi ve gazilerimizi and\u0131\u011f\u0131m\u0131z bu g\u00fcn\u00fc tatil olarak ge\u00e7irece\u011fiz.\n29 Ekim Cumhuriyet Bayram\u0131 resmi tatil mi?\n2020 y\u0131l\u0131nda 29 Ekim g\u00fcn\u00fc Cumhuriyet Bayram\u0131 Per\u015fembe g\u00fcn\u00fcne denk gelmektedir. 29 Ekim Cumhuriyet Bayram\u0131 resmi tatildir.\nKAYNAK: www.tbmm.gov.tr, http://www.mevzuat.gov.tr/MevzuatMetin/1.5.2429.pdf \n[Toplam:7    Ortalama:4.4/5] 2020 Y\u0131l\u0131 Resmi Tatilleri", "\u201cD\u00fcnyadaki \u00d6zel G\u00fcnler, Haftalar ve Y\u0131llar\u201d ba\u015fl\u0131kl\u0131 i\u00e7eri\u011fimizde d\u00fcnyada kutlanan \u00f6zel g\u00fcnleri ara\u015ft\u0131rd\u0131k.\nBirle\u015fmi\u015f Milletler taraf\u0131ndan g\u00f6zlemlenen uluslararas\u0131 g\u00fcnler olduk\u00e7a fazla. Te\u015fvik etmek ve fark\u0131ndal\u0131k yaratmak amac\u0131yla belirli olaylar ve konulara y\u00f6nelik baz\u0131 g\u00fcn ve haftalar belirlenmi\u015ftir. Bu \u00f6zel g\u00fcnler orada ya\u015fayan halk i\u00e7in \u00e7ok \u00f6nemli olsa da onlar\u0131n g\u00f6r\u00fc\u015f\u00fcnden olmayan insanlara anlams\u0131z gelebilir. \u00d6rne\u011fin, 1 Nisan Paskalya bayram\u0131 diye adland\u0131r\u0131lan, Hristiyanlar\u0131n kutlad\u0131\u011f\u0131 bu g\u00fcnde halk kiliseyi ziyaret ederek, paskalya tav\u015fan\u0131 \u015feklinde yap\u0131lm\u0131\u015f \u00e7ikolatalar\u0131 da\u011f\u0131t\u0131r. Evlerde paskalya \u00e7\u00f6rekleri yenilerek kutlan\u0131l\u0131r.\nKutlanan bir di\u011fer me\u015fhur \u00f6zel g\u00fcn ise Cad\u0131lar Bayram\u0131. 31 Ekim\u2019de kutlanan hemen hemen hepimizin duydu\u011fu bu g\u00fcn, \u00e7o\u011fu Amerikan eyaletinde kutlan\u0131yor. Cad\u0131lar Bayram\u0131, Pagan ve Hristiyan k\u00f6kleri ta\u015f\u0131yan bir gelenek. Oran\u0131n halk\u0131 \u00e7e\u015fitli kost\u00fcmleri giyerek partilere giderken, aileleri ile birlikte vakit ge\u00e7iriyorlar. Sokaklarda dola\u015fan k\u00fc\u00e7\u00fckler, evlerden \u015feker topluyorlar.\nBaz\u0131 \u00f6zel g\u00fcnlerin ise kutlanma tarihleri \u00fclkeden \u00fclkeye de\u011fi\u015febiliyor. \u00d6rne\u011fin: \u015e\u00fckran G\u00fcn\u00fc, ABD\u2019de kas\u0131m ay\u0131nda kutlan\u0131rken Kanada\u2019da ekim ay\u0131n\u0131n ikinci pazartesi g\u00fcn\u00fc kutlan\u0131yor. \u015e\u00fckran g\u00fcn\u00fc \u015f\u00fckretmek i\u00e7in kutlan\u0131lan bir g\u00fcn olarak tarihe ge\u00e7mi\u015ftir. Yine o g\u00fcnde de ailecek evde toplan\u0131l\u0131p hindi yiyerek kutlama yap\u0131l\u0131yor.\nD\u00fcnyada toplumlar aras\u0131 \u00f6zel kutlanan g\u00fcnler var. T\u00fcrkiye\u2019de de kutlad\u0131\u011f\u0131m\u0131z g\u00fcnler \u015fu \u015fekilde: Y\u0131lba\u015f\u0131, Nevruz, Anneler G\u00fcn\u00fc, Babalar G\u00fcn\u00fc, Sevgililer G\u00fcn\u00fc, D\u00fcnya Kad\u0131nlar G\u00fcn\u00fc, D\u00fcnya Tiyatro G\u00fcn\u00fc, D\u00fcnya Felsefe G\u00fcn\u00fc, T\u0131p Bayram\u0131, D\u00fcnya Veteriner Hekimleri G\u00fcn\u00fc, D\u00fcnya Su G\u00fcn\u00fc, D\u00fcnya Meteoroloji G\u00fcn\u00fc.\nBunlardan baz\u0131lar\u0131n\u0131n nas\u0131l ortaya \u00e7\u0131km\u0131\u015f oldu\u011funa bir g\u00f6z gezdirelim.\nAnneler G\u00fcn\u00fc nas\u0131l ortaya \u00e7\u0131km\u0131\u015ft\u0131r?\nAnneler G\u00fcn\u00fcn\u00fcn nas\u0131l ortaya \u00e7\u0131kt\u0131\u011f\u0131yla ilgili bir \u00e7ok rivayet bulunmaktad\u0131r. Bir rivayete g\u00f6re ABD\u2019nin Virginia eyaletinde ya\u015fayan bir \u00f6\u011fretmen, vefat eden annesi i\u00e7in her y\u0131l bir kutlama yapmak istemi\u015ftir. Kutlaman\u0131n ard\u0131ndan 1908 y\u0131l\u0131nda bir okulda 407 \u00e7ocuk anneler g\u00fcn\u00fcn\u00fc kutlamak istemi\u015ftir. Daha sonra bu g\u00fcn\u00fcn Anneler G\u00fcn\u00fc olarak kutlanmas\u0131 i\u00e7in medya ve politikac\u0131larla bu fikir payla\u015f\u0131lm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r. 1914 y\u0131l\u0131nda Anneler G\u00fcn\u00fc olarak kabul edilmi\u015ftir. May\u0131s ay\u0131n\u0131n 14\u2019\u00fcnde kutlad\u0131\u011f\u0131m\u0131z Anneler G\u00fcn\u00fc d\u00fcnyaca kutlan\u0131lan bir g\u00fcnd\u00fcr. T\u00fcrkiye\u2019de de \u00f6nemsenen bug\u00fcn\u00fc, var olma sebebimiz olan annelerimize hediye alarak ge\u00e7iriyoruz.\nBabalar G\u00fcn\u00fc nas\u0131l ortaya \u00e7\u0131km\u0131\u015ft\u0131r?\nAmerika\u2019da babas\u0131 gazi olan bir k\u0131z, anneler g\u00fcn\u00fc gibi Babalar G\u00fcn\u00fcn\u00fcn de olmas\u0131n\u0131 istemi\u015ftir. Babas\u0131n\u0131n do\u011fum g\u00fcn\u00fc 5 Haziran oldu\u011fu i\u00e7in de, bu tarihler \u00fczerine \u00e7al\u0131\u015fma ba\u015flatm\u0131\u015f, ancak \u00e7al\u0131\u015fmalar o tarihe yeti\u015fmemi\u015ftir. Kutlama, haziran ay\u0131n\u0131n \u00fc\u00e7\u00fcnc\u00fc pazar\u0131na ertelenmi\u015ftir. Babalar G\u00fcn\u00fc bu y\u00fczden haziran ay\u0131nda kutlanmaktad\u0131r. Babalar G\u00fcn\u00fc ilk kez 19 Haziran 1910\u2019da Washington Spokane \u015fehrinde kutlanm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r. 1924 y\u0131l\u0131nda ABD Ba\u015fkan\u0131 Calvin Coolidge kutlamalar\u0131 desteklemi\u015f ama resmi olarak Babalar G\u00fcn\u00fc tarihe ge\u00e7memi\u015ftir. T\u00fcrkiye\u2019de Babalar G\u00fcn\u00fcn\u00fc her y\u0131l haziran\u0131n \u00fc\u00e7\u00fcnc\u00fc haftas\u0131 kutlamaktay\u0131z.\nD\u00fcnya Kad\u0131nlar G\u00fcn\u00fc\n1857 y\u0131l\u0131nda ABD\u2019de New York kentinde kad\u0131n dokuma i\u015f\u00e7ileri daha iyi \u00e7al\u0131\u015fma ko\u015fullar\u0131 isteyerek greve ba\u015flam\u0131\u015ft\u0131r. Grev an\u0131nda polis i\u015f\u00e7ilere sald\u0131rm\u0131\u015f ve i\u015f\u00e7iler fabrikaya kitlenmi\u015ftir. Fabrikada yang\u0131n \u00e7\u0131kmas\u0131 sonucu \u00e7al\u0131\u015fan kad\u0131n i\u015f\u00e7ilerin 129\u2019u \u00f6lm\u00fc\u015ft\u00fcr. Daha sonra Danimarka\u2019n\u0131n Kopenhag kentinde ger\u00e7ekle\u015fen 2. Enternasyonal\u2019e ba\u011fl\u0131 kad\u0131nlar toplant\u0131s\u0131nda (Uluslararas\u0131 Sosyalist Kad\u0131nlar Konferans\u0131) 8 Mart\u2019\u0131n d\u00fcnya kad\u0131nlar g\u00fcn\u00fc olmas\u0131 \u00f6nerilmi\u015ftir. \u00d6neri kabul edilmesi sonucu 8 Mart, T\u00fcrkiye\u2019yle beraber t\u00fcm \u00fclkelerde D\u00fcnya Kad\u0131nlar G\u00fcn\u00fc olarak kutlamaktad\u0131r.\nNevruz g\u00fcn\u00fc nedir? Nevruz g\u00fcn\u00fc nas\u0131l ortaya \u00e7\u0131km\u0131\u015ft\u0131r?\nBahar\u0131n ilk g\u00fcn\u00fcne Nevruz denir. Mart ay\u0131n\u0131n 21. g\u00fcn\u00fcnde kutlanmaktad\u0131r. Birlik, beraberlik ve bar\u0131\u015f\u0131 ifade etmektedir. Bu g\u00fcn\u00fc ilk defa T\u00fcrklerin kutlad\u0131\u011f\u0131na dair \u00c7in kaynaklar\u0131nda derlemeler bulunmaktad\u0131r. A\u00e7\u0131k havada kutlanan bu g\u00fcn, \u00e7e\u015fitli yemeklerle \u015fenliklerle d\u00fczenlenmektedir. Bir rivayete g\u00f6re de \u0130slamiyet\u2019ten \u00f6nce hayat bulan nevruz, T\u00fcrk boylar\u0131 taraf\u0131ndan Ergenekon b\u00f6lgesinden \u00e7\u0131k\u0131lan tarihte yani 21 Mart g\u00fcn\u00fcnde \u201cKurtulu\u015f Bayram\u0131\u201d olarak kutlanm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r. Eski T\u00fcrk takvimi olan 12 Hayvanl\u0131 T\u00fcrk takviminde, \u201cy\u0131lba\u015f\u0131\u201d olarak da kabul edilmi\u015f, yeni y\u0131l kutlamalar\u0131 yap\u0131lm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r.\nNevruz g\u00fcn\u00fcnde insanlar sabahlar\u0131 ilk i\u015f olarak ate\u015f yak\u0131p, \u00fczerinden atlayarak kendilerine e\u011flence yarat\u0131rlar. \u00c7e\u015fmelerden su al\u0131p yola ve evlere serperek, kalan suyu ev halk\u0131na i\u00e7irirler. Nevruzun k\u00fclt\u00fcr\u00fcn\u00fc bu \u015fekilde yans\u0131t\u0131rlar.\nT\u0131p Bayram\u0131 nedir? Nas\u0131l ortaya \u00e7\u0131km\u0131\u015ft\u0131r?\nT\u0131p Bayram\u0131 1938\u2019e kadar 12 May\u0131s\u2019ta kutlanm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r. Bursa\u2019da Y\u0131ld\u0131r\u0131m Dar\u00fc\u015f\u015fafaka\u2019da ilk T\u00fcrk\u00e7e dersi ile kabul edilmi\u015f fakat daha sonra bu uygulamadan vazge\u00e7ilmi\u015ftir. 14 Mart\u2019\u0131n T\u0131p Bayram\u0131 olarak kabul edilmesinden sonra, bu tarihten itibaren bir hafta boyunca T\u0131p haftas\u0131 \u015feklinde kutlanmas\u0131 kararla\u015ft\u0131r\u0131lm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r. D\u00fcnyada t\u0131p bayram\u0131, Doktorlar G\u00fcn\u00fc, Sa\u011fl\u0131k G\u00fcn\u00fc \u015feklinde de kutlan\u0131yor. \u00d6rne\u011fin, ABD\u2019de 30 Mart 1842 genel anestezinin ilk defa kullan\u0131ld\u0131\u011f\u0131 bir tarih oldu\u011fu i\u00e7in bu g\u00fcn, t\u0131p ile ilgili olarak \u00f6zel kabul edilmektedir. Hindistan\u2019da da \u00fcnl\u00fc doktor Bidhan Chadra Roy\u2019un do\u011fum ve \u00f6l\u00fcm y\u0131ld\u00f6n\u00fcm\u00fc olan 1 Temmuz tarihi \u201cDoktorlarlar G\u00fcn\u00fc\u201d olarak kutlan\u0131lmaktad\u0131r. T\u00fcrkiye\u2019de de 14 Mart T\u0131p bayram\u0131 olarak kutlanmaktad\u0131r.\nSevgililer G\u00fcn\u00fc nas\u0131l ortaya \u00e7\u0131km\u0131\u015ft\u0131r?\n1800 y\u0131llarda 14 \u015eubat, Amerikal\u0131 Esther Howland\u2019\u0131n ho\u015fland\u0131\u011f\u0131 ki\u015fiye ilk Sevgililer G\u00fcn\u00fc kart\u0131n\u0131 yollamas\u0131yla toplumsal sevgililer g\u00fcn\u00fc olarak tarihe ge\u00e7mi\u015ftir. Sevgililer G\u00fcn\u00fc bir \u00e7ok \u00fclkede kutlan\u0131lan bir g\u00fcnd\u00fcr. Bu g\u00fcn\u00fc seven ve sevilen insanlar hediyele\u015ferek ge\u00e7irmektedir.\nD\u00fcnyada kutlanan di\u011fer \u00f6zel g\u00fcnler \nOCAK\n27 Ocak: Uluslararas\u0131 Yahudi Soyk\u0131r\u0131m\u0131 Kurbanlar\u0131n\u0131 Anma G\u00fcn\u00fc\n\u015eUBAT\n4 \u015eubat:  D\u00fcnya Kanser G\u00fcn\u00fc\n6 \u015eubat: Kad\u0131n S\u00fcnnetine Kar\u015f\u0131 S\u0131f\u0131r Tolerans Uluslararas\u0131 G\u00fcn\u00fc\n11 \u015eubat: Bilimde Kad\u0131nlar ve K\u0131z \u00c7ocuklar\u0131 Uluslararas\u0131 G\u00fcn\u00fc\n13 \u015eubat: D\u00fcnya Radyo G\u00fcn\u00fc\n20 \u015eubat: D\u00fcnya Sosyal Adalet G\u00fcn\u00fc\n21 \u015eubat: Uluslararas\u0131 Anadil G\u00fcn\u00fc [UNESCO]\n  MART\n1 Mart: S\u0131f\u0131r Ayr\u0131mc\u0131l\u0131k G\u00fcn\u00fc\n2 Mart: D\u00fcnya Yaban Hayat\u0131 G\u00fcn\u00fc\n8 Mart: D\u00fcnya Kad\u0131nlar G\u00fcn\u00fc\n20 Mart: BM Frans\u0131z Dili G\u00fcn\u00fc\n20 Mart: Uluslararas\u0131 Mutluluk G\u00fcn\u00fc\n21 Mart: Uluslararas\u0131 Irk Ayr\u0131m\u0131 ile M\u00fccadele G\u00fcn\u00fc\n21 Mart: D\u00fcnya \u015eiir G\u00fcn\u00fc [UNESCO]\n21 Mart: Uluslararas\u0131 Nevruz Mart: G\u00f6zalt\u0131na Al\u0131nan ve Kay\u0131p Birle\u015fmi\u015f Milletler Personeli ile Dayan\u0131\u015fma G\u00fcn\u00fc\n27 Mart: D\u00fcnya Tiyatro G\u00fcn\u00fc\nN\u0130SAN\n2 Nisan: D\u00fcnya Otizm Fark\u0131ndal\u0131k G\u00fcn\u00fc\n4 Nisan: D\u00fcnya May\u0131n Tehlikelerine Kar\u015f\u0131 Korunma G\u00fcn\u00fc\n6 Nisan: Uluslararas\u0131 Kalk\u0131nma ve Bar\u0131\u015f i\u00e7in Spor G\u00fcn\u00fc\n7 Nisan: Ruanda Soyk\u0131r\u0131m\u0131 Kurbanlar\u0131n\u0131 Anma G\u00fcn\u00fc\n7 Nisan: D\u00fcnya Sa\u011fl\u0131k G\u00fcn\u00fc [WHO]\n12 Nisan: Telif Haklar\u0131 G\u00fcn\u00fc [UNESCO]\n25 Nisan:  D\u00fcnya S\u0131tma \u0130le M\u00fccadele G\u00fcn\u00fc [WHO]\n26 Nisan:  D\u00fcnya Fikri M\u00fclkiyet G\u00fcn\u00fc [WIPO]\n26 Nisan: \u00c7ernobil Felaketini Anma Uluslararas\u0131 G\u00fcn\u00fc\n28 Nisan: D\u00fcnya \u0130\u015f G\u00fcvenli\u011fi ve Sa\u011fl\u0131\u011f\u0131 G\u00fcn\u00fc [ILO]\n30 Nisan: Uluslararas\u0131 Caz G\u00fcn\u00fc\n30 Nisan: Vesak G\u00fcn\u00fc\nMAYIS\n3 May\u0131s: D\u00fcnya Ton Bal\u0131\u011f\u0131 G\u00fcn\u00fc\n3 May\u0131s: D\u00fcnya Bas\u0131n \u00d6zg\u00fcrl\u00fc\u011f\u00fc G\u00fcn\u00fc\n8-9 May\u0131s: \u0130kinci D\u00fcnya Savas\u0131nda Hayat\u0131n\u0131 Kaybedenleri Anma ve Uzla\u015f\u0131 Sa\u011flama G\u00fcnleri\n10 May\u0131s: D\u00fcnya G\u00f6\u00e7men Ku\u015flar G\u00fcnleri [UNEP]\n15 May\u0131s: Aileler Uluslararas\u0131 G\u00fcn\u00fc\n16 May\u0131s: Bar\u0131\u015f i\u00e7inde Birlikte Ya\u015fama Uluslararas\u0131 G\u00fcn\u00fc\n17 May\u0131s: D\u00fcnya Telekom\u00fcnikasyon ve Bilgi Toplumu G\u00fcn\u00fc\n20 May\u0131s: D\u00fcnya Ar\u0131 G\u00fcn\u00fc\n21 May\u0131s: D\u00fcnya Diyalog ve Kalk\u0131nma i\u00e7in \u00c7ok K\u00fclt\u00fcrl\u00fcl\u00fck G\u00fcn\u00fc\n22 May\u0131s: Biyolojik \u00c7e\u015fitlilik Uluslararas\u0131 G\u00fcn\u00fc\n23 May\u0131s: Uluslararas\u0131 Obstetrik Fist\u00fcl\u00fc G\u00fcn\u00fc\n20 Kas\u0131m: Afrika\u2019n\u0131n Sanayile\u015fmesi G\u00fcn\u00fc\nKas\u0131m ay\u0131n\u0131n \u00fc\u00e7\u00fcnc\u00fc Pazar g\u00fcn\u00fc: Trafik Kazas\u0131 Dayan\u0131\u015fma G\u00fcn\u00fc\n29 Kas\u0131m: Filistin Halk\u0131yla Uluslararas\u0131 Dayan\u0131\u015fma G\u00fcn\u00fc\nARALIK\n1 Aral\u0131k: D\u00fcnya AIDS G\u00fcn\u00fc\n2 Aral\u0131k: Aral\u0131k: Soyk\u0131r\u0131m Kurbanlar\u0131n\u0131n An\u0131lmas\u0131 ve Onuru ve Soyk\u0131r\u0131m Su\u00e7unun \u00d6nlenmesi Uluslararas\u0131 G\u00fcn\u00fc\n9 Aral\u0131k: Uluslararas\u0131 Yolsuzlukla M\u00fccadele G\u00fcn\u00fc\n10 Aral\u0131k: \u0130nsan Haklar\u0131 G\u00fcn\u00fc\n11 Aral\u0131k: Uluslararas\u0131 Da\u011flar G\u00fcn\u00fc\n12 Aral\u0131k: Uluslararas\u0131 Tarafs\u0131zl\u0131k G\u00fcn\u00fc\n12 Aral\u0131k: Sa\u011fl\u0131k Hizmetlerinden Herkesin Yararlanmas\u0131 Uluslararas\u0131 G\u00fcn\u00fc\n18 Aral\u0131k: Uluslararas\u0131 G\u00f6\u00e7menler G\u00fcn\u00fc\n18 Aral\u0131k: BM Arap Dili G\u00fcn\u00fc\n20 Aral\u0131k: Uluslararas\u0131 \u0130nsani Dayan\u0131\u015fma G\u00fcn\u00fc\n  Uluslararas\u0131 Haftalar\nBirle\u015fmi\u015f Milletler taraf\u0131ndan belirlenen uluslararas\u0131 haftalar vard\u0131r. Bu haftalar, fark\u0131ndal\u0131k yaratmak ve te\u015fvik etmek amac\u0131yla belirlenmi\u015ftir. Birle\u015fmi\u015f Milletler belirli haftalar\u0131 \u00f6neri olarak sunar ve daha sonra Genel kurul taraf\u0131ndan bu \u00f6neriler kabul edilirse, bu haftalar \u201cUluslararas\u0131 Haftalar\u201d \u015feklinde kararla\u015ft\u0131r\u0131l\u0131r.\nBelirlenen bu haftalar \u015fu \u015fekildedir;\n\u015eUBAT\n1-7 \u015eubat (\u015eubat\u2019\u0131n ilk haftas\u0131): D\u00fcnya Dinleraras\u0131 Uyum Haftas\u0131\nMART\n21-27 Mart: Irk\u00e7\u0131l\u0131k ve Irk Ayr\u0131mc\u0131l\u0131\u011f\u0131na Kar\u015f\u0131 M\u00fccadele Eden Halklarla Dayan\u0131\u015fma Haftas\u0131\nNISAN\n19-23 Nisan: K\u00fcresel Toprak Haftas\u0131\n24-30 Nisan: D\u00fcnya A\u015f\u0131lar\u0131 Hafta\nMAYIS\n8-14 May\u0131s 2017: BM K\u00fcresel Yol G\u00fcvenli\u011fi Haftas\u0131\n25-31 May\u0131s: H\u00fck\u00fcmet D\u0131\u015f\u0131 Halklar\u0131n Dayan\u0131\u015fmas\u0131 Haftas\u0131\nA\u011eUSTOS\n1-7 A\u011fustos: D\u00fcnya Emziren Hafta\nEKIM\n4-10 Ekim: D\u00fcnya Uzay Haftas\u0131\n24-30 Ekim: Silahs\u0131zlanma Haftas\u0131\nKASIM\n6-12 Kas\u0131m (11 Kas\u0131m\u2019\u0131n d\u00fc\u015ft\u00fc\u011f\u00fc hafta): Uluslararas\u0131 Bilim ve Bar\u0131\u015f Haftas\u0131\n13-19 Kas\u0131m: D\u00fcnya Antibiyotik Bilinci Haftas\u0131\nUluslararas\u0131 Y\u0131llar\nYine fark\u0131ndal\u0131k yaratmak i\u00e7in Birle\u015fmi\u015f Milletler taraf\u0131ndan kabul edilen Uluslararas\u0131 Y\u0131llar vard\u0131r. Bunlar da bir veya birden fazla \u00fcye devletlerin \u00f6nerisi \u00fczerine genel kurula sunulup de\u011ferlendirilir. Kabul edildikten sonra da o y\u0131llar \u201cUluslararas\u0131 Y\u0131llar\u201d \u015feklinde ge\u00e7er.\nUluslararas\u0131 Y\u0131llar\u0131n baz\u0131lar\u0131 \u015fu \u015fekildedir;\n2022: Uluslararas\u0131 Artisanal Bal\u0131k\u00e7\u0131l\u0131k ve Su \u00dcr\u00fcnleri Yeti\u015ftirme Y\u0131l\u0131\n2019: Yerli Dillerin Uluslararas\u0131 Y\u0131l\u0131 Uluslararas\u0131 Yorulma Y\u0131l\u0131\nKimyasal Elemanlar Periyodik Cetvelinin Uluslararas\u0131 Y\u0131l\u0131n\u0131n Y\u0131l\u0131\n2017: Uluslararas\u0131 S\u00fcrd\u00fcr\u00fclebilir Kalk\u0131nma Turizmi Y\u0131l\u0131, Uluslararas\u0131 Bakliyat Y\u0131l\u0131\n2015: Uluslararas\u0131 I\u015f\u0131k ve I\u015f\u0131k Teknolojileri Y\u0131l\u0131, Uluslararas\u0131 Toprak Y\u0131l\u0131\n2014: Uluslararas\u0131 Filistin Halk\u0131yla Dayan\u0131\u015fma Y\u0131l\u0131, K\u00fc\u00e7\u00fck Ada Geli\u015fmekte Olan Devletlerin Uluslararas\u0131 Y\u0131l Y\u0131l\u0131, Uluslararas\u0131 Kristalografi Y\u0131l\u0131, Uluslararas\u0131 \u00c7ift\u00e7ilik Y\u0131l\u0131\nKAYNAKLAR: www.un.org www.ntv.com.tr , www.pekbilgili.com, www.internethaber.com , www.hurriyet.com.tr, www.sabah.com.tr/\nVideo oynat\u0131c\u0131\nhttps://dogrula.org/wp-content/uploads/2018/02/dogrula.org_.mp4\n00:00\n00:07\n[Toplam:8    Ortalama:4.9/5] D\u00fcnyadaki \u00d6zel G\u00fcnler, Haftalar ve Y\u0131llar", "WhatsApp\u2018ta kar\u015f\u0131 taraf g\u00f6rmeden g\u00f6nderilen mesaj\u0131 silme \u00f6zelli\u011finin gelmesi, uzun zamand\u0131r g\u00fcndemdeydi. \u00d6yle ki, bu \u00f6zellik art\u0131k bir efsaneye d\u00f6n\u00fc\u015fm\u00fc\u015ft\u00fc. Son y\u0131llarda konu\u015fulan mesaj silme \u00f6zelli\u011fini Whatsapp, ge\u00e7mti\u011fimiz g\u00fcnlerde T\u00fcrkiye\u2019de kullan\u0131ma sundu.\nSosyal medyada ve haber sitelerinde WhatsApp hakk\u0131nda s\u0131k\u00e7a yap\u0131lan haberlere g\u00f6re, mesaj silme \u00f6zelli\u011finin 2014 y\u0131l\u0131ndan beri uygulamas\u0131na ba\u015fland\u0131\u011f\u0131 iddialar\u0131 dola\u015fmaktayd\u0131. \u0130\u015fte daha \u00f6nce mesaj silme \u00f6zelli\u011finin geldi\u011fine dair do\u011fru olmayan haberlerden baz\u0131lar\u0131:\nTeknofiber, 5.10.2014\nYeni\u015fafak, 06.01.2015\nWebtekno, 15.12.2016\nMedya Akademi, 16.12.2016\nZaman zaman sundu\u011fu \u00f6zelliklerle uygulamay\u0131 geni\u015fletmeye \u00e7al\u0131\u015fan WhatsApp\u2019\u0131n mesaj silme \u00f6zelli\u011fi bir\u00e7ok \u00fclkede kullan\u0131ma a\u00e7\u0131lm\u0131\u015ft\u0131. Ge\u00e7ti\u011fimiz g\u00fcnlerde T\u00fcrkiye\u2019de de bu \u00f6zelli\u011fi devreye sokan WhatsApp, art\u0131k yanl\u0131\u015fl\u0131kla mesaj g\u00f6nderme ya da emin olmadan mesaj atma gibi durumlardan kullan\u0131c\u0131lar\u0131n imkan\u0131na sundu.\nPeki Mesajlar Nas\u0131l Siliniyor?\nEn son yay\u0131nlanan g\u00fcncellemeyle birlikte WhatsApp\u2019tan g\u00f6nderilen mesajlar iptal edilebiliyor. Bu \u00f6zellik, metin mesajlar\u0131n\u0131n yan\u0131 s\u0131ra, foto\u011fraf, video, sesli mesajlar\u0131 ve GIF\u2019leri de kaps\u0131yor.\nAndroid ve \u0130OS kullan\u0131c\u0131lar\u0131n\u0131n yanl\u0131\u015fl\u0131kla att\u0131klar\u0131 mesajlar\u0131 silmek istemeleri halinde, g\u00f6nderilen mesaja t\u0131klayarak \u201cHerkesten sil\u201d k\u0131sm\u0131n\u0131 se\u00e7tikleri anda mesaj silinebiliyor.\n\u0130OS\u2019ta Mesaj Silme:\nAndroid\u2019de Mesaj Silme:\n7 Dakika S\u0131n\u0131r\u0131\n\u00d6zelli\u011fin kullan\u0131labilmesi i\u00e7in, kullan\u0131c\u0131lar\u0131n g\u00f6nderdikleri mesajlar\u0131 7 dakika i\u00e7inde silmeleri gerekmektedir. Aksi halde mesaj\u0131 silmek isteseler de 7. dakikadan sonra bu m\u00fcmk\u00fcn olmayacakt\u0131r. Ancak mesaj silme \u00f6zelli\u011finin \u00e7al\u0131\u015fabilmesi i\u00e7in, WhatsApp\u2019\u0131n son s\u00fcr\u00fcm\u00fcn\u00fcn kullanmas\u0131 gerekiyor.\n\u201cBu Mesaj Silindi\u201d\nMesaj\u0131 sildikten sonra mesaj g\u00f6nderen ve mesaj\u0131 alan ki\u015filerde \u201cBu mesaj silindi.\u201d ifadesinin bulunmas\u0131, bu \u00f6zelli\u011fin ele\u015ftirildi\u011fi noktalardan biridir. Mesaj silinse dahi, silindi\u011finden kar\u015f\u0131 taraf\u0131n haberinin olmas\u0131, tepki \u00e7ekti. Ancak bunu \u00f6nlemek m\u00fcmk\u00fcn de\u011fil.\nKaynaklar:\n1-Milliyet 2-TeknoFiber 3-WebTekno 4-Medya Akademi\n[Toplam:3    Ortalama:4/5] Efsane Ger\u00e7ek Oldu: WhatsApp\u2019ta Mesaj Silme \u00d6zelli\u011fi", "Aile \u0130\u00e7i \u015eiddet Nedir?\nAile i\u00e7i \u015fiddet; ili\u015fkilerde \u015fiddet i\u00e7eren, rahats\u0131z edici veya korkutucu davran\u0131\u015flard\u0131r. Aile i\u00e7i \u015fiddet olarak adland\u0131r\u0131lan bu durum, yaln\u0131zca aile bireyleri aras\u0131nda ya\u015fanan \u015fiddet ve istismar olaylar\u0131n\u0131 de\u011fil, toplumsal ya\u015famda birbirleriyle ileti\u015fim halinde olan insanlar aras\u0131nda ger\u00e7ekle\u015fen \u015fiddet olaylar\u0131n\u0131 da kapsar. Bu ili\u015fki bir ortakla, bak\u0131c\u0131yla, aile \u00fcyesiyle ya da e\u015fler aras\u0131nda olabilir. K\u00f6t\u00fcye kullan\u0131m (istismar) sadece fiziksel \u015fiddet de\u011fildir. Kar\u015f\u0131daki ki\u015fiyi kontrol etmek, hakim olmak, a\u015fa\u011f\u0131lamak veya korkutmak anlam\u0131na gelen herhangi bir davran\u0131\u015f olabilir. Bir ki\u015finin aile i\u00e7i \u015fiddete maruz kald\u0131\u011f\u0131n\u0131 s\u00f6yleyebilmek i\u00e7in t\u00fcm taciz ve istismar t\u00fcrlerini ya\u015famas\u0131 gerekmez. Aile i\u00e7i \u015fiddet, \u00e7ok say\u0131da farkl\u0131 t\u00fcrde k\u00f6t\u00fc muameleyi i\u00e7erebilir.\n\u0130stismar ve aile i\u00e7i \u015fiddet t\u00fcrleri \u015funlar\u0131 i\u00e7erebilir:\nS\u00f6zl\u00fc taciz\nK\u00fcf\u00fcr ve s\u00fcrekli a\u015fa\u011f\u0131lanma (\u00f6zel ya da kamuya a\u00e7\u0131k yerlerde)\nEbeveyn ya da partner olarak zeka, cinsellik ve fiziksel \u00f6zellikler \u00fczerinden sald\u0131r\u0131lar.\nPsikolojik istismar\nKurbanla beraberken tehlikeli ara\u00e7 kullan\u0131m\u0131,\nKurban\u0131n mal\u0131na zarar vermek,\nAile \u00fcyelerinin \u00f6n\u00fcnde evcil hayvanlar\u0131n istismar edilmesi,\nHerhangi bir \u00e7ocu\u011fun vesayetiyle ilgili tehditlerde bulunmak,\nPolisin ve mahkemelerin yard\u0131m etmeyece\u011fini veya ona inanmayaca\u011f\u0131n\u0131 s\u00f6yleyerek kurban\u0131 \u2018d\u0131\u015flanmakla\u2019 tehdit etmek.\nDuygusal istismar\n\u0130li\u015fkide ya\u015fanan t\u00fcm problemlerden kurban\u0131 sorumlu tutmak,\nKurban\u0131n sayg\u0131 ve benlik de\u011ferini baltalamak i\u00e7in onu s\u00fcrekli olarak di\u011ferleriyle mukayese etmek,\nBelli aral\u0131klarla dayak atmak,\nT\u00fcm ilgiyi ve alakay\u0131 geri \u00e7ekmek (\u00f6rne\u011fin haftalarca s\u00fcren susma protestosu),\nDuygusal \u015fantaj ve intihar tehditleri.\nSosyal istismar\nAile ve arkada\u015flardan, onlar\u0131 d\u0131\u015flamak ve yaln\u0131zla\u015ft\u0131rmak i\u00e7in kabal\u0131k yaparak uzakla\u015fmak,\nMa\u011fduru sosyal \u00e7evre edinemeyece\u011fi veya i\u015f olanaklar\u0131 bulunmayan bir yerde kontrol alt\u0131nda tutmak,\nAraba veya telefon kullan\u0131m\u0131n\u0131 k\u0131s\u0131tlamak,\nMa\u011fdurun d\u0131\u015far\u0131 \u00e7\u0131k\u0131p insanlarla tan\u0131\u015fmas\u0131n\u0131 yasaklamak veya fiziksel olarak engellemek.\nMaddi istismar\nBanka hesaplar\u0131na eri\u015fimi yasaklamak,\n\u00c7ok az miktarda maddi destek sa\u011flamak,\nKurban\u0131n bir i\u015f bulmas\u0131na izin vermemek,\nMa\u011fduru belgeleri imzalamaya zorlamak veya yanl\u0131\u015f bildirimler yapmak,\nMa\u011fdurun ev masraflar\u0131 i\u00e7in kazand\u0131\u011f\u0131 t\u00fcm paray\u0131 kullanmak,\nMa\u011fdurun emeklili\u011fini kontrol etmek,\nMa\u011fdurun m\u00fclk edinme hakk\u0131na sahip oldu\u011funu inkar etmek.\nFiziksel istismar\nV\u00fccuda do\u011frudan sald\u0131r\u0131 (bo\u011fmak, sarsmak, g\u00f6z yaralanmalar\u0131, \u0131s\u0131rmak, tokatlamak, itmek, t\u00fck\u00fcrmek, yakmak, v\u00fccutta delik a\u00e7mak veya tekmelemek),\nCisimleri sald\u0131r\u0131 silah\u0131 olarak kullanmak,\n\u00c7ocuklara sald\u0131rmak,\nKurban\u0131 eve veya odaya kilitlemek,\nKurban\u0131 uyu\u015fturucu kullanmaya zorlanmak,\n\u0130la\u00e7, g\u0131da veya t\u0131bbi bak\u0131mdan al\u0131koyma,\nUykudan al\u0131koyma.\nCinsel istismar\nHerhangi bir ili\u015fki bask\u0131s\u0131,\nFiziksel a\u015fa\u011f\u0131lama,\nHamilelik veya cinsel yolla bula\u015fan hastal\u0131klara kar\u015f\u0131 koruma sa\u011flamayan ili\u015fkiye zorlamak,\nKurban\u0131n foto\u011fraflar\u0131n\u0131 izinsiz \u00e7ekmek veya da\u011f\u0131tmak,\nCinsel i\u00e7erikli hakaretlerde bulunmak,\nTaciz ve takip.\nTakip ve izleme\nTelefon ve internet \u00fczerinden taciz,\nGPS ile izleme,\nKorkutma,\n\u0130zinsiz yer kullan\u0131m\u0131.\nAile i\u00e7i \u015fiddete kimler maruz kal\u0131r?\nHer ya\u015ftan insan, etnik grup ve sosyal grup; yoksul insanlar, zengin insanlar ve her t\u00fcrl\u00fc ili\u015fkide olan insanlar aile i\u00e7i \u015fiddete maruz kalabilir.\nAile i\u00e7i \u015fiddet; \u015fiddet i\u00e7eren, rahats\u0131z edici veya korkutucu davran\u0131\u015flar\u0131 i\u00e7erir ve g\u00fc\u00e7 ve kontrol ile ilgilidir.\nEvli ve beraber ya\u015fayan \u00e7iftler, erkek arkada\u015f ve sevgililer, ayn\u0131 evde birlikte uzun s\u00fcreli ikamet edenler, bak\u0131c\u0131lar ve akrabalar aile i\u00e7i \u015fiddetin kurbanlar\u0131 aras\u0131nda olabilir.\nAile i\u00e7i \u015fiddet \u00e7o\u011funlukla erkekler taraf\u0131ndan kad\u0131nlara kar\u015f\u0131 i\u015flenir. Ayr\u0131ca bo\u015fanma ve ili\u015fi\u011fi kesme olaylar\u0131ndan sonra dahi \u015fiddet devam edebilir.\nYerel insanlar\u0131n, \u00f6z\u00fcrl\u00fc kad\u0131nlar\u0131n, k\u00fclt\u00fcrel ve dilbilimsel a\u00e7\u0131dan farkl\u0131 ge\u00e7mi\u015flerden gelen kad\u0131nlar\u0131n, lezbiyen, gey, biseks\u00fcel, transseks\u00fcel, intersex veya queer (LGBT) olarak tan\u0131mlanan insanlar\u0131n, gen\u00e7, ya\u015fl\u0131 ve hamile kad\u0131nlar\u0131n, uzak veya k\u0131rsal topluluklarda ya\u015fayan insanlar\u0131n, zihinsel sa\u011fl\u0131k ve / veya uyu\u015fturucu ve alkol sorunu bulunan kad\u0131nlar\u0131n ve \u015fiddetin oldu\u011fu bir ailede ya\u015fayan \u00e7ocuklar\u0131n aile i\u00e7i \u015fiddet ya\u015famas\u0131 daha olas\u0131d\u0131r.\nAile i\u00e7i \u015fiddet sald\u0131r\u0131lar\u0131, kurbanlar taraf\u0131ndan daha \u00e7ok \u015fiddet korkusu, utan\u00e7 duygusu ya da sald\u0131r\u0131n\u0131n \u00f6nemsiz oldu\u011fu d\u00fc\u015f\u00fcn\u00fcld\u00fc\u011f\u00fc i\u00e7in genelde daha az rapor edilmektedir.\nAile i\u00e7i \u015eiddet Nas\u0131l \u00d6nlenir?\nAile i\u00e7i \u015fiddet ve istismar\u0131 herkes ya\u015fayabilir, ancak sorun s\u0131kl\u0131kla g\u00f6zden ka\u00e7ar, reddedilir veya \u015fiddete mazeret bulunur.\n\u00d6zellikle istismar fiziksel de\u011fil de psikolojik oldu\u011funda bu durum ge\u00e7erlidir. K\u00f6t\u00fcmser bir ili\u015fkinin i\u015faretlerini fark etmek ve kabul etmek, onu sona erdirmenin ilk ad\u0131m\u0131d\u0131r. \u00c7evresindeki insanlar\u0131n ya da kendilerinin k\u00f6t\u00fcye kullan\u0131ld\u0131\u011f\u0131n\u0131 farkeden ki\u015filer, yard\u0131m almak i\u00e7in ilgili yerlere ba\u015fvurmal\u0131d\u0131r. Bu konuda h\u00fck\u00fcmetlerin yard\u0131mlar\u0131 mevcuttur. Kimse ya\u015fam\u0131n\u0131 sevdiklerinden korkarak s\u00fcrd\u00fcrmemelidir.\nAile i\u00e7i istismar s\u0131kl\u0131kla tehditlerden ve s\u00f6zl\u00fc tacizden \u015fiddete d\u00f6n\u00fc\u015fmektedir.\nFiziksel yaralanma en belirgin tehlike olabilece\u011fi gibi, aile i\u00e7i istismar\u0131n duygusal ve psikolojik sonu\u00e7lar\u0131 da \u015fiddetlidir.\nDuygusal a\u00e7\u0131dan k\u00f6t\u00fc muamele ili\u015fkileri, \u00f6z-de\u011feri ve \u00f6zg\u00fcveni yok edebilir, kayg\u0131 ve depresyona yol a\u00e7abilir ve kurban\u0131 \u00e7aresiz ve yaln\u0131z hissettirir.\nHi\u00e7 kimse bu t\u00fcrden ac\u0131lara katlanmak zorunda de\u011fildir ve \u00f6zg\u00fcrl\u00fc\u011f\u00fc geri almak i\u00e7in at\u0131lacak ilk ad\u0131m, durumun hakaret ve istismar oldu\u011funu kabul etmektir.\nK\u00f6t\u00fcye kullan\u0131m durumunun ger\u00e7ekli\u011fini kabul ettikten sonra kurbanlar, ihtiya\u00e7lar\u0131 olan yard\u0131m\u0131 elde edebilir.\nAile \u0130\u00e7i \u015eiddeti ve \u0130stismar\u0131 Anlama\n\u0130nsanlar aile i\u00e7i istismar\u0131 d\u00fc\u015f\u00fcnd\u00fcklerinde genellikle aile i\u00e7i \u015fiddete odaklan\u0131rlar. Ancak aile i\u00e7i istismar, yak\u0131n bir ili\u015fki veya evlilikteki bir ki\u015fi, di\u011ferine hakim olmaya ve onu kontrol alt\u0131na almaya \u00e7al\u0131\u015ft\u0131k\u00e7a olu\u015fur.\nAile i\u00e7i \u015fiddet ve istismar\u0131n amac\u0131, ki\u015filer \u00fczerinde tamamen kontrol sahibi olmakt\u0131r. Bir istismarc\u0131 adil olmaktan uzakt\u0131r. \u0130stismar edenler, kurban\u0131 korkutmak, onun su\u00e7luluk duymas\u0131n\u0131 sa\u011flamak ister; onu utan\u00e7 ve sindirme ile kullanmaya odaklan\u0131r.\n\u0130stismar eden ki\u015fi kurban\u0131 ve \u00e7evresindekileri tehdit edebilir ve incitebilir.\nT\u00fcm ya\u015f gruplar\u0131nda, etnik k\u00f6kenlerde ve ekonomik d\u00fczeylerde aile i\u00e7i \u015fiddet ve istismar ger\u00e7ekle\u015fir. Kad\u0131nlar daha s\u0131k ma\u011fdur olurken, erkekler de \u00f6zellikle s\u00f6zl\u00fc ve duygusal olarak istismar edilir.\nSonu\u00e7ta; bir erkek, bir kad\u0131n, bir gen\u00e7 ya da daha b\u00fcy\u00fck bir yeti\u015fkinden gelse dahi, k\u00fcf\u00fcr ve hakaret i\u00e7eren bir davran\u0131\u015f kabul edilemezdir. T\u00fcm bireyler sayg\u0131n ve g\u00fcvende hissetmeyi hak etmektedir.\nK\u00f6t\u00fc ama\u00e7l\u0131 bir ili\u015fkinin belirgin i\u015fareti, kurban\u0131n e\u015finden korkmas\u0131d\u0131r.\nDiken \u00fcst\u00fcnde y\u00fcr\u00fct\u00fclen bir ili\u015fki sa\u011fl\u0131ks\u0131z ve rahats\u0131z edicidir.\nA\u015fa\u011f\u0131layan, partnerini kontrol etmeye \u00e7al\u0131\u015fan bir e\u015f, nefessizlik, \u00e7aresizlik ve umutsuzluk hissi verir.\n\u00c7ocuk \u0130stismar\u0131 ve \u0130hmali\nFiziksel, duygusal istismar ve ihmal t\u00fcrleri \u00e7ocuklarda derin ve kal\u0131c\u0131 izler b\u0131rakmaktad\u0131r. Daha \u00f6nce tacize u\u011fram\u0131\u015f \u00e7ocuklar\u0131n yard\u0131m almas\u0131, onlar\u0131n iyile\u015fme \u015fans\u0131n\u0131 artt\u0131r\u0131r; istismara m\u00fcdahale etmek y\u00f6ntemlerini \u00f6\u011frenerek bir \u00e7ocu\u011fun ya\u015fam\u0131nda b\u00fcy\u00fck fark olu\u015fturulabilir.\nFiziksel istismar b\u0131rakt\u0131\u011f\u0131 izlerden dolay\u0131 \u015fok edici olmakla birlikte, t\u00fcm \u00e7ocuk istismarlar\u0131 belirgin de\u011fildir. \u00c7ocuklar\u0131n ihtiya\u00e7lar\u0131n\u0131 g\u00f6zard\u0131 ederek; onlar\u0131 denetimsiz, tehlikeli durumlara sokmak veya bir \u00e7ocu\u011fa de\u011fersiz veya aptal hissettirmek, \u00e7ocuk istismar\u0131d\u0131r.\nK\u00f6t\u00fcye kullan\u0131lm\u0131\u015f \u00e7ocuklar b\u00fcy\u00fcd\u00fck\u00e7e e\u011fitimlerini ihmal edebilir veya d\u00fc\u015f\u00fck \u00fccretli i\u015flerde \u00e7al\u0131\u015fabilir, \u00e7\u00fcnk\u00fc daha fazlas\u0131n\u0131 yapabileceklerine inanmazlar. Cinsel tacizden kurtulanlar ise, istismardan \u00f6t\u00fcr\u00fc damgalanmak, utan\u00e7 duymak ve zarar g\u00f6rmek hissi ile m\u00fccadele eder.\nTemel ihtiya\u00e7lar\u0131n\u0131n (yiyecek, giyecek, hijyen veya g\u00f6zetim) kar\u015f\u0131lanmamas\u0131,\nS\u00fcrekli k\u00fc\u00e7\u00fcmseyici, utand\u0131ran ve a\u015fa\u011f\u0131lay\u0131c\u0131 davran\u0131\u015flar,\nNegatif kar\u015f\u0131la\u015ft\u0131rmalar yapmak,\nBa\u011f\u0131rmak, tehdit etmek veya zorbal\u0131k yapmak,\n\u00c7ocu\u011fu cezaland\u0131rma olarak g\u00f6rmezden gelmek veya reddetmek,\nBir \u00e7ocukla fiziksel temas\u0131n s\u0131n\u0131rland\u0131r\u0131lmas\u0131 (sar\u0131lmamak, \u00f6pmemek vs.),\nBir \u00e7ocu\u011fun ba\u015fkalar\u0131na kar\u015f\u0131 ma\u011fdur edilmesi (di\u011fer ebeveynlere, bir karde\u015fe ya da bir evcil hayvana kar\u015f\u0131) \u00e7ocuk ihmalidir.\n\u00c7ocuk \u0130stismar\u0131n\u0131n ve \u0130hmalinin \u0130\u015faretleri\n\u00c7ocu\u011fun a\u015f\u0131r\u0131 geri \u00e7ekilmesi, korkmas\u0131 veya yanl\u0131\u015f bir \u015fey yapmaktan endi\u015felenmesi,\nU\u00e7 davran\u0131\u015flar (\u00e7ocu\u011fun son derece uyumlu, talepkar, pasif, agresif davran\u0131\u015flar sergilemesi),\nEbeveyn veya bak\u0131c\u0131ya ba\u011f\u0131ml\u0131 olmak,\nS\u0131k yaralanmalar veya a\u00e7\u0131klanamayan morluklar, \u0131s\u0131r\u0131klar veya kesikler,\nHer zaman tetikte olma; sanki bir \u015feylerin olmas\u0131n\u0131 beklemek,\nEl veya kemer izi \u015feklinde yaralanmalar,\nEve gitmekten korkuyor gibi g\u00f6r\u00fcnmek,\nS\u0131cak g\u00fcnlerde uygun olmayan uzun kollu g\u00f6mlekler gibi yaralanmalar\u0131 \u00f6rtbas etmeye yard\u0131mc\u0131 giysiler giymek,\nTemizlenmemi\u015f, matla\u015ft\u0131r\u0131lm\u0131\u015f ve y\u0131kanmam\u0131\u015f sa\u00e7lar; aleni v\u00fccut kokusu,\nTedavi edilmeyen hastal\u0131klar ve fiziksel yaralanmalar,\n\u00c7ocu\u011fun s\u0131k s\u0131k yaln\u0131z olmas\u0131 veya g\u00fcvensiz ortamlarda oyun oynamas\u0131,\nOkula ge\u00e7 gitmesi ya da hi\u00e7 gitmemesi,\nY\u00fcr\u00fcy\u00fc\u015f veya oturmas\u0131nda sorun olmas\u0131 (cinsel istismar belirtisi olarak)\nBir gerek\u00e7e olmaks\u0131z\u0131n belirli bir ki\u015fiden ka\u00e7\u0131nmaya gayret g\u00f6stermesi,\nK\u0131yafetlerini ba\u015fkalar\u0131n\u0131n \u00f6n\u00fcnde de\u011fi\u015ftirmemesi ya da fiziksel aktivitelere kat\u0131lmak istememesi,\n\u00d6zellikle 14 ya\u015f\u0131n alt\u0131ndaki \u00e7ocuklar\u0131n evden ka\u00e7ma durumlar\u0131, \u00e7ocuk istismar\u0131n\u0131n en belirgin i\u015faretleridir.\n\u00c7ocuk istismar\u0131n\u0131n t\u00fcr\u00fcne bak\u0131lmaks\u0131z\u0131n, sonu\u00e7 ciddi duygusal zarar g\u00f6rmedir. Ancak yard\u0131m mevcuttur. Bir \u00e7ocu\u011fun istismar edildi\u011finden \u015f\u00fcphelenildi\u011finde, onunla konu\u015fmak \u00f6nemlidir.\nBu \u015fekilde istismarc\u0131 ortaya \u00e7\u0131kar\u0131labilir.\n\u00c7evrenizde bulunan herhangi birinin aile i\u00e7i \u015fiddete maruz kald\u0131\u011f\u0131n\u0131 d\u00fc\u015f\u00fcn\u00fcyorsan\u0131z yapman\u0131z gereken be\u015f \u015fey:\n1. Aile i\u00e7i \u015fiddet ya\u015f\u0131yorsan\u0131z ya da \u00e7evrenizde \u015fiddet ve istismara \u015fahit olduysan\u0131z, polisi aray\u0131n.\n2. \u0130\u015fyerinizde, okulunuzda veya ibadethanelerde aile i\u00e7i \u015fiddet bilinci olu\u015fturma materyalleri da\u011f\u0131t\u0131n, insanlar\u0131 bilin\u00e7lendirmeye y\u00f6nelik konu\u015fmac\u0131lar ayarlay\u0131n; yard\u0131mc\u0131 olabilecek bir yol bulmaya \u00e7al\u0131\u015f\u0131n. Bunun i\u00e7in zaman ve kaynak ay\u0131rmaya \u00e7al\u0131\u015f\u0131n.\n3. \u0130stismar edilen birini tan\u0131yorsan\u0131z, deste\u011finizi sunun; polisi aray\u0131n ve ilgili sivil toplum kurulu\u015flar\u0131yla ileti\u015fime ge\u00e7in.\n4. Ba\u015fkalar\u0131n\u0131 k\u00fc\u00e7\u00fcmseme veya kontrol etme davran\u0131\u015flar\u0131ndan ka\u00e7\u0131n\u0131n.\n5. Kom\u015fular\u0131n\u0131zla iyi ili\u015fkiler kurarak onlar\u0131n deste\u011fini al\u0131n; b\u00f6ylece rahats\u0131z edici bir davran\u0131\u015f, dil ya da istismar sizin bulundu\u011funuz \u00e7evrede ho\u015f kar\u015f\u0131lanmaz.\nKAYNAKLAR\nDomesticviolence   Helpguide   Wellspringofnela\n[Toplam:2    Ortalama:5/5] Aile \u0130\u00e7i \u015eiddet Nedir, Nas\u0131l \u00d6nlenir?", "Son g\u00fcnlerde sosyal medyada yap\u0131lan bir payla\u015f\u0131mdaki iddiaya g\u00f6re, Kanada\u2019da 1982 y\u0131l\u0131nda mercime\u011fin tohumu T\u00fcrkiye\u2019den al\u0131narak \u00fcretimine ba\u015flanm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r ve g\u00fcn\u00fcm\u00fczde T\u00fcrkiye, mercime\u011fin %80\u2019ini Kanada\u2019dan almaktad\u0131r.\nAncak bu iddia do\u011fru de\u011fildir. Kanada\u2019ya tohum T\u00fcrkiye\u2019den gitmemi\u015ftir ve T\u00fcrkiye t\u00fcketti\u011fi mercime\u011fin %80\u2019ini Kanada\u2019dan ithal etmemektedir.\nAl Slinkard Geli\u015ftirdi\nKanada\u2019y\u0131 mercimekle tan\u0131\u015ft\u0131ran \u00fclke T\u00fcrkiye olmad\u0131\u011f\u0131 gibi Kanada\u2019da mercimek \u00fcretimine iddiada bahsedildi\u011fi gibi 1982\u2019de de\u011fil, 1972\u2019de yap\u0131lan bir \u00e7al\u0131\u015fmayla ba\u015flanm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r.\nD\u00fcnyadaki b\u00fcy\u00fck ve verimli bakliyat yeti\u015ftiricili\u011fi programlar\u0131ndan birine ev sahipli\u011fi yapan Saskatchewan \u00dcniversitesi, ABD\u2019nin bir eyaleti olan Idaho\u2019ya yeni geli\u015fen Mahsul Geli\u015ftirme Merkezi (Crop Development Centre) kapsam\u0131nda 1971\u2018de bezelye yeti\u015ftiricili\u011fi aray\u0131\u015f\u0131na girmesiyle bir s\u00fcreci ba\u015flatm\u0131\u015f oldu. Saskatchewan \u00dcniversitesi, Idaho \u00dcniversitesi\u2018nde bulunan Al Slinkard\u2018\u0131 se\u00e7erek yeni mercimek t\u00fcrlerinin bulunmas\u0131na zemin haz\u0131rlad\u0131.\n1972\u2018de yeni bir mercimek t\u00fcr\u00fc geli\u015ftiren Dr. Al Slinkard, Kanada\u2019da bakliyat end\u00fcstrisinin babas\u0131 olarak bilinmektedir.\nKanada\u2019da mercimek \u00fcretiminin geli\u015fimi\nT\u00fcrkiye\u2019de Mercimek \u00dcretimi\nT\u00fcrkiye\u2019de k\u0131rm\u0131z\u0131 ve ye\u015fil mercimek ekim alanlar\u0131 g\u00fcn\u00fcm\u00fcze kadar azalm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r. NAD (Nadas Alanlar\u0131n\u0131n De\u011ferlendirilmesi\nAra\u015ft\u0131rma ve Yay\u0131n Projesi) ile birlikte 1980\u2019lerin ba\u015f\u0131nda h\u0131zl\u0131 bir \u015fekilde geni\u015fleyen ekim alanlar\u0131 2000\u2019li y\u0131llar\u0131n ba\u015f\u0131nda toplamda 4 Milyon 720 bin dekar iken, 2016 y\u0131l\u0131ndaki alan 2 Milyon 522 bin dekara gerilemi\u015ftir.\nT\u00fcrkiye\u2019de Mercimek Ekim Alanlar\u0131, T\u00dc\u0130K 2016\nMercimek \u00fcretimi, 1980\u2019lerden bu yana giderek azal\u0131rken d\u00fcnyada lider olunan \u00fcr\u00fcnler aras\u0131nda T\u00fcrkiye\u2019de mercimek \u00fcretimi \u00fc\u00e7\u00fcnc\u00fc s\u0131radad\u0131r. 2016 y\u0131l\u0131nda T\u00fcrkiye\u2019de toplamda 365 bin ton mercimek \u00fcretilirken, bir \u00f6nceki y\u0131lda 360 bin ton \u00fcretilmi\u015ftir.\nT\u00dc\u0130K, 2016\nMercimek \u00fcretimindeki azal\u0131\u015flar s\u00fcrekli olmam\u0131\u015f, be\u015fer y\u0131ll\u0131k \u00fcretim aral\u0131\u011f\u0131 verilen grafikte 2005 ve 2016 y\u0131llar\u0131nda d\u00f6nemsel art\u0131\u015flar da meydana gelmi\u015ftir.\nMercimek D\u0131\u015f Ticareti\nT\u00fcrkiye\u2019de mercimek \u00fcretimi, n\u00fcfus art\u0131\u015flar\u0131 nedeniyle i\u00e7 talebi kar\u015f\u0131layamaz hale geldi\u011finden dolay\u0131 mercimek ithalat\u0131 giderek artm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r. Ayn\u0131 zamanda ihracat oran\u0131 da ithalattaki gibi istikrars\u0131z bir \u015fekilde y\u0131ldan y\u0131la art\u0131\u015f g\u00f6stermi\u015ftir.\nT\u00fcrkiye\u2019nin mercimek ithalat\u0131 yapt\u0131\u011f\u0131 \u00fclkeler aras\u0131nda pay\u0131 en \u00e7ok olan \u00fclke Kanada\u2018d\u0131r. \u0130hracat yapt\u0131\u011f\u0131 \u00fclkeler aras\u0131nda en b\u00fcy\u00fck pay ise Orta Do\u011fu ve Afrika\u2018n\u0131nd\u0131r. Sudan, M\u0131s\u0131r ve Suudi Arabistan s\u0131ras\u0131yla T\u00fcrkiye\u2019nin ana ihracat pazarlar\u0131d\u0131r.\nT\u00fcrkiye\u2019nin Mercimek \u0130thalat\u0131 Yapt\u0131\u011f\u0131 \u00dclkeler\nUSDA K\u00fcresel Tar\u0131m Bilgi A\u011f\u0131 (Global Agricultural Information Network) raporuna g\u00f6re, T\u00fcrkiye 2015 y\u0131l\u0131nda toplamda 105 bin 717 ton mercimek ithalat\u0131 yapm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r. Yap\u0131lan ithalatta Kanada\u2019dan 99 bin 838 ton mercimek al\u0131m\u0131 yap\u0131lm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r. Kanada\u2019dan yap\u0131lan ithalat\u0131n toplam mercimek ithalat\u0131 i\u00e7indeki pay\u0131 ise %80\u2019den fazlad\u0131r.\nAncak \u015fu noktaya dikkat edilmelidir ki, T\u00fcrkiye\u2019de t\u00fcketilen mercimek miktar\u0131, T\u00fcrkiye\u2019deki \u00fcretimin b\u00fcy\u00fck k\u0131sm\u0131 ile ithal edilenlerin toplam\u0131ndan olu\u015fmaktad\u0131r. Yani, \u00fcretilen mercimek do\u011frudan t\u00fcketilmemekte, at\u0131l \u00fcr\u00fcnler, tohumluk \u00fcr\u00fcnler ve ihracat pay\u0131 ayr\u0131lmaktad\u0131r.\nT\u00fcrkiye\u2019de 2015 y\u0131l\u0131 verilerine tekrar bak\u0131ld\u0131\u011f\u0131nda mercimekte toplamda 360 bin ton \u00fcretim yap\u0131lmakta ve 105 bin 717 ton d\u0131\u015f al\u0131m yap\u0131lmaktad\u0131r.\n\u0130ddiada bahsedilen %80\u2019lik oran, toplam mercimek t\u00fcketim pay\u0131 i\u00e7indeki oran de\u011fil, T\u00fcrkiye\u2019nin toplam ithal etti\u011fi mercimek oran\u0131n\u0131n i\u00e7erisindeki payd\u0131r. \nDo\u011fruluk Y\u00fczdesi\nKaynaklar:\n1-Twitter 2-Umr Agap 3-Canada 150 Usask 4-Producer 5-G\u0131da Tar\u0131m ve Hayvanc\u0131l\u0131k Bakanl\u0131\u011f\u0131  6-Ulusal Tar\u0131m 7-USDA GAIN Report 8-Dergipark\n[Toplam:0    Ortalama:0/5] T\u00fcrkiye\u2019deki Mercime\u011fin Y\u00fczde 80\u2019i Kanada\u2019dan \u0130thal Ediliyor \u0130ddias\u0131", "29 Ekim tarihinde sosyal medyada Cumhuriyet Bayram\u0131 dolay\u0131s\u0131yla bir\u00e7ok payla\u015f\u0131m yap\u0131ld\u0131 ve bu payla\u015f\u0131mlar g\u00fcndemde geni\u015f yer ald\u0131. Bu payla\u015f\u0131mlardan birinde Cumhurba\u015fkan\u0131 Recep Tayyip Erdo\u011fan ile ayn\u0131 videoda yer alan bir k\u0131z \u00e7ocu\u011funun fl\u00fctle \u0130zmir Mar\u015f\u0131\u2019n\u0131 \u00e7ald\u0131\u011f\u0131 iddia edildi. Ancak bu iddia do\u011fru de\u011fildir. \nTwitter payla\u015f\u0131m\u0131nda yer alan montajl\u0131 video\n\u0130lgili Twitter payla\u015f\u0131m\u0131ndaki video, Youtube\u2019a 4 ay \u00f6nce y\u00fcklenen ve \u0130zmir Mar\u015f\u0131\u2019n\u0131n \u00e7al\u0131nd\u0131\u011f\u0131 ba\u015fka bir videodan ses dosyas\u0131 ayr\u0131\u015ft\u0131r\u0131larak, montajlanm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r. \u00d6zg\u00fcn videoda 23 Nisan 2016 tarihinde Ulusal Egemenlik ve \u00c7ocuk Bayram\u0131 dolay\u0131s\u0131yla temsili Cumhurba\u015fkan\u0131 olarak, Cumhurba\u015fkan\u0131 R.Tayyip Erdo\u011fan\u2019\u0131n koltu\u011funa oturan Ba\u015fak Tahan isimli \u00e7ocuk, sadece \u201cHayat Bayram Olsa\u201d \u015fark\u0131s\u0131 ile \u0130stiklal Mar\u015f\u0131\u2019n\u0131 \u00e7alm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r.\nOrijinal video\nDaha \u00f6nce de ayn\u0131 videoya ba\u015fka ses dosyalar\u0131n\u0131n montajlanmas\u0131 s\u00f6z konusu olmu\u015ftur. Sosyal medyada bu tarz montajl\u0131 bir\u00e7ok video yer almakta ve \u00f6zellikle sosyal medyada orijinalinden daha fazla etkile\u015fimde olmaktad\u0131r. Bu nedenle kar\u015f\u0131la\u015f\u0131lan her videoya itibar etmemek ve do\u011frusuna ula\u015fmaya \u00e7al\u0131\u015fmak gerekmektedir. Montajl\u0131 olan bu videolardan baz\u0131lar\u0131;\nMontajl\u0131 Video 1\nMontajl\u0131 Video 2\nMontajl\u0131 Video 3\nDo\u011fruluk Y\u00fczdesi\nKaynaklar:\nTwitter, Youtube, Youtube 2\n[Toplam:1    Ortalama:5/5] Temsili Cumhurba\u015fkan\u0131 \u0130zmir Mar\u015f\u0131\u2019n\u0131 \u00c7ald\u0131 \u0130ddias\u0131", "Halk\u0131n prensesi Diana\u2019n\u0131n dramatik ya\u015fam\u0131, yaln\u0131zca birka\u00e7 ki\u015fi taraf\u0131ndan biliniyordu. Diana, 1993 y\u0131l\u0131nda konu\u015fma e\u011fitmeni taraf\u0131ndan \u00e7ekilen bir dizi videoda ya\u015fam\u0131na dair \u015feyler payla\u015fm\u0131\u015ft\u0131.\n\u00d6l\u00fcm\u00fcnden 20 y\u0131l sonra trajik ya\u015fam\u0131ndan pek \u00e7ok ayr\u0131nt\u0131n\u0131n ortaya \u00e7\u0131kmas\u0131n\u0131n ard\u0131ndan, Lady Diana\u2019n\u0131n kitleleri kendisine ba\u011flayan g\u00fcc\u00fcn\u00fcn kraliyet ailesinden de\u011fil, onun samimi ki\u015fili\u011finden kaynakland\u0131\u011f\u0131 bir kez daha g\u00fcn y\u00fcz\u00fcne \u00e7\u0131kt\u0131.\n1 Temmuz 1961 y\u0131l\u0131nda Sandringham, Birle\u015fik Krall\u0131k\u2019ta do\u011fan Diana Spencer, kraliyet k\u00f6kenli, aristokratik bir \u0130ngiliz ailesinden gelmi\u015ftir. \u0130ngiltere ve \u0130svi\u00e7re\u2019de e\u011fitim g\u00f6rm\u00fc\u015ft\u00fcr.\n29 Temmuz 1981 y\u0131l\u0131nda, \u0130ngiltere Krali\u00e7esi Elizabeth\u2019in o\u011flu Galler Prensi Charles (1948) ile Saint Paul Katedrali\u2019nde evlenmi\u015ftir. Ya\u015fam\u0131 ve evlili\u011fi kadar ans\u0131z ve \u00e7o\u011fu insana g\u00f6re \u015f\u00fcpheli g\u00f6r\u00fclen \u00f6l\u00fcm\u00fcyle de d\u00fcnya g\u00fcndemine oturan Lady Diana, 31 A\u011fustos 1997 tarihinde 36 ya\u015f\u0131ndayken hayata veda etmi\u015ftir. Diana ve Prens Charles\u2019in \u00e7ocuklar\u0131, Prens William ve Harry\u2019dir.\nLady Diana\u2019n\u0131n Evlili\u011fe Zorlanmas\u0131 ve Prens Charles ile Ni\u015fanlanmas\u0131\nEvlili\u011fe \u201citildi\u011fini\u201d iddia eden Diana, video kay\u0131tlar\u0131nda durumu \u015fu ifadelerle anlatm\u0131\u015f:\n\u201cEvet, ailem evlili\u011fin harika oldu\u011funu d\u00fc\u015f\u00fcnd\u00fc. Arkada\u015flar\u0131m da \u00f6yle. Charles\u2018in ailesi de \u00f6yle yapt\u0131.\u201d\n\u201cBeni sevdiler, misafir oldu\u011fum zamanlarda bana \u00e7ok iyi davrand\u0131lar\u2026 Yani durum gelinleri oldu\u011fumda de\u011fi\u015fti, \u00e7\u00fcnk\u00fc pozisyonlar de\u011fi\u015fti.\u201d\nDiana, 1981\u2019de ni\u015fanlar\u0131n\u0131 ilan etmek i\u00e7in verdikleri TV r\u00f6portaj\u0131n\u0131 hat\u0131rlatarak, \u201cBirisiyle ni\u015fanland\u0131\u011f\u0131n\u0131zda, onu seviyorsunuzdur d\u00fc\u015f\u00fcncesiyle yeti\u015ftirildim.\u201d diyor.\nPrens Charles, Prenses Diana ve Krali\u00e7e 2. Elizabeth\n\u201cVe en ola\u011fan\u00fcst\u00fc \u015fey, ni\u015fan\u0131m\u0131z\u0131 ilan etti\u011fimiz g\u00fcn m\u00fcthi\u015f bir r\u00f6portaj ger\u00e7ekle\u015ftirdi\u011fimizdir.\u201d\nR\u00f6portaj\u0131 yapan adam, \u2018Charles\u2019e a\u015f\u0131k m\u0131s\u0131n?\u2019 diye sordu\u011funda Diana: \u201cA, ne kadar ahmak\u00e7a bir soru! Evet, elbette.\u201d dedi\u011fini s\u00f6yl\u00fcyor.\nBuna kar\u015f\u0131l\u0131k Prens Charles: \u201cSevmek her ne anlama geliyorsa.\u201d demi\u015fti. Diana bu s\u00f6zleri hat\u0131rlayarak: \u201cBu beni tamamen \u015fa\u015fk\u0131na \u00e7evirdi. Ne tuhaf bir soru\u2026 yani cevap, diye d\u00fc\u015f\u00fcnd\u00fcm. Ah Tanr\u0131m! Kesinlikle benim i\u00e7in bir travmayd\u0131.\u201d diyor.\nCharles\u2019in bu cevab\u0131na itiraz edip etmedi\u011fi soruldu\u011funda ise Diana, \u201cHay\u0131r, cesaret edemedim.\u201d diyor.\nDiana\u2019ya korkup korkmad\u0131\u011f\u0131 soruldu\u011funda ise: \u201cKorkmu\u015f olmal\u0131y\u0131m, evet. Biz evlenmeden \u00f6nce yaln\u0131zca 13 kez g\u00f6r\u00fc\u015ft\u00fck.\u201d diyor.\nCamilla\nCharles ve Diana, Charles\u2019in Camilla Parker Bowles\u2018le olan ili\u015fkileri de dahil olmak \u00fczere skandalla dolu mutsuz bir evlilik ge\u00e7irmi\u015fti.
