Pazar\n15 Temmuz Demokrasi Bayram\u0131 Pazar\n2018 Kurban Bayram\u0131:\n20 A\u011fustos Kurban Bayram\u0131 Arifesi Pazartesi\n21 A\u011fustos Kurban Bayram\u0131 1.g\u00fcn Sal\u0131\n22 A\u011fustos Kurban Bayram\u0131 2.g\u00fcn \u00c7ar\u015famba\n23 A\u011fustos Kurban Bayram\u0131 3.g\u00fcn Per\u015fembe\n24 A\u011fustos Kurban Bayram\u0131 4.g\u00fcn Cuma\n30 A\u011fustos Zafer Bayram\u0131 Per\u015fembe\n28 Ekim Cumhuriyet Bayram\u0131 Arifesi Pazar\n29 Ekim Cumhuriyet Bayram\u0131 Cumartesi\n31 Aral\u0131k Y\u0131lba\u015f\u0131 gecesi Sal\u0131\n10 Kas\u0131m Tatil mi ?\n10 Kas\u0131m, bir milli bayram de\u011fil, Ulu \u00d6nder Mustafa Kemal Atat\u00fcrk\u2019\u00fcn \u00f6l\u00fcm y\u0131l d\u00f6n\u00fcm\u00fcd\u00fcr. 10 Kas\u0131m\u2019da sadece anma t\u00f6reni ger\u00e7ekle\u015fir. Herhangi bir tatil olmas\u0131 s\u00f6z konusu de\u011fildir. \u00d6zellikle k\u00fc\u00e7\u00fck \u00f6\u011frenciler taraf\u0131ndan s\u00fcrekli her sene bu soru soruldu\u011fundan burada a\u00e7\u0131klamak istedik. 10 Kas\u0131m bir yas, anma g\u00fcn\u00fcd\u00fcr.\n\u00d6zetle, 2018 y\u0131l\u0131nda 18 g\u00fcn resmi tatil, cumartesi pazar g\u00fcnleri dahil edildi\u011finde toplam 116 g\u00fcn tatili vard\u0131r.\n2018 y\u0131l\u0131na ait resmi tatilleri g\u00f6steren takvimi PDF olarak indirmek i\u00e7in l\u00fctfen yandaki linke t\u0131klay\u0131n\u0131z. 2018 Resmi Tatiller\nKAYNAK: http://www.takvim.com/2021_takvimi.html  www.tbmm.gov.tr , http://www.mevzuat.gov.tr/MevzuatMetin/1.5.2429.pdf\nVideo oynat\u0131c\u0131\n00:00\n00:00\n1. \u201cdogrula.org\u201d\n0:07\n[Toplam:9    Ortalama:4.6/5] 2018 Y\u0131l\u0131 Resmi Tatil G\u00fcnleri", "Aker E\u015farpta \u00c7\u0131plak Kad\u0131n Fig\u00fcr\u00fc Bulundu\u011fu iddias\u0131n\u0131 dogrula.org olarak inceledik. Ele\u015ftirel D\u00fc\u015f\u00fcnme Akademisi adl\u0131 Facebook sayfas\u0131ndaki payla\u015f\u0131ma g\u00f6re, Aker\u2018in 2017-2018 Sonbahar K\u0131\u015f sezonundaki katalo\u011fundaki bir e\u015farpta, \u00e7\u0131plak bir kad\u0131n silueti oldu\u011fu iddia edildi.\nAker E\u015farp\u2019\u0131n, \u00e7\u0131plak insan fig\u00fcr\u00fcyle e\u015farp tasarlad\u0131\u011f\u0131 ve sat\u0131\u015fa sundu\u011fu iddias\u0131 do\u011frudur. Dikkatle bak\u0131ld\u0131\u011f\u0131nda, e\u015farb\u0131n sol alt k\u00f6\u015fesinde bahsi ge\u00e7en insan fig\u00fcr\u00fc net olarak g\u00f6r\u00fclebilmektedir.\n\u00dct\u00fc Yaparken Fark Etti \n19 Eyl\u00fcl tarihinde \u015eikayetvar.com\u2018da, \u00e7\u0131plak kad\u0131n fig\u00fcrl\u00fc e\u015farb\u0131n, Semra kullan\u0131c\u0131 adl\u0131 bir m\u00fc\u015fteri taraf\u0131ndan \u00fct\u00fc yaparken fark edildi\u011fi payla\u015f\u0131ld\u0131.\nE\u015farp\u015falevi.com ve Katredar.com gibi online e\u015farp sat\u0131\u015f\u0131 yapan internet sitelerinde, s\u00f6z konusu e\u015farb\u0131n 2017-2018 Sonbahar K\u0131\u015f Sezonu kapsam\u0131nda \u00fczerindeki \u00e7\u0131plak insan fig\u00fcr\u00fcyle halen sat\u0131\u015f\u0131 yap\u0131lmaktad\u0131r.\n\u0130nternet sitelerinde 7449713-952 koduyla sat\u0131lan e\u015farb\u0131, Aker E\u015farp, kendi internet sitesinden kald\u0131rm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r. Ayn\u0131 kodla arat\u0131ld\u0131\u011f\u0131nda sayfan\u0131n art\u0131k kullan\u0131lmad\u0131\u011f\u0131 g\u00f6r\u00fclmektedir.\nGoogle \u0130ndeksledi \nBahsi ge\u00e7en e\u015farptaki \u00e7\u0131plak insan fig\u00fcr\u00fcn\u00fcn Aker\u2019in resmi sitesinden kald\u0131r\u0131lmas\u0131na ra\u011fmen, Google\u2018da \u00fcr\u00fcn\u00fcn koduyla yap\u0131lan aramalarda ayn\u0131 fig\u00fcr halen kar\u015f\u0131m\u0131za \u00e7\u0131kmaktad\u0131r.\nBask\u0131 Hatas\u0131 Oldu\nT\u00fcrkiye\u2019de ve yurt d\u0131\u015f\u0131nda bir\u00e7ok ma\u011fazas\u0131 bulunan ve 28 Temmuz 2016 tarihinde kayyum atanan Aker E\u015farp yetkilileriyle g\u00f6r\u00fc\u015f\u00fclmesi sonucu, \u00e7\u0131plak fig\u00fcrl\u00fc e\u015farb\u0131n bir bask\u0131 hatas\u0131yla sat\u0131\u015fa sunuldu\u011fu ifade edildi. Tasar\u0131mlar\u0131n\u0131 \u0130talya gibi \u00fclkelerden alan Aker E\u015farp, b\u00f6yle bir hatan\u0131n bilin\u00e7li olarak de\u011fil, fark edilmeyen bir durum oldu\u011funu s\u00f6yledi.\nSat\u0131\u015f\u0131 yap\u0131lan hatal\u0131 e\u015farplar\u0131n, fark edildikten sonra ma\u011fazalardan toplat\u0131l\u0131p imha edildi\u011fini ifade eden Aker E\u015farp yetkilileri, e\u015farb\u0131 sat\u0131n alan m\u00fc\u015fteriler i\u00e7in de \u00fcr\u00fcn\u00fcn iade edilmesini istedi. E\u015farptaki \u00e7\u0131plak kad\u0131n fig\u00fcr\u00fc kald\u0131r\u0131larak ayn\u0131 tasar\u0131ml\u0131 \u00fcr\u00fcn tekrar sat\u0131\u015fa sunuldu.\nDo\u011fruluk Y\u00fczdesi\nKaynaklar:\n1-Aker 2-Google  3-Katredar 4-E\u015farp \u015eal Evi 5-\u015eikayet Var 6-H\u00fcrriyet\n[Toplam:6    Ortalama:4.7/5] Aker E\u015farpta \u00c7\u0131plak Kad\u0131n Fig\u00fcr\u00fc Bulundu\u011fu \u0130ddias\u0131", "Bir k\u0131\u015f sebzesi olan ve \u0131srarla \u00e7ocuklara yedirilmesi \u00f6nerilen \u0131spana\u011f\u0131n kuvvetli bir demir kayna\u011f\u0131 oldu\u011fu iddias\u0131 do\u011fru de\u011fildir. Ispanakta bulunan demir miktar\u0131, asl\u0131nda maydanoz gibi bir\u00e7ok sebzede bulunan demir miktar\u0131ndan daha azd\u0131r.\nUSDA\u2018ya (Birle\u015fik Devletler Tar\u0131m Bakanl\u0131\u011f\u0131 Tar\u0131msal Ara\u015ft\u0131rmalar Servisi) g\u00f6re, 100 gram \u0131spanakta bulunan demir miktar\u0131 2.71 mg\u2019d\u0131r. Bu miktar, maydanozda 6.2 mg, nanede 5.1 mg, bu\u011fday, arpa gibi tah\u0131llarda ise ortalama 3.5 mg\u2019d\u0131r.\nEfsane Nereden Geliyor?\n1870 y\u0131l\u0131nda, Erich von Wolf adl\u0131 bir Alman kimyager ye\u015fil sebzelerin besleyici faydalar\u0131n\u0131 ara\u015ft\u0131rmaktayd\u0131. \u00c7al\u0131\u015fmalar\u0131n\u0131 yaparken, \u0131spana\u011f\u0131n demir oran\u0131ndaki ondal\u0131k noktas\u0131n\u0131 yanl\u0131\u015f yere yazd\u0131. Wolf, yanl\u0131\u015fl\u0131kla y\u00fcz gram\u0131nda 3,5 mg buldu\u011fu demir miktar\u0131n\u0131, 35 mg yazarak, \u0131spana\u011f\u0131n demir seviyesini 10 kat\u0131na \u00e7\u0131kard\u0131. Bu durum, \u0131spana\u011f\u0131n a\u015f\u0131r\u0131 derecede demir i\u00e7erdi\u011fi ve v\u00fccudun daha g\u00fc\u00e7l\u00fc olmas\u0131na yol a\u00e7an yanl\u0131\u015f bir anlay\u0131\u015fa neden oldu.\nIspanaktaki demir miktar\u0131n\u0131n yanl\u0131\u015f hesaplanmas\u0131, pop\u00fcler \u00e7izgi film karakteri Temel Reis (Popeye)\u2019in yarat\u0131lmas\u0131na katk\u0131 sa\u011flad\u0131. 1932\u2019de \u00e7izgi filmle\u015ftirilen Popeye, a\u011fz\u0131nda piposuyla denizci bir karakter olup, ba\u015f\u0131 s\u0131k\u0131\u015ft\u0131\u011f\u0131nda ya da g\u00fcce ihtiyac\u0131 oldu\u011funda bir teneke kutusundaki \u0131spana\u011f\u0131 a\u011fz\u0131na bo\u015falt\u0131yor; paz\u0131lar\u0131 \u015fi\u015fiyor kar\u015f\u0131s\u0131na \u00e7\u0131kan\u0131 yeniyordu. Popeye\u2019nin etkisiyle Amerika\u2018da \u0131spanak t\u00fcketimi bir anda 3 kat\u0131na \u00e7\u0131km\u0131\u015ft\u0131r.\nMr von Wolf\u2019un hatas\u0131 1937\u2018de verilerin yeniden kontrol edilmesi halinde fark edildi ve d\u00fczeltildi. Ancak \u0131spana\u011f\u0131n, hala halk aras\u0131nda belki de \u00e7izgi film karakterinin yard\u0131m etti\u011fi i\u00e7in, demir a\u00e7\u0131s\u0131ndan en zengin sebzelerden biri oldu\u011fu d\u00fc\u015f\u00fcn\u00fcl\u00fcyor.\nSon olarak, 1981\u2018de Royal Victoria Hastanesi\u2019ndeki bir hematoloji dan\u0131\u015fman\u0131 olan Terry Hamblin, 1980\u2019li y\u0131llarda \u0131spana\u011f\u0131n \u00f6nemli bir demir kayna\u011f\u0131 olarak nas\u0131l ke\u015ffedildi\u011fiyle ilgili hikaye hakk\u0131nda konu\u015ftu ve 1930\u2019larda, ara\u015ft\u0131rmac\u0131lar taraf\u0131nda, bir yaz\u0131m hatas\u0131n\u0131n, \u0131spanakta bulunan demir miktar\u0131n\u0131 on kat\u0131na \u00e7\u0131kt\u0131\u011f\u0131n\u0131 ke\u015ffetti.\nAra\u015ft\u0131rmac\u0131 Ole Bj\u00f8rn Rekdal\u2018a g\u00f6re, \u0131spanakta demir var ancak di\u011fer ye\u015fil sebzelerden daha fazla de\u011fil ve az miktarda ki\u015fi \u0131spana\u011f\u0131 b\u00fcy\u00fck miktarlarda t\u00fcketebilir. Bununla birlikte, iyi bir demir kayna\u011f\u0131 olarak \u0131spana\u011f\u0131n, daha b\u00fcy\u00fck bir problemi de demirin ba\u011f\u0131rsak emilimini \u015fiddetle engelleyen maddeleri i\u00e7ermesidir. Basit\u00e7e s\u00f6ylemek gerekirse, \u0131spanak demir eksikli\u011fi \u00e7ekenlerin ilk g\u0131da se\u00e7imi olmamal\u0131d\u0131r.\nIspanak, di\u011fer sebzelerden farkl\u0131 olarak bol miktarda oksalik asit de i\u00e7erdi\u011finden ve oksalik asit demirin emilimini \u00f6nledi\u011finden, \u0131spana\u011f\u0131n iyi bir demir kayna\u011f\u0131 oldu\u011fu s\u00f6ylenemez.\nDo\u011fruluk Y\u00fczdesi\nKaynaklar: 1-USDA 2-How Stuff Works 3-Dailymail 4-Business Insider 5-Sage Journals 6-Since Made Simple 7-ne-dir.org\n[Toplam:0    Ortalama:0/5] Ispana\u011f\u0131n G\u00fc\u00e7l\u00fc Bir Demir Kayna\u011f\u0131 Oldu\u011fu \u0130ddias\u0131", "\u015eehirlerde ya\u015fayan bir ku\u015f t\u00fcr\u00fcn\u00fcn (ispinoz), sigara izmaritindeki toksik kimyasallar\u0131 yuva parazitlerine kar\u015f\u0131 sava\u015f\u0131rken kulland\u0131\u011f\u0131 iddias\u0131 do\u011frudur.\nMeksika Ulusal \u00d6zerk \u00dcniversitesi\u2019nden Constantino Mac\u00edas Garcia ve meslekta\u015flar\u0131, birka\u00e7 y\u0131ld\u0131r \u015fehirde ya\u015fayan ev ispinozlar\u0131nda (Carpodacus mexicanus) g\u00f6zlemledikleri sigara izmaritleri toplama al\u0131\u015fkanl\u0131\u011f\u0131 \u00fczerinde \u00e7al\u0131\u015fmaktad\u0131r. \u0130lk kan\u0131tlar, nikotinin ve di\u011fer kimyasallar\u0131n b\u00f6cek zararl\u0131lar\u0131n\u0131n yuvalara girmesini \u00f6nlemeye yard\u0131mc\u0131 olabilece\u011fini g\u00f6stermi\u015ftir; kesin olmamakla birlikte nikotin anti-parazit \u00f6zelliklere sahiptir.\nAra\u015ft\u0131rma sonu\u00e7lar\u0131n\u0131 g\u00fc\u00e7lendirmek isteyen Mac\u00edas Garcia ve ekibi, 32 ispinoz yuvas\u0131nda deney yapm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r. Yuvadaki yumurtalanma i\u015fleminden bir g\u00fcn sonra, ara\u015ft\u0131rmac\u0131lar, kulu\u00e7ka s\u0131ras\u0131nda olu\u015fabilecek parazitleri \u00f6nlemek i\u00e7in do\u011fal yuva astar\u0131n\u0131 \u00e7\u0131karm\u0131\u015f ve suni ke\u00e7e ile de\u011fi\u015ftirmi\u015ftir. Daha sonra 10 ku\u015f yuvas\u0131na canl\u0131 keneleri, 10 ku\u015f yuvas\u0131na \u00f6l\u00fc keneleri b\u0131rakm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r ve 12 yuvaya hi\u00e7 kene b\u0131rakmam\u0131\u015ft\u0131r.\nBunun sonucunda, yeti\u015fkin ispinozlar\u0131n kene bulunan yuvalara sigara izmariti koyduklar\u0131n\u0131 g\u00f6zlemlemi\u015flerdir. Dahas\u0131, canl\u0131 keneler i\u00e7eren yuvalara eklenen sigara izmaritinin a\u011f\u0131rl\u0131\u011f\u0131, \u00f6l\u00fc kenelerin bulundu\u011fu yuvalara eklenen izmaritlerin a\u011f\u0131rl\u0131\u011f\u0131ndan ortalama %40 daha fazla olmu\u015ftur.\nSonu\u00e7lar\u0131n, ispinozlar\u0131n sigara izmaritlerini yuvalar\u0131n\u0131 kenelere kar\u015f\u0131 \u201cila\u00e7land\u0131rmak\u201d i\u00e7in kulland\u0131klar\u0131n\u0131 g\u00f6sterdi\u011fini \u00f6ne s\u00fcren Mac\u00edas Garcia, \u201cKene ve akarlar gibi ektoparazitler, t\u00fcylerini yiyip kanlar\u0131n\u0131 emerek ispinozlara zarar veriyor.\u201d demi\u015ftir.\nLondra \u00dcniversitesi\u2019nden Steve Portugal, \u201cHayvanlar\u0131n yenilik\u00e7i olup mevcut materyalleren kendileri i\u00e7in yararl\u0131 olanlar\u0131 kullanmalar\u0131 b\u00fcy\u00fcleyici ve heyecan verici.\u201d ifadelerini kullanm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r.\n\u00d6te yandan, bu kimyasal sava\u015f tekni\u011fi, iki taraf\u0131 keskin bir k\u0131l\u0131\u00e7 gibi. Garcia ve arkada\u015falar\u0131n\u0131n g\u00f6zlemlerine g\u00f6re, ispinoz yuvalar\u0131nda bulunan izmaritler ne kadar fazla olursa, civcivlerdeki kromozomal anormalliklerin say\u0131s\u0131 da o kadar art\u0131yor. Ku\u015flar bu \u00f6nlemleriyle kendi yavrular\u0131na zarar verdiklerinin fark\u0131nda de\u011filler, \u00e7\u00fcnk\u00fc bu t\u00fcr genetik hasarlar\u0131n fark edilmesi \u00e7ok zor bir durum.\nDo\u011fruluk Y\u00fczdesi\nKAYNAKLAR\nNewscientist    Wnd    Zmescience    Youtube\n[Toplam:1    Ortalama:5/5] Ku\u015flar\u0131n Parazitlere Kar\u015f\u0131 Yuvalar\u0131na \u0130zmarit Ta\u015f\u0131d\u0131\u011f\u0131 \u0130ddias\u0131", "13 Ekim 2017 itibariyle baz\u0131 gazetelerde yurt d\u0131\u015f\u0131nda ger\u00e7ekle\u015fecek bir toplant\u0131 i\u00e7in meclis heyetinin \u00f6zel u\u00e7ak kiralad\u0131\u011f\u0131na dair bir iddia g\u00fcndeme geldi. Bu iddiaya g\u00f6re, Meclis heyeti, Parlamentolararas\u0131 Birli\u011fi (PAB) Genel Kurulu toplant\u0131s\u0131na kat\u0131lmak \u00fczere \u00f6zel u\u00e7ak kiralam\u0131\u015ft\u0131r. Ancak s\u00f6z konusu iddia do\u011fru de\u011fildir.\nMeclisHaber sitesindeki a\u00e7\u0131klamaya g\u00f6re, Habert\u00fcrk gazetesinde 13 Ekim 2017 tarihinde CHP Mersin Milletvekili Aytu\u011f At\u0131c\u0131 taraf\u0131ndan, yurt d\u0131\u015f\u0131na resm\u00ee bir ziyaret dolay\u0131s\u0131yla \u00e7\u0131kan meclis heyetine \u00f6zel u\u00e7ak kiraland\u0131\u011f\u0131na dair iddiaya yer verilmi\u015ftir. Meclisten haber ve duyurular\u0131n yap\u0131ld\u0131\u011f\u0131 resmi meclis sitesinde yap\u0131lan a\u00e7\u0131klamada, \u00f6zel u\u00e7ak kiralanmas\u0131 gibi bir durum olmad\u0131\u011f\u0131, zaten bu gibi ziyaretler i\u00e7in daha \u00f6nceden de benzer \u015fekilde uyguland\u0131\u011f\u0131 \u00fczere meclis heyetine u\u00e7ak tesis edildi\u011fi belirtilmi\u015ftir. S\u00f6z konusu a\u00e7\u0131klama \u015f\u00f6yle;\n\u201cHabert\u00fcrk gazetesinde 13 Ekim 2017 tarihinde CHP Mersin Milletvekili Aytu\u011f ATICI\u2019n\u0131n yurt d\u0131\u015f\u0131na bir resm\u00ee ziyaret dolay\u0131s\u0131yla \u00f6zel u\u00e7ak kiraland\u0131\u011f\u0131na dair iddias\u0131na yer verilmi\u015ftir. Say\u0131n milletvekilinin bu a\u00e7\u0131klamalar\u0131 ger\u00e7ek d\u0131\u015f\u0131d\u0131r ve ger\u00e7e\u011fin bu kadar sapt\u0131r\u0131lmas\u0131 anla\u015f\u0131l\u0131r bir durum de\u011fildir.\nD\u00fcnyan\u0131n en eski uluslararas\u0131 kurulu\u015fu olan ve d\u00fcnya parlamentolar\u0131n\u0131n y\u0131ll\u0131k zirvesi niteli\u011findeki PAB Genel Kuruluna kat\u0131l\u0131m i\u00e7in herhangi bir \u00f6zel u\u00e7ak kiralanmam\u0131\u015f olup Cumhurba\u015fkanl\u0131\u011f\u0131 Makam\u0131nda mevcut u\u00e7aklardan Ana U\u00e7a\u011f\u0131, benzeri toplant\u0131larda mutat oldu\u011fu \u00fczere heyetimize tahsis edilmektedir. Daha \u00f6nce tarifeli sefer ile Rusya\u2019ya gitmesi planlanan PAB T\u00fcrk Komisyonu \u00fcyesi say\u0131n milletvekillerimiz u\u00e7ak kapasitesinin m\u00fcsait olmas\u0131 ve tasarruf gayesi ile u\u00e7a\u011fa davet edilmi\u015flerdir.\nBu veya benzeri yak\u0131\u015ft\u0131rmalar\u0131n ve uydurma bilgilerin kamuoyuna aktar\u0131m\u0131 Meclisimizin itibar\u0131na y\u00f6nelik sald\u0131r\u0131lard\u0131r.\nKamuoyunun bilgisine sayg\u0131yla duyurulur.\u201d\nPAB Nedir?\nTBMM\u2019nin i\u015fbirli\u011fi i\u00e7inde oldu\u011fu uluslararas\u0131 komisyonlardan birisi olan Parlamentolararas\u0131 Birlik (PAB) nedir? TBMM\u2019ye ait resmi web sitesinde bulunan tan\u0131mlamaya g\u00f6re PAB, ba\u011f\u0131ms\u0131z devlet parlamentolar\u0131n\u0131n temsilcilerinden olu\u015fan, halen 138 \u00fcyeye sahip ve Birle\u015fmi\u015f Milletlere paralel olarak \u00e7al\u0131\u015fan 1889\u2019da kurulmu\u015f bir kurulu\u015ftur. Genel Merkezi Cenevre\u2019dedir.\nPAB, temsili kurulu\u015flar\u0131 g\u00fc\u00e7lendirme, bar\u0131\u015f ve toplumlararas\u0131 i\u015fbirli\u011fini tesis ve parlamentolar ile parlamenterler aras\u0131ndaki temaslar\u0131 artt\u0131rmak amac\u0131yla \u00e7al\u0131\u015fmaktad\u0131r. Bu \u00e7er\u00e7evede, t\u00fcm \u00fclkelerin parlamentolar\u0131 ve parlamenterleri aras\u0131nda yap\u0131lacak g\u00f6r\u00fc\u015fmelerle tecr\u00fcbe al\u0131\u015fveri\u015fi desteklenmektedir. Uluslararas\u0131 g\u00fcndemde yeralan g\u00fcncel siyasi ve ekonomik meseleler incelenmekte, esas itibar\u0131yla bu konularda \u00e7al\u0131\u015fmalar yap\u0131lmaktad\u0131r.\nPAB i\u00e7in TBMM taraf\u0131ndan olu\u015fturulan grupta yer alan isimler \u015f\u00f6yle;\nCo\u015fkun \u00c7AKIR \u2013 AKP Tokat Milletvekili ve Parlamentolararas\u0131 Birlik Grubu T\u00fcrk Grubu Ba\u015fkan\u0131\nAhmet YILDIRIM \u2013 HDP Mu\u015f Milletvekili ve Parlamentolararas\u0131 Birlik Grubu T\u00fcrk Grubu \u00dcyesi\nAytu\u011f ATICI \u2013 CHP Mersin Milletvekili ve Parlamentolararas\u0131 Birlik Grubu T\u00fcrk Grubu \u00dcyesi\nEbubekir G\u0130ZL\u0130G\u0130DER \u2013 AKP Nev\u015fehir Milletvekili ve Parlamentolararas\u0131 Birlik Grubu T\u00fcrk Grubu \u00dcyesi\nHasan SERT \u2013 AKP \u0130stanbul Milletvekili ve Parlamentolararas\u0131 Birlik Grubu T\u00fcrk Grubu \u00dcyesi\nL\u00fctfiye \u0130lksen CER\u0130TO\u011eLU KURT \u2013 AKP \u00c7orum Milletvekili ve Parlamentolararas\u0131 Birlik Grubu T\u00fcrk Grubu \u00dcyesi\nS\u00fcleyman Sencer AYATA \u2013 CHP \u0130stanbul Milletvekili ve Parlamentolararas\u0131 Birlik Grubu T\u00fcrk Grubu \u00dcyesi\n\u015eahap KAVCIO\u011eLU \u2013 AKP Bayburt Milletvekili ve Parlamentolararas\u0131 Birlik Grubu T\u00fcrk Grubu \u00dcyesi\nDo\u011fruluk Y\u00fczdesi\nKaynaklar:\nmeclishaber.gov.tr, tbmm.gov.tr, tbmm.gov.tr 2\n[Toplam:2    Ortalama:5/5] Meclis Heyetine \u00d6zel U\u00e7ak Kiraland\u0131\u011f\u0131 \u0130ddias\u0131", "Topkap\u0131 Saray\u0131 imara a\u00e7\u0131ld\u0131 iddias\u0131n\u0131 dogrula.org ara\u015ft\u0131rd\u0131. H\u00fcrriyet gazetesindeki \u201cHasbah\u00e7e\u2019ye \u0130mar\u201d ba\u015fl\u0131kl\u0131 haberde, Topkap\u0131 Saray\u0131\u2019na in\u015faat izni verildi, Topkap\u0131 Saray\u0131 imara a\u00e7\u0131ld\u0131 \u015feklinde iddialar ortaya at\u0131ld\u0131. Habere g\u00f6re Koruma Kurulu taraf\u0131ndan, Topkap\u0131 Saray\u0131\u2019n\u0131 1. derece arkeolojik sit alan\u0131ndan 3. dereceye d\u00fc\u015f\u00fcrme karar\u0131 al\u0131narak saray ve \u00e7evresine in\u015faat izni verilmi\u015ftir.\nAncak s\u00f6z konusu iddia do\u011fru de\u011fildir.\nSur-u Sultani denilen Topkap\u0131 Saray\u0131\u2019n\u0131 \u00e7evreleyen surlarla demiryolu aras\u0131nda kalan Hasbah\u00e7e\u2019nin imara a\u00e7\u0131ld\u0131\u011f\u0131 iddialar\u0131 as\u0131ls\u0131z olmakla birlikte, K\u00fclt\u00fcr ve Turizm Bakanl\u0131\u011f\u0131 bu konuda a\u00e7\u0131klamada bulunmu\u015ftur:\n\u201cH\u00fcrriyet Gazetesi\u2019nde bug\u00fcn yay\u0131mlanan \u2018Hasbah\u00e7e\u2019ye \u0130mar\u2019 ba\u015fl\u0131kl\u0131 haber tamamen ger\u00e7ek d\u0131\u015f\u0131d\u0131r. S\u00f6z konusu haber Tarihi Yar\u0131mada\u2019n\u0131n yap\u0131la\u015fmaya ve imara a\u00e7\u0131lmak istendi\u011fi alg\u0131s\u0131n\u0131 olu\u015fturarak kamuoyunu yan\u0131ltmay\u0131 hedefledi\u011fi a\u00e7\u0131kt\u0131r.\nB\u00fct\u00fcn\u00fcyle spek\u00fclasyondan ibaret bu haberin aksine Bakanl\u0131\u011f\u0131m\u0131z, Sur-u Sultani\u2019nin yeniden ihyas\u0131na ili\u015fkin \u00e7ok kapsaml\u0131 \u00e7al\u0131\u015fmalar ger\u00e7ekle\u015ftirmektedir.\nAh\u0131rkap\u0131 Feneri ile Sepet\u00e7iler Kasr\u0131 aras\u0131ndaki alan\u0131n imara a\u00e7\u0131lmas\u0131 ya da burada yeni yap\u0131la\u015fmaya izin verilmesi s\u00f6z konusu de\u011fildir.\nBilinmelidir ki bir d\u00fcnya miras\u0131 olan Topkap\u0131 Saray\u0131\u2019na ve \u00e7evresindeki tarihi dokuya zarar verilmesine asla m\u00fcsaade edilmeyecektir.\nBu maksatl\u0131 haberi ve yap\u0131lan a\u00e7\u0131klamalar\u0131 kamuoyunun takdirine sunuyoruz.\u201d\nYeni bir in\u015fa yap\u0131lmas\u0131 s\u00f6z konusu olmay\u0131p, Topkap\u0131 Saray\u0131\u2019n\u0131n i\u00e7erisinde bulunan \u0130ncili K\u00f6\u015fk, Bal\u0131khane K\u00f6\u015fk\u00fc, \u015eevkiye K\u00f6\u015fk\u00fc ve Top Bataryas\u0131 yap\u0131lar\u0131n\u0131n ihya ve restorasyonuna y\u00f6nelik \u00e7al\u0131\u015fmalar\u0131n yap\u0131lmas\u0131 istenmektedir.\nFatih Belediyesi de konuyla ilgili Twitter hesab\u0131ndan \u015fu \u015fekilde a\u00e7\u0131klama yapm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r:\nFatih Belediyesi, Bas\u0131n A\u00e7\u0131klamas\u0131\nSabah Gazetesinin geleneksel olarak d\u00fczenledi\u011fi K\u00fclt\u00fcr Sanat Bulu\u015fmalar\u0131nda, \u00f6nde gelen temsilcilerle bir araya gelen K\u00fclt\u00fcr ve Turizm Bakan\u0131 Numan Kurtulmu\u015f, Hasbah\u00e7e\u2019nin \u0130mara A\u00e7\u0131lma iddias\u0131 hakk\u0131nda a\u00e7\u0131klamalarda bulundu.\nBakan Kurtulmu\u015f, \u201cZihnimizden ge\u00e7en, oray\u0131 tamamen trafikten ar\u0131nd\u0131rarak \u00c7atlad\u0131kap\u0131\u2019dan Sepet\u00e7iler Kasr\u0131\u2019n\u0131n oldu\u011fu alana kadar olan b\u00f6lgeyi Topkap\u0131 Saray\u0131\u2019n\u0131n alan\u0131 haline getirece\u011fiz. Oras\u0131 hi\u00e7bir \u015fekilde imara a\u00e7\u0131lmayacak. B\u00f6yle bir \u015fey s\u00f6z konusu dahi de\u011fil. Kimsenin endi\u015fesi olmas\u0131n. Orada hi\u00e7bir yap\u0131 yeni yap\u0131 olmayacak. Tarihi olarak var olan kas\u0131rlar da ihya edilecek. Tarihi bah\u00e7enin geni\u015fletilmesi i\u00e7in al\u0131nm\u0131\u015f bir karard\u0131r\u201d dedi.\nDo\u011fruluk Y\u00fczdesi\nKaynaklar:\n1-H\u00fcrriyet 2-K\u00fclt\u00fcr ve Turizm Bakanl\u0131\u011f\u0131 3-Fatih Belediyesi 4-Sabah Gazetesi\n[Toplam:0    Ortalama:0/5] Topkap\u0131 Saray\u0131 \u0130mara A\u00e7\u0131ld\u0131 \u0130ddias\u0131", " \u0130ngiltere\u2019de M\u00fcsl\u00fcman Kar\u015f\u0131t\u0131 Nefret Su\u00e7lar\u0131 Katlanarak Art\u0131yor", "CHP Genel Ba\u015fkan\u0131 Kemal K\u0131l\u0131\u00e7daro\u011flu, 28 Eyl\u00fcl\u2019de Manisa Ala\u015fehir\u2019de d\u00fczenlenen \u00dcz\u00fcm Mitingin\u2019de yapt\u0131\u011f\u0131 konu\u015fmada mazotun yatlara 1.5, trakt\u00f6re ise 5 liradan sat\u0131ld\u0131\u011f\u0131n\u0131 iddia etti.\nMazotun yatlara 1.5, trakt\u00f6re ise 5 liradan sat\u0131ld\u0131\u011f\u0131 iddias\u0131 do\u011fru de\u011fildir.\n31 Aral\u0131k 2003 tarihinde Resmi Gazete\u2019de yay\u0131nlanarak y\u00fcr\u00fcrl\u00fc\u011fe giren 2003/5868 say\u0131l\u0131 Bakanlar Kurulu Karar\u0131 ile y\u00fck ve yolcu ta\u015f\u0131yan gemilere, ticari yatlara, hizmet ve bal\u0131k\u00e7\u0131 gemilerine miktar\u0131 her geminin teknik \u00f6zelliklerine g\u00f6re tespit edilmek ve bu akaryak\u0131t\u0131 kullanacak gemi jurnaline i\u015flenmek kayd\u0131yla verilen akaryak\u0131t\u0131n \u00d6TV tutar\u0131 bu gemilerde s\u0131f\u0131ra indirilmi\u015ftir. Bakanlar Kurulu\u2019nun karar\u0131 01.01.2004 tarihinden itibaren uygulanmaya ba\u015fland\u0131.\n\u00d6ncelikle Enerji Piyasas\u0131 D\u00fczenleme Kurumu\u2019nun, A\u011fustos ay\u0131 boyunca uluslararas\u0131 piyasalara yans\u0131yan fiyatlara ba\u011fl\u0131 olarak haz\u0131rlad\u0131\u011f\u0131 rapora bak\u0131ld\u0131\u011f\u0131nda; mazotun vergisiz bayi sat\u0131\u015f fiyat\u0131 ortalamas\u0131n\u0131n 2,04 TL/LT olarak ger\u00e7ekle\u015fti\u011fi g\u00f6r\u00fclmektedir. Buna g\u00f6re, Bakanlar Kurulu\u2019nun  2003/5868 numaral\u0131 karar\u0131yla ticari yatlara sat\u0131lan mazot fiyat\u0131n\u0131n (eyl\u00fcl ay\u0131 i\u00e7in) 2,04 TL/LT veya \u00fczeri olmas\u0131 gerekmektedir.\nAyr\u0131ca yukar\u0131daki tablo incelendi\u011finde, A\u011fustos ay\u0131nda 4,53 TL/LT d\u00fczeyindeki motorin nihai litre fiyat\u0131n\u0131n %54,95\u2019lik k\u0131sm\u0131n\u0131n vergi, %31,96\u2019l\u0131k k\u0131sm\u0131n\u0131n \u00fcr\u00fcn maliyeti, %13,09\u2019luk k\u0131sm\u0131n\u0131n ise piyasada faaliyet g\u00f6steren \u015firketlerin br\u00fct kar marj\u0131 ile gelir pay\u0131ndan olu\u015ftu\u011fu g\u00f6r\u00fclmektedir.\n\u00d6TV Tutar\u0131 Yat ve Gemilerde Neden S\u0131f\u0131ra \u0130ndirildi?\n2003/5868 say\u0131l\u0131 Bakanlar Kurulu Karar\u0131\u2019yla y\u00fcr\u00fcrl\u00fc\u011fe giren \u00d6TV\u2019siz mazot sat\u0131\u015f\u0131 uygulamas\u0131, ka\u00e7ak mazot sat\u0131\u015f\u0131n\u0131 engellemeye y\u00f6neliktir. Ancak bu uygulama \u00f6zel yatlar ve tekneler i\u00e7in ge\u00e7erli de\u011fildir. S\u0131f\u0131r \u00d6TV uygulamas\u0131ndan faydalanabilmeleri i\u00e7in yat ve teknelerin bir \u015firket ad\u0131na kay\u0131tl\u0131, yani ticari olmas\u0131 gerekiyor.\nDevletin \u00c7ift\u00e7iye Y\u00f6nelik Yard\u0131mlar\u0131nda Mazotun Pay\u0131 Ne Kadar?\nTar\u0131msal destekleme uygulamas\u0131nda 2018\u2019den itibaren mazot maliyetinin %50\u2019si \u00fcreticiye devlet taraf\u0131ndan \u00f6denecektir.\nAncak mazot deste\u011finden, Havza Baz\u0131nda Tar\u0131msal \u00dcretimi Destekleme Modeli kapsam\u0131nda \u00c7KS\u2019ye kay\u0131tl\u0131 \u00e7ift\u00e7iler faydalanabilmektedir. B\u00f6ylelikle 1 dekarl\u0131k alanda harcanan 26 liral\u0131k mazotun 13 liras\u0131 devlet taraf\u0131ndan kar\u015f\u0131lanacakt\u0131r.\nAyr\u0131ca Toplam Tar\u0131msal Destek \u00d6demelerinde 2016 y\u0131l\u0131nda sa\u011flanan destek miktar\u0131 2015 y\u0131l\u0131na g\u00f6re %16 art\u0131r\u0131larak 11,6 Milyar TL\u2019ye y\u00fckseltilmi\u015ftir. 2017 y\u0131l\u0131nda ise \u00fcreticilere 12,8 Milyar TL tar\u0131msal destek sa\u011flanmas\u0131 planlanm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r.\nBununla beraber Alan Bazl\u0131 Destek \u00d6demeleri kapsam\u0131nda; alt gruplar baz\u0131nda bak\u0131ld\u0131\u011f\u0131nda 2016 Ekim ay\u0131 itibariyle; 694 Milyon TL mazot deste\u011fi, 885 Milyon TL kimyevi g\u00fcbre deste\u011fi, 96 Milyon TL toprak analizi deste\u011fi, 165 Milyon TL organik tar\u0131m ve iyi tar\u0131m uygulamalar\u0131 deste\u011fi, 826 Milyon TL f\u0131nd\u0131kta alan bazl\u0131 gelir deste\u011fi \u00f6demesi yap\u0131lm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r.\nDo\u011fruluk Sat\u0131ld\u0131\u011f\u0131 \u0130ddias\u0131", "2021 y\u0131l\u0131 resmi tatilleri 18 g\u00fcnd\u00fcr. 2021 y\u0131l\u0131n\u0131n ilk g\u00fcn\u00fc Cuma g\u00fcn\u00fcne denk gelmektedir. 2021 y\u0131l\u0131 resmi tatiller genelde hafta i\u00e7ine denk geldi\u011fi i\u00e7in bu y\u0131l\u0131 tatil y\u0131l\u0131 olarak adland\u0131rabiliriz :).\n2021 resmi tatilleri \u015fu \u015fekildedir;\n1 Ocak Y\u0131lba\u015f\u0131 Cuma\n23 Nisan Ulusal Egemenlik ve \u00c7ocuk Bayram\u0131 Cuma\n1 May\u0131s Emek ve Dayan\u0131\u015fma G\u00fcn\u00fc Cumartesi\n12 May\u0131s Ramazan Bayram\u0131 Arefesi \u00c7ar\u015famba\n13 May\u0131s Ramazan Bayram\u0131 1. g\u00fcn Per\u015fembe\n14 May\u0131s Ramazan Bayram\u0131 2. g\u00fcn Cuma\n15 May\u0131s Ramazan Bayram\u0131 3. g\u00fcn Cumartesi\n19 May\u0131s Atat\u00fcrk\u2019\u00fc Anma, Gen\u00e7lik ve Spor Bayram\u0131 \u00c7ar\u015famba\n15 Temmuz Demokrasi Bayram\u0131 Per\u015fembe\n19 Temmuz Kurban Bayram\u0131 Arefesi Pazartesi\n20 Temmuz Kurban Bayram\u0131 1. g\u00fcn Sal\u0131\n21 Temmuz Kurban Bayram\u0131 2. g\u00fcn \u00c7ar\u015famba\n22 Temmuz Kurban Bayram\u0131 3. g\u00fcn Per\u015fembe\n23 Temmuz Kurban Bayram\u0131 4. g\u00fcn Cuma\n30 A\u011fustos Zafer Bayram\u0131 Pazartesi\n29 Ekim Cumhuriyet Bayram\u0131 Cuma\n31 Aral\u0131k y\u0131lba\u015f\u0131 gecesi Cuma\n2021 y\u0131l\u0131 Ramazan (\u015eeker) Bayram\u0131 hafta sonuna m\u0131 denk geliyor?\n2021 y\u0131l\u0131 Ramazan bayram\u0131 arefesi \u00e7ar\u015famba g\u00fcn\u00fcne denk gelmektedir. Kamuda \u00e7al\u0131\u015fanlar \u00c7ar\u015famba g\u00fcn\u00fcne denk geldi\u011fi i\u00e7in 5 g\u00fcn boyunca tatil yapm\u0131\u015f olacaklard\u0131r.\n2021\u2019de resmi tatil g\u00fcn\u00fc Kurban Bayram\u0131 hafta sonuna m\u0131 denk geliyor?\nKamuda \u00e7al\u0131\u015fanlar 2020 y\u0131l\u0131nda 5 g\u00fcn tatil yapm\u0131\u015flard\u0131. 2021 y\u0131l\u0131nda kurban bayram\u0131 Pazartesi g\u00fcn\u00fcne denk geldi\u011fi i\u00e7in hafta sonu ile birle\u015ftirdiklerinde 7 g\u00fcn tatil yapacaklar.\n10 Kas\u0131m resmi tatil mi?\nUlu \u00d6nder Atat\u00fcrk\u2019\u00fcn \u00f6l\u00fcm y\u0131l d\u00f6n\u00fcm\u00fc her y\u0131l oldu\u011fu gibi \u00fclkemizce yas g\u00fcn\u00fcd\u00fcr.\n1 May\u0131s resmi tatil mi?\n2021 y\u0131l\u0131 1 May\u0131s Emek ve Dayan\u0131\u015fma G\u00fcn\u00fc Cumartesi g\u00fcn\u00fcne denk geldi\u011fi i\u00e7in kamuda \u00e7al\u0131\u015fanlar i\u00e7in ekstra bir tatil olmu\u015f olmayacak.\n19 May\u0131s tatil mi? Hangi g\u00fcne denk geliyor?\n2021 resmi tatiller i\u00e7erisinde olan 19 May\u0131s Atat\u00fcrk\u2019\u00fc Anma Gen\u00e7lik ve Spor Bayram\u0131 \u00c7ar\u015famba g\u00fcn\u00fcne denk gelmektedir. Bu g\u00fcn resmi tatil olarak ge\u00e7irilecektir.\n 30 A\u011fustos Zafer Bayram\u0131 tatil mi?\n30 A\u011fustos Zafer Bayram\u0131 Pazartesi g\u00fcn\u00fcne denk gelmektedir. Kamuda \u00e7al\u0131\u015fanlar Cumartesiden tatile \u00e7\u0131kt\u0131\u011f\u0131 i\u00e7in \u00fc\u00e7 g\u00fcn tatil yapma f\u0131rsat\u0131n\u0131 yakalam\u0131\u015f olacaklar.\n15 Temmuz tatil mi?\n\u201815 Temmuz g\u00fcn\u00fc Demokrasi ve Milli Birlik G\u00fcn\u00fc\u2019 resmi tatil g\u00fcn\u00fc olarak kabul edilmi\u015ftir. 2021 y\u0131l\u0131nda da aziz \u015fehitlerimizi ve gazilerimizi and\u0131\u011f\u0131m\u0131z bu g\u00fcn\u00fc tatil olarak ge\u00e7irece\u011fiz.\nKAYNAK: http://www.takvim.com/2021_takvimi.html\nVideo oynat\u0131c\u0131\nhttps://dogrula.org/wp-content/uploads/2018/02/dogrula.org_.mp4\n00:00\n00:07\n[Toplam:6    Ortalama:5/5] 2021 Y\u0131l\u0131 Resmi Tatilleri", "CHP Genel Ba\u015fkan\u0131 Kemal K\u0131l\u0131\u00e7daro\u011flu, Sudan\u2019da tar\u0131m arazisi kiraland\u0131 diyerek bir iddiada bulundu. K\u0131l\u0131\u00e7daro\u011flu, ge\u00e7ti\u011fimiz g\u00fcnlerde Ala\u015fehir \u00fcz\u00fcm mitinginde yapt\u0131\u011f\u0131 konu\u015fmada, 2014 y\u0131l\u0131nda da \u00fczerinde durdu\u011fu, devletin \u00e7ift\u00e7iyle rekabet edece\u011fi \u00fczerinden bir \u00f6rnek vererek Sudan\u2019dan 780.000 d\u00f6n\u00fcm arazi kiraland\u0131\u011f\u0131n\u0131 s\u00f6yledi.\nT\u00fcrkiye\u2019nin Sudan\u2019dan 780.000 d\u00f6n\u00fcm arazi kiralad\u0131\u011f\u0131 iddias\u0131 do\u011frudur. \nK\u0131l\u0131\u00e7daro\u011flu, Sudan\u2019dan arazi kiralanmas\u0131na y\u00f6nelik bu durumun ahlakla ve vicdanla ba\u011fda\u015fmayaca\u011f\u0131n\u0131 savunarak, T\u00fcrkiye\u2019deki topraklar\u0131n\u0131n neden de\u011ferlendirilmedi\u011fini sordu.\nNi\u00e7in Arazi Kiraland\u0131?\nG\u0131da, Tar\u0131m ve Hayvanc\u0131l\u0131k Bakanl\u0131\u011f\u0131 ile Sudan\u2019daki ilgili bakanl\u0131k aras\u0131nda imzalan mutabakata g\u00f6re, 2014 y\u0131l\u0131nda T\u00fcrkiye, tarihinde ilk kez devlet ve \u00f6zel sekt\u00f6r i\u015fbirli\u011fiyle Sudan\u2019dan tar\u0131m arazisi kiralad\u0131. 99 y\u0131ll\u0131\u011f\u0131na kiralanan 780 bin d\u00f6n\u00fcml\u00fck arazide, ananas, mango, avakado, pepino jambu gibi tropik meyvelerle birlikte kanola, pamuk ve ya\u011fl\u0131 tohum gibi \u00fcr\u00fcnler yeti\u015ftirilmesi planland\u0131.\nT\u00fcrkiye\u2019ye daha ucuza girmesi planlanan Sudan\u2019da yeti\u015ftirilecek olan \u00fcr\u00fcnlerin, \u00fclkemizin ithal etti\u011fi \u00fcr\u00fcnler olmas\u0131 dikkat \u00e7ekmektedir. Sudan\u2019\u0131n 5 ayr\u0131 b\u00f6lgesinde T\u0130GEM\u2019in (Tar\u0131m \u0130\u015fletmeleri Genel M\u00fcd\u00fcrl\u00fc\u011f\u00fc) T\u00fcrkiye\u2019deki arazilerinin iki kat fazlas\u0131 bir alan G\u0131da Bakanl\u0131\u011f\u0131\u2019na verildi. \u0130\u015f\u00e7ilik ve sulama maliyetleri d\u00fc\u015f\u00fck oldu\u011fu i\u00e7in, ithal edilen \u00fcr\u00fcnlerin daha ucuza mal edilmesi planlanm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r.\nSudan\u2019daki toprak ve su kaynaklar\u0131n\u0131n verimli olmas\u0131 ve ikliminin \u00e7e\u015fitlili\u011fiyle, farkl\u0131 bah\u00e7e bitkilerinin ve tropikal meyvelerin yeti\u015fmesine imkan sa\u011flamaktad\u0131r.\nSudan\u2019da sebze ve meyve \u00fcretiminin \u00f6zellikle k\u0131\u015f aylar\u0131nda ger\u00e7ekle\u015fmesi, bu aylarda Avrupa ve Kuzey Amerika \u00fclkelerinde bu \u00fcr\u00fcnlerin yeti\u015fmiyor olmas\u0131, Sudan\u2019a ihracat a\u00e7\u0131s\u0131ndan b\u00fcy\u00fck avantaj sa\u011flamaktad\u0131r.\nBakanl\u0131\u011f\u0131n A\u00e7\u0131klamas\u0131\nK\u0131l\u0131\u00e7daro\u011flu\u2019nun h\u00fck\u00fcmetin tar\u0131m politikalar\u0131yla ilgili ele\u015ftirilerine y\u00f6nelik ge\u00e7ti\u011fimiz aylarda bas\u0131n a\u00e7\u0131klamas\u0131nda d\u00fczenleyen G\u0131da, Tar\u0131m ve Hayvanc\u0131l\u0131k Eski Bakan\u0131 Faruk \u00c7elik, \u201cSudan konusu bir vizyon meselesidir. Bir\u00e7ok \u00fclke, ba\u015fka \u00fclkelerden 202 milyon hektar tar\u0131m arazisi kiralam\u0131\u015f durumda. D\u00fcnya uzayda bitki \u00fcretimi ile me\u015fgul olurken, sizin d\u00fcnya co\u011frafyas\u0131ndaki at\u0131l arazilerin de\u011ferlendirilmesi noktas\u0131nda bir g\u00f6r\u00fc\u015f\u00fcn\u00fcz yoksa vay halinize\u201d diye konu\u015ftu.\nSudan B\u00fcy\u00fckel\u00e7isi Osman Eldird\u0131eri, T\u00fcrkiye\u2019nin arazi kiralanmas\u0131na ili\u015fkin, \u201cHen\u00fcz, kullan\u0131ma a\u00e7\u0131lmam\u0131\u015f binlerce d\u00f6n\u00fcml\u00fck arazi var. T\u00fcrkiye ile bu arazilerden daha fazla faydalanabilmek i\u00e7in tar\u0131msal alanda i\u015fbirli\u011fi anla\u015fmas\u0131 yapt\u0131k. Buna g\u00f6re y\u00fcz binlerce d\u00f6n\u00fcml\u00fck arazi T\u00fcrklere ve T\u00fcrk yat\u0131r\u0131mc\u0131lara a\u00e7\u0131ld\u0131. Burada yeti\u015fecek \u00fcr\u00fcnlerin kullan\u0131m hakk\u0131 T\u00fcrkiye\u2019de olacak\u201d \u015feklinde a\u00e7\u0131klamada bulunmu\u015ftu.\nD\u00fcnyada \u00d6rnekleri Var M\u0131?\nBir ara\u015ft\u0131rmaya g\u00f6re, k\u00fcresel arazi ticaretinde en iyi olan \u00fclkeler s\u0131ras\u0131yla verilmi\u015ftir. Grafik, ithalat ortakl\u0131klar\u0131 (gri \u00e7ubuklar) ve ihracat ortakl\u0131klar\u0131n\u0131n (k\u0131rm\u0131z\u0131 \u00e7ubuklar) say\u0131s\u0131 olarak ikiye ayr\u0131lm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r. \u00d6rne\u011fin \u00c7in, 33 farkl\u0131 \u00fclkeden arazi ithal ederken 3 \u00fclkeye toprak ihra\u00e7 etmektedir.\nArazi ticaret ortakl\u0131\u011f\u0131nda en iyi 20 \u00fclke\nSon zamanlarda en \u00e7ok tar\u0131m arazisi kiralanan yat\u0131r\u0131m b\u00f6lgelerinin ba\u015f\u0131nda Afrika geliyor. Ancak G\u00fcneydo\u011fu Asya, G\u00fcney Amerika, Rusya ve Ukrayna da tar\u0131m yat\u0131r\u0131mlar\u0131 i\u00e7in se\u00e7ilen b\u00f6lgeler aras\u0131nda yer al\u0131yor.\nD\u00fcnyada, tar\u0131m arazisi yat\u0131r\u0131mlar\u0131 devlet eliyle yap\u0131lmas\u0131n\u0131n yan\u0131 s\u0131ra \u00f6zel \u015firketler taraf\u0131ndan da yap\u0131l\u0131yor. \u00c7in, Amerika, \u0130ngiltere, Almanya ve Hindistan toprak kiralayan veya sat\u0131n alan \u00fclkelerin ba\u015f\u0131n\u0131 \u00e7ekerken; Kongo topraklar\u0131n\u0131n 8,1 milyon, Endonezya 7,1 milyon, Filipinler 5,2 milyon, Sudan 4,7 milyon hektar\u0131n\u0131 kiraya verdi veya satt\u0131.\n\u00c7in \n\u00c7in\u2019de y\u0131llar boyunca n\u00fcfusun artmas\u0131yla birlikte, g\u0131da talebi de \u00fcst d\u00fczeye \u00e7\u0131km\u0131\u015ft\u0131r. Tar\u0131m toplumu ile i\u00e7 g\u0131da talebini kar\u015f\u0131lamaya y\u00f6nelik \u00e7e\u015fitli yollar denemi\u015ftir. \u00c7in\u2019in fazla n\u00fcfusa sahip olmas\u0131 bu sorunu \u00e7\u00f6zmeye yetmemi\u015ftir. Bu y\u00fczden, \u00e7e\u015fitli \u00fclkelerde araziler sat\u0131n alarak veya kiralayarak tar\u0131m sorununu \u00e7\u00f6zmektedir.\n\u00d6rne\u011fin \u00c7in, 2013 y\u0131l\u0131nda Ukrayna\u2019da 30 Milyon hektar arazi kiralam\u0131\u015ft\u0131r. \u00c7in\u2019in son zamanlarda tar\u0131m yat\u0131r\u0131mlar\u0131na odakland\u0131\u011f\u0131 \u00fclkeler aras\u0131nda Brezilya, Arjantin, Kongo Cumhuriyeti, Mozambik, Zambiya, Sudan ve Filipinler de yer almaktad\u0131r.\nHindistan\nArtan g\u0131da fiyatlar\u0131yla birlikte talebin de ayn\u0131 y\u00f6nl\u00fc artmas\u0131yla, Hindistan \u00f6zel sekt\u00f6r eliyle bir\u00e7ok yerden tar\u0131m arazileri kiralamaktad\u0131r. Hindistan, kiralad\u0131\u011f\u0131 arazi miktar\u0131 toplamda 2 milyon hektara ula\u015fm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r.\n\u0130ngiltere\n\u0130ngiltere, \u00e7o\u011funlu\u011fu Afrika\u2019da olmak \u00fczere toplamda 4,4 milyon hektar toprak kiralam\u0131\u015ft\u0131r. Kiralanan topraklar\u0131n y\u00fcz \u00f6l\u00e7\u00fcm\u00fc neredeyse Danimarka\u2019n\u0131n y\u00fcz \u00f6l\u00e7\u00fcm\u00fcyle e\u015fde\u011ferdir.\nDo\u011fruluk Y\u00fczdesi\nKaynaklar:\n1-CHP 2-T.C. G\u0131da Tar\u0131m ve Hayvanc\u0131l\u0131k Bakanl\u0131\u011f\u0131  3-SudanT\u00fcrk 4-National Geographic 5-Trt Haber 6-African Business Life 7-The Guardian\n[Toplam:0    Ortalama:0/5] K\u0131l\u0131\u00e7daro\u011flu\u2019nun Sudan\u2019dan Arazi Kiraland\u0131\u011f\u0131 Y\u00f6n\u00fcndeki \u0130ddias\u0131", "D\u00fcn \u00e7e\u015fitli yay\u0131n organlar\u0131nda yer alan habere g\u00f6re Kayseri\u2019de ilkokul \u00f6\u011fretmeni olan Fatma Saydam\u2019\u0131n, arkada\u015flar\u0131na \u201cHDP\u2019ye oy verdim\u201d dedi\u011fi i\u00e7in 10 ay hapis cezas\u0131na \u00e7arpt\u0131r\u0131ld\u0131\u011f\u0131 iddia edildi. 38 ya\u015f\u0131ndaki \u00f6\u011fretmen Saydam\u2019\u0131n, HDP\u2019ye oy verdi\u011fi i\u00e7in cezaya \u00e7arpt\u0131r\u0131ld\u0131\u011f\u0131 iddias\u0131 do\u011fru de\u011fildir. \u00d6nde gelen baz\u0131 yay\u0131n kurulu\u015flar\u0131 olay\u0131 \u00e7arp\u0131tarak, haberin yanl\u0131\u015f anla\u015f\u0131lmas\u0131na sebebiyet vermi\u015ftir.\nAncak, Kayseri 4. A\u011f\u0131r Ceza Mahkemesinde g\u00f6r\u00fclen duru\u015fmada, ter\u00f6r propagandas\u0131 yapt\u0131\u011f\u0131 gerek\u00e7esiyle 10 ay hapis cezas\u0131 verildi\u011fi do\u011frudur.\nCnnT\u00fcrk\u2019\u00fcn Haberi\nTer\u00f6r Propagandas\u0131 ve Cezas\u0131\nPropaganda, kelime anlam\u0131 olarak bir \u00f6\u011freti, d\u00fc\u015f\u00fcnce veya inanc\u0131 ba\u015fkalar\u0131na tan\u0131tmak, benimsetmek ve yaymak amac\u0131yla s\u00f6z, yaz\u0131 ve benzeri yollarla ger\u00e7ekle\u015ftirilen \u00e7al\u0131\u015fma ve yayma eylemleridir.\nT\u00fcrk Ceza Kanunu\u2018nun 220. maddesi 8. f\u0131kras\u0131na g\u00f6re; \u201c\u00d6rg\u00fct\u00fcn veya amac\u0131n\u0131n propagandas\u0131n\u0131 yapan ki\u015fi, bir y\u0131ldan \u00fc\u00e7 y\u0131la kadar hapis cezas\u0131 ile cezaland\u0131r\u0131l\u0131r. Bu su\u00e7un bas\u0131n ve yay\u0131n yolu ile i\u015flenmesi h\u00e2linde, verilecek ceza yar\u0131 oran\u0131nda art\u0131r\u0131l\u0131r.\u201d\nTer\u00f6r \u00f6rg\u00fct\u00fc propagandas\u0131na Ter\u00f6rle M\u00fccadele Kanunu\u2018nun 7. maddesinde de yer verilmi\u015ftir. TMK\u2019daki 7. maddenin 2013 y\u0131l\u0131ndaki de\u011fi\u015fikli\u011fine g\u00f6re;\n\u201cTer\u00f6r \u00f6rg\u00fct\u00fcn\u00fcn; cebir, \u015fiddet veya tehdit i\u00e7eren y\u00f6ntemlerini me\u015fru g\u00f6sterecek veya \u00f6vecek ya da bu y\u00f6ntemlere ba\u015fvurmay\u0131 te\u015fvik edecek \u015fekilde propagandas\u0131n\u0131 yapan ki\u015fi, bir y\u0131ldan be\u015f y\u0131la kadar hapis cezas\u0131 ile cezaland\u0131r\u0131l\u0131r.\u201d\nG\u00f6rev Arkada\u015flar\u0131 Tan\u0131kl\u0131k Etti\nTer\u00f6r \u00f6rg\u00fct\u00fc propagandas\u0131 yapmad\u0131\u011f\u0131n\u0131 iddia eden Fatma Saydam\u2019\u0131n, daha \u00f6nce \u00e7al\u0131\u015ft\u0131\u011f\u0131 Ali Osman \u00d6zel \u0130lkokulu\u2018nda g\u00f6rev yapan 2 \u00f6\u011fretmen arkada\u015f\u0131, mahkemede tan\u0131kl\u0131k etti.\nKudret F. isimli tan\u0131k, Fatma Saydam\u2019\u0131n \u201cAbdullah \u00d6calan iyi niyetli bir insan ve kendisinin bar\u0131\u015f el\u00e7isi oldu\u011funu d\u00fc\u015f\u00fcn\u00fcyorum. Herkesin \u00f6zerklik ilan etmeye hakk\u0131 oldu\u011funu ve b\u00f6l\u00fcnmenin herkes i\u00e7in iyi olaca\u011f\u0131n\u0131 d\u00fc\u015f\u00fcn\u00fcyorum\u201d dedi\u011fini ifade etti.\nDi\u011fer tan\u0131k Kezban B. ise, Saydam\u2019\u0131n kendisinden HDP\u2019ye oy vermesi talebinde bulundu\u011funu ve kendisinin \u201cBu ter\u00f6ristlere mi oy verece\u011fim?\u201d diye sormas\u0131na kar\u015f\u0131l\u0131k olarak, \u201cBiz bar\u0131\u015ftan yanay\u0131z. Asker de \u015fehit olmas\u0131n, da\u011fdaki de\u201d dedi\u011fini aktard\u0131.\nBunun \u00fczerine, kendisine y\u00f6neltilen su\u00e7lamalar\u0131 kabul etmeyen Fatma Saydam, savunmas\u0131nda;\n\u201c\u00dczerimde 1 y\u0131l\u0131 a\u015fk\u0131n bir zamand\u0131r bu konu ile ilgili bask\u0131 var. Ben sadece HDP\u2019ye oy verdi\u011fimi s\u00f6yledim. Ter\u00f6r \u00f6rg\u00fct\u00fcne kar\u015f\u0131 oldu\u011fum i\u00e7in HDP\u2019yi destekledim.\u201d diye konu\u015ftu.\nOkulun m\u00fcd\u00fcr\u00fc ise, san\u0131\u011f\u0131n ter\u00f6r \u00f6rg\u00fct\u00fc propagandas\u0131 yapt\u0131\u011f\u0131na rastlamad\u0131\u011f\u0131n\u0131 beyan etti.\nFatma Saydam\u2019a \u201cPKK/KCK propagandas\u0131\u201d yapma su\u00e7undan 10 ay hapis cezas\u0131 veren Kayseri 4. A\u011f\u0131r Ceza Mahkemesi, h\u00fckm\u00fcn a\u00e7\u0131klanmas\u0131n\u0131 geri b\u0131rakarak cezay\u0131 erteledi.\nDo\u011fruluk Y\u00fczdesi\nKaynaklar:\n1-T\u00fcrk Ceza Kanunu 2-Ter\u00f6rle M\u00fccadele Kanunu 3-CnnT\u00fcrk 4-T24 5-Kayseri Anadolu Haber\n[Toplam:0    Ortalama:0/5] HDP\u2019ye Oy Veren \u00d6\u011fretmenin Hapis Cezas\u0131 Ald\u0131\u011f\u0131 \u0130ddias\u0131", "Greenpeace Nedir?\nGreenpeace, \u00e7evreyi korumak ve bar\u0131\u015f\u0131 desteklemek i\u00e7in faaliyet g\u00f6steren ba\u011f\u0131ms\u0131z ve k\u00fcresel bir \u00f6rg\u00fct olarak kendini tan\u0131mlamaktad\u0131r. Greenpeace \u00e7evreyi koruma ve bar\u0131\u015f\u0131 destekleme ama\u00e7lar\u0131 do\u011frultusunda baz\u0131 prensipler benimsemi\u015ftir. Ba\u011f\u0131ms\u0131z, aktivist, bilimsel ve etkin olmak bu prensiplerden en \u00f6nemlileridir. Ba\u011f\u0131ms\u0131zl\u0131k prensibine g\u00f6re Greenpeace, hi\u00e7bir \u015firketten, sanayi kurulu\u015fundan, siyasi partiden ya da devletten maddi destek ya da sponsorluk kabul etmemekte ve yaln\u0131zca bireylerden ald\u0131\u011f\u0131 maddi destekle ayakta durmaktad\u0131r. Aktivist olarak Greenpeace, D\u00fcnya\u2019y\u0131 ya\u015fanmaz hale getiren \u00e7evre su\u00e7lar\u0131na kar\u015f\u0131, \u015fiddet i\u00e7ermeyen, yarat\u0131c\u0131 ve do\u011frudan eylemlerle tan\u0131kl\u0131k etmekte, \u00e7evre skandallar\u0131n\u0131 ortaya \u00e7\u0131kartmakta ve kamuoyuna duyurmaktad\u0131r. Bilimsellik prensibi gere\u011fi Greenpeace, \u0130ngiltere\u2019deki Exeter \u00dcniversitesi laboratuvar\u0131n\u0131n ve di\u011fer i\u015fbirli\u011fi yapan onlarca bilim insan\u0131n\u0131n sundu\u011fu bulgular do\u011frultusunda bilimsel raporlar haz\u0131rlamaktad\u0131r. Etkinlik prensibine g\u00f6re Greenpeace, uluslararas\u0131 anla\u015fmalara lobi etkinlikleriyle a\u011f\u0131rl\u0131\u011f\u0131n\u0131 koyan, taslaklar \u00f6neren ve kabul ettirebilen az say\u0131da sivil toplum kurulu\u015fundan biridir.\nGreenpeace\u2019in \u0130lk \u00c7al\u0131\u015fmalar\u0131\nGreenpeace fikri ilk olarak, k\u00fc\u00e7\u00fck bir grubun kiralad\u0131\u011f\u0131 Phyllis Cormack isimli eski bir tekne ile n\u00fckleer denemeleri protesto etmek i\u00e7in Alaska\u2019n\u0131n kuzeyinde bulunan Amchitka\u2019daki n\u00fckleer deneme sahas\u0131na gitmeleri ile ortaya \u00e7\u0131km\u0131\u015ft\u0131r. 1971 y\u0131l\u0131nda Kanada\u2019n\u0131n Vancouver \u015fehrinde kurulan Greenpeace ilk ad\u0131m olarak, Amerika Birle\u015fik Devletleri donanmas\u0131n\u0131n yapt\u0131\u011f\u0131 n\u00fckleer denemeleri durdurmay\u0131 ama\u00e7 edinmi\u015ftir. Bu do\u011frultuda \u00e7al\u0131\u015fma alanlar\u0131n\u0131 geni\u015fletmi\u015f ve zamanla uluslararas\u0131 bir olu\u015fum haline gelmi\u015ftir.\nGreenpeace, Kanada\u2019da kurulmu\u015f bir \u00e7evre koruma ve bar\u0131\u015f \u00f6rg\u00fct\u00fc olmas\u0131na ra\u011fmen zamanla uluslararas\u0131 bir \u00f6rg\u00fct haline  gelmi\u015f ve ge\u00e7mi\u015ften g\u00fcn\u00fcm\u00fcze \u00e7ok fazla eylemler ger\u00e7ekle\u015ftirmi\u015ftir. Bu eylemlerden bir k\u0131sm\u0131 ba\u015far\u0131l\u0131 olmu\u015f ve \u00e7evreyi olumsuz etkilemesi muhtemel \u00e7al\u0131\u015fmalar\u0131n \u00f6n\u00fcne ge\u00e7ilmi\u015ftir. Greenpeace\u2019in resmi web sitesinden bu ba\u015far\u0131lara dair detayl\u0131 bilgilere ula\u015fmak m\u00fcmk\u00fcn. Greenpeace\u2019in, temel olarak \u00e7al\u0131\u015fma alan\u0131 kapsam\u0131nda kabul etti\u011fi esaslar \u015funlard\u0131r:\n\u0130klim de\u011fi\u015fikli\u011fine kar\u015f\u0131 enerji evrimini ba\u015flatmak\nDenizleri bilin\u00e7siz politikalardan korumak\nD\u00fcnyan\u0131n en eski ormanlar\u0131n\u0131 ve bu ekosisteme ba\u011fl\u0131 ya\u015fayan bitki, hayvan ve insanlar\u0131 korumak\n\u00c7at\u0131\u015fmalar\u0131n nedenlerini ele alarak, b\u00fct\u00fcn n\u00fckleer silahlardan ar\u0131nmak yoluyla silahs\u0131zlanma ve bar\u0131\u015f i\u00e7in \u00e7al\u0131\u015fmak\nG\u0131da \u00fcr\u00fcnleri ba\u015fta olmak \u00fczere zararl\u0131 kimyasallar\u0131n kullan\u0131lmad\u0131\u011f\u0131 zehirli maddelerden ar\u0131nm\u0131\u015f (toksiksiz) bir gelecek yaratmak\nGeneti\u011fiyle oynanm\u0131\u015f organizmalar\u0131 reddederek, biyolojik \u00e7e\u015fitlili\u011fi korumak, s\u00fcrd\u00fcr\u00fclebilir tar\u0131m\u0131 desteklemek\nGreenpeace\u2019in Maddi Kaynaklar\u0131 Nelerdir?\nGreenpeace, Avrupa, Amerika, Asya, Afrika ve Pasifik\u2019te toplam 40 \u00fclkede, 28 b\u00f6lgesel veya ulusal ofisle faaliyet g\u00f6stermektedir. \u015eu anda merkez ofisi Amsterdam\u2019da bulunmaktad\u0131r. Greenpeace ba\u011f\u0131ms\u0131zl\u0131k ilkesini korumak ad\u0131na hi\u00e7bir h\u00fck\u00fcmet veya \u015firketten maddi gelir kabul etmemekte oldu\u011funu iddia etmektedir. Ba\u015flad\u0131\u011f\u0131 g\u00fcnden itibaren uzun bir s\u00fcre ama\u00e7lar\u0131 do\u011frultusunda bar\u0131\u015f\u00e7\u0131l bir \u00f6rg\u00fct olarak hareket eden Greenpeace, bir s\u00fcre sonra ama\u00e7lar\u0131n\u0131 ger\u00e7ekle\u015ftirmek i\u00e7in yeterli maddi deste\u011fi sa\u011flayamam\u0131\u015f ve deste\u011fe ihtiya\u00e7 duymu\u015ftur. B\u00fcy\u00fck g\u00fc\u00e7 kaynaklar\u0131 olan kurumlardan maddi destek alm\u0131\u015f ve bunu da ama\u00e7lar\u0131na uygun g\u00f6stermek ad\u0131na \u201cvak\u0131flardan gelen ba\u011f\u0131\u015flar\u201d olarak de\u011ferlendirmi\u015flerdir. Ancak hem bu ba\u011f\u0131\u015flar\u0131n miktar\u0131n\u0131n \u00e7ok fazla olmas\u0131 hem de s\u00f6z konusu vak\u0131f ve kurumlar\u0131n baz\u0131lar\u0131 ile Greenpeace\u2019in esaslar\u0131n\u0131n \u00e7ok b\u00fcy\u00fck \u00e7at\u0131\u015fma i\u00e7erisinde olmas\u0131 dikkat \u00e7ekmektedir. Greenpeace destek\u00e7isi olan baz\u0131 vak\u0131flar ve kurumlar\u0131n listesi \u015f\u00f6yle:\nListenin tamam\u0131 i\u00e7in g\u00f6rsele veya buraya t\u0131klayabilirsiniz.\nGreenpeace, ama\u00e7lar\u0131 do\u011frultusunda \u00e7evreye kar\u015f\u0131 i\u015flenen bir su\u00e7a tan\u0131kl\u0131k etmek, kamuoyunun dikkatini \u00e7ekerek su\u00e7u i\u015fleyenler \u00fczerinde bask\u0131 olu\u015fturmak amac\u0131yla bar\u0131\u015f\u00e7\u0131l eylemler yapan bir olu\u015fumken, ald\u0131\u011f\u0131 fonlar\u0131 sa\u011flayan vak\u0131flar sebebiyle \u00e7ok tepki \u00e7ekmi\u015ftir. \u00c7\u00fcnk\u00fc bu vak\u0131flar, Greenpeace\u2019in eylem kapsam\u0131nda de\u011ferlendirdi\u011fi konular\u0131 esas i\u015f olarak yapmaktad\u0131r. \u00d6rne\u011fin; Greenpeace petrol \u015firketlerine kar\u015f\u0131 oldu\u011funu iddia etmesine ra\u011fmen, ba\u011f\u0131\u015f ald\u0131\u011f\u0131 kurumlardan baz\u0131lar\u0131 petrol baronlar\u0131 taraf\u0131ndan y\u00f6netilmektedir. Bu petrol baronlar\u0131ndan biri olan Rockefeller\u2019\u0131n destek verdi\u011fi kurumlar listesine bakt\u0131\u011f\u0131m\u0131zda Greenpeace\u2019i g\u00f6rmek m\u00fcmk\u00fcn. Bu durumlardan dolay\u0131 tepki \u00e7eken Greenpeace, hissedarlar toplant\u0131s\u0131na kat\u0131labilmek amac\u0131yla Rockefeller\u2019\u0131n sahibi oldu\u011fu Shell\u2019den hisse al\u0131p, toplant\u0131lar\u0131nda petrol\u00fcn ekolojik zararlar\u0131n\u0131 g\u00fcndeme getirdiklerini ve daha sonra kar etmeden bu hisseyi geri satm\u0131\u015f olduklar\u0131n\u0131 a\u00e7\u0131klam\u0131\u015ft\u0131r. Bu a\u00e7\u0131klama Greenpeace hakk\u0131ndaki fikirlerin daha da sorgulanmas\u0131na sebep olmu\u015ftur. Sadece ba\u011f\u0131\u015flarla varl\u0131\u011f\u0131n\u0131 s\u00fcrd\u00fcrd\u00fc\u011f\u00fcn\u00fc iddia eden bir \u00f6rg\u00fct\u00fcn, d\u00fcnyan\u0131n en b\u00fcy\u00fck petrol i\u015fletmelerinden biri olan Shell\u2019den hisse alabilecek kadar b\u00fcy\u00fck bir miktarda paras\u0131n\u0131n olmas\u0131 \u015f\u00fcphe \u00e7ekmi\u015ftir. Ba\u011f\u0131\u015flarla b\u00fcy\u00fck miktarda para elde etmi\u015f olmalar\u0131 varsay\u0131m\u0131nda dahi, bu paran\u0131n Greenpeace organizasyonlar\u0131 kapsam\u0131nda \u00e7ok daha \u00f6nemli \u00e7al\u0131\u015fmalar i\u00e7in kullan\u0131lmay\u0131p, sadece toplant\u0131 g\u00fcndemine dahil olabilmek ad\u0131na hisse sat\u0131n almak i\u00e7in kullan\u0131lmas\u0131 inand\u0131r\u0131c\u0131 bulunmam\u0131\u015ft\u0131r. 2014 y\u0131l\u0131nda Greenpeace\u2019in finans dan\u0131\u015fman\u0131, euro ile pound para birimlerindeki k\u00fc\u00e7\u00fck bir dalgalanmadan dolay\u0131 \u201c5.2 milyon dolar\u201d kaybettiklerini a\u00e7\u0131klam\u0131\u015ft\u0131r. Ancak b\u00f6yle bir dalgalanma y\u00fcz\u00fcnden bu boyutta bir kayb\u0131n olmas\u0131 i\u00e7in anaparan\u0131n bu miktardan kat kat fazla olmas\u0131 gerekmektedir.\nDavid Rockefeller\nBenzer Olaylara Farkl\u0131 Eylemler\nGreenpeace, uluslararas\u0131 anla\u015fmalara lobi etkinlikleriyle a\u011f\u0131rl\u0131\u011f\u0131n\u0131 koyan, taslaklar \u00f6neren ve kabul ettirebilen az say\u0131daki yetkin \u00e7evre \u00f6rg\u00fctlerinden birisi olarak kabul edilmektedir. Bu anlamda \u00f6zellikle kriz d\u00f6nemlerinde, do\u011fa katliamlar\u0131 s\u00f6z konusu oldu\u011funda dikkatleri bu olaylara \u00e7ekmesi kendisinden beklenmektedir. Ancak Greenpeace, ba\u011f\u0131\u015f ald\u0131\u011f\u0131 kurumlarla z\u0131tla\u015fmamak ad\u0131na benzer olaylara farkl\u0131 eylemlerle yakla\u015fm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r. Meksika K\u00f6rfezi\u2019nde BP\u2019nin neden oldu\u011fu kaza hakk\u0131nda kampanyada her t\u00fcrl\u00fc hukuki i\u015flemler dahil olmak \u00fczere eylemler ve \u00e7al\u0131\u015fmalar yapan \u00f6rg\u00fct, Shell\u2019in sebep oldu\u011fu Nijerya kazas\u0131 hakk\u0131nda sesini \u00e7\u0131kartmam\u0131\u015ft\u0131r. Greenpeace, gelen yo\u011fun tepkiler \u00fczerine kazadan 2-3 y\u0131l sonra eylem ad\u0131 alt\u0131nda sadece bir yaz\u0131 yay\u0131nlam\u0131\u015ft\u0131r. Bir ba\u015fka \u00f6rnekte de, Nutella \u00fcretiminde kullan\u0131lacak palm ya\u011f\u0131n\u0131n sa\u011flanmas\u0131 i\u00e7in b\u00f6lgedeki palmiye a\u011fa\u00e7lar\u0131n\u0131n yok olacak \u015fekilde tahrip edilmesi hakk\u0131nda boykot \u00e7a\u011fr\u0131s\u0131na Greenpeace tepkisiz kalm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r. T\u00fcm bunlar ve daha fazlas\u0131, aralar\u0131nda kurucular\u0131n\u0131nda oldu\u011fu bir\u00e7ok Greenpeace g\u00f6n\u00fcll\u00fcs\u00fcn\u00fcn gidi\u015fattan memnun olmamas\u0131 sebebiyle \u00f6rg\u00fctten ayr\u0131lmas\u0131na sebep olmu\u015ftur. Bu isimlerden en \u00f6nemlisi ve Greenpeace kurucular\u0131ndan olan Kaptan Paul Watson, Greenpeace ile yollar\u0131n\u0131 ay\u0131rd\u0131ktan sonra Sea Shepherd organizasyonunu kurmu\u015f ve balina katliamlar\u0131n\u0131 \u00f6nlemek ad\u0131na \u00e7ok \u00f6nemli ba\u015far\u0131lara imza atm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r.\nPaul Watson\nGreenpeace\u2019ten ayr\u0131ld\u0131ktan sonra dahi baz\u0131 organizasyonlar i\u00e7in birlikte eylem yapmay\u0131 teklif eden Paul Watson\u2019a, Greenpeace taraf\u0131ndan hi\u00e7bir yan\u0131t gelmemi\u015ftir. Sea Shepherd destek\u00e7ilerinden birisine Greenpeace ad\u0131na cevap veren Sebastian Jannelli, ortak bir \u00e7al\u0131\u015fma y\u00fcr\u00fctmenin m\u00fcmk\u00fcn olmad\u0131\u011f\u0131n\u0131, \u00e7\u00fcnk\u00fc Sea Shepherd\u2019\u0131n organizasyonlar\u0131nda kulland\u0131\u011f\u0131 y\u00f6ntemlerin tehditkar ve kabul edilemez oldu\u011funu ifade etmi\u015ftir. Buna cevaben Paul Watson uzun bir a\u00e7\u0131klama yapm\u0131\u015f ve Greenpeace\u2019in yans\u0131tmaya \u00e7al\u0131\u015ft\u0131\u011f\u0131n\u0131n aksine Sea Shepherd uygulamalar\u0131n\u0131n hi\u00e7birinin \u015fiddetle alakal\u0131 olmad\u0131\u011f\u0131n\u0131 belirtmi\u015ftir.\nPatrick Moore Neden Ayr\u0131ld\u0131?\nGreenpeace\u2019in kurucular\u0131ndan ve Kanada merkezinin ba\u015fkan\u0131 olan Patrick Moore da, \u00e7al\u0131\u015fmalar\u0131n gidi\u015fat\u0131ndan memnun kalmay\u0131p \u00f6rg\u00fctten ayr\u0131lm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r. British Colombia \u00dcniversitesinde Ekoloji alan\u0131nda doktora yapm\u0131\u015f olan Moore, Greenpeace\u2019in bilimsellikten uzakla\u015ft\u0131\u011f\u0131n\u0131 ve asl\u0131nda insanl\u0131\u011fa b\u00fcy\u00fck faydalar\u0131 olan bir\u00e7ok kimyasala kar\u015f\u0131 bilin\u00e7sizce kampanya y\u00fcr\u00fctmeye ba\u015flad\u0131\u011f\u0131n\u0131 belirtmi\u015ftir. Moore, Greenpeace y\u00f6netiminde s\u00f6z sahibi olan 6 uluslararas\u0131 direkt\u00f6rden sadece kendisinin bilimle alakal\u0131 resmi ge\u00e7mi\u015fi oldu\u011funu ve Greenpeace\u2019in \u00e7al\u0131\u015fma alanlar\u0131 aras\u0131nda toksikoloji (zehir bilim), kimya ve insan sa\u011fl\u0131\u011f\u0131 gibi karma\u015f\u0131k konular\u0131n bulundu\u011funu s\u00f6ylemi\u015ftir. Moore ifadelerinde \u015fu s\u00f6zlere de yer vermi\u015ftir: \u201cBalinalar\u0131 yok olmaktan kurtarman\u0131n iyi bir \u015fey oldu\u011funu bilmek i\u00e7in deniz biyolojisi alan\u0131nda doktoran\u0131z olmas\u0131na gerek yok. Ancak hangi kimyasallar\u0131n yasaklanmas\u0131 gerekti\u011fi konusunda analiz yap\u0131yorsan\u0131z, baz\u0131 bilimleri bilmeniz gerekiyor.\u201d\nN\u00fckleer Enerji\nPatrick Moore, n\u00fckleer enerji ile alakal\u0131 olarak da Greenpeace\u2019in politikalar\u0131n\u0131n yanl\u0131\u015f oldu\u011funu ve n\u00fckleer enerjinin sera gaz\u0131 emisyonu yapmad\u0131\u011f\u0131 i\u00e7in fosil yak\u0131tl\u0131 enerji kaynaklar\u0131na alternatif olarak kullan\u0131lmas\u0131n\u0131n, d\u00fcnyada sera gaz\u0131 emisyonunu azaltarak muhtemel katastrofik iklim de\u011fi\u015fikli\u011fi felaketini \u00f6nleyici etkenlerin ba\u015f\u0131nda geldi\u011fini belirtmi\u015ftir.\nPatrick Moore\nGreenpeace\u2019in kurulmas\u0131na yard\u0131m ederken, bir \u00e7ok arkada\u015f\u0131 gibi n\u00fckleer enerjinin n\u00fckleer felaketle e\u015f anlaml\u0131 oldu\u011funa inand\u0131\u011f\u0131n\u0131 belirten Moore, \u201cAradan 30 y\u0131l ge\u00e7ti, g\u00f6r\u00fc\u015flerim de\u011fi\u015fti ve \u00e7evresel hareketlerde bulunanlar da g\u00f6r\u00fc\u015flerini g\u00fcncellemek zorundalar, \u00e7\u00fcnk\u00fc n\u00fckleer enerji gezegenimizi bir di\u011fer olas\u0131 felaket olan katostrofik iklim de\u011fi\u015fikliklerinden koruyacak enerji kayna\u011f\u0131 olabilir. \u015eu y\u00f6nden bakal\u0131m, ABD\u2019deki 600 adetten fazla k\u00f6m\u00fcre dayal\u0131 termik santral, iklim de\u011fi\u015fikli\u011finden sorumlu en \u00f6nemli sera gaz\u0131 olan karbondioksit gaz\u0131n\u0131n, ABD genelindeki emisyonun y\u00fczde 36\u2019s\u0131n\u0131, d\u00fcnya genelindeki emisyonun y\u00fczde 10\u2019unu \u00fcretiyor. N\u00fckleer enerji ise bir yandan b\u00fcy\u00fcyen enerji talebini kar\u015f\u0131larken, di\u011fer yandan bu emisyonlar\u0131 azaltabilecek tek, b\u00fcy\u00fck \u00f6l\u00e7ekte makul fiyatl\u0131 enerji kayna\u011f\u0131d\u0131r ve bu g\u00fcnlerde bu g\u00fcvenli yap\u0131labilmektedir.\u201d \u015feklinde konu\u015fmu\u015ftur. N\u00fckleer silahlanma ile n\u00fckleer enerjinin kar\u0131\u015ft\u0131r\u0131lmamas\u0131 gerekti\u011fini de belirten Moore, insanlar\u0131n n\u00fckleer silahlar\u0131n barbarl\u0131\u011f\u0131n\u0131 reddedip, n\u00fckleer enerjinin faydalar\u0131n\u0131 kabul edecek kadar fark\u0131ndal\u0131k kazanmalar\u0131 gerekti\u011fini ifade etmi\u015ftir.\nGreenpeace\u2019in n\u00fckleer enerji santralleriyle alakal\u0131 yapt\u0131\u011f\u0131 eylemler asl\u0131nda \u00e7ok etkisiz kalm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r. Hatta neredeyse en \u00e7ok eylem yapt\u0131\u011f\u0131 \u00fclkeler (ABD ve Fransa gibi), zamanla en \u00e7ok santrallerin yer ald\u0131\u011f\u0131 \u00fclkeler olmu\u015ftur. S\u00f6z konusu art\u0131\u015flar dolay\u0131s\u0131yla Greenpeace\u2019in eylemlerini ger\u00e7ekle\u015ftirmesinin bir nevi santral in\u015falar\u0131n\u0131n \u00fcst\u00fcn\u00fc \u00f6rtmek amac\u0131yla organize edildi\u011fi yorumlar\u0131 dahi yap\u0131lm\u0131\u015f, dikkatleri santral in\u015fas\u0131ndan uzak tutmak i\u00e7in eylem yapt\u0131klar\u0131 konu\u015fulmu\u015ftur. Santrallerin bulundu\u011fu \u00fclkelere ve eylemlerin yap\u0131lmas\u0131ndan \u00f6ncesi ve sonras\u0131ndaki santral say\u0131lar\u0131na bak\u0131ld\u0131\u011f\u0131nda, bu yorumlar dikkat \u00e7ekmektedir. N\u00fckleer santrallerin in\u015fas\u0131n\u0131 temize \u00e7\u0131karmak i\u00e7in formaliteden bir eylem organizasyonu yap\u0131ld\u0131\u011f\u0131n\u0131 savunan yorumcular buradan yola \u00e7\u0131kmaktad\u0131r. N\u00fckleer enerji santrallerine kar\u015f\u0131 olumsuz duru\u015f sergileyen Greenpeace, neden bu kadar etkisiz kalm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r? Patrick Moore\u2019un yapt\u0131\u011f\u0131 a\u00e7\u0131klamalar do\u011frultusunda asl\u0131nda n\u00fckleer enerji santrallerinin insanl\u0131\u011fa faydal\u0131 oldu\u011funu mu biliyorlar? E\u011fer \u00f6yleyse bu eylemlerin amac\u0131 nedir? \u0130\u015fte bu sorular ve daha fazlas\u0131 Greenpeace\u2019e olan g\u00fcveni sorgulatmaktad\u0131r.\nNazca Desenleri\nGreenpeace ile ilgili bir ba\u015fka ele\u015ftirilen konu da eylem yaparlarken ba\u015fka zararlara sebebiyet vermeleridir. 2014 senesinde Peru\u2019da d\u00fczenlenen Birle\u015fmi\u015f Milletler \u0130klim Zirvesi\u2018ni protesto etmek istemi\u015flerdir. Ancak bunu ger\u00e7ekle\u015ftirirken, Peru\u2019nun tarihi de\u011ferlerinden olan Nazca \u00c7izgilerine zarar vermi\u015flerdir. M.\u00d6. 700\u2019l\u00fc y\u0131llarda kim oldu\u011fu bilinmeyen birisi taraf\u0131ndan b\u00f6lgede farkl\u0131 alanlara \u00e7izilmi\u015f Nazca \u00c7izgileri\u2019nden sinekku\u015fu motifinin yan\u0131na, kuma\u015fla ve havadan bak\u0131ld\u0131\u011f\u0131nda g\u00f6r\u00fclebilecek b\u00fcy\u00fckl\u00fckte \u201cDe\u011fi\u015fim zaman\u0131! Gelecek Yenilenebilir. Greenpeace\u201d mesaj\u0131n\u0131 yazm\u0131\u015flar ve Peru\u2019nun tarihi miraslar\u0131ndan olan motife geri d\u00f6n\u00fc\u015f\u00fc olmayacak \u015fekilde zarar vermi\u015flerdir.\n\u0130\u00e7 Organizasyon S\u0131k\u0131nt\u0131s\u0131\nGreenpeace ile ilgili tart\u0131\u015fmalara yol a\u00e7an di\u011fer bir konu da, g\u00f6n\u00fcll\u00fcl\u00fck esas\u0131yla yola \u00e7\u0131kt\u0131\u011f\u0131n\u0131 ve kar amac\u0131 g\u00fctmedi\u011fini s\u00f6yleyen bu \u00f6rg\u00fct\u00fcn, kendi i\u00e7 organizasyonunda da bir s\u00fcredir s\u0131k\u0131nt\u0131 \u00e7ekiyor olmas\u0131d\u0131r. \u00d6rg\u00fct i\u00e7erisinde herkesin e\u015fit derecede \u00f6nemli oldu\u011fu ve g\u00f6n\u00fcll\u00fcl\u00fc\u011f\u00fcn esas oldu\u011fu eski Greenpeace yap\u0131s\u0131n\u0131n mevcut durumda ge\u00e7erlili\u011fini kaybetti\u011fi, t\u00fcm organizasyonun k\u00fc\u00e7\u00fck bir grup taraf\u0131ndan y\u00f6netildi\u011fi, \u00fcst d\u00fczey kabul edilen Greenpeace yetkililerinin \u00e7ok fazla \u00fccret ald\u0131\u011f\u0131, g\u00f6n\u00fcll\u00fclere ise c\u00fczi miktarlarda \u00f6deme yap\u0131ld\u0131\u011f\u0131 konular\u0131nda da Greenpeace tepki \u00e7ekmektedir.\nGreenpeace T\u00fcrkiye\nGreenpeace gemisi, T\u00fcrkiye\u2019ye ilk kez 1992 y\u0131l\u0131nda gelmi\u015ftir. Greenpeace T\u00fcrkiye, \u00e7al\u0131\u015fmalar\u0131n\u0131 Toksik Maddeler, Toksik At\u0131k Ticareti, Enerji, Denizler ve N\u00fckleer Silahs\u0131zlanma konu ba\u015fl\u0131klar\u0131 alt\u0131nda y\u00fcr\u00fctm\u00fc\u015ft\u00fcr. Greenpeace T\u00fcrkiye\u2019de \u015fu anda; \u0130klim De\u011fi\u015fikli\u011fi ve Enerji, Akdeniz\u2019i Koruma, Tar\u0131m Kampanyas\u0131 ve N\u00fckleersiz Gelecek alan\u0131nda etkin \u00e7al\u0131\u015fmalar y\u00fcr\u00fct\u00fclmektedir. \u015eu anda Greenpeace T\u00fcrkiye\u2018ye s\u00fcrekli maddi destekte bulunan yakla\u015f\u0131k 50 bin destek\u00e7i bulunmaktad\u0131r.\nKaynaklar:\n1. greenpeace, 2. greenpeace 2, 3. activistfacts, 4. activistfacts 2, 5. cevre.metu, 6. wikiwand, 7. uk.businessinsider, 8. qz, 9. seashepherd, 10. seashepherd 2, 11. theguardian, 12. eelegal, 13. rbf, 14. theguardian 2, 15. wikiwand, 16. prageru, 17. youtube, 18. sourcewatch, 19. haberler, 20. nukte, 21. nei, 22. world-nuclear, 23. world-nuclear 2, 24. nrc.gov, 25. nei 2, 26. eia.gov, 27. wikiwand 2, 28. greenpeace 3\n[Toplam:0    Ortalama:0/5] Greenpeace Hala Bir Bar\u0131\u015f \u00d6rg\u00fct\u00fc m\u00fc?", "Son g\u00fcnlerde sosyal medyada yer bulan, Viking mezarlar\u0131ndan \u201cAllah\u201d ve \u201cAli\u201d yaz\u0131lar\u0131 \u00e7\u0131kt\u0131 iddias\u0131 do\u011frudur.\nDaha \u00f6nce tipik Viking D\u00f6nemi desenleri oldu\u011fu d\u00fc\u015f\u00fcn\u00fclen bu yaz\u0131lar\u0131n geometrik Kufi karakterleri oldu\u011fu ispatlanm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r. Uppsala \u00dcniversitesi\u2019nin y\u00fcr\u00fctt\u00fc\u011f\u00fc ara\u015ft\u0131rma, \u015ferit desenlerinde hem Allah hem de Ali yaz\u0131lar\u0131n\u0131n bulundu\u011funu g\u00f6stermi\u015ftir.\nViking mezar k\u0131yafetinden bir kuma\u015f par\u00e7as\u0131\nArap\u00e7a karakterler, Viking D\u00f6nemi tekne mezarlar\u0131nda bulunan mezarl\u0131k kost\u00fcmlerinin yan\u0131 s\u0131ra, oda mezarlar\u0131nda bulunan ipek giysilerin \u00fczerinde de g\u00f6r\u00fclm\u00fc\u015ft\u00fcr.\nUppsala \u00dcniversitesi Arkeoloji ve Eski Tarih B\u00f6l\u00fcm\u00fc\u2019nde tekstil arkeolojisi ara\u015ft\u0131rmac\u0131s\u0131 olan Annika Larsson, \u201cAllah yaz\u0131s\u0131n\u0131n ayna g\u00f6r\u00fcnt\u00fcs\u00fc ile tasvir edilmesi, ilgin\u00e7 bir ayr\u0131nt\u0131\u201d dedi.\nLarsson ayr\u0131ca, \u201c\u0130lgi \u00e7ekici bir ke\u015fif oldu. Vikingler, \u0130slam dininden ve \u00f6l\u00fcmden sonra cennette sonsuz ya\u015fam inan\u0131\u015f\u0131ndan etkilenmi\u015f olabilir.\u201d de\u011ferlendirmesinde bulundu.\n\u201cAllah\u201d yaz\u0131s\u0131n\u0131n ayna g\u00f6r\u00fcnt\u00fcs\u00fc ile tasviri\nS\u00f6zc\u00fcklerin, Arap harflerinin d\u00fcz, k\u00f6\u015feli ve geometrik olarak kullan\u0131ld\u0131\u011f\u0131 Kufi yaz\u0131 t\u00fcr\u00fcyle yaz\u0131ld\u0131klar\u0131na i\u015faret eden Larsson, \u201dVikingler, \u00f6l\u00fclerini elbise ve m\u00fccevherleriyle g\u00f6m\u00fcyordu. Mezarlarda \u00fcstlerine g\u00fcm\u00fc\u015f \u015feritlerle Allah ve Ali ifadeleri i\u015flenmi\u015f baz\u0131 ipek giysiler ve kuma\u015flar bulduk. Ke\u015fif, heyecana neden oldu. Bu ifadelerin i\u015flendi\u011fi giysiler, genellikle \u00f6l\u00fcn\u00fcn ba\u015fucuna konulmu\u015f. Bu ifadelere baz\u0131 yast\u0131klarda da kar\u015f\u0131la\u015ft\u0131k\u201d dedi.\n Annika Larsson, \u201dRusya\u2019n\u0131n Volga Nehri boyunca \u0130skandinavya ile Orta Asya aras\u0131nda bir k\u00fclt\u00fcr al\u0131\u015fveri\u015fi vard\u0131. Mezarlardan \u00e7\u0131kan bu kuma\u015flar, ya ticaret yolu ile sat\u0131n al\u0131nm\u0131\u015f ya da ya\u011fma yoluyla ele ge\u00e7irilmi\u015ftir. Burada ilgin\u00e7 olan, k\u00fclt\u00fcr de\u011fi\u015fiminin g\u00f6ze \u00e7arpmas\u0131. Baz\u0131 kaynaklara g\u00f6re, M\u00fcsl\u00fcman Araplar, ticaret veya ba\u015fka ama\u00e7lar i\u00e7in Bat\u0131\u2019ya yolculuk ediyordu\u201d \u015feklinde konu\u015ftu.\nLarsson, mezarlarda bulunan kuma\u015flar\u0131n ge\u00e7en hafta Enk\u00f6ping M\u00fczesi\u2019nde sergilendi\u011fini ve fuar\u0131n 3 \u015eubat 2018 tarihine kadar a\u00e7\u0131k kalaca\u011f\u0131n\u0131 da s\u00f6zlerine ekledi.\nVikingler ile \u0130slam d\u00fcnyas\u0131 aras\u0131ndaki etkile\u015fimi vurgulayan bir di\u011fer e\u015fya ise, 1000 y\u0131l \u00f6nce haz\u0131rlanm\u0131\u015f bir y\u00fcz\u00fck.\n\u0130sve\u00e7\u2019te dokuzuncu y\u00fczy\u0131lda ya\u015fam\u0131\u015f olan bir kad\u0131n\u0131n mezar\u0131nda bulanan ve m\u00fccevher olarak halkan\u0131n i\u00e7ine yerle\u015ftirilen ta\u015f\u0131n \u00fczerinde, \u2018Allah i\u00e7in\u2018 veya \u2018Allah\u2019a\u2018 yazan bir yaz\u0131 bulunuyor.\nVikinglerin \u00e7ok uzaktaki topraklarda cam elde etti\u011fi zaten bilinse de, eser, denizcilik uygarl\u0131\u011f\u0131n\u0131n \u0130slam t\u00fcccarlar\u0131yla i\u015f yapt\u0131\u011f\u0131 teorisini g\u00fc\u00e7lendiriyor.\nVikingler Kimlerdi?\n\u2018Viking\u2019, \u0130skandinavya\u2018dan gelen (\u015fimdi Norve\u00e7, Danimarka ve \u0130sve\u00e7 olan), sekizinci ve on birinci y\u00fczy\u0131llar aras\u0131nda ya\u015fam\u0131\u015f, Norsemen (Norve\u00e7li) olarak bilinen insanlar i\u00e7in kullan\u0131lan kapsaml\u0131 bir terimdir.\nOrta\u00e7a\u011f d\u00fcnyas\u0131n\u0131n bask\u0131nlar\u0131 ve korsanlar\u0131 olarak \u00fcne kavu\u015fan Vikingler, tarihte uzun ve korkun\u00e7 bask\u0131nlar\u0131yla tan\u0131n\u0131rlar. Bununla birlikte, Avrupa ve Asya\u2019n\u0131n do\u011fusuna, Kuzey Afrika\u2019n\u0131n g\u00fcneyine ve bat\u0131da Newfoundland\u2019a yay\u0131lmay\u0131 ba\u015faran yetenekli denizcilerdi. D\u00fcnya genelinde bilinen ticaret yollar\u0131 olu\u015fturmu\u015f; Kuzey \u0130ngiltere, \u0130rlanda\u2019da ve Frenkler aras\u0131nda ya\u015fayarak Volga Nehri \u00fczerinde Kiev D\u00fckal\u0131\u011f\u0131\u2019n\u0131 kurmu\u015flard\u0131r.\nDo\u011fruluk Y\u00fczdesi\nKAYNAKLAR\nUu    Dailymail    historytoday   Youtube\n[Toplam:1    Ortalama:5/5] Viking Mezarlar\u0131ndan \u2018Allah\u2019 ve \u2018Ali\u2019 Yaz\u0131lar\u0131 \u00c7\u0131kt\u0131 \u0130ddias\u0131", "T\u0131bbi bir terim olan \u201camp\u00fctasyon\u201dun kelime anlam\u0131, ki\u015finin kol, bacak, ayak veya elinin t\u00fcm\u00fcn\u00fcn veya bir k\u0131sm\u0131n\u0131n olmamas\u0131 durumudur. Ampute futbol ise, her tak\u0131mda yedi oyuncu ile alt\u0131 saha d\u0131\u015f\u0131 oyuncusu ve bir kaleciyle oynanan bir engelli futboludur.\nAmpute futbolun genel y\u00f6netim organ\u0131 World Amputee Football Federation (D\u00fcnya Ampute Futbol Federasyonu), 2005 y\u0131l\u0131nda Brezilya\u2019da d\u00fczenlenen bir kongrede kurulmu\u015ftur. Rekreasyonel ve rekabete dayal\u0131 ampute futbol etkinlikleriyle, yeni veya gen\u00e7 amputeler aras\u0131nda sosyal etkile\u015fimi, benlik sayg\u0131s\u0131n\u0131 ve kendine g\u00fcveni te\u015fvik etmek hedefine dayal\u0131 olan WAFF i\u00e7in, \u00fcye \u00fclkeleri bu konuda bilin\u00e7lendirmek, d\u00fcnya yar\u0131\u015fmalar\u0131nda ve paralimpik m\u00fcsabakalarda sporcular\u0131 e\u011fitmek \u00f6ncelikli ama\u00e7t\u0131r.\nT\u00fcrkiye\u2019de Ampute Futbol\nAmpute futbol kapsam\u0131nda d\u00fcnya \u00e7ap\u0131ndaki ilk ma\u00e7, Amputee Football World Championships (Ampute Futbol D\u00fcnya \u015eampiyonas\u0131) ile 1984\u2018te ABD\u2019nin Seattle \u015fehrinde d\u00fczenlenmi\u015ftir. G\u00fcn\u00fcm\u00fcze kadar \u00e7e\u015fitli aral\u0131kla d\u00fczenlenen Ampute Futbol D\u00fcnya \u015eampiyonas\u0131, T\u00fcrkiye\u2019de ilk kez 2007 y\u0131l\u0131nda Antalya\u2018da d\u00fczenlenmi\u015f ve Ampute Milli Tak\u0131m\u0131m\u0131z d\u00fcnya \u00fc\u00e7\u00fcnc\u00fcs\u00fc olmu\u015ftur. 2007\u2019den sonra s\u0131rayla 2010, 2012, 2014 y\u0131llar\u0131nda d\u00fczenlenen \u015fampiyonada, T\u00fcrkiye Ampute Milli Tak\u0131m\u0131 d\u00fcnya \u00fc\u00e7\u00fcnc\u00fcl\u00fc\u011f\u00fcn\u00fc s\u00fcrd\u00fcrm\u00fc\u015ft\u00fcr.\nTablo, Ampute Milli Tak\u0131m\u0131n hangi kategoride ka\u00e7\u0131nc\u0131 oldu\u011funu g\u00f6stermektedir.\n4-9 Ekim 2017 tarihlerinde T\u00fcrkiye\u2018nin ev sahipli\u011finde d\u00fczenlenen Avrupa Ampute Futbol \u015eampiyonas\u0131 final ma\u00e7\u0131nda Ampute Milli Tak\u0131m\u0131m\u0131z, \u0130ngiltere\u2018yi 2-1 ma\u011flup ederek Avrupa \u015eampiyonu oldu.\nAmpute Futbol Nas\u0131l Oynan\u0131r?\nKar\u015f\u0131la\u015fma esnas\u0131nda metal koltuk de\u011fne\u011fi ve protez olmadan oynanan ve oyuncu de\u011fi\u015fikli\u011fi say\u0131s\u0131nda s\u0131n\u0131r olmayan ampute futbolun ba\u015fl\u0131ca kurallar\u0131 \u015f\u00f6yledir:\nAmpute Milli Tak\u0131m Oyuncular\u0131n\u0131n Hikayeleri \nTak\u0131m Kaptan\u0131 Gazi Osman \u00c7akmak \nBelki de bu zamana kadar isimlerini duymad\u0131\u011f\u0131m\u0131z kahramanlar\u0131n her birinin ayr\u0131 bir hikayesi var. Tokat\u2019\u0131n Nark\u0131\u015fla k\u00f6y\u00fcnde do\u011fan Ampute Milli Tak\u0131m Kaptan\u0131 Osman \u00c7akmak, \u00e7ocuklu\u011funu futbolcu olma hayaliyle ge\u00e7iriyor. Bir yandan marangozda \u00e7\u0131rak olarak \u00e7al\u0131\u015fan ve \u00e7e\u015fitli tak\u0131mlarda futbol oynayan \u00c7akmak, askerlik \u00e7a\u011f\u0131 geldi\u011finde komando olmak ister ve askerli\u011fini piyade komando olarak yapar. Ancak \u015e\u0131rnak-\u015eenova aras\u0131nda yol emniyeti sa\u011flama g\u00f6revini yapt\u0131\u011f\u0131 s\u0131rada hain ter\u00f6ristlerin yerle\u015ftirdi\u011fi bir may\u0131na basar ve sol baca\u011f\u0131, diz alt\u0131ndan itibaren kopar. 3 ay sonra protezle tekrar y\u00fcr\u00fcmeye ba\u015flayan Osman, \u00e7ok \u015fehit verilmesi nedeniyle tekrar askere gitmeyi ister. Ancak d\u00f6nemin Genelkurmay Ba\u015fkan\u0131 Ya\u015far B\u00fcy\u00fckan\u0131t, Osman \u00c7akmak\u2019a futbola devam etmesini ve \u00fclkesini futbolla da temsil edebilece\u011fini s\u00f6yler. \u015eu anda Ampute Milli Tak\u0131m oyuncusu olan Osman \u00c7akmak evli ve \u00fc\u00e7 \u00e7ocuk babas\u0131d\u0131r.\nBar\u0131\u015f Telli \n1993 y\u0131l\u0131nda, d\u00f6rt ya\u015f\u0131ndayken ge\u00e7irdi\u011fi bir trafik kazas\u0131 sonucu sa\u011f baca\u011f\u0131n\u0131n alt taraf\u0131n\u0131 kaybeden Bar\u0131\u015f Telli, sokakta topun pe\u015finde ko\u015farken araban\u0131n alt\u0131nda kald\u0131 ama futbol tutkusundan vazge\u00e7medi. Ampute Milli Tak\u0131m yan\u0131nda Atletizm Milli Tak\u0131m sporcusu da olan Bar\u0131\u015f, Gazi \u00dcniversitesi Beden E\u011fitimi ve Spor Y\u00fcksek Okulu \u201cAntren\u00f6rl\u00fck\u201d b\u00f6l\u00fcm\u00fcnden mezun oldu. \u0130ki y\u0131l sonunda formasyon ald\u0131 ve bedensel engelli ilk beden \u00f6\u011fretmeni olarak Gaziantep Zeliha Zilyan K\u0131z Anadolu Lisesi\u2019ne atand\u0131.\n2015 y\u0131l\u0131nda Sabah Gazetesine verdi\u011fi r\u00f6portaj\u0131nda, engellerin a\u015f\u0131lmaz olmad\u0131\u011f\u0131n\u0131 s\u00f6yleyen Bar\u0131\u015f, bak\u0131\u015f a\u00e7\u0131s\u0131n\u0131 de\u011fi\u015ftirmek gerekti\u011fini belirtti:\n\u201cYapmak istedi\u011fim \u015fey, insanlar\u0131n bak\u0131\u015f a\u00e7\u0131s\u0131n\u0131 de\u011fi\u015ftirmek. Bunun yolu, \u00f6\u011fretmenlikten ge\u00e7iyor. Hayat insan\u0131n \u00f6n\u00fcne bir\u00e7ok zorlu engel \u00e7\u0131kart\u0131yor. Ben \u00f6n\u00fcme gelen engelleri a\u015fmak i\u00e7in elimden gelen her \u015feyi yapt\u0131m ve yapmaya da devam ediyorum. \u00d6\u011frencilerime de hi\u00e7bir engelin a\u015f\u0131lamaz olmad\u0131\u011f\u0131n\u0131 g\u00f6stermeye \u00e7al\u0131\u015f\u0131yorum. Ben m\u00fccadele ediyorsam herkes m\u00fccadele edebilir.\nBenim gibi engellerle kar\u015f\u0131la\u015fan ve bu engelleri a\u015fmak isteyen karde\u015flerim olacakt\u0131r. Onlara yard\u0131m etmek, tecr\u00fcbelerimi aktarmak i\u00e7in \u00f6\u011fretmen oldum. \u00d6\u011fretmen olman\u0131n gururunu ya\u015f\u0131yorum. \u00d6\u011frencilerimi \u00e7ok seviyorum. Ma\u00e7lar\u0131m\u0131 yak\u0131ndan takip ediyorlar. Stadyuma geliyorlar, tezah\u00fcrat ediyorlar. Ne ya\u015fad\u0131\u011f\u0131m\u0131, neleri ba\u015fard\u0131\u011f\u0131m\u0131 g\u00f6r\u00fcyorlar.\nHayata bak\u0131\u015f a\u00e7\u0131lar\u0131 de\u011fi\u015fiyor.\u201d \nAmpute Milli Tak\u0131m Oyuncusu Bar\u0131\u015f Telli\u2019nin payla\u015f\u0131m\u0131\nFeyyaz G\u00f6z\u00fca\u00e7\u0131k \nDo\u011fu\u015ftan tek baca\u011f\u0131 olmamas\u0131na ra\u011fmen hayata sporla tutundu. Y\u00fczme, kayak, basketbol ve futbol dallar\u0131nda spor yapan Feyyaz, beden e\u011fitimi \u00f6\u011fretmenli\u011fi yap\u0131yor. Engelli kadrosundan ve hizmet al\u0131m\u0131ndan Kayseri Gen\u00e7lik Hizmetleri ve Spor \u0130l M\u00fcd\u00fcrl\u00fc\u011f\u00fc\u2018nde ge\u00e7ici olarak y\u00fczme antren\u00f6rl\u00fc\u011f\u00fc yapan, 4 y\u0131ldan bu yana da ayn\u0131 kurumda kadrolu antren\u00f6rl\u00fck yapan Feyyaz, Kayseri Melikgazi Bedensel Engelliler Kul\u00fcb\u00fc\u2019nden bu sezon Gaziantep\u2019e transfer oldu.\nAmpute Milli Tak\u0131m oyuncusu Feyyaz G\u00f6z\u00fca\u00e7\u0131k hakk\u0131nda, Kayseri Gen\u00e7lik Hizmetleri ve Spor \u0130l M\u00fcd\u00fcr\u00fc Murat Eskici,\n\u201dFeyyaz\u2019la gurur duyuyoruz. Kendisi m\u00fcd\u00fcrl\u00fc\u011f\u00fcm\u00fcz\u00fcn kadrolu antren\u00f6r\u00fc. Kayak, tekerlekli basketbol, y\u00fczme ve futbol bran\u015flar\u0131nda \u00e7ok yetenekli. Bedensel noksanl\u0131\u011f\u0131n\u0131 hi\u00e7 bir zaman sorun etmeden s\u00fcrekli sporun i\u00e7inde oldu. A Milli Tak\u0131m kadrosundan d\u00f6n\u00fcnce, tayinini Ankara\u2019ya istedi. Ankara\u2019da Milli E\u011fitim M\u00fcd\u00fcrl\u00fc\u011f\u00fc b\u00fcnyesinde beden e\u011fitimi \u00f6\u011fretmenli\u011fi yapmak istiyor. Kendisi ve tak\u0131m arkada\u015flar\u0131n\u0131n ba\u015far\u0131s\u0131n\u0131 kutluyor, ba\u015far\u0131lar\u0131n\u0131n devam\u0131n\u0131 diliyoruz.\u201d dedi.\nAlican Kuruyama\u00e7\nTrafik kazas\u0131 sonucu sa\u011f aya\u011f\u0131n\u0131 kaybeden Alican Kuruyama\u00e7, futbol hayalinden asla vazge\u00e7medi. \u015eahinbey Belediye Gen\u00e7lik ve Spor Kul\u00fcb\u00fc\u2018nde orta saha oyuncusu olan Alican, \u00f6n\u00fcndeki engelleri a\u015farak milli tak\u0131ma y\u00fckseldi.\nAmpute Futbol Milli Tak\u0131m Oyuncusu Alican Kuruyama\u00e7\nRahmi \u00d6zcan\nAmpute Futbol Milli Tak\u0131m\u0131\u2019n\u0131n \u015eahinbey Belediyespor\u2018lu oyuncular\u0131ndan olan Rahmi \u00d6zcan, sa\u011f baca\u011f\u0131nda do\u011fu\u015ftan gelen bir engeli olmas\u0131 sebebiyle 12 kez ameliyat oldu. Daha sonra baca\u011f\u0131n\u0131n dizinden a\u015fa\u011f\u0131s\u0131 kesilen milli tak\u0131m oyuncumuz 12 Ocak 2016\u2019da, hatal\u0131 \u00fcretilen kramponlar\u0131n at\u0131lmamas\u0131n\u0131, tek ayakla futbol oynayan ampute sporculara g\u00f6nderilmesini talep etmi\u015fti:\n\u201cBeden e\u011fitimi \u00f6\u011fretmenim sayesinde Ampute futboluna y\u00f6nlendirildim. Onun sayesinde ba\u015flad\u0131m Ampute Milli tak\u0131m\u0131na. 11 y\u0131ld\u0131r Milli tak\u0131mda, yakla\u015f\u0131k 7 y\u0131ld\u0131r devam ediyorum. Ligde de son 7 y\u0131lda Osmanl\u0131spor\u2019da \u015fampiyon olduk.\n\u0130ste\u011fimiz \u015fu, biliyorsunuz Ampute Futbol tek ayakla oynuyor. \u00d6nemli spor firmalar\u0131n\u0131n ayakkab\u0131lar\u0131n\u0131n ve firmalar\u0131n\u0131n hatal\u0131 olanlar\u0131n\u0131n yetkili a\u011f\u0131zlardan at\u0131ld\u0131\u011f\u0131n\u0131 duyduk. Buna \u00e7ok \u00fcz\u00fcld\u00fck. Ampute Futbol tek ayakla oynan\u0131rken, bunlar bize ula\u015ft\u0131r\u0131lmadan \u00e7\u00f6pe at\u0131lmas\u0131 bizi \u00fczd\u00fc. B\u00fcy\u00fck spor ma\u011fazalar\u0131ndan bu \u015fekilde iste\u011fimiz olacakt\u0131r. Biz lige sponsor olarak bu kramponlar\u0131n g\u00f6nderilmesini istiyoruz. Umar\u0131m yetkili insanlar bu \u00e7a\u011fr\u0131m\u0131z\u0131 duyar.\u201d\nSelim Karada\u011f \nMilli tak\u0131m\u0131n kalecili\u011fini yapan Selim Karada\u011f\u2018\u0131n do\u011fu\u015ftan bir kolu k\u0131sa. Ampute milli tak\u0131m\u0131n y\u0131llard\u0131r kalecisi olan Selim,\n\u201cBu onuru parayla pulla sat\u0131n alamazs\u0131n. Zaten burada hi\u00e7bir zaman para pul konu\u015fulmaz. Bizi sadece bayra\u011f\u0131m\u0131z ve vatan\u0131m\u0131z motive eder\u201d \u015feklinde a\u00e7\u0131klamada bulundu.\nMuhammed Ye\u011fen \nDo\u011fu\u015ftan bir baca\u011f\u0131 k\u0131sa olan Muhammed Ye\u011fen, TSK Engelliler Spor Kul\u00fcb\u00fc oyuncusudur.\nSerkan Dereli\nPendik Belediyespor\u2019da oynayan Serkan Dereli\u2018nin do\u011fu\u015ftan sol baca\u011f\u0131 olmayan yoktur.\nFatih \u015eent\u00fcrk\nMotosiklet kazas\u0131 sonucu sol baca\u011f\u0131n\u0131 kaybeden Fatih, \u015eahinbey Belediyespor\u2019un milli tak\u0131ma kazand\u0131rd\u0131\u011f\u0131 yeteneklerden biridir.\nFatih Karaku\u015f\nAmpute milli tak\u0131m\u0131n\u0131n ba\u015far\u0131l\u0131 kalecisidir. \u00c7ocukken elektrik \u00e7arpmas\u0131 sonucunda sol kolunu yitiren Fatih, \u015eahinbey Belediye Spor\u2019da oynamaktad\u0131r.\nKemal G\u00fcle\u015f\nTSK Engelliler Spor Kul\u00fcb\u00fc\u2019n\u00fcn futbolcusu olan Kemal, 11 ya\u015f\u0131nda mahallede arkada\u015flar\u0131yla bir in\u015faat y\u0131k\u0131m\u0131n\u0131 seyrederken kep\u00e7e \u00fcst\u00fcne d\u00fc\u015ft\u00fc. Sol baca\u011f\u0131n\u0131 dizinin \u00fcst\u00fcnden kaybetti.\n\u00d6mer G\u00fclery\u00fcz\nYeditepe Spor Kul\u00fcb\u00fc\u2019n\u00fcn oyuncusu olan \u00d6mer, bebekken havale ge\u00e7irdi ve bu sebepten sol baca\u011f\u0131 geli\u015fmedi.\nMehmet Yunsur\n1987 y\u0131l\u0131nda \u00c7orum\u2019da do\u011fan Mehmet, 13 ya\u015f\u0131ndayken k\u00f6y\u00fcnde meydana gelen bir trafik kazas\u0131 sonucu sol aya\u011f\u0131n\u0131 kaybetti. Ankara\u2019da Engelliler okulunda okurken, Gazilerimiz ve \u015fu anki Ampute Milli Tak\u0131m Teknik direkt\u00f6r\u00fc U\u011fur \u00d6zcan\u2018la, okulu ziyaret etmeleri esnas\u0131nda tan\u0131\u015f\u0131r ve futbola ba\u015flar. Futbol hayat\u0131na TSK Spor Kul\u00fcb\u00fcyle ba\u015flayan Mehmet Yunsur, kariyerine daha sonra \u015eahinbey Belediyespor ile devam eder. 10 y\u0131ld\u0131r Ampute Milli Tak\u0131m oyunculu\u011funu ba\u015far\u0131yla s\u00fcrd\u00fcrmektedir.\nAmpute Milli Tak\u0131m\u0131n En B\u00fcy\u00fck Primi\nAmpute futbolu \u201colimpik, paralimpik ya da deaflimpik\u201d spor bran\u015f\u0131 say\u0131lmad\u0131\u011f\u0131 i\u00e7in, Avrupa \u015eampiyonu olan Ampute Milli Tak\u0131m\u0131 herhangi bir \u00f6d\u00fcl alam\u0131yor.\nSpor Hizmet ve Faaliyetlerinde \u00dcst\u00fcn Ba\u015far\u0131 G\u00f6sterenlerin \u00d6d\u00fcllendirilmesi Hakk\u0131nda Y\u00f6netmelik\u2018e g\u00f6re, ampute milli tak\u0131m\u0131n\u0131n \u00f6d\u00fcllendirilmesi mevzuat gere\u011fi m\u00fcmk\u00fcn de\u011fildir. Ayr\u0131ca \u00f6d\u00fcle hak kazanabilmek i\u00e7in Avrupa \u015eampiyonas\u0131 ve Avrupa Kupalar\u0131nda en az 15 \u00fclke ve ilgili bran\u015f, stil, s\u0131klet veya kategoride de\u011fi\u015fik \u00fclkelerden en az 8 sporcunun i\u015ftirak etmesi \u015fartt\u0131r. Ancak, Ampute Milli Tak\u0131m\u0131n\u0131n \u015fampiyon oldu\u011fu son turnuvaya kat\u0131lan \u00fclke say\u0131s\u0131 12 olmas\u0131 da \u00f6d\u00fcl almamalar\u0131 y\u00f6n\u00fcnde ikinci bir engeldir. Futbol Federasyonu ve Gen\u00e7lik ve Spor Bakanl\u0131\u011f\u0131 s\u00f6z konusu mevzuat engeline bir \u00e7\u00f6z\u00fcm aramaktad\u0131r.\nAmpute Milli Tak\u0131m\u0131 ve Gen\u00e7lik ve Spor Bakan\u0131 Osman A\u015fk\u0131n Bak\nAmpute Milli Tak\u0131m\u0131 Ba\u015fantren\u00f6r\u00fc U\u011fur \u00d6zcan, ampute oyuncular\u0131n\u0131n kazand\u0131klar\u0131 ba\u015far\u0131lar kar\u015f\u0131l\u0131\u011f\u0131nda herhangi bir prim al\u0131p almad\u0131klar\u0131n\u0131 soranlara en b\u00fcy\u00fck primin ay y\u0131ld\u0131zl\u0131 bayrak oldu\u011funu s\u00f6yledi:\n\u201cBizim milli tak\u0131m\u0131m\u0131zda bug\u00fcne kadar prim konu\u015fulmad\u0131, konu\u015fulmaz da.
