Kabal\u0131k, edepsizlik, h\u0131zl\u0131 ruh hali de\u011fi\u015fimi, k\u00f6t\u00fc \u015fakalar yapma\nGer\u00e7ek bir intihar giri\u015fimi deneyiminin olmamas\u0131\nKi\u015fisel olmayan, \u00f6nemsiz ve zay\u0131f bir \u015fekilde entegre edilmi\u015f bir ya\u015fam\nHerhangi bir d\u00fczene ba\u011fl\u0131 bir hayat plan\u0131 yapamama\nKAYNAKLAR\na-s-p     psychopathsandlove   psychologytoday    cassiopaea\n[Toplam:0    Ortalama:0/5] Psikopatl\u0131k Nedir?", "Almanya\u2019da Gazeteciler Tutuklanm\u0131yor \u0130ddias\u0131\nMerkel, \u201cgazeteci tutuklam\u0131yoruz\u201d dedi mi? Alman yay\u0131n organ\u0131 Deutsche Welle\u2019in T\u00fcrk\u00e7e kanal\u0131nda yap\u0131lan habere g\u00f6re, T\u00fcrkiye D\u0131\u015fi\u015fleri Bakanl\u0131\u011f\u0131\u2019n\u0131n Almanya\u2019ya y\u00f6nelik yay\u0131nlad\u0131\u011f\u0131 seyahat uyar\u0131s\u0131n\u0131n ard\u0131ndan, Almanya Ba\u015fbakan\u0131 Angela Merkel, Kuzey Ren-Vestfalya eyaletinde yer alan Delbr\u00fcck \u015fehrinde ger\u00e7ekle\u015ftirilen se\u00e7im organizasyonunda yapt\u0131\u011f\u0131 a\u00e7\u0131klamada; \u201c\u015eunu a\u00e7\u0131k bir bi\u00e7imde ifade etmek istiyorum. Her T\u00fcrk vatanda\u015f\u0131 \u00fclkemize seyahat edebilir. Bizim \u00fclkemizde hi\u00e7bir gazeteci tutuklanm\u0131yor, hi\u00e7bir gazeteci g\u00f6zalt\u0131na al\u0131nm\u0131yor, \u00fclkemizde fikir \u00f6zg\u00fcrl\u00fc\u011f\u00fc ve hukuk devleti ilkeleri ge\u00e7erli. Biz de bundan gurur duyuyoruz.\u201d demi\u015ftir.  \nEuronews T\u00fcrk\u00e7e kanal\u0131n\u0131n konuya dair yapt\u0131\u011f\u0131 haberde s\u00f6z konusu konu\u015fman\u0131n videosu yer almaktad\u0131r.\nVatana \u0130hanet Soru\u015fturmas\u0131\nAlmanya \u015eans\u00f6lyesi Merkel, Almanya\u2019da gazetecilerin g\u00f6z alt\u0131na al\u0131nmad\u0131\u011f\u0131n\u0131 ve tutuklanmad\u0131\u011f\u0131n\u0131 s\u00f6ylemi\u015f olsa da, ger\u00e7ek durum b\u00f6yle olmad\u0131\u011f\u0131n\u0131 g\u00f6stermektedir. Merkel\u2019in ifadeleri do\u011fru de\u011fildir. Deutsche Welle\u2018in T\u00fcrk\u00e7e kanal\u0131ndan yapt\u0131\u011f\u0131 bir habere g\u00f6re, Almanya\u2019da vatana ihanet su\u00e7lamas\u0131yla 2 gazeteci hakk\u0131nda soru\u015fturma ba\u015flat\u0131lm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r. S\u00f6z konusu gazeteciler, internette kurduklar\u0131 Netzpolitik.org isimli dijital haklarla ilgili yay\u0131n yapan bir web sitesi ile ilgi g\u00f6rm\u00fc\u015f ve Grimme Online \u00d6d\u00fcl\u00fc alm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r. Ancak yapt\u0131klar\u0131 yay\u0131nlarda kulland\u0131klar\u0131 materyaller gerek\u00e7e g\u00f6sterilerek, gazeteciler hakk\u0131nda vatana ihanet su\u00e7lamas\u0131 yap\u0131lm\u0131\u015f ve soru\u015fturma a\u00e7\u0131lm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r. Gelen yo\u011fun tepkiler \u00fczerine gazeteciler hakk\u0131nda ba\u015flat\u0131lan soru\u015fturma \u00f6ncelikle ge\u00e7ici olarak durdurulmu\u015f ve konuyla ilgili haz\u0131rlanacak rapor beklenmi\u015ftir. Daha sonra ise gazeteciler hakk\u0131ndaki soru\u015fturma tamamen durdurulmu\u015ftur. Ancak gazetecilerin yay\u0131nlad\u0131klar\u0131 haberle ilgili kaynak olarak kimden yararland\u0131klar\u0131n\u0131 \u00f6\u011frenmeye ili\u015fkin soru\u015fturma devam ettirilmi\u015ftir.\nSoru\u015fturma De\u011ferlendirmesi\nSoru\u015fturma s\u00fcrecinin i\u015fleyi\u015fi ve yetersiz kan\u0131tlarla yap\u0131lan su\u00e7lama sebebiyle hakk\u0131nda soru\u015fturma ba\u015flat\u0131lan gazeteci Markus Beckedahl, \u2018vatana ihanet\u2019 soru\u015fturmas\u0131n\u0131n gazetecileri sindirmek i\u00e7in a\u00e7\u0131ld\u0131\u011f\u0131n\u0131 s\u00f6ylemi\u015ftir. Beckedahl, \u201cGazetecilerin ve haber kaynaklar\u0131n\u0131n, tarihin en b\u00fcy\u00fck izleme skandal\u0131yla ilgili haber yapmas\u0131n\u0131 durdurmaya \u00e7al\u0131\u015f\u0131yorlar.\u201d a\u00e7\u0131klamalar\u0131nda bulunmu\u015ftur. Gazetecilere soru\u015fturma a\u00e7\u0131lmas\u0131 Avrupa G\u00fcvenlik ve \u0130\u015fbirli\u011fi Te\u015fkilat\u0131\u2019n\u0131 (AG\u0130T) da harekete ge\u00e7irmi\u015f ve AG\u0130T s\u00f6zc\u00fcs\u00fc Dunja Mijatovi\u00e7, yapt\u0131\u011f\u0131 a\u00e7\u0131klamada; \u201cAra\u015ft\u0131rmac\u0131 gazetecilere vatan hainli\u011fi su\u00e7lamas\u0131nda bulunmak gazetecilik \u00fczerinde dondurucu bir etki yaratmaktad\u0131r.\u201d a\u00e7\u0131klamas\u0131n\u0131 yapm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r. Mijatvi\u00e7 Alman yetkilileri soru\u015fturmay\u0131 bir kez daha g\u00f6zden ge\u00e7irmeye \u00e7a\u011f\u0131r\u0131p, \u201cbilgi alma ve bas\u0131n \u00f6zg\u00fcrl\u00fc\u011f\u00fcne sayg\u0131 duyulmal\u0131\u201d demi\u015ftir.\nYay\u0131nlad\u0131klar\u0131 haber i\u00e7eri\u011fi Federal Ba\u015fsavc\u0131l\u0131k taraf\u0131ndan \u201cgizli devlet belgeleri\u201d olarak de\u011ferlendirilmemesine ra\u011fmen, kaynak olarak kiminle ileti\u015fimde olundu\u011funa dair soru\u015fturman\u0131n devam etmesi ise hem gazeteciler hem de fikir \u00f6zg\u00fcrl\u00fc\u011f\u00fc destek\u00e7ileri taraf\u0131ndan olumsuz kar\u015f\u0131lanm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r. Federal Ba\u015fsavc\u0131l\u0131k\u2019\u0131n haberdeki belgeler i\u00e7in \u201cgizli devlet belgeleri\u201d olmad\u0131\u011f\u0131 y\u00f6n\u00fcndeki karar\u0131na ra\u011fmen, Almanya\u2019n\u0131n anayasa koruma te\u015fkilat\u0131 ba\u015fkan\u0131 Hans-Georg Maa\u00dfen, \u201cBild am Sonntag\u201d gazetesine verdi\u011fi deme\u00e7te \u201cTe\u015fkilat\u0131m\u0131n radikal giri\u015fimler ve ter\u00f6rizmle m\u00fccadeledeki ba\u015far\u0131s\u0131n\u0131 garanti alt\u0131na almak i\u00e7in, Anayasay\u0131 Koruma Te\u015fkilat\u0131\u2019na ait gizli veya \u00f6zel olarak s\u0131n\u0131fland\u0131r\u0131lm\u0131\u015f belgelerin yay\u0131nlanmas\u0131 konusunda hukuki yollara ba\u015fvurulmas\u0131 zaruriydi\u201d \u015feklinde a\u00e7\u0131klama yapm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r.\nDer Spiegel Skandal\u0131\u2019n\u0131 An\u0131msat\u0131yor\nBu soru\u015fturma yap\u0131s\u0131 itibariyle Almanya\u2019n\u0131n ge\u00e7mi\u015finde medyaya yap\u0131lan bask\u0131 ve hukuksuzluklardan birisi olan Der Spiegel skandal\u0131n\u0131 hat\u0131rlatmaktad\u0131r. Haftal\u0131k haber dergisi olan Der Spiegel, 26 Ekim 1962 tarihinde bir gece yar\u0131s\u0131 operasyonuyla polis bask\u0131n\u0131na u\u011fram\u0131\u015f ve dergide h\u00fck\u00fcmetin savunma politikas\u0131n\u0131 sorgulayan haberde devlete ait gizli bilgilerin if\u015fa edildi\u011fi gerek\u00e7e g\u00f6sterilmi\u015ftir. Polis bask\u0131n\u0131nda \u201cvatana ihanet\u201d su\u00e7lamas\u0131 y\u00f6neltilen derginin Genel Yay\u0131n Y\u00f6netmeni Rudolf Augstein, yaz\u0131 i\u015fleri m\u00fcd\u00fcrleri ve haberi yapan gazeteci Conrad Ahlers tutuklanm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r. Ancak bu skandal ile ilgili iddialar mahkemede kan\u0131tlanamam\u0131\u015f, mahkeme su\u00e7lamalar\u0131 geri \u00e7evirmi\u015f ve d\u00f6nemin Savunma Bakan\u0131 Franz Josef Strau\u00df\u2019un g\u00f6revini k\u00f6t\u00fcye kulland\u0131\u011f\u0131n\u0131 karara i\u015flemi\u015ftir.\nAl Jazeera Muhabirinin Tutuklanmas\u0131\nBBC ve Al Jazeera\u2019nin haberlerine g\u00f6re Almanya, Al Jazeera\u2019nin deneyimli muhabirlerinden biri olan Ahmed Mansour\u2019u M\u0131s\u0131r talep etti\u011fi i\u00e7in havaliman\u0131nda tutuklam\u0131\u015ft\u0131r. Mansour, M\u0131s\u0131r talep etti\u011fi i\u00e7in iki g\u00fcn tutuklu kald\u0131\u011f\u0131 s\u00fcrecin ard\u0131ndan serbest b\u0131rak\u0131lm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r. Serbest b\u0131rak\u0131ld\u0131ktan sonra Almanya h\u00fck\u00fcmetinin mahkemelere bask\u0131 yapt\u0131\u011f\u0131n\u0131 s\u00f6yleyen Ahmed Mansour\u2019un havaliman\u0131nda al\u0131konuldu\u011funda payla\u015ft\u0131\u011f\u0131 tweet \u015f\u00f6yle:\n\u0644\u0627\u0632\u0644\u062a \u0631\u0647\u0646 \u0627\u0644\u0623\u0639\u062a\u0642\u0627\u0644 \u0641\u0649 \u0645\u0637\u0627\u0631 \u0628\u0631\u0644\u064a\u0646 \u0641\u0649 \u0627\u0646\u062a\u0638\u0627\u0631 \u062a\u062d\u0648\u064a\u0644\u0649 \u0627\u0644\u0649 \u0642\u0627\u0636\u0649 \u0627\u0644\u062a\u062d\u0642\u064a\u0642 \u0648\u0627\u0644\u0633\u0624\u0627\u0644 \u0647\u0648 \u0643\u064a\u0641 \u062a\u062d\u0648\u0644\u062a \u0627\u0644\u062d\u0643\u0648\u0645\u0629 \u0627\u0644\u0623\u0644\u0645\u0627\u0646\u064a\u0629\u2026 http://t.co/ui538Wbk5h\n\u2014 A Mansour \u0623\u062d\u0645\u062f \u0645\u0646\u0635\u0648\u0631 (@amansouraja) June 20, 2015\n\u00c7eviri: H\u00e2l\u00e2 Berlin Havaalan\u0131\u2019nda g\u00f6zalt\u0131nday\u0131m, sorgu h\u00e2kiminin kar\u015f\u0131s\u0131na \u00e7\u0131kar\u0131lmay\u0131 bekliyorum. As\u0131l soru, Alman h\u00fck\u00fcmeti ve uluslararas\u0131 polisin nas\u0131l olup da bir gecede kanl\u0131 darbe rejimine alet oldu\u011fu\u2026\n5 Gazeteci Hakk\u0131nda Soru\u015fturma\n\u201cTageszeitung\u201d isimli Alman yay\u0131n organ\u0131n\u0131n yapt\u0131\u011f\u0131 habere g\u00f6re, Alman silah \u015firketinin Meksika\u2019ya y\u00f6nelik yasa d\u0131\u015f\u0131 silah sat\u0131\u015f\u0131yla ilgili gizli devlet bilgilerini if\u015fa etmek gerek\u00e7esiyle 5 gazeteci hakk\u0131nda da soru\u015fturma ba\u015flat\u0131lm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r. Alman meclisine ta\u015f\u0131nan soru\u015fturmaya tabi tutulan gazetecilerin daha \u00f6nceden haz\u0131rlad\u0131\u011f\u0131 \u201c\u00d6l\u00fcmc\u00fcl ihracatlar \u2013 G36 Meksika\u2019ya nas\u0131l ula\u015ft\u0131?\u201d adl\u0131 belgesel film, ARD televizyonunda yay\u0131nlanm\u0131\u015f ve Grimme \u00f6d\u00fcl\u00fc alm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r. Stuttgart savc\u0131l\u0131\u011f\u0131nda ba\u015flat\u0131lm\u0131\u015f soru\u015fturma, daha sonra M\u00fcnih savc\u0131l\u0131\u011f\u0131na devredilmi\u015f ve soru\u015fturma sonucuna dair bilgilere ula\u015f\u0131lamamaktad\u0131r.\nT\u00fcrkiyeli Gazeteci Mehmet Fatih S.\nSon olarak, 11.10.2017 tarihinde DW T\u00fcrk\u00e7e sitesinin yapt\u0131\u011f\u0131 habere g\u00f6re, Hamburg Eyalet Y\u00fcksek Mahkemesi gazeteci Mehmet Fatih S.\u2019ye Almanya\u2019daki K\u00fcrtleri g\u00f6zlemledi\u011fi ve ke\u015fif yapt\u0131\u011f\u0131 gerek\u00e7esiyle 2 y\u0131l tecilli hapis cezas\u0131 vermi\u015ftir.\nYarg\u0131\u00e7, kararda \u201cT\u00fcrkiye i\u00e7indeki \u00e7at\u0131\u015fmalar\u0131 Almanya\u2019ya ta\u015f\u0131man\u0131n\u201d s\u00f6z konusu oldu\u011funu, ve Mehmet Fatih S.\u2018nin, M\u0130T i\u00e7in \u00e7al\u0131\u015ft\u0131\u011f\u0131n\u0131 ifade etmi\u015ftir. Kararda, hem \u201cdaha \u00f6nce ceza almam\u0131\u015f\u201d hem de \u201cprofesyonel davranmam\u0131\u015f oldu\u011fu\u201d ifadelerine yer verilmi\u015f ve ceza karar\u0131 bu durumlar g\u00f6zetilerek verilmi\u015ftir. Toplanan bilgilerin i\u00e7erik a\u00e7\u0131s\u0131ndan yeterince g\u00fc\u00e7l\u00fc olmad\u0131\u011f\u0131n\u0131 belirten mahkeme, san\u0131kla ilgili M\u0130T i\u00e7in \u00e7al\u0131\u015ft\u0131\u011f\u0131n\u0131 itiraf etti\u011fine dair iddialar\u0131 yalanlam\u0131\u015f ve san\u0131\u011f\u0131n cep telefonunda yer alan mesajlar\u0131 delil kabul etti\u011fini belirtmi\u015ftir. Ancak san\u0131kla ilgili olarak hem M\u0130T ajan\u0131 oldu\u011funu hem de profesyonel davranmad\u0131\u011f\u0131n\u0131 ifade eden mahkemenin, toplanan bilgilerin g\u00fc\u00e7l\u00fc olmad\u0131\u011f\u0131n\u0131 kabul etmesine ra\u011fmen 2 y\u0131l hapis cezas\u0131 vermesi, pek de hukuka uygun bir karar olarak g\u00f6r\u00fcnmemektedir.\nSonu\u00e7 olarak Merkel\u2019in \u201cgazetecileri tutuklam\u0131yoruz\u201d iddias\u0131 do\u011fru de\u011fildir.\nD\u00fczenleme: 13.01.2018\nDo\u011fruluk Y\u00fczdesi\nKaynaklar:\n1. Deutsche Welle T\u00fcrk\u00e7e 6, 7. Euronews T\u00fcrk\u00e7e, 8. Tageszeitung, 9. BBC, 10. Al Jazeera, 11. Al Jazeera 2, 12. The Telegraph, 13. T.C. D\u0131\u015fi\u015fleri Bakanl\u0131\u011f\u0131, 14. Twitter, 15. The Guardian, 16.  Deutsche Welle T\u00fcrk\u00e7e 7\n[Toplam:3    Ortalama:4.7/5] Merkel\u2019in Gazeteci Tutuklam\u0131yoruz \u0130ddias\u0131", "D\u00fcnyan\u0131n en h\u0131zl\u0131 trenleri nelerdir, T\u00fcrkiye h\u0131zl\u0131 trende ka\u00e7\u0131nc\u0131 s\u0131radad\u0131r gibi sorular\u0131n yan\u0131t\u0131 i\u00e7in buyurun yaz\u0131y\u0131 okuyal\u0131m. \u0130nternet \u00fczerinde \u00f6nde gelen bir istatistik \u015firketi olan Statista, ge\u00e7ti\u011fimiz g\u00fcnlerde, T\u00fcrkiye\u2019nin de aralar\u0131nda bulundu\u011fu d\u00fcnyadaki en h\u0131zl\u0131 trenleri g\u00f6steren bir grafik yay\u0131nlad\u0131.\n2017 y\u0131l\u0131 verileriyle, Avrupa Birli\u011fi direktiflerine ve ilgili demiryolu \u015firketlerinin g\u00fcncel verilerine bak\u0131larak haz\u0131rlanan istatistikte T\u00fcrkiye, h\u0131zl\u0131 trenlerin azami \u00e7al\u0131\u015fma h\u0131z\u0131 ve h\u0131z rekoru bak\u0131m\u0131ndan d\u00fcnyadaki ilk 10 \u00fclke aras\u0131nda 9. s\u0131rada yer al\u0131yor.\nEn H\u0131zl\u0131 Trenler\nGoeuro\u2019nun verileriyle derlenen ve Statista taraf\u0131ndan haz\u0131rlanan grafi\u011fe g\u00f6re, D\u00fcnya\u2019n\u0131n en y\u00fcksek h\u0131za ula\u015fan tren, Fransa\u2019daki TGV ve \u00c7in\u2019deki Shangai Maglev h\u0131zl\u0131 trenlerini ge\u00e7erek Japonya\u2019daki SCMaglev oldu.\n  T\u00fcrkiye ise d\u00fcnyadaki en h\u0131zl\u0131 tren s\u0131ralamas\u0131nda YHT (Y\u00fcksek H\u0131zl\u0131 Tren) ile dokuzuncu s\u0131rada yer ald\u0131. En y\u00fcksek h\u0131z s\u0131n\u0131r\u0131 saatte 303 km/sa olan YHT, \u00e7al\u0131\u015fma h\u0131z\u0131 bak\u0131m\u0131ndan ise h\u0131z\u0131 saatte 250 km/sa\u2019dir. T\u00fcrkiye, YHT ile \u0130sve\u00e7, Hollanda, Rusya ve Polonya\u2019y\u0131 ge\u00e7erek ilk 10 \u00fclke aras\u0131na girmi\u015ftir.\nH\u0131zl\u0131 trenlerin kay\u0131t h\u0131zlar\u0131 ve \u00e7al\u0131\u015fma h\u0131zlar\u0131 birbirinden farkl\u0131d\u0131r. Kay\u0131t h\u0131zlar\u0131na ili\u015fkin veriler trenlerin kay\u0131tl\u0131 olduklar\u0131 herhangi bir h\u0131z rekoruna aittir. Ayr\u0131ca bu kay\u0131tlar\u0131n \u00e7o\u011funa yolcular olmadan yap\u0131lan \u00f6zel hat denemeleriyle ula\u015f\u0131lm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r. \u00c7al\u0131\u015fma h\u0131z\u0131n\u0131n d\u00fc\u015f\u00fck olmas\u0131n\u0131n sebebi de budur.\n\u00c7al\u0131\u015fma h\u0131z\u0131 s\u00f6z konusu oldu\u011funda Almanya, \u0130spanya ve Fransa, \u00c7in\u2019in hemen arkas\u0131nda, ancak G\u00fcney Kore\u2018nin \u00fcst\u00fcnde Japonya ile ayn\u0131 h\u0131z do\u011frultusundad\u0131r. Avusturya ve \u0130spanya\u2019n\u0131n n\u00fcfusunun %20\u2019sinden fazlas\u0131 h\u0131zl\u0131 hatlara do\u011frudan eri\u015fime sahiptir ve bunu %18 ile \u0130talya ve Almanya izlemektedir.\nD\u00fcnyadaki Trenlerin \u00d6zellikleri\nD\u00fcnyan\u0131n en h\u0131zl\u0131 treni olarak kay\u0131tlara ge\u00e7en Japonya\u2019daki SCMaglev, \u015fehir merkezine gitmedi\u011fi i\u00e7in saatte 431 km/saat h\u0131z yapmaktad\u0131r.\nAvrupa\u2019daki en h\u0131zl\u0131 trenlerin g\u00fczergahlar\u0131 ve maksimum h\u0131zlar\u0131:\n\u0130talya, Frecciarossa\n  \u0130talya\u2019da \u201ck\u0131rm\u0131z\u0131 ok\u201d olarak adland\u0131r\u0131lan Frecciarossa 1000, Expo 2015 Fuar\u0131 s\u0131ras\u0131nda a\u00e7\u0131lm\u0131\u015f olup, h\u0131z a\u00e7\u0131s\u0131ndan dikkat \u00e7ekici oldu\u011fu kadar par\u00e7alar\u0131n\u0131n %98\u2019i yenilenebilir ve s\u00fcrd\u00fcrebilir bile\u015fenlere sahip bir trendir.\nFransa, TGV\n  D\u00fcnyan\u0131n en h\u0131zl\u0131 ikinci treni olan Fransa\u2019daki TGV, 1981\u2019de Paris ve Lyon aras\u0131nda halka a\u00e7\u0131ld\u0131. TGV, 1981 y\u0131l\u0131ndan bu yana \u00f6l\u00fcmc\u00fcl bir kazaya neden olmamakla birlikte g\u00fcvenli yolculuk imkan\u0131 sunmas\u0131yla dikkat \u00e7ekmektedir.\n  \u0130sve\u00e7, SJ\n  T\u00fcrkiye\u2019nin gerisinde kalan \u0130sve\u00e7\u2019in h\u0131zl\u0131 treni Sj ise maksimum olarak 200 km/sa h\u0131za sahiptir. Da\u011fl\u0131k ve engebeli alanlar\u0131n fazla olmas\u0131 nedeniyle ula\u015f\u0131labilen maksimum h\u0131z s\u0131n\u0131r\u0131 di\u011fer trenlere g\u00f6re daha d\u00fc\u015f\u00fckt\u00fcr.\n  T\u00fcrkiye\u2019nin H\u0131zl\u0131 Treni YHT\nY\u00fcksek H\u0131zl\u0131 Tren, TCDD (T\u00fcrkiye Cumhuriyeti Devlet Demir yollar\u0131) taraf\u0131ndan verilen h\u0131zl\u0131 tren hizmetinin ad\u0131d\u0131r. TCDD, h\u0131zl\u0131 tren ad\u0131n\u0131 belirlemek i\u00e7in anket yapm\u0131\u015f ve T\u00fcrk Y\u0131ld\u0131z\u0131, Turkuaz, Kardelen, Y\u00fcksek H\u0131zl\u0131 Tren, \u00c7elik Kanat, Y\u0131ld\u0131r\u0131m gibi isimler aras\u0131ndan Y\u00fcksek H\u0131zl\u0131 Tren ismi se\u00e7ilmi\u015ftir.\nT\u00fcrkiye, YHT\nYHT ilk olarak 2009 y\u0131l\u0131nda, Ankara- Eski\u015fehir aras\u0131nda hizmet vermi\u015ftir. G\u00fcn\u00fcm\u00fczde ise Konya, \u0130stanbul, Ankara, Eski\u015fehir, Bilecik, \u0130stanbul\u2019a hizmet vermektedir.\nYap\u0131m a\u015famas\u0131nda olan hatlar ise a\u015fa\u011f\u0131daki haritada g\u00f6sterildi\u011fi \u00fczere, \u0130zmir, Bursa, Sivas ve Karaman\u2018dad\u0131r.\nH\u0131zl\u0131 trenin geli\u015fmesi i\u00e7in yer \u015fekillerinin engebesiz olmas\u0131 ve \u015fehir i\u00e7i g\u00fczergahlar\u0131n\u0131n az olmas\u0131 \u00f6nemli bir etkendir. YHT\u2019nin ula\u015f\u0131m h\u0131z\u0131, \u015fehirlere g\u00f6re farkl\u0131l\u0131k g\u00f6stermektedir. T\u00fcrkiye\u2019nin co\u011frafi \u015fekillerinin engebeli olmas\u0131 nedeniyle YHT\u2019nin \u00e7al\u0131\u015fma h\u0131z\u0131, kay\u0131t h\u0131z\u0131na her zaman ula\u015famamaktad\u0131r.\n\u00d6rne\u011fin Konya, di\u011fer \u015fehirlere g\u00f6re d\u00fcz bir araziye sahip olmas\u0131 sebebiyle, Ankara-Konya aras\u0131 azami h\u0131z 300 km/sa olurken, Ankara-Eski\u015fehir hatt\u0131 daha engebeli oldu\u011fu i\u00e7in azami h\u0131z 250 km/sa\u2019dir.\nKaynaklar: 1-Statista 2-Goeuro 3-Traveler 4-Smart Rail World 5-SCMaglev 6-TGV 7-Shangai Maglev 8-KTX 9-AVE 10-Frecciarossa 1000 11-ICE 12-Italo 13-YHT 14-SJ\n[Toplam:0    Ortalama:0/5] D\u00fcnyan\u0131n En H\u0131zl\u0131 Trenleri Hangileridir?", "K\u00f6pr\u00fcde \u201cge\u00e7irmek bizim i\u015fimiz\u201d yazd\u0131\u011f\u0131 iddias\u0131 do\u011fru de\u011fildir. Gazeteci \u00d6mer Turan, Osman Gazi K\u00f6pr\u00fcs\u00fc\u2019nde bulunan bir dijital tabelada \u201cge\u00e7irmek bizim i\u015fimiz\u201d yazan bir g\u00f6rseli, \u201cb\u00f6yle slogan olur mu? ay\u0131p ya\u201d \u015feklinde de\u011ferlendirerek Twitter hesab\u0131ndan payla\u015ft\u0131. G\u00f6rsel, bir\u00e7ok sosyal medya kullan\u0131c\u0131s\u0131 taraf\u0131ndan da payla\u015f\u0131lm\u0131\u015f ve tart\u0131\u015fma konusu olmu\u015ftur.\nG\u00f6rsel Ger\u00e7ek De\u011fil\nOsman Gazi K\u00f6pr\u00fcs\u00fc\u2019ne ait oldu\u011fu s\u00f6ylenen bu g\u00f6rsel \u00fczerinde de\u011fi\u015fiklik yap\u0131lm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r. \u201cGe\u00e7irmek bizim i\u015fimiz\u201d yaz\u0131s\u0131n\u0131n fontunun, dijital tabeladaki orijinal fonttan farkl\u0131 olmas\u0131 ve montajlama i\u015fleminin profesyonelce yap\u0131lmamas\u0131 dolay\u0131s\u0131yla, g\u00f6rselin montajl\u0131 oldu\u011fu kolayl\u0131kla anla\u015f\u0131labilir. Zaten basit bir ara\u015ft\u0131rmayla g\u00f6rselin orijinal haline ula\u015fmak da m\u00fcmk\u00fcn. Habert\u00fcrk, daha \u00f6nceden kendi web sitesinde Osman Gazi K\u00f6pr\u00fcs\u00fc ile ilgili yapt\u0131\u011f\u0131 bir haberde, g\u00f6rselin orijinal versiyonunu kullanm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r. G\u00f6rselin orijinal hali \u015f\u00f6yle:\nOsman Gazi K\u00f6pr\u00fcs\u00fc dijital tabela\nBu durumun, \u00d6mer Turan\u2019\u0131n ilgili payla\u015f\u0131m\u0131n\u0131n alt\u0131nda bir\u00e7ok sosyal medya kullan\u0131c\u0131s\u0131 taraf\u0131ndan yorum olarak belirtilmi\u015f olmas\u0131 ve tepki \u00e7ekmesi sonucu, \u00d6mer Turan s\u00f6z konusu payla\u015f\u0131m\u0131n\u0131 kald\u0131rm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r. Ancak, archive.org \u00fczerinden ilgili payla\u015f\u0131ma ula\u015fabilmek m\u00fcmk\u00fcn. G\u00f6r\u00fcnt\u00fclemek i\u00e7in t\u0131klay\u0131n\u0131z.\nDo\u011fruluk Y\u00fczdesi\nKaynaklar:\nArchive.org, Habert\u00fcrk\n[Toplam:1    Ortalama:2/5] K\u00f6pr\u00fcde \u201cGe\u00e7irmek Bizim \u0130\u015fimiz\u201d Yaz\u0131yor \u0130ddias\u0131", "Twitter \u00fczerinden Pars kullan\u0131c\u0131 adl\u0131 bir hesaptan yap\u0131lan payla\u015f\u0131mdaki iddiaya g\u00f6re, Bursa\u2019da Suriyeliler taraf\u0131ndan Serpil Y\u0131ld\u0131r\u0131m isimli bir kad\u0131n tecav\u00fcz edilerek \u00f6ld\u00fcr\u00fclm\u00fc\u015ft\u00fcr.\nPars adl\u0131 kullan\u0131c\u0131n\u0131n tweeti\nAncak, sosyal medyada tepkilere neden olan payla\u015f\u0131mdaki iddia do\u011fru de\u011fildir. \nFoto\u011fraf 2013 Y\u0131l\u0131na Ait\nS\u00f6z konusu foto\u011fraf Serpil Y\u0131ld\u0131r\u0131m isimli bir kad\u0131na de\u011fil, Ocak 2013 tarihinde kocas\u0131 taraf\u0131ndan \u00f6ld\u00fcr\u00fclen G\u00fcl\u015fan Sarcan\u2019a aittir. \u0130stanbul Ey\u00fcp\u2019te gece yar\u0131s\u0131 Tem Otoyolu kenar\u0131nda bulunan kad\u0131n\u0131n eski e\u015fi su\u00e7unu itiraf ederek polise teslim olmu\u015ftur.\nOlaya ait foto\u011fraflar Ocak 2013 y\u0131l\u0131nda yap\u0131lan haberlerde kar\u015f\u0131m\u0131za \u00e7\u0131kmaktad\u0131r.\nDo\u011fruluk Y\u00fczdesi\nKaynaklar: 1-Haber T\u00fcrk 2-Sondakika 3-Foto\u011fraflar 4-Twitter\n[Toplam:0    Ortalama:0/5] Suriyelilerin Bir Kad\u0131n\u0131 Tecav\u00fcz Edip \u00d6ld\u00fcrd\u00fc\u011f\u00fc \u0130ddias\u0131", "T\u00fcrkiye\u2019nin 2023 hedefleri, bilinen di\u011fer ad\u0131yla Vizyon 2023, iktidar partisinin iddial\u0131 oldu\u011fu en \u00f6nemli konulardan biridir.\nAdalet ve Kalk\u0131nma Partisi, Cumhuriyetin kurulu\u015funun 100. y\u0131l\u0131 olan 2023\u2019\u00fc, iddial\u0131 ekonomik hedeflerin ger\u00e7ekle\u015fece\u011fi y\u0131l olarak belirledi. Bu vizyona g\u00f6re, 2023 y\u0131l\u0131na kadar T\u00fcrkiye, 2 trilyon dolarl\u0131k bir ekonomiyle, ki\u015fi ba\u015f\u0131na d\u00fc\u015fen 25.000 dolarl\u0131k gelirle ve 500 milyar dolarl\u0131k ihracatla, d\u00fcnyan\u0131n en b\u00fcy\u00fck 10. ekonomisi olacak. \u015eu anda d\u00fcnya s\u0131ralamas\u0131nda 10. s\u0131rada bulunan Rusya\u2019da GSYH oran\u0131, T\u00fcrkiye\u2019deki oran\u0131n yakla\u015f\u0131k iki kat\u0131 b\u00fcy\u00fckl\u00fc\u011f\u00fcnde.\nAk Parti\u2018nin iddial\u0131 oldu\u011fu hedefler baz\u0131 ekonomistler taraf\u0131ndan ula\u015f\u0131lmaz olarak de\u011ferlendirilse de \u00e7o\u011fu ekonomist ve politika analisti, y\u00fcksek hedefe ula\u015fma do\u011frultusunda at\u0131lacak ad\u0131mlar\u0131n \u00fclkeye yarar sa\u011flayaca\u011f\u0131n\u0131 savunmaktad\u0131r.\nT\u00fcrkiye\u2018nin 2023 vizyonu ku\u015fkusuz bu y\u00fczy\u0131lda devam eden en \u00f6nemli projelerden biridir ve T\u00fcrkiye\u2019nin ekonomik y\u00fcz\u00fcne \u00f6nemli katk\u0131da bulunmas\u0131 ve \u00fclkeyi d\u00fcnya \u00e7ap\u0131nda bir karar verici yapmas\u0131 planlanmaktad\u0131r. 2023 vizyonu, T\u00fcrk ekonomisinin geli\u015fimi i\u00e7in bir projedir ve 2014 y\u0131l\u0131nda cumhurba\u015fkanl\u0131\u011f\u0131 i\u00e7in yapt\u0131\u011f\u0131 kampanya s\u0131ras\u0131nda ve ba\u015fkanl\u0131k se\u00e7iminin kazan\u0131lmas\u0131ndan sonra Recep Tayyip Erdo\u011fan taraf\u0131ndan ilan edilmi\u015ftir.\n2023 Hedeflerinin D\u00fcnyaya Sa\u011flayaca\u011f\u0131 Yararlar\nBat\u0131 d\u00fcnyas\u0131, T\u00fcrkiye\u2018nin ekonomik ba\u015far\u0131s\u0131nda stratejik bir pay sahibi. M\u00fcreffeh bir T\u00fcrkiye, istikrarl\u0131 olmas\u0131yla Bat\u0131\u2019ya kar\u015f\u0131 destekleyici ve g\u00fcvenilir bir m\u00fcttefik haline gelerek demokratik ba\u011flar\u0131n daha da g\u00fc\u00e7lenmesini sa\u011flayacakt\u0131r. Ayr\u0131ca Bat\u0131, zengin bir T\u00fcrkiye\u2019den ekonomik gelir elde edecektir.\n2015\u2032te T\u00fcrkiye, Avrupa Birli\u011fi\u2018nin d\u00f6rd\u00fcnc\u00fc en b\u00fcy\u00fck ihracat pazar\u0131 ve onuncu en b\u00fcy\u00fck ithalat kayna\u011f\u0131 olmu\u015ftur. Daha fazla zenginlik, her iki y\u00f6nde de daha fazla yat\u0131r\u0131m imkan\u0131 anlam\u0131na gelir. M\u00fcreffeh bir T\u00fcrkiye, Suriyeli m\u00fclteci n\u00fcfusuna ev sahipli\u011fini ve istihdam\u0131n\u0131 absorbe ederek, kendi ba\u015f\u0131na daha esnek bir \u00fclke ve Avrupa i\u00e7in daha g\u00fc\u00e7l\u00fc bir kom\u015fu olacakt\u0131r.\n2023 Hedefleri Yolunda Kar\u015f\u0131la\u015f\u0131labilecek Zorluklar\nT\u00fcrkiye i\u00e7in zor olan \u015fey, yeni ekonomik b\u00fcy\u00fcme kaynaklar\u0131n\u0131 bulmakt\u0131r. G\u00fcn\u00fcm\u00fcz\u00fcn k\u00fcreselle\u015fmi\u015f ekonomisinde, genellikle, ihracat i\u00e7in oldu\u011fu kadar yurti\u00e7i ekonomisi i\u00e7in de mal ve hizmetler \u00fcreten y\u00fcksek teknolojili bir sekt\u00f6r\u00fcn geli\u015ftirilmesi gerekir. Bu y\u00fcksek teknoloji \u00fcr\u00fcn\u00fc b\u00fcy\u00fcme sekt\u00f6rleri, y\u00fcksek vas\u0131fl\u0131 bir i\u015f g\u00fcc\u00fcn\u00fcn geli\u015ftirilmesini gerektirir. Bug\u00fcn, T\u00fcrkiye ekonomisi anlaml\u0131 bir y\u00fcksek teknolojiye sahip sekt\u00f6rden yoksun. Nitelikli i\u015fg\u00fcc\u00fcn\u00fcn bu b\u00fcy\u00fcmeyi ilerletmesi gerekiyor.\nT\u00fcrkiye ekonomisi, 2001 mali krizini takiben, 2002\u2019de 3.500 dolardan 2008\u2018de 10.400 dolara, neredeyse \u00fc\u00e7 kat artan bir art\u0131\u015f g\u00f6sterdi. 2008 ve 2009\u2018daki k\u00fcresel ekonomik durumu yans\u0131tan bir d\u00fc\u015f\u00fc\u015f ve toparlanma d\u0131\u015f\u0131nda T\u00fcrkiye, bug\u00fcne kadar 10.000 dolar\u0131 bulan seviyede kald\u0131. Y\u00fcksek gelir grubuna girme ba\u015far\u0131s\u0131zl\u0131\u011f\u0131na ra\u011fmen T\u00fcrkiye a\u00e7\u0131k\u00e7a orta gelir d\u00fczeyinin \u00fcst ucunda; Aral\u0131k 2014\u2018te D\u00fcnya Bankas\u0131 T\u00fcrkiye\u2019nin \u201cy\u00fcksek gelirli bir ekonominin e\u015fi\u011finde\u201d bulundu\u011funu a\u00e7\u0131klam\u0131\u015ft\u0131r.\nBununla birlikte T\u00fcrkiye, s\u00fcrekli cari hesap a\u00e7\u0131klar\u0131, yenilikten ziyade d\u00fc\u015f\u00fck ve orta teknolojili \u00fcretim ve hizmetlere dayal\u0131 bir ekonomi, bir ekonomistin s\u00f6yledi\u011fi gibi \u201c1990\u2019lara y\u00f6nelik sanayi\u201d, hukukun \u00fcst\u00fcnl\u00fc\u011f\u00fc sorunu, \u00f6zerklik sorunlar\u0131 ve yetersiz bir e\u011fitim sistemi ile orta gelirli tuza\u011f\u0131na yakalanan uluslar\u0131n kar\u015f\u0131la\u015ft\u0131\u011f\u0131 g\u00fc\u00e7l\u00fcklerle y\u00fczle\u015fiyor.\n2023 Hedefleri Do\u011frultusunda \u201cMega Projeler\u201d\nAkkuyu N\u00fckleer Enerji Santrali\nNisan 2015\u2019te Mersin\u2019de in\u015fas\u0131 ba\u015flayan tesislerin 2020\u2019de online olarak devreye girmesi bekleniyor. 22 milyar dolarl\u0131k proje, Rus devlete ait n\u00fckleer enerji \u015firketi taraf\u0131ndan in\u015fa edildi.\nAkkuyu N\u00fckleer Enerji Santrali\nEnerji kaynaklar\u0131n\u0131 \u00e7e\u015fitlendirmek ve ithalata olan ba\u011f\u0131ml\u0131l\u0131\u011f\u0131 azaltmak isteyen T\u00fcrkiye, 2023 y\u0131l\u0131na kadar \u00fc\u00e7 adet operasyonel n\u00fckleer santral kurmay\u0131 planl\u0131yor.\nKuzey Marmara Yolu \u2013 Yavuz Sultan Selim K\u00f6pr\u00fcs\u00fc\nD\u00fcnyan\u0131n en geni\u015f ve en uzun karayolu ve demiryolu k\u00f6pr\u00fcs\u00fc olan Yavuz Sultan Selim K\u00f6pr\u00fcs\u00fc, hizmete a\u00e7\u0131lan projelerdendir.\nKuzey Marmara Otoyolu\nKuzey  Marmara Karayolu, \u0130stanbul\u2019un Avrupa yakas\u0131ndaki kuzeybat\u0131 kesiminde in\u015faat\u0131 devam eden \u0130stanbul\u2019un \u00fc\u00e7\u00fcnc\u00fc havaliman\u0131n\u0131n biti\u015fi\u011findedir.\n\u0130stanbul \u00dc\u00e7\u00fcnc\u00fc Havaliman\u0131\n\u0130stanbul\u2019un Arnavutk\u00f6y semtinde, yolcu kapasitesi a\u00e7\u0131s\u0131ndan d\u00fcnyan\u0131n en b\u00fcy\u00fcklerinden biri olacak olan \u0130stanbul\u2018un \u00fc\u00e7\u00fcnc\u00fc havaliman\u0131 yap\u0131m a\u015famas\u0131ndad\u0131r.\n\u0130stanbul \u00dc\u00e7\u00fcnc\u00fc Havaliman\u0131\nTamamland\u0131\u011f\u0131nda T\u00fcrk Hava Yollar\u0131\u2019n\u0131n (THY) ana merkezi haline gelecek olan havaalan\u0131, Avrupa, Asya, Afrika ve Orta Do\u011fu aras\u0131nda birincil konuma sahip \u00e7ok say\u0131da havayolu \u015firketi i\u00e7in yeni bir konaklama yeri olacakt\u0131r.\nKanal \u0130stanbul\nKanal \u0130stanbul, Bo\u011fazi\u00e7i\u2019ne paralel olarak in\u015fa edilecek ve Karadeniz\u2019i Marmara Denizi\u2019ne ba\u011flayacak yapay deniz seviyesinde bir su yoludur. Bo\u011faz\u0131n i\u00e7inden ge\u00e7en, \u00f6zellikle de petrol tankeri trafi\u011fine, nakliye trafi\u011fine rahatl\u0131k sa\u011flayacakt\u0131r. Kanal, g\u00fcnde 160 gemi kapasitesine sahiptir ve 2023 y\u0131l\u0131na kadar 15 milyar dolar maliyetle tamamlanmas\u0131 planlanmaktad\u0131r.\nTrans Anadolu Boru Hatt\u0131 Projesi (TANAP) ve T\u00fcrk Ak\u0131m\u0131\nAzerbaycan\u2018\u0131n \u015eah Deniz sahas\u0131ndan do\u011fal gaz\u0131n T\u00fcrkiye\u2019ye ve \u00f6tesine ta\u015f\u0131nmas\u0131 i\u00e7in tasarlanan Trans Anadolu Gaz Boru Hatt\u0131 (TANAP) in\u015faat\u0131 h\u0131zla ilerliyor. 12 milyar dolarl\u0131k boru hatt\u0131 projesindeki ilk gaz ak\u0131\u015f\u0131n\u0131n 2018\u2018de ba\u015flamas\u0131 bekleniyor.\nTANAP, T\u00fcrk-Yunan s\u0131n\u0131r\u0131ndaki Trans-Adriyatik Boru Hatt\u0131\u2018na (TAP) ba\u011flanacak ve 2026\u2018ya kadar y\u0131ll\u0131k \u00fcretiminin 31 milyar metrek\u00fcpe ula\u015fmas\u0131 bekleniyor.\nTANAP\u2019\u0131n yan\u0131 s\u0131ra T\u00fcrkiye ve Rusya, Rusya\u2019dan T\u00fcrkiye\u2019ye do\u011fal gaz ta\u015f\u0131yacak ve Karadeniz \u00fczerinden Avrupa\u2018ya ge\u00e7ecek olan \u2018T\u00fcrk Ak\u0131m\u0131\u2018 adl\u0131 bir do\u011fal gaz boru hatt\u0131 projesi \u00fczerinde de anla\u015fmaya varm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r. Bu boru hatt\u0131n\u0131n y\u0131ll\u0131k \u00fcretiminin 63 milyar metrek\u00fcp olmas\u0131 beklenmektedir.\nHer iki projede de, Do\u011fu\u2019daki tedarik\u00e7iler ve Bat\u0131\u2019daki m\u00fc\u015fteriler birbirine ba\u011flan\u0131rken, Avrupa\u2019n\u0131n enerji g\u00fcvenli\u011finin art\u0131r\u0131lmas\u0131 ve T\u00fcrkiye\u2019nin uluslararas\u0131 bir enerji merkezi olarak rol\u00fcn\u00fcn g\u00fc\u00e7lendirilmesi hedeflenmektedir.\nAvrasya T\u00fcneli ve Marmaray\nAvrasya T\u00fcneli\nAvrasya T\u00fcneli, Avrupa yakas\u0131nda Kazl\u0131\u00e7e\u015fme\u2018den \u0130stanbul\u2019un Asya yakas\u0131ndaki G\u00f6ztepe\u2018ye olan yolculuk s\u00fcresini 15 dakikaya indiren bir otoyolun ana bile\u015fenidir. \u0130ki katl\u0131 t\u00fcnel, bo\u011faz\u0131n alt\u0131ndan ge\u00e7mektedir ve g\u00fcnde 120.000 ara\u00e7 kapasitesine sahiptir.\nAvrasya T\u00fcneli, \u0130stanbul\u2019un Avrupa ve Asya yakas\u0131ndaki di\u011fer bir denizalt\u0131 t\u00fcneli olan Marmaray\u2018\u0131 bir demiryolu hatt\u0131 vas\u0131tas\u0131yla tamamlamaktad\u0131r.\n\u0130stanbul Finans Merkezi\n\u0130stanbul Finans Merkezi\nT\u00fcrkiye\u2018yi uluslararas\u0131 finans merkezi haline getirmesi planlanan bir projedir. \u0130stanbul zaten ticaretin \u00f6nemli bir merkezidir ve iyi d\u00fczenlenmi\u015f pazarlar\u0131, canl\u0131 ekonomisi, kat\u0131 bankac\u0131l\u0131k sistemi, vas\u0131fl\u0131 i\u015fg\u00fcc\u00fc ve avantajl\u0131 co\u011frafi konumu ile uluslararas\u0131 finans merkezinin rol\u00fcn\u00fc \u00fcstlenmek i\u00e7in uygundur.\nFinans sekt\u00f6r\u00fcn\u00fcn her kesiminde hizmet sunmay\u0131 hedefleyen \u0130stanbul\u2019un Asya yakas\u0131ndaki kompleksin, ofis alan\u0131, konutlar, konferans salonu, al\u0131\u015fveri\u015f merkezi ve otelden olu\u015fmas\u0131 ve 2.500.000 metrekareyi a\u015fmas\u0131 hedefleniyor.\n2018 y\u0131l\u0131na kadar tamamlanmas\u0131 planlanan \u0130stanbul Finans Merkezi, \u00fclkedeki finansal piyasalar, kamu bankalar\u0131 ve ilgili i\u015fletmelerin y\u00f6netim merkezlerini de a\u011f\u0131rlayacak.\nAk Parti\u2019nin 63 Maddelik 2023 Hedefleri\nAdalet ve Kalk\u0131nma Partisi (AKP) iktidar\u0131 taraf\u0131ndan, T\u00fcrkiye Cumhuriyeti\u2019nin kurulu\u015funun 100. y\u0131ld\u00f6n\u00fcm\u00fc olan 2023 y\u0131l\u0131na kadar T\u00fcrkiye\u2019nin geli\u015fimini ama\u00e7layan projenin kapsad\u0131\u011f\u0131 alanlar \u015f\u00f6yledir:\n1- Partilerin kapat\u0131lmas\u0131n\u0131n tamamen kald\u0131r\u0131lmas\u0131\n2- Parti kurulmas\u0131nda k\u0131s\u0131tlay\u0131c\u0131 ve yasaklay\u0131c\u0131 h\u00fck\u00fcmler kald\u0131r\u0131lacakt\u0131r\n3- Partilerde tek tiple\u015ftirici h\u00fck\u00fcmlerin kald\u0131r\u0131lmas\u0131\n4- Parti kapatmalar\u0131na son verilmesi\n5- Partiye de\u011fil ger\u00e7ek ki\u015filere ceza verilmesi\n6- Siyasete kat\u0131lman\u0131n \u00f6n\u00fcndeki t\u00fcm engellerin kald\u0131r\u0131lmas\u0131\n7- Se\u00e7imlerle ilgili mevzuat\u0131n topyek\u00fcn g\u00f6zden ge\u00e7irilmesi\n8- Temsilde adaletin sa\u011flanmas\u0131 i\u00e7in tedbirler Ortalama:3.5/5] T\u00fcrkiye\u2019nin 2023 Hedefleri", "Y\u0131llard\u0131r Coca-Cola ile ilgili bir\u00e7ok farkl\u0131 iddia zaman zaman g\u00fcndeme gelmi\u015ftir. Bunlardan Coca-Cola form\u00fcl\u00fcn\u00fcn gizli tutuldu\u011fu ve hatta form\u00fcl\u00fc sadece iki ki\u015finin bildi\u011fine dair iddialar \u00e7ok fazla konu\u015fulmu\u015ftur. \u015eehir efsanesine g\u00f6re, gizli form\u00fcl\u00fc bilen iki ki\u015finin ayn\u0131 anda u\u00e7a\u011fa binmesi ve di\u011fer tehlikeli olabilecek yerlerde ayn\u0131 anda bulunmas\u0131 yasakt\u0131r.\nGizli Form\u00fcl\u00fcn Tutuldu\u011fu Kasa\nCoca-Cola\u2019n\u0131n Know How Bilgisi\nCoca-Cola\u2019n\u0131n know how (nas\u0131l yap\u0131ld\u0131\u011f\u0131na dair bilgi) i\u00e7eri\u011fini, ticari s\u0131r olarak saklad\u0131\u011f\u0131 bilgisi do\u011frudur. Ancak bu bilgiyi sadece iki ki\u015finin bildi\u011fi ve onlar\u0131n ayn\u0131 anda u\u00e7ak yolculu\u011fu gibi yolculuklara \u00e7\u0131kmas\u0131n\u0131n yasak oldu\u011fu y\u00f6n\u00fcndeki iddialar do\u011fru de\u011fildir. Coca-Cola, eczac\u0131l\u0131k diplomas\u0131n\u0131 ald\u0131ktan sonra kreatif \u00e7al\u0131\u015fmalar yapmaya ba\u015flayan, Dr. John S. Pemberton taraf\u0131ndan 1886 y\u0131l\u0131nda \u00fcretilmi\u015ftir. \u00dcretimden sonra, Coca-Cola\u2019n\u0131n form\u00fcl\u00fc s\u0131r olarak saklanm\u0131\u015f ve yaz\u0131l\u0131 halde korunmas\u0131n\u0131n form\u00fcl\u00fcn gizlili\u011fini tehlikeye atabilece\u011fi gerek\u00e7esiyle form\u00fcl, sadece k\u00fc\u00e7\u00fck bir grup insanla payla\u015f\u0131lm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r. Coca-Cola\u2019n\u0131n 131 y\u0131ld\u0131r korunan orijinal form\u00fcl\u00fc Atlanta\u2019da bulunan \u201cWorld of Coca-Cola (Coca-Cola D\u00fcnyas\u0131)\u201d m\u00fczesinde saklanmaktad\u0131r. \nCoca-Cola\u2019n\u0131n Form\u00fcl\u00fcn\u00fcn Sakland\u0131\u011f\u0131 Kasa\nCoca-Cola\u2019n\u0131n gizli form\u00fcl\u00fc payla\u015f\u0131lmasa da, Atlanta\u2019daki World of Coca-Cola m\u00fczesinde gizli form\u00fclle ilgili farkl\u0131 deneyimler elde etme imkan\u0131 sunulmaktad\u0131r. \u0130lgili i\u00e7eri\u011fe ula\u015fmak i\u00e7in t\u0131klay\u0131n\u0131z.\nCoca-Cola ile \u0130lgili Ula\u015f\u0131labilir Bilgiler\nCoca-Cola\u2019n\u0131n gizli form\u00fcl\u00fcne ula\u015f\u0131lamamas\u0131, i\u00e7ece\u011fi olu\u015ftururken kullan\u0131lan malzemeleri \u00f6\u011frenmeye engel de\u011fil. Coca-Cola\u2019n\u0131n i\u00e7erisinde su, \u015feker veya fruktoz-glikoz \u015furubu, karbondioksit, renklendirici olarak karamel, asitli\u011fi d\u00fczenleyici olarak fosforik asit, do\u011fal aroma vericiler, kafein bulunur. Ayn\u0131 zamanda Coca-Cola\u2019n\u0131n nas\u0131l \u00fcretildi\u011fine dair baz\u0131 bilgilere de ula\u015fmak m\u00fcmk\u00fcn.\nCoca-Cola ile ilgili merak edilen bir\u00e7ok di\u011fer sorunun cevab\u0131na ula\u015fmak i\u00e7in Coca-Cola T\u00fcrkiye\u2019nin olu\u015fturdu\u011fu platformu inceleyebilirsiniz.\nDo\u011fruluk Y\u00fczdesi\nKaynaklar\nCoca-Cola Company, Coca-Cola "Avusturya Ba\u015fbakan\u0131 dan\u0131\u015fman\u0131 Christian Kern\u2019in dan\u0131\u015fman\u0131n\u0131n se\u00e7imden 2 ay \u00f6nce patlak veren skandal para aklama soru\u015fturmas\u0131 kapsam\u0131nda \u0130srail\u2019de g\u00f6zalt\u0131nda oldu\u011fu iddias\u0131 do\u011frudur. \u0130srailli dan\u0131\u015fman Tal Silberstein, kara para aklama, adaletin engellenmesi, r\u00fc\u015fvet ve ilgili su\u00e7lardan tutuklu bulunuyor.\nAvusturya\u2019n\u0131n y\u00f6netiminde olan Sosyal Demokratlar (SP\u00d6), \u00f6nemli bir se\u00e7im dan\u0131\u015fman\u0131 olan Silberstein ile ili\u015fkilerini, \u0130srail\u2018de kara para aklama olay\u0131na kar\u0131\u015fmas\u0131ndan dolay\u0131 sona erdirdi.\nSP\u00d6 se\u00e7im kampanyas\u0131 \u015fefi Georg Niederm\u00fchlbichler, partinin \u0130srailli siyasi dan\u0131\u015fman Tal Silberstein ile olan i\u015fbirli\u011fini \u201cani etki\u201d ile bitirdi\u011fini duyurdu.\nTal Silberstein Hakk\u0131nda\nAvusturya Ba\u015fbakan\u0131 Christian Kern\nSilberstein, ba\u015fbakan Christian Kern\u2018e, partisinin 15 Ekim\u2019deki Avusturya parlamento se\u00e7imleri i\u00e7in yapaca\u011f\u0131 kampanyalarda dan\u0131\u015fmanl\u0131k yap\u0131yordu.\n\u0130srail medyas\u0131, milyarder Beny Steinmetz ve di\u011fer birka\u00e7 ki\u015finin, sahte s\u00f6zle\u015fmeleri kullanarak para ta\u015f\u0131mak ve kullanmak su\u00e7lar\u0131yla sorgulanmak \u00fczere g\u00f6zalt\u0131na al\u0131nd\u0131\u011f\u0131n\u0131 bildirdi. Soru\u015fturmay\u0131 yapanlar, baz\u0131 \u015f\u00fcphelilerin evlerine ve ofislerine bask\u0131n yapt\u0131.\nBaz\u0131 medya organlar\u0131 Silberstein\u2019\u0131n da tutuklananlardan biri oldu\u011funu ancak \u0130srail makamlar\u0131ndan resmi bir a\u00e7\u0131klama yap\u0131lmad\u0131\u011f\u0131n\u0131 bildirdi. SP\u00d6, Silberstein ile olan ili\u015fkiyi sona erdirmeye karar verdiklerini a\u00e7\u0131klad\u0131.\nMuhalefet partileri Kern\u2018den bir a\u00e7\u0131klama talep ettiler. Sa\u011fc\u0131 Avusturya \u00d6zg\u00fcrl\u00fck Partisi (FP\u00d6), Silberstein\u2019a kar\u015f\u0131 iddialar\u0131n do\u011fru oldu\u011fu kan\u0131tland\u0131ysa \u015fans\u00f6lyenin istifa etmesi gerekti\u011fini s\u00f6yledi.\nSilberstein, eski Ba\u015fbakan Ehud Olmert\u2018in dan\u0131\u015fmanl\u0131\u011f\u0131 g\u00f6revinde de bulunmu\u015ftur.\nDo\u011fruluk Y\u00fczdesi\nKaynaklar\ntimesofisrael     politico\n[Toplam:0    Ortalama:0/5] Avusturya Ba\u015fbakan\u0131n\u0131n Dan\u0131\u015fman\u0131n\u0131n \u0130srail\u2019de G\u00f6zalt\u0131nda Oldu\u011fu \u0130ddias\u0131", "Solak insanlar\u0131n daha zeki oldu\u011fu hakk\u0131nda \u00e7ok say\u0131da s\u00f6ylenti vard\u0131r. Solaklar\u0131n daha zeki oldu\u011fu iddias\u0131 ise, tamamen yanl\u0131\u015f olmamakla birlikte, \u00e7o\u011funlukla yanl\u0131\u015ft\u0131r.\nBaz\u0131 ara\u015ft\u0131rmalar, solak ki\u015filerin daha gen\u00e7 ya\u015fta \u00f6ld\u00fc\u011f\u00fcn\u00fc, ihmalkar oldu\u011funu, hatta daha fazla i\u00e7ki i\u00e7ti\u011fini ileri s\u00fcrm\u00fc\u015ft\u00fcr. Bu iddialar aras\u0131nda en tart\u0131\u015fmal\u0131 olan\u0131 ise, solak insanlar\u0131n daha zeki ve dahi olmaya yatk\u0131n olduklar\u0131d\u0131r.\nGen\u00e7 Mozart\nYetenek ile solakl\u0131k aras\u0131nda bir ba\u011f oldu\u011fu inanc\u0131n\u0131n uzun bir ge\u00e7mi\u015fi vard\u0131r. Leonardo da Vinci, Mark Twain, Mozart, Marie Curie, Nicola Tesla ve Aristoteles \u00fcnl\u00fc solak ki\u015filerden baz\u0131lar\u0131d\u0131r.\nBilimsel \u00e7al\u0131\u015fmalara g\u00f6re, el fonksiyonu beyin i\u015flevinin bir g\u00f6stergesidir ve kavrama ile ili\u015fkilidir. Solaklar\u0131n beyninin sa\u011f taraf\u0131 daha b\u00fcy\u00fckt\u00fcr. Bu onlara mek\u00e2nsal (uzaysal) fark\u0131ndal\u0131k ve nesnelerin zihinsel temsili s\u00f6z konusu oldu\u011funda yard\u0131mc\u0131 olur. Ayr\u0131ca, iki beyin hemisferini birbirine ba\u011flayan sinir h\u00fccreleri paketi olan korpus kallozum, solaklarda daha b\u00fcy\u00fck olma e\u011filimindedir.\nSolakl\u0131k ve Zeka \u0130li\u015fkisi\nSolak olma e\u011filiminde olan sanat\u00e7\u0131lar ve m\u00fczisyenlere dair bir\u00e7ok anekdot vard\u0131r; bir g\u00f6zlemde sa\u011f hemisferin (sol eli kontrol eden) yarat\u0131c\u0131l\u0131\u011f\u0131n merkezi oldu\u011fu g\u00f6r\u00fc\u015f\u00fc vard\u0131r. Bu ba\u011flamda, solak olan Leonardo de Vinci\u2018ye, Paul McCartney\u2018ye ve daha bir\u00e7o\u011funa i\u015faret edilir. Ancak psikolog Chris McManus \u00f6d\u00fcll\u00fc \u201cRight Hand Left Hand\u201d (Sa\u011f El Sol El) kitab\u0131nda, \u201cSolaklarda artan yarat\u0131c\u0131l\u0131k iddialar\u0131 s\u00fcrekli tekrarlansa da, bilimsel literat\u00fcrde bu fikri destekleyecek \u00e7ok az \u015fey var\u201d demi\u015ftir. Solaklar\u0131n i\u00e7e d\u00f6n\u00fck olmalar\u0131yla ilgili olarak, sadece bu y\u0131l yay\u0131nlanan bir bildiride, Yeni Zellanda\u2019daki 662 \u00f6\u011frencinin eli ve ki\u015fili\u011fi hakk\u0131nda ara\u015ft\u0131rmalar yap\u0131lm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r. Ara\u015ft\u0131rmac\u0131lar, sol ve sa\u011f elini kullananlarda, farkl\u0131 bir ki\u015filik fakt\u00f6r\u00fcn\u00fcn ortaya \u00e7\u0131kmad\u0131\u011f\u0131n\u0131 s\u00f6ylemi\u015ftir.\nBununla birlikte, her iki elini kullanmak noktas\u0131nda da zay\u0131f olan ki\u015filerin (yani kar\u0131\u015f\u0131k elli) daha fazla i\u00e7e d\u00f6n\u00fck olma e\u011filimi oldu\u011fu ortaya \u00e7\u0131km\u0131\u015ft\u0131r.\n Peki ya IQ? Pek \u00e7ok ki\u015fi \u00fczerinde yap\u0131lan \u00e7al\u0131\u015fmada, zeka ile sa\u011f veya sol el kullanman\u0131n ili\u015fkili oldu\u011fu g\u00f6zlemlenmemi\u015ftir. Ba\u015fka bir ara\u015ft\u0131rmada ise, sa\u011f elini kullananlar\u0131n IQ konusunda \u201chafif\u201d avantajl\u0131 oldu\u011fu tespit edilmi\u015ftir. (Her iki \u00e7al\u0131\u015fmada da zeka / el kullan\u0131m ili\u015fkisi \u00f6nemsiz bir seviyededir.  Ayr\u0131ca, solaklar\u0131n sol hemisferi dil \u00f6\u011frenme konusunda daha az bask\u0131nd\u0131r.\nSolakl\u0131k ve zeka ili\u015fkisi \u00fczerine yap\u0131lan bir deneyde, yakla\u015f\u0131k 1000 kad\u0131n ve erkekten, birle\u015ftirilmesi g\u00fc\u00e7 olan iki s\u0131radan nesneyi birle\u015ftirmeleri istendi. Ba\u015fka bir deneyde ise kat\u0131l\u0131mc\u0131lardan, bir dizi kelimeyi m\u00fcmk\u00fcn oldu\u011funca \u00e7ok say\u0131da farkl\u0131 kategoride kullanmalar\u0131 istendi.\nElde edilen sonu\u00e7lar, solak erkeklerin farkl\u0131 d\u00fc\u015f\u00fcnme pratikleri \u00fczerinde sa\u011f elini kullanan erkeklerden daha iyi performans sergiledi\u011fini ortaya koymu\u015ftur; ancak kad\u0131nlarda b\u00f6yle bir fark g\u00f6r\u00fclmemi\u015ftir.\nEfsaneye g\u00f6re, solaklar daha i\u00e7e d\u00f6n\u00fck, ak\u0131ll\u0131 ve yarat\u0131c\u0131d\u0131r.\nAncak, el duygusu beynin i\u015flevinin yaln\u0131zca dolayl\u0131 bir ifadesidir. \u00d6rne\u011fin, sa\u011f hemisferi daha geli\u015fmi\u015f olan insanlar\u0131n yaln\u0131zca \u00fc\u00e7te biri solakt\u0131r. B\u00f6ylece, sa\u011f elini kullananlar\u0131n solaklar\u0131nkine benzer bir beyin yap\u0131s\u0131na sahip oldu\u011fu g\u00f6r\u00fcl\u00fcr. Sonu\u00e7 olarak, ister bir dahilik i\u015fareti, isterse bili\u015fsel bir bozukluk belirtisi olsun, insanlar\u0131n el tercihlerini yorumlamada temkinli olmak gerekir.\nSon bir bilgi daha: Solaklar sa\u011f ellerini kullanmak konusunda, sa\u011f el kullananlar\u0131n sol ellerini kullanmalar\u0131ndan daha iyi performans g\u00f6sterir.\nKAYNAKLAR: iflscience    indy100    businessinsider\n[Toplam:6    Ortalama:3/5] Solak \u0130nsanlar\u0131n Daha Zeki Oldu\u011fu \u0130ddias\u0131", "Arabada arka koltukta oturan insanlar\u0131n \u00f6n koltukta oturanlara g\u00f6re mide bulant\u0131s\u0131na daha yatk\u0131n oldu\u011fu iddias\u0131 do\u011frudur. Bu rahats\u0131zl\u0131\u011fa, \u201caraba hastal\u0131\u011f\u0131\u201d, \u201chareket hastal\u0131\u011f\u0131\u201d ya da halk aras\u0131nda \u201caraba tutmas\u0131\u201d denir.\n  V\u00fccudumuzun hareketi alg\u0131layan harika mekanizmalar\u0131 vard\u0131r. \u0130\u00e7 kula\u011f\u0131n yar\u0131m daire kanallar\u0131, ba\u015f\u0131 uzaya y\u00f6nlendiren minyat\u00fcr seviyelere benzer. G\u00f6zler s\u00fcrekli hareketle ilgili durumlarda beyni g\u00fcnceller. Eklemlerimizdeki sinirler, \u00f6zellikle ayak bilekleri, dizler ve omurga, hareket dedekt\u00f6rleridir. Cildin hafif dokunmatik sens\u00f6rleri bile havadaki hareketimizi alg\u0131layabilir.\nHareket hastal\u0131\u011f\u0131 (kinetozis), bu farkl\u0131 sistemler aras\u0131nda uyu\u015fmazl\u0131k oldu\u011funda ortaya \u00e7\u0131kabilir. Bu durumda yiyecekleri g\u00f6rmek dahi ki\u015fiye rahats\u0131zl\u0131k verir. Beyin, kulak ve g\u00f6zlerden veya eklemlerden \u00e7eli\u015fkili bilgiler al\u0131rsa, beyindeki kusma merkezlerindeki histamin resept\u00f6rleri, sindirim sistemi hareketlerini yava\u015flatmak i\u00e7in uyar\u0131labilir.\n  Bulant\u0131 (nausea) kelimesi, Yunanca gemi-naus kelimesinden t\u00fcretilmi\u015ftir. Belki de dilbilimciler geminin seyrini deniz hastal\u0131\u011f\u0131yla ili\u015fkilendirmi\u015ftir. Asl\u0131nda bir\u00e7ok farkl\u0131 hareket t\u00fcr\u00fc, deniz, hava, tren, araba, sal\u0131ncak, bo\u015fluk, deve, fil gibi hareketler dahil olmak \u00fczere hastal\u0131klara neden olabilir. Hareket hastal\u0131\u011f\u0131na neden olabilecek di\u011fer \u00e7evresel uyaranlar aras\u0131nda u\u00e7u\u015f uyar\u0131c\u0131lar\u0131, e\u011flence park\u0131 ara\u00e7lar\u0131 veya IMAX tiyatrolar\u0131 gibi yapay \u00e7evrelere maruz kalma say\u0131labilir.\nNormal \u015fartlar alt\u0131nda, her insan hareket hastal\u0131\u011f\u0131na yakalanabilir. Baz\u0131 ki\u015filer di\u011ferlerinden daha hassast\u0131r. Beyin yeni duyumlara al\u0131\u015fmaya \u015fans vermeden k\u00f6t\u00fc olma e\u011filimi g\u00f6sterir. Bazen ge\u00e7mi\u015fte ya\u015fanan k\u00f6t\u00fc bir deneyim, hafif bir yolculukta hareket hastal\u0131\u011f\u0131n\u0131 tetikler. Hatta yolculu\u011fa \u00e7\u0131kmadan \u00f6nce dahi hastal\u0131k tetiklenebilir. Her iki durumda da, hareket hastal\u0131\u011f\u0131 ya\u015fla ve sonunda deneyimle geli\u015fme e\u011filimindedir.\nArac\u0131n arka koltu\u011fundaki \u00e7ocuklar, y\u00fckseklik g\u00f6r\u00fc\u015f alan\u0131n\u0131n s\u0131n\u0131rlad\u0131\u011f\u0131ndan dolay\u0131 bulant\u0131ya meyillidir. Okuma, ilgiyi hareket ettirilmeyen bir \u015feye odaklama, araba hastal\u0131\u011f\u0131n\u0131 daha da k\u00f6t\u00fcle\u015ftirir. \u0130\u00e7 kulaklar hareketi alg\u0131lar, ancak v\u00fccudun geri kalan\u0131 alg\u0131lamaz.\nHareket hastal\u0131\u011f\u0131n\u0131n en \u00e7ok hissedildi\u011fi yerler araba, u\u00e7ak, tekneler, oyun ekipmanlar\u0131 ve e\u011flence park\u0131 ara\u00e7lar\u0131d\u0131r.\n\u00c7o\u011fu zaman yolculuktan \u00f6nceki 24 saat, hareket hastal\u0131\u011f\u0131n\u0131n sebebidir. Ak\u015famdan kalm\u0131\u015fl\u0131k, yorgunluk, endi\u015fe ve k\u00fc\u00e7\u00fck hastal\u0131klar, ya\u011fl\u0131 ve baharatl\u0131 a\u011f\u0131r yemekler hareket hastal\u0131\u011f\u0131na katk\u0131da bulunur. \u00c7ok fazla karbonatl\u0131 veya alkoll\u00fc i\u00e7ecekler mideyi kar\u0131\u015ft\u0131r\u0131r, bu da yolculuk s\u0131ras\u0131nda hareket hastal\u0131\u011f\u0131na tetikler. Bu nedenle, uykusuz, yorgun ve sa\u011fl\u0131ks\u0131z ki\u015filer, genelde oldu\u011fundan daha fazla mide bulant\u0131s\u0131 ya\u015far.\nHafif bulant\u0131l\u0131 hastal\u0131k genellikle midede komik bir hisle ba\u015flar. Hareket sinyallerindeki uyumsuzluk \u00e7\u00f6z\u00fclmezse, semptomlar terleme, esneme, a\u011flama (bebeklerde), t\u00fck\u00fcr\u00fck art\u0131\u015f\u0131, solgunluk, bulant\u0131 ve kusmay\u0131 i\u00e7erecek \u015fekilde ilerleyebilir. Baz\u0131 insanlar\u0131n nefes al\u0131\u015f veri\u015fi h\u0131zlan\u0131r. Baz\u0131lar\u0131n\u0131n ba\u015f\u0131 a\u011fr\u0131r. Baz\u0131lar\u0131 bay\u0131l\u0131r.\nBeynin mide bulant\u0131s\u0131 merkezleri ba\u015fkalar\u0131n\u0131n kusmas\u0131na daha duyarl\u0131d\u0131r. Bu y\u00fczden hareket hastal\u0131\u011f\u0131 bula\u015f\u0131c\u0131 olabilir.\nHareket hastal\u0131\u011f\u0131, hareket durduktan ve beyin rahatlad\u0131ktan sonra ge\u00e7er.\nHareket Hastal\u0131\u011f\u0131 Nas\u0131l \u00d6nlenebilir?\nAraba, tekne veya u\u00e7akta merkezi bir yerde kal\u0131n.\nArac\u0131n \u00f6n koltu\u011funa veya arka koltuktaki orta konuma oturun veya bir yolcu olmak yerine s\u00fcr\u00fcc\u00fc olun.\nUfu\u011fa veya dura\u011fan bir objeye odaklan\u0131n.\nS\u00fcr\u00fc\u015f esnas\u0131nda sars\u0131nt\u0131l\u0131, ani hareketlerden ka\u00e7\u0131n\u0131n.\nYolculuktan \u00fc\u00e7 saat \u00f6ncesine kadar yemek yemeyin, yedi\u011finiz yiyecekler hafif olsun.\nA\u011f\u0131r yemekler, s\u00fct \u00fcr\u00fcnleri ve protein, kalori veya tuz y\u00fcksek g\u0131dalardan ka\u00e7\u0131n\u0131n\nAlkol, sigara ve g\u00fc\u00e7l\u00fc kokulardan ka\u00e7\u0131n\u0131n\nSerin ve temiz havaya eri\u015fmeye \u00e7al\u0131\u015f\u0131n.\nG\u00f6rsel uyaranlardan ka\u00e7\u0131n\u0131n (\u00f6rn. Okuma, video izleme)\nBa\u015f hareketlerini s\u0131n\u0131rlay\u0131n (\u00f6rn. Ba\u015f\u0131n\u0131z\u0131 koltuk ba\u015fl\u0131\u011f\u0131na yaslay\u0131n)\nS\u0131rt\u00fcst\u00fc pozisyonda yatarken g\u00f6zleriniz kapal\u0131 olsun.\nPsikologla bili\u015fsel davran\u0131\u015f\u00e7\u0131 terapi yap\u0131n.\n\u00d6nlem olarak ila\u00e7 al\u0131n.\nDo\u011fruluk Y\u00fczdesi\nKaynaklar\ndrgreene.com    bimcbali.com\n[Toplam:1    Ortalama:5/5] Arabada Arka Koltukta Oturmak Mide Buland\u0131r\u0131yor \u0130ddias\u0131", "D\u00fcnya genelinde \u00fclkelerin gelir ve kazan\u00e7 \u00fczerinden uygulad\u0131klar\u0131 vergileme sistemlerine dair derledi\u011fimiz i\u00e7eri\u011fi okuyarak, konuya dair bilgi edinebilirsiniz.\nVergi Nedir?\nVergi, kamu hizmetlerine harcanmak i\u00e7in h\u00fck\u00fcmetin, yerel y\u00f6netimlerin yasalara g\u00f6re do\u011frudan do\u011fruya veya baz\u0131 mallar\u0131n fiyatlar\u0131n\u0131n \u00fcst\u00fcne koyarak dolayl\u0131 yoldan herkesten toplad\u0131\u011f\u0131 para.\nM\u00fckellefiyet Nedir?\nY\u00fck\u00fcml\u00fcl\u00fck. Gelir Vergisi Kanunu\u2019nda m\u00fckellefiyet, tam m\u00fckellefiyet ve dar m\u00fckellefiyet olarak ikiye ayr\u0131lm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r.\nVergi M\u00fckellefi Nedir?\nM\u00fckellef (y\u00fck\u00fcml\u00fc), vergi kanunlar\u0131na g\u00f6re kendisine vergi borcu terett\u00fcb eden ger\u00e7ek veya t\u00fczel ki\u015fidir.\nGelir Nedir?\nGelir, bir ger\u00e7ek ki\u015finin bir takvim y\u0131l\u0131 i\u00e7inde elde etti\u011fi kazan\u00e7 ve\niratlar\u0131n safi tutar\u0131d\u0131r.\nGelir Vergisi Nedir?\nKi\u015filerin gelirlerinden, bir oran \u00f6l\u00e7\u00fcs\u00fcnde devlete \u00f6dedikleri dolays\u0131z vergi.\nGelir Vergisi Neleri Kapsar?\nGelir Vergisi Kanunu\u2019nda tan\u0131mlanm\u0131\u015f gelir unsurlar\u0131 \u015funlard\u0131r:\n1. Ticar\u00ee kazan\u00e7lar,\n2. Zira\u00ee kazan\u00e7lar,\n3. \u00dccretler,\n4. Serbest meslek kazan\u00e7lar\u0131,\n5. Gayrimenkul sermaye iratlar\u0131,\n6. Menkul sermaye iratlar\u0131,\n7. Di\u011fer kazan\u00e7 ve iratlar\u0131.\nGelir Vergisi Kanunu\u2019nda tan\u0131mlanm\u0131\u015f gelir unsurlar\u0131n\u0131n kurumlar taraf\u0131ndan elde edilmesi durumunda vergilendirme, bu kurumlar\u0131n t\u00fczel ki\u015fili\u011fi \u00fczerinden yap\u0131lmaktad\u0131r. Kanunda say\u0131lan kurumlar vergisi m\u00fckellefleri \u015funlard\u0131r:\nSermaye \u015firketleri\nKooperatifler\nKamu iktisadi m\u00fcesseseleri\nDernek ve vak\u0131flara ait iktisadi i\u015fletmeler\n\u0130\u015f ortakl\u0131klar\u0131\nVergi Kamas\u0131 Nedir?\nVergiler nedeniyle sosyal refahta meydana gelen azalmay\u0131, yani fayda kayb\u0131n\u0131 ifade eder. \u00dcretici ve t\u00fcketici rantlar\u0131ndaki azalmad\u0131r.\nT\u00fcrkiye\u2019de Vergi Mevzuat\u0131\nT\u00fcrkiye\u2019de hakk\u0131nda en \u00e7ok norm bulunan alanlardan birisi vergi hukukudur. Gelir \u0130daresi Ba\u015fkanl\u0131\u011f\u0131n\u0131n mevzuat sisteminde 28 farkl\u0131 vergiyle ili\u015fkili kanun kay\u0131tl\u0131d\u0131r. Konuyla ilgili olarak en \u00e7ok inceledi\u011fimiz kanunlar ise; 193 say\u0131l\u0131 Gelir Vergisi Kanunu, 5520 say\u0131l\u0131 Kurumlar Vergisi Kanunu ve 213 say\u0131l\u0131 Vergi Usul Kanunu\u2019dur.\nVergilendirme Sistemleri\nVergiler, devletin ya da vergilendirme g\u00fcc\u00fcn\u00fc devletten alan kamu kurum ve kurulu\u015flar\u0131n\u0131n, bireylerden veya t\u00fczel ki\u015filerden belirli kurallara g\u00f6re, yasal sistemde tan\u0131ml\u0131 ve kar\u015f\u0131l\u0131ks\u0131z olarak ald\u0131klar\u0131 ekonomik de\u011ferlerdir. Bir \u00fclkede; vergi, resim, har\u00e7 ve benzeri mali y\u00fck\u00fcml\u00fcl\u00fcklerin toplam\u0131ndan meydana gelen organik yap\u0131n\u0131n belirli bir zaman diliminde uygulanmas\u0131 vergi sistemi olarak ifade edilmektedir. Vergi sistemleri \u00fclkelerin politik, ekonomik, yasal ve sosyal yap\u0131lar\u0131na g\u00f6re \u00e7e\u015fitli bi\u00e7imler alabilmektedir. \u00c7e\u015fitli fakt\u00f6rlerin etkisiyle, \u00fclkeler vergi yap\u0131lar\u0131n\u0131 ya da vergi sistemlerini olu\u015ftururken farkl\u0131 kararlar alabilmektedir.\nT\u00fcrkiye\u2019de Vergi Sistemi\nT\u00fcrkiye\u2019de genel itibariyle vergilendirme; gelir, gider ve varl\u0131k \u00fczerinden yap\u0131lmaktad\u0131r. Gelir vergileri, \u015fahsi gelir vergisi ve kurumsal gelir vergisini i\u00e7ermektedir. Gider \u00fczerinden al\u0131nan vergiler ise; katma de\u011fer vergisi, \u00f6zel t\u00fcketim vergisi, bankac\u0131l\u0131k ve sigorta muameleleri vergisi ve damga vergisidir. Varl\u0131k vergileri ise; emlak vergisi, motorlu ta\u015f\u0131t vergisi, veraset ve intikal vergisini kapsamaktad\u0131r. Gelir \u0130daresi Ba\u015fkanl\u0131\u011f\u0131\u2019n\u0131n yay\u0131nlad\u0131\u011f\u0131 verilere g\u00f6re, T\u00fcrkiye\u2019de 2017 y\u0131l\u0131ndaki gelir vergisi oranlar\u0131 \u015f\u00f6yle;\n2017 Y\u0131l\u0131 Gelir Vergisi Oranlar\u0131 (T\u00fcrkiye)\nVergi Oranlar\u0131\nOECD\u2019nin 2016 y\u0131l\u0131 i\u00e7in raporlad\u0131\u011f\u0131 vergi oranlar\u0131 incelendi\u011finde, vergi t\u00fcrlerine g\u00f6re \u00fclkelerin durumlar\u0131n\u0131n de\u011fi\u015fiklik g\u00f6sterdi\u011fi g\u00f6r\u00fclmektedir. Ortalama vergi kamas\u0131 hesapland\u0131\u011f\u0131nda en fazla vergiyi Bel\u00e7ika\u2019da \u00e7al\u0131\u015fan i\u015f\u00e7iler \u00f6derken, \u015fahsi gelir vergisi hesapland\u0131\u011f\u0131nda en fazla Danimarka\u2019da vergi \u00f6denmekte oldu\u011fu g\u00f6r\u00fclmektedir. Sadece OECD \u00fcyesi olan \u00fclkeler i\u00e7in analizi yap\u0131lm\u0131\u015f \u015fahsi gelir vergisi haritas\u0131 \u015f\u00f6yle:\n\u00dclkelere g\u00f6re gelir vergisi oranlar\u0131\nAB Vergi Sistemleri\nAB\u2019de vergi politikalar\u0131 k\u00fc\u00e7\u00fck yerel y\u00f6netim farkl\u0131l\u0131klar\u0131 d\u0131\u015f\u0131nda tamamen \u00fcye \u00fclkelerle ortak \u015fekilde belirlenmektedir.  Fakat AB \u00fcyesi \u00fclkeler, vergi politikalar\u0131n\u0131 olu\u015ftururken AB\u2019nin kurucu antla\u015fmas\u0131 olan Roma Antla\u015fmas\u0131\u2019ndan ba\u011f\u0131ms\u0131z davranamamaktad\u0131rlar.\nAB b\u00fct\u00e7e gelirleri esas olarak 4 kalemden olu\u015fmaktad\u0131r.\n1) \u00dcye olmayan \u00fclkelerden ithal edilen tar\u0131m \u00fcr\u00fcnlerinden al\u0131nan vergiler,\n2) \u00dcye olmayan \u00fclkelerle ticarette Ortak G\u00fcmr\u00fck Tarifesi\u2019nin (OGT) uygulamas\u0131 sonucu elde edilen g\u00fcmr\u00fck vergileri\n3) \u00dcye \u00fclkelerin toplad\u0131klar\u0131 KDV vergilerinin % 1 oran\u0131ndaki b\u00f6l\u00fcm\u00fc,\n4) \u00dcye \u00fclkelerin GSMH\u2019na g\u00f6re belirlenen b\u00fct\u00e7e katk\u0131 paylar\u0131.\nAB\u2019de tek bir pazar olu\u015fturulmas\u0131 y\u00f6n\u00fcnde b\u00fcy\u00fck \u00e7abalar olmas\u0131na ra\u011fmen, vergi hukukunda \u00fcye \u00fclkeler aras\u0131nda tam bir uyum sa\u011fland\u0131\u011f\u0131 s\u00f6ylenemez. \u00c7\u00fcnk\u00fc AB\u2019de vergi politikas\u0131n\u0131n koordinasyonunun sa\u011flanmas\u0131 y\u00f6n\u00fcnde at\u0131lan ad\u0131mlar \u00e7ok yava\u015f y\u00fcr\u00fct\u00fclmektedir. Bunun en b\u00fcy\u00fck nedeni ise AB \u00fcyesi \u00fclkelerin ekonomilerindeki kompleks yap\u0131 ve Roma Antla\u015fmas\u0131\u2019nda yer alan vergi y\u00fck\u00fcml\u00fcl\u00fckleri ile ilgili d\u00fczenlemelerin de\u011fi\u015fime pek a\u00e7\u0131k olmamas\u0131d\u0131r.\nAB konseyi, AB\u2019de vergi ayr\u0131mc\u0131l\u0131\u011f\u0131n\u0131n ne \u015fekilde olu\u015fabilece\u011fini belirgin olarak ortaya koymu\u015ftur. AB konseyi, AB Adalet Divan\u0131na vergideki ayr\u0131mc\u0131l\u0131\u011f\u0131n \u00f6nlenmesi amac\u0131yla tam yetki vermi\u015ftir. \u00d6zellikle AB\u2019de uygulanan KDV\u2019deki ayr\u0131mc\u0131l\u0131\u011f\u0131n \u00f6nlenmesi i\u00e7in etkin kanunlar mevcuttur.\nAsya Vergi Sistemleri\nAsya\u2019n\u0131n vergi sistemi olduk\u00e7a dinamiktir. Ge\u00e7ti\u011fimiz y\u0131llarda bir\u00e7ok Asya \u00fclkesi (\u00c7in, Endonezya, Malezya, Filipinler, Tayland, Vietnam) gelir vergisi oranlar\u0131nda indirim yapm\u0131\u015flard\u0131r. D\u00fcnya Bankas\u0131\u2019na g\u00f6re, 2011 y\u0131l\u0131nda, \u00c7in d\u00fcnyada en fazla vergi \u00f6deme kolayl\u0131\u011f\u0131 sa\u011flayan \u00fclkeler aras\u0131nda 7. s\u0131rada yer almaktad\u0131r. Asya \u00fclkelerinin gelir vergisi durumlar\u0131 k\u0131saca \u015f\u00f6yle;\n\u00c7in\u2019de gelir ve kazan\u00e7lardan sa\u011flanan gelirler \u00fczerinden % 3 ila % 45 aras\u0131nda kademeli olarak de\u011fi\u015fen 7 farkl\u0131 oranda gelir vergisi tahsis edilmektedir.\nHindistan\u2019da gelir vergisi ya\u015fa, cinsiyete ba\u011fl\u0131 olarak belirlenmektedir. Bu \u00f6zellikler ayr\u0131ca kendi i\u00e7erisinde de grupland\u0131r\u0131l\u0131r. Vergi oranlar\u0131 %10 ve %30 aras\u0131nda de\u011fi\u015fmektedir. Ayn\u0131 zamanda gelir vergisi, bir yabanc\u0131n\u0131n Hindistan\u2019da ikamet etti\u011fi g\u00fcn say\u0131s\u0131na ve gelirin miktar\u0131na g\u00f6re de de\u011fi\u015fiklik g\u00f6sterir.\nSingapur h\u00fck\u00fcmeti gelir vergisi dilimi i\u00e7in %0 ve %20 aras\u0131nda de\u011fi\u015fen a\u015famal\u0131 vergi oranlar\u0131 uygulamaktad\u0131r. Vergi m\u00fckellefleri; Singapurlular, Singapur\u2019da daimi ikamet izni olan yabanc\u0131lar ve Singapur\u2019da 183 g\u00fcn ya da daha fazla ikamet etmi\u015f yabanc\u0131lard\u0131r.\nVietnam\u2019da gelir vergisi, hem Vietnam\u2019da hem Vietnam d\u0131\u015f\u0131nda elde edilen gelirlerden al\u0131n\u0131r. \u00dclkede daimi ikamet edenlerden al\u0131nan gelir vergisi oranlar\u0131 %3 ila %35 aras\u0131nda de\u011fi\u015fen 7 farkl\u0131 sistemle al\u0131nmaktad\u0131r. Vietnam\u2019da ikamet etmeyenlerden al\u0131nan oran ise %20\u2019dir.\nD\u00fcnya Bankas\u0131 verilerine g\u00f6re, en d\u00fc\u015f\u00fck vergiyi Hong Kong ve Singapur uygulamaktad\u0131r. Ayn\u0131 zamanda en fazla vergi \u00f6deme kolayl\u0131\u011f\u0131 sa\u011flayan ilk 10 \u00fclke ve b\u00f6lge aras\u0131nda da yer almaktad\u0131rlar. \u00c7in ve Hindistan ise, Asya \u00fclkeleri aras\u0131nda en y\u00fcksek vergi oranlar\u0131na sahip olan \u00fclkelerdir. Bunun temel nedeni y\u00fcksek miktardaki i\u015f g\u00fcc\u00fc vergileridir.\nKaynaklar:\n1-OECD 2-Gelir Vergisi Kanunu 3-Kurumlar Vergisi Kanunu 4-Vergi Usul Kanunu 5-Gib.gov\n6-Invest.gov 7-Dergipark.gov 8-sgb.gov 9-mfa.gov 10-tusiad.org 10-koto.org\n[Toplam:11    Ortalama:3.1/5] T\u00fcrkiye ve D\u00fcnyada Gelir Vergisi Kar\u015f\u0131la\u015ft\u0131rmas\u0131", "B\u00fcy\u00fck bir \u201ckost\u00fcm m\u00fccevheri\u201d olarak sat\u0131n ald\u0131\u011f\u0131 y\u00fcz\u00fck i\u00e7in 15 dolar \u00f6deyen \u015fansl\u0131 bir kad\u0131n, y\u00fcz\u00fc\u011f\u00fcn de\u011ferinin kat kat fazla oldu\u011funu \u00f6\u011frenince hayat\u0131n\u0131n s\u00fcrprizini ya\u015fad\u0131. Ad\u0131 a\u00e7\u0131klanmayan kad\u0131n\u0131n 15 dolara sat\u0131n ald\u0131\u011f\u0131 y\u00fcz\u00fc\u011f\u00fcn 450 bin dolar de\u011ferinde oldu\u011fu iddias\u0131 do\u011frudur.\nThe Guardian\u2018\u0131n haberine g\u00f6re, otuz y\u0131l \u00f6nce bir kad\u0131n, Bat\u0131 Londra\u2018daki Bat\u0131 Middlesex hastanesindeki bit pazar\u0131ndan \u201cson derece b\u00fcy\u00fck\u201d bir ta\u015f sat\u0131n ald\u0131. Bir kuyumcu y\u0131llard\u0131r g\u00fcndelik hayatta ve hatta ev i\u015fleri yaparken takt\u0131\u011f\u0131 bu y\u00fcz\u00fc\u011f\u00fcn k\u0131ymetli olabilece\u011fini s\u00f6yledi\u011finde kad\u0131n y\u00fcz\u00fc\u011f\u00fcn de\u011ferinin fark\u0131nda de\u011fildi.\nAncak 15 dolar kar\u015f\u0131l\u0131\u011f\u0131nda ald\u0131\u011f\u0131 y\u00fcz\u00fc\u011f\u00fcn yakla\u015f\u0131k yar\u0131m milyon (450.000 dolar) de\u011ferinde bir elmas oldu\u011fu ortaya \u00e7\u0131kt\u0131.\n26.27 karatl\u0131k, yast\u0131k \u015feklindeki, beyaz elmas y\u00fcz\u00fck, 7 Haziran\u2019da a\u00e7\u0131k art\u0131rmaya \u00e7\u0131kar\u0131ld\u0131. Sahibi y\u00fcz\u00fc\u011f\u00fc sat\u0131n al\u0131rken ta\u015f\u0131n ger\u00e7ek olabilece\u011fini d\u00fc\u015f\u00fcnmemi\u015fti, \u00e7\u00fcnk\u00fc 19. y\u00fczy\u0131l p\u0131rlantas\u0131 olan bu ta\u015f, m\u00fccevher olarak \u00fcretilmemi\u015fti.\nSotheby Londra m\u00fccevher departman\u0131 m\u00fcd\u00fcr\u00fc Jessica Wyndham, eski bir kesme tarz\u0131na sahip y\u00fcz\u00fc\u011f\u00fcn kristaline \u015fekil verilirken parlakla\u015ft\u0131rmak yerine a\u011f\u0131rl\u0131\u011f\u0131n\u0131 korumaya y\u00f6nelik \u00e7al\u0131\u015f\u0131lm\u0131\u015f oldu\u011funu s\u00f6yledi.\nWyndham, y\u00fcz\u00fc\u011f\u00fcn sahiplerinin \u201cinan\u0131lmaz derecede heyecanl\u0131 oldu\u011funu\u201d ve elmas\u0131n de\u011ferinin, ki\u015finin hayat\u0131n\u0131 de\u011fi\u015ftirecek bir miktar oldu\u011funu s\u00f6yledi.\nDo\u011fruluk Y\u00fczdesi\nKAYNAKLAR\nmashable.com\n[Toplam:0    Ortalama:0/5] 15 Dolara Al\u0131nan Y\u00fcz\u00fc\u011f\u00fcn 450 bin Dolarl\u0131k Elmas Oldu\u011fu \u0130ddias\u0131", "D\u00fcnyan\u0131n g\u00f6z\u00fc \u00f6n\u00fcnde ger\u00e7ekle\u015fen Rohingya M\u00fcsl\u00fcmanlar\u0131na y\u00f6nelik katliam ve Myanmar\u2018daki etnik az\u0131nl\u0131\u011f\u0131n insanl\u0131k dram\u0131 sosyal medyada yank\u0131 bulurken, baz\u0131 internet siteleri dram\u0131n foto\u011fraflar\u0131na odaklanmak yerine, yay\u0131lan sahte foto\u011fraflara yer veriyor. Dram\u0131n ger\u00e7ek y\u00fcz\u00fcn\u00fc, ger\u00e7ek foto\u011fraflar\u0131n yaln\u0131zca bir k\u0131sm\u0131n\u0131 payla\u015farak g\u00f6stermek istiyoruz.\nMyanmar\u2018daki M\u00fcsl\u00fcman Rohingyal\u0131lar, Cox Bazar\u2019daki Kutupalong ge\u00e7ici s\u0131\u011f\u0131nmac\u0131 kamp\u0131na girmeyi bekliyor. (28 A\u011fustos 2017)\nMyanmar\u2019\u0131n bat\u0131 Rakhine eyaletinde ya\u015fanan \u015fiddet, binlerce etnik Rohingya M\u00fcsl\u00fcman\u0131n\u0131n g\u00fcvenlik nedeniyle Rakhine Budistlerinden Banglade\u015f\u2019e ka\u00e7mas\u0131na sebep oldu. (AP Foto\u011fraf\u0131 / Mushfiqul Alam)\nMyanmar\u2019daki M\u00fcsl\u00fcman Rohingya etnik az\u0131nl\u0131\u011f\u0131n\u0131n \u00fcyeleri, Myanmar-Banglade\u015f s\u0131n\u0131r\u0131ndaki Ghumdhum\u2019da, Myanmar\u2019a geri d\u00f6nmek i\u00e7in dikenli telleri a\u015f\u0131yor. (29 A\u011fustos 2017 Sal\u0131, AP)\nBanglade\u015f s\u0131n\u0131r muhaf\u0131z\u0131 \u00fcyesi, Rohingyal\u0131 k\u0131za, Cox\u2019s Bazar\u2019daki Banglade\u015f s\u0131n\u0131r\u0131ndan uzakla\u015fmas\u0131n\u0131 s\u00f6yl\u00fcyor. (27 A\u011fustos 2017,Mohammad Ponir Hossain)\nMyanmar\u2019l\u0131 polisler masum bir Rohingyal\u0131 m\u00fcsl\u00fcman\u0131 d\u00f6v\u00fcyor.\nBanglade\u015fli s\u0131n\u0131r muhaf\u0131zlar\u0131 taraf\u0131ndan geriye itilen Myanmar\u2018daki M\u00fcsl\u00fcman Rohingya etnik az\u0131nl\u0131\u011f\u0131n\u0131n \u00fcyeleri, Banglade\u015f Ghumdhum\u2019daki Myanmar s\u0131n\u0131r\u0131ndan silah seslerini duyarak Banglade\u015f taraf\u0131na geri d\u00f6nd\u00fcler. Myanmar\u2019dan ka\u00e7maya \u00e7al\u0131\u015fan y\u00fczlerce Rohingyal\u0131, Myanmar \u2013 Banglade\u015f s\u0131n\u0131r\u0131nda s\u0131k\u0131\u015fm\u0131\u015f durumda. (28 A\u011fustos 2017 Pazartesi, AP)\nBanglade\u015f s\u0131n\u0131r muhaf\u0131zlar\u0131 taraf\u0131ndan geriye itilen Rohingyal\u0131 bir kad\u0131n, Ghumdhum-Cox Bazar\u2019da durdurulmas\u0131ndan sonra a\u011fl\u0131yor. Myanmar\u2019dan ka\u00e7maya \u00e7al\u0131\u015fan y\u00fczlerce Rohingyal\u0131 s\u0131n\u0131rda bekletiliyor. (27 A\u011fustos 2017, AP)\nGhumdhum\u2019da bir grup M\u00fcsl\u00fcman Rohingyal\u0131, (foto\u011frafta g\u00f6r\u00fcnmeyen) Banglade\u015f s\u0131n\u0131r muhaf\u0131zlar\u0131 taraf\u0131ndan ge\u00e7ici olarak kald\u0131klar\u0131 kamp\u0131 terk etmeye zorlan\u0131yor. (28 A\u011fustos 2017)\nABD merkezli \u0130nsan Haklar\u0131 \u0130zleme \u00d6rg\u00fct\u00fc ve Birle\u015fmi\u015f Milletler taraf\u0131ndan yap\u0131lan ara\u015ft\u0131rmalara g\u00f6re, 2012\u2019den beri 1000\u2019den fazla Rohingyal\u0131 \u00f6ld\u00fcr\u00fcld\u00fc, yakla\u015f\u0131k 320 bin ki\u015fi Myanmar ve kom\u015fu Banglade\u015f\u2019teki bak\u0131ms\u0131z kamplarda ya\u015f\u0131yor ve binlerce ki\u015fi di\u011fer G\u00fcneydo\u011fu Asya \u00fclkelerine tehlikeli deniz yolculu\u011fu yap\u0131yor. (AP)\nBanglade\u015fli s\u0131n\u0131r muhaf\u0131z personelleri, Rohingyal\u0131lar\u0131 g\u00f6zlem alt\u0131nda tutuyor; Banglade\u015f Cox\u2019s Bazar\u2019daki Ghumdhum s\u0131n\u0131r\u0131ndan Banglade\u015f taraf\u0131na ge\u00e7melerini engelliyor. Myanmar\u2019dan ka\u00e7maya \u00e7al\u0131\u015fan y\u00fczlerce Rohingyal\u0131, \u201ckimsenin topraklar\u0131 olmayan yer\u201dde s\u0131k\u0131\u015fm\u0131\u015f durumda. (27 A\u011fustos 2017, AP)\nM\u00fcsl\u00fcman Rohingya\u2019l\u0131 baz\u0131 kad\u0131nlar ve \u00e7ocuklar, Banglade\u015f Ghumdhum s\u0131n\u0131r\u0131ndaki bir vardiya kamp\u0131na ta\u015f\u0131nmadan \u00f6nce ormanl\u0131k bir alana s\u0131\u011f\u0131nmak zorunda kald\u0131. (28 A\u011fustos 2017, AP)\nBanglade\u015fli s\u0131n\u0131r muhaf\u0131zlar\u0131 taraf\u0131ndan geri d\u00f6nd\u00fcr\u00fclen Myanmar\u2019daki M\u00fcsl\u00fcman Rohingyal\u0131lar, Banglade\u015f\u2019in Ghumdhum \u015fehrinde silah sesleri duyduklar\u0131 i\u00e7in Banglade\u015f \u2013 Myanmar s\u0131n\u0131r taraf\u0131na geri d\u00f6nd\u00fc. (28 A\u011fustos 2017, AP)\nMyanmarl\u0131 polisler Rohingya M\u00fcsl\u00fcmanlar\u0131n\u0131 d\u00f6verken kaydettikleri videoyu payla\u015ft\u0131:\n\u00c7at\u0131\u015fmalardan etkilenip Maungdaw\u2019dan ka\u00e7an Budist Rakhine m\u00fcltecileri, Rakhine eyaletindeki bir manast\u0131rda kald\u0131. (28 A\u011fustos 2017, AP)\nAyesha Begum, Rohingya\u2019n\u0131n sorunlu Rakhine b\u00f6lgesini terk ederek Myanmar\u2019\u0131n vatans\u0131z M\u00fcsl\u00fcman az\u0131nl\u0131\u011f\u0131 i\u00e7in sava\u015fanlar aras\u0131na kat\u0131lanlardan. (AFP /Rehman Asad)\nMyanmar\u2019da polis \u015fiddeti\nMyanmar s\u0131n\u0131r polisi, Myanmar\u2019\u0131n Rakhine eyaletindeki Maungdaw kasabas\u0131n\u0131n giri\u015findeki \u00e7at\u0131\u015fma alan\u0131ndan ka\u00e7an ki\u015fileri kontrol ediyor. (28 A\u011fustos 2017, AFP)\nRohingya M\u00fcsl\u00fcmanlar\u0131, Banglade\u015f\u2019e girmeleri yasakland\u0131\u011f\u0131 i\u00e7in, Banglade\u015f s\u0131n\u0131r muhaf\u0131zlar\u0131 taraf\u0131ndan s\u0131n\u0131rda bekletiliyor. (28 A\u011fustos 2017, Reuters)\nRamida Begum, 10 g\u00fcnl\u00fck k\u0131z\u0131yla, Banglade\u015f Cox\u2019s Bazar\u2019da bulunan kay\u0131t d\u0131\u015f\u0131 s\u0131\u011f\u0131nmac\u0131 kamp\u0131 Kutupalang\u2019da kal\u0131yor. \u201cOrdu, kocam\u0131 yakalad\u0131 ve Myanmar\u2019dan ayr\u0131lmadan bir hafta \u00f6nce evimizi yakt\u0131. O g\u00fcnden beri kocam\u0131n hayatta olup olmad\u0131\u011f\u0131n\u0131 bilmiyorum.\u201d (Reuters)\nNoor Begum ve bir g\u00fcnl\u00fck k\u0131z Sumaiya. Noor, bir bu\u00e7uk ay \u00f6nce Nagpura k\u00f6y\u00fcnden kocas\u0131 Jahangir ile birlikte kampa gelenlerden biri. (Reuters)\nOn sekiz ya\u015f\u0131ndaki Asmot Ara ve kuca\u011f\u0131nda yeni do\u011fmu\u015f k\u0131z\u0131. Asmot, Nagpura k\u00f6y\u00fcnden kom\u015fular\u0131yla bir ay \u00f6nce kampa gelmi\u015f. Myanmar\u2019da kay\u0131nbabas\u0131 \u00f6ld\u00fcr\u00fclm\u00fc\u015f ve evleri Myanmar ordusu taraf\u0131ndan yak\u0131lm\u0131\u015f. (Reuters)\nEdit\u00f6r\u00fcn notu: Edit\u00f6r, Arakan katliam\u0131n\u0131n g\u00f6r\u00fcnt\u00fclerinin bir \u00e7o\u011funu hassas i\u00e7erikli olduklar\u0131ndan dolay\u0131 payla\u015fmamay\u0131 tercih etmi\u015ftir. Par\u00e7alanan ve yak\u0131lan insan v\u00fccutlar\u0131, i\u015fkence ve tecav\u00fcze maruz kalm\u0131\u015f Arakanl\u0131 M\u00fcsl\u00fcmanlar\u0131n foto\u011fraflar\u0131 ve videolardakilerden \u00e7ok daha hassas i\u00e7erikli g\u00f6rseller payla\u015f\u0131lmam\u0131\u015ft\u0131r.\nKaynaklar\nhosted2  readingeagle  southcoastherald  independent   reuters\nyahoo   arynews\n  [Toplam:1    Ortalama:5/5] Arakan (Rohingya) Dram\u0131n\u0131n Ger\u00e7ek Foto\u011fraflar\u0131", "Milli E\u011fitim Bakanl\u0131\u011f\u0131n\u0131n izniyle bas\u0131lan 8. S\u0131n\u0131f T\u00fcrk\u00e7e MEB kitab\u0131ndaki Hoca Bakkal isimli metinle ilgili Twitter\u2018da, eski T\u00fcrk\u00e7e\u2018nin zorlu\u011funa dair ifadelerin ge\u00e7ti\u011fini iddia eden bir payla\u015f\u0131m yap\u0131lm\u0131\u015ft\u0131.\nMilli E\u011fitim Bakanl\u0131\u011f\u0131 taraf\u0131ndan T\u00fcrk\u00e7e MEB kitab\u0131n\u0131n bas\u0131m\u0131n\u0131n ve da\u011f\u0131t\u0131m\u0131n\u0131n yap\u0131ld\u0131\u011f\u0131 iddias\u0131 do\u011frudur.\n  2016 Eyl\u00fcl ay\u0131nda yap\u0131lan payla\u015f\u0131m, tekrardan g\u00fcndem oldu ve tart\u0131\u015fmaya a\u00e7\u0131ld\u0131. \u0130ddiaya g\u00f6re ilk\u00f6\u011fretim sekizinci s\u0131n\u0131f T\u00fcrk\u00e7e kitab\u0131ndaki ifadeler, Eski T\u00fcrk\u00e7e\u2019nin zor okundu\u011funa i\u015faret ediyor.\n  8. S\u0131n\u0131f T\u00fcrk\u00e7e Kitab\u0131\nS\u00f6z konusu T\u00fcrk\u00e7e kitab\u0131na ait iddiay\u0131 Mustafa Arma\u011fan ise \u015f\u00f6yle yan\u0131tlam\u0131\u015ft\u0131r:\nBas\u0131m\u0131 Yapan Yay\u0131nevi\nMilli E\u011fitim Bakanl\u0131\u011f\u0131, ders kitaplar\u0131n\u0131n bir k\u0131sm\u0131n\u0131 \u00f6zel sekt\u00f6re bast\u0131r\u0131rken bir k\u0131sm\u0131n\u0131 da kendisi haz\u0131rlamaktad\u0131r. 2015-2016 y\u0131l\u0131 i\u00e7in ders kitab\u0131 olarak kabul etti\u011fi \u0130lk\u00f6\u011fretim 8. S\u0131n\u0131f T\u00fcrk\u00e7e Kitab\u0131, Dikey Yay\u0131nc\u0131l\u0131k taraf\u0131ndan bas\u0131lm\u0131\u015f ve 2016 y\u0131l\u0131nda da\u011f\u0131t\u0131m\u0131 yap\u0131lm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r.\nBas\u0131m\u0131 Durdurulmu\u015f\nMilli E\u011fitim Bakanl\u0131\u011f\u0131 taraf\u0131ndan 2016-2017 E\u011fitim \u00d6\u011fretim y\u0131l\u0131nda \u00f6\u011frencilere \u00fccretsiz olarak da\u011f\u0131t\u0131lan ders kitaplar\u0131n\u0131n 58 tanesinin bas\u0131m\u0131 durdurulmu\u015ftur.\n  Bas\u0131m\u0131 durdurulan kitaplar aras\u0131nda genel olarak Din K\u00fclt\u00fcr\u00fc ve Ahlak Bilgisi ders kitaplar\u0131 ile \u0130mam Hatip Meslek Lisesi kitaplar\u0131 bulunurken, Dikey Yay\u0131nc\u0131l\u0131k 8. S\u0131n\u0131f T\u00fcrk\u00e7e Ders kitab\u0131n\u0131n da da\u011f\u0131t\u0131m\u0131 durdurulmu\u015ftur. Dikey Yay\u0131nc\u0131l\u0131\u011f\u0131n bast\u0131\u011f\u0131 ders kitab\u0131 yerine Milli E\u011fitim Bakanl\u0131\u011f\u0131n\u0131n kendi bast\u0131\u011f\u0131 kitap ders kitab\u0131 olarak kabul edilmi\u015ftir.\nDo\u011fruluk Y\u00fczdesi\nKaynaklar:\n1-E\u011fitim Bili\u015fim A\u011f\u0131 (EBA) 1  2-Kamudan.com 3-Kamu G\u00fcndemi 4-Twitter\n[Toplam:0    Ortalama:0/5] MEB Kitab\u0131nda Eski T\u00fcrk\u00e7enin Zor Oldu\u011fu \u0130ddias\u0131", "Arakanl\u0131 m\u00fcsl\u00fcmanlara uygulanan soyk\u0131r\u0131m ile ilgili bas\u0131n ve yay\u0131n organlar\u0131 belli bir \u00e7er\u00e7eve olu\u015fturdular. Bu \u00e7er\u00e7eve \u00f6nemli \u00f6l\u00e7\u00fcde hassasiyetlerin yo\u011funlu\u011funda bo\u011fulmu\u015f haberleri i\u00e7ermektedir. Haber ba\u015fl\u0131klar\u0131ndan i\u00e7eri\u011fine kadar, olu\u015fturulan hep \u00e7at\u0131\u015fma \u00e7er\u00e7evesi olmu\u015ftur. Haberlerin vurgusu Budist \u00e7etelerin yapt\u0131\u011f\u0131 katliamlardan ileriye gidemezken, haberin muhatab\u0131na durmadan duygusal bir a\u00e7\u0131dan yakla\u015f\u0131lmakta, vicdani sorumluluk harekete ge\u00e7irilmeye \u00e7al\u0131\u015f\u0131lmaktad\u0131r. Ger\u00e7ek nedenlerin \u00fcst\u00fcn\u00fc \u00f6rten bu y\u00f6ntem radikalizmi beslerken, medyay\u0131 da \u015fiddetin dili haline getirmektedir. Bu duruma g\u00fcn\u00fcm\u00fcz\u00fcn geli\u015fen teknolojisinin bir par\u00e7as\u0131 olan sosyal medyan\u0131n rol\u00fc de eklendi\u011finde, insan olman\u0131n erdemli y\u00fcz\u00fc korkun\u00e7 boyutlarda kararmaya ba\u015flamaktad\u0131r. Medyan\u0131n Arakan\u2019la ilgili ger\u00e7ek nedenleri belirtmeden dola\u015f\u0131ma koydu\u011fu haberler, alg\u0131y\u0131 k\u00f6reltmekten ve nefreti b\u00fcy\u00fctmekten ileriye gidemiyor. \u00c7ok az ki\u015finin Arakan\u2019daki katliam\u0131n ve soyk\u0131r\u0131m\u0131n sebebini soruyor olmas\u0131n\u0131n nedeni budur.\nBu yaz\u0131m\u0131zda yap\u0131lar\u0131 ve inan\u00e7lar\u0131 bak\u0131m\u0131ndan insan \u00f6ld\u00fcrmenin yanl\u0131\u015f oldu\u011funa inanan Budistleri kan d\u00f6kmeye iten nedenleri inceleyece\u011fiz. Myanmar y\u00f6netimi taraf\u0131ndan organize edilen \u00e7etelerin ve radikal Budistlerin uluslararas\u0131 g\u00fc\u00e7lerle ili\u015fkilerinden bahsedece\u011fiz. Arakan\u2019daki soyk\u0131r\u0131m\u0131n nedenlerini sorgularken, \u00e7\u0131kar ili\u015fkilerinin b\u00fcy\u00fck g\u00fc\u00e7lerin medeni vicdan\u0131n\u0131 (!) nas\u0131l k\u00f6reltti\u011fini ortaya koyaca\u011f\u0131z.\nBudizm Daha \u00d6nce de \u015eiddetin Dini Haline Getirildi\nArakan\u2019daki katliam\u0131n ger\u00e7ek sebeplerini ortaya koymaya ba\u015flamadan, Budist rahiplerin \u015fiddetten ka\u00e7\u0131nma ilkesini daha \u00f6nce de ihlal ettiklerini belirtme ihtiyac\u0131n\u0131 duyuyoruz.\nBudist rahipler tarihsel s\u00fcre\u00e7 i\u00e7erisinde de siyasal ittifaklar kurarak dini k\u0131l\u0131\u00e7 ile birle\u015ftirmi\u015flerdir.\nTarihte rahiplerin Budist \u00f6\u011freti ile \u00e7eli\u015fmelerinin sebebi \u015fiddetin kayna\u011f\u0131 olan krallar\u0131n destek ve korumalar\u0131n\u0131 sa\u011flama zorunlulu\u011fuydu. Buna kar\u015f\u0131n krallarda rahipleri me\u015frutiyet kayna\u011f\u0131 olarak kullanm\u0131\u015flard\u0131r. Bu durum Budizmin tarihinde \u015fiddetin \u00e7ekirde\u011fini olu\u015fturmu\u015ftur.\nOxford \u00dcniversitesi\u2019nden Alan Strathern\u2019in aktard\u0131\u011f\u0131na g\u00f6re Sri Lanka\u2019n\u0131n birle\u015fmesi, 500 Budist rahibe liderlik eden bir kral\u0131n, Budist olmayan bir kral\u0131 yenip, taraftarlar\u0131n\u0131 katletmesiyle m\u00fcmk\u00fcn olmu\u015ftur. Birmanyal\u0131 liderler de tarih boyunca Budizm ad\u0131na her t\u00fcrl\u00fc \u015fiddeti me\u015fru g\u00f6stermi\u015flerdir. Japonya\u2018da ise bir \u00e7ok samuray Zen Budist\u2019ti; Budist \u00f6\u011freti bu \u00fclkede de bir \u00e7ok icraat\u0131 me\u015fru g\u00f6stermek i\u00e7in kullan\u0131lm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r.\nZen Budizmi ve Japonlar\nArakan\u2019da da M\u00fcsl\u00fcmanlar\u0131n katledili\u015fi Budist rahiplerin siyasal iktidarlar ile ittifak kurmalar\u0131yla ba\u015flad\u0131.\nBug\u00fcn Arakan\u2019da katliamlar ekonomik ve siyasi \u00e7\u0131karlardan ba\u011f\u0131ms\u0131z olmasa da, ba\u015flang\u0131\u00e7 noktas\u0131nda yerli halk\u0131n iki farkl\u0131 dini gruba ayr\u0131lmas\u0131 etkili olmu\u015ftur.\nArakanl\u0131 M\u00fcsl\u00fcmanlar\u0131n lideri konumunda bulunan Dr. Muhammed Yunus\u2019a g\u00f6re, Arakan\u2019da 1287 y\u0131l\u0131ndan 1374 y\u0131l\u0131na kadar herhangi bir Burma (Myanmar) \u00fcst idaresinden bahsetmek m\u00fcmk\u00fcn olmam\u0131\u015ft\u0131r. Ancak Arakanl\u0131 baz\u0131 Budist Maghlar Ava\u2019ya (Burman\u0131n Ba\u015fkenti) gitmi\u015f ve kendi i\u00e7 i\u015flerine m\u00fcdahale etmelerini istemi\u015flerdir. Bunun sebebi olarak, Arakan Kral\u0131  Narameikla\u2019n\u0131n, Afrika\u2019dan Bengal\u2019e kadar geni\u015f bir b\u00f6lgeye uzanan \u0130slam\u2019\u0131n etkisinde kalm\u0131\u015f olmas\u0131 g\u00f6sterilmi\u015ftir.\nBudist Maghlar\u2019\u0131n Ava Kral\u0131 Minkhaung\u2019dan \u0131srarla \u00fclkelerinin i\u00e7 i\u015flerine m\u00fcdahale etmesini istemelerinin sonucunda Ava Kral\u0131\u011f\u0131 Arakan\u2019\u0131 i\u015fgal etti. Narameikla, \u00fclkesini Burmal\u0131lar\u0131n (Ava Krall\u0131\u011f\u0131) eline b\u0131rakarak Bengal\u2019e ka\u00e7t\u0131. Ancak, 1404 y\u0131l\u0131nda tahttan indirilmi\u015f olan Arakan Kral\u0131 Narameikla, 24 y\u0131l devam eden s\u00fcrg\u00fcn hayat\u0131 boyunca Bengal krallar\u0131yla \u00f6zel ili\u015fkiler kurdu ve S\u00fcleyman \u015eah ismini alarak M\u00fcsl\u00fcman oldu.\nS\u00fcleyman \u015eah ad\u0131n\u0131 alan Narameikla \u00fclkesine d\u00f6nerek 1430 y\u0131l\u0131nda Arakan \u0130slam Devletini kurdu. Arakan \u0130slam Devleti 1784 y\u0131l\u0131na kadar b\u00f6lgeye h\u00fckmetti. Bu d\u00f6nemde Arakan bir ticaret ve ilim merkezi oldu. Portekizliler ve Hollandal\u0131lar uzun y\u0131llar Arakan ile ticaret yapt\u0131lar ve Arakan, ekonomik olarak g\u00fc\u00e7l\u00fc bir hale geldi.\n\u0130ngiliz \u0130\u015fgalinden Sonra Arakan\n\u0130ngiliz \u0130\u015fgalinde Arakan\nBurma Krall\u0131\u011f\u0131, Arakan \u0130slam Devletini y\u0131ksa da b\u00f6lgeye tam olarak hakim olamad\u0131. 19. y\u00fczy\u0131lda Arakan\u2019\u0131 i\u015fgal eden yeni s\u00f6m\u00fcrgeci g\u00fc\u00e7 \u0130ngiltere oldu. Arakan\u0131 iliklerine kadar s\u00f6m\u00fcren ve Arakanl\u0131 M\u00fcsl\u00fcmanlar\u0131 maden ocaklar\u0131nda zorla k\u00f6le olarak \u00e7al\u0131\u015ft\u0131ran \u0130ngiltere, 1948 y\u0131l\u0131nda b\u00f6lgeden ayr\u0131ld\u0131\u011f\u0131nda, Arakan\u0131n kaderini Burma Krall\u0131\u011f\u0131n\u0131n eline b\u0131rakt\u0131.\nArakan\u2019da ya\u015fanan katliamlar\u0131 d\u00fcnyaya duyuran \u0130HH \u0130nsani Yard\u0131m Vakf\u0131\u2019n\u0131n belirtti\u011fine g\u00f6re, daha 1942 y\u0131l\u0131nda Minbya \u015fehrinde ba\u015flayan ve sonras\u0131nda b\u00fct\u00fcn Arakan\u2019a yay\u0131lan \u015fiddet olaylar\u0131nda 150.000 Arakanl\u0131 M\u00fcsl\u00fcman katledilmi\u015fti. Bu tarihi katliam s\u0131ras\u0131nda vatan\u0131n\u0131 terk ederek kom\u015fu \u00fclkelere s\u0131\u011f\u0131nan  Arakanl\u0131 M\u00fcsl\u00fcmanlar\u0131n say\u0131s\u0131 ise bilinmemektedir.\n\u0130HH\u2019n\u0131n Arakan Koordinat\u00f6r\u00fc Said Demir\u2019in yay\u0131nlad\u0131\u011f\u0131 Arakan Raporunda, 1942 y\u0131l\u0131nda M\u00fcsl\u00fcmanlara kar\u015f\u0131 giri\u015filen katliam\u0131n yaralar\u0131 sar\u0131lmam\u0131\u015fken, M\u00fcsl\u00fcmanlar\u0131n, 1947 y\u0131l\u0131nda Burmal\u0131lar taraf\u0131ndan giri\u015filen yeni bir sald\u0131r\u0131n\u0131n hedefi olduklar\u0131 belirtilmektedir.\nArakanl\u0131 M\u00fcsl\u00fcmanlar\u0131n \u0130syan\u0131\n1962 Darbesine kadar devam eden s\u00fcre\u00e7te M\u00fcsl\u00fcmanlara kar\u015f\u0131 uygulanan bask\u0131 ve zul\u00fcm politikas\u0131 devam etti. Baz\u0131 M\u00fcsl\u00fcman guruplar Burma devletine kar\u015f\u0131 silahl\u0131 m\u00fccadele ba\u015flatt\u0131larsa da ba\u015far\u0131l\u0131 olamad\u0131lar. M\u00fcsl\u00fcmanlar\u0131n biraz g\u00fc\u00e7lendi\u011fi 1954 y\u0131l\u0131nda ise Burma ordusu MUSON OPERASYONU ad\u0131 verdi\u011fi kanl\u0131 bir sald\u0131r\u0131 ile M\u00fcsl\u00fcman g\u00fc\u00e7lerini da\u011f\u0131tt\u0131.
